3_11_2_Mugambe abaana ba Isiraeri nti Bino bye biramu bye munaalyanga ku nsolo zonna eziri ku nsi. 
3_11_3_Buli ekyawulamu ekinuulo, era ekirina ekigere ekyaseemu, era, ekirina ekigere ekyaseemu, era ekizza obwenkulumu, mu nsolo, ekyo kye kye munalyanga. 
3_11_4_Naye bino bye mutalyanga ku ebyo ebizza obwenkulumu oba ku ebyo ebyawulamu ekinuulo: eŋŋamira, kubanga ezza obwenkulumu naye teyawulamu kinuulo, eyo si nnongoofu gye muli. 
3_11_5_N'omusu kubanga guzza obwenkulumu nayetegwawulamu kinuulo, ogwo si mulongoofu gye muli. 
3_11_6_N'akamyu, kubanga kazza obwenkulumu naye tekaawulamu kinuulo, ako si kalongoofu gye muli. 
3_11_7_N'embizzi kubanga eyawulamu ekinuulo era erina ekigere ekyaseemu, naye tezza bwenkulumu, eyo si nnongoofu gye muli. 
3_11_8_Ku nnyama yaazo temulyangako, so n'emirambo gyazo temugikomangako; si nnongoofu gye muli. 
3_11_9_Bino bye munaalyanga ku byonna ebiri mu mazzi: buli ekirina amaggwa n'amagamba mu mazzi, mu nnyanja ne mu migga, ebyo bye munaalyanga. 
3_11_10_Era buli ekitalina maggwa na magamba mu nnyanja ne mu migga, ku byonna ebitambulira mu mazzi ne ku biramu byonna ebiri mu mazzi, bya muzizo gye muli, 
3_11_11_era binaabanga bya muzizo gye muli; temulyanga ku nnyama yaabyo, n'emirambo gyabyo munaagiyitanga gya muzizo. 
3_11_12_Buli ekitalina maggwa newakubadde amagamba mu mazzi, ekyo kya muzizo gye muli. 
3_11_13_Na bino bye munaayitanga eby'omuzuo ku nnyonyi; tebiriibwanga, bya muzizo: ennunda, n'empungu, ne makwanzi; 
3_11_14_ne kamunye, n'eddiirawamu n'engeri yaalyo; 
3_11_15_buli namuŋŋoona n'engeri yaabo; 
3_11_16_ne maaya, n'olubugabuga, n'olusove, n'enkambo n'engeri yaayo; 
3_11_17_n'ekiwuugulu, n'enkobyokkoobyo, n'ekkufufu; 
3_11_18_n'ekiwuugulu eky'amatu, ne kimbala, n'ensega; 
3_11_19_ne kasida, ne mpaabaana n'engeri ye, n'ekkookootezi, n'ekinyira. 
3_11_20_Ebyewalula byonna ebirina ebiwaawaatiro ebitambuza amagulu ana bya muzizo gye muli. 
3_11_21_Naye bino bye muyinza okulya ku byonna ebyewalula ebirina ebiwaawaatiro ebitambuza amagulu ana, ebirina amagulu waggulu ku bigere byabyo, okugabuusa ku nsi; 
3_11_22_bino bye muyinza okulya ku ebyo enzige n'engeri yaayo, n'enseenene n'engeri yaayo, n'akanyeenkule n'engeri yaako, n'ejjanzi n'engeri yaalyo. 
3_11_23_Naye ebyewalula byonna ebirina ebiwaawaatiro, ebirina amagulu ana, bya muzizo gye muli. 
3_11_24_Na bino bye binaabafuulanga abatali balongoofu: buli anaakomanga ku mulambo gwabyo anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi 
3_11_25_era buli asitula ku mulambo gwabyo anaayozanga engoye ze, era anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_11_26_Buli nsolo eyawulamu ekinuulo, so nga terina kigere kyaseemu, so tezza bwenkulumu, si noongoofu gye muli: buli anaazikomangako anaabanga atali mulongoofu. 
3_11_27_Era buli etambuza ebibatu byayo ku nsolo zonna ezitambuza amagulu ana, ezo si nnongoofu gye muli: buli anaakomanga ku mulambo gwazo anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_11_28_Era oyo asitula omulambo gwazo anaayozanga engoye ze, era anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi: ezo si nnongoofu gye muli. 
3_11_29_Na bino bye bitali birongoofu gye muli ku byewalula ebyewalula ku nsi; eggunju, n'emmese, n'ekkonkomi eddene n'engeri yaalyo, 
3_11_30_ne anaka, n'enswaswa, n'omunya, n'ekkonkomi, ne nnawolovu. 
3_11_31_Ebyo bye bitali birongoofu gye muli ku ebyo byonna ebyewalula: buli anaabikomangako, nga bifudde, anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_11_32_Era ekintu kyonna ekinaagwibwangako kyonna kyonna ku byo, nga bifudde, kinaaI banga ekitali kirongoofu; bwe kibanga ekintu kyonna eky'omuti, oba kyambalo, oba ddiba, oba nsawo, oba kintu kyonna kyonna, ekikoza omulimu gwonna, kikigwaniranga okuteekebwa mu mazzi, era kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi; ne kiryoka kiba ekirongoofu. 
3_11_33_Na buli kintu eky'e'bbumba, ekinaagwibwangamu kyonna kyonna ku byo, ekibanga mu kyo kyonna kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu, nakyo munaakyasanga. 
3_11_34_Eky'okulya kyonna ekirimu ekiriika, ekiyinza okufukibwako amazzi, kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu : na buli kya kunywa ekinaaywebwanga mu buli kintu (ekiri bwe kityo) kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu. 
3_11_35_Era buli kintu ekinaagwibwangako ekitundu kyonna eky'omulambo gwabyo kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu; oba kabiga, oba amasiga g'entamu, kinaamenyebwamenyebwanga: si birongoofu, era binaabanga ebitali birongoofu gye muli. 
3_11_36_Naye oluzzi oba obunnya omuli amazzi agakuinaanyizibwa kinaabanga ekirongoofu: naye ekinaakomanga ku mulambo gwabyo kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu. 
3_11_37_Era oba nga ku mulambo gwabyo kugwa ku nsigo yonna ey'okusiga egenda okusigibwa, yo eneebanga nnongoofu. 
3_11_38_Naye oba ng'amazzi gafukibwa ku nsigo, ne ku mulambo gwabyo ne kugwa okwo, nga si nnongoofu gye muli. 
3_11_39_Era oba ng'ensolo yonna, gye muyinza okulyako, efa; akoma ku mulambo gwayo anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_11_40_N'oyo anaalyanga ku mulambo gwayo anaayozanga engoye ze era anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi: era n'oyo anaasitulanga omulambo gwayo anaayozanga engoye ze era anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi, 
3_11_41_Na buli ekyewalula ekyewalula ku nsi kya muzizo; tekiriibwanga. 
3_11_42_Buli ekitambuza olubuto, na buli ekitambuza amagulu ana, oba bud ekirina amagulu amangi, buli ebyewalula ku nsi, ebyo temubiryanga; kubanga bya muzizo. 
3_11_43_Temwegwagwawazanga na kyewalula kyonna, so temwefuulanga nabyo abatali balongoofu, mubeere n'empitambi bwe mutyo. 
3_11_44_Kubanga nze Mukama Katonda wammwe: kale mwetukuzenga, mubeerenga abatukuvu; kubanga nze ndi mutukuvu: so temwereeteranga mpitambi olw'engeri yonna ey'ekyewalula ekitambula ku nsi. 
3_11_45_Kubanga nze ndi Mukama eyabalinnyisa okuva mu nsi y'e Misiri, okuba Katonda wammwe, kale mmwe munaabanga abatukuvu: kubanga nze ndi mutukuvu. 
3_11_46_Eryo lye tteeka ery'ensolo n'ery'ennyonyi n'erya buli kitonde ekiramu ekitambula mu mazzi, n'erya buli kitonde ekyewalula ku nsi: 
3_11_47_okwawulamu ebitali birongoofu n'ebirongoofu, n'ekiramu ekiriika n'ekiramu ekitaliika. 
3_12_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_12_2_Gamba abaana ba Isiraeri nti Omukazi bw'anaabanga olubuto n'azaala omwana ow'obulenzi, kale omukazi oyo anaabanga atali mulongoofu ennaku musanvu; nga bw'abeera mu nnaku ez'okweyawula kw'endwadde ye, bw'atyo bw'anaabanga atali mulongoofu. 
3_12_3_Awo ku lunaku olw'omunaana omubiri gw'ekikuta kye gunaakomolwanga. 
3_12_4_Era omukazi anaamalanga ennaku asatu mu ssatu mu ez'okutukuzibwa kwe lwe ziriggwa. 
3_12_5_Naye bw'anaazaalanga omwana ow'obuwala, kale anaabanga atali mulongoofu ssabbiiti bbiri, nga bw'abeera mu kweyawula kwe; era anaamalanga ennaku nkaaga mu mukaaga mu musaayi ogw'okutukuzibwa kwe. 
3_12_6_Awo ennaku ez'okutukuzibwa kwe bwe ziggwanga; ez'ow'obulenzi, oba za wa buwala, anaaleetanga omwana gw'endiga ogw'omwaka ogw'olubereberye okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, n'ejjiba etto, oba kaamukuukulu, okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, eri kabona: 
3_12_7_kale anaagiwangayo mu maaso ga Mukama, n'amutangirira; kale anaalongoosebwanga mu nsulo y'omusaayi gwe. Eryo lye tteeka ly'omukazi azaala, oba wa bulenzi oba wa buwala. 
3_12_8_Era mu bintu bye bw'ataayinzenga kuleeta mwana gwa ndiga, kale anaatwalanga bakaamukuukulu babiri, oba amayiba amato abiri; erimu okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, n'eddala okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi: era kabona anaamutangiriranga era anaabanga mulongoofu. 
3_13_1_Era Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
3_13_2_Omuntu bw'anaabAnga n'ekizimba oba kikuta oba mbalabe etvngudde ku ddiba ly'omubiri gwe, ne kifuuka endwadde y'ebigenge ku ddiba ly'omubiri gwe, kale anaaleetebwanga eri Alooni kabona, oba eri omu ku baana be bakabona: 
3_13_3_kale kabona anaakeberanga endwadde eri ku ddiba ly'omubiri: era obwoya obuli awali endwadde bwe buba nga bufuuse obweru, ne kifaananyi ky'endwadde nga kifulumye wansi w'eddiba ly'omubiri gwe, nga ye ndwadde y'ebigenge: awo kabona anaamukeberanga, n'amwatulira nga si mulongoofu. 
3_13_4_Era embalabe erungudde bw'ebanga enjeru ku ddiba ly'omubiri gwe, n'ekifaananyi kyayo nga tekifulumye wansi w'eddiba, n'obwoya bwawo nga tebufuuse bweru, kale kabona snaasibiranga ow'endwadde ennaku musanvu: 
3_13_5_awo kabona alimukebera ku lunaku olw'omusanvu: kale, laba, bw'anaalabanga ng'endwadde ekomye awo; n'endwadde nga tebunye ku ddiba, awo kabona anaamusibiranga ennaku musanvu endala: 
3_13_6_awo kabona alimukebera nate ku lunaku olw'omusanvu: kale, laba, endwadde bw'eba nga tekyalabika nnyo, n'endwadde nga tebunye ku ddiba, kale kabona anaamwatuliranga nga mulongoofu: nga kye kikuta: kale anaayozanga engoye ze, n'aba mulongoofu 
3_13_7_Naye ekikuta bwe kinaabunanga ku ddiba, ag'amaze okweraga eri kabona olw'okulongoosebwa kwe, aneeraganga nate eri kabona: 
3_13_8_kale kabona anaakeberanga, era, laba, ekikuta bwe kinaabanga kibunye ku ddiba, awo kabona anaamwatuliranga nga si mulongaofu: nga bye bigenge. 
3_13_9_Endwadde y'ebigenge bw'ebanga ekutte omuntu, awo anaaleetebwanga eri kabona; 
3_13_10_kabona n'akebera, kale, laba, ekizimba ekyeru bwe kinaabanga ku ddiba, era nga kifudde obwoya okuba obweru, era ennyama enjere ennamu ng'eri awali ekizimba, 
3_13_11_nga bye bigenge eby'edda ku ddiba ly'omubiri gwe, era kabona anaamwatuliranga nga si mulongoofu: tamusibanga; kubanga oyo si mulongoofu. 
3_13_12_Era ebigenge bwe bifuutuukanga ku ddiba, ebigenge ne bibuna eddiba lyonna ery'omulwadde okuva ku mutwe okutuusa ku bigere, okulaba kwonna kabona kw'anaalabanga; 
3_13_13_kale kabona anaakeberanga: awo, laba, ebigenge bwe binaabanga bibunye omubiri gwe gwonaa, anaamwatuliranga omulwadde nga mulongoofu: byonna bifuuse okuba ebyeru: oyo mulongoofu. 
3_13_14_Naye ennyama enjere bw'eneerabikanga ku yc, anaabanga atali mulongoofu. 
3_13_15_Awo kabona anaakebeianga ennyama enjere, n'amwatulira nga si mulongoofu: ennyama enjere si nnongoofu: bye bigenge. 
3_13_16_Oba ennyama enjere bw'ekyukanga nata n'efuuka okuba enjeru, kale anajjanga eri kabona, 
3_13_17_kabona n'amukebera: era, laba, endwadde bw'ebanga efuuse okuba onjeru, kale kabona anaamwatulirangs onnulwadde nga mulongoofu: oyo mulongoofu. 
3_13_18_Era omubiri bwe gunaabangako ejjute ku ddiba lyagwo, nalyo nga lyawona, 
3_13_19_n'awaali ejjute ne wabaawo ekizimba ekyeru, oba mbalabe erungudde, enjeruyeru era emmyufumyufu, kale kinaalagibwanga kabona; 
3_13_20_awo kabona anaakeberanga, era, laba, ekifaananyi kyakyo bwe kinaabanga nga kifulumye wansi w'eddiba, a'obwoya bwawo nga bufuuse okuba obweru, hale kabona anamwatuliranga nga si mulongoofu: ye ndwadde y'ebigenge, efulumye mu jjute. 
3_13_21_Naye kabona bw'anaakikeberanga, era, laba, nga temuli bwoya bweru, so nga tekifulumye wansi w'eddiba, naye nga tekirabika bulungi, awo kabona anaamusibiranga ennaku musanvu: 
3_13_22_awo bwe kinaabunanga ku ddiba, awo kabona anaamwatuliranga nga si mulongoofu: eyo ye ndwadde: 
3_13_23_Naye embalabe erungudde bw'eneekomanga 'awo, era nga tebunye, eyo nga ye enkovu ey'ejjute; awo kabona anaamwatuliranga nga mulongoofu. 
3_13_24_Oba omubiri bwe gunaabangako okwokebwa n'omuliro ku ddiba lyagwo, ennyama ennamu eyokeddwa n'efuuka okuba embalabe erungudde, enjeruyeru era lemmyufumyufu, oba njeru; 
3_13_25_awo kabona anaagikeberanga: era, laba, obwoya obw'omu mbalabe erungudde bwe bunaabanga bufuuse okuba obweru, n'ekifaananyi kyayo nga kifulumye wansi w'eddiba; bino bye bigenge, byafuluma awaayokebwa: kale kabona anaamwatuliranga nga si mulongoofu: nga ye ndwadde y'ebigenge. 
3_13_26_Naye kabona bw'anaagikeberanga, era, laba, nga tewali bwoya bweru awali embalabe erungudde, so nga tefulumye wansi w'eddiba, naye nga terabika bulungi; kale kabona anaamusibiranga ennaku musanvu: 
3_13_27_kale kabona alimukebera ku lunaku olw'omusaavu: bw'eneebunanga ku ddiba, kale kabona anaamwatuliranga nga si mulongoofu: nga ye ndwadde y'ebigenge. 
3_13_28_Era embalabe erungudde bw'eneekomanga awo, nga tebunye ku ddiba, era nga terabika bulungi; nga kye kizimba eky'okwo kebwa, era kabona anaamwatuliranga nga mulongoofu: kubanga eyo ye nkovu ey'okwokebwa. 
3_13_29_Era omusajja oba mukazi bw'anaabanga n'endwadde ku mutwe oba ku kirevu, 
3_13_30_kale kabona anaakeberanga endwadde: awo, laba, ekifaananyi kyayo bwe kinaabanga nga kifulumye wansi w'eddiba, era nga mulimu enviiri eza kyenvu ez'entalaaga, kale kabona anaamwatuliranga nga si mulongoofu: ekyo kye kikakampa, bye bigenge eby'oku mutwe oba eby'oku kirevu. 
3_13_31_Era kabona bw'anaakeberanga endwadde ey'ekikakampa, era, laba, ekifaananyi kyayo nga tekifulumye wansi w'eddiba, so nga tewali nviiri nzirugavu, kale kabona anaamusibiranga omulwadde w'ekikakampa ennaku musanvu: 
3_13_32_awo ku lunaku olw'omusanvu kabona alikebera endwadde: era laba, ekikakampa bwe kinaabanga nga tekibunye, so nga tewali nviiri za kyenvu, n'ekifaananyi ky'ekikakampa nga tekifulumye wansi w'eddiba, 
3_13_33_kale anaamwebwanga, naye ekikakampa takimwanga; era kabona anaasibiranga omulwadde w'ekikakampa ennaku musanvu endala: 
3_13_34_awo ku lunaku olw'omusanvu kabona alikebera ekikakampa: kale, laba, ekikakampa bwe kinaabanga nga tekibunye ku ddiba, n'ekifaananyi kyakyo nga tekifulumye wansi w'eddiba; awo kabona anaamwatuliranga nga mulongoofu: kale anaayozanga engoye ze, n'aba mulongoofu. 
3_13_35_Naye ekikakampa bwe kinaabunanga ku ddiba ng'amaze okulongoosebwa; 
3_13_36_awo kabona anaamukeberanga: era, laba, ekikakampa bwe kinaabanga kibunye ku ddiba, kabona tanoonyanga nviiri za kyenvu; oyo si mulongoofu. 
3_13_37_Naye bw'anaalabanga ng'ekikakampa kikomye awo, n'enviiri enzirugavu nga zimezeewo; ekikakampa nga kiwonye, oyo mulongoofu: kale kabona anaamwatuliranga nga mulongoofu. 
3_13_38_Era omusajja oba mukazi bw'anaabanga n'embalabe ezirungudde ku ddiba ly'omubiri gwabwe, ze mbalabe ezirungudde enjeru; 
3_13_39_kale kabona anaakeberanga: awo, laba, embalabe ezi rungudde eziri ku ddiba ly'omubiri gwabwe bwe zinaabanga enjeruyeru; nga bwe butulututtu, nga bufulumye mu ddiba; oyo mulongoofu. 
3_13_40_Era omusajja bw'anaabanga akuunyuuse enviiri ez'oku mutwe gwe, oyo nga wa kiwalaata; (naye) mulongoofu. 
3_13_41_Era bw'anaabanga akuunyuuse enviiri ez'omu kawumpo, nga wa kiwalaata kya mu kawumpo; naye nga mulongoofu. 
3_13_42_Naye endwadde enjeruyeru era emmyafumyufu bw'eneebanga ku mutwe ogw'ekiwalaata oba mu kawumpo ak'ekiwalaata; ebyo bye bigenge ebifuluma mu mutwe gwe ogw'ekiwalaata oba mu kawumpo ke ak'ekiwalaata. 
3_13_43_Awo kabona anaamukeberanga: kale, laba, ekizimba eky'endwadde bwe kinaabanga ekyeruyeru era ekimyufumyufu ku mutwe gwe ogw'ekiwalaata, oba mu kawumpo ke ak'ekiwalaata, ng'ekifaananyi ky'ebigenge bwe kiri ku ddiba ly'omubiri; 
3_13_44_oyo nga wa bigenge, si mulongoofu: kabona talemanga kumwatulira nga si mulongoofu; endwadde ng'eri ku mutwe gwe. 
3_13_45_Era omugenge alina endwadde, engoye ze zinaabanga enjulifuyulifu, n'enviiri ez'oku mutwe gwe tazisibangako, era anaabikkanga ku mumwa gwe ogw'engulu, era anaayagereranga waggulu nti Siri mulongoofu, siri mulongoofu. 
3_13_46_Ennaku zonna eadwadde ng'ekyali ku ye anaabanga atali mulongoofu; si mulongoofu: anaabeeranga yekka; ennyumba ye eneebanga bweru wa lusiisira. 
3_13_47_Era n'ekyambalo ekiriko endwadde y'ebigenge, oba kyambalo kya byoya bya ndiga oba kyambalo kya bafuta; 
3_13_48_bwe bibanga ku wuuzi ez'obusimba oba ku z'obukiika; oba kya bafuta oba kya byoya; bwe bibanga ku ddiba oba ku kintu ekikolebwa n'eddiba; 
3_13_49_awo kabona anaakeiberanga endwadde, n'asibira eki kyambalo, oba ku wuuzi ez'obusimba, oba ku z'obukiika, oba ku ddiba, omulimu gwonna eddiba gwe likola; endwadde nga bigenge ebirya; nga si kirongoofu. 
3_13_50_Awo anaayokyanga ekyambalo, oba wuuzi za busimba, oba za bukiika, oba ng'eri mu byoya oba mu bafuta, oba mu kintu kyonna eky'eddiba, omuli endwadde: kubanga ebyo bye bigenge ebirya; kinaayokebwanga mu muliro. 
3_13_51_Era kabona bw'anaakeberanga, kale, laba, endwadde nga tebunye mu kyambalo, newakubadde mu wuuzi ez'obusimba, newakubadde mu z'obukiika, newakubadde mu kintu kyonna eky'eddiba; 
3_13_52_kale kabona anaalagiranga booze ekintu ekirimu endwadde, n'akisibira ennaku musanvu endala: 
3_13_53_awo kabona anaakeberanga, endwadde ng'emaze okwozebwa: kale, laba, endwadde bw'eneebanga tekyusizza bbala lyayo, era endwadde nga tebunye, ekyo nga si kirongoofu; onookyokyanga mu muliro: eyo ye ndwadde erya, okukuubuuka bwe kunaabanga munda oba kungulu. 
3_13_54_kale kabona anaalagiranga booze ekintu ekirimu endwadde, n'akisibira ennaku musanvu endala: 
3_13_55_awo kabona anaakeberanga, endwadde ng'emaze okwozebwa: kale, laba, endwadde bw'eneebanga tekyusizza bbala lyayo, era endwadde nga tebunye, ekyo nga si kirongoofu; onookyokyanga mu muliro: eyo ye ndwadde erya, okukuubuuka bwe kunaabanga munda oba kungulu. 
3_13_56_Era kabona bw'anaakeberanga, era, laba, endwadde nga terabika bulungi ng'emaze okwozebwa, kale anaagiyuzanga okugiggya mu kyambalo oba mu ddiba, oba mu wuuzi ez'obusimba, oba mu z'obukiika: 
3_13_57_era bw'eneebanga ekyalabika mu kyambalo, oba mu wuuzi ez'obusimba, oba mu z'obukiika, oba mu kintu kyonna eky'eddiba, ng'efuutuuka: onooyokyanga n'omuliro ekyo ekirimu endwadde. 
3_13_58_N'ekyambalo oba wuuzi ez'obusimba, obali ez'obukiika, oba kintu kyonna eky'eddiba nga bwe kinaabanga, ky'onooyozanga, endwadde bw'eneebanga, ebivuddemu, kale ne kiryoka kyozebwanga omulundi ogw'okubiri, ne kiba kirongoofu. 
3_13_59_Eryo lye tteeka ery'endwadde y'ebigenge mu kyambalo eky'ebyoya oba mu kyall bafuta, oba muwuuzi ez'obusimba, oba mu z'obuliika, oba mu kintu kyonna eky'eddiba, okukyatuliranga nga kirongoofu, oba okukyatuliranga nga si kirongoofu. 
3_14_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_14_2_Lino lye linaabanga etteeka ly'omugenge ku lunaku olw'okulongoosebwa kwe: anaaleetebwanga eri kabona: 
3_14_3_awo kabona anaafulumanga mu lusiisira; kabona n'akebera, kale, laba, endwadde y'ebigenge bw'eneebanga ewonye ku mugenge 
3_14_5_awo kabona anaalagiranga okuttako emu ku nnyonyi mu kintu ky'ebbumba ku mazzi agakulukuta: 
3_14_6_n'ennyonyi ennamu anaagiddiranga n'omuti omwerezi n'olugoye olumyufu n'ezobu, n'annyika ebyo n'ennyonyi ennamu mu musaayi gw'ennyonyi ettiddwa ku mazzi agakulukuta: 
3_14_7_awo anaamansiranga ku oyo agenda okulongoosebwako ebigenge emirundi musanvu, n'amwatulira nga mulongoofu, n'ateera ennyonyi ennamu mu ttale mu bbanga. 
3_14_8_N'oyo agenda okulongoosebwa anaayozanga engoye ze, n'amwa enviiri ze zonna, n'anaaba mu mazzi, kale anaabanga mulongoofu: oluvannyuma n'alyoka ayingira mu lusiisira, naye anaamalanga ennaku musanvu ng'ali bweru w'eweema ye. 
3_14_9_Awo olunaaruukanga ku lunaku olw'omusanvu, anaamwanga enviiri ze zonna okuziggya ku mutwe gwe n'ebirevu bye n'ebisige bye, enviiri ze zonna anaazimwanga: era anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba omubiri gwe mu mazzi, kale anaabanga mulongoofu. 
3_14_10_Awo ku lunaku olw'omunaana anaddiranga abaana b'endiga abalume babiri abataliiko bulema, n'omwana gw'endiga omuluusi ogiunu ogwakamaze omwaka ogumu ogutaliiko bulema, n'ebitundu bisatu eby'ekkumi eby'obutta obulungi okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta, obutabuddwamu amafuta, n'ekibya kimu eky'amafuta. 
3_14_11_Ne kabona amulongoosa anaateekanga omuntu: agenda okulongoosebwa n'ebintu ebyo mu maaso ga Mukama, ku mulyango gw'eweeina ey'okusisinkanirangamu: 
3_14_12_awo kabona anaddirangako gumu ku baana b'endiga omulume, n'aguwaayo okuba ekiweebwayo olw'omusango n’ekibya eky’amafuta, n’abiwuuba okuba ekiweebwayo ekiwuubibwa mu maaso ga Mukama. 
3_14_13_anattirwanga omwana gw'endiga omulume mu kifo mwe battira ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi n'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, mu kifo ekiri mu kifo ekitukuvu: kubanga ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi nga bwe kiri ekya kabona, ekiweebwayo olw'omusango bwe kiri bwe kiti: ekyo kitukuvu nnyo; 
3_14_14_kale kabona anaddiranga ku musaayi gw'ekiweebwayo olw'omusango, kabona n'aguteeka ku nsonda y'okutu okwa ddyo okw'oyo agenda okulongoosebwa, ne ku kinkumu eky'oku mukono gwe ogwa ddyo, ne ku kisajja eky'okukigere kye ekya ddyo: 
3_14_15_kale kabona anaddiranga ku kibya ky'amafuta, n'agafuka mu kibatu eky'omukono gwe ye ogwa kkono: 
3_14_16_awo kabona anannyikanga olunwe lwe olwa ddyo mu mafuta agali mu mukono gwe ogwa kkono, n'amansira ku mafuta n'olunwe lwe emirundi musanvu mu maaso ga Mukama: 
3_14_17_ne ku mafuta agasigalawo agali mu mukono gwe kabona anaagateekanga ku nsonda y'okutu okwa ddyo okw'oyo agenda okulongoosebwa, ne ku kinkumu eky'oku mukono gwe ogwa ddyo, ne ku kisajja eky'okukigere kye ekya ddyo, ku musaayi gw'ekiweebwayo olw'omusango: 
3_14_18_n'amafuta agasigalawo agali mu mukono gwa kabona anaagateekanga ku mutwe gw'oyo agenda okulongoosebwa: era kabona anaamutangiriranga mu maaso ga Mukama. 
3_14_19_Era kabona anaawangayo ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'atangirira oyo agenda okulongoosebwa olw'obutali bulongoofu bwe: oluvannyuma n'alyoka atta ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa: 
3_14_20_era kabona anaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ku kyoto: era kabona anaamutangiriranga, kale anaabanga mulongoofu. 
3_14_21_Era bw'anaabanga omwavu n'atayinza kufuna ebyenkana awo, kale anaddiranga omwana gw'endiga ogumu omulume okuba ekiweebwayo olw'omusango okuwuubibwa, okumutangirira, n'ekitundu kimu eky'ekkumi eky'obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta, n'ekibya ky'amafuta; 
3_14_22_ne bakaamukuukulu babiri oba amayiba amato abiri, nga bw'anaayinzanga okufuna; erimu linaabanga ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi n'eddala ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa. 
3_14_23_Ne ku lunaku olw'omunaana anaagaleeteranga kabona olw'okulongoosebwa kwe, ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, mu maaso ga Mukama. 
3_14_24_Awo kabona anaddiranga omwana gw'endiga ogw'ekiweebwayo olw'omusango, n'ekibya ky'amafuta, kabona n'abiwuuba mu maaso ga Mukama okuba ekiweebwayo ekiwuubibwa: 
3_14_25_n'atta omwana gw'endiga ogw'ekiweebwayo olw'omusango, kabona n'atoala ku musaayi ogw'ekiwee,bwayo olw'omusango, n'aguteekaku nsonda y'okuru okwa ddyo okw'oyo agenda okulongoosebwa, ne ku kinkumu eky'omukono gwe ogwa ddyo, ne ku kisajja eky'oku kigere kye ekya ddyo: 
3_14_26_awo kabona anaafukanga ku mafuta mu kibatu ky'omukono gwe ye ogwa kkono: 
3_14_27_kabona n'amansira n'olunwe lwe olwa ddyo ku mafuta lagali mu mukono gwe ogwa kl:ono emirundi musanw mu maaso ga Mukama: 
3_14_28_kabona n'atoola ku mafuta agali mu mukono gwe n'agateeka ku nsonda y'okutu okwa ddyo okw'oyo agenda okulongoosebwa, ne ku kinkumu eky'omukono gwe ogwa ddyo, ne ku kisajja eky'oku kigere kye ekya ddyo, mu kifo eky'omusaayi ogw'ekiweebwayo olw'omusango: 
3_14_29_n'amafuta agasigalawo agali mu mukono gwa kabona anaagateekanga ku mutwe gw'oyo agenda okulongoosebwa, akumutangirira mu maaso ga Mukama. 
3_14_30_Era anaawangayo ku bakaamukuukulu omu, oba ku mayiba amato limu, nga bw'anaayinzanga okufuna; 
3_14_31_nga bw'anaayinzanga okufuna, erimu lya kiweebwayo otw'ekibi, n'eddala lya kiweebwayo ekyokebwa, awamu n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta: era kabana anaatangiriranga oyo agenda okulongoosebwa mu maaso ga Mukama. 
3_14_32_Eryo lye tteeka ly'oya aliko endwadde y'ebigenge, atayin2a kufuna bya kulongoosebwa kwe. 
3_14_33_Era Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
3_14_34_Bwe muliba nga muruuse mu nsi ya Kanani, gye mbawa okuba obutaka, bwe nnaateekanga endwadde y'ebigeage mu nnyumba ey'omu nsi ey'obutaka bwammwe; 
3_14_35_awo nannyini nnyumba anajjanga n'abuulira kabona nti Ennyumba efaanana gye ndi okubaamu endwadde: 
3_14_36_kale kabona anaalagiranga okumalamu ebintu mu nnyumba, kabona nga tannaba kuyingira kulaba ndwadde, byonna ebiri mu nnyumba bireme okufuuka ebitali birongoofu: oluvannyuma kabona n'alyoka ayingira okulaba ennyumba: 
3_14_37_kale anaakeberanga endwadde, era, laba, endwadde bw'eneebanga ku bisenge by'ennyumba nga byewummuddewummudde, enguudo oba nga za nnawaadagala oba mmyufumyufu, n'ekifaananyi kyayo nga kifulumye munda w'ekisenge; 
3_14_38_awo kabona anaafulumanga mu nnyumba n'agenda ku mulyango gw'ennyumba, n'aggalira ennyumba ennaku musanvu: 
3_14_39_kale kabona anaakomangawo ku lunaku olw'omusanvu, n'akebera: era, laba, endwadde bw'eneebanga ebunye ku bisenge by'ennyumba; 
3_14_40_kale kabona anaalagiranga okuggyamu amayinja agaliko endwadde, n'okugasuula mu kifo ekitali kirongoofu ebweru w'ekibuga: 
3_14_41_era anaalagiranga ennyumba okugikolokota munda enjuyi zonna, era banaafukanga ennoai gye bakolokota ebweru w'ekibuga mu kifo ekitali kirongoofu; 
3_14_42_ne baddira amayinja amalala, ne bagateeka mu kifo ky'amayinja ago; n'addira ennonii endala, n'agisiiga ku nnyumba. 
3_14_43_Awo endwadde bw'eneekoma-' ngawo n'efuutuuka ku nnyumba, ng'amaze okuggyamu amayinja, era ng'amaze okukolokota ennyumba, era ng'emaze okusiigibwako; 
3_14_44_kale kabona anaayingiranga n'akebera, era, laba, endwadde bw'eneebanga ebunye ku nnyumba, ebyo nga bye bigenge ebirya mu nnyumba: nga si nnongoofu. 
3_14_45_Awo anaayabyanga ennyumba, amayinja gaayo, n'emiti gyayo, n'ennoni yonna ey'ennyumba; era anaabisitulanga n'abiggya mu kibuga n'abitwala mu kifo ekitali kirongoofu. 
3_14_46_Era nate buli anaayingiranga mu nnyumba ekiseera kyonna ng'ekyali nzigale anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_14_47_Era buli anaasulanga mu nnyumba eyo anaayozanga engoye ze; n'oyo anaaliiranga mu nnyumba eyo anaayozanga engoye ze. 
3_14_48_Era kabona bw'anaayingiranga, n'akebera, era, laba, endwadde nga tebunye ku nnyumba, ennyuxnba ng'emaze okusiigibwako; kale kabona anaayatuliranga ennyumba nga nnongoofu, kubanga endwadde ng'e wonye. 
3_14_49_Awo anaddiranga olw'okulongoosa ennyumba ennyoayi bbiri, n'omuti omwerezi, n'olugoye olumyufu, n'ezobu: 
3_14_50_n'attako emu ku nnyonyi mu kintu ky'ebbumba ku mazzi agakulukuta: 
3_14_51_n'addira omuti omwerezi n'ezobu n'olugoye olumyufu n'ennyonyi ,ennamu, n'abinnyika mu musaayi !gw'ennyonyi ettiddwa, ne mu mazzi ago agakulukuta, . n'amansira ku nnyumba emirundi musanvu: 
3_14_52_era anaalongoosanga ennyumba n'omusaayi gw'ennyonyi, n'amazzi ago agakulukuta, n'ennyonyi ennamu, n'omuti omwerezi, n'ezobu, n'olugoye olumyufu: 
3_14_53_naye anaateeranga ennyonyi ennamu mu ttale mu bbanga okuva mu kibuga: bw'atyo bw'anaatangiriranga ennyumba: awo eneebanga nnongoofu. 
3_14_54_Eryo lye tteeka ly'engeri yonna ey'endwadde y'ebigenge, era ery'ekikakampa; 
3_14_55_era ery'ebigenge eby'okukyambalo, era ery'ennyumba; 
3_14_56_era ery'ekizimba, era ery'ekikuta, era ery'embalabe erungudde: 
3_14_57_okuyigirizanga bwe kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu, era bwe kinaabanga ekirongoofu: eryo lye tteeka ly'ebigenge. 
3_15_1_Era Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
3_15_2_Mugambe abaaIna ba Isiraeri mubabuulire nti Omusajja yenna bw’abaabanga n’enziku eva mu mubiri gwe; nga simulongoofu olw'enziku ye. 
3_15_3_Era buino bwe bunaabanga obutali bulongoofu bwe obw'enziku ye: oba ng'atonnya enziku mu mubiri gwe, oba nga yaziyizibwa enziku mu mubiri gwe, buno bwe butali bu longoofu bwe. 
3_15_4_Buli kitanda omuziku ky'anaasulangako kinaabanga kitali kirongoofu: era buli kintu ky'anaatuulangako kinaabanga kitali kirongoofu. 
3_15_5_Era buli anaakomanga ku kitanda kye anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_6_N'oyo anaatuulanga ku kintu kyonna omuziku ky'atuddeko anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_7_N'oyo anaakomanga ku mubiri gw'omuziku anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_8_Era omuziku bw'anaawandanga amalusu ku mulongoofu; kale anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_9_N'amatandiiko gonna omuziku g'aneebagalirangako ganaabanga agatali malongoofu. 
3_15_10_Ne buli anaakomanga ku kintu kyonna ekibadde wansi we anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi: n'oyo anaasitulanga ebyo' anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mw mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_11_Na buli omuziku gw'anaakomangako, nga tannanaaba ngalo mu mazzi, anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofn okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_12_Na buli omuziku gw'anaakomangako, nga tannanaaba ngalo mu mazzi, anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_13_N'ekintu ky'ebbumba omuziku ky'anaakomangako kinaayasibwanga: na buli kintu ky'omuti kinaayozebwanga mu mazzi. 
3_15_14_Era omuziku bw'anaalongoosebwangako enziku ye, kale aneebaliranga ennaku musanvu olw'okulongoosebwa kwe, n'ayoza engoye ze; n'anaaba omubiri gwe mu mazzi agakulukuta, n'aba mulongoofu. 
3_15_15_kale kabona anaagawangayo, erimu lya kiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'eddala lya kiweebwayo ekyokebwa; era kabona anaamutangiriranga mu maaso ga Mukama olw'enziku ye. 
3_15_16_Era omusajja yenna bw'anaavangamu amaanyi, kale anaanaabanga omubiri gwe gwonna mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu oku tuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_17_Na buli kyambalo, na buli ddiba, omuli amaanyi, kinaayozebwanga n'amazzi, ne kiba ekitali kirongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_18_Era n'omukazi omusajja gw'anaasulanga naye n'amaanyi, bombi banaanaabanga mu mazzi, ne baba abatali balongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_19_Era omukazi bw'anaabanga n'enziku, n'enziku ye mu mubiri gwe nga ya musaayi, anaamalanga ennaku musanvu ez'okweyawula kwe: na buli anaamukomangako anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_20_Na buli kintu ky'anaasulangako mu biro by'okweyawula kwe kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu: era buli kintu ky'anaatuulangako kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu. 
3_15_21_Na buli anaakomanga ku kitanda kye anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_22_Na buli anaakomanga ku kintu kyonna ky'atuddeko anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_23_Era bwe kinaabanga ku kitanda, oba ku kintu kyonna ky'atuddeko, bw'anaakikomangako, anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_24_Era omusajja yenna bw'anaasulanga naye, n'obutali bulongoofu bwe ne buba ku ye, kale anaabanga latali mulongoofu ennaku musanvu; na buli kitanda ky'anaasulangako kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu. 
3_15_25_Era omukazi bw'anaavangamu omusaayi gwe ennaku nnyingi so nga si bye biro eby'okweyawula kwe, oba bw'anaavangamu omusaayi okusukkirira ebiro eby'okweyawula kwe; ennaku zonna z'anaaviirangamu omusaayi ogw'obutali bulongoofu bwe anaabanga nga bw'aba mu nnaku ez'okweyawula kwe: oyo nga si mulongoofu. 
3_15_26_Buli kitanda ky'anaasulangako ennaku zonna z'anaaviirangamu omusaayi kinaabanga gy'ali ng'ekitanda eky'okweyawula kwe: era buli ky'anaatuulangako kinaabanga ekitali kirongoofu, ng'obutali bulongoofu obw'okweyawula kwe. 
3_15_27_Era buli anaakomanga ku ebyo anaabanga atali mulongoofu, n'ayoza engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
3_15_28_Naye bw'anaalongoosebwanga olw'omusaayi okumuvaamu, kale aneebaliranga ennaku musanvu, oluvannyuma n'alyoka aba omulongoofu. 
3_15_29_Awo ku lunaku olw'omunaana aneetwaliranga bakaamukuukulu babiri, oba amayiba amato abiri, n'agatwalira kabona, ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
3_15_30_Awo kabona anaawangayo erimu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'eddala okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; era kabona anaamutangiriranga mu maaso ga Mukama olw'okuvaamu omusaayi ogw'obutali bulongoofu bwe. 
3_15_31_Bwe mutyo bwe munaayawulanga abaana ba Isiraeri n'obutali bulongoofu bwabwe; baleme okufiira mu butali bulongoofu bwabwe, bwe banaayonoonanga eweema yange eri wakati mu bo. 
3_15_32_Eryo lye tteeka ly'omuziku n'oyo avaamu amaanyi, n'okufuula ne gamufuula atali mulongoofu; 
3_15_33_era ery'omukazi alwadde olw'okweyawula kwe, era ery'omuziku, omusaja, era ery'omukazi, era ery'oyo asula n'omukazi atali mulongoofu. 
3_16_1_Mukama n'ayogera ne Musa, batabani ba Alooni bombi nga bamaze okufa, bwe baasembera mu maaso ga Mukama ne bafa 
3_16_3_Bino Alooni by'anajjanga nabyo mu watukuvu: ng'alina ente ennume envubuka okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'endiga enaume okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa. 
3_16_4_Anaayambalanga ekizibawo ekyo ekya bafuta ekitukuvu, era anaabanga ne seruwale eyo eya bafuta ku mubiri gwe, era nga yeesibye olukoba olwo olwa bafuta, era ng'atikkidde enkufbira eyo eya bafuta; ebyo bye byambalo ebitukuvu; era anaanaabanga omubiri gwe mu mazzi, n'abyambala. 
3_16_5_Awo anaatwalanga ku kibiina ky'abaana ba Isiraeri embuzi ennu 'me bbiri okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'endiga ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa. 
3_16_6_Awo Alooni anaayanjulanga ente ennume ey'ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, eyiye ku bubwe, ne yeetangirira ye n'ennyu mba ye. 
3_16_7_Awo anaatwalanga embuzi zombi, n'aziteeka mu maaso ga Mukama ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
3_16_8_Awo Alooni anaazikubiranga obululu embuzi zombi; akalulu akamu ka Mukama, n'akalulu ak'okubiri ka Azazeri. 
3_16_9_Awo Alooni anaayanjulanga embuzi egwiriddwako akalulu ka Mukama, n'agiwaayo okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi. 
3_16_10_Naye embuzi egwiriddwako akalulu ka Azazeri, eneetekebwanga mu maaso ga Mukama nga nnamu, okumutangirira, okugisindiikiriza eri Azazeri mu ddungu: 
3_16_11_Awo Alooni anaayanjulanga ente ennume ey'ekiweebwayo o1w'ekibi, eyiye ku bubwe, ne yeetangirira ye n'ennyumba ye, n'atta ente ennume ey'ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, eyiye ku bubwe: 
3_16_12_awo anaddiranga ekyoterezo ekijjudde amanda ag'omuliro ng'agaggya ku kyoto mu maaso ga Mukama, n'embatu ze nga zijjudde obubaane obw'akaloosa obusekuddwa ennyo, n'abuleeta munda w'eggigi: 
3_16_13_awo anaateekaaga obubaane ku muliro mu maaso ga Mukama, omukka ogw'obubaane 'gubikke ku atebe ey'okusaasira eri ku bujulirwa, aleme okufa: 
3_16_14_awo anaatoolanga ku musaayi gw'ente ennume, n'agumansira n'engalo ye ku ntebe ey'okusaasira ebuvanjuba; era anaamansiranga ku musaayi mu maaso g'entebe ey'okusaasira n'eIngalo ye emirundi musanvu. 
3_16_15_Awo anattanga embuzi ey'ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, ey'abantu, n'aleeta omusaayi gwayo munda w'eggigi, n'akola omusaayi gwayo nga bw'akoze omusaayi gw'ente ennume, n'agumansira ku ntebe ey'okusaasira, ne mu maaso g'entebe ey'okusaasira: 
3_16_16_era anaatangiriranga awatukuvu, olw'obutali bulongoofu bw'abaana ba Isiraeri, n'olw'ebyonoono byabwe, ebibi byabwe byonna: era bw'atyo bw'anaakolanga eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, ebeera nabo wakati mu butali bulongoofu bwabwe. 
3_16_17_So temubanga muntu mu eveema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, bw'anaayingiranga okutangirira mu watukuvu, okutuusa lw'anaafulumanga, ng'amaze okwetangirira ye n'ennyumba ye n'eki biina kyonna ekya Isiraeri. 
3_16_18_Awo anaafulumanga eri ekyoto ekiri mu maaso ga Mukama, n'akitangirira: n'atoola ku musaayi gw'ente ennume, ne ku musaayi gw'embuzi, n'agusiiga ku mayembe g'ekyoto enjuyi zonna. 
3_16_19_N'akimansirako omusaayi n'engalo ye emirundi musanvu, n'akirongoosa, n'akitukuza okukiggyako obutali bulongoofu bw'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
3_16_20_Awo bw'anaamaliranga ddala okutangirira awatukuw, n'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, n'ekyoto, anaayanjulanga embuzi ennamu: 
3_16_21_awo Alooni anaateekanga emikono gye gyombi ku mutwe gw'embuzi ennamu, n'ayatulira ku yo obutali buruukirivu bwonna obw'abaana ba Isiraeri, n'ebyonoono byabwe byonna, ebibi byabwe byonna; n'abiteeka ku mutwe gw'embuzi, n'agisindiikiriza mu ddungu mu mukono gw'omuntu eyeeteeseteese: 
3_16_22_era embuzi eneesituliranga ku yo obutali butuukirivu bwabwe bwonna n'ebutwala mu nsi eteriimu bantu: kale embuzi anaagiteeranga mu ddungu. 
3_16_23_Awo Aiooni anaayingiranga mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, n'ayambula ebyambalo ebya bafuta, by'abadde ayambadde ng'ayingidde mu watukuvu, n'abireka eyo: 
3_16_24_awo anaanaabiranga omubiri gwe n'amazzi mu kifo ekitukuvu, n'ayambala ebyambalo bye, n'afuluma, n'awaayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekikye n'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eky'abantu, ne yeetangirira ye n'abantu. 
3_16_25_N'amasanvu ag'ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi anaagookeranga ku kyoto. 
3_16_26_N'oyo ateera embuzi eri Azazeri anaayozanga ebyambalo bye, n'anaaba omubiri gwe mu mazzi, oluvannyuma n'alyoka ayingira mu lusiisira. 
3_16_27_N'ente ennume ey'ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'embuzi ey'ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, omusaayi gwayo oguyingizibwa okutangirira mu watukuw, zinaafulumizibwanga ebweru w'olusiisira; ne bookera mu muliro amaliba gaazo, n'ennyama yaazo, n'obusa bwazo. 
3_16_28_N'oyo abyokya amaayozanga ebyambalo bye n'anaaba omubiri gwe mu mazzi, oluvannyuma n'alyoka ayingira mulusiisira. 
3_16_29_Era lino linaabanga tteeka gye muli emirembe gyonna: mu mwezi ogw'omusanvu, ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'ekkumi, munaabonerezanga emmeeme zammwe, so temukolanga mulimu gwonna, enzaalwa I newakubadde omugenyi atuula mu mmwe: 
3_16_30_kubanga ku lunaku olwo kwe banaabatangiririranga, okubalongoosa; munaabanga balongoofu mu bibi byammwe byonna mu maaso ga Mukama. 
3_16_31_Olwo ye ssabbiiti ey'okuwummula ey'okwewombeekerako gye muli, era munaabonerezanga emmeeme zammwe: lye tteeka ery'emirembe gyonna. 
3_16_32_Era kabona, anaafukibwangako amafuta era anaayawulibwanga okuba kabona mu lufo kya kitaawe, anaatangiriranga era anaayambalanga ebyambalo ebya bafuta, ebyambalo ebitukuvu: 
3_16_33_era anaatangiriranga awatukuvu awaayawulibwa, era anaatangiriranga eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu n'ekyoto; era anaatangiriranga bakabona n'abantu bonna ab'ekibiina. 
3_16_34_Era lino linaabanga tteeka gye muli eritajjulukuka emirembe gyonna, okutangiriranga abaana ba Isiraeri olw'ebibi byabwe byonna omulundi gumu buli mwaka. N'akola nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
3_17_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_17_2_Yogera ne Alooni ne batabani be n'abaana ba Isiraeri bonna, obagambe nti Ekigambo kino Mukama ky'alagidde, ag'ayogera nti 
3_17_3_Bwe wabangawo omuntu yenna ow'omu nnyumba ya Isiraeri, anattiranga ente, oba omwana gw'endiga, oba embuzi, mu lusiisira, oba anaagittiranga ebweru w'olusiisira, 
3_17_4_n'atagiretta ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, okugiwaayo okuba ekitone eri Mukama mu maaso g'ennyumba ya Mukama: omusaayi gunaamubalirwanga omuntu oyo; ng'ayiye omusaayi; era omuntu oyo anaazikirizibwanga mu bantu be: 
3_17_5_abaana ba Isiraeri balyoke baleetenga ssaddaaka zaabwe, ze baweerayo mu ttale mu bbanga bazireetenga eri Mukama, ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, eri kabona, ne baziwaayo okuba ssaddaaka ez'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe eri Mukama. 
3_17_6_Awo kabona anaamansiranga omusaayi ku kyoto kya Mukama ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, n'ayokya amasavu okuba evvumbe eddungi eri Mukama. 
3_17_7_So tebakyawangayo ssaddaaka zaabwe eri embuzi ennume, ze bagoberera okwenda nazo. Eryo linaabanga tteeka gye ball ennaku zonna mu mirembe gyabwe gyonna. 
3_17_8_Era onoobagamba nti Bwe wanaabangawo omuntu yenna ow'omu nnyumba ya Isiraeri oba ku bagenyi abanaatuulanga mu bo, anaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa oba ssaddaaka, 
3_17_9_n'atakireeta ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, okukiwaayo eri Mukama; omuntu oyo anaazikirizibwanga mu bantu be. 
3_17_10_Era bwe wanaabangawo omuntu yenna ow'omu nnyumba ya Isiraeri, oba ku bagenyi abanaatuulanga mu bo, anaalyanga ku musaayi gwonna gwonna; n'ateekanga amaaso gange okwolekera omuntu oyo alya ku musaayi, ne mmuzikiriza mu bantu be. 
3_17_11_Kubanga obulamu bw'ennyama buba mu musaayi: era ngubawadde ku kyoto okutangiriranga obulamu bwammwe: kubanga omusaayi gwe gutangirira olw'obulamu. 
3_17_12_Kyennava nnamba abaana ba Isiraeri nti Tewabanga ku mmwe muntu anaalyanga ku musaayi, so n'omugenyi yenna anaatuulanga mu mmwe talyanga ku musaayi: 
3_17_13_Era bwe wanaabangawo omuntu yenna ku baana ba Isiraeri, oba ku bagenyi abanaatuulanga mu bo, anaakwatanga ensolo yonna oba nnyonyi yonna eriika ng'ayigga; anaayiwanga omusaayi gwayo, n'agubikkako n'enfuufu. 
3_17_14_Kubanga obulamu bw'ennyama yonna, omusaayi gwayo guba gumu n'obulamu bwayo: kyennava ŋŋamba abaana ba Isiraeri nti Temulyanga ku musaayi gwa nnyama yonna yonna: kubanga obulamu bw'ennyama yonna gwe musaayi gwayo: buli anaagulyangako anaazikirizibwanga. 
3_17_15_Era buli muntu anaalyanga ku eyo efa yokka, oba etaaguddwa ensolo, oba nzaalwa oba mugenyi, anaayozanga ebyambalo bye, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi: n'alyoka aba mulo ngoofu. 
3_17_16_Naye bw'ataabyozenga, n'atanaaba mubiri gwe, kale anaabangako obutali butuukizivu bwe. 
3_18_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_18_2_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri, obagambe nti Nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_18_3_Ng'ebikolwa bwe biri eby'omu nsi y'e Misiri, gye mwatuulangamu, temukolanga bwe mutyo: era ng'ebikolwa bwe biri eby'omu nsi ya Kanani, gye ndibatuusaamu, temukolanga bwe mutyo: so temutambuliranga mu mateeka gaabwe. 
3_18_4_Emisango gyange gye muba mukolanga, n'amateeka gange ge muba mwekuumanga, okubitambulirangamu: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_18_5_Kale mwekuumenga amateeka gange n'emisango gyange; ebyo omuntu bw'anaabikolanga, anaabanga mulamu olw'ebyo: nze Mukama. 
3_18_6_Tewabanga ku mmwe anaasembereranga ow'obuko yenna, okubikkula ku nsonyi ze: nze Mukama. 
3_18_7_Ensonyi za kitaawo, ze nsonyi za nnyoko, tozibikkulangako: ye nnyoko; tobikkulanga ku nsonyi ze. 
3_18_8_Tobikkulanga ku nsonyi za musika wa nnyoko: ze nsonyi za kitaawo. 
3_18_9_Ensonyi za mwannyoko azaalibwa kitaawo, azaalibwa nnyoko, oba yazaalibwa waka, yazaalibwa walala, ensonyi zaabwe tozibikkulangako. 
3_18_10_Ensonyi za muwala wa mutabani wo, oba muwala wa muwala wo, ensonyi zaabwe tozibikkulangako: kubanga ensonyi zaabwe ze zizo ggwe. 
3_18_11_Ensonyi za muwala wa mukazi wa kitaawo, kitaawo gw'azaala, oyo mwannyoko, tobikkulanga ku nsonyi ze. 
3_18_12_Tobikkulanga ku nsonyi za ssenga wo: oyo wa buko ne kitaawo. 
3_18_13_Tobikkulanga ku nsonyi za muganda wa nnyoko: oyo wa buko ne nnyoko. 
3_18_14_Tobikkulanga ku nsonyi za muganda wa kitaawo, tose mbereranga mukazi we: oyo ssenga wo. 
3_18_15_Tobikkulanga ku nsonyi za muka mwana wo: oyo muka, mutabani wo; tobikkulanga ku nsoayi ze. 
3_18_16_Tobikkulanga ku nsonyi, za muka muganda wo: ze nsonyi zamuganda wo. 
3_18_17_Tobikkulanga ku nsonyi z'omukazi n'eza muwala we; totwalanga muwala wa mutabani we, newakubadde muwala wa muwala we, okubikkula ku nsonyi ze; abo ba buko: ekyo kibi. 
3_18_18_So totwalanga mukazi wamu ne muganda we, okuba muggya we, okubikkula ku nsonyi ze, wamu ne munne, ye ng'akyali mulamu. 
3_18_19_So tosembereranga mukazi okubikkula ku nsonyi ze, ng'akyayawulibwa olw'obutali bulongoofu bwe. 
3_18_20_So tosulanga na muka muliraanwa wo, okweyonoona naye. 
3_18_21_So towangayo ku zzadde lyo okubayisa mu muliro en Moleki, so tovumisanga lianya lya Katonda wo: nze Mukama. 
3_18_22_Tosulanga aa basajja, nga bwe basula n'abakazi: ekyo kya muzizo. 
3_18_23_So tosulanga na nsolo yonna, okweyonoona nayo: so n'omukazi yenna tayimiriranga mu maaso g'ensolo, okugalamira aayo: okwo kwe kutabula. 
3_18_24_Temweyonoonanga n'ebyo byonna byonna: kubanga olw'ebyo byonna amawanga goonoonese ge ngoba mu maaso gammwe: 
3_18_25_n’ensi eyonoonese: kyenva ngiwalanako obutali butuukirivu bwayo, n'ensi esesemera ddala abagituulamu. 
3_18_26_Kale mmwe mwekuumenga amateeka gange n'emisango gyange, so temukolaagako ku by'emizzo ebyo byonna byonna; aewakubadde enzaalwa, newakubadde omugenyi atuula mu mmwe: 
3_18_27_(kubanga eby'emizizo ebyo byonna abasajja, ab'omu nsi baabikolanga, abaabasooka, n’ensi eyonoonese;) 
3_18_28_ensi ereme okubasesemera ddala nammwe, bwe mugyonoonanga, nga bwe yasesemera ddala eggwaaga eryabasooka. 
3_18_29_Kubanga omuntu yenna bw'anaakolanga kyonna ku by'emizizo ebyo, abantu abo abaabikola banasibwanga okubaggya mu bantu baabwe. 
3_18_30_Kyemunaavanga mwekuuma bye mbakuutira, obutakolanga yonna ku mpisa ezo ez'emizizo, ezaakolebwanga okusooka mmwe, n'obuteeyonoonsnga n'ezo: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_19_1_Mukama n’ayogera ae Musa nti 
3_19_2_Yogera n'ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri, oba gambe nti Munaabanga batukuvu: kubanga nze Mukama Katonda wammwe ndi mutukuvu. 
3_19_3_Mutyenga buli muntu nnyina ne kitaawe, era mwekuumenga ssabbiiti zange: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_19_4_Temukyukiranga bifaanaayi, so temwekoleranga bakatonda basaanuuse: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_19_5_Era bwe munaawangayo ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe eri Mukama, munaagiwangayo era mukkirizibwe. 
3_19_6_Ku lunaku olwo lwe munaagiweeraagako kwe munaagiriiranga, ne ku lw'enkya: era ekintu kyonna bwe kinaafikkangako okutuusa ku lunaku olw'okusatu, kinaayokebwanga omuliro. 
3_19_7_Era bwe kinaaliibwangako n'akatono ku lunaku olw'okusatu, kiba kya muzizo; tekikkirizibwenga: 
3_19_8_naye buli anaakiryangako anaabangako obutali butuukirivu bwe, kubanga avumisizza ekintu ekitukuvu ekya Mukama: era omuntu oyo anaazikirizibwanga mu bantu be. 
3_19_9_Era bwe munaakungulanga ebikungulwa by'ensi yammwe, tomaliranga ddala kukungula asonda za nnimiro yo, so tokuŋŋaaayanga ebyerebwa ku bikungulwa byo. 
3_19_10_So toyeraaga mu lusuku lwo olw'emizabbibu, so tokuŋŋaaayanga bibala ebikunkumuka mu lusuku lwo olw'emizabbibu; onoobirekeranga omwavu n'omugenyi: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_19_11_Temubbanga; so temulyazaamaanyanga, so temulimbagananga mwekka na mwekka. 
3_19_12_temulayiriranga bwereere linnya lyange, n'okuvumisa n'ovumisa erinnya lya Katonda wo: nze Mukama. 
3_19_13_Tojooganga muliraanwa wo, so tomunyaganga: empeera y'omusenze akolera empeera tosulanga ng'oli nayo okukeesa obudde. 
3_19_14_Tokolimiranga muggavu wa matu, so tomutetkerangawo nkonge omuzibe w'amaaso, naye onootyanga Katonda wo: nze Mukama. 
3_19_15_Temusalanga misango egitali gya nsonga: tolowoozanga maaso ga mwavu, so tossangamu kitiibwa maaso ga wa maanyi: naye onoosaliranga muliraanwa wo emi sango gya nsonga. 
3_19_16_Tobanga wa nnimi ng'otambulatambula mu bantu bo; so toyimiriranga kulumba musaayi gwa muliraanwa wo: nze Mukama. 
3_19_17_Tokyawanga muganda wo mu mutima gwo: tolemanga kunenya muliraanwa wo, oleme okubaako ekibi ku lulwe. 
3_19_18_Towalanangaggwanga, so tobanga na nge yonna eri abaana b'abantu bo, naye onooyagalanga muliraanwa wo nga bwe weeyagala wekka: nze Mukama. 
3_19_19_Mwekuumenga amateeka gange. Tozaalisanga nsolo zo ngeri ezitafaanana bumu: tosiganga mu nnimiro yo nsigo ey'engeri ebbiri: ekyambalo tekikubikkangako eky'engeri ebbiri ez'olugoye ezitabuddwa awamu. 
3_19_20_Era buli anaasulanga n'omukazi, naye nga muzaana, ng'aliko bba amwogereza, era nga tanunulwanga n'akatono, so nga taweebwanga ddembe; banaabonerezebwanga, tebattibwanga, kubanga teyali wa busa. 
3_19_21_Awo anaaleetanga ekyo ky'awaayo olw'omusango eri Mukama, ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, embuzi ennume okuba ekiweebwayo olw'omusango. 
3_19_22_Awo kabona anaamutangirizanga endiga ennume ey'ekiweebwayo olw'omusango mu maaso ga Mukama olw'ekibi kye yakola; kale anaasonyiyibwanga ekibi kye yakola. 
3_19_23_Era bwe mubanga muyingidde mu nsi eyo, era nga mumaze okusimba emiti egy'engeri zonna egiriibwako, ne mulyoka muyita ebibala byagyo obutakomolwa bwagyo: emyaka esatu binaabanga gye muli ng'ebitali bikomole tebiriibwangako. 
3_19_24_Naye mu mwaka, ogw'okuna ebibala byayo byonna biriba bitukuvu, olw'okutendereza Mukama. 
3_19_25_Ne mu mwaka ogw'okutaano mulirya ku bibala byayo, ebawe ekyengera kyayo: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_19_26_Temulyanga kintu kyonna wamu n'omusaayi, so temuwanga ddogo, so temulagulanga. 
3_19_27_Temumwanga nkiiya, so toyonoonanga nsonda za kirevu kyo. 
3_19_28_Temwesalanga ku mubiri gwammwe olw'abafu, so temwesalangako bya buyonjo byonna: nze Mukama. 
3_19_29_Tovumisanga muwala wo, okumufuula omwenzi; ensi creme okugoberera obwenzi, ensi n'ejjula ekibi. 
3_19_30_Mwekuumenga ssabbiiti zange, era mutyenga awatukuvu wange: nze Mukama. 
3_19_31_Temukyukiranga abo abasamira emizimu, newakubadde abalogo; temubanoonyanga, okwonooneka olw'abo: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_19_32_Oseguliranga alina envi, era ossangamu ekitiibwa amaaso g'omukadde, era otyanga Katonda wo: nze Mukama. 
3_19_33_Era omugenyi bw'anaatuulanga naawe mu nsi yammwe, temumukolanga bubi. 
3_19_34_Omugenyi anaatuulanga nammwe anaabanga gye muli ng'enzaalwa mummwe, era omwagalanga nga bwe weeyagala wekka, kubanga mwali bagenyi mu nsi y'e Misiri: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_19_35_Temukolanga ebitali bya butuukirivu okusala emisango, okupima emikono, okupimira mu minzaani, newakubadde okugera. 
3_19_36_Munaabanga ne minzaani ntuufu, n'ebigera bituufu, efa ntuufu, ne ini ntuufu: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe, eyabaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
3_19_37_Era mukwatenga amateeka gange gonna, n'emisango gyange gyonna, ne mubikolanga: nze Mukama. 
3_20_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_20_2_Era nate gamba abaana ba IIsiraeri nti Bwe wanaabangawo omuntu yenna ku baana ba Isiraeri, oba ku bagenyi abatuula mu Isi'raeri, anaawangayo ku zzadde lye eri Moleki: talemanga kuttibwa: abantu 'ab'omu nsi banaamukubanga amayinja. 
3_20_3_Era nange naamwolekezanga amaaso gange omuntu oyo, ne mmuzikiriza okumuggya mu bantu be; kubanga awaddeyo ku zzadde lye eri Moleki, okwonoona awatukuvu wange, n'okuvumisa erinnya lyange ettukuvu. 
3_20_4_Era abantu ab'omu nsi bwe banaakisanga n'akatono amaaso gaabwe omuntu oyo, bw'anaawangayo ku zzadde lye eri Moleki, ne batamutta: 
3_20_5_awo naamwolekezanga obwenyi bwange omuntu oyo ne baganda be, ae mmuzikiriza ye n'abo bonna abamugoberera okwenda, okwenda ne Moleki, okubaggya mu bantu baabwe. 
3_20_6_N'omuntu anaakyukiranga abo abasamira emizimu, n'abalogo, okubagoberera okwenda, naamwolekezanga obwenyi bwange omuntu oyo ne mmuzikiriza okumuggya mu bantu be. 
3_20_7_Kale mwetukuzenga mubeereaga abatukuvu: kubanga nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_20_8_Era mwekuumenga amateeka gange, mugakoleaga: nze Mukama abatukuza. 
3_20_9_Kubanga buli anaakolimiranga kitaawe oba nnyina talemanga kuttibwa: ng'akolimidde kitaawe oba nnyina; omusaayi gwe gunaabanga ku ye. 
3_20_10_N'omuntu anaayendanga ku mukazi w'omusajja omulala, anaayendanga ku mukazi wa muliraanwa we, omwenzi omusajja n'omwenzi omukazi tebalemanga kuttibwa. 
3_20_11_N'omusajja anaasulanga ne mukazi wa kitaawe, ng'abikudde ku nsonyi za kitaawe: bombi tebalemanga kuttibwa; omusaayi gwabwe gunaabanga ku bo. 
3_20_12_Era omusajja bw'anaasulanga ne muka mwana we, bombi tebalemanga kuttibwa: nga bakoze okutabula; omusaayi gwabwe gunaabanga ku bo. 
3_20_13_Era omusajja bw'anaasulanga n'omusajja, nga bwe yandyebase n'abakazi, bombi nga bakoze eky'omuzizo: tebalemanga kuttibwa; omusaayi gwabwe gunaabanga ku bo. 
3_20_14_Era omusajja bw'anaawasanga omukazi ne nnyina, ekyo kibi: banaayokebwanga omuliro ye nabo; muleme okuba ekibi mu mmwe. 
3_20_15_Era omusajja bw'anaasulanga n'ensolo, talemanga kuttibwa: era munattanga ensolo eyo. 
3_20_16_Era omukazi bw'anaasembereranga ensolo yonna, n'agalamira nayo, omuttanga omukazi oyo n'ensolo: tebiremanga kuttibwa; omusaayi gwabyo gunaabanga ku byo. 
3_20_17_Era omusajja bw'anaawasanga mwannyina, muwala wa kitaawe, oba muwala wa nnyina, n’alaba ensonyi ze, naye n'alaba ensonyi ze; kye kigambo eky'obuwemu; era banaazikirizibwanga mu maaso g'abaana b'abantu baabwe: ng'abikudde ku nsonyi za mwannyina; anaabangako obutali butuukirivubwe. 
3_20_18_Era omusajja bw'anaasulanga n'omukazi aliko endwadde ye, n'abikkula ku nsonyi ze; ng'afudde obwereere ensulo ye, naye ng'abikudde ku nsulo y'omusaayi gwe: awo bombi banaazikirizibwanga okuggibwa mu bantu baabwe. 
3_20_19_So tobikkulanga ku nsonyi za muganda wa nnyoko; newakubadde eza mwannyina kitaawo: kubanga afudde obwereere ow'obuko: banaabangako obutali butuukirivu bwabwe. 
3_20_20_Era omusajja bw'anaasulanga ne mukazi wa kojja we, ng'abikudde ku nsonyi za kojja we: banaabangako ekibi kyabwe; balifa nga tebalina baana. 
3_20_21_Era omusajja bw'anaawasanga mukazi wa muganda we, bwe butali bulongoofu: ng'abikudde ku nsonyi za muganda we; tebaliba na baana. 
3_20_22_Kyemunaavanga mwekuuma amateeka gaage gonna, n'emisango gyange gyonna, ne mubikolanga: ensi, gye mbayingizaamu okutuula omwo, eremenga okubasesemera ddala. 
3_20_23_So temutambuliranga mu mpisa z'eggwanga, lye ngoba mu maaso gammwe: kubanga baakolanga ebyo byonna, era kyenvudde mbakyawa. 
3_20_24_Naye nabagamba mmwe nti Mulisikira ensi yaabwe, nange ndigibawa okugirya, ensi ekulukuta n'amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki; nze Mukama Katonda wammwe, eyabaawula mu mawanga. 
3_20_25_Kyemunaavanga mwawula ensolo ennongoofu n'eterinnongoofu, n'ennyonyi eteri nnongoofu n'ennongoofu: so temufuulanga mmeeme zammwe za mizizo olw'ensolo, oba olw'ennyonyi, oba olw'ekintu kyonna eky'ekulula ku nsi, bye nnayawula gye muli obutaba birongoofu: 
3_20_26_Era munaabanga batukuvu gye ndi: kubanga nze Mukama ndi mutukuvu, era nabaawula mu mawanga mubeere abange. 
3_20_27_Era omusajja oba omukazi asamira omuzimu, oba omulogo, talemanga kuttibwa; banaabakubanga amayinja: omusaayi gwabwe gunaabanga ku bo. 
3_21_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Yogera ne bakabona batabani ba Alooni, obagambe nti Tewabamgawo muatu eyeeyoaoona olw'abo absafa ku baatu be 
3_21_4_Tayonoonanga, bw'aba omukulu mu bantu be, okwevumisa. 
3_21_5_Tebamwanga kiwalaata ku mutwe gwabwe, so e amwanga nsonda za kirevu kyabwe, so tebeesalanga n'akatono ku mubiri gwabwe. 
3_21_6_Banaabanga batukuvu eri Katonda waabwe, so tebavumisanga linnya lya Katonda waabwe: kubanga bawaayo ebiweebwayo ebya Mukama ebikolebwa n'omuliro, gwe mugaati gwa Katonda waabwe: kyebanaavanga babeera abatukuvu. 
3_21_7_Tebawasangamukazimwenzi,obaaliko empitambi; so tebawasanga mukazi eyagobebwa bba: kubanga mutukuw eri Katonda we. 
3_21_8_Kyonoovanga omutukuza; kubanga awaayo omugaati gwa Katonda wo: anaabanga mutukuvu gy'oli: kubanga nze Mukama abatukuza ndi mutukuvu. 
3_21_9_Era muwala wa kabona yenna, bw'aneevumisanga nga yeefuula omwenzi, ng'awmisa kitaawe: anaayokebwaaga omuliro. 
3_21_10_N'oyo anaabanga kabona asinga obukulu mu baganda be, afukibwako ku mutwe amafuta agafukibwako, era ayawulibwa okwambala ebyambalo ebyo, tasumululanga nviiri za ku mutwe gwe, so tayuzanga ngoye ze; 
3_21_11_so tayingiranga eri omulambo gwonna, so teyeeyonoosanga olwa kitaawe, newakubadde olwa nnyina; 
3_21_12_so tafulumanga mu watukuvu, so tavumisanga watukuvu wa Katonda we; kubanga engule ey'amafuta agafukibwako aga Katonda wegali ku ye: nze Mukama. 
3_21_13_Era anaawasanga omukazi nga tannamanya musajja. 
3_21_14_Nnamwandu oba eyagobebwa oba aliko empitambi, omwenzi, abo tabawasanga: naye emuwala atamanyaaga musajja ow'oku bantu be gw'anaawasanga. 
3_21_15_So tavumisanga zzadde lye mu bantu be: kubanga nze ndi Mukama amutukuza. 
3_21_16_Mukama n’agamba Musa nti 
3_21_17_Gamba Alooni nti Buli muntu yenna ow'oku zzadde lyo mu mirembe gyabwe gyonna anaabangako obulema, tasemberaaga okuwaayo omugaati gwa Katonda we. 
3_21_18_Kubanga buli muatu yeana anobulema tasemberanga: omuzibe w'amaaso oba awenyera oba eyayonooneka ennyindo, oba aliko ekintu kyonna ekisukkirira, 
3_21_19_oba eyamenyeka okugulu, oba eyamenyeka omukono, 
3_21_20_oba alina ebbango, oba mututuuli, oba aliko obulema ku liiso lye, oba alina obuwere, oba mubootongo, oba eyayatika enjagi; 
3_21_21_tewabangawo muntu wa ku zzadde lya Alooni kabona, aliko obulema, anaasemberanga okuwaayo ebiweebwayo ebya Mukama ebikolebwa n'omuliro: ng'aliko obulema; tasemberanga okuwaayo omugaati gwa Katonda we. 
3_21_22_Anaalyanga ku mugaati gwa Katonda we, ku mugaati omutukuvu ennyo, era ne ku mutukuvu. 
3_21_23_Kyokka tayingiranga awali eggigi, so. tasembereranga kyoto, kubanga aliko obulema; alemenga okuvumisa awatukuvu wange: kubanga nze ndi Mukama atukuzaawo. 
3_21_24_Awo Musa n'agamba Alooni bw'atyo ne batabani be n'abaana bonna aba Isiraeri. 
3_22_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_22_2_Gamba Alooni ne batabani be, beewalenga ebintu ebitukuvu eby'abaana ba Isiraeri, bye batukuza gye ndi, era balemenga okuvumisa erinnya lyange ettukuvu: nze Mukama. 
3_22_3_Bagambe nti Buli muntu yenna ow'oku zzadde lyammwe lyoaaa mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna, anaasembereranga ebintu ebitukuvu, abaana ba Isiraeri bye batukuza eri Mukama, ng'aliko obutali bulongoofu bwe, obulamu obwo bunaazikirizibwanga mu maaso gange: nze Mukama. 
3_22_4_Buli muntu yenna ow'oku zzadde lya Alooni aliko ebigenge oba alina enziku, talyanga ku bintu ebitukuw okutuusa lw'aliba omuloagoofu. Era buli anaakomanga ku kintu kyonna ekitali kirongoofu olw'abafu, oba omuntu avaamu amaanyi 
3_22_7_Awo enjuba ng'egudde, anaabanga mulongoofu; oluvannyuma anaalyanga ku bintu ebitukuw, kubanga gwe mugaati gwe. 
3_22_8_Ekinaafanga kyokka, oba ekinaataaguIwateagulwanga ensolo, talyangako okweyonoona nakyo: nze Mukama. 
3_22_9_Kyebanaavanga beekuuma kyennabateresa, balemenga okubaako ekibi olw'ekyo, ne bafiira mu kyo bwe banaakivumisanga: nze ndi Mukama abatukuza. 
3_22_10_Tewabangawo mugenyi anaalyanga ku kintu; ekitukuvu: omuyise ali ne kabona, oba omusenze akolera empeera, talyanga ku kintu ekitukuvu. 
3_22_11_Naye kabona bw'anaagulanga obulamu bwonna, agulibwa n'ebintul bye, oyo anaalyangako; n'abo abazaalirwa mu nnyumba ye, abo banaalyanga ku mugaati gwe. 
3_22_12_Era muwala wa kabona bw'anaafumbirwanga omugenyi, talyanga ku kiweebwayo ekisitulibwa ku bintu ebitukuvu. 
3_22_13_Naye muwala wa kabona bw'abanga nnamwandu, oba eyagobebwa, era nga talina mwana, era ng'akomyewo mu nnyumba ya kitaawe, nga mu buto bwe, anaalyanga ku mugaati.gwa kitaawe: naye tewabaagawo mugenyi anaalyanga ku gwo. 
3_22_14_Era omuntu bw'anaalyanga ku kintu ekitukuvu nga tamanyiridde, kale anaakigattangako ekitundu kyakyo eky'okutaano, n'awa kabona ekintu ekitukuvu. 
3_22_15_So tebavumisanga bintu bitukuvu bya baana ba Isiraeri, bye bawaayo eri Mukama; 
3_22_16_ne babaleetako (bwe batyo) obutali butuukiriw obuleeta omusango, bwe balya ku bintu byabwe ebitukuvu: kubanga nze ndi Mukama abatukuza. 
3_22_17_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_22_18_Yogera ne Alooni ne batabani be n'abaana bonna aba Isiraeri, obagambe nti Buli muntu yenna ow'oku nnyumba ya Isiraeri, oba ku bageayi abali mu Isiraeri, anaawangayo ekitone lye, bwe kinaabanga obweyamo bwabwe bwonna, oba ekiweebwayo kyonna kye bawaayo ku bwabwe, kye bawaayo eri Mukama okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
3_22_19_(munaawangayo) ennume eteriiko bulema ku nte, ku ndiga, oba ku mbuzi, mulyoke mukkirizibwe. 
3_22_20_Naye ekintu kyonna ekiriko obulema, ekyo temukiwangayo: kubanga tekiibenga kya kukkirizibwa ku lwammwe. 
3_22_21_Era buli anaawangayo ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe eri Mukama okutuukiriza obweyamo, oba okuba ky'awaayo ku bubwe, ku nte oba ku mbuzi, eneebanga ntuukirivu eryoke ekkirizibwe; tebangako bulema. 
3_22_22_Enzibe y'amaaso, oba emmenyefu, oba ennema, oba eriko amabwa oba obuwere oba kabootongo, ezo ltemuziwangayo eri Mukama, so temubifuulanga ekiweebwayo n'omuliro eri Mukama ku kyoto. 
3_22_23_Oba ente oba omwana gw'endiga eriko ekintu kyonna ekisukkirira oba ekitatuuka mu bitundu byayo, eyo oyinza okuwaayo okulia ky'owaayo ku bubwo: naye okuba obweyamo tekkirizibwenga. 
3_22_24_Eyabetentebwa enjagi zaayo, oba eyanyigibwa, oba eyayatika, oba eyasalibwako ezo, temugiwangayo eri Mukama; so temukolanga bwe mutyo mu nsi yammwe. 
3_22_25_So ne mu mukono gwa munnaggwanga temuwangayo mugaati gwa Katonda wammwe ogugendera ku ezo zonna; kubanga okwonooneka kwazo kuli mu zo, ziriko obulema: tezikkirizibwenga ku lwammwe. 
3_22_26_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_22_27_Ente oba tidiga oba mbuzi bw'eneezaalibwanga, eneemalanga ennaku musanvu ng'eyonka nnyina waayo; awo okuva ku lunaku olw'omunaana n'okukirawo enekkirizibwanga okuba ekitone ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama. 
3_22_28_Era bw'eba ente oba ndiga, temugittanga yo n'omwana waayo byombi ku lunaku lumu. 
3_22_29_Era bwe munaawangayo ssaddaaka ey'okwebaza eri Mukama, munaagiwangayo mulyoke mukkirizibwe: 
3_22_30_Eneeriirwanga ku lunaku olwo; temugisigazangako okutuusa enkya: nze Mukama. 
3_22_31_Kyemunaavanga mwekuuma ebiragiro byange, ne mubikola: nze Mukama. 
3_22_32_So temuvumisanga linnya lyange ttukuvu; naye njagala okutukuzibwanga mu baana ba Isiraeri: nze Mukama abatukuza, 
3_22_33_eyabaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri okuba Katonda wammwe: nze Mukama. 
3_23_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_23_2_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri, obagambe nti Embaga endagire eza Mukama, ze munaalangiranga okuba okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu, zino ze mbaga zange endagire. 
3_23_3_Ennaku omukaaga zinaakolerwangako omulimu: naye ku lunaku otw'omusanvu ye ssabbiiti ey'okuwummula ey'okwewombekerako, okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu; temukolangamulimu gwonna: olwo ssabbiiti eri Mukama mu nnyumba zammwe zonna. 
3_23_4_Zino ze mbaga endagire eza Mukama, kwe kukuŋŋaana okutukuvu, ze munaalangiranga mu ntuuko zaazo endagire. 
3_23_5_Mu mwezi ogw'olubereberye, ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ennya akawungeezi, kwe Kuyitako kwa Mukama 
3_23_6_Ne ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ettaano olw'omwezi ogwo ye mbaga ey'emigaati egitazimbulukuswa eri Mukama: munaaliiranga ennaku musanvu emigaati egitazimbulukuswa. 
3_23_7_Ku lunaku olw'olubereberye munaabanga n'okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu: temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono. 
3_23_8_Naye munaaweerangayo ennaku musanvu ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omutiro eri Mukama: ku lunaku olw'omusanvu wanaabangawo okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu; te mukolanga mulimu gwa mikono. 
3_23_9_Mukama n'agamba Musa; nti 
3_23_10_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri, obagambe nti Bwe mulimala okuyingira mu nsi gye mbawa, ne mukungula ebikungulwa byayo, ne mulyokanga muleeta ekinywa eky'ebibereberye eby'ebikungulwa byammwe eri kabona: 
3_23_11_naye anaawuubawuubanga ekinywa mu maaso ga Mukama, okukkirizibwa ku lwammwe: ku lw'enkya oluddirira ssabbiiti kabona kw'anaakiwuubirawuubiranga. 
3_23_12_Era ku lunaku kwe munaawuubirawuubiranga ekinywa, munaawangayo omwana gw'endiga omulume ogutaliiko bulema ogutannamala mwaka gumu okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eri Mukama. 
3_23_13_N'ekiweebwayo kyako eky'obutta kinaabanga ebitundu bibiri eby'ekkumi ebya efa eby'obu'tta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta, ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama okuba evvumbe eddungi: n'ekiweebwayo kyako eky'okunywa kinaabanga kya nvinnyo, ekitundu eky'okuna ekya ini. 
3_23_14_So temulyanga mugaati newakubadde eŋŋaano ensiike newakubadde ebirimba ebibisi, okutuusa olunaku olwo, okutuusa lwe munaamalanga okuleeta ekitone kya Katonda wammwe: lye tteeka eritaliggwaawo mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna mu nnyumba zammwe zonna. 
3_23_15_Era muneebaliranga okuva ku lw'enkya oluddirira ssabbiiti, okuva ku lunaku kwe mwaleetera ekinywa eky'ekiweebwayo ekiwuubibwawuubibwa; wanaabangawo ssabbuti musanvu ennamba: 
3_23_16_okutuusa olw'enkya oluddirira ssabbiiti ey'omusanvu munaabalanga ennaku ataano: awo munaawangayo ekiweebwayo eky'obutta obuggya eri Mukama. 
3_23_17_Munaafulumyanga mu nnyumba zammwe emigaati ebiri egiwuubibwawuubibwa egy'ebitundu ebibiri eby'ekkumi ebya efa: ginaabanga gya butta bulungi, ginaayokebwanga n'ekizimbulukusa, okuba ebibereberye eri Mukama. 
3_23_18_Era munaaleetanga wamu n'emigaati abaana b'endiga musanvu abataliiko bulema abatannamala mwaka gumu, n'ente ento emu, n'endiga ennume bbiri: zinaabanga ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eri Mukama, wamu n'ekiweebwayo kyako eky'obutta, n'ebiweebwayo byako eby'okunywa, kye kiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, eky'evvumbe eddungi eri Mukama. 
3_23_19_Era munaawangayo embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'abaana b'endiga abalume babiri abatannamala mwaka gumu okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe. 
3_23_20_Kale kabona anaaziwuubanga wamu n'emigaati egy'ebibereberye okuba ekiweebwayo ekiwuubibwawuubibwa mu maaso ga Mukama, wamu n'abaana b'endiga bombi: binaabanga bitukuvu eri Mukama bya kabona. 
3_23_21_Era munaalangiranga ku lunaku olwo; wanaabangawo okukuŋŋana okutukuvu gye muli: temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono: lye tteeka eritaliggwaawo mu nnyumba zammwe zonna mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna. 
3_23_22_Era bwe munaakungulanga ebikungulwa eby'ensi yammwe, tomaliranga ddala kukungula nsonda za nnimiro yo, so tolondanga ebyerebwa eby'ebikungulwa byo: onoobirekeranga omwavu n'omugenyi: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_23_23_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_23_24_Gamba abaana ba Isiraeri ati Mu mwezi ogw'omusanvu, ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi, wanaabangawo okuwummula okw'okwewombeeka gye muli, ekijjukizo eky'okufuuwa amakondeere, okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu. 
3_23_25_Temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono: era munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama. 
3_23_26_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_23_27_Naye ku lunaku olw'ekkumi olw'omwezi ogwo ogw'omusanvu lwe lunaku olw'okutangiririrako: lunaabanga kukunnaana kutukuvu gye muli, nammwe munaabonerezanga obulamu bammwe; era munaawangayo ekiweebwayo elukolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama. 
3_23_28_So temukolanga mulimu gwonna ku luaaku olwo: kubanga lwe lunaku olw'okutangiririrako, okubatangirira mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_23_29_Kubanga buli bulamu bwonna obutaabonerezebwenga ku lunaku olwo, anaazikirizibwanga mu bantu be. 
3_23_30_Era buli bulamu bwonna obunaakolanga omulimu gwonna ku lunaku olwo, obulamu obwo naabuzikirizanga mu bantu be. 
3_23_31_Temukolanga mulimu gwonna: lye tteeka eritaliggwaawo mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna mu nnyumba zammwe zonna. 
3_23_32_Lunaabanga gye muli ssabbiiti ey'okuwummula ey'okwewombeekerako, nammwe munaabonerezanga obulamu bwammwe: ku lunaku olw'omwenda olw'omwezi akawungeezi, okusooka akawungeezi okutuusa akawungeezi, muneekuumanga ssabbiiti yammwe. 
3_23_33_Mukama n’agamba Musa nti 
3_23_34_Gamba abaana ba Isiraeri nti Ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ettaano olw'omwezi guno ogw'omusanvu wanaabangawo embaga ey'ensiisira okumala ennaku musanvu eri Mukama. 
3_23_35_Ku lunaku olw'olubereberye wanaabangawo okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu: temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono. 
3_23_36_Munaaweerangayo ennaku musanvu ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama: ku lunaku olw'omunaana wanaabangawo okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu gye muli; nammwe munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama: kwe kukuŋŋaana okukulu; temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono. 
3_23_37_Ezo ze mbaga endagire eza Mukama, ze munaalangiranga okuba okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu okuwangayo ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama, ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta, ssaddaaka, n'ebiweebwayo eby'okunywa, kinnakimu ku lunaku lwakyo: 
3_23_38_obutassaako ssabbiiti za Mukama, n'ebirabo byammwe, n'obweyamo bwammwe bwonna, n'ebyo byonna bye muwaayo ku bwammwe, bye muwa Mukama. 
3_23_39_Naye ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ettaano olw'omwezi ogw'omusanvu, bwe munaamalanga ok'ukungula ebibala by'ensi, muneekuumiranga embaga ya Mukama ennaku musanvu: ku lunaku olw'olubereberye wanaabangawo okuwuinmula okw'okwewombeeka, ne ku lunaku olw'omunaana wanaabangawo okuwummula okw'okwewombeeka. 
3_23_40_Era ku lunaku olw'olubereberye muneetwaliranga ebibala by'emiti emirungi, amatabi g'enkindu, n'amatabi g'emiti emiziyivu, n'emiti egy'oku migga; era munaasanyukiranga ennaku musanw mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_23_41_Era munaagyekuumiranga okuba embaga eri Mukama ennaku musanw buli mwaka: lye tteka eritaliggwaawo mu mirembe gyammwe: munaagyekuumiranga mu mwezi ogw'omusanvu. 
3_23_42_Munaamalanga ennaku musanvu mu nsiisira: enzaalwa bonna ab'omu Isiraeri banaatuulanga mu nsiisira: 
3_23_43_emirembe gyammwe giryoke gimanyenga nga natuuza abaana ba Isiraeri mu nsiisira, bwe nnabaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_23_44_Awo Musa n'abuulira abaana ba Isiraeri embaga endagire eza Mukama. 
3_24_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_24_2_Lagira abaana ba Isiraeri, bakuleetere amafuta amalungi aga zeyituuni amakube olw'ettabaaza, okwasanga ettabaaza olutata. 
3_24_3_Ebweru w'eggigi ery'obujulirwa, mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, Alooni w'anaagirongooserezanga okusooka akawungeezi okutuusa enkya mu maaso ga Mukama olutata: linaabanga tteeka eritaliggwaawo mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna. 
3_24_4_Ettabaaza anaazirongooserezanga ku kikondo ekirongoofu mu maaso ga Mukama olutata. 
3_24_5_Era onoddiranga obutta obulungi, n'oggyamu emigaati lzkumi n'ebiri emyokye: ebitundu bibiri eby'ekkumi ebya efa binaabanga mu mugaati gumu. 
3_24_6_Era onoogitegekanga embu bbiri, buli lubu mukaaga, ku mmeeza ennongoofu mu maaso ga Mukama. 
3_24_7_Era onooteekanga omugavu omulongoofu ku bull lubu, gubeerenga ekijjukizo eri emigaati, ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa a'omuliro eri Mukama. 
3_24_8_Buli ssabbiiti anaagitegekanga mu maaso ga Mukama olutata; ye ndagaano eteriggwaawo ku lw'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
3_24_9_Era ginaabanga gya Alooni ne batabani be; era banaagiriiranga mu kifo ekitukuvu: kubanga mitukuvu nnyo gyali ku biweebwayo ebya Mukama ebikolebwa n'omuliro olw'etteeka eritaliggwaawo. 
3_24_10_Awo mutabani w'omukazi Omuisiraeri, kitaawe Mumisiri, n'afuluma n'agenda mu baana ba Isiraeri: mutabani w'omukazi Omuisiraeri n'omusajja wa Isiraeri ne bawakanira mu lusiisira; 
3_24_11_mutabani w'omukazi Omuisiraeri n'awoola Erinnya n'akolima; ne bamuleetera Musa. Ne nnyina erinnya lye Seromisi, muwala wa Dibuli, ow'omu kika kya Ddaani. 
3_24_12_Ne bamusiba belyoke babuulirwe mu kamwa ka Mukama. 
3_24_13_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_24_14_Oyo akolimye mumufulumye ebweru w'olusiisira; n'abo bonna abamuwulidde bateeke emikono gyabwe ku mutwe gwe, ekibiina kyonna kimukube amayinja. 
3_24_15_Era onoogamba abaana ba Isiraeri nti Buli anaakolimiranga Katonda we anaabangako ekibi kye. 
3_24_16_N'oyo anawoolanga erinnya lya Mukama talemanga kuttibwa; ekibiina kyonna tekiremanga kumukuba mayinja: omugeayi naye era n'enzaalwa, bw'anawoolanga erinnya lya Mukama, anattibwanga. 
3_24_17_N'oyo anaakubanga omuntu yenna n'amutta talemanga kuttibwa; 
3_24_18_n'oyo anaakubanga ensolo n'agitta anaagiriwanga: obulamu olw'obulamu. 
3_24_19_Era omuntu bw'anaalemazanga muliraanwa we; nga bw'akoze, bw'anaakolebwanga bw'atyo; 
3_24_20_ekinuubule olw'ekinuubule, eriiso olw'eriiso, erinnyo olw'erinnyo: nga bw'alemazizza omuntu, bw'anaasasulibwanga bw'atyo. 
3_24_21_N'oyo anattanga ensolo anaagiriwanga: n'oyo anattanga omuntu anattibwanga. 
3_24_22_Munaabanga n'etteeka limu eri omugenyi era n'enzaalwa: kubanga nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_24_23_Awo Musa n'agamba abaana ba Isiraeri, oyo eyakolima ne bamufulumya ebweru w'olusiisira; ne bamukuba amayinja. Abaana ba Isiraeri ne bakola nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
3_25_1_Mukama n'agambira Musa ku lusozi Sinaayi nti 
3_25_2_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri, obagambe nti Bwe muliyingira mu nsi gye mbawa, ensi n'eryokanga yeekuuma ssabbiiti eri Mukama. 
3_25_3_Ennimiro yo onoogisigiranga emyaka mukaaga, n'olusuku lwo olw'emizabbibu onoolusaliriranga emyaka mukaaga, n'okungula ebibala byalwo 
3_25_5_Ekyo ekimera kyokka ku bikungulwa byo tokikungulanga, ne zabbibu ez'oku muzabbibu gwo ogutali musalire tozinoganga: gunaabanga mwaka gwa kuwummula okw'okwewombeeka eri ensi. 
3_25_6_Era ssabbiiti ey'ensi eneebanga kya kulya gye muli; eri ggwe n'eri omuddu wo n'omuzaana wo, n'omusenze wo akolera empeera n'omugenyi wo atuula naawe 
3_25_8_Era oneebaliranga ssabbiiti musanvu ez'emyaka, emyaka musanvui emirundi musanvu; era wanaabangawo gy'oli ennaku eza ssabbiiti musanvu ez'emyaka, gye myaka ana mu mwenda. 
3_25_9_Awo n'olyokanga otambuza ekkondeere ery'eddoboozi eddene ku lunaku olw'ekkumi olw'omwezi ogw'omusanvu ku lunaku olw'okutangiririrako kwe munaatambulizanga ekkondeere okubunya ensi yammwe yonna. 
3_25_10_Era munaatukuzanga omwaka ogw'ataano, ne mulangira eddembe mu nsi yonna eri abo banna abagituulamu: gunaabanga jjubiri gye muli; era munaakomangawo buli muntu mu butaka bwe, era munaakomangawo buli muntu mu nda ze. 
3_25_11_Omwaka ogwo ogw'ataano gunaabanga jjuhiri gye muli: temusigaaga, so temukungulanga ekyo ekimera kyokka mu gwo so temunoganga mu gwo ku mizabbibu egitali misalire. 
3_25_12_Kubanga jjubiri; gunaabanga mutukuvu gye muli: munaalyanga ekyengera kyagwo nga mukiggya mu nnimiro 
3_25_13_Mu mwaka ogwo ogwa jjubiri mwe munaakomerangawo buIi muntu mu butaka bwe. 
3_25_14_Era bw'onooguzanga muliraanwa wo ekintu kyonna, oba by'onoogulanga mu mukono gwa muliraanwa wo, temulyazaamaanyagananga: 
3_25_15_ng'omuwendo gw'emyaka bwe guli egiddiridde jjubiri, bw'onoogulaananga ne muliraanwa wo, era ng'omuwendo gw'emyaka egy'ebikungulwa bwe guli bw'anaakuguzanga. 
3_25_16_Ng'emyaka bwe ginenkananga obungi bw'onooyongera bw'otyo ku muwendo gwakyo, era ng'emyaka bwe ginenkananga obutono bw'onoosalanga bw'otyo ku muwendo gwakyo; kubanga omuwendo gw'ebikungulwa gw'akuguza. 
3_25_17_So temulyazaamaanyagananga; naye otyanga Katonda wo: kubanga nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_25_18_Kye munaavanga mukola ama teeka gange, ne mwekuumanga emisango gyange ne mugikola; era munaatuulanga mu nsi mirembe. 
3_25_19_Era ensi eneebalanga ebibala byayo, nammwe munaalyanga okukkuta, ne mutuula omwo mirembe. 
3_25_20_Era bwe munaayogeranga nti Tulirya ki mu mwaka ogw'omusanvu? laba, tetulisiga, so tetulikungula kyeagera kyaffe: 
3_25_21_kale naalagiranga omukisa gwange okubeera ku mmwe mu mwaka ogw'omukaaga, era gunaabalanga ebibala eby'emyaka gyonsatule. 
3_25_22_Era munaasiganga mu mwaka gw'omunaana, ne mulya ku bibala ebyaterekebwa edda; okutuusa ku mwaka ogw'omwenda, ebibala byayo lwe birituuka, munaalyanga ku byaterekebwa edda. 
3_25_23_So ensi tetundibwanga okugiviiramu ddala ennaku zonna; kubanga ensi yange: kubanga muli bagenyi era abayise gye ndi. 
3_25_24_Ne mu nsi yonna ey'obutaka bwammwe munakkirizanga ensi okununulibwa. 
3_25_25_Muganda wo bw'aba ng'ayavuwadde, n'atunda ku butaka bwe, kale muganda we asinga okumuba okumpi mu luganda anajjanga, n'anunula ekyo muganda we ky'atunze. 
3_25_26_Era omuntu bw'atabangako anaakinunula, era ng'agaggawadde n'alaba ebinaamala okukinunula; 
3_25_27_awo abalenga emyaka gye kyatundi rwamu n'addiza ebisukkiriddemu amuntu gwe yakiguza; naye anaddanga mu butaka bwe. 
3_25_28_Naye bw'aba nga tayinza kukyeddiza, kale ekyo kye yatunda kinaabeeranga mu mukono gw'oyo eyakigula bkutuusa ku mwaka gwa jjubiri: awo kinaagenderanga mu jjubiri, naye anaddanga mu butaka bwe. 
3_25_29_Era omuntu bw'atundanga ennyumba ey'okutuulamu mu kibuga ekiriko bbugwe, kale anaayinzanga okuginunula omwaka omulamba nga tegunnaggwaako kasookedde etundibwa; anaamalanga omwaka omulamba ng'alina obuyinza obw'okununula. 
3_25_30_Era bw'eteenunulirwenga mu bbanga ery'omwaka omulamba, kale ennyumba eri mu kibuga ekiriko bbugwe eneefuukiranga ddala y'oyo eyagigula okuba eyiye ennaku zonna, mu mirembe gye gyonna: tegenderanga mu jjubiri. 
3_25_31_Naye ennyumba ez'omu byalo ebitaliiko bbugwe okubyetooloola zinaabalirwanga wamu n'ennimiro ez'omu byalo: zinaayinzikanga okununulibwa, era zinaagenderanga mu jjubiri. 
3_25_32_Naye ebibuga eby'Abaleevi, ennyumba ez'omu bibuga eby'obutaka bwabwe, Abaleevi banaayinzanga okuzinunula mu biro byonna. 
3_25_33_Era omu ku Baleevi bw'anaanunulanga, kale ennyumba eyatundibwa, n'ekibuga eky'obutaka bwe, binaagenderanga mu jjubiri: kubanga ennyumba ez'omu bibuga eby'Abaleevi bwe butaka bwabwe mu baana ba Isiraeri. 
3_25_34_Naye ennimiro ey'omu byalo ebiriraanye ebibuga byabwe tetundibwanga; kubanga bwe butaka bwabwe olw'ennaku zonna. 
3_25_35_Era muganda wo bw'aba ng'ayavuwadde, omukono gwe ne guggwaamu amaanyi gy'oli; kale onoomuyambanga: anaatuulanga naawe ng'omugenyi era ng'omuwaŋŋanguse. 
3_25_36_Tomutwalangako magoba newakubadde ebisukkirira; naye otyanga Katonda wo: muganda wo alyoke atuulenga naawe. 
3_25_37_Tomuwolanga bintu byo lwa magoba, so tomuwanga byakulya byo olw'ebisukkirira. 
3_25_38_Nze Mukama Katonda wammwe, eyabaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, okubawa ensi ya Kanani, okuba Katonda wammwe. 
3_25_39_Era muganda wo bw'aba ng'ayavuwalidde gy'oli, ne yeetunda gy'oli; tomufuulanga muddu okukuweerezanga: 
3_25_40_anaabeeranga name ng'omusenze akolera empeera era ng'omuwaŋŋanguse; anaakuweerezanga okutuusa ku mwaka gwa jjubiri: 
3_25_41_n'alyokanga akuvaako, ye n'abaana be awamu naye, n'adda mu nda ze ye, ne mu butaka bwa bakitaawe mw'anaddiranga. 
3_25_42_Kubanga baddu barige, be nnaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri: tebatundibwanga okuba abaddu. 
3_25_43_Tomufuganga lwa maanyi; naye otyanga Katonda wo. 
3_25_44_N'abaddu bo, n'abazaana bo, b'onoobanga nabo; ku mawanga agabeetoolodde, ku abo kwe munaagulanga abaddu n'abazaana. 
3_25_45_Era ku baana b'abagenyi abatuula mu mmwe, ku abo kwe munaagulanga ne ku ŋŋanda zaabwe eziri nammwe, be baazaalira mu asi yammwe: nabo banaabanga nwma zammwe. 
3_25_46_Era munaabafuulanga obusika eri abaana bammwe abanaabaddiriranga okuba nabo okuba envuma; ku abo kwe munaatwalanga abaddu bammwe ennaku zonna: naye baganda bammwe abaana ba Isiraeri temubafuganga mwekka na mwekka lwa maanyi. 
3_25_47_Era omugenyi oba muwaŋŋanguse ali naawe bw'aba ng'agaggawadde, ne muganda wo ng'ayavuwalidde gy'ali, ne yeetunda eri omugenyi oba muwagganguse ali naawe, oba eri olukolo lw'enda z'omuwaŋŋanguse: 
3_25_48_bw'anaamalanga okutundibwa anaayinzanga okununulibwa; omu ku baganda be anaayinzanga okumununula: 
3_25_49_oba kojja we, oba mutabani wa kojja we, anaayinzanga okumununula; oba muntu yenna ku nda ze amuli okumpi mu luganda anaayinzanga okumununula oba bw'aba ng'agaggawadde, anaayinzanga okwenunula yekka. 
3_25_50_Era anaabaliranga oyo eyamugula okuva ku mwaka mwe yeetundira gy'ali okutuusa ku mwaka gwa jjubiri: n'omuwendo ogw'okutundibwa kwe gunaabanga ng'omuwendo gw'emyaka bwe gunaabanga; ng'ebiro eby'omusenze akolera empeera bwe biri bw'atyo bw'anaabanga naye. 
3_25_51_Oba ng'ekyasigaddeyo emyaka mingi, ng'egyo bwe giri bw'anazzanga bw'atyo ku muwendo ogw'okununulibwa kwe ng'aguggya ku bintu ebyamugula. 
3_25_52_Era oba ng'ekyasigaddeyo emyaka mitono okutuusa ku mwaka gwa jjubiri, kale anaamubaliranga; ng'emyaka gye bwe giri bw'anazzanga bw'atyo omuwendo ogw'okununulibwa kwe. 
3_25_53_Anaabanga naye ng'omusenze akolera empeera buli mwaka: tamufuganga lwa maanyi mu maaso go. 
3_25_54_Era bw'ataanunulibwenga bw'atyo, kale anaagenderanga mu mwaka gwa jjubiri, ye n'abaana be awamu naye. 
3_25_55_Kubanga abaana ba Isiraeri baddu gye ndi; be baddu bange be nnaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_26_1_Temwekoleranga bifaananyi, so temwesimbiranga kifaananyi kyole, newakubadde empagi, so temuteekanga mu nsi yammwe jjinja lyonna eririko enjola, okulivuunamiranga: kubanga nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
3_26_2_Mwekuumanga ssabbiiti zange, ne mussangamu ekitiibwa awatukuvu wange: nze Mukama. 
3_26_3_Bwe munaatambuliranga mu mateeka gange ne mwekuumanga ebiragiro byange ne mubikola 
3_26_5_N'okuwuula kwammwe kunaatuukanga ku kunoga zabbibu, n'okunoga kunaatuukanga ku biro eby'okusigiramu: era munaalyanga emigaati gyammwe okukkuta, ne mutuula mu nsi yammwe mirembe. 
3_26_6_Nange naawanga emirembe mu nsi, era munaagalamiranga so tewaabenga anaabatiisanga: era ndimalawo ensolo embi mu nsi, so n'ekitala tekiiyitenga mu nsi yammwe. 
3_26_7_Nammwe munaagobanga abalabe bammwe, era banaagwanga mu maaso gammwe n'ekitala. 
3_26_8_Era abataano ku mmwe banaagobanga ekikumi, n'ekikumi ku mmwe banaagobanga akakumi: n'abalabe bammwe banaagwanga mu maaso gammwe n'ekitala. 
3_26_9_Era naabassangako omwoyo, ne mbazaalisa, ne mbaaza; era naanywezanga endagaano yange nammwe. 
3_26_10_Era munaalyanga ku byaterekebwa edda ebyaludde, era munaafulumyanga eby'edda olw'e biggya. 
3_26_11_Era naateekanga ennyumba yange mu mmwe: n'obulamu bwange tebuubakyawenga. 
3_26_12_Era naatambuliraaga mu mmwe ne mbeera Katonda wammwe, nammwe munaabanga bantu bange. 
3_26_13_Nze Mukama Katonda wammwe eyabaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, muleme okuba abaddu baabwe; era mmenye ebisiba eby'ekikoligo kyammwe, ne mbatambuza nga mwesimbye. 
3_26_14_Naye bwe mutampulirenga ne mutakola biragiro bino byonna: 
3_26_15_era bwe munaagaananga amateeka gange, n'obulamu bwammwe bwe bunaakyawanga emisango gyange, n'obutakola ne mutakolznga biragiro byange byonna, naye ne muleka endagaano yange: 
3_26_16_nange naabakolanga bwe nti; naalagiranga entiisa okubeera ku mmwe, akakono n'omusujja, ebinaamalangamu amaaso, ne bikoozimbya obulamu: era munaasigiranga busa ensigo zammwe, kubanga abalabe bammwe banaaziryanga. 
3_26_17_Era naaboolekezanga amaaso gange, nammwe munaakubibwanga mu maaso g'abalabe bammwe: ababakyawa be banaabafuganga; era munaddukanga nga tewali agoba. 
3_26_18_Era n'ebyo byonna bwe binaalemwanga okubatapuliza, kale ndyeyongera emirundi musanvu okubabonereza olw'ebibi byammwe. 
3_26_19_Era naamenyanga amalala ag'obuyinza bwammwe; era naafuulanga eggulu lyammwe okuba ng'ekyuma, n'ettaka lyammwe okuba ng'ekikomo: 
3_26_20_n'amaanyi gammwe ganaagenderanga busa: kubanga ensi yammwe teebalenga kyengera kyayo, so n'emiti egy'omu nsi tegiibalenga bibala byagyo.
