3_26_21_Era bwe munaatambuliranga mu kuyomba nange, ne mutampulira; ndyeyongeranga emirundi musanvu okubaleetako ebibonyoobonyo ng'ebibi byammwe bwe binaabanga. 
3_26_22_Era naasindikanga mu mmwe ensolo ey'omu nsiko, eneebanyagangako abaana bammwe, era eneezikirizanga ebisibo byammwe, era eneebakendeezanga; n'amakubo gammwe ganaazikanga: 
3_26_23_Era n'ebyo bwe binaalemwanga okubakomyawo gye ndi, naye ne mutambuIiranga mu kuyomba nange; 
3_26_24_kale nange naatambuliranga mu kuyomba nammwe; era naabakubanga emirundi musanvu, nze mwene, olw'ebibi byammwe. 
3_26_25_Era naabaleetangako ekitala, ekinaawalananga eggwanga ery'endagaano; era munaakuŋŋaanyizibwanga wamu mu bibuga byammwe: era naasindikanga kawumpuli ku mmwe; era munaagabulwanga mu mukono gw'omulabe. 
3_26_26_Bwe nnaamenyanga omuggo gwammwe ogw'omugaati, abakazi kkumi banaayokeranga emigaati gyammwe mu kabiga kamu, era banazzanga nate emigaati gya,mmwe nga bagipimye mu minrzani: lera munaalyanga ne mutakutta. 
3_26_27_Era n'ebyo byonna bwe binaalemwanga okubampuliza, naye ne mutambuliranga mu kuyomba nange; 
3_26_28_kale naatambuliranga mu kuyomba nammwe mu kiruyi; era naababonerezanga emirundi musanvu olw'ebibi byammwe. 
3_26_29_Era munaalyanga ennyama ya batabani bammwe, n'ennyama ya bawala bammwe gye munaalyanga. 
3_26_30_Era naazikirizanga ebifo byammwe ebigulumivu ne nsuulira ddala ebifaananyi byammwe eby'enjuba, ne nsuula emirambo gyammwe ku mirambo gy'ebifaananyi byammwe; n'obulamu bwange bunaabakyawanga. 
3_26_31_Era naazisanga ebibuga byammwe, era naafuulanga awatukuvu wammwe malungu, so siiwulirenga lusu lw'akaloosa kammwe. 
3_26_32_Era naafuulanga ensi ddungu: n'abalabe bammwe abagituulamu banaagyewuunyanga. 
3_26_33_Nammwe naabasaasaanyanga mu mawanga, ne nsowola ekitala okubagoberera: n'ensi yammwe eneebanga ddungu, n'ebibuga byammwe binaazikanga. 
3_26_34_Awo ensi n'eryokanga esanyukira ssabbiiti zaayo, ennaku zonna z'eneezikiranga nammwe nga muli mu nsi y'abalabe bammwe; awo ensi n'eryokanga ewummula n'esanyukira ssabbiiti zaayo. 
3_26_35_Ennaku zonna z'eneezikiranga eneewummulanga; okuwummula okwo kw'etabanga nakwo ku ssabbiiti zammwe nga mukyalimu. 
3_26_36_N'abo abanaasigalangawo ku mmwe, naasindikanga obutabaamu mwoyo mu mutima gwabwe mu nsi z'abalabe baabwe: n'eddoboozi ly'akasubi akamenyeka linaabagobanga; era banaddukanga ng'omuntu bw'adduka ekitala; era banaagwanga nga tewali agoba. 
3_26_37_Era banaalinnyagananga bokka na bokka, ng'abadduka ekitala, nga tewali agoba: so temuubenga na maanyi okuyimirira mu maaso g'abalabe bammwe. 
3_26_38_Era munaazikiriranga mu mawanga, n'ensi y'abalabe bammwe eneebalyanga. 
3_26_39_N'abo abanaasigalangawo ku mmwe banaakoozimbiranga mu butali butuukirivu bwabwe mu nsi z'abalabe bammwe; era ne mu butali butuukirivu bwa bajjajja baabwe mwe banaakoozimbiranga wamu nabo. 
3_26_40_Era banaayatulanga obutali butuukirivu bwabwe, n'obutali bu tuukirivu bwa bajjajja baabwe, mu kusobya kwabwe kwe bansobyako, era nga tebaatambula nange, 
3_26_41_era nga kyennaava ntambulira nange mu kuyomba nabo ne mbaleeta mu nsi y'abalabe baabwe, kubanga baatambulira mu kuyomba nange: kale omutima gwabwe ogutali mukomole bwe gunaatoowazibwanga, kale ne bakkiriza okubonerezebwa kw'obutali butuukirivu bwabwe; 
3_26_42_awo ne ndyoka njijukira endagaano yange gye nnalagaana ne Yakobo; era n'endagaano gye nnalagaana ne Isaaka, era n'endagaano yange gye nnalagaana ne Ibulayimu naagijjukiranga: era najjukiranga ensi. 
3_26_43_Era ensi banaagirekanga, n'esanyuldra ssabbiiti zaayo, ng'ekyazise bo nga tebaliimu; era banakkirizanga okubonerezebwa kw'obutali butuukirivu bwabwe: kubanea baagaana emisango gyange, eyo ye nsonga, n'obulamu bwabwe ne bukyawa amateeka gange. 
3_26_44_Era naye ebyo byonna nga bimaze okubaawo, bwe banaabanga nga bali mu nsi y'abalabe baabwe, siibagaanenga, so siibakyawenga, okubazikiririza ddala, n'okuleka endagaano yange gye nnalagaana nabo: kubanga nze Mukama Katonda waabwe: 
3_26_45_naye najjukiranga ku lwabwe endagaano ya bajjajja baabwe, be nnaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri mu maaso g'amawanga, ndyoke mbeerenga Katonda waabwe: nze Mukama. 
3_26_46_Ago ge mateeka n'emisango n'ebiragiro Mukama bye yassaawo wakati we n'abaana ba Isiraeri ku Ilusozi Sinaayi n'omukono gwa Musa. 
3_27_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
3_27_2_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri, obagambe nti Omuntu bw'anaatuukirizanga obweyamo, emibiri ginaabanga gya Mukama ng'okubala kwo bwe kunaabanga. 
3_27_3_N'okubala kwo okw'omusajja eyaakamaze emyaka abiri okutuusa ku myaka enkaaga, okubala kwo kunaabanga sekeri za ffeeza ataano, nga sekeri ey'omuwatukuvu bw'eri. 
3_27_4_Era bw'anaabanga ow'obuwala, kale okubala kwo kunaabanga sekeri asatu. 
3_27_5_Era bw'anaabanga yaaka maze emyaka etaano okutuusa ku myaka abiri, kale okubala kwo okw'ow'obulenzi kunaabanga sekeri abiri, n'okw'ow'obuwala sekeri kkumi. 
3_27_6_Era bw'anaabanga yaakamaze mwezi gumu okutuusa ku myaka etaano, kale okubala kwo okw'ow'obulenzi kunaabanga sekeri za ffeeza ttaano, n'okubala kwo okw'ow'obuwala kunaabanga sekeri za ffeeza ssatu. 
3_27_7_Era bw'anaabanga yaakamaze emyaka enkaaga n'okukirawo; bw'anaabanga omusajja, kale okubala kwo kunaabanga sekeri kkumi na ttaano, n'okw'omukazi sekeri kkumi. 
3_27_8_Naye bw'anaabanga omwavu okusinga okubala kwo, kale anaayimirizibwanga mu maaso ga kabona, kabona n'amusalira omuwendo; ng'obuyinza bw'oyo eyeeyama bwe bunaabanga, bw'atyo kabona bw'anaamusaliranga. 
3_27_9_Era bw'eneebanga ensolo, abantu gye bawaayo okuba ekirabo eri Mukama, byonna omuntu yenna by'anaawangayo ku ezo eri Mukama binaabanga bitukuvu 
3_27_10_Tagikyusanga so tagiwaanyisanga, ekirungi mu kifo ky'ekibi, oba ekibi mu kifo ky'ekirungi: n'okuwaanyisa bw'anaawaanyisanga ensolo n'ensolo, kale eyo era n'eri ezze mu kifo kyayo zombi zinaabanga ntukuvu. 
3_27_11_Era bw'eneebanga ensolo yonna eteri nnongoofu, gye batawaayo okuba ekitone eri Mukama, awo anaayimirizanga ensolo mu maaso ga kabona: 
3_27_12_kale kabona anaagiramulanga, oba nga nnungi oba nga mbi: nga ggwe kabona bw'onoogiramulanga, bw'eneebanga bw'etyo. 
3_27_13_Naye okununula bw'anaayagalanga okuginunula, kale anaagattangako ekitundu kyayo eky'okutaano ku bintu by'olamudde. 
3_27_14_Era omuntu bw'anaattikuzanga ennyumba ye okuba entukuvu eri Mukama, kale kabona anaagiramulanga, oba nga nnungi oba nga mbi: nga kabona bw'anaagiramulanga, bw'eneebanga bw'etyo. 
3_27_15_Era oyo eyagitukuza bw'anaayagalanga okununula ennyumba ye, kale anaagattangako ekittmdu eky'okutaano eky'ebintu by'olamudde, n'eba yiye. 
3_27_16_Era omuntu bw'anaatukuzanga eri Mukama ekitundu ky'ennimiro y'obutaka bwe, kale okulamula kwo kunaabanga ng'okusigibwa kwayo bwe kunaabanga okusiga kwa komeri ogwa sayiri kunaalamulwanga sekeri eza ffeeza ataano 
3_27_17_Bw'anaatukuzanga ennimiro ye okuva ku mwaka gwa jjubiri, eneebanga ng'okulamula kwo bwe kunaabanga. 
3_27_18_Naye bw'anaatukuzanga ennimiro ye jjubiri nga guweddeko, kale kabona anaamubaliranga ebintu ng'emyaka bwe giri egikyasigaddeyo okutuusa ku mwaka gwa jjubiri, ne bakendeeza ku bintu bye walamula. 
3_27_19_N'okununula oyo eyatukuza ennimiro bw'anaayagalanga okuginunula, kale anaagattangako ekitundu eky'okutaano eky'ebintu bye walamula, n'efuukira ddala yiye. 
3_27_20_Era bw'ataayagalenga kununula nnimiro, oba bw'aba ng'aguzizza ennimiro omulala, tekyanunulibwanga nate; 
3_27_21_naye ennimiro bw'eneegenderanga mu jjubiri, eneebanga ntukuvu eri Mukama, ng'ennimiro eyawongebwa; eneebanga ya kabona ya nvuma. 
3_27_22_Era bw'anaatukuzanga eri Mukama ennimiro gye yagula, eteri ya mu nnimiro ya butaka bwe; 
3_27_23_kale kabona anaamubaliranga omuwendo gw'ebintu bye walamula okutuusa ku mwaka gwa jjubiri: era anaawanga ebintu bye walamula ku lunaku olwo, ng'ekintu ekitukuvu eri Mukama. 
3_27_24_Mu mwaka gwa jjubiri ennimiro eneddanga eri oyo eyagitunda, ye nannyini butaka obw'ennimiro. 
3_27_25_N'okuiamula kwo kwonna kunaabanga nga sekeri bw'eri ey'omu watukuvu: gera amakumi abiri zinaabanga sekeri. 
3_27_26_Wabula eggula enda mu nsolo, ebeera eya Mukama eggula enda, tewabangawo anaagitukuzanga; oba nga nte, oba nga ndiga, eba ya Mukama. 
3_27_27_Era bw'eneebanga ya ku nsolo eteri nnongoofu, kale anaaginunulanga ng'okulamula kwo bwe kunaabanga, n'agattako ekitundu kyako eky'okutaano: oba bw'eteenunulibwenga, kale eneetundibwanga ng'okulamula kwo bwe kunaabanga. 
3_27_28_Naye tewabaaga kiatu ekyawongebwa, omuntu ky'anaawongeranga Mukama ku byonna by'alina, oba nga muntu oba nga nsolo, oba nga nnimiro ya butaka bwe, ekinaatundibwanga oba ekinaanunulibwanga: buli kintu ekyawongebwa kiba kitukuvu nnyo eri Mukama. 
3_27_29_Tewabanga eyawongebwa, anaawongebwanga ku bantu, anaanunulibwanga; talemanga kuttibwa. 
3_27_30_Era ekitundu byonna eby'ekkumi eby'ensi, oba nga bya nsigo za nsi, oba nga bya bibala bya muti, bya Mukama: biba bitukuvu eri Mukama. 
3_27_31_Era omuntu bw'anaayagalanga okununula ku bitundu bye eby'ekkumi, anaagattangako ekitundu kyabyo eky'okutaano. 
3_27_32_Era ebitundu byonna eby'ekkumi eby'ente oba eby'endiga, buli eyita wansi w'omuggo, ebitundu eby'ekkumi binaabanga bitukuvu eri Mukama. 
3_27_33_Takeberanga oba nga nnungi oba nga mbi so tagiwaanyisanga: n'okuwaanyisa bw'anaagiwaanyisanga, kale eyo era n'eri ezze mu kifo kyayo zombi zinaabanga ntukuvu: tenunulibwanga. 
3_27_34_Ebyo bye biragiro, Mukama bye yalagira Musa olw'abaana ba Isiraeri ku lusozi Sinaayi. 
4_1_1_Awo Mukama n'ayogerera ne Musa mu ddungu lya Sinaayi, mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi ogw'okubiri, mu mwaka ogw'okubiri nga bamaze okuva mu nsi y'e Misiri, ng'ayogera nti 
4_1_2_Mubale omuwendo gw'ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri, ng'enda zaabwe bwe ziri, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe guli, buli, musajja, ng'emitwe gyabwe bwe giri 
4_1_4_Era waliba wamu nammwe omusajja ow'omu buli kika; buli muatu omutwe gw'ennyumba ya bakitaawe. 
4_1_5_Era gano ge mannya g'abasajja abaliyimirira awamu nammwe: ku Lewubeeni; Erizuuli mutabani wa Sedewuli. 
4_1_6_Ku Simyoni; Serumiyeeri mutabani wa Zulisadaayi. 
4_1_7_Ku Yuda; Nakusoni mutabani wa Amminadaabu. 
4_1_8_Ku Isakaali; Nesaneri mutabani wa Zuwaali. 
4_1_9_Ku Zebbulooni; Eriyaabu mutabani wa Keroni. 
4_1_10_Ku baana ba Yusufu: ku Efulayimu; Erisaama mutabani wa Ammikudi: ku Manase; Gamalyeri mutabani wa Pedazuuli. 
4_1_11_Ku Benyamini: Abidaani mutabani wa Gidiyooni. 
4_1_12_Ku Ddaani; Akiyezeeri mutabani wa Amisadaayi. 
4_1_13_Ku Aseri; Pagiyeeri mutabaai wa Okulaani. 
4_1_14_Ku Gaadi; Eriyasaafu 'mutabani wa Deweri. 
4_1_15_Ku Nafutaali; Akira mutabani wa Enani. 
4_1_16_Abo be baayitibwa ku kibiina, abakulu b'ebika bya bakitaabwe; gye gyali emitwe gy'enkumi za Isiraeri. 
4_1_17_Awo Musa ne Alooni ne batwala abasajja abo abaatuddwa amannya: 
4_1_18_ne bakuŋŋaanya ekibiina kyonna ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi ogw'okubiri, ne baatula okuzaalibwa kwabwe ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, ng'emitwe gyabwe bwe gyali. 
4_1_19_Nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa, bw'atyo bwe yababalira mu ddungu lya Sinaayi. 
4_1_20_N'abaana ba Lewubeeni, omubereberye wa Isiraeri, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, ng'emitwe gyabwe bwe gyali, buli musajja eyaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_21_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Lewubeeni, baali obukumi buna mu kakaaga mu bitaano. 
4_1_22_Ku baana ba Simyoni, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, abaabalibwa ku bo, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, ng'emitwe gyabwe bwe gyali, buli musajja eyaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza, okutabaala; 
4_1_23_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Simyoni, baali obukumi' butaano mu kenda mu bisatu. 
4_1_24_Ku baana ba Gaadi, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_25_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Gaadi, baali obukumi buna mu enkumi ttaano mu lukaaga mu ataano. 
4_1_26_Ku baana ba Yuda, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_27_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Yuda, baali obukumi musanvu mu enkumi nnya mu lukaaga. 
4_1_28_Ku baana ba Isakaali, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyalca abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_29_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Isakaali, baali obukumi butaano mu enkumi nnya mu bina. 
4_1_30_Ku baana ba Zebbulooni, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_31_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Zebbulooni, baali obukumi butaano mu kasanvu mu bina. 
4_1_32_Ku baana ba Yusufu, ku baana ba Efulayimu, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_33_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Efulayimu, baali obukumi buna mu bitaano. 
4_1_34_Ku baana ba Manase, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'etmyumna za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_35_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Manase, baali obukumi busatu mu enkumi bbiri mu bibiri. 
4_1_36_Ku baana ba Benyamini, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_37_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Benyamini, baali obukumi busatu mu enkumi ttaano mu bina. 
4_1_38_Ku baana ba Ddaani, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_39_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Ddaani, baali obukumi mukaaga mu enkumi bbiri mu lusanvu. 
4_1_40_Ku baana ba Aseri, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'etmyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_41_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Aseri, baali obukumi buna mu lukumi mu bitaano. 
4_1_42_Ku baana ba Nafutaali, okuzaalibwa kwabwe, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala; 
4_1_43_abaabalibwa ku bo, ku kika kya Nafutaali, baali obukumi butaano mu enkumi ssatu mu bina. 
4_1_44_Abo be baabalibwa, Musa ne Alooni be baabala, n'abakulu ba Isiraeri, abasajja kkumi na babiri: buli muntu wa mu nnyumba ya bakitaawe. 
4_1_45_Bwe batyo bonna abaabalibwa ku baana ha Isiraeri; ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, bonna abaayinza okutabaala mu Isiraeri; 
4_1_46_bonna abaabalibwa baali obusiriivu mukaaga mu enkumi ssatu mu bitaano mu ataano. 
4_1_47_Naye Abaleevi ng'ekika kya bakitaabwe bwe kyali tebaabalibwa mu bo. 
4_1_48_Kubanga Mukama yagamba Musa 
4_1_49_nti Kyokka ekika kya Leevi tolikibala, so tolinoonya muwendo gwabwe mu baana ba Isiraeri: 
4_1_50_naye Abaleevi obafuule abakulu b'ennyumba ey'obujulirwa, era ab'ebintu byayo byonna, era ab'ebintu byonna ebigenderako: banaasitulanga ennyumba, n'ebintu byayo byonna; era banaagiweerezanga, era baanasiisiranga okwetoo loola ennyumba. 
4_1_51_Era ennyumba bw'eneebanga etambula, Abaleevi be banaagisimbulanga: era ennyumba bw'eneebanga esimbibwa, Abaleevi be banaagisimbanga: era munnaggwanga anaasemberanga anattibwanga. 
4_1_52_Era abaana ba Isiraeri banaasimbanga eweema zaabwe; buli muntu okuliraana n'olusiisira lwe ye, era buli muntu okuliraana n'ebendera ye ye, ng'eggye lyabwe bwe liri. 
4_1_53_Naye Abaleevi banaasiisiranga okwetooloola ennyumba ey'obujulirwa, walemenga okuba obusungu ku kibiina ky'abaana ba Isiraeri: era Abaleevi banaabanga n'omulimu ogw'okukuuma ennyumba ey'obujulirwa. 
4_1_54_Bwe batyo bwe baakola abaana ba Isiraeri; nga byonna bwe byali Mukama bye yalagira Musa, ne bakola bwe batyo. 
4_2_1_Awo Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
4_2_2_Abaana ba Isiraeri banaasiisiranga buli muntu okuliraana n'ebendera ye, awali obubonero bw'ennyumba za bakitaabwe: banaasiisiranga okwolekera eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu enjuyi zonna. 
4_2_3_Era abo abasiisira ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba okutunuulira enjuba gy'eva banaabanga ba bendera ya lusiisira lwa Yuda, ng'eggye lyabwe bwe liri: era Nakusoni mutabani wa Amminadaabu ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Yuda. 
4_2_4_Era eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi musanvu mu lukaaga. 
4_2_5_N'ekika kya Isakaali be banaasiisiranga okumuliraana: era Nesaneeri mutabani wa Zuwaali ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Isakaali: 
4_2_6_n'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku lyo baali obukumi butaano mu enkumi nnya mu bina: 
4_2_7_n'ekika kya Zebbulooni: era Eriyaabu mutabani wa Keroni ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Zebbulooni: 
4_2_8_n'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku lyo baali obukumi butaano mu kasanvu mu bina. 
4_2_9_Bonna abaabalibwa ku lusiisira lwa Yuda baali kasiriivu mu obukumi munaana mu lukaaga mu bina, ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali. Be banaasookanga okusitula. 
4_2_10_Ku luuyi olw'obukiika obwa ddyo we wanaabanga ebendera ey'olusiisira lwa Lewubeeni ng'eggye lyabwe bwe liri: era Erizuuli mutabani wa Sedewuli ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Lewubeeni. 
4_2_11_N'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku lyo baali obukumi buna mu kakaaga mu bitaano. 
4_2_12_N'ekika kya Simyoni be banaasiisiranga okumuliraana: era Serumyeri mutabani wa Zulisadaayi ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Simyoni: 
4_2_13_n'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi butaano mu kenda mu bisatu: 
4_2_14_n'ekika kya Gaadi: era Eriyasaafu mutabani wa Leweri ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Gaadi: 
4_2_15_n'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obuktuni buna mu enkumi ttaano mu lukaaga mu ataano. 
4_2_16_Bonna abaabalibwa ku lusiisira lwa Lewubeeni baali kasiriivu mu obukumi butaano mu lukumi mu bina mu ataano, ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali. Be banaddiriranga bali okusitula. 
4_2_17_Eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu n'eryoka etambulanga, wamu n'olusiisira lw'Abaleevi wakati mu nsiisira; nga bwe basiisira, bwe banaasitulanga bwe batyo, buli muntu mu kifo kye, awali ebendera zaabwe. 
4_2_18_Ku luuyi olw'ebugwanjuba we wanaabanga ebendera ey'olusiisira lwa Efulayimu ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lizi: era Erisaama mutabani wa Amaiikudi ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Efulayimu. 
4_2_19_N'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo, baali obukumi buna mu bitaano. 
4_2_20_N'ekika kya Manase kye kinaamuddiriranga: era Gamalyeri mutabani wa Pedazuuli ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Manase; 
4_2_21_n'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi busatu mu enkumi bbiri mu bibiri: 
4_2_22_n'ekika kya Benyamini: era Abidaani mutabani wa Gidiyooni ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Benyamini: 
4_2_23_n'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali abukumi busaru mu enkumi ttaano mu bina. 
4_2_24_Bonna abaabalibwa ku lusiisira lwa Efulayimu baali kasiriivu mu kanaana mu kikumi, ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali. Be banaddiriranga bali nate okusitula. 
4_2_25_Ku luuyi olw'obukiika obwa kkono we wanaabanga ebendera ey'olusiisira lwa Ddaani ng'eggyel lyabwe bwe liri: era Akiyezeeri mutabani wa Amisadaayi ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Ddaani. 
4_2_26_N'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi mukaaga mu enkumi bbiri mu lusanvu. 
4_2_27_N'ekika kya Aseri be banaasiisiranga okumuliraana: era Pagiyeeri mutabani wa Okulaani ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Aseri: 
4_2_28_n'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi buna mu' lukumi mu bitaano: 
4_2_29_n'eluka kya Nafutaali: era Akira mutabani wa Enani ye anaabanga omukulu w'abaana ba Nafutaali: 
4_2_30_n'eggye lye n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi butaano mu enkumi ssatu mu bina. 
4_2_31_Bonna abaabalibwa ku lusiisira lwa Ddaani baali kasiriivu mu obukumi butaano mu kasanvu mu lukaaga. Be banaasembanga ng'ebendera bwe ziri. 
4_2_32_Abo be baabalibwa ku baana ba Isiraeri ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali: bonna abaabalibwa ku nsiisira ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali baali obusiriivu mukaaga mu enkumi ssatu mu bitaano mu ataano. 
4_2_33_Naye Abaleevi tebaabalibwa mu baana ba Isiraeri; nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_2_34_Abaana ba Isiraeri bwe baakola bwe batyo; nga byonna bwe byali Mukama bye yalagira Musa, bwe baasiisiranga bwe batyo awali ebendera zaabwe, era bwe batyo bwe baasitulanga, buli muntu ag'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba ya bakitaabwe bwe zaali. 
4_3_1_Era kuno kwe kuzaala kwa Alooni ne Musa ku lunaku Mukama lwe yayogereramu ne Musa ku lusozi Sinaayi. 
4_3_2_Era gano ge mannya 8'abaana ba Alooni; Nada, bu, omubereberye, ne Abiku, Eriyazaali, ne Isamaali. 
4_3_3_Ago ge mannya g'abaana ba Alooni, bakabona abaafukibwako amafuta, be yayawula okuweererezanga mu bwakabona. 
4_3_4_Era Nadabu ne Abiku ne bafiira mu maaso ga Mukama, bwe baawaayo omuliro ogutali gugwe mu maaso ga Mukama, mu dduagu lya Sinaayi, ne bataba na baana: awo Eriyazaali ne Isamaali ne ba,weererezanga mu bwakabona mu maaso ga Alooni kitaabwe. 
4_3_5_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_3_6_Sembeza ekika kya Leevi, obateeke mu maaso ga Alooni kabona, bamuweerezanga. 
4_3_7_Era banaakuumanga ebyo ye bye yalagirwa, n'ebyo ekibiina kyonna bye kyalagirwa, mu maaso g'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, okukolanga okuweereza okw'omu nnyumba. 
4_3_8_Era banaakuumanga ebintu byonna eby'omu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, n'ebyo abaana ba Isiraeri bye baalagirwa, okukolanga okuweereza okw'omu nnyumba. 
4_3_9_Era onoowa Alooni n'abaana be Atialeevi: baweereddwa ddala ye ku bw'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_3_10_Era onossaawo Alooni n'abaana be, era banaakuumanga obwakabona bwabwe: ne munnaggwanga anaasemberanga anattibwanga. 
4_3_11_Awo Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_3_12_Nange, laba, nze nziye Abaleevi mu baana ba Isiraeri mu kifo ky'ababereberye abaggulanda mu baana ba Isiraeri; n'Abaleevi banaabanga bange: 
4_3_13_kubanga ababereberye bonna bange; ku lunaku lwe nnattiramu ababereberye bonna mu nsi y'e Misiri nneetukuliza ababereberye bonna mu Isiraeri, abantu era n'ensolo: banaabanga bange; nze ndi Mukama. 
4_3_14_Awo Mukama n'agambira Musa mu ddungu lya Sinaayi nti 
4_3_15_bala abaana ba Leevi ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, ng'enda zaabwe bwe ziri: buli mwana mulenzi eyaakamaze omwezi ogumu n'okukirawo onoobabala. 
4_3_16_Musa n'ababala ng'ekigambo kya Mukama bwe kyali, nga bwe yalagirwa. 
4_3_17_Era bano be baana ba Leevi ng'amannya gaabwe bwe gali; Gerusoni ne Kokasi ne Merali. 
4_3_18_Era gano ge mannya g'abaana ba Gerusoni ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali; Libuni ne Simeeyi. 
4_3_19_N'abaana ba Kokasi ng'enda zaabwe bwel zaali; Amulaamu ne Izukali, Kebbulooni ne Wuziyeeri. 
4_3_20_N'abaana ba Merali ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali; Makuli ne Musi. Ezo ze nda z'Abaleevi ng'enayumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali. 
4_3_21_Mu Gerusoni mwe mwava enda y'Abalibuni, n'enda y'Abasimeeyi: ezo ze nda z'Abagerusoni. 
4_3_22_Abo abaabalibwa ku bo ng'omuwendo gw'abasajja bonna bwe gwali, abaakamaze omwezi ogumu n'okukirawo, abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali kasanvu mu bitaano. 
4_3_23_Enda z'Abagerusoni banaassiisiranga nnyuma w'ennyumba ku luuyi olw'ebugwanjuba. 
4_3_24_N'omukulu w'ennyumba ya bakitaabwe ey',Sbagerusoni anaabanga Eriyasaafu mutabani wa Laeri. 
4_3_25_Era abaana ba Gerusoni kye baalagirwa mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu kinaabanga ennyumba n'Eweema, elugibikkako, a'eggigi ery'omulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, 
4_3_26_n'ezitimbibwa ez'oluggya, n'eggigi ery'omulyango gw'oluggya oluli ku nnyumba era olwetooloola ekyoto, n'emigwa gyalwo olw'pkuweereza kwalwo kwonna. 
4_3_27_Ne mu Kokasi mwe mwava enda y'Abamulaamu, n'enda y'Abaizukaali, n'enda y'Abakebbulooni, n'enda y'Abawuziyeeri: ezo ze nda z'Abakokasi. 
4_3_28_Ng'omuwendo gw'abasajja bonna bwe gwali abaakamaze omwezi ogumu n'okukirawo baali kanaana mu lukaaga abaakuumanga awatukuvu we baalagirwa. 
4_3_29_Enda z'abaana ba Kokasi banaasiisiranga ku luuyi olw'eweema olw'obukiika obwa ddyo. 
4_3_30_Era omukulu w'ennyumba ya bakitaabwe ey'Abakokasi anaabanga Erizafani mutabaani wa Wuziyeeri. 
4_3_31_Era kye balagirwa kinaabanga sanduuko, n'emmeeza, n'ekikondo, n'ebyoto, n'ebintu eby'omu watukuvu bye baweerezesa, n'eggigi n'okuweereza kwalyo kwonna. 
4_3_32_Ne Eriyazaali mutabaani wa Alooni kabona ye anaabanga omukulu w'abakulu b'Abaleevi, ng'alabirira abo abakuuma awatukuvu we balagirwa. 
4_3_33_Mu Merali mwe mwava eada y'Abamakuli, n'enda y'Abamusi: ezo ze nda za Merali. 
4_3_34_Era abo abaabalibwa ku bo, ng'omuwendo gw'abasajja bonna bwe gwali, abaakamaze omwezi ogumu n'okukirawo, baali kakaaga mu bibiri. 
4_3_35_Era omukulu w'ennyumba ya bakitaabwe ey'enda za Merali yali Zuliyeeri mutabani wa Abikayiri: abo banaasiisiranga ku luuyi lw'ennyumba olw'obukiika obwa kkono. 
4_3_36_N'omulimu ogulagirwa ogw'abaana ba Merali gunaabanga embaawo ez'ennyumba, n'emisituliro gyayo, n'empagi zaayo, n'ebinnya byayo, n'ebintu byayo byonna, n'okuweereza kwayo kwonna; 
4_3_37_n'empagi ez'oluggya olwetooloola, n'ebinnya byazo, n'enninga zaazo, n'emigwa gyazo. 
4_3_38_N'abo abanaasiisiranga mu maaso g'ennyumba ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba, mu maaso g'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu okwolekera enjuba ng'evaayo, banaabanga Musa, ne Alooni ne batabani be, nga bakuuma awatukuvu we balagirwa, olw'okulagirwa kw'abaana ba Isiraeri; ne munnaggwanga anaasembe ranga anattibwanga. 
4_3_39_Bonaa abaabalibwa ku Baleevi, Musa ne Alooni be baabala olw'ekiragiro kya Mukama ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, abasajja bonna abaakamaze omwezi ogumu n'okukirawo, baali obukumi bubiri mu enkumi bbiri. 
4_3_40_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Bala abasajja ababereberye bonna ku baana ba Isiraeri abaakamaze omwezi ogumu n'okukirawo, otwale omuwendo gw'amannya gaabwe. 
4_3_41_Era olintwalira nze Abaleevi nze Mukama mu kifo ky'ababereberye bonna ku baana ba Isiraeri; n'ebisibo by'Abaleevi mu kifo ky'embereberye zonna ku bisibo by'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_3_42_Awo Musa n'abala, nga Mukama bwe yamulagira, ababereberye bonna ku baana ba Isiraeri. 
4_3_43_N'abasajja bonna ababereberye, ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe gwali, abaakamaze omwezi ogumu n'okukirawo, abo abaabalibwa ku bo, baali obukumi bubiri mu enkumi bbiri mu bibiri mu nsanvu mu basatu. 
4_3_44_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_3_45_Twala Abaleevi mu kifo ky'ababereberye bonna ku baana ba Isiraeri n'ebisibo by'Abaleevi mu kifo ky'ebisibo byabwe: era Abaleevi banaabanga bange; nze Mu kama. 
4_3_46_N'olw'okununula ababereberye b'abaana ba Isiraeri bibiri mu nsanvu mu basatu, abafikkawo ku muwendo gw'Abaleevi, 
4_3_47_onoosoloozanga sekeri ttaano bulimuntu ng'emitwe bwe giri; onoozitwalanga nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri sekeri ze gera abiri: 
4_3_48_era onoowanga effeeza enunulal omuwendo gwabwe ogufikkawo Alooni ne batabani be. 
4_3_49_Musa n'abasoloozaako etFeeza enunula abo abafikkawo ku abo abaanunulibwa n'Abaleevi: 
4_3_50_ababereberye b'abaana ba Isiraeri be yasoloozaako effeeza; sekeri lukumi mu bisatu mu nkaaga mu ssatu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri: 
4_3_51_awo Musa n'awa Alooni ne batabani be effeeza enunula, ng'ekigambo kya Mukama bwe kyali nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_4_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
4_4_2_Mubale omuwendo gw'abaana ba Kokasi ku baana ba Leevi, ng'enda zaabwe bwe ziri, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, 
4_4_3_abaakamaze emyaka asatu n'okukirawo okutuusa ku myaka ataano, bonna abayingira mu kuweereza okwo, okukolanga omulimu mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_4_4_Guno gwe mulimu gw'abaana ba Kokasi mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, ogw'ebintu ebitukuvu ennyo: 
4_4_5_olusiisira bwe lunaasitulanga, Alooni anaayingiranga n'abaana be ne batimbulula eggigi eritimbibwa, ne balibikka ku sanduuko ey'obujulirwa: 
4_4_6_ne bateeka okwo amaliba g'ensionge okubikkako, ne baaliirira okwo olugoye olwa kaniki lwonna, ne bayingiza emisituliro gyayo. 
4_4_7_Ne ku mmeeza ey'emigaati egy'okulaga banaayaliirangako olugoye olwa kaniki ne bateeka okwo essowaani, n'ebijiiko, n'ebibya, n'ebikompe eby'okufukanga nabyo: n'emigaati egitavangawo ginaabanga okwo: 
4_4_8_era banaayaliiranga ku byo olugoye olumyufu, ne balusabikako olwo n'amaliba 'g'eŋŋonge agasabika, ne bayingiza emisituliro gyayo. 
4_4_9_Ne baddira olugoye olwa kaniki, ne basabika ku kikondo ky'ettabaaza, n'eby'ettabaaza byakyo, ne makansi yaakyo, n'essowaani zaakyo ez'ebisiriiza, n'ebintu byakyo byonna eby'amafuta, bye bakiweerezesa: 
4_4_10_ne bakisiba kyo n'ebintu byakyo byonna mu maliba g'eŋŋonge agasabika, ne bakiteeka ku muti. 
4_4_11_Ne ku kyoto ekya zaabu banaayaliirangako olugoye olwa kaniki, ne balusabikako amaliba g'ennonge agasabika, ne bayingiza emisituliro gyakyo: 
4_4_12_ne baddira ebintu byonna eby'okuweereza, bye baweerezesa mu watukuvu, ne babisiba mu lugoye olwa kaniki, ne babisabikako amaliba g'ennonge agasabika, ne babiteeka ku muti. 
4_4_13_Ne baggya evvu mu kyoto, ne bakyaliirako olugoye olw'effulungu: 
4_4_14_ne bakiteekako ebintu byakyo byonna, bye baweerezesa emirimu gyakyo, emmumbiro, n'eby'okukwasa ennyama, n'ebijiiko, n'ebibya, ebintu byonna eby'ekyoto; ne bakyaliirako amaliba g'eŋŋonge agasabika, ne bayingiza emisituliro gyakyo. 
4_4_15_Awo Alooni ne batabani be bwe banaamaliranga ddala okusabika ku watukuvu, n'ebintu byonna eby'omu watukuvu, olusiisira nga lunaatera okusitula; oluvannyuma batabani ba Kokasi ne balyoka bajja okubisitula: naye tebakomanga ku watukuvu, baleme okufa. Ebyo gwe mugugu gwa batabani ba Kokasi mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_4_16_Ne Eriyazaali mutabani wa Alooni kabona by'anaateresebwa binaabanga mafuta ga ttabaaza n'obubaane obw'akaloosa, n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekitavaawo, n'amafuta ag'okufukako, anaateresebwanga eweema yonna, n'ebigirimu byonna, awatukuvu n'ebintu byawo. 
4_4_17_Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
4_4_18_Ekika eky'ennyumba z'Abakokasi temukisalako okukiggya mu Baleevi: 
4_4_19_naye mubakole bwe mutyo, babenga abalamu, balemenga okufa, ag'abasemberera ebintu ebitukuvu ennyo: Alooni ne batabani be banaayingiranga, ne balagira buli muntu okuweereza kwe n'omugugu gwe: 
4_4_20_naye tebayingiranga n'akamu kokka kulaba watukuvu, baleme okufa. 
4_4_21_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_4_22_Bala omuwendo gw'abaana ba Gerusoni nabo, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, ng'enda zaabwe bwe ziri; 
4_4_23_abaakamaze emyaka asatu n'okukirawo okutuusa ku myaka ataano b'oba obala; bonna abayingira okulwana olutalo olwo, okukola omulimu mu weema ey'o kusisinkanirangamu. 
4_4_24_Kuno kwe kuweereza kw'enda ez'Abagerusoni, mu kuweereza ne mu kusitula emigugu: 
4_4_25_banaasitulanga amagigi ag'ennyumba, n'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, ebisabika ku yo, n'amaliba g'erjgonge agagisabikako waggulu, n'eggigi ery'oluggi lw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu; 
4_4_26_n'ezitimbibwa ez'oluggya, n'eggigi ery'oluggi lwa wankaaki w'oluggya, oluli ku weema ne ku kyoto eajuyi zonna, n'emigwa gyabyo, a'ebintu byonna eby'okuweereza kwabyo, n'emirimu gyonna gye binaakolanga, ebyo bye banaaweerezanga. 
4_4_27_Alooni ne batabani be be banaalagiranga okuweereza kwonna okwa batabani ba Gerusoni, mu kusitula kwabwe kwonna ne mu kuweereza kwabwe kwonna: era mmwe munaabagabiranga okusinila kwabwe kwonna okubakukwasa. 
4_4_28_Okwo kwe kuweereza kw'enda za batabaai ba Gerusoni mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu: n'okulagirwa kwabwe kunaabanga wansi w'omukono gwa Isamaali mutabani wa Alooni kabona. 
4_4_29_Batabani ba Merali, onoobabala ng'enda zaabwe bwe ziri, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri; 
4_4_30_abaakamaze emyaka asatu n'okukirawo okutuusa emyaka ataano b'oba obala, buli ayingira mu kuweereza, okukolanga omulimu ogw'ewcema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_4_31_Era kino kye kiragiro eky'okusitula kwabwe, ng'okuweereza kwabwe kwonna bwe kuli mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu; embaawo ez'ennyumba, n'emisituliro gyayo, n'empagi zaayo, n'ebinnya byayo; 
4_4_32_n'empagi ez'oluggya olwetooloola, n'ebinnya byazo, n'enninga zaazo, n'emigwa gyazo, wamu n'ebintu byazo byonna, n'okuweereza kwazo kwonna: era munaabagabiranga ng'amannya gaabwe bwe gali ebintu bye banaalagirwanga bye banaasitulanga. 
4_4_33_Okwo kwe kuweereza kw'enda za batabani ba Merali, ng'okuweereza kwabwe kwo'nna bwe kuli, mu weema ey'okuI sisinkanirangamu, wansi w'omukono gwa- Isamaali mutabani wa Alooni kabona. 
4_4_34_Awo Musa ne Alooni n'abakulu b'ekibiina ne babala batabani b'Abakokasi, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, era ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, 
4_4_35_abaali baakamaze emyaka asatu n'okukirawo ,okutuusa emyaka ataano, buli eyalyingira mu kuweereza, okukolanga omulimu mu weema ey'okusisinka'nirangamu: 
4_4_36_era abo abaabalibwa ku bo ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali baali enkumi bbiri mu lusanvu mu ataano. 
4_4_37_Abo be baabalibwa ku nda ez'Abakokasi, bonna abaaweerezanga mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, Musa ne Alooni be baabala ng'ekiragiro kya Mukama bwe kyali mu mukono gwa Musa. 
4_4_38_N'abo abaabalibwa ku batabani ba Gerusoni, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, era ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, 
4_4_39_abaali baakamaze emyaka asatu n'okukirawo okutuusa emyaka ataano, buli eyayingira mu kuweereza, okukolanga omulimu mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, 
4_4_40_abo abaabalibwa ku I bo, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, baali enkumi bbiii mu lu sanvu mu asatu. 
4_4_41_Abo be baabalibwa ku nda za batabani ba Gerusoni, bonna abaaweerezanga mu 'weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, Musa ne Alooni be baabala ng'ekiragiro kya Mukama bwe kyali. 
4_4_42_N'abo abaabalibwa ku nda za batabani ba Merali, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, 
4_4_43_abaakamaze emyaka asatu n'okukirawo okutuusa emyaka ataano, buli eyayingira mu kuweereza, okukolanga omulimu mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, 
4_4_44_abo abaabalibwa ku bo ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, baali enkumi bbiri mu bibiri. 
4_4_45_Abo be baabalibwa ku nda za batabani ba Merali Musa ne Alooni be baabalal ng'ekiragiro kya Mukama bwe kyali mu mukono gwa Musa. 
4_4_46_Abo bonna abaabalibwa ku Baleevi, Musa ne Alooni n'abakulu ba Isiraeri be baabala, ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali, era ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, 
4_4_47_abaali baakamaze emyaka asatu a'okukirawo okutuusa emyaka ataano, buli' eyayingira okukolanga omulimu ogw'okuweereza, n'omulimu ogw'okusitula emigugu mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, 
4_4_48_abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali kanaana mu bitaano mu kinaana. 
4_4_49_Ng'ekiragiro kya Mukama bwe kyali, baabalibwa n'omukono gwa Musa buli muntu ng'okuweereza kwe bwe kwali, era ng'okusitula kwe bwe kwali: bw'atyo bwe yababala, nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_5_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_5_2_Lagira abaana ba Isiraeri, baggye mu lusiisira buli mugenge, na buli muziku, na buli atali mulongoofu olw'omufu: 
4_5_3_abasajja era n'abakazi munaabaggyangamu, munaabafulumyanga ebweru w'olusiisira; balemenga okwonoona olusiisira lwabwe, lwe ntuulamu wakati 
4_5_4_Abaana ba Isiraeri ne bakola bwe batyo, ne babafulumya ebweru w'olusiisira: nga Mukama bwe yagamba Musa, abaana ba Isiraeri bwe baakola bwe batyo. 
4_5_5_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_5_6_Gamba abaana ba Isiraeri nti Omusajja oba omukazi bw'anaakolanga ekibi kyonna abantu kye bakola, okusobya Mukama, omuntu oyo n'abaako omusango 
4_5_8_Naye omuntu oyo bw'aba nga talina muganda we gwe bayinza okuliyira olw'omusango, ebyo bye baliwa olw'omusango bye baliyira Mukama binaabanga bya kabona; era n'endiga ennume ey'okutangirira, gye banaamutangirizanga. 
4_5_9_Na buli kiweebwayo ekisitulibwa ku bintu byonna ebitukuw eby'abaana ba Isiraeri, bye baleetera kabona, kinaabanga kikye. 
4_5_10_N'ebintu ebya buli muntu ebitukuzibwa, binaabanga bibye: ekintu kyonna omuntu yenna ky'anaawanga kabona, kinaabanga kikye. 
4_5_11_Mukama n'ayogera ne Musa nti 
4_5_12_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri, obagambe nti Omukazi w'omuntu yenna bw'anaakyamanga, n'amusobyako, 
4_5_13_omusajja n'asula naye, ne kikwekebwa amaaso ga bbaawe, ne kikisibwa, ye n'ayonooneka, ne wataba mujulirwa amulumiriza, era nga tebamusisinkanirizza; 
4_5_14_omwoyo ogw'obuggya ne gumujjira, n'akwatirwa mukazi we obuggya, naye ng'ayonoonese: oba omwoyo ogw'obuggya bwe gunaamujjiranga, n'akwatirwa mukazi we obuggya, so naye nga tayonoonese: 
4_5_15_kale omusajja anaaleetanga mukazi we eri kabona, n'amuleetera ekitone kye, ekitundu eky'ekkumi ekya efa eky'obutta obwa sayiri; tafukangako mafuta gonna, so tateekangako mugaw; kubanga kye kiweebwayo eky'obutta olw'obuggya, ekiweebwayo eky'obutta eky'okujjukiza, ekijjukiza obutali butuukirivu. 
4_5_16_Awo kabona anaamusembezanga, n'amuteeka mu maaso ga Mukama: 
4_5_17_kabona n'addira amazzi amatukuvu mu kintu eky'r bbumba; ne ku nfuufu eri wansi mu weema kabona anaatolangako, n'agiteeka mu mazzi: 
4_5_18_kabona n'ateeka omukazi mu maaso ga Mukama n'abikkula ku nviiri ez'oku mutwe gw'omukazi, n'amukwasa mu ngalo ekiweebwayo eky'obutta eky'a kujjukiza, kye kiweebwayo eky'obutta eky'obuggya: era kabona anaakwatanga mu mukono gwe amazti agakaawa agaleeta ekikolimo: 
4_5_19_awo kabona anaamulayizanga, n'agamba omukazi nti Oba up Itewali musajja eyasula naawe, so tokyamanga eri obutali bulongoofu, ng'ofugibwa balo, amazzi gano agakaawa agaleeta ekikolimo tegakubeerako: 
4_5_20_naye oba nga wakyama, ng'ofugibwa balo, era ng'oyonoonese, era omusajja omulala oba nga yasula naawe atali balo: 
4_5_21_awo kabona anaalayizanga omukazi ekirayiro eky'okukolima, kabona n'agamba omukazi nti Mukama akufuule ekikolimo n'ekirayiro mu bantu bo, Mukama bw'akoozimbyanga ekisambi kyo, n'atumbiiza olubuto lwo; 
4_5_22_n'amazzi gano agaleeta ekikolimo ganaagenda mu byenda byo, ne gatumbiiza olubuto lwo, ne gakoozimbya ekisambi kyo; omukazi n'ayogera nti Amina, Amina. 
4_5_23_Awo kabona anaawandiikanga ebikolimo ebyo mu kitabo, n'abyozaako n'amazzi agakaawa: 
4_5_24_n’anywesa omukazi amazzi agakaawa agaleeta ekikolimo: amazzi agaleeta ekikolimo ne gayingira mu ye ne gakaawa. 
4_5_25_Awo kabona anaggyanga ekiweebwayo eky'obutta eky'obuggya mu mukono gw'omuI kazi, n'awuuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta mu maaso ga Mukama, n'akireeta eri ekyoto: 
4_5_26_kabona n'addira olubatu olw'obutta obuweebwayo, okuba ek:jjukizo kyabwo, n'abwokera ku kyoto, oluvannyuma n'anywesa omukazi amazzi ago. 
4_5_27_Awo bw'anaamalanga okumunywesa amazzi, kale olunaatuukanga, bw'anaabanga ayonoonese, era ng'asobezza ku bbaawe, amazzi agaleeta ekikolimo ganaayingirangamu ye ne gakaawa, n'olubuto lwe ne lutumbiira, n'ekisambi kye ne kikoozimba: n'omukazi anaabanga kikolimo mu bantu be. 
4_5_28_Era omukazi bw'anaabanga tayonoonese, naye nga mulongoofu; kale taabengako kigambo, n'okuba aliba lubuto. 
4_5_29_Eryo lye tteeka ery'obuggya, omukazi ng'afugibwa bbaawe bw'anaakyamangan'ayonooneka: 
4_5_30_oba omwoyo ogw'obuggya bwe gunajjiranga omusajja, n'akwatirwa mukazi we obuggya; awo anaateekanga omukazi mu maaso ga Mukama, ne kabona anaamukoleranga etteeka eryo lyonna: 
4_5_31_Omusajja n'atabaako butali butuukirivu, n'omukazi oyo anaabangako obutali butuukirivu bwe. 
4_6_1_Mukama n'ayogera ne Musa nti 
4_6_2_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri, obagambe nti Omusajja oba omukazi bw'aneey amanga obweyamo ku bubwe yekka, obweyamo obw'omuwonge, okwewonga eri Mukama: 
4_6_3_aneeyawulanga n'omwenge n'ekitamiiza; tanywanga ku mwenge omukaaruufu, n'ewakubadde ekitamiiza ekikaatuufu, so tanywanga ku mazzi g'ezzabbibu, so talyanga zabbibu mbisi newakubadde enkalu. 
4_6_4_Ennaku zonna ez'okwewonga kwe talyanga kintu ekiva ku muzabbibu, newakubadde ensigo newakubadde ebikuta. 
4_6_5_Ennaku zonna ez'obweyamo bwe obw'okwewonga akamwano tekayitanga ku mutwe gwe: okutuusa ennaku lwe zinaatuukiriranga, ze yeewongeramu eri Mukama, anaabanga mutukuvu, anaalekanga emivunibo gy'enviiri ez'oku mutwe gwe okukula. 
4_6_6_Ennaku zonna ze yeewongeramu eri Mukama, tasembereranga mulambo. 
4_6_7_Teyeefuulanga atali mulongoofu lwa kitaawe, newakubadde lwa nnyina, newakubadde lwa muganda we, newakubadde lwa mwannyina, bwe banaafanga: kubanga okwewonga kwe eri Katonda kuli ku mutwe gwe. 
4_6_8_Ennaku zonna ez'okwewonga kwe aba mutukuvu eri Mukama. 
4_6_9_Era omuntu yenna bw'anaafanga amangu ennyo ng'amuliraanye naye n'ayonoona omutwe ogw'okwewonga kwe; kale anaamwanga omutwe gwe ku lunaku olw'okulongoosebwa kwe ku lunaku olw'omusanvu kw'anaagumweranga. 
4_6_10_Ne ku lunaku olw'omunaana anaaleetanga bukaamukuukulu bubiri, oba amayiba amato abiri, eri kabona, ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu: 
4_6_11_awo kabona anaawangayo akamu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'ak'okubiri okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, n'amutangirira, kubanga yayonoona olw'abafu, n'atukuza omutwe gwe ku lunaku olwo. 
4_6_12_Era anaawonganga eri Mukama ennaku ez'okwewonga kwe, n'aleeta omwana gw'endiga omulume ogutannamala mwaka gumu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'omusango: naye ennaku ezisoose zinaabanga zifudde, kubanga okwewonga kwe kwayonooneka. 
4_6_13_Era lino lye tteeka ery'omuwonge, ennaku ez'okwewonga kwe bwe zinaatuukiriranga: anaaleetebwanga ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu: 
4_6_14_n'awaayo ekitone kye eri Mukama, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu ogutaliiko bulema okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, n'omwana gw'endiga omuluusi gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu ogutaliiko bulema okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, n'endiga ennume emu eteriiko bulema okuba ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, 
4_6_15_n'ekibbo eky'emigaati egitazimbulukuswa, ebitole eby'obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta, n'emigaati egy'empewere egitazimbulukuswa egisiigibbwako amafuta, n'obutta bwako obuweebwayo, n'ebyokunywa byako ebiweebwayo. 
4_6_16_Awo kabona anaabyanjulanga mu maaso ga Mukama, n'awaayo ky'awaayo olw'ekibi, n'ekyo ky'a waayo ekyokebwa: 
4_6_17_n'awaayo endiga ennume okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe eri Mukama, awamu n'ekibbo eky'emigaati egitazimbulukuswa: era kabona anaawangayo n'obutta obuweebwayo bwako, n'ebyokunywa byako ebiweebwayo. 
4_6_18_Era omuwonge anaamweranga omutwe ogw'okwewonga kwe ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, n'addira enviiri ez'oku mutwe ogw'okwewonga kwe, n'aziteeka mu muliro oguli wansi wa ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe. 
4_6_19_Awo kabona anaatwalanga omukono omufumbe ogw'endiga ennume, n'ekitole kimu ekitazimbulukuswa ng'akiggya mu kibbo, n'omugaati ogw'empewere gumu ogutazimbulukuswa, n'abiteeka mu ngalo z'omuwonge, ng'amaze okumwa omutwe ogw'okwewonga kwe 
4_6_20_awo kabona anaabiwuubawuubanga okuba ekiweebwayo ekiwuubibwawuubibwa mu maaso ga Mukama; ebyo byayawulirwa kabona, awamu n'ekifuba ekiwuubibwawuubibwa n'ekisambi ekisitulibwa: oluvannyuma omuwonge n'alyoka ayinza okunywa omwenge. 
4_6_21_Eryo lye tteeka ery'omuwonge eyeeyama obweyamo, n'ekitone kye ky'awa Mukama olw'okwewonga kwe, obutassaako ebyo by'ayinza okufiuia: ng'obweyamo bwe bw'aneeyamanga bwe bunaabanga, bwe kityo bwe kimugwanira okukola ng'etteeka ery'okwewonga kwe bwe liri. 
4_6_22_Mukama n'ayogera ne Musa nti 
4_6_23_Yogera ne Alooni ne batabani be nti Bwe mutyo bwe munaasabiranga omukisa abaana ba Isiraeri: munaabagambanga nti 
4_6_24_Mukama akuwe omukisa, akukuume: 
4_6_25_Mukama akwakize amaaso ge, akukwatirwe ekisa: 
4_6_26_Mukama akuyimusize amaaso ge, akuwe emirembe. 
4_6_27_Bwe batyo bwe banaateekanga erinnya lyange ku baana ba Isiraeri; nange n'abawanga omukisa. 
4_7_1_Awo olwatuuka ku lunaku Musa lwe yamalirako okusimba ennyumba, era ng'amaze okugifukako amafuta n'okugitukuza, n'ebintu byayo byonna, n'ekyoto n'ebintu byakyo byonna, era ng'amaze okubifukako amafuta n'okubitukuza 
4_7_3_ne baleeta ekitone kyabwe mu maaso ga Mukama, amagaali amabikkeko mukaaga, n'ente kkumi na bbiri; eggaali erunu lya bakulu kinnababirye era kinoomu ente: ne babyanjula mu maaso g'ennyumba. 
4_7_4_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_7_5_Kitoole gye bali, bibeerenga bya kukola omulimu ogw'okuweereza ogw'omu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu; era onoobiwa Abaleevi, buli muntu ng'okuweereza kwe bwe kuli. 
4_7_6_Musa n'atoola amagaali n'ente, n'abiwa Abaleevi: 
4_7_7_Amagaali abiri n'ente nnya bye yawa batabani ba Gerusoni, ng'okuweereza kwabwe bwe kwali: 
4_7_8_n'amagaali ana n'ente munaana bye yawa batabani ba Merali, ng'okuweereza kwabwe bwe kwali, wansi w'omukono gwa Isamaali mutabani wa Alooni kabona. 
4_7_9_Naye batabani ba Kokasi teyabawaako: kubanga okuweereza okw'omu watukuvu kwali kwabwe; baakusituliranga ku bibegabega bya bwe. 
4_7_10_Awo abakulu ne bawaayo olw'okuwonga ekyoto ku lunaku lwe, kyafukirwako amafuta, abakulu ne bawaayo ekirabo kyabwe mu maaso g'ekyoto. 
4_7_11_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Banaawangayo ekitone kyabwe, buli mukulu ku lunaku lwe, olw'okutukuza ekyoto. 
4_7_12_N'oyo eyawaayo ekitone kye ku lunaku olw'olubereberye yali Nakusoni mutabani wa Aauninadaabu ow'omu kika kya Yuda: 
4_7_13_n'ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu ya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsanvu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_14_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_15_ente ennume envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiwee bwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_16_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo oIw'ekibi; 
4_7_17_era okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, eadiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Nakusoni mutabani wa Amminadaabu: 
4_7_18_Ku lunaku olw'okubiri Nesaneri mutabani wa Zuwaali, omukulu wa Isakaali, n'awaayo: 
4_7_19_yawaayo okuba ekitone kye essowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri ensanvu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_20_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_21_ente ennume envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwaaa gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_22_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_23_era okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennu me ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abataanamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Nesaneri mutabani wa Zuwaali. 
4_7_24_Ku lunaku olw'okusatu Eriyaabu mutabani wa Keroni, omukulu w'abaana ba Zebbulooni n'awaayo: 
4_7_25_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri ensanvu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_26_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_27_ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_28_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_29_era okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Eriyaabu mutabani wa Keroni. 
4_7_30_Ku lunaku olw'okuna Erizuuli mutabani wa Sedewuli, omukulu w'abaana ba Lewubeeni, n'awaayo: 
4_7_31_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri lcikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri ensanvu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri: byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_32_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_33_ente evubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwaaa gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_34_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_35_era okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gtunu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Erizuuli mutabaani wa Sedewuli. 
4_7_36_Ku lunaku olw'okutaano Serujmiyeeri mutabani wa Zulisadaayi, omukulu w'abaana ba Simyoni n'awaayo: 
4_7_37_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsavu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri: byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_38_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_39_ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_40_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_41_n'okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Senuniyeeri mutabani wa Zulisadaayi. 
4_7_42_Ku lunaku olw'omukaaga Eriyasaafu mutabani wa Deweri, omukulu w'abaana ba Gaadi, n'awaayo: 
4_7_43_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsavu, nga sekeri eyomu watukuvu bw'eri; byombi, nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_44_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_45_ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_46_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_47_n'okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bacaano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Eriyasaafu mutabani wa Deweri. 
4_7_48_Ku lunaku olw'omusanvu Erisaama mutabani wa Amm.ikudi omukulu w'abaana ba Efulayimu, n'awaayo; 
4_7_49_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsanvu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuwbw'eri; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_50_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_51_ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_52_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_53_n'okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiwee bwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Erisaama mutabani wa Ammikudi. 
4_7_54_Ku lunaku olw'omunaana Gamalyeri mutabani wa Pedazuuli, omukulu w'abaana ba Manase, n'awaayo: 
4_7_55_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsanvu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_56_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_57_ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyakebwa; 
4_7_58_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_59_n'okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Gamalyeri, mutabani wa Pedazuuli. 
4_7_60_Ku lunaku olw'omwenda Abidaani mutabani wa Gidiyooni, omukulu w'abaana ba Benyamini, n'awaayo: 
4_7_61_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibys kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsavu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eti; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_62_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya seketi kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_63_ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_64_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_65_n'okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaaao, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu; ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Abidaani mutabani wa Gidiyooni. 
4_7_66_Ku luaaku olw'ekkumi Akiyezeeri mutabani wa Amisadaayi, omukulu w'abaana ba Ddaani, n'awaayo: 
4_7_67_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsanvu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuw bw'eri; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_68_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_69_ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_70_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_71_n'okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennttme ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Akiyezeeri mutabani wa Amisadaayi. 
4_7_72_Ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'olumu Pagiyeeri mutabani wa Okulaani, omukulu w'abaana ba Aseri, n'awaayo: 
4_7_73_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsavu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_74_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya sekeri kkumi, ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_75_ente evubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga omulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_76_embuzi ennume emuokuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_77_n'okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, endiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga abalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Pagiyeeri mutabani wa Okulaani. 
4_7_78_Ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ebbiri Akira mutabani wa Enani, omukulu w'abaana ba Nafutaali, n'awaayo: 
4_7_79_ekitone kye kyali ssowaani emu eya ffeeza, obuzito bwayo sekeri kikumi mu asatu, ekibya kimu ekya ffeeza ekya sekeri nsanvu, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri; byombi nga bijjudde obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta, okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta; 
4_7_80_ekijiiko kimu ekya zaabu ekya Isekeri kkumi ekijjudde obubaane; 
4_7_81_ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, omwana gw'endiga iomulume gumu ogutannamala mwaka gumu, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; 
4_7_82_embuzi enntune emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; 
4_7_83_n'okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, ente bbiri, lendiga ennume ttaano, embuzi ennume ttaano, abaana b'endiga labalume bataano abatannamala mwaka gumu: ekyo kye kyali ekitone kya Akira mutabani wa Enani. 
4_7_84_Kuno kwe kwali okutukuza ekyoto, ku lunaku kwe kyafukirwako amafuta mu mikono gy'abakulu ba Isiraeri: essowaani kkumi na bbiri eza ffeeza, ebibya kkumi na bibiri ebya ffeeza, ebijiiko kkumi na bibiri ebya zaabu: 
4_7_85_buli ssowaani eya ffeeza sekeri kikumi mu asatu, na buli kibya sekeri nsanvu: effeeza yonna ey'ebintu sekeri enkumi bbiri mu bina, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri; 
4_7_86_ebijiiko ebya zaabu kkumi na bibiri, ebijjudde obubaane, buli kijiiko sekeri kkumi, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri: zaabu yonna ey'omu bijiiko sekeri kikumi mu abiri: 
4_7_87_ente zonna okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa kkumi na bibiri, endiga ennume kkumi na bbiri, abaana b'endiga abalume abatannamala mwaka gumu kkumi na babiri, n'obutta bwabyo obuweebwayo: n'embuzi ennume okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi kkumi na bbiri: 
4_7_88_n'ente zonna okuba ssaddaaka ey'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe ente abiri mu nnya, endiga ennume nkaaga, embuzi ennume nkaaga, abaana b'endiga abalume abatannamala mwaka gumu nkaaga. Okwo kwe kwali okutukuza ekyoto, bwe kyamala okufukibwako amafuta. 
4_7_89_Awo Musa bwe yayingira mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu okwogera naye, n'alyoka awulira Eddoboozi eryo nga lyogera naye nga liyima waggulu ku ntebe ey'okusaasira eyali ku sanduuko ey'obujulirwa, wakati wa bakerubi bombi: n'ayogera naye. 
4_8_1_Mukama n'ayogera ne Musa nti 
4_8_2_Yogera ne Alooni omugambe nti Bw'onookoleezanga ettabaaza, ettabaaza omusavu zinaayakiranga mu maaso g'ekikondo. 
4_8_3_Alooni n'akola bw'atyo; yakoleeza ettabaaza zaakyo okwakiranga mu maaso g'ekikondo, nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_8_4_Era guno gwe gwali omulimu ogw'ekikondo, mulimu gwa zaabu mpeese; okutuuka ku ntobo yaakyo, n'okutuuka ku bimuli byakyo, kyali mulimu muweese: ng'ekyokulabirako bwe kyali Mukama kye yalaga Musa, bw'atyo bwe yakola. 
4_8_5_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_8_6_Yawula Abaleevi mu baana ba Isiraeri, obalongoose. 
4_8_7_Era bw'onoobakola bw'oti okubalongoosa: mansira ku bo amazzi ag'okutangirira, era akamwano bakayise ku mubiri gwabwe gwonna, booze engoye zaabwe, beerongoose. 
4_8_8_Kale batwale ente envubuka, n'ekiweebwayo kyako eky'obutta, obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta, n'ente envubuka ey'okubiri gitwale okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi. 
4_8_9_Awo onooyanjula Abaleevi mu maaso g'eweeuta ey'okusisinkanirangamu: n'okuŋŋaanya ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri: 
4_8_10_n'oyanjula Abaleevi mu maaso ga Mukama: abaana ba Isiraeri ne balyoka bateeka emikono gyabwe ku Baleevi: 
4_8_11_Alooni n'awaayo Abaleevi mu maaso ga Mukama okuba ekiweebwayo ekiwuubibwawuubibwa, ku bw'abaana ba Isiraeri, babeerenga ab'okukola okuweereza kwa Mukama 
4_8_12_Abaleevi ne bateeka emikono gyabwe ku mitwe gy'ente; naawe oweeyo emu okuba ekiweebwayo ,olw'ekibi, n'ey'okubiri okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, eri Mukama, okutangirira Abaleevi. 
4_8_13_N'oteeka Abaleevi mu maaso ga Alooni ne mu maaso ga batabani be, n'obawaayo okuba ekiweebwayo ekiwuubibwawuubibwa eri Mukama. 
4_8_14_Bw'otyo bw'onooyawula Abaleevi mu baana ba Isiraeri: n'Abaleevi banaabanga bange. 
4_8_15_Oluvannyuma Abaleevi ne balyoka bayingira okukolanga okuweereza okw'omu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu; naawe oaoobalongoosa, n'obawaayo okuba ekiweebwayo ekiwuubibwawuubibwa. 
4_8_16_Kubanga baweereddwayo ddala gye ndi mu baana ba Isiraeri; naabeetwalira mu kifo ky'abo bonna abaggula nda, be ,babereberye ku baana ba Isiraeri bonna. 
4_8_17_Kubanga ababereberye bonna mu baana ba Isiraeri bange, oba nga muntu oba nga nsolo: ku lunaku kwe nnakubira ababereberye bonna mu nsi y'e Misiri nabeetukuliza. 
4_8_18_Era ntutte Abaleevi mu kifo ky'ababereberye bonna mu baana ba Isiraeri. 
4_8_19_Era mpadde Abaleevi okuba ekirabo eri Alooni n'eri batabani be nga mbaggYa mu baana ba Isiraeri, okukolanga okuweereza kw'abaana ba Isiraeri mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, n'okutangiriranga abaana ba Isiraeri: walemenga okuba ekibonyoobonyo kyonna mu baana ba Isiraeri, abaana ba Isiraeri nga basembera mu watukuvu. 
4_8_20_Bw'atyo Musa bwe yakola Abaleevi ne Alooni, n'ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri: nga byonna bwe byali Mukama bye yalagira Musa ku Baleevi, bwe batyo abaana ba Isiraeri bwe baabakola. 
4_8_21_Abaleevi ne beerongoosa mu kibi, ne booza engoye zaabwe; Alooni n'abawaayo okuba ekiweebwayo ekiwunbibwawuubibwa mu maaso ga Mukama; Alooni n'abataugirira okubalongoosa. 
4_8_22_Awo oluvannyuma Abaleevi ne balyoka bayingira okukolanga okuweereza kwabwe mu weema ey'okusisinkaniranganiu mu maaso ga Alooni, ne mu maaso ga batabani be: nga Mukama bwe yali alagidde Musa ku Baleevi, bwe batyo bwe baabakola. 
4_8_23_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_8_24_Bino bye by'Abaleevi: abaakamaze emyaka abiri mu etaano n'okukirawo banaayingiranga okulwanira olutalo mu mulimu ogw'omu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu: 
4_8_25_era bwe banaawezanga emyaka ataano, banaalekeranga awo okulwanira mu mulimu, aga tebakyaweereza; 
4_8_26_naye banaakoleranga wamu ne baganda baabwe mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, okukuuma bye baateresebwa, nga tebaweereza kuweereza kwonna. Bw'otyo bw'onookola Abaleevi mu ebyo bye baateresebwa. 
4_9_1_Mukama n'agambira Musa mu ddungu lya Sinaayi, mu mwezi ogw'olubereberye ogw'omwaka ogw'okubiri nga bamaze okuva mu nsi y'e Misiri, nti 
4_9_2_Era abaana ba Isiraeri bakwatenga Okuyitako mu atuuko zaakwo ezaalagirwa. 
4_9_3_Ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ennya olw'omwezi guno, akawungeezi, kwe munaakukwatiranga mu ntuuko zaakwo ezaalagirwa: ng'amateeka gaakwo gonna n'obulombolombo bwakwo bwonna bwe buli, bwe munaakukwatanga bwe mutyo. 
4_9_4_Musa n'agamba abaana ba Isiraeri bakwatenga Okuyitako. 
4_9_5_Ne bakwatira Okuyitako mu mwezi ogw'olubereberye, ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ennya olw'omwezi, akawungeezi, mu ddungu lya Sinaayi: nga byonna bwe byali Mukama bye yalagira Musa, bwe batyo bwe baakola abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_9_6_Awo ne wabaawo abantu abaali nga si balongoofu olw'omulambo gw'omuntu, n'obutayinza ne batayinza kukwatira Kuyitako ku lunaku olwo: ne bajja mu maaso ga Musa ne Alooni ku lunaku olwo: 
4_9_7_abantu abo ne bamugamba nti Tetuli balongoofu olw'omulambo gw'omuntu: ekituziyiza kiki okuwaayo ekitone kya Mukama mu ntuuko zaakyo mu baana ba Isiraeri? 
4_9_8_Musa n'abagamba nti Musooke muleke; ndyoke mpulire Mukama ky'anaalagira ku mmwe. 
4_9_9_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_9_10_Gamba abaana ba Isiraeri nti Omuntu yenna ku mmwe oba ku mirembe gyammwe bw'anaabanga si mulongoofu olw'omulambo, oba bw'anaabanga ali mu lugendo ewala, naye anaakwatanga Okuyitako eri Mukama: 
4_9_11_mu mwezi ogw'okubiri ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ennya akawungeezi kwe banaaku kwatiranga; banaakulyanga n'emigaati egitazimbulukuswa n'enva ezikaawa: 
4_9_12_tebasigazangako okutuusa enkya, so tebamenyanga ggumba lyakwo: ng'etteeka lyonna ery'Okuyitako bwe liri bwe banaakukwatanga bwe batyo. 
4_9_13_Naye omuntu omulongoofu so atali mu lugendo, n'aleka okukwata Okuyitako, obulamu obwo bunaazikirizibwanga mu bantu be: kubanga tawaddeeyo kitone kya Mukama mu ntuuko zaakyo ezaalagirwa, omuntu oyo anaabangako ekibi kye. 
4_9_14_Era omugenyi bw'anaatuulanga mu mmwe, n'ayagala okukwata Okuyitako eri Mukama; ng'etteeka ery'Okuyitako n'obulombolombo bwakwo bwe buli, bw'anaakolanga bw'atyo: munaabanga n'etteeka limu eri omugenyi era n'eri oyo eyazaalirwa mu nsi. 
4_9_15_Awo ku lunaku enayumba kwe yasimbirwa ekire ne kibikka ku nnyumba y'eweema ey'obujulirwa: era akawungeezi ne kiba ku nnyumba ng'ekifaananyi ky'omuliro, okutuusa enkya. 
4_9_16_Bwe kyabanga bwe kityo ennaku zonna: ekire kyagibikkangako, n'ekifaananyi ky'omuliro ekiro. 
4_9_17_Era buli ekire lwe kyaggibwangako ku Weema, awo abaana ba Isiraeri ne balyoka batambula: ne mu kifo ekire mwe kyabeeranga, awo abaana ba Isiraeri we baasiisiranga. 
4_9_18_Abaana ba Isiraeri baatambulanga lwa kiragiro kya Mukama, era baasiisiranga lwa kiragiro kya Mukama: ekiseera kyonna ekire kye kyamalanga ku nnyumba baatuulanga mu lusiisira. 
4_9_19_Era ekire bwe kyalwanga ennaku nnyingi ku nnyumba, awo abaana ba Isiraeri ne bakwatanga ekiragiro kya Mukama, ne batatambula. 
4_9_20_Era oluusi ekire kyamalanga ennaku ntono ku nnyumba; awo ng'ekiragiro kya Mukama bwe kyali ne batuulanga mu lusiisira, era ng'ekiragiro kya Mukama bwe kyali baatambulanga. 
4_9_21_Era oluusi ekire kyabangako okusooka akawungeezi okutuusa enkya; era ekire bwe kyaggibwangako enkya ne batambula: oba bwe kyabangako emisana n'ekiro, ekire bwe kyaggibwangako, ne batambula. 
4_9_22_Oba nga nnaku bbiri oba nga mwezi oba nga mwaka, ekire bwe kyalwanga ku nnyumba, nga kibeera okwo, abaana ba Isiraeri ne batuulanga mu lusiisira, ne batatambula: naye bwe kyaggibwangako, ne batambulanga. 
4_9_23_Baasiisiranga lwa kiragiro kya Mukama, era baatambulanga lwa kiragiro kya Mukama: baakwatanga ebyo Mukama bye yakuutira, olw'ekiragiro kya Mukama mu mukono gwa Musa. 
4_10_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_10_2_Weekolere amakondeere abiri ga ffeeza; onoogakola n'omulimu omuweese: era ganaabanga gy'oli ga kuyita kibiina, era ga kutambuza nsiisira. 
4_10_3_Era bwe banaagafuuwanga, ekibiina kyonna kinakuŋŋaaniranga gy'oli ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_10_4_Era bwe banaafuuwanga erimu lyokka, kale abakulu, emitwe gy'enkumi za Isiraeri, ba naakuŋŋaaniranga gy'oli. 
4_10_5_Era bwe munaagafunwanga okugalaya, ensiisira eziri ku luuyi olw'ebugwanjuba zinaatambulanga. 
4_10_6_Era bwe munaagafuuwanga okugalaya omulundi ogw'okubiri, ensiisira eziri ku luuyi olw'obukiika obwa ddyo zinaatambulanga: banaagafuuwanga okugalaya olw'okutambula kwabwe. 
4_10_7_Naye ekibiina bwe kinaabanga kya kukuŋŋaanyizibwa, munaafuuwanga, naye temugalayanga. 
4_10_8_Ne batabani ba Alooni, bakabona, banaafuuwanga amakondeere; era ganaabanga gye muli tteeka eritaliggwaawo mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna. 
4_10_9_Era bwe munastabaalanga mu nsi yammwe omulabe abajooga, kale munaafuuwanga amakondeere okugalaya; era munajjukirwanga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wammwe, era munaalokokanga mu balabe bammwe. 
4_10_10_Era ku lunaku olw'essanyu lyammwe, ne ku mbaga zammwe ezaalagirwa, n'emyezi gyammwe we ginaasooke ranga, munaafuuwanga amakondeere ago ku biweebwayo byammwe ebyokebwa ne ku ssaddaaka ez'ebyammwe ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe; era ganaabanga gye muli kijjukizo mu maaso ga Katonda wammwe: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
4_10_11_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'okubiri, mu mwezi ogw'okubiri, ku lunaku olw'abiri olw'omwezi, ekire ne kiggibwa kungulu ku weema ey'obujulirwa. 
4_10_12_Abaana ba Isiraeri ne basitula ng'ebiramago byabwe bwe byali ne bava mu ddungu lya Sinaayi; ekire ne kiyimirira mu ddungu lya Palani. 
4_10_13_Ne basooka okusitula ng'ekiragiro kya Mukama bwe kyali mu mukono gwa Musa. 
4_10_14_Ebendera ey'olusiisira olw'abaana ba Yuda n'ekulembera n'esitula ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali: n'omuhulu w'eggye lye yali Nakusoni mutabani wa Amminadaabu. 
4_10_15_N'omukulu w'eggye ly'ekika ky'abaana ba Isakaali yali Nesaneri mutabani wa Zuwaali. 
4_10_16_N'omukulu w'eggye ly'ekilta ky'abaana ba Zebbulooni yali Eriyaabu mutabani wa Keroni. 
4_10_17_Enayumba n'esimbulibwa; batabani ba Gerusoni ne batabani ba Merali, abeetikkanga ennyumba, ne basitula. 
4_10_18_Ebendera y'olusiisira lwa Lewubeeni n'etambula ng'eggye lyabwe bwe ,lyali: n'omukulu w'eggye lye yali 'Erizuuli mutabani wa Sedewuli. 
4_10_19_N'omukulu w'eggye ly'ekika ky'abaana ba Simyoni yali Serumiyeeri mutabani wa Zulisadaayi. 
4_10_20_N'omukulu w'eggye ly'ekika ky'abaana ba Gaadi yali Eriyasaafu mutabani wa Deweri. 
4_10_21_Abakokasi ne beetikka nga basitudde awatukuvu: ball ne basimbanga ennyu mba bo nga tebannatuuka. 
4_10_22_Ebendera ey'olusiisira lw'abaana ba Efulayimu n'esitula ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali: n'omukutu w'eggye lye yali Erisaama mutabani wa Ammikudi, 
4_10_23_N'omukulu w'eggye ly'ekika ky'abaana ba Manase yali Gamalyeri mutabatu wa Pedazuuli. 
4_10_24_N'omukulu w'eggye ly'ekika ky'abaana ba Benyamini yati Abidaani mutabani wa Gidiyooni. 
4_10_25_Ebendera y'olusiisira Iw'abaana ba Ddaani, eyasembanga easiisira zonna, n'esitula ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali: n'omukulu w'eggye lye yali Akiyezeeri mutabani wa Amisadaayi. 
4_10_26_N'omukulu w'eggye ly'ekika ky'abaana ba Aseri yali Pagiyeeri mutabani wa Okulaani. 
4_10_27_N'omukulu w'eggye ly'ekika ky'abaana ba Nafutaali yali Akira mutabani wa Enani. 
4_10_28_Okwo kwe kwali okutambula kw'abaana ba Isiraeri ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali; ne basitula. 
4_10_29_Awo Musa n'agamba Kobabu mutabani wa Leweri Omumidiyaani, mukoddomi wa Musa, nti Tutambula okugenda mu kifo Mukama kye yayogerako nti Ndikibawa: jjangu ggwe ogende naffe, naffe tunaakukolanga bulungi: kubanga Mukama yayogera ebirungi ku Isiraeri. 
4_10_30_N'amugamba nti Sijja kugenda: naye naddayo mu nsi y'ewaffe n'eri enda zange. 
4_10_31_N'agamba nti Totuleka, nkwegayiridde; kubanga ggwe omanyi bwe tuba tusiisiranga mu ddungu, era onoobanga gye tuli rig'amaaso. 
4_10_32_Kale olunaatuukanga, bw'onoogenda aaffe, weewaawo, olunaatukanga buli birungi byonna Mukama by'anaatukolanga ffe, ebyo tunaakukolanga naawe, 
4_10_33_Ne basitula ne bava ku lusozi lwa Mukama okutambula olugendo olw'ennaku essatu; n'essanduuko ey'endagaano ya Mukama n'ebakulembera olugendo olw'ennaku essatu okubanoonyeza ekifo eky'okuwummuliramu 
4_10_34_N'ekire kya Mukama kyabanga ku bo emisana, bwe baasitulanga okuva mu lnsiisira. 
4_10_35_Awo olwatuukanga essanduuko bwe yasitulwanga Musa n'ayogera nti Golokoka, ai Mukama, abalabe bo basaasaanyizibwe; n'abo abakukyaye badduke mu maaso go 
4_10_36_Era bwe yayimiriranga n'ayogera nti Komawo, ai Mukama, eri obukumi obw'enkumi za Isiraeri. 
4_11_1_Abantu ne baba nga beemuugunya, nga boogera bubi mu matu ga Mukama: Mukama bwe yabawulira obusungu bwe ne bubuubuuka; omuliro gwa hiukama ne gwokya mu bo, ne gulya ku nkomerero y'olusiisira. 
4_11_2_Abantu ne bakaabira Musa; Musa n'asaba Mukama, omulim ne gukkakkana. 
4_11_3_Ekifo ekyo ne kiruumibwa erinnya Tabera: kubanga omuliro gwa Mukama gwayokya mu bo. 
4_11_4_Awo ekibiina eky'abasenze ekyali mu bo ne batanula okwegomba: n'abaana ba Isiraeri nabo ne bakaaba amaziga nate, ne bagamba nti Ani anaatuwa ennyama okulya? 
4_11_5_Tujjukira ebyennyanja bye twaliiranga obwereere mu Niisiri; wujju n'ensujju n'enva n'obutungulu n'ebyokuliira: 
4_11_6_naye kaakano obulanu bwaffe bukalidde ddala; tewali kintu n'akatono: terulina kintu kye tuba twesiga wabula emmaanu eno. 
4_11_7_Era emmaanu yaliŋŋanga ensigo za jaada, n'ekifaananyi kyayo ng'ekifaananyi kya bedola. 
4_11_8_Abantu ne batambulatambula, ne bagikuŋŋaanya ne bagiseera ku mmengo, oba ne bagisekulira mu binu, ne bagifumba mu ntamu, ne bagiggyamu emigaati: n'okuwooma kwayo kwaliŋŋanga okuwooma kw'amafuta amaggya. 
4_11_9_Era omusulo bwe gwagwanga ku lusiisira ekiro, emmaanu n'egwanga ku gwo. 
4_11_10_Musa n'awulira abantu nga bakaaba amaziga mu nda zaabwe zonna, buli muntu ku mulyango gw'eweema ye: obusungu bwa Mukama ne bubuubuuka nnyo: Musa n'anyiiga. 
4_11_11_Awo Musa n'agamba Mukama nti Kiki ekikukozezza obubi omuddu wo? era kiki ekindobedde okulaba ekisa mu maaso go, n'okussaako n'onzisaako omugugu gw'abantu bano bonna? 
4_11_12_Nze nnali olubuto lw'abantu bano bonna? nze nabazaala, n'okugamba n'oŋŋamba nti Basitule mu kifuba kyo nga kitaawe w'omwana omulezi bw'asitula omwana ayonka, okubatwala mu nsi gye walayirira bajjajja baabwe? 
4_11_13_Nandiggye wa nze ennyama okugabira abantu bano bonna? kubanga bankaabira nga boogera nti Tuwe ennyama tulye. 
4_11_14_Nze siyinza kusitula bantu bano bonna nzekka, kubanga bayinze okunzitoowerera. 
4_11_15_Era bw'ononkola bw'otyo, nzitira ddala mangu ago, nkwegayiridde, oba nga ndabye ekisa mu maaso go; nneme okulaba ennaku zange. 
4_11_16_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Nkuŋŋaanyiza abasajja nsanvu ab'oku bakadde ba Isiraeri, b'omanyi okuba abakadde b'abantu n'abakulu abanaabafuganga; obaleete ku weema eyokusisinkanirangamu, bayimirire eyo wamu naawe. 
4_11_17_Nange nakka ne njogerera naawe eyo: era naatoola ku mwoyo oguli ku ggwe, ne nguteeka ku bo; nabo banaasitulanga omugugu gw'abantu wamu naawe, olemenga okugusitula ggwe wekka. 
4_11_18_Era gamba abantu nti Mwetukulize olunaku olw'enkya, era mulirya ennyama: kubanga mukaabidde amaziga mu matu ga Mukama nga mwogera nti Ani alituwa ennyama okulya? kubanga twali bulungi mu Misiri: Mukama kyaliva abawa ennyama, ne mulya. 
4_11_19_Temuliriirako lunaku lumu, newakubadde ennaku ebbiri, newakubadde ennaku ettaano, newakubadde ennaku ekkumi, newakubadde ennaku abiri; 
4_11_20_naye mwezi mulamba, okutuusa lw'erifulumira mu nnyindo zammwe, ne muginyiwa: kubanga mugaanyi Mukama ali mu mmwe, ne mukaabira amaziga mu maaso ge nga mwogera nti Ekyatuggya ki mu Misiri? 
4_11_21_Musa n'agamba nti Abantu be ndimu wakati, be basajja abatambula n'ebigere obusiriivu mukaaga: naye ogambye nti Ndibawa ennyama baliireko omwezi omulamba. 
4_11_22_Banaabattiranga endiga n'ente okubamalanga? oba balibakuŋŋaanyiza ebyennyanja byonna eby'omu nnyanja okubamalanga? 
4_11_23_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Omukono gwa Mukama guyimpawadde? kaakano onoolaba oba ng'ekigambo kyange kinaatuukirira gy'oli nantiki si weewaawo. 
4_11_24_Musa n'afuluma n'abuulira abantu ebigambo bya Mukama: n'akuŋŋaanya abasajja nsanvu ab'oku bakadde b'abantu, n'abassaawo okwetooloola Eweema. 
4_11_25_Mukama n'akkira mu kire n'ayogera naye, n'atoola ku mwoyo ogwali ku ye, n'aguteeka ku bakadde ensanvu: awo olwatuuka omwoyo bwe gwatuula ku bo ne balagula, naye ne bakomya awo. 
4_11_26_Naye ne musigala mu lusiisira abasajja babiri, erinnya ly'omu Eridaadi, n'erinnya ly'omulala Medadi: omwoyo ne gutuula ku bo; era baali ku muwendo gw'abo abaawandiikibwa, naye baali tebafulumye okugenda ku Weema: ne balagulira mu lusiisira. 
4_11_27_Omulenzi n'adduka n'abuulira Musa n'agamba nti Eridaadi ne Medadi balagulira mu lusiisira. 
4_11_28_Yoswa mutabani wa Nuuni, omuweereza wa Musa, omu ku basajja be abalonde, n'addamu n'agamba nti Mukama wange Musa, bagaane. 
4_11_29_Musa n'agamba nti Obuggya bukukutte ku lwange? abaatu bonna aba Mukama singa bannabbi, Mukama singa abateekako omwoyo gwe! 
4_11_30_Musa ne yeddirayo mu lusiisira, ye n'abakadde ba Isiraeri. 
4_11_31_Empewo n'efuluma eri Mukama, n'ereeta obugubi okuva ku nnyanja, n'ebugwisa mu lusiisira, ng'olugendo olw'olunaku olumu ku luuyi luno, n'olugendo olw'olunaku olumu ku luuyi luli, okwetooloola olusiisira, ng'emikono ebiri okutuuka ku ttaka we bwali. 
4_11_32_Abantu ne bagolokoka ne bazibya olunaku olwo, ne bakeesa obudde, ne bazibya obudde obw'enkya, ne bakuŋŋaanya obugubi: eyaku# 
4_11_33_1;ŋaanya obutono, yakuqgaanya komeri kkumi: ne babweyanikira wonna wonna okwetooloola olusiisira. 
4_11_34_Ekifo ekyo ne kiruumibwa erinnya Kibezosukataava: kubaaga we baaziika abantu abeegomba. 
4_11_35_Abantu ne basitula e Kiberosukataava ne batambula ne bagenda e Kazerosi; ne batuula e Kazerosi. 
4_12_1_Awo Miryamu ne Alooni ne boogera obubi ku Musa olw'omukazi Omukuusi gwe yali awasizza: kubanga yali awasizza omukazi Omukuusi. 
4_12_2_Ne boogera nti Mazima Mukama yayogera ne Musa yekka? era teyayogera naffe? Mukama n'abiwulira. 
4_12_3_Era omusajja Musa yali muwombeefn nnyo, okusinga abantu bonna abaali ku nsi yonna. 
4_12_4_Mukama n'ayogera mangu ago ne Musa ne Alooai ne Miryamu nti Mufulume mwensatule mujje ku weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. Abo bonsatule ne bafuluma. 
4_12_5_Mukama n'akkira mu mpagi ey'ekire, n'ayimirira ku mulyango gw'Eweema, n'ayita Alooni ne Miryamu: bombi ne bafuluma. 
4_12_6_N'ayogera nti Muwulire nno ebigambo byange: oba nga munaabanga mummwe nabbi, nze Mukama neetegeezanga gy'ali mu kwolesebwa, naayogerereranga naye mu kirooto. 
4_12_7_Omuddu wange Musa si bw'ali bw'atyo; oyo mwesigwa mu nnyuniba yange yonna: 
4_12_8_oyo naayogeranga naye akamwa n'akamwa, mu lwatu, so si mu bigambo bya ngero; n'okufaanana kwa Mukama anaakulabanga: kale ekyabalobera ki okutya okwogera obubi ku muddu wange, ku Musa? 
4_12_9_Obusungu bwa Mukama ne bubuubuuka ku bo; ne yeeviirawo. 
4_12_10_Ekire ne kiva waggulu ku Weema; era laba, Miryamu n'abaako ebigenge, ng'omuzira: Alooni n'atunuulira Miryamu, era, laba, ng'aliko ebigenge. 
4_12_11_Alooni n'agamba Musa nti Ai mukama wange, nkwegayiridde, totuteekako kibi, kubanga tukoze eby'obusirusiru era nga tukoze ekibi. 
4_12_12_Nkwegayiridde aleme okuba ng'omufu, omubiri gwe nga gwonooneseeko ekitundu ng'ava mu lubuto lwa nnyina, 
4_12_13_Musa n'akaabira Mukama ag'ayogera nti Muwonye, ai Katonda, nkwegayiridde. 
4_12_14_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Kitaawe singa amuwandidde amalusu obulusu mu maaso, ensonyi tezandimukwatidde eanaku musanvu? asibirwe ebweru w'olusiisira ennaku musanvu, kale oluvannyuma alyoke ayiagizibwe nate. 
4_12_15_Miryamu n'asibirwa ebweru w'olusiisira ennaku musanvu: abantu ne batatambula okutuusa Miryamu lwe yayingizibwa nate. 
4_12_16_Awo oluvannyuma abantu ne basitula e Kazerosi ne batambula ne basiisira mu ddungu lya Palani. 
4_13_1_Awo Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_13_2_Tuma abantu bakette ensi ya Kanani, gye mpa abaana ba Isiraeri: munaggya omuntu ku buli kiha kya bakitaabwe ne mumutuma, buli muntu omukuiu mu bo. 
4_13_3_Awo Musa n'abatuma ag'ayima mu ddungu lya Palani ng'ekiragiro kya Mukama bwe kyali: bonna abasajja abaali emitwe gy'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_13_4_N'amannya gaabwe ge gano: ku kika kya Lewubeeni, Semuwa mutabani wa Zakula. 
4_13_5_Ku kika kya Simyoni, Safati mutabani wa Koli. 
4_13_6_Ku kika kya Yuda, Kalebu mutabani wa Yefune. 
4_13_7_Ku kika kya Isakaali, Igali mutabani wa Yusufu. 
4_13_8_Ku kika kya Efulayimu, Koseya mutabani wa Nuuni. 
4_13_9_Ku kika kya Benyamini, Paluti mutabani wa Lafu. 
4_13_10_Ku ikika kya Zebbulooni, Gadyeri mutabani wa Sodi. 
4_13_11_Ku kika kya Yusufu, kye kika kya Manase, Gaadi mutabani wa Susi. 
4_13_12_Ku kika kya Ddaani, Ammiyeri mutabani wa Gemali. 
4_13_13_Ku kika kya Aseri, Sesula mutabani wa Mikaeri. 
4_13_14_Ku kika kya Nafutaali, Nakabi mutabani wa Vofesi. 
4_13_15_Ku kika kya Gaadi, Geweri mutabani wa Maki. 
4_13_16_Ago ge mannya g'abantu Musa be yatuma okuketta ensi. Musa n'atuuma Koseya mutabani wa Nuuni Yoswa. 
4_13_17_Musa n'abatuma okuketta ensi ya Kanani, n'abagamba nti Mwambukire mu kkubo lino ery'obukiika obwa ddyo, mulinnye ku nsozi 
4_13_18_mulengere ensi bw'eri; n'abantu abagituulamu oba nga ba maanyi oba nga banafu, oba nga batono oba nga bangi; 
4_13_19_era ensi bw'eri gye batuulamu, oba nga nnungi oba nga mbi; n'ebibuga bwe biri bye batuulamu, oba nga nsiisira, oba nga mu bigo; 
4_13_20_era ensi bw'eri, oba nga ngimu oba nga nkalu, oba nga mulimu emiti oba nga temuli. Era mugume omwoyo, muleete ku bibala byamu. Era ebiro byali biro bya zabbibu ezisooka okweagera. 
4_13_21_Awo ne bambuka, ne baketta ensi okuva ku ddungu lya Zini okutuuka e Lekobu, okucuusa w'oyingirira e Kamasi 
4_13_22_Ne bambukira obukiika obwa ddyo, ne batuuka e Kebbulooni; era Akimaani, Sesayi, ne Talumaayi, abaana ba Anaki, baali bali eyo. (Era Kebbulooni kyali kyakamaze emyaka musaavu okuzimbibwa, ne balyoka bazimba Zowani ekiri mu Misiri 
4_13_23_Ne batuuka mu kiwonvu e Esukoli, ne batemayo ettabi eryaliko ekirimba kimu ekya zabbibu, ne bakisitulira ku musituliro abantu babiri; era baaleeta ne ku makomamawanga, ne ku ttiini. 
4_13_24_Ekifo ekyo ne kiyitibwa ekiwonvu Esukoli, olw'ekirimba abaana ba Isiraeri kye baatemayo. 
4_13_25_Awo ne bakomawo nga bamaze okuketta ensi ennaku ana nga ziyiseewo. 
4_13_26_Ne batuuka ne bajja eri Musa n'eri Alooni n'eri ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri, mu ddungu lya Palani, e Kadesi; ne babaddiza ebigambo bo n'ekibiina kyonna, ne babalaga ebibala by'ensi. 
4_13_27_Ne bamubuulira ne bagamba nti Twatuuka mu nsi gye watutuma, era mazima ekulukuta n'amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki; era bino bye bibala byayo. 
4_13_28_Naye abantu abatuula mu nsi ba maanyi, n'ebibuga biriko enkomera, binene nnyo: era nate twalabayo abaana ba Anaki. 
4_13_29_Amaleki atuula mu nsi ey'obukiika obwa ddyo: n'Omukiiti, n'Omuyebusi, n'Omwamoli, batuula ku nsozi: n'Omukanani atuula kumpi n'ennyanja, era ku lubalama lwa Yoludaani. 
4_13_30_Kalebu n'asirisa abantu mu maaso ga Musa, n'agamba nti Twambuke mangu ago, tugirye; kubanga tuyinziza ddala okugiwangula. 
4_13_31_Naye abantu abaayambukira awamu naye ne bagamba nti Tetuyinza kwambuka ku bantu abo; kubanga batukiza amaanyi. 
4_13_32_Ne baleeta ebigambo ebibi eby'ensi gye baali bakesse eri abaana ba Isiraeri nga boogera nti Ensi gye twayitamu okugiketta, nsi eriira ddala abagituulamu; n'abantu bonna be twalaba omwo basajja bawanvu nnyo. 
4_13_33_Era twalabayo Banefiri, abaana ba Anaki, abaava ku Banefiri: naffe ne tuba mu maaso gaffe ng'obwacaaka, era bwe twali mu maaso gaabwe. 
4_14_1_Awo ekibiina kyonna ne bayimusa eddoboozi lyabwe, ne balira; abantu ne bakaaba amaziga ekiro ekyo. 
4_14_2_Abaana ba Isiraeri bonna ne beemulugunyiza Musa ne Alooni: ekibiina kyonna ne babagamba nti Singa rwafiira mu nsi y'e Misiri! oba singa twafiira mu ddungu muno! 
4_14_3_Era Mukama atuleetera ki mu nsi muno, okugwa n'ekitala? Bakazi baffe n'abaana baffe abato baliba munyago: si kye kisinga obulungi gye tuli okuddayo mu Misiri? 
4_14_4_Ne bagambagana nti Tweteekerewo omugabe, tuddeyo mu Misiri.
