4_14_5_Awo Musa ne Alooni ne bavuunama amaso gaabwe mu maaso g'ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_14_6_Yoswa mutabani wa Nuuni ne Kalebu mutabani wa Yefune, abaali ku muwendo gw'abo abaaketta ensi, ne bayuza !eagoye zaabwe: 
4_14_7_ne babuulira ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri nga boogera nti Ensi gye twayitamu okugiketta nsi nnungi nnyo. 
4_14_8_Mukama oba ag'atusanyukira, kale alituyingiza mu nsi omwo, n'agituwa; ensi ekulukuta n'amata n'omu'bisi gw'enjuki. 
4_14_9_Kyokka temujeemera Mukama, so temutya bantu ba mu nsi; kubanga kya kulya gye tuli: ekisiikirize kyabwe kiggiddwa waggulu ku bo, era Mukama ali wamu naffe: temubatya. 
4_14_10_Naye 'ekibiina kyonna ne balagira okubakuba amayinja. Ekitiibwa kya Mukama ne kirabikira mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu eri abaana ba Isiraeri bonna. 
4_14_11_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Abantu bano balituusa wa okutmyooma? era balituusa wa obutanzikiriza olw'obubonero bwonna bwe nnakolera mu bo 
4_14_12_N'abakuba ne kawumpuli, ne mbaggyako obusika bwabwe, ne nkuggyamu eggwanga eribasinga bo obunene n'amaanyi. 
4_14_13_Musa n'agamba Mukama nti Kale Abamisiri balikiwulira; kubanga waggya abantu bano mu bo n'amaanyi go n'obalinnyisa; 
4_14_14_ne bakibuulira abatuula mu nsi muno: baawulira nga ggwe Mukama oli wakati mu bantu bano; kubanga ggwe Mukama olabika amaaso n'amaaso, n'ekire kyo kiyimirira ku bo, n'obakulembera, mu mpagi ey'ekire emisana, ne mu mpagi ey'omuliro ekiro. 
4_14_15_Kale bw'onotta abantu bano ng'omuntu omu, kale amawanga agaawulira ettutumu lyo balyogera 
4_14_16_nti Kubanga Mukama teyayinza kuyingiza bantu bano mu nsi gye yabalayirira, kyeyava abattira mu ddungu. 
4_14_17_Kale kaakano, nkwegayiridde obuyinza bwa Mukama bubeere bungi, nga bwe wayogera 
4_14_18_nti Mukama alwawo okusunguwala, era ow'okusaasira kungi, asonyiwa obutali butuukirivu n'okusobya, era atalimuggyako musaago n'akatono aguliko; awalana obutali butuukirivu bwa bajjajja baabwe ku baana, ku mirembe egy'okusatu n'egy'okuna. 
4_14_19_Nkwegayiridde, sonyiwa, obutali butuukirivu bw'abantu bano ng'okusaasira kwo bwe kuli okungi, era nga bwe wasonyiwanga abantu bano okuva mu Misiri na guno gujwa. 
4_14_20_Mukama n'agamba nti Nsonyiye ng'ekigambo kyo bwe kibadde: 
4_14_21_naye mazima ddala, nga bwe ndi omulamu, era ng'ensi zonna bwe zirijjula ekitiibwa kya Mukama; 
4_14_22_kubanga abasajja abo botma abaalaba ekitiibwa kya nge n'obubonero bwange bwe tmakolera mu Misiri ne mu ddungu, naye ne bankema emirundi gino ekkumi, ne batawulira ddoboozi lyange; 
4_14_23_mazima tebaliraba nsi gye nnalayirira bajjajja baabwe, so tewaliba ku abo abannyooma n'omu aligiraba: 
4_14_24_naye omuddu wange, Kalebu, kubanga ye alina omwoyo omulala mu ye, era ye angobererera ddala, oyo ndimuleeta mu nsi gye yagendamu; n'ezzadde lye lirigirya. 
4_14_25_Kale Omwamaleki n'Omukanani batuula mu kiwonvu: enkya mukyu ke, mwegendere mu ddungu mu kkubo ery'Ennyaaja Emmyufu. 
4_14_26_Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
4_14_27_Ndiruusa wa okugumiikiriza ekibiina kino ekibi, abanneemulugunyiza? Mpulidde okwemulugunya kw'abaana ba Isiraeri kwe banneemulugunyiza. 
4_14_28_Bagambe nti Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama, mazima nga bwe mwogedde mu matu gange, bwe ntyo bwe nnaabakolanga: 
4_14_29_emirambo gyammwe girigwa mu ddungu muno; n'abo bonna abaabalibwa ku mmwe, ng'omuwendo gwammwe gwonna bwe gwali, abaali baakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, abanneemulugunyiza, 
4_14_30_mazima temulituuka mu asi, gye nnayimusiriza omukono gwange okubatuuza omwo, wabula Kalebu mutabani wa Yefune, ye Yoswa mutabani wa Nuuni. 
4_14_31_Naye abaana bammwe abato, be mugambye okuba omunyago, abo ndibayingiza, aabo balimanya ensi gye mugaanyi. 
4_14_32_Naye mmwe, emirambo gyammwe girigwa mu ddungu muno. 
4_14_33_N'abaana bammwe banaabanga batambuze mu ddungu okumala emyaka ana, era banaabangako obwenzi bwammwe, okutuusa emirambo gyammwe lwe girizikiririra mu ddungu. 
4_14_34_Ng'omuwendo gw'ennaku bwe gwali ze mwaketteramu ensi, ze nnaku ana, buli lunaku mwaka, bwe munaabangako bwe mutyo obutali butuukirivu bwammwe, gye myaka ana, era munaamanyanga bwe nnabaabulira. 
4_14_35_Nze Mukama njogedde, mazima ndikola kino ekibiina kino kyonna ekibi, abankuŋŋaaniddeko: mu ddungu muno mwe balizikiririra, era mwe balifiira. 
4_14_36_N'abantu Musa be yatuma okuketta easi, abaakomawo ne bamwemulugunyizisa ekibiina kyonna, nga baleeta ebigambo ebibi ku nsi, 
4_14_37_abantu abo abaaleeta ebigambo ebibi eby'ensi ne bafa kawumpuli mu maaso ga Mukama. 
4_14_38_Naye Yoswa mutabani wa Nuuni ne Kalebu mutabani wa Yefune ne basigalawo nga balamu ku bantu abo abaagenda okuketta ensi. 
4_14_39_Awo Musa n'abuulira abaana ba Isiraeri bonna ebigambo ebyo: abantu ne bawuubaala nnyo. 
4_14_40_Ne bagolokoka enkya mu makya, ne beegendera ku ntikko y'olusozi nga boogera nti Laba, tutuuno, era tunaayambuka mu kifo Mukama kye yasubiza: kubaaga twayonoona. 
4_14_41_Musa n'agamba nti Kaakano musobeza ki ekiragiro kya Mukama, kubanga tekiibe na mukisa? 
4_14_42_Temwambuka, kubanga Mukama tali mu mmwe; muleme okukubirwa ddala mu maaso g'abalabe bammwe. 
4_14_43_Kubanga eyo Omwamaleki n'Omukanani bali mu maaso gammwe, era munaagwa n'ekitala: kubanga mwadda ennyuma obutagoberera Mukama, Mukama kyanaava alema okubeera nammwe. 
4_14_44_Naye ne beeyinula okulinnya ku ntikko y'olusozi: naye ssanduuko ey'endagaano ya Mukama ne Musa tebaava mulusiisira. 
4_14_45_Awo Omwamaleki n'aserengeta, n'Omukanani eyatuula ku lusozi okwo, ne babakuba ne babaseera ddala okutuusa e Koluma. 
4_15_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_15_2_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri obagambe nti Bwe mulimala okutuuka mu nsi gye munaatuulangamu, gye mbawa, 
4_15_3_era nga mwagadde okuwaayo ekiweebwayo n'omuliro eri Mukama, ekiweebwayo elryokebwa oba ssaddaaka, okutuukiriza obweyamo, oba okuba kye muwaayo ku bwammwe, oba ku mbaga zammwe ezaalagirwa, okunyookereza Mukama evvumbe eddungi, ku nte oba ku ndiga: 
4_15_4_kale oyo anaawangayo ekitone kye anaawangayo eri Mukama ekiweebwayo eky'obutta eky'ekitundu eky'ekkumi ekya efa ey'obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu ekitundu eky'okuna ekya ini ey'amafuta: 
4_15_5_n'envinnyo okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa, ekitundu eky'okuna ekya ini, onootegekanga wamu n'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa oba olwa ssaddaaka, olwa buli mwana gw'endiga. 
4_15_6_Oba olw'endiga ennume onootegekanga okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ebitundu bibiri eby'ekkumi ebya efa ey'obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu ekitundu eky'okusatu ekya ini ey'amafuta: 
4_15_7_era okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa onoowangayo ekitundu eky'okusatu ekya ini ey'envinnyo, ey'akawoowo eri Mukama. 
4_15_8_Era bw'onootegekanga ente okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa oba okuba ssaddaaka, okutuukiriza obweyamo, oba okuba ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe eri Mukama: 
4_15_9_kale anaawangayo wamu n'ente ekiweebwayo eky'obutta eky'ebitundu bisatu eby'ekkumi ebya efa ey'obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu ekitundu kya ini ey'amafuta. 
4_15_10_Era onoowangayo okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa kitundu kya ini ey'envinnyo, okuba ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, eky'akawoowo eri Mukama. 
4_15_11_Bwe kityo bwe kinaakolebwanga olwa buli nte, oba olwa buli ndiga ennume, oba olwa buli mwana gw'endiga omulume, oba abaana b'embuzi. 
4_15_12_Ng'omuwendo gwe munaateekanga bwe gunaabanga, bwe munaakolanga bwe mutyo kinneemu ng'omuwendo gwazo bwe gunaabanga. 
4_15_13_Enzaalwa bonna banaakolanga ebyo bwe batyo, bwe banaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekiko lebwa n'omuliro, eky'ewumbe eddungi eri Mukama: 
4_15_14_Era omugenyi bw'anaatuulanga nammwe, oba buli anaabanga mu mmwe mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna, era ng'ayagadde okuwaayo ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, eky'ewumbe eddungi eri Mukama; nga mmwe bwe mukola, naye bw'anaakolanga bw'atyo. 
4_15_15_Mu kibiina, wanaabangawo etteeka limu gye mull n'eri omugenyi anaatuulanga mu mmwe, etteeka eritaliggwaawo mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna: nga mmwe bwe muli, n'omugenyi bw'anaabanga bw'atyo mu maaso ga Mukama. 
4_15_16_Etteeka limu n'a bulombolombo bumu binaabanga gye muli n'eri omugenyi anaatuulanga nammwe. 
4_15_17_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_15_18_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri obagambe nti Bwe multituuka mu nsi gye mbatwala, awo olunaatuu kanga, 
4_15_19_bwe munaalyanga ku mugaati ogw'ensi, munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa eri Mukama. 
4_15_20_Ku mugoyo gwammwe ogw'olubereberye kwe munaggyanga omugaati ne muguwaayo okuba ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa: nga bwe mukola ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa eky'omu guuliro, bwe munaakisitulanga bwe mutyo. 
4_15_21_Ku mugoyo gwammwe ogw'olubereberye kwe munaggyanga okuwa Mukama ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna. 
4_15_22_Era bwe munaasobyanga ne mutakwata biragiro bino byonna, Mukama bye yabuulira Musa, 
4_15_23_byonna Mukama bye yabalagira n'omukono gwa Musa, okuva ku lunaku Mukama lwe yalagirirako, n'oluvannyuma lwonna mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna; 
4_15_24_awo olunaatuukanga, bwe munaabanga mukikoze nga temumanyiridde, ekibiina nga tekimanyi, ekibiina kyonna banaawangayo ente emu envubuka okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, olw'evvumbe eddungi eri Mukama, wamu n'ekiweebwayo kyako eky'obutta n'ekiweebwayo kyako eky'okunywa, ng'etteeka bwe liri, n'embuzi emu ennume okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi. 
4_15_25_Era kabona anaatangiriranga ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri, era banaasonyiyibwanga; kubanga kubadde kusobya, era nga baleese ekitone kyabwe, ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama, n'ekyabwe ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi mu maaso ga Mukama, olw'okusobya kwabwe: 
4_15_26_n'ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri banaasonyiyibwanga, n'omugenyi atuula mu bo; kubanga kyakolebwa nga tebamanyiridde eri abantu bonna. 
4_15_27_Era omuntu bw'anaaydnoonanga nga tamanyiridde, kale anaawangayo embuzi enduusi etennamala mwaka gumu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi. 
4_15_28_Era kabona anaatangiriranga obulamu obusobya, bw'anaayonoonanga nga tamanyiridde, mu maaso ga Mukama, okumutangirira; kale anaasonyiyibwanga. 
4_15_29_Munaabanga n'etteeka limu eri oyo anaakolanga ekikolwa kyonna nga tamanyiridde, eri enzaalwa mu baana ba Isiraeri, n'eri omugenyi aruula mu bo. 
4_15_30_Naye obulamu obunaakolanga ekikolwa kyonna n'ekyejo, oba nga nzaalwa oba nga mugenyi, oyo ng'awodde Mukama; n'obulamu obwo bunaazikirizibwanga mu bantu be. 
4_15_31_Kubanga anyoomye ekigambo kya Mukama era ng'amenye ekiragiro kye; obulamu obwo bunaazikiririzibwanga ddala, obutali butuukirivu bwe bunaabanga ku ye. 
4_15_32_Awo abaana ba Isiraeri bwe baali nga bakyali mu ddungu, ne basanga omuntu ng'alondera enku ku lunaku lwa ssabbiiti. 
4_15_33_N'abo abaamusanga ng'alonda enku ne bamuleetera Musa ne Alooni n'ekibiina kyonna. 
4_15_34_Ne bamusiba, kubanga kyali tekinnategeezebwa bw'anaakolebwa. 
4_15_35_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Omuntu oyo taaleme kuttibwa: ekibiina kyonna kinaamukubira amayinja ebweru w'olusiisira. 
4_15_36_Ekibiina kyonna ne bamutwala ebweru w'olusiisira, ne bamukuba amayinja, n'afa; nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_15_37_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_15_38_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri obalagire okwekolera amatanvuwa ku nkugiro z'ebyambalo byabwe mu mirembe gyabwe gyonna, era bateeke omugwa ogwa kaniki ku matanvuwa agali ku buli lukugiro: 
4_15_39_era ganaabanga gye muli amatanvuuwa, mugalabenga mujjukire ebiragiro byonna ebya Mukama, mubikolenga; muleme okutambulatambula okugoberera omutima gwammwe mmwe n'amaaso gammwe mmwe, bye muyisa okugoberera okwenda nabyo: 
4_15_40_mujjukire ebiragiro byange byonna mubikole, mube batukuvu eri Katonda wammwe. 
4_15_41_Nze Mukama Katonda wammwe, eyabaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, okuba Katonda wammwe: nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
4_16_1_Awo Koola, mutabani wa Izukali, mutabani wa Kokasi, mutabani wa Leevi, ne Dasani ne Abiraamu, batabani ba Eriyaabu, ne Oni, mutabani wa Peresi, batabani ba Lewubeeni, ne batwala abantu: 
4_16_2_ne bagolokoka mu maaso ga Musa, wamu n'abalala ab'oku baana ba Isiraeri, abakulu b'ekibiina bibiri mu ataano, abaayitibwa mu kkuŋŋaaniro, abasajja abaayatiikirira: 
4_16_3_ne beekuŋŋaanyiza ku Musa ne ku Alooni ne babagamba nti Muyinga okwekuza, kubanga ekibiina kyonna kitukuvu, buli muntu ku bo, era Mukama ali mu bo: kale mwegulumiriza ki okusinga ekibiina kya Mukama? 
4_16_4_Awo Musa bwe yakiwulira n'avuunama amaaso ge 
4_16_5_n'agamba Koola ne banne bonna nti Enkya Mukama anaalaga ababe bwe bali, n'omutukuvu bw'ali, era anaamusembeza gy'ali: oyo gw'anaalonda anaamusembeza gy'ali. 
4_16_6_Mukole bwe muti; muddire ebyoterezo, Koola ne banne bonna 
4_16_8_Musa n'agamba Koola nti Muwulire nno, mmwe batabani ba Leevi: 
4_16_9_kyali kitono gye muli Katonda wa Isiraeri okubaawula mu kibiina kya Isiraeri, okubasembeza gy'ali; okukolanga okuweereza okw'omu nnyumba ya Mukama, n'okuyimiriranga mu maaso g'ekibiina okubaweereza: 
4_16_10_n'okusembeza ggwe ne bagandabo bonna batabani ba Leevi wamu naawe? era munoonya n'obwakabona? 
4_16_11_Kyemuvudde mukuŋŋaanira ku Mukama ggwe ne banno bonna: ne Alooni ye ani mmwe okumwemulugunyiza? 
4_16_12_Musa n'atuma okuyita Dasani ne Abiraamu, batabani ba Eriyaabu: ne bagamba nti Tetujja kwambuka: 
4_16_13_kyali kitono ggwe okutuggya mu nsi ekulukuta n'amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki n'otulinnyisa, okututtira mu ddungu, era naye n'okugwanira ne kikugwanira okwefuula omulangira ku ffe? 
4_16_14_Era nate totuleese mu nsi ekulukuta n'amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki, so totuwadde busika bwa animiro n'ensuku ez'emizabbibu: oyagala okuggyamu amaaso abantu abo? tetujja kwambuka. 
4_16_15_Awo Musa n'asunguwala nnyo, n'agamba Mukama nti Tossaayo; mwoyo eri ekyabwe ekiweebwayo: sibaggyangako na ndogoyi emu, so sikolaaga bubi n'omu ku bo. 
4_16_16_Musa n'agamba Koola nti Ggwe n'ekibiina kyo, kyonna mubeere mu maaso ga Mukama, ggwe nabo ne Alooni, enkya: 
4_16_17_muddire buli muntu ekyoterezo kye, mubiteekeko obubaane, muleete mu maaso ga Mukama buli muntu ekyoterezo kye, ebyoterezo ebikunu bibiri mu ataano; naawe ne Alooni, buli muntu ekyoterezo kye. 
4_16_18_Ne baddira buli muntu ekyoterezo kye, ne babiteekamu omuliro, ne bassaakol obubaane, ne bayimirira ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu wamu ne Musa ne Alooni. 
4_16_19_Koola n'akuŋŋaanyiza ku bo ekibiina kyonna ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu: ekitiibwa kya Mukama ne kirabikira ekibiina kyonna. 
4_16_20_Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
4_16_21_Mweyawule wakati mu kibiina kino ndyoke mbazikirize mangu ago. 
4_16_22_Ne bavuunama amaaso gaabwe ne bagamba nti Ai Katonda, Katonda w'emyoyo gya bonna abalina emibiri, omuntu omu ng'ayonoonye onoosunguwalira ekibiina kyonna? 
4_16_23_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_16_24_Gamba ekibiina nti Mugolokoke muve ku weema ya Koola, Dasani, ne Abiraamu. 
4_16_25_Musa n'agolokoka n'agenda eri Dasani ne Abiraamu; abakadde ba Isiraeri ne bamugoberera. 
4_16_26_N'agamba eki,biina nti Mbeegayiridde, muve ku weema ez'abantu bano ababi, so temukoma ku kintu kyonna ku byabwe, muleme okuzikirizibwa mu bibi byabwe byonna. 
4_16_27_Awo ne bagolokoka okuva ku nnyumba ya Koola, Dasani, ne Abiraamu, enjuyi zonna: Dasani ne Abiraamu ne bafuluma, ne bayimirira ku mulyango gw'eweema zaabwe, ne bakazi baabwe, ne batabani baabwe, n'abaana baabwe abato. 
4_16_28_Musa n'agamba nti Ku kino kwe munaategeerera nga Mukama yantuma okukola emirimu gino gyonna; kubanga saayima mu magezi gange nze okugikola. 
4_16_29_Abantu bano bwe balifa ng'abantu bonna bwe bafa bulijjo, oba bwe balijjirwa ng'abantu; bonna bwe bajjirwa; kale Mukama nga teyantuma. 
4_16_30_Naye Mukama bw'anaakola ekigambo ekiggya, ettaka ne lyasama akamwa kaalyo, ne libamira, wamu n'ebyabwe byonna, ne bakka nga balamu mu bunnya; kale munaategeera ng'abaatu bano banyoomye Mukama. 
4_16_31_Awo olwatuvka, bwe yali ng'agenda okumala okwogera ebigambo ebyo byonna, ettaka ne lyatika eryali wansi weabwe: 
4_16_32_ensi n'eyasama akamwa kaayo, n'ebamira, n'ennyumba zaabwe, n’abantu bonna aba Koola, n'ebintu byabwe byonna 
4_16_33_Bwe batyo bo n'ebyabwe byonna ne bakka nga balamu mu bunnya: ensi n'ebasaanikira, ne bazikirira mu kibiina. 
4_16_34_Isiraeri yonna abaali babeetoolodde ne badduka olw'okulira kwabwe: kubanga baagamba nti Ensi ereme okurumira ffe. 
4_16_35_Omuliro ne guva eri Mukama, ne gwokya abasajja ebibiri mu ataano abaawaayo obubaane. 
4_16_36_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_16_37_Gamba Eriyazaali mutabaani wa Alooni kabona, aggye ebyoterezo mu muliro, naawe ofuke eyo omuliro; kubaaga bitukuvu; 
4_16_38_ebyoterezo bya baao abaayonoona ku bulamu bwabwe bo, babifuule essowaani eziweesebwa okubikka ku kyoto: kubanga babiwaddeyo mu maaso ga Mukama, kye bibeeredde ebitukuvu: era binaabanga kabonero eri abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_16_39_Eriyazaal; kabona n'atwala ebyoterezo eby'ebikomo, abo abookeddwa bye bawaddeyo; ne babiweesa okuba ekibikka ku kyoto: 
4_16_40_okuba ekijjukizo eri abaana ba Isiraeri, munnaggwanga yenna, atali wa zzadde lya Alooni, alemenga okusembera okunyookeza obubaane mu maaso ga Mukama; alemenga okuba nga Koola, era nga banae: Mukama nga bwe yamugamba n'omukono gwa Musa. 
4_16_41_Naye ku lw'enkya ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri ne beemiilugunyiza Musa ne Alooni nga boogera nti Mwasse abantu ba Mukama. 
4_16_42_Awo olwatuuka, ekibiina bwe kyali kikuŋŋaanidde ku Musa ne ku Alooni, ne batunuulira eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu: era, laba, ekire nga kigibisseeko, ekitiibwa kya Mukama ne kirabika. 
4_16_43_Musa ne Alooni ne bajja mu bwenyi bw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_16_44_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_16_45_Mugolokoke muve wakati mu kibiina kino, mbazikirize mangu ago. Ne bavuunama amaaso gaabwe. 
4_16_46_Musa n'agamba Alooni nti Ddira ekyoterezo kyo, oggye omuliro ku kyoto oguteeke omwo, osseeko obubaane, okitwale mangu eri ekibiina, obatangirire: kubanga obusungu bufulumye eri Mukama: kawumpuli atanudde. 
4_16_47_Alooni n'addira nga Musa bwe yayogera, n'adduka n'agenda wakati mu kibiina; era, laba, kawumpuli ng'atanudde mu bantu. 
4_16_48_N'ayimirira wakati w'abafu n'abalamu; kawumpuli n'aziyizibwa. 
4_16_49_N'abo abaafa kawumpuli baali kakumi mu enkumi nnya mu lusanvu, obutassaako abo abaafa olw'ebigambo bya Koola. 
4_16_50_Alooni n'addayo eri Musa ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu: kawumpuli n'aziyizibwa. 
4_17_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_17_2_Gamba abaana ba Isiraeri, obaggyeko emiggo, buli nnyumba ya bakitaabwe gumu, ku bakulu baabwe bonna ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, emiggo kkumi n'ebiri: waadiika erinnya lya buli muntu ku muggo gwe. 
4_17_3_Eraonoowandiika erinnya lya Alooni ku muggo gwa Leevi: kubanga buli; mutwe gw'ennyumba za bakitaabwe omuggo gunaaba gumu. 
4_17_4_Era onoogitereka mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu mu maaso g'obujulirwa, we nsisinkanira nammwe. 
4_17_5_Kale olunaatuuka, omuntu gwe nnaalonda omuggo gwe gunaaloka: nange naamalawo gye ndi okwemulugunya kw'abaana ba Isiraeri, kwe babeemulugunyiza. 
4_17_6_Musa n'agamba abaana ba Isiraeri, abakulu baabwe bonna ne bamuwa emiggo, buli mukulu gumu, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, gy'emiggo kkumi n'ebiri: n'omuggo gwa Alooni gwali mu miggo gyabwe. 
4_17_7_Musa n'atereka emiggo mu maaso ga Mukama mu weema ey'obujulirwa. 
4_17_8_Awo olwatuuka enkya Musa n'ayiagira mu weema ey'obujulirwa; era, laba, omuggo gwa Alooni ogw'omu nnyumba ya Leevi nga gumeze ne guloka ne gusansula ne gubala amaloozi amengevu. 
4_17_9_Musa n'afwumya emiggo gyonna eri abaana ba Isiraeri bonna ng'agiggya mu maaso ga Mukama: ne balaba, ne baddira buli muntu omuggo gwe. 
4_17_10_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Zzaayo omuggo gwa Alooai mu manso g'obujulirwa, okukuumibwanga okuba akobonero eri abaana b'obujeemu; omalewo okwemulugunya kwabwe ku nze, baleme okufa. 
4_17_11_Musa bwe yakola bw'atyo: nga Mukama bwe yamulagira, bwe yakola. 
4_17_12_Abaana ba Isiraeri ae bagamba Musa nti Laba, tuzikirira, tufudde, fenna tufudde. 
4_17_13_Buli anaasemberanga, anaasemberanga ku nnyumba ya Mukama, anaafanga: fenna tulizikirira 
4_18_1_Mukama n'agamba Alooni nti Ggwe ne batabani bo n'ennyumba ya bakitamwe wamu naawe munaabangako obutali butuukirivu bw'awatukuvu: era ggwe ne batabani bo wamu naawe munaabangako obutali butuukirivu bw'obwakabona bwammwe. 
4_18_2_Ne baganda bo nabo, ekika kya Leevi, ekika kya kitaawo, basembeze wamu naawe, bagattibwe naawe bakuweerezenga: naye ggwe ne batabani bo wamu naawe munaabanga mu maaso g'eweema ey'obujulirwa. 
4_18_3_Era banaakuumanga bye wateresebwa, n'ebiteresebwa eby'Eweema yonna: kyokka tebasembereranga bintu bya mu watukuvu n'ekyoto, baleme okufa, bo newakubadde mmwe. 
4_18_4_Era baligattibwa naawe ne bakuuma eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu nga bwe baateresebwa, olw'okuweereza kwonna okw'omu Weema: ne munnaggwanga tabasembereranga. 
4_18_5_Era munaakuumanga awatukuvu nga bwe mwateresebwa, n'ekyoto nga bwe mwateresebwa: walemenga okuba obusungu nate ku baana ba Isiraeri. 
4_18_6_Naage, laba, nze nziye baganda bammwe Abaleevi mu baana ba Isiraeri: bo kirabo gye muli, ekiweereddwa eri Mukama, okukolanga okuweereza okw'omu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_18_7_Naawe ne batabani bo wamu naawe munaakuumiranga obwakabona bwammwe buli kintu eky'ekyoto n'ebyo ebiri munda w'egglgi; era munaaweerezanga: mbawa obwakabona okuba okuweereza kwe muweereddwa: ne munnaggwanga anaasemberanga anattibwanga. 
4_18_8_Mukama n'agamba Alooni nti Nange, laba, nze nkuteresezza ebiweebwayo gye ndi ebisitulibwa, ebintu byonna eby'abaana ba Isiraeri ebitukuzibwa, ggwe mbiwadde olw'okufukibwako amafuta, ne batabani bo, okuba ebbanja ennaku zonna. 
4_18_9_Bino bye binaabanga ebibyo ku bintu ebitukuvu ennyo, ebinaafikkangawo ku muliro: but kitone kyabwe, buli kye bawaayo eky'obutta, na buli kye bawaayo olw'ekibi, na buli kye bawaayo olw'omusango, bye banansasulanga, binaabanga bitukuvu nnyo, bibyo era bya batabani bo. 
4_18_10_Onoolyangako ng'ebintu ebitukuvu ennyo; buli musajja anaalyangako: binaabanga bitukuvu gy'oli. 
4_18_11_Era bino bibyo: ekirabo kyabwe kye bawaa. yo ekisitulibwa, byonna abaana ba Isiraeri bye bawaayo ebiwuubibwawuubibwa: mbikuwadde ggwe ne batabani bo ne bawala bo wami naawe, okuba ebbanja ennaku zonna: buli muntu omulongoofu mu nnyumba yo anaalyangako 
4_18_12_Amafuta gonna agasinga obu lungi ne zabbibu zonna ezisinga obulungi, ne ku ŋŋaano, ebiberebezye ku byo bye banaawanga Mukama, ggwe mbiwadde. 
4_18_13_Ebibala ebinaasookanga okwengera ku byonna ebiri mu nsi yaabwe, bye banaaleeteranga Mukama, binaabanga bibyo; buli muntu omulongoofu ali mu nnyumba yo anaalyangako. 
4_18_14_Buli kintu ekinaawongebwanga mu Isiraeri kinaabanga kikyo. 
4_18_15_Buli ekinaggulanga enda, ku byonna ebirina omubiri bye bawaayo eri Mukama, oba nga muntu oba nga nsolo, binaabanga bibyo: naye omubereberye w'omuntu tolemanga kununula, n'embereberye z'ensolo ezitali nnongoofu onoonunulanga. 
4_18_16_N'ebyo ebinaabanga eby'okununulibwa ku byo ebyakamaze omwezi ogumu onoonunulanga, ng'okubala kwo bwe kunaabanga, n'omuwendo ogwa sekeri ttaano, nga sekeri ey'omu watukuvu bw'eri eyo ze gera abiri. 
4_18_17_Naye embereberye y'ente, oba embereberye y'endiga, oba embereberye y'embuzi, tonunulanga; ezo ntukuvu: onoomansiranga omusaayi gwazo ku kyoto, n'oyokya amasavu gaazo okuba ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, okuba evvumbe eddungi eri Mukama. 
4_18_18_N'ennyama yaazo eneebanga yiyo, ng'ekifuba ekiwuubibwawuubibwa era ng'ekisambi ekya ddyo, eneebanga yiyo. 
4_18_19_Byonna ebisitulibwa ebiweebwayo ku bintu ebitukuvu, abaana ba Isiraeri bye bawaayo eri Mukama, nkubiwadde ggwe ne batabani bo ne bawala bo wamu naawe, okuba ebbanja ennaku zonna: ye ndagaano ey'omunnyo eteriggwaawo mu maaso ga Mukama eri ggwe n'eri ezzadde lyo awamu naawe. 
4_18_20_Mukama n'agamba Alooni nti Toobenga na busika mu nsi yaabwe, so toobeaga na mugabo gwonna mu bo: nze mugabo gwo n'obusika bwo mu baana ba Isiraeri. 
4_18_21_Era abaana ba Leevi, laba, mbawadde ebitundu byonna eby'ekkumi eby'omu Isiraeri okuba obusika, okuba empeera y'okuweereza kwabwe kwe baweereza, kwe kuweereza okw'omu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_18_22_N'okuva leero abaana ba Isiraeri tebaasembererenga weema ya kusisinkaiurangamu, balemenga okubaako ekibi ne bafa. 
4_18_23_Naye Abaleevi banaakolanga okuweereza okw'omu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, nabo banaabangako obutali butuukirivu bwabwe: lino linaabanga tteeka eritaliggwaawo mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna, era mu baana ba Isiraeri tebabanga na busika. 
4_18_24_Kubanga ebitundu eby'ekkumi eby'abaana ba Isiraeri, bye bawaayo okuba ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa eri Mukama, bye mbawadde Abaleevi okuba obusika: kyenvudde mbagamba nti Mu baana ba Isiraeri tebabanga na busika. 
4_18_25_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_18_26_Era nate onooyogera n'Abaleevi n'obagamba nti Bwe munaasoloozanga ku baana ba Isiraeri ebitundu eby'ekkumi bye mbawadde ku bc okuba obusika bwammwe, kale munaawangayo ku byo ekiweebwaye ekisitulibwa eri Mukama, ekitundu eky'ekkumi eky'ebitundu eby'ekkumi. 
4_18_27_Era kye muwaayo ekisitulibwa kinaabalibwanga gye muli, ng'emmere enkalu ey'omuguuliro, era ng'ebikula mu ssogolero. 
4_18_28_Bwe mutyo nammwe munaggyanga ku bitundu byammwe byonna eby'ekkumi abaana ba Isiraeri bye babawa, okuwaayo ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa eri Mukama; era munaggyanga ku byo okuwa Alooni kabona ekiweebwayo ekya Muksma ekisitulibwa. 
4_18_29_Ku birabo byammwe byonna kwe munaggyanga buli ekiweebwayo ekya Multama ekisitulibwa, ku ebyo byonna ebisinga obulungi, kye kitundu kyabyo ekitukuzibwa kye muggya ku byo. 
4_18_30_Kyonoova obagamba nti Bwe munaasitulanga ebisinga obulungi ku byo, kale binaabalibwanga eri Abaleevi ng'ekyengera eky'omu gguuliro, era ng'ekyengera eky'omu ssogolero. 
4_18_31_Era munaabiriiranga mu buli kifo, mmwe n'ennyumba zammwe: kubanga y'empeera yammwe olw'okuweereza kwammwe okw'omu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_18_32_So temuubengako kibi olw'ebyo, bwe munaamalanga okusitula ku byo ebisinga obulungi ku byo: so temuvumisanga bintu bitukuvu by'abaana ba Isiraeri; mulemenga okivfa. 
4_19_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti 
4_19_2_Lino lye tteeka ery'ekiragiro Mukama kye yalagira ng'agamba nti Gamba abaana ba Isiraeri bakuleetere ente enduusi eya lukunyu eteriiko bbala, eteriiko bulema, eteteekebwangako kikoligo: 
4_19_3_era munaagiwanga Eriyazaali kabona, naye anaagifulumyanga ebweru w'olusiisira, ne bagittira mu maaso ge: 
4_19_4_awo Eriyazaali kabona anaatoolanga ku musaayi gwayo n'engalo ye, n'amansira ku musaayi gwayo okwolekera obwenyi bw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu emirundi musanvu 
4_19_5_ne bookera ente mu maaso ge; eddiba lyayo n'ennyama yaayo n'omusaayi gwayo wamu n'obusa bwayo anaabyokyanga: 
4_19_6_kabona n'addira omuti omwerezi n'ezobu a'olugoye olumyttfu, n'abissuula wakati ente w'eyokerwa. 
4_19_7_Awo kabona anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba omubiri gwe mu mazzi, n'alyoka ayingira mu lusiisira, kabona n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
4_19_8_N'oyo anaagyokyanga anaayozanga engoye ze mu mazzi, n'anaaba omubiri gwe mu mazzi, n'aba atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
4_19_9_N'omuntu omulongoofu anaayoolanga ewu ly'ente, n'alitereka ebweru w'olusiisira mu kifo ekirongoofu, era linaakuumirwanga ekibiina ky'abaana ba Isiraeri okuba amazzi ag'okwawula: ekyo kye kiweebwayo olw'ekibi. 
4_19_10_N'oyo anaayoolanga ewu ly'ente anaayozanga engoye ze, n'aba atali mulongoofu okuruusa akawungeezi: era linaabanga eri abaana ba Isiraeri n'eri omugenyi atuula mu bo etteeka eritaliggwaawo. 
4_19_11_Anaakomanga ku mulambo gw'omuntu yenna anaabanga atali mulongoofu ennaku musanvu: 
4_19_12_oyo aneerongoosanga nago ku lunaku olw'okusatu, ne ku lunaku olw'omusanvu anaabanga mulongoofu: naye bw'anaalemanga okwerongoosa ku lunaku olw'okusatu, kale ku lunaku olw'omusanvu taabenga mulongoofu. 
4_19_13_Buli anaakomanga ku mulambo gw'omuntu yenna afudde, n'ateerongoosa, ng'ayonoona ennyumba ya Mukama; n'obulamu obwo bunaazikirizibwanga mu Isiraeri: kubanga teyamansirwako mazzi ga kwawula, anaabanga atali mulongoofu; obutali bulongoofu bwe nga bukyali ku ye. 
4_19_14_Lino lye tteeka omuntu bw'aaaafiiranga mu weema: buli anaayingiranga mu weema na buli anaabanga mu weema, anaabanga atali mulongoofu ennaku musanvu. 
4_19_15_Na buli kintu kyasaan,iridde, ekitaliiko kisaanikizo ekisibibwa ku kyo, si kirongoofu. 
4_19_16_Na buli anaakomanga ku ttale ebweru ku muntu eyattibwa n'ekitala oba ku mulambo oba ku ggumba ly'omuntu oba ku malaalo anaabanga atali mulongoofu ennaku musanvu. 
4_19_17_N'olw'atali mulongoofu banaatoolanga ku wu ery'ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi ekyokebwa, ne bafiiltako amazzi agakulukuta mu kibya: 
4_19_18_n'omuntu omulongoofu anaddiranga ezobu, n'aginnyilta mu mazzi, n'agamansira ku weema, ne ku bintu byonna, ne ku bantu abaalimu, ne ku oyo eyakoma ku ggumba oba ku oyo eyattibwa oba ku mufu oba ku malaalo: 
4_19_19_n'omulongoofu oyo anaamansiranga ku atali mulongoofu ku lunaku olw'okusatu ne ku lunaku olw'omusanvu: ne ku lunaku olw'omusanvu anaamulongoosanga; awo anaayozanga engoye ze, n'anaaba mu mazzi, n'aba mulongoofu akawungeezi. 
4_19_20_Naye omuntu anaabanga atali mulongoofu n'ateerongoosa, obulamu obwo bunaazikirizibwanga wakati mu kibiina, kubanga ayonoonye awatukuvu wa Mukama: amazzi ag'okwawula tegamansiddwa ku ye; si mulongoofu. 
4_19_21_Era linaabanga tteeka gye bali eritaliggwaawo: n'oyo anaamansiranga amazzi ag'okwawula anaayozanga engoye ze; n'oyo anaakomanga ku mazzi ag'okwawula anaabanga atali mulongoofu okutuusa akawungeezi. 
4_19_22_Na buli kintu atali mulongoofu ky'anaakomangako kinaabanga ekitali kiroagoofu: n'obulamu obunaakikomangako bunaabanga obutali bulongoofu 
4_20_1_Awo abaana ba Isiraeri, ekibiina kyonna, ne batuuka mu ddungu lya Zini mu mwezi ogw'olu bereberye: abantu ne batuula mu Kadesi; Miryamu n'afiira eyo n'aziikibwa eyo. 
4_20_2_Ne wataba mazzi ga kibiina: ne beekuŋŋaanyiza ku Musa ne ku Alooni. 
4_20_3_Abantu ne bawakana ne Musa ne boogera nti Singa twafa baganda baffe bwe baafiira mu maaso ga Mukama! 
4_20_4_Era mw'aleetera ki ekibiina kya Mukama mu ddungu muno, tufiire omwo, ffe n'ebisibo byaffe? 
4_20_5_Era mwatuggira ki mu Misiri okutulinnyisa okutuyingiza mu kifo kino ekibi? si kifo kya nsigo, so si kya ttiini, so si kya mizabbibu, so si kya mikomamawanga; so tewali mazzi ga kunywa. 
4_20_6_Musa ne Alooni ne bava mu maaso g'ekibiina ne bagenda ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, ne bavuunama amaaso gaabwe: ekitiibwa kya Mukama ne kibalabikira. 
4_20_7_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_20_8_Ddira omuggo ogwo, okuŋŋaanye ekibiina, ggwe ne Alooni muganda wo, mugambire olwazi mu maaso gaabwe, luleete amazzi gaalwo; onobaggira amazzi mu lwazi: bw'otyo bw'onoonywesa ekibiina n'ebisibo byabwe. 
4_20_9_Musa n'addira omuggo ng'aguggya mu maaso ga Mukama, nga bwe yamulagira. 
4_20_10_Musa ne Alooni ne bakuŋŋaanyiza ekibiina mu maaso g'olwazi, n'abagamba nti Muwulire nno, mmwe abajeemu; ffe tunaabaggira amaizi mu lwazi muno? 
4_20_11_Musa n'ayimusa omukono gwe, n’akuba olwazi n'omuggo gwe emirundi ebiri: amazzi mangi ne gavaamu, ekibiina ne banywa n'ebisibo byabwe. 
4_20_12_Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Alooni nti Kubanga temunzikirizza, okuntukuza mu maaso g'abaana ba Isiraeri, kyemuliva mulema okuyingiza ekibiina kino mu nsi gye mbawadde. 
4_20_13_Ago ge mazzi ag'e Meriba; kubanga abaana ba Isiraeri baawakana ne Mukama, n'atukuzibwa mu bo. 
4_20_14_Musa n'aiuma ababaka ng'ayima e Kadesi eri Kabaka w’e Edomu, nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Isiraeri muganda wo, nti Omanyi ennaku zonna ezaatubaako: 
4_20_15_bakitaffe bwe baaserengeta mu Misiri, ne tumala mu Misiri ebiro bingi Abamisiri ne batukola bubi ne bakitaffe: 
4_20_16_awo bwe twakaabira Mukama, n'awulira eddoboozi lyaffe, n'atuma malayika, n'atuggya mu Misiri: era, laba, tuli mu Kadesi; ekibuga ekiri ku nsalo yo enkomerero: 
4_20_17_ka tuyite, nkwegayiridde, mu nsi yo: tetuliyita mu nnimiro newakubadde mu lusuku lw'emizabbibu, so tetulinywa ku mazzi ag'omu nzizi: tunaatambuliranga mu luguudo lwa kabaka, tetulikyamira ku mukono ogwa ddyo, newakubadde ogwa kkono, okutuusa lwe tuliyita ku nsalo yo. 
4_20_18_Edomu n'amugamba nti Toliyita mu nze, nneme okukutabaala n'ekitala. 
4_20_19_Abaana ba Isiraeri ne bamugamba nti Tulirinnyira mu luguudo: bwe tunaanywanga ku mazzi go, nze n'ebisibo byange, kale n'awanga omuweado gwago: ka mpitemu buyisi n'ebigere. 
4_20_20_N'agamba nti Toli yitamu. Edomu n'amutabaala n'eggye lingi, n'omukono ogw'amaanyi. 
4_20_21_Bw'atyo Edomu n'agaana okuyisa Isiraeri mu nsalo ye Isiraeri kyeyava akyuka okuva gy'ali. 
4_20_22_Ne basitula e Kadesi ne batambula: abaana ba Isiraeri, ekibiiaa kyonna, ne batuuka ku lusozi Koola. 
4_20_23_Mukama n'agambira Musa ne Alooni ku lusozi Koola, ku nsalo yensi ya Edomu, ng'ayogera 
4_20_24_nti Alooni anaakuŋŋaanyizibwa eri abantu be: kubanga taliyingira mu nsi gye mpadde abaana ba Isiraeri, kubaaga mwajeemera ekigambo kyange ku mazzi ag'e Meriba. 
4_20_25_Twala Alooni ne Eriyazaali mutabaai we, obalinnyise ku lusozi Koola: 
4_20_26_Alooni omwambuleko ebyambalo bye, obimwambaze Eriyazaali mutabani we: kale Alooni anaakuŋŋaanyizibwa eri abantu be, era aaaafiira eyo. 
4_20_27_Musa n'akola nga Mukama bwe yalagira: ne balinnya ku lusozi Koola mu maaso g'ekibiina kyonna. 
4_20_28_Musa n'ayambula Alooni ebyambalo bye, n'abyambaza Eriyazaali mutabani we; Alooni n’afiira eyo ku ntikko y'olusozi: Musa ne Eriyazaali ne baserengeta ne bava ku lusozi. 
4_20_29_Awo ekibiina kyonna bwe baalaba nga Alooni afudde, ne bamala ennaku asatu nga bakaabira Alooni, ennyumba ya Isiraeri yonna. 
4_21_1_N'Omukanani, kabaka w’e Yaladi, eyatuulanga mu bukiika obwa ddyo, n'awulira nga Isiraeri ajja mu kkubo lya Asalimu; n'alwanane Isiraeri n'awamba abamu ku bo. 
4_21_2_Isiraeri ne yeeyama obweyamo eri Mukama, n'agamba nti Bw'onoogabulira ddala abantu bano mu mukono gwange, ndizikiririza ddala ebibuga byabwe. 
4_21_3_Mukama n'awulira eddoboozi lya Isiraeri, n'agabula Abakanani; ne babazikiririza ddala bo n'ebibuga byabwe: ekifo ne kituumibwa erinnya lyakyo Kolutna. 
4_21_4_Ne basitula okuva ku lusozi Koola ne bagenda mu kkubo ery'Ennyanja Emmyufu, okwetooloola ensi ya Edomu: obulamu bw'abantu ae buketlgentererwa nnyo olw'olugendo. 
4_21_5_Abantu ne boogera bubi ku Katonda ne ku Musa, nti Mwatuggira ki mu Misiri okutulinnyisa okufiira mu ddungu? kubanga tewali kyakulya, so tewali mazzi; n'obulamu bwaffe butamiddwa ekyokulya kino ekyangu. 
4_21_6_Mukama n'asindikira abantu emisota egy'omuliro, ne giruma abantu; abantu bangi ne bafa ku Isiraeri. 
4_21_7_Abantu ne bajja eri Musa ne bagamba nti Twonoonye kubanga twayogera obubi ku Mukama ne ku ggwe; saba Mukama atuggyeko emisota. Musa n'asabira abantu. 
4_21_8_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Weekolere omusota ogw'omuliro, oguteeke ku mulongooti: awo olunaatuuka, buli alumiddwa bw'anaagulaba, anaaba mulamu. 
4_21_9_Musa n'akola omusota ogw'ekikomo, n'aguteeka ku mu, longooti: awo olwatuuka amusota bwe gwabanga gulumye omuntu yenna, bwe yatunuulira omusota ogw'ekikomo, n'aba mulamu. 
4_21_10_Abaana ba Isiraeri ne batambula ne basiisira mu Obosi. 
4_21_11_Ne basitula e Obosi ne batambula ne basiisira mu Iyeabalimu, mu ddungu eryolekera Mowaabu, ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba. 
4_21_12_Ne bavaayo, ne batambula, ne basiisira mu kiwonvu kya Zeredi. 
4_21_13_Ne bavaayo ne batambula ne basiisira emitala wa Alunoni, oguli mu ddungu, ogusibuka mu nsalo y'Abamooli: kubanga Alunoni ye nsalo ya Mowaabu, wakati wa Mowaabu n'Aba mooli. 
4_21_14_Kyekyava kyogerwa mu kitabo eky'Entalo za Mukama nti Vakebu mu Sufa N'ebiwonvu bya Alunoni, 
4_21_15_N'ebikko eby'ebiwonvu Ebiserengetera eri eanyumba za Ali, Era ebyesigama ku nsalo ya Mowaabu. 
4_21_16_Ne bavaayo ne batambula ne bagenda e Beeri: olwo lwe luzzi Mukama lwe yabuulirako Musa nti Kutltlaanya abantu, nange naabawaamazzi. 
4_21_17_Isiraeri n'alyoka ayimba oluyimba luno: Weesere, ggwe oluzzi; muluyimbire; 
4_21_18_Oluzzi abakulu lwe baasima, Abakungu b'abaatu lwe baayerula, N'omuggo ogw'obwakabaka, n'emiggo gyabwe. Ne bava mu ddungu ne batambula ne bagenda e Matana: 
4_21_19_ne basitula e Matana ne bagenda e Nakalieri: ne basitula e Nakalieri ne bagenda e Bamosi: 
4_21_20_ne basitula e Bamosi ne bagenda mu kiwonvu ekiri ku ttale lya Mowaabu, ku ntikko ya Pisuga, kw'oyima okulengera eddungu. 
4_21_21_Isiraeri n'atuma ababaka eri Sikoni kabaka w'Abamoli ng'ayogera nti 
4_21_22_Ka mpite mu nsi yo: tetulikyamira mu nnimiro newakubadde mu lusuku Iw'emizabbibu; tetulinywa ku mazzi ga nzizi: tulitambulira mu luguudo lwa kabaka, okutuusa lwe tuliyita mu nsalo yo. 
4_21_23_Sikoni n'ataganya Isiraeri kuyita mu nsalo ye naye Sikoni n'akuŋŋaanya abantu be boana, n'atabaala Isiraeri mu ddungu, n'atuuka e Yakazi: n'alwana ne Isiraeri. 
4_21_24_Isiraeri n'amukuba n'obwogi bw'ekitala, n'alya ensi ye okuva ku Alunoni okutuuka ku Yaboki, okutuuka ku baana ba Amotu: kubanga ensalo ey'abaana ba Amoni yali ya maanyi. 
4_21_25_Isiraeri n'alya ebibuga ebyo byonna: Isiraeri n'atuula mu bibuga byonna eby'Abamoli, mu Kesuboni ne mu bibuga byakyo byonna. 
4_21_26_Kubanga Kesuboni kyali kibuga kya Sikoiu kabaka w'Abamoli, eyalwana ne kabaka wa Mowaabu eyasooka, n'aggya mu mukono gwe ensi yanna, okutuuka ku Alunoni. 
4_21_27_Aboogerera mu ngero kyebaava boogera nti Mujje e Kesuboni, Ekibuga kya Sikono kizimbibwe kinywezebwe: 
4_21_28_Kubanga omuliro gufulumye mu Kesuboni, Ennimi z'omuliro mu kibuga kya Sikoni: Gwokezza Ali ekya Mowaabu, Abakungu ab'ebifo ebigulumivu ebya Alunoni. 
4_21_29_Zikusanze, Mowaabu! Mufudde, mmwe abantu ba Kemosi : Agabudde batabani be okuba abadduse, Ne bawala be okuba abasibe, Eri Sikoni kabaka w'Abamoli. 
4_21_30_Twabasimbako; Kesuboni kyazikirira okutuuka ku Diboni, Era twazisa okutuuka ku Nofa, Ekituuka ku Medeba. 
4_21_31_Isiraeri n'atuula bw'atyo mu nsi y'Abamoli. 
4_21_32_Musa n'atuma okuketta Yazeri, ne balya ebibuga byayo, ne bagobamu Abamoli abaali eyo. 
4_21_33_Ne bakyuka ne bambukira mu kkubo ly'e Basani: Ogi kabaka We Basani n'abatabaala, ye n'abantu be bonna okulwanira nabo e Derei. 
4_21_34_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Tomutya: kubaaga mmugabudde mu mukono gwo, n'abantu be bonna, n'ensi ye; era olimukola nga bwe wakola Sikoni kabaka w'Abamoli, eyatuulanga e Kesuboni. 
4_21_35_Awo ne bamutta ne batabani be, n'abantu be boana, ne watamusigalirawo n'omu: ne balya ensi ye. 
4_22_1_Abaana ba Isiraeri ne batambula ne basiisira mu nsenyi za Mowaabu emitala wa Yoludaani e Yeriko. 
4_22_2_Awo Balaki mutabani wa Zipoli n'alaba byonna Isiraeri bye yali akoze Abamoli. 
4_22_3_Mowaabu n'atya nnyo abantu, kubanga bangi: Mo. waabu n'akeŋŋentererwa olw'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_22_4_Mowaabu n'agamba abakadde ba Midiyaani nti Kaakano ekibiina kino kigenda kukombera ddala byonna ebitwetoolodde, ng'ente bw'ekomba omuddo ogw'oku ttale. Era Balaki mutabani wa Zipoli ye yali kabaka wa Mowaabu mu biro ebyo 
4_22_5_N’atuma ababaka eri Balamu mutabani wa Byoli, e Pesoli, ekiri ku lubalama lw'Omugga, mu nsi y'abaana b'abantu be, okumuyita ng'ayogera nti Laba, waliwo abantu abaava mu Misiri: laba, basaanikidde ku maaso g'ensi, era batudde okunjolekera: 
4_22_6_kale nno jjangu, nkwegayiridde, onkolimirire abantu bano: kubanga bannyinze amaanyi: mpozzi ndiwangula, tubatte, mbagobe mu nsi: kubanga mmanyi nga gw'osabira ggwe omukisa aweebwa omukisa, ne gw'okolimira akolimirwa. 
4_22_7_Abakadde ba Mowaabu n'abakadde ba Midiyaani ne bagenda nga balina omukemba mu agalo zaabwe; ne bajja eri Balamu, ne bamubuulira ebigambo bya Balaki. 
4_22_8_N'abagamba nti Musule waao ekiro kino, nange ndibaddiza ebigambo nga Mukama bw'nagriamba: abakulu ba Mowaabu ne babeera ewa Balamu. 
4_22_9_Katonda n'ajja eri Balamu n'agamba nti Bantu ki bano abali naawe? 
4_22_10_Balamu n'agamba Katonda nti Balaki mutabani wa Zipoli kabaka wa Mowaabu, yaatumira ng'ayogera nti 
4_22_11_Laba, abantu abaava mu Misiri basaanikidde ku maaso g'ensi: Jjangu nno, obankolimirire; mpozzi ndiyinza okulwana aabo, ne mbagoba. 
4_22_12_Katonda a'agamba Balamu nti Togenda nabo; tokolimira bantu abo: kubanga baweereddwa omukisa. 
4_22_13_Balamu n'agolokoka enkya, n'agamba abakulu ba Balaki nti Mwegeadere mu nsi yammwe: kubanga Mukama agaanyi okundagira okugenda nammwe. 
4_22_14_Abakulu ba Mowaabu ne bagolokoka, ne baddayo eri Balaki, ne bagamba nti Balamu agaanyi okujja naffe. 
4_22_15_Balaki ne yeeyongera nate okutuma abakulu, abaasinga abo obungi era abaabasinga n'ekitiibwa. 
4_22_16_Ne bajja eri Balamu ne bamugamba nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Balaki mutabani wa Zipoli nti Waleme okubaawo ekintu, nkwegayiridde, ekinaakuziyiza okujja gye ndi: 
4_22_17_kubanga ndikukuza n'obeera n'ekitiibwa kinene nnyo, na buli ky'olingamba ndikikola: kale jjangu, egayiridde, onkolimirire abantu bano 
4_22_18_Balamu n’addamu n’agamba abaddu ba Balaki nti Balaki bw’alimpa ennyumba ye ng’ejjudde effeeza ne zaabu, siyinza kuyita ku kigambo kya Mukama Katonda wange, okukendeezaako oba okusukkiriza. 
4_22_19_Kale nno, mbeegayiridde nammwe musule wano ekiro kino, ndyoke mmanye Mukama ky'aneeyongera okumbuulira. 
4_22_20_Katonda n’ajja eri Balamu ekiro, n'amugamba nti Abantu abo oba nga bazze okukuyita, golokoka ogende nabo; naye ekigambo kyokka kye nkubuulira ky'oba okola. 
4_22_21_Balamu n'agolokoka enkya n'ateeka amatandiiko ku ndogoyi ye, n'agenda n'abakulu ba Mowaabu. 
4_22_22_Obusungu bwa Katonda ne bubuubuuka kubanga yagenda: malayika wa Mukama n'ayimirira mu kkubo okumuziyiza. Era yali yeebagadde ku ndogoyi ye, n'abaddu be bombi baali naye. 
4_22_23_Endogoyi n'eraba malayika wa Mukama ng'ayimiridde mu kkubo, ekitala kye nga kisowoddwa nga kiri mu ngalo ze: endogoyi n'ekyama okuva mu kkubo, n'egenda ku nsiko: Balamu n'akuba endogoyi okugizza mu kkubo. 
4_22_24_Malayika wa Mukama n'alyoka ayimirira mu kkubo ery'omu kiwonvu eriri wakati w'ensuku z'emizabbibu olukomera nga luli ku luuyi, n'olukomera ku luuyi. 
4_22_25_Endogoyi n'eraba malayika wa Mukama, ne yeenyigiriza ku lukomera, a'ebetenta ekigere kya Balamu ku lukomera: n'agikuba nate. 
4_22_26_Malayika wa Mukama ne yeeyongera okusembera eyo, n'ayimirira mu kkubo ery'akanyigo, awataali bbanga lya kukyukira ku mukono ogwa ddyo newakubadde ogwa kkono. 
4_22_27_Endogoyi n'eraba malayika wa Mukama, n'egalamira wansi wa Balamu: obusungu bwa Balamu ne bubuubuuka, n'akuba endogoyi n'omuggo gwe. 
4_22_28_Mukama n'ayasamya akamwa k'endogoyi, n'egamba Balamu nti Nkukoze ki ggwe okunkuba emirundi gino gyonsatule? 
4_22_29_Balamu n'agamba endogoyi nti Kubanga onduulidde: singa mbadde n'ekitala mu ngalo zange, kaakano nandikusse. 
4_22_30_Endogoyi n'egamba Balamu nti Siri ndogoyi yo, gye weebagalako obulamu bwo bwonna okutuusa leero? nali mpisizza okukukola bwe ntyo? N'agamba nti Nedda. 
4_22_31_Awo Mukama n'alvoka azibula amaaso ga Balamu, n'alaba malayika wa Mukama ng'ayimiridde mu kkubo, ekitala kye nga kisowoddwa nga kiri mu ngalo ze: n'akutama omutwe gwe, n'avuunama amaaso ge. 
4_22_32_Malayika wa Mukama n'amugamba nti Okubidde ki endogoyi yo emirundi gino gyonsatule? laba, nfulumye okukuziyiza, kubanga okutambula kwo kukakanyavu mu maaso gange. 
4_22_33_Endogoyi n'endaba n'ekyuka mu maaso gange emirundi gino gyonsatule: singa tekyuse mu maaso gange, kaakano sandiremye kukutta ggwe, nayo ne ngiwonya okufa. 
4_22_34_Balamu n'agamba malayika wa Mukama nti Nnyonoonye; kubanga saamanye ng'oyimiridde mu kkubo okunziyiza: kale kaakano, oba nga kikunyiiza, naddayo nate. 
4_22_35_Malayika wa Mukama n'agamba Balamu nti Genda n'abantu abo: naye ekigambo kyokka kye naaakubuulira ky'oba oyogera. Awo Balamu n'agenda n'abakulu ba Balaki. 
4_22_36_Awo Balaki bwe yawulira nga Balamu azze, n'afuluma okumusisinkana mu Kibuga kya Mowaabu, ekiri ku nsalo ya Alunoni, oguli ku nkomerero y'ensalo. 
4_22_37_Balaki n'agamba Balamu nti Saakutumira okukuyita ne nkutayirira? ekyakulobera okujja gye ndi ki? siyinza ddala kukukuza n'obeera n'ekitiibwa? 
4_22_38_Balamu n'agamba Balaki nti Laba, nzize gy'oli: kaakano naina obuyinza bwonna okwogera ekigambo lryonna? ekigambo Katonda ky'anaateeka mu kamwa kange, ekyo kye nnaayogera. 
4_22_39_Balamu n’agenda ne Balaki, ne bajja e Kiriasikuzosi 
4_22_40_Balaki n'awaayo ente n'endiga, n'atumiza Balamu n'abakulu abaali naye. 
4_22_41_Awo olwatuuka enkya, Balaki n’atwala Balamu, n'amulinnyisa ku bifo ebigulumivu ebya Baali, n'ayima eyo okulengera enkomerero y'abantu. 
4_23_1_Balamu n'agamba Balaki nti 
4_23_2_Balaki n'akola nga Balamu bwe yayogera; Balaki ne Balamu ne baweerayo ku buli kyoto ente n'endiga ennume. 
4_23_3_Balamu n'agamba Balaki nti Yimirira awaliekyo kebwa kw'owaayo nange naagenda; mpozzi Mukama anajja okusisinkana: era buli ky'anandaga naakikubuulira. N'agenda ku lusozi aweeru 
4_23_4_Katonda n'asisinkana ne Balamu: n’amugamba nti Ntegese ebyoto omusanvu, era mpeereddeyo ente n'endiga ennume ku buli kyoto. 
4_23_5_Mukama n'ateeka ekigambo mu kamwa ka Balamu, n'agamba nti Ddayo eri Balaki, era bw'otyo bw'onooyogera. 
4_23_6_Na’ddayo eri ye, era yali ayimiridde awali ekyokebwa kye yawaayo, ye n'abakulu bonna aba Mowaabu. 
4_23_7_N'agera olugero lwe, n'ayogera nti Balaki yanziya mu Alamu Kabaka wa Mowaabu yanziya mu nsozi ez'Ebuvanjuba: Jjangu okolimirire Yakobo, Era jjangul osoomoze Isiraeri. 
4_23_8_Naakolimira ntya oyo Katonda gw'atakolimiranga Naasoomoza ntya oyo Katonda gw'atasoora ozanga? 
4_23_9_Kubanga nnyima ku ntikko y'amayinja okumulaba, Ne ku nsozi okumulengera: Laba, be bantu ababeera bokka, So tebalibalibwa mu mawanga. 
4_23_10_Ani ayinza okubala enfuufa ya Yakobo, Oba okubala ekitundu eky'okuna ekya Isiraeri? Nfe ng'omutuukirivu bw'afa, N’enkomerero yange ey'oluvannyuma ebe ng'eyiye! 
4_23_11_Balaki n'agamba Balamu nti Onkoze ki? Nkututte okukolimira abalabe bange, era, laba, obasabiridde ddala omukisa 
4_23_12_N'addamu n'agamba nti Tekiŋŋwanira kwekuuma kwogera ekyo Mukama kyateeka kamwa kange? 
4_23_13_Balaki n'amugamba nti Jjangu nange, nkwegayiridde, mu kifo ekirala, w’oyinza okuyima okubalengera; onoolaba ekitundu kyabwe eky’enkomerero kyokka, n'otolaba bonna: n’oyima awo okubaokubakolimira 
4_23_14_N'amutwala mu ttale lya Zofimu, ku ntikko ya Pisuga, n'azimba ebyoto musanvu, n’aweerayo ente n'endiga ennune ku buli Kyoto. 
4_23_15_N'agamba Balaki nti Yimirira wano awali ekyokebwa ky'owaayo, nze nga bwe nnaasisinkana ne Mukama eyo. 
4_23_16_Mukama n'asisinkana ne Balamu, n'ateeka ekigambo mu kamwa ke, n'agamba nti Ddayo eri Balaki, era bw'onooyogera bw'otyo. 
4_23_17_N'ajja gy'ali, era, laba, yali ayimiridde awali ekyokebwa kye yawaayo, n'abakulu ba Mowaabu wamu naye. Balaki n'amugamba nti Mukama ayogedde ki? 
4_23_18_N'agera olugero lwe n'ayogera nti Golokoka, Balaki, owulire; Ntegera okutu, ggwe mutabani wa Zipoli: 
4_23_19_Katoada si muntu, okulimba; So si mwana wa muntu, okwejjusa: Ayogedde, n'okukola talikikola? Oba agambye, n'okutuusa talikituusa? 
4_23_20_Laba, ndagiddwa okuwa omukisa: Naye awadde omukisa, nange siyinza kugujjulula. 
4_23_21_Talabye butali buruukirivu ku Yakobo, So talabye bubambaavu ku Isiraeri: Mukama Katonda we ali naye, N'okwogerera waggulu okwa kabaka kuli mu bo. 
4_23_22_Katonda abaggya mu Misiri; Alina amaanyi ag'ag'embogo. 
4_23_23_Mazima tewali ddogo awali Yakobo, So tewali bulaguzi awali Isiraeri: Kaakano kinaayogerwanga ku Yakobo ne ku Isiraeri, Nti Katonda ng'akoze! 
4_23_24_Laba, abantu bagolokoka ng'empologoma enkazi Era beeyimusa ag'empologoma ennume: Taagalamire okutuusa lw'anaalya ku muyiggo, N'anywa omusaayi gw'abo abattiddwa. 
4_23_25_Awo Balaki n'agamba Balamu nti Tobakolimiranga n'akatono, so n'omukisa tobasabiranga mukisa n'akatono. 
4_23_26_Naye Balamu n'addamu n'agamba Balaki nti Saakubuulira nti Byonna Mukama by'ayogera, ebyo kiŋŋwanira okubikola? 
4_23_27_Balaki n'agamba Balamu nti Jjangu nno, aaakutwala awalala; mpozzi Katonda anaasiima ggwe okuyima eyo okubankolimirira. 
4_23_28_Awo Balaki n'alinnyisa Balamu ku ntikko ya Peoli, kw'oyima okulengera eddungu. 
4_23_29_Balamu n'agamba Balaki nti Nzimbira wano ebyoto musanvu, ontegekere waao ente musanvu n'endiga ennume musanvu. 
4_23_30_Balaki n'akola nga Balamu bwe yayogera, n’aweerayo ku buli kyoto ente n'endiga ennume. 
4_24_1_Awo Balamu bwe yalaba nga Mukama asiimye okuwa Isiraeri omukisa, n'atageada, ng'olulala, okunoonya eddogo, naye n'ayolekeza amaaso ge olukoola. 
4_24_2_Balamu n'alyimusa amaaso ge, n'alaba Isiraeri nga batudde ag'ebika byabwe bwe byali; omwoyo gwa Katonda ne gumujjako. 
4_24_3_N'agera olugero lwe, n'ayogera nti Balamu, mutabani wa Byoli, ayogera, Era omusajja eyazibwa amaaso ayogera: 
4_24_4_Ayogera oyo awulira ebigambo bya Katonda, Alaba okwolesebwa kw'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna, Ng'agwa wansi, n’amaaso ge nga gatunula: 
4_24_5_Nti Eweema zo nga naungi, ggwe Yakobo, Ennyuniba zo, ggwe Isiraeri 
4_24_6_Zeeyaliiridde ng'ebiwoavu, Ng'ensuku eziri ku lubalama lw'omugga, Ng'emiti egy'omugavu Mukama gye yasimba, Ng'emiti emyerezi egiri ku lubalama lw'amazzi. 
4_24_7_Amazzi ganaakulukutanga okuva mu nsuwa ze. N'ensigo ze zinaabanga awali amazzi amangi, Ne kabaka we anaasinganga Agagi obugulumivu, N'obwakabaka bwe bunaagulumizibwanga. 
4_24_8_Katonda amuggya mu Misiri; Alina amaanyi ng'ag'embogo. Aliriira ddala amawanga abalabe be, Era alimenyamenya amagumba gaabwe, N'abakuba okubafumita n'obusaale bwe. 
4_24_9_Yabwama, yagalamira ng'empologoma ennume, Era ng'empologoma enkazi; ani anaamusaggula? Aweebwenga omukisa buli anaakusabiranga omukisa, Era akolimirwenga buli anaakukolimiranga. 
4_24_10_Awo obusungu bwa Balaki ne bubuubuukira Balamu, n'akuba mu ngalo: Balaki n'agamba Balamu nti Nakuyita okukolimira abalabe bange, era, laba, obasabiridde ddala omukisa emirundi gino gyonsatule. 
4_24_11_Kale nno dduka oddeyo ewuwo: mbadde njagala okukukuza obeere n'ekitiibwa kingi nnyo; naye, laba, Mukama akuziyizizza okuba n'ekitiibwa. 
4_24_12_Balamu n'agamba Balaki nti Era saagamba n'ababaka bo be wantumira 
4_24_13_nti Balaki bw'alyagala okumpa ennyumba ye ng'ejjudde effeeza n'ezaabu, siyinza kuyita ku kigambo kya Mukama, okukola ebirungi newakubadde ebibi, nga nnyima mu magezi gange nze; Mukama ky'anaayogera nange kye nnaayogera? 
4_24_14_Era kaakano, laba, ŋŋenda eri abantu bange: jjangu nkutegeeze abantu bano bye balikola abantu bo mu nnaku ez'oluvannyuma. 
4_24_15_N'agera olugero lwe, n'ayogera nti Balamu mutabani wa Byoli ayogera, Era omusajja eyazibwa amaaso ayogera: 
4_24_16_Oyo ayogera awulira ebigambo bya Katonda. Era amanyi okumanya kw'oyo ali waggulu ennyo, Alaba okwolesebwa kw'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna, Ng'agwa wansi, n'amaaso ge nga gatunula: 
4_24_17_Nti Mmulaba, naye si kaakano: Mmutunuulira, naye tandi kumpi: Muliva emmunyeenye mu Yakobo, N'omuggo ogw'obwakabaka guliyimuka mu Isiraeri, Gulikubira ddala ensonda za Mowaabu, Gulimenyera ddala abaana bonna ab'oluyoogaano. 
4_24_18_Kale Edomu aliba butaka, Era ne Seyiri aliba butaka, abaali abalabe be; Isiraeri ng'akola eby'obuzira. 
4_24_19_Era muliva mu Yakobo omu aliba n'okufuga, Alizikiriza abalifikkawo mu kibuga. 
4_24_20_N'atunuulira Amaleki, n'agera olugero lwe n'ayogera nti Amaleki yali wa lubereberye mu mawanga; Naye enkomerero ye ey'oluvannyuma erituuka mu kuzikirira. 
4_24_21_N'atunuulira Omukeeni, n'agera olugero lwe n'ayogera nti Ekifo kyo eky'okutuulamu kya maanyi, N'ekisu kyo kyateekebwa ku lwazi. 
4_24_22_Naye Kayini alinyagibwa, Okutuusa Asuli lw'alikutwala mu busibe. 
4_24_23_N'agera olugero lwe, n'ayogera nti Zitusanze, ani aliba omulamu Katonda bw'alikola kino? 
4_24_24_Naye ebyombo biriva ku ttale ly'e Kittimu, Biribonereza Asuli, biribonereza ne Eberi, Era naye alituuka mu kuzikirira. 
4_24_25_Balamu n'agolokoka, n'agenda n'addayo uiu kifo kye: ne Balaki n'addayo. 
4_25_1_Isiraeri n'abeera e Sitimu, abantu ne batanula okwenda ku bawala ba Mowaabu: 
4_25_2_kubanga baayitanga abantu okujja ku ssaddaaka za bakatonda baabwe; abantu ne balya ne bavuunamira bakatonda baabwe. 
4_25_3_Isiiaeri ne yeegatta ne Baalipyoli: obusungu bwa Niukama ne bubuubuuka ku Isiraer 
4_25_4_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Twala abakulu b'abantu bonna, obawanikire Mukama mu maaso g'enjuba ekiruyi kya Mukama kikyuke kive ku Isiraeri. 
4_25_5_Musa n'agamba abalamuzi ba Isiraeri nti Mutte muntu abasajja be abeegasse ne Baalipyoli. 
4_25_6_Era, laba, omu ku baana ba Isiraeri n'ajja n’aleetera baganda be emukazi Omumidiyaani mu maaso ga Musa ne mu maaso g'ekibiina kyonna eky’abaana ba Isiraeri, bwe baali nga bakaabira amaziga ku mulyango gw’eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
4_25_7_Awo Finekaasi mutabani Eriyazaali mutabani wa Alooni kabona bwe yakiraba, n'agolokoka wakati mu kibiina, n'addira effumu mu mukono gwe 
4_25_9_N'abo abaafa kawumpuli baali obukumi bubiri mu enkumi nnya. 
4_25_10_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_25_11_Finekaasi mutabani wa Eriyazaali mutabani wa Alooai kabona akyusizza obusungu bwange okuva ku baana ba Isiraeri, kubanga akwatiddwa obuggya bwange mu bo, n'okuzikiriza ne sizikiriza baana ba Isiraeri mu buggya bwange. 
4_25_12_Kyoaoova ogamba nti Laba, mmuwa endagaano yange ey'emirembe: 
4_25_13_era eneebanga gy'ali, n'eri ezzadde lye erinaamuddiriranga, endagaano ey'obwakabona obutaliggwaawo; kubanga yakwatibwa obuggya olwa Katonda we, n'atangirira abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_25_14_Era omusajja Omuisiraeri eyattibwa, eyattirwa awamu n'omukazi Omumidiyaani, erinnya lye Zimuli, mutabani wa Salu, omukulu w'ennyumba ya bakitaabwe mu Basimyoni. 
4_25_15_N'omukazi Omumidiyaani eyattibwa, erinnya lye Kozebi muwala wa Zuuli; oyo yali mutwe gw'abantu ab'omu nnyumba ya bakitaabwe mu Midiyaani. 
4_25_16_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_25_17_Beeraliikirize Abamidiyaani obatte: 
4_25_18_kubanga babeeraliikiriza n'enkwe zaabwe, ze baasala ne babasendasenda mu bigambo bya Pyoli ne mu bigambo bya Kozebi, muwala w'omukulu wa Midiyaani, mwannyinaabwe, eyattibwa ku lunaku olwa kawumpuli olw'ebigambo bya Pyoli. 
4_26_1_Awo olwatuuka kawumpuli ng'awedde, Mukama n'agamba Musa ne Eriyazaali mutabani wa Alooni kabona nti 
4_26_2_Bala omuwendo gw'ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, bonna abayinza okutabaala mu Isiraeri. 
4_26_3_Musa ne Eriyazaali kabona ne babagambira mu nsenyi za Mowaabu ku Yoludaani e Yeriko nti 
4_26_4_Mubale omuwendo gw'abantu, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo; nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa n'abaana ba Isiraeri, abaava mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
4_26_5_Lewubeeni omubereberye wa Isiraeri: batabani ba Lewubeeai; okuva ku Kanoki, enda ey'Abakanoki: okuva ku Palu, enda eya Abapalu: 
4_26_6_okuva ku Kezulooni, enda eya Bakezulooni: okuva ku Kalumi, enda eya Bakalumi. 
4_26_7_Ezo ze nda eza Balewubeeni: n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi buna mu enkumi ssatu mu lusanvu mu asatu. 
4_26_8_Ne batabani ba Palu; Eriyaabu. 
4_26_9_Ne batabani ba Eriyaabu; Nemweri ne Dasani ne Abiraamu. Abo be Dasani ne Abiraamu abo, abaalondebwa ekibiina, abaawakana ne Musa ne Alooni mu kibiina kya Koola, bwe baawakana ne Mukama: 
4_26_10_ensi n'eyasama akamwa kaayo, n'ebamira wamu ne Koola, ekibiina ekyo bwe kyafa; mu biro ebyo omuliro bwe gwayokya abasajja ebikumi bibiri mu ataano, ne bafuuka kabonero. 
4_26_11_Naye batabani ba Koola tebaafa. 
4_26_12_Batabani ba Simyoai ag'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Nemweri, enda eya Banemweri: okuva ku Yamini, enda eya Bayamini: okuva ku Yakini, enda eya Bayakini: 
4_26_13_okuva ku Zeera, enda eya Bazeera: okuva ku Sawuli, enda eya Basawuli. 
4_26_14_Ezo ze nda eza Basimyoni, obukumi bubiri mu enkumi bbiri mu bibiri. 
4_26_15_Batabani ba Gaadi ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Zefoni, enda eya Bazefoni: okuva ku Kagi, enda eya Bakagi: okuva ku Suni, enda eya Basuni: 
4_26_16_okuva ku Ozeni, enda eya Baozeni: okuva ku Eri, enda eya Baeri: 
4_26_17_okuva ku Alodi, enda eya Baalodi: okuva ku Aleri, enda eya Baaleri: 
4_26_18_ezo ze nda eza batibani ba Gaadi ng'abo abaabalibwa ku bo bwe baali, obukumi buna mu bitaano. 
4_26_19_Batabani ba Yuda, Eri ne Onani: Eri ne Onani ne bafiira mu nsi ya Kanani. 
4_26_20_Ne batabani ba Yuda ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali bano; okuva ku Seera, enda eya Baseera: okuva ku Pereezi, enda eya Bapereezi: okuva ku Zeera, enda eya Bazeera. 
4_26_21_Ne batabani ba Pereezi bano; okuva ku Kezulooni, enda eya Bakezulooni okuva ku Kamuli, enda eya Bakamuli. 
4_26_22_Ezo ze nda za Yuda ng'abo abaabalibwa ku bo bwe baali, obukumi musanvu mu kakaaga mu bitaano. 
4_26_23_Batabani ba Isakaali ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Tola, enda eya Batola: okuva ku Puva, enda eya Bapuva: 
4_26_24_okuva ku Yasubu, enda eya Bayasubu: okuva ku Simuloni, enda eya Basimuloni. 
4_26_25_Ezo ze nda za Isakaali ng'abo abaabalibwa ku bo bwe baali, obukumi mukaaga mu enkumi nnya mu bisatu. 
4_26_26_Batabani ba Zebbulooni ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Seredi, enda eya Baseredi: okuva ku Eroni, enda eya Baeroni: okuva ku Yaleeti, enda eya Bayaleeri. 
4_26_27_Ezo ze nda eza Bazebbulooni ng'abo abaabalibwa ku bo bwe baali, obukumi mukaaga mu bitaaao. 
4_26_28_Batabani ba Yusufu ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: Manase ne Efulayimu 
4_26_29_Batabani ba Manase: okuva ku Makiri, enda eya Bamakiri: Makiri n'azaala Gireyaadi: okuva ku Gireyasdi, enda eya Bagireyaadi. 
4_26_30_Bano be batabaru ba Gireyaadi: okuva ku Yezeeri, enda eya Bayezeeri: okuva ku Kereki, enda eya Bakereki: 
4_26_31_n'okuva ku Asuliyeri, enda eya Basuliyeri: n'okuva ku Sekemu, enda eya Basekemu: 
4_26_32_n'okuva ku Semida, enda eya Basemida: n'okuva ku Keferi, enda eya Bakeferi. 
4_26_33_Ne Zerofekadi mutabani wa Keferi teyazaala baana ba bulenzi, wabula ab'obuwala: ne bawala ba Zerofekadi amannya gaabwe Maala ne Toowa, Kogula, Mirika, ne Tiruza. 
4_26_34_Ezo ze nda za Manase: n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi butaano mu enkumi bbiri mu lusanvu. 
4_26_35_Bano be batabani ba Efulayimu ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Susera, enda eya Basusera: okuva ku Bekeri, enda eya Babekeri: okuva ku Takani, enda eya Batakani. 
4_26_36_Ne bano be batabani ba Susera: okuva ku Erani, enda eya Baerani. 
4_26_37_Ezo ze nda za batabani ba Efulayimu ng'abo abaabalibwa ku bo bwe baali, obukumi busatu mu enkumi bbiri mu bitaano. Abo be batabani ba Yusufu ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali. 
4_26_38_Batabani ba Benyamiai ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Bera, enda eya Babera: okuva ku Asuberi, enda eya Basuberi: okuva ku Akiramu, enda eya Bakiramu: 
4_26_39_okuva ku Sufamu, enda eya Basufamu: okuva ku Kufamu, enda eya Bakufamu. 
4_26_40_Ne batabani ba Bera baali Aluda ne Naamani: oknva ku Aluda, enda eya Baluda: okuva ku Naamaai, enda eya Banaamani. 
4_26_41_Abo be batabani ba Benyamini ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi buna mu enkumi ttaano mu lukaaga. 
4_26_42_Bano be batabani ba Ddaani ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Sukamu, enda eya Basukamu. Ezo ze nda za Ddaani ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali. 
4_26_43_Enda zonna eza Basukamu, ng'abo abaabalibwa ku bo bwe baali, baali obukumi mukaaga mu enkumi nnya mu bina. 
4_26_44_Batabani ba Aseri ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Imuna, enda eya Baimuna: okuva ku Isuvi, enda eya Baisuvi: okuva ku Beriya, enda eya Baberiya. 
4_26_45_Okuva ku batabani ba Beriya: okuva ku Keberi, enda eya Bakeberi: okuva ku Malutciyeeri, enda eya Bamalukiyeeri. 
4_26_46_Ne muwala wa Aseri erinnya lye Seera. 
4_26_47_Ezo ze nda eza batabani ba Aseri ag'abo abaabalibwa ku bo bwe baali, obukumi butaano mu enkumi ssatu mu bina. 
4_26_48_Batabani ba Nafutaali ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Yazeeri, enda eya Bayazeeri: okuva ku Guni, enda eya Baguni: 
4_26_49_okuva ku Yezeeri, enda eya Bayezeeri: okuva ku Siremu, enda eya Basiremu. 
4_26_50_Ezo ze nda za Nafutaali ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: n'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi buna mu enkumi ttaano mu bina. 
4_26_51_Abo be baabalibwa ku baaaa iba Isiraeri, obusiriivu mukaaga mu lukumi mu lusanvu mu asatu. 
4_26_52_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_26_53_nti Abo be baligabirwa ensi okuba obusika ng'omuwendo gw'amannya bwe guli. 
4_26_54_Abayinga obungi olibawa obusika okusukkiriza, n’abatono olibawa obusika okukendeezaako: buli muntu ng'abo abaabalibwa ku ye bwe baali, bw'aliweebwa bw'atyo obusika bwe. 
4_26_55_Era naye ensi erigabibwa aa bululu: ng'amannya g'ebika bya bakitaabwe bwe gali bwe balisika. 
4_26_56_Ng'obululu bwe buliba obusika bwabwe bwe buligabirwa abo abayinga obungi n'abatono. 
4_26_57_Ne bano be baabalibwa ku Baleevi ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali: okuva ku Gerusoni, enda eya Bagerusoni: okuva ku Kokasi, enda eya Bakokasi: okuva ku Merali, enda eya Bamerali. 
4_26_58_Zino ze nda za Leevi: enda eya Balibuni, enda eya Bakebbulooni, enda eya Bamakuli, enda eya Bamusi, enda eya Bakoola. Kokasi n'azaala Amulaamu. 
4_26_59_Ne mukazi wa Amulaamu erinnya lye Yokebedi, muwala wa Leevi, eyazaalirwa Leevi mu Misiri: n'azaalira Amulaamu Alooni ne Musa ne Miryamu mwanayinaabwe. 
4_26_60_Alooni n'azaalirwa Nadabu ne Abiku, Eriyazaali ne Isamaali. 
4_26_61_Nadabu ne Abiku ne bafa, bwe baawaayo omuliro omulala mu maaso ga Mukama. 
4_26_62_N'abo abaabalibwa ku bo baali obukumi bubiri mu enkumi ssatu, buli musajja eyaakamala omwezi ogumu n'okukirawo: kubanga tebaabalibwa mu baana ba Isiraeri, kubanga tebaaweebwa busika mu baana ba Isiraeri. 
4_26_63_Abo be baabalibwa Musa ne Eriyazaali kabona; abaabalira abaana ba Isiraeri mu nsenyi za Mowaabu ku Yoludaani e Yeriko. 
4_26_64_Naye mu abo temwali a'omu ku abo abaabalibwa Musa ne Alooni kabona; abaabalira abaana ba Isiraeri mu ddungu lya Sinaayi. 
4_26_65_Kubanga Mukama yali ayogedde ku bo nti Tebalirema kufiira mu ddungu. So tewaasigalawo ku bo n'omu wabula Kalebu mutabani wa Yefune ne Yoswa mutabani wa Nuni. 
4_27_1_Awo ne wasembera bawala ba Zerofekadi, mutabani wa Keferi, mutabani wa Gireyaadi, mutabani wa Makiri, mutabani wa Manase, ab'oku nda za Manase mutabani wa Yusufu: ne gano ge mannya ga bawala be; Maala, Noowa ne Kogula ne Mirika ne Tiruza. 
4_27_2_Ne bayimirira mu maaso ga Musa ne mu maaso ga Eriyazaali kabona ne mu maaso g'abakulu a'ekibiina kyonna, ku mulyango gw'eweema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, nga boogera nti 
4_27_3_Kitaffe yafiira mu ddungu, so teyali mu kibiina ky'abo abeekuŋŋaanyiza ku Mukama mu kibiina kya Koola: naye yafiira mu kibi kye ye; so teyazaala baana ba bulenzi. 
4_27_4_Ekinaaba kiggisaawo ki erinnya lya kitaffe ku nda ye, kubanga teyazaala mwana wa bulenzi? Mutuwe obutaka mu baganda ba kitaffe. 
4_27_5_Musa n'atwala ensonga yaabwe mu maaso ga Mukama. 
4_27_6_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_27_7_Bawala ba Zerofekadi boogera bya nsonga: tolirema kubawa butaka bwa busika mu baganda ba kitaabwe; era olibasisa obusika bwa kitaabwe. 
4_27_8_Era onoogamba abaana ba Isiraeri nti Omusajja bw'anaafanga nga tazadde mwana wa bulenzi, kale muwala we munaamusisanga obusika bwe. 
4_27_9_Era bw'anaabanga talina mwana wa buwala, kale munaawanga baganda be obusika bwe. 
4_27_10_Era bw'anaabanga talina ba luganda, kale munaawanga baganda ba kitaawe obusika. 
4_27_11_Era kitaawe bw'anaabanga talina ba luganda, kale munaawanga obutaka bwe oyo amuli okumpi mu luganda ku nda ye, naye anaabulyanga: era linaabanga eri abaana ba Isiraeri tteeka lya musango, nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_27_12_Awo Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Linnya ku lusozi luno Abalimu, olengere ensi gye mpadde abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_27_13_Kale bw'onoomala okugirengera, naawe olikutlgaanyizibwa eri abantu bo, nga Alooni muganda wo bwe yakutl0aanyizibwa: 
4_27_14_kubanga mwajeemera ekigambo kyange mu ddungu Zini, mu kuwakana kw'ekibiina, okuntukuliza ku mazzi mu maaso gaabwe. (Ago ge mazzi ag'e Meriba e Kadesi mu dduagu Zini.) 
4_27_15_Musa n'agamba Mukama nti 
4_27_16_Mukama, Katonda w'emyoyo gya bonna abalina emibiri, alonde omusajja okufuga ekibiina, 
4_27_17_anaafulumanga mu maaso gaabwe, era anaayingiranga mu maaso gaabwe, era anaabafulumyanga, era anaabayingizanga; ekibiinal kya Mukama kireme okuba ng'endiga ezitalina musumba. 
4_27_18_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Twala Yoswa mutabani wa Nuni, omusajja alina omwoyo, omuteekeko omukono gwo; 
4_27_19_omuyimirize mu maaso ga Eriyazaali kabona ne mu maaso g'ekibiina kyonna; omukuutirire mu maaso gaabwe. 
4_27_20_Era onoomuteekako ku kitiibwa kyo, ekibiina kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri bawulirenga. 
4_27_21_Era anaayimiriranga mu maaso ga Eriyazaali kabona, anaamubuulizanga olw'omusango gwa Ulimu mu maaso ga Mukama: banaafulumanga lwa kigambo kye, era banaayingiranga lwa kigambo kye, ye n'abaana ba Isiraeri bonna wamu naye, ekibiina kyonna. 
4_27_22_Musa n'akola nga Mukama bwe yamulagira: n'atwala Yoswa, n'amuyimiriza mu maaso ga Eriyazaali kabona, ne mu maaso g'ekibiina kyonna: 
4_27_23_n'amuteekako emikono, n'amukuutira, nga Mukama bwe yayogera n'omukono gwa Musa. 
4_28_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_28_2_Lagira abaana ba Isiraeri obagambe nti Ekirabo kyange, ebyange ebyokulya olw'ebyange ebiweebwayo ebikolebwa n'omuliro, eby'ewumbe eddungi gye ndi, munaakwatanga okubiwaayo gye ndi mu ntuuko zaabyo. 
4_28_3_Era onoobagamba nti Kino kye kiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro kye munaawangayo eri Mukama; abaana b'endiga abalume abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema, buli lunaku babiri, okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo. 
4_28_4_Omwana gw'endiga ogumu onoowangayo enkya, n'omwana gw'endiga omulala onoowangayo akawungeezi 
4_28_6_Ekyo kye kiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, ekyalagirwa ku lusozi Sinaayi okuba ewumbe eddungi, ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama. 
4_28_7_N'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako kinaabanga kitundu kya kuna kya ini olw'omwana gw'endiga ogumu: mu watukuvu mw'onoofukiranga ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekika eri Mukama. 
4_28_8_N'omwana gw'endiga ogw'okubiri onoowangayo akawungeezi: ng'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako bwe biri, bw'onoogiwangayo bw'otyo, okuba ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, eky'evvumbe eddungi eri Mukama. 
4_28_9_Ne ku ssabbiiti abaana b'endiga babiri abalume abatannasnala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema, n'ebitundu eby'ekkumi bibiri ebya efa ey'obutta obulungi okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta, obutabuddwamu amafuta, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako: 
4_28_10_ekyo kye kiweebwayo ekya buli ssabbiiti, obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_28_11_Era emyezi gyammwe we ginaasookeranga munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eri Mukama, ente envubuka bbiri, n'endiga ennume emu, abaana b'endiga abalume musanvu abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema; 
4_28_12_n'ebitundu eby'ekkumi bisaru ebya efa ey'obutta obulungi okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta, obutabuddwamu amafuta, olwa buli nte; n'ebitundu eby'ekkumi bibiri eby'obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta olw'endiga emu; 
4_28_13_n'ekitundu ekirala eky'ekkumi eky'obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta okuba ekiweebwayo eky'obutta olwa buli mwana gw'endiga; okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eky'ewumbe eddungi, ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama. 
4_28_14_N'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako binaabanga kitundu kya ini ey'envinnyo olw'ente, n'ekitundu eky'okusatu eky'ekibya olw'endiga etmume, n'ekitundu eky'okuna ekya ini olw'omwana gw'endiga: ekyo kye kiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekya buli mwezi okumalako emyezi egy'omwaka. 
4_28_15_N'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi eri Mukama; eneeweebwangayo era n'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_28_16_Era mu mwezi ogw'olubereberye, ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'ekkumi n'ennya, wanaabangawo Okuyitako kwa Mukama. 
4_28_17_Ne ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ettaano olw'omwezi ogwo wanaabangawo embaga: emigaati egitazimbulukuswa ginaaliirwanga ennaku musanvu. 
4_28_18_Ku lunaku olw'olubereberye wanaabangawo okukuxnaana okutukuvu; temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono: 
4_28_19_naye munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eri Mukama; ente envubuka bbiri, n'endiga ennume emu, n'abaana b'endiga abalume musanvu abatannamala mwaka gumu: banaabanga gye muli abataliiko bulema: 
4_28_20_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta: munaawangayo ebitundu eby'ekkumi bisatu olw'ente, n'ebituadu eby'ekkumi bibiri olw'endiga ennume; 
4_28_21_onoowangaye ekitundu ekirala eky'ekkumi olwa buli mwana gw'endiga ku baana b'endiga omusanvu; 
4_28_22_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, okubatangirira. 
4_28_23_Munaawangayo ebyo era n'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eky'enkya, ekinaabanga ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitali ggwaawo. 
4_28_24_Bwe mutyo bwe munaawangayo buli lunaku, okumalako ennaku musanvu, ekyokulya eky'ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, eky'evvumbe eddungi eri Mukama: kinaaweebwangayo era n'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, n ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_28_25_Ne ku lunaku olw'omusanvu mutiaabanga n'okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu; tmukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono. 
4_28_26_Era ne ku lunaku olw'ebibala ebibereberye, bwe munaawangayo ekiweebwayo eky'obutta 'obuggya eri Mukama mu mbaga yammwe eya ssabbiiti, kale munaabanga n'okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu; temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono: 
4_28_27_naye munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa okuba ewumbe eddungi eri Mukama; ente envubuka bbiri, endiga ennume emu, abaana b'endiga abalume musanvu abatannamala mwaka gumu; 
4_28_28_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta, ebitundu eby'ekkumi bisatu olwa buli nte, ebitundu eby'ekkumi bibiri olw'endiga ennume emu, 
4_28_29_ekitundu ekirala eky'ekkumi olwa buli mwana gw'endiga ku baana b'endiga omusanvu; 
4_28_30_embuzi ennume emu okubatangirira. 
4_28_31_Obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako, munaawangayo n'ebyo (binaabanga gye muli ebitaliiko bulema), n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako. 
4_29_1_Ne mu mwezi ogw'omusanvu ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi, munaabanga n'okukuggaana okutukuvu; temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono: lwe lunaku olw'okufuuyirako amakondeere gye muli. 
4_29_2_Era munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa okuba ewumbe eddungi eri Mukama; ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, abaana b'endiga abalume omusanvu abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_3_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amaifuta, ebitundu eby'ekkumi bisatu olw'ente, ebitundu eby'ekkumi bibiri olw'endiga ennume, 
4_29_4_n'ekitundu eky'ekkumi kimu olwa buli mwana gw'endiga ku baana b'endiga omusanvu: 
4_29_5_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, okubatangirira: 
4_29_6_obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eky'omwezi ogwakajja guboneke, n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako, ng'etteeka lyabyo bwe liri, okuba evvumbe eddungi, ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro eri Mukama. 
4_29_7_Ne ku lunaku olw'ekkumi olw'omwezi ogwo ogw'omusanvu munaabanga n'okukuŋŋaana okutuikuvu; era munaabonerezanga obulamu bwammwe; temukolanga mulimu gwonna: 
4_29_8_naye munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eri Mukama okuba evvumbe eddungi; ente envubuka emu, endiga ennume emu, abaana b'endiga abalume musanvu abatannamala mwaka gumu; banaabanga gye muli abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_9_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta, ebitundu eby'ekkumi bisatu olw'ente, ebitundu eby'ekkumi bibiri olw'endiga ennume emu, 
4_29_10_ekitundu ekirala eky'ekkumi olwa buli mwana gw'endiga ku baana b'endiga omusanvu: 
4_29_11_embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; obutassaako ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi eky'okutangirira, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ebiweebwayo ebyokuaywa ebyako. 
4_29_12_Ne ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ettaano olw'omwezi ogw'omusanvu munaabanga n'okukunnaana okutukuvu; temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono, era munaakwatiranga embaga ennaku musanvu eri Mukama: 
4_29_13_era munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, eky'ewunibe eddungi eri Mukama; ente envubuka kkumi na ssatu, endiga ennume bbiri, abaana b'endiga abalume kkumi na bana abatannamala mwaka gumu; banaabanga abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_14_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, obutta obulungi obutabuddwamu amafuta, ebitundu eby'ekkumi bisatu olwa buli nte ku nte ekkumi n'essatu, ebituadu eby'ekkumi bibiri olwa buli ndiga ennume ku ndiga ennume zombi, 
4_29_15_n'ekitundu ekirala eky'ekkumi olwa buli mwana gw'endiga ku baana b'endiga ekkumi n'abana: 
4_29_16_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; obutassaako' ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_29_17_Ne ku lunaku olw'okubiri munaawangayo ente envubuka kkumi na bbiri, endiga ennume bbiri, abaana b'endiga abalume kkumi na bana abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_18_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako olw'ente, olw'endiga ennume, n'olw'abaana b'endiga, ng'omuwendo gwabyo bwe gunaabanga, ng'etteeka bwe liri: 
4_29_19_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako. 
4_29_20_Ne ku lunaku olw'okusatu ente kkumi n'emu, endiga enntune bbiri, abaana Wendiga abalume kkumi aa bana abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema; 
4_29_21_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako olw'ente, olw'endiga ennume, n'olw'abaana b'endiga, ng'omuweado gwabyo bwe gunaabanga, ng'etteeka bwe liri: 
4_29_22_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_29_23_Ne ku lunaku olw'okuna ente kkumi, endiga ennume bbiri, abaana Wendiga abalume kkumi na bana abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_24_ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako a'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako olw'ente, olw'endiga ennume, n'olw'abaana b'endiga, ng'omuwendo gwabyo bwe gunaabanga, ng'etteeka bwe liri: 
4_29_25_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_29_26_Ne ku lunaku, olw'okutaano ente mwenda, endiga ennume bbiri, abaana b'endiga abalume kkumi na bana abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_27_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako olw'ente, olw'endiga ennume, n'olw'abaana b'endiga, ng'omuwendo gwabyo bwe gunaabanga, ng'etteeka bwe liri: 
4_29_28_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_29_29_Ne ku lunaku olw'omukaaga ente munaaaa, endiga ennume bbiri, abaana Wendiga abalume kkumi na bana abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_30_n'eluweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako olw'ente, olw'endiga enaume, n'olw'abaana b'endiga, ng'omuwendo gwabyo bwe gunaabanga, ng'etteeka bwe liri: 
4_29_31_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; obutassaako eluweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako. 
4_29_32_Ne ku lunaku olw'omusanvu ente musanvu, endiga enaume bbiri, abaana Wendiga abalume kkumi na bana abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_33_n'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako olw'ente, olw'endiga eanume, n'olw'abaana b'endiga, ng'omuwendo gwabyo bwe gunaabanga, ng'etteeka bwe liri: 
4_29_34_n'embuzi enaume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi; obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaliggwaawo, eldwcebwayo eky'obutta ekyaho, n'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_29_35_Ku lunaku olw'omunaana munaabanga n'okukuŋŋaana okw'okwewombeeka: temukolanga mulimu gwonna ogw'emikono: 
4_29_36_naye munaawangayo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, ekiweebwayo ekikolebwa n'omuliro, elry'ewumbe eddungi en Mukama: ente emu, endiga ennume emu, abaana Wendiga abalume musanvu abatannamala mwaka gumu abataliiko bulema: 
4_29_37_ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako n'ebiweebwayo ebyokunywa ebyako olw'ente, olw'endiga ennume, n'olw'abaana b'eadiga, binaabanga ag'omuwendo gwabyo, ng'etteeka bwe liri: 
4_29_38_n'embuzi ennume emu okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi: obutassaako ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa elutaliggwaawo, n'eluweebwayo eky'obutta ekyako, a'ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa ekyako. 
4_29_39_Ebyo bye munaawangayo eri Mukama mu mbaga zammwe ezaalagirwa, obutassaako bweyamo bwammwe, n'ebyo bye muwaayo ku bwammwe, okuba bye muwaayo ebyokebwa, ne bye muwaayo eby'obutta, ne bye muwaayo ebyokunywa, ne bye muwaayo olw'emirembe. 
4_29_40_Musa n’abuulira abaana ba Isiraeri nga byonna bwe byali Mukama bye yalagira Musa. 
4_30_1_Musa n'agamba emitwe gy'ebika by'abaana ba Isiraeri nti Kino kye kigambo Mukama ky'alagidde. 
4_30_2_Omusajja bw'aneeyamanga obweyamo eri Mukama, oba bw'anaalayiranga ekirayiro okulagaanya obulamu bwe n'endagaano, tavumisanga kigambo kye; anaakolanga nga byonna bwe biri ebifuluma mu kamwa ke. 
4_30_3_Era omukazi bw'aneeyamanga obweyamo eri Mukama, ne yeeragaanya n'endagaano, ng'ali mu anyumba ya kitaawe, mu buto bwe 
4_30_5_Naye kitaawe bw'anaamugaananga ku lunaku lw'awulirirako; tewabangawo ku bweyamo bwe newakubadde ku ndagaano ze, ze yalagaanya obulamu bwe, eneenyweranga: era Mukama anaamusonyiwanga kubanga lutaawe yamugaana. 
4_30_6_Era bw'anaabanga alina bba, obweyamo bwe nga buli ku ye, oba emimwa gye bye gyogera ng'aYanguyiriza, by'alagaanyizza obulamu bwe 
4_30_8_Naye bba bw'anaamugaananga ku lunaku lw'akiwulirirako; kale anajjululanga obweyamo bwe obuli ku ye, n'emimwa gye bye gyogedde ng'ayanguyirizza, by'alagaanyizza obulamu bwe: era Mukama anaa musonyiwanga. 
4_30_9_Naye obweyamo bwa nnamwandu oba bw'oyo eyagobebwa bba, buli kye yalagaanya obulamu bwe, kinaanyweranga ku ye. 
4_30_10_Era oba nga yeeyamira obweyamo mu nnyumba ya bba, oba yalagaanya obulamu bwe n'endagaano ng'alayira, 
4_30_11_bba n'akiwulira n'amusirikira n'atamugaana; kale obweyamo bwe bwonna bunaanyweranga, na buli ndagaano gye yalagaanya obulamu bwe eneenyweranga. 
4_30_12_Naye bba oba nga yabidibya ku lunaku lwe yabiwulirirako; kale buli ekyafuluma mu mimwa gye mu bigambo by'obweyamo bwe oba mu bigambo by'endagaano y'obulamu bwe tekinyweranga: bba ng'abijjuludde; era Mukama auaamusonyiwanga. 
4_30_13_Buli bweyamo na buli kirayiro eky'endagaano eky'okwebonereza obulamu bwe, bba ayinza okukinyweza, oba bba ayinza okukijjulula. 
4_30_14_Naye bba bw'anaamusirikiriranga ddala bulijjo bulijjo; kale anaanywezanga obweyamo bwe bwonna, oba endagaano ze zonna eziri ku ye: ng'abinywezezza, kubanga yamusirikira ku lunaku lwe yabiwulirirako. 
4_30_15_Naye bw'anaabidibyanga n'gamaze okubiwulira; kale ye anaabangako obutali butuukirivu bw'omukazi. 
4_30_16_Ago ge mateeka Mukama ge yalagira Musa, wakati w'omusajja ne mukazi we, wakati wa kitaawe w'omuwala ne muwala we, ng'akyali mu buto bwe, mu nnyumba ya kitaawe. 
4_31_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_31_2_Woolera eggwanga ly'abaana ba Isiraeri ku Bamidiyaani; oluvannyuma olyoke okuŋŋaanyizibwe eri abantu bo. 
4_31_3_Musa n'agamba abantu nti Muggye mu mmwe abasajja mubawe eby'okulwanyisa olw'entalo, batabaale Midiyaani, okuwoolera eggwanga lya Mukama ku Midiyaaai. 
4_31_4_Munaggya ku buli kika lukumi okubunya ebika byonna ebya Isiraeri, ne mubatuma okutabaala. 
4_31_5_Awo ne baleeta ku nkumi za Isiraeri, ku buli kika lukumi, kakumi mu enkumi bbiri nga balina ebyokulwanyisa olw'entalo. 
4_31_6_Musa n'abasindika okutabaala, ku buli kika lukumi, bo ne Finekaasi mutabani wa Eriyazaali kabona, okutabaala, awamu n'ebintu eby'omu watukuvu n'amakondeere agalawa mu mukono gwe. 
4_31_7_Ne balwana ne Midiyaani, nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa; ne batta buli musajja. 
4_31_8_Ne batta bakabaka ba Midiyaani wamu n'abalala abattibwa; Evi ne Lekemu, ne Zuuli, ne Kuula, ne Leeba, bakabaka ba Midiyaani abataano: ne Balamu mutabani wa Byoli baamutta n'ekitala. 
4_31_9_Abaana ba Isiraeri ne banyaga abakazi ba Midiyaaai n'abaana baabwe abato; n'ebisibo byabwe byonna, n'embuzi zaabwe zonna, n'ebintu byabwe byonna ne babitwala okuba omunyago. 
4_31_10_N'ebibuga byabwe byonna mu bifo mwe baasulanga, n'ensiisira zaabwe zonna, ne babyokya omuliro. 
4_31_11_Ne batwala omunyago gwonna ne bye baafuna byonna, oba nga bantu oba nga nsolo. 
4_31_12_Ne baleeta omwandu ne bye baafuna n'omunyago eri Musa n'eri Eriyazaali kabona a'eri ekibiina ky'abaana ba Isiraeri, eri olusiisira olwali mu nsenyi za Mowaabu, eziri ku Yoludaani e Yeriko. 
4_31_13_Awo Musa ne Eriyazaali kabona n'abakulu bonna ab'ekibiina ne bafuluma okubasisinkana ebweru w'olusiisira. 
4_31_14_Musa n'asuguwalira abaami b'eggye, abaami b'enkumi n'abaami b'ebikumi, abaava mu kuweereza mu lutabaalo. 
4_31_15_Musa n'abagamba nti Abakazi bonna mubawonyezza okufa?
