4_31_16_Laba, bano be baasobesa abaana ba Isiraeri ku Mukama, olw'okuteesa kwa Balamu, mu bigambo bya Peoli, bw'atyo kawumpuli n'aba mu kibiina kya Mukama. 
4_31_17_Kale ano kaakano mutte buli musajja ku baana abato, era mutte buli mukazi eyamanya omusajja ng'asula naye. 
4_31_18_Naye abaana abato ab'obuwala, abatamanyanga musajja nga basula naye, mubeewonyeze obutafa. 
4_31_19_Era musiisire ebweru w'olusiisira ennaku musanvu: buli eyatta omuntu yenna, era buli eyakoma ku muntu yenna eyattibwa, mwerongoose ku lunaku olw'okusatu ne ku lunaku olw'omusanvu, mmwe n'omwandu gwammwe. 
4_31_20_Na buli kyambalo na buli kintu eky'eddiba, n'omulimu gwonna ogw'ebikuzzi by'embuzi, n'ebintu byonna eby'emiti, muneerongoosa. 
4_31_21_Eriyazaali kabona n'agamba abasajja abatabaazi abaatabaala nti Lino lye tteeka ery'ekiragiro Mukama ky'alagidde Musa: 
4_31_22_naye zaabu ne ffeeza, ekikomo, ekyuma, ebbaati, n'erisasi, 
4_31_23_buli kintu ekiyinza omuliro, munaakiyisa mu muliro, ne kiba kirongoofu; naye kinaalongoosebwa n'amazzi ag'okwawula: n'ebyo byonna ebitayinza muliro munaabiyisa mu mazzi. 
4_31_24_Era mulyoza engoye zammwe ku lunaku olw'omusanvu, ne muba balongoofu, oluvannyuma ne mulyoka muyingira mu lusiisira. 
4_31_25_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_31_26_Bala omuwendo gw'omunyago ogwanyagibwa, abantu ' era n'ensolo, ggwe ne Eriyazaali kabona n'emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe ez'ekibiina: 
4_31_27_mwawulemu omunyago ebitundu bibiri; eky'abasajja abamanyi entalo abaatabaala, n'eky'ekibiina kyonna: 
4_31_28_omusolooleze Mukama omusolo ku basajja abatabaazi abaatabaala: buli bitaano obulamu bumu, ku bantu ne ku nte ne ku ndogoyi ne ku mbuzi: 
4_31_29_omusolooleze Mukama omusolo ku basajja abatabaazi abaatabaala: buli bitaano obulamu bumu, ku bantu ne ku nte ne ku ndogoyi ne ku mbuzi: 
4_31_30_Ne ku kitundu eky'abaana ba Isiraeri onoggyako obumu obuggibwa ku buli ataano, ku bantu, ku nte, ku ndogoyi, ne ku mbuzi, ku nsolo zonna, n'obuwa Abaleevi, abakuuma ennyumba ya Mukama gye baateresebwa. 
4_31_31_Musa ne Eriyazaali kabona ne bakola nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_31_32_N'eby'okugereka ebyafikkawo ku munyago abasajja abatabaazi gwe baanyaga, byali endiga obusiriivu mukaaga mu obukumi musanvu mu enkumi ttaano, 
4_31_33_n'ente obukumi musanvu mu enkumi bbiri, 
4_31_34_n'endogoyi obukumi mukaaga mu lukumi, 
4_31_35_n'abantu obukumi busatu mu enkumi bbiri okugatta bonna, ku bakazi abatamanyanga musajja nga basula naye. 
4_31_36_abatamanyanga musajja nga basula naye. 
4_31_37_n'omusolo gwa Mukama ogw'oku ndiga gwali lukaaga mu nsanvu mu ttaano. 
4_31_38_N'ente zaali obukumi busatu mu kakaaga; ku ezo omusolo gwa Mukama gwali nsanvu mu bbiri. 
4_31_39_N'endogoyi zaali obukumi busatu mu bitaano; ku ezo omusolo gwa Mukama gwali nkaaga mu emu. 
4_31_40_N'abantu baali kakumi mu kakaaga; ku abo omusolo gwa Mukama gwali abantu asatu mu babiri. 
4_31_41_Musa n'awa Eriyazaali kabona omusolo, kye kyali ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa ekya Mukama, nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_31_42_Musa n'aggya ku kitundu eky'abaana ba Isiraeri, Musa kye yayawula ng'akiggya ku basajja abaatabaala, 
4_31_43_(era ekitundu eky'ekibiina kyali endiga obusiriivu busatu mu obukumi busatu mu kasanvu mu bitaano, 
4_31_44_n'ente obukumi busatu mu kakaaga, 
4_31_45_n'endogoyi obukumi busatu mu bitaano, 
4_31_46_n'abantu kakumi mu kakaaga;) 
4_31_47_ku kitundu eky'abaana ba Isiraeri Musa n'aggya obulamu bumu obnggibwa ku buli ataano, ku bantu era ne ku nsolo, n'abiwa Abaleevi abaakuumanga. ennyumba ya Mukama gye baateresebwa; nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa. 
4_31_48_N'abaami abaatwala enkumi ez'omu ggye, abaami b'enkumi n'abaami b'ebikumi, ne basemberera Musa: 
4_31_49_ne bagamba Musa nti Abaddu bo babaze omuwendo gw'abasajja abatabaazi be tutwala, so tekubuzeeko muntu n'omu ku ffe. 
4_31_50_Era tuleese ekirabo kya Mukama, buli muntu ky'afunye, ebyobuyonjo ebya zaabu, emikuufu egy'oku magulu, n'emisagga, empeta eziriko obubonero n'ez'omu matu, n'ebikomo, okutangirira obulamu bwaffe mu maaso ga Mukama 
4_31_51_Musa ne Eriyazaali kabona ne babaggyako ezaabu, ebyobuyonjo 'byonna ebiweese. 
4_31_52_Ne zaabu yonna ey'ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa kye baawaayo eri Mukama; nga bagiggya ku baami b'enkumi ne ku baami b'ebikumi, yali sekeri kakumi mu kakaaga mu lusanvu mu ataano. 
4_31_53_(Kubanga abasajja abatabaazi; baali beenyagidde ebintu, buli mu'ntu ebibye.) 
4_31_54_Musa ne Eriyazaali kabona ne batwala ezaabu ey'abaami b'enkumi n'ab'ebikumi, ne bagireeta mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, okuba nga ekijjukizo eri abaana ba Isiraeri mu maaso ga Mukama. 
4_32_1_Abaana ba Lewubeeni n'abaana ba Gaadi baalina ensolo nnyingi nnyo nnyini: awo bwe baalaba ensi ya Yazeri, n'ensi ye Gireyaadi, nga, laba, ekifo ekyo kifo kya nsolo 
4_32_3_Atalisi ne Diboni ne Yazeri ne Nimula ne Kesuboni ne Ereale ne Sebamu ne Nebo ne Beoni, 
4_32_4_ensi Mukama gye yakuba mu maaso g'ekibiina kya Isiraeri, ensi ya asolo, n'abaddu bo balina ensolo. 
4_32_5_Ne boogera nti Oba nga tulabye ekisa mu maaso go, ensi eao eweebwe abaddu bo okuba obutaka; totusomosa Yoludaani. 
4_32_6_Musa n'agamba abaana ba Gaadi n'abaana ba Lewubeeni nti Baganda bammwe banaatabaala, mmwe nga mutudde wano? 
4_32_7_Era kiki ekibakeŋŋenterezesa omwoyo gw'abaana ba Isiraeri obutasomoka okuyingira mu nsi Mukama gye yabawa? 
4_32_8_Bakitammwe bwe baakola bwe batyo bwe nnabatuma nga nnyima e Kadesubanea okulaba ensi. 
4_32_9_Kubanga bwe baayambuka mu kiwonvu e Esukoli, ne balaba ensi, ne bakeŋŋentereza omwoyo gw'abaana ba Isiraeri, baleme okuyingira mu nsi Mukama gye yali abawadde. 
4_32_10_Obusungu bwa Mukama ne bubuubuuka ku lunaku luli, n'alayira ng'agunba nti 
4_32_11_Mazima tewaliba ku basajja abaalinnya okuva mu Misiri, abaakamaze emyaka abiri n'okukirawo, abaliraba ensi gye nnalayirira Ibulayimu, Isaaka ne Yakobo; kubanga tebangobere redde ddala: 
4_32_12_wabula Kalebu mutabani wa Yefune Omukenizi ne Yoswa mutabani wa Nuni: kubanga abo bagobereredde ddala Mukama. 
4_32_13_Obusungu bwa Mukama ne bubuubuuka ku Isiraeri, n'abatambulizatambuliza eyo n'eyo mu ddungu emyaka ana, okutuusa ezzadde lyonna abaali bakoze obubi mu maaso ga Mukama lwe baazikirira. 
4_32_14_Era, laba, mmwe muyimiridde mu kifo kya bakitammwe, okwala okw'abantu abalina ebibi, okwongera nate ekiruyi kya Mukama eri Isiraeri. 
4_32_15_Kubanga bwe munaakyuka obutamugoberera, anaabaleka nate omulundi ogw'okubiri mu ddungu nammwe munaazikiriza abantu bano bonna. 
4_32_16_Ne bamusemberera ne bagamba nti Tunaazimbira ensolo zaffe ebiraalo wano, n'ebibuga olw'abaana baffe abato: 
4_32_17_naye ffe bennyini tuliba nga tweteeseteese nga tukutte ebyokulwanyisa okukulembera abaana ba Isiraeri okutuusa lwe tulimala okubayingiza mu kifo kyabwe: n’abaana baffe abato balituula mu bibuga ebiriko enkomera olw'abo abatuula mu nsi. 
4_32_18_Tetulikomawo mu nnyumba zaffe, okutuusa abaana ba Isiraeri lwe balimala okusikira buli muntu obusika bwe. 
4_32_19_Kubanga tetulisikira wamu nabo emitala wa Yoludaani n'okweyongerayo; kubanga obusika bwaffe butugwiridde emitala w'eno ewa Yoludaani ebuvanjuba. 
4_32_20_Musa n'abagamba nti Bwe munaakola ekigambo ekyo; bwe munaakwata ebyokulwanyisa okukulembera Mukama okutabaala, 
4_32_21_na buli musajja ku mmwe alina ebyokulwanyisa bw'anaasomoka Yoludaani mu maaso ga Mukama, okutuusa lw'aligobera ddala abalabe be mu maaso ge, 
4_32_22_ensi n'ewangulwa mu maaso ga Mukama: awo oluvaanyuma ne mulyoka mukomawo, ne mutabaako musango eri Mukama n'eri Isiraeri; n'ensi eno eneebanga butaka gye muli mu maaso ga Mukama. 
4_32_23_Naye bwe mutaakole bwe mutyo, laba, nga mwonoonye Mukama: era mute,geerere ddala ng'okwonoona kwammwe kulibayigga. 
4_32_24_Muzimbire abaana bammwe abato ebibuga, n'ebiraalo olw'endiga zammwe; era mukole elcyo ekifulwnye mu kammwa kammwe. 
4_32_25_Abaana ba Gaadi n'abaaaa ba Lewubeeni ne bagamba Musa nti Abaddu bo banaakola nga mukama wange bw'alagidde. 
4_32_26_Abubaffe abato, bakazi baffe, embuzi zaffe, n'ensolo zaffe zonaa binaabeera eyo mu bibuga eby'e Gireyaadi: 
4_32_27_naye abaddu bo banaasomoka, buli musajja alina ebyokulwanyisa olw'entalo, mu maaso ga Mukama okutabaala, mukama wange bw'ayogedde. 
4_32_28_Awo Musa n'alagira Eriyazaali kabona ebigambo byabwe ne Yoswa mutabani wa Nuni n'emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe ez'ebika by'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
4_32_29_Musa n'abagamba nti Abaana ba Gaadi n'abaana ba Lewubeeni bwe balisomoka Yoludaani awamu nammwe, buli musajja alina ebyokulwanyisa olw'entalo, mu maaso ga ivtukama, ensi n'ewangulwa mu maaso gammwe; kale mulibawa ensi y'e Gireyaadi okuba obutaka: 
4_32_30_naye, bwe batalikkiriza kusomoka wamu nammwe nga bakutte ebyokulwanyisa, baliba n'obutaka mu mmwe mu nsi ya Kanani. 
4_32_31_Abaana ba Gaadi n'abaana ba Lewubeeni ne baddamu nti Nga Mukama bw'agambye abaddu bo, bwe tutyo bwe tunaakola. 
4_32_32_Tunaasomoka nga tukutte ebyokulwanyisa mu maaso ga Mukama okuyingira mu nsi ya Kanani, era obutaka obw'obusika bwaffe bulibeera naffe emitala wa Yoludaani. 
4_32_33_Musa n'abawa bo, abaana ba Gaadi n’abaana ba Lewubeeni, n'ekitundu ky'ekika kya Manase mutabani wa Yusufu, obwakabaka bwa Sikoni kabaka w'Abamoli n'obwakabaka bwa Ogi kabaka w'e Basani, ensi ng'ebibuga byayo bwe byali wamu n'ensalo zaabyo, bye bibuga eby'omu nsi eriraanyeewo. 
4_32_34_Abaana ba Gaadi ne bazimba Diboni ne Atalosi ne Aloweri; 
4_32_35_ne Aterosisofani ne Yazeri ne Yogubeka; 
4_32_36_ne Besunimira ne Besukalaani: ebibuga ebiriko enkomera n'ebisibo by'endiga. 
4_32_37_Abaana ba Lewubeeni ne bazimba Kesuboni ne Ereale ne Kiriyasayimu; 
4_32_38_ne Nebo ne Baalumyoni, (nga bawaanyisizza amannya gaabyo), ne Sibima: ne babituuma amannya amalala ebibuga bye baazimba. 
4_32_39_Abaana ba Makiri mutabani wa Manase ne bagenda e Gireyaadi, ne bakirya, ne bagobamu Abamoli abaali omwo. 
4_32_40_Musa n'awa Makiri mutabani wa Manase Gireyaadi; n'abeera omwo. 
4_32_41_Yayiri mutabani wa Manase n'agenda n'alya ebibuga byayo, n'abiyita Kavosuyayiri. 
4_32_42_Noba n'agenda n'alya Kenasi, n'ebyalo byakyo, n'akituuma Noba, ng'erinnya lye ye bwe lyali. 
4_33_1_Bino bye biramago eby'abaana ba Isiraeri, bwa baava mu nsi y'e Misiri ng'eggye lyabwe bwe lyali wansi w'omukono gwa Musa ne Alooni. 
4_33_2_Musa n'awandiika okusitula kwabwe ng'ebiramago byabwe bwe byali olw'ekiragiro kya Mukama: era bino bye biramago byabwe ng'okusitula kwabwe bwe kwali. 
4_33_3_Ne basitula e Lamesesi mu mwezi ogw'olubereberye, ku lunaku olw'eklcumi a'ettaano olw'omwezi ogw'olubereberye; ku lw'enkya Okuyitako nga kuwedde abaana ba Isiraeri ne bavaayo n'omukono ogwagulumizibwa mu maaso g'Abamisiri bonna, 
4_33_4_Abamisiri bwe baali nga bakyaziika ababereberye baabwe bonna Mukama be yakuba mu bo: ne ku bakatonda baabwe Mukama n'awalana emisango. 
4_33_5_Abaana ba Isiraeri ne basitula e Lamesesi, ne basiisira e Sukkosi. 
4_33_6_Ne basitula e Sukkosi, ne basiisira e Yesamu, ekiri ku mabbali g'eddungu. 
4_33_7_Ne basitula e Yesamu ne badda ennyuma okntuuka e Pikakirosi, ekyolekera Baalizefoni: ne basiisira okwolekera Migudooli. 
4_33_8_Ne basitula e Kakirosi, ne bayita wakati mu nnyanja ne bayingira mu ddungu: ne batambula olugendo olw'ennaku ssatu mu ddungu ery'e Yesamu, ne basiisira mu Mala. 
4_33_9_Ne basitula e Mala ne batuuka e Erimu: era mu Erimu waaliwo ensulo z'amazzi kkumi na bbiri, n'enkindu nsanvu; ne basiisira eyo 
4_33_10_Ne basitula e Erimu, ne basiisira ku Nnyanja Emmyufu. 
4_33_11_Ne basitula okuva ku Nnyanja Emmyufu, ne basiisira mu ddungu Sini. 
4_33_12_Ne basitula okuva mu ddungu Sini, ne basiisira e Dofuka. 
4_33_13_Ne basitula e Dofuka, ne basiisira e Yalusi. 
4_33_14_Ne basitula e Yalusi, ne basiisira e Lefidimu, awataali mazzi abantu okunywa. 
4_33_15_Ne basitula e Lefidimu, ne basiisira mu ddungu lya Sinaayi. 
4_33_16_Ne basitula okuva mu ddungu lya Sinaayi, ne basiisira e Kiberosukataava. 
4_33_17_Ne basitula e Kiberosukataava, ne basiisira e Kazerosi. 
4_33_18_Ne basitula e Kazerosi, ne basiisira e Lisuma. 
4_33_19_Ne basitula e Lisuma, ne basiisira e Limoniperezi. 
4_33_20_Ne basitula e Limoniperezi, ne basiisira e Libuna. 
4_33_21_Ne basitula e Libuna, ne basiisira e Lisa. 
4_33_22_Ne basitula e Lisa, ne basiisira e Kekerasa. 
4_33_23_Ne basitula e Kekerasa, ne basiisira ku lusozi Seferi. 
4_33_24_Ne basitula okuva ku lusozi Seferi, ne basiisira e Kalada. 
4_33_25_Ne basirula e Kalada, ne basiisira e Makerosi. 
4_33_26_Ne basitula e Makerosi, ne basiisira e Takasi. 
4_33_27_Ne basirula e Takasi, ne basiisira e Tera. 
4_33_28_Ne basitula e Tera, ne basiisira e Misuka. 
4_33_29_Ne basitula e Misuka, ne basiisira e Kasumona. 
4_33_30_Ne basitula e Kasumona, ne basiisira e Moserosi. 
4_33_31_Ne basitula e Moserosi, ne basiisira e Beneyakani. 
4_33_32_Ne basitula e Beneyakani, ne basiisira e Kolukagidugada. 
4_33_33_Ne basitula e Kolukagidugada, ne basiirisa e Yorubasa. 
4_33_34_Ne basitula e Yotubasa, ne basiisira e Yabulona. 
4_33_35_Ne basitula e Yabulona, ne basiisira e Ezyonigeba. 
4_33_36_Ne basirula e Ezyonigeba, ne basiisira mu ddungu Zini (ye Kadesi): 
4_33_37_Ne basitula e Kadesi, ne basiisira ku lusozi Koola, ku mabbali g'ensi ya Edomu. 
4_33_38_Alooni kabona n'alinnya ku lusozi Koola olw'ekiragiro kya Mukama, n'afiira okwo, abaana ba Isiraeri nga baakamaze emyaka ana okuva mu nsi y'e Misiri, mu mwezi ogw'okutaano, ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi. 
4_33_39_Era Alooni yali yaakamaze emyaka kikumi mu abiri mu esatu bwe yafiira ku lusozi Koola. 
4_33_40_N'Omukanani, kabaka w'e Yaladi, eyatuulanga ebukiika obwa ddyo mu nsi ya Kanani, n'awulira abaana ba Isiraeri nga bajja. 
4_33_41_Ne basitula okuva ku lusozi Koola, ne basiisira e Zalumona. 
4_33_42_Ne basitula e Zalumona, ne basiisira e Punoni. 
4_33_43_Ne basitula e Punoni, ne basiisira e Yobosi. 
4_33_44_Ne basitula e Yobosi, ne basiisira e Iyeabalimu, ku mabbali ga Mowaabu. 
4_33_45_Ne basitula e Iyimu, ne basiisira e Dibonugadi. 
4_33_46_Ne basirula e Dibonugadi, ne basiisira e Yalumonudibulasaimu. 
4_33_47_Ne basitula e Yalumonudibulasaimu, ne basiisira ku nsozi Abalimu, okwolekera Nebo. 
4_33_48_Ne basitula okuva ku nsozi Abalimu, ne basiisira mu nsenyi za Mowaabu ku Yoludaani e Yeriko. 
4_33_49_Ne basiisira ku Yoludaani, okuva e Besuyesimosi okutuuka e Yaberisitimu mu nsenyi za Mowaabu. 
4_33_50_Mukama n'agambira Musa mu nsenyi za Mowaabu ku Yoludaani e Yeriko nti 
4_33_51_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri obagambe nti Bwe mulisoImoka Yoludaani ne muyingira mu nsi ya Kanani, 
4_33_52_kale muligobamu bonna abatuula mu nsi mu maaso gammwe, ne muzikiriza amayinja gaabwe gonna agaliko ebifaananyi, ne muzikiriza ebifaananyi byabwe byonna ebifumbe, ne musuulasuula ebifo byabwe byonna ebigulumivu: 
4_33_53_era mulirya ensi ne mutuula omwo: kubanga mmwe ngiwadde ensi okugirya. 
4_33_54_Era mulisikira ensi n'obululu ng'enda zammwe bwe ziri; abayinga obungi mulibawa obusika okusukkiriza, n'abatono olibawa obusika okukendeezaako: wonna wonna akalulu we kaligwirira omuntu, kale we waliba awawe; ng'ebika bya bakitammwe bwe biri bwe mulisika bwe mutyo. 
4_33_55_Naye bwe mutalikkiriza kugobamu abo abatuula mu nsi mu maaso gammwe; kale abo be mulisigaza ku bo banaabanga ng'ebifumita mu maaso gammwe era ng'amaggwa mu mbiriizi zammwe, era banaabateganyanga Imu nsi gye mulituulamu. 
4_33_56_Awo olulituuka, nga bwe nnali ndowooza okubakola bo, bwe ntyo bwe ndibakola mmwe. 
4_34_1_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_34_2_Lagira abaana ba Isiraeri obagambe nti Bwe muliyingira mu nsi ya Kanani, (eyo ye nsi eribagwira okuba obusika, ensi ya Kanani ng'ensalo zaayo bwe ziri,) 
4_34_3_kale oluuyi lwammwe olw'obukiika obwa ddyo luliva ku ddungu Zini ne luyita ku mabbali ga Edomu, n'ensalo yammwe ey'obukiika obwa ddyo eriva ku nkomerero y'Ennyanja Eyomunnyo ebuvanjuba: 
4_34_4_n'ensalo yammwe erikyukira ku luuyi olw'obukiika obwa ddyo olw'ekkubo eririnnya ku Akulabbimu, n'eyita n'etuuka Ezini: n'enkomerero yaayo eriba ku luuyi olw'obukiika olwa ddyo olw'e Kadesubanea; era erifuluma okutuuka e Kazaladali, n'eyita n'etuuka e Yazimoni: 
4_34_5_era ensalo erikyukira okuva e Yazimoni okutuuka ku mugga ogw'e Misiri, n'enkomerero yaayo eriba ku nnyanja. 
4_34_6_N'okuba ensalo ey'ebugwanjuba, muliba n'ennyanja ennene n'ensalo yaayo: eyo y'eriba ensalo yammwe ey'ebugwanjuba. 
4_34_7_N'eno y'eriba ensalo yammwe ey'obukiika obwa kkono: okuva ku nnyaaja ennene mulyerambira olusozi Koola: 
4_34_8_okuva ku lusozi Koola muliramba okutuuka w'oyingirira e Kamasi; n'enkomerero y'ensalo eriba ku Zedada: 
4_34_9_era easalo erifuluma okuruuka e Zifuloni, n'enkomerero yaayo eriba ku Kazalenaani: eyo y'eriba ensalo yammwe ey'obukiika obwa kkono. 
4_34_10_Era muliramba ensalo yammwe ey'ebuvanjuba okuva e Kazalenaani okuruuka e Sefamu: 
4_34_11_era ensalo eriva e Sefamu n'ekka e Libula ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba olw'e Yaini; era ensalo erikka, n'etuuka ku lubalama lw'ennyanja ey'e Kianeresi ebuvanjuba: 
4_34_12_era ensalo erikka n'etuuka ku Yoludaani, n'enkomerero yaayo eriba ku Nnyanja Eyomunnyo: eyo y'e riba ensi yammwe ng'easalo zaayo bwe ziriba enjuyi zonna. 
4_34_13_Musa n'alagira abaana ba Isiraeri ng'ayogera nti Eyo ye nsi gye mulisikira n'obululu, Mukama gy'alagidde okuwa ebika omwenda n'ekika eky'ekitundu: 
4_34_14_kubanga ekika ky'abaana' ba Lewubeeni ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, n'ekika ky'abaana ba Gaadi ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe ziri, baamala okuweebwa obusika bwabwe n'ekika eky'ekitundu ekya Manase baamala okubuweebwa: 
4_34_15_ebika ebibiri n'ekika eky'ekitundu baamala okuweebwa obusika bwabwe emitala wa Yoludaani e Yeriko ebuvanjuba enjuba gy'eva. 
4_34_16_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_34_17_Gano ge mannya g'abasajja abalibagabira ensi okuba obusika: Eriyazaali kabona ne Yoswa mutabani wa Nuni. 
4_34_18_Era mulitwala omukulu omu ku buli kika, okugaba ensi okuba obusika. 
4_34_19_Era gano ge manaya g'abasajja: ku kika kya Yuda Kalebu mutabani wa Yefune. 
4_34_20_Ne ku kika ky'abaaaa ba Simyoni Semweri mutabani wa Ammikudi. 
4_34_21_Ku kika kya Benyamiai, Eridaadi mutabani wa Kisuloni. 
4_34_22_Ne ku kika ky'abaana ba Ddaani, omukulu omu Buki mutabani wa Yoguli. 
4_34_23_Ku baana ba Yusufu: ku kika ky'abaana ba Manase, omukulu omu Kanieri mutabani wa Efodi; 
4_34_24_ne ku kika ky'abaana ba Efulayimu omukulu omu Kamueri mutabani wa Sifutani. 
4_34_25_Ne ku kika ky'abaana ba Zebbulooni, omukulu omu Erizafani mutabani wa Palunaki. 
4_34_26_Ne ku kika ky'abaana ba Isakaali, omukulu omu Palutieri mutabani wa Azani. 
4_34_27_Ne ku kika ky'abaana ba Aseri, omukulu omu Akikuda mutabaai wa Seromi. 
4_34_28_Ne ku kika ky'abaana ba Nafutaali, omukulu omu Pedakeri mutabani wa Ammikudi. 
4_34_29_Abo be baabo Mukama be yalagira okugabira abaana ba Isiraeri obusika mu nsi ya Kanaani. 
4_35_1_Mukama n'agambira Musa mu nsenyi za Mowaabu ku Yoludaani e Yeriko nti 
4_35_2_Lagira abaana ba Isiraeri okuwa Abaleevi ebibuga eby'okutuulamu nga babiggya ku busika obw'obutaka bwabwe; era n'amalundiro ag'oku bibuga agabyetoolodde muligawa Abaleevi 
4_35_3_N'ebibuga banaabanga nabyo okusulamu: n'amalundiro gaako ganaabanga ga bisibo byabwe era ga bintu byabwe era ga nsolo zaabwe zonna. 
4_35_4_N'amalundiro ag'oku bibuga, ge muliwa Abaleevi, galiva ku bbugwe w'ekibuga n'okweyongerayo emikono lukumi enjuyi zonna. 
4_35_5_Era muligera ebweru w'ekibuga ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba emikono enkumi bbiri, ne ku luuyi olw'obukiika obwa ddyo emikono enkumi bbiri, ne ku luuyi olw'ebugwanjuba emikono enkumi bbiri, ne ku luuyi olw'obukiika obwa kkono emikono enkumi bbiri, ekibuga nga kiri wakati. Ago ge galiba gye bali amalundiro ag'oku bibuga. 
4_35_6_N'ebibuga bye muliwa Abaleevi, biriba ebibuga mukaaga eby'okuddukiramu, bye muliwa omussi w'omuntu okuddukira omwo: era mulyongera ku ebyo ebibuga ana mu bibiri. 
4_35_7_Ebibuga byonna bye muliwa Abaleevi biriba ebibuga ana mu munaana; byo n'amalundiro gaabyo. 
4_35_8_N'ebibuga bye muliggya ku butaka obw'abaana ba Isiraeri okubigaba, ku bangi muliggyako bingi; ne ku batono muliggyako bitono: buli muntu ng'obusika bwe bwe buliba bw'alisikira, bw'atyo bw'aligabira Abaleevi ku bibuga bye. 
4_35_9_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti 
4_35_10_Yogera n'abaana ba Isiraeri obagambe nti Bwe mulisomoka Yoludaani ne muyingira mu nsi ya Kanani, 
4_35_11_kale mulyeroadera ebibuga okuba ebibuga eby'okuddukiramu gye muli; omussi w'omuntu anattanga omuntu yenna ng'ataniddwa addukire omwo. 
4_35_12_N'ebibuga biaaabanga gye muli bya kuddukirangamu eri omuwoolezi w'eggwanga; omussi w'omuntu alemenga okufa nga tannayimirira mu maaso g'ekibiina okusalirwa omusango. 
4_35_13_N'ebibuga bye muliwa biriba gye muli ebibuga mukaaga bya kuddukiramu. 
4_35_14_Muliwa ebibuga bisaru emitala wa Yoludaani, era muliwa ebibuga bisatu mu nsi ya Kanani; binaabanga bibuga bya kuddukirangamu. 
4_35_15_Eri abaana ba Isiraeri n'eri omugenyi n'eri oyo atuula mu bo, ebibuga ebyo omukaaga binaabanga bya kuddukirangamu: buli anattanga omuntu yenna ng'ataniddwa addukirenga omwo. 
4_35_16_Naye oba nga yamukuba n'ekintu eky'ekyuma n'okufa n'afa, oyo nga mussi wa muntu: omussi w'omuntu talemanga kuttibwa. 
4_35_17_Era oba nga yamukuba n'ejjinja ng'alihutte mu ngalo, eriyinza okutta omuntu, n'afa, oyo nga mussi wa muntu: omussi w'omuntu talemanga kuttibwa. 
4_35_18_Oba nga yamukuba n'ekintu eky'omuti ng'akikutte mu ngalo, ekiyinza okutta omuntu, n'afa, oyo nga mussi wa muntu: omussi w'omuntu talemanga kuttibwa. 
4_35_19_Omuwoolezi w'omusaayi yenayini ye anattanga omussi w'omuntu: lw'amusisinkananga lw'amuttanga. 
4_35_20_Era oba nga yamufumita olw'okumukyawa, oba yamukasuukirira, ng'ateeze, n'okufa n'afa; 
4_35_21_oba yamukuba n'ekikonde olw'obulabe, n'okufa n'afa: eyamukuba talemanga kuttibwa; oye mussi wa muntu: omuwoolezi w'omusaayi alitta omussi w'omuntu; lw'alimusisinkana. 
4_35_22_Naye oba nga yamufumita mangu awatali bulabe, oba yamukasuukirira ekintu kyonna nga tateeze, 
4_35_23_oba ejjinja lyonna eriyinza okutta omuntu, nga tamulabye, n'alimusuulako, n'okufa n'afa, so tabanga mulabe we, so teyayagala kumukola bubi: 
4_35_24_kale ekibiina banaasalanga omusango gw'oyo eyakuba n'omuwoolezi w'omusaayi ng'emisango egyo bwe giri: 
4_35_25_era ekibiina banaawonyanga omussi w'omuntu mu mukono gw'omuwoolezi w'omusaayi, era ekibiina banaamuzzangayo mu kibuga kye eky'okuddukirangamu kye yali addukiddemu: era anaasulanga omwo okutuusa kabona omukulu eyafukibwako amafuta amatukuvu lw'anaafanga. 
4_35_26_Naye omussi w'omuntu bw'anaabanga ayise ku nsalo y'ekilbuga kye eky'okuddukirangamu, ky'addukiramu; 
4_35_27_omuwoolezi w'omusaayi n'amusanga ng'ali bweru w'ensalo y'ekibuga kye eky'okuddukirangamu, omuwoolezi w'omusaayi n'atta omussi w'omuntu; tabangako musango gwa musaayi: 
4_35_28_kubanga yalema okubeera mu kibuga kye eky'okuddukirangamu okutuusa kabona omukulu lwe yandifudde: naye kabona omukulu ng'amaze okufa kale omussi w'omuntu anaddangayo mu nsi ey'obutaka bwe. 
4_35_29_Era ebyo binaabanga tteeka lya musango gye muli mu mirembe gyammwe gyonna mu nnyumba zammwe zonna. 
4_35_30_Buli anattanga omuntu yenna, omussi w'omuntu anattibwanga olw'akamwa k'abajulirwa: naye omujulirwa omu talumirizanga muntu yenna okumutta. 
4_35_31_Era temukkirizanga bya kununula bulamu bwa mussi wa muntu, asaanidde okufa: naye talemanga kuttibwa. 
4_35_32_So temukkirizanga bya kununula oyo eyaddukira mu kibuga kye eky'okuddukirangamu, akomewo okutuula mu nsi, okutuusa kabona lw'alifa. 
4_35_33_Bwe mutyo tomwonoonanga nsi gye mulimu: kubanga omusaayi, ogwo gwe gwonoona ensi: so n'ensi teyinza kutangirirwa olw'omusaayi oguyiise omwo, wabula n'omusaayi gw'oyo eyaguyiwa. 
4_35_34_So temwonoonanga nsi gye mutuulamu, gye mbeeramu wakati: kubanga nze Mukama mbeera wakati mu baana ba Isiraeri. 
4_36_1_Awo emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe ez'enda y'abaana ba Gireyaadi, mutabani wa Makiri, mutabani wa Manase, ow'oku nda za batabani ba Yusufu, ne basembera ne boogerera mu maaso ga Musa ne mu maaso g'abakulu, emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe ez'abaana ba Isiraeri: 
4_36_2_ne boogera nti Mukama yalagira mukama wange okugabira abaana ba Isiraeri ensi n'obululu okuba obusika: era mukama wange yalagirwa Mukama okugabira obusika bwa Zerofekadi muganda waffe bawala be. 
4_36_3_Era bwe banaafumbirwanga yenna ku baana b'ebika by'abaana ba Isiraeri ebirala, kale obusika bwabwe bunaggibwanga ku busika bwa bakitaffe, ne bugattibwa ku busika obw'ekika kye balibaamu: bwe butyo buliggibwa ku mugabo gw'obusika bwaffe. 
4_36_4_Awo jjubiri ogw'abaana ba Isiraeri bwe gulituuka, kale obusika bwabwe buligattibwa ku busika obw'ekika eluriba ekyabwe: bwe butyo obusika bwabwe buliggibwa ku busika obw'ekika kya bakitaffe. 
4_36_5_Musa n'alagira abaana ba Isiraeri ng'ekigambo kya Mukama bwe kyali ag'ayogera nti Ekika kya batabani ba Yusufu boogera bya nsonga. 
4_36_6_Kino kye kigambo Mukama ky'alagira ku bawala ba Zerofekadi, ng'ayogera nti Bafumbirwenga gwe banaasiimanga; kyokka ku nda y'ekika kya kitaabwe kwe banaafumbirwanga. 
4_36_7_Bwe kiryo tewaabengawo busika bwonna obw'abaana ba Isiraeri obunaakyukanga okuva mu kika okuyingira mu kika kinnaakyo: kubanga abaana ba Isiraeri baneegattanga buli muntu n'obusika obw'ekika kya bakitaabwe. 
4_36_8_Na buli muwala, anaabanga n'obusika mu kika kyonna eky'abaana ba Isiraeri, anaabanga mukazi w'omu ku nda ey'ekika kya kitaawe, abaana ba Isiraeri balyoke balye buli muaru obusika bwa bakitaabwe. 
4_36_9_Bwe kityo tewaabengawo busika bwonna obunaakyukanga okuva mu kika okuyingira mu kika ekirala; kubanga ebika by'abaana ba Isiraeri baneegattanga buli muntu n'obusika bwe ye. 
4_36_10_Nga Mukama bwe yalagira Musa, bwe batyo bawala ba Zerofekadi bwe baakola: 
4_36_11_kubanga Maala, Tiruza, ne Kogula, ne Mirika, ne Noowa, bawala ba Zerofekadi, ne bafumbirwa batabani ba baganda ba kitaabwe. 
4_36_12_Baafumbirwa ku nda za batabani ba Manase mutabani wa Yusufu, obusika bwabwe ne bubeeranga mu kika eky'enda ya kitaabwe. 
4_36_13_Ebyo bye biragiro n'emisango, Mukama bye yalagira abaana ba Isiraeri n'omukono gwa Musa mu nsenyi za Mowaabu ku Yoludaaai e Yeriko. 
5_1_1_Bino bye bigambo Musa bye yabuulira Isiraeri yenna emitala wa Yoludaani mu ddungu, mu Alaba awoolekera Sufu, wakati We Palani ne Toferi ne Labani ne Kazerosi ne Dizakabu. 
5_1_2_Lwe lugendo olw'ennaku ekkumi n'olumu okuva e Kolebu okuyita awali olusozi Seyiri okutuuka e Kadesubanea. 
5_1_3_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'amakumi ana, mu mwezi ogw'ekkumi n'ogumu, ku lunaku olw'omwezi ogw'olubereberye, Musa n'ayogera a'abaana ba Isiraeri, nga byonna bwe byali Mukama bye yamulagira okubabuulira 
5_1_5_emitala wa Yoludaani, mu nsi ya Mowaabu, Musa gye yatanulira okulangira amateeka gano, 
5_1_6_ng'ayogera nti Mukama Katonda waffe yayogerera naffe ku Kolebu, ng'ayogera nti Mwaludde okutuula ku lusozi luno: 
5_1_7_mukyuke, mutambule, mugende mu nsi ey'ensozi ey'Abamoli, ne mu bifo byonna ebiriraanyeewo, mu Alaba, mu nsi ey'ensozi, ey'olusenyi, ne mu Bukiika obwa ne ddyo, ne ku ttale ly'ennyanja, ensi y’Abakanani, ne Lebanooni, okutuuka ku mugga omunene, omugga Fulaati. 
5_1_8_Laba, ensi ngitadde mu maaso gammwe: muyingire, mulye ensi Mukama gye yalayirira bajjajja bammwe, Ibulayimu, ne Isaaka, ne Yakobo, okubawa bo n'ezzadde lyabwe eririddawo. 
5_1_9_Nange nayogera nammwe mu biro ebyo, nga ŋŋamba nti Nze soyinza kubasotula nzekka: 
5_1_10_Mukama Katonda wammwe abongedde, era, laba, leero muli ng’emmunyeenye ez’omu ggullu okuba obungi 
5_1_11_Mukama, Katonda wa bajjajja bammwe, abongere emirundi lukumi okusinga nga bwe muli, era abawe omukisa, nga bwe yabasuubiza! 
5_1_12_Nze nnyinza ntya nzekka okusitula okutegana kwammwe n'omugugu gwammwe n'okuyomba kwammwe? 
5_1_13_Mwetwalire abasajja ab'amagezi era abategeevu era ab'amaanyi, ng'ebika byammwe bwe biri, nange ndibafuula abakulu bammwe. 
5_1_14_Nammwe ne muddamu ne mwogera nti Ekigambo ky'oyogedde luruagi ffe okukikola. 
5_1_15_Kale ne ntwala abakulu b'ebika byammwe, abasajja ab'amagezi, era ab'amaanyi, ne mbafuula abakulu bammwe, abaami b'enkumi, era abaami b'ebikumi, era abaami b'ataano, era abaami b'amakumi, era abamyuka, ng'ebika byammwe bwe biri. 
5_1_16_Era nakuutira abalamuzi bammwe mu biro ebyo, nga njogera nti Muwulirenga ensonga za baganda bammwe, musalirenga emisango egy'ensonga omuntu ne muganda we ne munnaggwanga ali awamu naye. 
5_1_17_Temusalirizanga bwe munaasalanga emisango; munaawuliranga abato n'abakulu okubenkanyankanya; temutyanga maaso ga muntu; kubanga omusango gwa Katonda: era ensonga eneebalemanga mugireetanga gye ndi, nange naagiwuliranga. 
5_1_18_Era nabalagira mu biro ebyo byonna eby'abagwanira okukola. 
5_1_19_Awo ne tutambula okuva e Kolebu, ne tuyita mu ddungu liri lyonna eddene ery'entiisa lye mwalaba mu kkubo erouota mu nsi ey’ensozi ey’Abamoli, nga Mukama Katonda waffe bwe yatulagira; ne tutuuka e Kadesubanea. 
5_1_20_Ne mbagamba nti Mutuuse mu nsi ey’ensozi ey’Abamoli, Mukama Katonda waffe gy’atuwa. 
5_1_21_Laba, Mukama Katonda wo attadde ensi mu maaso go: yambuka olye nga Mukama Katonda wa bajjajja bo bwe yakugamba; totya so takankana. 
5_1_22_Ne musemberera buli muntu ku mmwe, ne mwogera nti Tutume abantu abanatukulembera, batume abantu abaatukulembera, batukulemberere ensi, bakomewo baubuulire ekkubo bwe liri lye tuba twambukiramu, n’ebibuga bwe biri mwe tulituuka. 
5_1_23_Ekigambo ekyo ne kinsanyusa nnyo: ne nnonda ku mmwe abantu kkumi na babiri, buli kika omuntu omu: 
5_1_24_ne bakyuka ne balinnya ku lusozi, ne batuuka mu kiwonvu kya Esukoli, ne bakiketta. 
5_1_25_Ne batwala ku bibala by'ensi mu ngalo zaabwe, ne babireeta gye tuli, ne batubuulira ne boogera nti Ensi eyo nnungi Mukama Katonda waffe gy'atuwa. 
5_1_26_Naye mmwe ne mutakkiriza kwambuka, naye ne mujeemera ekiragiro kya Mukama Katonda wammwe: 
5_1_27_ne mwemulugunyiza mu weema zammwe, ne mwogera nti Kubanga Mukama yatukyawa, kyeyava atuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, okutugabula mu mikono gy'Abamoli, okutuzikiriza. 
5_1_28_Twambuka wa? baganda baffe batusaanuusizza emitima gyaffe, nga boogera nti Abantu banene bawanvu okusinga ffe; ebibuga binene, byazimbibwako ebigo okutuuka mu ggulu; era twalabayo abaana ba Abanaki. 
5_1_29_Awo ne ndyoka mbagamba nti Temubatya, so temubatekemukira. 
5_1_30_Mukama Katonda wammwe abakulembera ye anaabalwaniriranga, nga byonna bwe byali bye yabakolera mu Misiri mu maaso gammwe; 
5_1_31_ne mu ddungu, mwe walabira Mukama Katonda wo bwe yakusitula ng'omusajja bw'asitula omwana we, mu kkubo lyonna lye mwayitamu, okutuusa lwe mwaruuka mu kifo kino. 
5_1_32_Naye mu kigambo ekyo temwakkiriza Mukama Katonda wammwe, 
5_1_33_eyabakulemberanga mu kkubo, okubanoonyezanga ekifo eky'okukubiramu eweema zammwe, ng'ayima mu muliro ekiro, okubalaganga ekkubo lye munaayitamu, ne mu kire emisana. 
5_1_34_Awo Mukama n'awulira eddoboozi ly'ebigambo byammwe, n'asunguwala, n'alayira ng'ayogera nti 
5_1_35_Mazima tewalibawo n'omu ku bantu bano ab'emirembe gino emibi aliraba ensi ennungi, gye nnalayirira okuwa bajjajja bammwe, 
5_1_36_wabula Kalebu omwana wa Yefune, oyo y'aligiraba; era oyo ndimuwa ensi gye yalinnyako n'abaana be: kubanga yagoberera Mukama mu byonna: 
5_1_37_Mukama n'ansunguwalira nze ku bwammwe, ng'ayogera nti Naawe toliyingira omwo: 
5_1_38_Yoswa omwana wa Nuni, ayimirira mu maaso go, oyo aliyingira omwo: mugumye omwoyo; kubanga ye aligisisa Isiraeri. 
5_1_39_Era n'abaana bammwe abato, be mwayogera nga bagenda okuba omwandu, n'abaana bammwe, abatamanyi leero birungi newakubadde ebibi, bo baliyingira omwo, era ndigibawa bo, era baligirya. 
5_1_40_Naye mmwe mukyuke mutambule mu ddungu mu kkubo eriyita mu Nnyanja Emmyufu. 
5_1_41_Ne mulyoka muddamu ne munnamba nti Tusobezza ku Mukama; tunaayambuka ne tulwana, nga byonna bwe biri Mukama Katonda waffe bye yatulagira. Ne mwesiba buli muntu ebibye ebyokulwanyisa, ne mwanguwa okulinnya ku lusozi. 
5_1_42_Awo Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Bagambe nti Temulinnya so temulwana; kubanga nze siri mu mmwe; muleme okugobebwa mu maaso g'abalabe bammwe: 
5_1_43_Awo ne njogera nammwe, ne mutawulira; naye ne mujeemera ekiragiro kya Mukama ne mukwatibwa amalala, ne mulinnya ku lusozi. 
5_1_44_Awo Abamoli abaatuulanga ku lusozi olwo, ne bafuluma okubalumba ne babagoba, ng'enjuki bwe zikola, ne babakubirakubira ku Seyiri okutuusa ku Koluma. 
5_1_45_Ne muddayo ne mukaaba amaziga mu maaso ga Mukama; naye Mukama n'atawulira ddoboozi lyammwe, so n'atabategera kutu. 
5_1_46_Awo ne mutuulira mu Kadesi ennaku nnyingi, ng'ennaku bwe ziri ze mwamalayo. 
5_2_1_Awo ne tulyoka tukyuka, ne tutambula mu ddungu mu kkubo eriyita mu Nnyanja Emmyufu, nga Mukama bwe yaŋŋamba: ne twetooloolera olusozi Seyiri ennaku nnYingi. 
5_2_2_Mukama n'ayogera nange nti 
5_2_3_Mwaludde okwetooloola olusozi luno: mukyuke mugende ebukika obwa kkono. 
5_2_4_Naawe lagira abantu ng'oyogera nti Mugenda kuyita mu nsalo ya baganda bammwe abaana ba Esawu abatuula ku Seyiri, era bo balibatya: kale mwekuume nnyo mwekka: 
5_2_5_temuyomba nabo; kubanga sijja kubawa ku nsi yaabwe newakubadde awalinayibwa n'ekigere: kubanga nawa Esawu olusozi Seyiri okuba obutaka. 
5_2_6_Munaagulanga emmere na ffeeza gye bali mulyenga; era n'amazzi munaagagulanga na ffeeza gye bali munywenga. 
5_2_7_Kubanga Mukama Katonda wo akuwadde omukisa mu mulimu gwonna ogw'omukono gwo: yamanya okutambula kwo mu ddungu lino eddene: emyaka gino amakumi ana Mukama Katonda wo ng'abeera wamu naawe; tewabangawo kye wabulwa: 
5_2_8_Awo ne tuyita ku mabbali baganda baffe abaana ba Esawu abatuula ku Seyiri, mu kkubo lya Alaba okuva mu Erasi rie Ezyonigeba. Ne tukyuka ne tuyita mu kkubo ly'omu ddungu lya Mowaabu. 
5_2_9_Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Tosunguwaza Mowaabu so tolwana nabo mu lutalo: kubanga sijja kukuwa ku nsi ye okuba obutaka; kubanga nawa abaana ba Lutti Ali okuba obutaka. 
5_2_10_(Abemi baatuulanga omwo olubereberye, eggwanga ekkulu, era eddene era eggwanvu aga Abanaki bwe bali; 
5_2_11_era nabo baayitibwa Balefa, nga Abanaki bwe bali; naye Abamo waabu baabayita Bemi. 
5_2_12_Era n'Abakooli baatuulaaga ku Seyiri olubereberye, naye abaana ba Esawu ne babasikira; ne babazikiriza mu maaso gaabwe, ne batuula mu kifo kyabwe; nga Isiraeri bwe yakola ensi ey'obutaka bwe Mukama gye yabawa.) 
5_2_13_Kale mugolokoke musomoke akagga Zeredi. Ne tusomoka akagga Zeredi. 
5_2_14_Era ennaku ze twamala kasookedde tuva e Kadesubanea okutuusa lwe twasomoka akagga Zeredi zaali emyaka amakumi asatu mu munaana; okuruusa emirembe gyonna egy'abalwanyi lwe baggweerawo wakati mu lusiisira, nga Mukama bwe yabalayirira. 
5_2_15_Era omukono gwa Mukama gwalwananga nabo, okubazikiriza wakati mu lusiisira, okutuusa lwe baggwaawo. 
5_2_16_Awo olwatuuka, abalwanyi boana bwe baamala okuggwaawo era nga bafudde mu bantu, 
5_2_17_Mukama n'alyoka aŋŋamba nti 
5_2_18_Leero onooyita mu Ali, ye nsalo ya Mowaabu: 
5_2_19_era bw'onoosemberera abaana ba Amoni era ng'oboolekedde, tobasunguwaza so toyomba aabo: kubanga sijja kukuwa ku nsi y'abaana ba Amoni okuba obutaka: kubanga nagiwa abaana ba Lutti okuba obutaka. 
5_2_20_(Era n'eyo eyitibwa nsi ya Balefa: Balefa baagituulangamu edda; naye Abamoni baabayita Bazamuzumu; 
5_2_21_eggwanga ekkulu era eddene era eggwanvu. nga Abaaaki bwe bali; naye Mukama yabazikiriza mu maaso gaabwe; ne babasikira ne batuula mu kifo kyabwe: 
5_2_22_nga bwe yakola abaana ba Esawu, abaatuula ku Seyiri, bwe yazikiriza Abakooli mu maaso gaabwe; ne babasikira, ne batuula, mu kifo kyabwe okutuusa leero 
5_2_23_n'Abavi abaatuulanga mu byalo okutuuka ku Gaza, Abakafutoli abaava mu Kafutoli ne babazikiriza ne batuula mu kifo kyabwe.) 
5_2_24_Mugolokoke, mutambule, muyite mu kiwonvu kya Alunoni: laba, ngabudde mu mukono gwo Sikoni Omwamoli, kabaka w'e Kesuboni, n'ensi ye: tanula okugirya, olwane naye mu lutalo. 
5_2_25_Leero naasooka okuteeka entiisa yo n'ekitiibwa kyo ku mawanga agali wansi w'eggulu lyonna, abaliwulira ettutumu lyo ne bakankana ne balumwa ku bubwo. 
5_2_26_Ne ntuma ababaka okuva mu ddungu ery'e Kedemosi eri Sikoni kabaka w'e Kesuboni n'ebigambo eby'emirembe, nga njogera nti 
5_2_27_Mpite mu nsi yo: naatambuliranga mu luguudo, sijja kukyami.ra ku mukono ogwa ddyo newakubadde ogwa kkono. 
5_2_28_Emmere ononguzanga na ffeeza ndyenga; n’amazzi onoonguzanga na ffeeza nywenga: kyokka mpitemu n'ebigere byange; 
5_2_29_ng'abaana ba Esawu abatuula ku Seyiri, n'Abamowaabu abatuula mu Ali bwe bankola; okutuusa lwe ndisomoka Yoludaani okugenda mu nsi Mukama Katonda waffe gy'atuwa. 
5_2_30_Naye Sikoni kabaka w'e Kesuboni n'atatuganya kuyita ku mabbali ge: kubanga Mukama Katonda wo yakakaayaza omwoyo gwe, n'amuwaganyaza omutima gwe alyoke amugabule mu mukono gwo nga leero. 
5_2_31_Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Laba, ntanudde okugabula Sikoni n'ensi ye mu maaso go: tanula okulya ensi ye olyoke ogisikire. 
5_2_32_Sikoni n'alyoka asitula okutulumba, ye n'abantu be bonna okulwauira e Yakazi. 
5_2_33_Mukama Katonda waffe n'amugabula mu maaso gaffe; ne tumutta ye n'abaana be n'abantu be bonna. 
5_2_34_Ne tunyaga ebibuga bye byonna mu biro ebyo, ne tuzikiririza ddala buli kibuga omuli abantu, wamu n'abakazi n'abaana abato; tetwasigazaawo n'omu: 
5_2_35_ente zokka zetwetwalira okuba omunyago, wamu n'ebyo bye twaggya mu bibuga bye twanyaga. 
5_2_36_Okuva ku Aloweri ekiri ku mabbali g'ekiwonvu kya Alunoni, era okuva ku kibuga ekiri mu kiwonvu okutuusa ku Gireyaadi, tewali kibuga ekyatulema olw'obugulumivu bwakyo: Mukama Katonda waffe yagabula byonna mu maaso gaffe: 
5_2_37_kyokka tewasemberera nsi y'abaana ba Amoni: oluuyi lwonna olw'omugga Yaboki, n'ebibuga eby'omu nsi ey'ensozi, ne yonna Mukama Katonda waffe gye yatugaana. 
5_3_1_Ne tulyoka tukyuka ne twambukira mu kkubo erigenda e Basani: Ogi kabaka We Basani n'asitula okutulumba, ye n'abantu be bonna, okulwanira Ederei. 
5_3_2_Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Tomutya: kubanga mmugabudde ye'n'abantu be bonna n'ensi ye mu mukono gwo; era olimukola nga bwe wakola Sikoni kabaka w'Abamoli abaatuulanga mu Kesuboni. 
5_3_3_Awo Mukama Katonda waffe n'agabula mu mukono gwaffe ne Ogi kabaka We Basani n'abantu be bonna: ne tumutta okutuusa Iwe watamusigalirawo n'omu: 
5_3_4_Ne tunyaga ebibuga bye byonna mu biro ebyo; tewali kibuga kye tutaabanyagaako; ebibuga nkaaga, ensi yonna eya Alugobu, obwakabaka bwa Ogi mu Basani. 
5_3_5_Ebyo byonna byali bibuga ebyazimbibwako bbugwe omuwanvu n'enzigi n'ebisiba; obutassaako bibuga ebitaalina bbugwe bingi nnyo: 
5_3_6_Ne tubizikiririza ddala nga bwe twakola Sikoni kabaka We Kesuboni, nga tuzikiririza ddala buli kibuga omuli abantu, wamu n'abakazi n'abaana abato. 
5_3_7_Naye ente zonna n'ebyo bye twanyaga mu bibuga, ne twetwalira okuba omunyago. 
5_3_8_Era mu biro ebyo ne tuggya ensi mu mukono gwa bakabaka bombi ab'Abamoli abaali emitala wa Yoludaani, okuva mu kiwonvu kya Alunoni okutuusa ku lusozi Kerumooni 
5_3_10_ebibuga byonna eby'omu lusenyi, ne Gireyaadi yonna, ne Basani yonna, okutuusa ku Saleka ne Ederei, ebibuga by'obwakabaka bwa Ogi mu Basani: 
5_3_11_(Kubanga Ogi kabaka w'e Basani ye yasigalawo yekka ku abo abaasigalawo ku Balefa; laba, ekitanda kye kyali kya kyuma; tekiri mu Labba eky'abaana ba Amoni? obuwanvu bwakyo emikono mwenda, n'obugazi bwakyo emikono ena, ng'omukono gw'omuntu bwe guli.) 
5_3_12_N'ensi eyo ne tugitya mu biro ebyo: okuva ku Aloweri, ekiri ku mabbali g'ekiwonvu kya Alunoni, n'ekitundu ky'ensi ey'ensozi eya Gireyaadi, n'ebibuga byayo n'abiwa Abalewubeeni n'Abagaadi: 
5_3_13_n'ekitundu kya Gireyaadi ekyasigalawo, ne Basani yonna, obwakabaka bwa Ogi, nabiwa ekitundu ky'ekika kya Manase; ensi yonna eya Alugobu, ye Basani yonna, (Eyo eyitibwa nsi ya Balefa. 
5_3_14_n'ekitundu kya Gireyaadi ekyasigalawo, ne Basani yonna, obwakabaka bwa Ogi, nabiwa ekitundu ky'ekika kya Manase; ensi yonna eya Alugobu, ye Basani yonna, (Eyo eyitibwa nsi ya Balefa. 
5_3_15_Gireyaadi n'empaayo Makiri, 
5_3_16_N'Abalewubeeni n'abagaadi ne mbawa okuva ku Gireyaadi okutuusa ku kiwonvu kya Alunoni, ekiwonvu ekya wakati, n'ensalo yaakyo; okutuusa ku mugga Yaboki, ye nsalo y'abaana ba Amoni; 
5_3_17_era ne Alaba ne Ybludaani n'ensalo yaagwo; okuva ku Kinneresi okutuusa ku nnyanja ya Alaba, Ennyanja Eyomunnyo, awali entunnumba za Pisuga ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba. 
5_3_18_Ne mbalagira mu biro ebyo nga njogera nti Mukama Katonda wammwe abawadde ensi eno okugirya: munaasomoka nga mukutte ebyokuiwanyisa mu maaso ga baganda bammwe abaana ba Isiraeri, abasajja bonna abazira. 
5_3_19_Naye bakazi bammwe n'abaana bammwe abato n'ebisibo byammwe (mmanyi nga mulina ebisibo bingi) binaabeeranga mu bibuga byammwe bye nnabawa; 
5_3_20_okutuusa Mukama lw'aliwa baganda bammwe okuwummula, nga nammwe, era nabo nga balidde ensi Mukama Katonda wammwe gy'abawa emitala wa Yoludaani: ne mulyoka mudda buli muntu mu butaka bwe bwe nnabawa. 
5_3_21_Ne ndagira Yoswa mu biro ebyo nga njogera nti Amaaso go galabye byonna Mukama Katonda wammwe by'akoze bakabaka bano bombi: bw'atyo Mukama bw'alikola obwakabaka bwonna gye musomoka okugenda. 
5_3_22_Temubatyanga: kubanga Mukama Katonda wammwe, oyo yabalwanirira. 
5_3_23_Ne nneegayirira Mukama mu biro ebyo nga ajogera nti 
5_3_24_Ai Mukama Katonda, otanudde okulaga omuddu wo obukulu bwo n'omukono gwo ogw'amaanyi; kubanga katonda ki ali mu ggulu oba mu nsi ayinza okukola ng'emirimu gyo bwe giri era ng'ebikolwa byo eby'amaanyi bwe biri? 
5_3_25_Nsomoke, nkwegayirira, ndabe ensi ennungi eri emitala wa Yoludaani, olusozi luli olulungi, ne Lebanooni. 
5_3_26_Naye Mukama n'ansunguwalira nze ku bwammwe n'atampulira: Mukama n'atlrlamba nti Kikumale: toyogera nate nange ku kigambo ekyo. 
5_3_27_Linnya ku ntikko ya Pisuga, oyimuse amaaso go otunule ebugwanjuba n'obukiika obwa kkono n'obwa ddyo n'ebuvanjuba, olabe n'smaaso go: kubanga tolisomoka Yoludaani guno. 
5_3_28_Naye kuutira Yoswa omugumye omuwe amaanyi: kubanga ye alisomoka ng'akulembera abantu bano, era ye alibasisa ensi gy'oliraba. 
5_3_29_Awo ne tutuula mu kiwonvu ekyolekera Besupyoli. 
5_4_1_Ne kaakano, ggwe Isiraeri, wulira amateeka n'emisango, bye mbayigiriza, okubikolanga; mulyoke mube balamu, muyingire mulye ensi Mukama Katonda wa bajjajja bammwe gy'abawa. 
5_4_2_Temwongeranga ku kigambo kye mbalagira, so temukisalangako, mukwatenga ebiragiro bya Mukama Katonda wammwe bye mbalagira. 
5_4_3_Amaaso gammwe galabye Mukama kye yakola olwa Baalipyoli: kubanga abantu bonna abaagoberera Baalipyoli, Mukama Katonda wo yabazikiriza wakati mu mmwe. 
5_4_4_Naye mmwe abeegatta ne Mukama Katonda wammwe mukyali balamu buli muntu ku mmwe leero. 
5_4_5_Laba, mbayigirizza amateeka n'emisango, nga Mukama Katonda wange bwe yandagira, mukolenga bwe mutyo wakati mu nsi gye muyingi ramu okugirya. 
5_4_6_Kale mubyekuumenga mubikolenga; kubanga ago ge magezi gammwe n'okutegeera kwammwe mu maaso g'amawanga aganaawuliranga amateeka ago gonna ne googera nti Mazima eggwanga lino ekkulu be baatu ab'amagezi era abategeera. 
5_4_7_Kubanga, ggwanga ki eririna katonda abali okumpi nga Mukama Katonda waffe bw'ali bwe tumukoowoolanga? 
5_4_8_Era ggwanga ki ekkulu eririna amateeka n'emisango egy'ensonga ng'amateeka gano gonna bwe gali, ge ntadde mu maaso gammwe leero? 
5_4_9_Kyokka weegendereze weekuume emmeeme yo ag'onyiikira, oleme okwerabira ebigambo amaaso go bye gaalaba, bireme okuva mu mutima gwo ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwo; naye mubitegeezenga abaana bo n'abaana b'abaana bo; 
5_4_10_olunaku lwe wayimirira mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo ku Kolebu, Mukama bwe yaŋŋamba nti Nkunnaanyiza abantu, nange naabawuliza ebigambo byange, bayige okuntyanga ennaku zonna ze banaabanga abalamu ku nsi, era bayigirizenga abaana baabwe. 
5_4_11_Ne musembera ne muyimirira wansi w'olusozi; olusozi ne lwaka n'omuliro okutuusa ku mutima gw'eggulu, n'ekizikiza, n'ekire, n'ekizikiza ekikutte. 
5_4_12_Mukama n'ayogera nammwe ng'ayima wakati mu muliro: mwawulira eddoboozi ly'ebigambo, naye ne mutalaba kifaananyi kyonna; ddoboozi lyokka. 
5_4_13_N'ababuulira endagaano ye, gye yabalagira okukola, ge mateeka ekkumi; n'agawandiika ku bipande by'amayinja bibiri. 
5_4_14_Mukama n'andagira mu biro ebyo okubayigiriza amateeka n'emisango, mubikolenga mu nsi gye musomokera okugendamu okugirya. 
5_4_15_Kale mwekuume nnyo; kubanga temwalaba kifaananyi kyonna kyonna ku lunaku Mukama lwe yayogera nammwe ku Kolebu ng'ayima wakati mu muliro: 
5_4_16_mulemenga okweyonoona ne mwekolera ekifaananyi ekyole nga lufaanana ekintu kyonna, ekifaananyi kye kisajja oba eky'ekikazi, 
5_4_17_ekifaananyi ky'ensolo yonna eri ku nsi, ekifaananyi ky'ennyonyi yonna erina ebiwaawaatiro ebuuka mu bbanga, 
5_4_18_ekifaananyi kye kintu kyonna ekyewalula ku ttaka, ekifaaaanyi ky'ekyennyanja kyonna ekiri mu mazzi wansi w'ettaka: 
5_4_19_era olemenga okuyimusa amaaso go mu ggulu, n'olaba enjuba n'omwezi n'emmunyeenye, lye ggye lyonna ery'omu ggulu, n'osendebwasendebwa n'obisinza, n'obiweereza, Mukama Katonda wo bye yagabira amawanga gonna agali wansi w'eggulu lyonna: 
5_4_20_Naye Mukama yabatwala n'abaggya mu kikoomi eky'ekyuma, mu Misiri, okuba gy'ali abantu ab'envuma, nga leero. 
5_4_21_Era nate Mukama yansunguwalira nze ku lwammwe, n'alayira nze obutasomoka Yoludaani, newakubadde okuyingira mu nsi eyo ennungi, Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa okuba obutaka: 
5_4_22_naye kiŋŋnira okufiira mu nsi muno, tekiŋŋwanira kusomoka Yoludaani: naye mmwe mulisomoka: ne mulya ensi eyo ennungi. 
5_4_23_Mwekuume mulemenga okwerabira endagaano ya Mukama Katonda wammwe, gye yalagaana nammwe, ne mwekolera ekifaananyi ekyole nga kirina engeri y'ekintu kyonna, Mukama Katonda wo kye yakugaana. 
5_4_24_Kubanga Mukama Katonda wo gwe muliro ogwokya, Katonda ow'obuggya. 
5_4_25_Bw'onoozaalanga abaana n'abaana b'abaana, era nga mumaze ebiro bingi mu nsi, era nga mumaze okweyonoona, ne mwekolera ekifaananyi ekyolenga kirina engeri y'ekintu kyonna, ne mukola ekiri mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo ekibi, okumusunguwaza: 
5_4_26_mpita eggulu n'ensi okuba abajulirwa eri mmwe leero, nga mulizikiririra ddala mangu ku nsi gye musomokera Yoludaani okugendamu okugirya; temuligimalako nnaku nnyingi, naye mulizikiririra ddala. 
5_4_27_Era Mukama alibasaasaanya mu mawanga, era mulisigalawo batono mu bantu,' Mukama gy'alibatwala ewala. 
5_4_28_Era muliweerereza eyo bakatonda, emirimu gy'emikono gy'abantu, emiti n'amayinja, ebitalaba newakubadde okuwulira newakubadde okulya newakubadde okuwunyiriza. 
5_4_29_Naye nga muyima eyo bwe munaanoonyanga Mukama Katonda wo, onoomulabanga bw'onoomunoonyanga n'omutima gwo gwonna n'obulamu bwo bwonna. 
5_4_30_Bw'onooba ng'olabye ennaku; era ebyo byonna nga bikujjidde; mu nnaku ez'enkomerero onookomangawo eri Mukama Katonda wo, era onoowuliranga eddoboozi lye; 
5_4_31_kubanga Mukama Katonda wo Katonda wa kusaasira; taakulekenga, so taakuzikirizenga, so teyeerabirenga ndagaano ya bajjajja bo gye yabalayirira. 
5_4_32_Kubanga kale buuza ennaku ez'edda ezaakusooka, okuva ku lunaku Katonda lwe yatonda abantu ku nsi, era okuva ku nkomerero y'eggulu okutuuka ku nkomerero yaalyo, oba nga waabangawo ekifaanana ng'ekigambo kino ekikulu; oba kyawulirwanga ekiri bwe kityo. 
5_4_33_Waabangawo abantu abaawulira eddoboozi lya Katonda nga lyogera nga liva wakati mu muliro, nga ggwe bwe wawulira, ne baba balamu? 
5_4_34_Oba Katonda yali agezezzaako okugenda okwetwalira eggwanga ng'aliggya wakati mu ggwanga linnaalyo, n'okukema n'obubonero n'eby'amagero n'entalo n'engalo ez'amaanyi n'omukono ogwagololwa n'eby'entiisa ebikulu, nga byonna bwe byali Mukama Katonda wammwe bye yabakolera mu Misiri mu maaso gammwe? 
5_4_35_Ggwe walagibwa bw'otyo olyoke omanye nga Mukama ye Katonda; tewali mulala wabula ye. 
5_4_36_Yakuwuliza eddoboozi lye ng'ayima mu ggulu alyoke akuyigirize: ne ku nsi yakulabya omulimu gwe omunene; n'owulira ebigambo bye nga biva wakati mu muliro. 
5_4_37_Era kubanga yayagala bajjajja bo, kyeyava alonda ezzadde lyabwe eriddawo, n'akuggya mu Misiri ye ng'abeera naawe olw'obuyinza bwe obungi; 
5_4_38_okugoba mu maaso go amawanga agaakusinga obukulu n'amaanyi, okukuyingiza ggwe, okukuwa ensi yaabwe okuba obutaka, nga leero. 
5_4_39_Kale manya leero, era okisse ku mwoyo, nga Mukama ye Katonda mu ggulu waggulu ne mu nsi wansi: tewali mulala. 
5_4_40_Era oneekuumanga amateeka ge n'ebiragiro bye, bye nkulagira leero, olabenga ebirungi ggwe n'abaana bo abaliddawo, era omale ennaku anyingi ku nsi, Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa, emirembe gyonna. 
5_4_41_Awo Musa n'alyoka ayawula ebibuga bisatu emitala wa Yoludaani ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba; 
5_4_42_omussi addukirenga omwo, anattanga munne ng'ataniddwa; so nga tamukyawanga; addukirenga mu kimu ku bibuga ebyo abeerenga omulamu; 
5_4_43_Bezeri ekiri mu ddungu, mu lusenyi, okuba eky'Ababalewubeeni; ne Lamosi ekiri mu Gireyaadi okuba eky'Abagaadi; ne Golani ekiri mu Basani okuba eky'Abamanase. 
5_4_44_Era gano ge mateeka Musa ge yateeka mu maaso g'abaana ba Isiraeri: 
5_4_45_buno bwe bujulirwa n'amateeka n'emisango Musa bye yabuulira abaana ba Isiraeri bwe baava mu Misiri; 
5_4_46_emitala wa Yoludaani, mu kiwonvu ekyolekera Besupyoli, mu nsi ya Sikoni kabaka w'Abamoli, eyatuulanga mu Kesuboni, Musa n'abaana ba Isiraeri gwe baakuba, bwe baava mu Misiri: 
5_4_47_ne balya ensi ye, n'ensi ya Ogi kabaka We Basani, bakabaka bombi ab'Abamoli, abaabanga emitals wa Yoludaani ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba; 
5_4_48_okuva ku Aloweri, ekiri ku mabbali g'ekiwonvu kye Alunoni, okutuusa ku lusozi Sayuuni (oyo Ye Kerumooni), 
5_4_49_ne Alaba yonna emitala wa Yoludaani ku luuyi olw'ebuvanjuba, okutuusa ku nnyanja ya Alaba, awali entunaumba za Pisuga. 
5_5_1_Awo Musa n'ayita Isiraeri yenna n'abagamba nti Wulira, ggwe Isiraeri, amateeka n'emisango bye njogera mu matu gammwe leero, mubiyige, mubikwatenga okubikola. 
5_5_2_Mukama Katonda waffe yalagaanira endagaaao aaffe ku Kolebu. 
5_5_3_Mukama teyalagaana ndagaano eyo ne bajjajja baffe, naye naffe ffe, abali wano fenna nga balamu leero. 
5_5_4_Mukama Yayogera nammwe nga mulabagana n'smaaso ku lusozi ng'ayima wakati mu muliro, 
5_5_5_(nayimirira wakati wa Mukama na mmwe mu biro ebyo, okubalaga ekigambo kya Mukama: kubaaga mwali mutidde olw'omuliro ne mutalinnya ku lusozi;) ng'ayogera nti 
5_5_6_Nze Mukama Katonda wo eyakuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, mu nayumba y'obuddu. 
5_5_7_Tobanga na bakatonda balala we ndi. 
5_5_8_Teweekoleranga kifaananyi kyole, ekifaananyi ky'ekintu kyonna ekiri mu ggulu waggulu, newakubadde wansi ku ttaka, newakubadde mu mazzi agali wansi w'ettaka: 
5_5_9_tobivuunamiranga, so tobiweerezanga: kubanga nze Mukama Katonda wo ndi Katonda wa buggya, awalana ku baaaa obubi bwa bajjajja baabwe, ne ku bannakabirye ne ku bannakasatwe ku abo abankya wa; 
5_5_10_era addiramu abantu nkumi na nkumi ku abo abanjagala, abeekuuma amateeka gange. 
5_5_11_Tolayiriraaga bwereere 1innYa lya Mukama Katonda wo: kubanga Mukama talimutowooza nga taliiko musaago omuntu alay^iira obwereere erinnya lye. 
5_5_12_Okwatanga olunaku olwa asabbiiti okulutukuza, nga Mukama Katonda wo bwe yakulagira 
5_5_13_Ennaku omukaaga okolaaga n'omala emi,rimu gyo gyonna: 
5_5_14_naye olunaku olw'omusanvu ye ssabbiiti ya Mukama Katonda wo: tolukolerangako mirimu gyonna ggwe newakubadde mutabani wo newakubadde muwala wo, newakubadde omuddu wo, newakubadde omuzaana wo; newakubadde ente yo, newakubadde endogoyi yo, newakubadde ebisolo byo byonna, newakubadde munnaggwanga wo ali ewuwo; omuddu wo n'omuzaana wo bawummulenga: era nga naawe. 
5_5_15_Era onojjuluranga nga wali muddu mu nsi y'e Misiri, Mukama Katonda wo n'akuggyamu n'engalo ez'amaanyi n'omukono ogwagololwa: Mukama Katonda wo kyeyava akulagira okwekuumanga olunaku olwa ssabbiiti. 
5_5_16_Kitaawo ne nnyoko obassangamu ekitiibwa, nga Mukama Katonda wo bwe yakulagira: ennaku zo zibe nnyingi, era olabe ebirungi ku nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa. 
5_5_17_Tottanga. 
5_5_18_So toyendanga: 
5_5_19_So tobbanga. 
5_5_20_So towaayirizanga muntu munno: 
5_5_21_So teweegombanga mukazi wa muntu munno, so toyaayaaairanga nnyumba ya muntu munno, newakubadde ennimiro ye, newakubadde omuddu we, newakubadde omuzaana we, newakubadde ente ye newakubadde endogoyi ye, newakubadde ekintu kyonna ekya muntu munno. 
5_5_22_Ebigambo ebyo Mukama yabibuulira ekibiina kyammwe kyonna ku lusozi ng'ayima wakati mu muliro ne mu kire ne mu kizikiza ekikutte, n'eddoboozi ddene: n'atayoagerako birala. N'abiwandiika ku bipande bibiri eby'amayinja n'agampa: 
5_5_23_Awo olwatuuka, bwe mwawulira eddoboozi nga liva mu kizikiza wakati, olusozi nga lwaka omuliro, ne munsemberera, abakulu bonna ab'ebika byammwe, n'abakadde bammwe; 
5_5_24_ne mwogera nti Laba, Mukama Katonda waffe atulaze ekitiibwa kye n'obuknlu bwe, era tuwulidde eddoboozi lye nga liva mu muliro: wakati: tulabye leero nga Katonda ayogera n'omuntu n'aba mulamu: 
5_5_25_Kale kaakano twandifiiridde ki? kubanga omuliro guno omungi gunaatuzikiriza: bwe tunaawulira nate eddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda waffe, tunaafa. 
5_5_26_Kubanga ani ku balina omubiri bonna eyali awulidde eddoboozi lya Katonda omulamu nga lyogera nga liva mu muliro wakati, nga ffe bwe tuwulidde, n'aba mulamu? 
5_5_27_Ggwe sembera ownfire byonna Mukama Katonda waffe by'anaayogera: olyoke otubuulire byonna Mukama Katonda waffe by'anaakubuulira; naffe tulibiwulira ne tubikola. 
5_5_28_Mukama n'awulira eddoboozi ly'ebigambo byammwe bwe mwayogera nange; Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Mpulidde eddoboozi ly'ebigambo by'abantu bano, bye bakubuulidde: boogedde bulungi byonna bye bagambye. 
5_5_29_Singa mulimu omutima mu bo ogufaanana bwe guti n'okutya bandintidde ne beekuumanga ebiragiro byange byonna ennaku zonna, balyoke balabe ebirungi n'abaana baabwe emirembe gyonna 
5_5_30_Genda obagambe nti Muddeeyo mu weema zammwe. 
5_5_31_Naye ggwe, yimirira wano we ndi; nange n'akubuulira ekiragiro kyonna n'amateeka n'emisango by'olibayigiriza, balyoke babikolenga mu nsi gye mbawa okugirya. 
5_5_32_Kale munaakwatanga okukola nga Mukama Katonda wammwe bwe yabalagira: temukyamiranga ku mukono ogwa ddyo newakubadde ku gwa kkono. 
5_5_33_Munaatambuliranga mu kkubo lyonna Mukama Katonda wammwe lye yabalagira, mulyoke mubenga abalamu, era mulabe ebirungi, era mumale ennaku nnyingi mu nsi gye mulirya. 
5_6_1_Kale kino kye kiragiro, amateeka n'emisango, Mukama Katonda wammwe bye yalagira okubayigiriza, mulyoke mubikolenga mu nsi, gye musomokera okugendamu okugirya: 
5_6_2_otyenga Mukama Katonda wo, okwekuumanga amateeka ge'gonna n'etiiragiro bye; bye nkulagira ggwe n'omwaaa wo n'omuzzukulu wo, ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwo; era olyoke owangaale ennaku nnyingi. 
5_6_3_Kale wulisa, ggwe Isiraeri, okwatenga okukola kutyo; olabenga ebirungi, era mwale nnyo, nga Mukama Katonda wa bajjajja bo bwe yakusuubiza, mu nsi ekulukuta n'amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki. 
5_6_4_Wulira, ggwe Isiraeri: Mukama Katonda waffe ye Mukama omu: 
5_6_5_era onooyagalanga Mukama Katonda wo n'omutima gwo gwonna, nemmeeme yo yonna, n'amaanyi go gonna. 
5_6_6_Era ebigambo bino bye nkulagira leero binaabanga ku mutima gwo: 
5_6_7_era onoonyiikiranga okubiyigiriza abaana bo, era onoobyogerangako bw'onootuulanga mu nnyumba yo, era bw'onootambuliranga mu kkubo, era bw'onoogalamiranga, era bw'onoogolokokanga: 
5_6_8_Era onoobisibanga okuba akabonero ku mukono gwo, era binaabanga eby'oku kyenyi wakati w'amaaso go. 
5_6_9_Era onoobiwandiikanga ku mifubeeto gy'ennyumba yo, ne ku nzigi zo. 
5_6_10_Awo olulituuka Mukaraa Katonda wo bw'alikuyingiza mu nsi gye yalayirira bajjajja bo, Ibulayimu ne Isaaka ne Yakobo okugikuwa: ebibuga ebinene ebirungi by'otaazimba, 
5_6_11_n'ennyumba ezijjula ebirungi byonna, z'otajjuza, n'ebidiba ebyasimibwa, by'otaasima, ensuku ez'emizabibu n'emizeyituuni gy'otaasimba, n'olya n'okkuta; 
5_6_12_n'olyoka weekuuma olemenga okwerabira Mukama: eyakuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri; mu nnyumba y'obuddu. 
5_6_13_Onootyanga Mukama Katonda wo; era oyo onoomuweerezanga, era erinnya lye ly'onoolayiranga. 
5_6_14_Temugobereranga bakatonda balala, ku bakatonda ab'amawanga agabeetoolodde; 
5_6_15_kubanga Mukama Katonda wo ali wakati wammwe ye Katonda ow'obuggya; obusungu bwa Mukama Katonda wo buleme okukubuubuukirako, n'akuzikiriza okukuggya ku maaso g'ensi. 
5_6_16_Temukemanga Mukama Katonda wammwe, nga bwe mwamukemera e Masa. 
5_6_17_Munaaayiikiranga okwekuuma ebiragiro bya Mukama Katonda wammwe n'ebyo bye yategeeza; n'amateeka ge, ge yakulagira: 
5_6_18_Era onookolanga ekiri mu maaso ga Mukama ekituukirivu era ekirungi: olyoke olabenga ebirungi, era oyingire olye ensi ennungi Mukaana gye yalayirira bajjajja bo, 
5_6_19_okugobamu abalabe bo bonna mu maaso go, nga Mukama bwe yayogera. 
5_6_20_Omwana wo bw'akubuuzanga mu biro ebigenda okujja, ng'ayogera nti Ebyo bye yategeeza, n'amateeka, n’emisango Mukama Katonda waffe bye yabalagira; amakulu gaabyo ki? 
5_6_21_n'olyoka ogamba omwana wo, nti Twali baddu ba Falaawo mu Misiri; Mukama n’atuggya mu Misiri n'engalo ez'amaanyi: 
5_6_22_era Mukama n’alaga obubonero n'eby'amagero, ebinene era ebizibu, ku Misiri, ku Falaawo, ne ku nnyumba ye yonna, mu maaso gaffe: 
5_6_23_n'atuggya omwo, alyoke atuyingize, okutuwa ensi gye yalayirira bajjajja baffe. 
5_6_24_Era Mukama n'atulagira okukolanga amateeka ago gonna, okutyanga Mukama Katonda waffe, olw'obulungi bwaffe ennaku zonna, alyoke atukuumenga tuleme okufa, nga leero. 
5_6_25_Era kinaabanga butuukirivu gye tuli, bwe tunaakwatanga okukola ekiragiro kino kyonna mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda waffe aga bwe yatulagira. 
5_7_1_Mukama Katonda wo bw'alikuyingiza mu nsi gy'ogenda okulya, n'asimbula mu maaso go amawanga mangi, Omukiiti, n'Omugirugaasi, n'Omwamoli, n'Omukanani; n'Omuperizi, n'Omukiivi, n'Omuyebusi, a.mawanga musanvu agakusinga obukulu n'amaaayi 
5_7_3_so tofumbiriganwanga nabo; muwala wo tomuwanga mutabani we, so ne muwala we tomuwasizanga mutabani wo. 
5_7_4_Kubanga alikyusa mutabani wo obutangoberera, baweerezenga bakatonda abalala: obusungu bwa. Mukama bulibuubuuka bwe butyo ku mmwe, era alikuzikiriza mangu 
5_7_5_Naye bwe muti bwe munaabakolanga; munaamenyaamenyanga ebyoto byabwe, mu naabetentanga n'empagi zaabwe, munaatemaatemanga ne Baasera baabwe, n'ebifaananyi byabwe ebyole munaabyokyanga omuliro. 
5_7_6_Kubanga gw'oli ggwanga ttukuvu eri Mukama Katonda. wo: Mukama Katonda wo yakulonda okuba eggwanga ery'envuma gy'ali, okusinga amawanga gonna agali ku maaso g'ensi. 
5_7_7_Mukama teyabassaako kwagala kwe, so teyabalonda, kubanga mwasinga eggwanga lyonna obungi; kubanga mwali batono okusinga amawanga gonna: 
5_7_8_naye kubanga Mukama abaagala, era kubanga ayagala okukwata ekirayiro kye yalayirira bajjajja bammwe, Mukama kyeyava abaggyamu n'engalo ez'amaanyi, n'abanunula mu tmyumba y'obuddu, mu mukono gwa Falaawo kabaka w’e Misiri. 
5_7_9_Kale manya nga Mukama.Katonda wo ye Katonda; Katonda omwesigwa, akwata endagaano n'okusaasira eri abo abamwagala ne beekuuma ebiragiro bye okutuusa emirembe olukumi; 
5_7_10_asasula abo abamukyawa ng'alabagana n'amaaso, okubazikiriza: taddirirenga eri oyo amukyawa, naye anaamusasulanga ng'alabagana n'a maaso. 
5_7_11_Kale oneekuumanga ekiragiro ekyo, n'amateeka, n'emisango, bye nkulagira leero, okubikolanga. 
5_7_12_Awo olulituuka kubanga muwulira emisango gino; ne mugikwata, ne mugikola; Mukama Katonda wo anaakukwatiranga endagaano n'okusaasira bye yalayirira bajjajja bo: 
5_7_13_era anaakwagalanga anaakuwanga omukisa, anaakwazanga: era anaawanga omukisa . ebibala by'omubiri gwo n'ebibala by'ettaka lyo, ennaano yo envinnyo yo n'amafuta go, ezzadde ly'ente zo n'abaana b'embuzi zo, mu nsi gye yalayirira bajjajja bo okukuwa. 
5_7_14_Onoobanga n'omukisa okusinga aimawanga gonna: tewaabenga mugumba mu mmwe newakubadde omusajja newakubadde omukazi, newakuba dde mu bisibo byo. 
5_7_15_Era Mukama anaakuggyangako obulwadde bwonna; so taakussengako n’emu ku ndwadde embi ez'e Misiri, z'omanyi; nape anaazissa,nga ku abo bonna abakukyawa. 
5_7_16_Era onoozikirizanga amawanga gonna Mukama Katonda wo g'anaakugabulanga; amaaso go tegaabasaasirenga: so toweerezanga bakatonda baabwe; kubanga ekyo kinaabanga kyambik gy'oli. 
5_7_17_Bw'onooyogeranga m mutima gwo nti Amawanga gan gansinga obungi; nnyinza ntya okubanyaga? 
5_7_18_tobatyanga; onojjukiriranga ddala Mukama Katond wo bwe yakola Falaawo, ne Misiri yonna; 
5_7_19_okukemebwa okunene amaaso go kwe gaalaba, n'obubonero, n'eby'amagero, n’engalo ez'a maanyi, n'omukono ogwagololwa Mukama Katonda wo bye yakuggisaamu: bw'atyo Mukama Katonda wo bw'anaakolanga amawanga gonna g'otya. 
5_7_20_Era Mukama Katonda wo anaatumanga mu bo ennumba okuruusa abo abalisigalawo ne beekweka lwe balizikirira mu maaso ge. 
5_7_21_Tobatekemukiranga: kubanga Mukama Katonda wo ali wakati wo, Katonda omukulu era ow'entiisa. 
5_7_22_Era Mukama Katonda wo anaasimbulanga amawanga gali mu maaso go kinnalimu; toliyinza kubamalawo mulundi gumu, ensolo ez'omu nsiko zireme okweyongera okukuyinga. 
5_7_23_Naye Mukama Katonda wo anaabagabulanga mu maaso go; era anaabeeraliikirizanga okweraliikirira okungi, okutuusa lwe balizikirira. 
5_7_24_Era anaagabulanga bakabaka baabwe mu mukono gwo, era onoozikirizanga erinnya lyabwe okuva wansi w'egguIu: tewaabenga muntu anaayinzanga okuyimirira mu maaso go, okutuusa lw'olibazikiriza. 
5_7_25_Ebifaananyi ebyole ebya bakatonda baabwe munaabyokyanga omntliro: teweegombanga ffeeza newakubadde zaabu ebiriko, so teweetwaliranga, oleme okutegebwa mu ebyo: kubanga mizizo eri Mukama Katonda wo: 
5_7_26_so toleetanga kintu kya muzizo mu nnyumba yo, naawe n'ofuuka ekyakolimirwa okufaanana nga kyo: onookikyayiranga ddala, era onookitamirwanga ddala; kubanga kiatu ekyakolimirwa. 
5_8_1_Ekiragiro kyonna kye nkulagira leeroragimunaakikwatanga okukikola, mulyoke mubenga abalamu, mwalenga, muyingire mulye ensi Mukama gye yalayirira bajjajja bammwe. 
5_8_2_Era onojjukiranga olugendo lwonna Mukama Katonda wo Iwe yakutambuliza emyaka gino amakumi ana mu ddungu, akutoowaze, akukeme, okumaaya ebyali mu mutima gwo, oba ng'ogenda okwekuumanga ebiragiro bye oba si weewaawo. 
5_8_3_N'akutoowaza n'akulumya enjala, n'akuliisa emmaanu, gye wali tomanyi, so ne bajjajja bo tebagimanyanga; akutegeeze ng'omuntu taba mulamu na mmere yokka, aaye olwa buli ekiva mu kamwa ka Mukama omuntu kyava aba omulamu. 
5_8_4_Ebyambalo byo tebyakaddiyiranga ku ggwe, so n'ekigere kyo tekyazimbaaga, emyaka gino amakumi ana. 
5_8_5_Era onoolowoozanga mu mutima gwo ng'omuntu nga bw'akaagavvula omwana we, bw'aryo Mukama Katonda wo bw'akukangavvula ggwe. 
5_8_6_Era oneekuumanga ebiragiro bya Mukama Katonda wo, okutambuliranga mu makubo ge, n’okumutyanga. 
5_8_7_Kubanga Mukama Katonda wo akuyingiza mu nsi ennungi, ensi ey'emigga gy'amazzi, ey'enzizi n'ebidiba, agakulukutira mu biwonvu ne ku nsozi 
5_8_10_Era onoolyaaga n'okkuta, ne weebaza Mukama Katonda wo olw'ensi ennungi gye yakuwa. 
5_8_11_Weekuumenga oleme okwerabira Mukama Katonda wo, obuteokuumanga biragiro bye n'emisango gye n'amateeka ge bye nkulagira leero: 
5_8_12_bw'onoomalanga okulya n'okkuta, era ng'omaze okuzimba enayumba ennungi n'okutuula omwo; 
5_8_13_era ente zo n’embuzi zo nga zaaze, n'effeeza yo ne zaabu yo nga zaaze, ne byonna by'olina nga byaze; 
5_8_14_kale omutima gwo gulemenga okugulumizibwa, ne weerabira Mukama Katottda wo, eyakuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, mu nayumba y'obuddu; 
5_8_15_eyakuyisa mu ddungu eddene era ery'entiisa, omwali emisota egy'omuliro n’enjaba ez'obusagwa, n'ettaka erirumwa ennyonta awatali mazzi; eyakuggira amazzi mu lwazi olw'embaalebaale; 
5_8_16_eyakuliisiza mu ddungu emmaanu, bajjajja bo gye batamanyanga; akutoowaze, akukeme, akukole bulungi ku nkomerero yo: 
5_8_17_era olemenga okwogera mu mutima gwo nti Obuyinza bwange n’amaanyi g'omukono gwange bye binfunidde obugagga buno. 
5_8_18_Naye onojjukiraaga Mukama Katonda wo, kubanga oyo yakuwa obuyinza okufuna obugagga; anyweze endagaano ye gye yalayirira bajjajja bo, nga leero. 
5_8_19_Awo olunaatuukanga, bw'oneerabiranga Mukama Katonda wo n'ogoberera bakatonda abalala n'obaweereza n'obasinza, mbategeeza leero nga temuulemenga kuzikirira. 
5_8_20_Ng'amawanga Mukama g'azikiriza mu maaso gammwe, bwe munaazikiriranga bwe mutyo; kubanga temwakkiriza kuwulira ddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
5_9_1_Wulira, ggwe Isiraeri: ogenda okusomoka Yoludaani leero, okuyiagira okulya amawanga agakusinga obunene n'amaanyi, ebibuga ebinene ebyazimbibwako ebigo okutuuka mn ggulu, 
5_9_2_abantu abanene abawanvu, abaana b'Anaki, b'omanyi, era be wawulirako nga bagamba nti Ani ayinza okuyimirira mu maaso g'abaana ba Anaki? 
5_9_3_Kale manya leero nga Mukama Katonda wo ye wuuyo asomoka okukukulembera ng'omuliro ogwokya; ye alibazikiriza, era alibamegga mu maaso go: bw'otyo bw'olibagobamu, n'obaziluriza mangu, nga Mukama bwe yakugamba. 
5_9_4_Toyogeranga mu mutima gwo, Mukama Katonda wo bw'alimala okubasindika mu maaso go, ng'ogamba nu Olw'obutuukirivu bwange Mukama kyavudde annyiagiza okulya ensi eno: kubanga olw'obubi bw'amawanga ago Mukama kyava agagoba mu maaso go. 
5_9_5_Si lwa butuukirivu bwo so si lwa bugolokofu bwa mutima gwo, kyova oyingira okulya ensi yaabwe: naye olw'obubi bw'amawanga, ago Mukama Katonda wo kyava agagoba mu maaso go, era alyoke anyweze ekigambo Mukama kye yalayirira bajjajja bo, Ibulayimu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo. 
5_9_6_Kale manya nga Mukama Katonda wo takuwa nsi eno nnuagi okugirya lwa butuukirivu bwo; kubanga oli ggwanga eririna ensingo enkakaayavu. 
5_9_7_Jjukira teweerabiranga bwe wasunguwaza Mukama Katonda wo mu ddungu: okuva ku lunaku lwe waviiramu mu nsi y'e Misiri okutuusa lwe mwajja mu kifo kino; mujeemera Mukama. 
5_9_8_Era ne ku Kolebu mwasunguwaza Mukama, Mukama n'abanyiigira okubazikiriza. 
5_9_9_Bwe nnali aga mmaze okulinnya ku lusozi okuweebwa ebipande eby'amayinja, bye bipande eby'endagaano Mukama gye yalagaana nammwe, ne ndyoka mmala ku lusozi ennaku amakumi ana emisana n'ekiro; saalyanga mmere so saanywanga. mazzi. 
5_9_10_Mukama n’ampa ebipande bibiri eby'amayinja ebyawandiikibwako n'engalo ya Katonda; era ku byo kwawandiikibwa ng'ebigambo byonna bwe biri, Mukama bye yayogera nammwe ku lusozi ng'ayima wakati mu muliro ku lunaku olw'okuku nnaanirako. 
5_9_11_Awo olwatuuka ennaku amakumi ana bwe zaayitawo emisana n'ekiro, Mukama n'ampa ebipande ebibiri eby'amayinja, bye bipande eby'endagaano. 
5_9_12_Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Golokoka ove wano oserengere mangu: kubanga abantu bo be waggya mu Misiri beeyoonoonye; bakyamye mangu okuva mu kkubo lye nnabalagira; beekoledde ekifaanaayi ekisaanuuse. 
5_9_13_Era Mukama ne yeeyongera n'aŋŋamba nti Ndabye eggwanga lino, era, laba, lye ggwanga eririna ensingo enkakanyavu: 
5_9_14_ndeka mbazikirize, nsangule erinnya lyabwe wansi w'eggulu: era ndifuula ggwe eggwanga eribasinga amaanyi n'obukulu. 
5_9_15_Awo ne nkyuka ne ava ku lusozi, era olusozi nga lwaka omuliro: n’ebipande eby'endagaano byombi aga biri mu mikono gyange gyombi. 
5_9_16_Ne atunula, era, laba, mwali mumaze okusobya ku Mukama Katonda wammwe; mwali mumaze okwekolera enayana ensaanuuse: mwali mumaze okuky ama amangu okuva mu kkubo Mukama lye yabalagira. 
5_9_17_Ne nkwata ebipande byombi, ne mbisuula mu mikono gyange gyombi, ne mbi menya mu maaso gammwe. 
5_9_18_Ne avuunamira mu maaso ga Mukama, ng'olubereberye, ennaku amakumi ana emisana n'ekiro; saalyanga mmere so saanywanga mazzi; olw'okwonoona.kwammwe kwonna kwe mwayonoona, nga mukola ekyali mu maaso ga Mukama ekibi okumusunguwaza. 
5_9_19_Kubanga natya obusungu n'ekiruyi, Mukama bwe yali abasunguwalidde okubazikiriza. Naye Mukama n’ampulira n'omulundi guli. 
5_9_20_Mukama n’asunguwalira nnyo Alooni okumuzikiriza: era ne nsabira ne Alooni mu biro ebyo. 
5_9_21_Ne nzirira ekibi kyammwe, ennyana gye mwali mukoze, ne ngyokya omuliro, ne ngisambirira, nga ngisekulasekula nnyo, okutuusa lwe yafaanana ng'enfuufu: ne nsuula enfuufu yaayo mu kagga akaserengetn’ okuva ku lusozi. 
5_9_22_Era e Tabera, n’e Masa, n'e Kiberosukataava mwasunguwalizaayo Mukama: 
5_9_23_Awo Mukama bwe yabatuma okuva e Kadesubanea, ng'ayogera nti Mwambuke mulye ensi gye mbawadde; ne mulyoka mujeemera ekiragiro kya Mukama Katonda wammwe, so temwamukkiriza, so temwawulira ddoboozi lye. 
5_9_24_Mujeemera Mukama okuva ku lunaku lwe nnabamanya. 
5_9_25_Awo ne nvuunamira mu maaso ga Mukama ennaku amakuau ana emisana n’ekiro ze nnavuunamirira; kubanga Mukama yali ayogedde ng'agenda okubazikiriza: 
5_9_26_Ne nsaba Mukama ne njogera nti Ai Multama Katonda, tozikiriza bantu be na busika bwo, be wanuaula olw'obukulu bwo, be waggya mu Misiri n'engalo ez'amaanyi. 
5_9_27_Jjukira abaddu be, Ibulayimu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo; totunuulira bukakanyavu bwa bantu bano newakubadde obubi bwabwe newakubadde okwonoona kwabwe: 
5_9_28_ensi gye wattiggyamu ereme okwogeta nti Kubanga Mukama teyayinza kubaleeta: mu nsi gye yabasuubiza; era kubanga yabakyawa, kyeyava abafulumya mu ddungu okubatta. 
5_9_29_Naye be bantu be, era bwe busika bwo, be waggyamu n'obuyinza bwo obungi n’omukono gwo ogwagololwa. 
5_10_1_Mu biro ebyo Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Weetemere ebipande bibiri eby'amayinja ebifaanana ng'eby'olubereberye, olinnye gye ndi ku lusozi, weekolere essanduuko ey'omuti. 
5_10_2_Era nnaawandiika ku bipande ebigambo ebyali ku bipande eby'olubereberye bye wamenya, era onoobiteeka mu ssanduuko. 
5_10_3_Awo ne nkola essanduuko ey'omuti gwa sita, ne ntema ebipande bibiri eby'amayinja ebifaanana ng'eby'olubereberye, ne nninnya ku lusozi, nga nkutte ebipande ebibiri mu ngalo zange. 
5_10_4_N'awandiika ku bipande, ng'okuwandiika okw'olubereberye bwe kwali, amateeka ekkumi, Mukama ge yababuulira ku lusozi ng'ayima wakati mu muliro ku lunaku olw'okukuŋŋaanirako Mukama n'abimpa. 
5_10_5_Ne nkyuka ne nva ku lusozi, ne ateeka ebipande mu ssanduuko, gye nnali nkoze; era biri omwo, nga Mukama bwe yandagira. 
5_10_6_(Abaana ba. Isiraeri ne batambula okuva e Beerosubeneyaakani okutuuka e Mosera: Alooni n'afiira eye, era eye gye yaziikibwa; Eriyazaali mutabani we n'aweerezanga mu bwakabona mu kifo kye. 
5_10_7_Ne bavaayo ne batambula okuruuka e Gudugoda; ne bava e Gudugoda ne batambula okutuuka e Yotubasa, ensi ey'emigga egy'amazzi. 
5_10_8_Mu biro ebyo Mukama n'ayawula ekika kya Leevi, okusitulanga essanduuko ey'endagaano ya Mukama, okuyimirira mu maaso ga Mukama, okumuweerezanga, n'okwebazanga erinnya lye, ne leero. 
5_10_9_Leevi kyava alema okuba n'omugabo newakubadde obusika awamu ne baganda be; Mukama bwe busika bwe, nga Mukama Katonda we bwe yamu gamba.) 
5_10_10_Ne mmala ennaku amakumi ana emisana n’ekiro ku lusozi, ng'omulundi ogw'olubereberye: Mukama n'ampulira n'omulundi ogwo; Mukama nga tagenda kukuzikiriza. 
5_10_11_Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Golokoka, otambule ku lugendo lwo ng'okulembera abaatu; era baliyingira balirya ensi gye nnalayirira bajjajja baabwe okubawa: 
5_10_12_Ne kaakano, Isiraeri, Mukama Katoada we akwagaza ki wabula okutyanga Mukama Katonda we, okutambuliranga mu makubo ge gonna, n'okumwagala, n’okuweereza Mukama Katonda we n'omutima gwo gwonna, n'emmeeme yo yonna, 
5_10_13_okwekuumanga ebiragiro bya Mukama n'amateeka ge, bwe nkulagira leero olw'obulungi bwo? 
5_10_14_Laba, Mukama Katonda we ye nnannyini ggulu, n'eggulu erya waggulu ensi era n'ebigirimu byonna. 
5_10_15_Mukama yasanyukira busanyukizi bajjajja be okubaagala, n'alonda ezzadde lyabwe eryaddawo, ye mmwe okusinga amawanga gonna, nga leero. 
5_10_16_Kale mukomole ekikuta ky'omutima gwammwe so, temubanga nate ba nsingo nkakanyavu 
5_10_17_Kubanga kiukama Katonda wammwe ye Katonda wa bakatonda era Mukama w'abaami, Katonda omukulu, ow'amaanyi era ow'entiisa, atatya maaso ga bantu, so talya nguzi. 
5_10_18_Asalira omusango mulekwa ne nnamwandu, era ayagala muanaggwanga, ng'amuwa ebyokulya n'ebyo kwambala. 
5_10_19_Kale mwagalenga munnaggwanga: kubanga mwali bannaggwanga mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
5_10_20_Onootyanga Mukama Katonda we; eye gw'onooweerezanga; era eye gw'oneegattanga aaye, n'erinnya lye ly'onoolayiranga. 
5_10_21_Oyo lye ttendo lye, era ye Katoada we, eyakukolera ebyo ebikulu era eby'entiisa, amaaso go bye gaalaba. 
5_10_22_Bajjajja be baaserengeta mu Misiri nga bali abantu nsanvu; ne kaakano Mukama Katonda we akufudde ng'emmuyeenye ez'omu ggulu olw'obungi. 
5_11_1_Kale onooyagalanga Mukama Katonda we, ne weekuuma bye yakuutira n'amateeka ge n'emisango gye n'ebiragiro bye ennaku zonna. 
5_11_2_Era mumanye leero: kubanga soogera aa baana bammwe abatannamanya era abatannalaba kukangavvula kwa Mukama Katonda wammwe, obukulu bwe, engalo ze ez'amaanyi, n'omukona gwe ogwagololwa, 
5_11_3_n'obubonero bwe, n'emirimu gye, bye yakolera wakati mu Misiri Falaawo kabaka w’e Msirin'ensi ye yonna 
5_11_5_era bye yabakolera mu ddungu okuruusa lwe mwajja mu kifo kino 
5_11_7_naye amaaso. gammwe gaalabanga omulimu gwonna omukulu ogwa Mukama gwe yakola. 
5_11_8_Kale muneekuumanga ekiraBiro kyonna kye nkulagira leero, mulyoke mube n'amaanyi, muyingire mulye ensi gye. musomokera okugendamu okugirya 
5_11_10_Kubanga ensi gy'oyiagiramu okugirya, tefaanana ng'ensi y'e Misiri mwe mwava, mwe wasigiranga ensigo zo n'ogifukirira amazzi n'ekigere kyo, ng'ennimiro y'enva: 
5_11_11_nate ensi gye musomokera okugendamu okugirya ye asi ey'ebiwonvu n'ensozi, enywa amazzi ag'enkuba eva mu ggulu: 
5_11_12_ensi Mukama Katonda wo gy'ayagala; amaaso ga Mukama Katonda wo gaba ku yo ennaku zonna, okuva omwaka we gusookera okutuusa ku nkomerero ya gwo. 
5_11_13_Awo olunaatuukanga bwe munaanyiikiranga okuwulira ebigambo byange bye mbalagira leero, okwagala Mukama Katonda wammwe, n'okumuweereza n'omutima gwammwe gwonna n'emmeeme Yammwe yonna, 
5_11_14_naatonnyesanga enkuba y'ensi yammwe mu ntuuko zaayo, enkuba eya ddumbi n'eya ttoggo, okungulenga ennaano yo n’envinnyo yo n'amafuta go. 
5_11_15_Era naawanga.omuddo mu nniaiiro zo olw'ebisibo byo era onoolyanga n'okkuta. 
5_11_16_Mwekuumenga omutima gwammwe Suleme okulimbibwa, ne mukyama, ne muweereza bakatonda abalala, ne mubasinza; 
5_11_17_obusungu bwa Mukama ne bubabuubuukirako, n'aggalawo eggulu, enkuba obutatonayanga, n'ensi obutabalanga bibala byayo; ne muzikirira mangu okuva ku nsi ennungi Mukama gy'abawa. 
5_11_18_Kale mutereke, ebigambo byange ebyo mu mutima gwammwe ne mu mmeeme yammwe; era munaabisibanga okuba akabonero ku mikono gyammwe, era binaabanga eby'okukyenyi, wakati w'amaaso gammwe. 
5_11_19_Era munaabiyigirizaaga, abaana bammwe nga mubinyumya, bw'onootuulanga mu nnyumba yo .era bw'onootambuliranga mu kkubo, era bw'onoogalamiranga, era bw'onoogolokokanga, 
5_11_20_Era onoobiwandiikanga ku mifubeeto gy'ennyumba, yo ne ku nzigi zo: 
5_11_21_ennaku zammwe zeeyongerenga, n'ennaku ez'abaana bammwe, ku nsi Mukama gye yalayirira bajjajja bammwe okubawa, ng'ennaku ez'eggulu eriri waggulu w'ensi. 
5_11_22_Kubanga bwe munaanyiikiranga okwekuuma ekiragiro kino kyonna kye mbalagira, okukikola; okwagalanga Mukama Katonda wammwe, okutambuliranga mu makubo ge gonna, n'okwegatta naye; 
5_11_23_Mukama anaagobaagamu amawanga gano gonna mu maaso, gammwe, mmwe ne mulya amawanga agabasinga obunene n'a maanyi. 
5_11_24_Buli kifo ekinaalinnyibwangamu ekigere kyammwe kinaabanga kyammwe: okuva ku ddungu ne Lebanooni, okuva ku mugga; omugga Fulaati, okutuuka ku.nnyanja ey'omu mabega we wanaabanga ensalo yammwe. 
5_11_25_Tewaliba muntu aliyinza okuyimirira mu maaso gammwe; Mukama Katanda wammwe anaateekanga ekitiibwa kyammwe n'entiisa yammwe ku nsi yonna kwe munaalinnyanga, nga bwe yabagamba. 
5_11_26_Laba, leero nteeka mu maaso gammwe omukisa n'okukolimirwa; 
5_11_27_omukisa bwe munaawuliranga ebiragiro, bya Mukama Katonda wammwe, bye mbalagira leero: 
5_11_28_n'okukolimirwa, bwe mutaawulirenga biragiro bya Mukama Katottda wammwe, naye ne mukyama okuva mu kkubo lye mbalagira leero, okugoberera bakatonda atialala be mutamanyanga. 
5_11_29_Awo olulituuka Mukama Katonda wo bw'alikuyingiza mu nsi gy'ogendamu okugirya, oliteeka omulusa ogwo ku lusozi Gerizimu, n'okukolimirwa okwo ku lusozi Ebali. 
5_11_30_Ezo teziri mitala wa Yoludaani, ennyuma w'ekkubo ery'ebugwanjuba, mu nsi ey'Abakanani abatuula mu Alaba, ekyolekera Girugaali, ku mabbali g'emyera gya Mole? 
5_11_31_Kubanga mugenda okusomoka Yoludaani okuyingira okulya ensi Mukama Katonda wammwe gy'abawa, era muligirya, ne mutuula omwo. 
5_11_32_Era munaa kwatanga okukola amateeka gonna n'emisango bye nteeka mu maaso gammwe leero. 
5_12_1_Gano ge mateeka n'emisango, bye munaakwatanga okukola mu nsi Mukama Katonda wa bajjajja bo gye yakuwa okugirya, ennaku zonna ze munaabeererangamu abalanu ku nsi: 
5_12_2_Temulirema kuzikiriza bifo byonna amawanga ge mulirya mwe baaweererezanga bakatonda baabwe, ku nsozi empanvu, ne ku busozi, ne wansi wa buli muti omubisi: 
5_12_3_era munaasuulanga ebyoto byabwe, era munaamenyaamenyanga empagi zaabwe, era munaayokyanga Abaasera baabwe n'omuliro; era munaatematemanga ebifaananyi ebyole ebya bakatonda baabwe; era mulizikiriza erinnya lyabwe mu kifo omwo. 
5_12_4_Temukolanga bwe mutyo Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
5_12_5_Naye mu kifo Mukama Katonda wammwe ky'alyeroboza mu bika byammwe byonna okuteeka omwo erinnya lye, kye kifo mw'atuula, munaanoonyangayo, era onojjangayo 
5_12_7_era munaaliiranga eyo mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wammwe, era munaasanyukiranga ebyo byonna bye munassangako emikono gyammwe, mmwe n'ab'omu nnyumba zammwe, Mukama Katonda wo mwe yakuweera omukisa. 
5_12_8_Temukolanga ng'ebyo byonna bwe biri bye tukola wano leero, buli muntu ekiri mu maaso ge, ekirungi 
5_12_10_Naye bwe mulisomoka Yoludaani ne mutuula mu nsi Mukania Katonda wammwe gy'abasisa, n'abawa okuwummula eri abalabe bammwe bonna abanaabeetooloolanga n'okutuula ne mutuula mirembe; 
5_12_11_awo olulituuka mu kifo Mukama Katonda wammwe ky'alyeroboza okutuuza omwo erinnya lye, munaaleetanga eyo byonna bye mbalagira, ebyo bye muwaayo ebyokebwa, ne ssaddaaka zammwe, ebitundu byammwe eby'ekkumi, n'ek'iweebwayo ekisitulibwa eky'omukono gwammwe, n'obweyamo bwonna obusinga obulungi bwe mweyama Mukama: 
5_12_12_era munaasanyukiranga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wammwe, mmwe ne batabani bammwe ne bawala bammwe n'abaddu bammwe n'abazaana bammwe n'Omuleevi ali munda w'enzigi zammwe, kubanga talina mugabo newakubadde obusika wamu nammwe. 
5_12_13_Weekuumenga oleme okuweerayo ebyo bye muwaayo ebyokebwa mu buti kifo ky'olaba: 
5_12_14_naye mu kifo Mukama ky'alyeroboza mu kimu ku bika byammwe; eyo gy'onooweeranga ebyo bw'owaayo ebyokebws era eyo gy'onookoleranga byonna bye akulagira. 
5_12_15_Naye oyinza okutta ennyama n'okugirya munda w'enzigi zo zonna, ng'okwagala kwonna okw'emmeeme yo bwe kunaabanga, ng'omulusa gwa Mukama Katonda wo gwe yakuwa: abatali balongoofu n'abalongoofu bayinza okugiryako, nga bwe balya ku mpewo ne ku njaza. 
5_12_16_Kyokka temulyanga ku musaayi; onoogufukanga ku ttaka ng'amazzi: 
5_12_17_Toliiranga munda w'enzigi zo kitundu eky'ekkunu eky'eŋŋaano yo, newakubadde eky'envinnyo yo, newakubadde eky'amafuta go, newakubadde ebibereberye by'ente zo newakubadde eby'endiga zo, newakubadde ekintu kyonna ku ebyo bye weeyama, newakubadde ebyo by'owaayo ku bubwo, newakubadde ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa eky'omukono gwo: 
5_12_18_naye onoobiriiranga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo mu kifo Mukama Katonda wo ky'alyeroboza, ggwene mutabani wo ne muwala wo n'omuddu wo n'omuzaana wo n'0muleevi ali munda w'enzigi zo: era onoosanyukiranga ebyo byonna by'onossangakov omukono gwo mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_12_19_Weekuumenga oleme okwabulira Omuleevi. ennaku zonna z'onoobeererangamu omulamu ku nsi yo. 
5_12_20_Mukama Katonda wo bw'aligaziya ensalo yo, nga bwe yakusuubiza, naawe n'oyogera nti Naalya ennyama, kubanga emmeeme yo eyagala okulya ennyama; oyinza okulya ennyama, ng'okwagala kwonna okw'emmeeme yo bwe kuli. 
5_12_21_Oba ng'ekifo Mukama Katonda wo ky'alyeroboza okuteeka omwo erinnya lye kiriyinga okukuba ewala, onottanga ku nte zo ne ku mbuzi zo, Mukama zeyakuwa, nga bwe nnakulagira, era onooliiranga munda w'enzigi zo, ng'okwagala kwonna okw'emmeeme'yo bwe kunaabanga. 
5_12_22_Ng'empeewo n'enjaza bwe ziriibwa, bw'otyo bw'oaoogiryangako: atali mulongoofu n'omulongoofu banaagiryangako okwenkanankana: 
5_12_23_Kyokka weetegereze olemenga okulya ku musaayi: kubanga omusaayi bwe bulamu; so toliiranga bulamu wamu n'ennyama. 
5_12_24_Togulyanga onoogufukanga ku ttaka ag'amazzi. 
5_12_25_Togulyanga; olyoke olabenga ebirtmgi n'abaana bo abaliddawo, bw'onookolanga ekiri mu maaso ga Mukama ekirungi. 
5_12_26_Kyokka ebitukuvu byo by'oliaa n'obweyamo bwo onoobiddiranga n'oyingira mu kifo Mukama ky'alyeroboza; 
5_12_27_era onooweerangayo ebyo by'owaayo ebyokebwa; ennyama n'omusaayi, ku kyoto kya Mukama Katonda wo: era omusaayi gwa ssaddaaka zo gunaafukibwanga ku kyoto kya Mukama Katonda wo; naawe onoolyanga ennyama.
