5_12_28_Kwata owulirenga ebigambo eby'o byonna bye nkulagira; olyoke olabenga ebirungi n'abaana bo abaliddawo emirembe gyonna, bw'onookolariga ekiiri mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo ekirungi era eky'ensonga; 
5_12_29_Mukama Katonda wo bw'alizikiriza amawanga mu maaso go, gy'oyingira okugalya, n'ogalya, n'otuula mu nsi yaabwe; 
5_12_30_weekuumenga oleme okutegebwa okugagoberera, bwe galimala okuzikirira mu maaso go; era olemenga okubuuza ebya bakatonda baabwe ng'oyogera nti Amawanga gano gaweereza. gatya bakatonda baabwe? era nange bwe. nnaakolanga bwe ntyo. 
5_12_31_Tokolanga bw'otyo Mukama Katonda wo: kubanga buli kigambo Mukama ky'ayita eky'omuzizo ky'akyawa bali baakikolanga bakatonda baabwe: kubanga ne batabani baabwe ne bawala baabwe baabookyanga omuliro eri bakatonda baabwe. 
5_12_32_Buli kigambo kye mbalagira munaakikwatanga okukola: tokyongerangako, so tokisalangako. 
5_13_1_Bwe wanaabangawo wakati mu ggwe nabbi oba omuloosi w'ebirooto, n'akuwa akabonero oba eky'amagero, 
5_13_2_akabonero ako oba eky'amagero eiryo ne kituukirira, kye yakugambako ng'ayogera nti Tugobererenga bakatonda abalala b'otomanyanga, era tubaweerezenga 
5_13_4_Munaatambulanga okugoberera Mukama Katonda wammwe ne mwekuumanga ebiragiro bye ne muwuliraaga eddoboozi lye, era munaamuweerezaaga, ne mwega ttanga naye. 
5_13_5_Era nabbi oyo oba omuloosi w'ebirooto anattibwanga; kubanga ayogedde eby'okujeemera Mukama Katonda wammwe, eyabaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, n'akununula mu nnyumba y'obuddu, okukusendasenda okukyama okuva mu kkubo Mukama Katoada wo lye yakulagira okutambulirangamu. Bw'otyo bw'onoggyangamu obubi wakati mu ggwe. 
5_13_6_Muganda wo, mutabani wa nnyoko, oba mutabani wo, oba muwala wo, oba omukazi ow'omu kifuba kyo, oba mukwano gwo, alitinanga obulamu bwo ggwe, bw'akusendasendanga ekyama, ng'ayogera nti Tugende tuweereze bakatonda abalala, b'otomanyanga ggwe newakubadde bajjajja bo 
5_13_8_tomukkirizanga so tomuwuliranga; so n'eriiso lyo terimusaasiranga, so tosonyiwanga, so tomukwekanga: 
5_13_9_naye tolemanga kumutta; omukono gwo gwe gunaasookanga okuba ku ye okumutta, omukono gw'abantu bonna ne gulyoka gumubaako. 
5_13_10_Era onoomukubanga amayinla afe; kubanga agezezzaako okukusendasenda okuva ku Mukama Katonda wo, eyakuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, mu nnyumba y'obuddu. 
5_13_11_Ne Isiraeri yenna anaawuliranga, ne batya, ne batakola nate bubi obwenkana awo wakati mu ggwe, 
5_13_12_Bw'onoowuliranga nga boogera ku kimu ku bibuga byo, Mukama Katonda wo by'akuwa okutuula omwo, nga bagamba nti 
5_13_13_Waliwo abantu abataliiko kye bagasa abavudde wakati mu ggwe, era abasenzesenze abatuula mu kibuga kyabwe, nga boogera nti Tugende tuweereze bakatonda abalala be mutamaayanga; 
5_13_14_onookeberanga n'onoonya n'obuuliriza; era laba, oba nga kya mazima, elugambo ne kitegeerekeka, ng'eky'omuzizo ekyenkana awo kikolerwa wakati mu ggwe; 
5_13_15_tolemanga kutta abatuula mu kibuga omwo n’obwogi bw'ekitala, ng'okizikiririza ddala ne byonna ebikirimu n'ebisibo byakyo, n'obwogi bw'ekitata. 
5_13_16_Era onookuŋŋaanyanga omunyago gwakyo gwonna wakati mu luguudo lwakyo, n'oyokya ekibuga omuliro, n'omunyago gwonna buli kantu konna, eri Mukama Katonda wo: era kinaabanga kifunvu ennaku zonna; tekirizimbibwa nate. 
5_13_17_So tewabanga ku kintu ekyakolimirwa ekineegatta nga n'omukono gwo: Mukama akyuke okuleka obusungu bwe obukambwe, akulage ekisa, akusaasire, era akwaze, nga bwe yalayirira bajjajja bo; 
5_13_18_bw'onoowuliranga eddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo, okwekuumanga, ebiragiro bye byonna bye nkulagira, leero, okukolanga ekiri mu manso ga Mukama Katonda wo ekirungi. 
5_14_1_Mmwe muli baana ba Mukama Katonda wammwe: temwesalanga, so temum.wanga kiwalaata kyonna wakati w'amaaso gammwe olw'abafu. 
5_14_2_Kubanga oli ggwanga ttukuvu eri Mukama Katonda wo, era Mukama yakulonda okuba eggwanga ery'envuma gy'ali, okusinga amawanga goana agali ku maaso g'ensi. 
5_14_3_Tolyanga kintu kyonna kya muzizo. 
5_14_4_Zino ze nsolo ze munaalyanga: ente, endiga n’embuzi, 
5_14_5_enjaza n’empeewo n’ennangaazi n'embulabuzi n'entamu n'enteŋŋo n'endiga ey'omu nsiko. 
5_14_6_Na buli nsolo eyawulamu ekinuulo, era ekirina ekinuulo ekyaseemu, ezza obwenkulumo, mu nsolo, eyo gye munaalyanga. 
5_14_7_Naye zino ze mutalyangako ku ezo ezizza obwenkulumo, oba ku ezo ezirina ekinuulo ekyaseemu: eŋŋamira n'akamyu n'omusu, kubanga bizza obwenkulumo, naye tebyawulamu kinuulo, ebyo si birongoofu gye muli: 
5_14_8_n'embizzi, kubanga eyawulamu ekinuulo naye tezza bwekulumo, eyo si nnongoofu gye muli: ku nnyama yaabyo temugiryangako, n'emirambo gyabyo temugikomangako. 
5_14_9_Bino bye munaalyanga ku byonna ebiba mu mazzi: buli ekirina amaggwa n'amagamba munaakiryaaga: 
5_14_10_na buli ekitalina maggwa na magamba temukiryanga; si kirongoofu gye muli. 
5_14_11_Ku nnyonyi zonna ennongoofu muyinza okuziryako. 
5_14_12_Naye zino ze mutalyangako: ennunda, n'empungu, ne makwanzi; 
5_14_13_ne wonzi, n'eddiirawamu, ne kamunye n'engeri ye; 
5_14_14_na buli namuŋŋoona n'engeri ye; 
5_14_15_ne maaya, n'olubugabuga, n’olusove, n'enkambo n'engeri yaayo; 
5_14_16_n'ekiwuugulu, n'ekkufukufu, n'ekiwuugulu eky'amatu; 
5_14_17_n'ekimbaala, n'ensega, n'enkobyokobyo; 
5_14_18_ne kasiida, ne ssekanyolya n'engeri ye, n’ekkookootezi, n'ekinyira. 
5_14_19_Ne byonna ebyewalula ebirina ebiwaawaatiro si birongoofu gye muli: tebiriibwanga. 
5_14_20_Ku nnyonyi zonna ennongoofu muyinza okuziryako. 
5_14_21_Temulyanga ku kintu kyonna ekifa kyokka: oyinza okukiwa munnaggwanga ali munda w'enzigi zo akirye; oba oyinza okukiguza mu nnaggwanga: kubanga gw'oli ggwanga ttukuvu eri Mukama Katonda wo. Tofumbiranga mwana gwa mbuzi mu mata ga nnyina gwayo. 
5_14_22_Tolemanga kusolooza kitundu kya kkumi ku bibala byonna eby'ensigo zo ebinaavanga mu nnimiro buli mwaka. 
5_14_23_Era onooliiranga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo mu kifo ky'alyeroboza okutuuza omwo erinnya lye ekitundu eky'ekkumi eky'eŋŋaano yo, n'eky'envinnyo yo, n’eky'amafuta go, n'ebibereberye by'ente zo n'eby'embuzi zo; oyige okutyanga Mukama Katonda wo ennaku zonna. 
5_14_24_Era oba ng'olugendo lunaakuyinganga okuba olunene, n'okuyinza n'otoyinza kukitwalayo, kubanga ekifo kiyinze okukuba ewala, Mukama Katonda wo ky'alyeroboza okuteeka omwo erianya lye, Mukama Katonda wo bw'alikuwa omukisa; 
5_14_25_onookiwaanyisangamu effeeza, n'osiba effeeza mu mukono gwo, n'ogenda mu kifo Mukama Kafonda wo ky'alyeroboza: 
5_14_26_kale effeeza onoogigulangamu ekintu kyonna emmeeme yo ky'eyagala, ente, oba ndiga, oba nvinnyo, oba ekitamiiza, oba ekintu kyonna emmeeme yo ky'eneekusabanga: era onooliiranga eyo mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo, era onoosanyukanga ggwe n'ab'omu nnyumba yo: 
5_14_27_n’Omuleevi ali munda w'enzigi zo, tomwabuliranga; kubanga talina mugabo newakubadde obusika awamu naawe. 
5_14_28_Buli myaka esatu bwe giggwangako, onoofulumyanga ekitundu kyonna eky'ekkumi eky'ebibala byo mu mwaka ogwo, n'okiterekanga munda w'enzigi zo: 
5_14_29_n'Omuleevi, kubanga talina mugabo newakubadde obusika awamu naawe, ne munnaggwanga, ne mulekwa, ne namwandu abali munda w'enzigi zo, banajjanga ne balya ne bakkuta; Mukama Katonda wo alyoke akuwe omukisa mu mulimu gwonna ogw'a mukono gwo gw'okola. 
5_15_1_Buli myaka omusanvu bwe giggwangako, onoosumululanga. 
5_15_2_Era eno ye ngeri y'okusumulula okwo: buli abanja anaasumululanga ekyo kye yawola muliraanwa we; takibanjanga muliraanwa we era muganda we; kubanga okusumulula kwa Mukama nga kulangiddwa. 
5_15_3_Munnaggwanga oyinza okukimubanja: naye ekintu kyonna ku bibyo ekiri ne muganda wo omukono gwo gunaakisumululanga. 
5_15_4_Naye tewaabenga baavu gy'oli, (kubanga Mukama taalemenga kukuwa mukisa mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa okuba obusika okugirya;) 
5_15_5_kyokka bw'onoonyiikiranga okuwulira eddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo, okukwatanga okukolanga ekiragiro kino kyonna kye nkulagira leero. 
5_15_6_Kubanga Mukama Katonda wo anaakuwanga omukisa, nga bwe yakusuubiza: era onoowolanga amawanga mangi, naye teweewolenga; era onoofuganga amawanga mangi, naye tebaakufugenga ggwe. 
5_15_7_Bwe wanaabanga gy'oli omwavu, omu ku baganda bo, munda w'oluggi lwonna ku nzigi zo mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa, tokakanyazanga mutima gwo, so tofunyanga ngalo zo eri muganda wo omwavu: 
5_15_8_naye tolemanga kwanjuluza ngalo zo gy'ali, so tolemanga kumuwola ebinaamumalanga olw'okwetaaga kwe mu ekyo ky'abuliddwa. 
5_15_9_Weekuumenga waleme okubaawo mu mutima gwo ekirowoozo ekikodo, ng'oyogera nti Omwaka ogw'omusanvu, omwaka ogusumululirwamu,,gunaatera okutuuka; eriiso lyo ne liba bbi eri muganda wo omwavu, n'otomuwa kintu; n'akoowoola Mukama ng'akuwawaabira, ne kiba kibi gy'oli. 
5_15_10_Tolemanga kumuwa, so n'amutima gwo tegunakuwalanga bw'omuwa: kubanga olw'ekigambo ekyo Mukama Katonda wo kyanaavanga akuwa omukisa mu mulimu gwo gwonna ne mu byonna by'onossangako omukono gwo. 
5_15_11_Kubanga abaavu tebaliggwaawo mu nsi ennaku zonna: kyenva nkulagira nga njogera nti Tolemanga kwanjuIuza ngalo zo eri muganda wo, eri ababo abeetaaga, era eri abaavu bo, mu nsi yo. 
5_15_12_Bwe bakuguzanga muganda wo, omusajja Omwebbulaniya oba mukazi Omwebbulaniya, n'amala emyaka mukaaga ng'akuweereza; mu mwaka ogw'omusanvu n'olyoka omuteeranga ddala okukuvaako. 
5_15_13_Era bw'onoomuteeranga ddala okukuvaako, tomutanga nga talina kintu: 
5_15_14_onoomulabiranga ebingi ku mbuzi zo ne ku gguuliro lyo ne ku ssogolero lyo: nga Mukama Katonda wo bwe yakuwa omukisa, bw'onoomuwanga bw'otyo. 
5_15_15_Era onojjukiranga nga wali muddu mu nsi y'e Misiri, Mukama Katonda wo n'akununula: kyenva nkulagira ekigambo ekyo leero. 
5_15_16_Awo olunaatuukanga bw'anaakugambanga nti Sijja kufutuma kukuleka; kubanga akwagala ggwe n'ab'omu nnyumba yo, kubanga alaba ebirungi ewuwo; 
5_15_17_n'olyoka oddiranga olukato, n'oluyisa mu kutu kwe n'okwasa n'oluggi, naye anaabeeranga muddu wo ennaku zonna. Era n'omuzaana wo bw'onoomukolanga bw'otyo. 
5_15_18_Tolowoozanga nga kizibu bw'onoomuteeranga ddala okukuvaako; kubanga yakuweerereza emyaka mukaaga okusinga emirundi ebiri oyo aweerereza empeera: era Mukama Katonda wo anaakuwanga omukisa mu byonna by'okola. 
5_15_19_Ebibereberye byonna ebisajja ente zo n'embuzi zo bye zinaazaalanga onootukuzanga eri Mukama Katonda wo: tokozanga mulimu gwonna kibereberye kya ate yo, so tosalanga byoya bya kibereberye kya mbuzi zo. 
5_15_20_Onookiriiranga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo buli mwaka mu kifo Mukama ky'alyeroboza, ggwe n'ab'omu nnyumba yo. 
5_15_21_Era bwe kinaabangako obulema bwonna, bwe kinaawenyeraaga oba bwe kinaabanga ekizibe ky'amaaso, obulema bwonna bwonna obutali bulungi; tokiwangayo eri Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_15_22_Onookiriiranga munda w'enzigi zo: abatali balongoofu n'abalongoofu banaakiryanga okwenkanankana, ng'e mpeewo era ng'enjaza: 
5_15_23_Kyokka tolyanga musaayi gwakyo; oaoogufukanga ku ttaka ng'amazzi. 
5_16_1_Okwatanga omwezi Abibu, weekuumenga Okuyitako eri Mukama Katonda wo: kubanga mu mwezi Abibu Mukama Katonda wo mwe yakuggira mu Misiri ekiro 
5_16_2_Era onottiranga Okuyitako Mukama Katonda wo, ku mbuzi n, ku nte, mu kifo Mukama ky'alyero boza okutuuza omwo erinnya lye. 
5_16_3_Tolyanga mmere nzimbulukuse wamu nakwo; onoomalanga ennaku musanvu ng'olya emmere eteri nzimbulukuse wamu nakwo, ye mmere ey'okunakuwala; kubanga wava mu nsi y'e Misiri ng'oyanguwa: ojjukirenga olunaku lwe waviiramu mu nsi y'e Misiri ennaku zonna ez'o bulamu bwo. 
5_16_4_So tewalabikanga gy'oli kizimbulukusa mu nsalo zo zonna ennaku musanvu; so tewasigalangawo ku nnyama, gy'onotta nga ku lunaku olw'olubereberye akawungeezi, okusulawo okukeesa obudde. 
5_16_5_Tottiranga Kuyitako munda w'oluggi lwonna ku nzig zo, Mukama Katonda wo z'akuwa: 
5_16_6_naye mu kifo Mukama Katonda wo ky'alyeroboza okutuuza omwo erinnya lye, eyo gy'onottiranga Okuyitako akawungeezi, enjuba ng'egwa, mu biro bye waviiramu mi Misiri. 
5_16_7_Era onookwokyanga n'okuliiranga mu kifo Mukama Katonda wo ky'alyeroboza: era onookyukanga enkya, n'ogenda mu weema zo. 
5_16_8_Ennaku mukaaga onoolyanga emmere eteri nzimbulukuse: ne ku lunaku olw'omusanvu wanaabanga okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu eri Mukama Katonda wo; tolukolerangako mulimi gwonna. 
5_16_9_Oneebaliranga ssabbiiti musanvu: okuva ku biro by'otanuliramu okussa ekiwabyo ku ŋŋaano ng'ekyali mu nnimiro kw'onoosookeranga okubala ssabbiiti omusanvu. 
5_16_10_Era oneekuumanga embaga eya ssabbiiti eri Mukama Katonda wo ng'omuwa omusolo ogw'ekyo ky'owaayo bubwo eky'omukono gwo, ky'onowangayo nga Mukama Katonda wo bw'akuwa omukisa: 
5_16_11_era onoosanyukiranga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo, ggwe ne mutabani wo ne muwala wo n'omuddu wo n'Omuzaana wo n'Omuleevi ali munda w'enzigi zo ne munnaggwanga ne mulekwa ne namwandu, abali wakati wo, mu kifo Mukama Katonda wo ky'alyeroboza okutuu omwo erinnya lye. 
5_16_12_Era onojjukiranga nga wali muddu mu Misiri: era onookwatanga onookolanga amateeka gano. 
5_16_13_Oneekuumiranga embaga ey'ensiisira ennaku musanvu, bw'onoobanga omaze okutereka eby'omugguuliro lyo n'eby'omu ssogolero lyo: 
5_16_14_era onoosanyukiranga embaga yo, ggwe ne mutabani wo ne muwala wo, n'omuddu wo n'omuzaana wo, n'Omuleevi ne munnaggwanga ne mulekwa ne nnamwandu, abali munda w'enzigi zo. 
5_16_15_Ennaku musanvu oneekuumanga embaga eri Mukama Katonda wo mu kifo Mukama ky'alyeroboza: kubanga Mukama Katonda wo anaakuwanga omukisa mu bibala byo byonna, ne mu mulimu gwonna ogw'engalo zo, era onoobanga n'essanyu jjereere. Emirundi esatu buli mwaka abasajja bo bonna banaalabikanga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo mu kifo ky'alyeroboza: ku mbaga ey'emmere eteri nzimbulukuse, ne ku mbaga eya ssabbiiti, ne ku mbaga ey'ensiisira: so tebalabikanga mu maaso ga Mukama nga tebalina kintu: 
5_16_16_Emirundi esatu buli mwaka abasajja bo bonna banaalabikanga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo mu kifo ky'alyeroboza: ku mbaga ey'emmere eteri nzimbulukuse, ne ku mbaga eya ssabbiiti, ne ku mbaga ey'ensiisira: so tebalabikanga mu maaso ga Mukama nga tebalina kintu: 
5_16_17_buli muntu anaawanga nga bw'anaayinzanga, ng'omukisa bwe gunaabanga ogwa Mukama Katonda wo gw'akuwadde: 
5_16_18_Abalamuzi n'abaami onossangawo mu nzigi zo zonna Mukama Katonda wo z'akuwa, ng'ebika byo bwe biri: era banaasaliranga abantu emisango egy'ensonga. 
5_16_19_Tokyamyanga musango; tosalirizanga bantu: so tolyanga nguzi; kubanga enguzi eziba amaaso g'ab'amagezi, era ekyusakyusa ebigambo by'abatuukirivu. 
5_16_20_Eby'obutuukirivu ddala by'onoogobereranga, olyoke obenga omulamu, osikire ensi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa. 
5_16_21_Teweesimbiranga muti gwonna okuba Asera ku mabbali g'ekyoto kya Mukama Katonda wo, ky'oneekoleranga. 
5_16_22_So teweeyimiririzanga mpagi; Mukama Katonda wo gy'akyawa. 
5_17_1_Tosalanga okuba ssaddaaka eri Mukama Katonda wo ente newakubadde endiga eriko obuiema oba ekitali kirungi kyonna: kubanga ekyo kya muzizo eri Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_17_2_Bwe wanaalabikanga wakati wo, munda w'oluggi lwonna ku nzigi zo Mukama Katonda wo z'akuwa, omusajja oba mukazi, akola ekiri mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo ekibi, ng'asobya ku ndagaano, 
5_17_3_era ng'agenze n'aweereza bakatonda abalala n'abasinza, oba njuba, oba mwezi, oba ku ggye ery'omu ggulu, bye ssaalagira 
5_17_6_Olw'akamwa k'abajulirwa ababiri oba bajulirwa basatu, agenda okufa bw'anattibwanga; olw'akamwa k'omujulirwa omu tattibwanga. 
5_17_7_Omukono gw'abajulirwa gwe gunaasookanga okumubaako okumutta, omukono gw'abantu. bonna ne gulyoka gumubangako: Bw'otyo bw'onoggyangawo ekibi wakati wo. 
5_17_8_Bwe wanaabangawo ensonga ekulema okugisalira omusango, nga bavunaana omusaayi n'omusaayi, nga bavunaana ensonga n'ensonga, era nga bavunaana omuggo n'omuggo, nga bawakanira ebyo munda w'enzigi zo: kale onoogolokokanga, n'oyambuka mu kifo Mukama Katonda ky'alyeroboza 
5_17_10_naawe onookolanga ng'omusango bwe gunaabanga, gwe banaakulaganga nga bayima mu kifo Mukama ky'alyeroboza; era onookwatanga akukola nga byonna bwe binaabanga bye bakuyigiriza: 
5_17_11_ng'etteeka bwe linaabaaga lye banaakuyigirizanga, era ng'ensala bw'eneebanga gye banaakubuuliranga, onookolanga bw'otyo: tokyamanga okuva mu musango gwe banaakulaganga okugenda ku mukono ogwa ddyo, newakubadde ogwa kkono: 
5_17_12_Era omuntu anaakolanga eby'ekyejo, nga tawulira kabona ayimirira eyo okuweerereza mu maaso: ga Mukama Katonda wo, oba mulamuzi, omuntu oyo anaafanga: era onoggyangawo obubi obwo mu Isiraeri. 
5_17_13_Era abantu bonna banaawuliranga ne batya, ne batakola nate bya kyejo. 
5_17_14_Bw'oliba ng'otuuse mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa, n'ogirya, n'otuula omwo; n'oyogera nti Nassaawo kabaka okunfuga, era nga n’amawanga gonna aganneetoolodde; 
5_17_15_tolemanga kussaawo oyo okuba kabaka okukufuga, Mukama Katoada wo gw'alyeroboza: omu ku baganda bo gw'olissaawo okuba kabaka okukufuga: si kirungi ggwe okussaawo munnaggwanga okukufuga, atali muganda wo. 
5_17_16_Kyokka teyeefuniranga mbalaasi nayingi, so tazzangayo bantu mu Misiri, alyoke yeefunire embalaasi ennyingi: kubanga Mukama yabagamba nti Temuddangayo nate mu kkubo eryo okuva kaakano. 
5_17_17_So teyeefuniranga bakazi bangi, omutima gwe gulemenga okukyuka: so teyeefuniranga ffeeza nnyingi nnyo newa kubadde zaabu. 
5_17_18_Awo olulituuka bw'alituula ku ntebe y'obwakabaka bwe, alyewandiikira etteeka lino mu kitabo, ng'aliggya mu ekyo ekiri mu: maaso ga bakabona Abaleevi: 
5_17_19_era kinaabeeranga gy'ali, era anaakisomangamu ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwe: ayige okutya Mukama Katonda we, okwekuumanga ebigambo byonna eby'etteeka lino n'ebiragiro bino okubikolanga: 
5_17_20_omutima gwe gulemenga okuguIumizibwa ku baganda be, era alemenga okukyama okuva mu kiragiro okugenda ku mukono ogwa ddyo newakubadde: ogwa kkono: alyoke awangaale ennaku nayingi mu bwakabaka bwe, ye n'abaana be, wakati mu Isiraeri. 
5_18_1_Bakabona Abaleevi, kye kika kyonna ekya Leevi, tebabanga na mugabo newakubadde obusika awamu ne Isiraeri: banaalyanga ebiweebwapo ebya Mukama ebikolebwa n'omuliro, n'obusika bwe. 
5_18_2_So tebabanga na busika mubaganda baabwe: Mukama bwe busika bwabwe, nga bwe yabagamba: 
5_18_3_Era lino lye linaabanga ebbanja lya bakabona lye banaabanjanga abantu, abo abanaawaagayo ssaddaaka, bw'eba ente oba ndiga, bawenga kabona omukono, n'emba zombi, ne ssebusa. 
5_18_4_Ebibereberye by'eŋŋaano yo, eby'envinnyo yo n'eby'amafuta go, n'ebibereberye by'ebyoya by'endiga zo, onoobimuwanga, 
5_18_5_Kubanga Mukama Katonda wo yamweroboza mu bika byo byonna, okuyimiriranga okuweerezanga n'erinnya lya Mukama, ye ne batabani be emirembe gyonna. 
5_18_6_Era Omuleevi bw'anaavanga mu luggi lwonna ku nzigi zo mu Isiraeri yenna, mw'atuula, n'ajja mu kifo Mukama ky'alyeroboza, emmeeme ye nga yeegombera ddala okujja 
5_18_8_Banaabanga n'emigabo egyenkanankana okulya, obutassaako ebyo ebivudde mu kutunda obutaka bwe. 
5_18_9_Bw'olimala okutuuka mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa, toyiganga kukola ng'eby'emizizo eby'amawanga gali bwe biri. 
5_18_10_Tewalabikanga gy'oli muntu yenna ayisa mu muliro mutabani we oba muwala we, newakubadde akola eby'obufumu, newakubadde alaguza ebire; newakubadde omulogo, newakubadde omuganga, 
5_18_11_newakubadde omusawo, newakubadde asamira omuzimu, newakubadde emma ndwa, newakubadde abuuza abafu. 
5_18_12_Kubanga buli akola ebyo wa muzizo eri Mukama: era olw'emizizo egyo Mukama Katonda wo kyava abagoba mu maaso go. 
5_18_13_Onoobanga eyatuukirira eri Katonda wo, 
5_18_14_Kubanga amawanga gano g'olirya, bawulira abo abalaguza ebire n'abafumu: naye ggwe Mukama Katonda wo takuganyizza kukolanga bw'otyo. 
5_18_15_Makama Katonda wo alikuyimusiza nabbi wakati wo, ku baganda bo, afaanana nga nze; oyo gwe muliwulira; 
5_18_16_nga byonna bwe byali bye wasaba Mukama Katonda wo ku Kolebu ku lunaku olw'okukuŋŋaanirako, ng'oyogere nti Nneme okuwulira nate eddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda vvange, era nneme okulaba nate omuliro guno omungi, nneme okufa. 
5_18_17_Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Boogedde bulungi ebyo bye bagambye. 
5_18_18_Ndibayimusiza aabbi ku baganda baabwe, afaanana nga ggwe; era nditeeka ebigambo byange mu kamwa ke, era alibabuulira byonna bye ndimulagira. 
5_18_19_Kale olulituuka buli ataliwulira bigambo byange by'alyogera mu linnya lyange, ndimulanga ekyo. 
5_18_20_Naye nabbi anaayogeranga ekigambo mu linnya lyange nga yeetulinkiridde, bye simulagidde kwogera, oba anaayogeranga mu linnya lya bakatonda abalala, nabbi oyo anaafaaga. 
5_18_21_Era bw'onooyogeranga mu mutima gwo nti Tunaategeeranga tutya ekigambo Mukama ky'atayogedde? 
5_18_22_Nabbi bw'anaayogeranga mu linnya lya Mukama, ekigambo ekyo bwe kitajja so tekiruukirira, ekyo kye lugambo Mukama ky'atayogedde: nabbi ng'akyogedde nga yeetulinkiridde, tomutyanga. 
5_19_1_Mukama Katonda wo bw'alizikiriza amawanga, Mukama Katonda wo ensi yaago gy'akuwa, on'obasikira, n'otuula mu bibuga byabwe ne mu nnyumba zaabwe 
5_19_3_Olyelimira oluguudo, era olisala mu nsalo z'ensi yo, Mukama Katonda wo gy'akusisa, okuba ebituadu bisatu, buli atta omuntu addukirenga omwo. 
5_19_4_Era eno ye nsonga y'oyo atta omuntu anaddukiranga omwo n'aba nga mulamu: buli anattanga munne nga tamanyiridde, so nga tamukyawanga lubereberye 
5_19_6_awalana eggwanga ly'omusaayi alemenga okugoberera eyatta omuntu, omutima gwe nga gukyasunguwadde, amutuukako, kubanga olugendo nnene, n'amufumita okumutta; so ga tasaanidde kufa, kubanga tamuawanga lubereberye. 
5_19_7_Kyenva ulagira nga njogera nti Olyeyawulira ebibuga bisatu. 
5_19_8_Era oba ga Mukama Katonda wo aligaziya ensalo yo, nga bwe yalayirira. bajjajja bo, n'akuwa ensi yonna gye yasuubiza okuwa bajjajja bo 
5_19_10_omusaayi ogutaliiko musango guleme okuyiika mu nsi yo Mukama Katonda wo. gy'akuwa okuba obusika, bwe kityo omusaayi ne gukubaako. 
5_19_11_Naye omuatu yenna bw'akyawanga munne, n'amuteega, n'amugolokokerako, n’amufumita okumutta n'okufa n'afa; n'addukira mu kimu ku bibuga ebyo: 
5_19_12_kale abakadde b'ekibuga kye, banaatumanga ne bamuggyayo, ne bamuwaayo mu mukono gw'oyo awalana eggwanga ly'omusaayi, afe. 
5_19_13_Eriiso lyo terimusaasiranga; naye onoggyangawo mu Isiraeri omusaayi ogn' taliiko musango, olyoke olabenga ebirungi. 
5_19_14_Tojjululanga nsalo ya muliraanwa wo, ab'edda gye baasimba, mu b.usika bwo bw'olisika mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa okugirya. 
5_19_15_Omujulinva omu tagolokokeranga ku muntu olw'obutali butuukirivu bwonna oba: olw'ekibi kyonna, mu kibi kyonna ky'ayonoona: olw'akamwa k'abajulirwa ababiri oba olw'akamwa k'abajulirwa abasatu ekigambo kinaanywezebwanga. 
5_19_16_Omujulirwa atali mutuukirivu bw'agolokokeranga ku muntu yenna okutegeeza ng'akoze bubi; 
5_19_17_abasajja bombi abawakana empaka ezo banaayimiriranga mu maaso ga Mukama, mu maaso ga bakabona n'abalamuzi abalibaawo mu nnaku ziri; 
5_19_18_kale abalamuzi banaakemerezanga nayo: era, laba; omujulirwa oyo bw'abanga omujulirwa ow'obulimba, era ng'awaayirizza muganda we; 
5_19_19_kale munaamukoleranga nga bw'abadde alowooza okukola muganda we: bw'otyo bw'o aoggyangawo obubi; wakati wo. 
5_19_20_N'abo abasigalawo b'anaawulilanga ne, batya, ne batakola: nate okuva, ku biro: biri obubi bwonna obuli ng'obwo wakati wo. 
5_19_21_So n'eriisa lyo terisaasiranga; obulamu bugattwenga obulamu, eriiso ligattwenga eriiso, erinnyo ligattwenga erinnyo, omukono gugattwenga omukono, ekigere kigattwenga ekigere. 
5_20_1_Bw'otabaalanga okulwana n'abalabe bo, n'olaba embalaasi n'amagaali n’abantu abakusinga obungi, tobatyanga: kubanga Mukama Katonda wo ali wamu naawe, eyakuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
5_20_2_Awo olunaatuukanga bwe munaasembereranga olutalo, kabona anajjanga n'ayogera n'abantu, 
5_20_3_n'abagamba nti Wulira, ggwe Isiraeri, musemberera olutalo leero okulwana n'abalabe bammwe: omutima gwammwe teguddiriranga; temutya so temukankana, so temubatekemukira 
5_20_5_Era abaami banaayogeranga n'abantu nga bagamba: nti Muntu ki ali wano eyazimba ennyumba empya so nga tannagitukuza? agende addeyo eka, aleme okufiira mu lutalo, omulala n'agitukuza. 
5_20_6_Era muntu ki ali wano eyasimba olusuku lw'emizabbibu, so nga aannalya ku bibala byalwo? agende addeyo ekaaleme okufiira mu lutalo, omulala n’alya ebibala, byalwo. 
5_20_7_Era muntu ki ali wano eyayogereza omukazi, so nga tannamuwasa? agende addeyo eka, aleme okufiira mu lutalo, omulala n'amuwasa: 
5_20_8_Era abaami baneeyoageranga okugamba abantu ne boogera nti Muntu ki ali wano atya era alina omutima oguddirira? agende addeyo eka, emitima gya baganda be gireme okusaanuuka ng'omutima gwe: 
5_20_9_Awo olunaatuukanga abaami bwe banaamalanga okwogera n'abantu, banassangawo abakulu b'eggye okukulembera abantu. 
5_20_10_Bw'onoosembereranga ekibuga okulwana nakyo, n'olyoka akirangiriranga emirembe. 
5_20_11_Awo olunaatuukanga, bwe kinaddangamu eby'emirembe; ne kikuggulirawo, abantu bonna abalabika omwo banaafuukanga ab'omusolo, era banaakuweerezanga. 
5_20_12_Era bwe kitakkirizanga kulagaana mirembe naawe, naye nga kyagala okulwana naawe, n'olyoka okizingizanga: 
5_20_13_era Mukama Katonda wo bw'anaakigabulanga mu mukono gwo, onottanga buli musajja waamu n'obwogi bw'ekitala: 
5_20_14_naye abakazi n'abaana abato n'ebisibo ne byonna ebiri mu kibuga, omunyago gwakyo gwonna, oneetwaliranga okuba omunyago; era onoolyanga omunyago gw'abalabe bo, Mukama Katonda wo gwe yakuwa. 
5_20_15_Bw'otya bw'onookolanga ebibuga byonna ebikuli ewala ennyo, ebitali bya ku bibuga bya mawanga gano. 
5_20_16_Naye ku bibuga by'abantu bano, Mukama Katonda wo b'akuwa okuba obusika, towonyangako kintu ekissa omukka kiremenga okufa: 
5_20_17_naye onoo bazikiririzanga ddala; Omukiiti, n'Omwamoli, Omukanani, n'Omuperizi, Omukiivi, n'Omuyebusi; nga Mukama Katonda wo bwe yakulagira: 
5_20_18_balemenga okubayigiriza okukola ng'eby'emizizo byabwe byonna bwe biri, bye baakoleraaga bakatonda baabwe; bwe mutyo mwandisobezza Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
5_20_19_Bw'oaoomalanga ebiro bingi ng'ozingizza ekibuga, ng'olwana nakyo okukinyaga, tozikirizanga miti gyakyo ng'ogigalulira embazzi; kubaaga oyinza okugiryako, era togitemanga; kubanga omuti ogw'omu nsiko muntu, ggwe okuguzingiza gwo? 
5_20_20_Emiti egyo gyokka gy'omanyi nga si miti gya kulyako, gy'onoozikirizanga gy'onootemanga; era onoozimbiranga ebigo ku kibuga ekirwana naawe, okutuusa lwe kirigawa. 
5_21_1_Omuntu bw'anaasangibwanga ng'attiddwa mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa okugirya, ng'ali mu. nsiko, so tekimanyibwa bw'ali amukubye: 
5_21_2_abakadde bo n'abalamuzi bo ne balyoka bafulumanga, era banaageranga okutuuka ku bibuga ebimwetoolodde oyo eyattibwa: 
5_21_3_awo olunaatuukanga ekibuga ekisinga okuba okumpi omuntu eyattibwa, abakadde: b'ekibuga ekyo banaddiranga ente enduusi okugiggya mu nte, etekozebwaaga mirimu, etewalulanga ng'eri mu kikoligo 
5_21_5_awo bakabona abaana ba Leevi banaasemberanga; kubanga abo Mukama Katonda wo be yeeroboza okumuweerezanga, n'okusabanga omukisa mu linaya lya Mukama; era ng'ekigambo kyabwe bwe kinaabanga, bwe zityo buli mpaka na buli kulumbagana bwe binaamalibwanga: 
5_21_6_awo abakadde bonna ab'ekibuga ekyo, abasinga okuba okumpi omuntu eyattibwa, banaanaabiranga engalo ku nte enduusi ekutuddwako ensingo mu kiwonvu: 
5_21_7_era banaddangamu ne boogera nti Engalo zaffe si ze zaayiwa omusaayi guno, so n'amaaso gaffe tegaagulaba. 
5_21_8_Sonyiwa, ai Mukama, abantu bo Isiraeri; be wanunula, so toganya musaayi ogutaliiko musango okuba wakati mu bantu bo Isiraeri. Kale omusaayi gunaabasonyiyibwanga. 
5_21_9_Bw'oryo bw'onoggyangawo omusaayi ogutaliiko musango wakati wo, bw'oaookolanga ekiri mu maaso ga Mukama ekirungi. 
5_21_10_Bw'onootabaalanga okulwana n'abalabe bo, Mukama Katonda wo n'abagabula mu mikono gyo, n'obatwala nga mwandu, 
5_21_11_n'olaba mu mwandu omukazi: omulungi, n'omwegomba, n'oyagala okumuwasa; 
5_21_12_n'olyoka omutwalanga ewuwo mu nnyumba yo; naye anaamwanga omutwe gwe n'asala enjala ze; 
5_21_13_era anaayambulanga ebyambalo eby'obunyage bwe, n'abeera mu nayumba yo n'amala omwezi omulamba ng'akaabira kitaawe ne nnyina: kale oluvanayuma n'olyoka oyingira gy'ali; n'oba bba naye nga mukazi wo. 
5_21_14_Awo olunaatuukanga, bw'otoomusanyukirenga n'akatono, onoomulekanga okugenda gy'ayagala; naye tomu tundangamu bintu n'akatono, tomukolanga ng'iomuzaana, kubanga wamutoowaza. 
5_21_15_Omusajja bw'abanga n'abakazi babiri, omu nga muganzi, omulala nga mukyawe, era'nga bombi baamuzaalira abaana, omuganzi n'omukyawe; era omwana wo w'obulenzi omubereberye bw'abanga ow'omukyawe; 
5_21_16_awo olunaatuukanga, ku lunaku lw'alisisa abaana be ebyo by'alina, tafuulanga mwana wa muganzi okuba omubereberye, omwana w'omukyawe, ye mubereberye, ng'akyali mulamu: 
5_21_17_naye anakkirizanga omubereberye, omwana w'omukyawe, ng'amuwa emigabo ebiri ku ebyo byonna by'alina: kubanga oyo kwe kusooka kw'amaanyi ge; eby'omubereberye bibye. 
5_21_18_Omuntu bw'abanga ne mutabani we omukakanyavu omujeemu, atakkiriza kugondera ddoboozi lya kitaawe, newakubadde eddoboozi lya nnyina, era newakubadde nga bamubonereza, nga takkiriza kubawulira: 
5_21_19_kale kitaawe ne nnyina banaamukwatanga, ne bamufulumya eri abakadde ab'omu kibuga kyabwe, n'eri wankaaki w'ekifo kyabwe: 
5_21_20_ne bagamba abakadde ab'omu kibuga kyabwe nti Omwana waffe ono mukakanyavu mujeemu, takkiriza kugondera ddoboozi lyaffe; wa mpisa mbi, era mutamiivu. 
5_21_21_Abasajja bonna ab'omu kibuga kyabwe ne bamukuba amayinja okumutta: bw'otyo bw'onoggyangawo obubi okuva wakati wo; kale Isiraeri yenna anaawuliranga anaatyanga. 
5_21_22_Era omuntu bw'aba ng'akoze ekibi ekisaanira okumussa; ne bamutta, n'omuwanika ku muti; 
5_21_23_omulambo gwe tegusulanga ku muti, naye tolemanga kumuziika ku lunaku olwo; kubanga awanikiddwa ng'akolimiddwa Katonda; olemenga okugwagwawaza ensi yo Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa okuba obusika. 
5_22_1_Tolabaaga nte ya muganda wo newakubadde endiga ye ng'ekyama, ne weekweka okuva gye ziri: tolemanga kuzizza eri muganda wo. 
5_22_2_Era muganda wo bw'aba nga takuli kumpi oba bw'oba nga tomumanyi, onoogitwalanga eka ewuwo, eneebeeranga naawe okutuusa muganda wo lw'aliginoonya, n'ogizza nate gy'ali. 
5_22_3_Era onookolanga n'endogoyi ye bw'otyo; era onookolanga n'ekyambalo kye bw'otyo; era onookolanga na buli kintu ekya muganda wo ekinaamubulanga naawe ng'okironze: okwekweka si kulungi. 
5_22_4_Tolabanga ndogoyi ya muganda wo newakubadde ente ye ng'egudde mu kkubo, ne.weekweka okuva gye ziri: tolemanga kumubeera okuziyimusa nate. 
5_22_5_Omukazi tayambalanga kya musajja, so n'omusajja tayambalanga kyambalo kya mukazi: kubanga buli akola ebyo wa muzizo eri Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_22_6_Ekisu ky'ennyonyi bwe kiba nga kikuli mu maaso mu kkubo, ku muti gwonaa oba wansi, obwana nga weebuli oba magi, nnyina ng'atudde ku bwana oba ku magi, totwalanga nnyina wamu n'amagi: 
5_22_7_tolemanga kuta nnyina, naye oyinza okwetwalira obwana; olyoke olabenga ebirungi, era owangaalenga ennaku nnyingi. 
5_22_8_Bw'ozimbanga enayumba empya, onookolanga omuziziko ku ntikko, ng'omuntu yenna ayimye okwo n'agwa, olemenga okuleeta omusaayi ku nnyumba yo. 
5_22_9_Tosiganga ngeri bbiri za: nsigo mu lusuku lwo olw'emizabbibu: olemeaga okufiirwa ebibala byonna, ensigo.ze wasiga n'ekyengera eky'olusuku. 
5_22_10_Tolimisanga nte n'endogoyi wamu. 
5_22_11_Toyambalanga lugoye olugatta ebibiri, ebyoya ne segamwenge wamu. 
5_22_12_Oneekoleranga amatanvuuwa mu mbiriizi nnya ez'ekyambalo kyo ky'oyambala. 
5_22_13_Omusajja yenna bw'awasanga omukazi, n'ayingira gy'ali, n'amukyawa, 
5_22_14_n'amuwawaabira eby'ensonyi, n'amuleetako erinnya ebbi, n'ayogera nti Nawasa omukazi ono, kale bwe nnamusembesera, ne ssimulabako bubonero bwa butamanya musajja: 
5_22_15_awo kitaawe w'omukazi ne nayina ne balyoka baddira obubonero bw'omuwala oyo obw'obutamanya musajja ne babuleetera abakadde b'ekibuga mu mulyango: 
5_22_16_kitaawe w'omuwala n’agamba abakadde nti Omusajja ono namuwa mwana wange okumuwasa, naye amukyaye; 
5_22_17_era, laba, amuwawaabidde eby'ensonyi, ng'agamba nti Saalaba mu mwana wo bubonero bwa butamanya musajja; era naye obubonero bw'omwana wange obw'obutamanya musajja buubuno. Kale ne bayaliira ekyambalo mu maaso g'abakadde b'ekibuga. 
5_22_18_Awo abakadde b'ekibuga ekyo ne batwala omusajja oyo ne bamukuba; 
5_22_19_ne bamutanza sekeri eza ffeeza kikumi, ne baziwa kitaawe w'omuwala oyo, kubanga yamuleetako erinnya ebbi omuwala wa Isiraeri: era anaabanga mukazi we; tamugobanga ennaku ze zonna. 
5_22_20_Naye oba ng'ekigambo kiao kya mazima, obubonero bw'obutamanya musajja obutalabika mu muwala: 
5_22_21_awo ne bafulumya omuwala oyo mu mulyango gw'ennyumba ya kitaawe, abasajja ab'omu kibuga kyabwe ne bamukuba amayinja ne bamutta: kubanga yakola obusirusiru mu Isiraeri, okwendera mu nnyumba ya kitaawe: bw'onoggyanga bw'otyo obubi wakati mu ggwe. 
5_22_22_Bwe basanganga omusajja ng'asula n'omukazi eyafumbirwa bba, bombi bafenga omusajja eyasula n'omukazi, n'omukazi: bw'otyo bw'onoggyanga obubi mu Isiraeri. 
5_22_23_Bwe wabangawo omuwala atamanyanga musajja ayogerezebwa omusajja, omusajja n'amusanga mu kibuga n'asula naye; 
5_22_24_bombi munaabafulumyanga eri wankaaki w'ekibuga ekyo, ne mubakuba amayinja n'okufa ne bafa; omuwala kubanga teyakuba nduulu, ng'ali mu kibuga; n'omusajja kubanga yatoowaza mukazi wa munne: bw'otyo bw'onoggyaaga obubi wakati mu ggwe. 
5_22_25_Naye omusajja bw'asaaganga omuwala ayogerezebwa mu nnimiro, omusajja n'amuwaliriza, n'asula naye; omusajja eyasula naye yekka y'anaafanga: 
5_22_26_naye omuwala tolimukola kintu; ku muwala tekuli kibi ekinaamussa: kuba ng'omuntu bw'agolokokera ku munne n'amutta, n'ekigambo ekyo hwe kiri bwe kiryo: 
5_22_27_kubanga yamusanga mu nnimiro; omuwala ayogerezebwa n'akuba enduulu, ne watabaawo amulokola. 
5_22_28_Omusajja bw'asangaaga omuwala atamanyanga musajja, atayo, gerezebwa, n'amukwata n'asula naye ne babalaba; 
5_22_29_kale omusajja eyasula naye anaamuwanga kitaawe w'omuwala sekeri eza ffeeza amakumi ataano, era anaabanga mukazi we, kubanga yamutoowaza; tayinza kumugoba ennaku ze zonna. 
5_22_30_Omusajja tawasaaga mukazi wa kitaawe, so tabikkulanga lukugiro lwa kitaawe. 
5_23_1_Eyafumitibwa, oba eyasalibwako ebitundu by'omubiri gwe eby'ekyama, tayingiranga mu kkuŋŋaaniro lya Mukama. 
5_23_2_Omwana omwebolereze tayingiranga mu kkuŋŋaaniro lya Mukama; okutuusa ku mirembe ekkumi tewabangawo ku babe abayingira mu kkuŋŋaaniro lya Mukama. 
5_23_3_Omwamoni oba Omumowaabu tayingiranga mu kkuŋŋaaniro lya Mukama; okutuusa ku mirembe ekkumi tewabangawo ku bantu baabwe abayingira mu kkuŋŋaaniro lya Mukama ennaku zonna: 
5_23_4_kubanga: tebaabasisinkana mu kkubo nga balina emmere n'amazzi, bwe mwava mu Misiri; era kubanga baawerera Balamu omwana, wa Byoli okumuggya mu Pesoli eky'omu Mesopotamiya, okukukolimira: 
5_23_5_Naye Mukama Katonda wo yagaana okuwulira Balamu; naye Mukama Katonda wo n'afuula ekikolimo okuba omukisa gy'oli, kubanga Mukama Katonda wo yakwagala. 
5_23_6_Tonoonyaaga mirembe gyabwe newakubadde omukisa gwabwe ennaku zo zonna emirembe gyonna. 
5_23_7_Tokyawanga Mwedomu; kubanga muganda wo: tokyawanga Mumisiri; kubanga wali mugenyi mu nsi yaabwe. 
5_23_8_Abaana bannakabirye abalibazaalirwa baliyingira mu kkunnaaniro lya Mukama. 
5_23_9_Bw'otabaalanga mu nsiisira okulwana n'abalabe bo, oneekuumanga mu buli kintu ekibi. 
5_23_10_Bwe wabanga mu mmwe omusajja yenna, atali mulongoofu olw'ekyo ekinaamubangako ekiro, anaafulumanga mu lusiisira, tayingiranga munda w'olusiisira: 
5_23_11_naye olunaatuukanga, obudde bwe buwungeeranga, anaanaabanga n'amazzi: kale enjuba bw'emalanga okugwa, n'ayingiranga mu lusiisira. 
5_23_12_Era onoobanga n'ekifo ebweru w'olusiisira, gy'onoofulumanga: 
5_23_13_era onoobanga n'ekifumu mu bintu byo; awo olunaatuukanga, bw'onoofulumaaga n'otuula, onookisimyanga n'okyuka n'obikka ku ekyo ekinaakuvangamu: 
5_23_14_kubanga Mukama Katonda wo atambulira wakati, mu lusiisira lwo, okukuwonya, n'okugabula abalabe bo mu maaso go; olusiisira lwo kye lunaavanga lubeera olutukuvu: alemenga okulaba mu ggwe ekintu kyonna ebitali kirongoofu, n’akukuba amabega. 
5_23_15_Tozzaaga eri mukama we omuddu eyabomba ku mukama we okujja gy'oli: 
5_23_16_anaatuulanga naswe, wakati mu ggwe, mu kifo ky'anaayagalanga munda w'enzigi zo olumu, w'anaasinganga okusiima: tomujooganga. 
5_23_17_Tewabanga mwenzi ku bawala ba Isiraeri, so tewabanga alya ebisiyaga ku batabani ba Isiraeri. 
5_23_18_Toleetanga mpeera ya mwenzi, newakubadde empeera y'embwa, mu nnyumba ya Mukama Katonda wo olw'obwepauio bwonna: kubanga ebyo byombiriri bya mizizo eri Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_23_19_Towolanga muganda wo lwa magoba; amagoba ag'effeeza, amagoba ag'ebyokulya, amagoba ag'ekintu: kyonna ekiwolwa olw'amagoba: 
5_23_20_munnaggwanga si kibi okumtiwola olw'amagoba; naye muganda wo tomuwolanga lwa magoba: Mukama Katonda wo alyoke akuwenga omukisa mu byonna by'oteekako omukono gwo, mu nsi gy'oyingiramu okugirya. 
5_23_21_Bw'oneeyamanga obweyamo Mukama Katonda wo, totenguwanga kubusasula: kubanga Mukama Katonda wo talirema kububuuza gy'oli: era kyandibadde kibi mu ggwe: 
5_23_22_Naye bw'olekanga okweyama, tekiriba kibi mu ggwe. 
5_23_23_Ekyali kivudde mu mimwa gyo onookyekuumanga n'okikola; nga bwe weeyama Mukama Katonda wo, ekiweebwayo ku bubwo, kye wasuubiza n'akamwa ko. 
5_23_24_Bw'oyingiranga mu lusuku olw'emizabbibu olwa munno, si labi okulya ezabbibu okukkuta nga bw'oyagala ggwe: naye toterekangako mu kintu kyo. 
5_23_25_Bw'oyingiranga mu ŋŋaano etennakungulwa eya munno, si kibi okunoga ebirimba n'engalo zo; naye toteekanga kiwabyo ku'nnaano etennakungulwa eya: munno. 
5_24_1_Omusajja bw'atwalanga omukazi n'amuwasa, kale olunaatuukanga, bw'ataaganjenga n'akatoao mu maaso ge, kubaaga alabye ku ye ekitali kirungi, anaamuwandiikiranga ebb8luwa ey'okumugoba, n'agimuwa mu ngalo ze; n'amugoba mu nnyumba ye: 
5_24_2_Awo bw'abanga avudde mu nnyumba ye, ayinza okugenda okuba omukazi w'omusajja omulala. 
5_24_3_Era bba ow'okubiri bw'amukyawanga, n'amuwandiikira ebbaluwa ey'okumugoba, n'agimuwa mu ngalo ze, n'amugoba mu nnyumba ye; oba bba ow'okubiri bw'afanga, eyamuwasa 
5_24_5_Omusaja bw'awasanga omukazi omuggya, tatabaalanga na ggye, so tasalirwanga mirimu gyonna: anaamalanga omwaka gumu eka nga yessa, anaasanyusanga omukazi gw'awasizza: 
5_24_6_Omuntu yenna tasingirwanga lubengo newakubadde enso: kubanga asingirwa obulamu bw'omuntu. 
5_24_7_Bwe basanganga omuntu ng'abba omuntu yenna ku baganda be abaana ba Isiraeri, n'amukola ng'omuddu, oba n'amutunda; kale omu bbi oyo anattibwanga: bw'otyo bw'onoggyaaga obubi wakati mu ggwe. 
5_24_8_Weekuumenga mu kibonobono eky'ebigenge, okwatirenga ddala okolenga byonna bakabona Abaleevi bye banaabayigirizanga: nga bwe nnabalagira bo, bwe mutyo bwe munaakwatanga okukola: 
5_24_9_Jjukira Mukama Katonda wo bwe yakola Miryamu, mu kkubo bwe mwali muva mu Misiri. 
5_24_10_Bw'oyazikanga munno ekintu kyonna ekyazikibwa, toyingiranga mu nnyumba ye okukima omusingo gwe. 
5_24_11_Onooyimiriranga ebweru, n'omuntu gw'oyazika anaafulumyanga omusingo ebweru gy'oli. 
5_24_12_Era bw'abanga omwavu, tosulanga ng'olina omusingo gwe: 
5_24_13_tolemanga kumuddiza misingo obudde bwe bunaawungeeranga, alyoke asule mu kyambalo kye, era akusabire omukisa: era kinaabanga butuukirivu eri ggwe mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_24_14_Tojooganga musenze akolera empeera omwavu eyeetaaga, bw'aba ku muwendo gwa baganda bo oba ku muweado gwa bannaggwanga bo abali mu nsi yammwe munda w'enzigi zo: 
5_24_15_ku lunaku lwe onoomuwanga empeera ye, so n’enjuba tegwanga ng'ekyaliyo; kubanga mwavu era agiteckako omwoyo gwe: alemenga okukaabiriranga Mukama okukuwawaabira, ne kiba kibi gy'oli. 
5_24_16_Bakitaabwe tebattibwanga okubalanga abaana baabwe, so n'abaana tebattibwanga okualanga bakitaabwe: buli muntu bamulangenga ekibi kye ye okumutta. 
5_24_17_Tokyamyanga musango gwa munnaggwanga, newakubadde ogw'atalina kitaawe; so tosingirwanga kyambalo kya nnamwandu: 
5_24_18_naye onojjukiranga nga wali muddu mu Misiri, Mukama Katonda wo n'akununula n'akuggyayo: kyenva nkulagira okukolanga ekigambo ekyo. 
5_24_19_Bw'okungulanga ebikungulwa byo mu nnimiro yo ne weerabira ekinywa mu nnimiro, toddangayo nate okukikima; kinaabanga kya muanaggwanga, ky'atalina kitaawe, era kya nnamwaadu: Mukama Katonda wo alyoke akuwenga omukisa mu mulimu gwonna ogw'engalo zo. 
5_24_20_Bw'okubanga omuzeyituuni gwo, toddanga mu matabi lwa kubiri: gunaabanga gwa munnaggwanga, gw'atalina kitaawe, era gwa nnamwandu. 
5_24_21_Bw'okungulanga ezabbibu ez'omu lusuku lwo, toddangamu ng'omaze omulundi gumu: lunaabanga lwa munnaggwanga, lw'atalina kitaawe, era lwa nnamwandu. 
5_24_22_Era onojjukiranga nga wali muddu mu nsi y'e Misiri: kyeava nkulagira okukolanga ekigambo ekyo. 
5_25_1_Bwe wabangawo empaka n'abantu, ne bajja okusalirwa omusango, ne bagubasalira; banaasaliranga omutuukirivu okugusinga, n’omubi okusingibwa 
5_25_3_Ayinza okumusalira emiggo ana, tasussaagawo: muganda wo alemenga okufaanana atali wa muwendo gy'oli, bw'abanga asussizzaawo ng'amukubye emiggo mingi okusinga egyo. 
5_25_4_Togiaibanga kamwa ente ng'ewuula. 
5_25_5_Ab'oluganda bwe banaabeeranga awamu, omu ku bo n’afa, nga talina mutabani, omukazi w'oyo afudde tafumbirwanga walala atali wa luganda: muganda wa bba ayingire gy'ali, amuwase, amukolere ebigwanira muganda wa bba 
5_25_6_Awo olunaatuukanga, omubereberye gw'alizaala y'anaasikiranga erinnya lya muganda we eyafa, erinnya lye liremenga okusangalibwa okuva mu Isiraeri. 
5_25_7_Era omusajja bw'abanga tayagala kuwasa mukazi wa muganda we, mukazi wa muganda we ayambukenga mu mulyango eri abakadde, ayogere nti Muganda wa baze agaana okuyimusiza muganda we erinnya mu Isiraeri, tayagala kunkolera ebigwanira muganda wa baze. 
5_25_8_Kale abakadde b'omu kibuga kyabwe bamuyitenga, bamugambe; kale bw'anaayimiriranga n'ayogera nti Saagala kumuwasa 
5_25_10_Era erinnya lye liyitibwenga mu Isiraeri nti Nnyumba y'oyo eyanaanulirwa engatto. 
5_25_11_Abasajja bwe babanga balwana bokka na bokka, mukazi w'omu n'asembera okulokola bba mu mukono gw'oyo amukuba, n'agolola omukono gwe, n'amukwata wamberi: 
5_25_12_omutemangako omukono, eriiso lyo terisaasiranga. 
5_25_13_Tobanga na bya kupima ebitali bimu, ekinene n'ekitono, mu nsawo yo. 
5_25_14_Tobanga na bigero ebitali bimu, ekinene n'ekitono; mu nayumba yo. 
5_25_15_Obenga n'eky'okupima ekituukirivu ekitasoba; obenga n'ekigero ekituukirivu ekitasoba: enriaku zo zibenga nnyingi mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa. 
5_25_16_Kubanga bonna abakola ebiri ng'ebyo, bonna abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu, muzizo eri Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_25_17_Jjukira Amaleki bwe yakukolera mu kkubo bwe mwali nga muva mu Misiri; 
5_25_18_bwe yakusanga mu kkubo, n'atta abasembi ennyuma wo, abanafu bonna ab'ennyuma, bwe wazirika era ng'okooye; n'atatya Katonda. 
5_25_19_Awo olulituuka, Mukama Katonda wo bw'aliba ng'akuwadde okuwummula eri abalabe bo bonna enjuyi zonna, mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa okuba obusika okugirya; kyoliva osangula okujjukizibwa kwa Amaleki wansi w'eggulu: teweerabiranga. 
5_26_1_Awo olulituuka, bw'oliba ng'oyingidde mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa okuba obusika, n'ogirya, n'otuula omwo 
5_26_3_Era olijja eri kabona alibaawo mu biro ebyo, n’omugamba nti Njatulidde leero Mukama Katonda wo: nga nnyingidde mu nsi Mukama gye yalayirira bajjajja baffe okugituwa. 
5_26_4_Kale kabona alitoola ekibbo ng'akiggya mu mukoao gwo; n’akissa wansi mu maasa g'ekyoto kya Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_26_5_Naawe oliddamu n'oyogera mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo nti Omusuuli eyali ng'anaatera okubula ye yali kitange, n'aserengeta mu Misiri, n'atuula omwo, omuweado gwe aga mutono; n'afuuka eyo eggwanga, eddene, ery'amaanyi, eryayala. 
5_26_6_Abamisiri ne batukola bubi, ne batubonyaabonya, ne batuteekako obuddu obukakanyavu: 
5_26_7_ne tukoowoola Mukama Katonda wa bajjajja baffe, Mukama n'awulira eddoboozi lyaffe, n'alaba okubonaabona kwaffe, n'okutegana kwaffe, n'okujoogebwa kwaffe: 
5_26_8_Mukama n'atuggya mu Misiri n’engalo ez'amaanyi n'omukono ogwagololwa, n'entiisa ennyingi, n'obubonero n'eby'amagero: 
5_26_9_n'atuyingiza mu kifo muno, n'atuwa ensi eno, ensi ekulukuta n'amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki. 
5_26_10_Era kaakano, laba, ndeese ebibereberye eby'oku bibala by'ettaka, ly'ompadde ggwe, ai Mukama. Era olibiteeka wansi mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo n'osinza mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo: 
5_26_11_era olisanyukira ebirungi byonna Mukama Katonda wo by'akuwadde ggwe n'ennyumba yo, ggwe n'Omuleevi ne munnaggwanga ali wakati wo: 
5_26_12_Bw'onoomalanga okusolooza ekitundu eky'ekkumi eky'ekyengera kyo kyonaa mu mwaka: ogw'okusatu, gwe mwaka ogusoloolezebwamu ekitundu eky'ekkumi, n'olyoka okiwa Omuleevi, ne munnaggwanga, n'atalina kitaawe, ne nnamwandu, baliire munda w'enzigi zo bakkute; 
5_26_13_era onooyogeranga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo nti Ebintu ebyatukuzibwa mbiggye mu nnyumba yange; era mbiwadde Omuleevi, ne munnaggwanga, n'atalina kitaawe, ne nnamwandu, ng'ekiragiro kyo kyonna bwe kiri kye wandagira: sisobezza ku biragiro byonna kimu, so sibyerabidde: 
5_26_14_sikiryangako nga nkyali mu nnaku zange, so sikiterekangako nga siri mulongoofu, so sikiwangako olw'abafu: nawulira eddoboozi. lya Mukama Katonda wange, nkoze nga byonna bwe biri bye wandagira. 
5_26_15_Tunula. ng'oyima mu kifo kyo ekitukuvu mw'otuula, mu ggulu, owe omukisa abantu bo Isiraeri, n'ettaka ly'otuwadde, nga bwe walayirira bajjajja baffe, ensi ekulukuta n'amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki. 
5_26_16_Leero Mukama Katonda wo akulagira okukolanga amateeka gano n'emisango: kyonoovanga obyekuuma n'obikola n'omutima gwo gwonna n'emmeeme yo yonna. 
5_26_17_Oyatudde leero Mukama nga ye Katonda wo, era ng'onootambuliranga mu makubo ge, ne weekuumanga amateeka ge n'ebiragiro, bye n'emisango gye; n'owuliranga eddoboozi lye: 
5_26_18_era Mukama ayatudde leero ggwe okubeeranga eggwanga ery'envuma eri ye yennyini, nga bwe yakusuubiza, era weekuumenga ebiragiro bye byonna; 
5_26_19_era akugulumizenga okusinga amawanga gonna ge yakola, olw'ettendo n'olw'erinnya n'olw'ekitiibwa; era obeerenga eggwanga ettukuvu eri Mukama Katonda wo; nga bwe yayogera. 
5_27_1_Awo Musa n'abakadde ba Isiraeri, ne balagira abantu, nga boogera nti Mwekuumenga ekiragiro kyonna kye mbalagira leero. 
5_27_2_Kale olulituuka ku lunaku olwo lwe mulisomoka Yoludaani okuyingira mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa, olyesimbira amayinja amanene, n'ogasiigako ennoni: 
5_27_3_era oliwandiika ku go ebigambo byonna eby'amateeka gano, bw'olimala okusomoka; olyoke oyingire mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa, ensi ekulukuta amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki, nga Mukama, Katonda wa bajjajja bo, bwe yakusuubiza. 
5_27_4_Awo olulituuka bwe muliba nga musomose Yoludaani; ne mulyoka musimba amayinja gano, ge mbalagira leero, ku lusozi, Ebali, n'ogasiigako ennoni. 
5_27_5_Era olizimbira eyo ekyoto kya Mukama Katonda wo, ekyoto eky'amayinja: togayimusangako kintu kya kyuma. 
5_27_6_Ekyoto kya Mukama Katonda wo onookizimbyanga amayinja agatali mateme: era okwo kw'onooweeranga ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa eri Mukama Katonda wo: 
5_27_7_era onoosalanga ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe, n'oliiranga eyo; era onoosanyukiranga mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_27_8_Era oliwandiikira ddala bulungi ku mayinja ago ebigambo byonna eby'amateeka gano. 
5_27_9_Awo Musa ne bakabona Abaleevi ne bagamba Isiraeri yenna nti Musirike, muwulire, ggwe Isiraeri; leero ofuuse eggwanga lya Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_27_10_Kyonoovanga ogondera eddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo, n'okolanga ebiragiro bye n'amateeka ge, bye nkulagira leero. 
5_27_11_Awo Musa n'akuutiira abantu ku lunaku olwo, ng'ayogera nti 
5_27_12_nti Bano be baliyimirira ku lusozi Gerizimu okusabira abantu omukisa nga mumaze okusomoka Yoludaani; Simyoni, ne Leevi, ne Yuda, ne Isakaali, ne Yusufu, ne Benyamini: 
5_27_13_era bano be baliyimirira ku lusozi Ebali olw'okukolima; Lewubeetu; Gaadi, ne Aseri, ne Zebbulooni; Ddaani, ne Nafutaali. 
5_27_14_Kale Abaleevi baliddamu ne bagamba abasajja bonna aba Isiraeri n'eddoboozi ddene nti 
5_27_15_Akolimirwe omuntu akola ekifaananyi ekyole oba ekifumbe, eky'omuzizo eri Mukama; omulimu gw'engalo z'omukozi, n'alusimba mu kyama. Abantu bonna ne baddamu ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_16_Akolimirwe oyo anyooma kitaawe oba nnyina. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_17_Akolimirwe oyo ajjulula ensalo ya muliraanwa we. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_18_Akolimirwe oyo akyamya omuzibe w'amaaso okuva mu kkubo. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_19_Akolimirwe oyo akyamya ensonga eya munnaggwanga n'atalina kitaawe ne nnamwandu. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_20_Akolimirwe oyo asula ne mukazi wa kitaawe; kubanga abikkudde olukugiro lwa kitaawe. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina: 
5_27_21_Akolimirwe oya asula n'ensolo yonna yonna. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_22_Akolimirwe oyo asula ne mwannyina, muwala wa kitaawe oba muwala wa nnyina. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_23_Akolimirwe oyo asuta ne mukoddomi we. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_24_Akolimirwe oyo akuba muliraanwa we mu kyama. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_25_Akolimirwe oyo alya empeera olw'okuttisa omuntu ataliiko musango. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_27_26_Akolimirwe oyo atanyweza bigambo by’amateeka gano okubikolanga. Abantu bonna ne bagamba nti Amiina. 
5_28_1_Awo olunaatuukanga, bw'oo noonyiikiranga okuwulira eddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo, okukwata ebiragiro bye byonna bye nkulagira leero, okubikolanga, Mukama Katonda wo anaakugulumizanga okusinga amawanga gonna agali ku nsi: 
5_28_2_n'emikisa gino gyonna ginaakujjiranga ginaakutuukangako, bw'onoowuliranga eddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_28_3_Onoobanga n'omukisa mu kibuga, era onoobanga n'omukisa mu kyalo. 
5_28_4_Ekibala ky'omubiri gwo kinaabanga n'omukisa, n'ekibala ky'ettaka lyo, n'ekibala ky'ekisibo kyo, ezzadde ly'ente: zo n'abaana b'embuzi zo. 
5_28_5_Ekibbo kyo kinaabanga n'omukisa n'olutiba lwo olw'okugoyeramu. 
5_28_6_Onoobanga n'omukisa bw'onooyingiranga, era onoobanga n'omukisa bw'onoofulumanga: 
5_28_7_Mukama anaakubiranga mu maaso go abalabe bo abakugolokokerako: banaafulumanga okukutabaala mu kkubo limu, ne baddukanga mu maaso go mu makubo musanvu. 
5_28_8_Mukama anaalagiranga omukisa okuba ku ggwe mu mawanika go, ne mu byonna by'oteekako omukono gwo; era anaakuweeranga omukisa mu nsi Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwa. 
5_28_9_Mukama anaakunywezanga okuba eggwanga ettukuvu eri ye, nga bwe yakulayirira; bw'onookwatanga ebiragiro bya Mukama Katonda wo n'otambuliraaga mu makubo ge. 
5_28_10_Awo amawanga gonna ag'oku nsi ganaalabanga ag'otuumiddwa erinnya lya Mukama; ne gakutyanga: 
5_28_11_Era Mukama anaakugaggawazanga olw'ebirungi, mu bibala by'omubiri gwo ne mu bibala by'ensolo zo ne mu bibala by'ettaka lyo; mu nsi Mukama gye yalayirira bajjajja bo okukuwa. 
5_28_12_Mukama anaakuggulirangawo etterekero lye eddungi eggulu okugaba enkuba y'ensi yo mu budde bwayo, n'okuwa omukisa omulimu gwonna ogw'omukono gwo: era onoowolanga amawanga mangi; so teweewalanga. 
5_28_13_Era Mukama anaakufuulanga omutwe so si mukira; era onoobanga wagguln wokka so si wansi; bw'otioowuliranga ebiragiro bya Mukama Katonda wo; bye nkukuutira leero, okubikwatanga n'okubikolanga; 
5_28_14_n'olema okukyamanga; okuva mu kigambo kyonna ku ebyo bye mbalagira leero, okugenda ku mukono ogwa ddyo newakubadde ku gwa kkono, okugoberera bakatonda abalala okubaweereza: 
5_28_15_Naye olulituuka, bw'otoliwulira ddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo, okukwata ebiragiro bye byonna n'amateeka ge bye nkulagira leero okubikola; ebikolimo bino byonna birikujjira, birikutuukako. 
5_28_16_Olikolimirwa mu kibuga, era olikolimirwa mu kyalo. 
5_28_17_Ekibbo kyo kirikolimirwa n'olutiba lwo olw'okugoyeramu. 
5_28_18_Ebibala by'omubiri gwo birikolimirwa, n'ebibala by'ettaka lyo, ezzadde ly'ente zo, n'abaana b'embuzi zo. 
5_28_19_Onookolimirwanga bw'onooyingiranga era onookolimirwanga bw'onoofulumanga. 
5_28_20_Mukama anaakusindikangako okukolimirwa n'okulemwa n'okunenyezebwa; mu byonna by'oteekako omukono gwo okukola, okutuusa lw'olizikirizibwa, n'okutuusa lw'olifaafaagana amangu; olw'obubi bw'ebikolwa byo ebyakunsengusa. 
5_28_21_Mukama anaakulwazanga kawumpuli yeegattenga naawe okutuusa lw'alikumalawo. okuva ku nsi, gy'oyingiramu okugirya 
5_28_22_Mukama anaakukubanga akakono, n'omusujja, n'okuzimba, n'okwokya okungi, n'ekitala, n'okwonooneka, n'okugengewala; era binaakugobereranga okutuusa lw'olizikirira. 
5_28_23_N'eggulu lyo eriri waggulu ku mutwe gwo linaabanga kikomo, n'ettaka eriri wansi wo linaabanga kyuma. 
5_28_24_Mukama anaafuulanga enkuba ey'ensi yo okuba effufugge n'enfuufu: mu ggulu mwe nnaavanga okukka ku ggwe, okutuusa lw'olizikirizibwa. 
5_28_25_Mukama anaakukubanga mu maaso g'abalabe bo: onoofulumanga okubatabaala mu kkubo limu, era onoddukanga mu makubo musanvu mu maaso gaabwe: era onooyuuganyizibwanga eruuyi n'eruuyi mu bwakabaka bwonna obw'ensi: 
5_28_26_N'omulambo gwo gunaabanga kya kulya kya nnyonyi zonna ez'omu bbanga, era kya nsolo ez'oku nsi, so tewaabengawo aliziguŋŋumula. 
5_28_27_Mukama anaskuleetangako ejjute ery'e Misiri, n'amabwa, n'olukonvuba n'obuwere ebitakuwonyezekako: 
5_28_28_Mukama anaakuleetangako eddalu n'obuzibe bw'amsaso n'okusamaalirira kw'omutima: 
5_28_29_era onoowammaatanga mu ttuntu, ng'omuzibe w'amaaso bw'awammantira mu kizikiza; so toolabenga mukisa mu makubo go: era onoojoogebwanga bujoogebwa era onoonyagibwanga ennaku zonna, so tewaabengawo anaakulokola. 
5_28_30_Onooyogerezanga omukazi, n'omulala anaasulanga naye: onoozimbanga ennyumba, so toobeerenga omwo: onoosimbanga olusuku lw'emizabbibu, so toolyenga bibala byalwo. 
5_28_31_Ente yo enettirwanga mu maaso go, so toogiryengako: endogoyi yo eneenyagibwanga lwa maanyi mu maaso go, so teekuddizibwenga: endiga zo zinaagabirwanga abalabe bo, so toobengako anaakulokolanga. 
5_28_32_Batabani bo ne bawala bo banaagabirwanga eggwanga eddala, era amaaso go ganaatunuIanga ganaazibanga olw'okubeegomba okuzibya obudde: so tewaabengawo kiatu ekinaabanga mu buyinza bw'omukono gwo. 
5_28_33_Ebibala by'ettaka lyo, n'emirimu gyo gyonna, eggwanga ly'otomanyi liribirya; era onoojoogebwanga bujoogebwa era onoobetentebwanga ennaku zonna: 
5_28_34_n'okulaluka n'olaluka olw'okulaba kw'amaaso go kw'onoolabanga. 
5_28_35_Mukama anaakulwazanga amaviivi n'amagulu ejjute ebbi, ly'otowonyezeka, okuva munda w'ekigere kyo okutuusa ku bwezinge bw'omutwe gwo. 
5_28_36_Mukama anaakuleetanga ggwe ne kabaka gw'oliyimusa okukufuga, eri eggwanga ly'otomanyanga ggwe newakubadde bajjajja bo; era onooweererezanga eyo bakatonda abalala, emiti n'amayinja. 
5_28_37_Era onoofuukanga ekyewuunyo, olugero, n'ekigambo eky'obuwemu mu mawanga gonna Mukama gy’anaakutwalanga. 
5_28_38_Onoofulumyanga mu animiro ensigo nnyingi, onooyingizanga ntono; kubanga enzige eneegiryanga: 
5_28_39_Onoosimbanga ensuku z'emizabbibu n'ozirima, naye toonyweaga ku nvinnyo, yaamu newakubadde okukungula; kubanga akawuka kanaagiryanga. 
5_28_40_Onoobanga n'emizeyituuni mu nsalo zo zonna, naye toosaabenga mafuta Saag9o; kubaaga omuzeyituuni gwo gunaaku akumulanga ebibala byagwo. 
5_28_41_Olizaala abaana ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala, naye tebaabenga babo; kubanga balitwalibwa mu busibe: 
5_28_42_Emiti gyo gyonna n'ebibala by'ettaka lyo eazige eneebiryanga. 
5_28_43_Munnaggwanga ali wakati mu ggwe aneeyongetayongeranga okulinnya waggulu okukusinga; naawe oneeyongerayongeranga okukka wansi. 
5_28_44_Anaakuwolanga; naawe toomuwolenga: anaabanga mutwe, naawe onoobanga mukira. 
5_28_45_Era ebikolimo ebyo byonna binaakujjiranga binaakugobereranga binaakutuukangako okutuusa lw'olizikirizibwa; kubanga tewawulira ddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo, okukwata ebiragiro bye n'amateeka ge bye yakulagira: 
5_28_46_era binaabanga lru ggwe okuba akabonero n'ekyewuunyo, ne ku zzadde lyo ennaku zonna: 
5_28_47_kubanga tewaweereza Mukama Katonda wo n'essanyu era n'omutima ogujaguza, olw'ebintu byonna okuba ebingi: 
5_28_48_kyonoovanga oweereza abalabe bo Mukama b'anaasindikanga okukulumba, ng'olumwa enjala n'ennyonta, era ng'oli bwereere, era ng'obulwa ebintu byonna: era anaateekaaga ekikoligo eky'ekyuma ku nkoto yo, okutuusa lw'alimala okukuzikiriza. 
5_28_49_Mukama alikuleetako eggwanga ng'ahggya wala mu nkomerero y'ensi, ng'empungu bw'ebuuka; eggwanga ly'otolitegeera lulimi lwalyo; 
5_28_50_eggwanga ery'obwenyi obukambwe, eritalitya maaso ga bakadde, so teririsaasira bato: 
5_28_51_anaalyanga ebibala by'ensolo zo, n'ebibala by'ettaka lyo, okutuusa lw'olizikirizibwa: era eritalikulekera Onaaw no, newakubadde envinnyo, newakubadde amafuta, ezzadde ly'ente zo, newakubadde abaana b'embuzi zo, okutuusa lw'alikuzikiriza: 
5_28_52_Era anaakuzingizanga mu miryango gyo gyonna, okutuusa enkomera zo empaavu eziriko ebigo ze weesiga lwe zirigwa mu nsi yo yonna: era alikuzingiza mu miryango gyo gyonaa wmu nsi yo yonna, Mukama Katonda wo gy'akuwadde: 
5_28_53_Era onoolyanga ebibala: by'omubiri gwo ggwe, ennyama y'abaana bo ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala Mukama Katonda wo b'akuwadde; mu kuzingizibwa ne mu kuziyizibwa abalabe bo kwe banaakuziyizanga; 
5_28_54_Omusajja omugonvu mu mmwe era omwenaanyi ennyo, eriiso lye linaabanga bbi eri mugaada we n'eri omukazi ow'omu kifuba kye, n'eri abaana be abasigadde abakyaliwo: 
5_28_55_n'obutawa n'atawa muntu yenna ku bo ku nnyama y'abaana be b'anaalyanga nga taliiko ekimusigalidde; mu kuzingizibwa ne mu kuziyizibwa. omulabe wo kw'anaakuziyizanga mu miryango gyo gyonna. 
5_28_56_Omukazi omugoavu mu mmwe era omwenaanyi, ataganya kulinnyisa. ku ttaka kigere kye olw'okwenaanya n'obugoavu, eriiso lye linaabanga bbi eri bba ow'omu kifuba kye, n'eri mutabani we, n'eri muwala we; 
5_28_57_n'eri omwana we omuto afuluma wakati w'ebigere bye, n'eri abaana be b'alizaala; kubanga anaabalyanga nkiso olw'okubulwa ebintu byonna: mu kuzingizibwa ne mu kuziyizibwa omulabe wo kw'anaakuziyizanga mu miryango gyo. 
5_28_58_Bw'otookwatenga bigambo byonna eby'omu mateeka gano ebiwaiidiikiddwa mu kitabo kino okubikolanga, olyoke otyenga erinnya lino ery'ekitiibwa era ery'entiisa, Mukama Katonda wo; 
5_28_59_awo Mukama anaafuulanga ebibonyoobonyo eby'ekitalo, n'ebiboayoobonyo by'ezzadde lyo, ebibonyoobonyo ebinene era ebirwawo ennyo, era: endwadde enkambwe era ezirwawo ennyo. 
5_28_60_Era anaakuleetangako nate endwadde zonna ez'e Misiri ze watyanga; era zineegattanga naawe. 
5_28_61_Era na buli ndwadde na buli kibonyoobonyo ekitawandiikiddwa mu kitabo eky'amateeka gano, ebyo Mukama anaabikuleetangako, okutuusa lw'olizi kirizibwa. 
5_28_62_Era mulisigalawo omuwendo gwammwe nga mutono, newakubadde nga mwali ng'emmunyeenye ez'omu ggulu olw'obungi; kubanga tewawulira ddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo. 
5_28_63_Awo olunaatuukanga Mukama nga bwe yabasanyukirako okubakola obulungi n'okubaaza; bw'atyo Mukama anaabasanyukirangako okubazikiriza n’okubafaafaaganya; era munaggibwangako okuva ku nsi gy'oyingira okugirya. 
5_28_64_Era Mukama anaakusaasaanyanga mu mawanga gonna; okuva ku nkomerero y'ensi okutuusa ku nkomerero y'ensi; era onooweererezanga eyo bakatonda abalala b'otomanyaaga ggwe newakubadde bajjajja bo, emiti n’amayinja. 
5_28_65_Era mu mawanga ago toliraba kwesiima kwonna, so n'ekigere kyo tekiibengako we kirinnya okuwummula: naye Mukama anaakuwanga omutima ogukankana, n'amaaso agaziba, n'emmeeme ekoozimba, 
5_28_66_n'obulamu bwo bunaabuusibwabuusibwanga mu maaso go; era onootyanga emisana n'ekiro, so toobengako kw'otegeerera obulamu bwo bwe bunaaba: 
5_28_67_enkya onooyogeranga nti Singa buwungedde! era akawungeezi onooyogeranga nti Singa bukedde! olw'okutya kw'omutima gwo kw'onootyanga, n'olw'okulaba kw'amaaso go kw'onoolabanga. 
5_28_68_Era Mukama alikuzza mu Misiri nate n'amaato, mu kkubo lye nnakugambako nti Toliriraba nate mulundi gwa kubiri: era eyo mulyetunda eri abalabe bammwe okuba abaddu n'abazaana, so tewaabengawo muntu anaabagulanga. 
5_29_1_Ebyo bye bigambo eby'endagaano Mukama gye yalagira Musa okulagaana n'abaana ba Isiraeri mu nsi ya Mowaabu, obutassaako ndagaano gye yalagaana nabo ku Kolebu. 
5_29_2_Era Musa n'ayita Isiraeri yenna n'abagamba nti Mwalaba byonna Mukama bye yakolera mu maaso gammwe mu asi y'e Misiri eri Falaawo n'eri abaddu be bonna n'eri easi ye yonna 
5_29_4_naye Mukama tabawadde mutima gwa kutegeera n'amaaso ag'okulaba n'amatu ag'okuwulira ne leero. 
5_29_5_Nange naakamaze emyaka ana nga mbakulembera mu ddungu: ebyambalo byammwe tebikaddiye ku mmwe, n'engatto yo tekaddiye ku kigere kyo. 
5_29_6_Temwalyanga ku mmere so temwanywanga ku mwenge newakubadde ekitamiiza: mulyoke mumanye nga nze Mukama Katonda wammwe: 
5_29_7_Era bwe mwatuuka mu kifo kino, Sikoni kabaka w'e Kesuboni ne Ogi kabaka We Basani ne basitula okulwana naffe, ne kubatta: 
5_29_8_ne tulya ensi yaabwe, ne tugiwa Abalewubeeni n'Abagaadi n'ekitundu: ky'eluka ky'Abamanase, okuba obutaka. 
5_29_9_Kale mwekuumenga ebigautbo eby'endagaano eno, mubikolenga; mulyoke mulabenga omukisa mu byonna bye mukola. 
5_29_10_Muyimiridde leero mwenna mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wammwe; abakulu bammwe, ebika byammwe, abakadde bammwe, n'abaami bammwe, be basajja bonna aba Isiraeri, 
5_29_11_abaana bammwe abato abakazi bammwe, ne munnaggwanga wo ali wakati mu nsiisira zo; okuva ku mutyabi w'enku zo okutuuka ku musenyi w'amazzi go: 
5_29_12_olagaane endagaano ya Mukama Katonda wo ne mu kirayiro lye, by'alagaana naawe leero: 
5_29_13_akunyweze leero gy'ali ye okubanga eggwanga, era abeerenga Katonda gy'oli, nga bwe yakugamba, era nga bwe yalayirira bajjajja bo Ibulayimu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo. 
5_29_14_So siragaana ndagaano eno ne ndayira ekirayiro kino eri mmwe mwekka; 
5_29_15_naye eri oyo ayimiridde wano awamu naffe leero mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda waffe, era n'eri oyo atali wano wamu naffe leero: 
5_29_16_(kubanga mumaayi bwe twatuulanga mu nsi y'e Misiri; era bwe twaggukira wakati mu mawanga ge mwayitamu; 
5_29_17_era mwalabanga eby'emizizo byabwe, n'ebifaanaayi byabwe, emiti n'amayinja, effeeza n'ezaabu, ebyali mu bo;) 
5_29_18_walemenga okuba mu mmwe omusajja oba mukazi oba nnyumba oba kika, akyamya omutima gwe leero okuva ku Mukama Katonda waffe, okugenda okuweereza bakatonda ab'amawanga gali; walemenga okuba mu mmwe ekikolo ekibala akalulwe ne abusino; 
5_29_19_era olunaatuukanga ng'awulira ebigambo eby'ekikolimo kino, ne yeenyumiriza mu mutima gwe, ng'ayogera nti Naabanga n'emirembe ne; we nnaatambuliranga mu bukakanyavu bw'omutima gwange, okuzikiriza oyo atobye wamu n'omukalu: 
5_29_20_Mukama taamusonyiwenga; naye obusuagu bwa Mukama n'obuggya bwe ne biryoka binyookera omusajja oyo, n'ekikoIimo kyonna ekiwandiikiddwa mu kitabo kino kinaamubangako, era Mukama anaasangulatiga erinnya lye okuliggya wansi w'eggulu. 
5_29_21_Era Mukama anaamwawuliranga obubi okumuggya mu bika byonna ebya Isiraeri, ng'ebikolimo byonna bwe biri eby'endagaano ewandiikiddwa mu kitabo kino eky'amateeka. 
5_29_22_Era ezzadde eririddawo abaana bammwe abaliyimuka okubaddirira, ne munnaggwanga aliva mu nsi y'ewala, balyogera, bwe baliraba ebibonyoobonyo by'easi eyo n'endwadde Mukama z'agirwazizza; 
5_29_23_era ng'ensi yaayo yonna kibiriiti na munnyo na kusiriira, nga si nsige, so tebala, so n'omuddo gwonna tegumera omwo, ag'okusuulibwa kw'e Sodoma ne Ggomola, Aduma ne Zeboyimu, Mukama bye yasuula mu busungu bwe ne mu kiruyi kye: 
5_29_24_amawanga gonna galyogera nti Mukama ekimukozezza ensi eao bwe. kityo kiki? okwokya kw'obusungu buno obungi makulu ki? 
5_29_25_Abantu ne balyoka boogera ati Kubanga baaleka endagaano ya Mukama, Katonda wa bajjajja baabwe, gye yalagaana nabo bwe yabaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri; 
5_29_26_ne bagenda ne baweereza bakatonda abalala, ne babasinza, bakatonda be baali tebamanyi, era be yali tabawadde 
5_29_27_obusungu bwa Mukama kye bwava bubuubuuka ku nsi eno, okugireetako ekikolimo kyonna ekiwandiikiddwa mu kitabo kino; 
5_29_28_kale Mukama n'abasimbula mu nsi yaabwe, mu busungu ne mu kiruyi ne mu kunyiiga okungi, n'abasuula mu nsi endala, nga leero. 
5_29_29_Eby'ekyama biba bya Mukama Katobda waffe: naye ebibikkulibwa biba byaffe era bya baana baffe, emirembe gyonna; tulyoke tukolenga ebigambo byonna eby'omu mateeka gano. 
5_30_1_Awo olunaatuukanga, ebyo byonna bwe birimala okukujjira, omukisa n'ekikolimo, bye ntadde mu maaso go, naawe bw'onoobijjuukiranga mu mawangagonna Mukama Katonda wo gy'akugobedde, 
5_30_2_n'okomawo eri, Mukama Katonda wo, n'ogondera eddobaozi lye nga byonna bwe biri bye nkulagira leero, ggwe n'abaana bo, n'omutima gwo gwonna, era n'emmeeme yo yonna 
5_30_4_IOmuntu yenna ku babo abaagobebwa bw'aba ng'ali mu nsonda z'eggulu, Mukama Katonda wo unaakuggyanga eyo okukukuŋŋaanya, era anaakukimanga eyo: 
5_30_5_era Mukama Katonda wo anaakuyingizanga mu nsi baijajja bo gye baalya, naawe oligirya; era alikukola bulungi, alikwaza okusinga bajjajja bo. 
5_30_6_Era Mukama Katonda wo alikukomola omutima, n'omutima gw'ezzadde lyo, okwagalanga Mukama Katonda wo n'omutima gwo gwonna, n'emmeeme yo yonna, olyoke obe omulamu. 
5_30_7_Era Mukama Katonda wo aliteeka ebikolimo ebyo byonna ku balabe bo, ne ku abo abaakukyawa, abaakuyigganyanga. 
5_30_8_Era olikomawo n'ogondera eddoboozi lya Mukama, n'okola ebiragiro bye byonna, bye nkulagira leero. 
5_30_9_Era Mukama Katonda wo alikwaza mu mulimu gwonna ogw'omukono gwo, mu bibala by'omubiri gwo, ne mu bibala by'ekisibo kyo, ne mu bibalx by'ettaka lyo, olw'obulungi: kubanga: Mukama alikusanyukirako nate olw'obulungi, nga bwe yasanyukira ku bajjajja bo: 
5_30_10_oba ng'oligondera eddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda wo, okwekuumanga ebiragiro bye n'amateeka ge ebiwandiikiddwa mu kitabo kino eky'amateeka; oba ng'olikyukira Mukama Katonda wo n'omutima gwo gwonna n'emmeeme yo yonna. 
5_30_11_Kubanga ekiragiro kino. kye nkulagira leero tekiiyinze. kukukaluubirira, so tekiri wala. 
5_30_12_Tekiri mu ggulu n'okwogera n'oyogera nti Ani anaatulinnyira mu ggulu, akituleetere, atukuwulize, tulyoke tukikole? 
5_30_13_So tekiri mitala w'ennyanja n'okwogera n'oyogera nti Ani alituwungukira ennyanja; akituleetere, akituwulize, tulyoke tukikole? 
5_30_14_Naye ekigambo kikuli kumpi nnyo, mu kamwa ko ne mu mutima gwo olyoke okikolenga. 
5_30_15_Laba, leero ntadde mu maaso go obulamu n'obulungi, n'okufa n’obubi; 
5_30_16_kubanga nkulagira leero okwagalanga Mukama Katonda wo, okutambuliranga mu makubo ge, n'okwekuumanga. ebiragiro bye n'amateeka ge n'emisango gye, olyoke obenga omulamu oyalenga era Mukama Katonda wo alyoke akuwenga omukisa mu nsi gy'oyingira okugirya. 
5_30_17_Naye omutima gwo bwe gunaakyamanga n'ogaana okuwulira, naye n'osendebwasendebwanga n'osinzanga bakatonda abalala n'obaweerezanga; 
5_30_18_mbategeereza ddala leero nga temutirema kuzikirira; temulimala nnaku zammwe nnyingi ku nsi gy'osomokera Yoludaani okuyingira okugirya. 
5_30_19_Mpita eggulu n'ensi okuba abajulirwa gye muli leero, nga ntadde mu maaso go obulamu n'okufa, omukisa n'okukolimirwa: kale weeroboze obulamu, olyoke obenga omulamu, ggwe n'ezzadde lyo: 
5_30_20_okwagalanga Mukama Katonda wo, okugonderanga eddo boozi lye, n'okwegattanga naye: kubanga oyo bwe bulamu bwo, era kwe kuwangaala enaaku zo: olyoke otuulenga mu nsi Mukama gye yalayirira bajjajja bo, Ibulayimu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo, okubawa. 
5_31_1_Awo Musa n'agenda n'abuulira Isiraeri yenna ebigambo ebyo. 
5_31_2_N'abagamba nti Leero naakamaze emyaka kikumi mu abiri; sikyayinza kufuluma na kuyingira: era. Mukama yaŋŋamba nti Tojja kusomoka. Yoludaani ono. 
5_31_3_Mukama Katonda wo y'alikukulembera okusomoka; ye alizikiriza amawanga gano mu maaso go, naawe oligalya: era Yoswa y'alikukulembera okusomoka, nga Mukama bwe yayogera. 
5_31_4_Era Mukama alibakola nga bwe yakola Sikoni ne Ogi, bakabaka b'Abamoli, n'ensi yaabwe; be yazikiriza. 
5_31_5_Era Mukama alibagabula mu maaso gammwe, nammwe mulibakola ng'ekiragiro kyonna bwe kiri kye mbalagidde. 
5_31_6_Beera n'amaanyi, guma omwoyo, totya so tobatekemukira kubanga Mukama Katonda wo ye wuuyo agenda naawe; taakulekenga so taakwabulirenga. 
5_31_7_Awo Musa n'ayita Yoswa n’amugamba mu maaso ga Isiraeri yenna nti Beera n'amaanyi, guma omwoyo: kubanga oligenda n'abantu bano mu nsi Mukama gye yalayirira bajjajja baabwe okubawa; era oligibasisa. 
5_31_8_Mukama ye wuuyo abakulembera; anaabeeranga naawe, taakulekenga so taakwabulirenga: totya so totekemuka. 
5_31_9_Awo Musa n'awandiika amateeka gano n'agawa bakabona abaana ba Leevi, abaasitulanga essanduuko ey'endagaano ya Mukama, n'abakadde bonna aba Isiraeri. 
5_31_10_Awo Musa n'abalagira ng'ayogera nti Buli myaka musanvu bwe ginaggwangako, mu kiseera ekyateekebwawo eky'omwaka ogw'okusumululiramu, mu mbaga ey'ensiisira. 
5_31_11_Isiraeri yenna nga bazze okulabikira mu maaso ga Mukama Katonda wo mu kifo ky'alyeroboza, onoosomeranga amateeka gano mu maaso ga Isiraeri yenna mu matu gaabwe. 
5_31_12_Okuŋŋaanyanga abantu; abasajja n'abakazi n'abaana abato, ne munnaggwanga wo ali munda w'enzigi zo, bawulire, era bayige, era batye Mukama Katonda wammwe, era bakwatenga ebigambo byonna eby'amateeka gano okubikola; 
5_31_13_era abaana baabwe; abatannamanya, bawulire era bayige okutyanga Mukama Katonda wammwe, ennaku zonna nga mukyatuula mu nsi gye musomokera Yoludaani okugirya. 
5_31_14_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Laba, ennaku zo ziri kumpi kikugwanire okufa: yita Yoswa, mweyanjule mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu, ndyoke mmulagire. Awo Musa ne Yoswa ne bagenda ne beeyanjula mu weema ey'okusisinkanirangamu. 
5_31_15_Awo Mukama n'alabikira mu weema mu mpagi y'ekire: empagi y'ekire n'eyimirira waggulu w'oluggi lw'eweema. 
5_31_16_Mukama n'agamba Musa nti Laba; olyebaka ne bajjajja bo; n'abaatu bano baligolokoka ne bagenda nga bayenda okugoberera bakatonda abalala ab'omu nsi, gye bagenda okubeeranga mu bo wakati, era balindeka ne bamenya endagaano yange gye nnalagaana nabo. 
5_31_17_Obusungu bwange ne bulyoka bubuubuuka ku bo ku lunaku luli, nange ndibaleka, era adibakisa amaaso gange, era baliriibwa, n'obubi n'ennaku ennyingi biribajjira; n'okwogera ne boogera ku lunaku luli nti Obubi buno si kye buwdde butujjira kubanga Katonda waffe tali mu ffe? 
5_31_18_Era sirirema kukisa maaso gange ku lunaku luli olw'obubi bwonna bwe baliba nga bakoze, kubanga bakyukidde bakatonda abalala. 
5_31_19_Kale nno kaakano mwewandiikire oluyimba luno, era oluyigirize abaana ba Isiraeri: oluteeke mu bumwa bwabwe, oluyimba luno lubeerenga omujulirwa wange eri abaana ba Isiraeri. 
5_31_20_Kubanga bwe ndiba nga mbayingizizza mu nsi gye nnalayirira bajjajja baabwe, ekulukuta amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki; era bwe baliba nga balidde ne bakkuta, ne bagejja; ne balyoka bakyukira bakatonda abalala, ne babaweereza, ne banyooma nze, ne bamenya endagaano yange. 
5_31_21_Awo olulituuka, obubi bungi n'ennaku bwe biiiba nga bibajjidde, oluyimba luno lulitegeeza mu maaso gaabwe ng'omujulirwa; kubanga: terulyerabirwa okuva mu bumwa: bw'ezzadde lyabwe: kubanga mmanyi oklilowooza kwabwe kwe bagoberera, ne kaakano, nga sinnabayingiza mu nsi gye nnalayirira. 
5_31_22_Awo Musa n’awandiika oluyimba luao ku lunaku olwo, n'aluyigiriza abaana ba Isiraeri: 
5_31_23_N'alagira Yoswa omwana wa Nuni, n'ayogera nti Beera n'amaanyi, guma omwoyo: kubanga oliyingiza abaana ba Isiraeri mu nsi gye nnabalayirira: nange n'abeeranga wamu naawe. 
5_31_24_Awo olwatuuka; Musa bwe yamalira ddala okuwandiika ebigambo eby'amateeka gano mu kitabo, okutuusa lwe byaggwa, 
5_31_25_Musa n'alagira Abaleevi, abaasitulanga essanduuko y'endagaano ya Mukama ng'ayogera nti 
5_31_26_Muddire ekitabo kino eky'amateeka; mukiteeke ku mabbali g'essanduuko y'endagaano ya Mukama Katonda wammwe, kibeerenga eyo okuba omujulirwa gy'oli. 
5_31_27_Kubanga mmanyi obujeemu bwo n'ensingo yo enkakanyavu: laba, nga mulamu nga nkyali wamu nammwe, mwabanga mwagala okujeemera Mukama; temulyeyongera nnyo nga mmaze: okufa? 
5_31_28_Mukuŋŋaanyize gye ndi abakadde bonna ab'ebika byammwe, n'abaami bammwe, ndyoke njogerere ebigambo bino mu matu gaabwe, era mpite eggulu: n'ensi okuba abajulirwa gye bali. 
5_31_29_Kubanga mmanyi nga mulyeyonoonera ddala nga mmaze okufa, era mulikyama okuva mu kkubo lye nnabalagira; era obubi bulibabaako mu nnaku ez'enkomerero; kubanga mulikola ekiri mu maaso ga Mukama ekibi, okumusunguwaza olw'omulimu gw'emikono gyammwe. 
5_31_30_Era Musa n'ayogerera matu g'ekibiina kyonna ekya Isiraeri ebigambo eby'oluyimba luno, okutuusa lwe byaggwa. 
5_32_1_Wulira, ggwe eggulu; nange naayogera; N’ensi ewulire ebigambo by’akamwa kange: 
5_32_2_Okuyigiriza kwage kunaatonn ne'enkuba, Okwogera kwange gagwa ng.'omusulo; Ng'obukubakuba ku ssubi eggonvu Era ng'oluwandaggirize ku muddo: 
5_32_3_Kubanga naatendera erinnya lya Mukama: Muwe obukulu, Katonda waffe. 
5_32_4_Lwazi, omulimu gwe gwatuukirira; Kubanga amakubo ge gonna musango: Katonda ow'obwebubigwa atalina bubi, Wa mazima oyo era wa nsonga. 
5_32_5_Baakolanga ebitali bya butuukirivu eri ye, si baana be, lye bbala lyabwe: Gye mirembe, emikakanyavu egyakyama. 
5_32_6_Bwe musasula Mukama, bwe mutyo, Mmwe, abantu abasirusiru abatalina magezi? Si ye kitaawo eyakugula? Ye yakukola, ye yakunyweza ye. 
5_32_7_Jjukira ennaku ez’edda, Lowooza emyaka gy'emirembe emingi: Buuza kitaawo, anaakiilaga; Abakadde bo, banaakubuulira. 
5_32_8_Ali waggulu ennyo; bwe yawa amawanga obusika bwabwe, Bwe yayawula abaana. b'abantu: Yassaawo ensalo z'amawanga Ng'omuwendo bwe gwali ogw'abaana ba Isiraeri. 
5_32_9_Kubanga omugabo gwa Mukama be bantu be; Yakobo: gwe muteeko gw'obusika bwe. 
5_32_10_Yamusanga mu nsi ey'eddungu, Era mu kigumbo ekyereere ensolo we zikaabira; Yamwetooloolanga, Yamujjanjabanga. Yamukuumanga ng'emmunye y'eriiso lye: 
5_32_11_Ng'empungu esaasaaaya ekisu kyayo, Epaapaalira ku bwana bwayo, Yayanjuluza ebiwaawaatiro bye, n'abatwala, N'abasitulira ku byoya bye, 
5_32_12_Mukama yekka Ye Yamukulembera, So tewabanga katonda, mulala wamu naye. 
5_32_13_Yamulinnyisa ku bifo ebigulumivu eby'ensi, N'alya eky’engera eky’ennimiro N'amunuunyanga omubisi gw'enjuki okuva mu lwazi, N'amafuta okuva mu lwazi olw'embaalebaale; 
5_32_14_Omuzigo gw'ente n'amata g'endiga, N'amasavu g'abaana b'endiga, N'eadiga ennume ez'engeri ey'e Basani, n'embuzi emmandwa; N'eŋŋaano eya ssava ng'amasavu g'ensigo; N'onywanga omwenge oguva mu musaayi. gw'omuzabbib 
5_32_15_Naye Yesuluuni n'asavuwala, n'asamba: Wasavuwala, wanenewala, wafuuka munyirivu: N'alyoka aleka Katonda kola, N'anyooma Olwazi olw'obulokozi bwe. 
5_32_16_Baamukwasanga obuggya ne bakatonda abalala, Baamusunguwazanga n'eby'emizizo. 
5_32_17_Baawanga ssaddaaka balubaale abatali Katonda, Bakatonda be bataamanyanga, Bakatonda abaggya abaakajja bayimuke, Bajjajja bammwe be bataaryanga. 
5_32_18_Lwazi eyakuzaala tomujjukira, Era weerahidde Katonda eyakuzaala. 
5_32_19_Mukama n'akiraba n'abatamwa Olw'okusunguwaza kwa batabani be ne bawala be. 
5_32_20_N'ayogera nti Naabakisa amaaso gange, Ndiraba enkomerero yaabwe bw'eriba: Kubanga gye mirembe egy'ekyeja ekingi, Abaana omutali kukkiriza. 
5_32_21_Bankwasanga obuggya n'ekyo ekitali Katonda; Bansunguwazanga n'ebigambo byabwe ebitaliimu: Nange ndibakwasa obuggya eri abo abatali ggwanga; Ndibasunguwaza n'eggwanga essirusiru. 
5_32_22_Kubanga omuliro gukoledde mu busungu bwange; Era gwase okutuuka mu magombe aga wansi ennyo, Era gwokya ensi n'ekyengera, kyayo, Era gukoleeza ensozi we zisibuka. 
5_32_23_Ndibatuumako obubi; Ndimalira obusaale bwange ku bo: 
5_32_24_Balikoozimba n'enjala, n'okwokya okungi kulibamalawo, N'okuzikirira okukambwe; N'amannyo g'ensolo ndibasindikira, N'obusagwa bw'ebyewalula eby'omu nfuufu. 
5_32_25_Ebweru ekitala kinaabafuulaaga bamulekwa, Ne mu bisenge entiisa; Kinaazikirizanga omulenzi era n'omuwala, Ayonka era n'omusajja ameze envi. 
5_32_26_Nayogera nti Nandibasaasaanyizza wala, Nandimazeeyo okujjukirwa kwabwe mu bantu: 
5_32_27_Singa saatya kusunguwaza kwa mulabe, Abaabakyawa baleme okwerimba, Baleme okwogera nti Omukono gwaffe gugulumizibwa, Era Mukama si y'akoze bino byonna: 
5_32_28_Kubanga lye ggwanga eritamanyi kuteesa bigambo, So temuli kutegeera mu bo. 
5_32_29_Singa ba magezi ne bategeera Ne balowooza enkomerero yaabwe ey'oluvannyuma! 
5_32_30_Omu yandigobye arya olukumi; N'ababiri bandiddusizza batya Lwazi waabwe singa teyabatunda, Era Mukama singa teyabagabula? 
5_32_31_Kubanga olwazi lwabwe teruliŋŋnga olwazi lwaffe, Newakubadde abalabe baffe bennyini nga be basala omusango. 
5_32_32_Kubanga omuzabbibu gwabwe gwava ku muzabbiliu ogw'e Sodoma, Ne mu nnimiro ez'e Ggomola: Ezabbibu zaabwe zabliibu za mususa, Ebirimba byazo bikaawa: 
5_32_33_Omwenge gwabwe busagwa bwa misota, Era busagwa bukambwe bwa mbalasaasa. 
5_32_34_Kino tekyaterekwa gye ndi, Nga kiteekeddwako akabonero mu bugagga bwange? 
5_32_35_Okuwalana kviwange, n'okusasula, Obudde bwe bulituuka ekigere kyabwe ne kiseerera: Kubangaolunaku lwabwe olw'okulaba ennaku luli kumpi: N'ebigenda okubajjira biryanguwa: 
5_32_36_Kubanga Mukama alisalira abantu be omusango; Era alyejjusa olw'abaddu be; Bw'aliraba ng'obuyinza bwabwe buweddewo, So tewali asigadtlewo, oba musibe oba atali musibe. 
5_32_37_Era ayogera nti Bakatonda baabwe bali ludda wa, Olwazi lwe beesiganga; 
5_32_38_Abaalyangaamasavuag'essaddaaka zaabwe, Abaanywanga omwenge ogw'ekyo kye baawangayo ekyokunywa. Bagolokoke bababeere, Babe ekigo kyammwe, 
5_32_39_Mulabe kaakano nga nze, nze wuuyo, So tewali katonda wamu nange: Nze nzita; era nze mpa obulamu; Nfumise, era mponya: So tewali ayinza okulokola okuggya mu mukono gwange: 
5_32_40_Kubanga ngolola omukono gwange eri eggulu, Ne njogera nti Nga bwe ndi omulamu emirembe gyonna, 
5_32_41_Bwe ndiwagala ekitala kyange ekimasamasa, Omukono gwange ne gukwata ku musango; Ndiwalana eggwanga ku balabe bange, Ndisasula abo abankyawa. 
5_32_42_Obusaale bwange ndibutamiiza omusaayi, N'ekitala kyange kirirya ennya; N'omusaayi gw'abo abattibwa n'abawambe, Okuva ku mutwe gw'abo abakulembera abalabe, 
5_32_43_Musanyuke, mmwe amawanga, wamu n’abantu be. Kubanga aliwalana eggwanga ly'omusaayi gw'abaddu be, Era alisasula abalabe be okubonerezebwa; Era alitangirira elisi ye, abantu be. 
5_32_44_Musa n'ajja n'ayogerera ebigambo byonna eby'oluyimba luno mu matu g'abantu, ye ne Koseya omwana wa Nuni: 
5_32_45_Musa n'amalira ddala okwogera ebigambo ebyo byonna eri Isiraeri yenna: 
5_32_46_n'abagamba nti Muteeke omutima gwammwe ku bigambo byonna bye mbategeeza leero; bye muliragira abaana bauimwe, okukwata ebigambo byonna eby'amateeka ago okubikolanga. 
5_32_47_Kubanga si kigembo ekitaliimu gye muli kubanga bwe bulamu bwammwe, era olw'ekigambo ekyo kyemunaavanga muwaagaala 'ennaku zammwe ku nsi gye musomokera. Yoludaani okugirya. 
5_32_48_Mukama n'agamba Musa ku lunaku olwo nti 
5_32_49_Linnya ku lusozi luno Abalimu, ku lusozi Nebo, oluli mu nsi ya Mowaabu, olwolekera Yeriko; olengere ensi ya Kanani gye mpa abaana ba Isiraeri okuba obutaka: 
5_32_50_ofiire ku lusozi lw'olinnyako, okuŋŋaanyizibwe eri abantu bo; nga Alooni muganda wo bwe yafiira ku lusozi Koola, n'akuŋŋaanyizibwa eri abantu be: 
5_32_51_kubanga mwansobyako wakati mu baana ba Isiraeri ku mazzi ag'e Meriba mu Kadesi, mu ddungu Zini; kubanga temwantukuza wakati mu baana ba Isiraeri. 
5_32_52_Kubanga olirengera ensi mu maaso go; naye toligendayo mu nsi gye mpa abaana ba Isiraeri. 
5_33_1_Era guno gwe mukisa Musa omusajja wa Katonda gwe yasabira abaana ba Isiraeri nga tannaba kufa. 
5_33_2_N'ayogera nti Mukama yava ku Sinaayi, Era yabagolokokera ng'ava ku Seyiri; Yamasamasa okuva ku lusozi Palani, N'ava eri obukumi bw'abatukuvu: Ku mukono gwe ogwa ddyo kwaliko amateeka ag'omuliro gye bali: 
5_33_3_Weewaawo, ayagala amawanga; Abatukuvu be bonna bali mu mukono gwo. Ne batuula ku bigere byo; Buli muntu aliweebwa ku bigambo byo. 
5_33_4_Musa yatulagira amateeka, Obusika obw'ekibiina kya Yakobo. 
5_33_5_Era yali kabaka mu Yesuluni. Emitwe gy'abantu bwe baakuŋŋaanyizibwa, Ebika byonna ebya Isiraeri wamu: 
5_33_6_Lewubeeni abenga omulamu, alemenga okufa; Naye abasajja be babenga batono: 
5_33_7_Era guno gwe mukisa gwa Yuda: n'ayogera nti Wulira Mukama, eddoboozi lya Yuda, Omuyingize eri abantu be: N'emikono gye yeerwanirira; Era onoobanga mubeezi eri abalabe be. 
5_33_8_Ne ku Leevi n'ayogera nti Sumimu wo ne Ulimu wo biri n'omusajja wo atya Katonda, Gwe wakemera e Masa, Gwe wawakana naye ku mazzi ag'e Meriba 
5_33_10_Banaayigirizanga Yakobo emisango gyo, Ne Isiraeri banaamuyigirizanga amateeka go: Banaateekanga eby'okwoteza: mu maaso go, N'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekiramba ku kyoto kyo. 
5_33_11_Ebintu bye, Mukama, biwenga omukisa, Okkirize omulimu gw'emikono gye: Ofumitire ddala ebiwato byabwe abanaamugolokokerangako, N'abo abamukyawa balemenga okugolokoka nate.
