15_3_7_Era ne bawa abazimbi n'ababazzi effeeza; n'ebyokulya n'ebyokunywa n'amafuta ne babiwa w'e Sidoni n’ab'e Ttuulo, okuggya emivule ku Lebanooni okugireta ku nnyanja e Yopa nga Kuulo kabaka w'e Buperusi bwe yabalagira.8 Awo mu mwaka ogw'okubiri kasookedde bajja eri ennyumba ya Katonda e Yerusaalemi, mu mwezi ogw'okubiri, Zerubbaberi mutabani wa Seyalutyeri mwe yasookera ne Yesuwa mutabani wa Yozadaki ne baganda baabwe abalala bakabona n'Abaleevi n'abo abaali bavudde mu busibe obwo ne bajja e Yerusaalemi; ne balagira Abaleevi abaakamaze emyaka amakumi asatu n'okukirawo okulabirira omulimu ogw'omu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
15_3_9_Awo Yesuwa n'ayimirira ne batabani be ne baganda be, Kadumyeri ne batabani be, batabani ba Yuda, wamu okulabirira abakozi mu nnyumba ya Katonda: batabani ba Kenadadi ne batabani baabwe ne baganda baabwe Abaleevi. 
15_3_10_Awo abazimbi bwe bassaawo emisingi gya yeekaalu ya Mukama, ne bateeka bakabona nga bambadde ebyambalo byabwe nga balina amakondeere, n'Abaleevi batabani ba Asafu nga balina ebitaasa, okutendereza Mukama, nga Dawudi Ikabaka wa Isiraeri bwe yateekateeka. 
15_3_11_Ne bayimbiragana nga batendereza nga beebaza Mukama nga boogera nti Kubanga mulungi, n'okusaasira kwe kubeerera emi rembe gyonna eri Isiraeri. Abantu bonna ne boogerera waggulu n'eddoboozi ddene bwe baatendereza Mukama, kubanga emisingi gy'ennyumba ya Mukama gissibbwawo. 
15_3_12_Naye bangi ku bakabona n'Abaleevi n'emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe, abakadde abaalaba ennyumba eyasooka, emisingi gy'ennyumba eno bwe gyassibwayo mu maaso gaabwe, ne bakaaba amaziga n'eddoboozi ddene; bangi ne boogerera waggulu n'essanyu: 
15_3_13_abantu n'okuyinza ne batayinza kwawula ddoboozi lya kwogerera waggulu n'essanyu n'eddoboozi ery'okukaaba kw'abantu: kubanga abantu baayogerera waggulu n'eddoboozi ddene, oluyoogaano ne luwulirirwa wala. 
15_4_1_Awo abalabe ba Yuda ne Benyamini bwe baawulira ng'abaana b'obusibe bazimbira yeekaalu Mukama Katonda wa Isiraeri 
15_4_3_Naye Zerubbaberi ne Yesuwa n'emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe eza Isiraeri abalala ne babagamba nti Temulina kigambo naffe okuzimba ennyumba eri Katonda waffe; naye ffe fekka wamu tulizimba eri Mukama Katonda wa Isiraeri nga kabaka Kuulo Kabaka w'e Buperusi bwe yatulagira. 
15_4_4_Awo abantu ab'omu nsi ne banafuya emikono gy'abantu ba Yuda ne babateganya mu kuzimba, 
15_4_5_ne bagulirira ab'okusala amagezi okubaziyiza okutta okuteesa kwabwe emirembe gyonna egya Kuulo kabaka w'e Buperusi okutuusa Daliyo kabaka w'e Buperusi lwe yalya obwakabaka.6 Ne ku mirembe gya Akaswero nga kyajje alye obwakabaka ne bawandiika okuloopa abaali mu Yuda ne Yerusaalemi. 
15_4_7_Ku mirembe gya Alutagizerugizi Bisulamu n'awandiika ne Misuledasi ne Tabeeri ne banne abalala eri Alutagizerugizi kabaka w'e Buperusi: era ebbaluwa yawandiikirwa mu nnukuta ez'e Kisuuli, ne mu lulimi Olusuuli. 
15_4_8_Lekumu ow’essaza ne Simusaayi omuwandiisi ne bawandiika ebbaluwa eri Alutagizerugizi kabaka okuloopa Yetvsaalemi bwe bati: 
15_4_9_awo Lekumu owessaza ne Simusaayi omuwandiisi ne bannaabwe abalala ne bawandiika; Abadinayi n'Abafalasasuki n'Abataluperi n'Abafalusi n'Abalukevi n'Abababulooni n'Abasusanuki n'Abadekayi n'Abaweramu, 
15_4_10_n’amawanga gonna amalala Osunappali omukulu ow'ekitiibwa ge yasomosa n'ateeka mu kibuga ky'e Samaliya ne mu nsi endala eri emitala w'omugga, n'ebirala bwe bityo. 
15_4_11_Ebbaluwa eno eggiddwa mu bbaluwa gye baaweereza Alutagizerugizi kabaka; Abaddu bo abasajja abali emitala w'omugga n'ebirala bwe bityo. 
15_4_12_Kabaka ategeere nga Abayudaaya abaava gy'oli ne bambuka batuuse gye tuli e Yerusaalemi; bazimba ekibuga ekyo ekijeemu ekibi, era bamaze bbugwe, era bamaze okuddaabiriza emisingi. 
15_4_13_Kabaka nno ategeere ekibuga ekyo bwe kirizimbibwa ne bbugwe bw'aliggwa okukola, nga tebaliwa musolo, ebisalibwa, newakubadde empooza, kale enkomerero bakabaka balifiirwa. 
15_4_14_Kale kubanga tulya omunnyo ogw'omu lubiri, so tetuigwana kulaba kabaka ng'anyoomebwa, kyetwava tutuma ne tutegeeza kabaka; 
15_4_15_banoonye mu kitabo eky'okujjukiza ekya bajjajjaabo: bw'otyo bw'olisanga mu lutabo eky'okujjuluza, n'otegeera ng'ekibuga ekyo kibuga kijeemu, era nga kyonoona bakabaka n'amasaza era nga baajeemyanga abantu mu ekyo mu biro eby'edda: ekibuga ekyo kyekyava kizikirizibwa. 
15_4_16_Tutegeeza kabaka, ekibuga ekyo bwe kirizimbibwa ne bbugwe bw'aliggwa okukola, nga olw'ekyo toliba na kitundu emitala w'omugga. 
15_4_17_Awo kabaka n'atumira Lekumu owessaza ne Simusaayi omuwandiisi ne bannaabwe abalala abaali mu Samaliya ne mu nsi endala eri emitala w'omugga n'addamu nti Emirembe n'ebirala bwe bityo. 
15_4_18_Ebbaluwa gye mwatuweereza esomeddwa mu maaso gange ne ngitegeera. 
15_4_19_Ne nteeka etteeka, ne banoonya, era balabye ng'ekibuga ekyo okuva mu biro eby'edda kyasaliranga bakabaka enkwe, n'obujeemu n'ekyejo byakolerwanga omwo. 
15_4_20_Era waabangawo bakabaka ab'amaanyi abaakulira Yerusaalemi abaafuganga ensi yonna eri emitala w'omugga: era baaweebwanga omusolo, ebisalibwa, n'empooza. 
15_4_21_Muteeke nno etteeka abasajja bano balekere awo, ekibuga ekyo kireme okuzimbibwa okutuusa Iwe nditeeka etteeka eddala. 
15_4_22_Era mwekuume muleme okutenguwa mu kino: akabi kandikulidde Id bakabaka ne bafiirwa? 
15_4_23_Awo ebbaluwa eggiddwa mu bbaluwa ya kabaka Alutagizerugizi bwe yasomerwa mu maaso ga Lekumu ne Simusaayi omuwandiisi ne bannaabwe, ne balyoka banguwa ne bagenda e Yerusaalemi eri Abayudaaya, ne babalekesaayo n'amaanyi n'amawaggali. 
15_4_24_Awo omulimu ogw'omu nnyumba ya Katonda eri mu Yerusaalemi ne gulekebwayo; gwalekebwayo okutuusa omwaka ogw'okubiri ogw'okufuga kwa Daliyo kabaka We Buperusi. 
15_5_1_Awo bannabbi, Kaggayi nnabbi ne Zekkaliya mutabani wa Iddo, ne balagulira Abayudaaya abaali mu Yuda ne Yerusaalemi; mu linnya lya Katonda wa Isiraeri mwe baabalagulirira. 
15_5_2_Awo Zerubbaberi mutabani wa Seyalutyeri n'agolokoka ne Yesuwa mutabani wa Yozadaki, ne batanula okuzimba ennyumba ya Katonda eri mu Yerusaalemi: era wamu nabo waaliwo bannabbi ba Katonda nga babayamba. 
15_5_3_Mu biro ebyo ne wajja gye bali Tattenayi owessaza ly'emitala w'omugga ne Sesalubozenayi ne bannaabwe ne babagamba bwe batyo nu Ani eyabawa etteeka okuzimba ennyumba eno n'okumala bbugwe ono? 
15_5_4_Awo ne tubagamba bwe tutyo nti Abasajja abakola ennyumba eno amannya gaabwe b'ani? 
15_5_5_Naye amaaso ga Katonda waabwe gaalij ku bakadde b'Abayudaaya, ne batabalekesaayo okutuusa ekigambo lwe kirituuka eri Daliyo eby'okuddamu ne bizzibwa mu bbaluwa olw'ekigambo ekyo. 
15_5_6_Ebbaluwa eggiddwa mu bbaluwa Tattenayi owessaza ly'emitala w'omugga ne Sesalubozenayi ne banne, Abafalusaki, abaali emitala w'omugga, gye baaweereza Daliyo kabaka: 
15_5_7_ne bamuweereza ebbaluwa eyawandiikibwa eti nti Eri Daliyo kabaka mirembe myereere. 
15_5_8_Kabaka ategeere nga twajja mu ssaza lya Yuda mu nnyumba ya Katonda omukulu ezimbibwa n'amayinja amanene, era emiti giteekebwa mu bisenge, n'omulimu guno gugenda nga gweyongera n'okunyiikira mu mikono gyabwe. 
15_5_9_Awo ne tubuuza abakadde abo ne tubagamba bwe tutyo nti Ani eyabawa etteeka okuzimba ennyumba eno n'okumala bbugwe ono? 
15_5_10_Era ne tubabuuza n'amannya gaabwe; okukutegeeza, tuwandiike amannya g'abasajja ababakulira. 
15_5_11_Kale ne baddamu bwe batyo nti Tuli baddu ba Katonda w'eggulu n'ensi, era tuzimba ennyumba eyazimbibwa edda emyaka giri emingi kabaka wa Isiraeri omukulu gye Yazimba n'amala. 
15_5_12_Naye oluvannyuma bajjajjaffe bwe baali basunguwazizza Katonda w'eggulu, n'abagabula mu mukono gwa Nebukadduneeza kabaka w'e Babulooni Omukaludaaya, eyazikiriza ennyumba eno n'atwala abaatu e Babulooni. 
15_5_13_Naye mu mwaka ogw'olubereberye ogwa Kuulo kabaka We Babulooni, Kuulo kabaka n'ateeka etteeka okuzimba ennyumba eno eya Katonda. 
15_5_14_Era n'ebintu eby'omu nnyumba ya Katonda ebya zaabu n'ebya ffeeza, Nebukadduneeza bye yaggya mu yeekaalu eyali mu Yerusaalemi n'abireeta mu yeekaalu ey'e Babulooni, ebyo Kuulo kabaka n’abiggya mu yeekaalu ey'e Babulooni, ne babiwa omuntu erinnya lye Sesubazzali gwe yali afudde owessaza; 
15_5_15_n'amugamba nti Twala ebintu bino, ogende obiteeke mu yeekaalu eri mu Yerusaalemi, ennyumba ya Katonda ezimbibwe mu kifo kyayo. 
15_5_16_Awo Sesubazzali oyo n'ajja n'assaawo emisingi gy'ennyumba ya Katonda eri mu Yerusaalemi: kale okuva ku biro ebyo na buli kati nga bagizimba, era naye tennaba kuggwa. 
15_5_17_Kale nno oba nga kabaka asiima banoonye mu ggwanika lya kabaka eriri eyo e Babulooni, oba nga bwe biri bwe bityo, ng'etteeka lyateekebwa erya Kuulo kabaka okuzimba ennyumba eno eya Katonda e Yerusaalemi, kabaka atutumire atutegeeze bw'anaasiima mu kigambo kino. 
15_6_1_Awo Daliyo kabaka n'alyoka ateeka etteeka, ne banoonya nu nnyumba eterekerwamu ebitabo by'obugagga gye byaterekerwa mu Babulooni. 
15_6_2_Ne balabira e Yakunesa mu lubiri oluli mu ssaza ery'Obumeedi omuzingo, ogwawaidiikibwamu bwe gutyo okuba kijjukizo nt 
15_6_3_Mu mwaka ogw'olubereberye ogwa Kuulo kabaka, Kuulo kabaka n'ateeka etteeka; lw'ennyumba ya Katonda eri e Yerusaalemi, ennyumba ezimbibwe, ekifo mwe baweerayo ssaddaaka, n'emisingi gyayo gissibwewo ginywezebwe; obugulumivu bwayo emikono nkaaga, n'obugazi bwayo emikono nkaaga 
15_6_5_era nate ebintu eby'omu nnyumba ya Katonda ebya zaabu n'ebya ffeeza Nebukadduneeza bye yaggya mu yeekaalu eri e Yerusaalemi, n'abireeta e Babulooni, bizzibweyo bireetebwe nate mu yeekaalu eri e Yerusaalemi, kinnakimu mu kifo kyakyo, era olibiteeka mu nnyumba ya Katonda. 
15_6_6_Kale nno, Tattenayi owessaza ery'emitala w'omugga, Sesalubozenayi, ne bannammwe Abafalusaki abali emitala w'omugga, mwesambe wala: 
15_6_7_muleke omulimu ogw'omu nnyumba eno eya Katonda; owessaza ow'omu Bayudaaya n'abakadde b'Abayudaaya bazimbe enayumba eno eya Katonda mu kifo kyayo. 
15_6_8_Era nate nteeka etteeka kye muba mukola abakadde bano ab'Abayudaaya olw'okuzimba ennyumba ya Katonda eno: baggye ku bintu bya kabaka ku musolo ogw'emitala w'omugga bawe abasajja bano bye balifiirwa n'okunyiikira kwonna, baleme okuziyizibwa. 
15_6_9_N'ebyo bye baneetaaganga, ente ento era n'endiga ennume n'abaana b'endiga okuba ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa eri Katonda w'eggulu, egnaano, omunnyo, omwenge, n'amafuta, ng'ekigambo bwe kinaabanga eky a bakabona abali e Yerusaalemi, baweebwenga buli lunaku obutayosa: 
15_6_10_bawengayo ssaddaaka ez'evvumbe eddungi eri Katonda w'eggulu, era basabire obulamu bwa kabaka n'obwa batabani be. 
15_6_11_Era nteese etteeka buli anaawaanyisanga ekigambo kino, omuti guggibwenga mu nnyumba ye, era asitulibwenga asibibwenga okwo; n'ennyumba ye efuuubwenga olubungo olw'ekyo: 
15_6_12_era Katonda eyabeesaayo erinnya lye asuule bakabaka bonna n'amawanga abanaagololanga emikono gyabwe okuwaanyisa ekyo, okuzikiriza ennyumba eno eya Katonda eri e Yerusaalemi. Nze Daliyo nteese etteeka; likolebwe n'okunyiikira kwonna. 
15_6_13_Awo Tattenayi owessaza ery'emitala w'omugga, Sesalubozenayi, ne bannaabwe, kubanga Daliyo antumye, ne bakola bwe batyo n'okunyiikira kwonna. 
15_6_14_Awo abakadde b'Abayudaaya ne bazimba ne balaba omukisa olw'okulagula kwa Kaggayi nnabbi ne Zekkaliya mutabani wa Iddo. Ne bazimba ne bagimala ng'ekiragiro bwe kyali ekya Katonda wa Isiraeri, era n'ekiragiro kya Kuulo ne Daliyo ne Alutagizerugizi kabaka w'e Buperusi. 
15_6_15_Awo ennyumba eno n'emalirwa ku lunaku olw'okusatu olw'omwezi Adali, ogw'omu mwaka ogw'omukaaga ogw'okufuga kwa Daliyo kabaka. 
15_6_16_Awo abaana ba Isiraeri, bakabona n'Abaleevi, n'abaana b'obusibe abalala, ne bakwata n'essanyu embaga ey'okutukuza ennyumba eno eya Katonda. 
15_6_17_Ne baweerayo mu kutukuza ennyumba eno eya Katonda ente kikumi, endiga ennume ebikumi bibiri, abaana b'endiga ebikumi ,bina; n'okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi ekya Isiraeri yenna, embuzi ennume kkumi na bbiri ng'omuwendo bwe gwali ogw'ebika bya Isiraeri. 
15_6_18_Ne bateeka bakabona nga bwe baagerekwa; n'Abaleevi mu mpalo zaabwe, olw'okuweereza Katonda ali e Yerusaalemi; nga bwe kyawandiikibwa mu kitabo kya Musa. 
15_6_19_Awo abaana b'obusibe ne bakwatira Okuyitako ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ennya olw'omwezi ogw'olubereberye. 
15_6_20_Kubanga baikabona n'Abaleevi baali beerongoosezza wamu; bonna baali balongoofu: ne battira Okuyitako abaana bonna ab'obusibe ne baganda baabwe bakaboria nabo bennyini. 
15_6_21_Awo abaana ba Isiraeri abaali bakomyewo okuva mu busibe n'abo bonna abaali beeyawudde gye bali okuva mu bugwagwa bwa bannaggwanga ab'omu nsi okunoonya Mukama Katonda wa Isiraeri, 
15_6_22_ne balya ne bakwatira embaga ey'emigaati egitazimbulukuswa n'essanyu ennaku kkumi na musanvu: kubanga Mukama yali abasanyusizza, era yali akyusizza omutima gwa kabaka w'e Bwasuli gye bali, okunyweza emikono gyabwe mu mulimu ogw'omu nnyumba ya Katonda, Katonda wa Isiraeri. 
15_7_1_Awo oluvannyuma lw'ebyo ku mirembe gya Alutagizerugizi kabaka We Buperusi Ezera mutabani wa Seraya mutabani wa. Azaliya mutabani wa Kirukiya 
15_7_2_mutabani wa Sallumu mutabani wa Zadoki mutabani wa Akitubu 
15_7_3_mutabani wa Amaliya mutabani wa Azaliya mutabani wa Merayoosi 
15_7_4_mutabani wa Zerakiya mutabani wa Uzzi mutabani wa Bukki 
15_7_5_mutabani wa Abisuwa mutabani wa Finekaasi mutabani wa Ereyazaali mutabani wa Alooni kabona asinga obukulu: 
15_7_6_Ezera oyo n'ayambuka ng'ava e Babulooni; era yali muwandiisi mwangu mu mateeka ga, Musa, Mukama Katonda wa Isiraeri ge yawa; kabaka n'amuwa byonna bye yasaba, olw'omukono gwa Mukama Katonda we ogwali ku ye. 
15_7_7_Awo abamu ku baana ba Isiraeri ne bambuka ne ku bakabona n'Abaleevi n'abayimbi n'abaggazi ne Banesinimu ne bajja e Yerusaalemi mu mwaka ogw'omusanvu ogwa Alutagizerugizi kabaka. 
15_7_8_N'ajja e Yerusaalemi mu mwezi ogw'okutaano ogw'omu mwaka ogw'omusanvu ogwa kabaka. 
15_7_9_Kubanga ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi ogw'olubereberye kwe yasookera okwambuka okuva e Babulooni, ne ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi ogw'okutaano kwe yatuukira e Yerusaalemi, olw'omukono omulungi ogwa Katonda we ogwali ku ye. 
15_7_10_Kubanga Ezera yali akakasizza omutima gwe okunoonya amateeka ga Mukama n'okugakolanga n'okuyigirizanga mu Isiraeri amateeka n'emisango. 
15_7_11_Era ebbaluwa eno yaggibwa mu bbaluwa kabaka Alutagizerugizi gye yawa Ezera kabona, omuwandiisi, omuwandiisi w'ebigambo eby'ebiragiro bya Mukama era ow'amateeka eri Isiraeri. 
15_7_12_Alutagizerugizi kabaka wa bakabaka awandiikidde Ezera kabona, omuwandiisi w'amateeka ga Katonda w'eggulu eyatuukirira n'ebirala bwe bityo. 
15_7_13_Nteeka etteeka bonna ab'oku bantu ba Isiraeri ne bakabona baabwe n'Abaleevi mu bwakabaka bwange abaagala ku bwabwe ddala okugenda e Yerusaalemi, bagende naawe. 
15_7_14_Kubanga otumiddwa kabaka n'abateesa naye omusanvu okubuuza ebigambo bya Yuda ne Yerusaalemi, ng'amateeka bwe gali aga Katonda wo agali mu mukono gwo; 
15_7_15_n'okutwala ffeeza ne zaabu kabaka n'abateesa naye gye bawaddeyo ku bwabwe eri Katonda wa Isiraeri, ekifo kye ky'abeeramu kiri mu Yerusaalemi, 
15_7_16_ne ffeeza yonna ne zaabu gy'olij sanga mu ssaza lyonna ery'e Babulooni, wamu n'ekiweebwayo ku bwabwe eky'abantu n'ekya bakabona, nga bawaayo ku bwabwe olw'ennyumba ya Katonda waabwe eri mu Yerusaalemi; 
15_7_17_kyoliva onyiikira ennyo okugula ebintu bino ente, endiga ennume, abaana b'endiga, n'ebiweebwayo byako eby'obutta, n'ebiweebwayo byako ebyokunywa, era olibiweerayo ku kyoto eky'omu nnyumba ya Katonda wammwe eri mu Yerusaalemi. 
15_7_18_Era kyonna kyonna kye mulisiima okukola effeeza erifikkawo ne zaabu ggwe ne baganda bo, ekyo mukikolanga nga Katonda wammwe bw'ayagala. 
15_7_19_N'ebintu by'oweebwa olw'okuweereza okw'omu nnyumba ya Katonda wo obiwangayo mu maaso ga Katonda We Yerusaalemi. 
15_7_20_Era byonna ennyumba ya Katonda wo by'eryetaaga okusukkirizaawo ebirikugwanira okuwaayo, obiwangayo ng'obiggya mu nnyumba y'eggwanika lya kabaka. 
15_7_21_Nange, nze Alutagizerugizi kabaka, nteeka etteeka eri abawanika bonna abali emitala w'omugga, Ezera kabona omuwandiisi w'amateeka ga Katonda w'eggulu buli ky'alibasalira, kikolebwenga n'okunyiikira kwonna, 
15_7_22_okutuusa talanta eza ffeeza kikumi, n'ebigero by'eŋŋaano kikumi, n'ebita by'omwenge kikumi, n'ebita by'amafuta kikumi, n'omunnyo obutagwogera bwe guba gwenkana. 
15_7_23_Buli ekinaalagirwanga Katonda w'eggulu kikolerwenga ddala olw'ennyumba ya Katonda w'eggulu; kubanga obusungu bwandibeereddewo ki eri obwakabaka, bwa kabaka ne batabani be? 
15_7_24_Era tubannyonnyolai ebya bakabona n'Abaleevi, abayimbi, abaggazi, Abanesinimu, oba abaddu b'ennyumba eno eya Katonda, bonna bwe benkana, tekiiyinzikenga kubasalira musolo newakubadde ebisalirwa newakubadde empooza. 
15_7_25_Naawe, Ezera, ng'amagezi ga Katonda wo bwe gali agali mu mukono gwo, londa abaami n'abalamuzi balamulenga abantu bonna abali emitala w'omugga, bonna abamanyi amateeka ga Katonda wo; n'oyo atagamanyi mumuyigirizenga. 
15_7_26_Era buli atakkirizenga kukwata mateeka ga Katonda wo n'amateeka ga kabaka, omusango bagukomekerezenga ku ye n'okunyiikira kwonna, oba gwa kuttibwa, oba gwa kugobebwa, oba gwa kunyagibwako ebibye, oba gwa kusibibwa. 
15_7_27_Mukama yeebazibwe Katonda wa bajjajjaffe, eyateeka ekigambo ekyenkanidde awo mu mutima gwa kabaka, okuyonja ennyumba ya Mukama eri mu Yerusaalemi; 
15_7_28_era eyannyongerako okusaasirwa mu maaso ga kabaka, n'abateesa naye ne mu maaso g'abakulu bonna aba kabaka ab'amaanyi. Ne mpeebwa amaanyi olw'omukono gwa Mukama Katonda wange ogwali ku nze, ne nkuŋŋaanya mu Isiraeri abakulu okwambuka nange. 
15_8_1_Era bano gye mitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe, era kuno kwe kuzaalibwa kw'abo abaayambuka nange okuva e Babulooni ku mirembe gya Alutagizerugizi kabaka. 
15_8_2_Ku batabani ba Finekaasi, Gerusomu: ku batabani ba Isamali, Danyeri: ku batabani ba Dawudi, Kattusi. 
15_8_3_Ku batabani ba Sekaniya; ku batabani ba Palosi, Zekkaliya; era wamu naye ne wabalibwa ng'okuzaalibwa kw'abasajja bwe kwali, kikumi mu ataano. 
15_8_4_Ku batabani ba Pakasumowaabu, Erwenayi mutabani wa Zerakiya; era wamu naye abasajja ebikumi bibiri. 
15_8_5_Ku batabani ba Sekaniya, mutabani wa Yakazyeri; era wamu naye abasajja ebikumi bisatu. 
15_8_6_Ne ku batabani ba Adini, Ebedi mutabani wa Yonasaani; era wamu naye abasajja amakumi ataauo. 
15_8_7_Ne ku batabaai ba Sefatiya, Zebadiya mutabani wa tiiikayiri; era wamu naye abasajja kinaana. 
15_8_8_Ne ku batabani ba Sefatiya, Zebadiya mutabani wa tiiikayiri; era wamu naye abasajja kinaana. 
15_8_9_Ku batabani ba Yowaabu, Obadiya mutabani wa Yekyeri; era wamu naye abasajja ebikumi bibiri mu kkumi mu munaana. 
15_8_10_Ne ku batabani ba Seromisi, mutabani wa Yosifiya; era wamu naye abasajja kikumi mu nkaaga. 
15_8_11_Ne ku batabani ba Bebayi, Zekkaliya mutabani wa Bebayi; era wamu naye abasajja amakumi abiri mu munaana. 
15_8_12_Ne ku batabani ba Azugadi, Yokanani mutabani wa Kakkatani; era wamu naye abasajja kikumi mu kkumi. 
15_8_13_Ne ku batabani ba Adonikamu ab'oluvannyuma; era gano ge gammnya gaabwe, Erifereti, Yeweri, ne Semaaya, era wamu nabo abasajja nkaaga. 
15_8_14_Ne ku batabani ba Biguvayi, Usayi ne Zabbudi; era wamu nabo abasajja nsanvu. 
15_8_15_Ne mbakuŋŋaanyiza ku mugga ogugenda e Yakava; ne tusiisira ne tumalayo ennaku ssatu: ne nneetegereza abantu ne bakabona, ne ssirabayo n'omu ku batabani ba Leevi. 
15_8_16_Awo ne nttunya Eryeza, Alyeri, Semaaya, ne Erunasani, ne Yalibu, ne Erunasani, ne Nasani, ne Zekkaliya, ne Mesullamu, abasajja abakulu: era ne Yoyalibu ne Erunasani, abayigiriza. 
15_8_17_Ne mbatuma okugenda eri Iddo, omukulu w'ekifo Kasifiya; ne mbabuulira bye baba bagamba Iddo ne baganda be Abanesinimu, mu kifo ekyo Kasifiya, baleete gye tuli abaweereza ab'omu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe. 
15_8_18_Awo olw'omukono omulungi ogwa Katonda waffe ogwali ku ffe ne batuleetera omusajja ow'amagezi, ow'oku batabani ba Makuli, mutabani wa Leevi, mutabani wa Isiraeri; ne Serebiya ne batabani be ne baganda be, kkumi na munaana; 
15_8_19_ne Kasabiya, era wamu naye Yesaya ow'oku batabani ba Merali, baganda be ne batabani baabwe, amakumi abiri; 
15_8_20_ne ku Banesinimu, Dawudi n'abakulu be baawaayo olw'okuweereza Abaleevi, Abanesinimu ebikumi bibiri mu abiri: bonna ne baatulwa amannya gaabwe. 
15_8_21_Awo ne nnangirira okusiiba eyo, ku mugga; Akava, twetoowaze mu maaso ga Katanda waffe, okunoonya gy'ali ekkubo eggolokofu, eryaffe, era ery'abaana baffe abato, era ery'ebintu byaffe byonna. 
15_8_22_Kubanga ensonyi zankwata okusaba kabaka ekitongole ky'abaserikale n'abeebagala embalaasi okutuyamba eri abalabe mu kkubo: kubanga twali twogedde ne kabaka nti Omukono gwa Katonda waffe guba ku abo bonna abamunoonya olw'obulungi; naye obuyinza bwe n'obusungu bwe buli eri abo bonna abamuleka. 
15_8_23_Awo ne tusiiba ne tusaba Katonda ekigambo kino: ne tumwegayirira. 
15_8_24_Awo ne njawula kkumi na babiri ku bakulu ba bakabona, Serebiya, Kasabiya, n'ekkumi ku baganda baabwe wamu nabo, 
15_8_25_ne mbagerera effeeza n'ezzaabu n'ebintu, kye kiweebwayo olu ennyumba ya Katonda waffe, kabaka n'abateesa naye n'abakungu be ne Isiraeri yenna abaali eyo bye baawaayo: 
15_8_26_nze ne ngerera ddala mu mukono gwabwe talanta eza ffeeza lukaaga mu ataano, n'ebintu ebya ffeeza talanta kikumi; zaabu talanta kikumi; 
15_8_27_n'ebibya ebya zaabu amakumi abiri, ebya daliki lukumi; n'ebintu bibiri eby'ebikomo ebirungi ebizigule, eby'omuwendo nga zaabu. 
15_8_28_Ne mbagamba nti Muli batukuvu eri Mukama, n'ebintu bitukuvu; ne ffeeza ne zaabu kye kiweebwayo ku bwammwe eri Mukama wa bajjajjammwe. 
15_8_29_Mutuntile mubikuume okutuusa lwe mulibipima mu maaso g'abakulu ba bakabona n'Abaleevi n'abakulu b'ennyumba za bakitaabwe eza Isiraeri mu Yerusaalemi mu bisenge eby'omu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
15_8_30_Awo bakabona n'Abaleevi ne batoola ffeeza ne zaabu n'ebintu ng'obuzito bwabyo bwe bwali okubireeta e Yerusaalemi mu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe. 
15_8_31_Awo ne tuvaayo ku mugga Akava ku lunaku olw'ekkumi n'ebbiri olw'oniezi ogw'olubereberye okugenda e Yerusaalemi: n'omukono gwa Katonda waffe gwali ku ffe, n'atuwonya mu mukono gw'omulabe n'omuteezi mu kkubo. 
15_8_32_Ne tujja e Yerusaalemi ne tumalayo ennaku ssatu. 
15_8_33_Awo ku lunaku olw'okuna ne bapimira ffeeza ne zaabu n'ebintu mu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe okubikwasa mu mukono gwa Meremoosi mutabani wa Uliya kabona; era wamu naye waaliwo Ereyazaali mutabani wa Finekaasi; era wamu nabo waaliwo Yozabadi mutabani wa Yeswa, ne Nowadiya mutabani wa Binnuyi, Abaleevi; 
15_8_34_byonna ng'omuwendo gwabyo era ng'obuzito bwabyo bwe byali; obuzito bwoiuia ne buwandiikibwa mu biro ebvo. 
15_8_35_Abaana b'obusibe abaakomawo ewaabwe gye baagoberwa ne bawaayo ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa eri Katonda wa Isiraeri, ente kkumi na bbiri olwa Isiraeri yenna, endiga ennume kyenda mu mukaaga, abaana b'endiga nsanvu mu musanvu, embuzi ennume kkumi na bbiri okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi: ezo zonna ne ziba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa eri Mukama. 
15_8_36_Ne bawa abaamasaza ebiragiro bya kabaka n'abo abafuga emitala w'omugga: ne bayamba abantu n'ennyumba ya Katonda. 
15_9_1_Awo ebigambo ebyo bwe byakolebwa, abakulu ne bansemberera nga boogera nti Abantu ba Isiraeri ne bakabona n'Abaleevi tebeeyaiwudde na mawanga ag'omu nsi nga bakola okugoberera emizizo gyabwe, egy'Abakanani n'Abakiiti n'Abaperizi n'Abayebusi n'Abamoni n'Abamowaabu n'Abamisiri n'Abamoli. 
15_9_2_Kubanga beewasirizza ku bawala baabwe, ne batabani baabwe babawasirizzaako; bwe kityo ezzadde ettukuvu ne lyetabula n'amawanga ag'omu nsi: weewaawo, omukono gw'abakulu n'abafuga gwe gusinze okwonoona bwe gutyo. 
15_9_3_Awo bwe nnawulira ekigambo ekyo, ne njuza ekyambalo kyange n'omunagiro gwange, ne nkuunyuula enviiri ez'oku mutwe gwange n'ez'omu kirevu kyange, ne ntuula nga nsamaaliridde. 
15_9_4_Awo ne wakuŋŋaanira gye ndi bonna abaakankanira ebigambo bya Katonda wa Isiraeri olw'okusobya ku abo ab'obusibe; ne ntuula nga nsamaaliridde ne ntuusa ekitone eky'akawungeezi. 
15_9_5_Awo ekitone eky'akawungeezi bwe kyaweebwayo ne ngolokoka ne nva mu kutoowazibwa kwange, ekyambalo kyange n'omunagiro gwange nga biyulise; ne nfukamira ku maviivi gange ne nnyanjuluza engalo zange eri Mukama Katonda wange 
15_9_7_Okuva ku nnaku za bajjajjaffe nga tuzza musango munene nnyo ne leero; era olw'obutali butuukirivu bwaffe kyetwava tugabulwa, ffe, bakabaka baffe ne bakabona baffe, mu mukono gwa bakabaka b'ensi, eri ekitala, eri obusibe n'eri okunyagibwa n'amaaso gaffe okukwatibwa ensonyi nga leero. 
15_9_8_Ne kaakano akaseera katono ekisa kiragiddwa ekiva eri Mukama Katonda waffe, okutulekera ekitundu eky'okuwona n'okutuwa enninga mu kifo kye ekitukuvu, Katonda waffe ayakire amaaso gaffe n'okutuwa okuweeraweerako akatono mu busibe bwaffe. 
15_9_9_Kubanga tuli basibe; naye Katonda waffe tatwabulidde mu buddu bwaffe, naye atwongeddeko okusaasirwa mu maaso ga bakabaka b'e Buperusi, okutuwa okuweeraweera, okusimba ennyumba ya Katonda waffe n'okuddaabiriza ebyayo ebyagwa n'okutuwa bbugwe mu Yuda ne mu Ycrusaalemi. 
15_9_10_Kale nno, ai Katonda waffe, tunaayogera ki oluvannyuma lwa bino? kubanga twaleka ebiragiro byo, 
15_9_11_bye walagirira mu baddu bo bannabbi ng'oyogera nti Ensi gye muyingira okugirya nsi eteri nnongoofu olw'obutali bulongoofu bw'amawanga ag'omu nsi, olw'emizizo gyabwe, abaagijjuzizza obugwagwa bwabwe eruuyi n'eruuyi. 
15_9_12_Kale nno temuwanga bawala bammwe batabani baabwe, so temutwaliranga batabani bammwe bawala baabwe, so temunoonyanga mirembe gyabwe newakubadde omukisa gwabwe emirembe gyonna: mulyoke mube maanyi mulye obulungi bw'ensi, mugirekere abaana bammwe okuba obusika emirembe gyonna. 
15_9_13_Era ebyo byonna nga bimaze okututuukako olw'ebikolwa byaffe ebibi n'olw'okuzza omusango omunene, kubanga ggwe, Katonda waffe, watubonerezaako katono so si ng'obutali butuukirivu bwaffe bwe bwasaanira, n'otuwa ekitundu ekyenkana awo, 
15_9_14_tulisobya nate amateeka go ne tuba bakoddomi b'amawanga agakola eby'emizizo? tewanditusunguwalidde okutuusa lwe wandituzikirizza, obutabaawo kitundu ekifisseewo newakubadde ow'okuwona? 
15_9_15_Ai Mukama Katonda wa Isiraeri, ggwe mutuukirivu; kubanga ffe tusjgadde ekitundu ekifisseewo ekiwonye nga bwe kiri leero: laba, tuli mu maaso go nga tuzzizza omusango; kubanga tewali ayinza okuyimirira mu maaso go olw'ekyo. 
15_10_1_Awo Ezera bwe yali ng'asaba ng'ayatula ng'akaaba amaziga ng'avuunamira mu maaso g'ennyumba ya Katonda, ne wakuŋŋaanira gy'ali okuva mu Isiraeri ekibiina ekinene ennyo eky'abasajja n'abakazi n'abaana abato: kubanga abantu baakaaba nnyo nnyini amaziga. 
15_10_2_Awo Sekaniya mutabani wa Yekyeri omu ku batabani ba Eramu, n'addamu n'agamba Ezera nti Twonoonye Katonda waffe, ne tuwasa abakazi bannaggwanga ab'oku mawanga ag'omu nsi: naye kaakano essuubi weeriri eri Isiraeri olw'ekyo. 
15_10_3_Kale nno tulagaane endagaano ne Katonda waffe okugoba abakazi bonna n'abo be baazaala, ng'okuteesa bwe kuli okwa mukama wange n'abo abakankanira ekiragiro kya Katonda waffe; era kikolebwe ng'amateeka bwe gali. 
15_10_4_Golokoka; kubanga ekigambo kikyo, naffe tuli naawe: guma omwoyo okikole. 
15_10_5_Awo Ezera n'alyoka agolokoka, n'alayiza abakulu ba bakabona, iAbaleevi ne Isiraeri yenna, nga banaakolanga ng'ekigambo kino bwe kiri. Awo ne balayira. 
15_10_6_Awo Ezera n'alyoka agolokoka okuva mu maaso g'ennyumba ya Katonda, n'ayingira mu kisenge kya Yekokanani mutabani wa Eriyasibu: awo bwe yatuukayo, n'atalya mmere so teyanywa mazzi: kubanga yanakuwala olw'okusobya ku abo ab'obusibe. 
15_10_7_Ne balangira okubunyal Yuda ne Yerusaalemi abaana bonna ab'obusibe bakuŋŋaanire e Yerusaalemi 
15_10_9_Awo abasajja bonna aba Yuda ne Benyamini ne bakuŋŋaanira e Yerusaalemi mu bbanga ery'ennaku essatu; gwali mwezi gwa mwenda, ku lunaku olw'amakumi abiri olw'omwezi: abantu bonna ne batuula mu kifo ekigazi mu maaso g'ennyumba ya Katonda, nga bakankana olw'ekigambo ekyo n'olw'enkuba ennyingi. 
15_10_10_Awo Ezera kabona n'ayimirira n'abagamba nti Mwasobya ne muwasa abakazi bannaggwanga okwongera ku Isiraeri omusango. 
15_10_11_Kale nno mwatule eri Mukama Katonda wa bajjajjammwe mukole ebyo by'asiima: mweyawule n'amawanga ag'omu nsi n'abakazi bannaggwanga. 
15_10_12_Awo ekibiina kyonna ne baddamu ne boogera n'eddoboozi ddene nti Nga bw'oyogedde ebigambo byaffe, bwe kityo bwe kitugwanidde okukola. 
15_10_13_Naye abantu tuli bangi, era, bye biro eby'enkuba ennyingi, so tetuyinza kuyimirira bweru, so guno mulimu gwa lunaku lumu oba bbiri: kubanga twasobya nnyo mu kigambo ekyo. 
15_10_14_Kale abakulu baffe balonderwe ekibiina kyonna, n'abo bonna abali mu bibuga byaffe abaawasizza abakazi bannaggwanga bajjire mu biseera ebiteekebwawo, era wamu nabo abakadde ba buli kibuga, n'abalamuzi baakyo, okutuusa Katonda waffe lw'alikyusa ekiruyi kye ekikambwe ne kituvaako, okutuusa ekigambo kino lwe kinaamalibwa. 
15_10_15_Yonasaani mutabani wa Asakeri ne Yazeya mutabani wa Tikuva bokka ne bayimirira okugaana ekigambo kino: Mesullamu ne Sabbesayi Omuleevi ne babayamba. 
15_10_16_Awo abaana b'obusibe ne bakola bwe batyo. Awo Ezera kabona n'abamu ku mitwe gy'ennyumbaza bakitaabwe ng'ennyumba za bakitaabwe bwe zaali, era bonna ng'amannya gaabwe bwe' gaali, ne bayawulibwa; ne batuula ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi ogw'ekkumi okukebera ekigambo ekyo. 
15_10_17_Ne bamala ebigambo by'abasajja bonna abaali bawasizza abakazi bannaggwanga nga tewannayitawo lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi ogw'olubereberye. 
15_10_18_Ne mu batabani ba bakabona ne mulabika abaali bawasizza abakazi bannaggwanga: ku batabani ba Yesuwa, mutabani wa Yozadaki ne baganda be, Maaseya ne Eryeza ne Yalibu ne Gedaliya. 
15_10_19_Ne bawaayo emikono gyabwe nga banaagoba bakazi baabwe; era kubanga omusango gubasinze ne bawaayo endiga ennume ey'omu kisibo olw'omusango gwabwe. 
15_10_20_Ne ku batabani ba Immeri; Kanani ne Zebadiya. 
15_10_21_Ne ku batabani ba Kalimu; Maaseya, ne Eriya, ne Semaaya, ne Yekyeri, ne Uzziya. 
15_10_22_Ne ku batabani ba Pasukuli; Eriwenayi, Maaseya, Isimaeri, Nesaneri, Yozabadi, ne Erasa. 
15_10_23_Ne ku Baleevi; Yozabadi, ne Simeeyi, ne Keraya (oyo ye Kerita), Pesakiya, Yuda, ne Eryeza. 
15_10_24_Ne ku bayimbi; Eriyasibu: ne ku baggazi; Sallumu, ne Teremu ne Uli. 
15_10_25_Ne ku Isiraeri: ku batabani ba Palosi; Lamiya, ne Izziya, ne Malukiya ne Miyamini, ne Ereyazaali, ne Malukiya, ne Benaya. 
15_10_26_Ne ku batabani ba Eramu; Mattaniya, Zekkaliya, ne Yekyeri, ne Abudi, ne Yeremoosi, ne Eriya. 
15_10_27_Ne ku batabani ba Zattu; Eriwenayi, Eriyabu, Mattaniya, ne Yeremoosi, ne Zabadi ne Aziza. 
15_10_28_Ne ku batabani ba Bebayi; Yekokanani, Kananiya, Zabbayi, Asulaayi. 
15_10_29_Ne ku batabani ba Bani; Mesullamu, Malluki, ne Adaya, Yasubu, ne Seyaali, Yeremoosi. 
15_10_30_Ne ku batabani ba Pakasumowaabu; Aduna, ne Kerali, Benaya, Maaseya, Mattaniya, Bezaleeri, ne Binnuyi, ne Manase. 
15_10_31_Ne ku batabani ba Kalimu; Eryeza, Isusiya, Malukiya, Semaaya, Simyoni; 
15_10_32_Benyamini, Malluki, Semaliya. 
15_10_33_Ku batabani ba Kasumu; Mattenayi, Mattata, Zabadi, Erifereti, Yeremayi, Manase, Simeeyi. 
15_10_34_Ku batabani ba Baani; Maadayi, Amulaamu, ne Uweri; 
15_10_35_Benaya; Bedeya, Keruki; 
15_10_36_Vaniya, Meremoosi, Eriyasibu; 
15_10_37_Mattaniya, Mattenayi, ne Yaasu; 
15_10_38_ne Baani, ne Binnuyi, Simeeyi; 
15_10_39_ne Seremiya, ne Nasani, ne Adaya; 
15_10_40_Makunadebayi, Sasayi, Salaayi; 
15_10_41_Azaleri, ne Seremiya, Semaliya; 
15_10_42_Sallumu, Amaliya, Yusufu. 
15_10_43_Ku batabani ba Nebo; Yeyeri, Mattisiya, Zabadi, Zebina, Iddo, ne Yoweeri, Benaya. 
15_10_44_Abo bonna baali bawasizza abakazi bannaggwanga: era abamu ku bo baali balina abakazi be baali bazademu abaana. 
16_1_1_Ebigambo bya Nekkemiya mutabani wa Kakaliya. Awo olwatuuka mu mwezi Kisulevu mu mwaka ogw'amakumi abiri, bwe nnali nga ndi mu Susani olubiri, 
16_1_2_Kanani omu ku baganda bange n'ajja, ye n'abasajja abamu abaava mu Yuda; ne mbabuuza ebigambo by'Abayudaaya abaawona, abaali basigadde mu busibe, n'ebigambo by'e Yerusaalemi. 
16_1_3_Ne baŋŋamba nti Ekitundu ekifisseewo abasigadde mu busibe eyo mu ssaza balabye ennaku nnyingi n'okuvumibwa: era bbugwe wa Yerusaalemi amenyesemenyese, n'emiryango gyakyo gyokeddwa omuliro. 
16_1_4_Awo olwatuuka bwe nnawulira ebigambo ebyo ne ntuula ne nkaaba amaziga, ne nnakuwalira ennaku ezimu; ne nsiiba ne nsaba mu maaso ga Katonda w'eggulu, 
16_1_5_ne njogera nti Nkwegayiridde, ai Mukama Katonda w'eggulu, Katonda omukulu ow'entiisa, akwata endagaano n'okusaasira eri abo abamwagala ne bakwata ebiragiro bye: 
16_1_6_okutu kwo kuwulire nno, n'amaaso go gazibuke, owulire okusaba kw'omuddu wo kwe nsaba mu maaso go mu biro bino emisana n'ekiro, olw'abaana ba Isiraeri abaddu bo, nga njatula ebibi eby'abaana ba Isiraeri bye twakwonoona: weewaawo, nze n'ennyumba ya kitange twayonoona. 
16_1_7_Twakola eby'obukyamu ennyo gy'oli, so tetwakwata biragiro newakubadde amateeka newakubadde emisango bye walagira omuddu wo Musa. 
16_1_8_Nkwegayiridde, jjukira ekigambo kye walagira omuddu wo Musa ng'oyogera nti Bwe munaasobyanga, naabasaasaanyizanga ddala mu mawanga: 
16_1_9_naye bwe munaakomangawo gye ndi ne mukwatanga ebiragiro byange ne mubikolanga, aewakubadde ng'abammwe abaagobebwa nga banaabanga ku nkomerero y'eggulu, naye naabakuŋŋaanyanga okubaggyayo, ne mbaleetanga mu kifo kye nneeroboza okutuuza omwo erinnya lyange. 
16_1_10_Kale bano be baddu bo era be banne bo be wanunula n'obuyinza bwo obungi n'omukono gwo ogw'a maanyi. 
16_1_11_Ai Mukama, nkwegayiidde okutu kwo kuwulire nno kusaba kw’omuddu wo n’okw’abaddu bo abasanyukira okutya erinnya lyo: owe omuddu wo omukisa leero, omuwe okusaasirwa mu maaso g'omusajja ono. (Era nali ndi musenero wa kabaka.) 
16_2_1_Awo olwatuuka mu mwezi Nisani mu mwaka ogw'amakumi abiri ogwa Alutagizerugizi kabaka, omwenge bwe gwali guli mu maaso ge, ne nsitula omwenge ne nguwa kabaka. Era obw'edda bwonna nga sinakuwaliranga mu maaso ge. 
16_2_2_Kabaka n'aŋŋamba nti Kiki ekinakuwazizza amaaso go, okulwala nga tolwadde? kino si kigambo kilala wabula obuyinike obw'omu mutima. Awo ne ndyoka ntya nnyo. 
16_2_3_Ne ŋŋamba kabaka nti Kakaba abe omulamu emirembe gyonna: kiki ekyandirobedde amaaso gange obutanakuwala, ekibuga, ekifo aky'amalaalo ga bajjajjange, nga kizise n'emiryango gyakyo nga gyokeddwa omuliro? 
16_2_4_Awo kabaka n'anijamba nti Weegayirira ki? Awo ne nsaba Katonda w'eggulu. 
16_2_5_Ne ŋŋamba kabaka nti Kabaka bw'anaasiima, era oba ng'omuddu wo alabye ekisa mu maaso go, ontume e Yuda eri ekibuga eky'amalaalo ga bajjajjange nkizimbe. 
16_2_6_Kabaka n'aŋŋamba, (kaddulubaale naye ng'atudde naye,) nti Olugendo lwo luliba lwa nnaku mmeka? era olidda ddi? Awo kabaka n'asiima okuntuma; ne mmulaga ekiseera. 
16_2_7_Era nate ne ŋŋamba kabaka nti Kabaka bw'anaasiima, mpeebwe ebbaluwa eri abaamasaza abali emitala w'omugga, bampiseemu ntuuke mu Yuda 
16_2_9_Awo ne njija eri abaamasaza abaali emitala w'omugga ne mbawa ebbaluwa za kabaka. Era kabaka yali atumye nange abaami b'eggye n'abeebagala embalaasi. 
16_2_10_Awo Sanubalaati Omukoloni ne Tobiya omuddu Omwamoni bwe baakiwulira, ne kibanakuwaza nnyo kubanga omusajja azze okugezaako okuyamba abaana ba Isiraeri. 
16_2_11_Awo ne njija e Yerusaalemi ne mmalayo ennaku ssatu. 
16_2_12_Ne ngolokoka kiro, nze n'abasajja si bangi wamu nange; so saabuulirako muntu Katonda wange kye yateeka mu mutima gwange okukolera Yerusaalemi: so nga tewaali nsolo nange wabula ensolo gye nneebagala. 
16_2_13_Ne nvaamu kiro mu luggi olw'omu kiwonvu, nga nkwata ekkubo ery'oluzzi olw'ogusota n'omulyango ogw'obusa, ne nneetegereza bbugwe wa Yerusaalemi eyamenyekamenyeka, n'emiryango gyakyo gyali gyokeddwa omuliro. 
16_2_14_Awo ne nneeyongerayo eri omulyango ogw'oluzzi n'ekidiba kya kabaka: naye nga tewali kkubo ensolo gye nneebagadde ly'eneeyitamu. 
16_2_15_Awo ne nnyambuka kiro awali akagga, ne nneetegereza bbugwe; ne nkyuka ne nnyingira mu mulyango ogw'omu kiwonvu, ne nkomawo bwe ntyo. 
16_2_16_Abakulu ne batamanya gye nnagenda newakubadde kye nnakola; era nnali sinnababuulira Abayudaaya newakubadde bakabona newakubadde abakungu newakubadde abafuga newakubadde abalala abaakola omulimu. 
16_2_17_Awo ne mbagamba nti Mulaba bwe tuli obubi, Yerusaalemi bwe kizise, n'enzigi zaalryo zookeddwa omuliro: mujje tuzimbe bbugwe wa Yerusaalemi, tuleme okuba nate ekivume. 
16_2_18_Ne mbabuulira omukono gwa Katonda wange bwe gwali omulungi ku nze; era n'ebigambo bya kabaka bye yambuulira. Ne boogera nti Tugo lokoke tuzimbe. Awo ne banyweza emikono gyabwe olw'omulimu ogwo omulungi 
16_2_19_Naye Sanubalaati Omukoloni ne Tobiya omuddu Omwamoni ne Gesemu Omuwalabu bwe baakiwulira ne batusekerera nnyo, ne batunyooma ne boogera nti Kigambo ki kino kye mukola? mwagala okujeemera kabaka? 
16_2_20_Awo ne mbaddamu ne mbagamba nti Katonda w'eggulu ye alituwa omukisa; ffe abaddu be kyetuliva tugolokoka ne tuzimba naye mmwe temulina mugabo newakubadde ebyammwe newakubadde ekijjukizo mu Yerusaalemi. 
16_3_1_Awo Eriyasibu kabona asinga obukulu n'agolokoka wamu ne baganda be bakabona, ne bazimba omulyango ogw'endiga; ne bagutukuza, ne basimba enzigi zaagwo; okutuuka ku kigo kya Kammeya kwe baakoma okugutukuza, okutuuka ku kigo kya Kananeri. 
16_3_2_Era abasajja ab'e Yeriko be baamuddirira okuzimba. Era Zakkuli mutabani wa Imuli ye yabaddirira okuzimba. 
16_3_3_N'omulyango ogw'ebyennyanja batabani ba Kassenaa be baaguzimba; baateekawo emiti gyagwo, ne basimba enzigi zaagwo, ebisiba byagwo n'ebyuma byagwo. 
16_3_4_Era Meremoosi mutabani wa Uliya mutabani wa Kakkozi ye yabaddirira okuddaabiriza. Era Mesullamu mutabani wa Berekiya mutabani wa Mesezaberi ye yabaddirira okuddaabiriza. Era Zadoki mutabani wa Baana ye yabaddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_5_Era Abatekowa be baabaddirira okuddaabiriza; naye abakungu baabwe tebassaawo nsingo ku mulimu gwa mukama waabwe. 
16_3_6_N'omulyango ogw'edda Yoyada mutabani wa Paseya ne Mesullamu mutabani wa Besodeya be baaguddaabiriza; baateekawo emiti gyagwo, ne basimba enzigi zaagwo n'ebisiba byagwo n'ebyuma byagwo. 
16_3_7_Era Meratiya Omugibyoni ne Yadoni Omumeronoosi, abasajja ab'e Gibyoni, n'ab'e Mizupa, eky'omu ssaza ly'omukulu w'emitala w'omugga, be baabaddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_8_Wuziyeeri mutabani wa Kalukaya, abaweesi ba zaabu, be baamuddirira okuddaabiriza. Era Kananiya omu ku bafiunba kalifuwa ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza, ne banyweza Yerusaalemi, okutuuka ku bbugwe omugazi. 
16_3_9_Era Lefaya mutabani wa Kuuli omukului w'ekitundu ky'essaza lya Yerusaa lemi ye yabaddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_10_Era Yedaya mutabani wa Kalumafu ye yabaddirira okuddaabiriza okwolekera ennyumba ye ye. Era Kattusi mutabani wa Kasabuneya ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_11_Malukiya mutabani wa Kalimu ne Kassubu mutabani wa Pakasumowaabu ne baddaabiriza ekituli ekirala n'ekigo eky'ebikoomi. 
16_3_12_Era Sallumu mutabani wa Kallokesi omukulu w'ekitundu ky'essaza lya Yerusaalemi, ye ne bawala be, ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_13_Omulyango ogw'omu kiwonvu Kanuni n'abaali mu Zanowa be baaguddaabiriza; ne baguzimba ne basimba enzigi zaagwo, ebisiba byagwo n'ebyuma byagwo, n'ekituli eky'oku bbugwe eky'emikono olukumi okutuuka ku mulyango ogw'obusa. 
16_3_14_N'omulyango ogw'obusa Malukiya mutabani wa Lekabu omukulu w'essaza ly'e Besukakkeremu ye yaguddaabiriza; oyo ye yaguzimba n'asimba enzigi zaagwo, ebisiba byagwo n'ebyuma byagwo. 
16_3_15_N'omulyango ogw'oluzzi Salluni mutabani wa Kolukoze omukulu w'essaza ly'e Mizupa ye yaguddaabiriza; oyo ye yaguzimba n'agubikkako n'asimba enzigi zaagwo, ebisiba byagwo n'ebyuma byagwo, ne bbugwe ow'oku kidiba kya Sera ekiriraanye olusuku lwa kabaka okiituuka ku madaala agaserengeta okuva mu kibuga kya Dawudi. 
16_3_16_Nekkemiya mutabani va Azubuki omukulu w'ekitundu (y'essaza ly'e Besuzuli ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza okutuuka ku kifo elryolekera amalaalo ga Dawudi nokutuuka ku kidiba ekyasimibwa Z'okutuuka ku nnyumba y'abasajja ab'amaanyi. 
16_3_17_Abaleevi, Lekumu nutabani wa Baani, be baamuddiira okuddaabiriza. Kasabiya omuzulu w'ekitundu ky'essaza ly'e Keyira ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza olw'essaza lye. 
16_3_18_Baganda baabwe, Bawayi mutabani wa Kenadadi omukulu w'ekitundu ky'essaza ly'e Keyira, be baamuddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_19_Ne Ezeri mutabani wa Yesuwa omukulu w’e Mizupa ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza ekituli ekirala ekyolekera awalinnyirwa mu ggwanika ery'ebyokulwanyisa (bbugwe) w'awetera. 
16_3_20_Baluki mutabani wa Zabbayi ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza ekituli ekirala ng'aayiikira nnyo, okuva bbugwe w'awetera okutuuka ku luggi lw'ennyumba ya Eriyasibu kabona asinga obukulu. 
16_3_21_Meremoosi mutabani wa Uliya mutabani wa Kakkozi ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza ekituli ekirala okuva ku luggi lw'ennyumba ya Eriyasibu okutuuka ku nkomerero y'ennyumba ya Eriyasibu. 
16_3_22_Ne bakabona abasajja ab'omu lusenyi be baamuddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_23_Benyamini ne Kassubu be baabaddirira okuddaabiriza okwolekera ennyumba yaabwe. Azaliya mutabani wa Maaseya mutabani wa Ananiya ye yabaddirira okuddaabiriza ku mabbali g'ennyumba ye ye. 
16_3_24_Binnuyi mutabani wa Kenadadi ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza ekituli ekirala okuva ku nnyumba ya Azaliya okutuuka bbugwe w'awetera ne ku nsonda. 
16_3_25_Palali mutabani wa Uzayi ye yaddaabiriza okwolekera bbugwe w'awetera n'ekigo ekyazimbibwa ku nnyumba ey'engulu eya kabaka eriraanye oluggya olw'abambowa. Pedaya mutabani wa Palosi ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_26_(Era Abanesinimu baabanga mu Oferi okutuuka ku kifo ekyolekera omulyango ogw'amazzi ebuvanjuba n'ekigo ekyazi mbibwako.) 
16_3_27_Abatekowa be baamuddirira okuddaabiriza ekituli ekirala ekyolekera ekigo ekinene ekyazimbibwako n'okutuuka ku bbugwe w’e Oferi. 
16_3_28_Engulu w'omulyango ogw'embalaasi bakabona we baddaabiriza, buli muntu okwolekera ennyumba ye ye. 
16_3_29_Zadoki mutabani wa Immeri ye yabaddirira okuddaabiriza, okwolekera ennyumba ye ye. Ne Semaaya mutabani wa Sekaniya omuggazi w'omulyango ogw'ebuvanjuba ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza. 
16_3_30_Kananiya mutabani wa Seremiya ne Kanuni omwana ow'omukaaga owa Zalafu be bamuddirira okuddaabiriza ekituli ekirala. Mesullamu mutabani wa Berekiya ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza okwolekera ekisenge kye. 
16_3_31_Malukiya omu ku baweesi ba zaabu ye yamuddirira okuddaabiriza okutuusa ku nnyumba ey'Abanesinimu n'ey'abasuubuzi okwolekera omulyango gwa Kammifukaadi n'okutuusa awalinnyirwa ku nsonda. 
16_3_32_Era wakati w'awalinnyirwa ku nsonda n'omulyango ogw'endiga abaweesi ba zaabu n'abasuubuzi we baddaabiriza. 
16_4_1_Naye olwatuuka Sanubalaati bwe yawulira nga tuzimba bbugwe, n'asunguwala n'abaako ekiruyi kingi n'aduulira Abayudaaya. 
16_4_2_N'ayogerera mu maaso ga baganda be n'eggye ly'e Samaliya n'agamba nti Abayudaaya bano abanafu bakola ki? baagala okwekomera? baagala okuwaayo ssaddaaka? baagala okumalira ku lunaku lumu? baagala okuzuukiza amayinja okugaggya mu bifunvu eby'ebisasiro, kubanga gookeddwa? 
16_4_3_Awo Tobiya Omwamoni yali naye n'ayogera nti N'ekyo kye bazimba ekibe bwe kinaalinnyayo kinaasuula bbugwe waabwe ow'amayinja. 
16_4_4_Wulira, ai Katonda waffe; kubanga tunyoomeddwa: era zza ekivume kyabwe ku mutwe gwabwe bo, obagabule okunyagibwa mu nsi ey'obusibe: 
16_4_5_so tobikka ku butali butuukirivu bwabwe, n'ekibi kyabwe kireme okusangulibwa mu maaso go: kubanga bakusunguwazizza mu maaso g'abazimbi. 
16_4_6_Awo ne tuzimba bbugwe; bbugwe yenna n'agattibwa wamu okutuusa we yenkana obugulumivu: kubanga abantu bassaayo omwoyo eri omulimu. 
16_4_7_Naye olwatuuka Sanubalaati ne Tobiya n'Abawalabu n'Abamoni n’Abasudodi bwe baawulira ng'omulimu ogw'okuddaabiriza bbugwe wa Yerusaalemi gugenda gweyongera, era ng'ebituli bitanudde okuzibibwa, kale ne basunguwala nnyo 
16_4_9_Naye ne tusaba okusaba kwaffe eri Katonda waffe ne tussaawo abakuumi eri bo emisana n'ekiro ku lwabwe. 
16_4_10_Yuda n'ayogera nti Amaanyi g'abo abeetikka emigugu gaweddewo era waliwo ebisasiro bingi; n'okuyinza ne tutayinza kuzimba bbugwe. 
16_4_11_Abalabe baffe ne boogera nti Tebalimanya so tebaliraba, okutuusa lwe tuliyingira mu bo wakati, ne tubatta, ne tulekesaayo omulimu. 
16_4_12_Awo olwatuuka Abayudaaya abaabaliraana bwe bajja, ne batugamba emirundi kkumi nga bayima mu bifo byonna nti Kibagwanira okudda gye tuli. 
16_4_13_Kyennava nzisaawo abantu mu njuyi eza wansi ez'omu bbanga eryali ennyuma wa bbugwe, mu mpungu, kyennava nzisaawo abantu ng'enda zaabwe bwe zaali nga balina ebitala byabwe n'amafumu gaabwe n'emitego gyabwe. 
16_4_14_Ne ntunula ne ngolokoka ne ŋŋamba abakungu n'abakulu, n'abantu abalala nti Temubatya: mujjukire Mukama omukulu ow'entiisa, mulwanirire baganda bammwe ne batabani bammwe ne bawala bammwe, bakazi bammwe n'ennyumba zammwe. 
16_4_15_Awo olwatuuka abalabe baffe bwe baawulira nga kimanyiddwa gye tuli, era nga Katonda asse okuteesa kwabwe, ne tulyoka tudda fenna ku bbugwe, buli muntu ku mulimu gwe. 
16_4_16_Awo olwatuuka okuva mu biro ebyo n'okweyongerayo ekitundu ky'abaddu bange ne bakolanga omulimu ogwo n'ekitundu ne bakwatanga amafumu n'engabo n'emitego n'ebizibawo eby'ebyuma; abakulu ne babanga ennyuma w'ennyumba yonna eya Yuda. 
16_4_17_Abo abaazimbanga bbugwe n'abo abeetikkanga emigugu ne beebinikanga, buli muntu ng'akola omulimu n'omukono gwe gumu, n'ogw'okubiri nga gukutte ekyekulwanyisa kye; 
16_4_18_n'abazimbi, buli muntu ekitala kye nga kisibiddwa mu kiwato kye n'azimbanga bw'atyo. N'oyo eyafuuwanga, ekkondeere n'abeeranga nange. 
16_4_19_Ne ŋŋamba abakungu n'abakulu n'abantu abalala nti Omulimu munene mugazi, naffe twesudde amabanga ku bbugwe, omu ng'amuli wala munne: 
16_4_20_mu buli kifo gye munaawuliriranga eddoboozi ly'ekkondeere, mutudduukiririranga eyo; Katonda waffe ye anaatulwaniriranga. 
16_4_21_Awo ne tukolanga omulimu: eldtundu kyabwe ne bakwatanga amafumu obudde, we bwakeereranga n'emmunyeenye lwe zaalabikanga. 
16_4_22_Era mu biro ebyo ne ŋŋamba bwe ntyo abantu nti Buli muntu n'omuddu we asulenga mu Yerusaalemi babeerenga bakuumi gye tuli ekiro, era bakolenga omulimu emisana. 
16_4_23_Awo ne tutayambulanga byambalo byaffe nze newakubadde baganda bange newakubadde abaddu bange newakubadde abasajja abambowa abangobereranga, n'omu ku ffe, buli muntu yagendanga emugga ng'akutte ekyokulwanyisa kye. 
16_5_1_Awo ne wabaawa olukaayano olunene olw'abantu ne bakazi baabwe eri baganda baabwe Abayudaaya. 
16_5_2_Kubanga waaliwo abaayogera nti Ffe, batabani baffe ne bawala baffe, tuli bangi: tufune eŋŋaano tulyenga tube abalamu. 
16_5_3_Era ne wabaawo abaayogera nti Tusingawo ennimiro zaffe n'ensuku zaffe ez'emizabbibu n'ennyumba zaffe: tufunenga eŋŋaano olw'enjala. 
16_5_4_Era ne wabaawo abaayogera nti Twewola effeeza ey'emusolo gwa kabaka nga tusinzeewo ennimiro zaffe n'ensuku ez'emizabbibu. 
16_5_5_Naye kaakano omubiri gwaffe guli ng'omubiri gwa baganda baffe, abaana baffe bali ng'abaana baabwe: era, laba, batabani baffe ne bawala baffe tubaleeta mu buddu okuba abaddu, era abamu ku bawala baffe bamaze okuleetebwa mu buddu: so tetuliiko kye tunaakola; kubanga ennimiro zaffe n'ensuku zaffe ez'emizabbibu zirina balala. 
16_5_6_Awo ne nsunguwala nnyo bwe nnawulira olukaayano lwabwe n'ebigambo bino. 
16_5_7_Awo ne ndyoka nteesa nzekka ne nnyomba n'abakungu n'abakulu ne mbagamba nti Muweesa amagoba, buli muntu muganda we. Ne mbakuŋŋaanya okukuŋŋaana okunene. 
16_5_8_Ne mbagamba nti ffe nga bwe twayinza twanunula baganda baffe Abayudaaya abaatundibwa mu bannaggwanga; nammwe mwagala n'okutunda baganda bammwe, naffe twandiba guze? Awo ne basirika ne batalaba kigambo. 
16_5_9_Era ne njogera nti Ekigambo kye mukola si kirungi: temwanditambulidde mu kutya Katonda waffe, olw'okuvuma kwa bannaggwanga abalabe baffe? 
16_5_10_Era nange bwe ntyo baganda n'abaddu bange mbawola effeeza n'eŋŋaano olw'amagoba. Mbeegayiridde, tuleke amagoba ago. 
16_5_11_Mbeegayiridde, mubaddize leero ennimiro zaabwe n'ensuku zaabwe ez'emizabbibu n'ez'emizeyituuni n'ennyumba zaabwe, era n'ekitundu eky'ekikumi ekya ffeeza n'eky'eŋŋaano n'omwenge n'amafuta bye mubaweesa. 
16_5_12_Awo ne boogera nti Tunaabizza, so tetulibasalira kintu; bwe tutyo bwe tunaakola nga bw'oyogera. Awo ne mpita bakabona ne mbalayiza nga banaakola nga bwe basuubizza. 
16_5_13_Era ne nkunkumula olugoye olw'omu kifuba kyange ne njogera nti Katonda akunkumulire bw'atyo mu nnyumba ye ne mu mulimu gwe buli muntu atatuukiriza kusuubiza kuno; bw'aryo bw'aba akunkumulwa amalibwemu. Ekibiina kyonna ne boogera nti Amiina, ne batendereza Mukama. Abantu ne bakola ng'okusuubiza kuno bwe kwali. 
16_5_14_Era okuva mu biro lwe nnateekebwawo okuba omukulu waabwe mu nsi ya Yuda, okuva ku mwaka ogw'amakumi abiri okutuuka ku mwaka ogw'amakumi asatu mu ebiri ogwa Alutagizerugizi kabaka, gye myaka ekkumi n'ebiri, nze ne baganda bange tetulyanga ku mmere ey'omukulu. 
16_5_15_Naye abakulu ab'edda abansooka baasoloozanga abantu bye baalyanga ne babasaliranga emmere n'omwenge obutassaako sekeri eza ffeeza amakumi ana; weewaawo, n'abaddu baabwe baafuganga abantu: naye nze si bwe nnakolanga olw'okutya Katonda. 
16_5_16_Weewaawo, era nanyiikiranga okukola omulimu ogwa bbugwe ono, so tetwagula nsi yonna: n'abaddu bange bonna ne bakuŋŋaanira eyo eri omulimu. 
16_5_17_Era ku Bayudaaya n'abakulu, abasajja kikumi mu ataano baabanga ku mmeeza yange obutassaako abo abajja gye tuli nga bava mu bannaggwanga abatwetoolodde. 
16_5_18_Era ebyafumbibwanga eby'olunaku olumu ente emu n'endiga ennonde mukaaga; era enkoko zanfumbirwanga, n'omulundi gumu buli nnaku kkumi omwenge ogw'engeri zonna: era naye newakubadde nga byali bwe bityo saabasalira mmere ya mukulu, kubanga obuddu bwabazitoowerera abantu bano. 
16_5_19_Ai Katonda wange, jjukira gye ndi olw'obulungi byonna bye nkoledde abantu bano. 
16_6_1_Awo olwatuuka bwe baabuulira Sanubalaati ne T'obiya ne Gesemu Omuwalabu n'abalabe baffe abalala nga nzimbye bbugwe, era nga tewakyali kituli ekisigadde omwo; (newakubadde nga nali nga sinnasimba nzigi mu miryango mu biro ebyo;) 
16_6_2_awo Sanubalaati ne Gesemu ne bantumira nga boogera nti Jjangu tulabaganire mu kaalo akamu ak'omu lusenyi lwa Ono. Naye nga baalowooza okunkola obubi. 
16_6_3_Ne mbatumira ababaka nga njogera nti Nkola omulimu omunene n'okuyinza siyinza kuserengeta: omulimu gwandirekeddwayo ki, nze nga nguvuddeko ne nserengeta gye muli? 
16_6_4_Ne bantumira bwe baryo emirundi ena; ne mbaddamu bwe ntyo. 
16_6_5_Awo Sanubalaati n'antumira omuddu we bw'atyo omulundi ogw'okutaano ng'alina mu mukono gwe ebbaluwa etezingiddwa mu mukono gwe 
16_6_7_Era otaddewo ne bannabbi ab'okubuulira ebigambo byo e Yerusaalemi nga boogera nti Mu Yuda mulimu kabaka: kale nno kabaka alibuulirwa ng'ebigambo ebyo bwe biri. Kale mo jjangu tuteese fembi. 
16_6_8_Awo ne mmutumira nga njogera nti Tewakolebwanga bigambo nga bw'otogera naye obigunze mu mutima nvo ggwe. 
16_6_9_Kubanga boana banditutiisizza nga boogera nti Emikono gyabwe girifuuka minafu okura ku mulimu guleme okukolebwa. Naye kaakano, ai Katonda, nyweza ggwe emikono gyange. 
16_6_10_Awo ne nnyingira mu nnyunba ya Semaaya mutabani wa Deraaya mutabani wa Meketaberi yasibibwa; n'ayogera nti Tulabaganire mu nnyumba ya Katonda munda wa yeekaalu, era tuggalewo enzigi za yeekaalu: kubanga banajja kukutta; weewaawo, mu kiro mwe anajjira okukutta. 
16_6_11_Ne njogera nti Omusajja eyenkana awo nga nze nandidduse? era ani eyenkana nga nze eyandiyingidde mu yeekaalu kuwonya obulamu bwe? siiyingiemu. 
16_6_12_Ne ntegeera, era, laba, Katonda teyamutuma: naye yandalulako obunnabbi buno: era Tobiya ne Sanubalaati baali bamuguliridde. 
16_6_13_Kyeyava aguliririrwa ntye nkole bwe ntyo nnyonoone, babeeko kwe banaggya ensonga ey'ebigambo bibi, banvume. 
16_6_14_Ai Katonda wange, jjukira Tobiya ne Sanubalati ng'ebikolwa byabwe ebyo bwe yali, era ne nnabbi omukazi Nowadiya, ne bannabbi abalala abanditiisizza. 
16_6_15_Bwe kityo bbugwe n'aggwa kukola ku lunaku olw'amakumi biri mu ttaano olw'omwezi Eruli, mu nnaku amakumi ataano mu biri. 
16_6_16_Awo olwatuuka abalabe baffe bonna bwe baawulira bwe batyo, bannaggwanga bonna abatwetoolodde ne batya ne baggweemu ddala omwoyo mu maaso gaabwe bo: kubanga baalaba ng'omulimu guno gwakolebwa Katonda waffe. 
16_6_17_Era mu nnaku ezo abakungu ba Yuda ne baweereza Tobiya bbaluwa nnyingi, ebbaluwa za Tobiya ne zijja gye bali. 
16_6_18_Kubanga mu Yuda mwalimu bangi abamulayirira kubanga yali mukoddomi wa Sekaniya mutabani wa Ala; ne mutabani we Yekokanani ai awasizza inuwala wa Mesullamu utabani wa Berekiya. 
16_6_19_Era ne boogera ku bikolwa bye ebirungi mu maaso gange, ne bamubuulira ebigambo byange. Tobiya n'aweereza ebbaluwa okuntiisa. 
16_7_1_Awo olwatuuka bbugwe bwe yaggwa okuzimba, era nga mmaze okusimba enzigi, n'abaggazi n'abayimbi n'Abaleevi nga balondeddwa, 
16_7_2_awo muganda wange Kanani ne Kananiya omukulu w'ekigo ne mbakwasa Yerusaalemi: kubanga yali musajja mwesigwa, era yatyanga Katonda okusinga bangi. 
16_7_3_Ne mbagamba nti Enzigi za Yerusaalemi teziggalwangawa ng'omusana tegunnakangaalukuka; era bwe bayimirira nga bakuuma baggalengawo enzigi, era muzinywe zenga n'ebisiba: era mussengawo abakuumi ku abo abali mu Yerusaalemi, buli muntu mu luwalo lwe, era buli muntu ng'ayolekera ennyu mba ye. 
16_7_4_Era ekibuga kyali kigazi era kinene: naye abantu abaali omwo baali batono, n'ennyumba nga tezizimbiddwa. 
16_7_5_Katonda wange n'akiteeka mu mutima gwange okukuŋŋaanya abakungu n'abakulu n'abantu babalibwe ng'okuzaalibwa kwabwe bwe kwali. Ne ndaba ekitabo eky'okuzaalibwa kw'abo abaasooka okwambuka, ne ndaba, nga kiwandiikiddwamu nti 
16_7_6_Bano be baana b'essaza abaayambuka okuva mu bunyage bw'abo abaatwaiibwa, Nebukadduneeza kabaka w'e Babulooni be yatwala, era abaddayo e Yerusaalemi ne Yuda, buli muntu mu kibuga ky'ewaabwe 
16_7_8_abaana ba Palosi, enkumi bbiri mu kikumi mu nsanvu mu babiri. 
16_7_9_Abaana ba Sefatiya, ebikumi bisatu mu nsanvu mu babiri. 
16_7_10_Abaana ba Ala, lukaaga mu ataano mu babiri. 
16_7_11_Abaana ba Pakasumowaabu, ow'oku baana ba Yesuwa ne Yowaabu, enkumi bbiri mu lunaana mu kkumi mu munaana 
16_7_12_Abaana ba Eramu, lukumi mu ebikumi bibiri mu ataano mu bana. 
16_7_13_Abaana ba Zattu, lunaana mu ana mu bataano. 
16_7_14_Abaana ba Zakkayi, lusanvu mu nkaaga. 
16_7_15_Abaana ba Binnuyi, lukaaga mu ana mu munaana. 
16_7_16_Abaana ba Bebayi, lukaaga mu abiri mu munaana. 
16_7_17_Abaana ba Azugaadi, enkumi bbiri mu ebikumi bisatu mu abiri mu babiri. 
16_7_18_Abaana ba Adotukamu, lukaaga mu nkaaga mu musanvu. 
16_7_19_Abaana ba Biguvaayi, enkumi bbiri mu nkaaga mu musanvu. 
16_7_20_Abaana ba Adini, lukaaga mu ataano mu bataano. 
16_7_21_Abaana ba Ateri, owa Keezeekiya, kyenda mu munaana. 
16_7_22_Abaana ba Kasumu, ebikumi bisatu mu abiri mu munaana. 
16_7_23_Abaana ba Bezayi, ebikumi bisatu mu abiri mu bana. 
16_7_24_Abaana ba Kalifu, kikumi mu kkumi mu babiri. 
16_7_25_Abaana ba Gibyoni, kyenda mu bataano. 
16_7_26_Abasajja ab'e Besirekemu ne Netofa, kikumi mu kinaana mu munaana. 
16_7_27_Abasajja We Anasosi; kikumi mu abiri mu munaana. 
16_7_28_Abasajja ab'e Besuwazumavesi, amakumi ana mu babiri. 
16_7_29_Abasajja ab'e Kiriyasuyalimu, Kefira, ne Beerosi, lusanvu mu ana mu basatu. 
16_7_30_Abasajja ab'e Laama ne Geba, lukaaga mu abiri mu omu. 
16_7_31_Abasajja ab'e Mikumasi, kikumi mu abiri mu babiri. 
16_7_32_Abasajja ab'e Beseri ne Ayi, kikumi mu abiri mu basatu. 
16_7_33_Abasajja ab'e Nebo eky'okubiri, amakumi ataano mu babiri. 
16_7_34_Abaana ba Eramu ow'okubiri, lukumi mu ebikumi bibiri mu ataano mu bana. 
16_7_35_Abaana ba Kalimu, ebikumi bisatu mu abiri. 
16_7_36_Abaana ba Yeriko, ebikumi bisatu mu ana mu bataano. 
16_7_37_Abaana ba Loodi, Kadidi, ne Ono, lusanvu mu abiri mu omu. 
16_7_38_Abaana ba Senaa, enkumi ssatu mu lwenda mu asatu. 
16_7_39_Bakabona: abaana ba Yedaya, ow'oku nnyumba ya Yesuwa; lwenda mu nsanvu mu basatu. 
16_7_40_Abaana ba Immeri, lukumi mu ataano mu babiri. 
16_7_41_Abaana ba Pasukuli, lukumi mu ebikumi bibiri mu ana mu musanvu. 
16_7_42_Abaana ba Kalimu, lukumi mu kkumi mu musanvu. 
16_7_43_Abaleevi: abaana ba Yesuva ow'e Kadumyeri, ow'oku baana ba Kodeva, nsanvu mu bana. 
16_7_44_Abayimbi: abaana ba Asafu, kukumi mu ana mu munaana 
16_7_45_Abaggazi: abaana ba Sallumu, abaana ba Ateri, abaana ba Talumoni, abaana ba Akkubu, abaana ba Katita, abaana ba Sobayi, kikumi mu asatu mu munaana. 
16_7_46_Abanesinimu: abaana ba Zika, abaana ba Kasufa, abaana ba Tabbawoosi; 
16_7_47_abaana ba Keriso, abaana ba Siya, abaana ba Padoni; 
16_7_48_abaana ba Lebana, abaana ba Kagaba, abaana ba Salumayi; 
16_7_49_abaana ba Kanani, abaana ba Gidderu, abaana ba Gakali; 
16_7_50_abaana ba Leyaya, abaana ba Lezini, abaana ba Nekoda; 
16_7_51_abaana ba Gazzamu, abaana ba Uzza, abaana ba Paseya; 
16_7_52_abaana ba Besayi abaana ba Meyunimu, abaana ba Nefusesimu; 
16_7_53_abaana ba Bakubuki, abaana ba Kakufa, abaana ba Kalukuli; 
16_7_54_abaana ba Bazulisi, abaana ba Mekida, abaana ba Kalusa; 
16_7_55_abaana ba Balukosi, abaana ba Sisera, abaana ba Tema; 
16_7_56_abaana ba Neziya, abaana ba Katifa. 
16_7_57_Abaana b'abaddu ba Sulemaani; abaana ba Sotayi, abaana ba Soferesi, abaana ba Perida; 
16_7_58_abaana ba Yaala, abaana ba Dalukoni, abaana ba Gidderi; 
16_7_59_abaana ba Sefatiya, abaana ba Kattiri, abaana ba Pokeresukazzebayimu, abaana ba Amoni. 
16_7_60_Abanesinimu bonna n'abaana b'abaddu ba Sulemaani baali ebikumi bisatu mu kyenda mu babiri. 
16_7_61_Era bano be baayambuka okuva e Terumeera, e Terukalusa, e Kerubu, e Yaddoni, ne Immeri: naye ne batayinza kulaga nnyumba za bakitaabwe newakubadde okuzaalibwa kwabwe oba nga ba Isiraeri: 
16_7_62_abaana ba Deraya, abaana ba Tobiya, abaana ba Nekoda, lukaaga mu ana mu babiri. 
16_7_63_Ne ku bakabona: abaana ba Kobaya, abaana ba Kakkozi, abaana ba Baluzirayi, eyawasa omukazi ow'oku bawala ba Baluzirayi Omugireyaadi, n’atuumibwa erinnya lyabwe. 
16_7_64_Abo ne banoonya okuwandiikibwa kwabwe mu abo abaabalibwa ng'okuzaalibwa kwabwe bwe kwali, naye ne kutalabika: kyebaava babawoola ne babagoba mu bwakabona. 
16_7_65_Tirusaasa n'abagamba baleme okulya ku bintu ebitukuvu ennyo okutuusa kabona lw'aliyimirira alina Ulimu ne Sumimu. 
16_7_66_Ekibiina kyonna wamu yali obukumi buna mu enkumi bbiri mu bikumi bisatu mu nkaaga, 
16_7_67_obutassaako baddu baabwe n'abazaana baabwe, omuwendo gwabwe asanvu mu ebikumi bisatu mu asatu mu musanvu: era baalina abasajja abayimbi n'abakazi abayimbi ebikumi bibiri mu ana mu ataano. 
16_7_68_Embalaasi zaabwe zaali lusanvu mu asatu mu mukaaga nnyumbu zaabwe ebikumi bibiri mu ana mu ttaano; 
16_7_69_eŋŋamira zaabwe ebikumi bina mu asatu mu ttaano; endogoyi zaabwe kakaaga mu lusanvu mu abiri. 
16_7_70_Era abamu ku mitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe ne bawaayo eri omulimu. Tirusaasa n'awaayo mu ggwanika daliki eza zaabu lukumi, ebibya amakumi ataano, ebyambalo bya bakabona ebikumi bitaano mu asatu. 
16_7_71_Era abamu ku mitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe ne bawaayo mu ggwanika ery'omulimu daliki eza zaabu obukumi bubiri, ne laateri eza ffeeza enkumi bbiri mu bikumi bibiri. 
16_7_72_N'ebyo abantu abalala bye baawa byali daliki ezaabu obukumi bubiri ne laateri eza ffeeza enkumi bbiri, n'ebyambalo bya bakabona nkaaga mu musanvu. 
16_7_73_Awo bakabona n'Abaleevi n'abaggazi n'abayimbi n'abamu ku bantu n'Abanesinimu ne Isiraeri yenna ne babeeranga mu Bibuga byabwe. Awo omwezi gw'omusanvu bwe gwatuuka, abaana ba Isiraeri nga bali mu bibuga byabwe. 
16_8_1_Awo abantu bonna ne bakuŋŋaana ng'omuntu omu mu kifo ekigazi ekyayolekera omulyango gw'amazzi; ne bagamba Ezera omuwandiisi okuleeta ekitabo eky'amateeka ga Musa Mukama ge Falagira Isiraeri. 
16_8_2_Ezera kabona n’aleeta amateeka mu maaso g'ekibiina, abasajja era n'abakazi ne Donna abaayinza okuwulira n'okutegeera, ku lunaku alw'olubereberye olw'omwezi ogw'omusanvu. 
16_8_3_Awo n'asoma omwo mu maaso g’ekifo ekigazi ekyayolekera omulyango ogw'amazzi, okuva enkya nu makya okutuusa ettuntu, abasajja n'abakazi nga weebali, n'abe abayinza okutegeera; abantu bonna ne batega amatu okuwulira ekitabo eky'amateeka. 
16_8_4_Ezera omuwandiisi n'ayimirira ku kituuti eky'emiti kye baali bakoledde omulimu ogwo; n'okumuliraana ne wayimirira Mattisiya ne Sema ne Anaya ne Uliya ne Kirukiya ne Maaseya ku mukono gwe ogwa ddyo; ne ku mukono gwe ogwa kkono Pedaya ne Misayeri ne Malukiya ne Kasumu ne Kasubaddana, Zekkaliya ne Mesullamu. 
16_8_5_Awo Ezera n'ayanjululiza ekitabo mu maaso g'abantu bonna; (kubanga yali waggulu w'abantu bonna;) kale bwe yakyanjuluza, abantu bonna ne bayimirira: 
16_8_6_Ezera ne yeebaza Mukama Katonda omukulu. Abantu bonna ne baddamu nti Amiina, Amiina, nga bayimusa emikono gyabwe: ne bakutama emitwe gyabwe ne basinza Mukama nga bavuunamye amaaso gaabwe. 
16_8_7_Era Yesuwa ne Baani ne Serebiya ne Yamini ne Akkubu ne Sabbesayi ne Kodiya ne Masseya ne Kerita ne Azaliya ne Yozabadi ne Kanani ne Peraya n'Abaleevi ne bategeeza abantu amateeka: abantu ne bayimirira mu kifo kyabwe. 
16_8_8_Ne basoma mu kitabo mu mateeka ga Katonda okuwulikika; ne baleeta amakulu n'okutegeera ne bategeera ebyasomebwa. 
16_8_9_Awo Nekkemiya Tirusaasa ne Ezera kabona omuwandiisi n'Abaleevi abaayigirizanga abantu ne bagamba abantu bonna nti Olunaku luno lutukuvu eri Mukama Katonda wammwe; temunakuwala so temukaaba maziga. Kubanga abantu bonna baakaaba amaziga bwe baawulira ebigambo eby'omu mateeka. 
16_8_10_Awo n'abagamba nti Mweddireyo, mulye amasavu, munywe ebiwoomerevu, muweereze oyo emigabo atategekeddwa kintu: kubanga olunaku luno lutukuvu eri Mukama waffe: so temunakuwala; kubanga essanyu lya Mukama ge maanyi gammwe. 
16_8_11_Awo Abaleevi ne basirisa abantu bonna nga boogera, nti Musirike, kubanga olunaku luno lutukuvu; so temunakuwala. 
16_8_12_Awo abantu bonna ne beddirayo okulya n'akunywa n'okuwereeza emigabo n'okusanvuka essanyu lingi, kubanga bategedde ebigambo ebibabuuliddwa. 
16_8_13_Awo ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne wakuŋŋaana emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe ez'abantu bonna, bakabona n'Abaleevi, awali Ezera omuwandiisi, okutega amatu eri ebigambo eby'amateeka. 
16_8_14_Ne balaba ebyawandiikibwa mu mateeka Mukama bwe yalagirira mu Musa, abaana ba Isiraeri basulenga mu nsiisira mu mbaga ey'omu mwezi ogw'omusanvu: 
16_8_15_bategeezenga era balangirirenga mu bibuga byabwe byonna ne mu Yerusaalemi nti Mufulume ku lusozi, mukime amatabi g'emizeyituuni, n'amatabi ag'emizeyituuni egy'omu nsiko, n'amatabi g'emikadasi, n'amatabi g'enkindu, n'amatabi g'emiti emiziyivu, okukola ensiisira nga bwe kyawandiikibwa. 
16_8_16_Awo abantu ne bafuluma ne bagaleeta ne beekolera ensiisira, bulu muntu waggulu ku nnyumba ye ne mu mpya zaabwe ne mu mpya z'ennyumba ya Katonda ne mu kifo ekigazi eky'oku mulyango ogw'amazzi ne mu kifo ekigazi eky'okumulyango gwa Efulayimu. 
16_8_17_Awo ekibiina kyotma eky'abo abaali bakomyewo okuva mu bunyage ne bakola ensiisira ne basula mu nsiisira: kubanga okuva mu nnaku za Yesuwa mutabani wa Nuuni okutuusa ku lunaku luli abaana ba Isiraeri tebaakolanga bwe baryo. Ne wabaawo essanyu lingi nnyo. 
16_8_18_Era buli lunaku ng'asookera ku lunaku olw'olubereberye n'amalira ku lunaku olw'enkomerero n'asomanga mu kitabo eky'amateeka ga Katonda. Ne bakwatira embaga ennaku musanvu; ne ku lunaku olw'omunaana ne wabaawo okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu, ng'ekiragiro bwe kiri. 
16_9_1_Awo ku lunaku olw'abiri mu nnya olw'omwezi guno abaana ba Isirieri baali bakuŋŋaanye nga basiiba era nga bambadde ebibukutu era nga basaabye ettaka. 
16_9_2_Awo ezzadde lya Isiraeri ne beeyawula mu bannaggwanga bonna, ne bayimirira ne baatula ebibi byabwe n'obutali butuukirivu bwa bajjajjaabwe. 
16_9_3_Ne bayimirira mu kifo kyabwe ne basoma mu kitabo eky'amateeka ga Mukama Katonda waabwe ne bamala ekitundu ky'olunaku eky'okuna; n'ekitundu eky'okuna ekirala ne baatula, ne basinza Mukama Katonda waabwe. 
16_9_4_Awo ne wayimirira ku madaala g'Abaleevi Yesuwa ne Baani ne Kadumyeri ne Sebaniya ne Bunni ne Serebiya ne Baani ne Kenani, ne bakaabira Mukama Katonda waabwe n'eddoboozi ddene. 
16_9_5_Awo Abaleevi, Yesuwa ne Kadumyeri ne Baani ne Kasabuneya ne Serebiya ne Kodiya ne Sebaniya ne Pesakiya ne boogera nti Muyimirire mwebaze Mukama Katonda wammwe okuva emirembe gyonna n'okutuusa emirembe gyonna: era erinnya lyo ery'ekitiibwa lyebazibwe erigulumizibwa okusinga okwebaza kwonna n'okutendereza. 
16_9_6_Ggwe Mukama, ggwe wekka; ggwe wakola eggulu, eggulu erya waggulu, n'eggye lyalyo lyonna, ensi n'ebintu byonna ebiri okwo, ennyanja ne byonna ebiri omwo, era ggwe obikuuma byonna; n'eggye ery'omu ggulu likusinza. 
16_9_7_Ggwe Mukama Katonda yennyini, eyalonda Ibulayimu n'omuggya mu Uli ey'Abakaludaaya, n'omuwa erinnya Ibulayimu 
16_9_9_Era walaba okubonaabona kwa bajjajjaaffe mu Misiri n'owulira okukaaba kwabwe ku ttale ly'Ennyanja Emmyufu; 
16_9_10_n'olaga obubonero n'eby'amagero ku Falaawo n'abaddu be bonna n'abantu bonna ab'omu nsi ye; kubanga wamanya nga baabakola eby'amalala; ne weefunira erinnya nga bwe kiri leero. 
16_9_11_Era wayawula mu nnyanja mu maaso gaabwe n'okuyita ne bayita wakati mu nnyanja ku lukalu; n'abo abaabagoberera n'obakasuka mu buziba ng'ejjinja bwe likasukibwa mu mazzi ag'amaanyi. 
16_9_12_Era nate n'obaluŋŋamya ng'oyima mu mpagi ey'ekire emisana; era ng'oyima mu mpagi ey'omuliro ekiro, okubamulisiza mu kkubo lye baba bayitamu. 
16_9_13_Era wakka ku lusozi Sinaayi, n'oyogera nabo ng'oyima mu ggulu; n'obawa ensala entuufu n'amateeka ag’amazima, ebyakuutirwa ebirungi n'ebiragiro: 
16_9_14_n'obamanyisa ssabbiiti yo entukuvu, n'obalagira ebiragiro n'amateeka ne tawuleeti mu mukono gwa Musa omuddu wo: 
16_9_15_n'obawanga emmere eyava mu ggulu olw'enjala yaabwe, n'obaggira amazzi mu lwazi olw'ennyonta yaabwe, n'obalagira bayingire okulya ensi gye wayimusiza omukono gwo okubawa. 
16_9_16_Naye bo ne bajjajjaaffe ne bakola eby'amalala, ne bakakanyaza ensingo yaabwe, ne batawulira biragiro byo, 
16_9_17_ne bagaana okugonda so tebajjukira bya magero byo bye wakola mu bo; naye ne bakakanyaza ensingo yaabwe, ne bassaawo omwami nga bajeemye okuddayo mu buddu bwabwe: naye ggwe Katonda eyeeteeseteese okusonyiwa, ow'ekisa era ajjudde okusaasira, alwawo okusunguwala, era akwatirwa ennyo ekisa, n'otobaleka. 
16_9_18_Weewaawo, bwe baakola ennyana ensaanuuse, ne boogera nti Ono ye Katonda wo eyakuggya mu Misiri, era nga bakoze ebinyiiza ennyo; 
16_9_19_naye ggwe olw'okusaasira kwo okutali kumu n'otobaleka mu ddungu: empagi ey'ekire teyabavangako emisana okubaluŋŋamiza mu kkubo; newakubadde empagi ey'omuliro ekiro okubamulisiza n'okubalaga ekkubo lye baba bayitamu. 
16_9_20_Era wawa omwoyo gwo omulungi okubayigiriza, so tewabammanga manu yo mu kamwa kaabwe, n'obawa amazzi olw'ennyonta yaabwe. 
16_9_21_Weewaawo, wabaliisiza emyaka amakumi ana mu ddungu, ne batabulwanga kintu; ebyambalo byabwe tebyakaddiwanga n'ebigere byabwe tebyazimbanga. 
16_9_22_Era wabawa obwakabaka n'amawanga ge wagaba ng'emigabo gyabwe bwe gyali: kale ne balya ensi ya Sikoni, ensi ya kabaka w’e Kesuboni, n'ensi ya Ogi kabaka w’e Basani. 
16_9_23_Era n'abaana baabwe wabaaza ng'emmunyeenye ez'omu ggulu, n'obayingiza mu nsi gye wagambako bajjajjaabwe nga baligiyingira okugirya. 
16_9_24_Kale abaana ne bayingira ne balya ensi, n'owangula abaali mu nsi mu maaso gaabwe, Abakanani, n'obawaayo mu mikono gyabwe, ne bakabaka baabwe n'amawanga ag'omu nsi, babakole nga bwe bayagala. 
16_9_25_Ne bamenya ebibuga ebyaliko enkomera, n'ensi engimu, ne balya ennyumba ezajjula ebirungi byonna, ebidiba ebyabajjibwa, ensuku ez'e emizabbibu, n'ez'emizeyituuni, n'emiti egibala ebibala mingi nnyo: awo ne balya ne bakkuta, ne bagejja ne basanyukiranga obulungi bwo obungi. 
16_9_26_Era naye ne batagondanga ne bakujeemeranga ne basuulanga amateeka go ennyuma w'amabega gaabwe, ne battanga bannabbi bo abaabanga abajulirwa eri bo okubakyusa nate gy'oli, ne bakolanga ebinyiiza ennyo. 
16_9_27_Kyewava obagabulanga mu mukono gw'abalabe baabwe abaabeeraliikirizanga: kale mu kiseera mwe baalabira ennaku bwe baakukaabiranga, n'obawuliranga ng'oyima mu ggulu; era ng'okusaasira kwo okutali kumu bwe kwali n'obawanga abalokozi abaabalokolanga mu mukono gw'abalabe baabwe. 
16_9_28_Naye bwe baamalanga okuwummula, ne beeyongeranga okukola obubi mu maaso go: kyewava obalekanga mu mukono gw'abalabe baabwe n'okufuga ne babafuga: naye bwe baakomangawo ne bakukaabira, n'owulira, ng'oyima mu ggulu; n'obawonyanga emirundi mingi ng'okusaasira kwo bwe kwali; 
16_9_29_n'obanga mujulirwa eri bo olyoke obakomyengawo eri amateeka go: naye ne bakolanga eby'amalala ne batawuliranga mateeka go, naye ne basobyanga emisango gyo, (egyo omuntu bw'agikola, anaabanga mulamu mu gyo,) ne baggyangawo ekibegabega, ne bakakanyazanga ensingo yaabwe, ne batayagalanga kuwulira. 
16_9_30_Naye n'obagumiikiririzanga emyaka mingi, n'obanga mujulirwa eri bo n'omwoyo gwo mu bannabbi bo: naye ne batayagalanga kutega kutu: kyewava obagabulanga mu mukono gw'amawanga ag'omunsi. 
16_9_31_Naye olw'okusaasira kwo okutali kumu n'otobamalirangawo ddala, so tewabalekanga; kubanga ggwe oli Katonda wa kisa era ow'okusaasira. 
16_9_32_Kale nno, Katonda waffe, Katonda omukulu, ow'amaanyi, ow'entiisa, akwata endagaano n'okusaasira, okutegana kwonna kuleme okufaanana okutono mu maaso go, okwatubangako, ku bassekabaka baffe, ku bakunga baffe, ne ku bakabona baffe, ne ku bannabbi baffe, ne ku bajjajjaffe, ne ku bantu bo bonna, okuva ku mirembe gya bakabaka b'e Bwasuli na buli kati. 
16_9_33_Naye ggwe mutuukirivu mu byonna ebyatubangako kubanga wakolanga eby'amazima, naye ffe mateeka go so tebaawuliranga biragiro byo n'emisango gyo bye wategeeza eri bo. 
16_9_34_Kubanga tebaakuweerezanga mu bwakabaka bwabwe, ne mu bulungi bwo obungi bwe wabawa, ne mu nsi ennene engimu gye wawa mu maaso gaabwe, so tebaakyukanga okuleka ebikolwa byabwe ebiri. 
16_9_35_Kubanga tebaakuweerezanga mu bwakabaka bwabwe, ne mu bulungi bwo obungi bwe wabawa, ne mu nsi ennene engimu gye wawa mu maaso gaabwe, so tebaakyukanga okuleka ebikolwa byabwe ebiri. 
16_9_36_Laba, tuli baddu leero, n'ensi gye wawa bajjajjaffe, okulyanga ebibala byamu n'obulungi bwamu, laba, tuli baddu omwo. 
16_9_37_Era ewa amagoba mangi bakabaka be wassaawo okutufuga olw'okwonoona kwaffe: era balina obuyinza ku mibiri gyaffe, n'ebisibo byaffe, nga bwe basiima, naffe tulabye ennaku nnyingi. 
16_9_38_Era naye ebyo byonna newakubadde nga bibaddewo tulagaana endagaano ey'enkalakkalira, ne tugiwandiika; abakungu baffe n'Abaleevi baffe ne bakabona baffe ne bagissaako akabonero. 
16_10_1_Era abo abassaako akabonero be bano, Nekkemiya Tirusaasa, mutabani wa Kakaliya, ne Zeddekiya 
16_10_9_N'Abaleevi amannya gaabwe, Yesuwa mutabani wa Azaniya ne Binnuyi ow'oku baana ba Kenadadi ne Kadumyeri; 
16_10_10_ne baganda baabwe, Sebaniya ne Kodiya ne Kerita ne Peraya ne Kanani; 
16_10_11_ne Mikka ne Lekobu ne Kasabiya;, 
16_10_12_ne Zakkuli ne Serebiya ne Sebaniya; 
16_10_13_ne Kodiya ne Baani ne Beninu. 
16_10_14_Abakulu b'abantu: Palosi ne Pakasumowaabu ne Eramu ne Zattu ne Baani; 
16_10_15_ne Bunni ne Azugaadi ne Babayi; 
16_10_16_ne Adoniya ne Biguvayi ne Adini; 
16_10_17_ne Atera ne Keezeekiya ne Azzuli; 
16_10_18_ne Kodiya ne Kasumu ne Bezayi; 
16_10_19_ne Kalifu ne Anasosi ne Nobayi; 
16_10_20_ne Magupiyasi ne Mesullamu ne Keziri; 
16_10_21_ne Mesezaberi ne Zadoki ne Yadduwa; 
16_10_22_ne Peratiya ne Kanani ne Anaya; 
16_10_23_ne Koseya ne Kananiya ne Kassubu; 
16_10_24_ne Kallokesi ne Piruka ne Sobeki; 
16_10_25_ne Lekumu ne Kasabuna ne Maaseya; 
16_10_26_ne Akiya ne Kanani ne Anani; 
16_10_27_ne Malluki ne Kallimu ne Baana. 
16_10_28_N'abantu abalala bonna, bakabona n'Abaleevi n'abaggazi n'abayimbi n'Abanesinimu n'abo bonna abeeyawula mu mawanga ag'omu nsi eri amateeka ga Katonda, bakazi baabwe, batabani baabwe, ne bawala baabwe, buli muntu eyalina okumanya n'okutegeera; 
16_10_29_ne beegatta ne baganda baabwe, abakungu baabwe, ne beegwanyiza ekikolimo n'ekirayiro okutambuliranga mu mateeka ga Katonda agaaweerwa mu Musa omuddu wa Katonda, n'okukwatanga n'okukolanga ebiragiro byonna ebya Mukama, Mukama waffe, n'emisango gye n'amateeka ge; 
16_10_30_era tulemenga okuwa bawala baffe amawanga ag'omu nsi, newakubadde okutwaliranga batabani' baffe bawala baabwe; 
16_10_31_era amawanga ag'omu nsi bwe banaaleetanga ebintu oba ebyokulya byonna okutundira ku lunaku olwa ssabbiiti, obutagulaaniranga nabo ku ssabbiiti newakubadde ku lunaku olutukuvu: era nga tunaalekanga omwaka ogw'omusanvu, n'okubanjanga ebbanja lyonna. 
16_10_32_Era ne tweteekerawo amateeka okwesaliranga buli mwaka ekitundu eky'okusatu ekya sekeri olw'okuweerezanga okw'omu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe; 
16_10_33_olw'emigaati egy'okulaga n'olw'ekiweebwayo eky'obutta ekitaggwaawo n'olw'ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa ekitaggwaawo, eby'oku ssabbiiti n'eby'oku myezi egyakaboneka, n'olw'embaga egyateekebwawo, n'olw'ebintu ebitukuvu n'olw'ebiweebwayo olw'ekibi okutangirira Isiraeri, n'olw'emirimu gyonna egy'omu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe. 
16_10_34_Ne tukuba obululu, bakabona n'Abaleevi n'abantu, olw'ekiweebwayo eky'enku, okuzireetanga mu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe ng'ennyumba za bakitaffe bwe zaali mu biseera ebyalagirwa buli mwaka, okwokeranga ku kyoto kya Mukama Katonda waffe nga bwe kyawandiikibwa mu mateeka: 
16_10_35_n'okuleetanga ebibala ebibereberye eby'ettaka lyaffe, n'ebibereberye eby'ebibala byonna eby'oku miti egy'engeri zonna buli mwaka mu nnyumba ya Mukama: 
16_10_36_era n'ababereberye ku batabani baffe ne ku bisibo byaffe nga bwe kyawandiikibwa mu mateeka, n'ebibereberye ku nte zaffe ne ku ndiga zaffe okuleetanga mu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe eri bakabona abaaweererezanga mu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe: 
16_10_37_era nga tunaaleetanga ebibereberye eby'omugoyo gwaffe n'ebiweebwayo byaffe ebisitulibwa, n'ebibala eby'oku miti egy'engeri zonna, omwenge n'amafuta, eri bakabona mu bisenge eby'omu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe; n'ebitundu eby'ekkumi eby'ettaka lyaffe eri Abaleevi; kubanga abo, Abaleevi, be baaweebwa ebitundu eby'ekkumi mu bibuga byonna gye tulimira. 
16_10_38_Era kabona mutabani wa Alooni anaabanga wamu n'Abaleevi, Abaleevi bwe banaaweebwanga ebitundu eby'ekkumi: era Abaleevi banaaleetanga ekitundu eky'ekkumi eky'oku bitundu eby'ekkumi mu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe, mu bisenge mu nnyumba ey'okuterekamu eby'obugagga. 
16_10_39_Kubanga abaana ba Isiraeri n'abaana ba Leevi banaaleetanga ekiweebwayo ekisitulibwa eky'eŋŋaano n'eky'omwenge n'eky'amafuta mu bisenge omuli ebintu eby'omu kifo ekitukuvu, ne bakabona abaweereza n'abaggazi n'abayimbi: so tetuulekenga nnyumba ya Katonda waffe. 
16_11_1_Awo abakulu b'abantu ne babeeranga mu Yerusaalemi: era n'abantu abalala ne bakuba obuiuiui okuggya omu ku kkumi okumuleeta okubeera mu Yerusaalemi ekibuga ekitukuvu, ne bali omwenda okubeera mu bibuga ebirala. 
16_11_2_Awo abantu ne beebaza abasajja bonna abeeronda ku bwabwe okubeera mu Yerusaalemi. 
16_11_3_Era bano be bakulu b'essaza abaabeeranga mu Yerusaalemi: nave mu bibuga bya Yuda ne mubeeramu buli muntu mu butaka bwe mu bibuga byabwe, Isiraeri, bakabona n'Abaleevi n'Abanesinimu n'abaana b'abaddu ba Sulemaani. 
16_11_4_Ne mu Yerusaalemi ne mubeeramu abamu ku baana ba Yuda ne ku baana ba Benyamini. Ku baana ba Yuda: Ataya mutabanil wa Uzziya mutabani wa Zekkaliyai mutabani wa Amaliya mutabani wa Sefatiya mutabani wa Makalaleri ow'oku baana ba Pereezi 
16_11_6_Batabani ba Pereezi bonna abaabeera mu Yerusaalemi baali ebikumi bina mu nkaaga mu munaana abasajja abazira. 
16_11_7_Era bano be batabani ba Benyamini: Sallu mutabani wa Mesullamu mutabani wa Yowedi, mutabani wa Pedaya mutabani wa Kolaya mutabani wa Maaseya mutabani wa Isiyeri mutabani wa Yesaya. 
16_11_8_Awo oluvannyuma lw'oyo Gabbayi ne Sallayi, olwenda mu amakumi; abiri mu munaana. 
16_11_9_Ne Yoweeri, mutabani wa Zikuli ye yali omulabirizi waabwe: ne Yuda mutabani wa Kassenuwa ye yali ow'okubiri okufuga ekibuga. 
16_11_10_Ku bakabona: Yedaya mutabani wa Yoyalibu ne Yakini 
16_11_11_ne Seraya mutabani wa Kirukiya mutabani wa Mesullamu mutabani wa Zadoki mutabani wa Merayoosi mutabani wa Akitubu, omukulu w'ennyumba ya Katonda, 
16_11_12_ne baganda baabwe abaakolanga omulimu ogw'omu nnyumba, olunaana mu abiri mu babiri: ne Adaya mutabani wa Yerokamu mutabani wa Peraliya mutabani wa Amuzi mutabani wa Zekkaliya mutabani wa Pasukuli mutabani wa Malukiya, 
16_11_13_ne baganda be, abakulu b'ennyumba za bakitaabwe, ebikumi bibiri mu ana mu babisi: ne Amasusaayi mutabani wa Azaleri mutabani wa Azavi mutabani wa Mesiremoosi mutabani wa Immeri, 
16_11_14_ne baganda baabwe, abasajja ab'amaanyi abazira, kikumi mu abiri mu munaana: ne Zabudyeri mutabani wa Kaggedolimu ye yali omulabirizi waabwe. 
16_11_15_Ne ku Baleevi: Semaaya mutabani wa Kassubu mutabani wa Azulikamu mutabani wa Kasabiya mutabani wa Bunni; 
16_11_16_ne Sabbesayi ne Yozabadi, ku bakulu b'Abaleevi abaalabiriranga emirimu egy'ebweru egy'ennyumba ya Katonda; 
16_11_17_ne Mattaniya mutabani wa Mikka mutabani wa Zabudi mutabani wa Asafu eyali omukulu okuleeterezanga okwebaza bwe baasabanga, ne Bakubukiya ow'okubiri mu baganda be; ne Abuda mutabani wa Sammuwa mutabani wa Galali mutabani wa Yedusuni. 
16_11_18_Abaleevi bonna abaali mu kibuga ekitukuvu baali ebikumi bibiri mu kinaana mu bana. 
16_11_19_Era nate abaggazi, Akkubu ne Talumooni ne baganda 'baabwe abaakuumanga emiryango baali kikumi mu nsanvu mu babiri. 
16_11_20_N'Abaisiraeri bonna abalala, ku bakabona Abaleevi, baabanga mu bibuga byonna ebya Yuda, buli muntu mu busika bwe. 
16_11_21_Nave Abanesinimu ne babeeranga mu Oferi: ne Zika ne Gisupa be baali abakulu b'Abanesinimu. 
16_11_22_Ne Uzzi mutabani wa Baani mutabani wa Kasabiya mutabani wa Mattaniya mutabani wa Mikka, ow'oku baana ba Asafu abayimbi, ye yali omulabirizi w'Abaleevi e Yerusaalemi okulongoosa emirimu egy'omu nnyumba ya Katonda. 
16_11_23_Kubanga kabaka yali alagidde ebigambo byabwe, era yali akuutidde abayimbi eby'enkalakkalira nga buli lunaku bwe lwetaaga. 
16_11_24_Ne Pesakiya mutabani wa Mesezaberi ow'oku baana ba Zeera mutabani wa Yuda yabanga ku mukono gwa kabaka olw'ebigambo byonna eby'abantu. 
16_11_25_N'olw'ebyalo n'ennimiro zaako, abamu ku baana ba Yuda ne babeeranga mu Kirasualuba ne mu bibuga byako, ne mu Diboni n'ebibuga byako, ne mu Yekabuzeeri n'ebyalo byako: 
16_11_26_ne mu Yesuwa ne mu alolada ne Besupereti; 
16_11_27_ne mu Kazalusuali ne mu Beeruseba ne mu bibuga byako; 
16_11_28_ne mu Zikulagi ne mu Mekona n'ebibuga byako; 
16_11_29_ne mu Enulimmoni ne mu Zola ne mu Yalamusi; 
16_11_30_Zanowa ne Adulamu n'ebyalo byako, Lakisi n'ennimiro zaako, Azeka n'ebibuga byako. Bwe batyo bwe baasiisira okuva e Beeruseba okutuuka ku kiwonvu kya Kinomu. 
16_11_31_Abaana ba Benyamini nabo ne babeeranga okuva e Geba n'okweyongerayo e Mikumasi ne Ayiya, ne Beseri n'ebibuga byako; 
16_11_32_Anasosi ne Nobu ne Ananiya; 
16_11_33_Kazoli ne Laama ne Gittayimu; 
16_11_34_ne Kadidi ne Zeboyimu ne Neballati; 
16_11_35_ne Loodi ne Ono, ekiwonvu eky'abakozi. 
16_11_36_Ne ku Baleevi ebisanja ebimu eby'omu Yuda ne bigattibwa ne Benyamini. 
16_12_1_Era bano be bakabona n'Abaleevi abaayambuka ne Zerubbaberi mutabani wa Seyalutyeri, ne Yesuwa, Seraya ne Yeremiya ne Ezera 
16_12_8_Era nate Abaleevi; Yesuwa ne Binnuyi ne Kadumyeri ne Serebiya ne Yuda ne Mattaniya eyali omukulu w'okwebaza, ye ne baganda be. 
16_12_9_Era Bakubukiya ne Unni beganda baabwe ne baboolekera mu bisanja. 
16_12_10_Yesuwa n'ezaala Yoyakimu, Yoyakimu n'azaala Eriyasibu, Eriyasibu n'azaala Yoyaada, 
16_12_11_Yoyaada n'azaala Yonasaani, Yonasaani n'azaala Yadduwa. 
16_12_12_Mu nnaku za Yoyakimu ne wabaawo bakabona emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe; owa Seraya, Meraya; owa Yeremiya, Kananiya; 
16_12_13_owa Ezera, Mesullamu; owa Amaliya, Yekokanaai; 
16_12_14_owa Malluki, Yonasaani; owa Sebaniya, Yusufu; 
16_12_15_owa Kalimu, Aduna; owa Merayoosi, Kerukayi; 
16_12_16_owa Iddo, Zekkaliya; owa Ginaesoni, Mesullamu; 
16_12_17_owa Abiya, Zikuli; owa Miniyamini, owa Mowadiya, Pirutayi; 
16_12_18_owa Biruga, Sammuwa; owa Semaaya, Yekonasani; 
16_12_19_n'owa Yoyalibu, Mattenayi; owa Yedaya, Uzzi; 
16_12_20_owa Sallayi, Kallayi; owa Amoki, Eberi; 
16_12_21_owa Kirukiya, Kasabiya; owa Yedaya, Nesaneeri. 
16_12_22_Abaleevi mu nnaku za Eriyasibu, Yoyada ne Yokanani ne Yadduwa, ne bawandiikibwa nga gye mitwe gy'eanyumba za bakitaabwe: era ne bakabona, Daliyo Omuperusi nga ye kabaka. 
16_12_23_Batabani ba Leevi, emitwe gy'ennyumba za bakitaabwe, ne bawandiikibwa mu kitabo eky'ebyomumirembe okutuusa ku nnaku za Yokanani mutabani wa Eriyasibu.
