18_18_12_Amaanyi ge ganaalumwanga enjala, N'obuyinike bunaamubangako ng'asejjera. 
18_18_13_Bunaalyanga ebitundu by'omubiri gwe, Weewaawo, omubereberye w'okufa anaalyanga ebitundu bye. 
18_18_14_Anaasimbulwanga mu weema ye gye yeesiga; Era anaaleetebwanga eri kabaka w'ebitiisa. 
18_18_15_Ekitali kikye n'akatono kinaabanga mu weema ye: Ekibiriiti kinaamansirwanga ku kifo mwe yabeeranga, 
18_18_16_Ekikolo kye kinaakaliranga ddala wansi, Ne waggulu ettabi lye linaatemebwangawo. 
18_18_17_Ekijjukizo kye kinaabulanga ku nsi, So taabenga na linnya mu luguudo. 
18_18_18_Anaagoberwanga mu kizikiza okuva mu musana, Era anaayigganyizibwanga okuva mu nsi. 
18_18_19_Taabenga na mwana newakubadde omuzzukulu mu bantu be, Newakubadde omuntu yenna asigadde gye yabeeranga. 
18_18_20_Abanaddangawo baneewuunyanga olunaku lwe, Ng'abo abaasooka bwe baatiisibwa. 
18_18_21_Mazima ennyumba z'atali mutuukirivu bwe zifaanana bwe zityo, Era kino kye kifo ky'oyo atamanyi Katonda. 
18_19_1_Awo Yobu n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_19_2_Mulituusa wa okweraliikiriza emmeeme yange, Ne mummeayamenya n'ebigagambo? 
18_19_3_Mwakanwmira emirundi kkumi: Temukwatiddwa nsonyi okunzitoowerera. 
18_19_4_N'okukyama newakubadde nga nkyamye, Okukyama kwange kubeera nange mwene. 
18_19_5_Okwegulumiza oba nga muneegulumiza eri nze, Ne mundeetako ekivume kyange: 
18_19_6_Mutegeere nno nga Katonda ansudde mu nsonga yange, Era anzingizizza n'ekitimba kye. 
18_19_7_Laba, ajogerera waggulu olw'okujoogebwa, naye ne siwulirwa: Lidaagana nfune obuyambi, naye siraba antaasa. 
18_19_8_Azibye ekkubo lyange n'okuyinza ne ssiyinza kuyitamu, Era atadde ekizikiza mu makubo gange. 
18_19_9_Anziyeeko ekitiibwa kyange, Era aggye engule ku mutwe gwange. 
18_19_10_Ammenyemenye enjuyi zonna, era ŋŋenze: N'essuubi lyange alisimbudde ng'omuti. 
18_19_11_Era abuubuusizza obusungu bwe ku nze, Era ampita omu ku balabe be gy'ali. 
18_19_12_Eggye lye litabaalira wamu, ne batuuma ekkubo lyabwe ku nze, Ne basiisira okuzingiza eweema yange. 
18_19_13_Baganda bange abantadde wala, N'abo be mmanyi bafuukidde ddala nga be ssimanyi: 
18_19_14_Ab'ekika kyange baweddewo, Ne mikwano gyange ennyo banneerabidde. 
18_19_15_Abo ababeera mu nnyumba yange n'abazaana bange bampita mugenyi: Ndi munnaggwanga mu maaso gaabwe. 
18_19_16_Mpita omuddu wange n'atanjitaba, Newakubadde nga mmwegayirira n'akamwa kange. 
18_19_17_Omukka gwange mukazi wange tagumanyi, N'okwegayirira kwange abaana b'enda ya mmange tebakumanyi: 
18_19_18_Era n'abaana abato bannyooma; Bwe nnyimuka banjogerako obubi. 
18_19_19_Emikwano gyange bonna be nteesa nabo bantamiddwa: N'abo be nnayagalanga bakyuse okuba abalabe bange. 
18_19_20_Eggumba lyange lyegatta n'eddiba lyange n'omubiri gwange,Era mponye n'eddiba ly'okumanayo gange. 
18_19_21_Munsaasire, munsaasire, si mmwe mikwano gyange; Kubanga omukono gwa Katonda gunkomyeko. 
18_19_22_Kiki ekibanjiggaayisa nga Katonda, So n'omubiri gwange tegubamala? 
18_19_23_Singa nno ebigambo byange biwandiikiddwa! Singa biwandiikiddwa mu kitabo! 
18_19_24_Singa byoleddwa ku lwazi N'ekkalaamu ey'ekyuma n'ekisasi okumala emirembe gyonna! 
18_19_25_Naye mmanyi nga Omununuzi wange aba mulamu, Era ku nkomerero ng'aliyimirira ku nsi: 
18_19_26_Era eddiba ly'omubiri gwange bwe lirimala okuzikirizibwa bwe lityo, Naye mu mubiri gwange ndiraba Katonda: 
18_19_27_Gwe ndiraba nze mwene, N'amaaso gange galimutunuulira so si mulala. Emmeeme yange emaliddwawo munda yange. 
18_19_28_Bwe munaayogera nti Nga tunaamuyigganya so! Kubanga ekikolo ky'ekigambo kirabise mu nze; 
18_19_29_Mutyenga ekitala: Kubanga obusungu buleeta okubonereza kw'ekitala. Mulyoke mumanye nga waliwo okusala omusango. 
18_20_1_Awo Zofali Omunaamasi n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_20_2_Ebirowoozo byange kyebiva binziramu, Olw'okwanguyiriza okuli mu nze. 
18_20_3_Mpulidde okunenya okunswaza, Omwoyo ogw'okutegeera kwange ne gunziramu. 
18_20_4_Ekyo tokimanyi obw'edda, Omuntu kasookedde ateekebwa ku ttaka, 
18_20_5_Ng'okuwangula kw'ababi kwa kuggwaawo mangu, Era ng'essanyu ly'abatamanyi Katonda lya kiseera buseera? 
18_20_6_Obukulu bwe newakubadde nga bulinnya okutuuka mu ggulu, N'omutwe gwe gutuuka mu bire 
18_20_8_Anaavangawo ng'ekirooto, so taalabikenga: Weewaawo, anaagoberwanga ddala ng'okwolesebwa okw'ekiro. 
18_20_9_Eriiso eryamulabanga teriimulabenga nate; So n'ekifo kye tekiimutunuulirenga nate. 
18_20_10_Abaana be baneegonzaaga eri abaavu, N'emikono gye ginaakomyangawo obugagga bwe. 
18_20_11_Amagumba ge gajjudde obuvubuka bwe, Naye bunaagalamiranga naye mu nfuufu. 
18_20_12_Obubi newakubadde nga bumuwoomera mu kamwa ke, Newakubadde ng'abukweka wansi w'olulimi lwe; 
18_20_13_Newakubadde ng'abusonyiwa n'ataganya kubuta, Naye ng'akyaguguba nabwo mu kamwa ke; 
18_20_14_Naye emmere ye mu byenda bye efuuse, Bwe busagwa bwe mbalasaasa munda ye. 
18_20_15_Yamira obugagga, era anaabusesemanga nate: Katonda anaabuggyanga mu lubuto lwe. 
18_20_16_Anaanuunanga obusagwa bw'embalasaasa: Olulimi lw'omusota lunaamuttanga. 
18_20_17_Taatunuulirenga migga, Emigga egikulukuta egy'omubisi gw'enjuki n'omuzigo. 
18_20_18_Kye yateganira anaakizzanga, so taakimirenga; So taasanyukenga ng'ebintu bwe biri by'afunye. 
18_20_19_Kubanga yajooga abaavu n'abaleka; Yaggyawo ennyumba olw'amaanyi so taagizimbenga. 
18_20_20_Kubanga teyamanya kutereera munda ye, Taawonyenga kintu ku ebyo by'asanyukira. 
18_20_21_Tewasigala kintu ky'atalya; Omukisa gwe kyegunaavanga gulema okuba ogw'olubeerera. 
18_20_22_Mu lufulube lw'ebintu bye ebisukkirira anaalabanga ennaku: Omukono gwa buli muntu aliko obuyinike gunaamutuukangako. 
18_20_23_Bw'aba ng'anaatera okukkusa olubuto lwe, Katonda anaamusuulangako ekiruyi kye ekingi, Era anaakitonnyesanga ku ye ng'alya. 
18_20_24_Anaddukanga ekyokulwanyisa eky'ekyuma, N'omutego ogw'ekikomo gunaamufumitanga. 
18_20_25_Aguggyamu ne guva mu mubiri gwe: Weewaawo, omumwa gwagwo ogumasamasa guva mu mususa gwe; Ebitiisa bimuliko. 
18_20_26_Ekizikiza kyonna kyaterekerwa ebibye eby'obugagga: Omuliro ogutakumibwa bantu gunaamwokyanga; Gunaamalangawo ebyo ebisigadde mu weema ye. 
18_20_27_Eggulu linaabikkulanga ku butali butuukirivu bwe, N'ensi eneemugolokokerangako. 
18_20_28_Ekyengera eky'omu nnyumba ye kinaavangawo, Ebintu bye binaabuliranga ku lunaku olw'obusungu bwe. 
18_20_29_Ogwo gwe mugabo gw'omuntu omubi oguva eri Katonda, N'obusika Katonda bwe yamuteekerawo. 
18_21_1_Awo Yobu n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_21_2_Muwulire nnyo okwogera kwange; Era bino bibeere bya kubasanyusa. 
18_21_3_Munzikirize, nange naayogera; Kale nga mmaze okwogera, mweyongere okuduula. 
18_21_4_Nze nemulugunya eri abantu? Era ekyandindobedde okwesunaasuna kiki? 
18_21_5_Munziseeko omwoyo, mwewuunye, Era muteeke omukono gwammwe ku kamwa kammwe. 
18_21_6_Bwe njijukira obujjukizi neeraliikirira, Okwesisiwala ne kukwata omubiri gwange. 
18_21_7_Ababi babeerera ki abalamu, Ne bakaddiwa ne baba ba maanyi mu buyinza? 
18_21_8_Ezzadde lyabwe linywera gye bali bo nga balaba, N'enda yaabwe mu maaso gaabwe. 
18_21_9_Ennyumba zaabwe ziba mirembe awatali kutya, So n'omuggo gwa Katonda tegubabaako, 
18_21_10_Ente yaabwe ennume ezaala n'eteddirira; Ente yaabwe enkazi ezaala n'etesowola mwana gwayo. 
18_21_11_Basindika abaana baabwe abato ng'ekisibo, N'abaana baabwe bazina. 
18_21_12_Bayimbira ku bitaasa n'ennanga, Ne basanyukira eddoboozi ly'omulere. 
18_21_13_Bamala ennaku zaabwe nga balabye omukisa, Mu kaseera ne bakka mu magombe. 
18_21_14_Era naye ne bagamba Katonda nti Tuveeko; Kubanga tetwegomba kumanya makubo go. 
18_21_15_Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna kye ki, ffe tumuweereze? Era bwe tunaamusabanga kinaatugasanga kitya? 
18_21_16_Laba, omukisa gwabwe teguli mu mukono gwabwe: Okuteesa kw'ababi kundi wala. 
18_21_17_Ettabaaza y'ababi ezikizibwa emirundi emeka? N'obuyinike bwabwe bubatuukako emirundi emeka? Katonda agaba ennaku mu busungu bwe emirundi emeka? 
18_21_18_Baba ng'ebisasiro ebitwalibwa n'empewo, Era ng'ebisusunku embuyaga bye zitwala emirundi emeka? 
18_21_19_Mwogera nti Katonda aterekera abaana-be obutali butuukirivu bwe. Abasasule ye yennyini abumanye. 
18_21_20_Amaaso ge galabe okuzikirira kwe ye, Era anywe ku busungu bw'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna. 
18_21_21_Kubanga asanyukira atya ennyumba ye emuddirira, Omuwendo gw'emyezi gye nga gukutuse wakati? 
18_21_22_Waliwo anaayigirizanga Katonda okumanya? Kubanga asalira abo omusango abagulumizibwa. 
18_21_23_Wabaawo omu afa ng'alina amaanyi ge gonna, Ng'aweereddeweeredde ddala ng'ateredde: 
18_21_24_Amabeere ge gajjudde amata, N'obusomyo obw'amagumba ge nga bubisi. 
18_21_25_N'omulala afa omwoyo gwe nga gumubalagala, So taleganga ku birungi. 
18_21_26_Bombi bagalamira mu nfuufu, Envunyu n'ebabikkako. 
18_21_27_Laba, mmanyi ebirowoozo byammwe, N'enkwe ze munsalira obubi. 
18_21_28_Kubanga mwogera nti Etmyumba y'omukungu eri ludda wa? Era nti Eweema ababi mwe babeera eri ludda wa? 
18_21_29_Temwababuuza abatambulira mu kkubo? Era temumanyi bubonero bwabwe? 
18_21_30_Ng'omuntu omubi aterekerwa olunaku olw'okulabirako ennaku? Nga batwalibwa eri olunaku olw'obusungu? 
18_21_31_Ani anaabuuliranga ekkubo lye mu maaso ge? Era ani anaamusasulanga bye yakola? 
18_21_32_Naye anaatwalibwanga mu ntaana, Era anaakuumanga amalaalo. 
18_21_33_Amafunfugu ag'omu kiwonvu ganaamuwoomeranga, N'abantu bonna banaawalulwanga ennyuma we, Nga bwe baamukulembera abatabalika. 
18_21_34_Kale nno munsanyusiza mutya obwereere, Kubanga mu kuddamu kwammwe musigaddemu obulimba busa? 
18_22_1_Awo Erifaazi Omutemani n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_22_2_Omuntu ayinza okugasa Katonda? Mazima ow'amagezi yeegasa yekka. 
18_22_3_Kiriko bwe kisanyusa Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna ggwe okubeera omutuukirivu? Oba kimugasa ggwe okutuukiriza amakubo go? 
18_22_4_Kubanga omutya kyava akunenya, Kyava asala omusango gwo? 
18_22_5_Obubi bwo si bungi? So n'obutali butuukirivu bwo tebuliiko gye bukoma. 
18_22_6_Kubanga waggya ku muganda wo emisingo egy'obwereere, N'oyambula abaali obwereere ebyamhalo byabwe. 
18_22_7_Tonywesanga mazzi omukoowu, Era wamma omuyala emmere. 
18_22_8_Naye ow'amaanyi ye yalya ensi; N'ow'ekitiibwa ye yagibeeramu. 
18_22_9_Wasindika bannammwandu nga tebalina kintu, N'emikono gy'abatalina kitaabwe gyamenyeka. 
18_22_10_Obukunizo kyebuva bukwetooloola, N'entiisa gy'otomanyiridde ekweraliikiriza, 
18_22_11_Oba ekizikiza n'otoyinza kulaba, Amazzi amangi ne gakubikkako. 
18_22_12_Katonda tali mu ggulu awagulumizibwa? Era laba emmunyeenye bwe zenkana obugulumivu! 
18_22_13_Naawe oyogera nti Katonda amanyi ki? Ayinza okusala omusango ng'ayima mu kizikiza ekikutte? 
18_22_14_Ebire ebiziyivu bimubikkako n'okulaba talaba; Era atambulira mu kwekulungirira kw'eggulu. 
18_22_15_Oyagala okukwata ekkubo ery'edda Abantu ababi bye baalinnyirangamu? 
18_22_16_Abaakwakulibwa entuuko zaabwe nga tezinnabaawo, Omusingi gwabwe ne gufukibwa ng'omugga: 
18_22_17_Abaagambanga Katonda nti Tuveeko: Era nti Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna ayinza kutukolera ki? 
18_22_18_Naye yajjuza ennyumba zaabwe ebirungi: Naye okuteesa kw'ababi kundi wala. 
18_22_19_Abatuukirivu bakiraba ne basanyuka; N'ataliiko musango abasekerera nnyo: 
18_22_20_Ng'ayogera nti Mazima abo abaatugolokokerako bamaliddwawo, N'abo abafisseewo omuliro gubookezza. 
18_22_21_Yiga nno obeere n'emirembe: Bw'otyo bw'onoobanga n'ebirungi. 
18_22_22_Nkwegayiridde, kkiriza amateeka eri akamwa ke, Era tereka ebigambo bye mu mutima gwo. 
18_22_23_Bw'onookomangawo eri Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna, onoozimbibwanga; Bw'onoggyangawo obutali butuukirivu okuba ewala n'eweema zo. 
18_22_24_N'oteeka ebibyo eby'obugagga mu nfuufu, Ne zaabu eya Ofiri mu mayinja ag'omu bugga; 
18_22_25_Kale Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna ye anaabanga obugagga bwo, Era anaabanga ffeeza ya muwendo mungi gy'oli. 
18_22_26_Kubanga lw'onoosanyukiranga Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna, Era onooyimusanga amaaso go eri Katonda. 
18_22_27_Onoesabanga okusaba kwo eri ye, naye anaakuwuliranga; Era onoosasulanga obweyamobwo. 
18_22_28_Era onoolagiranga ekigambo ne kinywera gy'oli; N'omusana gunaayakiranga amakubo go. 
18_22_29_Bwe bakusuula, onooyogeranga nti Waliwo okuyimusibwa; Era anaalokolanga eyeetoowaza. 
18_22_30_Anaawonyanga n'oyo aba taliiko musango: Weewaawo, anaawonyezebwanga olw'obulongoofu bw'engalo zo. 
18_23_1_Awo Yobu n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_23_2_Ne leero okwemulugunya kwange Okukubibwa kwange kusinga okusinda kwange obuzito. 
18_23_3_Singa mmanyi gye nnyinza okumulabira, Singa nnyinza okutuuka n'awali entebe ye! 
18_23_4_Nandiriraanyizza ensonga yange mu maaso ge, Ne njijuza akauiwa kange ensonga. 
18_23_5_Nandimanye ebigambo bye yandinzizeemu, Ne ntegeera bye yandiratlambye. 
18_23_6_Yandinnyombesezza olw'obukulu bw'obuyinza bwe? Nedda, naye yandinzisizzaako omwoyo. 
18_23_7_Eyo ab'amazima bandiyinzizza okuwoza naye; Bwe nnandiwonyezebbwa bwe ntyo ennaku zonna eri omulamuzi wange. 
18_23_8_Laba, atambula mu maaso, naye ye nga taliiyo; Ne ntambula ennyuma, naye ne ssiyinza kumulaba: 
18_23_9_Ku mukono ogwa kkono, bw'akola omulimu, naye ne ssiyinza kumulaba: Yeekweka ku mukono ogwa ddyo n'okulaba ne ssiyinza kumulaba: 
18_23_10_Naye amanyi ekkubo lye nkwata; Bw'alimala okunkema, ndivaamu nga zaabu. 
18_23_11_Okugulu kwange kwasimbira ddala mu bigere bye; Ekkubo lye nalikwata ne ssikyama. 
18_23_12_Siddanga nnyuma okuva mu kiragiro eky'emimwa gye; Natereka ebigambo eby'akamwa ke okusinga emmere yange ennwanira. 
18_23_13_Naye ye alowooza bumu, era ani ayinza okumukyusa? Era emmeeme ye kye yeegomba ekyo ky'akola. 
18_23_14_Kubanga atuukiriza ekyo ekyanteekerwawo: N'ebingi ebiri bwe bityo biri naye. 
18_23_15_Kyenva neeraliikirira ye okubaawo; Bwe ndowooza mmutya. 
18_23_16_Kubanga Katonda azirisiza omutima gwange. Era Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna anteganyizza: 
18_23_17_Kubanga saazikirizibwa okusooka ekizikiza, So teyabikka ku kizikiza ekikutte eri amaaso gange. 
18_24_1_Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna kiki ekimulobera okutereka ebiro? N'abo abamumanyi kiki ekibalobera okulaba ennaku ze? 
18_24_2_Wabaawo abajjulula obubonero bw'ensalo; Banyaga embuzi lwa maanyi ne baziriisa. 
18_24_3_Bagoba endogoyi ey'abatalina kitaabwe, Batwala ente ya nnamwandu okuba omusingo. 
18_24_4_Bakyamya abeetaaga mu kkubo: Abaavu ab'omu nsi beekweka wamu. 
18_24_5_Laba, ng'entulege mu ddungu Bafuluma eri omulimu gwabwe nga banoonyeza ddala eby'okulya; Ensiko ebawa emmere ya baana baabwe. 
18_24_6_Basala emaiere ey'ensolo zaabwe mu ttale; Era banoga ezabbibu ez'omubi. 
18_24_7_Basula ne bakeesa obudde nga tebaliiko kye bambadde, So tebaliiko kye beebikka empowo nga zifuuwa. 
18_24_8_Batoba n'oluwandaggirize olw'oku nsozi, Era bavumbagira olwazi ngal babuliddwa we beggama. 
18_24_9_Wabaawo abakwakula abatalina kitaabwe okubaggya ku mabeere, Ne baggya omusingo ku mwavu: 
18_24_10_N'okutambula ne batambula bwereere nga tebalina kye bambadde, Era enjaia ng'ebalumye beetikka ebinywa; 
18_24_11_Bakamulira amafuta mu bisenge by'abasajja abo; Balinya amasogolero gaabwe ne balumwa ennyonta. 
18_24_12_Abantu basinda nga bali mu kibuga ekirimu abantu abangi, Emmeeme y'abo abafumitiddwa n'ekaaba: Naye Katonda takibala okuba obusirusiru. 
18_24_13_Abo bali ku muwendo gw'abo abajeemera omusana; Tebamanyi makubo gaagwo, So tebabeerera mu mpenda zaagwo. 
18_24_14_Omussi agolokokera wamu n'omusana, atta omwavu ne yeetaaga; Era ekiro aba ng'omubbi. 
18_24_15_Era n'eriiso ly'omwenzi liriadirira ekizikiza, Ng'ayogera nti Tewali liiso erinandaba: Ne yeefuula amaaso ge. 
18_24_16_Mu kizikiza mwe basimira ennyumba: Beggalira emisana; Tebamanyi musana. 
18_24_17_Kubanga obw'enkya buli ng'ekisiikirize eky'okufa eri abo bonna; Kubanga bamanyi ebitiisa eby'ekisiikirize eky'okufa. 
18_24_18_Aba wa mbiro ng'amazzi; Omugabo gwabwe gukolimiddwa ku nsi: Tekyukira awali ekkubo ery'ensuku z'emizabbibu. 
18_24_19_Ekyeya n'ebbugumu bimalawo amazzi agava mu muzira: N'amagombe bwe gatyo gamalawo abo abayonoona. 
18_24_20_Olubuto lunaamwerabiranga; envunyu eneemulyanga ng'ewoomeddwa; Tajjukirwenga nate: Kale obutali butuukirivu bunaamenyekanga ng'omuti. 
18_24_21_Alya omugumba atazaala; So takola nnamwandu bulungi. 
18_24_22_Era awalula n'ab'amaanyi olw'obuyinza bwe: Ayimuka, so tewali muntu asuubira okuba omulamu. 
18_24_23_Bagulumizibwa; ne wayitawo ebbanga ttono nga bagenze; Weewaawo, bakkakkanyizibwa, baggibwa mu kkubo ng'abalala bonna, Era basalibwa ng'emitwe gy'ebirimba by'eŋŋaano. 
18_24_25_Era oba nga si bwe kiri kaakano, ani anannumiriza aga ndi mulimba, Naafuula okwogera kwange obutabaako kye kugasa? 
18_25_1_Awo Birudaadi Omusuki n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_25_2_Okufuga n'entiisa biri naye; Aleeta emirembe mu bifo bye ebigulumivu. 
18_25_3_Eggye lye liriko gye likoma? Era ani ataviirwayo omusana gwe? 
18_25_4_Kale omuntu ayinza atya okuba n'obutuukirivu eri Katonda? Oba ayinza atya okuba omulongoofu oyo azaalibwa omukazi? 
18_25_5_Laba, n'omwezi tegulina kumasamasa, N'emmunyeenye si nnongoofu mu maaso ge: 
18_25_6_Okusinga ennyo omuntu, envunyu! N'omwana w'omuntu, olusiriŋŋanyi! 
18_26_1_Awo Yobu n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_26_2_Atalina buyinza ng'omubedde so! Omukono ogutalina maanyi ag'ogulokodde so! 
18_26_3_Atalina magezi ag’omuweeredde so, N'oyatula bingi nnyo eby'okutegeera obulungi! 
18_26_4_Ani gw'obuulidde ebigambo? N'omwoyo gwani oguwdde mu ggwe? 
18_26_5_Abaafa bakankana wansi w'amazzi n'ababeera omwo. 
18_26_6_Amagombe gali bwereere mu maaso ge, N'okuzikirira tekulina kye kwebikka. 
18_26_7_Abamba obukiika obwa kkono mu bbanga ejjereere, Era awanika ensi awatali kintu. 
18_26_8_Asiba amazzi mu bire bye ebiziyivu; Ekire ne kitayulika wansi we. 
18_26_9_Aziba obwenyi bw'entebe ye, N'agyaliirako ekire kye. 
18_26_10_Yassaawo embibi ku maaso g'amazzi, Okutuusa omusana n'ekizikiza we bikoma. 
18_26_11_Empagi ez'eggulu zikankana ne zeewuunya olw'okunenya kwe. 
18_26_12_Afuukuula ennyanja olw'obuyinza bwe, Era afumitira ddala Lakabu olw'okutegeera kwe. 
18_26_13_Eggulu liyonjebwa olw'omwoyo gwe; Omukono gwe gwafuuiita omusota oguwulukuka. 
18_26_14_Laba, gano ge mabbali gokka ag'amakubo ge: N'akagambo ke tumuwulirako nga katono! Naye okubwatuka okw'obuyinza bwe ani ayinza okukutegeera? 
18_27_1_Awo Yobu n'aleeta nate olugero lwe n’ayogera nti 
18_27_2_Nga Katonda bw'ali omulamu alidde ensonga yange; Era Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna, eyeeraliikiriza emmeeme yange 
18_27_4_Mazima emimwa gyange tegyogere butali butuukirivu, So n'olulimi lwange terwatule bulimba. 
18_27_5_Katonda akiddize eri nze okubawa obutuukirivu: Okutuusa lwe ndifa ssiryeggyako obugolokofu bwange. 
18_27_6_Obutuukirivu bwange mbunyweza so ssiibutenga: Omutima gwange tegunnenyenga nga nkyali mulamu. 
18_27_7_Omulabe wange abe ng'omubi. N'oyo angolokokerako abe ng'atali mutuukirivu. 
18_27_8_Kubanga essuubi ly'atamanyi Katonda kye ki, newakubadde nga yeefunira amagoba, Katonda bw'aggyawo obulamu bwe? 
18_27_9_Katonda anaawuliranga okukaaba kwe, Ennaku bwe zinaamutuukangako? 
18_27_10_Anaasanyukiranga Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna, N'akaabira Katonda mu biro byonna? 
18_27_11_N'abayigiriza eby'omukono gwa Katonda; Ekiri n'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna ssiikikweke. 
18_27_12_Laba, mmwe mwenna mmwe bennyini mukirabye; Kale kiki ekyabafuulira ddala abataliiko kye mugasa? 
18_27_13_Guno gwe mugabo gw'omuntu omubi eri Katonda, N'obusika, bw'abajoozi bwe baweebwa Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna. 
18_27_14_Abaana be bwe beeyongera, beeyongerera ekitala; N'enda ye terikkuta mmere. 
18_27_15_Abanaasigalangawo ku ye banaaziikibwanga mu kufa, ne bannamwandu be tebaakungubagenga. 
18_27_16_Newakubadde ng'atuuma ffeeza ng'enfuufu, n'ategeka ebyambalo ng'ettaka; 
18_27_17_Okutegeka ayinza okubitegeka, naye omutuukirivu ye alikyambala, Era ataliiko musango ye aligabana ffeeza. 
18_27_18_Azimba ennyumba ye ng'ekiwojjolo, Era ng'ensiisira omukuumi gy'akola. 
18_27_19_Agalamira nga mugagga, naye taakungulwenga; Azibula amaaso, kale nga takyaliwo. 
18_27_20_Ebitiisa bimukwata ng'amazzi; Kibuyaga amutwala kyama kiro. 
18_27_21_Embuyaga ez'ebuvanjuba zimutwalira ddala n'agenda; Ne zimuggya mu kifo kye lwa maanyi. 
18_27_22_Kubanga Katonda alimukasuukirira n'atasaasira: Yandyagadde okudduka mu mukono gwe. 
18_27_23_Abantu balimukubira mu ngalo, Era balimusooza ave mu kifo kye. 
18_28_1_Mazima waliwo gye basimira ffeeza, N'ekifo kya zaabu gye balongoosa. 
18_28_2_Ekyuma kiggibwa mu ttaka, N'ekikomo bakisaanuusa okukiggya mu jjinja. 
18_28_3_Abantu babibira ekizikiza, Ne bakenneenya okutuuka ku nsalo ekomererayo Amayinja ag'ekizikiza ekikutte n'ag'ekisiikirize eky'okufa. 
18_28_4_Basima obunnya obuli ewala n'abantu we batuula; Beerabirwa ekigere ekiyitawo: Balengejjera wala n'abantu, bawuubibwawuubibwa eruuyi n'eruuyi. 
18_28_5_Ensi ye evaamu emmere: Era wansi evnunikibwa ng'ekivuunikibwa n'omuliro. 
18_28_6_Amayinja gaayo kifo kya safiro, Era erina enfuufu eya zaabu. 
18_28_7_Ekkubo eryo tewali nnyonyi eyigga erimanyi, So n'amaaso ga kamunyi tegalirabanga. 
18_28_8_Ensolo ezaamalala teziririnnyangamu, So n'empologoma enkambwe teriyitangamu. 
18_28_9_Agolola omukono gwe ku jjinja ery'embaalebaale; Avuunika ensozi okuviira ddala we zisibuka. 
18_28_10_Atema ensalosalo mu njazi; N'amaaso ge galaba buli kintu eky'omuwendo omungi. 
18_28_11_Asiba emigga gireme okukulukuta; N'ekigambo ekyakisibwa akireeta awalaba. 
18_28_12_Naye amagezi ganaalabikanga wa? N'ekifo eky'okutegeera we kubeera kiri ludda wa? 
18_28_13_Abantu tebamanyi muwendo gwago; So tegalabika mu nsi ey'abalamu. 
18_28_14_Obuziba bwogera nti Tegali mu nze: N'ennyanja eyogera nti Tegali we ndi. 
18_28_15_Tegafunika lwa zaabu, So ne ffeeza teripimibwa okugagula. 
18_28_16_Tegayinzika kwenkanyankanyizibwa ne zaabu eya Ofiri, Ne onuku ey'omuwendo omungi oba safiro. 
18_28_17_Zaabu n'endabirwamn tebiyinza kugenkana: So n'amakula aga zaabu ennungi tegaabenga buguzi bwago. 
18_28_18_Tebaayogerenga ku kolali n'amayinja ag'endabirwamu: Weewaawo, omuwendo ogw'amagezi gusinga amayinja amatwakaavu. 
18_28_19_Topazi eriva e Buwesiyopya teriigenkanenga, So tegenkanyankanyizibwenga ne zaabu ennungi. 
18_28_20_Kale amagezi gava wa? N'ekifo okutegeera we kubeera kiri ludda wa? 
18_28_21_Kubanga gakwekebwa amaaso g'abalamu bonna, Era gakisibwa ennyonyi ez'omu bbanga. 
18_28_22_Okuzikirira n'Okufa kwogera nti Twawulira ekigambo kyago n'amatu gaffe. 
18_28_23_Katonda ategeera ekkubo lyago, Era ye amanyi ekifo kyago. 
18_28_24_Kubanga atunuulira okutuuka ku nkomerero z'ensi, Era alaba ebiri wansi w'eggulu lyonna; 
18_28_25_Okukolera empewo elugera; Weewaawo, apima amazzi n'ekipima. 
18_28_26_Bwe yateekera enkuba etteeka, N'ekkubo ery'okumyansa okw'okubwatuka: 
18_28_27_Awo n'alyoka agalaba n'agabuulira; Yaganyweza, weewaawo, n'agakenneenyeza ddala. 
18_28_28_Era n'agamba abantu nti Laba, okutya Mukama okwo gg magezi; N'okuleka obubi kwe kutegeera. 
18_29_1_1 Awo Yobu n'aleeta nate olugero lwe n'ayogera nti 
18_29_2_Singa mbadde nga bwe anal mu myezi egyayita, Nga bwe naali mu nnaku Katonda ze yandabirirangamu 
18_29_7_Bwe nnafulumanga ne ŋŋenda eri omulyango mu kibuga, Bwe nnategekanga entebe yangi mu luguudo, 
18_29_8_Abalenzi baandabanga ne bee kweka, Abakadde ne tiayimukanga bayimirira 
18_29_10_Eddoboozi ery'abakulu ne lisirika, Olulimi lwabwe ne lwegatta n'ekibuno ky'akamwa kaabwe. 
18_29_11_Kubanga okutu bwe kwampuliranga ne kulyoka kunneebaza; Era eriiso bwe lyandabanga liba mujulirwa wange: 
18_29_12_Kubanga nawonyanga omwavu eyakaaba, Era n'atalina kitaawe eyabulwa ow'okumuyamba. 
18_29_13_Omukisa gwanjijira oyo gwe yansabira eyali ayagala oki zikirira: Ne nnyimbisa olw'essanyu omutima gwa nnamwandu. 
18_29_14_Nayambala obutuukirivu ne bumbikkako: Obutalya nsonga bwange ne buba ng'omunagiro n'engule. 
18_29_15_Nabanga amaaso eri omuzibe, Era nabanga ebigere eri awenyera. 
18_29_16_Nabanga kitaabwe abeetaaga: Era nakeberanga ensonga y'oyo gwe ssaamanya. 
18_29_17_Era namenyanga atali mutuukirivu oluba, Ne nsika omuyiggo ne nguggya mu mannyo ge, 
18_29_18_Kale ne njogera nti Ndifiira mu kisu kyange, Era naayongeranga ennaku zange ng'omusenyu: 
18_29_19_Emmizi gyange giranze eri amazzi, N'omusulo gubeera ku ttabi lyange ne gukeesa obudde: 
18_29_20_Ekitiibwa kyange kiggya gye ndi, N'omutego gwange guzzibbwa buggya mu mukono gwange. 
18_29_21_Nze abantu bampulirizanga ne balinda, Ne basirikira okuteesa kwange. 
18_29_22_Nga ndeese ebigambo bo ne batayogera nate; Okwogera kwange ne kubagwako. 
18_29_23_Era bannindirira nga bwe balindirira enkuba; Era bayasama nnyo akamwa kaabwe ng'abayasamira enkuba eya ttoggo. 
18_29_24_Bwe nnabasekeranga ne batakkiriza; N'omusana gw'amaaso gange tebaagusuula. 
18_29_25_Neerobozanga ekkubo lyabwe ne ntuula ng'omukulu, Ne mbeera nga kabaka mu ggye, Ng'omuntu akubagiza abakungubaga. 
18_30_1_Naye kaakano be nsinga obukulu bansekerera, Bakitaabwe nabanyooma okubateeka wamu n'embwa ez'ekisibo kyange. 
18_30_2_Weewaawo, amaanyi ag'emikono gyabwe gandingasizza ki? Abantu abaweddemu obuvubuka, 
18_30_3_Bakoozimbye olw'okwetaaga n'enjala; Bameketa ettaka ekkalu mu kizikiza eky'okuzika n'okwonooneka. 
18_30_4_Banoga enkunga awali ebisaka; N'enkolo ez'omwoloola ye mmere yaabwe. 
18_30_5_Bagobebwa wakati mu bantu; Babalangira nga bwe balangira omubbi. 
18_30_6_Kibagwanira okubeera mu njatika ez'omu biwonvu, Mu bunnya obw'omu ttaka n'obw'omu njazi. 
18_30_7_Balinira mu bisaka, Wansi w'emyennyango we bakuijnaanira. 
18_30_8_Baana ba basirusiru, weewaawo, baana ba basajja abatalina linnya; Baakubibwa emiggo ne bagobebwa mu nsi. 
18_30_9_Kale kaakano nze nfuuse oluyimba lwabwe, Weewaawo, adi kigambo kya buwemu gye bali. 
18_30_10_Bantamwa, banneesamba, Tebaleka kumpandira malusu mu maaso. 
18_30_11_Kubanga asumuludde omugwa gwe n'ambonyabonya, Era basudde olukoba olugoba mu maaso gange. 
18_30_12_Ku mukono gwange ogwa ddyo kugolokokera abalalulalu; Basindiikiriza ebigere byange, Era: batuuma ku nze amakubo gaabwe ag'okuzikirira. 
18_30_13_Boonoona ekkubo lyange, Bongera ku nnaku ze ndabye, Abantu ababulwa aw'okubayamba. 
18_30_14_Bajja nga bayita mu kituli ekiwagule ekigazi: Wakati mu matongo bangwako. 
18_30_15_Ebitiisa bikyuse okungwako, Bayigganya ekitiibwa kyange ng'empewo; N'omukisa gwange guweddewa ng'ekire. 
18_30_16_Era kaakano emmeeme yange efukiddwa munda yange; Ennaku ez'okubonyaabonyezebwamu zinkutte. 
18_30_17_Ekiro amagumba gange gafumitibwa mu nze, N'obubalagaze obunnuma tebuwummula. 
18_30_18_Olw'amaanyi amangi ag'endwadde yange ekyambalo kyange kyonoonese: Ensibira ddala ng'ekitogi ky'ekizibawo kyange. 
18_30_19_Ansudde mu bitosi, Era nfuuse ng'enfuufu n'evvu. 
18_30_20_Nkukaabira so tonziramu: Nayimirira, n'ontunuulira. 
18_30_21_Okyuse okuba omukambwe gye ndi: Olw'amaanyi ag'omukoao gwo onjigganya. 
18_30_22_Onsitulira awali empewo n'ozinneebagazaako; Era onsaanuusizza mu kibuyaga, 
18_30_23_Kubanga mmanyi ag'olintuusa mu kufa, N'eri enapumba eyateekerwawo abalamu bonna. 
18_30_24_Mazima taagololere mukono gwe ku kifuavu ky'ebyagwa; Newakubadde nga bibeera mu kuzikirira kwe, omuntu ayinza okulira olw'ebyo. 
18_30_25_Saamukaabira amaziga oyo eyali mu naaku? Emmeeme yange teyanakuwalira oyo eyeetaaga? 
18_30_26_Bwe nnasuubira ebiruagi, ebibi ne biryoka bijja; Era bwe nnaliadirira omusana, ekizikiza ne kijja. 
18_30_27_Ebyenda byange byesera ne bitawummula: Ennaku ez'okubonyaabonyezebwamu zintuuseeko. 
18_30_28_Ntambula nga mpuubaala awatali njuba: Nnyimirira mu kkuŋŋaaniro ne nkuba enduulu bannyambe. 
18_30_29_Ndi muganda w'ebibe, Ne bamaaya ndi munnaabwe. 
18_30_30_Eddiba ery'omubiri gwange liddugadde, linsasambukako, N'amagumba gange gookeddwa n'ebbugumu. 
18_30_31_Ennanga yange kyevudde ekyuka okuwuubaala, N'omulere gwange gufuuse ddoboozi ly'abo abakaaba amaziga. 
18_31_1_Nalagaana endagaano n’amaaso gange; Kale nandiyinzizza ntya okutunuulira omuwala? 
18_31_2_Kubanga omugabo gwa Katonda oguva waggulu kye kiki, N'obusika obw'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna obuva engulu? 
18_31_3_Si buyinike eri atali mutuukirivu, N'okulaba ennaku eri abakola eby'obujeemu? 
18_31_4_Talaba makubo gange, N'abala ebigere byange byonna? 
18_31_5_Oba nga nali ntambudde n'obutaliimu, Oba nga ekigere kyange kyanguye okukuusakuusa 
18_31_7_Oba nga ekigere kyange kyali kikyamye mu kkubo, N'omutima gwange oba nga gwali gugoberedde amaaso gange, Era oba nga ebbala lyonna lyali lyegasse n'engalo zange: 
18_31_8_Kale nze nsige, omulala alye; Weewaawo, emmere ey'omu nnimiro yange esimbulibwe. 
18_31_9_Omutima gwange oba nga gwali gusendeddwa eri omukazi, Ne nteegera ku mulyango gwa munnange: 
18_31_10_Kale mukazi wange aseere omulala, Era abalala bakutame ku ye. 
18_31_11_Kubanga ekyo kyandibadde kya kiwe; Weewaawo, kyandibadde kibi ekigwana abalamuzi okukibonereza: 
18_31_12_Kubanga muliro ogwokya ne guzikiriza, Era ogwagala okusimbula emmere yange yonna. 
18_31_13_Oba nga nali nnyoomye ensonga ey'omuddu wange oba omuzaana wange, Bwe bampawaabira: 
18_31_14_Kale ndikola ntya, Katonda bw'aligolokoka? Era bw'alinjijira, ndimuddamu ntya? 
18_31_15_Eyankola nze mu lubuto si ye yamukola ye? Eyatubumba mu lubuto fembi si omu? 
18_31_16_Oba nga nali nnyimye abaavu kye beegomba, Oba nali mazizzaawo amaaso ga nnamwandu; 
18_31_17_Oba nali ndidde akamere kange nzekka; So atalina kitaawe taliddeeko. 
18_31_18_(Nedda, okuva mu buto bwange yakulira wamu nange nga kitaawe, Ne nnamwandu n'abanga mulezi we okuva mu lubuto lwa mmange;) 
18_31_19_Oba nga nali ndabye n'omu ng'afa olw'okubulwa ebyambalo, Oba eyeetaaga nga talina kye yeebikka: 
18_31_20_Ekiwato kye oba nga tekyanneebaza, Era oba nga tabugumye na byoya bya ndiga zange; 
18_31_21_Oba nga nali nnyimusizza omukono gwange eri atalina kitaawe, Kubanga nalaba anannyamba mu mulyango: 
18_31_22_Kale ekibegabega kyange kive ku nkwakwa, N'omukono gwange gukutuke okuva ku ggumba. 
18_31_23_Kubanga bbuyinike obuva eri Katonda bwabanga ntiisa gye ndi, Era olw'obukulu bwe ne ssibaako kye nnyinza kukola. 
18_31_24_Oba nga nali nfudde zaabu okuba essuubi lyange, Era oba nga nali nnambye zaabu ennungi nti Ggwe bwesige bwange; 
18_31_25_Oba nga nali nsanyuse kubanga obugagga bwange bwali bungi, Era kubanga omukono gwange gwali gufunye bingi; 
18_31_26_Oba nga nali ntunuulidde enjuba, Oba omwezi nga gutambulira mu kumasamasa; 
18_31_27_Omutima gwange ne gusendebwa kyama, Akamwa kange ne kanywegera omukono gwange: 
18_31_28_Era n'ekyo kyandibadde kibi ekigwana abalamuzi okukibonereza: Kubanga nandirimbye Katonda ali waggulu. 
18_31_29_Oba nga nali nsanyukidde oyo eyankyawa ng'azikiridde, Oba nali neeyimusizza obubi bwe bwamulaba; 
18_31_30_(Weewaawo, saaganya kamwa kange kwonoona Nga nsaba obulamu bwe nga nkolima;) 
18_31_31_Abasajja ab'omu weema yange oba nga tebaayogera nti Ani ayinza okulaba omuntu atakkuse nnyama ye? 
18_31_32_Omugenyi teyasulanga mu luguudo; Naye n'aggulirangawo enzigi zange omutambuze; 
18_31_33_Oba nga nali mbisse ku kusobya kwange nga Adamu, Nga nkisa obutali butuukirivu bwange mu kifuba kyange; 
18_31_34_Kubanga nali ntidde ekibiina ekinene, N'okunyoomebwa ebika ne ku nkanga, N'okusirika ne nsirika ne ssiva mu mulyango. 
18_31_35_Singa wabaddewo anampulira! (Laba, kano ke kabonero kange Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna anziremu;) Era mba kuba n'ekyo omulabe wange ky'ampawaabidde ky'awandiise! 
18_31_36_Mazima nandikisitulidde ku kibegabega kyange; Nandikyesibye nga kiremba. 
18_31_37_Nandimubuulidde ebigere byange bwe byenkana omuwendo; Nandimusemberedde ng'omukungu. 
18_31_38_Ensi yange bw'enempawaabira, N'ebibibi byayo ne bikaabira wamu amaziga; 
18_31_39_Oba nga nali ndidde ebibala byamu awatali ffeeza, Oba nali nfiisizza bannyini yo: 
18_31_40_Omwennyango gudde mu kifo ky'eŋŋaano. Ne ssere mu kifo kya sayiri. Ebigambo bya Yobu biwedde. 
18_32_1_Awo abasajja abo abasatu ne baleka okuddamu Yobu, kubanga yaii mutuukiriyu mu maasoge ye. 
18_32_2_Awo obusungu bwa Eriku, mutabani wa Balakeri Omubuzi, ow'omu kika kya Laamu ne bulyoka bubuubuuka eri Yobu, kubanga yeeyita mntuukirivu so si Katonda. 
18_32_3_Era obusungu bwe ne bubuubuuka n'eri mikwano gye bonsatule kubanga tebaalaba kya kuddamu, naye ne basalira Yobu okumusinga. 
18_32_4_Era Eriku yali alindiridde okwogera ne Yobu, kubanga waaliwo abaamusinga obukulu. 
18_32_5_Awo Eriku bwe yalaba nga mu kamwa k'abasajja abo abasatu temuli kya kuddamu, obusungu bwe ne bubuubuuka. 
18_32_6_Awo Eriku mutabani wa Balakeri Omubuzi n'addamu n'ayogera nti Nze ndi muto, nammwe muli bakadde nnyo; Kyennavudde nzibiikiriza ne ssaŋŋanga kubalaga kye ndowooza. 
18_32_7_Njogedde nti Ennaku ze zandyogedde, Olufulube lw'emyaka lwandiyigirizza amagezi. 
18_32_8_Naye waliwo omwoyo mu bantu, N'omukka gw'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna gubawa okutegeera. 
18_32_9_Abakulu si be bagezi, So n'abakadde si be bategeera emisango. 
18_32_10_Kyenvudde njogera nti Mumpulire; Era nange naalaga kye ndowooza. 
18_32_11_Laba, nnindiridde ebigambo byammwe, Mpulirizza ensonga zammwe, Nga munoonya bye muba mwogera. 
18_32_12_Weewaawo, nteze okutu eri mmwe, Era, laba, nga tewali asinze Yobu, Newakubadde azzeemu ebigambo bye ku mmwe. 
18_32_13_Mwekuume muleme okwogera nti Tulabye amagezi; Mpozzi Katonda ayinza okumuwangula, si bantu: 
18_32_14_Kubanga ebigambo bye tabyolekezza nze; So ssiimuddemu na kwogera kwammwe. 
18_32_15_Basamaaliridde, tebakyayanukula: Tebalina kigambo kya kwogera. 
18_32_16_Nange naalindirira, kubanga teboogera, Kubanga bayimirira buyimirizi nga tebakyayanukula? 
18_32_17_Era nange naayanukula ebyange, Era nange naalaga kye ndowooza. 
18_32_18_Kubanga njijudde ebigambo; Omwoyo gwange oguli mu nze gumpaliriza. 
18_32_19_Laba, olubuto lwange luliŋŋanga omwenge ogutaliiko we gufulumira; Ng'amaliba amaggya lwagala okwabika. 
18_32_20_Naayogera ndyoke mpeereweere; Naayasama emimwa gyange ne nziramu. 
18_32_21_Nkwegayiridde, nneme okusosola mu bantu eri omuntu yenna; So ssiiwe muntu yenna mannya ganyumiikiriza. 
18_32_22_Kubanga simanyi kuwa mannya ganyumiikiriza; Omutonzi wange yandinziyeewo mangu. 
18_33_1_Naye, Yobu, nkwegayiridde, wulira okwogera kwange, Era tega okutu kwo eri ebigambo byange byonna. 
18_33_2_Laba nno, njasamye akamwa kange, Olulimi lwange lwogedde mu kamwa kange. 
18_33_3_Ebigambo byange binaayatula obugolokofu bw'omutima gwange; N'emimwa gyange bye gimanyi bye ginaayogera awatali bukuusa. 
18_33_4_Omwoyo gwa Katonda gwe gwankola, N'omukka gw'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna gwe gumpa obulamu. 
18_33_5_Oba, oyinza, nziraamu: Liraanya ebigambo byo mu maaso gange, oyimirire wakati. 
18_33_6_Laba, ndi awali Katonda era nga ggwe bw'oli: Era nange nabumbibwa okuva mu ttaka. 
18_33_7_Laba, entiisa yange teekukange, So n'okunyigiriza kwange tekuukuzitoowerere. 
18_33_8_Mazima oyogedde nze nga mpulira, Nange mpulidde eddoboozi ly'ebigambo byo ng'oyogera nti 
18_33_9_Ndi mulongoofu nga ssiriiko kusobya; Ssiriiko musango, so mu nze temuli butali butuukirivu: 
18_33_10_Laba, anziyako ensonga, Ampita mulabe we; 
18_33_11_Ateeka ebigere byange mu nvuba, Alabirira amakubo gange gonna. 
18_33_12_Kiki ekikuwakanya naye? Kubanga tabalirira muwendo gwa bigambo bye byonna. 
18_33_13_Kiki ekikuwakanya naye? Kubanga tabalirira muwendo gwa bigambo bye byonna. 
18_33_14_Kubanga Katonda ayogera omulundi gumu, Weewaawo, emirundi ebiri, abantu newakubadde nga tebassaayo mwoyo. 
18_33_15_Mu kirooto, mu kwolesebwa okw'omu kiro, Otulo otungi bwe tukwata abantu, Nga babongoota ku kitanda; 
18_33_16_Awo n'alyoka aggula amatu g'abantu, N'ateeka akabonero ku kuyigirizibwa kwabwe, 
18_33_17_Aggye abantu mu kuteesa kwabwe, Era akweke abantu amalala; 
18_33_18_Aziyiza emmeeme ye okukka mu bunnya, N'obulamu bwe buleme okufa n'ekitala. 
18_33_19_N'okulumwa kumukangawula ku kitanda kye, N'okulwana okutamala mu magumba ge: 
18_33_20_Obulamu bwe n'okutamwa ne butamwa emmere, N'emmeeme ye ekyokulya ekiyonjo. 
18_33_21_Omubiri gwe gumalibwawo n'okuyinzika ne gutayinzika kulabibwa; N'amagumba ge agaali gatalabika ne gakukunala. 
18_33_22_Weewaawo, emmeeme ye esemberera obunnya, N'obulamu bwe busemberera abazikiriza. 
18_33_23_Oba waliwo wamu naye malayika, Omutegeeza, omu mu lukumi, Okwolesa abantu ebibagwanira; 
18_33_24_Awo n'amukwatirwa ekisa n'ayogera nti Muwonye aleme okukka mu bunnya, Ndabve ekinunulo. 
18_33_25_Omubiri gwe guliba muggya okusinga ogw'omwana omuto; Adda mu nnaku z'obuto bwe: 
18_33_26_Asaba Katonda, era amukwatirwa ekisa; N'okulaba alaba amaaso ge n'essanyu: Era awa nate omuntu obutuukirivu bwe. 
18_33_27_Ayimbira mu maaso g'abantu n'ayogera nti Nnyonoonye ne nnyoola ekyo ekyali ekirungi, So ssiriiko kye nnagasibwa: 
18_33_28_Anunudde emmeeme yange obutakka mu bunnya. N'obulamu bwange bunaatunuuliranga omusana. 
18_33_29_Laba, ebyo byonna Katonda abikola, Emirundi ebiri, weewaawo, n'esatu eri omuntu, 
18_33_30_Okukomyawo emmeeme ye mu bunnya, Ayakirwe omusana ogw'abalamu. 
18_33_31_Weetegereze nnyo, ai Yobu, ompulire: Sirika, nange naayogera. 
18_33_32_Oba nga olina eky'okwogera nziraamu: Yogera, kubanga njagala okukufuula omutuukirivu. 
18_33_33_Oba nga si weewaawo, mpulira: Sirika, nange naakuyigiriza amagezi. 
18_34_1_Era nate Eriku n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_34_2_Muwulire ebigambo byange, mmwe abasajja ab'amagezi; Era mutege okutu gye ndi, mmwe abalina okutegeera. 
18_34_3_Kubanga okutu kukema ebigambo, Ng'amatama bwe galega ku mmere. 
18_34_4_Twerondere ekyo ekinaaba eky'ensonga: Tumanye fekka na fekka ebirungi bwe biri. 
18_34_5_Kubanga Yobu ayogedde nti Nze ndi mutuukirivu, Era nti Katonda anziyeeko ensonga yange: 
18_34_6_Newakubadde nga nnina ensonga mpitibwa mulimba; Ekiwundu kyange tekiwonyezeka, newakubadde nga. ssiriiko kusobya. 
18_34_7_Muntu ki afaanana Yobu, Anywa okunyoomebwa ng'amazzi? 
18_34_8_Atambulira awamu n'abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu, Era atambulira awamu n'abasajja ababi. 
18_34_9_Kubanga ayogedde nti Omuntu tekiriiko kye kimugasa Okusanyukira Katonda. 
18_34_10_Kale mumpulire, mmwe abasajja abalina okutegeera: Kiddire eri awali Katonda, ye okukola obubi; N'awali Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna, ye okukola ebitali bya butuukirivu. 
18_34_11_Kubanga alisasula omuntu omulimu gwe, Era alirabya buli muntu ng'amakubo ge bwe gali. 
18_34_12_Weewaawo, mazima Katonda taakolenga bubi, So n'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna taalyenga nsonga. 
18_34_13_Ani eyamuteresa ensi okugikuuma? Oba ani eyateekateeka ebintu byoana bwe byenkana? 
18_34_14_Bw'ateeka omutima gwe ku bantu, Bw'akuŋŋaanyiza gy'ali omwoyo gwe n'omukka gwe; 
18_34_15_Byonna ebirina omubiri birizikiririra wamu, Abantu ne badda mu nfuufu. 
18_34_16_Kale oba olina okutegeera, wulira kino: Wulira eddoboozi ly'ebigambo byange. 
18_34_17_Akyawa eby'ensonga oyo alifuga? Era onoosalira oyo omutuukirivu era ow'amaanyi okumusinga? 
18_34_18_Kirungi okugamba kabaka nti Ggwe oli mugwagwa? Oba abakungu nti Mmwe muli babi? 
18_34_19_Okusinga ennyo si kirungi okugamba oyo atatya maaso ga balangira, So talowooza mugagga okusinga omwavu? Kubanga bonna mulimu gwa mikono gye. 
18_34_20_Bafa mu kaseera akatono, mu, ttuntu; Abantu bakankanyizibwa ne bayitawo, N'ab'amaanyi baggibwawo awatali mukono. 
18_34_21_Kubanga amaaso ge gatunuulira amakubo ag'omuntu, Era alaba okutambula kwe kwonna. 
18_34_22_Tewali kizikiza newakubadde ekisiikirize eky'okufa, Abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu we bayinza okwekweka. 
18_34_23_Kubanga teyeetaaga kweyongera kulowooza omuntu, Atuuke mu maaso ga Katonda okusalirwa omusango. 
18_34_24_Amenyamenya abasajja ab'amaanyi mu ngeri etenoonyezeka, Era assaawo abalala mu kifo kyabwe. 
18_34_25_Kyava alabirira emirimu gyabwe; Era abavuunika kiro n'okuzikirizibwa ne bazikirizibwa. 
18_34_26_Abakuba ng'ababi Mu maaso g'abalala aweeru; 
18_34_27_Kubanga bakyama obutamugoberera, So tebayagala kussaayo mwoyo eri amakubo ge gonna: 
18_34_28_N'okutuusa ne batuusa gy'ali okukaaba kw'omwavu, N'awulira okukaaba kw'abo ababonyaabonyezebwa. 
18_34_29_Ye bw'awa okutereera, kale ani ayinza okusala omusango okusinga? Era ye bw'akweka amaaso ge, kale ani ayinza okumutunuulira? Oba nga ggwanga oba nga muntu, kyonna bwe bumu: 
18_34_30_Omusajja atamanyi Katonda alemenga okufuga, Walemenga okubaawo anaateega abantu. 
18_34_31_Kubanga waliwo eyali agambye Katonda, nti Mbonerezebbwa, sikyasobya nate: 
18_34_32_Kye ssiraba kinjigirize: Oba nga nkoze obujeemu ssikyabukola nate? 
18_34_33_Empeera ye eriba nga ggwe bw'oyagala n'okugaana n'ogigaana? Kubanga ggwe oba weeroboza so si nze: Kale yogera ekyo ky'omanyi. 
18_34_34_Abantu abalina okutegeera baliipamba nti Weewaawo, buli muntu ow'amagezi ampulira, anaŋŋamba nti 
18_34_35_Yobu ayogera nga talina kumanya, N'ebigambo bye tebiriimu magezi, 
18_34_36_Yobu singa akemeddwa okutuusa enkomerero, Kubanga ayannkula ng'abantu ababi. 
18_34_37_Kubanga ayongera obujeemu ku kwonoona kwe, Akuba mu ngalo ze ng'ayima wakati mu ffe, Era ayongerayongera ebigambo bye okuwakanya Katonda. 
18_35_1_Era nate Eriku n'addamu n'ayogera nti 
18_35_2_Olowooza ekigambo ekyo ye nsonga yo, Oba oyogera nti Obutuukirivu bwange businga obwa Katonda? 
18_35_3_N'okwogera n'oyogera nti Kirikugasa ki? Era nti Ndifuna magoba ki ge ndiba nago okukira ge nnandifunye singa nayonoona? 
18_35_4_Nze nnaakuddamu, Ne banno wamu naawe. 
18_35_5_Tunuulira eggulu olabe; Era ttunuulira eggulu erikusinga obugulumivu. 
18_35_6_Oba nga oyonoonye omukola ki? Okusobya kwo bwe kweyongerayongera, omukola ki? 
18_35_7_Bw'oba n'obutuukirivu, omuwaki? Oba aweebwa ki mu mukono gwo? 
18_35_8_Obubi bwo buyinza okulumya omuntu nga ggwe bw'oli; N'obutuukirivu bwo buyinza okugasa omwana w'omuntu. 
18_35_9_Olw'okujoogebwa okungi ennyo bakaaba; Bakuba enduulu bayambibwe olw'omukono ogw'ab'amaanyi. 
18_35_10_Naye tewali ayogera nti Katonda Omutonzi wange ali ludda wa, Awa ennyimba ekiro; 
18_35_11_Atuyigiriza okusinga ensolo ez'oku nsi, Era atuwa amagezi okukira ennyonyi ez'omu bbanga? 
18_35_12_Bakaabira eyo, naye tewali addamu, Olw'amalala ag'abantu ababi. 
18_35_13_Mazima Katonda taawulire bigambo ebitaliimu, So n'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna tasseeyo mwoyo. 
18_35_14_Kale aliwulira atya bw'oyogera nti tomulaba, Ensonga eri mu maaso ge, naawe omulindirira? 
18_35_15_Naye kaakano kubanga tabonerezza na busungu bwe, So tassaayo nnyo omwoyo eri esukuti; 
18_35_16_Yobu kyava ayasama akamwa ke okwogera ebigambo ebitaliimu; Ayongerayongera ebigambo awatali kumanya. 
18_36_1_Era nate Eriku ne yeeyongera n'ayogera nti 
18_36_2_Sooka ondeke, nange naakunnyonnyola; Kubanga nkyaliko kye njagala okwogera ku lwa Katonda 
18_36_3_Naggya wala okumanya kwange, Era naamussaako obutuukirivu Omutonzi wange. 
18_36_4_Kubatrga mazima ebigambo byange si bya bulimba: Omuntu eyatuukirira mu kumanya ali naawe. 
18_36_5_Laba, Katonda wa maanyi, so tanyooma mnntu yenna: Wa maanyi mu buyinza obw'okutegeera. 
18_36_6_Takuuma bulamu bw'ababi: Naye abawa ababonyaabonyezebwa ebyabwe. 
18_36_7_Taggya maaso ge ku batuukirivu Naye awali bakabaka ku ntebe Gy'abateeka emirembe gyonna ne bagulumizibwa. 
18_36_8_Era bwe baba nga basibiddwa n'amasamba, Era nga bakwasibwa n'emigwa egy'okubonyabonyezebwa 
18_36_10_Era aggulawo okutu kwabwe okuwulira okuyigirizibwa, N'abalagira bakomewo okuva mu butali butuukirivu. 
18_36_11_Bwe bawulira ne bamuweereza, Banaamalanga ennaku zaabwe nga balabye omukisa, N'emyaka gyabwe nga basanyuka. 
18_36_12_Naye bwe batawulira banaazikiriranga n'ekitala, Era banaafanga awatali kumanya. 
18_36_13_Naye abo abatamanyi Katonda mu mutima batereka obusungu: Tebakuba nduulu bayambwe bw'abasiba. 
18_36_14_Bafa nga bakyali bato, N'obulamu bwabwe buzikirira mu abo abatali balongoofu. 
18_36_15_Awonya oyo abonyabonyezebwa olw'okubonyabonyezebwa kwe, Era aggula okutu kwabwe bwe bajoogebwa. 
18_36_16_Weewaawo, yandikuggye mu kuiaba ennaku N'akuyingiza mu kifo ekigazi awatali kunyigirizibwa; N'ekyo ekiteekebwa ku mmeeza yo kyandijjudde obugimu. 
18_36_17_Naye ggwe ojjudde omusango gw'omubi: Omusango n'okusala eby'ensonga bikukwata. 
18_36_18_Kubanga waliwo obusungu, weekuume oleme okutwalibwa n'obugagga So enguzi tekukyamyanga kubanga nnene. 
18_36_19_Obugagga bwo bunaamala oleme okulaba ennaku, Oba obuyinza bwonna obw'amaanyi go? 
18_36_20_Teweegomba kiro, Amawanga bwe gazikirizibwa mu kifo kyago. 
18_36_21_Weekuume oleme okutunuulira obutali butuukirivu: Kubanga weerobozezza obwo okusinga okubonyabonyezebwa. 
18_36_22_Laba, Katonda akola ebigulumivu mu buyinza bwe: Ani omuyigiriza afaanana ye? 
18_36_23_Ani eyali amulagidde ekkubo lye? Oba ani ayinza okwogera nti Okoze ebitali bya butuukirivu? 
18_36_24_Jjukira okugulumizanga omulimu gwe, Abantu gwe baayimbangako. 
18_36_25_Abantu bonna baagutunuulira; Abantu baagulengera nga bayima wala. 
18_36_26_Laba, Katonda mukulu, naffe tetumumanyi; Omuwendo gw'emyaka gye tegunoonyezeka. 
18_36_27_Kubanga awalula waggulu amatondo g'amazzi, Agatonnya enkuba eva mu mukka gwe: 
18_36_28_Eggulu ge liyiwa Ne ligatonnya ku bantu mangi nnyo. 
18_36_29_Weewaawo, waliwo ayinza okutegeera ebire bwe bibambibwa, Okubwatuuka okw'omu weema ye? 
18_36_30_Laba, yeeyaliirira omusana gwe okwetooloola; Era asaanikira ku nnyanja wansi. 
18_36_31_Kubanga olw'ebyo asala emisango gy'amawanga; Agaba emmere nnyingi nnyo. 
18_36_32_Abikka engalo ze n'enjota; Era aziragira zikube sabbaawa. 
18_36_33_Eddoboozi lyazo linnyonnyola ebigambo bye, Era libuulira n'ente kibuyaga ayambuka. 
18_37_1_Era n'ekyo kikankanya omutima gwange, Ne gunyeenyezebwa okuva mu kifo kyagwo. 
18_37_2_Muwulire okuwuuma kw'eddoboozi lye, N'okududuma okuva mu kamwa ke. 
18_37_3_Akusindika wansi w'eggulu lyoN'okumyansa kwe kubuna enkomerero z'ensi. 
18_37_4_Oluvannyuma lwakwo eddoboozi ne liwuluguma; Abwaluka n'eddoboozi ery'obukulu bwe: So tabiziyiza eddoboozi lye bwe liwulirwa. 
18_37_5_Katonda abwatuka kitalo n'eddoboozilye; Akola ebikulu bye tutayinza kutegeera. 
18_37_6_Kubanga agamba omuzira nti Gwa ku nsi; Era bw'atyo bw'agamba oluwandaggirize, N'empandaggirize ez'enkuba ye ey'amaanyi. 
18_37_7_Assa akabonero ku mukono gwa buli muntu; Abantu bonna be yatonda balyoke bakimanye. 
18_37_8_Awo ensolo ne zigenda mu bwekwekero, Ne zibeera mu mpuku zaazo, 
18_37_9_Mu kisenge eky'obukiika obwa ddyo mwe muva omuyaga: Empewo ne ziva mu bukiika obwa kkono. 
18_37_10_Omukka gwa Katonda gwe guleeta omuzira: N'amazzi bwe genkana obugazi ne gakwata. 
18_37_11_Weewaawo, ajjuza ekire ekiziyivu amazzi; Abamba ekire eky'enjota ze: 
18_37_12_Era okuluŋŋamya kwe kwe kukikyusakyusa eruuyi n'eruuyi, Bikolenga byonna by'abiragira Kungulu ku nsi yonna okubeereka: 
18_37_13_Oba nga kya kubuulirira, oba nga kya nsi ye, Oba nga kya kusaasira, kyava akireeta. 
18_37_14_Ekyo kiwulire, ggwe Yobu: Yimirira buyimirizi, olowooze ebikolwa bya Katonda eby'ekitalo. 
18_37_15_Omanyi Katonda bw'abikuutira, N'ayasa enjota ez'omu kire kye? 
18_37_16_Omanyi okutereezebwa kw'ebire, Ebikolwa eby'ekitalo eby'oyo eyatuukirira mu kumanya? 
18_37_17_Ebyambalo byo bwe bibuguma, Ensi ng'esirise olw'embuyaga ez'obukiika obwa ddyo? 
18_37_18_Oyinza okubambira eggulu awamu naye, Amaanyi gaalyo genkana enda birwamu ensaanuuse? 
18_37_19_Tuyigirize bye tuba tumugamba; Kubanga tetuyinza kuliraanya kwogera kwaffe olw'ekizikiza. 
18_37_20_Anaabuulirwa nga njagala okwogera? Oba omuntu yandyagadde okumirwa? 
18_37_21_Era kaakano abantu tebalaba musana ogumasamasa mu ggulu: Naye embuyaga ne ziyita ne ziryerula. 
18_37_22_Mu bukiika obwa kkono mwe muva okuyakaayakana okuli nga zaabu: Katonda ayambadde ekitiibwa ekikanga. 
18_37_23_Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna tetuyinza kumunoonya; asinga bonna obuyinza: Era mu musango ne mu butuukirivu obusukkirivu talibonyabonya. 
18_37_24_Abantu kyebava bamutya: abassaako mwoyo abo bonna abalina emitima egy'amagezi. 
18_38_1_Awo Mukama n'alyoka addamu Yobu ng'ayima mu mbuyaga ez'akazimu n'ayogera nti 
18_38_2_Ani ono aleeta akizikiza mu kuteesa N'ebigambo ebitaliimu kumanya? 
18_38_3_Kale nno weesibe ekimyu ng'omusajja; Kubanga naakubuuza, naawe onziremu. 
18_38_4_Wali oli ludda wa bwe nnassaawo emisingi gy'ensi? Yatula oba olina okutegeera. 
18_38_5_Ani eyateesa ebigera byayo, oba nga omanyi? Oba ani eyagireegera omugwa? 
18_38_6_Emisingi gyayo gyasibirwa ku ki? Oba ani eyassaawo ejjinja lyayo ekkulu ery'oku nsonda 
18_38_8_Oba ani eyasiba ennyanja n'enzigi, Bwe yawaguza ng'ekiva mu lubuto 
18_38_10_Bwe nnagiragira etteeka lyange, Ne nzisaawo ebisiba n'enzigi, 
18_38_11_Ne njogera nti Wano w'okomanga so tosukkangawo; Era wano amayengo go ag'amalala we gaziyirizibwanga? 
18_38_12_Wali olagidde enkya ennaku zo kasookedde zibaawo, Wali omanyisizza emmambya ekifo kyayo; 
18_38_13_Ekwate enkomerero z'ensi, Era ababi bakunkumulwe okugivaamu? 
18_38_14_Ewaanyisibwa ng'ebbumba wansi w'akabonero; N'ebintu byonna bikukunuka ng'ekyambalo: 
18_38_15_N'ababi omusana gwabwe gubaggibwako, N'omukono ogugulumizibwa gumenyeka. 
18_38_16_Wali oyingidde mu nsulo ez'ennyanja? Oba wali otambudde mu madubi ag'obuziba? 
18_38_17_Enzigi ez'okufa zaali zikubikkuliddwa? Oba wali olabye enzigi ez'ekisiikirize eky'okufa? 
18_38_18_Wali otegedde ensi bw'eri engazi? Yatula, oba nga obimanyi byonna. 
18_38_19_Ekkubo liri ludda wa eridda mu nnyumba ey'omusana, N'ekizikiza ekifo kyakyo kiri ludda wa; 
18_38_20_Ekkubo liri ludda wa eridda mu nnyumba ey'omusana, N'ekizikiza ekifo kyakyo kiri ludda wa; 
18_38_21_Omanyi, kubanga wali ozaaliddwa mu biro ebyo; N'omuwendo gw'ennaku zo mungi! 
18_38_22_Wali oyingidde mu mawanika g'amazzi amakwafu, Oba wali olabye amawanika ag'omuzira, 
18_38_23_Ge nnaterekera ebiro eby'okulabiramu ennaku, Olunaku olw'olutalo n'obulwa? 
18_38_24_Mu kkubo ki omusana mwe gwawukanira, Oba embuyaga ez'ebuvanjuba mwe zisaasaanira ku nsi? 
18_38_25_Ani eyasalira amataba olusalosalo, Oba ekkubo ery'enjota ez'okubwatuka; 
18_38_26_Okutonnyesa enkuba ku nsi okutali muntu; Mu ddungu omutali muntu n'omu; 
18_38_27_Okukkusa ettaka eryazika eryalekebwa; N'okulosa omuddo omuto? 
18_38_28_Enkuba erina kitaawe waayo? Oba ani eyazaala amatondo ag'omusulo? 
18_38_29_Mu lubuto lw'ani omwava amazzi amakwafu? N'omusulo omukwafu omweru ogw'omu ggulu ani eyaguzaala? 
18_38_30_Amazzi gakwekebwa nga gakwekeddwa n'amayinja. Ne kungulu ku buziba nga kukutte. 
18_38_31_Oyinza okusiba ekikuukuulu kya Kakaaga, Oba okusumulula olukoba Iw'Entungalugoye? 
18_38_32_Oyinza okufulumya emmunyeenye mu ntuuko zaazo? Oba oyinza okulunnamya Nabaliyo n'abaana be? 
18_38_33_Omanyi ebiragiro eby'omu ggulu? Oyinza okunyweza okufuga kwalyo mu nsi? 
18_38_34_Oyinza okuyimusa eddoboozi lyo eri ebire, Amazzi amangi ennyo gakubikkeko? 
18_38_35_Oyinza okuweereza enjota zitambule, Ne zikugamba nti Ne tuutuno? 
18_38_36_Ani eyateeka amagezi mu bitundu eby'omunda? Oba ani eyawa emmeeme okutegeera? 
18_38_37_Ani ayinza okubala ebire olw'amagezi? Oba ani ayinza okuttulula amaliba ag'omu ggulu, 
18_38_38_Enfuufu bw'ekulukuta n'eba effunfugu, Amafunfugu ne geegattira ddala? 
18_38_39_Onooyiggira empologoma enkazi omuyiggo? Oba onokkusa okwegomba kw'abaana b'empologoma, 
18_38_40_Bwe zisula mu mpuku zaazo, Ne zibeera mu bisaka okuteega? 
18_38_41_Ani alabira namuŋŋoona emmere ye, Abaana be bwe bakaabira Katonda, Ne batambulatambula olw'okubulwa ebyokulya? 
18_39_1_Omanyi ebiro embulabuzi ez'oku njazi mwe zizaalira? Oba oyinza okutegeera empewo bwe ziba n'amawako? 
18_39_2_Oyinza okubala emyezi gye zimala? Oba omanyi ebiro mwe zizaalira? 
18_39_3_Zikutama, zizaala abaana baazo, Zeggyamu obubalagaze bwazo. 
18_39_4_Abaana baazo bagejja, bakulira ebweru ku ttale; Bafuluma ne batadda. 
18_39_5_Ani eyata entulege okuba ey'eddembe? Oba ani eyasumulula enkoba ez'entulege? 
18_39_6_Nafuula ensiko okuba ennyumba yaayo, N'ensi ey'omunnyo okuba ekifo w'ebeera. 
18_39_7_Enyooma oluyoogaano olw’omu kibuga, So tewulira kulekaana kwa mugobi. 
18_39_8_Ensozi bwe zenkana obugazi lye ddundiro lyayo, Era enoonya buli kintu ekibisi. 
18_39_9_Embogo enekkirizanga okukuweereza? Oba eneebeeranga awali ekisibo kyo? 
18_39_10_Oyinza okusiba embogo n'olukobalwayo ku kibibi? Oba eneerimanga ebiwonvu ng'ekuvaako ennyuma? 
18_39_11_Onoogyesiganga kubanga amaanyi gaayo mangi? Oba onoogirekeranga omulimu gwo? 
18_39_12_Onoogyesiganga okukomyawo ewuwo ensigo zo, N'okukuŋŋaanyanga eŋŋaano ey'omu gguuliro lyo? 
18_39_13_Ekiwaawaatiro kya maaya kisanyuka; Naye ebiwaawaatiro bye n'ebyoya birina ekisa? 
18_39_14_Kubanga aleka amagi ge ku ttaka, N'egabugumya mu musenyu, 
18_39_15_Ne yeerabira ng'ekigere kiyinza okugabetenta, Oba ensolo ey'omu nsiko eyinza okugalinnyirira. 
18_39_16_Akakanyalira abaana be ng'abatali babe: Newakubadde ng'ateganira bwereere talina kutya; 
18_39_17_Kubanga Katonda yamuggyako amagezi, So tamuwadde kutegeera. 
18_39_18_Bw'aba nga yeegulumizizza, Anyooma embalaasi n'oyo agyebagala. 
18_39_19_Wawa embalaasi amaanyi gaayo? Wayambaza obulago bwayo n'olugiŋŋirima olukankana? 
18_39_20_Wagibuusa ng'enzige? Ekitiibwa ky'okufugula kwayo kya ntiisa. 
18_39_21_Etakulira mu kiwonvu, n'esanyukira amaanyi gaayo: Efuluma okusisinkana n'abasajja abakutte ebyokulwanyisa. 
18_39_22_Esekerera okutya so tekeŋŋentererwa; so tedda nnyuma awali ekitala. 
18_39_23_Omufuko guwulungutira ku yo, Effumu erimasamasa n'akasaale. 
18_39_24_Emira ettaka n'obusungu n'ekiruyi; So tekkiriza nga lye ddoboozi ery'ekkondeere. 
18_39_25_Ekkondeere buli lwe livuga, n'eyogera nti Bw'otyo N'ekonga olutalo nga lukyali wala,, Okubwatuka kw'abaami n'okuleekaana. 
18_39_26_Magga atumbiira na magezi go, N'abamba abiwaawaatiro bye eri obukiika obwa ddyo? 
18_39_27_Empungu erinnya na kiragiro kyo, N'ekola ekisu kyayo waggulu? 
18_39_28_Ebeera ku jjinja, n'ennyumba yaayo eri okwo, Ku linnyo ly'ejjinja n'ekifo eky'amaanyi. 
18_39_29_Erengera omuyiggo ng'eyima okwo; Amaaso gaayo gagulaba nga guli wala. 
18_39_30_Era n'abaana baayo banuuna omusaayi: Era awaba emirambo, gy'ebeera eyo. 
18_40_1_Era nate Mukama n'addamu Yobu n'ayogera nti 
18_40_2_Aleeta ensonga ezitaliimu anaayombesa Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna? Awakanya Katonda akiwoze. 
18_40_3_Awo Yobu n'alyoka addamu Mukama n'ayogera nti 
18_40_4_Laba, siriimu ka buntu; n'akuddamu ntya? Nteeka omukono gwange ku kamwa kange. 
18_40_5_Njogedde omulundi gumu, so ssiddemu; Weewaawo, emirundi ebiri, naye sseeyongere nate. 
18_40_6_Awo Mukama n'addamu Yobu ng'ayima mu mbuyaga ez'akazimu n'ayogera nti 
18_40_7_Weesibe nno ekimyu ng'omusajja: Naakubuuza, naawe onziremu. 
18_40_8_N'okujjulula onojjulula omusango gwe nsala? Ggwe ononsalira nze omusango obeere n'obutuukirivu? 
18_40_9_Oba olina omukono nga Katonda? Era oyinza okubwatuka n'eddoboozi erifaanana erirye? 
18_40_10_Weeyonje nno n'okuwooma n'okutiibwa; Yambala ekitiibwa n'obukulu. 
18_40_11_Fuka obusungu bwo okusukkiridde: Otunuulire buli muntu ow'amalala omujeeze. 
18_40_12_Tunuulira buli muntu ow'amalala omukkakkanye; Olinnyirire ababi we bayimirira. 
18_40_13_Bakise wamu mu nfuufu; Siba amaaso gaabwe mu kifo ekikisibwa. 
18_40_14_Kale mange ne ndyoka nzikiriza ku ggwe Ng'omukono gwo gwe guyinza okukulokola. 
18_40_15_Laba nno envubu gye nnatondera awamu naawe; Erya omuddo ng'ente. 
18_40_16_Laba nno amaanyi gaayo gali mu kiwato kyayo, N'amawaggali gaayo gali mu binywa eby'omu lubuto lwayo. 
18_40_17_Yeesagga omukira ng'omuvule: Ebinywa eby'omu kiwato kyayo byegatta wamu. 
18_40_18_Amagumba gaayo galinijanga enseke ez'ebikomo; Amagulu gaayo galiŋŋanga ebyuma ebisiba. 
18_40_19_Ye ekulira amakubo ga Katonda: Ye yekka eyagitonda ayinza okugisembereza ekitala kye. 
18_40_20_Mazima ensozi zigizaalira ebyokulya; Ensolo zonna ez'omu nsiko we zizannyira. 
18_40_21_Egalamira wansi w'ebisiikirize by'emiti, Mu bwekwekero obw'omu ndago ne mu bitosi. 
18_40_22_Ebisiikirize by'emiti bigibikkako; Emyerebu egy'omu bugga gigyetooloola. 
18_40_23_Laba, omugga bwe gwanjaala, tekankana: Eguma omwoyo Yoludaani newakubadde nga gujjula ne gutuuka ku kamwa kaayo. 
18_40_24_Waliwo anaagikwata bw'eba ng'etunula, Oba anaawummula ennyindo zaayo n'ekyambika? 
18_41_1_Oyinza okuggyangamu egoonya n'eddobo? Oba okunyigirizanga olulimi lwayo n'omugwa? 
18_41_2_Oyinza okuyingizanga omugwa mu nnyindo zaayo? Oba okuwummulanga oluba lwayo n'eddobo? 
18_41_3_Eneekwegayiriranga ebigambo bingi? Oba eneekugambanga ebigambo ebigonvu? 
18_41_4_Eneeragaananga endagaano naawe, Ogitwalenga okuba omuddu emirembe gyonna? 
18_41_5_Onoozannyanga nayo nga bw'ozannya n'ennyonyi? Oba onoogisibiranga abawala bo? 
18_41_6_Ebibiina eby'abavubi binaagifuulanga obuguzi? Banaagigabaniranga mu basuubuzi? 
18_41_7_Oyinza okujjuzanga eddiba lyayo ebyuma ebiriko amalobo, Oba omutwe gwayo emiwunda egiswaga ebyennyanja? 
18_41_8_Giteekeko omukono gwo; Jjukira olutalo olemenga okweyongera okukola bw'otyo. 
18_41_9_Laba, essuubi lyayo lya bwereere: Omuntu taakeŋŋentererwenga bw'agiraba obulabi? 
18_41_10_Tewali mukambwe bw'atyo n'okwaŋŋanga n'ayaŋŋanga okugisaggula: Kale aluwa oyo ayinza okuyimirira mu maaso gange? 
18_41_11_Ani eyasooka okumpa, nze mmusasule? Byonna ebiri wansi w'eggulu lyonna byange. 
18_41_12_Siisirike olw'amagulu gaayo, Newakubadde amaanyi gaayo amangi, newakubadde okugattibwa kwayo okulungi. 
18_41_13_Ani ayinza okugyambula ekyambalo kyayo eky'okungulu? Ani anaatuuka munda w'enkoba zaayo ebbiri? 
18_41_14_Ani ayinza okuggulawo enzigi ez'arimaaso gaayo? Entiisa yeetoolodde amannyo gaayo. 
18_41_15_Amagamba gaayo ag'amaanyi ge malala gaayo, Nga gasibaganye ng'akabonero bwe kanyweza. 
18_41_16_Erimu lyegatta n'ery'okubiri bwe lityo N'okuyinza empewo ne zitayinza kuyita wakati waago. 
18_41_17_Geegasse gokka na gokka; Gakwatagana ne gatayinzika kwawulibwa. 
18_41_18_Okwasimula kwayo kumyansaamu omusana, N'amaaso gaayo gafaanana ebikowe eby'enkya. 
18_41_19_Mu kamwa kaayo muva emimuli egyaka, N'ensasi ez'omuliro zibuuka okuvaamu. 
18_41_20_Mu nnyindo zaayo muva omukka, Ng'ogw'entamu etokota n'ogw'ebitoogo ebiggya. 
18_41_21_Omukka gwayo gwasa amanda, Era omuliro guva mu kamwa kaayo. 
18_41_22_Mu nsingo yaayo mubeera amaanyi, N'entiisa ezinira mu maaso gaayo. 
18_41_23_Emiwula gy'ennyama yaayo gyegasse: Ginywerera ku yo: tegiyinza kusagaasagana. 
18_41_24_Omutima gwayo guguma ng'ejjinja; Weewaawo, guguma ng'olubengo. 
18_41_25_Bw'eyimuka ab'amaanyi batya: Olw'okwekanga nga baliko eddalu. 
18_41_26_Bwe bagisimbako ekitala, tekiriiko kye kiyinza kukola; Newakubadde effumu newakubadde omuwunda newakubadde akasaale akasongovu. 
18_41_27_Ebyuma ebiyita .bisasiro, N'ebikomo miti mivundu. 
18_41_28_Akasaale tekayinza kugiddusa: Amayinja agavuumuulibwa gafuuka ebiti eriyo. 
18_41_29_Endoddo ziyitibwa ng'ebiti: Esekerera okuwulukuka kw'akasaale. 
18_41_30_Ebitundu byayo ebya wansi biriŋŋanga engyo eziriko obwogi: Eteeka ng'eggaali ewuula ku bitosi. 
18_41_31_Etokosa etmyanja ng'entamu: Efaananya ennyanja amafuta. 
18_41_32_Emasamasisa ekkubo ennyuma waayo; Obuziba wandibulowoozezza okuba n'envi. 
18_41_33_Tewali ekigyenkana ku nsi, Ekolebwa obutabaamu kutya. 
18_41_34_Etunuulira buli kintu ekigulumivu: Ye kabaka w'abaana bonna ab'amalala. 
18_42_1_Awo Yobu n'addamu Mukama n'ayogera nti 
18_42_2_Mmanyi nga ggwe oyinza byo Era nga tewali kigambo kye wateesa ekiziyizika. 
18_42_3_Ani ono akisa okuteesa awatali kumanya? Kyennavudde njatula ebyo bye ssaategedde, Ebigambo eby'ekitalo ebyannemye bye ssaamanye. 
18_42_4_Nkwegayiridde, wulira, nange ka njogere; Naakubuuza, naawe onziremu. 
18_42_5_Nali nkuwuliddeko n'okuwulira kw'okutu; Naye kaakano eriiso lyange likulaba, 
18_42_6_Kyenvudde neetamwa ne nneenenya Mu nfuufu n'evvu. 
18_42_7_Awo olwatuuka Mukama bwe yamala okugamba Yobu ebigambo ebyo, Mukama n'agamba Erifaazi Omutemani nti Obusungu bwange bukubuubuukidde ggwe ne banno bombi: kubanga temunjogeddeeko ekigambo ekirina ensonga, ng'omuddu wange Yobu bw'ayogedde. 
18_42_8_Kale nno mwetwalire ente ennume musanvu n'endiga ennume musanvu, mugende eri omuddu wange Yobu, muweeyo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa; era omuddu wange Yobu anaabasabira; kubanga oyo gwe nnakkiriza nneme okubakola ng'obusirusiru bwammwe bwe buli; kubanga temunjogeddeko kigambo ekirina ensonga ng'omuddu wange Yobu bw'ayogedde: 
18_42_9_Awo Erifaazi Omutemani ne Birudaadi Omusuki ne Zofali Omunaamasi ne bagenda ne bakola nga Mukama bw'abalagidde: kale Mukama n'akkiriza Yobu. 
18_42_10_Awo Mukama n'akyusa obusibe bwa Yobu, bwe yasabira mikwano gye: Mukama n'awa Yobu okusinga emirundi ebiri ebyo bye yalina olubereberye. 
18_42_11_Awo baganda be bonna ne bajja gy'ali ne bannyina bonna n'abo bonna be yamanyagananga nabo olubereberye, ne baliira emmere wamu naye mu nnyumba ye: ne bamukaabira ne bamukubagiza olw'obubi bwonna Mukama bwe yamuleetako: era buli muntu n'amuwa ekitundu ekya ffeeza, na buli muntu empeta eya zaabu. 
18_42_12_Awo Mukama n'awa omukisa enkomerero ya Yobu okukira entandikwa ye: n'aba n'endiga kakumi mu enkumi nnya, n'eŋŋamira kakaaga, n'emigogo gy'ente lukumi n'endogoyi enkazi lukumi. 
18_42_13_Era yalina abaana ab'obulenzi musanvu n'ab'obuwala basatu. 
18_42_14_N'ow'olubereberye n’amutuuma erinnya Yemima; n'ow'okubiri erinnya lye Keeziya; n'ow'okusatu erinnya lye Kerenukappuki. 
18_42_15_Awo mu nsi yonna ne watalabika abakazi abalungi okwenkana abawala ba Yobu: kitaabwe n'abawa obusika mu baganda baabwe. 
18_42_16_Awo oluvannyuma lw'ebyo Yobu n'awangaala emyaka kikumi mu ana, n'alaba batabani be n'abaana ba batabani be, bannakasatwe. 
18_42_17_Awo Yobu n'afa nga mukadde ng'awezezza ennaku nnyingi. 
19_1_1_Alina omukisa omuntu atatambulira mu kuteesa kw'ababi, Newakubadde okuyimirira mu kkubo ly'abo abalina ebibi, Newakubadde okutuula ku ntebe y'abanyooma. 
19_1_2_Naye amateeka ga Mukama ge gamusanyusa; Era mu mateeka ge mw'alowooleza emisana n'ekiro. 
19_1_3_Naye alifaanana ng'omuti ogwasimbibwa okumpi n'ensulo ez'amazzi, Ogubala emmere yaagwo mu ntuuko zaayo, Era amalagala gaagwo tegawotoka; Na buli ky'akola, akieweelako, omukisa. 
19_1_4_Ababi si bwe batyo; Naye bali ng'ebisusunku, empewo bye zifuumuula. 
19_1_5_Ababi kyebaliva balema okuyimirira mu musango, Newakubadde abalina ebibi mu kkuŋŋaaniro ly'abatuukirivu. 
19_1_6_Kubanga Mukama amanyi ekkubo ly'abatuukirivu: Naye ekkubo ly'ababi liribula. 
19_2_1_Kiki ekibagugumusizza ab'amawanga, N'abantu kiki ekibalowoozesezza ekitaliimu? 
19_2_2_Bakabaka ab'ensi beeteeseteese, N'abafuga bateesezza ebigambo wamu, Ku Mukama ne ku Masiya we nga boogera nti 
19_2_3_Katumenyemenye enjegere zaabwe, Tusuule wala emigwa gyabwe. 
19_2_4_Atuula mu ggulu aliseka, Mukama alibaduulira. 
19_2_5_Mu biro biri alibagamba mu busungu bwe, Alibateganya mu kiruyi kye ekingi: 
19_2_6_Naye naateeka kabaka wange Ku lusozi lwange olutukuvu Sayuuni. 
19_2_7_Ekiragiro ndikibuulira: Mukama yantlamba nti Ggwe oli mwana wange; Leero nkuzadde. 
19_2_8_Onsabe nze, nange ndikuwa amawanga okubeera obusika bwo, N'ensonda ez'ensi okubeera amatwale go. 
19_2_9_Olibimenya n'omuggo ogw'ekyuma; Olibyasayasa ng'entamu ey'omubumbi. 
19_2_10_Kale kaakano mubeere n'amagezi, mmwe bakabaka: Muyige, mmwe. abasala omusango gw'ensi. 
19_2_11_Muweereze Mukama n'okutya, Era musanyuke n'okukankana. 
19_2_12_Munywegere omwana, aleme okusunguwala, nammwe ne mubula mu kkubo, Kubanga obusungu bwe bulibuubuuka mangu. Balina omukisa bonna abamweyuna Ye. 
19_4_1_Mukama, abalabe bange nga beeyongedde! Abagolokoka okunnumba bangi. 
19_4_2_Bangi aboogera ku mmeeme yange Nti Talina kuyambwa mu Katonda. (Seera) 
19_4_3_Naye ggwe, Mukama, oli ngabo enkuuma; Ekitiibwa kyange, era ayimiriza omutwe gwange. 
19_4_4_N'eddoboozi lyange, nkoowoola Mukama, Naye anziramu okuva ku lusozi lwe olutukuvu. (Seera) 
19_4_5_Naagalamira ne nneebaka; Ne nzuukuka; kubanga Mukama ye ankuuma. 
19_4_6_Siritya bukumi bwa bantu, Abaneetooloola okunnumba. 
19_4_7_Golokoka, ai Mukama: ondokole, ai Katonda wange: Kubanga wakuba abalabe: bange bonna ku ttama, Wamenya amannyo g'ababi. 
19_4_8_Obulokozi buli eri Mukama: Omukisa gwo gubeere ku bantu bo. (Seera) 
19_5_1_Wulira ebigambo byange, ai Mukama, Osseeyo omwoyo eri ebirowoozo byange. 
19_5_2_Wulira eddoboozi ly'okukaaba kwange, Kabaka wange, era Katonda wange: Kubanga nkusaba ggwe. 
19_5_3_Ai Mukama, buli akya onoo_wuliraaga eddoboozi lyange; Buli nkya naalongoosanga okusaba kwaage gy'oli, ne ntunula. 
19_5_4_Kubanga toli Katonda asanyusibwa obubi: Ebitasaana tebiituulenga gy'oli. 
19_5_5_Abeenyumiriza tebaayimirirenga mu maaso go: Okyawa bonna abakola, ebitali bituukirivu. 
19_5_6_Olizikiriza aboogera. eby'obulimba: Mukama akyawa omuntu atta n'alimbalimba. 
19_5_7_Naye ku lwange mu bungi bw'ekisa kyo naayingiranga mu nnyumba yo: Mu kukutya naasinzanga nga njolekera yeekaalu yo entukuvu. 
19_5_8_Ontwale, ai Mukama, mu butuukirivu bwo olw'abalabe bange; Ongololere ekkubo lyo mu maaso gange. 
19_5_9_Kubanga tewali bwesigwa mu mimwa gyabwe: Omwoyo gwabwe bubi busa: Omumiro gwabwe ye ntaana eyasaamiridde; Beegonza n'olulimi lwabwe. 
19_5_10_Obasseeko omusango, ai Katonda; Bagwe olw'okuteesa kwabwe bo: Obasindike mu kwonoona kwabwe okungi; Kubanga bakujeemedde ggwe. 
19_5_11_Naye bonna abeesiga ggwe basanyukenga, Bayoogaanenga mu ssanyu bulijjo, kubanga ggwe obakuuma: Era abaagala erinnya lyo basanyukirenga mu ggwe. 
19_5_12_Kubanga oliwa omutuukirivu omukisa; Ai Mukama, olimwetoolooza ekisa ng'engabo. 
19_6_1_Ai Mukama; tonnenya mu busungu bwo, So tombuulirira mu kiruyi kyo ekibuubuuka. 
19_6_2_Onsaasire, ai Mukama; kubanga mpotokedde ddala: Ai Mukama, omponye; kubanga amagumba gange geeraliikiridde. 
19_6_3_Era n'emmeeme yange yeeraliikiridde nnyo: Naawe, ai Mukama, olituusa wa? 
19_6_4_Komawo, ai Mukama, ondokole emmeeme yange: Omponye olw'ekisa kyo: 
19_6_5_Kubanga tewali akujuukirira mu kufa: Ani alikwebaliza mu magombe? 
19_6_6_Okusinda kwange kunkooyezza; Buli kiro nkulukusa ekiriri kyange; Ekitanda kyange nkitobya n'amaziga. 
19_6_7_Eriiso lyange likulukuse olw'okunakuwala; Likaddiye olw'abalabe bange bonna. 
19_6_8_Muveewo we ndi, mwenna abakola ebitali bituukirivu; Kubanga Mukama awulidde eddoboozi ly'okukaaba kwange. 
19_6_9_Mukama awulidde okwegayirira kwange; Mukama anakkirizanga okusaba kwange. 
19_6_10_Abalabe bange bonna baliswazibwa, balyeraliikirira nnyo: Balidda ennyuma, baliswazibwa mangu. 
19_7_1_Ai Mukama, Katonda wange, neesiga ggwe: Ondokole eri abo bonna abangoba, omponye: 
19_7_2_Aleme okutaagula emmeeme yange ng'empologoma, Okugitaagulataagula, nga tewali anamponya. 
19_7_3_Ai Mukama, Katonda wange, oba nga nakola bwe ntyo; Oba nga obutali butuukirivu buli mu mikono gyange 
19_7_5_Ankyawa ayigganye emmeeme yange, agituukeko: Anninnyirire obulamu btvange wansi mu ttaka, Asse ekitiibwa kyange mu nfuufu. (Seera) 
19_7_6_Golokoka, ai Mukama, mu busungu bwo, Weesimbe ku bukambwe obw'abalabe bange: Era onzuukukire; walagira omusango. 
19_7_7_Era ekkuŋŋaaniro ery'amawanga likwetooloole: Okomewo waggulu okubafuga 
19_7_8_Mukama aweereza omusango amawanga: Osale omusango gwange, ai Mukama, olw'obutuukiriw bwange n'amazima gange agali mu nze. 
19_7_9_Singa obubi obw'ababi: buweddewo, naye abatuukirivu ggwe obanyweze: Kubanga Katonda ow'obutuukirivu ageza emitima n'emmeeme. 
19_7_10_Engabo yange eri ne Katonda, Alokola abalina omutima ogw'amazima. 
19_7_11_Katonda ye musazi w'emisango omutuukirivu, Era ye Katonda alina obusungu buli lunaku. 
19_7_12_Omuntu bw'atakyuka, aliwagala ekitala kye; Aleeze omutego gwe, aguteeseteese. 
19_7_13_Era amuteekeddeteekedde ebintu ebitta; Emisaale gye agiteekako omuliro. 
19_7_14_Laba, alina olubuto olw'obubi; Weewaawo, eggwako lye lye ttima, era azadde obulimba. 
19_7_15_Yakola obunnya, yabusima, Era agudde mu lusalosalo lwe pakola. 
19_7_16_Ettima lye liriddira ku mutwe gwe ye, N'ekyejo kye kirituuka ku bwezinge bwe. 
19_7_17_Neebazanga Mukama olw'obutuukirivu bwe: Naayimbanga okutendereza erinnya lya Mukama ali waggulu ennyo. 
19_8_1_Ai Mukama, Mukama waffe, Erinnya lyo nga ddungi nnyo mu nsi zonna! Ggwe eyateeka ekitiibwa kyo ku ggulu. 
19_8_2_Mu kamwa k'abawere n'abayonka wanyweza amaanyi, Olw'abalabe bo, Olyoke osirise omulabe n'oyo awalana eggwanga. 
19_8_3_Bwe ndowooza eggulu lyo, omulimu gw'engalo zo, Omwezi n'emmunyeenye, bye walagira 
19_8_5_Kubanga wamukola okubulako akatono okuba nga Katonda, Era omussaako engule ey'ekitiibwa n'ettendo. 
19_8_6_Wamufuza emirimu egy'emikono Wateeka ebintu byonaa wansi w'ebigere bye: 
19_8_7_Endiga zonna n'ente, Era n'ensolo ez'omu nsiko 
19_8_9_Ai Mukama, Mukama waffe, Erinnya lyo nga ddungi nnyo mu nsi zonna! 
19_9_1_Neebazanga Mukama n'omutima gwange gwonna; Naayolesanga ebikolwa byo eby'ekitalo byonna. 
19_9_2_Naasanyukanga naajagulizanga mu ggwe: Naayimbanga okutendereza erinnya lyo, ggwe ali waggulu ennyo. 
19_9_3_Abalabe bange bwe badda ennyuBeesittala ne bazikirira mu maaso go. 
19_9_4_Kubanga ggwe. wayamba ensonga yange n'ebigambo byange; Watuula ku ntebe, ng'osala omusango ogw'ensonga. 
19_9_5_Waboggolera amawanga, wazikiriza ababi, Wasangula erinnya lyabwe emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_9_6_Abalabe baweddewo, baviibwamu emirembe egitaggwaawo; N'ebibuga bye wamenya. Era n'ekijjukizo kyabyo kizikiridde. 
19_9_7_Naye Mukama abeererawo emirembe egitaggwaawo: Ateeseteese entebe ye okusala omusango. 
19_9_8_Naye alisala omusango ogw'ensi zonna mu butuukirivu, Aliwa omusango amawanga mu mazima. 
19_9_9_Era Mukama anaabeeranga kigo ekiwanw eri abayigganyizibwa, Ekigo ekiwanvu mu biro eby'ennaku; 
19_9_10_N'abo abamanyi erinnya lyo baneesiganga ggwe; Kubanga ggwe, Mukama, tonnabaleka abakunoonya. 
19_9_11_Muyimbe okutendereza Mukama, atuula mu Sayuuni: Mubuulire ebikolwa bye mu bantu. 
19_9_12_Kubanga oyo avunaana omusaayi abajjukira: Teyeerabira kukaaba kw'abaavu. 
19_9_13_Onsaasire, ai Mukama; Laba okubonaabona kwange kwe bankola abankyaye, Ggwe annyimusa ku miryango egy'olumbe; 
19_9_14_Ndyoke njolesenga ettendo lyo lyonna: Mu miryango egy'omuwala wa Sayuuni Naasanyukiranga obulokozi bwo. 
19_9_15_Amawanga gagudde mu bunnya bwe baasima: Mu kyambika kye baatega ekigere kyabwe mwelukwatiddwa: 
19_9_16_Mukama yeetegeezezza, atuukirizza omusango: Omubi akwatibwa mu mirimu gy'emikono gye. (Kiggayoni. Seera 
19_9_17_Ababi balidda mu magombe. Ge mawanga gonna ageerabira Katonda. 
19_9_18_Kubanga abaavu tebeerabirwenga ennaku zonna, So essuubi ery'abawombeefu teriibulenga emirembe gyonna. 
19_9_19_Golokoka, ai Mukama; abantu balemenga okuwangula: Amawanga gasalirwe omusango mu maaso go. 
19_9_20_Obatiise, ai Mukama: Amawanga geetekeere nga bantu buntu. (Seera) 
19_10_1_Kiki ekikuyimirizisizza ewala, ai Mukama? Kiki ekikwekwesezza mu biro eby'ennaku? 
19_10_2_Mu malala ag'omubi omwavu ayigganyizibwa nnyo: Bakwatibwe mu nkwe ze baateesa. 
19_10_3_Kubanga omubi yeenyumiriza olw'okwegomba kw'omutima gwe, N'omukodo yeegaana, era anyooma Mukama. 
19_10_4_Omubi mu malala ag'amaaso ge ayogera nti Talivunaana. Ebirowoozo bye byonna nti Tewali Katonda. 
19_10_5_Amakubo ge makakanyavu ennaku zonna; Emisango gyo giri waggulu nnyo gy'atayinza kugirabira: Abalabe be bonna abasooza. 
19_10_6_Ayogera mu mutima gwe nti Sirisagaasagana: Okutuusa emirembe gyonna siriraba nnaku. 
19_10_7_Akamwa ke kajjudde okukolima n'okulimba n'okujooga: Wansi w'olulimi lwe waliwo ettima n'obutali butuukirivu: 
19_10_8_Atuula mu mateegero ag'ebyalo: Mu bwekweko atta abatalina misango: Amaaso ge agatunuuliza ku munafu mu kyama. 
19_10_9_Yeekweka mu tteegero ng'empologoma mu mpuku yaayo: Yeekisa okukwata omwavu: Akwatira ddala omwavu, ng'amuwalulira mu kyambika kye. 
19_10_10_Akutama, akootakoota, Abasajja be ab'amaanyi ne basuula abanafu. 
19_10_11_Ayogera mu mutima gwe nti Katonda yeerabidde: Akweka amaaso ge; tagenda kukiraba. 
19_10_12_Golokoka, ai Mukama; ai Katonda oyimuse omukono gwo: Teweerabira mwavu. 
19_10_13_Lwaki omubi okunyoomanga Katonda, N'okwogera mu mutima gwe nti Tolivunaana? 
19_10_14_Walaba; kubanga otunuulira ettima n'obukyayi, okussaako omukono gwo: Omunafu yeewaayo gy'oli; Wabanga omubeezi w'abo abataliiko kitaabwe. 
19_10_15_Menya omukono gw'omubi; Omuntu omubi onoonyeze ddala obubi bwe okutuusa obutabusangamu. 
19_10_16_Mukama ye kabaka emirembe n'emirembe: Amawanga gazikiridde mu nsi ye. 
19_10_17_Mukama, wawulira abawombeefu kye bayagala: Onooteekateekanga omutima gwabwe, onoowulizanga okutu kwo: 
19_10_18_Okusalira omusango abataliiko kitaabwe n'abajoogebwa. Omuntu; ye w'omu nsi, aleke okubeera n'entiisa. Ya mukulu w'abayimbi. Zabbuli ya Dawudi. 
19_11_1_Mukama gwe nneesiga: Mugamba mutya emmeeme yange nti Ddukira ku lusozi lwammwe ng'ennyoni? 
19_11_2_Kubanga, laba, ababi bategal omutego. Bateekateeka akasaale ku lugoye, Balasize mu nzikiza abalina omutima ogw'amazima. 
19_11_3_Oba nga emisingi girizikirizibwa, Kiki omutuukirivu ky'ayinza okukola? 
19_11_4_Mukama ali mu yeekaalu ye entukuvu, Mukama, entebe ye eri mu ggulu; Amaaso ge galaba abaana b'abantu, ebikowe bye bibakema. 
19_11_5_Mukama akema abatuukirivu: Naye omubi n'oyo ayagala eby'amaanyi emmeeme ye ebakyawa. 
19_11_6_Ku babi anaatonnyesanga ebyambika; Omuliro n'ekibiriiti n'empewo ezookya binaabeeranga omugabo ogw'ekikompe kyabwe. 
19_11_7_Kubanga Mukama mutuukirivu; ayagala eby'obutuukirivu: Abalina omwoyo ogw'amazima baliraba amaaso ge. 
19_12_1_Yamba Mukama; kubanga atya Katonda aggwaawo; Kubanga abakkiriza bakendeera mu baana b'abantu. 
19_12_2_Boogera ebitaliimu buli muntu ne munne: Boogera n'emimwa eginyumiriza n'emitima ebiri: 
19_12_3_Mukama alimalawo emimwa gyonna eginyumiriza, N'olulimi olwogera ebikulu: 
19_12_4_Aboogedde nti N'olulimi lwaffe tuliwangula; Emimwa gyaffe gye gyaffe: atufuga yeani? 
19_12_5_Olw'okunyagibwa kw'abaavu, olw'okusinda kw'abanafu, Kaakano naagolokoka, Mukama bw'ayogera; Naamuteeka mu mirembe gwe basooza. 
19_12_6_Ebigambo bya Mukama bye bigambo ebirongoofu; Nga ffeeza egezebwa mu kyoto ku nsi, Erongoosebwa emirundi omusanvu. 
19_12_7_Onoobakuumanga, ai Mukama, Onoobawonyanga mu mirembe gino ennaku zonna. 
19_12_8_Ababi batambula ku njuyi zonna, Obugwagwa bwe bugulumizibwanga mu baana b'abantu. 
19_13_1_Olituusa wa, ai Mukama, okunneerabiranga emirembe gyonna? Olituusa wa okunkisanga amaaso go? 
19_13_2_Ndituusa wa okuteesanga mu mmeeme yange, Nga ndaba ennaku mu mutima gwange obudde okuziba? Alituusa wa omulabe wange okugulumizibwanga ku nze? 
19_13_3_Lowooza onziremu, ai Mukama Katonda wange: Yakira amaaso gange, nneme okwebaka okufa 
19_13_5_Naye nneesize okusaasira kwo; Omutima gwange gunaasanyukiranga obulokozi bwo: 
19_13_6_Naayimbiranga Mukama, Kiibanga aakoledde obulungi obungi. 
19_14_1_Omusirusiru ayogedde mu mutima gwe nti Siwali Katonda. Bavunze, bakoze ebikolwa eby'obugwagwa; uSiwali akola obulungi. 
19_14_2_Mukama yatunuulira ng'ayima mu ggulu abaana b'abantu, Okulaba nga waliwo abaategeera, Abaanoonya Katonda. 
19_14_3_Bonna bakyamye; boonoonese empitambi wamu; Siwali akola obulungi, newakubadde n'omu. 
19_14_4_Bonna abakola obutali butuukirivu tebalina magezi? Abalya abantu bange nga bwe balya emmere, So tebakoowoola Mukama. 
19_14_5_Eri baalina obuti bungi : Kubanga Katonda ali mu mirembe gy'abatuukirivu. 
19_14_6_Mukwasa ensonyi okuteesa kw'omwavu, Kubanga Mukama kye kiddukiro kye: 
19_14_7_Singa obulokozi bwa Isiraeri buvudde mu Sayuuni! Mukama bw'alizzaayo obusibe obw'abantu be, Yakobo n'alyoka asanyuka, Isiraeri alijaguza. 
19_15_1_Mukama, anaatuulanga mu weema yo ye ani? Anaabeeranga ku lusozi lwo olutukuvu ye ani? 
19_15_2_Oyo atambulira mu bugolokofu, era akola obutuukirivu, Era ayogera eby'amazima mu mutima gwe. 
19_15_3_Atawaayiriza n'olulimi lwe, So mukwano gwe tamukola bubi, So takkiriza kibi ku muliraanwa we. 
19_15_4_Amaaso ge ganyooma omubi; Naye abatya Mukama abassaamu ekitiibwa. Bw'alayira ne bw'afiirwa takyuka. 
19_15_5_Atawolera bintu bye magoba. So taweebwa mpeera ku atalina musango. Oyo akola ebyo taasagaasaganenga emirembe gyonna. 
19_16_1_Onkuume, ai Katonda: kubanga nkwesiga ggwe. 
19_16_2_ŋŋambye Mukama nti Ggwe oli Mukama wange: Sirina bulungi bwonna awatali ggwe. 
19_16_3_Abatukuvu abali mu nsi, Abo be basinga obulungi, be nsanyukira essanyu lyange lyonna. 
19_16_5_Okunakuwala kwabwe kunaayongerwangako abo abawaanyisa Mukama olwa katonda Omulala: Esaddaaka zaabwe ez'okunywa ez'omusaayi ssiiziwengayo. So ssiitwalenga mannya gaabwe mu mimwa gyange. 
19_16_6_Emigwa ginguddeko mu bifo ebirungi; Mazima nnina obusika obulungi. 
19_16_7_Neebazanga Mukama, aateeserezza ebigambo: Mazima, emmeeme yange enjigiriza mu biseera eby'ekiro. 
19_16_8_Mukama mmutadde mu maaso gange bulijjo. Kubanga ye ali ku mukono gwange ogwa ddyo, sirisagaasagana. 
19_16_9_Omutima gwange kyeguva gusanyuka n'ekitiibwa kyange kijaguza: Era n'omubiri gwange gunaabeeranga mu mirembe. 
19_16_10_Kubanga tolireka mmeeme yange mu magombe; So toliganya Omutukuvu wo okulaba olcuvunda. 
19_16_11_Onondaganga ekkubo ery'obulamu: Gy'oli waliwo essanyu erituukirira; Mu mukono gwo ogwa ddyo mwe muli ebisanyusa emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_17_1_Wulira ensonga ey'obutuukirivu, ai Mukama, lowooza okukaaba kwange; Tega okutu owulire okusaba kwange, okutava mu mimwa egy'obukuusa. 
19_17_2_Omusango gwange guve w'oli; Amaaso go gatunuulire obutuukirivu. 
19_17_3_Wagezaako omutima gwange; wajja gye ndi ekiro; Wankema, n'otolaba kigambo; Mmaliridde akamwa kange obutayonoonanga. 
19_17_4_Mu bikolwa by'abantu, olw'ekigambo eky'emimwa gyo Neekuumanga mu makubo ag'abantu abalina ekyejo 
19_17_5_Olugendo lwange lwanywera mu makubo go, Ebigere byange tebiseereranga. 
19_17_6_Nkukoowodde, kubanga ggwe ononziramu, ai Katonda: Ontegere okutu kwo, ompulire bye njogera. 
19_17_7_Laga ekisa kyo eky'ekitalo, ggwe alokola abakwesiga, Mu abo ababagolokokerako, n'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo. 
19_17_8_Onkuume ng'emmunye ey'eriiso, Onkise mu kisiikirize eky'ebiwawaatiro byo, 
19_17_9_Mu babi abannyaga, Mu balabe bange abaagala okunzita, abanzingiza. 
19_17_10_Babikkiddwa amasavu gaabwe: N'akamwa kaabwe boogera eby'amalala. 
19_17_11_Kaakano batuzingizizza mu bigere byaffe: Bakaliriza amaaso gaabwe okutusuula waasi. 
19_17_12_Afaanana. ng'empologoma eyaayaanira omuyiggo gwayo, Era ng'omwana gw'empologoma ogw'ekisa we guteegera. 
19_17_13_Golokoka, ai Mukama, Omuyimirire mu maaso, omumegge wansi: Omponye emmeeme yange eri omubi n'ekitala kyo; 
19_17_14_Eri abantu n'omukono gwo, ai Mukama, Eri abantu ab'ensi, abalina omugabo gwabwe mu bulamu buno, N'olubuto lwabwe olujjuza obugagga bwo: Banyiye abaana, N'ebintu byabwe ebisigalawo babirekera abaana baabwe. 
19_17_15_Nze amaaso go ndigalaba mu butuukirivu: Ndimatira bwe ndizuukuka n'ekifaananyi kyo. 
19_18_1_Nkwagala ggwe, ai Mukama, amaanyi gange. 
19_18_2_Mukama lwe lwazi lwange, era kye kigo kyange, era ye andokola; Katonda wange, olwazi lwange olunywevu, oyo gwe ŋŋenda okwesiganga; Engabo yange, n'ejjembe ery'obulokozi bwange, ekigo kyange ekigulumivu. 
19_18_3_Naakoowoolanga Mukama, asaanira okutenderezebwa: Bwe nnaalokokanga bwe ntyo mu balabe bange. 
19_18_4_Emigwa egy'okufa gyansiba, N'ebitaba eby'obutatya Katonda byantiisa. 
19_18_5_Emigwa egy'emagombe gyanneetooloola: Emitego egy'olumbe gyankwasa. 
19_18_6_Mu nnaku zange ne nkoowoola Mukama, Ne mpita Katonda wange: N'awulira eddoboozi lyange mu yeekaalu ye, Ne bye nnakaabira mu maaso ge ne bituuka mu matu ge. 
19_18_7_Ensi n'eryoka ekankana n'esagaasagana, Era n'emisingi gy'ensozi ne gikankana ne ginyeenyezebwa, Kubanga asunguwadde. 
19_18_8_Omukka ne gunyooka mu nnyindo ze, N'omuliro ne guva mu kamwa ke ne gulya: Ne gukoleeza amanda. 
19_18_9_Era n'eggulu n'alikutamya, n'akka; N'ekizikiza ekinene ne kiba wansi w'ebigere bye. 
19_18_10_Ne yeebagala kerubi n'abuuka: Era n'abuuka mangu ku biwaawaatiro eby'empewo. 
19_18_11_Ekizikiza n'akifuula . eky'okwekwekamu, eweema ye emwetoolodde; Ekizikiza eky'amazzi, ebire ebikutte eby'omu ggulu. 
19_18_12_Mu kumasamasa okuli mu maaso ge ebire bye ebikutte ne biyita, Ne waba amayinja ag'omuzira n'amanda ag'omuliro. 
19_18_13_Era Mukama n'abwatuka mu ggulu N'oyo ali waggulu ennyo n'aleeta eddoboozi lye; Ne waba amayinja ag'omuzira n'amanda ag'omuliro. 
19_18_14_N'alasa obusaale bwe n'abasaasaanya; N'alasa enjota nnyingi n'abeeraliikiriza. 
19_18_15_Ensalosalo ez'amazzi ne ziryoka zirabika, Emisingi gy'ensi. ne gyeruka, Mu kunenya kwo, ai Mukama, Mu kibuyaga ow'omukka ogw'ennyindo zo, 
19_18_16_Yatuma okuva waggulu, n'antwala; N'ampalula mu mazzi amangi. 
19_18_17_Yamponya eri mulabe wange ow'amaanyi, N'eri abo abankyawa, kubanga bansinza amaanyi nze. 
19_18_18_Banjijira ku lunaku olw'akabi kange: Naye Mukama ye yannyweza. 
19_18_19_Era n'aafulumya mu kifo ekigazi; Yamponya, kubanga yansanyukira. 
19_18_20_Mukama yampa empeera ng'obutuukirivu bwange bwe bwali; Ng'emikono gyange bwe giri emirungi, bw'ansasudde. 
19_18_21_Kubanga nakwata amakubo ga Mukama, Ne ssireka Katonda waage n'obubi. 
19_18_22_Kubanga emisango gye gyonna gyali mu maaso gange, So amateeka ge saagaggyaawe gye ndi.
