19_18_23_Era nali eyatuukirira gy'ali. Ne nneekuuma mu bubi bwange. 
19_18_24_Mukama kyavudde ansasula; ng'obutuukirivu bwange bwe buli, Emikono gyange nga bwe giri emirungi mu maaso ge. 
19_18_25_Eri ow'ekisa oneeraga ow'ekisa; Eri eyatuukirira oneeraganga eyatuukirira; 
19_18_26_Eri omulongoofu oneeraganga omulongoofu; N'eri omukakanyavu oneeraganga aziyiza. 
19_18_27_Kubanga onoolokolanga abantu abajoogebwa; Naye amaaso ag'amalala onoo gatoowazanga. 
19_18_28_Kubanga ggwe olikoleeza etta baaza yange. Mukama Katonda wange ali mulisa mu kizikiza kyange. 
19_18_29_Kubanga mu kubeerwa kwo nnumba ekibiina; Era mu kuyamba kwa Katonda wange mbuuka ekigo. 
19_18_30_Katonda, ekkubo lye lyatuukirira: Ekigambo kya Mukama kya kettebwa; Oyo ye ngabo y'abo bonna abamwesiga. 
19_18_31_Kubanga ani Katonda, wabula Mukama? Era ani olwazi, wabula Katonda waffe? 
19_18_32_Katonda ansibya amaanyi, Era atuukiriza ekkubo lyange. 
19_18_33_Afuula ebigere byange ng'eby'empeewo: Era angulumiza mu bifo byange ebya waggulu. 
19_18_34_Anjigiriza engalo zange okulwana; Emikono gyange ne gireega omutego ogw'ekikomo. 
19_18_35_Era ompadde engabo ey'obulokozi bwo: N'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gumpaniridde, N'obuwombeefu bwo bungulumizizza. 
19_18_36_Ongaziyirizza ekkubo ery'ebigere byange, N'ebisinziiro byange tebiseereranga. 
19_18_37_Ndigoberera abalabe bange, ne mbatuukako: So ssirikomawo nga tebannazikirizibwa. 
19_18_38_Ndibafumitira ddala ne batayinza kuyimuka: Baligwa waasi w'ebigere byange. 
19_18_39_Kubanga onsibye amaanyi ag'okulwana: Obafukamizza mu maaso gange abannyimukirako. 
19_18_40_Era abalabe bange obakyusizza amabega gaabwe gye ndi, Ndyoke nzikirize abankyawa. 
19_18_41_Baakoowoola, waye tewaali mulokozi: Baakoowoola Mukama, naye n'atabaddamu. 
19_18_42_Ne ndyoka mbasekulasekula ng'enfuufu etwalibwa empewo: Ne mbasuula ng'ebitosi eby'omu nguudo. 
19_18_43_Omponyezza mu kuyomba kw'abantu; Onfudde omutwe gw'amawanga; Abantu be ssaamanyanga balimpeereza. 
19_18_44_Bwe baliwulira ebigambo byange, ne balyoka baŋŋondera: Bannaggwanga balinjeemulukukira. 
19_18_45_Bannaggwanga baliggwaawo, Baliva mu bifo byabwe eby'okwekwekamu nga bakankana. 
19_18_46_Mukama mulamu; olwazi Iwange atenderezebwe; Era agulumizibwe Katonda ow'obulokozi bwange : 
19_18_47_Ye Katonda ampalanira eggwanga Era awangula amawanga ngafuge. 
19_18_48_Amponya eri abalabe bange: Weewaawo, ongulumiza ku abo abannyimukirako: Ondokola eri omuntu ow'ekyejo 
19_18_49_Kyennaavanga nkwebaza ggwe, ai Mukama, mu mawanga, Naayimbanga okutendereza erinnya lyo. 
19_18_50_Obulokozi bukulu bw'awa kabaka we; Era amukolera eby'ekisa oyo gwe yasiiga amafuta, Dawudi n'ezzadde lye, emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_19_1_Eggulu lyogera ekitiibwa kya Katonda: N'ebbanga libuulira emirimu gy'emikono gye. 
19_19_2_Omusana gugamba ebigambo omusana, N'ekiro kiraga amagezi ekiro. 
19_19_3_Siwali bigambo newakubadde olulimi; Eddoboozi lyabyo teriwulikika. 
19_19_4_Okuyigiriza kwabyo kubunye mu nsi zonna, N'ebigambo byabyo okutuuka ku nkomerero y'ensi. Abiteekeddemu enjuba eweema, 
19_19_5_Eri ng'awasa omugole ng'ava mu nju ye, Era esanyuka ng'ow'amaanyi okuyita mu lugendo lwayo. 
19_19_6_Evaayo ku nkomerero y'eggulu, Ne yeetooloola okutuuka ku nkomerero yaalyo: So tewali kintu ekikwekebwa mu kwokya kwayo. 
19_19_7_Etteeka lya Mukama lyatuukirira, erikomyawo emmeeme: Okutegeeza kwa Mukama kunywevu, okuwa abasirusiru amagezi. 
19_19_8_Okuyigiriza kwa Mukama kwabutuukirivu, okusanyusa omutima: Ekiragiro kya Mukama kirongoofu, ekyakira amaaso. 
19_19_9_Entiisa ya Mukama nnungi, ya lubeerera emirembe gyonna: Emisango gya Mukama gya mazima, gya butuukirivu ddala: 
19_19_10_Bisaanira okubiyaayaanira okusinga ezaabu, era n'ezaabu ennyingi ennungi: Biwoomerera okusinga omubisi gw'enjuki n'ebisenge byagwo. 
19_19_11_Era ebyo bye birabula omuddu wo: Mu kubyekuuma mulimu empeera ennene. 
19_19_12_Ani ayinza okukebera ebyonoono bye? Onnongoose mu bibi ebikisibwa. 
19_19_13_Era ne mu by'amalala oziyize omuddu wo; Bireme okumpangula: bwe ntyo bwe nnaabanga eyatuukirira, So omusango ogw'okwonoona okunene tegulinsinga. 
19_19_14_Ebigambo eby'omu kamwa kange n'okulowooza okw'omu mutima gwange bisiimibwe mu maaso go, Ai Mukama, olwazi lwange, era omununuzi wange. 
19_20_1_Mukama akuddemu ku lunaku olw'okunakuwala; Erinnya lya Katonda wa Yakobo likugulumizenga waggulu 
19_20_4_Akuweenga omutima gwo kye gwagala, Atuukirizenga okuteesa kwo kwonna. 
19_20_5_Tunaawangulanga mu bulokozi bwo, Ne mu linnya lya Katonda waffe runaawanikanga ebendera zaffe: Mukama atuukirizenga by'osaba byonna. 
19_20_6_Kaakano mmanyi nga Mukama alokola oyo gwe yasiiga amafuta; Alimuddamu ng'ayima mu ggulu lye ettukuvu N'obulokozi obuwonya obw'omukono gwe ogwa ddyo. 
19_20_7_Abalala beesiga amagaali, n'abalala beesiga embalaasi: Naye ffe tunaayogeranga erinnya lya Mukama Katonda waffe. 
19_20_8_Bakutamye bo ne bagwa: Naye ffe tugolokose, ne tuyimirira. 
19_20_9_Lokola, Mukama: Kabaka atuddemu bwe tukoowoola. 
19_21_1_Kabaka anaasanyukiranga amaanyi go, ai Mukama; N'obulokozi bwo ng'aaaabuja gulizanga nnyo! 
19_21_2_Omuwadde omutima gwe kye gwagala, So tomummye emimwa gye kye gisabye. (Seera) 
19_21_3_Kubanga omusisinkanye n'eby'omukisa eby'obulungi: Omuteekako ku mutwe gwe engule ey'ezaabu ennungi. 
19_21_4_Yakusaba obulamu, n'obumuwa; Era n'ennaku ennyingi ez'emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_21_5_Ekitiibwa kye kingi mu bulokozi bwo: Ekitiibwa n'obukulu obimussaako. 
19_21_6_Kubanga omuteekawo okuba omukisa omungi emirembe gyonna: Omusanyasa essanyu mu maaso go. 
19_21_7_Kubanga kabaka yeesiga Mukama, N'olw'ekisa ky'oyo ali waggulu ennyo taasagaasaganenga. 
19_21_8_Omukono gwo gulituuka ku balabe bo bonna: Omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gulituuka ku abo abakukyawa. 
19_21_9_Olibafaananya ng'ekikoomi ekyaka mu biro eby'obusungu bwo. Mukama alibamira mu kiruyi kye, N'omuliro gulibalya. 
19_21_10_Ebibala byabwe olibizikiriza ku nsi, N'ezzadde lyabwe mu baana b'abantu. 
19_21_11_Kubanga baakuteeseza obubi: Baasala olukwe, lwe bataayinza kukola. 
19_21_12_Kubanga olibazza ennyuma, Oliteekateeka engoye zo ez'omutego ku maaso gaabwe. 
19_21_13_Ogulumizibwenga, ai Mukama, mu maanyi go: Tulyoke tuyimbenga tutenderezenga obuyinza bwo. 
19_22_1_Katonda wange, Katonda wange, kiki ekikundesezza? Lwaki okubeera ewala obutanzibira, obutawulira bigambo eby'okukaaba kwange? 
19_22_2_Ai Katonda wange, nkoowoola emisana, naawe n'otoddamu; Era n'ekiro, so ssisirika. 
19_22_3_Naye ggwe oli mutukuvu, Ggwe atuula mu matendo ga Isiraeri. 
19_22_4_Bajjajja baffe baakwesiganga ggwe: Beesiganga, naawe n'obawonya. 
19_22_5_Baakukoowoolanga ggwe,ne bawonyezebwanga: Baakwesiganga ggwe, ne batakwasibwanga nsonyi. 
19_22_6_Naye nze ndi lusiriŋŋanyi, so ssiri muntu; Abasajja gwe bavuma, n'abantu gwe banyooma. 
19_22_7_Bonna abandaba bansekerera ne banduulira: Bansooza n'emimwa gyabwe, banyeenya omutwe, nga boogera nti 
19_22_8_Yeeweeyo eri Mukama; ye amulokole: Amuwonye, kubanga amusanyukira. 
19_22_9_Naye ggwe wanziya mu lubuto lwa mmange: Ggwe wanneesiza bwe nnali nga nkyali ku mabeere ga mmange. 
19_22_10_Neeyuna ggwe okuva mu kuzaalibwa kwange: Ggwe oli Katonda wange okuva mu lubuto lwa mmange. 
19_22_11_Tombeera wala; kubanga akabi kali kumpi; Kubanga tewali anannyamba. 
19_22_12_Zisseddume nnyingi zinneetoolodde: Zisseddume ez'amaanyi ez'e Basani zinzingizizza. 
19_22_13_Banjasamidde akamwa kaabwe, Ng'empologoma etaagulataagula ewuluguma. 
19_22_14_Nfukibwa ng'amazzi, N'amagumba gange gonna gasowose. Omutima gwange guli ng'obubaane; Gusaanuuse wakati mu byenda byange. 
19_22_15_Amaanyi gange gakaliridde ng'olugyo; N'olulimi lwange lwegatta n'emba zange; Era ondeese mu nfuufu ey'okufa. 
19_22_16_Kubanga embwa zinneetoolodde: Ekibiina ky'abo abakola obubi baataayizizza; Bampummudde engalo zange n'ebigere byange. 
19_22_17_Nnyinza okubala amagumba gange gonna; Bantunuulira, banvulumulira amaaso: 
19_22_18_Bagabana ebyambalo byange, Ne bakuba akalulu ku lugoye lwange: 
19_22_19_Naye tobeera wala, ai Mukama: Ai ggwe annyamba, yanguya okunzibira. 
19_22_20_Wonya emmeeme yange eri, ekitala; Ne kaganzi kange eri amaanyi g'embwa: 
19_22_21_Ondokole mu kamwa k'empologama; Era ne mu mayembe g'embogo wanziramu. 
19_22_22_Naabuuliranga erinnya lyo eri baganda bange: Wakati mu kibiina naakutenderezanga. 
19_22_23_Mmwe abatya Mukama, mumutenderezenga; Mmwe amwenna ezzadde lya Yakobo, mumugulumizenga; Mumutyenga mmwe mwenna ezzadde lya Isiraeri. 
19_22_24_Kubanga teyanyooma so teyakyawa nnaku z'oyo analcuwala; So teyamukisa amaaso ge; Naye bwe yamukoowoola, n'awulira. 
19_22_25_Mu ggwe mwe muva ettendo lyange mu kibiina ekinene: Ndisasula obweyamo bwange mu maaso g'abo abamutya. 
19_22_26_Abawombeefu balirya ne bakkuta: Balitendereza Mukama abamunoonya: Omutima gwammwe gubeerenga mulamu emirembe gyonna. 
19_22_27_Enkomerero zonna ez'ensi zirijjukira ne zikyukira Mukama: N'ebika byonna eby'amawanga birisinza mu maaso go. 
19_22_28_Kubanga obwakabaka bwa Mukama: Naye ye afuga amawanga. 
19_22_29_Abagewu bonna ab'ensi balirya ne basinza: N'abo abakka mu nfuufu balimufukaamirira, Ye atayinza kuwonya mmeeme ye okufa. 
19_22_30_Ezzadde lirimuweereza; Kiribuulirwa ku Mukama okutuusa ku mirembe egigenda okujja. 
19_22_31_Balijja ne babuulira obutuukirivu bwe Eri abantu abalizaalibwa; nga ye abukola: 
19_23_1_Mukama ye musumba wange; seetaagenga: 
19_23_2_Angalamiza mu ddundiro ery'omuddo omuto: AntwaIa ku mabbali ag'smazzi amateefu. 
19_23_3_Akomyawo emmeeme yange: Annuŋŋamya mu makubo ag'obutuukirivu ku lw'erinnya lye. 
19_23_4_Era newakubadde nga ntambulira mu kiwonvu eky'ekisukirize eky'olumbe, Siritya kabi konna; kubanga ggwe oli nange: Oluga lwo n'omuggo gwo bye binsanyusa. 
19_23_5_Onteekerateekera emmeeza mu maaso g'abalabe bange: Onsiize amafuta ku mutwe; ekikompe kyange kiyiwa. 
19_23_6_Obulungi n'ekisa tebiiremenga kugenda nange ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwange: Nange naatuulanga mu nnyumba ya Mukama okutuusa ku nnaku nnyingi. 
19_24_1_Ensi ya Mukama, n'okujjula kwayo; Ensi zonna, n'abo abazituulamu. 
19_24_2_Kubarrga yagisimba ku nnyanja, Yaginyweza ku mazzi amangi 
19_24_3_Am alirinnya ku lusozi lwa Mukama? Era am aliyiminira mu kifo kye elutukuvu? 
19_24_4_Oyo alina emikono emirungi, n'omutima omulongoofu; Atayimusanga mmeeme ye eri ebitaliimu, So teyalayiriranga bwereere. 
19_24_5_Oyo anaaweebwanga Mukama omukisa, Era n'obutuukirivu anaabuweebwanga Katonda ow'obulokozi bwe. 
19_24_6_Egyo gye mirembe gy'abo abamuaoonya, Abanoonya amaaso go, ai Katonda wa Yakobo. (Seera) 
19_24_7_Muyimuse emitwe gyamniwe, mmwe enzigi; Nammwe muyimuke, mmwe bawankaaki abataggwaawo: Ne kabaka ow'ekitiibwa anaayingira. 
19_24_8_Kabaka ow'ekitiibwa ye ani? Mukama ow'amaanyi ow'obuyinza Mukama ow'obuyinza mu kulwana. 
19_24_9_Muyimuse emitwe gyammwe, mmwe enzigi; Kale, mugiyimuse, mmwe bawankaaki abataggwaawo: Ne Kabaka ow'ekitiibwa anaayingira. 
19_24_10_Kabaka oyo ow'ekitiibwa ye ani? Mukama ow'eggye, Oyo ye Kabaka ow'ekitiibwa. (Seera) 
19_25_1_Gy'oli, ai Mukama, nnyimusiza emmeeme yange. 
19_25_2_Ai Katonda wange, naakwesiganga ggwe, Toŋŋanya kukwatibwa nsonyi; Abalabe bange tobaganya kumpangula. 
19_25_3_Era siwali akulindirira anaakwatibwanga ensonyi: Abo banaakwatibwanga ensonyi abasala enkwe ez'obwereere. 
19_25_4_Ondage: amakubo go, si Mukama; Onjigirize empenda zo. 
19_25_5_Onnuŋŋamye mu mazima go, onjigirize; Kubanga ggwe oli Katonda ow'obulokozi bwange; Ggwe gwe nnindirira obudde okuziba. 
19_25_6_Jjukira, ai Mukama, okusaasira kwo okulungi n'ekisa kyo; Kubanga byaliwo edda, n'edda lyonna 
19_25_7_Tojjukira bibi bya buwbuka bwange, newakubadde ebyonoono byange: Onjijukire ng'ekisa kyo bwe kiri, Olw'obulungi bwo, ai Mukama. 
19_25_8_Mukama ye mulungi era wa mazima: Kyanaavanga ayigiriza ekkubo abalina ebibi. 
19_25_9_Abawombeefu anaabaluŋŋamyanga mu musango: Era abawombeefu anaabayigirizanga ekkubo lye. 
19_25_10_Amakubo gonna aga Mukama kye kisa n'amazima Eri abo abeekuuma endagaano ye n'okutegeeza kwe: 
19_25_11_Olw'erinnya lyo, si Mukama, Onsonyiwe obubi bwange, kubanga bunene. 
19_25_12_Omuntu atya Mukama aluwa? Oyo gw'anaayigirizanga mu kkubo ly'anaasiimanga. 
19_25_13_Emmeeme ye eneetuulanga mu mirembe; N'ezzadde lye linaasikiranga ensi. 
19_25_14_Ekyama kya Mukama kiri mu abo abamutya; Era anaabalaganga endagaano ye. 
19_25_15_Amaaso gange gatunuulira Mukama ennaku zonna; Kubanga ye anaggyanga ebigere byange mu kyambika. 
19_25_16_Onkyukire, onsaasire; Kubanga ndekeddwa omu ne mbonaabona. 
19_25_17_Ennaku ez'omutima gwange zeeyongedde: Kale onziye mu bibonoobono byange. 
19_25_18_Lowooza ennaku zange n'okutegana kwange; Era onsonyiwe ebibi byange byonna. 
19_25_19_Lowooza abalabe bange, kubanga bangi; Era bankyawa obukyayi obukambwe. 
19_25_20_Kale onkuumenga emmeeme yange, omponyenga: Tontlanyanga kukwatibwa nsonyi, kubanga nkwesiga ggwe. 
19_25_21_Obutuukirivu n'amazima binkuumenga, Kubanga nnindirira ggwe. 
19_25_22_Nunula Isiraeri, ai Katonda, Mu bibonoobono bye byonna. 
19_26_1_Onsalire omusango, ai Mukama, kubanga natambuliranga mu butuukirivu bwange: Era neesiganga Mukama obutabuusabuusa. 
19_26_2_Onkebere, ai Mukama, onkeme; Ongezeeko emmeeme yange n'omutima gwange. 
19_26_3_Kubanga ekisa kyo kiri mu maaso gange; Era natambuliranga mu mazima go. 
19_26_4_Saatuulanga wamu na bantu abataliimu; So ssiiyingirenga wamu na bakuusakuusa. 
19_26_5_Ekibiina ky'abo abakola obubi nkikyawa, So siituulenga wamu na babi. 
19_26_6_Naanaabanga mu ngalo zange mu butayonoona; Bwe nneetooloolanga bwe ntyo ekyoto kyo, ai Mukama: 
19_26_7_Ndyoke mpulirizenga eddoboozi ery'okwebaza, Njogerenga ku bikolwa byo byonna eby'ekitalo: 
19_26_8_Mukama, njagala ekisulo eky'omu nnyumba yo, N'ekifo ekitiibwa kyo kye kituulamu, 
19_26_9_Tonoga mmeeme yange wamu n'abalina ebibi, Newakubadde obulamu bwange wamu n'abantu ab'omu nsi: 
19_26_10_Emikono gyabwe girimu ettima, N'omukono gwabwe ogwa ddyo gujjudde enguzi. 
19_26_11_Naye nze naatambuliranga mu butuukirivu bwange: Onnunule, era onsaasire. 
19_26_12_Ekigere kyange kiyimiridde mu kifo ekitereevu: Mu bibiina neebazanga Mukama. 
19_27_1_Mukama gwe musana gwange n'obulokozi bwange; gwe nnaatyanga ye ani? Mukama ge maanyi ag'obulamu bwange; anankankanyanga ye ani? 
19_27_2_Abakola obubi bwe bannumba okulya omubiri gwange, Be balabe bange era abankyawa, ne beesittala ne bagwa. 
19_27_3_Newakubadde ng'eggye lisiisidde okunnwanyisa, Omutima gwange teguutyenga: Newakubadde ng'entalo zimbaddeko, Era ne mu ezo naagtmianga omwoyo. 
19_27_4_Ekigambo kimu nkisabye Mukama, kye nnaanoonyanga; Okutuulanga mu nnyumba ya Mukama ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwange, Okutunuuliranga obulungi bwa Mukama, n'okubuuzanga mu yeekaalu ye. 
19_27_5_Kubanga ku lunaku olw'okunakuwala alinkuuma mu kyama mu nnyumba ye: Awakwekerwa mu weema ye we alinkisiza; Alinnyimusa ku lwazi. 
19_27_6_Ne kaakano omutwe gwange gunaayimusibwa ku balabe bange abanneetoolodde; Era naawaayo mu weema ye ssaddaaka ez'okusanyuka; Naayimbanga, weewaawo, naayimba okutendereza Mukama. 
19_27_7_Wulira, ai Mukama, bwe nkaaba n'eddoboozilyange: Era onsaasire, onziremu. 
19_27_8_Bwe wagamba nti Munoonye amaaso gange; omutima gwange gwakugamba nti Amaaso go, Mukama, naaganaonyanga. 
19_27_9_Tonlusa amaaso go; Togoba muddu wo mu busungu: Ggwe wabeeranga omubeezi wange; Tonsuula, so tondeka, ai Katonda ow'obulokozi bwange. 
19_27_10_Kubanga kitange ne mmange bandese, Naye Mukama ananjijanjabanga. 
19_27_11_Onjigirizenga ekkubo lyo, ai Mukama; Era onnuŋŋamyenga mu luwenda olulabika, Olw'abalabe bange. 
19_27_12_Tompaayo eri abalabe bange okunkola bye baagala: Kubanga abawaayiriza bangolokokeddeko, n'abo abassa omukka ogw'obukambwe. 
19_27_13_Nandizirise, singa sakkiriza okulaba obulungi bwa Mukama mu nsi ey'abalamu. 
19_27_14_Lindirira Mukama: Ddamu amaanyi, ogume omwoyo gwo; Weewaawo, lindirira Mukama. 
19_28_1_Ggwe, ai Mukama, naakukoowoolanga; Olwazi lwange, togaana kumpulira: Nneme okuba ng'abo abakka mu bunnya, Oba nga ononsiriikirira. 
19_28_2_Wulira eddoboozi ery'okwegayirira kwange, bwe nkukaabirira, Bwe nnyimusa emikono gyange eri ekifo ekitukuvu ky'oyogereramu. 
19_28_3_Tompalulira wamu n'ababi, N'abo abakola obutali butuukirivu; Aboogera eby'emirembe ne bannaabwe, Naye ettima nga liri mu mitima gyabwe. 
19_28_4_Obawe ng'emirimu gyabwe bwe giri era ng'obubi obw'ebikolwa byabwe: Obawe ng'emikono gyabwe bwe gikola; Obasasule bye basaanidde. 
19_28_5_Kubanga tebalowooza mirimu gya Mukama, Newakubadde emikono gye bye gikola, Alibamenyaamenya so talibazimba. 
19_28_6_Atenderezebwe Mukama, Kubanga awulidde eddoboozi ery'okwegayirira kwange. 
19_28_7_Mukama ge maanyi gange era ye ngabo yange; Omutima gwange gwamwesiganga oyo, ne mbeerwa: Omutima gwange kyeguva gusanyuka ennyo; Era naamutenderezanga n'oluyimba lwange. 
19_28_8_Mukama ge maanyi gaabwe, Era kye kiddukiro eky'obulokozi eri oyo gwe yasiiga amafuta. 
19_28_9_Lokola abantu bo, owenga omukisa ab'obusika bwo: Obaliisenga, obawanirirenga emirembe gyonna. 
19_29_1_Mumuwe Mukama, mmwe abaana b'abazira, Mumuwe Mukama ekitiibwa n'amaanyi. 
19_29_2_Mumuwe Mukama ekitiibwa erinnya lye kye lisaanira; Mumusinze Mukama mu butuukiriw obuwooma. 
19_29_3_Eddoboozi lya Mukama liri ku mazzi: Katonda ow'ekitiibwa abatuka, Ye Mukama, ku mazzi amangi. 
19_29_4_Eddoboozi lya Mukama lya maanyi; Eddoboozi lya Mukama lijjudde ekitiibwa. 
19_29_5_Eddoboozi lya Mukama limenya emivule; Weewaawo, Mukama amenyaamenya emivule gya Lebanooni. 
19_29_6_Era agizinyisa ng'ennyana; Lebanooni ne Siriyoni ng'ennyana y'embogo, 
19_29_7_Eddoboozi lya Mukama lyawula ennimi ez'omuliro. 
19_29_8_Eddoboozi lya Mukama likankanya eddungu; Mukama akankanya eddungu lya Kadesi. 
19_29_9_Eddoboozi lya Mukama lizaaza empeewo, Era likunkumulira ddala amabira, Era mu yeekaalu ye buli kintu kyogera nti Ekitiibwa. 
19_29_10_Mukama yatuula nga kabaka ku Mataba; Weewaawo, Mukama atuula nga kabaka emirembe gyonna. 
19_29_11_Mukama aliwa amaanyi abantu be; Mukama omukisa gw'aliwa abantu be gye mirembe. 
19_30_1_Naakugulumizanga, ai Mukama; kubanga onnyimusizza, N'otobampanguza abalabe bange. 
19_30_2_Ai Mukama Katonda wange, Naakukoowoola, naawe n'omponya. 
19_30_3_Ai Mukama, walinnyisa emmeeme yange okuva mu magombe: Omponyezza okufa, nneme okukka mu bunnya. 
19_30_4_Mumuyimbirenga Mukama nga mumutendereza, mmwe abatukuvu be, N'erinnya lye ettukuvu mulyebazenga. 
19_30_5_Kubanga obusungu bwe buyita mangu; Mu kisa kye mwe muli obulamu: Amaziga wozzi gayinza okubeerawo ekiro, Naye essanyu lijja obudde nga bukedde. 
19_30_6_Nze bwe nnaweebwa omukisa, ne njogera nti Sirisagaasagana emirembe gyonna. 
19_30_7_Ggwe, Mukama, mu kisa kyo wali onywezezza olusozi lwange: N'okisa amaaso go; ne nneeraliikirira. 
19_30_8_Ne nkukoowoola ggwe, ai Mukama; Era Mukama ne mwegayirira 
19_30_10_Wulira, ai Mukama, onsaasire: Mukama, ggwe beera omubeezi wange. 
19_30_11_Onfuulidde okunakuwala kwange okuzina; Onziyeeko ebibukutu byange, onnyambazizza essanyu: 
19_30_12_Ekitiibwa kyange kiryoke kikuyimbirenga okukutendereza, so kiremenga okusirika. Ai Mukama Katonda wange, naakwebazanga emirembe gyonna. 
19_31_1_Ai Mukama, nkwesiga ggwe; nneme okuswazibwanga emirembe gyonna: Ondokole mu butuukirivu bwo. 
19_31_2_Ontegere okutu kwo; yanguya okundokola: Obeerenga gye ndi olwazi olw'amaanyi, ennyumba enkomere okumponya, 
19_31_3_Kubanga ggwe oli lwazi lwange era ekigo kyange; Kale ku lw'erinnya lyo onkulembere onnuŋŋamye. 
19_31_4_Onziye mu kyambika kye banteze enkiso; Kubanga ggwe oli bbugwe wange. 
19_31_5_Mpaayo omwoyo gwange mu mukono gwo: Ggwe wannunula, ai Mukama, ggwe Katonda ow'amazima. 
19_31_6_Nkyawa abo abalowooza ebigambo eby'obulimba ebitaliimu: Naye neesiga Mukama. 
19_31_7_Naasanyukanga, naajaguzanga okw'okusaasira kwo: Kubanga walaba ebibonoobono byange; Wamanya emmeeme yange mu kulaba ennaku: 
19_31_8_So tewanziyiza kukwatibwa mukono ogw'omulabe; Ebigere byange wabissa mu kifo ekigazi. 
19_31_9_Onsaasire, ai Mukama, kubanga zinsanze: Eriiso lyange liweddemu olw'okunakuwala weewaawo, emmeeme yange n'omubiri givange. 
19_31_10_Kubanga obulamu bwange buyita n'okutegana, n'emyakal gyange giyita n'okusinda. Amaanyi gange gampweddemu olw'okwonoona kwange, n’amagumba gange gakozze. 
19_31_11_Ku lw'abalabe bange bonna nfuuse ekivume, Weewaawo, eri abaliraanwa bange ennyo, era nfuuse entiisa eri mikwano gyange: Abandaba mu kkubo ne banziruka. 
19_31_12_Nneerabiddwa ng'omufu atalowoozebwa: Nfaanana ng'ekibya ekyatise. 
19_31_13_Kubanga nawuLira okuwaayiriza kw'abangi, Ensisi yanneetooloola: Bwe baali bateesa ebigambo awamu ku nze, Ne basala amagezi okunziyako obulamu bwange. 
19_31_14_Naye nakwesiga ggwe, ai Mukama: Nayogera nti Ggwe Katonda wange. 
19_31_15_Entuuko zange ziri mu mukono gwo: Ondokole mu mukono gw'abalabe bange n'abo abanjigganya. 
19_31_16_Amaaso go gaakire omuddu wo: Ondokole mu kisa kyo. 
19_31_17_Nnemenga okukwatibwa ensonyi, ai Mukama; kubanga nkukoowodde ggwe: Ababi bakwatibwenga en basirikenga mu magombe 
19_31_18_Emimwa egy'obulimba gisiruwalenga; Egyogera ku batuukirivu n'ekyejo, N'amalala n'okunyooma. 
19_31_19_Obulungi bwo nga bungi bwe waterekera abo abakutya, Bwe wakolera abakwesiga, mu maaso g'abaana b'abantu! 
19_31_20_Gy'oli awakwekebwa w'onoobakisanga enkwe z'abantu: Onoobakuumiranga mu weema mu kyama eri ennimi eziyomba. 
19_31_21_Atenderezebwenga Mukama: Kubanga andaze ekisa kye eky'ekitalo mu kibuga ekiriko ekigo. 
19_31_22_Nze nayogera nga nnyanguyiriza nti Nzildridde mu maaso go: Naye wawulira eddoboozi ery'okwegayirira kwange bwe nnakukoowoola. 
19_31_23_Kale mumwagalenga Mukama, mwenna abatukuvu be: Mukama awonya abeesigwa, Era asasulira ddala mu bungi akola eby'amalala. 
19_31_24_Muddengamu amaanyi, mugumenga omwoyo gwammwe, Mwenna abasuubira mu Mukama. 
19_32_1_Aweereddwa omukisa asonyiyiddwa ekyonoono kye n'ekibi kye kikwekeddwa. 
19_32_2_Aweereddwa omukisa Mukama gw'atabalira butali butuukirivu. Ne mu mwoyo gwe temuli bukuusa. 
19_32_3_Bwe nnasirikanga, amagumba gange gaakaddiwanga, Olw'okukaaba kwange obudde okuziba. 
19_32_4_Kubanga emisana n'ekiro omukono gwo gwanzitoowereranga: Amazzi gange ne gakaliranga ng'olw'omusana ogw'ekyeya.(Seera) 
19_32_5_Ne nkwatulira ekibi kyange, n'obutali butuukirivu bwange ne ssibukweka: Nayogera nti Mukama naamwatulira ebyonoono byange; Naawe n'onsonyiwa obutali butuukirivu obw'ekibi kyange. (Seera) 
19_32_6_Ku lw'ekyo buli atya Katonda akusabenga mu biro by'oyinza okulabikiramu: Mazima mu ntaba ez'amazzi amangi tebalituuka gy'ali. 
19_32_7_Oli bwekweko bwange; ononkuumanga mu kulaba ennaku; Ononneetooloozanga ennyimba ez'obulokozi. (Seera) 
19_32_8_Naakuyigirizanga naakulanganga mu kkubo ly'onooyitangamu: Naakuteesezanga ebigambo eriiso lyange nga liri ku ggwe. 
19_32_9_Temuba nga mbalaasi, n'ennyumbu, ezitalina magezi: Ezigwanira okusibibwa ekyuma n'olukoba okuziziyiza, Awatali ebyo, tezirijja gy'oli. 
19_32_10_Ababi banaalabanga ennaku nnyingi: Naye oyo eyeesiga Mukama okusaasirwa kunaamwetooloolanga. 
19_32_11_Musanyukire Mukama, mujaguze, mmwe abatuukirivu: Mwogerere waggulu olw'essanyu, mwenna abalina omutima ogw'amazima. 
19_33_1_MusanyukireMukama,mmwe abatuukirivu: Okutendereza kusaanira abalina omwoyo ogw'amazima. 
19_33_2_Mumwebaze Mukama n'ennanga: Muyimbe okumutendereza n'ennanBa ey'engoye kkumi. 
19_33_3_Mumuyirabire oluyimba oluggya; Mukube enaanga n'amagezi n'eddoboozi ddene. 
19_33_4_Kubanga ekigambo kya Mukama kigolokofu; N'omulimu gwe gwonna (agukola) mu bwesigwa. 
19_33_5_Ayagala obutuukirivu n'amazima: Ensi ejjudde ekisa kya Mukama. 
19_33_6_Mu kigambo kya Mukama eggulu lyakolebwa; N'eggye lyamu lyonaa (lyakolebwa) n'omukka ogw'akamwake. 
19_33_7_Amazzi ag'omu rmyanja agakuŋŋaanya ng'entuumo: Atereka amadubi mu mawanika. 
19_33_8_Ensi zonna zityenga Mukama: Bonna abali mu nsi zonna bamukankanirenga. 
19_33_9_Kubanga yayogera ne kikolebwa; Yalagira ne kinywera. 
19_33_10_Mukama aggyawo okuteesa kw'amawanga: Adibya ebirowoozo by'abantu. 
19_33_11_Okuteesa kwa Mukama kunywera ennaku zonna, N'ebirowoozo by'omutima gwe okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
19_33_12_Eggwanga eririna Mukama okuba Katonda waalyo liweereddwa omukisa; Abantu be yalonda okuba obusika bwe ye. 
19_33_13_Mukama alengera ng'ayima mu ggulu; Atunuulira abaana b'abantu bonna; 
19_33_14_Ng'ayima mu kifo eky'ekisulo kye alaba Ku abo abali mu nsi bonna; 
19_33_15_Abumba emitima gyabwe bonna, Alowooza ebikolwa byabwe byonna. 
19_33_16_Tewali kabaka alokoka olw'eggye okuba eringi: Omuzira tawonyezebwa maanyi mangi. 
19_33_17_Embalaasi kye kintu ekitaliimu ku bulokozi: So teewonyenga muntu olw'amaanyi gaayo amangi. 
19_33_18_Laba, eriiso lya Mukama liri ku abo abamutya, Ku abo abasuubira mu kusaasira kwe; 
19_33_19_Okuwonyanga emmeeme yaabwe okufa, N'okubakuumanga abalamu mu njala. 
19_33_20_Emmeeme yaffe erindiridde Mukama: Oyo ye mubeezi waffe, era ye ngabo yaffe. 
19_33_21_Kubanga omutima gwaffe gunaasanyukira oyo, Kubanga twesize erinnya lye ettukuvu. 
19_33_22_Okusaasira kwo, si Mukama, kubeerenga ku ffe, Nga ffe bwe tusuubira mu ggwe. 
19_34_1_Neebazanga Mukama mu biro byonna: Ettendo lye liri mu kamwa kange bulijjo. 
19_34_2_Emmeeme yange eneenyumiririzanga mu Mukama: Abawombeefu baliwulira, balisanyuka. 
19_34_3_Mumukuze Mukama wamu nange, Tugulumize erinnya lye fenna. 
19_34_4_Nanoonya Mukama, n'anziramu, N'andokola mu kutya kwange kwonna. 
19_34_5_Baamutunuulira, ne balaba omusana: Era amaaso gaabwe tegaakwatibwenga nsonyi emirembe gyonna. 
19_34_6_Omunaku ono yakoowoola, Mukama n'amuwulira, N'amulokola mu nnaku ze zonna. 
19_34_7_Malayika wa Mukama asiisira okwetooloola abo abamurya, N'abalokola. 
19_34_8_Mulege mutegeere Mukama nga mulungi: Aweereddwa omukisa oyo amwesiga. 
19_34_9_Mutyenga Mukama, mmwe abatukuvu be: Kubanga tebabulwa kintu abamutya. 
19_34_10_Obwana bw'empologoma bubulwa ne bulumwa enjala: Naye abanoonya Mukama tebaabulwenga kintu kirungi kyonna. 
19_34_11_Mujje, mmwe abaana abato, mumpulire: Naabayigirizanga okutya Mukama. 
19_34_12_Muntu ki ayagala obulamu, Era eyeegomba ennaku (ennyingi), alyoke alabe obulungi? 
19_34_13_Ziyizanga olulimi lwo mu bubi, N'emimwa gyo obutoogeranga bukuusa. 
19_34_14_Va mu bubi, okolenga obulungi; Noonyanga emirembe, ogigobererenga. 
19_34_15_Amaaso ga Mukama galaba abatuukirivu, N'amatu ge gawulira okukaaba kwabwe. 
19_34_16_Obwenyi bwa Mnkama buba ku abo abakola obubi, Amalemu okujjukirwa kwabwe mu nsi. 
19_34_17_Abatuukirivu baakoowoola, Mukama n'awulira, N'abalokola mu nnaku zaabwe zonna. 
19_34_18_Mukama ali kumpi n'abo abalina omutima ogumenyese. Era awonya abalina omwoyo oguboneredde. 
19_34_19_Ebibonoobono eby'omutuukirivu bye bingi: Naye Mukama amulokola mu byonna. 
19_34_20_Akuuma amagumba ge gonna: Linnaago erimu terimenyeka. 
19_34_21_Obubi bulitta omubi: N'abo abakyawa omutuukirivu balisingibwa omusango. 
19_34_22_Mukama anunula emmeeme y'abaddu be: So tewali mu bo abamwesiga alisingibwa omusango. 
19_35_1_Wakana, ai Mukama, n'abo abawakana nange: Lwana n'abo abalwana nange. 
19_35_2_Kwata engabo n'akagabo, Oyimirire okunnyamba. 
19_35_3_Era sowola n'effumu, ozibire ekkubo abo abanjigganya: Ogambe emmeeme yange nti Nze bulokozi bwo. 
19_35_4_Bakwatibwe ensonyi baswazibwe abanjigganya emmeeme yange: Bazzibwe ennyuma beeraliikirizibwe abateesa okunkola obubi. 
19_35_5_Babeere ng'ebisusunku ebitwalibwa n'empewo, Era malayika wa Mukama ng'abagoba. 
19_35_6_Ekkubo lyabwe libeere ekizikiza n'obuseerezi. Era malayika wa Mukama ng'abayigganya. 
19_35_7_Kubanga awatali nsonga bankisizza mu bunnya ekyambika kyabwe, Awatali nsonga basimidde emmeeme yange. 
19_35_8_Okuzikirira kumujjeko nga talaba; N'ekyambika kye kye yakisa kimukwate ye yennyini: Akigwemu n'okuzikirira: 
19_35_9_N'emmeeme yange erisanyukira Mukama: Erijaguliza obulokozi bwe. 
19_35_10_Amagumba gange gonna galyogera nti Mukama, ani afaanana nga ggwe, Awonya omwavu eri oyo amusinga amaanyi, Awonya omwavu n'omunafu eri oyo amunyaga? 
19_35_11_Abajulirwa abatali batuukirivu bagolokose; Bambuuza ebigambo bye ssimanyi. 
19_35_12_Bansasula obubi ku lw'obulungi, Okweraliikiriza emmeeme yange. 
19_35_13_Naye nze, bwe baalwala, nayambala bibukutu: Ne nteganya emmeeme yange n'okusiiba; N'okusaba kwange ne kudda mu kifuba kyange. 
19_35_14_Ne mba nga bwe nnaakubadde, singa yali mukwano gwange' oba muganda wange: Ne nkutama ne nnakuwala ng'afiiriddwa nnyina: 
19_35_15_Naye bwe nnawenyera nze, ne basanyuka, ne bakunnaana: Abagwagwa ne bankuŋŋaanirako, ne ssimanya; Ne banjuza, ne batalekaayo: 
19_35_16_Ng'abo abatatya Katonda abaduula mu mbaga, Bwe baaluma obujigi bwe batyo, nga bansunguwalira. 
19_35_17_Mukama, olituusa wa okutunula obutunuzi? Wonya emmeeme yange mu kuzikiriza kwabwe, Kaganzi kange mu mpologoma. 
19_35_18_Ndikwebaliza mu kibiina ekinene: Ndikutenderereza mu bantu abangi. 
19_35_19_Abo abalabe bange baleme okunsanyukirako n'obulimba: Era abankyawa awatali nsonga baleme okutemya ekikowe. 
19_35_20_Kubanga teboogera mirembe: Naye bateesa ebigambo eby'obulimba ku abo abatereera mu nsi. 
19_35_21_Era banjasaamiririra ddala akamwa. kaabwe; Ne boogera nti Ggwe, ggwe, eriiso lyaffe lyakiraba. 
19_35_22_Ggwe wakiraba, si Mukama; tosirika: Ai Mukama, tombeera wala. 
19_35_23_Golokoka, ozuukuke okunsalira omusango, Era olw'ensonga yange, Katonda wange era Mukama wange. 
19_35_24_Onsalire omusango, ai Mukama Katonda wange, ng'abutuukirivu bwo bwe buli; So tobaganya kunsanyukirako; 
19_35_25_Baleme okwogera mu mutima gwabwe nti Bw'otyo bwe twagala bwe tutyo: Baleme okwogera nti Tumumize bugobo. 
19_35_26_Bakwatibwe ensonyi baswazibwe bonna abasanyukira nze okulaba akabi: Bambale ensonyi n'okunyoomebwa abanneegulumirizaako. 
19_35_27_Boogerere waggulu olw'essanyu, bajaguze, abayamba ensonga yange ey'obutuukirivu: Era boogerenga bulijjo eri Mukama agulumizibwe, Asanyukira omukisa ogw'omuddu we. 
19_35_28_N'olulimilwangelunaayogeranga ku butuukirivu bwo, Ne ku ttendo lyo obudde okuziba. 
19_36_1_Ekyonoono ky'omubi kyogerera mu mutima gwange nti Tewali kutya Katonda mu maaso ge. 
19_36_2_Kubanga yeenyumiririza mu maaso ge ye, Ng'obutali butuukirivu bwe tebulirabika ne bukyayibwa. 
19_36_3_Ebigambo eby'akamwa ke bwe butali butuukirivu n'obulimba: Alese okuba n'amagezi n'okukola obulungi. 
19_36_4_Ateesa obutali butuukirivu ku kitanda kye; Yeeteeka mu kkubo eritali ddungi; Takyawa bubi. 
19_36_5_Ekisa kyo, ai Mukama, kiri mu ggulu Obwesige bwo bubuna ebbanga. 
19_36_6_Obutuukirivu bwo buli ng'ensozi za Katonda; Emisango gyo bwe buziba obunene: Ai Mukama, ggwe owonya abantu n'ebisolo. 
19_36_7_Ekisa kyo, ai Katonda, nga kya muwendo mungi! Era abaana b'abantu baddukira wansi w'ekisiikirize eky'ebiwaawaatiro byo. 
19_36_8_Banakkusibwanga ddala obugevvu obw'ennyumba yo. Era onoobanywesanga ku mugga ogw'essanyu lyo. 
19_36_9_Kubanga w'oli we wali oluzzi olw'obulamu: Mu musana gwo naffe mwe tunaalabiranga omusana. 
19_36_10_Kale yongera ekisa kyo eri abo abakumanya; N'obutuukirivu bwo eri abo abalina omutima ogw'amazima. 
19_36_11_Toganya kigere kya malala okunjijirako, Newakubadde omukono gw'omubi okungoba. 
19_36_12_Eri gye bagudde abakola obutali butuukirivu; Bameggeddwa wansi, so tebaayinzenga kuyimuka. 
19_37_1_Teweeraliikiriranga lw'abo abakola obubi, So tokwatibwanga buggya ku abo abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu. 
19_37_2_Kubanga balisalwa mangu ng'essubi, Baliwotoka ng'omuddo ogumera. 
19_37_3_Weesigenga Mukama, okolenga obulungi; Beeranga mu nsi, ogobererenga obwesigwa. 
19_37_4_Era sanyukiranga Mukama: Naye anaakuwanga omutima gwo bye gusaba. 
19_37_5_Olugendo lwo oluyiringisizenga ku Mukama; Era weesigenga oyo, naye anaakituukirizanga. 
19_37_6_Era anaayolesanga obutuukirivu bwo ng'omusana, N'omusango gwo ng'ettuntu. 
19_37_7_Sirika eri Mukama, omulindirirenga a'okugumiikiriza: Teweeraliikiriranga lw'oyo alaba ebirungi mu kkubo lye, Olw'omuntu atuukiriza enkwe ez'obubi. 
19_37_8_Lekanga obusungu, ovenga mu kiruyi: Teweeraliikiriranga; okwagala obwagazi okuleta obubi. 
19_37_9_Kubanga abakola obubi balizikirizibwa: Naye abalindirira Mukama abo be balisikira ensi. 
19_37_10_Kubanga waliba akaseera katono, n'omubi talibeerawo. Weewaawo, ekifo kye olikitunuulira ddala, naye talibeerawo. 
19_37_11_Naye abawombeefu balisikira ensi: Era banaasanyukiranga emirembe emingi. 
19_37_12_Omubi yeekoba ku mutuukirivu, Era aluma bujigi ng'amusunguwalidde. 
19_37_13_Mukama alimusekerera: Kubanga alaba ng'olunaku lwe lujja. 
19_37_14_Ababi basowodde ekitala, baleeze omutego gwabwe; Okusuula omwavu n'omunafu, Okutta abo abatambulira mu kkubo n'amazima. 
19_37_15_Ekitala kyabwe kisifumita omutima gwabwe bo, N'emitego gyabwe girimenyeka. 
19_37_16_Ebitono omutuukirivu by'alina Bisinga obugagga obw'ababi abangi. 
19_37_17_Kubanga emikono gy'ababi girimenyeka: Naye Mukama anyweza abatuukirivu. 
19_37_18_Mukama amanyi ennaku z'abo abatuukiridde: N'obusika bwabwe bunaabeeranga bwa mirembe gyonna. 
19_37_19_Tebaakwatibwenga nsonyi mu biro eby'akabi: Ne mu nnaku ez'enjala banakkutanga. 
19_37_20_Naye ababi balibula, N'abalabe ba Mukama baliba ng'ekisinga amasavu mu birundibwa: Balibula; balibulira ddala mu mukka. 
19_37_21_Omubi yeewola, n'atasasula nate: Naye omutuukirivu akola eby'ekisa, agaba. 
19_37_22_Kubanga abaweebwa omukisa gwe balisikira ensi; N'abo abakolimirwa ye balizikirizibwa. 
19_37_23_Olugendo olw'omuntu lunywezebwa Mukama; Era asanyukira ekkubo lye. 
19_37_24_Newakubadde ng'agwa, talisuulirwa ddala wansi: Kubanga Mukama amunyweza n'omukono gwe. 
19_37_25_Nali muto, kaakano nkaddiye; Naye , sirabanga mutuukirivu ng'alekeddwa, Newakubadde ezzadde lye nga basaba emmere. 
19_37_26_Obudde okuziba akola eby'ekisa, n'awola; N'ezzadde lye liweebwa omukisa. 
19_37_27_Ovenga mu bubi, okolenga obulungi; Obeerengawo emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_37_28_Kubanga Mukama ayagala ensonga, Era taleka batukuvu be; Bakuumibwa emirembe gyonna: Naye ezzadde ery'omubi Lirizikirizibwa. 
19_37_29_Abatuukirivu balisikira ensi, Banaagibeerangamu emirembe gyonna. 
19_37_30_Akamwa k'omutuukuivu koogera eby'amagezi, N'olulimi lwe lubuulira ensonga. 
19_37_31_Amateeka ga Katonda we gabeera mu mutima gwe; Mu lugendo lwe lwonna taaseererenga. 
19_37_32_Omubi atunuulira omutuukirivu, Ng'ayagala okumutta. 
19_37_33_Mukama talimuleka mu mukono gwe, So talimusinza bw'alisalirwa omusango. 
19_37_34_Lindiriranga Mukama, okwatenga ekkubo lye, Naye alikugulumiza okusikira ensi: Ababi bwe balizikirizibwa oliraba. 
19_37_35_Nalaba omubi ng'alina obuyinza obungi, Era ng'agulumidde ng'omuti ogumeze ku ttaka lyagwo. 
19_37_36_Naye bwe baayita, laba, taliiwo: Era namunoonya, naye teyalabika. 
19_37_37_Weekalirizenga oyo atuukiridde, olabenga ow'amazima: Kubanga enkomerero ey'omuntu oyo mirembe. 
19_37_38_Aboonoonyi, bo balizilurizibwa Ibonna: Enkomerero ddala ey'omubi erizikirizibwa. 
19_37_39_Naye obulokozi obw'abatuukirivu buva eri Mukama: Oyo kye kigo kyabwe mu biro eby'okulabiramu ennaku. 
19_37_40_Era Mukama abayamba, n'abawonya: Abawonya eri ababi, n'abalokola, Kubanga beeyunye oyo. 
19_38_1_Ai Mukama, tonnenya mu busungu bwo: So tombuuliririra mu kiruyi kyo ekibuubuuka. 
19_38_2_Kubanga obusaale bwo bunkwatidde ddala, N'omukono gwo gunnyigirizza nnyo. 
19_38_3_Temuli bulamu mu mubiri gwange olw'okunyiiga kwo; So temuli kuwona mu magumba gange olw'okwonoona kwange. 
19_38_4_Kubanga obutali butuukirivu bwange buyiise ku mutwe gwange. Ng'omugugu omunene bunzitooweredde bunnemye. 
19_38_5_Ebiwundu byange biwunya era bivunze, Olw'obusirusiru bwange. 
19_38_6_Nnumiddwa, nkutamizibbwa nnyo; Ntambula nga nkaaba obudde okuziba. 
19_38_7_Kubanga ekiwato kyange kijjudde okwokya; So temuli bulamu mu mubiri gwange. 
19_38_8_Nnyongobera, mmenyesemenyese: Mpulugumye olw'okweraliikirira kw'omutima gwange. 
19_38_9_Mukama, bye njagala byonna biri mu maaso go; N'okusinda kwange tekukukisibwa. 
19_38_10_Omutima gwange guntundugga, amaanyi gange gampweddemu: Omusana ogw'amaaso gange, era nagwo gumbuze. 
19_38_11_Abanjagala ne mikwano gyange beewala ekibonoobono kyange; Ne baganda bange bayimirira wala. 
19_38_12_Era n'abo abanjigganya obulamu bwange banteega; N'abo abaagala nze okulaba akabi boogera eby'ettima, Era balowooza eby'obulimba obudde okuziba. 
19_38_13_Naye nze, ng'omuzibe w'amatu, ssiwulira; Era nninga omusiru atayasama kamwa ke. 
19_38_14_Mazima, nninga omuntu atawulira, Ne mu kamwa ke temuli kunenya. 
19_38_15_Kubanga eri ggwe, ai Mukama, gye nsuubira: Oliddamu, ai Mukama Katonda wange. 
19_38_16_Kubanga nayogera nti Baleme okunsanyukirako: Ekigere kyange bwe kiseerera, banneegulumirizaako. 
19_38_17_Kubanga nze ndi kumpi n'okuwenyera, N'ennaku zange ziri mu maaso gange bulijjo. 
19_38_18_Kubanga naayatulanga obutali butuukirivu bwange; Naanakuwalanga olw'okwonoona kwange. 
19_38_19_Naye abalabe bange balamu, balina amaanyi: N'abo abankyawa olw'obulimba beeyongedde. 
19_38_20_Era n'abo abasasula obubi olw'obulungi. Be balabe bange, kubanga ngoberera ebigambo ebirungi. 
19_38_21_Tondeka, ai Mukama: Ai Katonda wange, tombeera wala. 
19_39_1_Nayogera nti Neekuumanga amakubo gange, Nnemenga okwonoonya olulimi lwange: Naasibanga akamwa kange n'olukoba, Omubi ng'ali mu maaso gange. 
19_39_2_Nasiruwala obutayogera, nasirika, newakubadde ebirungi saabyogera; Okunakuwala kwange ne kweyongera. 
19_39_3_Omutima gwange ne gwaka munda yange; Bwe nnali ndowooza, omuliro ne gukoleera: Ne ndyoka njogera n'olulimi lwange: 
19_39_4_Mukama, ontegeeze enkomerero yange, N'ekigera eky'ennaku zange bwe kiri; Ntegeere bwe ndi omumenyefu. 
19_39_5_Laba, ennaku zange wazikola ng'enta; N'obulamu bwange buli nga si kintu gy'oli: Mazima, buli muntu, bw'anywerera ddala, mukka bukka. (Seera) 
19_39_6_Mazima buli muntu atambula mu kifaananyi ekitaliimu. Mazima, beeraliikiririra bwereere: Akuuma obugagga, so tamanya agenda okubutwala. 
19_39_7_Ne kaakano, Mukama, nnindirira ki? Mu ggwe mwe nnina essuubi. 
19_39_8_Onziye mu byonoono byange byonna; Tonfuula kivume kya basirusiru. 
19_39_9_Nasiruwala, saayasamya kamwa kange; Kubanga wakikola. 
19_39_10_Onzigyeko omuggo gwo: Mmaliddwamu amaanyi olw'okukuba kw'omukono gwo. 
19_39_11_Bw'obuuliriranga omuntu n'okunenya olw'obutali butuukirivu, Omumaliramu ddala obulungi bwe, ng'ennyenje: Mazima, buli muntu mukka. (Seera) 
19_39_12_Wulira okusaba kwange, ai Mukama, okkirize okukaaba kwange; Tosirikira maziga gange: Kubanga nze ndi mugenyi gy'oli, Omutambuze, nga bajjajja bange bonna bwe baali. 
19_39_13_Onsaasire, ndyoke nziremu amaanyi, Nga sinnava muno ne ssibeerawo. 
19_40_1_Nalindirira Mukama n'okugumiikiriza; N'antegera okutu, n'ampulira okukaaba kwange. 
19_40_2_Era n'anziya mu bunnya obw'okuzikirira, mu bitositosi; N'ateeka ebigere byange ku lwazi, n'anyweza okugenda kwange. 
19_40_3_Era n'oluyimba oluggya alussizza mu kamwa kange, kwe kutendereza Katonda waffe: Bangi abanaalabanga, ne batya, Ne beesiga Mukama. 
19_40_4_Aweereddwa omukisa omuntu eyeesiga Mukama, N'atabassaamu ekitiibwa ab'amalala newakubadde abakyamira mu bulimba. 
19_40_5_Ebikolwa eby'ekitalo bye wakola, ai Mukama Katonda wange, bingi, N'ebirowoozo byo ebiri gye tuli: Tebiyinzika kukulongookera kinnakimu; Singa mbadde njagala okubibuulira n'okubyogerako, Tebibalika obungi. 
19_40_6_Ssaddaaka n'ebiweebwayo tobisanyukira; Amatu gange ogawulizza: Ebyokebwa n'ebiweebwayo olw'ebibi tewabyagala. 
19_40_7_Ne ndyoka njogera nti Laba nzize; Mu muzingo ogw'ekitabo ekyampandiikwako: 
19_40_8_Nsanyuka okukola by'oyagala, ai Katonda wange; Weewaawo, amateeka go gali mu mutima gwange munda. 
19_40_9_Mbuulidde obutuukirivu mu kibiina ekinene; Laba, ssiibunizenga mimwa gyange, Ai Mukama, ggwe omanyi. 
19_40_10_Sikwekanga butuukirivu bwo mu mutima gwange munda; Mbuulidde obwesige bwo n'obulokozi bwo: Ekisa kyo n'amazima go sibikisanga ekibiina ekinene. 
19_40_11_Naawe, ai Mukama, tonnyima kusaasira kwo okulungi: Ekisa kyo n'amazima go binkuumenga ennaku zonna. 
19_40_12_Kubanga obubi obutabalika bunneetoolodde, Obutali butuukirivu bwange buntuuseeko n'okuyinza ne ssiyinza kutunula waggulu; Businga enviiri ez'oku mutwe gwange obungi, era omutima gwange gundese. 
19_40_13_Kkiriza, ai Mukama, okumponya: Yanguwa okunnyamba, ai Mukama. 
19_40_14_Bakwatibwe ensonyi baswazibwe bonna wamu. Abanoonya emmeeme yange okugizikiriza: Bazzibwe ennyuma banyoomebwe Abo abasanyukira nze okulaba akabi. 
19_40_15_Balekebwe olw'ensonyi zaabwe Abo abansooza. 
19_40_16_Bonna abakunoonya bakusanyukire bajaguze: Abo abaagala obulokozi bwo boogerenga bulijjo nti Mukama agulumizibwe. 
19_40_17_Naye nze ndi mwavu, neetaaga; Mukama andowooza: Ggwe oli mubeezi wange era omulokozi wange; Tolwawo, ai Katonda wange. 
19_41_1_Aweereddwa omukisa oyo ajjukira omwavu: Mukama alimulokola ku lunaku olw'akabi. 
19_41_2_Mukama anaamukuumanga, anaamuwonyanga, era anaaweebwanga omukisa mu nsi; So tomuwangayo eri abalabe be okumukola bye baagala. 
19_41_3_Mukama anaamujjanjabanga ng'ayongobera ku kitanda: Ggwe olongooseza ddala ekiriri kye bw'alwala. 
19_41_4_Nayogera nti Ai Mukama, onsaasire: Omponye emmeeme yange: kubanga nnyonoonye ggwe. 
19_41_5_Abalabe bange banjogerako obubi nti Alifa ddi, erinnya lye ne libula? 
19_41_6_Era ne bw'ajja okundaba, ayogera ebitaliimu; Omutima gwe gwekuŋŋaanyiza obutali butuukirivu: Bw'ava mu nnyumba, abubuulira. 
19_41_7_Bonna abankyawa bangeyera wamu: Bateesa ebigambo okunkola akabi. 
19_41_8_Boogera nti Endwadde embi emukutte: Kaakano bw'agalamidde, tagenda kugolokoka nate. 
19_41_9_Era ne munnange mukwano gwange nze, gwe nneesiga, eyalyanga ku mmere yange, Ansitulidde ekisinziiro kye. 
19_41_10_Naye ggwe, ai Mukama, onsaasire, ongolokose, Ndyoke mbawalanire eggwanga. 
19_41_11_Kyenvudde mmanya ng'onsanyukira, Kubanga omulabe wange tampangula. 
19_41_12_Naye nze, onnyweza nze mu butuukirivu bwange, Era onteeka mu maaso go ennaku zonna. 
19_41_13_Atenderezebwenga Mukama, Katonda wa Isiraeri, Okuva mu mirembe gyonna okutuusa emirembe n'emirembe. Amiina, era Amiina. 
19_42_1_Ng'empeewo bw'ewejjawejja olw'amazzi, Bw'etyo n'emmeeme yange bw'ewejjawejja ku lulwo, ai Katonda. 
19_42_2_Emmeeme yange erumwa enjala ku lwa Katonda, ku lwa Katonda omulamu: Ndituuka ddi ne ndabika mu maaso ga Katonda? 
19_42_3_Amaziga gange ye mmere yange emisana n'ekiro, Bwe baŋŋamba obudde okuzibat nu Katonda wo ali luda wa? 
19_42_4_Bino mbijjukira, ne nfuuka emmeeme yange munda yange, Bwe nnagenda n'ekibiina, ne mbatwala mu nnyumba ya Katonda, N'eddoboozi ery'essanyu n'ery'okutendereza, ekibiina ekyegendereza olunaku. 
19_42_5_Kiki ekikukutamizza, emmeeme yange? Kiki ekikweraliikiriza munda yange? Suubira eri Katonda: kubanga edda ndimutendereza Olw'obulamu obw'amaaso ge. 
19_42_6_Ai Katonda wange, emmeeme yange ekutamye munda yange: Kyenva nkujjuukirira mu nsi ya Yoludaani, Ne ku nsozi Kerumooni, ne ku kasozi Mizali, 
19_42_7_Obuziba bukoowoola obuziba amazzi go ageefuukuula bwe gayira: Amayengo go gonna n'amasingiisira go gampiseeko. 
19_42_8_Naye Mukama anaalagiranga ekisa kyo emisana, N'ekiro oluyimba lwe lunaabeeranga nange. Kwe kusaba Katonda ow'obulamu bwange. 
19_42_9_Ndigamba Katonda olwazi lwange nti Kiki ekikunneerabizza? Lwaki nze okugenda nga nkaaba olw'okujooga kw'omulabe? 
19_42_10_Ng'elutala mu magumba gange, abalabe bange banvuma; Nga baŋŋamba obutayosa nti Katonda wo ali ludda wa? 
19_42_11_Kiki ekikukutamizza, emmeeme yange? Kiki ekikweraliikiriza munda yange? Suubira eri Katonda: kubanga edda ndimutendereza, Bwe bulamu obw'amaaso gange, era Katonda wange. 
19_43_1_Onsalire omusango, ai Katonda, era ompolereze ensonga eri eggwanga eritatya Katonda: Ondokole eri omuntu ow'obulimba atali mutuukirivu. 
19_43_2_Kubanga ggwe oli Katonda wa maanyi gange; kiki ekikunsuuzizza ewala? Lwaki nze okugenda nga nkaaba olw'okujooga kw'omulabe? 
19_43_3_Kale otume omusana gwo n'amazima go; ebyo binnuŋŋamye: Bindeete ku lusozi lwo olutukuvu, Ne mu weema zo. 
19_43_4_Ne ndyoka ŋŋenda ku kyoto kya Katonda, Eri Katonda essanyu lyange eritasingika; Ne ku nnanga ndikutendereza, ai Katonda, Katonda wange. 
19_43_5_Kiki ekikukutamizza, emmeeme yange? Kiki ekikweraliildriza munda yange? Suubira eri Katonda: kubanga edda ndimutendereza, Bwe bulamu obw'amaaso gange; era Katonda wange. 
19_44_1_Twawuliranga n'amatu gaffe; ai Katonda, bajjajja baffe baatubuuliranga, Emirimu gye wakolanga mu nnaku zaabwe, mu nnaku ez'edda. 
19_44_2_Amawanga wagagobamu n'omukono gwo, n'obasigamu bo; Wabonyaabonya amawanga, n'ogasaasaanyiza ddala. 
19_44_3_Kubanga tebaalya nsi olw'ekitala kyabwe, Newakubadde omukono gwabwe si gwe gwabalokola: Wabula omukono gwo ogwa ddyo n'engalo zo, n'omusana ogw'amaaso go, Kubanga baalaba ekisa eri ggwe. 
19_44_4_Ggwe oli kabaka wange, ai Katonda: Lagira obulokozi eri Yakobo. 
19_44_5_Ku bubwo tulisindika abalabe baffe wansi: Olw'erinnya lyo tulirinnyirira abo abatugolokokerako ffe. 
19_44_6_Kubanga ssiryesiga mutego gwange, So ekitala kyange si kye kirindokola. 
19_44_7_Naye ggwe watulokola eri abalabe baffe, Era wabaswaza abatukyawa. 
19_44_8_Mu Katonda mwe twenyumiririza obudde okuziba, Era tuneebazanga erinnya lyo emirembe gyonna. (Seera) 
19_44_9_Naye kaakano otusudde wala, otukwasizza ensonyi; So totabaala n'eggye lyaffe. 
19_44_10_Otuzza nnyuma eri abalabe: N'abo abatukyawa beenyagira. 
19_44_11_Watuwaayo ng'endiga okuba ennyama; Watusaasaanya mu mawanga. 
19_44_12_Abantu bo obatundira bwereere, So n'omuwendo gwabwe togwongezezza ku bugagga bwo. 
19_44_13_Otufuula ekivume eri abaliraanwa baffe, Ekinyoomebwa, ekisekererwa eri abo abatwetoolodde. 
19_44_14_Otufuula olugero mu mawanga, Okunyeenyezebwa kw'omutwe mu bantu. 
19_44_15_Obudde okuziba okunyoomebwa kwange kunjolekedde, N'ensonyi ez'amaaso gange zinsaanikidde, 
19_44_16_Olw'eddoboozi ly'oyo aboggola, avuma; Olw'omulabe n'olw'oyo awalana eggwanga. 
19_44_17_Ebyo byonna bitutuuseeko; naye tetukwerabidde, So tetukoze bya bulimba mu ndagaano yo. 
19_44_18_Omutima gwaffe teguzze nnyuma, So ebigere byaffe tebikyamye kuva mu kkubo lyo; 
19_44_19_Ne we watumenyaamenya ennyo mu kifo elry'ebibe, N'otusaanikiza ekisiikirize eky'okufa. 
19_44_20_Oba nga twerabidde erinnya lya Katonda waffe, Oba tugolodde emikono gyaffe eri katonda omuggya, 
19_44_21_Ekyo Katonda talikikenneenya? Kubanga ebyama eby'omu mutima abimanyi. 
19_44_22_Era tuttibwa obudde okuziba okulangibwa ggwe; Tuli ng'endiga ez'okusalibwa. 
19_44_23_Zuukuka, kiki ekikwebasa, ai Mukama? Golokoka, totusuulanga wala emirembe gyonna. 
19_44_24_Kiki ekikukwesezza amaaso go, N'ebibonoobono byaffe n'okujoogebwa n'obyerabira? 
19_44_25_Kubanga emmeeme yaffe ekutamye mu nfuufu: Olubuto lwaffe lwegasse n'ettaka. 
19_44_26_Golokoka okutuyamba, Otununule olw'ekisa kyo. 
19_45_1_Omutima gwange gujjudde musera ekigambo ekirtmgi: Njogera ebigambo bye mpandiise bya kabaka: Olulimi lwange ye kkalaamu ey'omuwandiisi omwangu. 
19_45_2_Ggwe osinga abaana b'abantu obulungi; Ekisa kifukiddwa ku mimwa gyo: Katonda kyeyava akuwa omukisa emirembe gyonna. 
19_45_3_Weesibe ekitala kyo mu kiwato kyo, ggwe ow'amaanyi. Kye kitiibwa kyo n'obukulu bwo. 
19_45_4_Ne mu bukulu bwo weebagale owangule, Olw'amazima n'obuwombeefu n'obutuukirivu: N'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gulikuyigiriza eby'entiisa. 
19_45_5_Obusaale bwo bwa bwogi; Amawanga gagwa wansi mu maaso go; Buli mu mutima gw'abalabe ba kabaka. 
19_45_6_Entebe yo, ai Katonda, ya lubeerera emirembe gyonna: Omuggo ogw'obutuukirivu gwe muggo ogw'obwakabaka bwo. 
19_45_7_Wayagala obutuukirivu, wakyawa obubi: Katonda, Katonda wo, kyavudde akuteekako Amafuta ag'essanyu okusinga banno. 
19_45_8_Ebyambalo byo byonna biwtmya kaloosa mooli ne akaloosi ne kasiya; Mu mayumba ag'amasanga ennanga zikusanyusizza. 
19_45_9_Mu bakyala bo mulimu abambejja: Ku mukono gwo ogwa ddyo kaddulubaale ayimirira ng'ayambadde zaabu ya Ofiri. 
19_45_10_Wulira, omuwala, olowooze, otege okutu kwo; Era weerabire ekika kyammwe, n'ennyumba ya kitaawo; 
19_45_11_Bw'atyo kabaka anaayagalanga obulungi bwo: Kubanga ye Mukama wo; era omusinze. 
19_45_12_N'omuwala wa Ttuulo alijja n'ekirabo; Era n'abagagga ab'omu bantu balikwegayirira ekisa kyo. 
19_45_13_Omuwala wa kabaka munda mu lubiri wa kitiibwa kyereere: Olugoye lwe lukoleddwamu ne zaabu. 
19_45_14_Anaaleetebwa eri kabaka ng'ayambadde eby'amabala: Bawala banne abamugoberera Banaaleetebwa gy'oli. 
19_45_15_Banaaleetebwa n'okusanyuka n'okujaguza: Banaayingira mu nnyuriba ya kabaka. 
19_45_16_Awali bakitaawo wanaabeeranga abaana bo, B'olifuula abalangira mu nsi zonna. 
19_45_17_Najjukizanga erinnya lyo emirembe gyonna: Amawanga kyeganaavanga kwebaza emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_46_1_Katonda kye kiddukiro n'amaanyigaffe, Omubeezi ddala atabula mu kulaba ennaku. 
19_46_2_Kyetunaavanga tulema okutya, ensi ne bw'eneekyukanga, N'ensozi ne bwe zinaasigukanga mu buziba obw'ennyanja 
19_46_4_Waliwo omugga, emyala gyagwo gisanyusa ekibuga kya Katonda, Ekifo ekitukuvu eky'eweema z'oyo ali waggulu ennyo. 
19_46_5_Katonda ali wakati waakyo; tekiisagaasaganenga: Katonda anaakibeeranga, anaakibeeranga enkya mu matulutulu. 
19_46_6_Amawanga gaayoogaana, obwakabaka ne bwetabula: Yaleeta eddoboozi lye, ensi n'esaanuuka. 
19_46_7_Mukama w'eggye ali wamu naffe; Katonda wa Yakobo kye kiddukiro kyaffe. (Seera) 
19_46_8_Mujje, mulabe ebikolwa bya Mukama, Okuzikiriza kwe yaleeta mu nsi. 
19_46_9_Aggyawo entalo okutuusa ku nkomerero y'ensi; Amenya omutego, n'effumu alikutula; N'amagaali agookya omuliro. 
19_46_10_Musirike mumanye nga nze Katonda: Naagulumizibwanga mu mawanga, Naagulumizibwanga mu nsi. 
19_46_11_Mukama w'eggye ali wamu naffe; Katonda wa Yakobo kye kiddukiro kyaffe. (Seera) 
19_47_1_Mukale mukube mu ngalo, mmwe amawanga gonna; Mwogerere waggulu eri Katonda n'eddoboozi ery'okuwangula. 
19_47_2_Kubanga Mukama ali waggulu ennyo wa ntiisa: Ye kabaka omukulu: afuga ensi zonna. 
19_47_3_Alijeemula abantu ne tubafuga, N'amawanga aligassa wansi w'ebigere byaffe. 
19_47_4_Alitulondera obusika bwaffe, Okuwooma kwa Yakobo gwe yayagala. (Seera) 
19_47_5_Katonda alinaye a'okwogerera waggulu, Mukama alinnye n'eddoboozi ery'akagombe. 
19_47_6_Muyimbe okutendereza Katonda, muyimbe okumutendereza; Muyimbe okutendereza Kabaka waffe, muyimbe okumutendereza: 
19_47_7_Kubanga Katonda ye Kabaka w'ensi zonna: Muyimbe okumutendereza n'amagezi. 
19_47_8_Katonda afuga amawanga: Katonda atuula ku ntebe ye entukuvu. 
19_47_9_Abalangira ab'amawanga bakuŋŋaanye. Okubeera abantu ba Katonda wa Ibulayimu: Kubanga engabo ez'ensi za Katonda; Agulumizibwa nnyo. 
19_48_1_Mukale mukube mu ngalo, mmwe amawanga gonna; Mwogerere waggulu eri Katonda n'eddoboozi ery'okuwangula. 
19_48_2_Kubanga Mukama ali waggulu ennyo wa ntiisa: Ye kabaka omukulu: afuga ensi zonna. 
19_48_3_Alijeemula abantu ne tubafuga, N'amawanga aligassa wansi w'ebigere byaffe. 
19_48_4_Alitulondera obusika bwaffe, Okuwooma kwa Yakobo gwe yayagala. (Seera) 
19_48_5_Katonda alinaye a'okwogerera waggulu, Mukama alinnye n'eddoboozi ery'akagombe. 
19_48_6_Muyimbe okutendereza Katonda, muyimbe okumutendereza; Muyimbe okutendereza Kabaka waffe, muyimbe okumutendereza: 
19_48_7_Kubanga Katonda ye Kabaka w'ensi zonna: Muyimbe okumutendereza n'amagezi. 
19_48_8_Katonda afuga amawanga: Katonda atuula ku ntebe ye entukuvu. 
19_48_9_Abalangira ab'amawanga bakuŋŋaanye. Okubeera abantu ba Katonda wa Ibulayimu: Kubanga engabo ez'ensi za Katonda; Agulumizibwa nnyo. 
19_49_1_Kino mukiwulire, mmwe amawanga gonna; Mutege okutu, mmwe mwenna abali mu nsi: 
19_49_2_Abakopi era n'abakulu, Abagagga n'abaavu awamu. 
19_49_3_Akamwa kange kanaayogera amagezi; N'omutima gwange gunaalowooza eby'okumanya. 
19_49_4_Okutu kwange naakutegera olugero: Naabikkula ekigambo kyange ekizibu n'ennanga. 
19_49_5_Lwaki nze okutya mu nnaku ez'akabi, Obutali butuukirivu bwe buneetooloola ku bisinziiro byange? 
19_49_6_Abeesiga obugagga bwabwe, Ne beenyumiriza olw'ebintu byabwe ebingi 
19_49_8_(Kubanga ekinunulo eky'emmeeme yaabwe kizibu, Era ekigwanira okulekebwanga emirembe gyonna:) 
19_49_9_Alyoke awangaalenga ennaku zonna, Alemenga okulaba okuvunda, 
19_49_10_Kubanga alaba ng'ab'amagezi bafa, Atamanyi n'omusirusiru bazikirira wamu, N'obugagga bwabwe ne babulekera abalala: 
19_49_11_lowooza munda ng'ennyumba zaabwe za nnaku zonna, Ebifo byabwe bya mirembe gyonna; Batuuma ensi zaabwe amannya gaabwe bo. 
19_49_12_Naye omuntu tabeerera mu kitiibwa: Ali ng'ensolo ezizikirira. 
19_49_13_Ekkubo lyabwe eryo bwe busirusiru bwabwe: Naye abantu ababaddirira basiima ebigambo byabwe: (Seera) 
19_49_14_Bateekerwawo magombe ng'ekisibo; Okufa kunaabeeranga omusumba waabwe: Ab'amazima banaabafuganga obudde bwe bulikya; N'obulungi bwabwe buliba obw'emagombe, okubulya, buleme okubeera n'ekifo eky'okutuulamu. 
19_49_15_Naye Katonda alinunula emmeeme yange mu maanyi ag'emagombe; Kubanga ye alinzikiriza. (Seera) 
19_49_16_Totyanga ggwe omuntu bw'agaggawala, Ekitiibwa eky'ennyumba ye bwe kyeyongera: 
19_49_17_Kubanga bw'alifa talitwala kintu: Ekitiibwa kye tekirikka kumugoberera: 
19_49_18_Newakubadde nga yayita emmeeme ye ey'omukisa bwe yali ng'akyali mulamu, Era abantu bakutendereza bwe weekolera wekka obulungi, 
19_49_19_Alikka mu mirembe gya bajjajja be; Tebaliraba musana nate. 
19_49_20_Omuntu alina ekitiibwa n’atategeera, Ali ng'ensolo ezizikirira. 
19_50_1_Katonda, Katonda, Mukama, ayogedde, N'ayita ensi okuva mu buvanjuba okutuuka mu bugwanjuba. Katonda amasamasizza. 
19_50_2_Okuva mu Sayuuni, obulungi obutuukiridde, Katonda amasamasizza. 
19_50_3_Katonda waffe alijja, so talisirika; Omuliro gulirya mu maaso ge, Omuyaga omungi gulimwetooloola. 
19_50_4_Alikoowoola eggulu waggulu, N'ensi, alyoke asalire abantu be omusango: 
19_50_5_Mukugriaanye abatukuvu bange awamu we ndi; Abaalagaana nange endagaano n'essaddaaka. 
19_50_6_N'eggulu liribuulira obumukirivu bwe; Kubanga Katonda ye mulamuzi yennyini. (Seera) 
19_50_7_Muwulire, abantu bange, nange naayogera; Ggwe Isiraeri, nange naakutegeeza; Nze Katonda, Katonda wo. 
19_50_8_Siikunenye lwa ssaddaaka zo; N'ebyokebwa byo biri mu maaso gange bulijjo. 
19_50_9_Siriggya seddume mu nnyumba yo. Newakubadde embuzi ennume mu bisibo byo. 
19_50_10_Kubanga buli nsolo ey'omu kibira yange, N'ente ez'oku nsozi lukumi. 
19_50_11_Ennyonyi zonna ez'oku nsozi nzimanyi: N'ensolo ez'omu nsiko zange. 
19_50_12_Singa nnumwa enjala, sandikubuulidde: Kubanga ensi yange, n'okujjula kwayo. 
19_50_13_Nze naalyanga ennyama eya seddume, Oba naanywanga omusaayi gw'embuzi? 
19_50_14_Owenga Katonda ssaddaaka ey'okwebaza; Osasulenga obweyamo bwo ali waggulu ennyo: 
19_50_15_Era onkoowoolenga ku lunaku olw'okulaba ennaku; Ndikuwonya, naawe olingulumiza nze! 
19_50_16_Naye omubi Katonda amugamba nti Ofaayo ki okubuulira amateeka Bange, N'oyingiza endagaano yange mu kamwa ko? 
19_50_17_Kubanga okyawa okuyigirizibwa, N'ebigambo byange obisuula ennyuma wo. 
19_50_18_Bwe walaba omubbi walagaana naye, Era wassa ekimu n'abenzi. 
19_50_19_Owaayo akamwa ko eri obubi, N'olulimi lwo lukola eby'obulimba. 
19_50_20_Otuula ng'owma muganda wo; Era owaayiriza omwana wa nnyoko. 
19_50_21_Ebyo wabikola, nange ne nsirika; N'olowooza nga nenkanankanira ddala naawe: Naye ndikunenya, ne mbiteeka mu maaso go. 
19_50_22_Kale mulowooze kino, mmwe abeerabira Katonda, Nneme okubataagulataagula, okubulawo alibawonya: 
19_50_23_Buli ampa ssaddaaka ey'okwebaza angulumiza; Naye alongoosa obulungi ekkubo lye Ndimulaga obulokozi bwa Katonda. 
19_51_1_Ya mukulu w'abayimbi Zabbuli ya Dawudi: Nasani nnabbi bwe yajja gy'ali, bwe yali ng'amaze okuyingira eri Basuseba. 
19_51_2_Onsaasire, ai Katonda, mu kisa kyo; Mu bungi obw'okusaasira kwo sangula ebyonoono byange byonna. 
19_51_3_Onnaalize ddala mu bubi bwange, Omiongoose mu kwonoona kwange. 
19_51_4_Ggwe, ggwe wekka, ggwe nnayonoona. Ne nkola ekibi mu maaso go: Obeere omutuukirivu bw'oyogera, Osinge omusango bw'osala. 
19_51_5_Laba, nze natondebwa mu bubi; Ne mu kwonoona mmange mwe yanzaalira. 
19_51_6_Laba, ggwe oyagala eby'omunda eby'amazima; Era mu mwoyo ogutalabika onommanyisa amagezi. 
19_51_7_Ontukuze n'ezoobu, nange naaba mulungi: Onnaaze, nange naaba mutukuvu okusinga omuzira. 
19_51_8_Ompulize essanyu a'okwesiima; Amagumba ge wamenya gasanyuke. 
19_51_9_Okise amaaso go mu bibi byange, Osangule ebyonoono byange byonna. 
19_51_10_Ontondemu omutima omulongoofu, ai Katonda; Onzizeemu omwoyo omulungi munda yange. 
19_51_11_Tongoba w'oli; So tonziyaako omwoyo gwo omutukuvu. 
19_51_12_Onkomezeewo essanyu ery'obulokozi bwo: Onnyweze n'omwoyo ogw'eddembe. 
19_51_13_Ne ndyoka njigiriza amakubo go aboonoonyi; N'abalina ebibi balikyukira gy'oli. 
19_51_14_Omponye mu musango gw'omusaayi, ai Katonda, ggwe Katonda ow'obulokozi bwange; 
19_51_15_Ai Mukama, yasamya emimwa gyange; N'akamwa kange kalyolesa ettendo lyo 
19_51_16_Kubanga tosanyukira ssaddaaka; naakukuwadde; Ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa tebikuwoomera. 
19_51_17_Ssaddaaka za Katonda ye mmeeme emenyese: Omutima ogumenyese era oguboneredde, ai Katonda, toogugayenga. 
19_51_18_Okole bulungi Sayuuni, nga bw'oyagala: Okolere Yerusaalemi bbugwe. 
19_51_19_N'olyoka osanyukira ssaddaaka ez'obutuukirivu, eby'okwokya n'eby'okwokya ebiramba: Ne balyoka bawaayo ente ku kyoto kyo. 
19_52_1_Lwaki okwenyumiriza mu ttima, ggwe omuzira? Okusaasira kwa Katonda kwa lubeerera. 
19_52_2_Olulimi lwo luteesa eby'obubi obwereere; Ng'akamwano ak'obwogi, lukola n'obulimba. 
19_52_3_Oyagala ebibi okusinga ebirungi, N'okulimba okusinga okwatula amazima. (Seera) 
19_52_4_Oyagala ebigambo byonna ebiruma, Ggwe olulimi olw'obulimba. 
19_52_5_Era ne Katonda bw'atyo anaakuzikirizanga emirembe gyonna, Alikusitula, alikukwakula, alikuggya mu weema yo, Alikusigula okuva mu nsi ey'abalamu. (Seera) 
19_52_6_Era n'abatuukirivu baliraba, balitya, Balimusekerera, nga boogera nti 
19_52_7_Laba, ye wuuyo ataafuula Katonda maanyi ge; Naye ne yeesiga obugagga bwe obungi, Ne yeenyweza mu bubi bwe. 
19_52_8_Naye nze nfaanana ng'omuzeyituuni oguloka ennyo mu nnyumba ya Katonda: Neesiga okusaasira kwa Katonda emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_52_9_Naakwebazanga ennaku zonna, kubanga ggwe wakola bw'otyo : Era naalindiritanga erinnya lyo, kubanga ddungi, mu maaso g'abatukuvu bo. 
19_53_1_Omusirisiru ayogedde mu mutima gwe nti Tewali Katonda. Bavunze, bakoze obubi obw'omuzizo; Tewali akola bulungi. 
19_53_2_Katonda yatunula ku baana b'abantu ng'ayima mu ggulu, Alabe nga waliwo abategeera, Abanoonya Katonda. 
19_53_3_Buli muntu mu abo azze ennyuma; bonna bagwagwawadde wamu; Tewali akola bulungi, tewali n'omu. 
19_53_4_Abakola obubi tebalina magezi? Abalya abantu bange, nga bwe balya emmere, Ne batakaabira Katonda. 
19_53_5_Awatali kya kutya we batiira ennyo: Kubanga Katonda asaasaanyizza amagumba g'oyo akukolako olusiisira; Obakwasizza ensonyi, kubanga Katonda yabagoba. 
19_53_6_Singa obulokovu bwa Isiraeri bulabise nga buvudde mu Sayuuni! Katonda bw'alikomyawo abantu be abaanyagibwa,Yakobo n'alyoka asaayuka, Isiraeri alijaguza. 
19_54_1_Ndokola, ai Katonda, n'erinnya lyo, Onsalire omusaago mu maanyi go. 
19_54_2_Wulira okusaba kwange, si Katonda; Otege okutu eri ebigambo eby'akamwa kange. 
19_54_3_Kubanga bannaggwanga bangolokokeddeko, N'ab'ekyejo banoonyezza emmeeme yange: Tebateese Katonda mu maaso gaabwe. (Seera) 
19_54_4_Laba, Katonda ye mubeezi wange: Mukama ali wamu n'abo abanyweza emmeeme yange. 
19_54_5_Aliwalana obubi obwo ku balabe bange: Obazikirize mu mazima go. 
19_54_6_Ssaddaaka ey'omwoyo ogw'eddembe gye ndikuwa ggwe: Neebazanga erinnya lyo, si Mukama, kubanga ddungi. 
19_54_7_Kubanga anziye mu kweraliikirira kwonna; N'eriiso lyange lirabye bye njagala nga bituuse ku balabe bange. 
19_55_1_Tega okutu eri okusaba kwange, ai Katonda; So teweekweka obutawulira kwegayirira kwange. 
19_55_2_Mpulira, onziremu: Okwemulugunya kwange kunteganya, ne nsinda 
19_55_4_Omwoyo gunnuma nnyo munda yange: N'entiisa ey'okufa enguddeko. 
19_55_5_Okutya n'okukankana kuntuuseeko, N'okwekanga kunnumbye. 
19_55_6_Ne njogera nti Singa mbadde n’ebiwaawaatiro ng'ejjiba Nandibuuse, ne rMenda, ne mpummula. 
19_55_7_Laba, nandikyamidde wala, Nandisuze mu ddungu. (Seera) 
19_55_8_Nandyanguye okudduka mu kiddukiro Okuva mu muyaga n'empewo ennyingi. 
19_55_9_Bazikirize, ai Mukama, oyawule ennimi zaabwe: Kubanga ndabye ettima n'okuyomba mu kibuga. 
19_55_10_Emisana n'ekiro batambulatambula ku bbugwe waakyo: Era obubi n'ettima biri wakati mu kyo. 
19_55_11_Okwonoona kuli wakati mu kyo: Okujooga n'obukuusa tebiva mu nguudo zaakyo. 
19_55_12_Kubanga omulabe si ye yaavuma; Nandiyiazizza okugumiikiriza: So si oyo eyankyawa eyanneegulumirizaako; Nandyekwese mu maaso ge: 
19_55_13_Wabula ggwe, muntu munnange, Eyatambula nange, mukwano gwange gwe namanyiira ennyo. 
19_55_14_Twateesanga ebigambo n'essanyu fembi, Twatambulanga mu nnyumba ya Katonda n'ekibiina. 
19_55_15_Okufa kubatuukeko nga tebalowooza, Bakke mu bunnya nga bakyali balamu: Kubanga obubi buli mu nnyumba yaabwe, mu bo wakati. 
19_55_16_Akawungeezi n'enkya ne mu ttuntu neemulugunyanga ne nsindanga: Naye anaawuliranga eddoboozi lyanye. 
19_55_17_Yanunula emmeeme yange mu mirembe mu lutalo olwali lugenda okunsinga: Kubanga abaali balwana nange bangi. 
19_55_18_Yanunula emmeeme yange mu mirembe mu lutalo olwali lugenda okunsinga: Kubanga abaali balwana nange bangi. 
19_55_19_Katonda aliwulira, alibaddamu, ye oyo abeerera edda n'edda lyonna, (Seera) Alibaddamu abo abatalaba biggya, Abatatya Katonda. 
19_55_20_Yagolola emikono gye ku abo abaali batabaganye naye: Yanyooma endagaano ye. 
19_55_21_Akamwa ke kaali kagonvu ng'omuzigo, Naye omutima gwe kulwana: Ebigambo bye byagonda okusinga amafuta, Naye byali bitala ebisowoddwamu. 
19_55_22_Gussenga omugugu gwo ku Mukama, naye anaakuwaniriranga: Taaganyenga abatuukirivu okujjulukuka ennaku zonna. 
19_55_23_Naye ggwe, ai Katonda, olibassa mu bunnya obw'okuzikirira: Abantu abaagala omusaayi n'ab'obulimba tebalimala kitundu kya nnaku zaabwe; Naye nze neesiganga ggwe. 
19_56_1_Onsaasire, ai Katonda; kubanga abantu baagala okummira nze: Bazibya obudde nga balwana nga banjooga. 
19_56_2_Abalabe bange baagala okummira obudde okuziba: Kubanga abalwana nange n'amalala bangi. 
19_56_3_Buli lwe nnaatyanga, Neesiganga ggwe. 
19_56_4_Mu Katonda ndyebaza ekigambo kye: Katonda gwe nneesize, siritya; Ab'omubiri bayinza kunkola ki? 
19_56_5_Bakyusa ebigambo byange okuzibya obudde: Ebirowoozo byabwe byonna bimbaako olw'obubi. 
19_56_6_Beekuŋŋaanya, beekweka, Bakebera ebisinde byange, Nga bwe baateega emmeeme yange. 
19_56_7_Baliwona olw'obutali butuukirivu? Mu busungu suula amawanga, ai Katonda. 
19_56_8_Ggwe obala okutambulatambula kwange: Oteeke amaziga gange mu kasumbi ko; Tegawandiikibwa mu kitabo kyo? 
19_56_9_Abalabe bange ne balyoka badda ennyuma ku lunaku lwe ndikaabiriramu: Kino kye mmanyi, nga Katonda ali ku lwange. 
19_56_10_Mu Katonda nditendereza ekigambo kye: Mu Mukama nditendereza ekigambo kye. 
19_56_11_Katonda gwe nneesize, siritya; Abantu bayinza okuakola ki? 
19_56_12_Ebirayiro byo biri ku nze, ai Katonda: Ndisasula ssaddaaka ez'okwebaza eri ggwe. 
19_56_13_Kubanga wawoaya emmeeme yange okufa: Tewawonya bigere byange okwesittala? Ndyoke ntambule mu maaso ga Katonda mu musana ogw'abantu abalamu. 
19_57_1_Onsaasire, ai Katonda, onsaasire; Kubanga emmeeme yange yeeyuna ggwe: Weewaawo, mu kisiikirize eky'ebiwaawaatiro byo mwe nneeyunanga, Okutuusa ebibonooboao ebyo lwe biriggwaawo. 
19_57_2_Ndikoowoola Katonda all waggulu ennyo; Katonda ankolera byonna. 
19_57_3_Alituma ng'ayima mu ggulu, n'andokola, Oyo gyagaa okummira bw'anvuma; (Seera) Katoada alituma okusaasira kwe n'amazima ge. 
19_57_4_Emmeeme yange eri mu mpologoma; Ngalamidde mu abo abaaka n'omuliro, Be baana b'abantu, amannyo gaabwe ge mafumu n'obusaale, N'olulimi lwabwe kye kitala eky'obwogi: 
19_57_5_Bakugulumize, ai Katonda, okusinga eggulu; Ekitiibwa kyo kibeere ku nsi zonna. 
19_57_6_Bateekeddeteekedde akatimba ebigere byange; Emmeeme yange ekutamye: Bansimidde obunnya mu kkubo lyange; Babuguddemu wakati bo bennyini. (Seera) 
19_57_7_Omutima gwange gunywedde, ai Katonda, omutima gwange gunywedde: Ndiyimba, weewaawo, ndiyimba eby'okutendereza. 
19_57_8_Zuukuka, ggwe ekitiibwa kyange; zuukuka, entoagooli n'ennanga: Nze nzekka naazuukuka enkya mu matulutulu. 
19_57_9_Ndikwebaliza ggwe, ai Mukama, mu bantu: Ndiyimba eby'okukutendereza ggwe mu mawanga. 
19_57_10_Kubanga ekisa kyo kingi, kituuka mu ggulu, N'amazima go gatuuka mu bbanga. 
19_57_11_Bakugulumize, ai Katonda, Okusinga eggulu; Ekitiibwa kyo kibeere ku asi zonna. 
19_58_1_Okwogera mwogera eby'obutuukirivu nga musirika? Musala omusango ogw'amazima, mmwe abaana ba bantu? 
19_58_2_Naye mu mitima gyammwe mukola eby'obubi; Ettima ery'emikono gyammwe gwe musango gwe musala mu nsi. 
19_58_3_Ababi bakyama okuva mu lubuto: Bwe bazaalibwa, amangu ago ne beekooloobya, nga boogera eby'obulimba. 
19_58_4_Obusagwa bwabwe buli ng'obusagwa obw'omusota: Bali nga ssalambwa eritawulira rizibikira amatu gaalyo 
19_58_6_Ai Katonda, omenye amannyo gaabwe mu bumwa bwabwe: Omenyere ddala amasongezo g'empologoma ento, ai Mukama. 
19_58_7_Basaanuuke ng'amazzi agakulukuta amangu: Bw'ateeba n'obusaale bwe, babe nga bazikirizibwa. 
19_58_8_Babe ng'ekkovu erisaanuuka eriggwaawo: Era ng'omwana omukazi gw'ataasa, atalabanga ku musana. 
19_58_9_Entamu zammwe nga tezinnabuguma n'amaggwa, Aligaggirawo ddala n'embuyaga, amabisi n'ago agaaka gonna. 
19_58_10_Omutuukirivu alisanyuka, bw'aliraba okuwalana okwo: Alinaaba ebigere bye mu musaayi gw'ababi. 
19_58_11_Abantu ne balyoka boogera nti Mazima waliwo empeera omutuukirivu gy'aliweebwa: Mazima waliwo Katonda asala omusango mu nsi. 
19_59_1_Ondokole mu balabe bange, ai Katonda wange: Ongulumize eri abo abangolokokerako. 
19_59_2_Ondokole eri abo abakola obutali butuukirivu, Omponye eri abo abaagala omusaayi. 
19_59_3_Kubanga, laba, bateega emmeeme yange; Ab'amaanyi bakuŋŋaana okunnumba: Si lwa kyonoono kyange, so si lwa kibi kyange, ai Mukama. 
19_59_4_Baddukana, beeteekateeka nga sikoze bubi: Ozunkuke onnyambe, olabe. 
19_59_5_Ggwe, ai Mukama Katonda ow'eggye, Katonda wa Isiraeri, Ogolokoke obuulirire amawanga gonna: Tosaasiranga muntu yenna omwonoonyi omubi. (Seera) 
19_59_6_Bakomawo akawungeezi, bakaaba ng'embwa, Beetooloola ekibuga. 
19_59_7_Laba, beebajjagala n'akamwa kaabwe; Ebitala biri mu mimwa gyabwe: Kubanga boogera nti Ani awulira? 
19_59_8_Naye ggwe, Mukama, olibasekerera; Oliduulira amawanga gonna. 
19_59_9_Ai amaanyi gange, naakulindiriranga ggwe: Kubanga Katonda kye kigo kyange ekiwanvu. 
19_59_10_Katonda ow'okusaasirwa kwange anankulemberanga: Katonda anandabyanga bye njagala nga bituuse ku balabe bange. 
19_59_11_Tobatta, abantu bange baleme okwerabira: Obasaasaanye n'amaanyi go, obatoowaze, Ai Mukama engabo yaffe. 
19_59_12_Olw'okwonoona kw'akamwa kaabwe, olw'ebigambo by'emimwa gyabwe, Bakwatibwe nga beenyumiriza, Era n'olw'okukolima n'obulimba bye boogera. 
19_59_13_Obazikirize mu busungu, obazikirize, balemenga okubaawo nate: Era bategeerenga nga Katonda afugira mu Yakobo, Okutuuka ku nkomerero z'ensi. (Seera) 
19_59_14_Era akawungeezi bakomewo, bakaabe ng'embwa, Beetooloole ekibuga. 
19_59_15_Balitambulatambula nga banoonya emmere, Balikeesa obudde bwe batalikkuta. 
19_59_16_Naye nze naayimbanga ku maanyi go; Weewaawo, naayimbiranga ddala ku kusaasira kwo enkya: Kubanga wali kigo kyange ekiwanvu, N'ekiddukiro ku lunaku olw'okutegana kwange. 
19_59_17_Ggwe, ai amaanyi gange, gwe nnaayimbiranga okukutendereza: Kubanga Katonda kye kigo kyange ekiwanvu, Katonda wa kusaasirwa kwange. 
19_60_1_Ai Katonda, otusudde, otumenyeemenye; Wasunguwala; otukomyewo, tukwegayiridde. 
19_60_2_Wakankanya ensi; wagyasa: Ozibe enjatika zaayo; kubanga eyuuga. 
19_60_3_Abantu bo obalaze ebigambo ebizibu: otunywesezza omwenge ogw'okutagatta. 
19_60_4_Owadde ebendera abo abakutya, Eyolesebwe olw'amazima. (Seera) 
19_60_5_Muganzi wo alyoke awoayezebwe, Lokola n'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo, otuddemu. 
19_60_6_Katonda yayogera mu butukuvu bwe; nti Ndijaguza: Ndisala mu Sekemu, era ndigabaagaba ekiwonvu ekya Sukkosi. 
19_60_7_Gireyaadi wange) era Manase wange; Efulayimu naye yakuuma omutwe gwange; Yuda gwe muggo gwange ogw'obwakabaka. 
19_60_8_Mowaabu kye kinaabirwamu kyange; Edomu ndimukastikira engatto yange: Ggwe Firisutiya, yogerera waggulu ku lwange. 
19_60_9_Ani alinnyingiza mu kibuga eky'amaanyi? Ani eyandeeta mu Edomu? 
19_60_10_Totusudde, ai Katonda? So totabaala, ai Katonda, n'eggye lyaffe. 
19_60_11_Otuyambe eri omulabe: Kubanga obuyambi bw'abantu tebuliimu. 
19_60_12_Katonda ye anaatukozanga eby'obuzira: Kubanga oyo ye anaalinnyiriranga ku balabe baffe. 
19_61_1_Owulire okukaaba kwange, ai Katonda; Olowooze okusaba kwange. 
19_61_2_Nga nnyima ku nkomerero z'ensi naakukoowoolanga; omutima gwange bwe gunaazirikanga: Onnuŋŋamye eri ejjinja erinsinga obugulumivu. 
19_61_3_Kubanga wali kiddukiro gye ndi, Ekigo eky'amaanyi eri omulabe. 
19_61_4_Naatuulanga mu weema yo emirembe gyonna: Neeyunanga ekisiikirize eky'ebiwaawaatiro byo. (Seera) 
19_61_5_Kubanga ggwe, ai Katonda, owulidde obweyamo bwange: Ompadde obusika bw'abo abaagala erinnya lyo. 
19_61_6_Olyongera ku nnaku ez'obulamu bwa kabaka: Emyaka gye giriba ng'emirembe emingi. 
19_61_7_Alibeerera mu maaso ga Katonda ennaku zonna: Kale teekateeka ekisa n'amazima, biryoke bimuwonye. 
19_61_8_Ne ndyoka nnyimba okutendereza erinnya lyo ennaku zonna; Ntuukirize buli lunaku obweyamo bwange. 
19_62_1_Emmeeme yange erindirira Katonda yekka: Oyo obulokozi bwange mwebuva. 
19_62_2_Ye yekka lye jjinja lyange era bwe bulokozi bwange: Kye kigo kyange ekiwanvu; sirisagaasagana nnyo. 
19_62_3_Mulituusa wa okulumba omuntu, Okumutta, mmwe mwenna, Ng'ekisenge ekyewunzise, ng'olukomera oluyuuguuma? 
19_62_4_Kino kyokka kye bateesa okumujeeza mu bukulu bwe; Basanyukira eby'obulimba: Boogera eby'omukisa n'akamwa kaabwe, naye bakolima munda. 
19_62_5_Emmeeme yange, lindirira Katonda yekka; Kubanga oyookusubira kwange mwe kuva. 
19_62_6_Ye yekka lye jjinja lyange era bwe bulokozi bwange: Oyo kye kigo kyange ekiwanvu: sirisagaasagana. 
19_62_7_Awali Katonda we wali obulokozi bwange n'ekitiibwa kyange: Ejjinja ery'amaanyi gange n'ekiddukiro kyange biri mu Katonda. 
19_62_8_Mumwesige ye mu biro byonna, mmwe abantu; Mufuke omutima gwammwe mu maaso ge: 
19_62_9_Mazima abantu abatali ba kitiibwa gwe mukka, n'abo ab'ekitiibwa ekingi bwe bulimba: Bwe baliteekebwa mu kigera, baliyimuka; Bombiriri omukka gubasinga okuzitowa: 
19_62_10_Temwesiganga kujooga, Temugobereranga ebitaliimu mu kunyaga: Obugagga bwe buneeyongeranga, temubussangako mwoyo. 
19_62_11_Katonda yayogera omulundi gumu, Mpulidde bwe ntyo emirundi ebiri; Nga Katonda ye nannyini buyinza: 
19_62_12_Era ggwe, ai Mukama, olina okusaasira: Kubanga osasula buli muntu ng'omulimu gwe bwe guli. 
19_63_1_Ai Katonda, ggwe oli Katonda wange; naakeeranga okukunoonya Emmeeme yange erumwa ennyonta eri ggwe, omubiri gwange gwegomba ggwe, Mu nsi enkalu ekooyesa, omutali mazzi. 
19_63_2_Bwe ntyo bwe nnakutunuulira_ nga mu watukuvu, Okulaba obuyinza bwo n'ekitiibwa kyo. 
19_63_3_Kubanga ekisa kyo kiwooma okusinga obulamu; Emimwa gyange ginaakutenderezanga. 
19_63_4_Bwe ntyo bwe nnaakwebazanga nga nkyali mulamu: Naayimusanga emikono gyange mu linnya lyo. 
19_63_5_Emmeeme yange enekkusibwanga ag'obusomyo n'amasavu; N'akamwa kange kanaakutenderezanga n'emimwa egisanyuka 
19_63_7_Kubanga wabeera mubeezi wange, Era mu kisiikirize eky'ebiwaawaatiro byo mwe nnaasanyukiranga. 
19_63_8_Emmeeme yange efuga okukugoberera: Omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gumpanirira. 
19_63_9_Naye abo abanoonya emmeeme yange okugizikiriza, Baligenda wansi w'ettaka. 
19_63_10_Baliweebwayo eri amaanyi ag'ekitala: Balibeera mugabo gwa bibe. 
19_63_11_Naye kabaka alisanyukira Katonda: Buli amulayira ye alyenyumiriza; Kubanga akamwa k'abo aboogera eby'obulimba kalizibibwa. 
19_64_1_Gwulirenga eddoboozi lyange, ai Katonda, mu kwemulugunya kwange: Okuumenga obulamu bwange nnemenga okutya omulabe. 
19_64_2_Onkweke eri abakozi b'obubi abateesa mu kyama; N'eri okuyoogaana kw'abo abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu: 
19_64_3_Abawagadde olulimi lwabwe ng'ekitala, Abateebye obusaale bwabwe bye bigambo eby'obukambwe: 
19_64_4_Balasize oyo eyatuukirira mu bifo eby'ekyama: Baamulasa nga talaba, ne batatya. 
19_64_5_Bagumyagana emyoyo mu kuteesa obubi; Bateesa okutega emitego mu kyama; Boogera nti Anaagiraba ani? 
19_64_6_Banoonya ebitali bya butuukirivu; boogera nti Tumaze okunoonyeza ddala nga tufuba: N'okulowooza okw'omunda okwa buli muntu, n'omutima gwabwe, biri ng'obuziba. 
19_64_7_Naye Katonda alibalasa; Balifumitibwa n’akasaale nga tebalowooza. 
19_64_8_Bwe batyo bwe baneesittazibwanga, olulimi lwabwe bennyini nga lubagwisa: Bonna abanaabalabanga banaanyeenyanga emitwe gyabwe. 
19_64_9_Era abantu bonna banaatyanga; Ne batendera omulimu gwa Katonda, Ne baowooza n'amagezi bye yakola. 
19_64_10_Omutuukirivu anaasanyukiranga Mukama, era anaamwesiganga; Era bonna abalina emitima egy'amazima baneenyumirizanga. 
19_65_1_Ettendo likuiadirira, ai Katonda, mu Sayuuni: Era ggwe gwe banaatuukiriri zanga obweyamo. 
19_65_2_Ai ggwe awulira okusaba, Bonna abalina omubiri balijja gy'oli. 
19_65_3_Ebitali bya butuukirivu binsinze: Okwonoona kwaffe olikunaaliza ddala. 
19_65_4_Alina omukisa oyo gw'olonda, era gw'osembeza gy'oli. Abeerenga mu mpya zo: Tunakkusibwanga obulungi obw'ennyumba yo, Awatukuvu mu yeekaalu yo. 
19_65_5_N'ebigambo eby'entiisa olituddamu mu butuukirivu, Ai Katonda ow'obulokozi bwaffe; Ggwe enkomerero zonna ez'ensi gwe zeesiga, N'abo abali ewala ku nnyanja: 
19_65_6_Oyo yanyweza ensozi n'amaanyi ge: Nga yeesiba obuyinza: 
19_65_7_Asirisa okuwuuma kw'ennyanja, Okuwuuma kw'amayengo gaayo, N'okuyoogaana kw'amawanga. 
19_65_8_Era n'abo abatuula ku nkomerero z'ensi batya olw'obubonero bwo: Ggwe osanyusa emiryango gy'enkya n'egy'akawungeezi. 
19_65_9_Okyalira ensi, n'ogifukirira, Ogigaggawaza nnyo; Omugga gwa Katonda gujjudde amazzi: Obalabira eŋŋaano, ng'omaze okulongoosa ensi bw'otyo. 
19_65_10_Ofukirira ensalosalo zaayo amazzi amangi; Olongoosa ebibibi byayo: Ogigonza n'oluwandaggirize; Okuwa omukisa okumera kwayo. 
19_65_11_Oteelya engule ku mwaka, bwe bulungi bwo; N'amakubo go gatonnyesa obugimu. 
19_65_12_Gatonnyesa mu malundiro ag'omu ddungu: N'obusozi bwesiba essanyu. 
19_65_13_Amalundiro gambala ebisibo; Era n'ebiwoavu bibikkiddwa eŋŋaano: Byogerera waggulu olw'essanyu, era biyimba. 
19_66_1_Leeta eddoboozi ery'essanyu eri Katonda, ensi yonna: 
19_66_2_Yimbira waggulu ekitiibwa eky'erinnya lye: Gulumiza ettendo lye libe n'ekitiibwa. 
19_66_3_Katonda nti Emirimu gyo nga gya atiisa! Olw'obuyinza bwo obungi abalabe bo balikujeemukira. 
19_66_4_Ensi yonna erikusinza, Erikuyimbira ggwe; Baliyimbira erinnya lyo. (Seera) 
19_66_5_Mujje mulabe emirimu gya Katonda; Ye w'entiisa mu by'akola eri abaana b'abantu. 
19_66_6_Ennyanja yagifuula olukalu: Baayita mu mugga n'ebigere: Awo we twamusanyukirira. 
19_66_7_Afuga n'amaanyi ge emirembe gyonna; Amaaso ge gatunuulira amawaaga: Abajeemu balemenga okwegulumiza. (Seera) 
19_66_8_Kale, mmwe amawanga, mumwebazenga Katonda waffe, Muwulize eddoboozi erimutendereza: 
19_66_9_Akwatirira emmeeme yaffe obutafa, Era ataganya bigere byaffe okusagaasagana. 
19_66_10_Kubanga ggwe, ai Katonda, watugeza: Watukema nga bwe bakema effeeza. 
19_66_11_Watuyingiza mu kitimba; Wateeka omugugu omuzito ku biwato byaffe. 
19_66_12_Weebagaza abantu okulinnya ku mitwe gyaffe; Twayita mu muliro ne mu mazzi; Naye watuggyamu n'otuyingiza mu kifo eky'obugagga. 
19_66_13_Naayingira mu nnyumba yo n'ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa, Naakusasula obweyamo bwange, 
19_66_14_Emimwa gyange bwe gyayogera, N'akamwa kange bwe kaayatula, bwe nnalaba ennaku. 
19_66_15_Naakuwa ebyokwokya ebya ssava, N'ebyokwoteza eby'endiga eza seddume; Naawaayo ente n'embuzi. (Seera) 
19_66_16_Mujje muwuiire, mwenna abatya Katonda, Nange ne mbuulira bye yakolera emmeeme yange. 
19_66_17_Namukoowoola n’akamwa kange, Era yatenderezebwa n'olulimi lwange. 
19_66_18_Bwe mba ndowooza obutali butuukirivu mu mutima gwange, Mukama taawulire: 
19_66_19_Naye mazima Katonda awulidde; Alowoozezza eddoboozi ery'okusaba kwange. 
19_66_20_Katonda yeebazibwe, Atagobye kusaba kwange, so tannyimye kusaasira kwe. 
19_67_1_Katonda atusaasirenga, atuwenga omukisa. Atwakizenga amaaso ge; (Seera) 
19_67_2_Ekkubo lyo limanyibwenga mu nsi, Obulamu bwo obulokola bumanyibwenga mu mawanga gonna. 
19_67_3_Abantu bakutenderezenga, ai Katonda; Abantu bonna bakutenderezenga. 
19_67_4_Kale, amawanga gasanyukenga gayimbenga olw'essanyu: Kubanga olisalira abantu emisango egy'ensonga, Era olifugira amawanga mu nsi. (Seera) 
19_67_5_Abantu bakutenderezenga, ai Katonda; Abantu bonna bakutenderezenga, 
19_67_6_Ensi ereese ekyengera kyayo: Katonda, ye Katonda waffe, anaatuwanga omukisa. 
19_67_7_Katonda anaatuwanga omukisa; N'enkomerero zonna ez'ensi zinaamutyanga. 
19_68_1_Katonda agolokoke, abalabe be basaasaane; Era n'abo abamukyawa badduke mu maaso ge. 
19_68_2_Ng'omukka bwe gugobebwa, obagobe bw'otyo: Ng'enwmbo bw'esaanuuka ku muliro, Ababi bazikirire bwe batyo awali Katonda. 
19_68_3_Naye abatuukirivu basanyuke; bajagulize mu maaso ga Katonda: Weewaawo, bajaguze n'essanyu. 
19_68_4_Mumuyimbire Katonda, muyimbe okutendereza erinnya lye: Mumukubire oluguudo oyo eyeebagalira mu malungu; YA lye linnya lye; era mujagulize mu maaso ge. 
19_68_5_Kitaabwe w'abo abatalina bakitaabwe, era asalira bannamwandu omusango, Katonda mu kifo kye ekitukuvu ky'atuulamu. 
19_68_6_Katonda awa abawuulu ennyumba: Aggya abasibe (mu kkomera) okulaba ebirungi: Naye abajeemu batuula mu nsi ekaze. 
19_68_7_Ai Katonda, bwe wakulembera abantu bo, Bwe watambula mu ddungu; (Seera) 
19_68_8_Ensi n'ekankana, Eggulu ne ligwa mu maaso ga Katonda: Olusozi luli Sinaayi ne lukankanira mu maaso ga Katonda, Katonda wa Isiraeri. 
19_68_9_Ggwe, ai Katonda, watonnyesa enkuba nnyingi, N'onyweza obusika bwo, bwe bwali nga bukooye. 
19_68_10_Ekibiina kyo kyatuula omwo: Ggwe, ai Katonda; wateekerateekera abaavu olw'obulungi bwo. 
19_68_11_Mukama yawa ekigambo: Abakazi ababuulira ebigambo lye ggye eringi. 
19_68_12_Bakabaka b'eggye badduka, badduka: Omukazi asigala eka ye agaba omunyago. 
19_68_13_Muligalamira mu bisibo by'endiga, Ng'ebiwaawaatiro by'ejjiba ebibikkibwako effeeza, N'ebyoya byalyo ebiriko ezaabu emmyufu? 
19_68_14_Omuyinza w'ebintu byotuza bwe yasaasaanyiza omwo bakabaka, Kyali nga omuzira bwe gutonnya mu Zalumoni. 
19_68_15_Olusozi Basani lwe lusozi lwa Katonda; Olusozi Basani lwe lusozi oluwanvu. 
19_68_16_Kiki ekibaluziimuuza, mmwe ensozi empanvu, Olusozi Katonda lwe yayagala okulutuulako? Weewaawo, Mukama anaalutuulangako emirembe gyonna. 
19_68_17_Amagaali ga Mukama bwe bukumi obubiri, ze nkumi n’enkumi: Mukama ali mu ago, nga ku Sinaayi, mu watukuvu. 
19_68_18_Olinnye waggulu, osibye obusibe bwo; Oweereddwa ebirabo mu Bantu, Era ne mu bajeemu, Mukama Katonda alyoke atuulenga wamu nabo. 
19_68_19_Mukama atenderezebwenga atusitulira omugugu gwaffe buli lunaku, Ye Katonda, bwe bulokozi bwaffe. (Seera) 
19_68_20_Katonda ye Katonda ow'okuwonyanga gye tuli; Era Yakuwa Mukama ye nannyini kuwonya mu kufa. 
19_68_21_Naye Katonda alifumita omutwe gw'abalabe be, N'obwezinge obuliko enviiri obwa buli muntu anyiikira okuzza omusango. 
19_68_22_Mukama yayogera nti Ndikomyawo okuva mu Basani, Ndibakomyawo okuva mu buziba bw'ennyanja: 
19_68_23_Olyoke onnyike ekigere kyo mu musaayi, Olulimi lw'embwa zo lubeerenga n'omugabo gwalwo eri abalabe bo. 
19_68_24_Balabye bw'otambula, ai Katonda, Ggwe Katonda wange, Kabaka wange, bw'otambula ng'oyingira mu watukuvu. 
19_68_25_Abayimbi bakulembedde, abakubi b'ennanga bagoberedde, Wakati mu bawala abakuba ebitaasa. 
19_68_26_Mwebalize Katonda mu bibiina, Ye Mukama, mmwe ab'oluzzi lwa Isiraeri. 
19_68_27_Waliwo Benyamini omuto abafuga, Waliwo abalangira ba Yuda n'abateesa nabo, Waliwo abalangira ba Zebbulooni, abalangira ba Nafutaali. 
19_68_28_Katonda wo alagidde amaanyi go: Onywezenga, ai Katonda, kye watukolera. 
19_68_29_Olwa yeekaalu yo eri mu Yerusaalemi, Bakabaka kyebanaavanga bakuleetera ebirabo. 
19_68_30_Onenye ensolo ey'omu bitoogo, Ente ennyingi eza seddume, n'ennyana ez'amawanga, Ng'olinnyirira ebitundu eby'effeeza n'ebigere byo; Asaasaanyizza amawanga agasanyukira entalo. 
19_68_31_Abalangira baliva mu Misiri; Kuusi eryanguwa okugolola emikono gye eri Katonda. 
19_68_32_Muyimbire Katonda, mmwe amatwale g'ensi; Kale muyimbe okutendereza Mukama; (Seera)
