19_68_33_Oyo eyeebagala ku ggulu eriri waggulu w'eggulu, eryabaawo edda n'edda lyonna; Laba, ayogera n'eddoboozi lye, lye ddoboozi ery'amaanyi. 
19_68_34_Mumuwe Katonda amaanyi: Obulungi bwe bufuga Isiraeri, N'amaanyi ge gali mu ggulu. 
19_68_35_Ai Katonda, oli wa ntiisa ng'oyima mu bifo byo ebitukuvu: Katonda wa Isiraeri yawa amaanyi n'obuyinza abantu be. Katonda yeebazibwe. 
19_69_1_Ndikola, ai Katonda; Kubanga amazzi gayingidde ne gatuuka ku mmeeme yange. 
19_69_2_Ntubira mu bitosi ebiwanvu awatali kuyimirira: Ntuuse mu buziba amazzi amangi we gampitirako. 
19_69_3_Okukaaba kwange kunkooyesezza; obulago bwange bukaze: Amaaso gange ganzibye nga nnindirira Katonda wange. 
19_69_4_Abankyayira obwereere basinga enviiri ez'oku mutwe gwange obungi: Abaagala okunzikiriza, kubanga be balabe bange awatali nsonga, ba maanyi: Ne ndyoka nziza kye saabaggyaako. 
19_69_5_Ai Katonda, ggwe omanyi obusirusiru bwange: N'okwonoona kwange tekukisibwa ggwe. 
19_69_6_Abakulindirira ggwe balemenga okukwatibwa ensonyi ku lwange, ai Mukama Katonda ow'eggye: Abakunoonya ggwe balemenga okuswazibwa ku lwange, ai Katonda wa Isiraeri. 
19_69_7_Kubanga banvusna okunnanga ggwe; Ensonyi zibisse amaaso gange. 
19_69_8_Nfuuse munnaggwanga eri baganda bange, Era atali mumanyi eri abaana ba mmange. 
19_69_9_Kubanga obuggya obw'ennyumba yo bundidde; N'ebivume by'abo abakuvuma ggwe binguddeko. 
19_69_10_Ewe nnakaaba amaziga, emmeeme yange n'esiiba enjala, Ekyo kye kyanvumya. 
19_69_11_Bwe nnayambala ebibukutu, Ne mbafuukira eŋŋombo. 
19_69_12_Abatuula mu mulyango banjogerako, Era ndi luyimba lwa batamiivu. 
19_69_13_Naye nze, okusaba kwange kuli eri ggwe, ai Mukama, mn kiseera eky'okukkiririzaamu: Ai Katonda, mu kusaasira kwo okungi, Onziremu mu mazima ag'obulokozi bwo. 
19_69_14_Onnyinyulule mu bitosi, nneme okutubira: Ndokoke eri abo abankyawa ne mu mazzi ag'eddubi. 
19_69_15_Amazzi amangi galeme okumpangula, Newakubadde obuziba buleme okummira; Newakubadde obunnya buleme okunzibira akamwa kaabwo. 
19_69_16_Onziremu, ai Mukama; kubanga ekisa kyo kirungi: Ng'okusaasira kwo bwe kuli okungi, onkyukire. 
19_69_17_So tokisa amaaso go omuddu wo; Kubanga ndi mu nnaku; oyanguwe okunziramu. 
19_69_18_Osemberere emmeeme yange, oginunule: Ompe eddembe olw'abalabe bange. 
19_69_19_Ggwe omanyi bwe nvumibwa, bwe nkwatibwa ensonyi, bwe nnyoomebwa: Abalabe bange bonna bali mu maaso go. 
19_69_20_Okuvumibwa kumenye omutima gwange; era njijudde ennaku: Nnoonyezza anansaasira, naye tewabadde n'omu: Era abanansanyusa, naye ne siraba. 
19_69_21_Era bampa omususa okuba emmere yange; Era bwe nnalumibwa ennyonta ne bannywesa omwenge omukaatuufu, 
19_69_22_Emmeeza yaabwe eri mu maaso gaabwe ebeerenga ekyambika gye bali; Era bwe baba mu mirembe, gifuukenga omutego. 
19_69_23_Amaaso gaabwe gabenga mu kizikiza, baleme okulaba; Okankanyenga ebiwato byabwe ennaku zonna. 
19_69_24_Obafukengako ekiruyi kyo, N'obusungu bwo obukambwe bubatuukengako. 
19_69_25_Ennyumba yaabwe erekebwenga, So omuntu yenna alemenga okubeera mu weema zaabwe. 
19_69_26_Kubanga baayigganya oyo gw'okubye; Era boogera ku nnaku zaabo b'ofumise. 
19_69_27_Oyongerenga obubi ku bubi bwabwe: So balemenga okuyingira mu butuukirivu bwo. 
19_69_28_Basangulibwenga okuva mu kitabo ky'obulamu, So balemenga okuwandiikibwa awamu n'abatuukirivu. 
19_69_29_Naye nze ndi mwavu, munaku: Obulokozi bwo, ai Katonda, bungulumize waggulu. 
19_69_30_Naatenderezanga erinnya lya Katonda n'oluyimba, Naamugulumizanga n'okwebaza. 
19_69_31_Era ebyo binaasanyusanga Mukama okusinga ente, Ente erina amayembe n'ebinuulo. 
19_69_32_Abawombeefu bakirabye ne basanyuka: Mmwe abanoonya Katonda, omutima gwammwe gube omulamu. 
19_69_33_Kubanga Mukama awulira abaavu, So tanyooma basibe be. 
19_69_34_Eggulu n'ensi bimutenderezenga, Ennyanja ne byonna ebigitambuliramu. 
19_69_35_Kubanga Katonda alirokola Sayuuni, era alizimba ebibuga bya Yuda; Nabo balituula omwo, ne bagirya 
19_69_36_Era n'ezzadde ly'abaddu be baligisikira; N'abo abaagala erinnya lye balituula omwo. 
19_70_1_Oyanguwe, ai Katonda, okundokola; Oyanguwe okunnyamba, ai Mukama. 
19_70_2_Bakwatibwe ensonyi baswale Abanoonya emmeeme yange: Bazzibwe ennyuma bajeezebwe Abasanyukira okufiirwa kwange. 
19_70_3_Bazzibwe ennyuma olw'ensonyi zaabwe Aboogera nti Nyenya, nyenya. 
19_70_4_Bonna abakunoonya bakusanyukirenga bajaguzenga; N'abo abaagala obulokozi bwo boogerenga bulijjo nti Katonda agulumizibwenga. 
19_70_5_Naye nze ndi mwavu, sirina kintu; Oyanguwe okujja gye ndi, ai Katonda: Ggwe oli mubeezi wange era omulokozi wange; Ai Mukama, tolwawo. 
19_71_1_Ggwe, ai Mukama, ggwe nneesiga: Nnemenga okukwatibwa ensonyi ennaku zonna. 
19_71_2_Ondokole mu butuukirivu bwo, omponye: Ontegere okutu, ondokole. 
19_71_3_Obeerenga gye ndi olwazi olw'okutuulangako, we nnaayinzanga okweyuna bulijjo: Walagira okundokola; Kubanga ggwe oli lwazi lwange era ekigo kyange. 
19_71_4_Omponye, ai Katonda wange, mu mukono gw'omubi, Mu mukono gw'omuntu atali mutuukirivu, omukambwe. 
19_71_5_Kubanga ggwe oli ssuubi lyange, ai Mukama Katonda: Ggwe gwe nneesiga okuva mu buto bwange. 
19_71_6_Ggwe wampanirira okuva mu lubuto: Ggwe wamiya mu byenda bya mmange: Ggwe gwe nnaatenderezanga ennaku zonna. 
19_71_7_Nninga ekitalo eri abantu abangi; Naye ggwe oli kiddukiro kyange eky'amaanyi. 
19_71_8_Akamwa kange kanajjulanga ettendo lyo, N'ekitiibwa kyo okuzibya obudde. 
19_71_9_Tonsuula mu biro eby'obukadde; Tondekanga amaanyi gange bwe galimbula. 
19_71_10_Kubanga abalabe bange banjogerako; N'abo abateega emmeeme yange bateesa wamu, 
19_71_11_Nga boogera nti Katonda amulese: Mumugoberere mumukwate; kubanga tewali anaamuwonya. 
19_71_12_Ai Katonda, tombeera wala: Ai Katonda wange, yanguwa okunnyamba. 
19_71_13_Bakwatibwe ensonyi bazikirire abakyawa emmeeme yange; Baswazibwe banyoomebwe abaagala okunkola obubi. 
19_71_14_Naye naasuubiranga ennaku zonna, Era naayongeranga okukutenderezanga bulijjo. 
19_71_15_Akamwa kange kanaatenderanga obutuukirivu bwo, N'obulokozi bwo okuzibya obudde; Kubanga omuwendo gwabyo sigumanyi. 
19_71_16_Najjanga n'ebikolwa eby'amaanyi ebya Mukama Katonda: Naayogeranga ku butuukirivu bwo, ku bubwo bwokka. 
19_71_17_Ai Katonda, ggwe wanjigirizanga okuva mu buto bwange; Era okutuusa leero naabuuliranga ebikolwa byo eby'ekitalo. 
19_71_18_Weewaawo, bwe ndiba nkaddiye era nga mmeze envi, ai Katonda, tondekanga; Okutuusa lwe ndibuulira amaanyi go emirembe egijja okubaawo, N'obuyinza bwo buli muntu agenda okujja. 
19_71_19_Era n'obutuukirivu bwo, ai Katonda, bugulumivu nnyo: Ggwe eyakola ebikulu, Ai Katonda, afaanana nga ggwe ani? 
19_71_20_Ggwe eyatulaga ebibonoobono ebingi ebizibu, Olituzuukiza nate, Era olitulinnyisa nate okuva mu bya wansi by'ensi. 
19_71_21_Oyongerenga ggwe obukulu bwange, Okyukenga nate onsanyuse. 
19_71_22_Era naakutenderezanga n'endere, Amazima go ge nnaatenderezanga, ai Katonda wange: Ggwe gwe nnaatenderezanga nga nnyimba mu nnanga, Ai ggwe Omumkuvu wa Isiraeri. 
19_71_23_Emimwa gyange ginaasanyukanga nnyo bwe nnaayimbanga okukutendereza; N'emmeeme yange gye wanunula. 
19_71_24_Era n'olulimi lwange lunaayogeranga ku butuukirivu bwo okuzibya obudde: Kubanga bakwatiddwa ensonyi, baswazibbwa abaagala okunkola obubi. 
19_72_1_Owenga kabaka emisango gyo, ai Katonda Era owenga obutuukirivu bwo omwana wa kabaka. 
19_72_2_Anaasaliranga abantu bo emisango egy'obutuukirivu, N'abaavu bo egy'ensonga. 
19_72_3_Ensozi zinaaleeteranga abantu emirembe, N'obusozi, mu butuukirivu. 
19_72_4_Anaasaliranga omusango abaavu ab'omu bantu, Anaalokolanga abaana b'abo abatalina bintu, Era anaamenyaamenyanga omujoozi. 
19_72_5_Banaakutyanga ng'enjuba ekyaliwo, Era ng'omwezi gukyayaka, emirembe gyonna. 
19_72_6_Alikka ng'enkuba bw'etonnya ku ssubi erisaliddwa: Ng'empandaggirize ezifukirira ensi. 
19_72_7_Mu nnaku ze abatuukirivu banaalabanga omukisa, Era wanaabangawo emirembe emingi, okutuusa omwezi lwe guliggwaawo. 
19_72_8_Era anaafuganga okuva ku nnyanja okutuuka ku nnyanja, Era okuva ku Mugga okutuuka ku nkomerero z'ensi. 
19_72_9_Abatuula mu ddungu balimufukaamirira; N'abalabe be balikomba enfuufu. 
19_72_10_Bakabaka b'e Talusiisi n'ab'oku Bizinga banaaleetanga ebirabo: Bakabaka w’e Syeba n'ab'e Seeba banaawangayo ebitone. 
19_72_11_Weewaawo, bakabaka bonna banaavuunamiranga mu maaso ge: Amawanga gonna ganaamuweerezanga. 
19_72_12_Kubanga anaawonyanga omunafu bw'anaakaabanga: N'omwavu atalina mubeezi. 
19_72_13_Anaasaasiranga omwavu n'omunafu, N'emmeeme z'abanafu anaazirokolanga. 
19_72_14_Anaanunulanga emmeeme zaabwe mu kujoogebwa n'ettima: N'omusaayi gwabwe gunaabanga gwa muwendo mungi mu maaso ge: 
19_72_15_Era banaabanga balamu; naye anaaweebwanga ku zaabu ey'e banaamusabiranga Syeba: Era abantu bulijjo; Banaamwebazanga okuzibya obudde. 
19_72_16_Wanaabangawo emmere enkalu nnyingi mu nsi ku ntikko y'ensozi; Ebibala byayo binaayuuganga nga Lebanooni: N'ab'ekibuga banaameranga ng'omuddo ogw'oku nsi. 
19_72_17_Erinnya lye linaabeereranga emirembe gyonaa; Erinnya lye linaalwangawo ng'enjuba: N'abantu banaalabanga omukisa mu ye; Amawanga gonna ganaamuyitanga wa Mukisa. 
19_72_18_Yeebazibwenga Mukama Katonda, Katonda wa Isiraeri, Akola eby'amagero yekka: 
19_72_19_N'erinnya lye ery'ekitiibwa lyebazibwenga emirembe gyonna; Era ensi zonna zijjuzibwenga ekitiibwa kye. Amiina, era Amiina. 
19_72_20_Okusaba kwa Dawudi mutabani wa Yese kuwedde. 
19_73_1_Mazima Katonda wa kisa eri Isiraeri, Eri abo abalina emitima emirongoofu. 
19_73_2_Naye nze, ebigere byange byali kumpi n'okugwa; Okutambula kwange kwabulako katono kuseerera. 
19_73_3_Kubanga ab'amalala bankwasa obuggya, Bwe nnalaba ababi bwe balina omukisa. 
19_73_4_Kubanga bafa tebalumwangako: Naye amaanyi gaabwe ganywera. 
19_73_5_Tebalaba nnaku ng'abantu abalala; So tebabonyaabonyezebwa ng'abantu abalala: 
19_73_6_Amalala kyegava gabeera ng'omukuufu ogwetooloola obulago bwabwe; Ettima libabikka ng'ekyambalo. 
19_73_7_Amaaso gaabwe gabakanuse olw'obugevvu: Balina ebingi okukira omutima bye guyinza okwagala. 
19_73_8_Baduula ne boogera eby'okujooga mu bubi: Boogera ebikulu. 
19_73_9_Omumwa gwabwe bagutadde mu ggulu, N'olulili lwabwe lutambulatambula mu nsi. 
19_73_10_Abantu be kyebava bakomawo wano: N'amazzi ag'omu kikompe ekijjudde ne bagamalirawo ddala. 
19_73_11_Era boogera nti Katonda amanya atya? Era okumanya kuli mu oyo ali waggulu ennyo? 
19_73_12_Laba, abo be babi; Era beeyongera mu bugagga nga balina emirembe ennaku zonna. 
19_73_13_Mazima nnongooserezza bwereere omutima gwange, Ne nnaaba mu ngalo zange n'obutayonoona; 
19_73_14_Kubanga nabonyaabonyezebwa okuzibya obudde, Ne nkangavvulwa buli nkya. 
19_73_15_Singa nayogera nti Ka ajogere bwe ntyo; Laba, nandikkusizza emirembe gy'abaana bo. 
19_73_16_Bwe nnalowooza bwe nnyinza okutegeera ekyo, Kyanteganya ne kinnema; 
19_73_17_Okutuusa lwe nnagenda mu watukuvu wa Katonda, Ne ndowooza ebibatuukako ku nkomerero. 
19_73_18_Mazima obateeka mu bifo eby'obuseerezi: Obasuulira ddala ne bazikirira. 
19_73_19_Nga bafuuse ekifulukwa mu kaseera akatono Entiisa zibamalirawo ddala. 
19_73_20_Ng'ekirooto bwe kiri aloose ng'azuukuse; Era bw'otyo naawe, ai Mukama, bw'olizuukuka, olinyooma ekifaananyi kyabwe. 
19_73_21_Kubanga omutima gwange gwannuma, N'emmeeme yange yanfiunita; 
19_73_22_Bwe nnali ng'ensolo bwe ntyo ne ssitegeera; Nali nsolo mu maaso go. 
19_73_23_Naye ndi wamu naawe ennaku zonna: Onkutte omukono gwange ogwa ddyo. 
19_73_24_Ononnuŋŋamyanga n'amagezi go, Era oluvannyuma olinzikiriza okuyingira mu kitiibwa. 
19_73_25_Ani gwe nnina mu ggulu wabula ggwe? So tewali mu nsi gwe njagala wabula ggwe. 
19_73_26_Omubiri gwange n'omutima gwange bimpwako: Naye Katonda ge maanyi g'omutima gwange n'omugabo gwange emirembe gyonna. 
19_73_27_Kubanga, laba, abakuli ewala balizikirira: Wabafaafaaganya bonna abagenda okwenda ne bakuleka. 
19_73_28_Naye kitungi nze nsemberere Katonda: Mukama Katonda mmufudde ekiddukiro kyange, Ndyoke njogerenga ku bikolwa byo byonna. 
19_74_1_Ai Katonda, kiki ekyatusuuza ennaku zonna? Kiki ekinyoosa obusungu bwo eri endiga ez'ettale lyo? 
19_74_2_Ojjukire ekibiina kyo kye wagula edda, Kye wanunula okuba ekika eky'obusika bwo; N'olusozi Sayuuni, lwe watuulangamu. 
19_74_3_Oyimuse ebigere byo ogende mu bifulukwa ebitavaawo, Obubi bwonna omulabe bwe yakola mu watukuvu. 
19_74_4_Abalabe bo bawulugumye wakati mu kibiina kyo; Basimbye ebendera zaabwe okuba obubonero. 
19_74_5_Bafaananye ng'abantu abayimusa Embazzi okutema ekisaka eky'omu kibira. 
19_74_6_Ne kaakano bamenyaamenya emirimu gyawo gyonna emyole N'embazzi n'ennyondo. 
19_74_7_Bookezza omuliro awatukuvu wo; Banyoomye ennyumba ey'erinnya lyo ne bagisuula wansi. 
19_74_8_Boogedde mu mitama gyabwe nti Tubazikiririz ddala bonna bonna: Bookerezza ddala amakunnaaniro gonna aga Katonda mu nsi. 
19_74_9_Tetukyalaba bubonero bwaffe; Tewakyali nnabbi n'omu; So temuli n'omu mu ffe ategeera ebyo gye birituusa okubaawo. 
19_74_10_Ai Katonda, omulabe alituusa wa okuvuma? Akukyawa aliwoola erinnya lyo emirembe gyonna? 
19_74_11_Kiki ekikuddiriza omukono, omukono gwo ogwa ddyo? Oguggye mu kifuba kyo obazikirize. 
19_74_12_Naye Katonda ye Kabaka wange edda n'edda lyonna, Aleeta obulokozi wakati mu nsi. 
19_74_13_Wayawula ennyanja n'amaanyi go: Wamenya emitwe gy'ensolo mu mazzi. 
19_74_14_Wamenyaamenya emitwe gya lukwata, Wamuwa okuba emmere y'abo abatuula mu ddungu. 
19_74_15_Wasalamu ensulo n'omukka: Wakaza emigga eminene. 
19_74_16_Emisana gigyo, era n'ekiro kikyo: Wakola omusana n'enjuba. 
19_74_17_Wateekawo ensalo zonna ez'ensi: Wakola ekyeya ne ddumbi. 
19_74_18_Ojjukire kino ng'abalabe bavumye, ai Mukama, Era ng'eggwanga essirusiru liboggoledde erinnya lyo. 
19_74_19_Nkwegayiridde, towaayo emmeeme y'ejjiba lyo eri ensolo: Teweerabira bulamu obw'abaavu bo ennaku zonna. 
19_74_20_Ojjukire endagaano: Kubanga ebifo eby'enzikiza eby'ensi bijjudde ennyumba ez'ettima. 
19_74_21_Ajoogebwa alemenga okudda ng'akwatiddwa ensonyi, nkwegayiridde: Abaavu n'abanafu batenderezenga erinnya lyo. 
19_74_22_Golokoka, ai Katonda, weewolereze ensonga yo, Ojjukire omusirusiru bw'azibya obudde okukuvuma. 
19_74_23_Teweerabira ddoboozi lya balabe bo: Oluyoogaano lw'abo abakugolokokerako lulinnya bulijjo. 
19_75_1_Tukwebaza, ai Katonda; Twebaza kubanga erinnya lyo liri kumpi: Abantu boogera ku bikolwa byo eby'ekitalo. 
19_75_2_Bwe ndiraba ebiro ebyateekebwawo, Ndisala emisango egy'ensonga. 
19_75_3_Ensi n'abantu bonna abagituulamu biweddewo: Nze nsimbye empagi zaayo. (Seera) 
19_75_4_Nagamba ab'ekyejo nti Temugiranga kyejo: N'ababi nti Temuyimusanga jjembe: 
19_75_5_Temuyimusanga waggulu jjembe lyammwe Temwogeranga n'ensingo enkakanyavu. 
19_75_6_Kubanga okugulumizibwa tekuva buvanjuba, Newakubadde ebugwanjuba, newakubadde obukiika obwa ddyo. 
19_75_7_Naye Katonda ye mulamuzi: Atoowaza ono, n'oli amugulumiza. 
19_75_8_Kubanga mu mukono gwa Mukama ekikompe mwekiri, n'omwenge gwamu guliko ejjovu; Kijjudde ogutabuddwamu, n'akifuka; Mazima ebbonda lyagwo ababi bonna ab'ensi balirikutamira, balirinywa. 
19_75_9_Naye nze naabuuliranga emirembe gyonna, Naayimbanga okutendereza Katonda wa Yakobo. 
19_75_10_Era n'amayembe gonna ag'ababi naagazikirizanga; Naye amayembe g'abatuukirivu ganaagulumizibwanga. 
19_76_1_Mu Yuda Katonda amanyibwa: Erinnya lye kkulu mu Isiraeri. 
19_76_2_Era mu Salemi eweema ye mweri, N'ekifo kye ky'atuulamu mu Sayuuni. 
19_76_3_Eyo gye yamenyera obusaale obw'omutego, Engabo, n'ekitala, n'olutalo. (Seera 
19_76_4_Oli wa kitiibwa, osinga, okuva ku nsozi ez'omunyago. 
19_76_5_Ab'emitima emizira banyagiddwa, beebase mu tulo twabwe; So mu bantu ab'amaanyi temuli abalabye emikono gyabwe. 
19_76_6_Ggwe onenyezza, ggwe Katonda wa Yakobo, Eggaali era n'embalaasi n'ebyebasibwa otulo otw'okufa. 
19_76_7_Ggwe, ggwe ogwanira okutiibwa: Era ani ayinza okuyimirira mu maaso go ng'omaze okusunguwala? 
19_76_8_Wawuliza omusango nga guvudde mu ggulu; Ensi n'etya, n'esirika 
19_76_10_Mazima obusungu bw'abantu bulikutendereza: Obusungu obulisigalawo olibwesiba. 
19_76_11_Mweyame obweyamo, musasule Mukama Katonda wammwe: Bonna abamwetoolodde baleetere ebirabo oyo agwanira okutiibwa. 
19_76_12_Alizikiriza omwoyo gw'abalangira: Ye w'entusa eri bakabaka b'ensi. 
19_77_1_Naakabiranga Katonda n'eddoboozi lyange; Eri Katonda n'eddoboozi lyange, naye anampuliranga. 
19_77_2_Ku lunaku olw'okunakuwala kwange nanoonya Mukama; Omukono gwange ne gugololebwa ekiro ne gutaddirira; Emmeeme yange n'egaana okusanyusibwa. 
19_77_3_Njijukira Katonda, ne nneeraliikirira: Neemulugunya, omwoyo gwange ne guzirika. (Seera) 
19_77_4_Okwata ku maaso gange nga gatunula: Ntegana bwe nti n'okuyinza ne ssiyinza kwogera. 
19_77_5_Ndowoozezza ennaku ez'edda, Emyaka egy'ebiro eby'edda. 
19_77_6_Njijukira oluyimba lwange ekiro Ne nteesa ebigambo n'omutima gwange nzekka; N'omwoyo gwange gwanoonyeza ddala. 
19_77_7_Mukama anaasuuliranga ddala emirembe gyonna? Era anaaba nga takyalina kisa nate? 
19_77_8_Okusaasira kwe kugendedde ddala emirembe gyonna? Kye yasuubiza nga kifudde emirembe n'emirembe? 
19_77_9_Katonda yeerabidde okuba n'ekisa? Asibye okusaasira kwe okulungi mu busungu? (Seera) 
19_77_10_Nange ne njogera nti Obwo bwe bunafu bwange; Naye najjukiranga emyaka egy'omukono ogwa ddyo gw'oyo ali waggulu ennyo. 
19_77_11_Naayogeranga ku bikolwa bya Mukama; Kubanga najjukiranga eby'ekitalo byo eby'edda. 
19_77_12_Era naalowoozanga omulimu gwo gwonna, Era naafumiitirizanga ebikolwa byo. 
19_77_13_Ekkubo lyo, ai Katonda, liri mu watukuvu: Katonda omukulu, ali nga Katonda, ye ani? 
19_77_14_Ggwe Katonda akola eby'amagero: Wamanyisa amaanyi go ma mawanga. 
19_77_15_Wanunula abantu bo n'omukono gwo, Abaana ba Yakobo ne Yusufu. (Seera) 
19_77_16_Amazzi gaakulaba, ai Katonda; Amazzi gaakulaba, ne gatya: Era n'obuziba ne bukankana. 
19_77_17_Ebire ne bitonnya amazzi; Eggulu ne lireeta eddoboozi : Era n'obusaale bwo ne bubuna. 
19_77_18_Eddoboozi ery'okubwatuka kwo ne liba mu kikutltjunta; Okumyansa ne kumulisa ebintu byonna: Ensi n'ekankana n'eyuuguuma. 
19_77_19_Ekkubo lyo lyali mu nnyanja. N'empenda zo zaali mu mazzi amangi. N'ebigere byo tebyamanyika. 
19_77_20_Waluŋŋamyanga abantu bo ng'endiga, Mu mukono gwa Musa ne Alooni. 
19_78_1_Muwulire, mmwe abantu bange, okulagira kwange: Mutege amatu gammwe eri ebigambo eby'akamwa kange. 
19_78_2_Naayasama akamwa kange mu lugero: Naayogera ebigambo eby'ekyama eby'edda: 
19_78_3_Bye twawuliranga, bye twamanyanga, Era bajjajjaffe bye baatubuuliranga. 
19_78_4_Tetuubikisenga baana baabwe, Nga tubuulira emirembe egijja amatendo ga Mukama, N'amaanyi ge, n'eby'amagero bye bye yakola. 
19_78_5_Kubanga yanyweza obujulirwa mu Yakobo, Era yalagira etteeka mu Isiraeri, Lye yakuutira bajjajjaffe, Babitegeezenga abaana baabwe: 
19_78_6_Emirembe egijja gibimanye, be baana abaali bagenda okuzaalibwa; Abaali bagenda okugolokoka n'okubibuulira abaana baabwe: 
19_78_7_Balyoke basuubirenga Katonda, So balemenga okwerabira emirimu gya Katonda, Naye bakwatenga amateeka ge: 
19_78_8_So balemenga okuba nga bajjajjaabwe, Emirembe emikakanyavu, emijeemu; Emirembe egitalongoosa bulungi omutima gwagyo, N'omwoyo gwagyo nga tegunywera eri Katonda. 
19_78_9_Abaana ba Efulayimu, nga balina ebyokulwanyisa n'emitego, Ne bakyuka ennytuna ku lunaku olw'olutalo. 
19_78_10_Tebaakwata ndagaano ya Katonda, Ne bagaana okutambulira mu mateeka ge; 
19_78_11_Ne beerabira ebikolwa bye, N'eby'amagero bye bye yabalaga. 
19_78_12_Yakolera eby'ekitalo mu maaso ga bajjajjaabwe, Mu nsi y'e Misiri, mu nnimiro ya Zowaani. 
19_78_13_Yayasa mu nnyanja, n'abayisa wakati; N'ayimiriza amazzi ng'entuumo. 
19_78_14_Era emisana yabakulemberanga n'ekire, N'ekiro kyonna n'omumuli ogw'omuliro. 
19_78_15_Yayasa amayinja mu ddungu, N'abanywesa amazzi amangi nga gava mu buziba. 
19_78_16_Era yaviisa ensulo mu jjinja, N'akulukusa amazzi ng'emigga. 
19_78_17_Naye ne banyiikira nate okumwonoona, Okujeemera oyo ali waggulu ennyo mu ddungu. 
19_78_18_Ne bakema Katonda mu mutima gwabwe Nga basaba emmere olw'okwegomba kwabwe. 
19_78_19_Era naye baayogera obubi ku Katonda; Baagamba nti Katonda ayinza okuteekateeka emmeeza mu ddungu? 
19_78_20_Laba, yakuba ejjinja amazzi ne gatiiriika, Emigga ne gikulukuta; Era ayinza okuwa n'omugaati? Alirabira ennyama abantu be? 
19_78_21_Mukama kyeyava awulira, n'asunguwala: Omuliro ne gwaka ku Yakobo, Era n'obusungu ne bunyooka ku Isiraeri: 
19_78_22_Kubanga tebakkiriza Katonda, So tebeesiga bulokozi bwe. 
19_78_23_Naye n'alagira eggulu waggulu, N'aggulawo enzigi ez'omu ggulu; 
19_78_24_N'abatonnyesezanga maanu okulya, N'abawanga emmere ey'omu ggulu. 
19_78_25_Abantu ne balyanga emmere ey'abakulu: Yabaweerezanga ebyokulya n'abakkusa. 
19_78_26_N'akunsa empewo eziva ebuvanjuba mu ggulu: Era n'aluŋŋamya n'obuyinza bwe empewo eziva obukiika obwa ddyo. 
19_78_27_Era n'abatonnyeseza ennyama ng'enfuufu, N'ennyonyi ezibuuka ng'omusenyu ogw'ennyanja: 
19_78_28_N'abigwisa wakati mu lusiisira lwabwe, Okwetooloola ennyumba zaabwe. 
19_78_29_Awo ne balya, ne bakkuta nnyo; N'abawa kye baali beegomba. 
19_78_30_Baali nga tebannayawukana n'okwegomba kwabwe, Emmere yaabwe yali ng'ekyali mu bumwa bwabwe, 
19_78_31_Obusungu bwa Katonda ne bulinnya ku bo, Ne bubattamu abasinga obunene, Ne buzikiriza abavubuka ba Isiraeri. 
19_78_32_Era naye ebyo byonna bwe byababaako ne boonoona nate, Ne butakkiriza bya magero bye. 
19_78_33_Kyeyava amalawo ennaku zaabwe okuzifuula obutaliimu, N'emyaka gyabwe mu kutya. 
19_78_34_Bwe yabatta, bwe baabuuzabuuza okununoonya: Ne bakomawo ne bakeeranga okunoonya Katonda. 
19_78_35_Ne bajjukira nga Katonda lwe lwazi lwabwe, Era nga Katonda ali waggulu ennyo ye yabanunula. 
19_78_36_Naye baamunyumiriza na kamwa kaabwe, Ne bamulimbalimba n'olulimi lwabwe. 
19_78_37_Kubanga omutima gwabwe tegwalongooka gy'ali, So tebaali beesigwa mu ndagaano ye. 
19_78_38_Naye ye, kubanga yajjula okusaasira, n'asonyiwa obutali butuukirivu bwabwe, n'atazikiriza: Weewaawo, emirundi emingi yabayisaako obusungu bwe, N'atakubiriza busungu bwe bwonna. 
19_78_39_Naye n'ajjukira nga bo mubiri bubiri; Empewo eziyita ne zitadda nate. 
19_78_40_Emirundi nga mingi gye baakamujeemera mu ddungu, Ne bamunakuwaliza mu lukoola! 
19_78_41_Ne bakyuka nate ne bakema Katonda, Ne banyiiza Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri. 
19_78_42_Tebajjukira mukono gwe, Newakubadde olunaku lwe yabanunuliramu eri omulabe. 
19_78_43_Bwe yateeka obubonero bwe mu Misiri, N'eby'amagero bye mu nnimiro ya Zowaani; 
19_78_44_N'afuula emigga gyabwe omusaayi, N'enzizi zaabwe ne batayinza kunywa. 
19_78_45_N'atuma mu bo ebitole by'ensowera, ezaabaluma; N'ebikere, ebyabazikiriza. 
19_78_46_Era n'awa obuwuka ekyengera kyabwe, N'emirimu gyabwe eri enzige. 
19_78_47_N'atta emizabbibu gyabwe n'omuzira, N'emisukomooli gyabwe n'empeke ennene ez'omuzira. 
19_78_48_Yawaayo n'ente zaabwe eri omuzira, N'endiga zaabwe eri enjota ezaaka. 
19_78_49_Yabakasukako obusungu bwe obukambwe, N'okunyiiga, n'okunyiikaala, n'okunakuwala, Ekibiina kya bamalayika abaleeta obubi. 
19_78_50_Yakubira obusungu bwe ekkubo, Teyasaasira mmeeme zaabwe okufa, Naye n'awaayo obulamu bwa bwe eri olumbe; 
19_78_51_N'akuba ababereberye bonna abaali mu Misiri, Abaasinga amaanyi mu weema za Kaamu: 
19_78_52_Naye n'aggyamu abantu be ya ng'endiga, N'abaluŋŋamiza mu ddungu ng'ekisibo. 
19_78_53_N'abakulembera mu mirembe bw'ati n'okutya ne batatya: Naye ennyanja n'esuulira ddala abalabe baabwe. 
19_78_54_N'abaleeta ku nsalo ey'awatu. kuvu we, Ku lusozi luno omukono gwe ogwa ddyo lwe gwagula. 
19_78_55_Era n'agobamu amawanga mu maaso gaabwe, N'agabawa okuba obusika ng'abagerera, N'atuuza ebika bya Isiraeri mu weema zaago. 
19_78_56_Naye ne bakema Katonda ali waggulu ennyo ne bamujeemera, Ne batakwata bye yategeeza; 
19_78_57_Naye ne bakyuka ennyuma ne bakuusakuusa nga bajjajjaa bwe: Ne bakyama ng'omutego ogw'o bulimba. 
19_78_58_Kubanga baamusunguwazanga n'ebifo byabwe eby'oku nsozi Ne bamukwasanga obuggya n'e bifaananyi byabwe ebyole. 
19_78_59_Katonda bwe yawulira bw'atyo n'asunguwala, N'atamwa nnyo Isiraeri: 
19_78_60_N'afuluka mu weema ey'omi Siiro, Eweema gye yali ateese mi bantu; 
19_78_61_N'awaayo amaanyi ge mu bu sibe, N'ekitiibwa kye mu mukono gw'omulabe. 
19_78_63_Era n'agabula abantu be eri ekitala; N'asunguwalira obusika bwe: 
19_78_64_Bakabona baabwe ne bafa ekitala; Ne bannamwandu baabwe ne batakuba biwoobe. 
19_78_65_Mukama n'alyoka azuukuka ng'azuukuka mu tulo, Ng'omuzira ayogerera waggulu ng'anywedde omwenge. 
19_78_66_N'akuba abalabe be ne baddayo ennyuma: N'abakwasa ensonyi ezitaggwaawo. 
19_78_67_Era n'agaana eweema ya Yusufu, N'atalonda kika kya Efulayimu; 
19_78_68_Naye n'alonda ekika kya Yuda, Olusozi Sayuuni lwe yayagala. 
19_78_69_N'azimba awatukuvu we okufaanana ng'ensozi, Ng'ensi gye yanyweza emirembe gyonna. 
19_78_70_Era n'alonda Dawudi omuddu we, N'amuggya mu bisibo by'endiga: 
19_78_71_Mu kugoberera eadiga eziyonsa mwe yamuggya, Okulundanga Yakobo be bantu be, ne Isiraeri bwe busika bwe. 
19_78_72_Awo n'abalundanga mu butuukirivu obw'omutima gwe; N'abalunnamyanga n'amagezi g'emikono gye: 
19_79_1_Ai Katonda, amawanga gazze mu busika bwo; Boonoonye yeekaalu yo entukuvu; Basudde Yerusaalemi entuumo n'entuumo. 
19_79_2_Emirambo gy'abaddu bo bagiwaddeyo okuba emmere y'ennyonyi eza waggulu, Emibiri gy'abatukuvu bo eri ensolo z'oku nsi. 
19_79_3_Omusaayi gwabwe bagufuse ng'amazzi okwetooloola Yerusaalemi: Ne wataba muntu wa kubaziika. 
19_79_4_Tufuuse ekiwme eri baliraanwa baffe, Okuduulirwa n'okusekererwa eri abo abatwetoolodde. 
19_79_5_Ai Mukama, olituusa wa okusunguwala emirembe gyonna? Obuggya bwo bunaabuubuukanga ng'omuliro? 
19_79_6_Fuka obusungu bwo ku mawanga agatakumanyi, Ne ku bwakabaka obutakoowoola linnya lyo. 
19_79_7_Kubanga balidde Yakobo, Ne bazisa ekifo kye. 
19_79_8_Tojjukira gye tuli obutali butuukirivu bwa bajjajjaffe: Okusaasira kwo okulungi kwanguwe okutukulemberanga: Kubanga tujeezebwa nnyo. 
19_79_9_Otuyambe, ai Katonda ow'obulokozi bwaffe, olw'ekitiibwa ky'erinnya lyo: Era otuwonye, onaalize ddala ebibi byaffe, olw'erinnya lyo. 
19_79_10_Ab'amawanga ekiriba kiboogeza kiki nti Katonda waabwe ali ludda wa? Eggwanga ly'omusaayi gw'abaddu bo oguyiika 
19_79_11_Okusinda kw'omusibe kujje mu maaso go; Ng'obuyinza bwo bwe buli obungi owonye abo abateekerwawo okufa; 
19_79_12_Era owalane baliraanwa baffe emirundi musanw mu kifuba kyabwe Ekiwme kye baakuwma ggwe, ai Mukama. 
19_79_13_Naffe abantu bo era endiga ez'ettale lyo Tunaakwebazanga ennaku zonna: Tunaayolesanga ettendo lyo okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
19_80_1_Ai Omusumba wa Isiraeri, wulira, Ggwe aluŋŋamya Yusufu ng'ekisibo; Ggwe atuula wakati wa bakerubi, yakira ddala. 
19_80_2_Mu maaso ga Efulayimu ne Benyamini ne Manase, kubiriza amaanyi go, Ojje otulokole. 
19_80_3_Otukyuse nate, ai Katonda; Oyase amaaso go, naffe tulirokoka. 
19_80_4_Ai Mukama Katonda ow'eggye, Olituusa wa okusunguwalira okusaba kw'abantu bo? 
19_80_5_Wabaliisa emmere ey'amaziga, Era wabawa amaziga amangi okunywa. 
19_80_6_Otufuula oluyombo eri baliraanwa baffe: N'abalabe baffe baseka bokka na bokka. 
19_80_7_Otukyuse nate, ai Katonda ow'eggye; Era oyase amaaso go, naffe tolirokoka. 
19_80_8_Waggya omuzabbibu mu Misiri: Wagobamu amawanga, n'ogusimba. 
19_80_9_Wasaawa mu maaso gaagwo, Ne gusimba nnyo emmizi, ne gujjula ensi. 
19_80_10_Ensozi ne zibikkibwa n'ekisiikirize kyagwo, N'amatabi gaagwo ne gaba ng'emiwle gya Katonda. 
19_80_11_Gwaloka amatabi gaagwo okutuusa ku nnyanja N'ensibukn zaagwo okutuusa ku Mugga. 
19_80_12_Kiki ekyakumenyesa enkomera zaagwo, Bonna abayita mu kkubo ne bagunogako? 
19_80_13_Embizzi eva mu kibira egunyaga, N'ensolo ez'omu nsiko zigulyako. 
19_80_14_Okyuke nate, tukwegayiridde, ai Katonda ow'eggye: Otunuulire wansi ng'oyima mu ggulu, olabe, ojjire omuzabbibu ogwo. 
19_80_15_N'ekikolo omukono gwo ogwa ddyo kye gwasimba, N'ettabi lye weekolera ery'amaanyi. 
19_80_16_Gwokeddwa omuliro, gutemeddwa ddala: Bazikirira amaaso go bwe gabanenya. 
19_80_17_Omukono gwo gube ku musajja ow'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo, Ku mwana w'omuntu gwe weekolera ow'amaanyi. 
19_80_18_Naffe tetulidda nnyuma okukuleka: Otuzuukize ggw e, naffe tunaakaabiranga erinnya lyo. 
19_80_19_Otukyuse, nate, ai Mukama Katonda ow'eggye; Oyase amaaso go, naffe tulirokoka. 
19_81_1_Muyimbirenga waggulu Katonda amaanyi gaffe: Muleetenga eddoboozi ery'essanyu eri Katonda wa Yakobo. 
19_81_2_Mwanukulenga oluyimba, muleetenga ekitaasa, Ennanga ennungi era n'amadinda. 
19_81_3_Mufuuwenga ekkondeere omwezi nga kYe gulle guboneke, Omwezi nga gwa ggabogabo, ku lunaku lwaffe olutukuvu olw'embaga. 
19_81_4_Kubanga eryo lye tteeka eri Isiraeri, Ekiragiro kya Katonda wa Yakobo. 
19_81_5_Yakiteeka mu Yusufu okuba obujulirwa, Bwe yabuna ensi y'e Misiri: Gye nnawuurira olulimi lwe ssaamanya. 
19_81_6_N'aggya ekibegabega kye ku mugugu; Engalo ze ne zisumattulwa mu bibbo. 
19_81_7_Wakoowoola bwe wali mu nnaku, nange ne nkuwonya; Ne nkuddiramu mu kifo eky'ekyama eky'okubwatuka: Nakukemera ku mazzi ag'e Meriba. (Seera) 
19_81_8_Muwulire, mmwe abantu bange, nange naabategeeza: Ggwe Isiraeri, singa okkiriza okumpulira! 
19_81_9_Temuubenga katonda munnaggwanga mu ggwe; So toosinzenga katonda munnaggwanga yenna. 
19_81_10_Nze Mukama Katonda wo, Eyakuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri: Yasama nnyo akamwa ko, nange naakajjuza. 
19_81_11_Naye abantu bange tebaawulira ddoboozilyange; So Isiraeri teyanjagala n'akatono. 
19_81_12_Nange ne mbaleka okugoberera obukakanyavu bw'omutima gwabwe, Batambulirenga mu kuteesa kwabwe bo. 
19_81_13_Singa abantu bange bakkiriza okumpulira, Singa Isiraeri akkiriza okutambulira mu makubo gange! 
19_81_14_Nandiwangudde mangu abalabe baabwe, Nandikyusizza omukono gwange ku abo abalwana nabo. 
19_81_15_Abakyawa Mukama bandimujeemulukukidde: Naye ekiseera kyabwe kyandibadde kya mirembe gyonna. 
19_81_16_Era yandibaliisizza n'obugimu obw'eŋŋaano: Era nandikukkusizza n'omubisi gw'enjuki oguva mu jjinja. 
19_82_1_Katonda ayimirira mu kibiina kya Katonda; Asala emisango mu bakatonda. 
19_82_2_Mulituusa wa okusalanga emisango egitali gya nsonga, N'okusalirizanga ababi? (Seera) 
19_82_3_Musalirenga emisango omwavu n'oyo atalina kitaawe: Mugattenga oyo ali mu nnaku n'atalina bintu. 
19_82_4_Muwonyenga omwavu n'oyo eyeetaaga: Mubalokolenga mu mukono gw'omubi. 
19_82_5_Tebamanya so tebategeera; Batambulatambula mu kizikiza: Emisingi gyonna egy'ensi gisagaasagana. 
19_82_6_Nayogera nti Muli bakatonda, Era mwenna muli baana b'oyo ali waggulu ennyo. 
19_82_7_Era naye munaafanga ng'abantu, Era munaagwanga ng'omu ku balangira. 
19_82_8_Golokoka, ai Katonda, osalire ensi omusango: Kubanga olisikira amawanga gonna. 
19_83_1_Ai Katonda, tosirika nate: Toleka kwogera, so tobeererawo, ai Katonda. 
19_83_2_Kubanga, laba, abalabe bo bayoogaana: N'abo abakukyawa bayimusizza omutwe. 
19_83_3_enkwe ku bantu bo, Bateesa wamu obubi ku bantu bo abakweke. 
19_83_4_Boogedde nti Mujje tubazikirize balemenga okuba eggwanga; Erinnya lya Isiraeri liremenga okujjukirwa nate. 
19_83_5_Kubanga bateesezza wamu n'omwoyo gumu; Balagaana endagaano ku ggwe: 
19_83_6_Eweema za Edomu n'ez'Abaisimaeri; Mowaabu, n'Abakagale 
19_83_8_Era n'Obwasuli bwegasse nabo; Bayambye abaana ba Lutti. (Seera) 
19_83_9_Obakole nga bwe wakola Midiyaani; nga Sisera, nga Yabini, ku mugga Kisoni; 
19_83_10_Obakole nga bwe wakola Midiyaani; nga Sisera, nga Yabini, ku mugga Kisoni; 
19_83_11_Abakungu baabwe obafaananye nga Olebu ne Zeebu; Weewaawo, abalangira baabwe bonna nga Zeba ne Zalumunna: 
19_83_12_Abaayogera nti Twetwalire fekka Ennyumba za Katonda tuzirye. 
19_83_13_Ai Katonda wange, obafuule ng'enfuufu ey'akazimu; Ng'ebisasiro empewo bye zitwala. 
19_83_14_Ng'omuliro ogwokya ekibira, Era ng'ennimi z'omuliro ezookya ensozi; 
19_83_15_Obayigganye bw'oryo ne kibuyaga wo, Era obatiise n'empewo zo. 
19_83_16_Jjuza amaaso gaabwe okweraliikirira; Banoonyenga erinnya lyo, ai Mukama. 
19_83_17_Bakwatibwenga ensonyi, batyenga ennaku zonna; Weewaawo, beeraliikirirenga bazikirirenga: 
19_83_18_Balyoke bategeerenga nga ggwe wekka, erinnya lyo YAKUWA, Oli waggulu nnyo ng'ofuga ensi yonna. 
19_84_1_Eweema zo nga nnungi, Ai Mukama ow'eggye. 
19_84_2_Emmeeme yange yeegomba, era ezirise olw'empya za Mukama; Omutima gwange n'omubiri gwange bikaabira Katonda omulamu. 
19_84_3_Weewaawo, enkazaluggya yeerabidde ennyumba, N'akataayi ekisu mwe kanaabiikiranga obwana bwako, Bye byoto byo, ai Mukama ow'eggye, Kabaka wange, era Katonda wange. 
19_84_4_Balina omukisa abatula mu nnyumba yo: Banaakutenderezanga. (Seera) 
19_84_5_Alina omukisa omuntu amaanyi ge bwe gaba mu ggwe; Enguudo ezigenda mu Sayuuni nga ziri mu mutima gwe. 
19_84_6_Nga bayita mu kiwonvu eky'amaziga bakifuula ekifo eky'ensulo; Weewaawo, ddumbi akibikkako n'omukisa. 
19_84_7_Bava mu maanyi ne baggukira mu maanyi, Buli muntu mu bo alabika mu maaso ga Katonda mu Sayuuni. 
19_84_8_Ai Mukama Katonda ow'eggye, wulira okusaba kwange: Otege okutu, ai Katonda wa Yakobo. (Seera) 
19_84_9_Tunula, ai Katonda engabo yaffe, Olabe amaaso g'oyo gwe wafukako amafuta. 
19_84_10_Kubanga olunaku lumu mu mpya zo lusinga olukumi. Njagala okuba omuggazi mu nnyumba ya Katonda wange Okusinga okutuula mu weema ez'obubi. 
19_84_11_Kubanga Mukama Katonda ye njuba, ye ngabo: Mukama anaagabanga ekisa n'ekitiibwa: Tammenga kintu kirungi kyonna abo abeegendereza. 
19_84_12_Ai Mukama ow'eggye, Alina omukisa omuntu akwesiga ggwe. 
19_85_1_Mukama, watunuulira ensi yo n'ekisa: Wazza obusibe bwa Yakobo. 
19_85_2_Wasonyiwa obutali butuukirivu obw'abantu bo, Wabikka ku kibi kyabwe kyonna. (Seera) 
19_85_3_Waggyawo obusungu bwo bwonna: Wakyuka n'oleka ekiruyi kyo ekikambwe: 
19_85_4_Otukyuse, ai Katonda ow'obulokozi bwaffe. Era okunyiiga kwo kuggweewo eri ffe. 
19_85_5_Onootuusunguwaliranga ennaku zonna? Onootuusanga obusungu bwo emirembe gyonna? 
19_85_6_Tolituzuukiza nate, Abantu bo bakusanyukirenga ggwe? 
19_85_7_Otulage okusaasira kwo, ai Mukama, Otuwe obulokozi bwo. 
19_85_8_Ka mpulire Katonda Mukama by'anaayogera: Kubanga anaabuulira abantu be emirembe, n'abatukuvu be: Naye baleme okukyama nate mu busirusiru. 
19_85_9_Mazima obulokozi bwe buba kumpi abo abamutya; Ekitiibwa kiryoke kituulenga mu nsi yaffe. 
19_85_10_Okusaasira n'amazima birabaganye; Obutuukirivu n'emirembe binywegeraganye. 
19_85_11_Amazima galose mu ttaka; N'obutuukirivu butunudde ku nsi nga buyima mu ggulu. 
19_85_12_Weewaawo, Mukama anaagabanga ebirungi; N'ensi yaffe eneereetanga ekyengera kyayo. 
19_85_13_Obutuukirivu bunaamukulemberanga; Era bunaakubiranga ebigere bye ekkubo. 
19_86_1_Otege okutu kwo, ai Mukama, onziremu; Kubanga nze ndi mwavu, sirina bintu. 
19_86_2_Okuume emmeeme yange; kubanga nze ntya Katonda: Ai ggwe Katonda wange, olokole omuddu wo akwesiga. 
19_86_3_Onsaasire, ai Mukama; Kubanga nkukoowoola ggwe okuzibya obudde. 
19_86_4_Osanyuse emmeeme y'omuddu wo; Kubanga nnyimusa emmeeme yange eri ggwe, ai Mukama. 
19_86_5_Kubanga ggwe, Mukama, oli mulungi, oyanguwa okusonyiwa, Era ojjula ekisa eri abo bonna abakukoowoola. 
19_86_6_Otege okutu, ai Mukama, eri okusa kwange; Owuli eddoboozi ery’okwegairira kwange. 
19_86_7_Ku lunaku olw'okunakuwala kwange ndikukoowoola; Kubanga olinziramu. 
19_86_8_Tewali afaanana nga ggwe mu bakatonda, ai Mukama; So tewali bikolwa ebiri ng'ebibyo. 
19_86_9_Amawanga gonna ge wakola galijja, galisinza mu maaso go, ai Mukama; Era galiguhumiza erinnya lyo. 
19_86_10_Kubanga ggwe mukulu, era okola eby'ekitalo: Ggwe Katonda wekka. 
19_86_11_Onjigirizenga ekkubo lyo, ai Mukama; naatambuliranga mu mazima go: Ogatte wamu omutima gwange gutye erinnya lyo. 
19_86_12_Naakutenderezanga, ai Mukama Katonda wange, n'omutima gwange gwonna; Era naagulumizanga erinnya lyo emirembe gyonna. 
19_86_13_Kubanga okusaasira kwo kungi gye ndi; Era wawonya emmeeme yange mu bunnya obuli wansi ennyo. 
19_86_14_Ai Katonda, ab'amalala bangolokokeddeko, N'ekibiina eky'abatemu banoonyezza emmeeme yange, So tebakutadde ggwe mu maaso gaabwe. 
19_86_15_Naye ggwe, ai Mukama, oli Katonda ajjula okusaasira, ow'ekisa, Alwawo okusunguwala, alina okusaasira n'amazima amangi. 
19_86_16_Onkyukire, onsaasire; Owe omuddu wo amaanyi go, Olokole omwana w'omuzaana wo. 
19_86_17_Ondage akabonero olw'obulungi; Abankyaye bakalabe bakwatibwe ensonyi. Kubanga ggwe, ai Mukama, onnyambye, era onsanyusizza. 
19_87_1_Emisingi gye giri ku nsozi entukuvu. 
19_87_2_Mukama ayagala emiryango gya Sayuuni Okusinga ennyumba zonna eza Yakobo. 
19_87_3_Eby'ekitiibwa bikwogerwako, Ggwe ekibuga kya Katonda. (Seera) 
19_87_4_Ndyogera ku Lakabu ne Babulooni nga bali mu abo abammanyi: Laba Firisutiya, ne Ttuulo, ne Esiyoopya; Oyo Yazaalirwa omwo. 
19_87_5_Weewaawo, kiryogerwa ku Sayuuni nti Gundi ne gundi baazaalirwa omwo; N'oyo ali waggulu ennyo alikinyweza yennyini. 
19_87_6_Mukama alibala, bw'aliwandiika amawanga, Nti Gundi yazaalirwa omwo. (Seera) 
19_87_7_Abayimba era n'abo abazina (balyogera nti) Ensulo zange zonna ziri mu ggwe. 
19_88_1_Ai Mukama, Katonda ow'obulokozi bwange, Naakaabiranga e.misaas n'ekiro mu maaso go: 
19_88_2_Okusaba kwange kuyingire w'oli; Otege okutu kwo eri okukaaba kwange: 
19_88_3_Kubanga emmeeme yange ejjudde ennaku, N'obulamu bwange busemberera emagombe. 
19_88_4_Bambalira wamu n'abo abakka mu bunnya; Nninga omuntu atalina mubeezi: 
19_88_5_Asuulibwa mu bafu, Ali ng'abattibwa abagalamira mu ntaana, B'otojjukira nate; Era bayawukana n'omukono gwo. 
19_88_6_Ontadde mu bunnya obuli wansi ennyo, Mu bifo eby'enzikiza, mu buziba. 
19_88_7_Obusungu bwo bunyigiriza nnyo, Era ombonyabonyezza n'amayengo go gonna. (Seera) 
19_88_8_Onjawukanyirizza wala n'abo be mmanyi; Onfudde ekitama eri abo: Nsibiddwa, so siyinza kuvaamu. 
19_88_9_Eriiso lyange likulukuse olw'okunakuwala: Nkukaabira buli lunaku, ai Mukama, Ntega engalo zange eri ggwe. 
19_88_10_Oliraga abafu eby'amagero? Abaafa baligolokoka balikutendereza? (Seera) 
19_88_11_Ekisa kyo kiribuulirirwa mu magombe? N'obwesigwa bwo mu kuzikirira? 
19_88_12_Eby'amagero byo birimanyirwa mu kizikiza? N'obutuukirivu bwo mu nsi ey'okwerabira? 
19_88_13_Naye ggwe, si Mukama, gwe nkaabira, Era buli nkya okusaba kwange kunaatuukanga mu maaso go. 
19_88_14_Mukama, kiki ekikusuuza emmeeme yange? Kiki ekikunkwesa amaaso go? 
19_88_15_Mbonyaabonyezebwa, nfaanana okufa okuva mu buto bwange: Entiisa zo bwe zimbaako, ne nneeraliikirira nnyo. 
19_88_16_Obusungu bwo obukambwe buatuuseeko; Entiisa zo zinzingizizza. 
19_88_17_Banneetooloola ng'amazzi okuzibya obudde; Bantaayiza eruuyi n'eruuyi wamu. 
19_88_18_Abanjagala ne mikwano gyange obaawukanyizza wala nange, N'abo be mmanyi mu kizikiza. 
19_89_1_Naayimbanga ku kusaasira kwa Mukama ennaku zonna: N'akamwa kange naategeezanga ab'emirembe gyonna obwesigwa bwo. 
19_89_2_Kubanga njogedde nti Okusaasira kunaanywezebwanga okutuusa emirembe n'emirembe; Era ne mu ggulu onoosimbanga obwesiswa bwo. 
19_89_3_Ndagaanye endagaano n'abalonde bange, Ndayiridde Dawudi amuddu wange 
19_89_5_N'eggulu linaatenderezanga eby'amagero byo, ai Mukama; Era n'obwesigwa bwo mu kkuŋŋaaniro ery'abatukuvu. 
19_89_6_Kubanga ani mu ggulu gwe bayinza okugeraageranya ne Mukama? Ani ku baana b'abakulu ali nga Mukama. 
19_89_7_Ye Katonda atiibwa ennyo mu lukiiko olw'abatukuvu, Agwaana okutiibwa okusinga bonna abamwetooloola? 
19_89_8_Ai Mukama Katonda ow'eggye, Ani ow'amaanyi, afaanana nga ggwe, ai YA? N'obwesigwa bwo bukwetooloola. 
19_89_9_Ggwe ofuga amalala g'ennyanja: Amayengo gaayo bwe gagolokoka, ogateesa. 
19_89_10_Wamenyaamenya Lakabu ng'omuntu attibwa; Wasaasaanya abalabe bo n'omukono ogw'amaanyi go. 
19_89_11_Eggulu liryo, era n'ensi yiyo: Ebintu byonna n'okujjula kwabyo wabiteekawo. 
19_89_12_Obukiika obwa kkono n'obwa ddyo wabutonda: Taboli ne Kerumooni zisanyukira erinnya lyo. 
19_89_13_Olina omukono ogw'amaanyi: Engalo zo za maanyi, n'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gugulumizibwa. 
19_89_14_Obutuukirivu n'omusango bye binyweza entebe yo: Okusaasira n'amazima bikulembera amaaso go. 
19_89_15_Balina omukisa abantu abamanyi eddoboozi ery'essanyu: Ai Mukama, batambulira mu musana gw'amaaso go. 
19_89_16_Basanyukira erinnya lyo okuzi bya obudde; Era bagulumizibwa mu butuukirivu bwo. 
19_89_17_Kubanga ggwe oli kitiibwa ky’amaanyi gaabwe: N'olw'ekisa kyo ejjembe lyaffe linaagulumizibwanga. 
19_89_18_Kubanga Mukama ye nannyini ngabo yaffe; Era Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri ye nannyini kabaka waffe. 
19_89_19_Mu biro biri wagambira abatukuvu bo mu kwolesebwa, N'oyogera nti Ntadde obuyambi ku muntu ow'amaanyi; Ngulumizizza omuntu eyalondebwa mu bantu. 
19_89_20_Ndabye Dawudi omuddu wange; Mmufuseeko amafuta gange amatukuvu: 
19_89_21_Engalo zange zinaanywezebwanga gy'ali; N'omukono gwange gunaamuwanga amaanyi. 
19_89_22_Omulabe taamujoogenga: Newakubadde omwana w'obubi taamubonyeebonyenga. 
19_89_23_Nange naasuulanga abanaalwananga naye mu maaso ge, Era naakubanga abanaamukyawanga. 
19_89_24_Naye obwesigwa bwange n'okusaasira kwange binaabanga naye; Ne mu linnya lyange ejjembe lye linaagulumizibwanga. 
19_89_25_Era naateekanga omukono gwe ku nnyanja, N'omukono gwe ogwa ddyo ku migga. 
19_89_26_Anankaabiranga nti Ggwe kitange, Katonda wange, era ejjinja ery'obulokozi bwange. 
19_89_27_Era ndimufuula omubereberye wange, Asinga bakabaka ab'ensi. 
19_89_28_Naamuterekeranga okusaasira kwange emirembe n'emirembe, N'endagaano yange eneenyweranga gy'ali. 
19_89_29_Era naawangaazanga ezzadde lye emirembe gyonna, N'entebe ye ng'ennaku ez'eggulu. 
19_89_30_Abaana be bwe banaalekanga amateeka gange, Ne batatambuliranga mu misango gyange; 
19_89_31_Bwe banaanyoomanga ebiragiro byange, Ne batakwatanga mateeka gange; 
19_89_32_Nange najjiranga okwonoona kwabwe n'omuggo, N'obutali butuukirivu bwabwe n'okukuba. 
19_89_33_Naye siimuggirengako ddala kusaasira kwange, So siiganyenga bwesigwa bwange okuweebuuka. 
19_89_34_Siimenyenga ndagaano yange, Sijjululenga kigambo ekyava mu mimwa gyange. 
19_89_35_Omulundi gumu nalayira obutuukirivu bwange; Siimulimbenga Dawudi. 
19_89_36_Ezzadde lye linaabeereranga emirembe gyonna, N'entebe ye ng'enjuba mu maaso gange. 
19_89_37_Eneenywezebwanga ennaku zonna ng'omwezi, Era ng'omujulirwa omwesigwa mu ggulu. (Seera) 
19_89_38_Naye wasuula n'ogoba N'osunguwalira oyo gwe wafukako amafuta. 
19_89_39_Wakyawa endagaano ey'omuddu wo. Wanyooma engule ye n'ogisuula wansi. 
19_89_40_Wamenyaamenya enkomera ze zonna; Wayabya ebigo bye. 
19_89_41_Bonna abayita mu kkubo bamunyaga: Afuuse ekivume eri baliraanwa be. 
19_89_42_Ogulumizizza omukono ogwa ddyo ogw'abalabe be; Osanyusizza abamukyaye bonna. 
19_89_43_Weewaawo, okyamizza obwogi bw'ekitala kye, So tomuyimirizizza mu lutalo. 
19_89_44_Omazeewo okumasamasa kwe, N'osuulira ddala entebe ye wansi. 
19_89_45_Osaze ku nnaku ez'obuvubuka bwe: Omubisseeko ensonyi. (Seera) 
19_89_46_Olituusa wa, ai Mukama, okwekwekanga ennaku zonna? Obusungu bwo bulituusa wa okubuubuukanga ng'omuliro? 
19_89_47_Ojjukire, nkwegayiridde, ekiseera kyange bwe kiri ekitono: Abaana b'abantu bonna nga wabatondera ebitaliimu! Omuntu aluwa aliba omulamu ataliraba kufa, Alyewonya emmeeme ye mu buyinza bw'amagombe? (Seera) 
19_89_49_a, okusaasira kwo okw'edda kuli luuyi wa, Kwe walayirira Dawudi mu bwesigwa bwo? Jjukira, Mukama, abaddu bo bwe bavumibwa; Bwe nsitula mu kifuba kyange ekivume eky'amawanga gonna ag'amaanyi; 
19_89_51_Abalabe bo kye bavuma, ai Mukama, Kye bavuma ebigere by'oyo gwe wafukako amafuta. 
19_89_52_Mukama yeebazibwenga emirembe n'emirembe. Amiina, era Amiina. 
19_90_1_Mukama, ggwe wali kifo kyaffe eky'okutuulamu Mu mirembe gyonna. 
19_90_2_Ensozi nga tezinnazaalibwa, Era nga tonnabumba nsi n'ebintu Okuva mu mirembe gyonna okutuusa nya mirembe gyonna, ggwe Katonda. 
19_90_3_Osindika abantu mu kuzikirira; Era oyogera nti Muddeeyo, mmwe abaana b'abantu. 
19_90_4_Kubanga emyaka olukumi mu maaso go Giri ng'olwajjo olwayita, Era ng'ekisisimuka ky'ekiro. 
19_90_5_Obatwalira ddala nga mukoka; bali ng'otulo: Enkya bali ng'omuddo ogiunera. 
19_90_6_Enkya guloka, gumera; Akawungeezi nga gusaliddwa, era nga guwotose. 
19_90_7_obusungu bwo butumalawo, Era bw'onyiiga ne tweraliikirira. 
19_90_8_Otadde obutali butuukirivu bwaffe mu musana gw'amaaso go, Ebibi byaffe eby'ekyama mu musana gw'amaaso go. 
19_90_9_Kubanga ennaku zaffe zonna ziyita mu busungu bwo; Emyaka gyaffe giggwaawo ng'ekirowoozo. 
19_90_10_Ennaku z'emyaka gyaffe gye myaka nsanvu, Era naye amaanyi gaweza emyaka ekinaana; Naye amalala gaabwe kwe kutegana n'okunakuwala kwereere; Kubanga gayita mangu, naffe ne tubula. 
19_90_11_Ani amanyi obuyinza obw'obusungu bwo, N'okunyiiga nga bw'ogwanira okutiibwa? 
19_90_12_Otuyigirize tubalenga bwe tutyo ennaku zaffe, Tulyoke tufune omutima omugezigezi. 
19_90_13_Okomewo, ai Mukama; olituusa wa? Era wejjuse mu bigambo eby'abaddu bo. 
19_90_14_Otukkuse enkya n'okusaasira kwo; Tusanyukenga, tujaguzenga, ennaku zaffe zonna. 
19_90_15_Otusanyuse ng'ennaku bwe ziri ze watubonyaabonyezangamu Era ng'emyaka bwe giri gye twalabirangamu obubi. 
19_90_16_Omulimu gwo gulabikirenga abaddu bo, N'ekitiibwa kyo kirabikenga ku baana baabwe. 
19_90_17_Era n'obulungi bwa Mukama Katonda waffe bubeerenga ku ffe: Era otunywerezenga emirimu gy'emikono gyaffe. 
19_91_1_Atuula mu kifo eky'ekyama eky'oyo ali waggluu ennyo Ye anaabeeranga wansi w'ekisiikirize eky'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna. 
19_91_2_Naayogeranga ku Mukama nti Oyo kye kiddukiro kyange, era kye kigo kyange: Katonda wange gwe nneesiga. 
19_91_3_Kubanga oyo ye anaakulokolanga mu mutego ogw'omuyizzi, Ne mu kawumpuli omubi. 
19_91_4_Anaakubikkangako n'ebiwaawaatiro bye, Era wansi w'ebyoya bye w'onoddukiranga: Amazima ge ye ngabo, ge gakuuma. 
19_91_5_Tootyenga lwa ntiisa ya kiro Newakubadde akasaale akagenda emisana 
19_91_7_Abantu olukumi baligwira ku lubiriizi lwo, Era akakumi ku mukono gwo ogwa ddyo; Tekulikusemberera ggwe. 
19_91_8_Naye olitunula n'amaaso go, Oliraba empeera y'ababi. 
19_91_9_Kubanga ggwe, ai Mukama, oli kiddukiro kyange Omufudde oyo ali waggulu ennyo ekigo kyo w'otuula; 
19_91_10_Tewali kabi akalikubaako, so tewali kibonoobono ekirisemberera eweema yo. 
19_91_11_Kubanga alikulagiririza bamalayika be, Bakukuume mu makubo go gonna. 
19_91_12_Balikuwanirira mu mikono gyabwe, Oleme okwesittala elugere kyo ku jjinja. 
19_91_13_Olirinnya ku mpologoma ne ku ssalambwa; Olisamba empologoma ento n'omusota wansi w'ebigere byo. 
19_91_14_Kubanga antaddeko okwagala kwe, kyendiva mmuwonya: Ndimugulumiza waggulu, kubanga amanyi erinnya lyange. 
19_91_15_Alinkaabira, nange ndimuyita; Naabeeranga wamu naye bw'anaanakuwalanga: Ndimuwonya, ndimuwa ekitiibwa. 
19_91_16_Ndimuwangaaza nnyo, ndimukkusa obulamu, Era ndinnulaga obulokozi bwange. 
19_92_1_Kirungi okwebazanga Mukama, N'okuyimba okutenderezanga erinnya lyo, ggwe ali waggulu ennyo: 
19_92_2_Okwolesanga ekisa kyo enkya, N'obwesigwa bwo buli kiro. 
19_92_3_N'ekivuga ekirina enkoba ekkumi, era n'amadinda: N'eddoboozi ery'okusinza ery'ennanga. 
19_92_4_Kubanga ggwe, Mukama, onsanyusizza n'omulimu gwo: Naajagnlizanga emirimu gy'emikono gyo. 
19_92_5_Emirimu gyo nga mikulu, ai Mukama Ebirowoozo byo bya buziba nnyo. 
19_92_6_Omuntu ali ng'ensolo tamanyi kino, So nga n'omusirusiru takitegeera: 
19_92_7_Ababi bwe baloka ng'omuddo, Era abakozi b'obubi bonna bwe babeera; Kyebava beera bazikirizibwe emirembe gyonna: 
19_92_8_Naye ggwe, ai Mukama, ogulumizibwanga emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_92_9_Kubanga, laba, abalabe bo, ai Mukama, Kubanga, laba, abalabe bo balizikirira; Abakozi b'obubi bonna balisaasaanyizibwa. 
19_92_10_Naye ogulumizizza ejjembe lyange ng'ery'embogo: Nfukiddwako amafnta amaggya. 
19_92_11_Era eriiso lyange Lirabye bye njagala nga bituuse ku balabe bange, Amatu gange gawulidde bye njagala nga bituuse ku abo abakola obubi abangolokokerako. 
19_92_12_Omutuukirivu alyera ng'olukindu; Alikula ng'omuvule mu Lebanooni. 
19_92_13_Abasimbirwa mu nnyumba ya Mukama Balyerera mu mpya za Katonda waffe. 
19_92_14_Baliba nga bakyabala ebibala nga bakaddiye; Balijjula amazzi, baligejja: 
19_92_15_Balage nga Mukama mutuukirivu; Oyo lye jjinja lyange, so mu ye temuli butali butuukirivu. 
19_93_1_Mukama afuga; ayambadde obukulu: Mukama ayambadde, yeesibye amaanyi: Era ensi enywedde n'okuyinza n'eteyinza kusagaasagana. 
19_93_2_Entebe yo yanywera edda n'edda lyonna: Obeererawo okuva emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_93_3_Amazzi gayimusizza, Ai Mukama, Amazzi gayimusizza eddoboozi lyago; Amazzi gayimusa amayengo gaago. 
19_93_4_Okusinga amaloboozi ag'amazzi amangi, Amayengo amanene ag'oku nnyanja, Mukama ali waggulu asinza amaanyi. 
19_93_5_Bye wategeeza bya mazima ddala: Obutukuvu busaanira emmyumba yo, Ai Mukama, emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_94_1_Ai Mukama, ggwe Katonda nannyini kuwalana, Ggwe Katonda nannyini kuwalana, omasizemasize ddala. 
19_94_2_Weeyimuse, ggwe asalira ensi emisango: Owe ab'amalala ebibagwanira. 
19_94_3_Mukama, ababi balituusa wa, Ababi balituusa wa okuwangula? 
19_94_4_Boogera ebitaliimu, n'eby'amalala: Mumuyimbire Mukama oluyimba oluggya: Mumuyimbire Mukama, mmwe ensi zonna. 
19_94_5_Bamenyaamenya abantu bo, ai Mukama, Era babonyaabonya obusika bwo. 
19_94_6_Batta nnamwandu ne munnaggwanga, Era batta atalina kitaawe. 
19_94_7_Ne boogera nti Mukama taalabe, So Katonda wa Yakobo taalowooze. 
19_94_8_Mulowooze, mmwe abali ng'ensolo mu bantu: Nammwe abasirusiru, muligeziwala ddi? 
19_94_9_Eyateekawo okutu, taliwulira? Eyabumba eriiso, taliraba? 
19_94_10_Abonereza amawanga, talikangavvula, Ayigiriza abantu amagezi? 
19_94_11_Mukama amanyi ebirowoozo by'abantu, Nga mukka. 
19_94_12_Alina omukisa omuntu gw'obonereza, ai Mukama, Era gw'oyigiriza ebiva mu mateeka go; 
19_94_13_Olyoke omuwummuze aleme okulaba ebiro eby'ennaku, Okutuusa obunnya lwe bulisimitwa ababi. 
19_94_14_Kubanga Mukama talisuula bantu be, So talireka busika bwe. 
19_94_15_Kubanga omusango gulidda mu butuukirivu: Ne bonna abalina emitima egy'amazima balibugoberera. 
19_94_16_Ani anangolokokera ku abc abakola obubi? Ani anannyimiririra ku bakozi b'ebitali bya butuukirivu? 
19_94_17_Singa Mukama teyali mubeezi wange, Emmeeme yange yanditudde mangu awali okusirika. 
19_94_18_Bwe tmayogera nti Ekigere kyange kiseerera, Okusaasira kwo, ggwe Mukama, ne kumpanirira. 
19_94_19_Mu birowoozo byange ebingi ebiri mu nze Okusanyusa kwo kumpoomera emmeeme yange. 
19_94_20_Abafuga ababi balissa ekimu naawe, Abalagira eby'ettima mu mateeka? 
19_94_21_Bakuŋŋaana okulumba emmeeme y'omutuukirivu, Ne basala omusango okusinga omusaayi ogutaliiko kabi. 
19_94_22_Naye Mukama yabanga kigo kyange ekiwanvu; Era Katonda wange lye jjinja lye nneeyuna. 
19_94_23_Era abaleeseeko obutali butuukirivu bwabwe bo, Era alibazikiriza mu bubi bwabwe; Mukama Katonda waffe alibazikiriza. 
19_95_1_Mujje, tuyimbire Mukama: Tuyimbire n'eddoboozi ery'essanyu ejjinja ery'obulokozi bwaffe. 
19_95_2_Tujje mu maaso ge n'okwebaza, Tumuyimbire n'eddoboozi ery'essanyu ne zabbuli. 
19_95_3_Kubanga Mukama ye Katonda omukulu, Era Kabaka omukulu asinga bakatonda bonna. 
19_95_4_Enkonko z'ensi ziri mu mukono gwe; N'entikko z'ensozi nazo zizze. 
19_95_5_Ennyanja yiye, era yagikola; N'emikono gye gye gyabumba olukalu. 
19_95_6_Mujje, tusinze, tuvuuname; Tufukamire mu maaso ga Mukama Omutonzi waffe: 
19_95_7_Kubanga ye Katonda waffe, Naffe tuli bantu ba ttale lye, era endiga ez'omu mukono gwe. Leero, oba nga munaawulira eddoboozi lye, 
19_95_8_Temukakanyaza mitima gyammwe, nga e Meriba, Nga ku lunaku olw'e Masa mu ddungu: 
19_95_9_Bajjajja bammwe bwe bankema, Ne bangeza, ne balaba omulimu gwange. 
19_95_10_Emyaka amakumi ana nanyiikaalira ab'emirembe giri, Ne njogera nti Be bantu abakyama mu mutima gwabwe, So tebamanya makubo gange: 
19_95_11_Kyennava ndayira mu busungu bwange, Nga tebaliyingira mu kiwummulo kyange. 
19_96_1_Muyimbire Mukama oluyimba oluggya: Mumuyimbire Mukama, mmwe ensi zonna. 
19_96_2_Mumuyimbire Mukama, mwebaze erinnya lye: Mwolesenga obulokozi bwe buli lunaku buli lunaku. 
19_96_3_Mubuulirenga ekitiibwa kye mu mawanga, Eby'amagero bye mu bantu bonna. 
19_96_4_Kubanga Mukama mukulu, era agwana okutenderezebwa ennyo: Agwana okutiibwanga okusinga bakatonda bonna. 
19_96_5_Kubanga bakatonda bonna ab'amawanga bye bifaananyi: Naye Mukama ye yakola eggulu. 
19_96_6_Ekitiibwa n'obukulu biri mu maaso ge: Amaanyi n'obulungi biri mu watukuvu we. 
19_96_7_Mumuwe Mukama, mmwe ebika eby'amawanga, Mumuwe Mukama ekitiibwa n'amaanyi. 
19_96_8_Mumuwe Mukama ekitiibwa ekigwanira erinnya lye: Muleete ssaddaaka, mujje mu mpya ze. 
19_96_9_Kale mumusinze Mukama mu bulungi obw'obutukuvu. Mukankane mu maaso ge, mmwe ensi zonna. 
19_96_10_Mwogerere mu mawanga nti Mukama afuga: Era n'ensi enywera n'okuyinza n'eteyinza kusagaasagana: Alisalira amawanga emisango egy'ensonga. 
19_96_11_Eggulu lisanyuke, era n'ensi ejaguze; Ennyanja ewuume, n'okujjula kwayo; 
19_96_12_Ennimiro ejaguze, n'ebigirimu byonna; Emiti gyonna egy'omu kibira ne giryoka giyimba olw'essanyu; 
19_96_13_Mu maaso ga Mukama, kubanga ajja; Kubanga ajja okusalira ensi emisango: Alisalira ensi emisango egy'ensonga, Aliramula amawanga n'amazima ge. 
19_97_1_Mukama afuga; ensi esanyuke: Ebizinga bijaguze bwe byenkana obungi. 
19_97_2_Ebire n'ekizikiza bimwetooloola: Obutuukirivu n'omusango bye binyweza entebe ye. 
19_97_3_Omuliro gumukulembera, Gwokya abalabe be eruuyi n’eruuyi. 
19_97_4_Enjota ze zaamulisa ensi: Ensi n'eraba n'ekankana. 
19_97_5_Ensozi z'asaanuuka ng'envumbo awali Mukama, Awali Mukama w'ensi zonna. 
19_97_6_Eggulu libuulira obutuukirivu bwe, N'amawanga gonna galabye ekitiibwa kye. 
19_97_7_Bakwatibwe ensonyi bonna abasinza ebifaananyi ebyoIe, Abeenyuzniriza olw'ebifaananyi: Mumusinze ye, mmwe bakatonda mwenna. 
19_97_8_Sayuuni yawulira n'asanyuka, N'abawala ba Yuda ne bajaguza; Olw'emisango gyo, ai Mukama. 
19_97_9_Kubanga ggwe, Mukama, oli waggulu nnyo ku nsi zonna: Ogulumizibwa okusinga ennyo bakatonda bonna. 
19_97_10_Kale mmwe abaagala Mukama, mukyawe obubi: Akuuma emmeeme z'abatukuvu be; Abawonya mu mukono gw'omubi. 
19_97_11_Omusana gwasigirwa omutuukirivu, N'essanyu oyo alina omutima ogw'amazima. 
19_97_12_Musanyukire Mukama, mmwe abatuukirivu Era mwebaze erinnya lye ettukuvu. 
19_98_1_Mumuyimbire Mukama oluyimba oluggya; Kubanga akoze eby'amagero: Engalo ze eza ddyo, n'omukono gwe omutukuw bimuleetedde obulokozi. 
19_98_3_Ajjukidde okusaasira kwe n'obwesigwa bwe eri ennyumba ya Isiraeri: Enkomerero zonna ez'ensi zirabye obulokozi bwa Katonda waffe. 
19_98_4_Muyimbe n'eddoboozi ery'essanyu eri Mukama, mmwe ensi zonna: Muleete oluyimba muyimbe olw'essanyu, weewaawo, muyimbe eby'okutendereza. 
19_98_5_Muyimbe okutendereza Mukama n'ennanga; N'ennanga era n'eddoboozi eriyimba. 
19_98_6_N'amakondeere n'eddoboozi ery'akagombe Muleete eddoboozi ery'essanyu mu maaso ga Kabaka, Mukama. 
19_98_7_Ennyanja ewuume, n'okujjula kwayo; Ensi zonna, n'abo abazituulamu 
19_99_1_Mukama afuga; amawanga gakankane; Atuula wakati wa bakerubi; ensi esagaasagane. 
19_99_2_Mukama mukulu mu Sayuuni; Era ali waggulu okusinga amawanga gonna. 
19_99_3_Batendereze erinnya lyo ekkulu era ery'entiisa. Ye mutukuvu. 
19_99_4_Era amaanyi ga kabaka gaagala go ogw'ensonga; Ggwe onyweze obutuukirivu, Otuukiriza omusango n'oburuukirivu mu Yakobo. 
19_99_5_Mtunugulumizenga Mukama Katonda waffe, Era musinzizenga ku ntebe y'ebigere bye: Ye mutukuvu. 
19_99_6_Musa ne Alooni mu bakabona be, Ne Samwiri mu abo abakoowoola erinnya lye; Baakaabira Mukama, n'abayitaba. 
19_99_7_Yayogerera nabo mu mpagi ey'ekire: Baakwata bye yategeeza; n'ekiragiro kye yabawa. 
19_99_8_Wabaddamu, ai Mukama Katonda waffe: Wali Katonda abasonyiwa, Newakubadde nga wabawalana eggwanga olw'ebikolwa byabwe. 
19_99_9_Mumugulumizenga Mukama Katonda waffe, Musinzizenga ku lusozi lwe olutukuvu; Kubanga Mukama Katonda waffe mutukuvu. 
19_100_1_Muleetere Mukama eddoboozi ery'essaayu, mmwe ensi zonna. 
19_100_2_Mumuweereze Mukama n'essanyu: Mujje mu maaso ge n'okuyimba. 
19_100_3_Mumanye nga Mukama ye Katonda: Oyo ye yatutonda, naffe tuli babe; Tuli bantu be, era endiga ez'omu ddundiro lye. 
19_100_4_Muyingire mu miryango gye n'okwebaza, Ne mu mpya ze n'okutendereza. Mumwebaze, mukuze erinnya lye. 
19_100_5_Kubanga Mukama mulungi; okusaasira kwe kwa lubeerera; N'obwesigwa bwe bwa mirembe gyonna. 
19_101_1_Naayimbanga ku kusaasira ne ku musango: Ggwe, ai Mukama, gwe nnaayimbiranga okutendereza. 
19_101_2_Naatambuliranga n'amagezi mu kkubo ettuukirivu: Woowe, olijja gye ndi ddi? Naatambuliranga mu nnyumba yange n'omutima ogutuukiridde. 
19_101_4_Omutima ogutawulira gulindekera ddala: Sirimanya kintu kyonna kibi. 
19_101_5_Siiteekenga kintu kyonna ekitasaana mu maaso gange: Nkyawa omulimu gw'abo abakyama; Tegwegattenga nange: 
19_101_6_Amaaso gange ganaatunuuliranga abeesigwa ab'omu nsi, batuulenga wamu nange: Atambulira mu kkubo ettuukirivu ye anampeerezanga. 
19_101_7_Akola eby'obulimba talituula mu nnyumba yange: Ayogera ebitali bya mazima talinywera mu maaso gange. 
19_101_8_Buli nkya naazikirizanga ababi bonna ab'omu nsi; Mmalewo bonna abakola ebitali byabutuukirivu baggweewo mu kibuga kya Mukama. 
19_102_1_Wulira okusaba kwange, ai Mukama. Okukaaba kwange kutuuke gy'oli. 
19_102_2_Tonkisa maaso go ku lunaku olw'okunakuwala kwange: Otege okutu kwo we ndi; Ku lunaku Iwe nkoowoolerako ompitabe mangu. 
19_102_3_Kubanga ennaku zange ziggwaawo ng'omukka, N'amagumba gange gookebwa ng'omumuli. 
19_102_4_Omutima gwange gwokeddwa, guwotose ng'omuddo; Kubanga neerabira okulya emmere yange. 
19_102_5_Olw'eddoboozi eryokusinda kwange Amagumba gange geegasse n'omubiri gwange. 
19_102_6_Nninga kimbala ow'omu dduungu Nfuuse ng'ekiwuugulu eky'omu nsiko. 
19_102_7_Ntunula, era nfuuse Ng'enkazaluggya etuula ku kitikkiro yokka. 
19_102_8_Abalabe bange bazibya obudde okunvuma; Abandalukidde bandayira. 
19_102_9_Kubanga ndidde evvu ng'omugaati, Era ntabudde kye nnywedde n'amaziga. 
19_102_10_Olw'okunyiiga kwo n'obusungu bwo: Kubanga wannonda n'onsuula. 
19_102_11_Ennaku zange ziri ng'ekisiikirize ekiggwaawo; Era mpotose ng'omuddo. 
19_102_12_Naye ggwe, ai Mukama, onoobeereranga ennaku zonna: N'ekijjukizo kyo okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
19_102_13_Oligolokoka, olisaasira Sayuuni: Kubanga obudde butuuse okumusaasira, Weewaawo, obudde obwalagirwa butuuse. 
19_102_14_Kubanga abaddu bo basanyukira amayinja ge, Era basaasira enfuufu ye. 
19_102_15_Bwe gatyo amawanga gonna galitya erinnya lya Mukama, Ne bakabaka bonna ab'ensi balitya ekitiibwa kyo: 
19_102_16_Kubanga Mukama azimbidde ddala Sayuuni, Alabikidde mu kitiibwa kye; 
19_102_17_Alowoozezza okusaba kw'abo abafiiriddwa, So tanyoomye kusaba kwabwe. 
19_102_18_Ekyo kiriwandiikirwa emirembe egirijja: N'eggwanga eriritondebwa liritendereza Mukama. 
19_102_19_Kubanga atunuulidde wansi ng'ayima ku watukuvu we awagulumivu; Mukama yalaba ensi ng'ayima mu ggulu; 
19_102_20_Okuwulira okusinda kw'omusibe; Okusumulula abo abateeketwawo okufa; 
19_102_21_Abantu balyoke batenderenga erinnya lya Mukama mu Sayuuni N'ettendo lye mu Yerusaalemi; 
19_102_22_Amawanga bwe galikuŋŋaana awamu, N'amatwale, okuweereza Mukama. 
19_102_23_Yakendeeza ku maanyi gange mu kkubo; Yasala ku nnaku zange. 
19_102_24_Ne njegera nti Ai Katonda wange, tontwalira ddala ng'ennaku zange tezinnaggwaawo: Emyaka gyo gibeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_102_25_Edda n'edda watandika ensi; N'eggulu gwe mulimu gw'emikono gyo. 
19_102_26_Ebyo biriggwaawo, naye ggwe onoobeereranga: Weewaawo, ebyo byonna birikaddiwa ng'ekyambalo; Olibiwaanyisa ng'ekyambalo, n'ebyo biriwaanyisibwa: 
19_102_27_Naye ggwe oba bumu, N'emyaka gyo tegirikoma. 
19_102_28_Abaana b'abaddu bo banaabeerangawo. N'ezzadde lyabwe linaanywezebwanga mu maaso go. 
19_103_1_Weebaze Mukama, ggwe emmeeme yange; Ne byonna ebiri munda yange, mwebaze erinnya lye ettukuvu. 
19_103_2_Weebaze Mukama, ggwe emmeeme yange, So teweerabira birungi bye byonna: 
19_103_3_Asonyiwa ebikolwa byo byonna ebitali bya butuukirivu; Awonya endwadde zo zonna 
19_103_5_Akkusa akamwa ko ebirungi; Obuvubuka bwo ne budda obuggya ng'empungu. 
19_103_6_Mukama akola eby'obutuukirivu, Atuukiriza emisango ku lw'abo bonna abajoogebwa. 
19_103_7_Yamanyisa Musa amakubo ge, N'ebikolwa bye eri abaana ba Isiraeri. 
19_103_8_Mukama ajjudde okusaasira n'ekisa, Alwawo okusunguwala, alina okusonyiwa okungi. 
19_103_9_Taanenyenga ennaku zonna; So taabenga na busungu mirembe gyonna. 
19_103_10_Tatukoze ng'ebibi byaffe bwe biri, So tatusasudde ng'ebikolwa byaffe ebitali bya butuukiriw bwe biri. 
19_103_11_Kuba eggulu nga bwe liri waggulu okusinga ensi, N'okusaasira kwe bwe kuli okungi bwe kutyo eri abo abamutya. 
19_103_12_Ebuvanjuba n'ebugwanjuba bwe biri ewala, Bw'atyo bw'atutadde ewala ebyonoono byaffe: 
19_103_13_Nga kitaabwe bw'asaasira abaana be, Ne Mukama bw'asaasira bw'atyo abamutya. 
19_103_14_Kubanga amanyi omubiri gwaffe; Ajjukira nga ffe tuli nfuufu. 
19_103_15_Omuntu, ennaku ze ziri ng'omuddo; Ng'ekimuli eky'omu nsiko, bw'ayera bw'atyo. 
19_103_16_Kubanga empewo zikikuntako, ne kiba nga kigenze; N'ekifo kyakyo tekirikimanya nate. 
19_103_17_Naye okusaasira kwa Mukama kwava mu mirembe gyonna era kulituuka mu mirembe gyonna eri abamutya, N'obutuukirivu bwe eri abaana b'abaana; 
19_103_18_Eri abo abakwata endagaano ye, N'eri abo abajjukira ebiragiro bye okubikola. 
19_103_19_Mukama yanyweza eatebe ye mu ggulu; N'obwakabaka bwe bufuga byonna. 
19_103_20_Mumwebaze Mukama, mmwe bamalayika be: Mmwe abazira ab'amaanyi, abatuukiriza ekigambo kye, Nga muwulira eddoboozi ery'ekigambo kye. 
19_103_21_Mumwebaze Mukama, mmwe mwenna eggye lye; Abaweereza be, abakola by'ayagala. 
19_103_22_Mumwebaze Mukama, mmwe mwenna emirimu gye, Mu bifo byonna by'afugiramu: Weebaze Mukama, ggwe emmeeme yange. 
19_104_1_Weebaze Mukama, ggwe emmeeme yange. Ai Mukama Katoada wange, oli mukulu nnyo; Oyambadde ekitiibwa n'obukulu. 
19_104_2_Eyeebikka omusana ng'ekyambalo; Atimba eggulu ng'eggigi: 
19_104_3_Asimba empagi ez'enju ze mu mazzi; Afuula ebire eggaali lye; Atambulira ku biwaawaatiro by'etiipewo: 
19_104_4_Afuula ababaka be empewo; N'abaweereza be omuliro ogwaka: 
19_104_5_Eyasimba emisingi gy'ensi, Ereme okusagaasagananga emirembe gyonna. 
19_104_6_Wagibikkako ennyanja ng'ekyambalo; Amazzi ne gayimirira waggulu w'ensozi. 
19_104_7_Ggwe bwe wanenya ne gadduka; Eddoboozi ery'okubwatuka kwo bwe lyawulirwa ne ganguwa okugenda 
19_104_9_Wagalagira ensalo gye gatayinza kusukkako; Galeme okudda nate okubikka ku nsi. 
19_104_10_Aleeta enzizi mu biwonvu; Zikulukuta mu nsozi: 
19_104_11_Zinywesa ensolo zonna ez'omu nsiko; Entulege ziwona ennyonta. 
19_104_12_Ennyonyi ez'omu ggulu kwe zituula ku ezo, Ziyimbira mu matabi. 
19_104_13_Afukirira amazzi ensozi ng'ayima mu nju ze: Ensi n'ekkuta ebibala eby'emirimu gyo. 
19_104_14_Amereza ente essubi, N'omuddo okuweereza abantu; Balyoke baggyenga emmere mu ttaka; 
19_104_15_N'omwenge ogusanyusa omutima gw'abantu, N'amafuta ganyirizenga amaaso ge, N'emmere ewa omuntu amaanyi omutima gwe. 
19_104_16_Emiti gya Mukama gikkuta; Emivule gya Lebanooni gye yasimba; 
19_104_17_Ennyonyi gye zikoleramu ebisu byazo: Kasida, emiberoosi ye nnyumba ye. 
19_104_18_Ensozi empanvu ziba za mbulabuzi; Amayinja kye kiddukiro ky'obumyu. 
19_104_19_Yateekerawo omwezi ebiro: Enjuba emanyi okugwa kwayo. 
19_104_20_Ggwe oleeta ekizikiza, ekiro ne kibaawo; Ensolo zonna ez'omu kibira mwe zifulumira nga zisooba. 
19_104_21_Empologoma ento ziwumira gye zinaalya, Era zinoonya emmere yaazo eri Katonda. 
19_104_22_Enjuba n'evaayo, ne zigenda, Ne zeebaka mu mpuku zaazo. 
19_104_23_Abantu ne bagenda ku mulimu gwabwe N'okutegana kwabwe okutuusa akawungeezi. 
19_104_24_Ai Mukama, emirimu gyo nga gya ngeri nnyingi Wagikola gyonna mu magezi: Ensi ejjudde obugagga bwo. 
19_104_25_Ennyanja eri, ennene engazi, Omuli ebyewalula ebitabalikika, Ebisolo ebitono era n'ebinene. 
19_104_26_Eri amaato gye gayitako; Lukwata mwali, gwe wakola okuzannyira omwo. 
19_104_27_Ebyo byonna bikulindirira ggwe, Obiwe emmere yaabyo mu ntuuko zaayo. 
19_104_28_Gy'obiwa gye bikuŋŋaanya; Oyanjuluza engalo, ne bikkuta ebirungi. 
19_104_29_Okisa amaaso go, ne byeraliikirira; Obiggyamu omukka gwabyo, ne bifa, Ne bidda mu nfuufu yaabyo. 
19_104_30_Otuma omwoyo gwo, ne bitondebwa; Era ofuula obuggya amaaso g'ettaka. 
19_104_31_Ekitiibwa kya Mukama kibeere kya kubeerera; Mukama asanyukire emirimu gye: 
19_104_32_Atunuulira ensi, n'ekankana; Akwata ku nsozi, ne zinyooka. 
19_104_33_Naayimbiranga Mukama nga nkyali mulamu: Naayimbanga okutendereza Katonda wange nga nkyaliwo. 
19_104_34_Okulowooza kwange kumuwoomerenga: Naasanyukiranga Mukama. 
19_104_35_Ababi bazikirire baggweewo ku nsi, Aboonoonye baleme okubeerawo nate. Weebaze Mukama, ggwe emmeeme yange. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_105_1_Mumwebazenga Mukama, mukaabirenga erinnya lye; Mumanyisenga ebikolwa bye mu mawanga. 
19_105_2_Mumuyimbirenga, muyimbenga okumutendereza; Mwogerenga ku by'amagero bye byonna. 
19_105_3_Mwenyumirizenga olw'erinnya lye ettukuvu: Omutima gw'abo abanoonya Mukama gusanyukenga. 
19_105_4_Munoonyenga Mukama n'amaanyi ge; Munoonyenga amaaso ge ennaku zonna. 
19_105_5_Mujjukirenga eby'amagero bye bye yakola; Eby'ekitalo bye, n'emisango egy'akamwa ke 
19_105_7_ye Mukama Katonda waffe: Emisango gye gibuna ensi zonna. 
19_105_8_Ajjukira endagaano ye ennaku zonna. Ekigambo kye yalagira emirembe olukumi 
19_105_10_N'ekyo naakinyweza eri Yakobo okuba etteeka, Eri Isiraeri, okuba endagaano eteriggwaawo: 
19_105_11_Ng'ayogera nti Ggwe ndiwa ensi ya Kanani, Omugabo ogw'obusika bwa mmwe: 
19_105_12_Bwe baali abantu abatono omuwendo gwabwe: Weewaawo, abatono ennyo, era abo batambuze omwo; 
19_105_13_Ne batambulatambula mu mawanga agatali gamu, Nga bava mu bwakabaka ne baggukira mu bantu abalala. 
19_105_14_Teyaganya muntu kuboonoona; Weewaawo, yanenya bakabaka ku lwabwe; 
19_105_15_Ng'ayogera nti Temukwatanga ku abo be nnafukako amafuta, So temukolanga bubi bannabbi bange. 
19_105_16_N'ayita enjala okugwa ku nsi; N'amenya omuggo gwabwe gwonna, ye mmere yaabwe. 
19_105_17_Yabakulembeza omuntu; Yusufu yatundibwa okuba omuddu: 
19_105_18_Ebigere bye baabirumya enjegere; Yagaiamira ng'asibiddwa n'ebyuma: 
19_105_19_Okutuusa ekigambo kye lwe kyatuukirira; Ekigambo kya Mukama kyamukemanga. 
19_105_20_Kabaka yatuma n'amusumulula; Ye yafuga amawanga, n'amuteera ddala. 
19_105_21_N'amufuula omukulu w'ennyumba ye, N'amuteresa ebinttt bye byonna: 
19_105_22_Okusiba abalangira be bw'ayagala, N'okuyigiriza amagezi abakadde be. 
19_105_23_Era ne Isiraeri n'ajja mu Misiri; Yakobo n'atuula mu nsi ya Kaamu. 
19_105_24_N'ayongera nnyo abantu be, N'abawa amaanyi okusinga abalabe baabwe. 
19_105_25_N'akyusa omutima gwabwe okukyawa abantu be, Okukuusakuusa abaddu be. 
19_105_26_N'atuma Musa omuddu we, Ne Alooni gwe yalonda. 
19_105_27_Ne bassa mu bo obubonero bwe, N'eby'amagero mu nsi ya Kaamu. 
19_105_28_N'aleeta ekizikiza, ekizikiza ne kikwata; Ne bajeemera ebigambo bye. 
19_105_29_N'afuula amazzi gaabwe omusaayi, N'atta ebyennyanja byabwe. 
19_105_30_Ensi yaabwe n'ejjula ebikere, Mu nju za bakabaka baabwe. 
19_105_31_N'ayogera, ebitole eby'easowera ne bijja, N'easekere mu nsalo zaabwe zonna. 
19_105_32_N'abawa omuzira mu kifo ky'enkaba, N'omuliro ogwaka mu nsi yaabwe. 
19_105_33_Era n'ekuba n'emizabbibu n'omituni gyabwe; N'amenya emiti egy’omu asalo zaabwe. 
19_105_34_N'ayogera, enzige ne zijja, N'obuwuka, era ebyo tebyabalikika omuwendo gwabyo. 
19_105_35_Ne birya buli muddo ogwali mu nsi yaabwe, Ne birya ebibala eby'ettaka lyabwe. 
19_105_36_Era n’akuba n'ababereberye bonaa abaali mu asi yaabwe, Abaali basinga amaanyi mu bazira baabwe bonna. 
19_105_37_N'abaggyamu nga balina effeeza n'ezaabu: So tewaali muntu munafu omu mu bika bye. 
19_105_38_Misiri n’esanyuka bwe baagenda; Kubanga entiisa yaabwe yali ebaguddeko. 
19_105_39_N'ayanjuluza ekire okubabikkangako; N'omuliro gabsakirenga ekiro. 
19_105_40_Ne basaba, n'aleeta obngubi, N'ebakkusa emmere ey'omu ggulu. 
19_105_41_N'ayasa ejjinja, amazzi ne gatiitiika; Ne gakulukuta ma bifo ebikalu. 
19_105_42_Kubanga yajjukira ekigambo kye ekitukuvu, Ne Ibulayimu omuddu we. 
19_105_43_N'aggyamu abantu be n'essanyu, N'abatonde be n'okuyimba. 
19_105_44_N'abawa easi ez'amawanga; Ne batwala ne balya emirimu egy'amawanga: 
19_105_45_Balyoke bakwateaga ebiragiro bye, Beekuumenga amateeka ge. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_106_1_Mukama Mumntendereze Mukama. Kale mumwebaze Mukama; knbanga mulungi: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeencra emirembe gyonna. 
19_106_2_Ani ayinza okwatula ebikolwa eby'amaanyi ebya Mukama, Oba okwolesa etteado lye lyonna? 
19_106_3_Balina omukisa abakwata omusango, N'oyo akola eby'obutuukirivu mu biro byonna. 
19_106_4_Onjijukire, si Mukama, n’ekisa ky'olina eri abantu bo; Nkwegayiridde, onjijire n'obulokozi bwo: 
19_106_5_Ndabe abalonde bo nga balaba omuldsa, Nsanyuldre essanyu ery'eggwanga lyo. Neenyumirize wamu n'obusika bwo. 
19_106_6_Twayonoona ffe ne bajjajjaffe, Twakola ebitali bya butuukirivu, twahola obubi. 
19_106_7_Bajjajjaffe tebaategeera bya magero byo mu Misiri; Ne batajjukira kusaasira kwo okungi; Naye ne bajeemera ku anyanja, ku Nnyanja Emmyufu. 
19_106_8_Era naye n’abalokola olw'erinaya lye, Amanyise obuyinza bwe obungi. 
19_106_9_Era n'anenya Ennyanja Emmyufu, n'ekalira: Awo n'abayisa mu buziba, nga mu ddungu. 
19_106_10_N'abalokola eri omukono gw'oyo eyabakyawa, N'abanuaula mu mukono gw'omulabe. 
19_106_11_Amazzi ne gabikka ku balabe baabwe: Ne watasigalawo n'omu. 
19_106_12_Ne balyoka bakkiriza ebigambo bye; Ne bayimba okumutendereza. 
19_106_13_Beerabira mangu emirimu gye; Tebaalindirira kuteesa kwe: 
19_106_14_Naye ne beegombera nnyo mu lukoola, Ne bakemera Katonda mu ddungu. 
19_106_15_N'abawa bye baasaba; Naye n'aleeta obukovvu mu mmeeme yaabwe. 
19_106_16_Era obuggya ne bubakwatira Musa mu lusiisira, Ne Alooni omutukuvu wa Mukama. 
19_106_17_Ensi n'eyasama n'emira Dasani. N'ebikka ku kibiina kya Abiraamu. 
19_106_18_Omuliro ne gwaka mu kibiina kyabwe; Ennimi zaagwo ne zookya ababi. 
19_106_19_Ne bakolera ennyana mu Kolebu, Ne basinza ekifaananyi ekisaanuuse. 
19_106_20_Bwe batyo ne bawaanyisa ekitiibwa kyabwe Okuba ekifaananyi ky'ente erya omuddo. 
19_106_21_Ne beerabira Katonda omulokozi waabwe, Eyakolera ebikulu mu Misiri; 
19_106_22_Eby'amagero mu nsi ya Kaamu, N'eby'entiisa ku Nnyanja Emmyufu. 
19_106_23_Kyeyava ayogera ng'alibazikiriza, Singa Musa omulonde we teyayimirira mu maaso ge mu kituli, Okuzzaayo obusungu bwe, aleme okubazikiriza. 
19_106_24_Weewaawo, baanyooma ensi ey'okwesiima, Tebakkiriza kigambo kye; 
19_106_25_Naye ne beemulugunya mu weema zaabwe, Ne batawulira ddoboozi lya Mukama. 
19_106_26_Kyeyava ayimusa omukono gwe gye bali, Ng'alibasuulira mu ddungu: 
19_106_27_Era ng'aligwisa ezzadde lyabwe mu mawanga, Era ng'alibasaasaanya mu nsi. 
19_106_28_Era ne beegatta ne Baalipyoli, Ne balya ssaddaaka ez'abafu. 
19_106_29_Bwe batyo bwe baamusunguwazanga n'ebikolwa byabwe; Kawumpuli n'agwa mu bo. 
19_106_30_Finekaasi n'alyoka ayimirira n'atuukiriza omusango: Kawumpuli n'aziyizibwa bw'atyo. 
19_106_31_Ekyo ne kimubalirwa okuba obutuukirivu, Okutuusa emirembe gyonna egitaliggwaawo. 
19_106_32_Era ne bamunyiigiza ku mazzi ag'e Meriba, N'okulaba Musa n'alaba obubi ku lwabwe: 
19_106_33_Kubanga baali baagala okujeemera omwoyo gwe, N'ayogera ebitali bya magezi n'emimwa gye. 
19_106_34_Tebaazikiriza mawanga, Nga Mukama bye yabalagira; 
19_106_35_Naye ne beegatta n'amawanga, Ne bayiga emirimu gyabwe: 
19_106_36_Ne baweereza ebifaananyi byabwe; Ebyabafuukira ekyambika. 
19_106_37_Weewaawo, baawangayo batabani baabwe ne bawala baabwe eri bassetaani. 
19_106_38_Ne bayiwa omusaayi ogutaliiko kabi, gwe musaayi gwa batabani baabwe ne bawala baabwe, Be baawangayo eri ebifaananyi bya Kanani; Ensi n'eyonooneka n'omusaayi. 
19_106_39_Bwe batyo ne babaako empitambi olw'emirimu gyabwe, Ne bagenda bayenda mu bikolwa byabwe. 
19_106_40_Obusungu bwa Mukama kyebwava bubuubuuka eri abantu be, N'atamwa obusika bwe. 
19_106_41_N'abawaayo mu mukono gw'amawanga; N'abo abaabakyawa ne babafuga. 
19_106_42_Era abalabe baabwe ne babajooga, Ne bajeemulwa wansi w'omukono gwabwe. 
19_106_43_Emirundi emingi yabawonya; Naye ne baagala okujeema mu kuteesa kwabwe, Ne bajeezebwa mu butali butuukirivu bwabwe. 
19_106_44_Era naye n'atunuulira ennaku zaabwe, Bwe yawulira okukaaba kwabwe: 
19_106_45_N'abajjuukirira endagaano ye, Ne yejjusa ng'okusaasira kwe bwe kuli okungi. 
19_106_46_Era n'ababasaasiza Bonna abaabatwalanga mu busibe. 
19_106_47_Otulokole, ai Mukama Katonda waffe, Otukuŋŋaanye tuve mu mawanga, Okwebazanga erinnya lyo ettukuvu, N'okujagulizanga ettendo lyo. 
19_106_48_Yeebazibwenga Mukama, Katonda wa Isiraeri, Okuva emirembe gyonna okutuuka mu mirembe gyonna. 
19_107_1_Mumwebaze Mukama; kubanga mulungi: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_107_2_Abanunule ba Mukama boogera bwe batyo, Be yanunula mu mukono gw'omulabe 
19_107_4_Baakyamira mu ddungu mu kkubo omutali bantu; Ne batalaba kibuga kya kutuulamu. 
19_107_5_Baalumibwa enjala n'enayonta, Emmeeme yaabwe n'ezirika mubo. 
19_107_6_Ne balyoka bakaabira Mukama mu nnaku zaabwe, N'abawonya mu kweraliikira kwabwe. 
19_107_7_Era n'abaluŋŋamiza mu kkubo eggolokofu, Batuuke mu kibuga eky'okutuulamu. 
19_107_8_Kale singa abantu batendereza Mukama olw'obulungi bwe, N'olw'eby'amagero bye eri abaana b'abantu! 
19_107_9_Kubanga akkusa emmeeme eyeegomba, N'emmeeme erumwa enayonta agijjuza ebirungi. 
19_107_10_Abo abaatuula mu kizikiza ne mu kisiikirize eky'okufa, Nga basibibwa n’ennaku n'ekyuma; 
19_107_11_Kubanga baajeemera ebigambo bya Katonda, Ne banyooma okuteesa kw'oyo ali waggulu enayo: 
19_107_12_Kyeyava azitoya omutima gwabwe n'okutegana; Ne bagwa, so nga tewali anaabayamba. 
19_107_13_Ne balyoka bakaabira Mukama mu nnaku zaabwe, Era abantu bonna boogero nti Amiina. Mumutendereze Mukama. N'abalokola mu kweraliikirira kwabwe. 
19_107_14_N'abaggya mu kizikiza n'ekisiikirize eky'okufa, N'amenyaamenya enjegere zaabwe. 
19_107_15_Kale singa abantu batendereza Mukama olw'obulungi bwe, N'olw'eby'amagero bye eri abaana b'abantu. 
19_107_16_Kubanga yamenya enzigi ez'ebikomo, N'atemera ddala ebisiba eby'obyuma: 
19_107_17_Abasirusiru olw'okwonoona kwabwe, N'olw'obutali butuukirivu bwabwe, babonyaabonyezebwa. 
19_107_18_Emmeeme yaabwe etamwa emmere yonna yonna; Ne basemberera emiryango egy'okufa. 
19_107_19_Ne balyoka bakaabira Mukama mu nnaku zaabwe, N'abalokola mu kweraliikirira kwabwe. 
19_107_20_Atuma ekigambo kye, n’abawonya, N'abaggya mu kuzikirira kwabwe. 
19_107_21_Kale singa abantu batendereza Mukama olw'obulungi bwe, N'olw'eby'amagero bye eri abaana b'abantu! 
19_107_22_Era bawengayo asaddaaka ez'okwebaza, Era batenderenga ebikolwa bye n'okuyimba. 
19_107_23_Abaserengetera ku nnyanja mu maato, Abakola emirimu awali amazzi amangi; 
19_107_24_Abo balaba ebikolwa bya Mukama, N'eby'amagero bye mu buziba. 
19_107_25_Kubanga alagira, n'akunsa omuyaga, Oguyimusa amayengo gaagwo. 
19_107_26_Balinnya mu ggulu, ne bakka nate mu ddubi: Emmeeme yaabwe esaanuuka olw'ennaku. 
19_107_27_Beesunda eruuyi n'eruuyi, era batagatta ng'omutamiivu, N'amagezi gonna nga gababuze. 
19_107_28_Ne balyoka bakaabira Mukama mu nnaku zaabwe, N'abaggya mu kweraliikirira kwabwe. 
19_107_29_Alaaza omuyaga, Amayengo gaagwo ne gateeka. 
19_107_30_Ne balyoka basanyuka kubanga bawumniula; N'alyoka abaleeta mu mwalo gwe baagala okutuukamu. 
19_107_31_Kale singa abantu batendereza Mukama olw'obulungi bwe, N'olw'eby'amagero bye eri abaana b'abantu 
19_107_32_Era bamugulumizenga mu kkuŋŋaaniro ery'abantu, Era bamutenderezenga awali ekituuti eky'abakadde. 
19_107_33_Afuula emigga eddungu, N'enzizi azifuula ettaka ekkalu; 
19_107_34_Ensi ebala agifuula olukoola olw'omunnyo, Olw'obubi bwabo abatuula omwo. 
19_107_35_Eddungu alifuula ekidiba eky'amazzi, N'ensi enkalu ensulo ez'amazzi. 
19_107_36_Omwo mw'atuuza abalumwa enjala, Balongoosenga ekibuga eky'okutuulamu; 
19_107_37_Era basigenga ennimiro, basimbenga emizabbibu, Beefunirenga ebibala eby'ekyengera. 
19_107_38_Era n'abawa omukisa, n'okweyongera ne beeyongeranga nnyo; N'ataganya nte zaabwe okukendeera. 
19_107_39_Nate, ne baweebuuka ne bajeezebwa Olw'okujoogebwa, n'okweraliikirira, n'okunakuwala. 
19_107_40_Anyoomesa nnyo abalangira, Era abakyamiza mu nsiko omutali kkubo. 
19_107_41_Era naye agulumiza omwavu okuva mu nnaku. N'amukolera ebika ng'ekisibo. 
19_107_42_Abatuukirivu balibiraba, balisanyuka; N'obutali butuukirivu bwonna buliziba akamwa kaabwo. 
19_107_43_Buli alina amagezi anaalowoozanga ebyo, Era banaafumiitirizanga okusaasira kwa Mukama. 
19_108_1_Omutima gwange gunywedde, ai Katonda; Naayimba, weewaawo, naayimba okutendereza, naayimba n'ekitiibwa kyange. 
19_108_2_Muzuukuke, mmwe amadinda n'enaanga: Nze naakeera nnyo okuzuukuka. 
19_108_3_Naakwebazanga ggwe, ai Mukama, mu mawanga: Era naayimbanga okukutendereza mu bantu. 
19_108_4_Kubanga okusaasira kwo kungi, kusinga eggulu: N'amazima go gatuuka mu ggulu. 
19_108_5_Ogulumizibwe, ai Katonda, okusinga eggulu: N'ekitiibwa kyo okusinga ensi zonna. 
19_108_6_Muganzi wo alyoke awone, Olokole n'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo, otuddemu. 
19_108_7_Katonda yayogera mu butukuvu bwe nti Ndijaguza: Ndisala mu Sekemu, era ndigabaagaba ekiwonvu ekya Sukkosi. 
19_108_8_Gireyaadi wange; Manase wange; Efulayimu naye yakuuma omutwe gwange; Yuda gwe muggo gwange ogw'obwakabaka. 
19_108_9_Mowaabu kye kinaabirwamu kyange; Edomu ndimukasukira engatto Yange Ndyogereia waggulu ku Firisutiya. 
19_108_10_Ani alinnyingiza mu kibuga eky'amaanyi? Ani eyandeeta mu Edomu? 
19_108_11_Totusudde, ai Katonda? So totabaala, ai Katonda, n'eggye lyaffe. 
19_108_12_Otuyambe eri omulabe: Kubanga obuyambi bw'abantu tebuliimu. 
19_108_13_Katonda ye alitukoza eby'obuzira: Kubanga oyo ye alinayirira ku balabe baffe. 
19_109_1_Tosirika, ai Katonda gwe ntendereza 
19_109_3_Era banneetooloola n'ebigamba eby'okukyawa, Ne balwana nange awatali nsonga. 
19_109_4_Olw'okwagala kwange bafuuse balabe bange: Naye nze nsaba. 
19_109_5_Era bansasudde obubi olw'obulungi, N'okukyawa olw'okwagala kwange. 
19_109_6_Omusseeko omuntu omubi: Omulabe ayimirirenga ku mukono gwe ogwa ddyo. 
19_109_7_Bw'asalirwa omusango, afulume nga gumusinze; Era okusaba kwe kufuuke ekibi. 
19_109_8_Ennaku ze zibe ntono; Omulala alye obukulu bwe. 
19_109_9_Abaana be babe nga tebalina kitaabwe, Me mukazi we nnamwandu. 
19_109_10_Abaana be babe mmomboze, basabirizenga; Banoonyenga emmere mu bifo byabwe ebyazika. 
19_109_11_Omunyazi atege byonna by'alina; B'atamanyi banyageenyage emirimu gye. 
19_109_12_Anaamwongerako ekisa amubule; Anaasaasira abaana be nga tebalina kitaabwe naye abule. 
19_109_13_Ezzadde lye lizikirizibwe; Mu mirembe egirijja amanaya gaabwe gasaangulibwe. 
19_109_14_Obutali butuukirivu bwa bajjajjaabe bujjukirwe eri Mukama: So ekibi kya nnyina kireme okusangulibwa. 
19_109_15_Bibeerenga mu maaso ga Mukama ennaku zonna, Azikirize okujjukirwa kwabwe ku nsi. 
19_109_16_Kubanga teyajjukira kusaasira, Naye n'ayigganya omuntu omwavu eyeetaaga, N'oyo eyalina omutima ogumenyese, okubatta. 
19_109_17_Weewaawo, yayagala okukolima, ne kutuuka gy'ali; So teyasanyukira kusaba mukisa, ne gumuba wala. 
19_109_18_Era yayambala okukolima ng'ekyambalo kye, Ne kuyingira mu nda ye ng'amazzi, Era ng'amafuta mu magumba ge. 
19_109_19_Kubanga gy'ali ng'ekyambalo ky'ayambala, Era kubenga ng'olukoba lwe yeesiba ennaku zonna. 
19_109_20_Eyo ye mpeera ey'abalabe bange eva eri Mukama, N'abo aboogera obubi ku mmeeme yange. 
19_109_21_Naye olongoose ebyange, ai Katonda Mukama, olw'erinnya lyo: Kubanga okusaasira kavo kulungi, omponye. 
19_109_22_Kubanga nze ndi mwavu, nneetaga, N'omutima gwange gufumitiddwa munda yange. 
19_109_23_ŋŋendedde ddala ng'ekisiikirize bwe kiggwaawo: Nkuunta ng'enzige. 
19_109_24_Amaviivi gange ganafuwadde olw'okusiiba; N'omubiri gwange guweebuuse obutagejja. 
19_109_25_Era nfuuse ekivume gye bali: Bwe bandaba, banyeeaya omutwe gwabwe. 
19_109_26_Onnyambe, ai Mukama Katonda wange; Nkwegayiridde ondokole ng'okusaasira kwo bwe kuli. 
19_109_27_Balyoke bategeere ng'ogwo gwe mukono gwo: Nga ggwe, Mukama, wakikola. 
19_109_28_Bo bakolime, naye ggwe ompe omukisa: Bwe baligolokoka, balikwatibwa ensonyi, naye omuddu wo alisanyuka. 
19_109_29_Abalabe bange bambale okuswazibwa, Era beebikke ensonyi zaabwe ng'ekikunta. 
19_109_30_Neebazanga nnyo Mukama n'akamwa kange; Weewaawo, naamutenderezanga mu kibiina. 
19_109_31_Neebazanga nnyo Mukama n'akamwa kange; Weewaawo, naamutenderezanga mu kibiina. 
19_110_1_Mukama agamba mukama wange nti Tuula ku mukono gwange ogwa ddyo, Okutuusa lwe ndifuula abalabe bo entebe y'ebigere byo.
