19_110_2_Mukama alisindika omuggo ogw'amaanyi go okuva mu Sayuuni: Ggwe fugira wakati mu balabe bo. 
19_110_3_Abantu bo beewaayo n'omwoyo ogutawalirizibwa ku lunaku olw'obuyinza bwo: Mu bulungi obw'obutukuvu, olina omusulo ogw'obuvubuka bwo, Oguva mu lubuto lw'enkya. 
19_110_4_Mukama yalayira, so talyejjusa, Nti Ggwe oli kabona emirembe gyonna Ng'engeri ya Merukizeddeeki bw'eri. 
19_110_5_Mukama ku mukono gwo ogwa ddyo Alifumita bakabaka ku lunaku olw'obusungu bwe. 
19_110_6_Alisala emisango mu mawanga, Alijjuza ebifo emirambo; Alifumita omutwe mu nsi ennyingi. 
19_110_7_Alinywa ku nsulo eri mu kkubo: Kyaliva ayimusa omutwe. 
19_111_1_Mumutendereze Mukama. Neebazanga Mukama n'omutima gwange gwonna, Mu kibiina eky'abatuukirivu abateesa, ne mu kkuŋŋaaniro. 
19_111_2_Emirimu gya Mukama mikulu, Ginoonyezebwa abo bonna abagisanyukira. 
19_111_3_Omulimu gwe gwa kitiibwa, gwa bukulu: N'obutuukirivu bwe bubeerera enurembe gyonna. 
19_111_4_Ajjukizizza emirimu gye egy'ekitalo: Mukama wa kisa, ajjudde okusaasira. 
19_111_5_Awa emmere abo abamutya: Anajjukiranga endagaano ye emirembe gyonna. 
19_111_6_Alaze abantu be obuyinza obw'emirimu gye, Ng'abawa obusika obw'amawanga. 
19_111_7_Eaurimu egy'emikono gye ge mazima n'omusango; Ebiragiro bye byonna binywera. 
19_111_8_Biteekebwawo emirembe n'emirembe, Bikolebwawo mu mazima n'obutuukirivu. 
19_111_9_Yawa abantu be okununulwa; Yalagira endagaano ye emirembe gyonna: Erinnya lye ttukuvu, lya kitiibwa. 
19_111_10_Mu kutya Mukama amagezi mwe gasookera; Balina okutegeera okulungi bonna abakola bwe batyo; Ettendo lye libeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_112_1_Mumutendereze Mukama. Alina omukisa oyo atya Mukama, Asanyukira ennyo amateeka ge. 
19_112_2_Ezzadde lye linaabanga lya maanyi ku nsi: Ezzadde ly'abatuukirivu linaabanga n'omukisa. 
19_112_3_Ebintu n'obugagga biri mu nnyumba ye: N'obutuukirivu bwe bubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_112_4_Eri omutuukirivu omusana gujja awali ekizikiza: Oyo wa kisa, ajjudde okusaasira, era ye mutuukirivu. 
19_112_5_Alaba ebirungi oyo akola eby'ekisa, awola; Alinyweza ensonga ye bw'alisalirwa omusango. 
19_112_6_Kubanga taasagaasaganenga emirembe gyonna; Omutuukirivu anajjukirwanga ennaku zonna ezitaliggwaawo. 
19_112_7_Taatyenga bigambo bya bubi: Omutima gwe gunywera, nga gwesiga Mukama. 
19_112_8_Omutima gwe gutereera, tsatyenga, Okutuusa lw'aliraba by'ayagala nga bituuse ku balabe be. 
19_112_9_Agabye, awadde abaavu; Obutuukirivu bwe bubeerera emirembe gyonna: Ejjembe lye lirigulumizibwa n'ekiriibwa. 
19_112_10_Omubi alibiraba, alirumwa omwoyo; Aliruma obujiji n'amannyo ge: alinyolwa: Omubi by'ayagala birifa. 
19_113_1_Mumutendereze Mukama. Mutendereze, mmwe abaddu ba Mukama, Mutendereze erinnya lya Mukama. 
19_113_2_Erinnya lya Mukama lyebazibwenga Okuva leero okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
19_113_3_Okuva mu buvanjuba okutuuka mu bugwanjuba Erinnya lya Mukama ligwana okutenderezebwanga. 
19_113_4_Mukama ali waggulu okusinga amawanga gonna, N'ekitiibwa kye okusinga eggulu. 
19_113_5_Ani afaanana nga Mukama Katonda waffe, Alina entebe ye waggulu. 
19_113_6_Eyeetoowaza okutunuulira Ebiri mu ggulu ne mu nsi? 
19_113_7_Ayimusa omwavu mu nfuufu, Agolokosa omunafu mu lubungo 
19_113_9_Atuuza mu nju omukazi omugumba, N'amusanyusa ng'amuzaazizza abaana. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_114_1_Isiraeri bwe yava mu Misiri, Ennyumba ya Yakobo mu bantu ab'olulimi olulala 
19_114_3_Ennyanja n'eraba ekyo, n'edduka Yoludaani n'agobebwa okudda ennyuma. 
19_114_4_Ensozi ne zibuuka ng'endiga eza seddume, N'obusozi obutono ng'obuliga. 
19_114_5_Wali otya, ggwe ennyanja, okudduka? Naawe Yoludaani, okudda ennyuma? 
19_114_6_Mmwe ensozi, okubuuka ng'endiga eza seddume; Mmwe obusozi obutono, ng'obuliga? 
19_114_7_Kankana, ggwe ensi, awali Mukama, Awali Katonda wa Yakobo 
19_115_1_Si ffe, ai Mukama, si ffe, Wabula erinnya lyo lye ligwana okuweebwa ekitiibwa Olw'okusaasira kwo, n'olw'amazima go. 
19_115_2_Kiki ekinaaba kiboogeza ab'amawanga Nti Katonda waabwe ali ludda wa kaakano? 
19_115_3_Naye Katonda waffe ali mu ggulu: Akoze bye yayagala byonna. 
19_115_4_Ebifaananyi byabwe ye ffeeza, ye zaabu, Omulimu ogw'emikono gy'abantu. 
19_115_5_Birina obumwa, naye tebyogera; Birina amaaso, naye tebiraba 
19_115_8_Ababikola balibifaanana; Weewaawo, buli abyesiga. 
19_115_9_Ggwe Isiraeri, mwesigenga Mukama: Ye mubeezi waabwe, ye ngabo yaabwe. 
19_115_10_Ggwe ennyumba ya Alooni, mwesigenga Mukama: Ye mubeezi waabwe, ye ngabo yaabwe. 
19_115_11_Mmwe abatya Mukama, mwesigenga Mukama: Ye mubeezi waabwe, ye ngabo yaabwe. 
19_115_12_Mukama atujjukidde; alituwa omukisa; Aliwa omukisa ennyumba ya Isiraeri; Aliwa omukisa ennyumba ya Alooni. 
19_115_13_Aliwa omukisa abo abatya Mukama, Abato era n'abakulu. 
19_115_14_Mukama ayongerenga bulijjo okubaaza Mmwe n'abaana bammwe. 
19_115_15_Mmwe muweereddwa Mukama omukisa, Eyakola eggulu n'ensi. 
19_115_16_Eggulu lye ggulu lya Mukama; Naye ensi yagiwa abaana b'abantu. 
19_115_17_Abafu tebatendereza Mukama, Newakubadde abo bonna abakka mu kusirika; 
19_115_18_Naye ffe tuneebazanga Mukama Okuva leero okutuusa emirembe gyonna. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_116_1_Mukama, kubanga awulidde Eddoboozi lyange n'okwegayirira kwange. 
19_116_2_Kubanga antegedde okutu, Kyennaavanga mmukoowoola nga nkyali mulamu. 
19_116_3_Emigwa egy'okufa gyansiba. N'okulumwa kw'emagombe kwankwata: Ne ndaba ennaku n'okutegana. 
19_116_4_Ne ndyoka nkoowoola erinnya lya Mukama; Nti Ai Mukama, nkwegayiridde, omponye emmeeme yange. 
19_116_5_Mukama wa kisa, era mutuukirivu; Weewaawo, Katonda waffe alina okusaasira. 
19_116_6_Mukama akuuma abo abatalina nkwe: Najeezebwa, n'andokola. 
19_116_7_Komawo mu kiwummulo kyo, ggwe emmeeme yange; Kubanga Mukama akukoledde eby'ekisa ekingi. 
19_116_8_Kubanga omponyezza emmeeme yange okufa, Amaaso gange obutakaaba maziga, N'ebigere byange obutagwa. 
19_116_9_Naatambuliranga mu maaso ga Mukama Mu nsi y'abalamu. 
19_116_10_Nzikiriza, kubanga ndyogera: Nabonyaabonyezebwa nnyo: 
19_116_11_Ne njogera nga nnyanguwa Nti Abantu bonna bulimba. 
19_116_12_Kiki kye ndisasula Mukama Olw'ebirungi bye byonna eri nze? 
19_116_13_Nditoola akakompe ak'obulokozi, Era ndikaabira erinnya lya Mukama. 
19_116_14_Ndisasula obweyamo bwange eri Mukama, Weewaawo, mu maaso g'abantu be bonna. 
19_116_15_Okufa kw'abatukuvu be Kwa muwendo mungi mu maaso ga Mukama. 
19_116_16_Ai Mukama, mazima nze ndi muddu wo: Nze ndi muddu wo, era omwana w'omuzaana wo; Osumuludde ebyansiba. 
19_116_17_Ndikuwa ssaddaaka ey'okwebaza, Era ndikaabira erinnya lya Mukama. 
19_116_18_Ndisasula obwepamo bwange eri Mukama, Weewaawo, mu maaso g'abantu be bonna; 
19_116_19_Mu mpya z'ennyumba ya Mukma, Wakati mu ggwe, ggwe Yerusaalemi. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_117_1_Mumutendereze Mukama, mmwe amawanga gonna; Mumugulumize, mmwe abantu bonna. 
19_117_2_Kubanga okusaasira kwe kungi eri ffe: N'amazima ga Mukama gabeerera emirembe gyonna, Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_118_1_Mumwebaze Mukama; kubanga mulungi: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_118_2_Isiraeri ayogere kaakano Nti okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_118_3_Ennyumba ya Alooni eyogere kaakano Nti okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_118_4_Abo abamutya Mukama boogere kaakano Nti okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_118_5_Bwe nnali mu nnaku ne nkaabira Mukama: Mukama n'anjitaba, n'anteeka mu kifo ekigazi. 
19_118_6_Mukama ali ku luuyi lwange; siritya: Abantu bayinza kunkola ki? 
19_118_7_Mukama ali ku luuyi lwange mu abo abannyamba: Kyendiva ndaba bye njagala nga bituuse ku abo abankyaye. 
19_118_8_Kirungi okwesiganga Mukama Okusinga okwesiga abantu. 
19_118_9_Kirungi okwesiganga Mukama Okusinga okwesiga abalangira. 
19_118_10_Amawanga gonna ganneetoolodde: Mu linnya lya Mukama ndigazikiriza. 
19_118_11_Ganneetoolodde; weewaawo, ganneetoolodde; Mu linnya lya Mukama ndigazikiriza. 
19_118_12_Banneetoolodde ng'enjuki; bazikidde ng'omuliro ogw'omu maggwa: Mu linnya lya Mukama ndibazikiriza. 
19_118_13_Bansoya nnyo okungwisa: Naye Mukama n'annyamba. 
19_118_14_Mukama ge maanyi gange, lwe luyimba lwange; Era afuuse obulokozi bwange. 
19_118_15_Eddoboozi ery'essanyu era ery'obulokozi liri mu weema ez'abatuukirivu; Omukono ogwa dddyo ogwa Mukama gukola eby'obuzira. 
19_118_16_Omukono ogwa ddyo ogwa Mukama gugulumizibwa: Omukono ogwa ddyo ogwa Mukama gukola eby'obuzira. 
19_118_17_Sirifa, naye naabeeranga mulamu, Era naabuuliranga omirimu gya Mukama. 
19_118_18_Mukama ambonerezza nnyo: Naye tangabulanga eri okufa. 
19_118_19_Munzigulirewo enzigi ez'obutuukirivu: Naaziyingiramu, ne nneebaza Mukama. 
19_118_20_Olwo lwe luggi lwa Mukama; Abatuukirivu be baliyingiramu. 
19_118_21_Naakwebazanga, kubanga onzizeemu, Era ofuuse obulokozi bwange. 
19_118_22_Ejjinja abazimbi lye baagaana Lifuuse ekkulu ery'oku asonda. 
19_118_23_Ekyo Mukama ye yakikola; Kya kitalo mu maaso gaffe. 
19_118_24_Luno lwe lunaku Mukama lwe yakola; Tunaasanyuka, tunaajaguliza okwo. 
19_118_25_Olokole kaakano, tukwegayiridde, ai Mukama: Ai Mukama, tukwegayiridde, oweereze omukisa kaakano. 
19_118_26_Alina omukisa oyo ajja mu linnya lya Mukama: Tubasabidde omukisa nga tuyima mu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
19_118_27_Mukama ye Katonda, era atuwadde omusana Musibe ssaddaaka n'emigwa,musibe ku mayembe g'ekyoto. 
19_118_28_Ggwe oli Katonda wange, nange naakwebazanga: Ggwe oli Katonda wange, naakugulumizanga. 
19_118_29_Kale mumwebaze Mukama; kubanga mulungi: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_119_1_Balina omukisa abo abatuukirira mu kkubo, Abatambulira mu mateeka ga Mukama. 
19_119_2_Balina omukisa abo abeekuuma bye yategeeza, Abamunoonya n'omutima gwonna. 
19_119_3_Weewaawo, abo tebakola ebitali bya butuukirivu; Batambulira mu makubo ge. 
19_119_4_Watukuutira ebiragiro byo, Tubikwatenga nnyo. 
19_119_5_Singa amakubo gange ganywedde Okukwata amateeka go! 
19_119_6_Bwe ntyo bwe siikwatibwenga nsonyi, Bwe nnaalowoozanga bye walagira byonna. 
19_119_7_Naakwebazanga n'omutima ogutalina bukuusa, Bwe ndiba nga njize emisango gyo egy'ensonga. 
19_119_8_Naakwatanga amateeka go: Nkwegayiridde, tondekera ddala.BEESI9 Omuvubuka anaalongoosanga atya ekkubo lye? Nga yeegendereza ng'ekigambo kiri. 
19_119_10_N'omutima gwange gwonna nkunoonyezza: Nkwegayiridde, nneme okukyama okuleka bye walagira. 
19_119_11_Nterese ekigambo kyo mu mutima gwange, Nneme okwonoona mu maaso go. 
19_119_12_Weebazibwa, ai Mukama: Onjigirizenga amateeka go. 
19_119_13_N'emimwa gyange mbuulidde Emisango gyonna egy'akamwako. 
19_119_14_Nsanyukidde ekkubo ly'ebyo byewategeeza, Nga asanyukira obugagga bwonna. 
19_119_15_Naafumiitirizanga ebiragiro byo. Era naalowoozanga amakubo go. 
19_119_16_Naasanyukiranga amateeka go: Seerabirenga kigambo kyo.GIMERI 
19_119_17_Onkolere omuddu wo eby'ekisa ekingi, mbeerenga omulamu; Bwe ntyo bwe nnaakwatanga ekigambo kyo. 
19_119_18_Onzibule amaaso gange, ndabe Eby'ekitalo ebiva mu mateeka go. 
19_119_19_Nze ndi mutambuze mu nsi: Tonkisa bye walagira. 
19_119_20_Emmeeme yange ekutuse olw'okuyaayaana Kw'eyaayaanira emisango gyo ebiro byonna. 
19_119_21_Onenyezza ab'amalala abakolimirwa, Abakyama okuleka bye walagira. 
19_119_22_Onzigyeko okuvumibwa n'okunyoomebwa; Kubanga neekuumye bye wategeeza. 
19_119_23_Era n'abalangira batuula ne banjogerako obubi: Naye omuddu wo nafumiitiriza amateeka go. 
19_119_24_Era bye wategeeza bye nsanyukira, Era ebyo be bantu be nteesa nabo.DALESI 
19_119_25_Emmeeme yange yeegasse n'e nfuufu: Onzuukize ng'ekigambo kyo bwe kyo bwe kiri. 
19_119_26_Nayatula amakubo gange, naawe n'onziramu: Onjigirize amateeka go. 
19_119_27_Ontegeeze ntegeere ekkubo ery'ebiragiro byo: Ne ndyoka nfumutiriza emirimu gyo egy'ekitalo. 
19_119_28_Emmeeme yange esaanuuse olw'okunyiikaala: Ompe amaanyi ng'ekigambo kyo bwe kiri. 
19_119_29_Onziyeko ekkubo ery'obulimba: Era ompe amateeka go n'ekisa. 
19_119_30_Neerobozezza ekkubo ery'obwesigwa: Emisango ngitadde mu maaso gange. 
19_119_31_Neegatta n'ebyo bye wategeeza: Ai Mukama, tonkwasa nsonyi.HE 
19_119_32_Naddukiranga mu kkubo ly'ebyo bye walagira, Bw'oligaziya omutima gwange. 
19_119_33_Onjigirize, ai Mukama, ekkubo ery'amateeka go; Nange naalyekuumanga okutuusa enkomerero. 
19_119_34_Ompe amagezi, nange neekuumanga amateeka go; Weewaawo, naagakwatanga n'omutima gwange gwonna. 
19_119_35_Ompise mu kkubo Iy'ebyo bye walagira: Kubanga mu eryo mwe nsanyukira. 
19_119_36_Okyuse omutima gwange eri ebyo bye wategeeza, So si eri kwegomba. 
19_119_37_Owunjule amaaso gange galemenga okulaba ebitaliimu, Era onzuukize mu makubo go. 
19_119_38_Onyweze ekigambo kyo eri omuddu wo, Ky'eky'okutyanga ggwe. 
19_119_39_Ompunjulire ekivume kye ntya; Kubanga emisango gyo mirungi 
19_119_40_Laba, neegombanga ebiragiro byo: Onzuukirize mu butuukirivu bwo.VAWU 
19_119_41_Era n'okusaasira kwo kutuuke gye ndi, ai Mukama, Bwe bulokozi bwo, ng'ekigambo kyo bwe kiri. 
19_119_42_Bwe ntyo bwe ndiba n'eky'okuddamu eri oyo anvuma; Kubanga neesiga ekigambo kyo. 
19_119_43_So toggiramu ddala kigambo kya mazima mu kamwa kange; Kubanga naasuubiranga emisango gyo. 
19_119_44_Bwe ntyo bwe nnaakwatanga amateeka go ennaku zonna Emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_119_45_Era naatambulanga nga neeyabya; Kubanga nnoonyezza ebiragiro byo. 
19_119_46_Era naayogeranga ku ebyo bye wategeeza mu maaso ga bakabaka, Ne sikwatibwa nsonyi. 
19_119_47_Era naasanyukiranga ebyo bye walagira, Bye nnaayagalanga: 
19_119_48_Era naayimusanga engalo zange eri ebyo bye walagira, bye nnaayagalanga: Era naafumiitirizanga mateeka go.ZAYINI 
19_119_49_Ojjukire ekigambo eri omuddu wo, Kubanga wansuubiza. 
19_119_50_Eryo lye ssanyu lyange bwe mbonyaabonyezebwa: Kubanga ekigambo kyo kinzuukizizza. 
19_119_51_Ab'amalala bansekeredde nnyo: Naye ne sseekooloobyanga okuva mu mateeka go. 
19_119_52_Njijukidde emisango gyo egy'edda, ai Mukama, Ne nneesanyusa. 
19_119_53_Obusungu obubuubuuka bunkutte, Olw'ababi abaleka amateeka go. 
19_119_54_Amateeka go ge nnyimbirako Mu nnyumba ey'okutambula kwange. 
19_119_55_Najjukiranga erinnya lyo ekiro, ai Mukama, Era nakwatanga amateeka go. 
19_119_56_Ekigambo kino kyange, Okukuumanga ebiragiro byo.KEESI 
19_119_57_Mukama gwe mugabo gwange: Nayogera nga naakwatanga ebigambo byo. 
19_119_58_Nasaba ekisa kyo n'omutima gwange gwonna: Onsaasire ng'ekigambo kyo bwe kiri. 
19_119_59_Nalowooza amakubo gange, Ne nkyusa ebigere byange eri ebyo bye wategeeza. 
19_119_60_Nayanguwa ne sirwawo, Okukwata ebyo bye walagira. 
19_119_61_Emigwa egy'ababi gimbisse; Naye seerabidde mateeka go. 
19_119_62_Mu ttumbi naagolokokanga okukwebaza Olw'emisango gyo egy'ensonga. 
19_119_63_Nze ndi munne w'abo bonna abakutya, N'abo abakwata ebiragiro byo. 
19_119_64_Ai Mukama, ensi ejjudde okusaasira kwo: Onjigirize amateeka go.TEESI 
19_119_65_Okoledde ebirungi omuddu wo, Ai Mukama, ng'ekigambo kyo bwe kiri. 
19_119_66_Onjigirizenga okusala emisango egy'ensonga n'okutegeera; Kubanga nakkirizanga ebyo bye walagira. 
19_119_67_Nga sinnabonyaabonyezebwa, nakyama; Naye kaakano nkwata ekigambo kyo. 
19_119_68_Oli mulungi, era okola ebirungi; Onjigirizenga amateeka go. 
19_119_69_Ab'amalala banjiiyirizzaako eky'obulimba: N'omutima gwange gwonna neekuumanga ebiragiro byo. 
19_119_70_Omutima gwabwe gugezze ng'amasavu; Naye nze nsanyukira amateeka go. 
19_119_71_Kwangasa okubonyaabonyezebwa; Ndyoke njige amateeka go. 
19_119_72_Amateeka g'akamwa ko gampoomera nze Okusinga ebitundu eby'ezaabu n'effeeza enkumi n'enkumi.YODI 
19_119_73_Engalo zo ze zankola, ze zammumba: Ompe amagezi, njigenga ebyo bye walagira. 
19_119_74_Abakutya banandabanga ne basanyuka; Kubanga naasuubiranga elugambo kyo. 
19_119_75_Mmanyi, ai Mukama, ng'emisango gyo gya nsonga, Era nga wambonyaabonya olw'obwesigwa. 
19_119_76_Nkwegayiridde, ekisa kyo ekirungi kinsanyuse, Ng'ekigambo kyo bwe kiri eri omuddu wo. 
19_119_77_Okusaasira kwo okulungi kujje gye ndi, mbeerenga omulamu: Kubanga amateeka go ge gansanyusa. 
19_119_78_Ab'amalala bakwatibwe ensonyi; kubanga bammegga awatali nsonga. Naye naafumiitirizanga ebiragiro byo. 
19_119_79_Abakutya bankyukire, Era balitegeera bye wategeeza. 
19_119_80_Omutima gwange gutuukirire mu mateeka go; Nnemenga okukwatibwa ensonyi.KAFU 
19_119_81_Emmeeme yange ezirise olw'obulokozi bwo: Naye nsuubira ekigambo kyo. 
19_119_82_Amaaso gange gakulukuse olw'ekigambo kyo, Nga njogera nti Olinsanyusa ddi? 
19_119_83_Kubanga nfuuse ng'eddiba eriwanikibwa mu mukka; Naye seerabira mateeka go. 
19_119_84_Ennaku ez'omuddu wo ziri mmeka? Olituukiriza ddi omusango ku abo abanjigganya? 
19_119_85_Ab'amalala bansimidde obunnya Abatagoberera mateeka go. 
19_119_86_Bye walagira byonna bya bwesigwa: Banjigganya awatali nsonga: ggwe onnyambe. 
19_119_87_Baabulako katono banzikirize ku nsi; Naye ne sireka biragiro byo. 
19_119_88_Onzuukize ng'ekisa kyo ekirungi bwe kiri; Bwe ntyo bwe nnaakwatanga akamwa ko bye kategeeza.LAMEDI 
19_119_89_Emirembe gyonna, ai Mukama, Ekigambo kyo kinyweredde mu ggulu. 
19_119_90_Obwesigwa bwo bubeerera emirembe gyonna: Wanyweza ensi, n'ebeererawo. 
19_119_91_Bikyaliwo leero nga bwe walagira; Kubanga ebintu byonna baddu bo. 
19_119_92_Singa amateeka go si ge gansanyusa, Nandizikiridde bwe nnabonyaabonyezebwa. 93 Seerabirenga biragiro byo ennaku zonna; Kubanga wanzuukiza n'ebyo. 94 Nze ndi wuwo, ondokole; Kubanga naanoonyanga ebiragiro byo. 95 Ababi bannindiridde okunzikiriza; Naye nze naalowoozanga bye wategeeza. 96 Ndabye ebintu byonna ebyatuukirira gye bikoma; Naye ekiragiro kyo kigazi nnyo.MEMU97 Amateeka go nga ngaagala! Ago ge nfumiitiriza okuzibya obudde. 98 Bye walagira bingeziwaza okusinga abalabe bange; Kubanga bali wamu nange ennaku zonna. 99 Nnina okutegeera okusinga abayigiriza bange bonna; Kubanga bye wategeeza bye ndowooza. 
19_120_1_Mu kunakuwala kwange nakoowoola Mukama, N'ampitaba. 
19_120_2_Omponye emmeeme yange, ai Mukama, eri emimwa egy'obulimba, N'eri olulimi olw'obukuusakuusa. 
19_120_3_Oliweebwa ki, olyongerwako ki nate, Ggwe olulimi olw'obukuusakuusa? 
19_120_4_Obusaale obw'obwogi obw'abazira, Era n'amanda ag'entaseesa. 
19_120_5_Zinsanze, kubanga ntambulira mu Meseki Kubanga ntuula mu weema za Kedali! 
19_120_6_Emmeeme yange yaakamaze ennaku nnyingi okutuula Awamu n'oyo akyawa emirembe. 
19_120_7_Nze njagala emirembe: Naye bwe njogera, baagala okulwana. 
19_121_1_Mu kunakuwala kwange nakoowoola Mukama, N'ampitaba. 
19_121_2_Omponye emmeeme yange, ai Mukama, eri emimwa egy'obulimba, N'eri olulimi olw'obukuusakuusa. 
19_121_3_Oliweebwa ki, olyongerwako ki nate, Ggwe olulimi olw'obukuusakuusa? 
19_121_4_Obusaale obw'obwogi obw'abazira, Era n'amanda ag'entaseesa. 
19_121_5_Zinsanze, kubanga ntambulira mu Meseki Kubanga ntuula mu weema za Kedali! 
19_121_6_Emmeeme yange yaakamaze ennaku nnyingi okutuula Awamu n'oyo akyawa emirembe. 
19_121_7_Nze njagala emirembe: Naye bwe njogera, baagala okulwana. 
19_122_1_Nasanyuka bwe baŋŋamba nti Tugende mu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
19_122_2_Ebigere byaffe biyimiridde Munda mu miryango gyo, ggwe Yerusaalemi 
19_122_4_Ebika gye birinnya, bye bika bya Mukama, Okuba obujulirwa eri Isiraeri, Okwebazanga erinnya lya Mukama. 
19_122_5_Kubanga baateeka omwo entebe ez'okusalirako omusango, Entebe ez'ennyumba ya Dawudi. 
19_122_6_Musabirenga Yerusaalemi emirembe: Baliraba omukisa abakwagala. 
19_122_7_Emirembe gibeere mu bisenge byo, N'omukisa mu mayugo. 
19_122_8_Ku lwa baganda bange ne bannange Naayogera kaakano nti Emarembe gibeere mu ggwe. 
19_122_9_Olw'ennyumba ya Mukama Katonda waffe Naagezangako okukukola obulungi. 
19_123_1_Eri ggwe nnyimusa amaaso gange, Ai ggwe atuula mu ggulu. 
19_123_2_Laba, amaaso g'abaddu nga bwe gatunuulira omukono gwa mukama waabwe, Amaaso g'omuzaana nga bwe gatunuulira omukono gwa mugole we, N'amaaso gaffe bwe gatyo bwe gatunuulira Mukama Katonda waffe, Okutuusa lw'alitusaasira. 
19_123_3_Otusaasire, ai Mukama, otusaasire: Kubanga tujjudde tmyo okunyoomebwa 
19_123_4_Emmeeme yaffe ejjudde nnyo Okuduulirwa abo abalina emirembe, N'okunyoomebwa abo abalina amalala. 
19_124_1_Singa Mukama si ye yali ku luuyi lwaffe, Isiraeri ayogere kaakano 
19_124_3_Banditumize, nga tukyali balamu, Obusungu bwabwe lwe bwatubuubuukirako: 
19_124_4_Amazzi ganditutwalidde ddala, Mukoka yandiyise ku mmeeme yaffe: 
19_124_5_Amazzi ag'amalala gandiyise ku mmeeme yaffe. 
19_124_6_Mukama yeebazibwe, Atatugabudde okuba emmere eri amannyo gaabwe. 
19_124_7_Emmeeme yaffe ewonye ng'ennyonyi mu mutego ogw'abatezi: Omutego gukutuse, naffe tuwonye. 
19_124_8_Okubeerwa kwaffe kuli mu linnya lya Mukama, Eyakola eggulu n'ensi. 
19_125_1_Abeesiga Mukama Baliŋŋanga olusozi Sayuuni, olutajjulukuka, naye lunywera emirembe gyonna. 
19_125_2_Ensozi nga bwe zeetooloola Yerusaalemi, Ne Mukama bw'atyo bwe yeetooloola abantu be, Okuva leero n'okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
19_125_3_Kubanga omuggo ogufuga ogw'obubi tegulibeererawo ku mugabo ogw'abatuukirivu; Abatuukirivu balemenga okugolola emikono gyabwe okukola ebitasaana: 
19_125_4_Obakolenga ebirungi, ai Mukama, abalungi, N'abo abalina emitima egitali gya bukuusa. 
19_125_5_Naye abo abeekooloobya mu makubo gaabwe agakyamye, Mukama alibafulumya wamu n'abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu. Emirembe gibeere ku Isiraeri. 
19_126_1_Mukama bwe yazza nate obusibe bwa Sayuuni, Ne tufaanana ng'abo abaloota. 
19_126_2_Akamwa kaffe ne kalyoka kajjula enseko, N'olulimi lwaffe okuyimba: Ne balyoka boogerera mu mawanga Nti Mukama abakoledde ebikulu. 
19_126_3_Mukama atukoledde ebikulu; Kyetuvudde tusanyuka. 
19_126_4_Ozze nate obusibe bwaffe, ai Mukama, Ng'emigga mu bukiika obwa ddyo. 
19_126_5_Abasiga nga bakaaba amaziga balikungula nga basanyuka. 
19_126_6_Newakubadde nga yagenda ng'akaaba, ng'atwala ensigo; Alidda nate n'essanyu, ng'aleeta ebinywa bye. 
19_127_1_Mukama bw'atazimba nnyumba, Abagizimba bakolera bwereere: Mukama bw'atakuuma kibuga, Omukuumi atunuulirira bwereere. 
19_127_2_Mukolera bwereere bwe mukeera okugolokoka, era bwe mulwawo ennyo okwebaka; Era bwe mulya emmere ey'okutegana: Kubanga bw'abawa bw'atyo otulo abaagalwa be. 
19_127_3_Laba, abaana bwe busika bwa Mukama: N'ebibala eby'olubuto ye mpeera ye. 
19_127_4_Ng'obusaale bwe buli mu mukono gw'omuzira, Abaana ab'omu buvubuka bwe bali bwe batyo. 
19_127_5_Alina omukisa omuntu omttfuko gwe bwe gujjula abo: Tebaakwatibwenga nsonyi, Bwe banaayogereranga n'abalabe baabwe mu mulyango. 
19_128_1_Alina omukisa buli atya Mukama, Atambulira mu makubo ge. 
19_128_2_Kubanga onoolyanga ge emirimu egy'emikono gyo: Oliba wa mukisa, era oliraba ebirungi. 
19_128_3_Mukazi wo aliba ng'omuzabbibu ogubala mu nju ez'omunda mu nnyumba yo: Abaana bo ng'amatabi g'omuzeyituuni nga beetooloola emmeeza yo. 
19_128_4_Laba, bw'atyo bw'aliweebwa omukisa omuntu Atya Mukama. 
19_128_5_Mukama anaakuwanga omukisa ng'ayima mu Sayuuni: Naawe onoolabanga ebirungi nga bijja ku Yerusaalemi ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwo. 
19_128_6_Weewaawo, oliraba abaana b'abaana bo. Emirembe gibeere ku Isiraeri. 
19_129_1_Emirundi mingi gye baakambonyaabonyezza okuva mu buto bwange Isiraeri ayogeze kaakano 
19_129_3_Abakabala baakabala omugongo gwange; Baatema ensalosalo empanvu, 
19_129_4_Mukama mutuukirivu: Asazeesaze emigwa egy'ababi. 
19_129_5_Bakwatibwe ensonyi, bazzibwe ennyuma, Bonna abakyawa Sayuuni. 
19_129_6_Babe ng'omuddo oguli waggulu ku nnyumba, Oguwotoka nga tegunnakula: 
19_129_7_Omukunguzi n'atajjuza ogwo omukono gwe, Newakubadde asiba ebinywa ekifuba kye. 
19_129_8_Newakubadde abayita teboogera Nti Omukisa gwa Mukama gube ku mmwe; Tubawadde omukisa mu linnya lya Mukama. 
19_130_1_Mu buziba nkukaabidde ggwe, ai Mukama. 
19_130_2_Mukama, owulire eddoboozi lyange: Amatu go galowooze Eddoboozi ery'okwegayirira kwange. 
19_130_3_Mukama, owulire eddoboozi lyange: Amatu go galowooze Eddoboozi ery'okwegayirira kwange. 
19_130_4_Naye waliwo okusonyiwa w'oli, Olyoke otiibwenga. 
19_130_5_Nnindirira Mukama, emmeeme yange erinda, Era ekigambo kye kye nsuubira. 
19_130_6_Emmeeme yange eyaayaanira Mukama, Okusinga abakuumi bwe bayaayaanira obudde okukya; Weewaawo, okusinga abakuumi bwe bayaayaanira obudde okukya. 
19_130_7_Ggwe Isiraeri, suubiranga Mukama; Kubanga awali Mukama we wali okusaasira, Era awali ye we wali okununula okungi. 
19_130_8_Era oyo alinunula Isiraeri Mu butali butuukirivu bwe bwonna. 
19_131_1_Mukama omutima gwange si gwa malala, newakubadde amaaso gange tegeegulumiza; So sitambulira mu bigambo ebikulu. Newakubadde mu bigambo eby'ekitalo ebinnema. 
19_131_2_Mazima ŋŋonzezza emmeeme yange, ngisirisizza; Ng'omwana avudde ku mabeere awali nnyina, N'emmeeme yange eri we ndi bw'etyo ng'omwana avudde ku mabeere. 
19_131_3_Ggwe Isiraeri suubiranga Mukama Okuva leero n'okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
19_132_1_Mukama, ojjuukirire Dawudi Okubonaabona kwe kwonna. 
19_132_2_Bwe yalayirira Mukama, Ne yeeyama Omuzira wa Yakobo: 
19_132_3_Mazima siriyingira mu weema ey'ennyumba yange, So siririnnya ku kiriri kyange 
19_132_6_Laba, twagiwulirako mu Efulasa: Twagiraba mu nnimiro ey'ekibira. 
19_132_7_Tuliyingira mu weema ze; Tulisinziza awali entebe y'ebigere bye. 
19_132_8_Golokoka, ai Mukama, oyingire mu kifo kyo eky'okuwummuliramu; Ggwe, n'essanduuko ey'amaanyi go. 
19_132_9_Bakabona bo bambale obutuukirivu; N'abatukuvu bo boogerere waggulu olw'essanyu. 
19_132_10_Ku lw'omuddu wo Dawudi Togoba maaso g'oyo gwe wafukako amafuta. 
19_132_11_Mukama yalayirira Dawudi mu mazima; Talikyuka kugaleka: Ku bibala eby'omubiri gwo nditeeka ku ntebe yo. 
19_132_12_Abaana bo bwe banakkirizanga okwekuuma endagaano yange N'obujulirwa bwange bwe nnaabayigirizanga, Era n'abaana baabwe banastuulanga ku ntebe yo emirembe gyonna. 
19_132_13_Kubanga Mukama yeeroboza Sayuuni; Yakiyaayaanira okukituulamu. 
19_132_14_Kino kye kifo kye mpummuliramu ennaku zonna: Wano we nnaatuulanga; kubanga nayaayaanirawo. 
19_132_15_Naskiwanga omukisa muagi ekyengera kyakyo: Nakkusanga abaavu baakyo emmere. 
19_132_16_Era ne bakabona baakyo ndibambaza obulokozi: N'abatukuvu baakyo balyogerera waggulu olw'essanyu. 
19_132_17_Eyo gye ndyanyisiza ejjembe lya Dawudi: Namuteekerawo ettabaaza eyo gwe nnafukako amafuta. 
19_132_18_Abalabe be ndibambaza ensonyi: Naye ku mutwe gwe engule ye eriraba omukisa. 
19_133_1_Laba bwe kuli okulungi, bwe kusanyusa, Ab'oluganda okutuula awamu nga batabaganye! 
19_133_2_Kuliznanga amafuta ag'omuwendo omungi agali ku mutwe, Agaakulukutira mu kirevu, Mu kirevu kya Alooni; Agaaserengetera ku lukugiro lw'ebyambalo bye 
19_134_1_Mulabe, mumwebaze Mukama, mmwe mwenna abaddu ba Mukama, Abayimirira ekiro mu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
19_134_2_Muyimuse engalo zammwe eri awatukuvu, Mumwebaze Mukama. 
19_134_3_Mukama akuwe omukisa ng'ayima mu Sayuuni; Oyo eyakola eggulu n'ensi. 
19_135_1_1 Mumutendereze Mukama. Mutendereze erinnya lya Mukama, Mumutendereze, mmwe abaddu ba Mukama: 
19_135_2_Mmwe abayimirira mu nnyumba ya Mukama, Mu mpya z'ennyumba ya Katonda waffe. 
19_135_3_Mumutendereze Mukama; kubanga Mukama mulungi: Muyimbe okutendereza erinnya lye; kubanga lya ssanyu. 
19_135_4_Kubanga Mukama yeeroboza Yakobo okuba owuwe, Ne Isiraeri okuba ow'envuma ye yekka. 
19_135_5_Kubanga mmanyi nga Mukama mukulu, Era nga Mukama waffe asinga bakatonda bonna. 
19_135_6_Buli ky'ayagadde Mukama akikoze, Mu ggulu ne mu nsi, mu nnyanja ne mu by'obuziba byonna. 
19_135_7_Anyoosa omukka okuva ku nkomerero z'ensi; Aleetera enjota enkuba; Afulumya empewo mu mawanika ge. 
19_135_8_Eyakuba ababereberye ab'e Misiri, Ab'abantu era n'ab'ensolo. 
19_135_9_Yaweereza obubonero n'eby'amagero wakati mu ggwe, ggwe Misiri, Ku Falaawo, ne ku baddu be bonna. 
19_135_10_Eyakuba amawanga amangi, N'atta bakabaka ab'amaanyi; 
19_135_11_Sikoni kabaka w'Abamoli, Ne Ogi kabaka We Basani, N'amatwale gonna aga Kanani: 
19_135_12_N'agaba ensi yaabwe okuba obusika, Obusika eri Isiraeri abantu be. 
19_135_13_Erinnya lyo, ai Mukama, libeerera ennaku zonna; N'ekijjukizo kyo, ai Mukama, okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
19_135_14_Kubanga Mukama alisalira omusango abantu be, Era alyejjusa mu bigambo eby'abaddu be. 
19_135_15_Ebifaananyi eby'amawanga ye ffeeza, ye zaabu, Omulimu ogw'emikono gy'abantu. 
19_135_16_Birina obumwa, naye tebyogera; Birina amaaso, naye tebiraba; 
19_135_17_Birina amatu, naye tebiwulira; So tewali mukka mu bumwa bwabyo. 
19_135_18_Ababikola balibifaanana; Weewaawo, buli abyesiga. 
19_135_19_Mmwe ennyumba ya Isiraeri, mumwebaze Mukama: Mmwe ennyumba ya Alooni, mumwebaze Mukama: 
19_135_20_Mmwe ennyumba ya Leevi, mumwebaze Mukama: Mmwe abatya Mukama, mumwebaze Mukama. 
19_135_21_Mukama yeebazibwe okuva mu Sayuuni, Atuula mu Yerusaalemi. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_136_1_Mumwebaze Mukama; kubanga mulungi: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_2_Mumwebaze Katonda wa bakatonda: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_3_Mumwebaze Mukama w'abaami: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_4_Oyo akola eby'amagero ebikulu yekka: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_5_Oyo eyakola eggulu n'amagezi: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_6_Oyo eyayaliira ensi waggulu ku mazzi: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_7_Oyo eyakola ebyaka ebikulu: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_8_Enjuba okufuga emisana: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_9_Omwezi n'emmunyeenye okufuga ekiro: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_10_Oyo eyakubira e Misiri ababereberye baabwe: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_11_N'aggyamu Isiraeri wakati mu bo: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonaa. 
19_136_12_N'engalo ez'amaanyi, n'omukono omugolole: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_13_Oyo eyayawulamu wakau Ennyanja Emmyufu: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_14_N'ayisa Isiraeri wakati mu yo: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna: 
19_136_15_Naye n'asuulira Falaawo n'eggye lye mu Nnyanja Emmyufu. Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_16_Oyo eyaluŋŋamiza abantu be mu ddungu: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_17_Oyo eyakuba bakabaka abakulu: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna: 
19_136_18_N'atta bakabaka abaatiikirivu: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna: 
19_136_19_Sikoni kabaka w'Abamoli: Kubanga okusaasira kwe ku, beerera emirembe gyonna: 
19_136_20_Ne Ogi kabaka w'e Basani: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna: 
19_136_21_N'agaba ensi yaabwe okuba obusika: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna: 
19_136_22_Okuba obusika eri Isiraeri omuddu we: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emireMbe gyonna. 
19_136_23_Eyatujjukira bwe twajeera: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna: 
19_136_24_N'atuwonya eri abalabe baffe: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_25_Awo ebyokulya ebirina emibiri byonna: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_136_26_Mumwebaze Katonda ow'omu ggulu: Kubanga okusaasira kwe kubeerera emirembe gyonna. 
19_137_1_Okumpi n'emigga egy'e Babulooni, Twatuulawo wansi, weewaawo, ne tukaaba amaziga: Bwe twajjukira Sayuuni. 
19_137_2_miti egyali wakati mu kyo Ne tuwaaikako ennanga zaffe. 
19_137_3_Kubanga abaatutwala mu busibe baatulagirira eyo okuyimba, N'abaatunyaga baatulagira okuseka, Nti Mutuyimbireko ku nnyimba za Sayuuni. 
19_137_4_Tunaayimbanga tutya oluyimba lwa Mukama Mu nsi eteri yaffe? 
19_137_5_Bwe nnaakwerabiranga, ggwe Yerusaalemi, Omukono gwange ogwa ddyo gwerabirenga amagezi gaagwo. 
19_137_6_Olulimi lwange lwegattenga n'ekibuno kyange, Bwe ssiikujjukirenga; Bwe ssaagalenga Yerusaalemi Okusinga essanyu lyange ekkulu. 
19_137_7_Ojjukire, si Mukama, ku baana ba Edomu Olunaku olw'e Yerusaalemi; Abaayogera nti Kisuule, kisuule, Era n’emisingi gyakyo. 
19_137_8_Ggwe omuwala ow'e Babulooni, agenda okuzikirizibwa; Aliba n'omukisa oyo alikuwalana ggwe, Nga bwe watukola ffe. 
19_137_9_Aliba n'omukisa oyo alikwata abaana bo abato, alibakasuka ku jjinja. 
19_138_1_Nneebazanga n'omutima gwange gwonna: Mu maaso ga bakatonda naayimbanga okukutendereza. 
19_138_2_Nnaasinzizanga eri yeekaalu yo entukuvu, Era nneebazanga erinnya lyo olw'ekisa kyo n'olw'amazima go: Kubanga ogulumizizza ekigambo kyo okusinga erinnya lyo lyonna. 
19_138_3_Ku lunaku lwe nnakaabirirako wampitaba, N'onnumya n'amaanyi mu mmeema yange. 
19_138_4_Bakabaka bonna ab'ensi balikwebaza, ai Mukama, Kubanga bawulidde ebigambo eby'akamwa ko. 
19_138_5_Weewaawo, baliyimba ku makubo ga Mukama; Kubanga ekitiibwa kya Mukama kingi. 
19_138_6_Weewaawo, baliyimba ku makubo ga Mukama; Kubanga ekitiibwa kya Mukama kingi. 
19_138_7_Newakubadde nga ntambulira wakati mu nnaku, olinzuukiza; Oligolola omukono gwo ku busungu bw'abalabe bange, N'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gulindokola. 
19_138_8_Mukama alituukiriza ebigambo ebinfaako: Okusaasira kwo, ai Mukama, kubeerera emirembe gyonna; Toleka mirimu gya mikono gyo ggwe. 
19_139_1_Ai Mukama, wannoonya nze, mwammanya. 
19_139_2_Omanyi bwe ntuula, era bwe' ngolokoka, Otegeera okulowooza kwange nga kukyali wala. 
19_139_3_Onoonyeza ddala ekkubo lyange n'okwebaka kwange, Era omanyi amagenda gange gonna. 
19_139_4_Kubanga simuli kigambo mu lulimi lwange, Laba, ai Mukama, ggwe ky'otomanyira ddala. 
19_139_5_Onzingizizza mu maaso n'ennyuma, Era ontaddeko omukono gwo. 
19_139_6_Okumanya okuliŋŋanga okwo kwa ki talo, kunnema; Kwa waggulu, siyinza kukutuukako. 
19_139_7_Naagenda wa okuva eri omwoyo gwo? Oba naddukira wa amaaso go? 
19_139_8_Bwe nnaalinnya mu ggulu, nga gy'oli: Bwe nnaayala obuliri bwange mu magombe, laba, nga gy'oli. 
19_139_9_Bwe nnaatoola ebiwaawaatiro eby'enkya, Ne ntuula mu bifo eby'ennyanja ebiri ewala ennyo; 
19_139_10_Newakubadde eyo omukono gwo gunannuŋŋamya, N'omukono gwo ogwa ddyo gunankwata. 
19_139_11_Bwe ndyogera nti Enzikiza teereme kumbikkako, N'omusana ogunneetoolodde gunaaba ekiro; 
19_139_12_Newakubadde enzikiza teyeekisa eri ggwe, Naye ekiro kyaka ng'omusana: Kubanga enzikiza n'omusana bifaanana w'oli. 
19_139_13_Kubanga ggwe olina omwoyo gwange: Wambikkako mu lubuto lwa mmange. 
19_139_14_Naakwebazanga; kubanga okukolebwa kwange kwa ntiisa, kwa kitalo: Emirimu gyo gya kitalo; N'ekyo emmeeme yange ekimanyidde ddala. 
19_139_15_Tewakisibwa mubiri gwange, Bwe nnakolerwa mu kyama, Bwe nnatondebwa n'amagezi amangi mu bya wansi eby'ensi. 
19_139_16_Amaaso go gaalaba omubiri gwange nga tegunnatuukirira, Ne mu kitabo kyo ebitundu byange byonna ne biwandiikibwa. 
19_139_17_Amaaso go gaalaba omubiri gwange nga tegunnatuukirira, Ne mu kitabo kyo ebitundu byange byonna ne biwandiikibwa. Ebyabumbibwanga buli lunaku buli lunaku, Bwe byali nga tebinnabaawo n'ekimu. 
19_139_18_Bwe mba mbibaze, bisinga omusenyu omuwendo: Bwe nzuukuka, nga nkyali wamu naawe. 
19_139_19_Tolirema kutta babi, ai Katonda: Kale muve gye ndi, mmwe abasajja abayaayaanira omusaayi. 
19_139_20_Kubanga bakwogerako bubi, N'abalabe bo balayirira bwereere erinnya lyo. 
19_139_21_Sibakyawa abo, ai Mukama, abakukyawa ggwe? Sinyiigira abo abakugolokokerako? 
19_139_22_Mbakyawa okukyawa okutuukiridde Mbayita balabe bange. 
19_139_23_Onkebere, ai Katonda, omanye omutima gwange: Onkeme, omanye ebirowoozo byange: 
19_139_24_Olabe ng'ekkubo lyonna ery'obubi liri mu nze, Era onnuŋŋamyanga mu kkubo eritakoma. 
19_140_1_Omponye, ai Mukama, eri omubi; Onkuume eri omutemu: 
19_140_2_Abayiiya ettima mu mutima gwabwe; Bakuŋŋaananga bulijjo okulwana. 
19_140_3_Basongodde olulimi lwabwe ng'omusota; Obusagwa bw'essalambwa buli wansi w'emimwa gyabwe. (Seera) 
19_140_4_Onkuume, ai Mukama, eri emikono gy'ababi; Omponye eri omutemu: Abateesezza okukyamya ebigere byange olw'amaanyi. 
19_140_5_Ab'amalala bantegedde omutego n'emigwa; Bayaze ekitimba mu kkubo: Bantegedde ebyambika. (Seera) 
19_140_6_Nagamba Mukama nti Ggwe oli Katonda wange: Owulire eddoboozi ery'okwegayirira kwange, ai Mukama. 
19_140_7_Ai Katonda Mukama, amaanyi ag'obulokozi bwange. Wambikka ku mutwe gwange ku lunaku olw'olutalo. 
19_140_8_Tokkiriza, ai Mukama, omubi by'ayagala; Toyamba lukwe lwe olubi; baleme okwegulumizanga. (Seera) 
19_140_9_Omutwe gwabwe abanneetooloola, Ettima ery'emimwa gyabwe bo libabikkengako. 
19_140_10_Amanda agookya gabagweko: Basuulibwe mu muliro; Mu bunnya obuwanvu, baleme okugolokokanga nate. 
19_140_11_Ayogera obubi taanywerenga mu nsi: Obubi bunaayigganyanga omutemu okumusuula. 
19_140_12_Mmanyi nga Mukama aliwoza omusango gw'abo ababonyaabonyezebwa, N'ensonga ey'abanaku. 
19_140_13_Abatuukirivu tebalirema kwebaza linnya lyo: Ab'amazima balituula w'oli. 
19_141_1_Mukama, nkukaabidde; oyanguwe okujja gye ndi: Owulire eddoboozi lyange, bwe nkukaabira. 
19_141_2_Okusaba kwange kuteekebwe mu maaso go ng'omugavu; Okugololwa kw'emikono gyange kube nga ssaddaaka ey'akawungeezi. 
19_141_3_Ossengawo okulabirira, ai Mukama, ku kamwa kange: Okuumenga omulyango gw'emimwa gyange. 
19_141_4_Tokyusanga mutima gwange eri ekibi kyonna. Okugenderera ebikolwa eby'obubi Awamu: n'abo abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu: So nnemenga okulya ku mmere yaabwe empoomerevu. 
19_141_5_Omutuukirivu ankubenga nga kwa kisa; Era ambuulirirenga, ng'amafuta ku mutwe; Omutwe gwange gulemenga okugagaana: Kuba newakubadde, mu bubi bwabwe okusaba kwange kunaabeererangawo. 
19_141_6_Abalamuzi baabwe basuulibwa ku mabbali g'ejjinja; Nabo baliwulira ebigambo byange; kubanga biwoomerevu. 
19_141_7_Ng'omuntu bw'akabala ng'atema ettaka, N'amagumba gaffe bwe gatyo gasaasaanidde ku kamwa k'amagombe. 
19_141_8_Kubanga amaaso gange gatunuulira ggwe, ai Katonda Mukama: Nkwesiga ggwe; toleka mmeeme yange nga teriiko anannyamba. 
19_141_9_Onkuume eri omutego gwe bantegedde, N'eri ebyambika by'abo abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu. 
19_141_10_Ababi bagwe mu bitimba byabwe bo, Naye nze nga mpona. 
19_142_1_Nkaabira Mukama n'eddoboozi lyange; N'eddoboozi lyange neegayirira Mukama. 
19_142_2_Nfuka mu maaso ge ebinneemulugunyisizza; Ndaga mu maaso ge ebinnakuwazizza 
19_142_4_Mutunule ku mukono gwange ogwa ddyo, mulabe; kubanga tewali muntu ammanyi: Ekiddukiro kimbuze; tewali muntu ayagala emmeeme yange: 
19_142_5_Nakukoowoola ggwe, ai Mukama; Nayogera nti Ggwe oli kiddukiro kyange, Omugabo gwange mu nsi ey'abalamu. 
19_142_6_Owulire okukaaba kwange; kubanga njeezebwa nnyo: Omponye eri abo abanjigganya; kubanga bansinga amaanyi. 
19_142_7_Oggyeemu emmeeme yange mu kkomera, neebazenga erinnya lyo: Abatuukirivu balinneetooloola; Kubanga olinkolera eby'ekisa ekingi. 
19_143_1_Owulire okusaba kwange, ai Mukama; otege okutu eri okwegayirira kwange. Mu bwesigwa bwo ompitabe, ne mu butuukirivu bwo. 
19_143_2_So tosalanga musango gwa muddu wo; Ku banga mu maaso go tewali muntu mulamu alisinga. 
19_143_3_Kubanga omulabe anjigganyizza emmeeme yange; Akubye obulamu bwange n'abusuula wansi: Antuuzizza mu bifo eby'enzikiza ng'abo abaafa edda. 
19_143_4_Omwoyo gwange kyeguvudde guzirika munda yange; Omutima gwange munda yange teguliiko anannyamba. 
19_143_5_Njijukira ennaku ez'edda; ndowooza ebikolwa byo byonna: Nfumiitiriza omulimu ogw'engalo zo. 
19_143_6_Nnyanjuluza engalo zange eri ggwe: Emmeeme yange ekulumirwa ennyonta, ng'ensi ekooye. (Seera) 
19_143_7_Oyanguwe okumpitaba, ai Mukama; omwoyo gwange guggwaawo: Tonkisa maaso go; nneme okufuuka ng'abo abakkira mu bunnya. 
19_143_8_Ompulizenga enkya ekisa kyo ekirungi; kubanga neesiga ggwe: Ontegeeze ekkubo eriŋŋwanira okutambuliramu; kubanga nnyimusa emmeeme yange eri ggwe. 
19_143_9_Omponye, ai Mukama, eri abalabe bange: Nziruka okujja w'oli okwekisa. 
19_143_10_Onjigirize okukolanga by'oyagala; kubanga ggwe oli Katonda wange: Omwoyo gwo mulungi; onnuŋŋamize mu nsi ey'obutuukirivu. 
19_143_11_Onzuukize, ai Mukama, olw'erinnya lyo: Mu butuukirivu bwo oggyemu emmeeme yange mu nnaku. 
19_143_12_Era mu kisa kyo ekirungi ozikirize abalabe bange, Omalewo bonna ababonyaabonya emmeeme yange; Kubanga ndi muddu wo. 
19_144_1_Yeebazibwe Mukama ejjinja lyange, Ayigiriza emikono gyange entalo, n'engalo zange okulwana. 
19_144_2_Ekisa kyange ekirungi era ekigo kyange, Ennyumba yange empanvu, era omulokozi wange; Engabo yange, era oyo gwe nneesiga, Ajeemulula abantu bange be ntwala. 
19_144_3_Mukama, omuntu kiki, ggwe okumumanya? Oba omwana w'omuntu, ggwe okumulowoozaako? 
19_144_4_Omuntu alintlanga omukka: Ennaku ze ziriŋŋanga ekisiikirize ekiggwaawo. 
19_144_5_Okutamye eggulu lyo, ai Mukama, okke: Okwate ku nsozi, zinaanyooka. 
19_144_6_Okasuke enjota, obasaasaanye; Olase obusaale bwo, obateganye. 
19_144_7_Ogolole omukono gwo ng'oyima waggulu; Omponye, onziye mu mazzi amangi, mu mukono gwa bannaggwanga 
19_144_9_Naakuyimbiranga ggwe oluyimba oluggya, ai Katonda: N'ennanga erina enkoba ekkumi naayimbanga okukutendereza. 
19_144_10_Ye wuuyo awa bakabaka obulokozi: Awonya Dawudi omuddu we eri ekitala ekiruma. 
19_144_11_Omponye, onziye mu mukono gwa bannaggwanga, Akamwa kaabwe koogera ebitaliimu, N'omukono gwabwe ogwa ddyo gwe mukono ogwa ddyo ogw'obulimba. 
19_144_12_Batabani baffe bwe baliba ng'emiti egikuze nga bakyali bavubuka; N'abawala baffe ng'amayinja ag'omu nsonda agabajjibwa nga bwe bagabajjira mu lubiri; 
19_144_13_Amawanika gaffe bwe galijjula, nga galina ebintu eby'engeri zonna; N'endiga zaffe bwe zirizaala enkumi n'obukumi ku ttale lyaffe; 
19_144_14_Ente zaffe bwe ziriba n'emigugu eminene; Nga tewali kuwagula, newakubadde okufuluma, So nga tewali kuyoogaana mu nguudo zaffe; 
19_144_15_Balina omukisa abantu ababeera bwe batyo: Balina omukisa abantu abalina Katonda waabwe ye Mukama. 
19_145_1_Naakugulumizanga, Katonda wange, ai Kabaka; Era neebazanga erinnya lyo emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_145_2_Buli lunaku naakwebazanga; Era naatenderezanga erinnya lyo emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_145_3_Mukama mukulu, era agwana okutenderezebwa ennyo N'obukulu bwe tebunoonyezeka. 
19_145_4_Emirembe ginaasuutanga emirimu gyo eri emirembe, Era ginaatenderanga ebikolwa byo eby'amaanyi. 
19_145_5_Ku bukulu obw'ekitiibwa obw'ettendo lyo, Ne ku mirimu gyo egy'ekitalo, kwe nnaalowoozanga. 
19_145_6_Era abantu banaayogeranga ku bikolwa byo eby'entiisa nga bya maanyi; Nange naategeezanga obukulu bwo. Banaayatulanga obulungi bwo obungi bwe bujjukirwa, Era banaayimbanga ku butuukirivu bwo. 
19_145_7_Banaayatulanga obulungi bwo obungi bwe bujjukirwa, Era banaayimbanga ku butuukirivu bwo. 
19_145_8_Mukama wa kisa ajjudde okusaasira; Alwawo okusunguwala era wa kusonyiwa kungi. 
19_145_9_Mukama mulungi eri bonna; N'okusaasira kwe okulungi kubuna emirimu gye gyonna. 
19_145_10_Emirimu gyo gyonna ginaakwebazanga, ai Mukama; N'abatukuvu bo banaakweyanzanga. 
19_145_11_Banaayogeranga ku kitiibwa eky'obwakabaka bwo, Banaanyumyanga ku buyinza bwo; 
19_145_12_Okumanyisanga abaana b'abantu ebikolwa bye eby'amaanyi, N'ekitiibwa eky'obukulu obw'obwakabaka bwe. 
19_145_13_Obwakabaka bwo bwe bwakabaka obutaliggwaawo, N'okufuga kwo kunaabeereranga emirembe gyonna. 
19_145_14_Mukama awanirira abagwa bonna, Era ayimiriza abakutama bonna. 
19_145_15_Amaaso g'ebintu byonaa gakulindirira; Naawe obiwa emmere yaabyo mu ntuuko zaabyo. 
19_145_16_Oyanjuluza engalo zo, N’okkusa buli kintu kiramu bye kyagala. 
19_145_17_Mukama mutuukirivu mu makubo ge gonna,Era wa kisa mu mirimu gye gyonna. 
19_145_18_Mukama aba kumpi abo bonna abamukaabira, n'amazima. 
19_145_19_Anaatuukirizanga abo kye baagala abamutya; Era anaawuliranga okukaaba kwabwe anaabalokolanga. 
19_145_20_Mukama akuuma abo bonna abamwagala; Naye ababi bonna alibazikiriza. 
19_145_21_Akamwa kange kanaayogeranga ettendo lya Mukama; Era ne byonna ebirina emibiri byebazenga erinnya lye ettukuvu emirembe n'emirembe. 
19_146_1_Mumutendereze Mukama. Tendereza Mukama, ggwe emmeeme yange. 
19_146_2_Nga nkyali mulamu, naatenderezanga Mukama: Naayimbanga okutendereza Katonda wange nga nkyaliwo. 
19_146_3_Temwesiganga balangira, Newakubadde omwana w'omuntu, omutali buyambi bwonna. 
19_146_4_Omukka gwe gumuvaamu, n'adda mu ttaka lye; Ku lunaku olwo ebirowoozo bye ne bibula. 
19_146_5_Alina omukisa oyo alina Katonda wa Yakobo okuba omubeezi we, Asuubira Mukama Katonda we: 
19_146_6_Eyakola eggulu n'ensi, ennyanja, n'ebibirimu byonna; Akwata amazima ennaku zonna: 
19_146_7_Abatuukiririza omusango abajoogebwa; Awa emmere abalumwa enjala; Mukama asumulula abasibe 
19_146_10_Mukama anaafuganga ennaku zonna, Katonda wo, ggwe Sayuuni, okutuusa emirembe gyonna. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_147_1_Mumutendereze Mukama; Kubanga kulungi okuyimba okutenderezanga Katonda waffe; Kubanga kwa ssanyu, era ettendo liwooma. 
19_147_2_Mukama azimbira ddala Yerusaalemi; Akuŋŋaanya wamu abagobebwa ab'omu Isiraeri. 
19_147_3_Awonya abalina emitima egimenyese, Era asiba ebiwundu byabwe. 
19_147_4_Abala emmunyeenye omuwendo gwazo; Azituuma zonna amannya gaazo. 
19_147_5_Mukama waffe mukulu, era obuyinza bwe bwa maanyi; Okutegeera kwe tekulowoozekeka. 
19_147_6_Mukama awanirira abawombeefu: Asindika wansi ababi. 
19_147_7_Mumuyimbire Mukama n'okwebaza; Muyimbe n'ennanga okutendereza Katonda waffe 
19_147_9_Awa ensolo emmere yaazo, Ne bannamuŋŋoona abato abakaaba. 
19_147_10_Tasanyukira maanyi ga mbalaasi: Teyeesiimira amagulu g'omuntu. 
19_147_11_Mukama yeesiimira abo abamutya, Abo abasuubira okusaasira kwe. 
19_147_12_Tendereza Mukama, ggwe Yerusaalemi; Tendereza Katonda wo, ggwe Sayuuni. 
19_147_13_Kubanga anywezezza ebisiba by'enzigi zo; Awadde omukisa abaana bo munda yo. 
19_147_14_Aleeta emirembe mu nsalo zo; Akujjuza obugimu obw'eŋŋaano. 
19_147_15_Aweereza ekiragiro kye ku nsi; Ekigambo kye kidduka embiro nnyingi. 
19_147_16_Agabula omuzira ng'ebyoya by'endiga; Amansira omusulo ogukutte empewo ng'evvu. 
19_147_17_Aweereza amazzi ge agakutte ng'obukunkumuka: Ani ayinza okuyimirira awali empewo ze? 
19_147_18_Atuma ekigambo kye, n'abisaanuusa: Akunsa empewo ze, amazzi ne gakulukuta. 
19_147_19_Alaga Yakobo ekigambo kye, Amateeka ge n'emisango gye eri Isiraeri. 
19_147_20_Takolanga bw'atyo ggwanga lyonna: N'emisango gye tebagimanyanga. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_148_1_Mumutendereze Mukama Mumutendereze Mukama, mmwe abayima mu ggulu: Mumutendereze mu bifo ebya waggulu. 
19_148_2_Mumutendereze, mmwe bamalayika be bonna: Mumutendereze, mmwe lye lyonna. 
19_148_3_Mumutendereze, mmwe enjuba n'omwezi: Mumutendereze, mmwe emmunyeenye zonna ezaaka. 
19_148_4_Mumutendereze, mmwe eggulu ly'eggulu, Nammwe amazzi agali waggulu w'eggulu. 
19_148_5_Bitendereze erinnya lya Mukama: Kubanga yalagira, ne bitondebwa. 
19_148_6_Era yabinyweza okutuusa emirembe n'emirembe: Yateeka etteeka eritaridiba. 
19_148_7_Mumutendereze Mukama, mmwe abali mu nsi, Mmwe balukwata, n'ebifo byonna eby'obuziba: 
19_148_8_Omuliro n'omuzira, serugi n'omukka: Omuyaga ogutuukiriza ekigambo kye: 
19_148_9_Ensozi n'obusozi bwonna; Emiti egibala n'emivule gyonna: 
19_148_10_Ensolo n'ente zonna; Ebyewalula n'ennyonyi ezibuuka: 
19_148_11_Bakabaka b'ensi n'amawanga gonna; Abalangira n'abalamuzi bonna ab'ensi: 
19_148_12_Abavubuka n'abawala; Abakadde n'abato: 
19_148_13_Batendereze erinnya lya Mukama; Kubanga erinnya lye yekka lye ligulumizibwa: Ekitiibwa kye kiri kungulu ku nsi ne ku ggulu. 
19_148_14_Era agulumizizza ejjembe ery'abantu be, Ettendo eryabatukuvu be bonna; Be baana ba Isiraeri, abantu abamuli okumpi: Mumutendereze Mukama. 
19_149_1_Mumutendereze Mukama. Mumuyimbire Mukama oluyimba oluggya, N'ettendo lye mu kkuŋŋaaniro ery'abatukuvu: 
19_149_2_Isiraeri asanyukire oyo eyamukola: Abaana ba Sayuuni bajagulize kabaka waabwe. 
19_149_3_Batendereze erinnya lye nga bazina: Bayimbe okumutendereza n'ekitaasa n'ennanga. 
19_149_4_Kubanga Mukama asanyukira abantu be: Aliwonya abawombeefu n'obulokozi. 
19_149_5_Abatukuvu bajagulize ekitiibwa: Bayimbirenga olw'essanyu ku bitanda byabwe. 
19_149_6_Ettendo eggulumivu lya Katonda libenga mu bulago bwabwe, N'ekitala eky'obwogi obubiri mu ngalo zaabwe 
19_150_1_Mumutendereze Mukama. Mumutendereze Katonda mu watukuvu we: Mumutendereze mu bbanga ery'amaanyi ge. 
19_150_2_Mumutendereze olw'ebikolwa bye eby'amaanyi: Mumutendereze ng'obukulu bwe obulungi bwe buli. 
19_150_3_Mumutendereze n'eddoboozi ery'ekkondeere: Mumutendereze n'amadinda n'ennanga. 
19_150_4_Mumutendereze n'ekitaasa n'okuzina: Mumutendereze n'ebyo ebirina engoye n'endere: 
19_150_5_Mumutendereze n'ebitaasa ebivuga ennyo: Mumutendereze n'ebitaasa eby'eddoboozi ettono. 
19_150_6_Buli ekirina omukka kimutendereze Mukama. Mumutendereze Mukama. 
20_1_1_Engero za Sulemaani mutabani wa Dawudi, kabaka wa Isiraeri: 
20_1_2_Okumanyanga amagezi n'okuyigirizibwanga; Okwawulanga ebigambo eby'okutegeera 
20_1_5_Ow'amagezi awulire yeeyongerenga okuba n'okuyiga; Era omusajja alina okutegeera afune okuteesanga okutuufu. 
20_1_6_Okutegeeranga olugero n'ekifaananyi; Ebigambo eby'abagezigezi n'ebikokko byabwe. 
20_1_7_Mu kutya Mukama okumanya mwe kusookera: Naye abasirusiru banyooma amagezi n'okuyigirizibwanga. 
20_1_8_Mwana wange, wulira okuyigirizanga kwa kitaawo, So tova mu tteeka lya nnyoko: 
20_1_9_Kubanga binaabanga ngule ya kisa ku mutwe gwo, N'emikuufu egyetoolodde obulago bwo. 
20_1_10_Mwana wange, abalina ebibi bwe bakusendasenda, Tokkirizanga. 
20_1_11_Bwe boogera nti Jjangu tugende fenna, Tuteege omusaayi, Tugwire mu kyama ataliiko musango awatali nsonga; 
20_1_12_Tubamire nga bakyali balamu ng'amagombe, Era nga bakyali balamba ng'abo abakka mu bunnya; 
20_1_13_Tuliraba ebintu byonna eby'omuwendo omungi. Tulijjuza ennyumba zaffe omunyago; 
20_1_14_Oneekubira akalulu wamu naffe; Fenna tunaabanga n'ensawe emu: 
20_1_15_Mwana wange, totambuliranga mu kkubo wamu nabo: Ziyizanga ekigere kyo okuyitang mu lugendo lwabwe: 
20_1_16_Kubanga ebigere byabwe bidduka mbiro okugoberera obut Era byanguwa okuyiwa omusaayi. 
20_1_17_Kubanga bategera bwereere ekitimba, Ennyonyi yonna ng'ekiraba: 
20_1_18_Era abo bateega omusaayi gwabwe bo, Bagwira mu kyama obulamu bwabwe bo. 
20_1_19_Bwe gatyo bwe gabeera amakubo aga buli muntu eyeegomba amagoba; Gaggyawo obulamu bwa bannyini go. 
20_1_20_Amagezi googerera waggulu mu luguudo; Galeeta eddoboozi lyago mu bifo ebigazi; 
20_1_21_Googerera waggulu mu kifo ekikulu eky'okukuŋŋaaniramu; Awayingirirwa mu miryango, Mu kibuga mwe galeetera ebigambo byago: 
20_1_22_Mmwe abatalina magezi, mulituusa wa okwagalanga obutaba na magezi? N'abanyooma okusanyukiranga okunyooma, N'abasirusiru okukyawanga okumanya? 
20_1_23_Mukyuke olw'okunenya kwange: Laba, naafukanga omwoyo gwange gye muli, Naabamanyisanga ebigambo byange. 
20_1_24_Kubanga mpise, mmwe ne mugaana; Ngolodde omukono gwange, so tewali muntu assizzaayo mwoyo; 
20_1_25_Naye mujjuludde okuteesa kwange kwonna, So temwagadde kunenya kwange n'akatono: 
20_1_26_Era nange ndisekera ku lunaku kwe mulirabira ennaku; Ndikudaala entiisa yammwe bw'erituuka; 
20_1_27_Entiisa yammwe bw'erituuka ng'omuyaga, N'ennaku ze muliraba bwe zirijja ng'embuyaga ez'akazimu; Okweraliikirira n'obubalagaze bwe biribajjira. 
20_1_28_Kale bwe balinkaabira, naye siriddamu; Balinnoonya nnyo, naye tebalindaba: 
20_1_29_Kubanga baakyawanga okumanya, So tebeerobozanga kutya Mukama: 
20_1_30_Tebaayagalanga kuteesa kwange n'akatono; Baanyoomanga okunenya kwange kwonna: 
20_1_31_Kyebaliva balya ku bibala eby'ekkubo lyabwe bo, Ne bakkuta enkwe zaabwe bo. 
20_1_32_Kubanga okudda ennyuma okw'abatalina magezi kulibatta, N'okulaba omukisa okw'abasirusiru kulibazikiriza. 
20_1_33_Naye buli anaawuliranga nze anaabeeranga mirembe, Era anaatereeranga nga tewali kutya kabi. 
20_2_1_Mwana wange, bw'onokkirizanga ebigambo byange, N'oterekanga ebiragiro byange ewuwo 
20_2_4_Bw'onooganoonyanga nga ffeeza, N'ogakenneenyanga ng'eby'obugagga ebyakwekebwa 
20_2_6_Kubanga Mukama awa amagezi; Mu kamwa ke mwe mufuluma okumanya n'okutegeera: 
20_2_7_Aterekera abagolokofu amagezi amatuufu, Aba ngabo eri abo abatambulira mu butayonoona 
20_2_9_Kale lw'olitegeera obutuukirivu n'omusango, N'eby'ensonga, weewaawo buli kkubo eddungi. 
20_2_10_Kubanga amagezi ganaayingiranga mu mutima gwo, N'okumanya kunaawoomeranga emmeeme yo; 
20_2_11_Okuteesa kunaakulabiriranga. Okutegeera kunaakukuumanga: 
20_2_12_Okukuwonyanga mu kkubo ery'obubi, Eri abasajja aboogera eby'ekyejo; 
20_2_13_Abaleka amakubo ag'obugolokofu, Okutambuliranga mu makubo ag'ekizikiza; 
20_2_14_Abasanyuka okukola obubi, N'ekyejo eky'omubi kye kibawoomera; 
20_2_15_Amakubo gaabwe makyamukyamu, N'okugenda kwabwe kwenyoolanyoola: 
20_2_16_Okukuwonyanga eri omukazi omugenyi, Eri omugenyi anyumiriza n'ebigambo bye; 
20_2_17_Aleka omukwano ogw'omu buto bwe, Ne yeerabira endagaano ya Katonda we: 
20_2_18_Kubanga ennyumba ye etwala mu kufa, N'amakubo ge eri abafu: 
20_2_19_Tewali abagenda gy'ali abadda nate, So tebatuuka mu makubo ag'obulamu: 
20_2_20_Olyoke otambulirenga mu kkubo ery'abasajja abalungi, N'okwata empenda ez'abatuukirivu. 
20_2_21_Kubanga abagolokofu banaabeeranga mu nsi, N'abo abatuukirira balisigala omwo. 
20_2_22_Naye ababi balimalibwawo okuva mu nsi, N'abo abasala enkwe balisimbulirwamu ddala. 
20_3_1_Mwana wange, teweerabiranga tteekalyange; Naye omutima gwo gukwatenga ebiragiro byange 
20_3_3_Okusaasira n'amazima tebikulekanga: Bisibenga mu bulago bwo; Biwandiikenga ku bipande eby'omutima gwo: 
20_3_4_Bw'onoolabanga bw'otyo okuganja n'okutegeera okulungi Mu maaso ga Katonda n'ag'abantu. 
20_3_5_Weesigenga Mukama n'omutima gwo gwonna. So teweesigamanga ku kutegeera kwo ggwe: 
20_3_6_Mwatulenga mu makubo go gonna, Kale anaaluŋŋamyanga olugendo lwo. 
20_3_7_Tobanga na magezi mu maaso go ggwe; Tyanga, Mukama ove mu bubi: 
20_3_8_Ekyo kye kinaabanga obulamu eri ekkundi lyo, N'obusomyo eri amagumba go. 
20_3_9_Ossangamu ekitiibwa Mukama n'ebintu byo, N'ebibereberye ku bibala byo byonna: 
20_3_10_Amawanika go bwe ganajjulanga bwe garyo ekyengera, N'amasogolero go ganaayiikanga omwenge omusu. 
20_3_11_Mwana wange, tonyoomanga kubuulirira kwa Mukama; So n'okunenya kwe kulemenga okukukooya: 
20_3_12_Kubanga Mukama gw'ayagala gw'anenya; Era nga kitaawe omwana we gw'asanyukira. 
20_3_13_Aweereddwa omukisa omuntu alaba amagezi. N'oyo afuna okutegeera. 
20_3_14_Kubanga obuguzi bwago businga obuguzi obwa ffeeza, N'amagoba gaago gakira zaabu ennungi. 
20_3_15_Ga muwendo mungi okusinga amayinja amatwakaavu: So tewali kintu ky'oyinza okwegomba ebyenkanyankanyizibwa nago. 
20_3_16_Okuwangaala kuli mu mukono gwago ogwa ddyo; Mu mukono gwago ogwa kkono mulimu obugagga n'ekitiibwa. 
20_3_17_Amakubo gaago makubo ga kusanyukiramu, N'eŋŋendo zaago zonna mirembe. 
20_3_18_Ago gwe muti ogw'obulamu eri abo abagakwata: Era alina omukisa buli muntu abeera nago. 
20_3_19_Mukama yassaawo emisingi gy'ensi n'amagezi; Yanyweza eggulu n'okutegeera. 
20_3_20_Ennyanja yayabika n'okumanya kwe, Eggulu ne litonnya omusulo. 
20_3_21_Mwana wange, ebyo tebivanga ku maaso go; Kwatanga amagezi amatuufu n'okuteesa; 
20_3_22_Bwe binaabanga bwe bityo obulamu eri emmeeme yo, N'obuyonjo eri obulago bwo. 
20_3_23_Awo lw'olitambulira mu kkubo lyo mirembe, So n'ekigere kyo tekiryesittala 
20_3_24_Bw'onoogalamiranga tootyenga: Weewaawo, onoogalamiranga n'otulo two tunaakuwoomeranga. 
20_3_25_Totyanga ntiisa gy'otomanyiridde, Newakubadde okuzikiriza okw'ababi bwe kujjanga: 
20_3_26_Kubanga Mukama ye anaabanga obwesige bwo, Era ye anaakuumanga ekigere kyo olemenga okuwambibwa 
20_3_27_Tommanga birungi abo abagwanira, Bwe kiri mu buyinza bw'omukono gwo okubikola. 
20_3_28_Togambanga muliraanwa wo nti Genda okomewo, Enkya ndikuwa; Bwe kiri naawe. 
20_3_29_Tosaliranga munno bubi, Kubanga abeera gy'oli mirembe 
20_3_30_Toyombanga na muntu awatali nsonga, Oba nga taliiko bubi bw'akukoze. 
20_3_31_Tokwatirwanga buggya omusajja ow'amawaggali, So teweerobozanga makubo ge gonna. 
20_3_32_Kubanga omukyamu wa muzizo eri Mukama: Naye ekyama kye kiri n'abagolokofu. 
20_3_33_Ekikolimo kya Mukama kiri mu nnyumba ey'omubi: Naye awa omukisa ekifo abatuukirivu mwe babeera. 
20_3_34_Mazima anyooma abanyoomi, Naye awa abeetoowaza ekisa. 
20_3_35_Ab'amagezi balisikira ekitiibwa: Naye ensonyi ze ziriba okukuzibwa okw'abasirusiru. 
20_4_1_Baana bange, muwulirenga okuyigiriza kwa kitammwe, Mutegenga amatu okumanya okutegeera: 
20_4_2_Kubanga mbawa okuyiga okulungi; Temuvanga mu tteka lyange. 
20_4_3_Kubanga nali mwana eri kitange, Omugonvu era eyayagalibwanga nzekka mu maaso ga mmange. 
20_4_4_Era yanjigirizanga n'aŋŋamba nti Omutima gwo gunywezenga ebigambo byange; Kwatanga ebiragiro byange obeerenga omulamu: 
20_4_5_Funa amagezi, funa okutegeera; Togeerabiranga so tovanga mu bigambo eby'omu kamwa kange: 
20_4_6_Togalekanga, nago ganaakukuumanga; Ogaagalanga nago ganaakulindanga. 
20_4_7_Togalekanga, nago ganaakukuumanga; Ogaagalanga nago ganaakulindanga. 
20_4_8_Gagulumizenga nago galikukuza: Galikutuusa mu kitiibwa, bw'onoogawambaatiranga. 
20_4_9_Galiwa omutwe gwo engule ey'obuyonjo: Galikugabira enkuufiira ey'obulungi. 
20_4_10_Ai mwana wange, wulira okkirizenga ebigambo byange; N'emyaka egy'obulamu bwo giriba mingi. 
20_4_11_Naakuyigiriza ekkubo ery'amagezi; Naakuluŋŋamya mu makubo ag'obugolokofu. 
20_4_12_Bw'onootambulanga ebigere byo tebiifundikirwenga; Era bw'onoddukanga teweesittalenga. 
20_4_13_Nywerezanga ddala okuyigirizibwa; tokutanga: Kukwatenga; kubanga bwe bulamu bwo. 
20_4_14_Toyingiranga mu kkubo ery'ababi, So totambuliranga mu lugendo olw'abasajja ababi. 
20_4_15_Olwesambanga, toluyitangako; Okyukanga okuluvaamu, weeyongerenga mu maaso. 
20_4_16_Kubanga tebeebaka wabula nga bamaze okukola akabi; N'otulo tubaggibwako wabula nga baliko be bagwisizza. 
20_4_17_Kubanga balya emmere ey'obubi, Ne banywa omwenge ogw'okugira ekyejo. 
20_4_18_Naye ekkubo ery'abatuukirivu liriŋŋanga omusana ogwakayakana, Ogweyongerayongera okwaka okutuusa obudde lwe butuukirira. 
20_4_19_Ekkubo ery'ababi liriŋŋanga ekizikiza: Tebamanyi ekibeesittaza. 
20_4_20_Mwana wange, ssangayo omwoyo eri ebigambo byange; Teganga okutu eri okwogera kwange. 
20_4_21_Tebivanga ku maaso go; Bikuumirenga wakati mu mutima gwo. 
20_4_22_Kubanga ebyo bwe bulamu eri abo ababiraba, Era kwe kulama eri omubiri gwabwe gwonna. 
20_4_23_Onyiikiranga nnyo nnyini okukuumanga omutima gwo; Kubanga omwo mwe muva ensulo ez'obulamu. 
20_4_24_Weggyengako akamwa akabambaavu, N'emimwa emikyamu ogyewalanga nnyo. 
20_4_25_Amaaso go galuŋŋamirenga ddala, N'ebikowe byo bitunuulirenga ddala emberi yo. 
20_4_26_Tereezanga ekkubo ery'ebigere byo, Era amagenda go gonna ganywerenga. 
20_4_27_Tokyamiranga ku mukono ogwa ddyo newakubadde ku gwa kkono: Ggyawo ekigere kyo obutakola bubi. 
20_5_1_Mwana wange, ssangayo omwoyo eri amagezi gange; Teganga okutu eri okutegeera kwange: 
20_5_2_Olyoke okuumenga okuteesa, N'emimwa gyo gikwatenga okumanya. 
20_5_3_Kubanga emimwa gy'omukazi omugenyi gitonnya omubisi gw'enjuki, N'akamwa ke kasinga amafuta obugonvu: 
20_5_4_Naye enkomerero ey'oluvannyuma ekaawa ng'omususa, Esala ng'ekitala eky'obwogi obubiri. 
20_5_5_Ebigere bye bikka mu kufa; Ebisinde bye bikwata amagombe 
20_5_7_Kale nno, baana bange, mumpulirenga, So temuvanga mu bigambo eby'omu kamwa kange. 
20_5_8_Ekkubo lyo limwesambire ddala, So tosembereranga luggi lwa nnyumba ye: 
20_5_9_Olemenga okuwa abalala ekitiibwa kyo, N'emyaka gyo eri omukambwe. 
20_5_10_Abagenyi balemenga okukkuta amaanyi go; N'emirimu gyo giremenga okubeera mu nnyumba y'omunnaggwanga; 
20_5_11_Naawe n'onakuwala enkomerero yo ng'etuuse Ennyama yo n'omubiri gwo bwe birimalibwawo, 
20_5_12_N'oyogera nti Nga nakyawanga okuyigirizibwa, Omutima gwange ne gunyoomanga okunenyezebwa; 
20_5_13_So saagonderanga ddoboozi lya bayigiriza bange, So saateganga kutu kwange eri abo abanjigirizanga! 
20_5_14_Nabulako katono okuba mu bubi bwonna Wakati mu kkuŋŋaaniro n'ekibiina. 
20_5_15_Onyweranga amazzi mu kidiba kyo ggwe, N'amazzi agakulukuta mu luzzi lwo ggwe. 
20_5_16_Ensulo zo zandisaasaanidde ddala, Emigga egy'amazzi ne giba mu nguudo? 
20_5_17_Gabeereranga ddala gago wekka, So si ga bagenyi wamu naawe. 
20_5_18_Ensulo yo ebeerenga n'omukisa; Era sanyukiranga omukazi ow'omu buvubuka bwo. 
20_5_19_Ng'ennangaazi ekwagala n'empeewo ekusanyusa, Amabeere ge gakumalenga mu biro byonna; okwebaka: Era osanyukirenga bulijjo okwagala kwe. 
20_5_20_Kubanga lwaki ggwe okusanyukiranga omukazi omugenyi, mwana wange, N'ogwa mu kifuba ky'atali wuwo? 
20_5_21_Kubanga amakubo g'abantu gali mu maaso ga Mukama, Era atereeza eŋŋendo ze zonna. 
20_5_22_Obutali butuukirivu bwe ye bulikwata omubi, Era alisibibwa n'emigwa egy'o kwonoona kwe, 
20_5_23_Alifa olw'okubulwa okuyigirizi bwa; Era olw'obusirusiru bwe obungi aliwaba. 
20_6_1_Mwana wange, oba nga weeyimirira muliraanwa wo, N'okubira omugenyi mungalo, 
20_6_2_Ebigambo eby'omu kamwa ko bikukwasizza, Ebigambo eby'omu kamwa ko bikuteze. 
20_6_3_Kale nno, mwana wange, kola kino weerokole, Kubanga ogudde mu mukono gwa muliraanwa wo; Genda weetoowaze otayirire muliraanwa wo. 
20_6_4_Toganyanga maaso go kwebaka Newakubadde ebikowe byo okubongoota. 
20_6_5_Weerokole ng'empeewo bw'eva mu mukono gw'omuyizzi, Era ng'ennyonyi bw'eva mu mukono gw'omutezi. 
20_6_6_Genda eri enkolooto, ggwe omugayaavu; Lowooza empisa zaayo obeerenga n'amagezi: 
20_6_7_Eyo terina mwami, Newakubadde omulabirizi newakubadde afuga, 
20_6_8_Naye ne yeeterekera ebyayo ebyokulya mu biro eby'okukunguliramu, N'ekuŋŋaanya emmere yaayo mu mwaka. 
20_6_9_Naye ne yeeterekera ebyayo ebyokulya mu biro eby'okukunguliramu, N'ekuŋŋaanya emmere yaayo mu mwaka. 
20_6_10_Wakyaliwo okwebaka okutono n'okubongoota okutono, N'okufunya emikono okutono okwebaka: 
20_6_11_Bwe kityo obwavu bwo bulijja ng'omunyazi, N'okwetaaga kwo ng'omusajja akutte ebyokulwanyisa. 
20_6_12_Omuntu ataliiko ky'agasa, omusajja ow'obutali butuukirivu; Atambula ng'alina akamwa akabambaavu; 
20_6_13_Atemya amaaso, ayogeza bigere bye, Abagula n'engalo ze; 
20_6_14_Obubambaavu buli mu mutima gwe, asala obubi olutata; Asiga okukyawagana nga tamanyiridde; 
20_6_15_Ennaku z'aliraba kyeziriva zijja nga tamanyiridde; Amangu ago alimenyeka, awatali kuwonyezebwa. 
20_6_16_Waliwo ebigambo mukaaga Mukama by'akyawa; Weewaawo, musanvu bya mu zizo gy'ali: 
20_6_17_Amaaso ag'amalala, olulimi olulimba, N'engalo eziyiwa omusaayi ogutaliiko musango; 
20_6_18_Omutima oguyunja ebirowoozo ebibi, Ebigere ebyanguwa embiro okugoberera ettima; 
20_6_19_Omujulirwa w'obulimba ayogera eby'obulimba, N'oyo asiga okukyawagana mu b'oluganda. 
20_6_20_Mwana wange, okwatanga ekiragiro kya kitaawo, So tolekanga tteeka lya nnyoko: 
20_6_21_Bisibenga ennaku zonna ku mutima gwo, Binywenga mu bulago bwo. 
20_6_22_Bw'onootambulanga, linaakukulemberanga; Bw'oneebakanga, linaakukuumanga: Era bw'onoozuukukanga, linaayogeranga naawe. 
20_6_23_Kubanga areeka ttabaaza; ekiragiro musana; N'okunenya kw'oyo akuyigiriza lye kkubo ery'obulamu: 
20_6_24_Okukuumanga eri omukazi omubi, Eri onyumiriza kw'olulimi lw'omugenyi. 
20_6_25_Teweegombanga bulungi bwe mu mutima gwo; So n'ebikowe bye biremenga okukukwasa. 
20_6_26_Kubanga olw'omukazi omwenzi omuntu afuuka mmere bumere: N'omukazi omwenzi ayigga obulamu obw'omuwendo omungi. 
20_6_27_Omuntu ayima okuwambaatira omuliro mu kifuba kye, Ebyambalo bye ne bitaggya? 
20_6_28_Oba omuntu ayinza okutambulira ku manda agookya, Ebigere bye ne bitasiriira? 
20_6_29_Bw'atyo bw'abeera ayingira eri omukazi wa munne; Buli amukomako talirema kubonerezebwa. 
20_6_30_Abantu tebanyooma mubbi oba ng'abba Okukkusa emmeeme ye ng'alumiddwa enjala: 
20_6_31_Naye bw'anaalabikanga, anaagattanga emirundi musanvu; Anaawangayo ebintu byonna eby'omu nnyumba ye. 
20_6_32_Ayenda ku mukazi talina kutegeera: Ayagala okuzikiriza obulamu bwe ye ye akola bw'atyo. 
20_6_33_Alifuna ebiwundu a'okunyoomebwa; N'ekivume kye tekirisaagulibwa. 
20_6_34_Kubanga obuggya kye kiruyi ky'omusajja; So talisaasira ku lunaku olw'okuwalanirako eggwanga. 
20_6_35_Talissaayo mwoyo eri ekinunulo kyoana; So tslinyiigulukuka newakubadde ng'owa ebirabo ebingi. 
20_7_1_Mwana wange, okwatanga ebigambo byange, Oterekanga ebiragiro byange ewuwo. 
20_7_2_Okwatanga ebiragiro byange obeerenga omulamu; N'etteeka lyange ng'emmunye ey'eriiso lyo. 
20_7_3_Bisibenga ku mukono gwo; Biwandiikenga ku bipande eby'omutima gwo. 
20_7_4_Gambanga amagezi nti Ggwe mwannyinaze; Oyitenga okutegeera ow'ekika kyammwe: 
20_7_5_Bikukuumenga eri omukazi omugenyi, Eri omugenyi anyumiriza n'ebigambo bye. 
20_7_6_Kubanga nalingiza mu ddirisa ery'ennyumba yange Mu mulimu omuluke ogw'omu ddirisa 
20_7_8_Ng'ayita mu luguudo kumpi ku mugguukiriro gwe, N'agenda mu kkubo eridda mu nnyumba ye 
20_7_10_Kale, laba, ne wamusisinkana omukazi Ng'ayambadde ebyambalo eby'omwenzi, era ow'omutima omugerengetanya. 
20_7_11_Muyombi era mukakanyavu; Ebigere bye tebibeera mu nnyumba ye: 
20_7_12_Oluusi aba mu nguudo, oluusi mu bifo ebigazi, Era ateegera ku buli mugguukiriro. 
20_7_13_Awo n'amukwata n'amunywegera, N'amugamba ng'amusimbye amaaso nti 
20_7_14_Ssaddaaka ez'ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe ziri wange; Leero mmaze okusasula obweyamo bwange. 
20_7_15_Kyenvudde nfuluma okukusisinkana, Okunyiikira okunoonya amaaso go, era nkulabye. 
20_7_16_Njaze ekitanda kyange n'amagodooli, N'engoye ez'amakuubo eza ppamba w’e Misiri. 
20_7_17_Mpunyisizza bulungi ekiriri kyange N'obubaane n'omugavu n'eby'akaloosa. 
20_7_18_Jjangu tukkute okwagala okukeesa obudde; Twesanyuse n'okwagala. 
20_7_19_Kubanga baze tali ka, Yatambula lugendo lwa wala: 
20_7_20_Yagenda ng'atwala ensawo eya ffeeza; Alikomawo omwezi nga gwa ggabogabo. 
20_7_21_Amukkirizisa n'ebigambo bye ebirungi bingi, Amuwaliriza okugenda n'okwegonza okw'emimwa gye. 
20_7_22_Amangu ago agenda amugobeberera, Ng'ente bw'egenda okusalibwa, Oba ng'amasamba bwe gagenda okukangavvula omusirusiru; 
20_7_23_Okutuusa akasaale lwe kalifumita ekibumba kye; Ng'ennyonyi bw'eyanguwa okugwa mu kyambika, So tamanyi ng'alifiirwa obulamu bwe. 
20_7_24_Kale nno, baana bange, mumpulirenga, Era mussengayo omwoyo eri ebigambo eby'omu kamwa kange. 
20_7_25_Omutima gwo tegukyamiranga mu makubo ge, Towabiranga mu mpenda ze. 
20_7_26_Kubanga yasuula bangi nga bafumitiddwa ebiwundu: Weewaawo, ababe abattibwa ggye ddene. 
20_7_27_Ennyumba ye lye kkubo lyennyini eridda mu magombe. Nga likka mu bisenge eby'okufa. 
20_8_1_Amagezi tegoogerera waggulu N'okutegeera tekuleeta ddoboozi lyakwo? 
20_8_2_Enguudo we zisibuka mu kkubo Mu masatjganzira we gayimirira 
20_8_4_Mmwe abasajja, mbakoowoola; N'eddoboozi lyange liri eri abaana b'abantu. 
20_8_5_Mmwe abatalina magezi, mutegeerenga obukabakaba; Nammwe, abasirusiru, mubeerenga n'omutima ogutegeera. 
20_8_6_Muwulire, kubanga naayogera ebigambo ebirungi ennyo; N'okwasama emimwa gyange kunaavaamu eby'ensonga. 
20_8_7_Kubanga akamwa kange kanaayogera eby'amazima; N'obubi bwa muzizo eri emimwa gyange. 
20_8_8_Ebigambo byonna eby'omu kamwa kange biri mu butuukirivu byo temuli kintu ekikyamakyama newakubadde ekyenyodde. 
20_8_9_Byonna byangu eri oyo ategeera, Era bya nsonga eri abo abalaba okumanya. 
20_8_10_Mukkirize okuyigiriza kwange so si ffeeza; N'okumanya okukira zaabu ennonde. 
20_8_11_Kubanga amagezi gasinga amayinja amatwakaavu; N'ebintu byonna ebiyinzika okwegombebwa tebyenkanyankanyizibwa nago. 
20_8_12_Nze amagezi nfudde obukabakaba okuba ennyumba yange Era nnoonya okumanya n'okuteesa. 
20_8_13_Okutya Mukama kwe kukyawa obubi; Amalala n'essukuti n'ekkubo ebbi N'akamwa akabambaavu bye nkyawa. 
20_8_14_Okuteesa kwange n'okumanya okutuufu: Nze ndi kutegeera; nnina amaanyi. 
20_8_15_Ku bwange bakabaka bafuga, Abalangira ne bateeka eby'obutuukiruvu. 
20_8_16_Ku bwange abalangira bafuga, N'abakungu, abalamuzi bonna ab'oku nsi: 
20_8_17_Njagala abo abanjagala; N’abo abanyiikira okunnoonya balindaba. 
20_8_18_Obugagga n’ekitiibwa biri nange; Wewaawo, obugagga obwe’enkalakkalira n’obutuukirivu. 
20_8_19_Ebibala byange bisinga zaabu obulungi, weewaawo, zaabu ennungi; N'amagoba gange gakira ffeeza ennonde. 
20_8_20_Ntambulira mu kkubo ery'obutuukirivu, Wakati mu mpenda ez'okusala emisango: 
20_8_21_Ndyoke mpe abo abanjagala okusikira ebintu, Era njijuze amawanika gaabwe. 
20_8_22_Mukama yali nange ekkubo lye we lyasookera, Okusooka emirimu gye egy'edda. 
20_8_23_Nateekebwawo okuva emirembe n'emirembe, okuva ku lubereberye, Ensi nga tennabaawo. 
20_8_24_Nga tewannabaawo buziba, nazaalibwa; Ensulo ezijjudde amazzi nga tezinnabaawo. 
20_8_25_Ensozi nga tezinnaba kussibwawo, Nasooka obusozi okuzaalibwa: 
20_8_26_Ye nga tannatonda nsi newakubadde ennimiro, Newakubadde enfuufu ey'ensi eyasooka. 
20_8_27_Bwe yanyweza eggulu, nze naliyo: Bwe yakulunga amaaso g'obuziba: 
20_8_28_Bwe yanyweza eggulu waggulu: Ensulo ez'ennyanja bwe zaafuuka ez'amaanyi: omubi yeetonnyezaako ebbala. 
20_8_29_Bwe yawa ennyanja ensalo yaayo, Amazzi galemenga okusobya ekiragiro kye: Bwe yalamba emisingi gy'ensi: 
20_8_30_Kale nze nga ndi awo gy'ali ng'omukoza: Era bulijjo yansanyukiranga, Nga njaguliza bulijjo mu maaso ge; 
20_8_31_Nga nsanyukira ensi ye ebeerekamu; N'essanyu lyange lyali n'abaana b'abantu. 
20_8_32_Kale nno, baana bange, mumpulirenga: Kubanga balina omukisa abakwata amakubo gange. 
20_8_33_Muwulirenga okuyigirizibwa mubenga n’amagezi, So temugagaananga. 
20_8_34_Alina omukisa omunt ampulira, Ng'atunuulira bulijjo ku nzigi zange, Ng'alinda awali emifuubeeto gy'enzigi zange. 
20_8_35_Kubanga buli alaba nze alaba bulamu, Era alifuna okuganja eri Mukama. 
20_8_36_Naye oyo annyonoona asobya obulamu bwe ye: Bonna abakyawa nze baagala okufa. 
20_9_1_Amagezi gazimbye ennyumba yaago, Gatemye empagi zaago musanvu: 
20_9_2_Gasse ensolo zaago; gatabudde omwenge gwago; Era gategese emmeeza yaago. 
20_9_3_Gasindise abawala baago, googerera waggulu. Ku bifo eby'omu kibuga ebisinga obugulumivu, 
20_9_4_Nti Buli atalina magezi akyamire muno: Oyo abulwa okutegeera gamugamba nti 
20_9_5_Mujje mulye ku mmere yange, Era munywe ku mwenge gwe ntabudde. 
20_9_6_Mulekenga, mmwe abatalina magezi, mubeerenga abalamu; Era mutambulirenga mu kkubo ery'okutegeera. 
20_9_7_Anenya omukudaazi yeeswaza: N'oyo abuulirira omubi yeetonnyezaako ebbala. 
20_9_8_Tobuuliriranga mukudaazi aleme okukukyawa: Buuliriranga ow'amagezi, anaakwagalanga. 
20_9_9_Yigirizanga ow'amagezi, aneeyongeranga okuba n'amagezi: Yigirizanga omutuukirivu, aneeyongeranga okuyita. 
20_9_10_Mu kutya Mukama amagezi mwe gasookera: N'okumanya oyo Omutukuvu kwe kutegeera. 
20_9_11_Kubanga ku bwange ennaku zo ziryongerwa, N’emyaka egy’obulamu bwo girisukkirizibwa. 
20_9_12_Oba nga olina amagezi, weebeera n’amagezi wekka: Era bw’onoonyoomanga, kuliba ku ggwe wekka. 
20_9_13_Omukazi omusirisiru aleekaana; Talina magezi, so taliiko ky'amanyi. 
20_9_14_Era atuula ku mulyango gw'ennyumba ye, Ku ntebe mu bifo eby'omu kibuga ebigulumivu, 
20_9_15_Okuyita abo abayitawo, Abakwatira ddala amakubo gaabwe, 
20_9_16_Nti Buli atalina magezi akyamire muno: N'oyo abulwa okutegeera amugamba nti 
20_9_17_Amazzi amabbe ge gawooma, N'emmere eriirwa mu kyama ye esanyusa. 
20_9_18_Naye tamanyi ng'abafu bali eyo: Ng'abagenyi be bali mu buziba bw'emagombe. 
20_10_1_Engero za Sulemaani. Omwana ow'amagezi asanyusa kitaawe: Naye omwana omusirusiru anakuwaza nnyina. 
20_10_2_Obugagga obw'obubi tebuliiko kye bugasa: Naye obutuukirivu buwonya mu kufa. 
20_10_3_Mukama taalekenga mmeeme ya mutuukirivu okufa enjala: Naye okwegomba kw'ababi akusindika eri. 
20_10_4_Ayavuwala oyo akola n'omukono oguddiridde: Naye omukono gw'abanyiikivu guleeta obugagga. 
20_10_5_Akungulira mu kyeya mwana wa magezi: Naye oyo eyeebakira mu biro eby'okukunguliramu ye mwana akwasa ensonyi. 
20_10_6_Emikisa giba ku mutwe gw'omutuukirivu: Naye ekyejo kibikka ku kamwa k'ababi. 
20_10_7_Ekijjukizo ky'omutuukirivu kirina omukisa: Naye erinnya ly'ababi lirivunda. 
20_10_8_Alina omutima ogw'amagezi anakkirizanga ebiragiro: Naye omubuyabuya aligwa. 
20_10_9_Atambulira mu bugolokofu ye atambula emirembe: Naye akyamya amakubo ge alimanyibwa. 
20_10_10_Atemya eriiso eleeta ennaku: Naye omusirusiru omubuyabuya aligwa. 
20_10_11_Akamwa k'omutuukirivu nsulo ya bulama: Naye ekyejo kibikka ku kamwa k'ababi. 
20_10_12_Okukyawa kuleeta ennyombo: Naye okwagala kubikka ku byoaoono byonna. 
20_10_13_Mu mimwa gy'oyo alina okwawula mulabikamu amagezi: Naye omuggo gwa mabega g'oyo abulwa okutegeera. 
20_10_14_Ab'amagezi batereka okutnanya: Naye akamwa k'omusirusiru kwe kuzikirira okutavaawo. 
20_10_15_Ebintu eby'omugagga kye kibuga kye eky'amaanyi: Abaavu okuzikirira kwabwe bwavu bwabwe. 
20_10_16_Omulimu ogw'omutuukirivu guleeta bulamu; Ekyengera eky'omubi kireeta kwonoona. 
20_10_17_Oyo ali mn kkubo ery'obulamu assaayo omwoyo eri okubuulirirwa: Naye oyo aleka okunenyezebwa akyama. 
20_10_18_Oyo akisa okukyawa wa mimwa gya bulimba; N'oyo awaayiriza musirusiru. 
20_10_19_Mu lufulube lw'ebigambo tomubula kusobya: Naye oyo aziyiza emimwa gye akola eby'amagezi. 
20_10_20_Olulimi lw'omutuukirivu ffeeza nnonde: Omutima gw'ababi tegugasa nnyo. 
20_10_21_Emimwa gy'omutuukiriw giriisa bangi: Naye abasirusiru bafa olw'okubulwa okutegeera. 
20_10_22_Omukisa gwa Mukama gwe gugaggawaza, So tagatta buyinike bwonna wamu nagwo. 
20_10_23_Okukola obubi muzannyo gwa musirusiru: Era bwe gatyo amagezi bwe gabeera eri omuntu alina okutegeera. 
20_10_24_Omubi ky'arya kirimujjira: N'ekyo abatuukirivu kye beegomba balikiweebwa. 
20_10_25_Empewo ez'akazimu bwe ziyita, kale omubi nga takyaliwo: Naye omutuukirivu musingi gwa lubeerera. 
20_10_26_Ng'omwenge omukaatuufu bwe gugira amannyo, era ng'omukka bwe gugira amaaso, N'omugayaavu bw'agira bw'atyo abo abamutuma. 
20_10_27_Okutya Mukama kuwangaaza: Naye emyaka gy'ababi girisalibwako. 
20_10_28_Essuubi ery'abatuukirivu liriba ssanyu: Naye okusuubira kw'ababi kulizikirira. 
20_10_29_Ekkubo lya Mukama kigo eri omugolokofu; Naye kuzikirira eri abo abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu. 
20_10_30_Omutuukirivu tajjululwenga ennaku zonna: Naye ababi tebalibeera mu nsi. 
20_10_31_Akamwa k'omutuukirivu kazaala amagazi: Naye olulimi olubambaavu lulimalibwawo. 
20_10_32_Emimwa gy'omutuukirivu gigaanyi ebikkirizibwa: Naye omumwa gw'ababi gwogera bubambaavu. 
20_11_1_Eminzaani ey'obulimba ya muzizo eri Mukama: Naye ekipima ekituufu ky'asanyukira. 
20_11_2_Amalala lwe gajja, lwe wajja n'ensonyi: Naye amagezi gaba n'abeetoowaza. 
20_11_3_Obutayonoona obw'abagolokofu bulibaluŋŋamya: Naye obubambaavu bw'abo abasala enkwe bulibazikiriza. 
20_11_4_Obugagga tebuliiko kye bugasa ku lunaku olw'obusungu: Naye obutuukirivu buwonya mu kufa. 
20_11_5_Obutuukirivu bw'oyo eyatuukirira bunaaluŋŋamyanga ekkubo lye: Naye omubi aligwa olw'obubi bwe ye. 
20_11_6_Obutuukirivu obw'abagolokofu bulibawonya: Abo abasala enkwe balikwasibwa n'ettima lyabwe bo. 
20_11_7_Omuntu omubi bw'afanga, okusuubira kwe kuzikiriranga: N'essuubi ery'obutali butuukikirivu libula. 
20_11_8_Omutuukirivu awonyezebwa mu nnaku, Omubi n'adda mu kifo kye. 
20_11_9_Atamanyi Katonda azikiriza munne n'akamwa ke: Naye abatuukirivu baliwonyezebwa olw'okumanya. 
20_11_10_Abatuukirivu bwe balaba ebitvngi, ekibuga kisanyuka: Era ababi bwe babula, wabaawo okuleekaana. 
20_11_11_Omukisa ogw'abagolokofu gwe gugulumiza ekibuga: Naye akamwa k'ababi ke kakisuula. 
20_11_12_Anyooma munne abulwa amagezi: Naye omuntu alina okutegeeta asirika. 
20_11_13_Atambulatambula ng'alyolyptna abikkula ebyama: Naye oyo alina omwoyo omwesigwa akisa ekigambo. 
20_11_14_Okuluŋŋamya okw'amagezi nga kubuze, abantu bagwa: Naye mu bateesa ebigambo abangi mwe muli emirembe. 
20_11_15_Eyeeyimirira oyo gw'atamanyi alibalagalwa: Naye akyawa obuyima anaabanga wa nkalakkalira. 
20_11_16_Omukazi ow'ekisa aguguba n'ekitiibwa: N'abasajja ab'amawaggali baguguba n'obugagga. 
20_11_17_Asaasira akola bulungi emmeeme ye ye: Naye omukambwe ateganya omubiri gwe ye. 
20_11_18_Omubi afuna empeera emulimbalimba: Naye oyo asiga obutuukirivu aba n'empeera ey'enkalakkalira. 
20_11_19_Anywerera mu butuukirivu ye alituuka mu bulamu: N'oyo agoberera obubi yetta yekka. 
20_11_20_Abo abalina omutima omukyamu ba muzizo eri Mukama: Naye abo abalina ekkubo eryatuukirira b'asanyukira. 
20_11_21_Omukono newakubadde nga gwegatta n'omukono, omuntu omubi taliwona kubonerezebwa: Naye ezzadde ery'abatuukirivu liriwonyezebwa. 
20_11_22_Ng'ekyobuyonjo ekya zaabu ekiri mu nnyindo y'embizzi, Bw'atyo bw'abeera omukazi omulungi atalina kuteesa. 
20_11_23_Abatuukirivu kye beegomba birungi bisa: Naye ababi kye basuubira busungu. 
20_11_24_Wabaawo asaasaanya ne yeeyongera nate okwala; Era wabaawo akodowala okusinga bwe kigwana, naye kireeta kwetaaga bwetaazi. 
20_11_25_Emmeeme egabagaba eneegejjanga: N'oyo afukirira amazzi, naye alifukirirwa yennyini. 
20_11_26_Amma eŋŋaano, abantu balimukolimira: Naye omukisa gunaabanga ku mutwe gw'oyo agitunda. 
20_11_27_Anyiikira okunoonyanga ebirungi, anoonyanga n'okuganja: Naye akenneenya ettima, linaamujjiranga. 
20_11_28_Eyeesiga obugagga bwe aligwa: Naye abatuukirivu banaayeranga ng'amalagala amabisi. 
20_11_29_Ateganya ennyumba ye ye alisikira empewo: N'omusirisuru aliba muddu w'oyo alina omutima ogw'amagezi. 
20_11_30_Ebibala by'omutuukirivu muti gwa bulamu: N'oyo alina amagezi afuna emmeeme z'abantu. 
20_11_31_Laba, omutuukirivu aliweebwa empeera mu nsi: Omubi n'omwonoonyi tebalisinga nnyo? 
20_12_1_Ayagala okubuulirirwa ayagala okumanya: Naye oyo akyawa okunenyezebwa aliŋŋanga ensolo. 
20_12_2_Omuntu omulungi anaaweebwanga Mukama ekisa: Naye omuntu ow'enkwe embi alimusalira omusango okumusinga. 
20_12_3_Omuntu taanywezebwenga lwa bubi: Naye emmizi gy'abatuukirivu tegijjululwenga ennaku zonna. 
20_12_4_Omukazi eyeegendereza ngule eri bba: Naye aswaza kivundu mu magumba ge. 
20_12_5_Ebirowoozo eby'abatuukirivu bya nsonga: Naye ababi bye bateesa bulimba. 
20_12_6_Ebigambo eby'ababi bya kutega musaayi: Naye akamwa k'abagolokofu kalibawonya. 
20_12_7_Ababi bameggebwa ne babula: Naye ennyumba ey'abatuukirivu eriyimirira. 
20_12_8_Omuntu alisiimibwa ng'amagezi ge bwe gali: Naye oyo alina omutima omukyamu alinyoomebwa. 
20_12_9_Oyo atayitibwa ka buntu, era alina omuddu, Asinga oyo eyessaamu ekitiibwa era abulwa eby'okulya. 
20_12_10_Omuntu omutuukirivu alowooza obulamu bw'ensolo ye: Naye okusaasira kw'ababi kukambwe. 
20_12_11_Alima ensi ye aliba n'emmere nnyingi: Naye agoberera abataliiko kye bagasa abuliddwa okutegeera. 
20_12_12_Omubi yeegomba ekitimba ky'abasajja ab'ekyejo: Naye ekikolo eky'abatuukirivu kibala ebibala. 
20_12_13_Mu kusobya kw'emimwa mulimu ekyambika eri omuntu ow'ekyejo: 
20_12_14_Omuntu alikkuta ebirungi olw'ebibala eby'akamwa ke: N'ebikolwa eby'emikono gy'omuntu alibisasulibwa. 
20_12_15_Ekkubo ery'omusirusiru ddungi mu maaso ge ye: Naye ow'amagezi awulira okuweererwa ebigambo. 
20_12_17_Ayatula eby'amazima ayolesa obutuukirivu, Naye omujulirwa ow'obulimba ayolesa obukuusa. 
20_12_18_Wabaawo ayogera ng'ayanguyiriza ag'okufumita okw'ekitala: Naye olulimi lw'ab'amagezi kwe kulaama. 
20_12_19_Omumwa ogw'amazima gunaanywezebwanga emirembe gyonna: Naye olulimi olulimba Iwa kaseera buseera. 
20_12_20_Okudyeka kuli mu mitima gy'abo abateesa obubi: Naye abateesa emirembe baba n'essanyu. 
20_12_21_Omutuukirivu talibaako kabi k'aliraba: Naye ab'ekyejo balikkuta obubi. 
20_12_22_Emimwa egirimba gya muzizo eri Mukama: Naye abo abakola eby'amazima b'asanyukira. 
20_12_23_Omuntu omutegeevu akisa okumanya: Naye omutima gw'abasirusiru gulaalika obusirusiru. 
20_12_24_Omukono gw'abanyiikivu gulifuga: Naye omugayaavu balimukoza omulimu ogw'obuddu. 
20_12_25_Ennaku bwe ziba mu mutima gw'omuntu zigukutamya; Naye ekigambo ekirungi kigusanyusa. 
20_12_26_Omutuukirivu aba musaale eri munne: Naye ekkubo ery'ababi libawabya. 
20_12_27_Omuntu omugayaavu tayokya ekyo ky'akutte ng'ayigga; Naye ebintu eby'omuwendo omungi eby'abantu biba bya munyiikivu. 
20_12_28_Mu kkubo ery'obutuukirivu mwe muli obulamu; Ne mu luwenda lw'abo temuli kufa. 
20_13_1_Omwana ow'amagezi awulira okuyigiriza kwa kitaawe: Naye omunyoomi tawulira kunenyezebwa. 
20_13_2_Omuntu anaalyanga ebirungi olw'ebibala eby'akamwa ke: Naye emmeeme ey'abasala enkwe eneeryanga kugirirwa kyejo. 
20_13_3_Akuuma akamwa ke aayweza obulamu bwe: Naye ayasama ennyo akamwa ke aliba n'okuzikirira. 
20_13_4_Emmeeme ey'omugayaavu yeegomba n'eteba na kintu: Naye emmeeme ey'abanyiikivu eneegejjanga. 
20_13_5_Omuntu omutuukirivu akyawa obulimba: Naye omuntu omubi mugwagwa, era akwatibwa ensonyi. 
20_13_6_Obutuukirivu bukuuma oyo akwata ekkubo eggolokofu: Naye ekyejo kisuula oyo alina ebibi. 
20_13_7_Wabaawo eyeegaggawaza, naye nga talina kintu: Wabaawo eyeeyavuwaza, naye ng'alina obugagga bungi. 
20_13_8_Obugagga bwe bwe bununula obulamu bw'omuntu: Naye omwavu, tawulira kukanga kwonna. 
20_13_9_Omusana ogw'abatuukirivu gusanyuka: Naye ettabaaza ey'ababi erizikizibwa.
