20_13_10_Amalala galeeta okuwakana okwereere: Naye amagezi gaba n'abo abateesa obulungi. 
20_13_11_Obugagga obufunibwa olw'ebigambo ebitaliimu bulikendeezebwa: Naye oyo akungaanya ng'akola emirimu aliba n'okwala. 
20_13_12_Essuubi erirwawo lisinduukiriza emmeeme: Naye ekyegombebwa bwe kijja kiba muti gwa bulamu. 
20_13_13_Buli anyooma ekigambo yeereetako okuzikirira: Naye oyo arya ekiragiro aliweebwa empeera. 
20_13_14_Etteeka ery'omugezigezi nsulo ya bulamu, Okuva mu byambika eby'okufa. 
20_13_15_Okutegeera okulungi kuleeta okuganja: Naye ekkubo ery'abasala enkwe bbi. 
20_13_16_Buli muntu omutegeevu akola emirimu n'okumanya: Naye omusirusiru ayaliira obusirusiru. 
20_13_17_Omubaka ow'ekyejo agwa mu bubi: Naye omutume omwesigwa kwe kulaama. 
20_13_18_Obwavu n'ensonyi biriba by'oyo agaana okubuulirirwa: Naye assaayo omwoyo eri okuneenyezebwa alissibwamu ekitiibwa. 
20_13_19_Ekyegombebwa bwe kiruukirira kiwoomera emmeeme: Naye okuva mu bubi kwa muzizo eri abasirusiru. 
20_13_20_Otambulanga n'abantu ab'amagezi, naawe oliba n'amagezi: Naye munnaabwe w'abasirusiru alibalagalwa. 
20_13_21_Obubi bugoberera abalina ebibi: Naye abatuukirivu balisasulibwa ebirungi. 
20_13_22_Omuntu omulungi alekera obusika abaana b'abaana be: N'obugagga bw'oyo alina ebibi buterekerwa omutuukirivu. 
20_13_23_Mu nnimiro ez'abaavu mulimu emmere nnyingi: Naye wabaawo azikirizibwa olw'obutagoberera nsonga. 
20_13_24_Atakwata muggo gwe akyawa omwana we: Naye oyo amwagala amukangavvula ebiro nga bikyali. 
20_13_25_Omutuukirivu alya, emmeeme ye n’ekkuta: Naye olubuto lw'ababi lulirumwa enjala. 
20_14_1_Buli mukazi ow'amagezi azimba ennyumba ye. Naye omusirusiru agyabya n'emikono gye ye. 
20_14_2_Atambulira mu bugolokofu bwe arya Mukama: Naye akyamakyama mu makubo ge amunyooma. 
20_14_3_Mu kamwa k'omusirusiru mulimu omuggo ogw'amalala: Naye emimwa gy'ab'amagezi ginaabakuumanga. 
20_14_4_Eteri nte ekisibo kiba kirongoofu: Naye amaanyi g'ente galeeta okwala kungi. 
20_14_5_Omujulirwa omwesigwa talimba: Naye omujulirwa ow'obulimba ayogera eby'okuwaayiriza. 
20_14_6_Anyooma anoonya amagezi n'atagalaba: Naye okumanya kwangu eri oyo alina okutegeera. 
20_14_7_Yingira mu masso g'omusirusiru, Toolabe ku ye mimwa gya kumanya. 
20_14_8_Okutegeera ekkubo lye ge magezi g'omutegeevu: Naye abasirusiru obusirusiru bwabwe kulimba. 
20_14_9_Abasirusiru bakudaalira omusango: Naye mu bagolokofu mulimu ekisa. 
20_14_10_Omutima gumanya okulumwa kwagwo; So n'omugenyi teyeetabula mu ssanyu lyagwo. 
20_14_11_Ennyumba ey'ababi erisuulibwa: Naye eweema ey'abagolokofu eneebanga n'omukisa. 
20_14_12_Waliwo ekkubo omuntu ly'ayita eddungi, Naye enkomerero yaalyo ge makubo ag'okufa. 
20_14_13_Ne bwe guseka omutima gunakuwala; N'enkomerero y'okuseka buyinike. 
20_14_14_Adda ennyuma mu mutima gwe alikkuta amakubo ge ye: N'omuntu omulungi alikkuta ye yennyini. 
20_14_15_Atalina magezi akkiriza buli kigambo kyonna: Naye omuntu omutegeevu akebera nnyo amagenda ge. 
20_14_16_Omuntu ow'amagezi atya n'ava mu bubi: Naye omusirusiru aba n'ettitimbuli, era yeeyinula. 
20_14_17_Ayanguwa okusunguwala alikola eby'obusirusiru: N'omuntu asala enkwe embi akyayibwa. 
20_14_18_Abatalina magezi basikira obusirusiru: Naye abategeevu bassibwako engule kwe kumanya. 
20_14_19_Ababi bakutamira abalungi; N'ab'ekyejo awali emiryango egy'abatuukirivu. 
20_14_20_Omwavu ne munne amukyawa: Naye omugagga alina emikwano mingi: 
20_14_21_Anyooma munne ayonoona: Naye asaasira abaavu alina omukisa. 
20_14_22_Abagunja obubi tebawaba? Naye okusaasirwa n'amszima binaabanga byabwe abagunja obulungi. 
20_14_23_Omulimu gwonna guliko kye gugasa: Naye okubuyabuya kw'emimwa kwavuwaza bwavuwaza. 
20_14_24_Obugagga bwabwe ye ngule ey'ab'amagezi: Naye obusirusiru bw'abasirusiru busirusiru bwereere. 
20_14_25_Omujulirwa ow'amazima awonya emmeeme z'abantu: Naye aleeta eby'obulimba akyamya. 
20_14_26_Mu kutya Mukama mulimu okuguma ennyo omwoyo: N'abaana be baliba n'obuddukiro. 
20_14_27_Okutya Mukama nsulo ya bulamu, Okuva mu byambika eby'okufa. 
20_14_28_Mu lufulube lw'abantu mwe muli ekitiibwa kya kabaka: Naye okubulwa abantu kwe kuzikirira kw'omulangira: 
20_14_29_Alwawo okusunguwala alina okntegeera kungi: Naye alina omwoyo ogwanguyiriza agulumiza abusirusiru. 
20_14_30_Omutima omutuufu bwe bulamu obw'omubiri: Naye obuggya kwe kuvunda kw'amagumba. 
20_14_31_Ajooga omwavu avuma Omutonzi we: Naye asaasira oyo eyeetaaga amussaamu ekitiibwa. 
20_14_32_Omubi asindikibwa wansi mu kwonoona kwe: Naye omutuukirivu alina essuubi mu kufa kwe: 
20_14_33_Amagezi gabeera mu mutima gw'oyo alina okutegeera: Naye ekiri ku kitundu eky'abasirusiru eky'omunda kimanyisibwa. 
20_14_34_Obutuukirivu bugulumiza eggwanga; Naye ekibi kivumisa eggwanga lyonna. 
20_14_35_Omuddu akola eby'amagezi ye aganja eri kabaka: Naye obusungu bwe bunaabanga eri oyo akwasa ensonyi 
20_15_1_Okuddamu n'eggonjebwa kukyusa ekuruyi: Naye ekigambo eky'ekkayu kisaanuula obusungu. 
20_15_2_Olulimi lw'ab'amagezi lwogera okumanya nga bwe kisaana: Naye akamwa k'abasirusiru kayiwa obusirusiru. 
20_15_3_Amaaso ga Mukama gaba mu buli kifo, Nga galabirira ababi n'abalungi. 
20_15_4_Olulimi oluwonya muti gwa bulamu: Naye bwe luba n'obukyamu, omwoyo gumenyeka. 
20_15_5_Omusirusiru anyooma okubuulirira kwa kitaawe: Naye oyo assaayo omwoyo eri okunenya afiuia obutegeevu. 
20_15_6_Mu nnyumba ey'omutuukirivu mubaamu obugagga bungi: Naye mu magoba ag'omubi mulimu okulaba ennaku. 
20_15_7_Emimwa gy'ab'amagezi gibunya okumanya: Naye omutima gw'abasirusiru si bwe gukola. 
20_15_8_Ssaddaaka ey'omubi ya muzizo eri Mukama: Naye okusaba kw'abagolokofu kw'asanyukira. 
20_15_9_Ekkubo ery'omubi lya muzizo eri Mukama: Naye ayagala oyo agoberera obutuukirivu. 
20_15_10_Waliwo okubuulirirwa okuzibu eri oyo aleka ekkubo lyennyini: Era oyo akyawa okunenyezebwa alifa. 
20_15_11_Amagombe n'okuzikirira biri mu maaso ga Mukama: Kale emitima gy'abaana b'abantu tegisinga nnyo? 
20_15_12_Omunyoomi tayagala kunenyezebwa: Tayagala kugenda eri ab'amagezi: 
20_15_13_Omutima ogujaguza gusanyusa amaaso: Naye obuyinike obw'omutima bwe bumenya omwoyo. 
20_15_14_Omutima gw'oyo alina okutegeera gunoonya okumanya: Naye akamwa k'abasirusiru emmere yaako busirusiru. 
20_15_15_Ennaku zonna ez'abo ababonyaabonyezebwa mbi: Naye oyo alina omutima ogujaguza alya embaga etevaawo. 
20_15_16_Akatono akaliko okutya Mukama Kasinga obugagga bungi obuliko obuyinike. 
20_15_17_Amaluma awali okwagalaaa Gasinga ente eya ssava awali okukyawagana. 
20_15_18_Omuntu ow'obusungu asaanuula oluyombo: Naye alwawo okusunguwala akkakkanya empaka. 
20_15_19_Ekkubo ery'omugayaavu liri ng'olukomera olw'amaggwa: Naye oluwenda olw'abagolokofu lufuuka oluguudo. 
20_15_20_Omwana ow'amagezi asanyusa kitaawe: Naye omuntu omusirusiru anyooma nnyina. 
20_15_21_Obusirusiru buba ssanyu eri oyo atalina magezi: Naye omuntu alina okutegeera alutlnamya amagenda ge. 
20_15_22_Awatali magezi okuteesa kufa: Naye kunywerera mu lufulube lw'abo abateesa ebigambo. 
20_15_23_Omuntu asanyukira okuddamu okw'omu kamwa ke: N'ekigambo ekijjira mu ntuuko zaakyo nga kirungi! 
20_15_24_Eri ow'amagezi ekkubo ery'obulamu lyambuka waggulu, Alyoke ave mu magombe wansi. 
20_15_25_Mukama alisimbula ennyumba ey'ab'amalala: Naye alinyweza ensalo ya nnamwandu. 
20_15_26_Okusala enkwe embi kwa muzizo eri Mukama: Naye ebigambo ebisanyusa biba birongoofu. 
20_15_27_Ayaayaanira amagoba ateganya ennyumba ye ye: Naye akyawa enguzi ye anaabanga omulamu. 
20_15_28_Omutima gw'omutuukirivu gufumiitiriza okwanukula: Naye akamwa k'ababi kafuka ebitasaana. 
20_15_29_Mukama aba wala ababi: Naye awulira okusaba kw'abatuukirivu. 
20_15_30_Omusana ogw'amaaso gusanyusa omutima: N'ebigambo ebirungi bigezza amagumba. 
20_15_31_Okutu okuwulira okunenya okw'obulamu Kunaabeeranga mu b'amagezi. 
20_15_32_Agaana okubuulirirwa anyooma emmeeme ye: Naye oyo awulira okunenya afuna okutegeera. 
20_15_33_Okutya Mulcama amagezi kwe gayigiriza; Era okwetoowaza kukulembera ekitiibwa. 
20_16_1_Okutegeka omutima kugwanira muntu: Naye okwanukula kw'olulimi kuva eri Mukama. 
20_16_2_Amakubo gonna ag'omuntu gaba malongoofu mu maaso ge ye: Naye Mukama apima emyoyo. 
20_16_3_Emirimu gyo giterese Mukama, N'ebirowoozo byo binaanywezebwanga. 
20_16_4_Mukama yakolera buli kintu omulimu gwakyo: Weewaawo, era n'ababi yabakolera olunaku olw'okulabirako ennaku. 
20_16_5_Buli muntu alina omutima ogw'amalala wa muzizo eri Mukama: Omukono newakubadde nga gwegatta n'omukono, taliwona kubonerezebwa. 
20_16_6_Okusaasira n'amazima bye birongoosa obutali butuukirivu: Era okutya Mukama kwe kuggya abantu mu bubi. 
20_16_7_Amakubo ag'omuntu bwe gasanyusa Mukama, Atabaganya naye era n'abalabe be. 
20_16_8_Akatono akaliko obutuukirivu Kakira amagoba mangi wamu n'ebitali bya nsonga. 
20_16_9_Omutima gw'omuntu guteesa ekkubo lye: Naye Mukama ye aluŋŋamya ebigere bye. 
20_16_10_Obulaguzi buba mu mimwa gya kabaka: Akamwa ke tekalisobya mu kusala omusango. 
20_16_11_Ebigera n'eminzaani ebituufu biba bya Mukama: Ebipima byonna eby'omu nsawo mulimu gwe. 
20_16_12_Okukola obubi kwa muzizo eri bakabaka: Kubanga obutuukirivu bwe bunyweza entebe. 
20_16_13_Emimwa emituukirivu bakabaka gye basanyulura; Era baagala oyo ayogera eby'ensonga. 
20_16_14_Obusungu bwa kabaka babaka ba kufa: Naye omuntu ow'amagezi alibukkakkanya. 
20_16_15_Mu musana ogw'amaaso ga kabaka mwe muli obulamu; N'okuganza kwe kire kya mu ttoggo. 
20_16_16_Okufuna amagezi nga kusinga nnyo okufuna zaabu! Weewaawo, okufuna okutegeera kulondebwa okukira ffeeza. 
20_16_17_Olugendo olw'abagolokofu kuleka bubi: Akuuma ekkubo lye awonya emmeeme ye. 
20_16_18_Amalala gakulembera okuzikirira, N'omwoyo ogwegulumiza gukulembera ekigwo. 
20_16_19_Aba n'omwoyo ogwetoowaza wamu n'abaavu Akira agereka omunyago wamu n'ab'amalala. 
20_16_20_Assaayo omwoyo eri ekigambo anaalabanga ebiruagi: Era buli eyeesiga Mukama alina omukisa. 
20_16_21_Alina omutima ogw'amagezi banaamuyitanga mutegeevu: N'obuwoomerevu bw'emimwa bwongera okuyiga. 
20_16_22_Okutegeera luzzi lwa bulamu eri nnyini kwo: Naye abasirusiru obusirusiru bwabwe bwe bubabuulirira. 
20_16_23_Omutima gw'ow'amagezi guyigiriza akamwa ke, Ne gwongera okuyiga ku mimwa gye. 
20_16_24_Ebigambo ebisanyusa bisenge bya njuki, Biwoomera emmeeme, era bwe bulamu eri amagumba. 
20_16_25_Waliwo ekkubo omuntu ly'ayita eddungi, Naye enkomerero yaalyo makubo ga kufa. 
20_16_26_Omululu gw'omukozi gumukolera emirimu. Kubanga akamwa ke kamwegayirira. 
20_16_27_Omuntu ataliiko ky'agasa agunja ettima: Era mu mimwa gye mubaamu omuliro ogusonsomola. 
20_16_28_Omuntu omubambaavu asiga empaka: Era omulyolyomi akyayisa ab'omukwano ennyo. 
20_16_29_Omuntu ow'ekyejo asendasenda munne, N'amutwala mu kkubo eritali ddungi. 
20_16_30_Aziba amaaso, kwe kuteesa ebigambo eby'obubambaavu: Aluma emimwa atuuluriza obubi. 
20_16_31_Omutwe oguliko envi ngule ya kitiibwa, Gunaalabikanga mu kkubo ery'obutuukirivu. 
20_16_32_Alwawo okusunguwala asinga ab'amaanyi; N'afuga omwoyo gwe akira amenya ekibuga. 
20_16_33_Akalulu kasuulibwa mu lugoye olw'omu kifuba; Naye okulagira kwako kwonna kuva eri Mukama. 
20_17_1_Akamere akaluma awamu n'obutereevu Kakira ennyumba ejjudde embaga omuli okuyomba. 
20_17_2_Omuddu akola eby'amagezi alifuga omwana akwasa ensonyi, Era aliba n'omugabo ogw'obusika mu b'oluganda. 
20_17_3_Entamu erongoosa eba ya ffeeza, n'ekikoomi kya zaabu: Naye Mukama ye akema emitima. 
20_17_4_Akola obubi assaayo omwoyo eri emimwa emibi; N'omulimba awulira olulimi olw'ettima. 
20_17_5_Akudaalira omwavu awoola Omutonzi we: N'oyo asanyukira obuyinike taliwona kubonerezebwa. 
20_17_6_Abaana b'abaana ngule ya bakadde; N'abaana ekitiibwa kyabwe bakitaabwe. 
20_17_7_Okwogera ebikulu tekusaanira musirusiru: Kale emimwa egirimba gisaanira gitya omulangira? 
20_17_8_Ekirabo jjinja lya muwendo mungi mu maaso g'oyo ali nakyo: Gye kikyukira yonna kiraba omukisa. 
20_17_9_Abikka ku kusobya anoonya okwagala: Naye ayeeyereza ekigambo akyayisa ab'omukwano ennyo. 
20_17_10_Okunenya kuyingira nnyo mu nnyini kutegeera Okusinga emiggo kikumi bwe giyingira mu musirisuru. 
20_17_11_Omuntu omubi anoonya bujeemu bwereere; Omubaka omukambwe kyaliva atumibwa okumukwata. 
20_17_12_Eddubu enyagiddwako abaana baayo esisinkane n'omuntu, Aleme okusisinkana n'omusirusiru mu busirusiru bwe. 
20_17_13_Asasula obubi olw'obulungi, Obubi tebuliva ku nnyumba ye. 
20_17_14_Okutanula okuyomba kuli ng'omuntu bw'aggulira amazzi: Kale olekanga okuwakana nga tewannabaawo kuyomba. 
20_17_15_Awa omubi obutuukirivu n'oyo asalira omutuukirivu okumusinga, Bombi benkana okuba ab'omuzizo eri Mukama. 
20_17_16_Kiki ekibeesaawo omuwendo mu mukono gw'omusirusiru okugula amagezi, Nga talina kutegeera? 
20_17_17_Ow'omukwano ayagala mu biro byonna, Era ow'oluganda yazaalirwa obuyinike. 
20_17_18_Omuntu abulwa okutegeera akuba mu ngala, N'afuuka omuyima mu maaso ga munne. 
20_17_19_Ayagala okuyomba ayagala okusobya: Agukumiza ennyo omulyango gwe anoonya okuzikirira. 
20_17_20_Alina omutima omubambaavu taliiko bulungi bw'alaba: N'oyo alina olulimi olukyamu agwa mu bubi. 
20_17_21_Azaala omusirusiru yeereetako obuyinike: Era kitaawe w'omusirusiru talina ssanyu. 
20_17_22_Omutima ogujaguza ddagala ddungi: Naye omwoyo ogumenyese gukaza amagumba. 
20_17_23_Omuntu omubi aggya enguzi mu kifuba, Okukyamya amakubo ag'okusala omusango. 
20_17_24_Amagezi gaba mu maaso g'oyo alina okutegeera: Naye amaaso g'omusirusiru gaba mu njuyi z'ensi ezikomererayo. 
20_17_25_Omwana omusirusiru buyinike bwa kitaawe, Era bubalagaze bwa mukazi eyamuzaala. 
20_17_26_Era okubonereza omutuukirivu si kulungi, Newakubadde okukuba abalungi ng'obalanga obugolokofu bwabwe, 
20_17_27_Aziyiza ebigambo bye alina okumanya: N'oyo alina omwoyo ogw'emmizi muntu mutegeevu. 
20_17_28_Era n'omusirusiru bw'asirika bamuyita wa magezi: Bw'abuniza emimwa gye bamulowooza nga mutegeevu. 
20_18_1_Eyeeyawula anoonya kye yeegomba yekka, Era alalukira amagezi gonna amatuufu. 
20_18_2_Omusirusiru tasanyukira kutegeera, Naye omutima gwe gwebikkule bwebikkuzi. 
20_18_3_Omubi bw'ajja, n'okunyooma kulla, Era awamu n'okuswazibwa ne wajja n'okuvumibwa. 
20_18_4_Ebigambo eby'omukamwa k'omuntu mazzi ga buziba: Oluzzi olw'amagezi mugga ogukulukuta. 
20_18_5_Okukkiriza amaaso g'omubi si kulungi, Newakubadde okugoba omutuukirivu bw'awoza. 
20_18_6_Emimwa gy'omusirusiru giyingira mu nnyombo, Akamwa ke ne kasaba emiggo. 
20_18_7_Akamwa k'omusirusiru kwe kuzikirira kwe, N'emimwa gye kye kyambika eky'emmeeme ye. 
20_18_8_Ebigambo eby'omugeyi biri ng'ebiwundu, Era bikka mu bisenge eby'omu lubuto. 
20_18_9_Era n'oyo atenguwa ng'akola emirimu Ye muganda w'oyo azikiriza. 
20_18_10_Erinnya lya Mukama kigo kya maanyi: Omutuukirivu addukira omwo n'aba mirembe. 
20_18_11_Omugagga obugagga bwe kye kibuga kye eky'amaanyi, Era bbugwe muwanvu mu kulowooza kwe ye. 
20_18_12_Okuzikiriza nga tekunnabaawc omutima gw'omuntu gwegulumiza, Era okwetoowaza kukulembera ekitiibwa. 
20_18_13_Addamu nga tannawulira, Busirusiru n'ensonyi gy'ali. 
20_18_14_Omwoyo gw'omuntu gunaawaniriranga obunafu bwe; Naye omwoyo omumenyefu ani ayinza okugugumiikiriza? 
20_18_15_Omutima gw'omutegeevu gufuna okumanya; N'okutu kw'ab'amagezi kunoonya okumanya. 
20_18_16_Ekirabo eky'omuntu kimuseguliza, Era kimutuusa mu maaso g'abakulu. 
20_18_17_Asooka okuwoza afaanana nga ye mutuukirivu; Naye munne n'ajja n'amukebera. 
20_18_18_Akalulu kalekesaayo ennyombo, Era kalamula ab'amaanyi. 
20_18_19_Ow'oluganda anyiize kizibu okumufuna okusinga ekibuga eky'amaanyi: Era ennyombo eziri bwe zityo ziri ng'ebisiba eby'ekigo. 
20_18_20_Olubuto lw'omuntu lulikkuta ebibala eby'akamwa ke; Ekyengera eky'omu mimwa gye kirimumala. 
20_18_21_Okufa n'obulamu biba mu buyinza bw'olulimi; N'abo abalwagala balirya ebibala byalwo. 
20_18_22_Alaba omukazi okumufumbirwa alaba ekirungi, Era afuna okuganja eri Mukama. 
20_18_23_Omwavu yeegayirira: Naye omugagga addamu n'ebboggo. 
20_18_24_Akwana emikwano emingi yeereetako okuzikirira: Naye waliwo ow'omukwano eyeegatta ennyo okusinga ow'oluganda. 
20_19_1_Omwavu atambulira mu butayonoona bwe Akira ow'emimwa emikyamu era omusirusiru. 
20_19_2_Era emmeeme obutaba na kumanya si kirungi; N'oyo ayanguyiriza n'ebigere bye ayonoona. 
20_19_3_Obusirusiru bw'omuntu bwe buvuunika ekkubo lye; N'omutima gwe gunyiigira Mukama. 
20_19_4_Obugagga bwongera emikwano mingi: Naye omwavu akyawagana ne mukwano gwe. 
20_19_5_Omujulirwa ow'obulimba taliwona kubonerezebwa; N'oyo ayogera eby'okudyeka talirokoka. 
20_19_6_Bangi abalimusaba omugabagabanyi obuganzi: Era buli muntu aba mukwano gw'oyo awa ebirabo. 
20_19_7_Omwavu baganda be bonna bamukyawa: Mikwano gye tebasinga nnyo kumwewala! Abayigganya n'ebigambo, naye nga bagenze. 
20_19_8_Afuna amagezi ayagala emmeeme ye: Anyweza okutegeera aliraba ebirungi. 
20_19_9_Omujulirwa ow'obulimba taliwona kubonerezebwa; Naye ayogera eby'obulimba alizikirira. 
20_19_10_Okwekanasa tekusaanira musirusiru; Kale omuddu okufuga abalangira kusaana kutya? 
20_19_11_Okuteesa kw'omuntu kwe kumulwisaawo okusunguwala; Era okusonyiwa ekyonoono kye kitiibwa kye. 
20_19_12_Obusungu bwa kabaka buli ng'okuwuluguma kw'empologoma; Naye obuganzi bwe musulo ku ssubi. 
20_19_13_Omwana omusirusiru nnaku za kitaawe: N'okuyomba kw'omukazi kwe kutonnya olutata. 
20_19_14_Ennyumba n'obugagga bwe busika obuva eri bakitaabwe: Naye omukazi omutegeevu ava eri Mukama. 
20_19_15_Obugayaavu buleeta otulo tungi; N'omuntu atakola mulimu alirumwa enjala. 
20_19_16_Akuuma ekiragiro akuuma emmeeme ye: Naye atassaayo mwoyo eri amakubo ge alifa. 
20_19_17_Asaasira omwavu awola Mukama, Era alimusasula nate ekikolwa kye ekirungi. 
20_19_18_Kangavvulanga omwana wo, kubanga essuubi weeriri; So teweegomba kuzikirira kwe. 
20_19_19_Omuntu ow'ekiruyi ekingi aliriwa: Kubanga bw'olimuwonya kirigwanira okukola bw'otyo nate omulundi ogw'okubiri. 
20_19_20_Wuliranga okuteesa, okkirizenga okuyigirizibwa, Obeere n'amagezi enkomerero yo ng'etuuse. 
20_19_21_Mu mutima gw'omuntu mulimu okufumiitiriza kungi; Naye okuteesa kwa Mukama kwe kunaanyweranga. 
20_19_22_Omuntu ekimwagaza kisa kye: N'omwavu akira omulimba. 
20_19_23_Okutya Mukama kuleeta bulamu: N'oyo ali nakwo anaabeereranga awo nga kumumala; Talijjirwa bubi. 
20_19_24_Omugayaavu annyika omukono gwe mu kibya, So tayagala na kuguzza nate ku kamwa ke. 
20_19_25_Kuba omunyoomi, atalina magezi anaayiga obutegeevu: Era buulirira alina okutegeera; era anaategeera okumanya. 
20_19_26_Anyaga kitaawe n'agoba nnyina, Ye mwana akwasa ensonyi era aleeta ekivume. 
20_19_27_Mwana wange, lekanga okuwulira okuyigirizibwa, Okuleeta okukyama obukyami okuva mu bigambo eby'okumanya. 
20_19_28_Mwana wange, lekanga okuwulira okuyigirizibwa, Okuleeta okukyama obukyami okuva mu bigambo eby'okumanya. 
20_19_29_Emisango gyategekerwa abanyoomi, N'emiggo gyategekerwa amabega g'abasirusiru. 
20_20_1_Omwenge mukudaazi, ekitamiiza muleekaanyi; Era buli akyama olw'ebyo talina magezi. 
20_20_2_Entiisa ya kabaka kuwuluguma kwa mpologoma: Amusunguwaza ayonoona obulamu bwe ye. 
20_20_3_Omuntu eyeewala ennyombo yeefunira ekitiibwa: Naye buli musirusiru ayagala okuyombanga. 
20_20_4_Omugayaavu taganya kulima olwa ttoggo; Kyanaavanga asabiriza okukungula nga kutuuse n'ataba na kintu. 
20_20_5_Okuteesa okw'omu mutima gw'omuntu kuli ng'amazzi ag'omu luzzi oluwanvu; Naye omuntu alina okutegeera alikusena. 
20_20_6_Abantu bangi abalirangira buli muntu ekisa kye ye: Naye omuntu omwesigwa ani ayinza okumulaba? 
20_20_7_Omuntu omutuukirivu atambulira mu butayonoona bwe, Abaana be abaddawo balina omukisa. 
20_20_8_Kabaka atudde ku ntebe esalirwako emisango Asaasaanya obubi bwonna n'amaaso ge. 
20_20_9_Ani ayinza okwogera nti Nnongoosezza omutima gwange, Ndi mulongoofu mu kwonoona kwange? 
20_20_10_Ebipima ebitenkana n'ebigera ebitenkana Byombi bya muzizo eri Mukama. 
20_20_11_Era n'omwana omuto yeemanyisa olw'ebikolwa bye, Omulimu gwe oba nga mulongoofu, oba nga mulungi. 
20_20_12_Okutu okuwulira, n'eriiso eriraba, Mukama ye yakola byombi. 
20_20_13_Toyagalanga kwebaka oleme okutuuka mu bwavu; Zibulanga amaaso go, onokkutanga emmere. 
20_20_14_Tekiriiko kye kigasa, tekiriiko kye kigasa, bw'ayogera agula: Naye ng'amaze okugenda n'alyoka yeenyumiriza. 
20_20_15_Waliwo zaabu n'amayinja amatwakaavu mangi nnyo: Naye emimwa egy'okumanya kya buyonjo kya muwendo mungi. 
20_20_16_Twalanga ekyambalo ky'oyo eyeeyimirira gw'atamanyi; Era abowenga oyo eyeeyimirita b'atamanyi. 
20_20_17_Emmere ey'obulimba ewoomera omuntu; Naye oluvannyuma akamwa ke kalijjula omusenyu. 
20_20_18_Buli kigambo ky'omalirira kinywezebwa na kuteesa: Era tabaalanga n'okukulemberwa okw'amagezi. 
20_20_19_Atambulatambula ng'alyolyoma abikkula ebyama: Kale teweetabulanga n'oyo ayasama ennyo emimwa gye. 
20_20_20_Akolimira kitaawe oba nnyina, Ettabaaza ye erizikizibwa mu kizikiza ekikutte zigizigi. 
20_20_21_Obusika buyinzika okufunibwa amangu olubereberye; Naye enkomerero yaabwo teriba na mukisa. 
20_20_22_Toyogeranga nti Ndisasula obubi: Lindiriranga Mukama naye anaakuwonyanga. 
20_20_23_Ebipima ebitenkana bya muzizo eri Mukama; Ne minzaani ey'obulimba si nnungi. 
20_20_24_Amagenda g'omuntu gava eri Mukama; Kale nno omuntu ayinza atya okutegeera ekkubo lye? 
20_20_25_Kyambika eri omuntu, okwogera ng'ayanguyiriza nti Kitukuvu, Awo ng'amaze okweyama n'alyoka abuuza. 
20_20_26_Kabaka ow'amagezi awewa ababi, Era abaleetako nnamuziga ewuula. 
20_20_27_Omwoyo gw'omuntu ye ttabaaza ya Mukama, Ekebera ebitundu byonna eby'olubuto eby'omunda. 
20_20_28_Okusaasira n'amazima biwonya kabaka: Era okusaasira kwe kuwanirira entebe ye. 
20_20_29_Abalenzi ekitiibwa kyabwe maanyi gaabwe: N'abakadde omutwe oguliko envi bwe bulungi bwabwe. 
20_20_30_Emiggo egiruma gimalawo obubi: N'enga zituuka mu bitundu eby'olubuco eby'omunda. 
20_21_1_Omutima gwa kabaka guli mu mukono gwa Mukama ng'emigga: Agukyusa gy'ayagala yonna. 
20_21_2_Buli kkubo ery'omuntu ddungi mu maaso ge ye: Naye Mukama ye apima emitima. 
20_21_3_Okukola eby'ensonga n'eby'omusango Kukkirizibwa Mukama okusinga ssaddaaka. 
20_21_4_Amaaso ageegulumiza n'omutima ogw'amalala, Ye ttabaaza ey'ababi, kwe kwonoona. 
20_21_5_Ebirowoozo eby'omunyiikivu bireeta bungi bwereere Naye buli muntu ayanguyiriza ayanguya okwetaaga obwetaazi. 
20_21_6_Okufuna obugagga n'olulimi olulimba Mukka ogutwalibwa eruuyi n'eruuyi; ababunoonya banoonya okufa. 
20_21_7_Ekyejo eky'ababi kiribamalawo; Kubanga bagaana okukola eby'ensonga. 
20_21_8_Ekkubo ly'oyo eyeebinise omusango likyamakyama nnyo nnyini: Naye omulongoofu omulimu gwe mulungi. 
20_21_9_Beeranga ku nnyumba waggulu awafunda Olemenga okubeera n'omukazi omuyombi mu nnyumba engazi. 
20_21_10_Emmeeme y'omubi yeegomba obubi: Munne caganja n'akamu mu maaso ge. 
20_21_11_Omunyoomi bw'abonerezebwa, atalina magezi agafuna: Era ow'amagezi bw'ayigirizibwa aweebwa okumanya. 
20_21_12_Omuntu omutuukirivu alowooza ennyumba ey'omubi; Ababi bwe basuulibwa ne babula. 
20_21_13_Aziba amatu ge omwavu bw'akaaba, Era naye alikaaba, naye taliwulirwa. 
20_21_14_Ekirabo eky'omu kyama kikkakkanya obusungu, N'ekitone eky'omu kifuba kikkakkanya ekiruyi ekingi. 
20_21_15_Okukolanga eby'ensonga ssanyu lya mutuukirivu. Naye kuzikirira eri abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu. 
20_21_16_Omuntu awaba okuva mu kkubo ery'okutegeera Aliwummulira mu kkuŋŋaaniro ery'abafu. 
20_21_17_Ayagala essanyu anaabanga mwavu: Ayagala omwenge n'amafuta taabenga mugagga. 
20_21_18_Omubi aba kinunulo kya mutuukirivu; N'oyo asala enkwe adda mu kifo ky'abagolokofu. 
20_21_19_Beeranga mu nsi ey'eddungu Olemenga okubeera n'omukazi omuyombi anyiiganyiiga. 
20_21_20_Mu nnyumba ey'omutuukirivu mulimu obugagga obw'omuwendo omungi n'amafuta; Naye omusirusiru abumira. 
20_21_21_Agoberera obutuukirivu n'okusaasira Alaba obulamu n'obutuukirivu n'ekitiibwa. 
20_21_22_Omuntu ow'amagezi alinnya mu kibuga eky'ab'amaanyi, N'akkakkanya amaanyi ag'obugumu bwakyo. 
20_21_23_Buli akuuma akamwa ke n'olulimilwe Akuuma emmeeme ye obutalaba nnaku. 
20_21_24_Omuntu ow'amalala eyeegulumiza, erinnya lye munyoomi, Akolera emirimu mu ttitimbuli ery'amalala. 
20_21_25_Okwegomba okw'omugayaavu kumutta; Kubanga emikono gye gigaana okukola emirimu. 
20_21_26_Wabaawo ayaayaana ennyo okuzibya obudde: Naye omutuukirivu awa n'atamma. 
20_21_27_Ssaddaaka ey'ababi ya muzizo: Bw'agireeta n'emmeeme embi, tesinga nnyo kuba ya muzizo? 
20_21_28_Omujulirwa ow'obulimba anaabulanga: Naye omuntu awulira anaayogeranga nga tewali amulimbulula. 
20_21_29_Omuntu omubi akakanyaza amaaso ge: Naye omugolokofu aliraanya amakubo ge. 
20_21_30_Tewali magezi newakubadde okutegeera Newakubadde okuteesa ku Mukama. 
20_21_31_Embalaasi etegekerwa olunaku olw'olutalo. Naye okuwangula kuva eri Mukama. 
20_22_1_Erinnya eddungi lya kulondebwa okusinga obugagga obungi, N'okuganja n'okwagalwa okusinga ffeeza ne zaabu. 
20_22_2_Omugagga n'omwavu baalabagana: Mukama ye yabatonda bonna. 
20_22_3_Omuntu omutegeevu alaba akabi ne yeekweka: Naye abatalina magezi bayita buyisi ne bafiirwa. 
20_22_4_Obugagga n'ekitiibwa n'obulamu Ye mpeera ey'okwetoowazanga n'okutyanga Mukama. 
20_22_5_Amaggwa n'ebyambika biri mu kkubo ery'omubambaavu: Akuuma emmeeme ye alibibeera wala. 
20_22_6_Manyiiza omwana omuto mu kkubo erimugwanira okutambuliramu, Awo newakubadde nga mukadde talirivaamu. 
20_22_7_Omugagga afuga abaavu, N'eyeewola aba muddu w'awola. 
20_22_8_Asiga obutali butuukirivu alikungula obuyinike: N'omuggo ogw'obusungu bwe guliggwaawo. 
20_22_9_Alina eriiso erigabaagaba anaabanga n'omukisa; Kubanga awa omwavu ku mmere ye. 
20_22_10_Gobanga omunyoomi, n'okuyomba kunaavangawo; Weewaawo, okuwakana n'okuswazibwa birikoma. 
20_22_11_Ayagala omutima omulongoofu, Olw'ekisa eky'omu mimwa gye kabaka kyanaavanga abeera mukwano gwe. 
20_22_12_Amaaso ga Mukama gakuuma oyo alina okumanya, Naye asuula ebigambo eby'omuntu asala enkwe. 
20_22_13_Omugayaavu ayogera nti Empo. logoma eri bweru: N'attirwa mu nguudo. 
20_22_14_Akamwa k'abakazi abagenyi bunnya buwanvu: Akyayibwa Mukama aligwa omwo. 
20_22_15_Obusirusiru busibibwa mu mutima gw'omwana omuto; Naye omuggo ogukangavvula gulibugobera wala okuva gy'ali. 
20_22_16_Ajooga omwavu okwongera ku magoba ge, N'oyo agabira omugagga batuuka mu kwetaaga bwetaazi. 
20_22_17_Tega okutu kwo owulire ebigambo eby'ab'amagezi, Era ssaayo omutima gwo eri okumanya kwange. 
20_22_18_Kubanga kigambo kya ssanyu bw'obeera nabyo mu nda yo, Bwe binywerera wamu ku mimwa gyo. 
20_22_19_Obwesige bwo bube eri Mukama, Kyenvudde nkubimanyisa leero ggwe. 
20_22_20_Sikuwandiikidde birungi nnyo nnyini Eby'okuteesa n'eby'okumanya; 
20_22_21_Okukutegeeza ebigambo eby'amazima bwe bitabuusibwabuusibwa, Olyoke obaddize ebigambo eby'amazima abo abakutuma? 
20_22_22_Tonyaganga mwavu kubanga mwavu, So tojooganga abonyaabonyezebwa mu mulyango: 
20_22_23_Kubanga Mukama ye aliwoza ensonga yaabwe, Era abo ababanyaga alibanyagako obulamu. 
20_22_24_Tokwananga muntu wa busungu: Togendanga na muntu ow'ekiruyi: 
20_22_25_Olemenga okuyiga amakubo ge, N'ofunira emmeeme yo ekyambika. 
20_22_26_Tobanga ku muwendo gw'abo abakuba mu ngalo, Newakubadde ogw'abo abeeyimirira amabanja: 
20_22_27_Oba nga tolina kya kusasula, Lwaki akuggirawo ekitanda kyo wansi wo? 
20_22_28_Tojjululanga kabonero ka nsalo ak'edda, Bajjajjaabo ke baasimba. 
20_22_29_Olaba omuntu anyiikira mu mulimu gwe? aliyimirira mu maaso ga bakabaka; Taliyimirira mu maaso ga bakopi. 
20_23_1_Bw'otuulanga ku mmere wamu n'omukungu, Olowoolezanga ddala oyo ali mu maaso go 
20_23_3_Teweegombanga nva ze ennungi; Kubanga bye byokulya eby'obulimba. 
20_23_4_Teweekooyanga okuba omugagga; Vanga ku magezi go ggwe. 
20_23_5_Oneekalirizanga amaaso ku ekyo ekitaliiwo? Kubanga mazima obugagga bwefunira ebiwaawaatiro, Ng'empungu ebuuka mu bbanga. 
20_23_6_Tolyanga mmere y'oyo alina eriiso ebbi, So teweegombanga nva ze nnungi: 
20_23_7_Kubanga nga bw'alowooza mu nda ye, bw'ali bw'atyo: Lya, nywa, bw'akugamba; Naye omutima gwe teguli wamu naawe. 
20_23_8_Ennoga gy'olidde onoogisesema, N'ofiirwa ebigambo byo ebirungi. 
20_23_9_Toyogeranga omusirusiru ng'awulira; Kubanga anaanyooma amagezi ag'ebigambo byo. 
20_23_10_Tojjululanga kabonero ka nsalo ak'edda; So toyingiranga mu nnimiro ez'abatalina bakitaabwe: 
20_23_11_Kubanga omununuzi waabwe wa maanyi; Anaawozanga ensonga yaabwe naawe. 
20_23_12_Ssangayo omutima gwo eri okuyigirizibwa, N'amatu go eri ebigambo eby'okumanya. 
20_23_13_Tolekanga kubuulirira omwana: Kubanga bw'onoomukubanga n'omuggo, talifa. 
20_23_14_Omukubanga n'omuggo, N'owonya emmeeme ye mu magombe. 
20_23_15_Mwana wange, omutima gwo oba nga gwa magezi, Omutima gwange gunaasanyuka, ogwange: 
20_23_16_Weewaawo, emmeeme yange eneesanyuka, Emimwa gyo bwe gyogera eby'ensonga. 
20_23_17_Omutima gwo gulemenga okukwatirwa obuggya abalina ebibi: Naye obeerenga mu kutya Mukama okuzibya obudde: 
20_23_18_Kubanga mazima empeera weeri; N'essuubi lyo teririmalibwawo. 
20_23_19_Mwana wange, wulira obeerenga n'amagezi, Oluŋŋamyenga omutima gwo mu kkubo. 
20_23_20_Tobanga ku muwendo gw'abo abeekamirira omwenge; Mu abo abeevuubiika ennyama: 
20_23_21_Kubanga omutamiivu n'omuluvu balituuka mu bwavu N'okubongoota kunaayambazanga omuntu enziina. 
20_23_22_Owuliranga kitaawo eyakuzaala, So tonyoomanga nnyoko ng'akaddiye. 
20_23_23_Gulanga amazima, so togatundanga; Weewaawo, amagezi n'okuyigirizibwa n'okutegeera. 
20_23_24_Kitaawe w'omutuukirivu anaasanyukanga nnyo: N'oyo azaala omwana ow'amagezi anaabanga n'essanyu. 
20_23_25_Kitaawo ne nnyoko basanyukenga, N'omukazi eyakuzaala ajaguzenga. 
20_23_26_Mwana wange, mpa omutima gwo, N'amaaso go gasanyukirenga amakubo gange. 
20_23_27_Kubanga omukazi omwenzi lukonko luwanvu; N'omukazi omugenyi bunnya bwa kanyigo. 
20_23_28_Weewaawo; ateega ng'omunyazi, Era ayaza abasala enkwe mu bantu. 
20_23_29_Ani alaba obuyinike? ani alaba ennaku? ani alina ennyombo? Ani alina okwemulugunya? ani alina ebiwundu eby'obwereere? Ani amyusa amaaso? 
20_23_30_Abo abalwawo ku mwenge; Abo abagenda okunoonya omwenge omutabule. 
20_23_31_Totunuuliranga mwenge nga gumyuse, Bwe gwolesanga ebbala lyagwo mu kikompe, Bwe gukka empola: 
20_23_32_Enkomerero guluma ng'omusota, Gusonsomola ng'embalasaasa. 
20_23_33_Amaaso go galiraba eby'ekitalo, N'omutima gwo gulyogera ebigambo eby'obubambaavu. 
20_23_34_Weewaawo, oliba ng'oyo agalamira wakati mu nnyanja, Oba ng'oyo agalamira waggulu ku mulongooti. 
20_23_35_Bankubye, bw'olyogera bw'otyo, ne ssirumwa; Bankubye, ne ssiwulira: Ndyebaka ddi? naagunoonya nate omulundi ogw'okubiri. 
20_24_1_Tokwatirwanga buggya abantu ababi, So teweegombanga okuba awamu nabo: 
20_24_2_Kubanga omutima gwabwe guteesa okujooga, N'emimwa gyabwe gyogera ku ttima. 
20_24_3_Amagezi ge gazimbya ennyumba; N'okutegeera kwe kuginyweza: 
20_24_4_N'okumanya kwe kujjuza ebisenge Obugagga bwonna obw'omuwendo omungi era obusanyusa. 
20_24_5_Omuntu ow'amagezi aba wa maanyi; Weewaawo, omuntu alina okumanya ayoagera obuyinza. 
20_24_6_Kubanga olirwana olutalo lwo n'okuteesa okw'amagezi: Era mu bateesa ebigambo abangi mwe muli emirembe. 
20_24_7_Amagezi magulumivu nnyo, galema omusirusiru: Tayasama kamwa ke mu mulyango. 
20_24_8_Agunja okukola obubi, Abantu balimuyita omuntu ow'ettima. 
20_24_9_Okulowooza kw'omusirusiru kwonoona: Era omunyoomi wa muzizo eri abantu. 
20_24_10_Bw'ozirika ku lunaku olw'okulabirako obuyinike, Amaanyi go nga matono. 
20_24_11_Obawonyanga abo abatwalibwa okuttibwa, N'abo abagenda okuttibwa obalekanga. 
20_24_12_Bw'onooyogeranga nti Laba; tetwamanya kino: Oyo apima emitima takirowooza? N'oyo akuuma emmeeme yo takimaayi? Era talisasula buli muntu ng'omulimu gwe bwe guli? 
20_24_13_Mwana wange, olyanga omubisi gw'enjuki, kubanga mulungi; N'ebisenge byazo ebiwoomera amatama go. 
20_24_14_Onoomanyanga ng'amagezi gawoomera bwe gatyo emmeeme yo: Oba ng'ogalabye, awo walibaawo empeera, N'essuubi lyo teririmalibwawo. 
20_24_15_Toteegera ku nnyumba ya mutuukiriw, ggwe omuntu omubi; Tonyaga kifo ky'awummuliramu: 
20_24_16_Kubanga omuntu omutuukirivu agwa emirundi musanvu n'ayimuka nate: Naye ababi obuyinike bubasuula. 
20_24_17_Tosanyukanga omulabe wo bw'agwanga, So n'omutima gwo gulemenga okusanyuka bw'ameggebwanga: 
20_24_18_Mukama alemenga okukiraba ne kimunyiiza, N'akyusa obusungu bwe okumuvaako. 
20_24_19_Teweeraliikiriranga olw'abo abakola obubi; So tokwatirwanga buggya ababi: 
20_24_20_Kubanga tewaliba mpeera eri omuntu omubi; Ettabaaza ey'ababi erizikizibwa. 
20_24_21_Mwana wange, otyanga Mukama ne kabaka: So teweetabulanga n'abo abaagala okujjululajjulula. 
20_24_22_Kubanga obuyinike bwabwe buliyimuka nga tebamanyiridde; Era ani amanyi okuzikirira kwabwe bombi? 
20_24_23_Era na bino bigambo bya bagezigezi. Okusosola mu bantu bw'osala emisango si kirungi. 
20_24_24_Agamba omubi nti Ggwe mutuukirivu; Abantu banaamukolimiranga, amawanga ganaamutamwanga: 
20_24_25_Naye abo abamunenya be baliba n'essaayu, N'omukisa omulungi gulibatuukako. 
20_24_26_Addamu eby'ensonga Anywegera emimwa. 
20_24_27_Teekateekanga omulimu gwo ebweru, Ogwetegekerenga mu nnimiro; Oluvannyuma n'olyoka ozimba ennyumba yo. 
20_24_28_Tolumirizanga munno awatali asonga: So tolimbanga na mimwa gyo. 
20_24_29_Toyogeranga nti Ndimukola nga ye bw'ankoze nze; Ndisasula omusajja oyo ng'omulimu gwe bwe gubadde. 
20_24_30_Nayita ku nnimiro ey'omugayaavu, N'olusuku olw'emizabbibu lw'oyo atalina kutegeera; 
20_24_31_Kale, laba, amaggwa nga galubunye lwonna, Omwennyango nga gubisse ku lwo kungulu, N'olukomera lwalwo olw'amayinja nga lusuuliddwa. 
20_24_32_Awo ne ntunula ne ndowooza nnyo: Nalaba ne mpeebwa okuyigirizibwa. 
20_24_33_Wakyaliwo okwebaka kutono, okubongoota kutono, Okufunya engalo okwebaka kutono: 
20_24_34_Bwe kiryo obwavu bwo bulituuka ng'omunyazi; N'okwetaaga kwo ng'omusajja akutte ebyokulwanyisa. 
20_25_1_Era na zino ngero za Sulemaani, abasajja ba Keezeekiya kabaka wa Yuda ze baawandiika. 
20_25_2_Okukisa ekigambo kitiibwa kya Katonda: Naye okukebera ekigambo kye kitiibwa kya bakabaka. 
20_25_3_Eggulu nga bwe ligenda ennyc waggulu, n'ensi nga bw'egenda ennyo wansi. N'omutima gwa bakabaka tegunoonyezeka. 
20_25_4_Ggyangamu amasengere mu ffeeza, Ne muvaamu ekibya eky'omulongoosa: 
20_25_5_Ggyangawo ababi mu maaso ga kabaka, N'entebe ye erinywezebwa mu butuukirivu. 
20_25_6_Teweekuza mu maaso ga kabaka, So toyimiriranga mu kifo eky'abakulu: 
20_25_7_Kubanga waakiri bakugambe nti Yambuka wano; N'otossibwa wansi mu maaso g'omulangira, Amaaso go gwe galabye. 
20_25_8_Tofulumanga mangu okuwakana, Olemenga okubulwa ku nkomerero by'oba okola, Munno ng'akuswazizza. 
20_25_9_Wozanga ensonga yo ne munno yennyini, So tobikkulanga kyama kya beene: 
20_25_10_Akiwulira alemenga okukuvuma, Okuswala kwo ne kutavangawo. 
20_25_11_Ekigambo ekyogerwa nga bwe kisaanye Kiri ng'amapeera aga zaabu mu bisero ebya ffeeza. 
20_25_12_Ng'empeta ey'omukutu eya zaabu n'ekyobuyonjo ekya zaabu ennungi, Ow'amagezi anenya bw'abeera bw'atyo eri okutu kw'okugonda. 
20_25_13_Ng'empewo eya serugi bw'ebeera mu biro eby'okukunguliramu, Omubaka omwesigwa bw'abeera bw'atyo eri abo abamutuma; Kubanga aweezaweeza emmeeme ya bakama be, 
20_25_14_Ng'ebire n'empewo awatali nkuba, Bw'atyo bw'abeera oyo eyeenyumiriza olw'ebirabo bye ng'alimba. 
20_25_15_Okugumiikiriza okulwawo ennyo kwe kusendasenda omukulu, N'olulimi olugonvu lumenya eggumba. 
20_25_16_Olabye omubisi gw'enjuki? lyangako ogunaakumala obumazi; Olemenga okugukkuta n'ogusesema. 
20_25_17_Ekigere kyo tekirinnyanga mirundi mingi mu nnyumba ya munno; Alemenga okukunyiwa n'akukyawa. 
20_25_18_Omuntu awaayiriza munne Nnyondo n'ekitala n'akasaale ak'obwogi. 
20_25_19_Okwesiga omuntu atali mwesigwa mu biro eby'okulabiramu ennaku Linnyo erimenyese n'okugulu okusowose. 
20_25_20_Ng'omuntu ayambula ekyambalo mu biro eby'empewo, era ng'omwenge omukaatuufu, oguli ku luvu, Bw'atyo bw'abeera oyo ayimbira ennyimba omutima oguliko obuyinike. 
20_25_21_Omulabe wo bw'alumwanga enjala, omuwanga emmere ey'okulya; Era bw'alumwanga ennyonta, omuwanga amazzi okunywa: 
20_25_22_Kubanga olikuma amanda ag'omuliro ku mutwe gwe, Era Mukama alikuwa empeera. 
20_25_23_Embuyaga ez'obukiika obwa kkono zireeta enkuba: N'olulimi olulyolyoma bwe luleeta bwe lutyo amaaso agaliko obusungu. 
20_25_24_Beeranga waggulu ku nnyumba awafunda, Olemenga okubeera n'omukazi omuyombi mu nnyumba engazi. 
20_25_25_Ng'amazzi amannyogovu bwe gaba eri emmeeme erumwa ennyonta, Ebigambo ebirungi ebiva mu nsi ey'ewala bwe biba bwe bityo 
20_25_26_Ng'oluzzi olutabanguse, n'ensulo eyonoonese, Omuntu omutuukirivu bw'abeera bw'atyo bw'asegulira omubi. 
20_25_27_Si kirungi okulyanga omubisi gw'enjuki omungi: Bwe kityo abantu okunoonya ekitiibwa kyabwe bo si kitiibwa. 
20_25_28_Ataziyiza mwoyo gwe Ali ng'ekibuga ekimenyese so nga tekirina bbugwe. 
20_26_1_Ng'omuzira bwe gutasaana mu kyeya, era ng'enkuba mu biro eby'okukunguliramu, N'ekitiibwa bwe kityo tekisaanira, musirusiru. 
20_26_2_Ng'enkazaluggya mu kuwaba kwayo, era ng'akataayi mu kubuuka kwako, Bwe kityo n'ekikolimo eky'obwereere tekiggwa. 
20_26_3_Oluga lusaanira mbalaasi, olukoba lusaanira ndogoyi, N'omuggo gusaanira mabega ga basirusiru. 
20_26_4_Toddangamu musirusiru ng'obusirusiru bwe bwe buli, Era naawe olemenga okumufaanana. 
20_26_5_Oddangamu omusirusiru ng'obusirusiru bwe bwe buli, Alemenga okuba ow'amagezi mu kulowooza kwe ye. 
20_26_6_Aweereza ebigambo mu mukono gw'omusirusiru Yeesalako ebigere, era anywa okufiirwa. 
20_26_7_Amagulu gawenyera galeebeeta buleebeesi: Olugero bwe lubeera bwe lutyo mu kamwa k'abasirusiru. 
20_26_8_Ng'ensawo erimu amayinja ag'omuwendo omungi eri mu kifunvu eky'amayinja, Bw'atyo bw'abeera oyo assaamu ekitiibwa omusirusiru. 
20_26_9_Ng'eriggwa erifumita omukono gw'omutamiivu, Olugero bwe lubeera bwe lutyo mu kamwa k'abasirusiru. 
20_26_10_Ng'omulasi afiunita bonna, Bw'abeera bw'atyo oyo agulirira omusirusiru, n'oyo agulirira abo abayitawo. 
20_26_11_Ng'embwa edda ku bisesemye byayo, Bw'abeera bw'atyo omusirusiru addiŋŋana mu busirusiru bwe. 
20_26_12_Olaba omuntu ow'amagezi mu kulowooza kwe ye? Omusirusiru asuubirwa okukira ye. 
20_26_13_Omugayaavu ayogera nti Waliwo empologoma mu kkubo; Empologoma eri mu nguudo. 
20_26_14_Ng'oluggi bwe lukyukira ku ŋŋango zaalwo, Omugayaavu bw'akyukira bw'atyo ku kitanda kye. 
20_26_15_Omugayaavu annyika omukono gwe mu kibya; Okuguzza nate ku kamwa ke kumukooyesa. 
20_26_16_Omugayaavu alina amagezi mu kulowooza kwe ye Okukira abantu omusanvu abayinza okuleeta ensonga. 
20_26_17_Ayitawo ne yeeraliikirira olw'empaka ezitali zize Alijnanga akwata embwa ku matu. 
20_26_18_Ng'omutalu akasuka emimuli, N'obusaale, n'okufa; 
20_26_19_Bw'atyo bw'abeera omuntu alimba munne, N'ayogera nti Sizannya buzannya? 
20_26_20_Enku nga zibuze omuliro kyeguva guzikira: Era awabuze omugeyi, okuyomba kuggwaawo. 
20_26_21_Ng'amanda bwe gakwata ebisiriiza ebyokya n'enku nga bwe zikoleeza omuliro, Omuntu omuyombi bw'akoleeza bw'atyo oluyombo. 
20_26_22_Ebigambo eby'omugeyi biri ng'ebiwundu, Era bikka mu bisenge eby'omu lubuto. 
20_26_23_Emimwa eminyiildvu n'omutima omubi Biri ng'ekintu eky'ebbumba ekibikkiddwako amasengere aga ffeeza. 
20_26_24_Akyawa akuusakuusa n'emimwa gye, Naye atereka obulimba mu ye: 
20_26_25_Bw'ayogeranga eky'okwegonza, tomukkirizanga: Kubanga mu mutima gwe mulimu eby'emizizo musanvu: 
20_26_26_Okukyawa kwe newakubadde nga kwebikkako obukuusa, Obubi bwe bulyolesebwa mu lwatu mu maaso g'ekibiina. 
20_26_27_Buli asima obunnya, aligwa omwo: N'oyo ayiringisa ejjinja, liridda ku ye. 
20_26_28_Olulimi olulimba lukyawa abo be lwafumita; N'akamwa akanyumiriza kaleeta okuzikirira. 
20_27_1_Teweenyumirizanga bya nkya; Kubanga tomanyi bwe binaaba olunaku bye luyinza okuzaala. 
20_27_2_Omundi akutenderezenga, so si kamwa ko ggwe; Omugenyi, so si mimwa gyo ggwe. 
20_27_3_Ejjinja lizitowa, n'omusenyu muzito; Naye okweraliikirira kw'omusirusiru kubisinga byombi obuzito. 
20_27_4_Obusungu bukambwe, n'ekiruyi mukoka; Naye ani ayinza okuyimirira awali obuggya? 
20_27_5_Okunenya mu lwatu Kusinga obulungi okwagala okukisibwa. 
20_27_6_Ebiwundu eby'omukwano byesigwa: Naye okunywegera kw'omulabe kuba kungi nnyo nnyini. 
20_27_7_Emmeeme ektcuse etamwa ebisenge by'enjuki: Naye emmeeme erumiddwa enjala buli kintu ekikaawa ekiyita kiwoomerevu. 
20_27_8_Ng'ennyonyi ewaba okuva mu kisu kyayo, Bw'atyo bw'abeera omuntu awaba okuva mu kifo kye. 
20_27_9_Amafuta ag'omugavu n'eby'akaloosa bisanyusa omutima: Obuwoomerevu bw'omukwano gw'omuntu bwe busanyusa bwe butyo obuva mu kuteesa okw'omu mwoyo gwe. 
20_27_10_Mukwano gwo ggwe ne mukwano gwa kitaawo tobaabuliranga; So togendanga mu nnyumba ya muganda wo ku lunaku kw'olabira obuyinike: Muliraanwa wo akuli okumpi akira ow'oluganda ali ewala. 
20_27_11_Mwana wange, beeranga n'amagezi osanyusenga omutima gwange. Ndyokenga nziremu oyo anvuma. 
20_27_12_Omuntu omutegeevu alaba obubi ne yeekweka: Naye abatalina magezi bayitawo buyisi ne bafiirwa. 
20_27_13_Twalanga ekyambalo ky'oyo eyeeyimirira gw'atamanyi; Era mubowenga oyo eyeeyimirira omukazi omugenyi. 
20_27_14_Eyeebaza mukwano gwe n'eddoboozi eddene, ng'agolokoka enkya mu makya, Kinaayitibwanga kikolimo gy'ali. 
20_27_15_Okutonnya olutata, obudde nga bwa nkuba nnyingi, N'omukazi omuyombi bw'afaanana: 
20_27_16_Ayagala okumuziyiza aziyiza empewo, N'omukono gwe ogwa ddyo gulwana n'amafuta. 
20_27_17_Ekyuma kiwagala kyuma; Bw'atyo omuntu awagala amaaso ga mukwano gwe. 
20_27_18_Buli alima omutiini anaalyanga ku bibala byagwo; N'oyo aweereza mukama we anassibwaagamu ekitiibwa. 
20_27_19_Ng'amaaso bwe goolekera amaaso mu mazzi, Bwe gutyo omutima gw'omuntu bwe gwolekera omuntu. 
20_27_20_Amagombe n'okuzikirira tebikkutanga enaaku zoana; N'amaaso g'abantu tegakkutanga ennaku zonna. 
20_27_21_Entamu erongoosa ya ffeeza, n'ekikoomi kya zaabu, N'omuntu akemebwa lwa kumutendereza. 
20_27_22_Ne bw'osekula omusirusiru mu kinu n'omusekuzo mu kasooli omusekule, Era naye obusirusiru bwe tebuumuvengako. 
20_27_23_beeranga munyiikivu okumanya embuzi zo bwe ziri, Okeberanga nnyo ente zo: 
20_27_24_Kubanga obugagga si bwa lubeerera; Era engule ebeerera awo okutuusa emirembe gyonna? 
20_27_25_Omuddo omukalu gutwalibwa n'essubi eggonvu lirabika, N'emiddo egy'oku nsozi bagi yingiza. 
20_27_26_Abaana b'endiga baba ba ku kwambaza, N'embuzi gwe muwendo gw'e nnimiro: 
20_28_1_Ababi badduka nga tewali muntu agoberera: Naye abatuukirivu baguma emyoyo ng'empologoma. 
20_28_2_Olw'okusobya kw'ensi bakabaka baamu baba bangi: Naye olw'abantu abalina okute geera n'okumanya okunywera kwayo kulyongerwako. 
20_28_3_Omuntu eyeetaaga ajooga abaavu Nkuba ewemmenta etalekaawo mmere yonna. 
20_28_4_Abo abaleka amateeka batende reza ababi: Naye abo abakwata amateeka bayomba nabo. 
20_28_5_Abantu ababi tebategeera mu sango: Naye abo abanoonya Mukama bategeera byonna. 
20_28_6_Omwavu atambulira mu butayonoona bwe Akira obulungi ow'amakubo atnakyamu, newakubadde nga mugagga. 
20_28_7_Buli akwata amateeka mwana wa magezi: Naye aba mukwano gw'abantu abaluvu akwasa kitaawe ensonyi. 
20_28_8_Ayongera ku bintu bye olw'amagoba n'ebisalirwa Akuŋŋaanyiza oyo asaasira abaavu. 
20_28_9_Akyusa okutu kwe obutawulira mateeka, N'okusaba kwe kwa muzizo. 
20_28_10_Buli akyamya abagolokofu mu kkubo. Ebbi Aligwa ye yennyini mu bunnya bwe ye: Naye abo abatuukirira balisikira ebirungi. 
20_28_11_Omugagga aba wa magezi mu kulowooza kwe ye; Naye omwavu alina okutegeera amukebera. 
20_28_12_Abatuukirivu bwe bawangula, wabaawo ekitiibwa ekinene: Naye ababi bwe bagolokoka, abantu beekweka. 
20_28_13_Abikka ku kusobya kwe taliraba mukisa: Naye buli akwatula n'akuleka alifuna okusaasirwa. 
20_28_14_Alina omukisa omuntu atya mu biro byonna. Naye oyo akakanyaza omutima gwe aligwa mu kabi. 
20_28_15_Ng'empologoma ewuluguma n'eddubu etambulatambula; Bw'abeera bw'atyo omukulu omubi afuga abantu abaavu. 
20_28_16_Omulangira atalina kutegeera aba mujoozi nnyo era: Naye oyo akyawa omululu aliwangaala ennaku nnyingi. 
20_28_17_Omuntu eyeebinise omusaayi ogwa buli muntu yenna Aliddukira mu bunnya; tewabangawo muntu amuziyiza. 
20_28_18_Buli atambula n'obugolokofu aliwonyezebwa: Naye ow'amakubo amakyamu aligwa mangu ago. 
20_28_19_Alima ensi ye aliba n'emmere nnyingi: Naye agoberera abantu abataliiko kye bagasa aliba n'obwavu obulimumala. 
20_28_20_Omuntu omwesigwa aliba n'okwebazibwa kungi: Naye ayanguwa okugaggawala taliwona kubonerezebwa. 
20_28_21_Okusosola mu bantu si kulungi: Newakubadde omuntu okusobya olw'akamere obumere. 
20_28_22_Alina eriiso ebbi ayanguwa okugoberera obugagga, So tamanyi ng'okwetaaga kulimutuukako. 
20_28_23_Anenya omuntu oluvannyuma alyeyongera okuganja Okusinga oyo anyumiriza n'olulimi. 
20_28_24_Buli anyaga kitaawe oba nnyina n'ayogera nti Si musango; Oyo ye munne w'omuzikiriza. 
20_28_25_Ow'omwoyo ogw'omululu aleeta oluyombo: Naye eyeesiga Mukama aligejja. 
20_28_26_Eyeesiga omutima gwe ye musirisiru: Naye atambula n'amagezi ye aliwonyezebwa. 
20_28_27_Agabira omwavu teyeetaagenga: Naye akisa amaaso ge anaabanga n'ebikolimo bingi. 
20_28_28_Ababi bwe bagolokoka, abantu beekweka: Naye bwe bazikirira, abatuukirivu beeyongera. 
20_29_1_Omuntu akakanyaza ensingo ye bw'anenyezebwa emirundi emingi Alimenyeka nga tamanyiridde awatali kuwonyezebwa: 
20_29_2_Abatuukirivu bwe beeyongera, abantu basanyuka: Naye omuntu omubi bw'afuga, abantu basinda. 
20_29_3_Buli ayagala amagezi asanyusa kitaawe: Naye oyo abeera n'abakazi abenzi amalawo ebintu bye. 
20_29_4_Kabaka anyweza ensi lwa kusala misango: Naye asolooza enguzi agisuula. 
20_29_5_Omuntu anyumiriza munne Ategera ebigere bye ekitimba. 
20_29_6_Mu kusobya kw'omuntu omubi mulimu ekyambika: Naye omutuukirivu ayimba n'asanyuka. 
20_29_7_Omutuukirivu yeetegereza ensonga ey'abaavu: Naye omubi talina kutegeera okugimanya. 
20_29_8_Abantu abanyooma basasamaza ekibuga: Naye abantu ab'amagezi bakyusa obusungu ne buvaawo. 
20_29_9_Omuntu ow'amagezi bw'aba n'empaka n'omuntu omusirusiru, Oba nga asunguwala oba nga aseka, tewaliba kuwummula. 
20_29_10_Abayagala omusaayi bakyawa oyo eyatuukirira: N'omugolokofu banoonya obulamu bwe. 
20_29_11_Omusirusiru ayatula obusungu bwe bwonna: Naye omuntu ow'amagezi abuziyiza n'abukkakkanya. 
20_29_12_Omukulu bw'awulira eby'obulimba, Abaddu be bonna baba babi. 
20_29_13_Omwavu n'omujoozi balabagana: Mukama ayakira amaaso gaabwe bombi. 
20_29_14_Kabaka asalira abaavu emisango n'obwesigwa, Entebe ye eneenywezebwanga emirembe gyonna. 
20_29_15_Omuggo n'okunenya bireeta amagezi: Naye omwana gwe balekera awo akwasa nnyina ensonyi. 
20_29_16_Ababi bwe beeyongera, okusobya kweyongera: Naye abatuukirivu balitunuulira okugwa kwabwe. 
20_29_17_Buuliriranga omwana wo, anaakuwanga okuwummula; Weewaawo, anaasanyusanga emmeeme yo. 
20_29_18_Awatali kwolesebwa, abantu basuula okuziyizibwa: Naye akwata amateeka alina omukisa. 
20_29_19_Omuddu taganya kubuulirirwa lwa bigambo: Kubanga ne bw'ategeera talissaayo mwoyo. 
20_29_20_Olaba omuntu ayanguyiriza ebigambo bye? Omusirusiru asuubirwa okukira ye. 
20_29_21_Alera omuddu we nga yeekanasa okuva mu buto bwe Alimufuukira omwana ku nkomerero. 
20_29_22_Omuntu ow'obusungu aleeta ennyombo, N'ow'ekiruyi okusobya kwe kuba kungi nnyo nnyini. 
20_29_23_Amalala ag'omuntu galimutoowaza: Naye alina omwoyo ogwetoowaza alifuna ekitiibwa. 
20_29_24_Buli assa ekimu n'omubi akyawa obulamu bwe ye: Awulira okulayizibwa n'atabaako ky'ayogera. 
20_29_25_Okutya abantu kuleeta ekyambika: Naye buli eyeesiga Mukama anaabanga mirembe. 
20_29_26_Bangi abaagala okuganja eri omukulu: Naye omusango gw'omuntu guva eri Mukama. 
20_29_27_Omuntu atali wa nsonga wa muzizo eri abatuukirivu: N'oyo akwata ekkubo eggolokofu wa muzizo eri ababi. 
20_30_1_Ebigambo bya Aguli mutabani wa Yake; ebyalagulwa. Omusajja agamba Isyeri, Isyeri ne Ukali 
20_30_3_So siyiganga magezi, So sirina kumanya kw'oyo Omutukuvu. 
20_30_4_Ani eyali alinnye mu ggulu n'akka? Ani eyali akuŋŋaanyizza empewo mu bikonde bye? Ani eyali asibye amazzi mu kyambalo kye? Ani eyali anywezezza enkomerero zonna ez'ensi. Erinnya lye ye ani, n'omwana we erinnya lye ye ani, oba ng'omanyi? 
20_30_5_Buli kigambo kya Katonda kikemebwa: Aba ngabo eri abo abamwesiga. 
20_30_6_Toyongeranga ku bigambo bye, Aleme okukunenyanga naawe n'olabika ng'omulimba. 
20_30_7_Nkusabye ebigambo bibiri; Tonnyima nga sinnafa: 
20_30_8_Ggyangawo ebigambo ebitaliimu n'eby'obulimba bibe wala nange: Tompanga bwavu newakubadde obugagga; Ndisanga emmere gye nneetaaga: 
20_30_9_Nneme okukkutanga ne nkwegaana ne njogera nti Mukama ye ani? Era nnemenga okuba omwavu ne nziba, Ne njogera bubi erinnya lya Katonda wange. 
20_30_10_Towaayirizanga muddu eri mukama we, Alemenga okukukolimira naawe n'olowoozebwa ng'ozizza omusango. 
20_30_11_Waliwo abantu abakolimira kitaabwe; So tebasabira nnyaabwe omukisa. 
20_30_12_Waliwo abantu ababa abalongoofu mu maaso gaabwe bo, Era naye tebanaazibwako empitambi yaabwe. 
20_30_13_Waliwo abantu, amaaso gaabwe nga malalambavu! N'ebikowe byabwe bigulumizibwa. 
20_30_14_Waliwo abantu amannyo gaabwe bitala, n'amasongezo gaabwe bwambe, Okulya abaavu okubamalawo ku nsi, n'abeetaaga mu bantu. 
20_30_15_Ekinoso kirina abawala baakyo babiri aboogerera waggulu nti Mpa, mpa. Waliwo ebintu bisatu ebitakkuta ennaku zonna, Weewaawo, ebina ebitayogera nti Lekera awo: 
20_30_16_Amagombe; n'olubuto olugumba; N'ensi etekkuta mazzi; N'omuliro ogutayogera nti Lekera awo. 
20_30_17_Eriiso erikudaalira kitaawe, Ne liayooma okugondera nnyina, Bannamuŋŋoona ab'omu kiwonvu baliriggyamu, N'empungu ziririrya. 
20_30_18_Waliwo ebigambo bisatu eby'ekitalo ebinnema, Weewaawa, ebina bye ssimanyi: 
20_30_19_Ekkubo ery'empungu mu bbanga; Ekkubo ery'omusota ku lwazi; Ekkubo ery'eryato wakati mu nnyanja; N'ekkubo ery'omusajja n'omuwala. 
20_30_20_Bwe lityo bwe libeera ekkubo ery'omukazi omwenzi; Alya n'asangula ku mimwa gye, N'ayogera nti Siriiko bubi bwe nkoze. 
20_30_21_Ensi ekankanira ebigambo bisatu, Era ebina by'eteyinza kugumiikiriza: 
20_30_22_Omuddu bw'aba kabaka; N'omusirusiru bw'akkuta emmere; 
20_30_23_Omukazi omugwagwa bw'afumbirwa; N'omuzaana asikira mugole we. 
20_30_24_Waliwo ebintu bina ebitono ku nsi, Naye birina amagezi mangi nnyo nnyini: 
20_30_25_Enkolooto lye ggwanga eritaIina maanyi, Naye zeeterekera emmere yaazo mu kyeya; 
20_30_26_Obumyu buntu bunafu, Naye bwezimbira ennyumba zaabwo mu mayinja; 
20_30_27_Enzige tezirina kabaka, Naye zitabaala zonna bibiina bibiina; 
20_30_28_Omunya gukwata n'engalo zaagwo, Naye gubeera mu mayumba ga bakabaka. 
20_30_29_Waliwo ebintu bisatu ebyesimba obulungi mu kutaznbula kwabyo, Weewaawo, ebina ebyesimba obulungi mu kugenda: 
20_30_30_Empologoma esinga ensolo zonna amaanyi, So tewali gy'esegulira yonna; 
20_30_31_Embwa enjizzi; era n'embuzi ennume; Ne kabaka atagolokokerwako. 
20_30_32_Oba ng'okoze eby'obusirusiru nga weegulumiza, Oba ng'olowoozezza obubi, Teekanga omukono gwo ku kamwa ko. 
20_30_33_Kubanga okusunda amata kuleeta omuzigo, N'okunyigiriza ennyindo kuleeta omusaayi: N'okunyigiriza kw'obusungu bwe kutyo kuleeta oluyombo. 
20_31_1_Ebigambo bya kabaka Lemweri; ebyalagulwa nnyina bye yamuyigiriza. 
20_31_2_Kiki, mwana wange? era kiki, ai mwana w'olubuto lwange? Era kiki, ai mwana w'obweyamo bwange? 
20_31_3_Towanga bakazi amaanyi go, Newakubadde amakubo go eri ekyo ekizikiriza bakabaka. 
20_31_4_Si kwa bakabaka, ai Lemweri, si kwa bakabaka okunywanga omwenge; So si kwa balangira okwogeranga nti Ekitamiiza kiri ludda wa? 
20_31_5_Balemenga okunywa ne beerabira amateeka, Ne banyoola omusango gw'omuntu yenna abonyaabonyezebwa. 
20_31_6_Mumuwenga ekitamiiza oyo ayagala okufa, N'omwenge oyo alina emmeeme eriko obuyinike: 
20_31_7_Anywenga yeerabirenga obwaw bwe, Alemenga okujjukira nate ennaku ze. 
20_31_8_Yasamanga akamwa ko olwa kasiru, Okuwoza ensonga y'abo bonna abalekebwa nga tebalina bannaabwe. 
20_31_9_Yasamanga akamwa.ko osalenga emisango egy'ensonga, Osalirenga emisango omwavu n'eyeetaaga. 
20_31_10_Omukazi omwegendereza ani ayinza okumulaba? Kubanga omuwendo gwe gusinga wala amayinja amatwakaavu. 
20_31_11_Omutima gwa bba gumwesiga, So taabulwenga magoba. 
20_31_12_Amukola bulungi so si bubi Ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwe. 
20_31_13_Anoonya ebyoya by'endiga ne ppamba, N'akola emirimu n'engalo ze n’essanyu. 
20_31_14_Ali ng'atnaato ag'abasuubuzi; Emmere ye agiggya wala. 
20_31_15_Era agolokoka nga bukyali bwa kiro, N'awa ab'omu nnyumba ye ebyokulya, N'agabira abawala be emirimu gyabwe. 
20_31_16_Alowooza ennimiro n'agiguia: Asimba olusuku olw'emizabbibu n'ebibala eby'emikono gye. 
20_31_17_Yeesiba n'amaanyi, N'anyweza emikono gye. 
20_31_18_Alaba ng'obuguzi bwe bulimu ettunzi: Ettabaaza ye tezikira kiro. 
20_31_19_Ateeka engalo ze ku muggo ogubaako ppamba, Emikono gye ne gikwata akati akalanga. 
20_31_20_Ayanjululiza omwavu omukono gwe: Weewaawo, agololera emikono gye oyo eyeetaaga. 
20_31_21_Omuzira tagut:ira ab'omu nnyumba ye; Kubanga ab'omu nnyumba ye bonna bambadde olugoye olumyufu. 
20_31_22_Yeekolera amagodooli; Ebyambalo bye bafuta nnungi n'olugoye olw'effulungu. 
20_31_23_Bba amanyibwa mu miryango, Bw'atuula mu bakadde ab'ensi. 
20_31_24_Atunga ebyambalo ebya bafuta n'abitunda; N'awa omusuubuzi enkoba. 
20_31_25_Amaanyi n'okutiibwa bye byambalo bye; Era asekerera ebiro sbigenda okujja. 
20_31_26_Ayasama akamwa ke n'amagezi; N'etteeka ery'ekisa liba ku lulimi lwe. 
20_31_27_Alabirira nnyo empisa ez'ab'omu nnyumba ye, So talya mmere ya kugayaala. 
20_31_28_Abaana be bagolokoka ne bamuyita wa mukisa; Ne bba, n'amutendereza ng'ayogera nti 
20_31_29_Abawala bangi abaakola eby'okwegendereza, Naye ggwe obasinga bonna. 
20_31_30_Okuganja kulimba n'obulungi tebuliiko kye bugasa: Naye omukazi atya Mukama ye anaatenderezebwanga. 
20_31_31_Mumuwenga ku bibala eby'emikono gye; N'emirimu gye gimutenderezenga mu miryango. 
21_1_1_Ebigambo eby'Omubuulizi, mutabani wa Dawudi, kabaka mu Yerusaalemi. 
21_1_2_Obutaliimu obusinga obutaliimu bwonna, bw'ayogera Omubuulizi; obutaliimu obusinga obutaliimu bwonna, byonna butaliimu. 
21_1_3_Magoba ki omuntu gaggya mu mulimu gwe gwonna gw'akola wansi w'enjuba? 
21_1_4_Emirembe emirala gigenda, n'emirembe emirala gijja; ensi n'ebeerera awo ennaku zonna. 
21_1_5_Era n'enjuba evaayo, eiijuba n'egwa, n'eyanguwa okugenda mu kifo kyayo gy'eva. 
21_1_6_Empewo egenda eri obukiilca obwa ddyo, n'ekyukira obukiika obwa kkono; ekyukakyuka buli kaseera mu kutambula kwayo, empewo n'edda nate mu kwetooloola kwayo. 
21_1_7_Emigga gyonna gigenda mu nnyanja, naye ennyanja tejjula; mu kifo emigga gye gigenda eyo gye gigenda nate. 
21_1_8_Ebintu byonna bijjudde obukoowu; omuntu tayinza kubwogera: eriiso terikkuta kulaba, so n'okutu tekukkuta okuwulira. 
21_1_9_Ebintu byonna bijjudde obukoowu; omuntu tayinza kubwogera: eriiso terikkuta kulaba, so n'okutu tekukkuta okuwulira. 
21_1_10_Waliwo ekintu abantu kye boogerako nti Laba, kino kiggya? kyamala okubaawo mu mirembe egyatusooka. 
21_1_11_Tewali kujjukira mirembe egy'edda; so tewaliba kujjukira mirembe gya luvaanyuma egigenda okujja mu abo abaliddawo. 
21_1_12_Nze Omubuulizi nali kabaka wa Isiraeri mu Yerusaalemi. 
21_1_13_Awo ne nzisaayo omutima gwange okunoonya n'okukenneenya o1w'amagezi byonna ebikolebwa wansi w'eggulu: bwe bubalagaze obungi Katonda bwe yawa abaana b'a bantu okubaluma. 
21_1_14_Nalaba emirimu gyonna egikolebwa wansi w'enjuba; era, laba, byonna butaliimu na kugoberera mpewo. 
21_1_15_Ekikyamye tekiyinzika kuluŋŋamizibwa: n'ekyo ekitatuuka tekibalika. 
21_1_16_Nateesa n'omutima gwange nze ngz njogera nti Laba, neefunidde amagezi mangi okukira bonna abansooka mu Yerusaalemi: weewaawo, omutima gwange gwalaba nnyo amagezi n'okumanya. 
21_1_17_Ne nzisaayo omutima gwange okumanya amagezi n'okumanya eddalu n'obusirusiru: nalaba nga n'ekyo kwe kugoberera empewo. 
21_1_18_Kubanga mu magezi amangi mulimu obuyinike bungi: n'oyo ayongera okumanya ayongera okulaba ennaku. 
21_2_1_Nayogera mu mutima gwange nti Kale nno, naakukema n'ebinyumu; kale beera n'essanyu: era, laba, n'ekyo nga bwe butaliimu. 
21_2_2_Nayogera ku nseko nti Ziraluse: ne ku binyumu nti Bikola ki? 
21_2_3_Nanoonya mu mutima gwange bwe mba nsanyusa omubiri gwange n'omwenge, omutima gwange nga gukyannuŋŋamya n'amagezi, era bwe mba nnyweza obusirusiru, ndyoke ntegeere ebisaanira abaana b'abantu okukola wansi w'eggulu ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwabwe. 
21_2_4_Neekolera emirimu eminene, neezimbira ennyumba; neesimbira ensuku ez'emizabbibu 
21_2_6_neekolera ensuku n'ennimiro, ne nsimba omwo emiti egy'ebibala eby'engeri zonna: 
21_2_7_nagula abaddu n'abazaana, ne nzaalirwa abaddu mu nnyumba yange: era nalina obugagga bungi obw'ente n'embuzi, okukira abo bonna abansooka mu Yerusaalemi: 
21_2_8_era neekumaanyiza ffeeza ne zaabu, n'obugagga obw'omu buli nsi obwa bakabaka n'obw'omu masaza: neefunira abasajja abayimbi n'abakazi abayimbi, n'ebisanyusa abaana b'abantu, abazaana bangi nnyo. 
21_2_9_Kale ne mba mukulu, ne nneeyongera okusinga bonna abansooka mu Yerusaalemi: era amagezi gange ne gabeera nange. 
21_2_10_Na buli kintu amaaso gange kye geegombanga saakigamma: saaziyiza mutima gwange obutalaba ssanyu lyonna, kubanga omutima gwange gwasanyuka olw'emirimu gyange gyonna; era guno gwe gwali omugabo gwange ogwava mu mirimu gyange gyonna. 
21_2_11_Awo ne ndyoka ntunuulira emirimu gyonna emikono gyange gye gyali gikoze n'okutegana kwe nnategana okukola: era, laba, byonna butaliimu na kugoberera mpewo, so nga tewali kintu kigasa wansi w'enjuba. 
21_2_12_Awo ne nkyuka okulaba amagezi n'eddalu n'obusirusiru: kubanga omuntu ayinza ki addirira kabaka? Ayinza ekyo ekyakolebwa edda. 
21_2_13_Awo ne ndaba ng'amagezi gasinga obusirusiru obulungi ng'omusana bwe gusinga ekizikiza. 
21_2_14_Omugezigezi amaaso ge gaba mu mutwe gwe, n'omusirusiru atambulira mu kizikiza: era naye ne ntegeera nga bonna ekigambo kimu kibatuukako. 
21_2_15_Awo ne ŋŋamba mu mutima gwange nti Ekituuka ku musirusiru era kye kirituuka ku nze nange; kale musinga mu ki amagezi? Kale ne njogera mu mutima gwange nga n'ekyo butaliimu. 
21_2_16_Kubanga n'omugezigezi era nga n'omusirusiru tajjukirwa mirembe gyonna; kubanga mu biro ebigenda okujja byonna nga byamala dda okwerabirwa. Era omugezigezi ng'afa okwenkana n'omusirusiru! 
21_2_17_Awo ne nkyawa obulamu; kubanga emirimu egikolebwa wansi w'enjuba gyantama: kubanga byonna butaliimu na kugoberera mpewo. 
21_2_18_Awo ne nkyawa okutegana kwange kwonna kwe nnategana wansi w'enjuba: kubanga kiŋŋwanira okukulekera omusajja alinziririra. 
21_2_19_Era ani amanyi oba ng'aliba mugezigezi oba musirusiru, naye alifuga okutegana kwange kwonna kwe nnategana, ere kwe nnayolesezaamu amagezi wansi w'enjuba. Era n'ekyo butaliimu. 
21_2_20_Kyennava nkyuka omutima gwange ne guggwaamu essuubi ery'okutegana kwonna kwe nnategana wansi w'enjuba. 
21_2_21_Kubanga wabaawo omuntu okutegana kwe kulina amagezi n'okumanya n'obukabakaba; naye omuntu atategananga mu byo gw'alikulekera okuba omugabo gwe. Era n'ekyo buta liimu na kabi kanene. 
21_2_22_Kubanga omuntu afuna ki olw'okutegana kwe kwonna n'olw'okufuba kw'omutima gwe kw'ategaaa wansi w'e'njuba? 
21_2_23_Kubanga ennaku ze zonna buyinike bwereere, n'okufuba kwe kunakuwala; weewaawo, ne mu kiro omutima gwe tegubaako bwe guwummula. Era n'ekyo butaliimu. 
21_2_24_Tewali kintu ekigasa omuntu okusinga okulya n'okunywa n'okuliisa emmeeme ye ebirungi mu kutegana kwe. Era n'ekyo nakiraba nga kiva eri omukono gwa Katonda. 
21_2_25_Kubanga ani ayinza okulya, oba ani ayinza okuba n'essanyu okukira nze? 
21_2_26_Kubanga omuntu amusanyusa Katonda gw'awa amagezi n'okumanya n'essanyu: naye alina ebibi amuwa okutegana, akuŋŋaanye atuume entuumo, awe oyo asanyusa Katonda. Era n'ekyo butaliimu na kugoberera mpewo. 
21_3_1_Buli kintu kiriko entuuko yaakyo, na buli kigambo ekiri wansi w'eggulu kiriko ekiseera kyakyo: 
21_3_2_ekiseera eky'okuzaalirwamu, n'ekiseera eky'okufiiramu; ekiseera eky'okusimbiramu, n'ekiseera eky'okusimbuliramu ekyo ekyasimbibwa 
21_3_9_Magoba ki gaafuna oyo akola emirimu mu ekyo mw'ateganira? 
21_3_10_Nalaba okutegana Katonda kwe yawa abaana b'abantu okubateganya. 
21_3_11_Yafuula buli kintu okuba ekirungi mu kiseera kyakyo: era yateeka ensi mu mutima gwabwe, naye agiteekamu bw'atyo omuntu n'okuyinza n'atayinza kukebera mulimu Katonda gwe yakola okuva ku lubereberye okutuuka ku nkomerero. 
21_3_12_Mmanyi nga tewali kintu kibagasa okusinga okusanyuka n'okukola obulungi ennaku zonna nga bakyali balamu. 
21_3_13_Era buli muntu okulyanga n'okunywanga n'okusanyukiranga ebirungi mu kutegana kwe kwonna, kye kirabo kya Katonda. 
21_3_14_Mmanyi nga buli Katonda ky'akola kinaabanga kya lubeerera; tewali kintu kiyinzika okukyongerwako, newakubadde okukisalibwako: era Katonda kyeyava akikola abantu balyoke batye mu maaso ge. 
21_3_15_Ekiriwo kyamala dda okubaawo; n'ekyo ekigenda okubaawo kyabaawo dda; era Katonda anoonya nate ekyo ekyayitawo. 
21_3_16_Era nate nalaba wansi w'enjuba mu kifo eky'okusaliramu emisango ng'obubi bwali eyo; ne mu kifo eky'obutuukirivu ng'obubi bwali omwo. 
21_3_17_Ne njogera mu mutima gwange nti Katonda ye alisala emisango gy'omutuukirivu n'omubi: kubanga eyo eriyo ekiseera eky'ekigambo kyonna n'omulimu gwonna. 
21_3_18_Ne njogera mu mutima gwange nti Kiba bwe kityo olw'abaana b'abantu Katonda alyoke abakeme, balabe nga bo bennyini bali ng'ensolo obusolo. 
21_3_19_Kubanga ekyo ekituuka ku baana b'abantu kye kituuka ku nsolo; ekigambo kimu kibatuukako; ng'eyo bw'efa, n'oyo bw'afa bw'atyo; weewaawo, bonna balina omukka gumu; so abantu tebaliiko bwe basinga nsolo: kubanga byonna butaliimu. 
21_3_20_Bonna bagenda mu kifo kimu; bonna baava mu nfuufu, era bonna badda mu nfuufu nate. 
21_3_21_Ani amanyi omwoyo gw'abantu oba nga gulinnya mu ggulu, n'omwoyo gw'ensolo oba gukka wansi mu ttaka? 
21_3_22_Kyennava ndaba nga tewali kintu kisinga kino obulungi, omuntu okusanyukiranga emirimu gye; kubanga ogwo gwe mugabo gwe: kubanga ani alimukomyawo okulaba ebinaabangawo oluvannyuma lwe? 
21_4_1_Awo ne nzirayo ne ndaba okujooga kwonna kwe bajooga wansi w'enjuba: era, laba, amaziga g'abo abajoogebwa, so nga tebalina abasanyusa; n'obuyinza nga buli ku luuyi lw'abajoozi baabwe, naye no nga tebalina abasanyusa. 
21_4_2_Kyennava ntendereza abafu abaamala okufa okusinga abalamu abakyalaba 
21_4_4_Awo ne ndyoka ndaba okutegana kwonna na buli mulimu ogw'amagezi, ng'olwekyo omuntu kyava amukwatirwa munne obuggya. Era n'ekyo butaliimu na kugoberera mpewo. 
21_4_5_Omusirusiru afunya emikono gye, n'alya omubiri gwe ye. 
21_4_6_Olubatu lumu wamu n'okutereera lusinga embatu bbiri wamu n'okutegana n'okugoberera empewo. 
21_4_7_Awo ne nzirayo ne ndaba obutaliimu wansi w'enjuba. 
21_4_8_Wabaawo ali omu, nga talina wa kubiri; weewaawo, talina mwana newakubadde ow'oluganda: naye okutegana kwe kwonna tekuliiko we kukoma, so n'amaaso ge tegakkuta bugagga. Kale nteganira ani, bw'ayogera, ne nnyima emmeeme yange ebirungi? Era n'ekyo butaliimu, weewaawo, kweraliikirira kungi. 
21_4_9_Babiri basinga omu; kubanga baba n'empeera ennungi olw'okutegana kwabwe. 
21_4_10_Kubanga bwe bagwa omu ali yimusa munne: naye zimusanze oyo ali yekka bw'agwa, so nga talina munne amuyimusa. 
21_4_11_Nate babiri bwe bagalamirira awamu, lwe babuguma: naye omu ayinza atya okubuguma bw'aba yekka? 
21_4_12_Era omuntu bw'asinga oyo ali yekka, ababiri be balimusobola; n'omugwa ogw'emiyondo esatu tegutera kukutuka. 
21_4_13_Omulenzi omwavu omugezigezi asinga kabaka omukadde omusirusiru atakyamanyi kubuulirirwa. 
21_4_14_Kubanga mu kkomera mwe yava okuba kabaka; weewaawo, ne mu bwakabaka bwe yazaalibwa nga mwavu. 
21_4_15_Nalaba abalamu bonna abatambulira wansi w'enjuba, nga baali wamu n'omulenzi, ow'okubiri, eyayimirira mu kifo kye. 
21_4_16_Abantu bonna tebaaliko gye bakoma, abo bonna be yakulira: naye abo abalibaawo oluvannyuma lwe tebalimusanyukira. Mazima era ri ekyo butaliimu na kugoberera mpewo. 
21_5_1_Okuumanga ekigere kyo bw'ogendanga mu nnyumba ya Katonda; kubanga okusembera okuwulira kusinga okuwaayo ssaddaaka ey'abasirusiru: kubanga tebamanyi nga bakola bubi. 
21_5_2_Akamwako tekanguyirizanga, so n'omutima gwo guleme okwanguyirizanga okwogera ekigambo kyenna mu maaso ga Katonda; kubanga Katonda ali mu ggulu, naawe oli ku nsi: kale ebigambo byo bibeerenga bitono. 
21_5_3_Kubanga ekirooto kijjira wamu n'olufulube lw'emirimu; n'eddoboozi ly'omusirusiru lijjira wamu n'olufulube lw'ebigambo. 
21_5_4_Bw'oneeyamanga obweyamo eri Katonda, tolwangawo okubusasula; kubanga tasanyukira basirusiru: osasulanga ekyo kye weeyama. 
21_5_5_Waakiri oleme okweyama, okusinga okweyama n'olema okusasula. 
21_5_6_Waakiri oleme okweyama, okusinga okweyama n'olema okusasula. 
21_5_7_Kubanba bwe kituukirira bwe kityo olw'olufulube lw'ebirooto n'obutaliimu n'ebigambo ebingi: naye ggwe otyanga Katonda. 
21_5_8_Bw'onoolabanga abaavu nga babajooga, era nga balya ensonga olw'amaanyi ne banyoola omusango mu ssaza, teweewuunyanga kigambo ekyo: kubanga asinga abagulumivu obugulumivu assaayo omwoyo; era waliwo abasinga bo obugulumivu. 
21_5_9_Nate ekyengera eky'ettaka kiba kya bonna: kabaka yennyini ennimiro emuweereza. 
21_5_10_Ayagala ffeeza takkutenga ffeeza; so n'oyo ayagala obungi, ekyengera tekiimukkusenga: era n'ekyo butaliimu. 
21_5_11_Ebintu bwe byeyongera, n'abo ababirya ne beeyongera: kale magoba ki nannyini byo g'afuna, wabula okubiraba obulabi n'amaaso ge? 
21_5_12_Otulo otw'omukozi w'emirimu tumuwoomera, oba nga alya bitono oba nga bingi: naye omukkuto ogw'omugagga tegumuganya kwebaka. 
21_5_13_Waliwo ekibi ekinene kye nnalaba wansi w'eggulu, kye kino, obugagga nnyini bwo bw'akuuma ne yeerumya yekka: 
21_5_14_obugagga obwo ne buzikirira olw'ebigambo ebibi ebiggwaawo; era bw'aba ng'azadde omwana, nga temuli kintu mu mukono gwe. 
21_5_15_Nga bwe yava mu lubuto lwa nnyina, ng'ali bwereere, bw'atyo bw'aliddayo, nga bwe yajja, so talitwala kintu olw'okutegana kwe, ky'ayinza okutwala mu mukono gwe. 
21_5_16_Era n'ekyo kibi kinene, ng'aligenda ng'ali bw'atyo mu bigambo byonna era; nga bwe yajja: era magoba ki g'alina n'okutegana n'ateganira mpewo? 
21_5_17_Era ennaku ze zonna aliira mu kizikiza, era yeeraliikitira tmyo, era abaako endwadde n'obusungu. 
21_5_18_Laba, ekyo kye nnalaba nga kye kiwooma kye kisaana kye kino, omuntu okulyanga n'okunywanga n'okusanyukiranga ebirungi mu kutegana kwe kwonna kw'ategana wansi w'enjuba ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwe Katonda bwe yamuwa: kubanga ogwo gwe mugabo gwe. 
21_5_19_Era buli muntu Katonda gw'awadde obugagga n'ebintu, era ng'amuwadde obuyinza okulyangako n'okuddiranga omugabo gwe n'okusanyukiranga okutegana kwe; ekyo kye kirabo kya Katonda. 
21_5_20_Kubanga talijjukira nnyo ennaku ez'obulamu bwe; kubanga Katonda amuddamu olw'okusanyuka kw'omutima gwe. 
21_6_1_Waliwo ekibi kye nnalaba wansi w'enjuba, era kizitoowerera abantu: 
21_6_2_omuntu Katonda gw'awa obugagga n'ebintu n'ekitiibwa, n'okubulwa n'atabulwa kintu olw'emmeeme ye ku ebyo byonna bye yeegomba, naye Katonda n'atamuwa buyinza kubiryako, naye omugenyi ye abirya; ekyo butaliimu, era ye ndwadde embi. 
21_6_3_Omuntu bw'azaala abaana kikumi, n'awangaala emyaka mingi, ennaku ez'emyaka gye ne ziba nnyingi, naye emmeeme ye n'etekkuta birungi, era nate: n'ataba na kuziikibwa; njogera ng'omwana omusowole amusinga oyo: 
21_6_4_kubanga ajjira mu butaliimu n'agendera mu kizikiza, n'erinnya lye libikkibwako ekizikiza 
21_6_6_weewaawo, newakubadde ng'awangaala emyaka lukumi emirundi ebiri, naye n'atasanyukira birungi: bonna tebadde mu kifo kimu? 
21_6_7_Okutegana kwonna okw'omuntu kuba kwe kamwa ke, era naye okwegomba tekukkuta. 
21_6_8_Kubanga omugezigezi asinga atya omusirusiru? oba omwavu alina ki, amanyi okutambulira mu maaso g'abalamu? 
21_6_9_Okulaba n'amaaso kwe kusinga okutambulatambula n'omwoyo ogwegomba: era n’ekyo butaliimu na kugoberera mpewo. 
21_6_10_Buli ekyabaawo, erinnya lyakyo lyatuumibwa dda, era kimanyibwa nga muntu so tayinza kuwakanya oyo amusinga amaanyi. 
21_6_11_Kubanga waliwo ebintu bingi ebyongera ku butaliimu, omuntu yeeyongera ki okugasa? 
21_6_12_Kubanga ani amanyi ekisaanira omuntu mu bulamu bwe, ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwe obutaliimu bw'amalawo ng'ekisiikirize? kubanga ani ayinza okubuulira omuntu ebinaabnga oluvannyuma lwe wansi w'enjuba? 
21_7_1_Erinnya eddungi lisinga amafuta ag'omugavu ag'omuwendo omungi; n'olunaku olw'okufiiramu lusinga olunaku olw'okuzaalirwamu. 
21_7_2_Okugenda mu, nnYumba ey'okuwuubaaliramu, kusinga okugenda mu nnyumba ey'okuliiramu embaga: kubanga eyo ye nkomerero y'abantu bonna; n'omulamu alikiteeka ku mutima gwe. 
21_7_3_Ennaku zisinga enseko: kubanga obuyinike bw'amaaso bwe busannyusa omutima. 
21_7_4_Omutima gw'abagezigezi guba mu nnyumba ey'okuwuubaaliramu; naye omutima gw'abasirusiru guba mu nnyumba ey'ebinyumu. 
21_7_5_Okuwulira okunenya kw'omugezigezi kusinga okuwulira oluyimba olw'abasirusiru. 
21_7_6_Kubanga amaggwa nga bwe gatulikira wansi w'entamu, enseko z'omusirusiru bwe ziba bwe zityo: era n'ezo butaliimu 
21_7_7_Mazima obukamuzi bufuula omugezigezi okuba omusirusiru; era enguzi emalamu okutegeera. 
21_7_8_Enkomerero y'elugambo esinga obulungi okusooka kwakyo: alina omwoyo ogugriza asinga alina omwoyo ogw'amalala. 
21_7_9_Toyangayirizanga mu mwoyo gwo okusunguwala: kubanga obusungu bubeera mu kifuba ky'abasirusiru. 
21_7_10_Toyogeranga nti Nsonga ki ennaku ez'edda kyezaavanga zisinga zinno? kubanga tobuuza kino lwa magezi. 
21_7_11_Amagezi genkana obulungi obusika: weewaawo, gasinga okuwooma eri abo abalaba enjuba. 
21_7_12_Kubanga amagezi kigo, nb'a ffeeza bw'eri ekigo: naye okumanya kyekuva kusinga obulungi, kubanga annagezi gakuuma obulamu bwa nnyini go. 
21_7_13_Lowooza omulimu gwa Katonda: kubanga ani ayinza okuluŋŋamya ekyo ye kye yanyoola? 
21_7_14_Osanyukiranga ku lunaku olw'okulabiramu omukisa, era olowoolezanga ku lunaku olw'okulabiramu ennaku: Katonda yaliraanya olwo ku mabbali g'olwo, omuntu alemenga okulaba ekintu kyonna e.kiriba oluvannyuma lwe. 
21_7_15_Ebyo byonna nabirabira mu nnaku ez'obutaliimu bwange: waliwo omuntu omutuukirivu azikirira mu butuukirivu bwe, era waliwo omuntu omubi awangaalira mu kukola obubi bwe. 
21_7_16_Tosukkiriranga kuba mutuukirivu; so teweefuulanga asukkiriza amagezi: lwaki ggwe okwezikiriza? 
21_7_17_Tosukkiriranga kuba mubi, so tobanga musirusiru: Iwaki ggwe okufa ekiseera kyo nga tekinnatuuka? 
21_7_18_Kirungi okwatenga ekyo; weewaawo, na kiri tokiggyaako mukono gwo: kubanga atya Katonda anaavanga mu byonna. 
21_7_19_Amagezi maanyi eri omugezigezi okusinga abafuga kkumi abali mu kibuga. 
21_7_20_Mazima tewali muntu mutuukirivu ku nsi akola ebirungi n'atayonoona. 
21_7_21_Era tossaayo mwoyo eri ebigambo byonna ebyogerwa; olemenga okuwulira omuddu wo ng'akukolimira: 
21_7_22_kubanga emirundi mingi omutima gwo ggwe nagwo gumanyi nga naawe bw'otyo wakolimira abalala. 
21_7_23_Ebyo byonna nabikema lwa magezi: nayogera nti Ndiba mugezigezi; naye ne gambeera wala. 
21_7_24_Ekiriwo kiri wala era kigenda wansi nnyo; ani ayinza okukikebeera? 
21_7_25_Nakyuka, omutima gwa nge ne ngukakasa okumanyanga n'okuketmeenyanga, n'okunoonya nga amagezi n'ensonga z'ebigambo n'okumanyanga ng'obubi busiru siru, era ng'obusirusiru ddalu: 
21_7_26_era ndaba ekigambo ekising okufa okubalagala, ye mukazi, omu tima gwe byambika n'ebitimba; n'e mikono gye giri ng'enjegese: bu asanyusa Katonda alimuwona; nayalina ebibi alikwatibwa ye. 
21_7_27_Laba, kino kyokka kye nnalaba nga Katonda yakola abantu nga bagolokofu; naye bo ne banoonya bingi bye baagunja. 
21_7_28_Laba, kino kyokka kye nnalaba nga Katonda yakola abantu nga bagolokofu; naye bo ne banoonya bingi bye baagunja. 
21_8_1_Ani ali ng'omugezigezi? era ani amanyi ekigambo bwe kitegeezebwa? Amagezi g'omuntu ganyiriza amaaso ge, n'obukakanyavu bw'amaaso ge ne buwaanyisibwa. 
21_8_2_Nkuweerera ebigambo, nti Okwatanga ekiragiro kya kabaka, era kyova okola bw'otyo olw'ekirayiro kya Katonda: 
21_8_3_Toyanguyirizanga kuva w'ali; tolemeranga mu kigambo ekibi: kubanga akola buli ky'ayagala. 
21_8_4_Kubanga ekigambo kya kabaka kirina obuyinza; era ani ayinza okumugamba nti Okola ki? 
21_8_5_Buli akwata ekiragiro talibaako kigambo kibi ky'alimanya; n'omutima gw'Omuntu omugezigezi gwawula ekiseera n'okuteesa: 
21_8_6_kubanga buli kigambo ky'oyagala okukola kibaako ekiseera kyakyo n'okuteesa kwakyo; kubanga obuyinike bw'omuntu bumuzitoowerera nnyo: 
21_8_7_kubanga tamanyi ekiribaawo: kubanga ani ayinza okumubuulira bwe kiriba? 
21_8_8_Tewali muntu alina obuyinza ku mwoyo okuziyiza omwoyo; so talina buyinza ku lunaku olw'okufiiramu; so mu ntalo ezo temuli kusindikibwa: so n'obubi tebulimuwonya oyo abugoberera. 
21_8_9_Ebyo byonna nabiraba, ne nzisaayo omutima gwange eri buli mulimu ogukolebwa wansi w'enjuba: wabaawo ekiseera omuntu omu bw'abeera n'obuyinza ku mulala olw'okumukola obubi. 
21_8_10_Era nate nalaba ababi nga babaziika, ne bajja eri entaana; n'abo abaakolanga eby'ensonga ne bagenda nga bava mu kifo ekitukuvu, ne beerabirwa mu kibuga: era n'ekyo butaliimu. 
21_8_11_Kubanga omusango ogusatirwa ekikolwa ekibi tebagutuukiriza mangu, omutima gw'abaana b'abantu kyeguva gukakasibwa ddala mu bo okukola obubi. 
21_8_12_Alina ebibi newakubadde ng'akola obubi emirundi kkumi n'awangaala nnyo, era naye mazima mmanyi ng'abo abatya Katonda banaabanga bulungi, abatya mu masso ge: 
21_8_13_naye omubi taabenga bulungi, so taliwangaala nnaku nayingi eziri ng'ekisiikirize; kubanga tatya mu maaso ga Katonda. 
21_8_14_Waliwo obutaliimu obukolebwa ku nsi; nga waliwo abantu abatuukirivu abagwibwako ebiriŋŋanga omulimu ogw'ababi; naye waliwo abantu ababi abagwibwako ebiriŋŋanga omtilimu ogw'abatuukirivu: ne njogera nga n'ekyo butaliimu. 
21_8_15_Awo ne nsiima ebinyumu, kubanga omuntu talina kintu kyonna ekisinga obulungi wansi w'enjuba wabula okulyanga n'okunywanga n'okusanyukanga: kubanga ebyo binaabeeranga naye mu kutegana kwe ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwe Katonda bw'amuwadde wansi w'enjuba. 
21_8_16_Bwe nnassaayo omutima gwange okumanya amagezi, n'okulaba emirimu egikolebwa ku nsi: (kubanga waliwo era atafuna tulo mu maaso ge emisana n'ekiro:) 
21_8_17_awo ne ndaba omulimu gwonna ogwa Katonda; omuntu nga tayinza kukebera mulimu ogukolebwa wansi w'enjuba: kubanga omuntu ne bw'ategana atya okugukebera, naye taligulaba; weewaawo, nate omugezigezi ne bw'alowooza okugumaaya, nate taliyinza kugulaba. 
21_9_1_Kubanga ebyo byonna nabiteeka ku mutima gwange, okuketta ebyo byonna; ng'abatuukirivu n'abagezigezi n'emirimu gyabwe bali mu mukono gwa Katonda: oba nga kwagala oba nga kukyawa omuntu takumanyi: byonna biri mu mberi yaabwe. 
21_9_2_Byonna byenkana okujjira bonna: waliwo ekigambo ekimu eri omutuukirivu n'omubi; eri omulungi n'eri omuIongoofu n'eri atali mulongoofu; eri oyo asala ssaddaaka n'eri oyo atasala ssaddaaka: ng'omulungi bw'ali, alina ebibi bw'ali bw'atyo; n'oyo alayira ali ng'oyo arya ekirayiro. 
21_9_3_Ekyo kibi mu byonna ebikolebwa wansi w'enjuba, ng'ekigambo ekimu ekibajjira bonna: weewaawo, era omutima gw'abaana b'abantu gujjudde obubi, era eddalu liri mu mutima gwabwe nga bakyali balamu, awo oluvannyuma, lw'ekyo ne badda mu bafu. 
21_9_4_Kubanga eri oyo agattibwa n'abalamu bonna waliwo essuubi: kubanga embwa ennamu ekira empologoma enfu obulungi. 
21_9_5_Kubanga abalamu bamanyi nga balifa: naye abafu tebaliiko kye bamanyi, so nga tebakyalina mpeera; kubanga ekijiukizo kyabwe kyerabirwa. 
21_9_6_Okwagala kwabwe kwenkana n'okukyawa n'obuggya bwabwe okuzikirira kaakano: so nga tebakyalina mugabo ennaku zonna mu byonna ebikolebwa wansi w'enjuba. 
21_9_7_Weegenderenga, olyenga emmere yo ng'osanyuka, onywenga omwenge gwo a'omutima ogujaguza; kubanga Katonda amaze okukkiriza emirimu gyo. 
21_9_8_Ebyambalo byo bitukulenga enaaku zonna; so n'omutwe gwo tegubulwanga mafuta. 
21_9_9_Beeranga n'omukazi gw'oyagala n'essanyu ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwo obutaliimu bw'akuwadde wansi w'enjuba, ennaku zo zonna ezitaliimu: kubanga ogwo gwe mugabo gwo mu bulamu, ne mu kutegana kwo kw'otegana wansi w'enjuba. 
21_9_10_Buli kintu omukono gwo kye gulaba okukola, okikolanga n'amaanyi go; kubanga tewali mulimu newakubadde okuteesa newakubadde okumanya newakubadde amagezi mu magombe gy'ogenda. 
21_9_11_Awo ne nzirayo ne ndaba wansi w'enjuba ng'ab'embiro si be basinga empaka ez'embiro, so n'ab'amaanyi si be basinga okulwana, so n'abagezigezi si be bafuna emmere, so n'abantu: abategeevu si be bafuna obugagga, so n'abakabakaba si be baganja; naye bonna bibagwira bttgwizi ebiseera n'ebigambo. 
21_9_12_Kubanga n'omuntu tamanyi kiseera kye: ng'ebyennyanja ebikwatibwa mu mugonjo omubi, era ng'ennyonyi ezikwatibwa mu kakunizo, era bwe batyo abaana b'abantu bateegebwa mu kiseera ekibi, bwe kibagwira nga tebamanyiridde. 
21_9_13_Era nalaba amagezi wansi w'enjuba bwe ntyo; ne gafaanana mangi gye ndi: 
21_9_14_waaliwo ekibuga ekitono n'abasajja abaali omwo si bangi; kabaka omukulu n'akitabaala, n'akizingiza, n'akizimbako amakomera amanene: 
21_9_15_awo ne walabika omwo omusajja omwavu omugezigezi, oyo n'awonya ekibuga olw'amagezi ge; era naye ne wataba muntu ajjukira omusajja oyo omwavu. 
21_9_16_Kale ne njogera nti Amagezi gasinga amaanyi obulungi: era naye amagezi g'omwavu ganyoomebwa, ebigambo bye ne batabiwulira. 
21_9_17_Ebigambo eby'abagezigezi ebyogerwa akasirise babiwulira okusinga okuleekaana kw'oyo afugira mu basirusiru. 
21_9_18_Amagezi gasinga ebyokulwanyisa: naye omu alina ebibi azikiriza ebirungi bingi. 
21_10_1_Ensowera enfu ziwunyisa ekivundu amafuta ag'omugavu ag'omufumbi wa kalifuwa: bwe kityo obusirusiru obutono bumalawo amagezi n'ekitiibwa. 
21_10_2_Omutima gw'omugezigezi guba ku mukono gwe ogwa ddyo; naye omutima gw'omusirusiru guba ku mukono gwe ogwa kkono. 
21_10_3_Era, weewaawo, omusirusiru bw'aba nga atambulira mu kkubo, okutegeera kwe ne kumuggwaako, n'agamba buli muntu nga musirusiru. 
21_10_4_Omwoyo gw'omukulu bwe gukugolokokerako, tovanga mu kifo kyo; kubanga okwemenya kukkakkanya okunyiiga okungi. 
21_10_5_Waliwo ekibi kye nnalaba wansi w'enjuba, ekiri ng'okusobya oknva eri omukulu: 
21_10_6_obusirusiru aga butuuzibwa awali ekitiibwa ekinene, atagagga ne batuula mu kifo ekya wansi 
21_10_7_Nalaba abaddu nga beebagadde embalaasi, n'abalangira nga batambula ng'abaddu ku ttaka. 
21_10_8_Asima obunnya aiibugwamu; era awagula olukomera, omusota gulimuluma. 
21_10_9_Buli asimula amayinja galimuluma; n'oyo ayasa enku zimuleetera akabi. 
21_10_10_Ekyuma bwe kikoŋŋontera, n'olema okuwagala omamwa gwakyo, kale kikugwanira okweyongera okussaako amaanyi: naye amagezi gagasa okuluŋŋamya. 
21_10_11_Omusota bwe guluma nga tegunnalogebwa, kale omulogo taliiko ky'agasa. 
21_10_12_Ebigambo eby'akamwa k'omugezigezi bya kisa; naye emimwa gy'omusirusiru girimira ye yennyini. 
21_10_13_Okusooka kw'ebigambo eby'omu kamwa ke busirusiru: n'enkamerero y'okwogera kwe ddalu erireeta akabi. 
21_10_14_Era omusirusiru ayongerayongera ebigambo: naye omuntu tamanyi ebiribaawo; n'ebiribaawo oluvannyuma lwe ani ayinza okumubuulira? 
21_10_15_Okutegana kw'abasirusiru kubakooyesa bonna kinnoomu, kubanga tamanyi w'aba ayita okugenda mu kibuga. 
21_10_16_Zikusanze, ggwe ensi, kabaka wo bw'aba nga ye mwana muto, abakulu bo ne balya enkya! 
21_10_17_Olina omukisa, ggwe ensi, kabaka wo bw'aba nga ye mwana w'abakungu, abakulu bo baliira, mu ntuuko olw'okufuna amaanyi so si lwa kutamiira! 
21_10_18_Olw'obugayaavu akasolya kabotoka; era olw'okugayaala kw'emikono ennyumba etonnya. 
21_10_19_Embaga bagifumbira kuleeta nseko, n'omwenge gusanyusa obulamu: ne ffeeza eyanukulira byonna. 
21_10_20_Tokolimiranga kabaka, newakubadde mu kulowooza kwo; so tokolimiranga mugagga mu nju yo mw'osula: kubanga ennyonyi ey'omu bbanga eritwala eddoboozi, n'ekirina ebiwaawaatiro kiribuulira ekigambo ekyo. 
21_11_1_Suulanga emmere yo ku mazzi: kubanga oligiraba ennaku nayingi nga ziyiseewo. 
21_11_2_Owenga musanvu omugabo, weewaawo, munaana; kubanga tomanyi ekibi bwe kiriba ku nsi. 
21_11_3_Ebire bwe bijjula enkuba, ne biyiika ku nsi: n'omuti bwe gugwa okwolekera obukiika obwa ddyo oba obwa kkono, mu kifo omuti mwe gugwa we gulibeera. 
21_11_4_Alabirira embuyaga talisiga; n'oyo atunuulira ebire talikungula. 
21_11_5_Nga bw’otomanyi ekkubo ery'empewo bwe liri, newakubadde amagumba bwe gakulira mu lubuto lw'oyo ali olubuto; era bw'otyo bw'otomanyi mulimu gwa Katonda akola byonna. 
21_11_6_Enkya osiganga ensigo zo, n'akawungeezi toddirizamba mukono gwo: kubanga tomanyi bwe ziri ku zo eziriraba omukisa, oba zino oba ezo, oba zonna ziryenkana okuba ennungi. 
21_11_7_Mazima omusana guwooma, era kigambo kya ssanyu amaaso okulaba enjuba.
