21_11_8_Weewaawo, omuntu bw'awangaala emyaka emingi, agisanyukirenga gyonna; naye ajjukirenga ennaku ez'ekizikiza, kubanga ziriba nnyingi. Byonna ebijja butaliimu. 
21_11_9_Sanyukiranga obuvubuka bwo, ggwe omulenzi; omutima gwo gukusanyusenga mu nnaku ez'obuvubuka bwo, otambulirenga mu makubo ag'omutima gwo ne mu kulaba kw'amaaso go: naye tegeera nga Katonda alikusalira omusango gw'ebyo byonna. 
21_11_10_Kale ggyangawo obuyinike ku mutima gwo, oggyengawo obubi ku mubiri gwo: kubanga obuto n'obuvubuka butaliimu. 
21_12_1_Era ojjuukiriranga Omutonzi wo mu biro eby'obvvubuka bwo, ennaku embi nga tezinnajja n'emyaka nga teginnasembera bw'olyogera nti Sigisaayukira n'akamu 
21_12_3_ku lunaku abakuumi b'ennyumba kwe balikankanira, abasajja ab'amaanyi ne bakutama, n'abo abasa ne balekayo kubanga batono, n'abo abalingiza mu madirisa ne bazikizibwa, 
21_12_4_enzigi ne ziggalwawo mu luguudo; eddoboozi ery'okusa nga likkakkaaye, ne wabaawo ayimuka olw'okukaaba kw'enayony, n'abawala bonna ab'okuyimba bwe balikkakkanyizibwa 
21_12_6_omugwa ogwa ffeeza nga tegunnasumulukuka, n'ekibya ekya zaabu nga tekinnamenyeka, n'ensuwa nga tennayatika ku luzzi ne nnamuziga nga tannayatika ku kidiba 
21_12_8_Obutaliimu obusinga obutaliimu bwonna, bw'ayogera Omubuulizi; byonna butaliimu. 
21_12_9_Era nate kubanga Omubuulizi yalina amagezi, ne yeeyongera okuyigiriza abantu okumanya; weewaawo, yafumiitirizanga n'anoonya n'aliraanya engero nnyingi. 
21_12_10_Omubuulzi yanoonya okulaba ebigambo ebikkirizibwa, n'ebyo ebyawandiikibwa n'obugolokofu, bye bigambo eby'amazima. 
21_12_11_Ebigambo eby'abagezigezi biri ng'emiwunda, era ebigambo eby'ebifunvu by'amakuŋŋaaniro biri ng'enninga ezikomererwa obulungi, ebiweebwa okuva eri omusumba omu. 
21_12_12_Era nate, mwana wange, labuka: okukolanga ebitabo ebingi tekuliiko gye kukoma; n'okuyiga ennyo kukooya omubiri. 
21_12_13_Ekigambo ekyo we kikoma wano; byonna biwuliddwa: otyanga Katonda, okwatanga ebiragiro bye; kubanga ekyo bye byonna ebigwanira omuntu. 
21_12_14_Kubanga Katonda alisala omusango gwa buli mulimu, wamu na buli kigambo ekyakwekebwa, oba nga kirungi oba nga kibi. 
22_1_1_Oluyimba olusinga ennyimba, lwe lwa Sulemaani 
22_1_2_Annywegere n'okuaywegera kw'akamwa ke: Kubanga okwagala kwo kusinga omwenge obulungi. 
22_1_3_Amafuta go gawunya akaloosa; Erinnya lyo liringanga amafuta agafukibwa; Abawala abatamanyi musajja kyebava bakwagala. 
22_1_4_Mpalula tunaakugoberera mbiro: Kabaka annyingizizza mu bisenge bye: Tunaakusanyukira ne tujaguza, Okwagala kwo tunaakwogerako okusinga omwenge: Bakwagala lwa nsonga. 
22_1_5_Ndi muddugavu, naye mulungi, Mmwe abawala ba Yerusaalemi, Ng'eweema ez'e Kedali. Ng'amagigi ga Sulemaani. 
22_1_6_Temuntunuulira kubanga ndi muddugavu. Kubanga omusana gunjokezza. Abaana ba mmange bansuguwalira, Banfuula omukuumi w'ensuku ez'emizabbibu; Naye olusuku lwange nze saalukuuma. 
22_1_7_Mbuulira, ggwe emmeeme yange gw'eyagala, Gy'oliisiza ekisibo kyo, gy'okigalamiriza mu ttuntu; Kubanga nandibeeredde ki ng'ayambadde ekibikka ku maaso Awali ebisibo bya banno? 
22_1_8_Oba nga tomanyi, ggwe asinga abakazi bonna obulungi, Fuluma okwate ekkubo ogoberere ebigere by'endiga zo, Oliisize abaana b'embuzi zo awali eweema ez'abasumba. 
22_1_9_Nkufaananyizza, ai muganzi wange, Embalaasi eri ku magaali ga Falaawo. 
22_1_10_Amatama go malungi n'emivumbo emirange, Ensingo yo nnungi n'embu ez'eby'obuyonjo. 
22_1_11_Tunaakukolera emivumbo egya zaabu N'amapeesa aga ffeeza. 
22_1_12_Kabaka bwe yali ng'atudde ku mmeeza ye, Amafuta gange ag'omugavu ne gawunya akaloosa kaago. 
22_1_13_Muganzi wange ali gye ndi ng'ekisaaganda ky'ebimuli ebya kofera. Mu nsuku ez'emizabbibu ez'e Engedi. 
22_1_15_Laba, oli mulungi, gwe njagala; laba, oli mulungi; Amaaso go mayiba. 
22_1_16_Laba, oli mulungi, muganzi wange, weewaawo, wa kusanyusa: Era ekitanda kyaffe kya malagala mato. 
22_1_17_Emikiikiro gy'ennyumba yaffe mivule, N'enzooba zaffe nkanaga: 
22_2_1_Nze ndi kimyula kya Saloni, Eddanga ery'omu biwonvu. 
22_2_2_Ng'eddanga mu maggwa, Gwe njagala bw'ali bw'atyo mu bawala. 
22_2_3_Ng'omucungwa mu miti egy'omu kibira, Muganzi wange bw'ali bw'atyo mu balenzi. Natuula wansi w'ekisiikirize kye n'essanyu lingi, Ebibala bye ae biwoomera amatama gange. 
22_2_4_Yannyingiza mu nju ey'okuliiramu embaga, Ne bendera ye eyali ku nze kwagala: 
22_2_5_Munkwatirire n'ezabbibu enkalu, munsanyuse n'amacungwa; Kubanga okwagala kundwazizza. 
22_2_6_Omukono gwe ogwa kkono guli wansi w'omutwe gwange, N'omukono gwe ogwa ddyo gunkutte. 
22_2_7_Mbalayiza, mmwe abawala ba Yerusaalemi, w'empeewo n'enjaza ez'omu ttale, Muleme okugolokosa newakubadde okuzuukusa okwagala, Okutuusa we kunaayagalira. 
22_2_8_Eddoboozi lya muganzi wange! laba, ajja, Ng'abuukirabuukira ku nsozi, ng'azinira ku busozi. 
22_2_9_Muganzi wange ali ng'empeewo oba ennangaazi ento: Laba ayimirira ennyuma w'olukomera lwaffe, Alingiza mu ddirisa, Yeeraga ng'alabikira mu mulimi ogulukibwa ogw'omu: kituli. 
22_2_10_Muganzi wange yayogera n'aŋŋamba Nti Golokoka, gwe njagala, omu. lungi gye ndi, tugende tuveewo. 
22_2_11_Kubanga, laba, ttoggo aweddeko Enkuba eyise egenze; 
22_2_12_Ebimuli birabise ku ttaka; Ebiro bituuse ennyonyi mwe ziyimbira, N'eddoboozi lya kaamukuukulu liwulirwa mu nsi yaffe; 
22_2_13_Omutiini gwengeza ettiini zaagwo embisi, N'emizabbibu gimulisizza, Giwunya akaloosa kaagyo. Golokoka, gwe njagala, omulungi gye ndi, tugende tuveewo. 
22_2_14_Ai ejjiba lyange, abeera mu njatika ez'omu jjinja, rot bwekwekero obw'ebbanga, Ndabe amaaso go, mpulire eddoboozi lyo; Kubanga eddoboozi lyo ddungi n'amaaso go ga kusanyusa. 
22_2_15_Mutukwatire ebibe, ebibe ebito ebyonoona ensuku ez'emizabbibu; Kubanga ensuku zaffe ez'emizabbibu zimulisizza. 
22_2_16_Muganzi wange wange, nange ndi wuwe: Aliisizza ekisibo kye mu malanga. 
22_2_17_Okutuusa obudde nga bukedde ebisiikirize ne biddukira ddala, Kyuka, muganzi wange, obe ng'empeewo oba ennangaazi ento Ku nsozi eza Beseri. 
22_3_1_Ekiro ku kitanda kyange nanoonya omusajja emmeeme yangi gw'eyagala: Namunoonya naye ne ssimu laba. 
22_3_2_Ne njogera nti Naagolokoka kaakano ne ntambulatambula mu kibuga, Mu nguudo ne mu bifo ebigazi, Nanoonya omusajja emmeeme yange gw'eyagala: Namunoonya, naye ne ssimulaba . 
22_3_3_Abakuumi abatambulatambula mu kibuga ne bandaba: Ne mbagamba nti Mulabye oyo emmeeme yange gw'eyagala? 
22_3_4_Nnali mbayiseeko katono, Ne ndaba oyo emmeeme yange gw'eyagala: Ne mmunyweza ne ssikkiriza kumuta, Okutuusa lwe nnamuleeta mu nnyumba ya mmange, Ne mu kisenge ky'oyo anzaala. 
22_3_5_Mbalayiza, mmwe abawala ba Yerusaalemi, Olw'empeewo n'enjaza ez'omu ttale, Muleme okugolokosa newakubadde okuzuukusa okwagala, Okutuusa we kunaayagalira. 
22_3_6_Ani ono ajja ng'alinnya ng'ava mu ddungu afaanana empagi ez'emikka, Asiigibwa eby'akaloosa ebya mooli n'omugavu, N'eddagala lyonna ery'omusuubuzi? 
22_3_7_Laba, ke kadyeri ka Sulemaani; Abasajja ab'amaanyi nkaaga bakeetoolodde, Ku basajja ab'amaanyi aba Isiraeri. 
22_3_8_Bonna bakwata ekitala, ba magezi okulwana: Buli muntu yeesiba ekitala kye mu kiwato, Olw'entiisa ekiro. 
22_3_9_Kabaka Sulemaani yeekolera eggaali Ey'emiti egy'oku Lebanooni. 
22_3_10_Empagi zaayo yazikola za ffeeza. Wansi waayo zaabu, entebe yaayo lugoye lwa ffulungu, Wakati waayo nga waalire n'okwagala, Okuva eri abawala ba Yerusaalemi. 
22_3_11_Mufulume, mmwe abawala ba Sayuuni, mutunuulire kabaka Sulemaani, Ng'alina engule nnyina gy'amutikkiridde ku lunaku kw'afumbiriddwa, Era ku lunaku omutima gwe kwe gusanyukira. 
22_4_1_Laba, oli mulungi, gwe njagala; laba, oli mulungi; Amaaso go mayiba ennyuma w'olugoye lw'ogabisseeko: Enviiri zo ziri ng'eggana ly'embuzi, Ezigalaaudde ku mbiriizi z'olusozi Gireyaadi. 
22_4_2_Amannyo go gali ng'eggana ly'endiga ezaakajja zisalibweko ebyoya, Ezirinnye okuva mu kunaazibwa; Buli emu ku zo ng'ezadde abaana abalongo, So tekuli ku zo efiiriddwa n'emu. 
22_4_3_Emimwa gyo giri ng'ewuzi ey'olugoye olutwakaavu, N'akamwa ko kalungi: Ekyenyi kyo kiri ng'ekitundu ky'ekkomamawanga Ennyuma w'olugoye lw'obisse ku maaso. 
22_4_4_Ensingo yo eri ng'ekigo kya Dawudi ekyazimbibwa okuterekamu ebyokulwanyisa, Omuwanikibwa engabo olukumi, Engabo zonna ez'abasajja ab'amaanyi. 
22_4_5_Amabeere. go gombi gali ng'abalongo ababiri abaana b'empeewo, Abaliira mu malanga. 
22_4_6_Okutuusa obudde nga bukedde, ebisiikirize ne biddukira ddala, Neegendera eri olusozi oiwa mooli. N'eri akosozi ak'omugavu. 
22_4_7_Oli mulungi wenna, gwe ajagala; So ku ggwe tekuli bbala. 
22_4_8_Jjangu tugende ffembi okuva ku Lebanooni, mugole wange, Ffembi okuva ku Lebanooni: Lengera ng'oyima ku ntikko ya Amana, Ku ntikko ya Seniri ne Kerumooni, Ng'oyima awali empuku ey'empologoma, Ku nsozi ez'engo. 
22_4_9_Osanyusizza omutima gwange mwannyinaze, mugole wange Osanyusizza omutima gwange n'eriiso lyo erimu, N'omukuufu ogumu ogw'omi bulago bwo. 
22_4_10_Okwagala kwo nga kulungi mwannyinaze, mugole wange Okwagala kwo nga kusinga nny omwenge; N'amafuta go ag'omugavu nga gasinga nnyo eby'akaloosa eby'engeri zonna okuwunya obulungi! 
22_4_11_Emimwa gyo, ai mugole wange, gitonnya ag'ebisenge by'enjuki: Omubisi gw'enjuki n'amata biri wansi w'olulimi lwo; N'okuwunya kw'ebyambalo byo kuli ng'okuwunya kwa Lebanooni. 
22_4_12_Mwannyinaze, mugole wange, lwe lusuku olwasibibwa; Lwe luzzi olwasibibwa, ye nsulo eyateekebwako akabonero. 
22_4_13_Ebimera byo lusuku lwa mikomamawanga, olulina ebibala eby'omuwendo omungi; Kofera n'emiti egy'omugavu: 
22_4_14_Omugavu ne kalikomu, Kalamo ne kinamomo, n'emiti gyonna egy'omugavu; Mooli ne akalosi, wamu n'eby'akaloosa byonna ebisinga obulungi. 
22_4_15_Omugavu ne kalikomu, Kalamo ne kinamomo, n'emiti gyonna egy'omugavu; Mooli ne akalosi, wamu n'eby'akaloosa byonna ebisinga obulungi. 
22_4_16_Muzuukuke, mmwe embuyaga eziva obukiika obwa kkono; nammwe mujje, ez’obukika obwa ddyo: Mukuntire ku nnimiro ynge, eby’akaloosa ebyamu bikulukute. Muganzi wange ajje mu nnimiro ye; Alye ebibala bye eby'omuwendo omungi. 
22_5_1_Nzize mu nnimiro yange, mwannyinaze mugole wange: Nnoze mooli yange n'eby'akaloosa byange; Ndidde ebisenge byange eby'enjuki n'omubisi gwange; Nnywedde omwenge gwange n'amata gange. Mulye, mmwe ab'omukwano; Munywe, weewaawo, mukkute, mmwe baganzi bange. 
22_5_2_Nnali neebase, naye omutima gwange nga gulaba: Lye ddoboozi lya muganzi wange, akoona ng'ayogera nti Nzigulira, mwannyinaze, gwe njagala, ejjiba lyange, owange ataliiko bbala: Kubanga omutwe gwange gutobye omusulo, Emivumbo gy'eaviiri zange gitobye amatondo eg'ekiro. 
22_5_3_Nnyambudde ekizibawo kyange; naakyambala ntya? Nnaabye ebigere: naabyonoona ntya? 
22_5_4_Muganzi wange n'ayingiza omukono gwe awali ekituli eky'omu luggi, Omwoyo ne gunnuma ku lulwe. 
22_5_5_Ne ngolokoka okuggulirawo muganzi wange; Emikono gyange ne gitonnya mooli, N'engala zange nga zitonnya mooli ekulukuta, Ku mikonda egy'ekisiba. 
22_5_6_Ne nzigulirawo muganzi wange; Naye muganzi wange yali nga yeegendedde, ng'avuddewo. Omwoyo gwange gubadde guntyemuse bw'ayogedde: Ne mmunoonya, naye ne ssiyinza kumulaba; Ne mmuyita, naye n'atanziramu. 
22_5_7_Abakuumi abatambulatambula mu kibuga ne bandaba, Ne bankuba ne banfumita; Abakuumi ba bbugwe ne banziyako omunagiro gwange. 
22_5_8_Abakuumi abatambulatambula mu kibuga ne bandaba, Ne bankuba ne banfumita; Abakuumi ba bbugwe ne banziyako omunagiro gwange. 
22_5_9_Muganzi wo, kye ki okusinga omuganzi omulala, Ggwe akira abakazi bonna obulungi? Muganzi wo kye ki okusinga omuganzi omulala, N'okulayiza n'otulayiza bw'otyo? 
22_5_10_Muganzi wange mutukuvu era mumyufu Atabula mu kakumi. 
22_5_11_Omutwe gwe guli nga zaabu ennungi ennyo nnyini, Emivumbo gy'enviiri ze gya masadde era middugavu nga nnamuŋŋoona. 
22_5_12_Amaaso ge gali ng'amayiba ku mabbali g'obugga obw'amazzi; Agaanaazibwa n'amata era agaateekebwamu obulungi. 
22_5_13_Amatama ge gali ng'omusiri ogw'emiddo egy'akaloosa, ng'ebifunvu ebimerako enva eziwunya obulungi: Emimwa gye giri ng'amalanga, nga gitonnya mooli ekulukuta. 
22_5_14_Emikono gye giri ng'empeta eza zaabu eziteekebwamu berulo: Omubiri gwe guli ng'omulimu ogw'amasanga ogubikkiddwako safiro. 
22_5_15_Amagulu ge gali ag'empagi ez'amayinja amanyirivu ezisimbibwa ku binnya ebya zaabu ennungi: Enfaanana ye eri nga Lebanooni, ewooma nnyo nayini ag'emivule. 
22_5_16_kamwa ke kalungi nnyo nnyini: weewaawo, yenna wa kwagalwa. Muganzi wange bw'ali bw'atyo, era bw'ali bw'atyo mukwano gwange, Mmwe abawala ba Yerusaalemi. 
22_6_1_Muganzi wo agenze wa, Ggwe akia abakazi bonna obulungi? Muganzi wo yeekyusiririzza wa, Tumunoonyeze wamu naawe? 
22_6_2_Muganzi wange aserengetedde mu nnimiro ye mu misiri egy'emiddo egy'akaloosa, Okuliira mu nnimiro, n'okunoga amalanga. 
22_6_3_Nze ndi wa muganzi wange, ne muganzi wange wange: Aliisa ekisibo kye mu malanga. 
22_6_4_Oli mulungi, ai gwe njagala, nga Tiruza, Owooma nga Yerusaalemi, Wa ntiisa ag'eggye eririna ebendera. 
22_6_5_Nziyaako amaso go, Kubanga gampangudde. Enviiri zo ziri ng'eggana ly'embuzi, Ezigalamira ku mbiriizi z'olusozi Gireyaadi. 
22_6_6_Amannyo go,gali ng'eggana ly'endiga enkazi, Ezirinnye okuva mu kunaazibwa; Buli emu ku zo ng'ezadde abaana abalongo, So tekuli ku zo efiiriddwa n'emu. 
22_6_7_Ekyenyi kyo kiri ng'ekitundu ky'ekkomamawanga Ennyuma w'olugoye lw'obisse ku maaso. 
22_6_8_Waliwo bakabaka abakazi nkaaga, n'abazaana kinaana, N'abawala abatamanyi musajja abatabalika. 
22_6_9_Ejjiba lyange, owange ataliiko bbala, ali omu yekka; Mwana wa nnyina omu yekka; Mulonde w'omukazi amuzaala. Abawala baamulaba ne bamuyita eyaweebwa omukisa; Bakabaka abakazi n'abazaana baamulaba ne bamutendereza. 
22_6_10_Ani oyo atunula ng'emmambya: Omulungi ng'omwezi, Atangalijja ng'enjuba, Ow'entiisa ng'eggye eririna ebendera? 
22_6_11_N'aserengetera mu nnimiro ey'emmere erimu emiramwa, Okulaba ebisimbe ebibisi eby'omu kiwonvu, Okulaba omuzabbibu oba nga gumulisizza, N'emikomamawanga oba nga gyanyizza. 
22_6_12_Nga sinnamanya emmeeme yange ne nteeka Mu magaali g'abantu bange ab'ekikungu. 
22_6_13_Komawo, komawo, ggwe Omusulamu; Komawo, komawo, tukutunuulire. Kiki ekibaagaza okutunuulira Omusulamu, Ng'amazina ga Makanayimu? 
22_7_1_Ebigere byo nga birungi mu ngatto, ggwe omwana w'omulangira! Ennyingo z'ebisambi byo ziri ng'eby'obuyonjo, Omulimu ogw'emikono gy'omukozi omukabakaba. 
22_7_2_Ekkundi lyo kikompe kyekulungirivu, Omutabuze mwenge gwonna ogutabulwa: Olubuto lwo ntuumu ya nnaano Eyonjebwa n'amalanga. 
22_7_3_Amabeere go gombi gali ng'abalongo ababiri Abaana b'empeewo. 
22_7_4_Ensingo yo eri ng'ekigo eky'amasanga; Amaaso go gali nga ebidiba ebiri mu Kesuboni, awali omulyango ogw'e Basulabbimu: Ennyindo yo eri ng'ekigo eky'oku Lebanooni Ekyolekera Ddamasiko. 
22_7_5_Omutwe gwo guli ku ggwe nga Kalumeeri, N'enviiri ez'oku mutwe gwo ng'olugoye olw'effulungu; Kabaka emibumbo gyazo gimusiba. 
22_7_6_Ng'oli mulungi, ng'owoomerera, Ai gwe njagala, olw'okusanyusa! 
22_7_7_Obuwanvu bwo buno buli ng'olukindu, N'amabeere go ng'ebirimba by'ezabbibu. 
22_7_8_Nayogera nti Naalinya mu lukindu olwo, Naakwata amatabi gaalwo: Amabeere go gabe ng'ebirimba eby'oku muzabbibu, N'akawoowo k'omukka gwo ng'amacungwa 
22_7_10_Nze ndi wa muganzi wange, N'okwegomba kwe kuli eri nze. 
22_7_11_Jjangu, muganzi wange, tufulume mu nsiko; Tusule mu byalo. 
22_7_12_Tugende mu.nsuku z'emizabbibu mu makya; Tulabe omuzabbibu oba nga giunulisizza, n'ekimuli kyagwo oba nga kyeyanjuluzza, N'emikomamawanga oba nga gyanyizza: Naakuweera eyo okwagala kwange. 
22_7_13_Amadudayimu gawunya kaloosa, Ne ku nzigi zaffe waliwo ebibala eby'omuwendo omungi eby'e ngeri zonna, ebiggya n'ebikadde, Bye nkuterekedde, ai muganzi wange. 
22_8_1_Singa obadde nga muganda wange, Eyayonka amabeere ga mmange Bwe nnandikulabye ebweru, nandikunywegedde; Weewaawo, so tewandibaddewo eyandinnyoomye. 
22_8_2_Nandikulese ne nkuyingiza mu nnyumba ya mmange, Eyandinjigirizza; Nandikunywesezza omwenge ogutabuddwamu eby'akaloosa, Ku mazzi g'ekkomamawanga lyange. 
22_8_3_Omukono gwe ogwa kkono gwandibadde wansi w'omutwe gw'ange, N'omukono gwe ogwa ddyo gwandimpambaatidde. 
22_8_4_Mbalayiza, mmwe abawala ba Yerusaalemi, Muleme okugolokosa newakubadde okuzuukusa okwagala, Okutuusa we kunaayagalira. 
22_8_5_Mukazi ki ono ajja ng'alinnya okuva mu ddungu, Nga yeesigama ku muganzi we? Nakuzukusa wansi w'omucungwa: Eyo nnyoko gye yalumirwa okukuzaala, Eyo gye Yalumirwa oyo eyakuzaala. 
22_8_6_Nteeka ku mutima gwo ng'akabonero, ku mukono gwo ng'akabonero: Kubanga okwagala kwenkana okufa amaanyi; Obuggya bwenkana amagombe obukambwe: Okumyansa kwabwo kumyansa kwa muliro, Okwokya kwennyini okwa Mukama. 
22_8_7_Amazzi amangi tegayinza kuzikiza kwagala, So n'ebitaba tebiyinza kukutta: Omuntu bw'akkiriza okuwaayo ebintu byonna eby'omu nnyumba ye olw'okwagala, Yandinyoomereddwa ddala. 
22_8_8_Tulina mwannyinaffe omuto, Era tannaba na mabeere: Tulimukola turya mwannyinaffe Ku lunaku lwe balimwogererezaako? 
22_8_9_Oba nga bbugwe, Tulimuzimbako ekigo kya ffeeza, Era oba nga luggi, Tulimubikkako embaawo ez'emivule. 
22_8_10_Ndi bbugwe, n'amabeere gange gali ng'ebigo byako: Ne ndyoka mbeera mu maaso ge ng'omuntu alabye emirembe. 
22_8_11_Sulemaani yalina olusuku lw'emizabbibu e Baalukamooni; Yasigira olusuku abalimi; Olw'ebibala byamu buli muntu yasalirwa ebitundu ebya ffeeza lukumi. 
22_8_12_Olusuku lwange olw'emizabbibu, olwange, luli mu maaso gange; Ggwe, Sulemaani, onoobanga n'olukumi olwo, N'abo abakuuma ebibala byamu bikumi bibiri. 
22_8_13_Ggwe abeera mu nnimiro, Banno bawuliriza eddoboozi lyo: Limpulize. 
22_8_14_Yanguwa, muganzi wange, Obeere ng'empeewo oba ennangaazi ento Ku nsozi ez'eby'akaloosa. 
23_1_1_Okwolesebwa kwa Isaaya omwana wa Amozi, kwe yalabanga ku Yuda ne Yerusaalemi, mu mirembe gya Uzziya, Yosaiiiu, Akazi; ne Keezeekiya, bassekabaka ba Yuda. 
23_1_2_Wulira ggwe Eggulu era tega okutu, ggwe Ensi, kubanga Mukama ayogedde: nayonsa ne ndera abaana, ne banjeemera, 
23_1_3_Ente emanya nnyini yo, n'endogoyi emanya ekisibo kya mukama waayo: naye Isiraeri tamanyi, abantu bange tebalowooza. 
23_1_4_Woowe eggwanga eririna ebibi, abantu abazitoowereddwa n'obutali butuukirivu, ezzadde er'abakola obubi, abaana aboonoona: balese Mukama, banyoomye Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri, basenguse bazze ennyuma. 
23_1_5_Ekibaagaza ki okukubibwa nate, n'okweyongera ne mweyongera okujeema? omutwe gwonna gulwadde, n'omutima gwo nna guzirise. 
23_1_6_Okuva munda w'ekigere okuruuka ku mutwe temuliimu bulamu; wabula ebiwundu, n'okuzimba, n'amabwa amavundu: tebibunizibwanga so tebisibibwanga so tebiteekebwangamu mafuta. 
23_1_7_Easi yammwe ezise; ebibuga byammwe byokeddwa omuliro; ensi yammwe, ab'amawanga bagiriira mu maaso gammwe, era ezise, kubanga ab'amawanga bagisudde. 
23_1_8_Era omuwala wa Sayuuni asigadde ng'ensiisira eri mu lusuku lw'emizabbibu, ng'ekikuumirwamu ekiri mu nnimiro y'emyungu, ng'ekibuga ekizingizibwa. 
23_1_9_Mukama ow'eggye singa teyatulekerawo kitundu ekyafikkawo ekitono ennyo, twandibadde nga Sodomu, twandifaananye nga Ggomola. 
23_1_10_Muwulire ekigambo kya Mukama, mmwe abafuga Sodomu; mutege okutu eri amateeka ga Katonda waffe, mmwe abantu ab'e Ggomola. 
23_1_11_Zigasa ki ssaddaaka zammwe enkumu ze munsalira, bw'ayogera Mukama: nzikuse endiga ennume enjokye eziweebwayo n'amasavu g'ensolo ensibe; so sisanyukira musaayi gwa nte, newakubadde ogw'abaana b'endiga, newakubadde ogw'embuzi emmandwa. 
23_1_12_Bwe mujja okulabika mu maaso gange, ani eyabasalira kino, okulinnyirira empya zange? 
23_1_13_Temuleetanga nate bitone ebitaliimu; obubaane bwa muzizo gye ndi; emyezi egibonese ne ssabbiiti, okuyita amakuŋŋaaniro, sisobola butali butuukirivu na kukuŋŋaana kwa ddiini. 
23_1_14_Emyezi gyammwe egibonese n'embaga zammwe eziragiddwa obulamu bwange bubikyawa: kwe kutegana gye ndi; nkooye okubigumiikirizanga. 
23_1_15_Era bwe munaayanjalanga engalo zammwe, naabakwekanga amaaso gange: weewaawo, bwe munaasabanga ebigambo ebingi, siiwulirenga: emikono gyammwe gijjudde omusaayi. 
23_1_16_Munaabe, mwerongoose; muggyengawo obubi bw'ebikolwa byammwe bive mu maaso gange; mulekeaga okukola obubi: 
23_1_17_muyige okukolanga obulungi; mugobererenga eby'ensonga; mudduukirirenga ajoogebwa, musalenga omusango gw'atalina kitaawe, muwolerezenga nnamwandu. 
23_1_18_Mujje nno, tuteese bw'ayogera Mukama: ebibi byammwe ne bwe biba ng'olugoye olumyufu, binaaba byeru ng'omuzira; ne bwe bitwakaala ng'ebendera, binaaba ng'ebyoya by’endiga. 
23_1_19_Bwe munaagondanga nemuwulira; munaalyanga ebirungi eby’ensi: 
23_1_20_naye bwe munaagaananga ne mujeemanga, munaaliibwanga n'ekitala: kubanga akamwa ka Mukama ke kakyogedde. 
23_1_21_Ekibuga ekyesigwa nga kifuuse omwenzi! oyo eyajjulanga emisango egy'ensonga! obutuukirivu bwatuulanga mu ye, naye kaakano bassi. 
23_1_22_Effeeza yo efuuse masengere, omwenge gwo gutabudwamu amazzi. 
23_1_23_Abalangira bo bajeemu, mikwano gya babbi; buli muntu yeegomba enguzi, era agoberera empeera: tebasala musango gw'atalina kitaawe, so n'ensonga ya nnamwandu tetuuka gye bali. 
23_1_24_Kyava ayogera Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye, Owaamaanyi owa Isiraeri, nti A, ndyeggyako abalabe bange, era ndiwalana eggwanga ku abo abankyawa: 
23_1_25_era ndikuteekako omukono gwange, ne nnongooseza ddala amasengere go gonna, ne nziyawo essasi lyo lyonna: 
23_1_26_era ndikomyawo abalamuzi bo ng'olubereberye, n'abateesa ebigambo byo nga mu kusooka: oluvannyuma oliyitibwa nti Ekibuga eky'obutuukirivu, ekibuga ekyesigwa. 
23_1_27_Sayuuni alinunulibwa n'omusango n'abakyufu be n'obutuukirivu. 
23_1_28_Naye okuzikirira kw'aboonoonyi n'abalina ebibi kulibeera wamu n'abo abaleka Mukama balimali bwawo. 
23_1_29_Kubanga ensonyi ziri. bakwata olw'emivule gye mwego. mba, era muliswazibwa olw'ensukt ze mweroboza. 
23_1_30_Kubanga muliba ng'omuvule oguwotoka amala. gala, era ng'olusuku omutali mazzi. 
23_1_31_Era ow'amaanyi aliba ng'enfuuzi, n'omulimu gwe ng'olusasi olw'o. muliro; era byombi biriggiira wamu, so tewaliba abizikiza. 
23_2_1_Ekigambo Isaaya omwana wa Amozi kye yalaba ku Yuda ni Yerusaalemi. 
23_2_2_Awo olulituuka mu nnaku ez'oluvannyuma, olusozi olw'ennyumba ya Mukama lulinywezebwa ku ntikko y'ensozi era luligulumizibwa okukira ensozi; era amawanga gonna galikulukutira ku lwo. 
23_2_3_Era amawanga mangi agalyambuka ne googera nti Mujje, twambuke eri olusozi lwa Mukama, eri ennyumba ya Katonda wa Yakobo; era anaatuyigirizanga ku makubo ge, naffe tunaatambuliranga mu mpenda ze kubanga mu Sayuuni mwe mulifuluma amateeka, a'ekigambo kya Mukama mu Yerusaalemi. 
23_2_4_Era aliramula mu mawanga, era alinenya abantu bangi: era baliweesa ebitala byabwe okubifuula enkumbi, n'amafumu gaabwe okugafuula ebiwabyo eggwanga teririyimusa kitala eri eggwanga linnaalyo, so tebaliyiga kulwana nate. 
23_2_5_Mmwe ennyumba ya Yakobo mujje tutambulire mu musana gwa Mukama. 
23_2_6_Kubanga waleka abantu bo ennyumba ya Yakobo, kubanga bajjudde empisa ezaava ebuvanjuba, era balaguzi nga Abafirisuuti, era bakubagana mu ngalo n'abaana b'ab'amawanga. 
23_2_7_Era ensi yaabwe ejjudde effeeza n'ezaabu, so n'obugagga bwabwe tebuliiko gye bukoma; era ensi yaabwe ejjudde embalaasi, so n'amagaali gaabwe tegaliiko gye gakoma. 
23_2_8_Era ensi yaabwe ejjudde ebifaananyi; basinza omulimu gw'emikono gyabwe bo, engalo zaabwe bo gwe zaakola. 
23_2_9_Omukopi n'avuunama, n'omukulu yeetoowaza: kyova olema okubasonyiwa. 
23_2_10_Yingira mu lwazi, weekweke mu nfuufu, mu maaso g'entiisa ya Mukama, ne mu maaso g'ekitiibwa ky'obukulu bwe; 
23_2_11_Okulalambala kw'abantu kuliwanulibwa, n'amalala g'abantu galikutamizibwa, era Mukama yekka ye aligulumizibwa ku lunaku olwo. 
23_2_12_Kubanga walibaawo olunaku lwa Mukama ow'eggye eri ebyo byonna ebyekuza ebirina amalala, n'eri byonna ebigulumizibwa; era biriwanulibwa: 
23_2_13_n'eri enfugo zonna eza Lebanooni, empanvu ezigulumizibwa, n'eri emivule gyonna egya Basani; 
23_2_14_n'eri ensozi zonna empanvu, n'eri obusozi bwonna obugulumizibwa; 
23_2_15_n'eri buli kigo ekiwanvu, n'eri buli bbugwe aliko ekkomera; 
23_2_16_n'eri ebyombo byonna eby'e Talusiisi, n'eri ebifaananyi byonna eby'okwesiima. 
23_2_17_Era okugulumizibwa kw'abantu kulikutamizibwa, n'amalala g'abantu galiwanulibwa; era Mukama yekka ye aligulumizibwa ku lunaku olwo. 
23_2_18_N'ebifaananyi biriggweerawo ddala. 
23_2_19_Era abantu baligenda mu mpuku ez'amayinja, ne mu bunnya obw'ettaka, okuva mu maaso g'entiisa ya Mukama, ne mu maaso g'ekitiibwa ky'obukulu bwe, bw'aligolokoka okukankanya ensi n'amaanyi. 
23_2_20_Ku lunaku olwo omuntu alisuulira ddala ebifaananyi bye eby'effeeza n'ebifaananyi bye eby'ezaabu, bye baamukolera okusinzanga, eri emmese n'eri ebinyira; 
23_2_21_bagende mu mpuku ez'amayinja, ne mu nkonko ez'amayinja amaatifu, okuva mu maaso g'entiisa ya Mukama, ne mu maaso g'ekitiibwa ky'obukulu bwe, bw'aligookoka okukankanya ensi n'amaanvi. 
23_2_22_Muleke abantu, omukka gwabwe guli mu nnyindo zaabwe: kubanga ekinaaba kibalowoozesa kiki? 
23_3_1_Kubanga; laba, Mukama, Mukama ow’eggye, aggya ku Yerusaalemi ne ku Yuda ekibeesiguza n'ekyo kwe banyeredde, ekibeesiguza kyonna eky'emmere, n'ekibeesiguza kyonna eky'amazzi 
23_3_4_Era ndireeta abaana okuba abalangira baabwe, era abaana abawere balibafuga. 
23_3_5_Era abantu balijoogebwa, buli muntu munne, na buli muntu muliraanwa we: omuto aligirira ekyejo omukadde, n'omukopi aligirira ekyejo ow'ekitiibwa. 
23_3_6_Omuntu bw'alikwata muganda we mil nnyumba ya kitaawe, ng'ayogera nti Ggwe olina eby'okwambala, beera mufuzi waffe ggwe, a'okubula kuno kubeere wansi w'omukono gwo: 
23_3_7_ku lunaku olwa aliyimusa eddoboozi lye, ng'ayogera nti Sijja kuba muwonya; kubanga mu nnyumba yange temuli mmere newakubadde eby'okwambala: temujja kunfuula mufuzi wa bantu. 
23_3_8_Kubanga Yerusaalemi kizikiridde, ne Yuda agudde: kubanga olulimi lwabwe n'ebikolwa byabwe biwakanya Mukama, okusunguwaza amaaso ag'ekitiibwa kye. 
23_3_9_Ekifaananyi ky'obwenyi bwabwe kitegeeza nga gubasinze; era babuulira ekibi kyabwe nga Sodomu, tebakikisa. Zisanze obulamu bwabwe! kubanga beesasulidde bokka obubi. 
23_3_10_Mwogere ku mutuukirivu nti anaabanga bulungi: kubanga banaalyanga ebibala by'ebikolwa byabwe. 
23_3_11_Zisanze omubil anaabanga bubi: kubanga anaaweebwanga empeera y'engalo ze. 
23_3_12_Abantu bange abaana abato be babajooga, era abakazi be babafuga. Woowe abantu bange, ababakulembera babakyamya, era bazikiriza ekkubo lyammwe eritambulirwamu. 
23_3_13_Mukama ayimirira okuwoza, era ayimirira okusala omusango gw'amawanga. 
23_3_14_Mukama alisala omusango gw'abakadde b'abantu be n'abalangira baabwe: Mmwe mwaliira ddala olusuku lw'emizabbibu; omunyago gw'omwavu guli mu nnyumba zammwe: 
23_3_15_mubadde ki okubetentanga abantu bange, n'okusanga amaaso g'abaavu? bw'ayogera Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye. 
23_3_16_Era nate Mukama yayogera nti Kubanga abawala ba Sayuuni balina amalala, era batambula nga balalambaza ensingo era nga balina amaaso ag'obukaba, nga batambula era nga bakumba bwe bagenda, era nga bavuza ebigere byabwe: 
23_3_17_Mukama kyaliva alwaza ebikakampa obwezinge bw'otmitwe gw'abawala ba Sayuutu, Mukama n'abikkula ku nsonyi zaabwe. 
23_3_18_Ku lunaku olwo Mukama aliggyako obuyonjo bw'amasamba gaabwe, n'enkundulu zaabwe, n'ebifaanana ng'emyezi; 
23_3_19_n'emijugo, n'emisagga, n'engoye ez'oku maaso; 
23_3_20_ebiremba, n'obudangadi, n'enneebagyo, n'obucupa obw'akaloosa, n'ensiriba; 
23_3_21_empeta n'empeta ez'omu nnyindo; 
23_3_22_engoye ez'amabala, n'eminagiro, n'essuuka, n'ensawo; 
23_3_23_endabirwamu, ne bafuta, n'ebiremba, n'ezibikka ku mitwe. 
23_3_24_Awo olulituuka awaali eby'akaloosa walibaawo ekivundu; n'awaali olwebagyo mugwa; n'awaali enviiri ensunsule ebulungi kiwalata n’awaali ekizibawo kwesiba kibukutu: awaali obuyonjo kwokebwa. 
23_3_25_Abasajja bo ekitala kiribatta, n'abazira bo balifiira mu ntalo. 
23_3_26_N'enzigi ze zirikaaba ziriwuubaala; era ye a1iba munaku, alituula ku ttaka. 
23_4_1_Era abakazi musanvu balyekwata ku musajja omu ku lunaku luji, nga boogera nti Tunaalyanga emmere yaffe ffe, era tunaayambalanga ebyambalo byaffe ffe: kyokka tutuumibwe erinnya lyo; otuggyeko ekivume kyaffe. 
23_4_2_Ku lunaku luli ettabi lya Mukama liriba ddungi era lya kitiibwa, n'ebibala by'ensi biribawoomera nnyo abo abawonye ku Isiraeri, biriba birungi. 
23_4_3_Awo olulituuka, oyo asigadde mu Sayuuni n'oyo abeera mu Yerusaalemi, aliyitibwa mutukuvu, ye buli muntu awandiikibwa mu balamu mu Yerusaalemi: 
23_4_4_Mukama bw'aliba ng'anaalizza ddala empitambi y'abawala ba Sayuuni, era ng'amazeemu omusaayi gwa Yerusaalemi wakati mu kyo, olw'omwoyo ogw'omusango, era olw'omwoyo ogw'okwokya. 
23_4_5_Era Mukama alitondera ku buli nnyumba ey'olusozi Sayuuni ekire n'omukka emisana, n'okumasamasa kw'omuliro ogwaka ekiro: kubanga waggulu ku kitiibwa kyonna kulibaako ekiritimbibwako. 
23_4_6_Era walibaawo eweema okuba ekisiikirize emisana eri olubugumu, n'okuba ekiddukiro era omwekwekebwa. 
23_5_1_Nnyimbire muganzi wange oluyimba olw'omwagalwa wange ebigambo by'olusuku lwe olw'emizabbibu. Muganzi wange yalina olusuku olw'emizabbibu ku lusozi olugimu ennyo: 
23_5_2_n'alusimira olusalosalo, n'alusigulamu amayinja gaamu, n'alusimbamu omuzabbibu omulungi ennyo nnyini, n'aluzimbamu wakati ekigo, era n'aIusimamu essogolero: n'asuubira lubale zabbibu, ne lubala zabbibu ez'omu nsiko. 
23_5_3_Kale nno, mmwe abatuula mu Yerusaalemi nammwe abasajja ba Yuda, mutusalire omusango, mbeegayiridde, nze n'olusuku lwange olw'emizabbibu. 
23_5_4_Nandiyinzizza kukola ki nate olusuku lwange olw'emizabbibu kye nnalema okulukola? Bwe nnasuubira lubale zabbibu, ekyalubaza zabbibu ez'omu nsiko kiki? 
23_5_5_Kale nno kaakano ka mbategeeze kye nnaakola olusuku lwange olw'emizabbibu: naggyako olukomera lwalwo, era luliriirwa ddala; naamenyera ddala ekisaakaate kyalwo, era lulirinnyrirwa ddala: 
23_5_6_era naaluzisa; tebaalusalirenga so tebaalulimenga; naye mulimeramu emyeramannyo n'amaggwa: era ndiragira ebire obutalutonnyesangako nkuba. 
23_5_7_Kubanga olusuku olw'emizabbibu olwa Mukama ow'eggye ye nnyumba ya Isiraeri, n'abasajja ba Yuda kye kisimbe kye ekimusanyusa: yasuubira okusala ensonga, naye, laba, kujooga; obutuukirivu, naye, laba, kukaaba. 
23_5_8_Zibasanze abo abagatta ennyumba n'ennyumba ginnaayo, abongera ennimiro ku nnimiro ginnaayo, okutuusa ebbanga lwe liggwaawo, nammwe n'okutuula ne mutuula mwekka wakati mu nsi! 
23_5_9_Mu matu gange ayogera Mukama ow'eggye nti Mazima ennyumba nnyingi ziriba bifulukwa, ennene era ennungi, nga tewaliazituulamu. 
23_5_10_Kubanga. ensuku ez'emizabbibu kkumi zinaavangamu ekibbo kimu, n'ogusera ogw'ensigo gunaavangamu ekibbo kimu kyokka: 
23_5_11_Zibasanze abo abakeera enkya mu makya okugolokoka, bagoberere ekitamiiza; abalwawo ekiro okutuusa ettumbi omwenge ne gubalalusa! 
23_5_12_Era ennaaga n'entongooli, ebitaasa n'endere, n'omwenge: biri mu mbaga zaabwe: naye tebalowooza mulimu gwa Mukama, so tebannassa ku mwoyo okukola kw'engalo ze. 
23_5_13_Abantu bange kyebavudde bagenda mu bunyage, olw'okubulwa okumanya: n'abasajja baabwe ab'ekitiibwa balumiddwa enjala, n'ekibiina kyabwe ennyonta ebasse. 
23_5_14_Amagombe kyegavudde gagaziya okwegomba kwago, era gaasamizza akamwa kaago ekitayasamizika: n'ekitiibwa kyabwe n'obungi bwabwe n'oluyoogaano lwabwen'oyo asanyuka mu bo bikka omwo. 
23_5_15_Era omukopi akutamizibwa, n'omukulu atoowazibwa, n'amaaso g'ab'amalala gatoowazibwa: 
23_5_16_naye Mukama ow'eggye agulumizibwa olw'omusango, era Katonda Omutukuvu atukuzibwa olw'obutuukirivu. 
23_5_17_Abaana b'endiga ne ziryoka zirya nga mu ddundiro lyazo, era ebifo ebyazika eby'abagevvu abatambuze balibirya. 
23_5_18_Zibasanze abo abawalula obutali butuukirivu n'akagwa ak'obulimba, abawalula ekibi nga n'omugwa ogw'eggaali: 
23_5_19_aboogera nti Ayanguyeeko, asambyeka omulimu gwe tugulabe: n'okuteesa kw'Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri kusembere kutuuke tukumanye! 
23_5_20_Zibasanze abo abayita ekibi ekirungi, n'ekirungi ekibi; abateeka ekizikiza mu kifo ky'omusana, n'omusana mu kifo ky'ekizikiza; abateeka okukaawa mu kifo ky'okuwoomerera, n'okuwoomerera mu kifo ky'okukaawa! 
23_5_21_Zibasanze abo abalina amagezi mu maaso gaabwe bo, era abakabakaba mu kulaba kwabwe bo! 
23_5_22_Zibasanze abo abalina amaanyi okunywa omwenge, era abazira okutabula ekitamiiza: 
23_5_23_abateeka obutuukirivu ku babi olw'enguzi; era abaggya ku mutuukirivu obutuukirivu bwe! 
23_5_24_Kale ng'olulimi lw'omuliro bwe lyokya ensambu, era ng'essubi ekkalu bwe likka mu muliro, bwe kityo ekikolo kyabwe kiriba ng'ekivundu, n'ekimuli kyabwe kirifuumuuka ng'enfuufu: kubanga baagaananga amateeka ga Mukama ow'eggye, era baanyoomanga ekigambo eky'Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri. 
23_5_25_Obusungu bwa Mukama kyebuvudde bubuubuuka ku bantu be, era agolodde omukono gwe okubalumba, era abasse, ensozi ne zikankana; n'emirambo gyabwe ne giba ng'ebisasiro wakati mu nguudo Ebyo byonna bimaze okubaawc naye obusungu bwe tebunnaba kuggibwawo, naye omukono gwe gukyagoloddwa. 
23_5_26_Era aliyimusiza amawanga ebendera ng'ayim, wala, alibakoowoola ng'ayima ku nkomerero y'ensi: era, laba, balyanguwa mangu okujja: 
23_5_27_tewaliba mu bo alikoowa newakubadde alyesittala; tewaliba alibongoota newakubadde alyebaka; so n'olukoba lwe besiba terulisumulukuka, so n'olukoba lw'engatto zaabwe terulikutuka: 
23_5_28_obusaale bwabwe bwa bwogi, n'emitego gyabwe gyonna mireege; ebinuulo by'embalaasi zaabwe biribalibwa ng'amayinja ag'embaalebaale, ne bannamuziga baabwe nga kibuyaga; 
23_5_29_okulira kwa bwe kuliba ng'empologoma, balirira ng'empologoma ento: weewaa wo, balirira, balikwata omuyiggo gwabwe, ne bagitwalira ddala mirembe, so tewalibaawo aliwonya. 
23_5_30_Era baliwuuma ku bo ku lunaku luli ng'ennyanja bw'ewuuma: era omuntu bw'atunuulira olukalu, laba ekizikiza n'ennaku, n'omusana guzikizibwa mu bire byalwo. 
23_6_1_Mu mwaka kabaka Uzziya, mwi yafiira nalaba Mukama ng'atuddi ku ntebe, empanvu eyagulumizibwa, n'ekirenge kye nga kijjula yeekaalu. 
23_6_2_Basseraafi baali bayimiridde waggulu we: buli omu yalina ebiwaavaatiro mukaaga; ebibiri yabibikka mu maaso ge, n'ebibiri yabibikka ku bigere bye, n'ebibiri yabibuusa 
23_6_3_Omu n'ayogerera waggulu eri nunne ng'agamba nti Mutukuvu, nutukuvu, mutukuvu, Mukama w'eggye: ensi yonna ejjudde ekiiibwa kye. 
23_6_4_N'emisingi gy'emiyango ne ginyeenyezebwa olw'edoboozi ly'oyo eyayogerera waggulu, ennyumba n'ejjula omukka. 
23_6_5_Ne ndyoka njogera nti Zinsanze! kubanga nfudde; kubanga ndi muntu wa mimwa egitali mirongoofu, era ntuula wakati mu bantu ab'emimwa egitali mirongoofu: kubanga amaaso gange galabye Kabaka, Mukama ow'eggye. 
23_6_6_Omu ku basseraafi n'alyoka abuuka n'ajja gye ndi, ng'alina eryanda eryaka nu ngalo ze, lye yali aggye ku kyoto ne nnamagalo: 
23_6_7_n'alikomya ku kamwa kange, n'ayogera nti Laba, lino likomye ku mimwa gyo; era obutali butuukirivu bwo buggidwawo, n'ekibi kyo kirongoosebbwa. 
23_6_8_Ne mpulira eddoboozi ya Mukama, nga lyogera nti Naatuma ani, era anaatugendera ani? Ne ndyoka njogera nti Nze nzuuno: ntuma nze. 
23_6_9_N'ayogera nti Genda obuulire abantu bano nti Okuwulira muwulire naye temutegeera; n'ozulaba mulabe, naye temwetegereza. 
23_6_10_Savuwaza omutima gw'abantu bano, era ggala amatu gaabwe, era siba amaaso gaabwe; baieme okulaba n'amaaso gaabwe, n'okuwulira n'amatu gaabwe, n'okutegeera n'omutima gwabwe, n'okukyuka, okuwonyezebwa. 
23_6_11_Ne ndyoka njogera nti Mukama wange, birituusa wa okubaawo? N'addamu nti Okutuusa ebibuga lwe birizika nga tewali abituulamu, ne mu nnyumba nga temuli muntu ensi n'ezirikira ddala, 
23_6_12_era Mukama ng’ajjuludde abantu ng'abatutte wala, n’ebifulukwa nga bingi wakati mu nsi. 
23_6_13_Era ekitundu eky'ekkumi bwe kiriba nga kikyasigadde omwo, kiririirwa ddala nate: ng'omumyuliru era ng'omuvule ekikolo kyagyo nga kisigadde, bwe gitemebwawo; bwe kityo ensigo entukuvu kye kikolo kyayo. 
23_7_1_Awo olwatuuka ku mirernbe gya Akazi omwana wa Yosamu, omwana wa Uzziya, kabaka wa Yuda, Lezini kabaka We Busuuli, ne Peka omwana wa Lemaliya, kabaka wa Isiraeri, ne bayambuka e Yerusaalemi okukirwanyisa; naye ne bakiremwa. 
23_7_2_Ne babuulira ennyumba ya Dawudi nga boogera nti Obusuuli butabaganye ne Efulayimu. Omutima gwe ne gunyeenyezebwa, n'omutima gw'abantu be, ng'emiti egy'omu kibira bwe ginyeenyezebwa n'empewo. 
23_7_3_Mukama n'alyoka agamba Isaaya nti Fuluma kaakano osisinkane Akazi, ggwe ne Seyalusayubu omwana wo, olusalosalo olw'ekidiba eky'engulu we lukoma, mu luguudo olw'ennimiro y'omwozi w'engoye 
23_7_5_Kubanga Obusuuli buteesezza obubi ku ggwe, ne Efulayimu, n'omwana wa Lemaliya, nga boogera nti 
23_7_6_Twambuke tulumbe Yerusaalemi, tukiteganye, twewagulire omwo ekituli, tusseewo kabaka wakati mu kyo, omwana wa Tabeeri: 
23_7_7_bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Tekirinywera so tekirituukirira. 
23_7_8_Kubanga omutwe gw'Obusuuli ye Ddamasiko n'omutwe gw'e Ddamasiko ye Lezini: era emyaka enkaaga n'etaano nga teginnaggwaawo Efulayimu alimenyekamenyeka obutaba ggwanga: 
23_7_9_n'omutwe gwa Efulayimu ye Samaliya, n'omutwe gw'e Samaliya ye mwana wa Lemaliya. Bwe muligaana okukkiriza, mazima temulinywezebwa. 
23_7_10_Awo Mukama n'agamba nate Akazi nti 
23_7_11_Weesabire Mukama Katonda wo akabonero: kasabe oba mu buziba oba mu bbanga waggulu. 
23_7_12_Naye Akazi n'ayogera nti Siisabe so siikeme Mukama. Naye Akazi n'ayogera nti Siisabe so siikeme Mukama. 
23_7_13_N'ayogera nti Muwulire kaakano, mmwe ennyumba ya Dawudi; kigambo kitono gye muli mmwe okukooya abantu n'okwagala ne mwagala okukooya ne Katonda wange era? 
23_7_14_Mukama yennyini kyaliva abawa akabonero; laba, omuwala atamanyi musajja aliba olubuto, alizaala omwana wa bulenzi era alituumwa erinnya lye Imanueri. 
23_7_15_Omuzigo n'omubisi gw'enjuki alibirya, bw'amanya okugaana ebibi, n'okweroboza ebirungi. 
23_7_16_Kubanga omwana nga tannamanya kugaana bibi n'okweroboza ebirungi, ensi gy'okyawaamu bakabaka baayo bombi erirekebwa. 
23_7_17_Mukama alikuleetako ne ku bantu bo, ne ku nnyumba ya kitaawo, ennaku ezitajjanga, okuva ku lunaku Efulayimu lwe yaviiramu mu Yuda; kabaka w'e Bwasuli. 
23_7_18_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli Mukama alikoowoola ensowera eri mu bifo eby'ewala eby'emigga egy'e Misiri, n'enjuki eri mu nsi y'e Bwasuli. 
23_7_19_Era birijja, era biriwummulira byonna mu biwonvu ebyazika, ne mu bunnya obw'omu mayinja, ne ku maggwa gonna, ne ku malundiro gonna. 
23_7_20_Ku lunaku luli Mukama alimwesa akamwano akagule akali mu bifo eby'emitala w'omugga, ye Kabaka w'e Bwasuli, omutwe n'obwoya obw'oku bigere: era kalimalawo n'ekirevu. 
23_7_21_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli omusajja aliriisa ente eyonsa ento n'endiga bbiri; 
23_7_22_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli, buli kifo awaabanga emizabbibu olukumi, buli gumu gwa sekeri lukumi, kiriba kya myeramannyo n'amaggwa. 
23_7_23_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli, buli kifo awaabanga emizabbibu olukumi, buli gumu gwa sekeri lukumi, kiriba kya myeramannyo n'amaggwa. 
23_7_24_Balijjayo nga balina obusaale n'omutego; kubanga ensi yonna eriba myeramannyo, n'amaggwa. 
23_7_25_N'ensozi zonna ze baalimanga n'enkumbi, tolituukayo olw'okutya emyeramannyo n'amaggwa, naye waliba wa kusindikayo nte, n'okulinnyirirwa endiga. 
23_8_1_Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Weetwalire ekipande ekinene, okiwandiikeko n'ekkalaamu ey'omuntu nti Kya Makeru-salalukasu-bazi 
23_8_3_Ne ŋŋenda eri nnabbi omukazi; n'aba lubuto, n'azaala omwana wa bulenzi. Mukama n'alyoka aŋŋamba nti Mutuume erinnya Makeru-salalu-kasu-bazi. 
23_8_4_Kubanga omwana nga tannamanya kukaaba nti Kitange, era nti Mmange, obugagga obw'e Ddamasiko n'omunyago ogw'e Samaliya birinyagibwa mu maaso ga kabaka w’e Bwasuli. 
23_8_5_Mukama n'ayogera nange nate omulundi omulala nti 
23_8_6_Kubanga abantu bano bagaanyi amazzi ga Sirowa agatambula empola, ne basanyukira Lezini n'omwana wa Lemaliya 
23_8_8_era alyeyongera n'akulukuta okutuuka mu Yuda; alyanjaala aliyitamu; alikoma ne mu bulago; n'okugololwa kw'ebiwaawaatiro bye kulijjuza ensi yo, ggwe Imanueri; nga bwe yenkana obugazi. 
23_8_9_Muyoogaane, mmwe amawanga, mulimenyekamenyeka; era mutege amatu, mmwe mwenna ab'omu nsi ez'ewala: mwesibe, mulimenyekamenyeka; mwesibe, mulimenyekamenyeka. 
23_8_10_Muteese ebigambo wamu, birizikirizibwa; mwogere ekigambo, tekiriyimirira: kubanga Katonda ali wamu naffe. 
23_8_11_Kubanga Mukama yayogera nange bw'atyo n'omukono ogw'amaanyi, n'anjigiriza nneme okutambulira mu kkubo ly'abantu bano, ng'ayogera nti 
23_8_12_Temwogera nti Okwekoba, mu byonna eggwanga lino bye liryogerako nti Okwekoba; so temutya kutya kwabwe, so temutekemuka. 
23_8_13_Mukama ow'eggye oyo gwe muba mutukuza; era oyo abeerenga entiisa yammwe, era oyo abeerenga ekitiibwa kyammwe. 
23_8_14_Era aliba ng'awatukuvu; naye aliba ng'ejjinja ery'okwesittalwako era olwazi olugwisa eri ennyumba zombi eza Isiraeri, okuba omutego era ekyambika eri abo abatuula mu Yerusaalemi. 
23_8_15_Era bangi abaliryesittalako, ne bagwa, ne bamenyeka, ne bategebwa, ne bakwasibwa. 
23_8_16_Sibira ddala okutegeeza, osse akabonero ku mateeka mu bayigirizwa bange. 
23_8_17_Era ndirindirira Mukama, akweka amaaso ge ennyumba ya Yakobo, ne mmunoonya. 
23_8_18_Laba, nze n'abaana Mukama b'ampadde bya kuba bubonero era bya kuba byewuunyo mu Isiraeri ebiva eri Mukama ow'eggye, atuula ku lusozi Sayuuni. 
23_8_19_Era bwe babagambanga nti Mubuuze abo abaliko emizimu n'abafiunu, abalira ng'ennyonyi era abajoboja: eggwanga tekirigwanira kubuuza Katonda waabwe? Ebigambo by'abalamu bandibibuuzizza bafu? 
23_8_20_Tudde eri amateeka n'obujulirwa! oba nga teboogera ng'ekigambo ekyo bwe kiri, mazima obudde tebugenda kubakeerera. 
23_8_21_Era baliyita mu nsi, nga beeraliikirira nnyo nga balumwa enjala: awo olunaatuukanga bwe banaalumwanga enjala, banaanyiiganga ne bakolima nga balayira kabaka waabwe ne Katonda waabwe, ne batunuza amaaso gaabwe: waggulu: 
23_8_22_era banaatunuuliranga ensi, era, laba, nnaku n'ekizikiza, ekizikiza el.y'okubonyaabonyezebwa; era baligoberwa mu kizikiza ekikutte. 
23_9_1_Naye tewaliba kizikiza eri oyo eyali abonyaabonyezebwa. Edda yanyoomya ensi ya Zebbulooni n'ensi ya Nafutaali, naye mu kiseera eky'oluvannyuma agifudde ya kitiibwa, awali ekkubo ery'ennyanja, emitala wa Yoludaani, Ggaliraaya ey'amawanga. 
23_9_2_Abantu abaatambuliranga mu kizikiza balabye omusana mungi: abo abaatuulanga mu nsi y'ekisiikirize ky'okufa, omusana gubaakidde bo. 
23_9_3_Oyazizza eggwanga, oyongedde ku ssanyu lyabwe: basanyukira mu maaso go ng'essanyu bwe liri ery'omu makungula, abasajja nga bwe basanyuka nga bagereka omunyago. 
23_9_4_Kubanga ekikoligo ekyamuzitoowerera, n'omuggo ogw'oku kibegabega kye, lwe luga lw'omujoozi we, obimenye nga ku lunaku lwa Midiyaani. 
23_9_5_Kubanga ebyokulwanyisa byonna eby'oyo alina ebyokulwanyisa mu luyoogaano, n'ebyambalo ebikulukuunyizibbwa mu musaayi, biriba bya kwokebwa bwokebwa, okuba enku ez'omuliro. 
23_9_6_Kubanga omwana atuzaaliddwa ffe, omwana ow'obulenzi aweereddwa ffe; n'okufuga kunaabanga ku kibegabega kye: n'erinnya lye liriyitibwa nti Wa kitalo, Ateesa ebigambo, Katonda ow'amaanyi, Kitaffe ataggwaawo, Omukulu ow'emirembe. 
23_9_7_Okufuga kwe n'emirembe tebirikoma kweyongeranga, ku ntebe ya Dawudi, ne ku bwakabaka bwe, okubunyweza, n'okubuwanirira n'omusango n'obutuukirivu okuva leero n'emirembe n'emirembe. Obunyiikivu bwa Mukama ow'eggye bulituukiriza ekyo. 
23_9_8_Mukama yaweereza Yakobo ekigambo, ne kigwa ku Isiraeri. 
23_9_9_Era abantu bonna balimanya, Efulayimu n'abatuula mu Samaliya, aboogera n'amalala n'obukakanyavu bw'omutima nti 
23_9_10_Amatoffaali gagudde, naye tulizimbya amaiinja amateme: enkoma zitemeddwawo, naye tlilizifuula ensambya. 
23_9_11_Mukama kyaliva agulumiza abalabe ba Lezini okumulumba, era alisaakiriza abalabe be; 
23_9_12_Abasuuli mu maaso, n'Abafirisuuti emabega; era balirya Isiraeri n'akamwa akayasamye. Ebyo byonna bimaze okubaawo naye obusungu bwe tebunnakyusibwa okubavaako, naye omukono gwe gukyagoloddwa. 
23_9_13_Naye abantu tebaakyukiranga oyo eyabakuba, so tebaaaoonyanga Mukama wa ggye. 
23_9_14_Mukama kyaliva asalako ku Isiraeri omutwe n'omukira, olukindo n'ekitoogo, ku lunaku lumu. 
23_9_15_Omusajja omukadde era ow'ekitiibwa gwe mutwe; ne anabbi ayigiriza eby'obulimba gwe mukira. 
23_9_16_Kubanga abakulembera abantu bano babakyamya; n'sbo be bakulembera bazikirizibwa. 
23_9_17_Mukama kyativa alema okusanyukira abavubuka baabwe, so tali. saasira basina baabwe abafiiriddwa bakitaabwe ne bannamwandu baa bwe: kubanga buli muntu avvoola era akola ebibi, na buli kamwa koogera eby'obusiru. Ebyo byonna bimaze okubaawo naye obusung bwe tcbunnakyusibwa okubavaako naye omukono gwe gukyagoloddwa. 
23_9_18_Kubanga obubi bwokya ng'omuliro; gumalawo emyeramannyo n'amaggwa: weewaawo, gukoleera mu bisaka eby'omu kibira, ebire eby'omukka ebikutte ne binyooka ne birinnya waggulu. 
23_9_19_Olw'obusungu bwa Mukama ow'eggye ensi eyiiridde ddala: era n'abantu bali ng'enku ez'omuliro; tewali asonyiwa muganda we. 
23_9_20_Era omu alisika ku mukono ogwa ddyo, n'alumwa enjala; era alirya ku mukono ogwa kkono, so tebalikkuta: balirya buli muntu ennyama ey'onukono gwe ye: 
23_9_21_Manase Efuayimu; ne Efulayimu Manase: era ombi wamu balikyawa Yuda. Ebyo byonna bimaze okubaawo naye obusungu bwe tebunnakyusibwa okubavaako, naye omukono gwe gukyagoloddwa. 
23_10_1_Zibasanze abo abateeka amateeka agatali ga butuukirivu, n'abawandiisi abawandiika obukyamu: 
23_10_2_okugoba abanaku baleme okusalirwa omusango, n'okubanyagako ebyabwe abaavu ab'omu bantu bange, bannamwandu babeere munyago gwabwe, era abafiiriddwa bakitaabwe babafuule omuyiggo gwabwe. 
23_10_3_Era mulikola mutya ku nnaku olw'okujjirwa, ne mu kuziirizibwa okuliva ewala? mulidduira eri ani okubeerwa? era mulireka wa ekitiibwa kyammwe? 
23_10_4_Balikutama bukutami wansi w'abasibe, era baligwa wansi w'abattiddwa. Ebyo byonna bimaze okubaawo naye obusungu bwe tebunnakyusibwa okubavaako, naye omukono gwe gukyagoloddwa. 
23_10_5_Ggwe Omwasuli, oluga olw'ousungu bwange, omuggo oguli mu igalo zo kye kiruyi kyange! 
23_10_6_Ndinutuma okulumba eggwanga erivoola, era ndimulagira ku bantu baliko obusungu bwange, okunyaga omunyago, n'okunyaga omuyiggo, n’okubalinnyirira wansi ng'ebitoomi by'omu nguudo. 
23_10_7_Naye tagenderera kukola bw'atyo, so n'omutima gwe tegulowooza bwe gutyo; naye kiri mu mutima gwe okuzikiiza, n'okumalawo amawanga si matono. 
23_10_8_Kubanga ayogera nti Abakulu bange bonna si bakabaka? 
23_10_9_Kalino tekifaanana Kalukemisi? Kamasi tekifaanana Alupadi? Saaaliya tekifaanana Ddamasiko? 
23_10_10_Ng'omukono gwange bwe gwatuuka ku nsi za bakabaka ezisinza ebifaananyi, ezaalina ebifaananyi ebibajje ebyasinga ebyo ebiri mu Yerusaalemi ne mu Samaliya; 
23_10_11_nga bwe nnakola Samaliya ne sanamu zaakyo, sirikola bwe ntyo Yerusaalemi ne sanamu zaakyo? 
23_10_12_Kyekiriva kituuka, Mukama bw'aliba ng'amalidde ddala omulimu gwe gwonna ku lusozi Sayuuni ne ku Yerusaalemi, me ndyoka mbonereza ebibala by'omutima omukakanyavu ogwa kabaka w’e Bwasuli, n'amalala g'amaaso ge amagulumivu. 
23_10_13_Kubanga yayogera nti Olw'amaanyi g'omukono gwange nakikola, n'olw'amagezi gange; kubanga ndi mukabakaba: era najjulula ensalo ez'amawanga, ne nnyaga obugagga bwabwe, ne ntoowaza ng'omusajja omuzira abo abatuula ku ntebe: 
23_10_14_era omukono gwange guvumbudde obugagga obw'amawanga ng'ekisu; era ng'omuntu bw'akuŋŋaanya amagi amazire, bwe ntyo bwe naakuŋŋaanyanga ensi zonna: so tewali eyayanjuluza ekiwaawaatiro, newakubadde eyayasamya akamwa, newakubadde eyakaaba. 
23_10_15_Embazzi eryenyumiriza eri oyo agitemya? omusumeeno gulyekuza eri oyo agunyeenya? kwenkana oluga nga lunyeenyezza abo abalulonda, oba omuggo nga gusitudde atali muti. 
23_10_16_Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye, kyaliva aweereza obukovvu mu basajja be abagevvu; era wansi w'ekitiibwa kye we alikolera okwokya ng'okwokya kw'omuliro. 
23_10_17_N'omusana gwa Isiraeri guliba mu kifo ky'omuliro, n'Omutukuvu we aliba mu kifo ky'okwaka: kale gulyokya gulimalawo amaggwa ge n'emyeramannyo gye ku lunaku lumu. 
23_10_18_Era alimalawo ekitiibwa ky'ekibira kye, n'eky'ennimiro ye engimu, obulamu era n'omubiri: kale kiriba ng'omukwasi w'ebendera bw'azirika. 
23_10_19_N'emiti egy'omu kibira kye egirisigalawo giriba mitono, omwana omuto n'okuyinza n'ayinza okugiwandiika. 
23_10_20_Awo olulituuka ku Iunaku luli, abaliba nga bafisseewo ku Isiraeri, n'abo abaliba nga bawonye ku nnyumba ya Yakobo, nga tebakyesigama nate ku oyo eyabakuba: naye balyesigama ku Mukama, Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri, mu mazima. 
23_10_21_Ekitundu ekirifikkawo kirikomawo, ekirifikkawo ku Yakobo, eri Katonda ow'amaanyi. 
23_10_22_Kubanga abantu bo Isiraeri newakubadde nga baliba ng'omusenyu ogw'ennyanja, kitundu butundu ekirifikkawo ku bo kye kirikomawo: okutuukiriza kwateesebwa, okusukkirira n'omusango ogw'ensonga. 
23_10_23_Kubanga okukomekkereza, era okwateesebwa, Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye kw'alikola wakati mu nsi yonna. 
23_10_24_Kyava ayogera Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye nti Mmwe abantu bange abatuula mu Sayuuni, temutyanga Asuli: newakubadde ng'akukuba n'oluga, n'akugalulira omuggo gwe, ng'empisa y'e Misiri bw'eri. 
23_10_25_Kubanga akaseera kakyali katono nnyo, okunyiiga kulyoke kutuukirizibwe n'obusungu bwange mu kuzikirisa kwabwe. 
23_10_26_Awo Mukama ow'eggye alimuleetako ekibonoobono, nga bwe byali Midiyaani bwe yattirwa awali olwazi lwa Olebu: n'oluga lwe luliba ku nnyanja, era alirugalula ng'empisa y'e Misiri bw'eri. 
23_10_27_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli, omugugu gwe guliva ku kibegabega kyo, n'ekikoligo kye mu bulago bwo, n'ekikoligo kirizikirizibwa olw'okufukibwako amafuta. 
23_10_28_Atuuse e Yayasi, ayise mu Miguloni; e Mikumasi gy'aterekera emigugu gye: 
23_10_29_bavvuunuse awavvuunukirwa; basuze e Geba: Laama akankana; Gibeya wa Sawulo adduse. 
23_10_30_Yogerera waggulu n'eddoboozi lyo, ggwe muwala wa Gallimu! wulira, ggwe Layisa! Ggwe Anasosi asaasirwa! 
23_10_31_Madumena mudduse; abatuula mu Gebimu beekuŋŋaanya okudduka. 
23_10_32_Ku lunaku luno olwa leero anaasula Enobu: omukono gwe agugalulira olusozi lwa muwala wa Sayuuni, olusozi lwa Yerusaalemi. 
23_10_33_Laba, Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye, alitema amatabi n'entiisa n'abawanvu abawagguufu balitemerwa ddala, n'abagulumivu balikka kkanyizibwa. 
23_10_34_Era alimalawo n'ekyuma ebisaka eby'omu kibira, ne Lebanooni aligwa olw'ow'amaanyi. 
23_11_1_Era mu kikolo kya Yese muliva ensibuka, n'ettabi eririva mu mmizi gye liribala ebibala: 
23_11_2_n'omwoyo gwa Mukama gulibeera ku ye, omwoyo ogw'amagezi n'okutegeera, omwoyo ogw'okuteesa n'amaanyi, omwoyo ogw'okumanya n'okutya Mukami 
23_11_4_naye anaasaliranga omwavu emisango gya nsonga, era anaanenyanga n'obutuukirivu olw'abawombeefu abali ku nsi: era alikuba ensi n'omuggo ogw'omu kamwa ke, era alitta omubi n'omukka ogw'omu mimwa gye. 
23_11_5_N'obutuukirivu buliba lukoba lwa mukiwato kye, n'obwesigwa buliba lukoba lwa mu mugongo gwe. 
23_11_6_N'omusege gunaasulanga wamu n'omwana gw'endiga, n'engo eneegalamiranga wamu n'omwana gw'embuzi; n'ennyana n'omwana gw'empologoma n'ekya ssava wamu; n'omwana omuto alizikulembera. 
23_11_7_N'eate n'eddubu ziririira wamu; abaana baazo baligalamira wamu: n'empologoma erirya omuddo ng'ente. 
23_11_8_N'omwana ayonka alizannyira ku kinnya eky'enswera, n'omwana eyaakava ku mabeere aliteeka omukoao gwe ku mpampagama y'essalambwa. 
23_11_9_Tebaliruma newakubadde okuzikiriza ku lusozi lwange olutukuvu lwonna: kubanga ensi erijjula okumanya Mukama, ng'amazzi bwe gasaanikira ennyanja. 
23_11_10_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli ekikolo kya Yese, ekiyimirira okuba ebendera ey'amawanga, eri oyo amawanga gye banaanoonya; n'ekifo kye eky'okuwummuliramu kiriba kitiibwa. 
23_11_11_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli Mukama alissaawo nate omukono gwe omulundi ogw'okubiri okukomyawo abalifikkawo ku bantu be abalisigalawo, okubaggya mu Bwasuli ne mu Misiri ne mu Pasuloosi ne mu Kuusi ne mu Eramu ne mu Sinali ne mu Kamasi ne mu bizinga eby'omu nnyanja. 
23_11_12_Era aliwanikira amawanga ebendera, era alikunnaanya abaagobebwa mu Isiraeri, n'aleeta wamu abaasaasaanyizibwa ku Yuda okubaggya mu nsonda ennya ez'ensi. 
23_11_13_Era obuggya bwa Efulayimu buliggwaawo, n'abo abateganya Yuda balizikirizibwa. Efulayimu talikwatirwa Yuda buggya, ne Yuda taliteganya Efulayimu. 
23_11_14_Era balibuuka ne bagwa ku kibegabega ky'Omufirisuuti ebugwanjuba; balyetaba okunyaga abaana b'ebuvanjuba: baligolola omukono gwabwe ku Edomu ne Mowaabu; n'abaana ba Amoni balibagondera. 
23_11_15_Era Mukama alizikiririza ddala olulimi lw'ennyanja ey'e Misiri; era alikunkumulira omukono gwe ku Mugga n'empewo ye ekaza, n'agukuba n'agufuula emigga musanvu, n'asomosa abantu nga tebatobye bigere. 
23_11_16_Era waliba oluguudo eri abo abalifikkawo ku bantu be, abalisigalawo, okuva mu Bwasuli; nga bwe lwaliwo eri Isiraeri ku lunaku lwe yalinnyirako okuva mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
23_12_1_Era ku lunaku luli olyogera nti Naakwebaza, ai Mukama; kubanga newakubadde nga wansunguwalira, obusungu bwo bukyuse, era onsanyusa. 
23_12_2_Laba, Katonda bwe bulokozi bwange; nneesigaaga ne ssitya: kubanga Mukama Yakuwa ge maanyi gange n'oluyimba; era ye afuuse obulokozi bwange. 
23_12_3_Kyemunaavanga musenanga n'essanyu amazzi mu nzizi ez'obulokozi. 
23_12_4_Era ku lunaku luli mulyogera nti Mwebaze Mukama, mukoowoole erinnya lye, mubuulire ebikolwa bye mu mawanga, mwogere erinnya lye ligulumizibwe. 
23_12_5_Mumuyimbire Mukama; kubanga akoze eby'ekitiibwa: ekyo ki manyibwe mu nsi yonna. 
23_12_6_Yogerera waggulu oleekaane, ggwe atuula mu Sayuuni: kubanga Omutukuvu owa Isiraeri ali wakati mu ggwe mukulu. 
23_13_1_Omugugu gwa Babulooni Isaaya mutabani wa Amozi gwe yalaba. 
23_13_2_Muwanike ebendera ku lusozi olw'obweru, mubayimusize eddoboozi, muwenye n'omukono, bayingire mu miryango egy'abakungu. 
23_13_3_Ndagidde abawonge bange, weewaawo, mpise abasajja bange ab'a maanyi olw'obusungu bwange, aba nge abeenyumiriza n'amalala. 
23_13_4_Oluyoogaano lw'ekibiina ku nsozi ng'olweggwanga eddene! oluyoogaano olw'okuleekaana kw'obwaka baka obw'amawanga nga gakuŋŋaanye! Mukama ow'eggye akuŋŋaanyizza eggye olw'olutalo. 
23_13_5_Bava mu nsi y'ewala, ku nkomerero y'e ggulu, Mukama n'ebyokulwanyisa eby'okunyiiga kwe, okuzikiriza ensi yonna. 
23_13_6_Muwowoggane; kubanga olunaku lwa Mukama luli kumpi lulijja ng'okuzikirira okuva eri Omu yinza w'ebintu byonna. 
23_13_7_Emikono gyonna kyegiriva giddirira na buli mutima gw'omuntu gulisaanuuka: 
23_13_8_era balikeŋŋentererwa okusonsomolwa n'okubalagalwa ku libakwata; balirumwa ng'omukazi alumwa okuzaala: baliwuniikirira bokka na bokka; amaaso gaabwe galiba maaso ga muliro. 
23_13_9_Laba olunaku lwa Mukama lujja, olukambwe, nga lulina obusungu n'ekiruyi; okuzisa ensi, n'okuzikiriza abalina ebibi abaayo okubamalamu. 
23_13_10_Kubanga emmunyeenye ez'omi ggulu n'ebibiina byazo tebiryaka kwaka kwabyo: enjuba erizikizibwa ng'evaayo, n'omwezi tegulyaka mu sana gwagwo. 
23_13_11_Nange ndibonereza ensi olw'obubi bwabwe n'ababi olw'obutali butuukirivu bwabwe; era ndimalawo ekyejc eky'abalina amalala, era ndikkakka nya okwenyumiriza kw'abo abatiisa. 
23_13_12_Ndifuula omusajja okuba ow'o muwendo okusinga ezaabu ennungi omusajja okusinga ezaabu ennung eya Ofiri. 
23_13_13_Kyendiva nkankanya eggulu, n'ensi erinyeenyezebwa okuva mu kifo kyayo, mu busungu bwa Mukama ow'eggye, ne ku lunala olw'ekiruyi kye. 
23_13_14_Awo olulituuka ng'empeewo egobebwa era ng'endiga ezitaliiko musumba, balikyuka buli muntu okudda mu bann b'ewaabwe ye, era balidduka buli muntu mu nsi yaabwe ye. 
23_13_15_Buli anaalabikanga anaafumitibwanga; na buli anaawambibwanga anaagwanga n'ekitala. 
23_13_16_N'abaana baabwe abawere balimenyerwamenyerwa mi. maaso gaabwe; ennyumba zaabwe zirinyagibwa, n'abakazi baabwe balikwatibwa lwa maanyi: 
23_13_17_Laba, ndibaleetako Abameedi, abatalissaaro mwoyo eri effeeza, n'ezaabu ebaligisanyukira. 
23_13_18_N'emitego gyabwe girimenyaamenya abavubuma so tebalisaasira zzadde lya lubuto; eriiso lyabwe teririsonyiwa baana bato. 
23_13_19_Ne Babulooni, ekiiibwa eky'obwakabaka, obulungi obw'amalala ag'Abakaludaaya, kiriba iga Katonda bwe yasuula Sodomu ie Ggomola. 
23_13_20_Tekiisulibwengamu ennaku zonna, so tekiibeerwengamu emirembe n'emirembe: so n'Omuwalabu taasimbegayo weema; so n'abasumba tebaagalamizengayo nbuzi zaabwe. 
23_13_21_Naye ensolo enkambwe ez'omu ddungu ze zinaagalamirangayo; n'ennyumba zaame zirijjula ebintu ebisinda; ne bamaaya banaabeerangayo, n'ebya zigeye binaaziniranga eyo. 
23_13_22_N'emisege ginaakaabiranga mu bigo byabwe, n'ebibe mu mayumba gaabwe ag'ebinyumu: n'ekiseera yakyo kiri kumpi n'okutuuka, so n'ennaku zaakyo teziryongerwako. 
23_14_1_Kubanga Mukama alisaasira Yakobo, era, bw'alimala, n'alonda Isiraeri, n'abateeka mu nsi yaabwe bo: n'omugenyi alyegatta iabo, era balyetaba n'ennyumba ya Yakobo. 
23_14_2_N'amawanga balibawala, ne babaleeta mu kifo kyabwe: n'eanyumba ya Isiraeri baba nabo mu nsi ya Mukama okuba baddu n'abazaana: era baliwamba bo abaabawambanga; era balifuga bo abaabajooganga. 
23_14_3_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku Mukama lw'alikuweerako okuwuunula mu nnaku zo ne mu kuteana kwo ne mu kuweereza okuzibu we wawalirizibwa okuweereza, 
23_14_4_awo oligera olugero luno ku kaaka w’e Babulooni n'oyogera nti Omujoozi ng'aweddewo! ekibuga kya zaabu nga kiweddewo! 
23_14_5_Mukama amenye omuggo ogw'ababi, muggo ogw'obwakabaka ogw'abo abafuga 
23_14_7_Ensi yonna ewummudde, era eredde: babaguka okuyimba. 
23_14_8_Weewaawo, enfugo zikusanyukira, emivule egy'oku Lebanooni, nga gyogera nti Kasookedde ogalamizibwa, tekulinnyanga ku ffe atutema. 
23_14_9_Amagombe wansi gagugumuka ku lulwo okukusisinkana ng'ojja: gagolokosa abafu ku lulwo, abakulu bonna ab'ensi; gayimusizza bakabaka bonna ab'amawanga okuva ku ntebe zaabwe. 
23_14_10_Abo fionna baliddamu ne bakugamba nti Era naawe ofuuse munafu nga ffe? ofaanaanyizibwa nga ffe? 
23_14_11_Ekitiibwa kyo kissibwa emagombe, n'eddoboozi ly'ennanga zo: envunyu zaaliiriddwa wansi wo, era envunyu zikubisseeko. 
23_14_12_Ng'ogudde okuva mu ggulu, ggwe emmunyeeye ey'enkya, omwana w'enkya! ng'otemeddwa okutuuka ku ttaka, ggwe eyamegganga amawanga! 
23_14_13_N'oyogera mu mutima gwo nti Ndirinnya mu ggulu, ndigulumiza entebe yange okusinga emmunyeeye za Katonda; era ndituula ku lusozi olw'ekibiina, ku njuyi ez'enkomerero ez'obukiika obwa kkono: 
23_14_14_ndirinnya okusinga ebire we bikoma; ndifaanana oyo ali waggulu ennyo. 
23_14_15_Naye olissibwa emagombe, ku njuyi ez'enkomerero ez'obunnya. 
23_14_16_Abo abanaakulabanga banaakukeberanga, banaakulowoozanga, nga boogera nti Ye wuuno eyakankanyanga ensi, eyanyeenyanga obwakabaka: 
23_14_17_eyazisanga ensi yonna, n'asuula ebibuga byamu; ataatanga basibe be okudda ewaabwe? 
23_14_18_Bakabaka bonna ab'amawanga, bonna bwe benkana, beebakira mu kitiibwa, buli muntu mu nnyumba ye ye. 
23_14_19_Naye ggwe osuulibwa okukuggya mu malaalo go ng'ettabi erikyayibwa, ng'oyambadde abattibwa, abafumitibwa n'ekitala, abakka mu mayinja ag'obunnya; ng'omulambo ogulinnyirirwa n'ebigere. 
23_14_20_Toligattibwa nabo mu kuziikibwa, kubanga wazikiriza ensi yo, n'otta abantu bo; ezzadde ly'abo abakola obubi teriryogerwako ennaku zonna. 
23_14_21_Mutegekere abaana be okuttibwa olw'obutali butuukirivu bwa bakitaabwe; baleme okugolokoka, ne balya ensi, ne bajjuza ensi yonna ebibuga. 
23_14_22_Nange ndibagolokokerako, bw'ayogera Mukama ow'eggye, ne mpemmenta mu Babulooni erinnya n'abalifikkawo, n'omwana n'omuzzukulu, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_14_23_Era ndikifuula obutaka bwa namunnungu, n'ebidiba eby'amazzi: era ndikyera n'olweyo olw'okuzikiriza, bw'ayogera Mukama ow'eggye. 
23_14_24_Mukama ow'eggye alayidde, ng'ayogera nti Mazima nga bwe nnalowooza, bwe kirituukirira bwe kityo; era nga bwe nnateesa, bwe kirinywera bwe kityo; 
23_14_25_ndimenyera Omwasuli mu nsi yange, era ndimulinnyira n'ebigere ku nsozi zange: kale ekikoligo kye kiribavaako, n'omugugu gwe guliva ku kibegabega kyabwe. 
23_14_26_Okwo kwe kuteesa okwateesebwa ku nsi yonna: era ogwo gwe mukono ogwagololwa ku mawanga gonna. 
23_14_27_Kubanga Mukama ow'eggye ye yateesa, era ani alikijjulula? n'omukono gwe gugoloddwa, era ani aliguzzaayo? 
23_14_28_Mu mwaka kabaka Akkazi mwe yafiira ne wabaawo omugugu guno. 
23_14_29_Tosanyuka, ggwe Bufirisuuti, ggwe wenna, kubanga omuggo gumenyese ogwakukuba: kubanga mu kikolo ky'omusota muliva essalambwa, n'ezzadde lyalyo liriba musota gwa muliro ogubuuka. 
23_14_30_N'ababereberye ab'abaavu balirya, n'abatalina bintu baligalamira mirembe: era nditta ekikolo kyo n'enjala, n'ababo abalifikkawo balittibwa. 
23_14_31_Wowoggana, ggwe wankaaki; kaaba, ggwe ekibuga; osaanuuse, ggwe Bufirisuuti, ggwe wenna; kubanga mu bukiika obwa kkono muvaamu omukka, so tewali eyeewala mu ntuuko ze ezaalagirwa. 
23_14_32_Kale balyanukulwa batya aba baka ab'eggwanga? Nti Mukama yateekawo emisingi gya Sayuuni, ne mu ye ababonyaabonyezebwa ku bantu be mwe baliddukira. 
23_15_1_Omugugu gwa Mowaabu. Kubanga mu kiro kimu Ali ekya Mowaabu baakizisa, baakimalawo; kubanga mu kiro kimu Ali ekya Mowaabu baakizisa, baakimalawo. 
23_15_2_Ayambuse e Bayisi ne Diboni, ku bifo ebigulumivu, okukaaba amaziga: Mowaabu awowogganira Nebo ne Medeba: ku mitwe gyabwe gyonna kuliko ebiwalaata, buli kirevu kimwereddwa. 
23_15_3_Beesibira ebibukutu mu nguudo zaabwe: waggulu ku nnyumba zaabwe ne mu mbuga zaabwe buli muntu awowoggana, ng'akaaba nnyo amaziga. 
23_15_4_Ne Kesuboni alira, ne Ereyale; eddoboozi lyabwe liwulirwa okutuuka e Yakazi: basserikale ba Mowaabu kyebava boogerera waggulu; obulamu bwe bukankana mu nda mu ye. 
23_15_5_Omutima gwange gukaabira Mowaabu; abakungu be baddukira e Zowaali, e Yegulasuserisiya: kubanga awayambukirwa e Lukisi gye balinnyira nga bakaaba amaziga; kubanga bakaabira mu kkubo ery'e Kolonayimu okukaaba okw'okuzikirira. 
23_15_6_Kubanga amazzi ag'e Nimulimu galirekebwawo: kubanga omuddo guwotokedde ddala, omuddo omugonvu guggwaawo, tewali kintu kimera. 
23_15_7_Ebintu ebingi bye bafunye n'ebyo bye baterese kyebaliva babitwala eri omugga ogw'enzingu. 
23_15_8_Kubanga okukaaba kwetoolodde ensalo za Mowaabu; okuwowoggana kwakwo kutuuse e Yegulayimu, n'okuwowoggana kwakwo kutuuse e Beererimu. 
23_15_9_Kubanga amazzi ag'e Dimoni gajjudde omusaayi: kubanga ndyeyongera okuleeta ebirala nate ku Dimoni, empologoma ku oyo awona ku Mowaabu, ne ku abo abalifikkawo ku nsi. 
23_16_1_Muweereze abaana b'endiga b'oyo afuga ensi okuva e Seera ekyolekera eddungu okutuuka ku lusozi lwa muwala wa Sayuuni. 
23_16_2_Kubanga olulituuka ng'ennyonyi ezaabula ng'ekisu ekyasaasaana bwe batyo bwe baliba bawala ba Mowaabu ku misomoko gya Alunoni. 
23_16_3_Teesa ebigambo, mala omusango; fuula ekisiikirize kyo okuba ng'ekiro wakati mu ttuntu: kweka abagobeddwa; tolyamu lukwe adaagana. 
23_16_4_Abange abagobeddwa batuule naawe; Mowaabu, beera kiddukiro gy'ali mu maaso g'omunyazi: kubanga omukanga azikiridde, okunyaga kuwedde, abajoozi bakomye mu nsi. 
23_16_5_N'entebe ey'obwakabaka eneenywezebwanga mu kusaasira, era walibaawo aligituulako mu mazima, mu weema ya Dawudi; ng'asala emisango, era ng'agoberera eby'ensonga, era omwangu okukolanga eby'obutuukirivu. 
23_16_6_Tuwulidde amalala ga Mowaabu, nga wa malala mangi nnyo; ekyejo kye n'amalala ge n'obusungu bwe; okwenyumiriza kwe tekuliimu. 
23_16_7_Mowaabu kyaliva awowogganira Mowaabu, buli muntu aliwowoggana: mulinakuwalira emigaati egya zabbibu egy'e Kirukaleseesi, nga mukubiddwa ddala. 
23_16_8_Kubanga ennimiro ez'e Kesubooni ziwotoka, n'omuzabbibu ogw'e Sibuma; abakungu ab'amawanga bamenyedde ddala emiti gyagwo egyasinga obulungi; gyabuna okutuuka e Yazeri, gyatuuka mu ddungu; amatabi gaagwo gaalanda, gaasomoka ennyanja. 
23_16_9_Kyennaava nkaabira amaziga awamu n'okukaaba kwa Yazeri olw'omuzabbibu ogw'e Sibuma: naakufukirira amazzi n'amaziga gange, ggwe Kesubooni ne. Ereyale: kubanga ku bibala byo eby'ekyengera ne ku bikungulwa byo kukubiddwako olube. 
23_16_10_N'essanyu liggiddwawo, n'emizira giwedde mu nnimiro eŋŋimu; ne mu nsuku z'emizabbibu temuliba kuyimba, newakubadde eddoboozi ery'okusanyuka: tewaliba musogozi alisogolera omwenge mu masogolero; nkomezza emizira gy'abasogozi. 
23_16_11_Ebyenda byange kyebiva bikaabira Mowaabu ng'ennanga, ne munda wange mmukaabira Kirukeresi. 
23_16_12_Awo olulituu.ka, Mowaabu bw'alyeyanjula, bw'alyekooya ku kifo ekigulumivu, n'ajja mu watukuvu we okusaba, talisobola. 
23_16_13_Ekyo kye kigambo Mukama kye yayogera ku Mowaabu mu biro eby'edda. 
23_16_14_Naye kaakano Mukama ayogedde nti Emyaka esatu nga teginnaggwaako, ng'emyaka egy'omusenze akolera empeera bwe gibeera, ekitiibwa kya Mowaabu kirinyoomebwa awamu n'ekibiina kye kyonna ekinene; n'abo abalifikkawo baliba batono nnyo so tebaliba kintu: 
23_17_1_Omugugu gwa Ddamasiko. Laba, Ddamasiko, kiggiddwawo obutaba kibuga, era kiriba kifunvu eky'ebyagwa. 
23_17_2_Ebibuga bya Aloweri birekeddwawo: biriba bya mbuzi, ezunaagalamiranga so tewaabenga anaaziikanga. 
23_17_3_Era ekigo kirikoma mu Efulayimu, n'obwakabaka mu Ddamasiko, n'abalifikkawo ku Busuuli; baliba ng'ekitiibwa ky'abaana ba Isiraeri, bw'ayogera Mukama ow'eggye. 
23_17_4_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli ekitiibwa kya Yakobo kirikendee zebwa, n'obugewu bw'omubiri gw bulikogga. 
23_17_5_Era kiriba ng'omu kunguzi bw'akuŋŋaanya eŋŋaano emera n'omukono gwe ne gukungula ebirimba; weewaawo, kiriba ng'o muntu bw'alonda ebirimba mi kiwonvu kya Lefayimu. 
23_17_6_Naye mulisigalamu ebirondebwa, ng'okukubibwa kw'omuzeyituuni bwe kubeera, ebibala ebibiri oba bisatu waggulu ku busongezo obukomererayo, ebina oba bitaano ku busongezo bw'omuti omugimu, bw'ayogera Mukama, Katonda wa Isiraeri 
23_17_7_Ku lunaku luli omuntu alitunuulira Omutonzi we, n’amaaso go galikyukira Omutukuvu owa Isiraeri. 
23_17_8_So talitunuulira byoto, omulim gw'emikono gye, so talikyukira ekyo engalo ze kye zaakola, oba Baasera oba ebifaananyi by'enjuba. 
23_17_9_Ku lunaku luli ebibuga bye eby'amaanyi biriba ng'ebifulukwa mu kibira ne ku ntikko y'olusozi, ebyaviibwamu mu maaso g'abaana ba Isiraeri era biriba nsiko. 
23_17_10_Kubanga weerabidde Katonda ow'obulokozi bwo so tojjukidde lwazi lwa maanyi ge kyova, osimbamu ebisimbe eby'oki sanyusa, n'osigamu ebimera ebigenyi: 
23_17_11_ku lunaku lw'osimbirako ossaako olukomera, era enkya omerusa ensigo zo: naye ebikungulwa biddukira ku lunaku olw'okunakuwaliramu era olw'okukungubagiramu. 
23_17_12_Woowe, oluyoogaano lw'amawanga amangi, agawuluguma ng'okuwuluguma kw'ennyanja; n'okuwulukuka kw'amawanga agawuluku ng'okuwulukuka kw'amazzi ag’amaanyi! 
23_17_13_Amawanga galiwulukuka ng'okuwulukuka kw'amazzi amangi naye alibanenya, nabo baddukira wala, era baligobebwa ng'ebisusunku eby'oku nsozi mu maaso g'empewo, era ng'enfuufu ey'akazimu mu mberi ya kibuyaga. 
23_17_14_Akawungeezi, laba, ntiisa; obudde nga tebunnakya tebalih Guno gwe mugabo gw'abo abatunyaga, era ye mpeera y'abo abatukwakwabira. 
23_18_1_Woowe, ensi ey'okukwakwaya kw'ebiwaawaatiro, eri emitala w'emigga gya Kuusi: 
23_18_2_etuma ababaka ku nnyanja mu bibaya ku mazzi, ng'eyogera nti Mugende, mmwe ababaka abangu, eri eggwanga eggwanvu era eggweweevu, eri abantu abaabanga ab'entiisa kasookedde babeerawo na guno gujwa; eggwanga erigera era eririnnyiririra ddala, ensi yaabwe emigga gigisazeemu! 
23_18_3_Mmwe mwenna abatuula mu nsi, nammwe ababeera ku ttaka ly'ensi, ebendera bw'ewanikibwanga ku nsozi, mulabanga; era ekkondeere bwe lifuuyibwanga, muwuliranga. 
23_18_4_Kubanga bw'atyo Mukama bw'aŋŋambye nti Ndisirika, era ndiraba nga nnyima mu kifo kyange we ntudde; ng'olubugumu olutemagana mu musana, ng'ekire ky'omusulo mu lubugumu lw'omu biro eby'okukunguliramu. 
23_18_5_Kubanga okukungula nga tekuznabaawo, okumulisa nga kuwedde, n'ekimuli nga kifuuka zabbibu eyeigera, aliwawaagula obutabi n'ebiwabyo, n'amatabi agalanda aligaggyawo n'agatema. 
23_18_6_Galirekerwa wamu ennyonyi ez'amaddu ez'oku nsozi n'ensolo ez'ensi: era ennyonyi ez'amaddu zirigatuulako mu kyeya, n'ensolo zonna ez'ensi zirigabeerako nu ttoggo. 
23_18_7_Mu biro ebyo ekirabo kirireeterwa Mukama ow'eggye ky'abantu abawanvu era abaweweeu, n'okuva eri abantu abaabanga b'entiisa kasookedde babeerawo na guno gujwa; eggwanga erigera era eririnnyiririra ddala, ensi yaabwe migga gigisazeemu, eri ekifo eky'erinnya lya Mukama ow'eggye, olusozi Sayuuni. 
23_19_1_Omugugu gwa Misiri. Laba, Mukama yeebagadde ku kire ekiyita amangu n'ajja mu Misiri: n'ebifaananyi eby'e Misiri birinyeenyezebwa mu maaso ge, omutima gwa Misiri gulisaanuuka mu yo wakati. 
23_19_2_Era ndirwanya Abamisiri n'Abamisiri: era balirwaa buli muntu ne muganda we; na buli muntu ne muliraanwa we; ekibuga n'ekibuga, obwakabaka n'obwakabaka. 
23_19_3_N'omwoyo gwa Misiri guliggwaamu wakati mu yo; nange nditta okuteesa kwayo: era baliragulwa eri ebifaananyi, n'eri abasamize, n'eri abo abaliko emizimu, n'eri abalogo. 
23_19_4_Era ndigabula Abamisiri mu mukono gw'omwami omukambwe; era kabaka omukanga alibafuga, bw'ayogera Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye. 
23_19_5_N'amazzi galikendeera mu nnyanja, n'omugga guliweebuuka ne gukala. 
23_19_6_N'emigga giriwunya; obugga obw'e Misiri bulikeewa ne bukala: ebitoogo n'essaalu biriwotoka. 
23_19_7_Amalundiro agali ku Kiyira, ku lubalama lwa Kiyira kwennyini, ne byonna ebisigibwa ku Kiyira, birikala, birigobebwawo, so tebiribaawo nate. 
23_19_8_Era n'abavubi balikaaba, n'abo bonna abasuula amalobo mu Kiyira balinakuwala, n'abo abasuula ebiragala mu mazzi baliggwaamu amaanyi. 
23_19_9_Era nate abo abakola omulimu ogw'obugoogwa obusunsule, n'abo abaluka engoye enjeru, balikwatibwa ensonyi. 
23_19_10_N'empagi zaayo zirimenyekamenyeka, abo bonna abakolera, empeera balinakuwala mu myoyo. 
23_19_11_Abakulu w'e Zowani basiruwalidde ddala; okuteesa kw'abateesa ba Falaawo abakiza amagezi kufuuse ng'okw'ensolo: mugamba mutya Falaawo nti Ndi mwana wa bagezi, omwana wa bassekabaka ab'edda? 
23_19_12_Kale nno abasajja bo ab'amagezi bali ludda wa? era bakubuulire kaakano; era bategeere Mukama ow'eggye ky'ateesezza ku Misiri. 
23_19_13_Abakulu ab'e Zowani basiruwadde, abakulu ab'e Noofu balimbiddwa; ejjinja ery'oku nsonda ery'ebika byayo, abo be bakyamizza Misiri. 
23_19_14_Mukama atadde omwoyo ogw'obubambaavu wakati mu yo: era bakyamizza Misiri mu buli mulimu gwayo, ng'omutamiivu atagatta ng'asesema. 
23_19_15_So tewaliba mulimu gwonna gwa Misiri oguyinzika okukolebwa omutwe oba mukira, olusansa oba kitoogo. 
23_19_16_Ku lunaku luli Misiri erifaanana ng'abakazi: era erikankana eritya olw'okukunkumula kw'omukono gwa Mukama ow'eggye, gw'akunkumulira ku yo. 
23_19_17_N'ensi ya Yuda erifuuka ntiisa eri Misiri, buli muntu anaagibuulirwangako anaatyanga, olw'okuteesa kwa Mukama ow'eggye, kw'ateesa ku yo. 
23_19_18_Ku lunaku luli waliba ebibuga bitaano mu nsi y'e Misiri ebyogera olulimi lwa Kanani, ne birayirira Mukama ow'eggye; ekimu kiriyitibwa nti Kibuga kya kuzikirira. 
23_19_19_Ku lunaku luli waliba ekyoto eri Mukama wakati mu nsi y'e Misiri, n'empagi eriba ku nsalo yaayo eri Mukama. 
23_19_20_Era eriba kabonero era omujulirwa eri Mukama ow'eggye mu nsi y'e Misiri: kubanga balikaabira Mukama olw'abajoozi, naye alibaweereza omulokozi, era omukuumi, naye alibalokola. 
23_19_21_Era Mukama alimanyibwa Misiri, n'Abamisiri balimanya Mukama ku lunaku luli; weewaawo, balisinza ne ssaddaaka n'ekitone, era balyeyama obweyamo eri Mukama, era balibutuukiriza. 
23_19_22_Era Mukama alikuba Misiri, ng'akuba era ng'awonya; nabo balidda eri Mukama, naye alyegayirirwa bo, era alibawonya. 
23_19_23_Ku lunaku luli waliba oluguudo oluva mu Misiri olugenda mu Bwasuli, n'Omwasuli alijja mu Misiri, n'Omumisiri mu Bwasuli; n'Abamisiri balisinziza wamu n'Abaasuli. 
23_19_24_Ku lunaku luli Isiraeri aliba wa kusatu wamu ne Misiri n'Obwasuli, omukisa wakati mu nsi: 
23_19_25_kubanga Mukama ow'eggye abawadde omukisa, ng'ayogera nti Baweebwe omukisa Misiri abantu bange, n'Obwasuli omulimu gw'emikono gyange, ne Isiraeri obusika bwange. 
23_20_1_Mu mwaka Talutani mwe yajjira e Asudodi, Salugoni kabaka w'e Bwasuli bwe yamugaba, n'alwana ne Asudodi n'akimenya 
23_20_3_Mukama n'ayogera nti Ng'omuddu wange Isaaya bwe yatambulira emyaka esatu obwereere nga talina na ngatto okuba akabonero n'ekyewuunyo ku Misiri ne ku Kuusi 
23_20_5_Era balikennentererwa balikwatibwa ensonyi, olwa Kuusi essuubi lyabwe, n'olwa Misiri ekitiibwa kyabwe. 
23_20_6_N'oyo atuula ku ttale lino ery'ennyanja alyogerera ku lunaku luli nti Laba, bwe lifaanana bwe lityo essuubi lyaffe, gye twaddukira okubeerwa okulokoka eri kabaka w’e Bwasuli: naffe tuli wona tutya ffe? 
23_21_1_Omugugu ogw'eddungu ery'ennyanja. Nga kibuyaga ow'omu bukiika obwa ddyo bw'ayita amangu, bwe watyo bwe wava mu ddungu, mu nsi ey'entiisa. 
23_21_2_Okwolesebwa okuzibu kumbuuliddwa; omulyazaamaanyi alyazaamaanya, a'omunyazi aayaga. Yambuka, ggwe Eramu: zingiza, ggwe Obumeedi; okussa ebikkowe kwayo kwonna nkukomezza. 
23_21_3_Ekiwato kyange kyekivudde kijjula okubalagalwa; obulumi bunkutte ng'obulumi bw'omukazi alumwa okuzaala: nnyoleddwa n'okuyinza ne ssiyinza kuwulira; nkeŋŋetereddwa n'okuyinza ne ssiyinza kulaba. 
23_21_4_Omutima gwange guwejjawejja, okwesisiwala kunkanze: ekiro kye nnali neegomba ki fuuse gye ndi kukaakana. 
23_21_5_Bategeka emmeeza, bassaswo abakuumi, balya, banywa: mugolokoke, mmwe abakulu, musiige amafuta ku ngabo. 
23_21_6_Kubanga bw'atyo Mukama bw'annambye nti Genda osseewo omukuumi; ategeeze ky'aaaalaba: 
23_21_7_era bw'alabanga ekitongole, abeebagala embalaasi babiri nga bali wamu, ekibiiaa ky'endogoyi, ekibiina ky'eŋŋamira, awuliranga aayo nga yeetegereza bulungi. 
23_21_8_N'akaaba ng'empologoma nti Ai Mukama, bulijjo emisana nnyimirira ku kigo awakuumirwa, era nkeesa obudde nga ndi muggalire. 
23_21_9_era, laba, wajja ekitongole ky'abantu, abeebagala embalaasi babiri nga bali wamu. N'addamu n'ayogera nti Babulooni kigudde, kigudde; n'ebifaananyi byonna ebyole ebya bakatonda baakyo bimenyese okutuuka ku ttaka. 
23_21_10_Woowe ggwe okuwuula kwange era eŋŋaano ey'omu gguuliro lyaage: ebyo bye mpulidde ebivudde eri Mukama ovd'eggye, Katonda wa Isiraeri, mbibabuulidde. 
23_21_11_Omugugu gwa Duuma. Waliwo ampita ng'ayima ku Seyiri nti Omukuumi, eby'ekiro bitya? Omukuumi, eby'ekiro bitya? 
23_21_12_Omukuumi n'ayogera nti Enkya ejja, era n'ekiro: bwe mwagala okubuuza, mubuuze: mukyuke mujje. 
23_21_13_Omugngu oguli ku Buwalabu. Mu kibira mu Buwalabu mwe mulisula, mmwe ebibiina ebya Abadedeni ebitambula. 
23_21_14_Oyo eyalumwa enayonta baamuleetera amazzi; abatuula mu nsi ey'e Teema baasisinkana abadduse a'emmere yaabwe. 
23_21_15_Kubanga badduka ebitala, elutala ekisowole, n'omutego omunaanule, n'obubi bw'entalo. 
23_21_16_Kubanga bw'atyo Mukama bw'aŋŋambye nti Omwaka nga tegunnaggwaako, ng'emyaka egy'omusenze akolera empeera bwe gibeera, ekitiibwa kyoana ekya Kedali kiri ggwaawo: 
23_21_17_n'abalifikkawo ku muwendo gw'abalasi, abasajja ab'amaaayi ab'oku baana ba Kedali, baliba batono: kubanga Mukama, Katonda wa Isiraeri, akyogedde. 
23_22_1_Omugugu ogw'ekiwonvu eky'okwolesebwa. Obadde otya kaakano, n'okuliaaya n'olinayira ddala waggulu ku anyumba? 
23_22_2_Ggwa ajjudde okuleekaana, ekibuga eky'oluyoogaano, ekibuga eky'essanyu; ababo abattibwa tebattibwa na kitala, so tebafiiridde mu ntalo. 
23_22_3_Abakufuga bonna baddukira wamu, baasibibwa abalasi: bonna abaasangibwa ku babo baasibirwa wamu, baddukira wala. 
23_22_4_Kyeanava njogera ati Mukyuse amaaso gammwe obutandaba, naakaba nnyo amaziga; temutegana kunsanyusa olw'okunyagibwa kw'omuwala w'abantu bange. 
23_22_5_Kubanga lwe lunaku olw'olukeŋŋentererwako era olw'okulinayirirwako, era olw'okubuusizabuusizaako, oluva eri Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye mu kiwonvu eky'okwolesebwa; oku menyamenya bbugwe, n'okukaaba eri ensozi. 
23_22_6_Eramu n'ayambalira omufuko, wamu n'amagaali ag'abasajja n'abeebagala embalaasi; Kiira n'asabuukulula engabo. 
23_22_7_Awo olwatuuka ebiwonvu byo ebisinga obulungi ne bijjula amagaali, n'abeebagala embalaasi, ne batalira mu mulyango. 
23_22_8_N'aggyawo ekibikka ku Yuda; n'otunuulira ku lunaki luli ebyokulwanyisa ebyali mu nnyumba ey'omu kibira. 
23_22_9_Ne mulaba ebituli ebyawagulwa mu kibuga kya Dawudi, nga bingi: ne mukuŋŋaanya amazzi ag'ekidiba ekya wansi. 
23_22_10_Ne mubala ennyumba ez'omu Yerusaalemi, ne mumenyaamenya ennyumba okunyweza bbugwe. 
23_22_11_Era ne musimira ekidiba amazzi ag'ekidiba eky'edda wakati wa babbugwe bombi: naye ne mutatunuulira oyo eyagira kino, so temwalowooza oyo eyakikola edda ennyo. 
23_22_12_Era ku lunaku luli Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye, n'ayits abantu okukaaba amaziga n'okuwuubaala n'okumwa ebiwalaata n'okwesiba ebibukutu: 
23_22_13_era, laba ssanyu na kujaguza, kutta nte ne kutta ndiga, kulya nnyama na kunywa mwenge: tulyetunywe kubanga enkya tunaafa. 
23_22_14_Mukama ow'eggye ne yeebikkulira mu man gange nti Mazima obutali butuukirivu buno tebulirongoosebwa okubavaako okutuusa lwe mulifa, bw'ayogera Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye. 
23_22_15_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama; Mukama ow'eggye, nti Weegendere eri omuwanika oyo, ye Sebuna, ya mukulu w'ennyumba, oyogere nti 
23_22_16_Okola ki wano? era ani gw'olina wano n'okwebajjira ne weebajjira wano entaana? ng'omubajjira entaana waggulu, nga yeetemera ennyumba mu lwazi! 
23_22_17_Laba, Mukama alikukasuka lwa maanyi ng'omusajja ow'amaanyi; weewaawo, ali kusabikira ddala. 
23_22_18_Talirema kukyuka n'akukasuka ng'omupiira mu nsi engazi; eyo gy'olifiira, era eyo amagaali ag'ekitiibwa kyo gye galibeera, ggwe ensonyi z'ennyumba ya mukama wo. 
23_22_19_Nange ndikuggya mu bwami bwo, era alikussa okuve mu bukulu bwo. 
23_22_20_Awo ku lunaku luli ndiyita omuddu wange Eriyakimu mutabani wa Kirukiya: 
23_22_21_era ndimwambaza ekyambalo kyo, ne mmunyweza n'olukoba lwo, era ndimuteresa okufuga kwo mu mukono gwe: era aliba kitaabwe eri abo abatuula mu Yerusaalemi n'eri ennyumba ya Yuda. 
23_22_22_N'ekisumuluzo eky'ennyumba ya Dawudi ndikiteeka ku kibegabega kye; era aliggulawo so tewaliba aggalawo; era aliggalawo so tewaliba aggulawo. 
23_22_23_Era ndimukomerera ng'enninga mu kifo ekinywevu; era aliba ntebe ya kitiibwa eri ennyumba ya kitaawe. 
23_22_24_Era balimuwanikako ekitiibwa kyonna eky'ennyumba ya kitaawe, ab'enda n'ezzadde, buli kintu ekitono, okuva ku bukompe okutuuka ku bita byonna. 
23_22_25_Ku lunaku luli, bw'ayogera Mukama ow'eggye, enninga eyakomererwa mu kifo ekinywevu erisimbuka; era eritemebwawo n'egwa, n'omugugu ogwali ku yo gulisalibwako; kubanga Mukama akyogedde. 
23_23_1_Omugugu gwa Ttuulo. Muwowoggane, mmwe ebyombo eby'e Talusiisi; kubanga kizise, obutabaamu nnyumba newakubadde okuyingiramu; bakibikkuliddwa okuva mu nsi ya Kittimu. 
23_23_2_Musirike, mmwe abatuula ku kizinga; ggwe abasuubuzi ab’e Zidoni abawunguka ennyanja gwe bajjuza. 
23_23_3_Era ku mazzi amangi ensigo za Sikoli, ebikungulwa bya Kiyira, bye byali amagoba ge; era oyo ye yali akatale k'amawanga. 
23_23_4_Kwatibwa ensonyi, ggwe Zidoni: kubanga ennyanja eyogedde, ekigo eky'ennyanja, nti Sinnalumwa kuzaala, so sinnazaala, so sinnayonsa balenzi, so sinnalera bawala. 
23_23_5_Ebigambo bwe birituuka e Misiri, balinakuwalira nnyo ebigambo eby'e Ttuulo. 
23_23_6_Muwunguke mugende e Talusiisi; muwowoggane, mmwe abatuula ku kizinga. 
23_23_7_Kino kye kibuga kyammwe eky'essanyu ekimaze emyaka emingi era ebigere byakyo ebyakitwalanga mu bitundu eby'ewala olw'obubudamo? 
23_23_8_Ani ateesezza kino ku Ttuulo, ekibuga ekitikkira engule, abasuubuzi baamu balangira, abatunzi baamu be b'ekitiibwa mu nsi? 
23_23_9_Ani ateesezza kino ku Ttuulo, ekibuga ekitikkira engule, abasuubuzi baamu balangira, abatunzi baamu be b'ekitiibwa mu nsi? 
23_23_10_Yita mu nsi yo nga Kiyira, ggwe muwala wa Talusiisi; tewakyali lukoba olukusiba. 
23_23_11_Agolodde omukono gwe ku nnyanja, anyeenyezza obwakabaka: Mukama alagidde eby'e Kanani, okuzikiriza ebigo byamu. 
23_23_12_N'ayogera nti Tokyeyongera kusanyuka, ggwe muwala wa Zidoni ajoogebwa: golokoka, owunguke ogende e Kittimu; era n'eyo toliba na kuwummula. 
23_23_13_Laba, ensi ey'Abakaludaaya; eggwanga lino terikyaliwo; Omwasuli agifudde ey'ensolo ez'omu ddungu: baazimba ebigo byabwe, baasuula amayumba gaamu; yaaizikiriza. 
23_23_14_Muwowoggane, mmwe ebyombo eby'e Talusiisi: kubanga ekigo kyammwe kizise. 
23_23_15_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli Ttuulo kiryerabirirwa emyaka nsanvu, ng'ennaku za kabaka omu bwe ziriba: emyaka nsanvu nga giweddeko ebiriba ku Ttuulo biriba ng'ebiri mu luyimba olw'omwenzi. 
23_23_16_Ddira ennanga otambuletambule mu kibuga, ggwe omwenzi eyeerabirwa; kuhs bulungi ennanga, oyimbe ennimba nnyingi, olyoke ojjukirwe. 
23_23_17_Awo olulituuka emyaka nsanvu nga giweddeko Mukama alijjira Ttuulo, naye aliddira empeera ye, era alyenda n'obwakabaka bwonna obw'ensi obusaasaanidde wonna.
