23_23_18_N'ebibye eby'obuguzi n'empeera ye biriba butukuvu eri Mukama: tebiriterekebwa so tebiriwanikibwa; kubanga ebibye eby'obuguzi biriba by'abo abatuula mu maaso ga Mukama, okulyanga okukkuta, n'okuba ebyambalo ebigumu. 
23_24_1_Laba, Mukama ensi agimalamu byonna, era agizisa, era agiwunika, era asaasaanyiza ddala abagituutamu. 
23_24_2_Era olulituuka ng'abantu bwe baliba, bw'atyo kabona bw'aliba; ng'omuddu bw'aliba, bw'atyo mukama we bw'aliba; ng'omuzaana bw'aliba, bw'atyo mugele we bw'aliba; ng'amuguzi bw'aliba, bw'atyo omutunzi bw'aliba; ng'awola bw'aliba, bw'atyo eyeewola bw'aliba; ng'aweebwa amagoba bw'aliba, bw'atyo amuwa amagoba bw'aliba. 
23_24_3_Ensi erimalirwamu ddala byonna, era erinyagirwa ddala; kubanga Mukama ayogedde ekigambo ekyo. 
23_24_4_Ensi ewuubaala era esaanuuka, ettaka liggwaamu amaanyi era lisaanuuka, abantu abagulumivu ab'ensi baggwaamu amaanyi. 
23_24_5_Era ensi esiigiddwako empitambi wansi w'abagituulamu; kubanga basobezza amateeka, ne bawaanyisa ekiragiro, ne bamenya endagaano eteriggwaawo. 
23_24_6_Ekikolimo kyekyava kirya ensi, n'abo abagituulamu balabise nga gubasinze: abatuula mu nsi kyebava bookebwa, abantu ne basigala batono. 
23_24_7_Omwenge omusu guwuubaala, omuzabbibu guyongobera, bonna abalina emitima egisanyuka bassa ebikkowe. 
23_24_8_Ekinyumu eky'ebitaasa kikoma, oluyoogaano lw'abo abasanyuka luggwaawo, essanyu ery'ennanga likoma. 
23_24_9_Tebalinywa mwenge nga bayimba; ekitamiiza kirikaayirira abo abakinywa. 
23_24_10_Ekibuga eky'okwetabula kimenyesemenyese: buli nnyumba eggaddwawo, omuntu yenna aleme okuyingiramu. 
23_24_11_Waliwo okukaaba mu nguudo olw'omwenge; essanyu lyonna lizikizibwa, ekinyumu eky'ensi kigenze. 
23_24_12_Mu kibuga musigadde okuzika, ne wankaaki akubiddwa n'okuzikirira. 
23_24_13_Kubanga bwe kiti bwe kiribeera wakati mu nsi mu mawanga, nga bwe bakuba omuzeyituuni, nga bwe balonda ezabbibu okunoga nga kuwedde. 
23_24_14_Bano baliyimusa eddoboozi lyabwe, balyogerera waggulu, olw'obukulu bwa Mukama baleekaana nga bayima ku nnyanja. 
23_24_15_Kale mugulumize Mukama ebuvanjuba, erinnya lya Mukama, Katonda wa Isiraeri, mu bizinga eby'omu nnyanja. 
23_24_16_Tuwulidde ennyimba nga ziva ku nkomerero y'ensi, ekitiibwa eri abatuukirivu. Naye ne njogera nti Nkoozimba, nkoozimba, zinsanze! abalyazaamaanyi balyazaamaanyizza; weewaawo, abalyazaamaanyi balyazaamaanyizza nnyo. 
23_24_17_Entiisa n'obunnya n'omutego biri ku ggwe, ggwe atuula mu nsi. 
23_24_18_Awo olulituuka oyo adduka eddoboozi ery'entiisa aligwa mu bunnya; n'oyo alinnya okuva mu bunnya wakati omutego gulimukwata: kubanga ebituli ebya waggulu bigguddwawo, n'emisingi gy'ensi ginyeenya. 
23_24_19_Ensi emenyekedde ddala, ensi esaanuukidde ddala, ensi ejjulukuse nnyo. 
23_24_20_Ensi eritagatta ng'omutamiivu, era eriyuuguumizibwa ng'ensiisira; n'okusobya kwayo kuligizitoowerera, era erigwa n'etegolokoka nate. 
23_24_21_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli Mukama alibonereza eggye ery'abagulumivu waggulu, ne bakabaka ab'ensi ku nsi. 
23_24_22_Era balikuŋŋaanyizibwa wamu ng'abasibe bwe bakunnaanyizibwa mu bunnya, era balisibirwa mu kkomera, era ennaku anyingi aga ziyiseewo balijjirwa. 
23_24_23_Kale omwezi, gulikwatibwa ensoayi, n'enjuba eriswala; kubanga Mukama ow'eggye alifugira ku lusozi Sayuuni ne mu Yerusaalemi, ne mu maaso g'abakadde be n'ekitiibwa. 
23_25_1_Ai Mukama, ggwe Katonda wange; naakugulumizanga, naatenderezanga erinnya lyo; ku banga okoze eby'ekitalo, bye wateesa edda, mu bwesigwa n'amazima. 
23_25_2_Kubanga ekibuga okifudde ekifuavu; ekibuga ekyaliko enkomera okifudde ebyagwa: eriyumba ery'abagenyi olifudde obutaba kibuga; tekirizimbibwa ennaku zonna. 
23_25_3_Abantu ab'amaanyi kyebaliva bakussaamu ekitiibwa, ekibuga eky'amawanga ag'entiisa kirikutya. 
23_25_4_Kubanga wabanga kigo eri abaavu, ekigo eri atalina hintu ng'alabye ennaku, ekiddukiro eri kibuyaga, ekisiikirize eri olubugumu, okuwuuma kw'ab'entiisa bwe kubanga kibuyaga akunta ku kisenge. 
23_25_5_Ng'olubugumu oluli mu kifo ekikalu bw'olikkakkanya bw'otyo oluyoogaano olw'abagenyi; ng'olubugumu bwe lukkakkanyizibwa n'ekisiikirize ky'ekire, oluyimba olw'ab'entiisa hulikkakkanyizibwa, 
23_25_6_Era ku lusozi luno Mukama ow'eggye alifumbira amawanga gonna embaga ey'ebya ssava, embaga ey'omwenge omuka, ey'ebya ssava ebijjudde obusomyo, ey'omwenge omuka ogusengejjeddwa obulungi. 
23_25_7_Era alimirira ddala ku lusozi luno ekibikka kyonna ekyaliiriddwa ku baatu bonna, n'eggigi erisaanikidde ku mawanga gonna 
23_25_8_Yamirira ddala okufa okutuusa ennaku zonna; era Mukama Katonda alisangula amaziga mu maaso gonna; n'ekivume eky'abaatu be alikiggya ku nsi yonna: kubanga Mukama akyogedde. 
23_25_9_Kale kiryogererwa ku lunaku luli nti Laba, ono ye Katonda waffe; twamulindiriranga, era alitulokola: ono ye Mukama, twamulindiriranga, tulisanyuka tulijaguliza obulokozi bwe. 
23_25_10_Kubanga ku lusozi luno omukono gwa Mukama kwe guliwummulira, era Mowaabu alirinnyiririrwa mu kifo kye, ng'ebisasiro bwe birinnyiririrwa mu mazzi ag'olubungo. 
23_25_11_Era alyanjuluza engalo ze wakati mu kyo, ng'awuga bw'ayanjuluza engalo ze okuwuga: era alikkakkanya amalala ge wamu n'enkwe ez'engalo ze. 
23_25_12_N'ekigo eky'olukomera oluwanvu olwa bbugwe wo akikkakkanyizza, akissizza wansi, n'akituusa ku ttaka okutuuka ne mu nfuufu. 
23_26_1_Ku lunaku luli oluyimba luno luliyimbirwa mu nsi ya Yuda: nti Tulina ekibuga eky'amaanyi; obulokozi bw'alissaawo okuba bbugwe n'enkomera. 
23_26_2_Mugguleewo enzigi, eggwanga ettuukirivu erikwata amazima liyingire. 
23_26_3_Onoomukuumanga mirembe mirembe, eyeesigamya omwoyo gwe ku ggwe: kubanga akwesiga ggwe. 
23_26_4_Mwesigenga Mukama ennaku zonna: kubanga mu Mukama Yakuwa mwe muli olwazi alutaliggwaawo. 
23_26_5_Kubanga akkakkanyizza abo abatuula waggulu, ekibuga ekigulumivu: akissa wansi, akissa wansi okutuuka ne ku ttaka; akikkakkanya okutuuka ne mu nfuufu. 
23_26_6_Ekigere kirikirinnyirira; ebigere by'omwavu, n'ebisinde by'oyo atalina kintu. 
23_26_7_Ekkubo ery'omutuukirivu bugolokofu: ggwe omugolokofu oluŋŋamya olugendo olw'omutuukirivu. 
23_26_8_Weewaawo, mu kkubo ery'emisango gyo, ai Mukama, mwe twakulindiriranga; eri erinnya lyo n'eri ekijjukizo kyo ye eri okwoya kw'obulamu bwaffe. 
23_26_9_Nakwoyanga n'obulamu bwange ekiro; weewaawo, nakeeranga mu makya okukunoonya n'omwoyo gwange munda yange: kubanga emisango gyo bwe gibeera mu nsi, abatuula ku ttaka lwe bayiga obutuukirivu. 
23_26_10_Omubi ne bwe bamulaga ekisa, era taliyiga butuukirivu: mu nsi ey'obugolokofu mw'anaakoleranga ebitali bya nsonga, so taliraba bukulu bwa Mukama. 
23_26_11_Mukama, omukono gwo guyimusibwa, naye tebalaba: naye baliraba obunyiikivu bwo olw'abantu ne bakwatibwa ensonyi; weewaawo, omuliro gulyokya abalabe bo. 
23_26_12_Mukama, oliragira emirembe gye tuli: kubanga n'okukola watukolera emirimu gyaffe gyonna. 
23_26_13_Ai Mukama Katonda waffe, abaami abalala awali ggwe baatufuganga; naye ggwe tunaayatulanga erinnya lyo wekka. 
23_26_14_Bafudde, tebaliba balamu; bazikiridde, tebalizuukira: kyewava obajjira n'obasangulawo n'obuza oku jjukirwa kwabwe kwonna. 
23_26_15_Wayaza eggwanga, ai Mukama, wayaza eggwanga; ogulumizibwa: ogaziyizza ensalo zonna ez'ensi. 
23_26_16_Mukama, lwe balabye ennaku lwe bakujjidde, baafuka okusaba okukangavvula kwo bwe kwali ku bo. 
23_26_17_Ng'omukazi ali olubuto, ebiro eby'okuzaala kwe nga binaatera okutuuka, bw'alumwa n'akaaba ng'abalagalwa; bwe tutyo bwe twabanga mu maaso go, ai Mukama. 
23_26_18_Twali lubuto, twalumwa, twazaala mpewo; tetwaleeta kulokola kwonna mu nsi; so n'abatuula mu nsi tebagudde. 
23_26_19_Abafu bo baliba balamu; emirambo gyange girizuukira. Muzuukuke muyimbe, mmwe ababeera mu nfuufu: kubanga omusulo gwo guli ng'omusulo ogw'oku middo, n'ettaka liriwandula abafu. 
23_26_20_Jjangu, eggwanga lyange, oyingire mu bisenge byo, weggalire enzigi zo: weekweke akaseera katono, okutuusa okuayiiga We kuliggwaawo. 
23_26_21_Kubanga, laba, Mukama ajja ng'afuluma mu kifo kye okubonereza abatuula mu nsi olw'obutali butuukirivu bwabwe: n'ettaka nalyo liribikkula ku musaayi gwalyo; so teriryeyongera kubikka ku baalyo abattibwa. 
23_27_1_Ku lunaku luli Mukama alibonereza lukwata omusota oguwulukuka n'ekitala kye eky'obwogi ekinene eky'amaanyi, ne lukwata ogwegoloŋŋonya; era alitta ogusota oguli mu nnyanja. 
23_27_2_Ku lunaku luli Olusuku olw'enizabbibu olw'omwenge muliruyimbira. 
23_27_3_Nze Mukama ndukuuna; naalufukiriranga amazzi buli kaseera: ekintu kyonna kireme okulwonoonanga, naalukuumanga emisana n'ekiro. 
23_27_4_Ekiruyi tekiri mu nze: singa katazamiti n'amaggwa gannumbye mu lutalo! nandigatabadde, nandigookedde wamu. 
23_27_5_Oba akwate ku maanyi gange, atabagane nange; weewaawo, atabagane nange. 
23_27_6_Mu biro ebiribaawo Yakobo alisimba emmizi; Isiraeri alyanya alimulisa: era balijjuza ensi gonna ebibala. 
23_27_7_Amukubye nga ye bwe yakuba abo abaamukuba? oba attiddwa ag'abo bwe battibwa be yatta? 
23_27_8_Bw'omusindika okugenda owatana naye mu kigero; amujjuludde n'okuwuuma kwe okw'amaanyi ku lunaku olw'embuyaga eziva ebuvanjuba. 
23_27_9_Obutali butuukirivu obwa Yakobo kyebuliva bulongoosebwa n'ekyo, era ekyo kye kibala kyonna eky'okuggyako ekibi kye; bw'afuula imayinja gotma ag'ekyoto ng'ebisibosibo ebisekulwasekulwa, Baasera n'ebifaananyi by'enjuba n'okuyimuka ne bitayimuka nate. 
23_27_10_Kubauga ekibuga ekyabangako enkomera kifulukwa, matongo agalekeddwawo, ng'eddungu: awo ennyana w'eririira, era awo w'erigalamira n'erya amatabi gaamu. 
23_27_11_Amatabi gaamu bwe galiwotoka, galiwogolwa; abakazi balijja ne bagookya: kubanga be bantu abatalina magezi; eyabakola kyaliva alema okubasaasira, era eyababumba talibalaga kisa. 
23_27_12_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli Mukama alikuŋŋunta okuva ku ntaba ez'Omugga okutuusa ku mugga ogw'e Misiri, era mulikungulwa kinnoomu kinnoomu, mmwe abaana ba Isiraeri. 
23_27_13_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli ekkondeere eddene lirifuuyibwa; era balijja abo abaali beeteeseteese okuzikirira mu nsi y'e Bwasuli n'abo abaali bagobeddwa mu nsi y'e Misiri; era balisinziza Mukama ku lusozi olutukuvu e Yerusaalemi. 
23_28_1_Zisanze engule ey'amalala ag'abatamiivu ab'omu Efulayimu, n'ekimuli ekiwotoka eky'obu lungi bwe obw'ekitiibwa, ekiri ku mutwe gw'ekiwonvu ekigimu eky'abo abameggebwa omwenge! 
23_28_2_Laba, Mukama alina ow'amaanyi era omuzira; nga kibuyaga alimu omuzira, embuyaga ezizikiriza, ng'amazzi amangi ag'amaanyi agayanjaala ennyo, bw'atyo bw'alisuula wansi ku ttaka n'omukono. 
23_28_3_Engule ey'amalala ag'abatamiivu ab'omu Efulayimu eririnnyirirwa n'ebigere: 
23_28_4_n'ekimuli ekiwotoka eky'obulungi bwe obw'ekitiibwa, ekiri ku mutwe gw'ekiwonvu ekigimu, kiriba ng'ettiini erisooka okwengera ekyeya nga tekinnaruuka; oyo alitunuulira bw'aliraba nga likyali mu mukono gwe aliriia ddala. 
23_28_5_Ku lunaku luli Mukama ow'eggye aliba ngule ya kitiibwa, era aliba nkuufiira ya buyoajo, eri abantu be abalifikkawo: 
23_28_6_era aliba mwoyo gwa kusala misango eri oyo atuula ng'asala emisango, era aliba maanyi eri abo abazzaayo olutalo mu mulyango. 
23_28_7_Naye era nabo bakyamye olw'omwenge, era ekitamiiza kibawabizza; kabona ne nnabbi bakyamye olw'omwenge, omwenge gubasaanyizzaawo, bawabye olw'ekitamiiza; bakyama mu kwolesebwa, beesittala mu kusala emisango. 
23_28_8_Kubanga emmeeza zonna zijjudde ebisesemye n'empitambi, obutabaawo kifo kirongoofu. 
23_28_9_Ani gw'aliyigiriza okumanya? era ani gw'alitegeeza ebibuulirwa? abo abaleseeyo okuyonka era abavudde ku mabeere? 
23_28_10_Kubaaga kiba kiragiro ku kiragiro, ekiragiro ku kiragiro; olunnyiriri ku lunayiriri, olunnyiriri ku lunnyiriri; wano katono, awo katono. 
23_28_11_Nedda, naye alyogera n'abantu bano n'emimwa emigenyi era n'olulimi olulala: 
23_28_12_be yagamba nti Kuno kwe kuwummula, mumuwe okuwummula oyo akooye; era kuno kwe kuweera: naye ne bataganya kuwulira. 
23_28_13_Ekigambo kya Mukama kyekiriva kibeera gye bali ekiragiro ku kiragiro, ekiragiro ku kiragiro; olunnyiriri ku lunnyiriri, olunnyiriri ku lunnyiriri; wano katono, awo katono; bagende bagwe bugazi bameayeke bateegebwe bakwatibwe. 
23_28_14_Kale, muwulire ekigambo kya Mukama, mmwe abaayooma, abafuga abantu bano abali mu Yerusaalemi: nti 
23_28_15_Kubanga mwogedde nti Tulagaanye endagaano n'okufa, era tutabaganye n'amagombe; ekibonyoobonyo ekyanjaala bwe kiriyitamu, tekiritutuukako; kubanga tufudde eby'obulimba ekiddukiro kyaffe, era twekwese wansi w'obukuusa: 
23_28_16_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera nti Laba, nteeka mu Sayuuni ejjinja okuba omusingi, ejjinja eryakemebwa, ejjinja ery'oku nsonda ery'omuwendo omungi erinywezebwa ennyo wansi: akkiriza talyanguyiriza. 
23_28_17_Era ndifuula omusango okuba omugwa ogugera, n'obutuukirivu okuba omugwa ogutereeza: n'omuzira gulyerera ddala ekiddukiro eky'obulimba, n'amazzi galyanjaala ku kifo eky'okwekwekamu. 
23_28_18_N'endagaano gye mwalagaana n'okufa erijjulukuka, so n'okutabagana kwammwe kwe mwatabagana n'amagombe tekulinywera; ekibonyoobonyo ekiryanjaala bwe kiriyitamu, ne kiryoka kiribalinnyirira wansi. 
23_28_19_Buli lwe kinaayitangamu; kinaabakwatanga; kubanga buli lukya kinaayitangamu emisana n'ekiro: era okutegeera ebibuulirwa kuliba ntiisa nsa. 
23_28_20_Kubanga ekitanda kimpi omuntu n'okuyinza n’atayinza kukyegololerako; n'eky'okwebikkako kyako kifunda n'okuyinza n'atayinza kukyebikka. 
23_28_21_Kubanga Mukama aligolokoka nga bwe yagolokokera ku lusozi Perazimu, alisunguwala nga bwe yasunguwalira mu kiwonvu eky'e Gibyoni; akole omulimu gwe, omulimu gwe ogw'ekitalo, era atuukirize ekikolwa kye, ekikolwa kye eky'ekitalo. 
23_28_22_Kale nno temuba banyoomi, enjegere zammwe zireme okuaywezebwa: kubanga okukomekkereza era okwateesebwa kwe mpulidde okuva eri Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye, ku nsi yonna. 
23_28_23_Mutege amatu muwulire eddoboozi lyange; mutegereze muwulire ebigambo byange. 
23_28_24_Omulimi alima lutata okusiga? akabala lutata n'akuba amavuunike ag'ettaka lye? 
23_28_25_Bw'amala okulittaanya lyonna, tayiwa ntinnamuti, n'asaasaanya kumino, n'asiga eŋŋaano ennyiriri ne sayiri mu kifo ekiragiddwa n'obulo ku lubibiro lwako? 
23_28_26_Kubanga; Katonda we amutegeeza bulungi, amuyigiriza. 
23_28_27_Kubanga entinnamuti teziwuulibwa na kintu kya bwogi, so ne kumino tebaginyooleranyoolerako namuziga w'eggaali; naye entinnamuti ziwuulibwa na muggo, ne kumino na luga. 
23_28_28_Eŋŋaano ey'omugaati bagisa busa; kubanga talimala nnaku zonna ng'agiwuula: era namuziga w'eggaali lye n'embalaasi ze ne bwe bigisaasaanya, era tagisa. 
23_28_29_Era n'ekyo kivudde eri Mukama ow'eggye, ow'ekitalo okuteesa ebigambo, asinga bonna amagezi. 
23_29_1_Owange, Alyeri, Alyeri, ekibuga Dawudi kye yasiisirako mugatte omwaka ku mwaka; embaga zituukire mu ntuuko zaazo: 
23_29_2_ne ndyoka nakuwaza Alyeri, era walibaawo okukaaba n'okuwuubaala: era aliba gye ndi nga Alyeri. 
23_29_3_Era ndikusiisirako enjuyi zonna, era ndikuzingiza n'ekigo, era ndikuzimbako enkomera ez'okuzimbirira: 
23_29_4_Era olikkakkanyizibwa, era olyogera ng'oyima mu ttaka, n'ebigamba byo biriba wansi nga biyima mu nfuufu; n'Eddoboozi lyo liriba ng'eryoyo aliko omuzimu,. nga liyima mu ttaka, n'ebigambo byo biryogerwa kyama nga biyima mu nfuufu. 
23_29_5_Naye ekibiina eky'abalabe bo kiriba ng'effufugge, n'ekibiim eky'ab'entiisa kiriba ng'enfuufi efuumuuka: weewaawo, kiriba kya kaseera mangu ago. 
23_29_6_Alijjirwa Mukama ow'eggye n'okubwatuka n'ekikankano ky'ensi, n'eddoboozi eddene, n'omuzimu ne kibuyaga n'olulimi olw'omuliro ogwokya. 
23_29_7_N'ekibiina eky'amawanga gonna agalwana ne Alyeri, gonna agalwama naye n'ekigo kye, n'abamuteganya kiriba ng'ekirooto, okwolesebw; okw'ekiro. 
23_29_8_Awo kiriba ng'omuyala bw'aloota, era, laba, ng'alya naye n'azuukuka, n'obulamu bwe nga tebukkuse: oba ng'ow'ennyonta bw'aloota, era, laba, ng'anywa; naye n'azuukuka, era, laba, ng'azirika n'obulamu bwe nga bwoya: bwe kityo bwe kiriba ekibiina eky'ama waaga gonna agalwana n'olusozi Sayuuni. 
23_29_9_Mulindirire mwewuunye; mweiimire ddala muzibe amaaso: batanidde, naye si na mwenge; batagatta, naye si na kitamiiza. 
23_29_10_Kubanga Mukama afuse ku mmwe omwoyo ogw'otulo otungi, era aziiye amaaso gammwe, bannabbi; n'emitwe gyammwe, abalaguzi, agibisseeko. 
23_29_11_N'okwolesebwa kwonna kufuuse gye muli ng'ebigambo eby'omu kitabo ekissibwako akabonero, abantu kye bawa omuntu eyayigirizibwa nga boogera nti Soma kino, nkwegayiridde: n’ayogera nti Siyinza, kubanga kissibbwako akabonero: 
23_29_12_ne bamuwa ekitabo oyo ataayigirizibwa nga boogera nti Soma, kino, nkwegayiridde: n'ayogera nti Siyigirizibwanga. 
23_29_13_Mukama n'ayogera nti Kubanga abantu bano bansemberera ne banzisaamu ekitiibwa kya mu kamwa kaabwe era kya ku mimwa gyabwe, naye omutima gwabwe baguntadde wala, n'okuntya kwame kiragiro kya bantu kye bayigirizibwa: 
23_29_14_kale, laba, ŋŋenda okukola omulimu ogw'ekitalo mu bantu bano, omulimu ogw'ekitalo era eky'amagero: n'amagezi g'abagezigezi baabwe galizikirira, n'okutegeera kwa bakabaka baabwe kulikwekebwa. 
23_29_15_Zibasanze abo abakka ennyo wansi okukweka Mukama okuteesa kabwe, n'emirimu gyabwe giri mu kizikiza, ne boogera nti Ani ttulaba? era ani arumanyi? 
23_29_16_Muvuunikira ddala ebintu Omubumbi balimwenkanya ebbumba; ekintu ekikolebwa n'okwogera ne kyogera ku oyo eyakikola nti Teyankola; oba ekintu ekibumbibwa ne kyogera ku oyo eyakibumba nti Talina magezi? 
23_29_17_Tekyasigaddeyo kiseera kitono nnyo Lebanooni alifuusibwa ennimiro eŋŋimu, n'ennimiro eŋŋimu baligiyita kibira? 
23_29_18_Era ku lunaku luli omuggavu w'amatu aliwulira ebigambo by'omu utabo, n'amaaso g'omuzibe galiraba okuva mu butalaba ne mu kizikiza. 
23_29_19_Era abawombeefu balyeyongera okusanyukira Mukama, b'abaavu mu bantu balisanyukira Omutukuvu owa Isiraeri. 
23_29_20_Kubanga ow'entiisa bamudibizza, n'omunyoomi akoma, n'abo bonna abalabirira obutali butuukirivu bazikiridde: 
23_29_21_abafuula omuntu omusobya mu mu sango, ne bamutegera omutegi anenya mu mulyango, ne ba kyamya omutuukirivu n'ekitaliimu. 
23_29_22_Mukama eyanunula Ibulayimu kyava ayogera mu nnyumba ya Yakobo talikwatibwa nsonyi kaakano, so n’amaaso ge tegaikyuka bbala lyago. 
23_29_23_Naye bw’aliraba abaana be, omlimu ogw’engalo zange, wakati mu ye, balitukuza erinnya lyange; weewaawo, balitukuza Omutukuvu owa Yakobo, era balitekemukira Katonda wa Isiraeri: 
23_29_24_Era n'abo abakyama mu mwoyo, balifuuka abategeevu, n'abo abeemulugunya baliyiga okuyigirizibwa. 
23_30_1_Zibasanze abaana abajeemu bw'ayogera Mukama, abateesa ebigambo, naye si nange; era ababikka n'ekibikka, aaye si kya mwoyo gwange, balyoke bongere ekibi ki kibi: 
23_30_2_abatambula okuserengeta okugenda e Misiri, so nga tebabuuzi zza mu kamwa kange; okwenyweza mu maanyi ga Falaawo, n'okwesiga ekisiikirize eky'e Misiri! 
23_30_3_Amaanyi ga Falaawo kyegaliva gabeera ensonyi zammwe, n'okwesiga eki siikirize eky'e Misiri kuliba kuswala kwammwe. 
23_30_4_Kubanga abakulu be bali Zowani, n'ababaka be batuus e Kanesi. 
23_30_5_Bonna balikwatirwa ensonyi abantu abatayinza kubagasa abatayamba newakubadde okugasa wabula ensonyi era ekivume. 
23_30_6_Omugugu ogw'ensolo ez'omu bukiika obwa ddyo. Bayita mu nsi ey'okulaba ennaku n'okubalagalwa, omuva empologoma enkazi n'ensajja, embalasaasa n'omusota ogw'omuliro ogubuuka nga batikka obugagga bwabwe ku mabega g'endogoyi ento, n'ebintu byabwe ku mabango g'eŋŋamira nga bagenda eri abantu abatagenda kubagasa. 
23_30_7_Kubanga Misiri abeerera bwereere era busa: kyenvudde mmuyita Lakabu atuula obutuuzi. 
23_30_8_Kale genda okiwandiikire ku kipande mu maaso gaabwe, okiteeke ne mu kitabo, kibeere kya biro ebigenda okujja emirembe n'emirerebe. 
23_30_9_Kubanga be bantu abajeemu, abaana ab'obulimba, abaana abataganya kuwulira mateeka ga Mukama: 
23_30_10_abagamba abalabi nti Temulabanga; n'abalaguzi nti Tenutulaguliranga bya mazima, mutubuulire ebiweweevu mulagule eby'obulimba: 
23_30_11_muve mu luguudo, nukyame okuva mu kkubo, Omutukuvu owa Isiraeri mumumalewo mu naaso gaffe. 
23_30_12_Kyava ayogera omutukuvu owa Isiraeri nti Kubanga munyoomye ekigambo kino ne mwesiga okujooga n'obubambaavu ne mwesigama okwo; 
23_30_13_obuali butuukirivu buno kyebuliva bubeera gye muli ng'ekituli ekiwagule ekyagala okugwa, ekizimba enkundi mu kisenge ekiwanvu, okunenyeka kwakyo kujja mangu obuamanyirira. 
23_30_14_Era alikimenya ng'ekintu eky'omubumbi bwe kinenyeka, ng'akimenyamenya awaali kusaasira; n'okulabika ne wataabika lugyo mu bitundu byakyo olw'okusena omuliro mu kyoto, oba olw'okusena amazzi mu kidiba: 
23_30_15_Kubanga bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, Omutukuvu owa Isiraeri nti Mu kudda ne mu kuwummula mwe mulirokokera; mu zutereera ne mu kwesiga mwe muliba amaanyi gammwe: mmwe ne mutayagala. 
23_30_16_Naye ne mugamba nti Nedda, kubanga tuliddukira ku mbalaasi; kyemuliva mudduka: era nti Tulyebagala ku z'embiro; abalibagoberera kyebaliva babeera ab'embiro. 
23_30_17_Olukumi balidduka olw'okuboggola kw'omu; olw'okuboggola kw'abataano mulidduka: okutuusa lwe mulisigala ng'omulongooti oguli ku ntikko y'olusozi, era ng'ebendera eri ku kasozi. 
23_30_18_Era Mukama kyaliva alinda, abakwatirwe ekisa, era kyaliva agulumizibwa abasaasire: kubanga Mukama Katonda alaba ensonga; balina omukisa bonna abamulindirira. 
23_30_19_Kubanga abantu balituula ku Sayuuni e Yerusaalemi: tolikaaba nate maziga; talirema kukukwatirwa kisa olw'eddoboozi ery'oku kaaba kwo; bw'aliwulira alikwanukula: 
23_30_20_Era Mukama newakubadde ng'akuwa emmere ey'okulaba ennaku n'amazzi ag'okubonyaabonyezebwa, naye abayigiriza bo nga tebakyakwekebwa nate, naye amaaso go galiraba abayigiriza bo: 
23_30_21_n'amatu go ganaawuliranga ekigambo ekikuvaako ennyuma nga kyogera nti Lino lye kkubo, mulitambuliremu; bwe munaakyamiranga ku mukono ogwa ddyo, era bwe munaakyamiranga ku gwa kkono. 
23_30_22_Era mulyonoona ebibikka ku bifaananyi byo ebyole ebya ffeeza, n'ebisaanikira ku bifaananyi byo ebifumbe ebya zaabu: olibisuulira ddala ng'ekintu ekitali kirongoofu; olikigamba nti Vaawo. 
23_30_23_Era alitonnyesa enkuba ey'ensigo zo, z'olisiga mu ttaka; era aligaba emmere ey'ekyengera eky'ettaka, era eriba nnimu era nnyingi: ku lunaku luli ebisibo byo biririira mu malundiro amagazi. 
23_30_24_Era ente n'endogoyi ento ezirima ettaka zinaalyanga ebyokulya ebirimu omunnyo, ebyawewebwa n'olugali n'ekiwujjo. 
23_30_25_Era ku buli lusozi olugulumivu ne ku buli kasozi akawanvu kuliba ensulo n'emigga gy'amazzi, ku lunaku olw'okutia abangi, ebigo bwe birigwa. 
23_30_26_Era omusana gw'omwezi guliba ag'omusana gw'enjuba, n'omusana gw'enjuba gulyeyongera emirundi musanvu ng'omusana gw'ennaku omusanvu, ku lunaku Mukama lw'alisibirako ekinuubule eky’abantu be n'awonya ekiwundu eky'okufumitibwa kwabwe. 
23_30_27_Laba, erinnya lya Mukama liva wala, nga lyaka n'obusungu bwe, era nga linyooka omukka omuziyivu emimwa gye gijjudde okunyiiga, n'olulimi lwe luli ng'omuliro ogwokya: 
23_30_28_n'omukka gwe guli ng'omugga ogwanjaala, ogutuuka ne mu bulago, okukunnunta amawanga n'olugali olw'obutaliimu: n'olukoba oluwabya luliba mu mba z'amawanga. 
23_30_29_Muliba n'oluyimba ng'ekiro bwe bakwata embaga entukuvu n'essanyu ery'omu mutima, ng'omuntu bw'agenda n'endere okujja ku lusozi lwa Mukama, eri Olwazi lwa Isiraeri. 
23_30_30_Era Mukama aliwuliza eddoboozi lye ery'ekitiibwa, era aliraga okukka kw'omukono gwe, n'okunyiiga kw'obusungu bwe, n'olulimi lw'omuliro ogwokya n'okubwatuka ne kibuyaga n'omuzira. 
23_30_31_Kubanga olw'eddoboozi lya Mukama Omwasuli alimenyekamenye ka, eyakubanga n'oluga. 
23_30_32_Na buli lwe banaamukubanga n'omuggo ogwalagirwa, Mukama gw'alimuteekako, wanaabangawo ebitaasa n'ennanga: era alirwana nabo mu ntalo ez'okunyeenya. 
23_30_33_Kubanga Tofesi kyategekebwa okuva edda; weewaawo, kyateekerwateekerwa kabaka; akifudde kiwanvu era kinene: ekikoomi kyakyo muliro na nku nnyingi; omukka gwa Mukama, ng'omugga ogw'ekibiriiti, gukyasa. 
23_31_1_Zibasanze abo abaserengeta e Misiri okubeerwa, era abeesiga embalaasi; era abeesiga amagaali kubanga mangi, n'abeebagala embalaasi kubanga ba maanyi mangi; naye tebatunuulira Mutukuvu wa Isiraeri so tebanoonya Mukama! 
23_31_2_Naye era naye wa magezi, era alireeta obubi, so talikomyawo bigambo bye: naye aligolokokera ku nnyumba y'abo abakola obubi ne ku buyambi bw'abo abakola ebitali bya butuukirivu. 
23_31_3_Kale nno Abamisiri bantu buntu so si Katonda; n'embalaasi zaabwe mubiri bubiri so si mwoyo: era Mukama bw'aligolola omukono gwe, oyo ayamba alyesittala era n'oyo ayambwa aligwa, kale bonna baliggweerawo wamu. 
23_31_4_Kubanga bw'atyo Mukama bw'angamba nti Ng'empologoma bw'ewulugumira ku muyiggo gwayo n'empologoma ento, abasumba abangi bwe bayitibwa okugirumba, teritiisibwa na ddoboozi lyabwe, so teryetoowaza lwa kuyoogaana kwabwe: bw'atyo Mukama ow'eggye bw'alikka okulwanira ku lusozi Sayuuni ne ku kasozi kaako. 
23_31_5_Ng'ennyonyi ezibuuka, bw'atyo Mukama ow'eggye bw'anaakuumanga Yerusaalemi; anaakikuumanga n'akiwonya, aliyitako n'akirokola. 
23_31_6_Mukyukire oyo gwe mwajeemerera ddala, mmwe abaana ba Isiraeri. 
23_31_7_Kubanga ku lunaku luli balisuulira ddala buli muntu ebifaananyi bye ebya ffeeza, n'ebifaananyi bye ebya zaabu, engalo zammwe mmwe bye zaabakolera okuba ekibi. 
23_31_8_Awo Omwasuli aligwa n'ekitala ekitali kya bantu; n'ekitala ekitali kya bantu kirimulya: era alidduka ekitala, n'abawbuka be balifuuka musolo. 
23_31_9_N'olwazi lwe lulivaawo olw'okwesisiwala, n'abakulu be balikeŋŋentererwa olw'ebendera, bw'ayogera Nlukama, omuliro gvre guli ku Sayuuni n'ekikoomi kye mu Yerusaalemi. 
23_32_1_Laba, kabaka alifuga n'obutuukirivu, n'abakulu balifuga n'omusango. 
23_32_2_Era omuntu aliba ng'ekifo eky'okwekwekamu eri empewo, n'ekiddukiro eri kibuyaga; ng'emigga gy'amazzi mu kifo ekikalu, ng'ekisiikirize ky'olwazi olunene mu nsi ekooyesa. 
23_32_3_N'amaaso g'abo abalaba tegalibaako kifu, n'amatu g'abo abawulira galiwuliriza. 
23_32_4_N'omutima gw'oyo eyeeyinula gulitegeera okumanya, n'olulimi lw'abanaanaagize lulyeteekateeka okwogera obulungi. 
23_32_5_Omugwagwa nga tebakyamuyita mugabi, so n'omukodo nga tebamuyita wa kisa. 
23_32_6_Kubanga omugwagwa alyogera eby'obugwagwa, n'omutima gwe gulikola ebitali bya butuukirivu, okukola eby'okuvuma Katonda, n'okwogera ebikyamu ku Mukama, okulumya enjala obulamu bw'omuyala, n'okumalawo ow'ennyonta kye yandinywedde. 
23_32_7_Era n'ebintu eby'omukodo bibi: asala enkwe embi okuzikiriza omuwombeefu n'ebigambo eby'obulimba atalina kintu ne bw'ayogera eby'ensonga. 
23_32_8_Naye omugabi alowooza bya kugaba; era mu by'okugaba mw'alinywerera. 
23_32_9_Mugolokoke, mmwe abakazi abalangajja, muwulire eddoboozi lyange; mmwe abawala abataliiko kye mulowooza, mutegere amatu ebigambo byange. 
23_32_10_Mulinakuwalira ennaku ezirisussa omwaka, mmwe abakazi abataliiko kye mulowooza: kubanga ebikungulwa eby'emizabbibu birifa, okukungula tekulituuka. 
23_32_11_Mukankane, mmwe abakazi abalangajja; munakuwale, mmwe abataliiko kye mulowooza: mwambule mubeere bwereere, mwesibe ebibukutu mu biwato byammwe. 
23_32_12_Balikuba mu kifuba olw'ennimiro ez'okusanyuka, olw'omuzabbibu omugimu. 
23_32_13_Ku nsi y'abantu bange kulimera amaggwa ne katazamiti; weewaawo, ku nnyumba zonna ez'essanyu mu kibuga eky'essanyu: 
23_32_14_kubanga olubiri lulirekebwawo; ekibuga eky'abantu abangi kiriba kifulukwa; olusozi n'ekigo ekirengererwako biriba mpuku ennaku zonna, ssanyu lya ntulege, ddundiro lya magana; 
23_32_15_okutuusa omwoyo lwe gulirufukibwako okuva waggulu, eddungu ne lifuuka ennimiro eŋŋimu, ennimiro eŋŋimu ne bagiyita kibira. 
23_32_16_Kale omusango gulituula mu ddungu, n'obutuukirivu bulibeera mu nnimiro eŋŋimu. 
23_32_17_N'omulimu gw'obutuukirivu guliba mirembe; era obutuukirivu bulireeta okutereera n'okwesiganga ennaku zonna. 
23_32_18_N'abantu bange balituula mu kifo eky'emirembe ne mu nnyumba ez'enkalakkalira, ne mu biwummulo ebitereevu. 
23_32_19_Naye omuzira gulitonnya, ekibira bwe kirigwa; n'ekibuga kirisuulirwa ddala wansi. 
23_32_20_Mulina omukisa mmwe abasiga ku mabbali g'amazzi gonna, abasindika ebigere by'ente n'endogoyi. 
23_33_1_Zikusanze ggwe anyaga so tonyagibwanga; era alyazaamaanya, so tebakulyazaamaanyanga! Bw'olireka okunyaga, n'olyoka onyagibwa; era bw'olimalira ddala okulyazaamaanya, ne balyoka bakulyazaamaanya. 
23_33_2_Ai Mukasna, tukwatirwe ekisa; twakulindirira: beera mukono gwabwe buli nkya, era obulokozi bwaffe mu biro eby'okulabiramu ennaku. 
23_33_3_Olw'eddoboozi ery'okuyoogaana amawanga gadduse: olw'okweyimusa ggwe amawanga gasaasaanye. 
23_33_4_N'omunyago gwammwe gulikuŋŋaanyizibwa ng'akawuka bwe kakutlnaanya: ng'enzige bwe zigwa bwe baligugwako bwe batyo. 
23_33_5_Mukama agulumizibwa kubanga atuula waggulu: ajjuzizza Sayuuni omusango n'obutuukirivu. 
23_33_6_Era walibaawo enkalakkalira mu biro byo, obulokozi obusukkirira, amagezi n'okumanya: okutya Mukama bwe bugagga bwe. 
23_33_7_Laba, abazira baabwe bakaabira bweru: ababaka ab'emirembe bakaaba nnyo amaziga. 
23_33_8_Enguudo zizise, omutambuze aggwaawo: amenye endagaano, anyoomye ebibuga, tassaayo mwoyo eri abantu. 
23_33_9_Ensi ewuubaala eyongobera: Lebanooni akwatiddwa ensonyi awotoka: Saloni ali ng'eddungu; ne Basani ne Kalumeeri bawaatula. 
23_33_10_Kaakano naagolokoka, bw'ayogera Mukama; kaakano neeyimusa kaakano naagulumizibwa. 
23_33_11_Mu liba mbuto za bisusunku, mulizaala ssubi: omukka gwammwe muliro ogulibookya. 
23_33_12_N'amawanga galiba ng'okwokya kw'ensimbi: ng'amaggwa agatemebwa agookerwa mu muliro. 
23_33_13_Muwulire, mmwe abali ewala bye nkoze; nammwe abali okumpi mukkirize amaanyi gange. 
23_33_14_Abalina ebibi abali mu Sayuuni batidde okukankana kugudde ku abo abatatya Katonda. Ani ku ffe alituula awamu n'omuliro ogwokya? ani ku ffe alituula awamu n'okwokya okutaliggwaawo? 
23_33_15_Oyo atambula n'obutuukirivu, era ayogera eby'amazima; oyo anyooma amagooba agava mu kujooga, akunkumula engalo ze obutakwata nguzi, aziba amatu ge obutawulira musaayi, era aziba amaaso ge obutatunuulira bubi; 
23_33_16_oyo ye alituula waggulu ekifo kye eky'okwekuuma kiriba nkomera za mayinja: emmere ye anaagiweebwanga; amazzi ge galiba ga nkalakkalira. 
23_33_17_Amaaso go galiraba kabaka mu bulungi bwe: galiraba ensi eziyimirira ewala. 
23_33_18_Omutima gwo gulifumiitiriza entiisa: ali ludda wa oyo eyabala, ali ludda wa oyo eyagera omusolo? ali ludda wa oyo eyatala ebigo? 
23_33_19_Toliraba ggwanga kkakali eggwanga eririna enjogera enzibi gy'otoyinza kumamya; eririna olulimi olunnaggwanga lw'otoyinza kutegeera. 
23_33_20_Tunuulira Sayuuni, ekibuga eky'embaga zaffe: amaaso go galiraba Yerusaalemi nga kifo kya kutuulamu kitereevu, eweema eterijjululwa, enkondo zaayo tezirisi mbulwa ennaku zonna, so tewalib; ku migwa gyayo egirikutulwa. 
23_33_21_Naye eyo Mukama alibeera naffe mu bukulu, ekifo eky'emigga emigazi n'ensulo; omutaliyita lyato erivugibwa, so n’ekyombo ekinene tekirigendamu. 
23_33_22_Kubanga Mukama ye mulamuzi waffe, Mukama ye muteesi w'amateeka gye tuli, Mukama ye kabaka waffe; ye alitulokola. 
23_33_23_Emigwa gyo egisiba gisumulukuse; tebayinza kunyweza kikolo kya mulongooti gwabwe, tebayinza kuwanika ttanga: awo ne bagereka ebintu eby'omunyago omunene; abawenyera baatwala omunyago. 
23_33_24_N'oyo atuulamu talyogera nti Ndi mulwadde: abantu abatuula omwo balisonyiyibwa obutali butuukirivu bwabwe. 
23_34_1_Musembere, mmwe amawanga, okuwulira; era muwulirize, mmwe abantu: ensi ewulire n'okujjula kwayo; ettaka n'ebintu byonna ebirivaamu. 
23_34_2_Kubanga Mukama alina okunyiiga ku mawanga gonna, n'ekiruyi ku ggye lyabwe lyonna: abazikiririzza ddala, abagabudde okuttibwa. 
23_34_3_Era abaabwe abattibwa balisuulibwa ebweru, n'ekivundu eky'emirambo gyabwe kiririnnya, n'ensozi zirisaanuuka olw'omusaayi gwabwe. 
23_34_4_N'eggye lyonna ery'omu ggulu liryabulukuka, n'eggulu lirizingibwa ng'omuzingo gw'empapula: n'eggye lyalyo lyonna liriyongobera, ng'akalagala bwe kayongobera ne kava ku muzabbibu, era ng'akalagala akayongobera bwe kava ku mutiini. 
23_34_5_Kubanga ekitala kyange kinywedde okukkuta mu ggulu: laba, kirigwa ku Edomu, ne ku bantu ab'ekikolimo kyange, olw'omusango. 
23_34_6_Ekitala kya Mukama kijjudde omusaayi, kisavuwadde n'amasavu, n'omusaayi gw'abaana b'endiga n'embuzi, n'amasavu ag'ensigo z'endiga ennume: kubanga Mukama alina ssaddaaka e Bozula, n'okutta abangi mu nsi ya Edomu. 
23_34_7_N'embogo ziriserengeta wamu nazo, n'eate wamu ne ziseddume; n'ensi yaabwe eritamiira omusaayi, n'enfuufu yaabwe erisavuwala n'amasavu. 
23_34_8_Kubanga lwe lunaku olw'okuwalana eggwanga lya Mukama, omwaka ogw'okusasula empeera mu mpaka za Sayuuni. 
23_34_9_N'emigga gyayo girifuuka bulimbo, n'enfuufu yaayo kibiriiti, n'ensi erifuuka bulimbo obwaka. 
23_34_10_Terizikizibwa misana newakubadde ekiro; omukka gwayo gunaanyookanga ennaku zonna: emirembe n'emirembe eneebeereranga awo ng'ezise; tewaabenga anaagiyitangamu emirembe n'emirembe. 
23_34_11_Naye kimbala ne namunnungu be banaabanga bannyini yo; n'ekiwugulu ne namuŋŋoona be banaatuulanga omwo: era aligireegako omugwa ogw'okwetabula, n'amayinja agatereeza ag'obutaliimu. 
23_34_12_Baliyita abakungu baayo okujja mu bwakabaka, naye tewaliba alibaayo; n'abalangira baayo bonna baliba si kintu. 
23_34_13_N'amaggwa galimera mu mayumba gaayo, emyennyango n'amatovu mu bigo byayo: era eneebanga nnyumba za bibe, luggya lwa bamaaya. 
23_34_14_N'ensolo enkambwe ez'omu ddungu zirisisinkana n'emisege, n'eya zigeye eriyitiriza ginnaayo; weewaawo, ennyonyi ey'ekiro erigwa eyo, ne yeerabira ekiwummulo. 
23_34_15_Eyo ekkufufu gye lirizimbira ekisu kyalyo, ne libiika, ne limaamira, ne likuŋŋaanya wansi w'ekisiikirize kyalyo: weewaawo, eyo bakamunye gye balikuŋŋaanira, buli omu wamu ne munne. 
23_34_16_Munoonye mu kitabo kya Mukama musome: tekulibula ku ebyo na kimu, tewaliba ekiribulwa kinnaakyo: kubanga akamwa kange ke kalagidde, n'omwoyo gwe gwe gubikuŋŋaanyizza. 
23_34_17_Era abikubidde obululu, n'omukono gwe gubigabidde n'omugwa: binaagiryanga ennaku zonna, emirembe n'emirembe binaatuulanga omwo. 
23_35_1_Olukoola n'amatongo birijaguza; n'eddungu lirisanyuka, lirisansula ng'ekiyirikiti. 
23_35_2_Lirisukkiriza okusansula, lirisanyuka n'essanyu n'okuyimba; ekitiibwa kya Lebanooni kiririweebwa, obulungi obungi obwa Kalumeeri ne Saloni: baliraba ekitiibwa kya Mukama, obulungi obungi obwa Katonda waffe. 
23_35_3_Munyweze emikono eminafu, mukakase n'amaviivi agajugumira. 
23_35_4_Mugambe abo abalina omutima omuti nti Mubeere n'amaanyi, temutya: laba Katonda wammwe alijja n'okuwalana eggwanga, n'empeera ya Katonda; alijja n'abalokola. 
23_35_5_Awo amaaso g'omuzibe w'amaaso ne galyoka gazibuka, n'amatu g'omuggavu w'amatu galigguka. 
23_35_6_Awo awenyera n'alyoka abuuka ng'ennangaazi, n'olulimi lwa kasiru luliyimba: kubanga amazzi galitiiriikira mu lukoola, n'emigga mu ddungu. 
23_35_7_N'omusenyu ogumasamasa gulifuuka ekidiba, n'ettaka ekkalangufu nzizi za mazzi: mu kifo eky'ebibe mwe byagalamiranga, muliba omuddo n'essaalu n'ebitoogo. 
23_35_8_Era eribaayo oluguudo, n'ekkubo, era liriyitibwa nti Kkubo lya butukuvu; abatali balongoofu tebaliriyitamu; naye liriba lya bali: abatambuze, weewaawo abasirusiru, tebaliriwabiramu. 
23_35_9_Teribaayo mpologoma, so tekulirinnyako nsolo yonna ey'amaddu, tezirirabikayo; naye abaanunulibwa be baliritambuliramu: 
23_35_10_n'aba Mukama abaagulibwa balikomawo, ne bajja e Sayuuni nga bayimba; n'essanyu eritaliggwaawo liribeera ku mitwe gyabwe: balifuna essanyu n'okujaguza, n'okunakuwala n'okusinda kuliddukira ddala. 
23_36_1_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'ekkumi n'ena ogwa kabaka Keezeekiya, Sennakeribu kabaka w’e Bwasuli n'ayambuka okulumba ebibuga byonna ebya Yuda ebyaliko enkomera, n'abimenya. 
23_36_2_Awo kabaka w’e Bwasuli n'agaba Labusake okuva e Lakisi okugenda e Yerusaalemi eri kabaka Keezeekiya ng'alina eggy'e eddene. N'ayimirira ku mabbali g'olusalosalo olw'ekidiba eky'engulu mu luguudo olw'ennimiro ey'omwozi. 
23_36_3_Awo ne bafuluma ne bajja gy'ali Eriyakimu mutabani wa Kirukiya, eyali omukulu w'ennyumba, ne Sebuna omuwandiisi, ne Yowa mutabani wa Asafu omujjukiza. 
23_36_4_Labusake n'abagamba nti Mugambe kaakano Keezeekiya nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera kabaka omukulu, kabaka w'e Bwasuli, nti Bwesige ki buno bwe weesiga? 
23_36_5_Nze ŋŋamba nti okuteesa kwo n'amaanyi olw'entalo bigambo bugambo ebitaliimu: ani nno gwe weesiga n'okujeema a'onjeemera nze? 
23_36_6_Laba, weesigama ku muggo ogw'olumuii luno olubetentefu, ye Misiri; omuntu bwe yeesigatna okwo, guyingira mu ngalo ze ne guzifumita: bw'atyo bw'abeera Falaawo kabaka We Misiri eri abo bonna abamwesiga. 
23_36_7_Naye bw'onoŋŋamba nti Twesiga Mukama Katonda waffe: si ye wuuyo Keezeekiya gwe yaggyako ebifo bye ebigulumivu n'ebyoto bye, n'agamba Yuda ne Yerusaalemi nti Munaasinzizanga mu maaso g'ekyoto kino? 
23_36_8_Kale nno kaakano, akwegayiridde, muwe emisingo mukama wange kabaka w'e Bwasuli nange naakuwa embalaasi enkumi, bbiri, ggwe ku bubwo bw'onooyinza okuzeebagazaako abantu. 
23_36_9_Kale oyinza otya okukyusa amaaso g'omwami omu ku abo abasinga obuto ku baddu ba mukama wange, ne weesiga Misiri olw'amagaali n'olw'abeebagala embalaasi? 
23_36_10_Era kaakano nnyambuse okutabaala ensi eno okugizikiriza awatali Mukama? Mukama yaŋŋamba nti Yambuka otabaale ensi eno ogizikirize. 
23_36_11_Awo Eriyakimu ne Sebuna ne Yowa ne bagamba Labusake nti Nkwegayiridde, yogera n'abaddu bo mu lulimi Olusuuli; kubanga tulumanyi: so toyogera naffe mu lulimi olw'Abayudaaya mu matu g'abantu abali ku bbugwe. 
23_36_12_Naye Labusake n'ayogera nti Mukama wange antumye eri mukama wo n'eri ggwe okwogera ebigambo bino? tantumye eri abantu abatuula ku bbugwe, okulya amazi gaabwe bo, n'okunywa enkali yaabwe bo awamu nammwe? 
23_36_13_Awo Labusake n'ayimirira n'ayogerera waggulu n'eddoboozi eddene mu lulimi olw'Abayudaaya n'ayogera nti Muwulire ebigambo bya kabaka omukulu, kabaka w'e Bwasuli. 
23_36_14_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera kabaka nti Keezeekiya tabalimbanga; kubanga taliyinza kubawonya: 
23_36_15_so Keezeekiya tabasigulanga eri Mukama ng'ayogera nti Mukama talirema kutuwonya; ekibuga kino tekirigabulwa mu mukono gwa kabaka w’e Bwasuli. 
23_36_16_Temuwuliranga Keezeekiya: kubanga bw'atyo bw'ayogera kabaka w'e Bwasuli nti Mutabagane nange, mufulume mujje, gye ndi; mulyenga buli muntu ku muzabbibu gwe na buli muntu ku mutiini gwe, era munywenga buli muntu ku mazzi ag'omu kidiba kye ye: 
23_36_17_okutuusa lwe ndijja ne mbatwalira ddala mu nsi efaanana ensi yammwe, ensi ey'eŋŋaano n'omwenge, ensi ey'emigaati n'e nsuku z'emizabbibu. 
23_36_18_Mwekuume Keezeekiya aleme okubasendasenda ng'ayogera nti Mukama alituwonya. Waliwo katonda yenna ow'amawanga eyali awonyezza ensi ye mu mukono gwa kabaka w'e Bwasuli? 
23_36_19_Bali ludda wa bakatonda ab'e Kamasi n'e Alupadi? bali ludda wa bakatonda ab'e Sefavayimu? era baawonya Samaliya mu mukono gwange? 
23_36_20_Baani ku bakatonda bonna ab'ensi ezo abaawonya ensi yabbwe mu mukono gwange, Mukama okuwonya Yerusaalemi mu mukono gwange? 
23_36_21_Naye ne basirika ne batamwanukula kigambo: kubanga ekiragiro kya kabaka kyali bwe kiti nti Temumwanukulanga. 
23_36_22_Awo Eriyakimu mutabani wa Kirukiya eyali omukulu w'ennyumba ne Sebuna omuwaadiisi ne Yowa mutabani wa Asafu omujjukiza ne bajja eri Keezeekiya nga bayuzizza engoye zaabwe, ne bamubuulira ebigambo bya Labusake. 
23_37_1_Awo olwatuuka kabaka Keezeekiya bwe yakiwulira n'ayuza engoye ze n'ayambala ebibukutu n'ayingira mu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
23_37_2_N'atuma Eriyakimu eyali omukulu w'enayumba ne Sebuna omuwandiisi n'abakadde ab'oku bakabona, nga bambadde ebibukutu, eri Isaaya nabbi mutabani wa Amozi. 
23_37_3_Ne bamugamba nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Keezeekiya nti Olunaku luno lunaku lwa kulabiramu nnaku era lwa kunenyezebwamu era lwa kuvumirwamu: kubanga abaana batuuse okuzaalwa, so tewali maanyi ga kuzaala. 
23_37_4_Mpozzi Mukama Katonda wo anaawulira ebigambo bya Labusake, kabaka w'e Bwasuli mukama we gw'atumye okuvuma Katonda omulamu, n'anenya ebigambo Mukama Katonda wo by'awulidde: kale yimusiza okusaba kwo ekitundu ekifisseewo. 
23_37_5_Awo abaddu ba kabaka Keezeekiya ne bajja eri Isaaya. 
23_37_6_Isaaya n'abagamba nti Bwe mutyo bwe munaagamba mukama wammwe nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Totya bigambo by'owulidde, abaddu ba kabaka w’e Bwasuli bye banvumye. 
23_37_7_Laba, ndimuteekako omuzimu, naye aliwulira olugambo n'addayo mu nsi ye; era ndimusuula n'ekitala mu nsi ye ye. 
23_37_8_Awo Labusake n'addayo n'asanga kabaka w'e Bwasuli ng'alwana ne Libuna: kubanga yali awulidde nga yasitula e Lakisi. 
23_37_9_N'awulira nga boogera ebya Tiraka kabaka w'e Kuusi, nti Atabadde okulwana naawe. Awo bwe yakiwulira n'atuma ababaka eri Keezeekiya ng'ayogera nti 
23_37_10_Bwe mutyo bwe muligamba Keezeekiya kabaka wa Yuda nga mwogera nti Katonda wo gwe weesiga takulimbanga ng'ayogera nti Yerusaalemi tekirigabulwa mu mukono gwa kabaka w'e Bwasuli. 
23_37_11_Laba, owulidde bakabaka w'e Bwasuli bye baakolanga ensi zonna, nga bazizikiririza ddala: naawe oliwonyezebwa? 
23_37_12_Bakatonda ab'amawanga baagawdnya, bakitange ge baazikiriza, Gozani ne Kalani ne Lezefu n'abaana ba Edeni abaabanga mu Terasali? 
23_37_13_Ali ludda wa kabaka w'e Kamasi ne kabaka w'e Alupadi ne kabaka w'ekibuga Sefavayimu ow'e Keena ne Yiva? 
23_37_14_Keezeekiya n'atoola ebbaluwa mu mukono gw'ababaka n'agisoma: Keezeeluya n'ayambuka mu nnyumba ya Mukama n'agyanjululiza mu maaso ga Mukama. 
23_37_15_Keezeekiya ne yeegayirira Mukama ng'ayoge nti 
23_37_16_Ai Mukama ow'eggye, Katonda wa Isiraeri, atuula ku bakerubi, ggwe Katonda, ggwe wekka, wa bwakabaka bwonna obw'omu nsi; ggwe wakola eggulu n'ensi. 
23_37_17_Tega okutu kwo, ai Mukama, owulire; zibula amaaso go, ai Mukama, olabe: owulire ebigambo byonna ebya Sennakeribu, by'atumye okuvuma Katonda omulamu. 
23_37_18_Mazima, Mukama, bakabaka w’e Bwasuli baazisa amawanga gonna n'ensi yaabwe, 
23_37_19_ne basuula bakatonda baabwe mu muliro: kubanga tebaali bakatonda, naye mulimu gwa ngalo za bantu, miti na mayinja; kyebaava babazikiriza. 
23_37_20_Kale nno kaakano, ai Mukama Katonda waffe, tulokole mu mukono gwe, obwakabaka bwonna obw'omu nsi butegeere nga ggwe Mukama, ggwe wekka. 
23_37_21_Awo Isaaya mutabani wa Amozi n'atumira Keezeekiya ng'ayogera nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama, Katonda wa Isiraeri, nti Kubanga onneegayiridde ebya Sennakeribu kabaka w'e Bwasuli, 
23_37_22_kino kye kigambo Mukama ky'ayogedde ku ye: Omuwala wa Sayuuni atamaayi musajja akunyoomye era akugadizza; omuwala wa Yerusaalemi akunyeenyerezza omutwe. 
23_37_23_Ani gw'ovumye gw'ovodde? era ani gw'oyimusirizzaako eddoboozilyo n'olalama amaaso go waggulu? ku Mutukuvu wa Isiraeri. 
23_37_24_Oyimye mu baddu bo okuvuma Mukama n'oyogera nti N'amagaali gange amangi nnyambuse ku ntikko y'olusozi, ntuuse mu njuyi ez'omunda eza Lebanooni; era nditemera ddala emivule gyako emiwanvu, n'enfugo zaako ezisinga obulungi: era ndituuka ku lusozi lwako olukomererayo, ekibira eky'ennimiro ye eŋŋimu. 
23_37_25_Nsimye era nnywedde amazzi, era ndikaliza emigga gyonna egy'e Misiri n'ebigere byange: 
23_37_26_Towuliranga bwe nnakikola edda ennyo ne nkibumba okuva ebiro eby'edda? kaakano nkituukirizza ggwe okubeera omuzikiriza w'ebibuga ebiriko enkomera obifuule ebifunvu eby'e byagwa: 
23_37_27_Abaabituulangamu kyebaava babeera ab'amaanyi amatono, baatekemuka ne bakeŋŋentererwa; ne baba ng'essubi ery'omu nnimiro era ng'omuddo omubisi, ng'omuddo oguli waggulu ku nnyumba, era ag'omusiri gw'eŋŋaano nga tennakula. 
23_37_28_Naye mmanyi bw'otuula era bw'ofuluma era bw'oyingira era bw'onneesalirako akajegere. 
23_37_29_Kubanga onneesalirako akajegere era kubanga ettitimbuli lyo lirinnye mu matu gange, kyeadiva nteeka eddobo lyange mu nnyindo yo n'olukoba lwange mu mimwa gyo, era ndikuzzaayo mu kkubo lye wajjiramu. 
23_37_30_Era kano ke kaliba. akabonero gy'oli: mulirya mu mwaka guno ekyo ekimera kyokka, ne mu mwaka ogw'okubiri ekyo kye gumera; ne mu mwaka ogw'okusatu musiganga mukungulanga musimbanga ensuku z'emizabbibu mulyanga ebibala byamu. 
23_37_31_N'ekitundu ekifisseewo ekiwonye ku nayumba ya Yuda balisimba emmizi wansi ne babala ebibala waggulu. 
23_37_32_Kubanga mu Yerusaalemi muliva ekitundu ekifisseewo, ne ku lusozi Sayuuni abo abaliwona: obuggya bwa Mukama ow'eggye bulituukiriza ekyo. 
23_37_33_Mukama kyava ayogera ku kabaka w'e Bwasuli nti Talituuka ku kibuga kino, so talirasaayo kasaale, so talikyolekera n'engabo, so talikituumako kifunvu. 
23_37_34_Mu kkubo mwe yajjira omwo mw'aliddirayo, so talituuka ku kibuga kino, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_37_35_Kubanga ndirwanirira ekibuga kino okukirokola ku bwange nze era ne ku bw'omuddu wange Dawudi. 
23_37_36_Awo malayika wa Mukama n'afuluma n'atta mu lusiisira olw'Abaasuli kasiriivu mu obukumi munaana mu enkumi ttaano: abantu bwe baagolokoka enkya mu makya, laba, bonna baali mirambo gya bafu. 
23_37_37_Awo Sennakeribu kabaka w’e Bwasuli n'avaayo n'agenda n'addayo, n'abeera e Nineeve. 
23_37_38_Awo olwatuuka bwe yali ng'asinziza mu kiggwa kya Nisuloki katonda we, Adulammereki ne Salezeri batabani be ne bamutta n'ekitala: ne baddukira mu nsi ya Alalati. Esaludooni mutabani we n'amuddira mu bigere. 
23_38_1_Mu biro ebyo Keezeekiya n'alwala kumpi n'okufa. Isaaya nabbi mutabani wa Amozi n'ajja gy'ali n’amugamba nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Teekateeka ennyumba yo; kubanga ogenda kufa so togenda kulama. 
23_38_2_Awo Keezeekiya n'akyusiza amaaso ge ku kisenge ne yeegayirira Mukama n'ayogera nti 
23_38_3_Jjukira kaakano, ai Mukama, nkwegayiridde, bwe nnatambuliranga mu maaso go n'amazima n'omutima ogwatuukirira, ne nkola ebiri mu maaso go ebirungi. Keezeekiya n'akaaba nnyo amaziga. 
23_38_4_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kijjira Isaaya nti 
23_38_5_Genda ogambe Keezeekiya nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama, Katonda wa Dawudi kitaawo, nti Mpulidde okusaba kwo, ndabye amaziga go: laba, ndyongera ku nnaku zo emyaka kkumi n'etaano. 
23_38_6_Era ndikuwonya ggwe n'ekibuga kino mu mukono gwa kabaka w'e Bwasuli: era ndirwanirira ekibuga kino. 
23_38_7_Era kano ke kanaaba akabonero gy'oli okuva eri Mukama nga Mukama alikola ekigambo kino ky'ayogedde: 
23_38_8_laba, nazzaayo ennyuma ekisiikirize ekiri ku madaala, ekikkidde ku madaala ga Akazi awamu, n'enjuba, ebbanga ery'amadaala ekkumi. Awo enjuba n'eddayo ebbanga ery'amadaala ekkumi ku madaala ge yali ekkiddeko. 
23_38_9_Okuwandiika kwa Keezeekiya kabaka wa Yuda, bwe yamala okulwala era ng'awonye endwadde ye. 
23_38_10_N'ayogera nti Mu ttuntu ly'ennaku zange mwe ndigendera mu miryango gy'emagombe: Nzigiddwako emyaka gyange egisigaddeyo. 
23_38_11_N'ayogera nti Siriraba Mukama, Mukama mu nsi y'abalamu: Siriraba bantu nate wamu n'abatuula mu nsi. 
23_38_12_Ebiro byange bivuddewo, era binzigiddwako ng'eweema ey'omusumba: Nzinze obulamu bwange ng'omulusi w'engoye; alinsala ku muti ogulukirwako: Okuva enkya okutuusa ekiro olimmalirawo ddala. 
23_38_13_Neesirisa okutuusa enkya; ng'empologoma, bw'amenya bw'atyo amagumba gange gonna: Okuva enkya okutuusa ekiro olimmalirawo ddala. 
23_38_14_Ng'akataayi oba sekanyolya, bwe nnavulungutana bwe nnyo; Nawuubaala nga kaamukuukulu: amaaso gange gafuuyirira olw'okulalama; Ai Mukama, njoogebwa; ggwe beera muyima wange. 
23_38_15_Naayogera ntya? yayogedde nange era ye yennyini ye akikoze: Naatambulanga mpola emyaka gyange gyonna olw'okubalagalwa kw'obulamu bwange. 
23_38_16_Ai Mukama, olw'ebyo abantu baba balamu, Era mu ebyo mwokka mwe muli obulamu bw'omwoyo gwange: Kale mponya onnamye. 
23_38_17_Laba, olw'emirembe gyange kyennava mbalagalwa ennyo: Naye ggwe olw'okwagala obulamu bwange obuwonyezza mu bunnya obuvundirwamu; Kubanga osudde ebibi byange byonna ennyuma w'amabega go. 
23_38_18_Kubanga amagombe tegayiaza kukutendereza, okufa tukuyinza kukusuuta: Abo abakka mu bunnya tebayinza kusuubira mazima go. 
23_38_19_Omulamu, omulamu ye alikutendereza nga nze bwe nkola leero Kitaabwe alitegeeza abaana amazima go. 
23_38_20_Mukama yeeteeseteese okundokola: Kyetunaavanga tuyimbira ennyimba zange mu nnanga Ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwaffe mu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
23_38_21_Era Isaaya yali ayogedde nti Baddire ekitole ky'ettiini bakisiige ku jjute, era aliwona. 
23_38_22_Ne Keezeekiya yali ayogedde nti Kaluwa akabonero nga ndyambuka mu nnyumba ya Mukama? 
23_39_1_Mu biro ebyo Merodakubaladani mutabani wa Baladani, kabaka We Babulooni, n'aweereza Keezeekiya ebbaluwa n'ekirabo: kubanga yawulira nga yali alwadde era ng'awonye. 
23_39_2_Kegeekiya n'abasanyukira, n'abalaga ennyumba ey'ebintu bye eby'omuwendo omungi, effeeza ne zaabu n'eby'akaloosa n'amafuta ag'omuwendo omungi, n'eznyumba yonna ey'eby'okulwanyisa bye, ne byonna ebyalabika mu bugagga bwe: tewaali kintu mu nnyumba ye newakubadde mu matwale ge gonna Keezeekiya ky'ataabalaga. 
23_39_3_Awo Isaaya nabbi n'ajja eri kabaka Keezeekiya n'amugamba nti Abasajja bano boogedde ki? era baava wa okujja gy'oli? Keezeekiya n'ayogera nti Bava mu nsi ya wala okujja gye ndi, baava e Babulooni. 
23_39_4_Awo n'ayogera nti Balabye ki mu nnyumba yo? Keezeekiya n'addamu nti Byonna ebiri mu nnyumba yange babirabye: tewali kintu mu bugagga bwange kye ssibalaze. 
23_39_5_Awo Isaaya n'agamba Keezeekiya nti Wulira ekigambo kya Mukama ow'eggye, 
23_39_6_Laba, ennaku zijja byonna ebiri mu nnyumba yo n'ebyo bakitaawo bye baaterekanga okutuusa leero lwe biritwalibwa e Babulooni: tewaliba kintu ekirisigalawo, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_39_7_Ne ku batabani bo abaliva mu ggwe b'olizaala balibatwalako; era baliba balaawe mu lubiri lwa kabaka w’e Babulooni. 
23_39_8_Awo Keezeekiya n'agamba Isaaya nti Ekigambo kya Mukama ky'oyogedde kirungi. Era n'ayogera nti Kavuna wanaabanga emirembe n'amazima mu mirembe gyange. 
23_40_1_Musanyuse, musanyuse abantu bange, bw'ayogera Katonda wammwe. 
23_40_2_Mwogere eby'okusanyusa Yerusaalemi, mumukoowoole nti entalo ze zimalirizibbwa, ng'obutali butuukirivu bwe busonyiyiddwa; ng'aweereddwa mu mukono gwa Mukama emirundi ebiri olw'ebibi bye byonna. 
23_40_3_Eddoboozi lyayogerera waggulu nti Mulongoose mu lukoola ekkubo lya Mukama, mugololere mu ddungu Katonda waffe oluguudo. 
23_40_4_Buli kiwonvu kirigulumizibwa, na buli lusozi n'akasozi zirikkakkanyizibwa: n'obukyamu buligololwa, n'ebifo ebitali bisende biritereezebwa 
23_40_5_n'ekitiibwa kya Mukama kiri bikkulibwa, ne bonna abalina omubiri balikirabira wamu: kubanga akamwa ka Mukama ke kakyogedde. 
23_40_6_Eddoboozi lyayogera nti Yogerera waggulu. Ne wabaawo eyayogera nti Naayogerera ki waggulu? Omubiri gwonna muddo, n'obulungi bwagwo bwonna buliŋŋanga ekimuli eky'omu nnimiro: 
23_40_7_omuddo guwotoka, ekimuLi kiyongobera; kubanga omukka gwa Mukama gugufuuwako: mazima abantu muddo: 
23_40_8_Omuddo guwotoka, ekimuli kiyongobera: naye ekigambo kya Katonda waffe kinaanyweranga ennaku zonna. 
23_40_9_Ggwe abuulira Sayuuni ebigambo ebirungi, weerinnyire ku lusozi oluwanvu; ggwe abuulira Yerusaalemi ebigambo ebirungi, yimusa eddoboozi lyo n'amaanyi; liyimuse, totya; gamba ebibuga bya Yuda nti Laba, Katonda wammwe! 
23_40_10_Laba, Mukama Katonda alijja ng'ow'amaanyi, n'omukono gwe gulimufugira: laba empeera ye eri naye, n'okusasula kwe kuli mu maaso ge. 
23_40_11_Aliriisa ekisibo kye ng'omusumba, alikutltlaanya abaana b'endiga mu mukono gwe, n'abasitula mu kifuba kye, aliyitiriza mpola ezo eziyonsa. 
23_40_12_Ani eyali ageze amazzi mu kibatu kye, n'apima eggulu n'oluta, n'agatta enfuufu ey'oku nsi mu kigera, n'apima ensozi mu minzaani n'obusozi mu kipima? 
23_40_13_Ani eyali aluŋŋamizza omwoyo gwa Mukama, oba eyamuweerera ebigambo n'amuyigiriza? 
23_40_14_Ani gwe yali ateesezza naye ebigambo, era ani eyal: amuyigirizza, n'amutegeeza mu kkubo ery'omusango, n'amunnyonnyoh okumanya, n'amulaga ekkubo ery'o kutegeera? 
23_40_15_Laba, amawanga gali ng'ettondo eriri mu nsuwa, era babalibwa ng'effufugge eriri mu minzaani: laba, asitula ebizinga ng'ekintu ekitono ennyo. 
23_40_16_Ne Lebanooni tamala kuba nku, so n'ensolo zaako tezimala kuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa. 
23_40_17_Amawanga gonna gali nga si kintu mu maaso ge; gabalibwa gy'ali nga si kintu ddala era nga kirerya. 
23_40_18_Kale ani gwe mulifaananya Katonda: oba kifaananyi ki kye mulimugererako? 
23_40_19_Ekifaananyi ekyole omu. kozi akifumba, n'omuweesi wa zaabu akibikkako zaabu, n'akifumbira emikuufu egya ffeeza. 
23_40_20_Ayinzi obwavu n'okuyinza n'atayinza kirabo ekyenkana awo yeeroboza omuti ogutalivunda; yeenoonyeza omukozi omugezigezi okusimba ekifaananyi ekyole, ekitalijjulukuka: 
23_40_21_Temunnamanya? temunnawulira? temubuulirwanga okuva ku lubereberye, temutegeeranga okuva ku kutondebwa kw'ensi? 
23_40_22_Ye wuuyo atuula ku nsi enneekulungirivu, n'abagituulamu bali ng'amayanzi; atimba eggulu ng'eggigi, era alibamba ng'eweema ey'okutuulamu: 
23_40_23_afuula abalangira obutaba kintu; afuula abalamuzi b'ensi okuba ebirerya. 
23_40_24_Weewaawo, tebasimbibwanga weewaawo, tebasigibwanga; weewaawo, ekikolo kyabwe tekisimba nga mmizi mu ttaka; era abafuuwako ne bawotoka, n'embuyaga ez'akazimu ne zibatwalira ddala ng'ebisusunku. 
23_40_25_Kale ani gwe mulinfaananya nze okumwenkana? bw'ayogera Omutukuvu. 
23_40_26_Muyimuse amaaso gammwe waggulu mulabe eyatonda ebyo bw'ali, afulumya eggye lyabyo ng'omuwendo gwaby bwe guli: byonna abituuma ama nnya; olw'obukulu bw'obuyinza bwe, era kubanga wa maanyi mu kuyinza, tewali na kimu ekibulako. 
23_40_27_Ekikwogeza ki, ggwe Yakobo, n'ogamba, ggwe Isiraeri, nti Ekkubo lyange likwekeddwa Mukama, n'omusango gwange guyise ku Katonda wange? 
23_40_28_Tonnamanya? tonnawulira? Katonda ataliggwaawo, Mukama, Omutonzi w'enkomerero z'ensi, tazirika so takoowa; amagezi ge teganoonyezeka. 
23_40_29_Awa amaanyi abazirika; n'oyo atalina buyinza amwongerako amaanyi. 
23_40_30_Abavubuka nabo balizirika balikoowa, n'abalenzi baligwira ddala: 
23_40_31_naye abo abalindirira Mukama baliddamu obuggya amaanyi gaabwe; balitumbiira n'ebiwaawaatiro ng'empungu; balidduka mbiro ne batakoowa; balitambula ne batazirika. 
23_41_1_Musirike mu maaso gange, mmwe ebizinga, amawanga gaddemu obuggya amaanyi gaabwe: basembere; balyoke boogere: tusembere wamu eri omusango. 
23_41_2_Ani ayimusizza omuntu ava ebuvanjuba, gw'ayita mu butuukirivu okujja ku kigere kye? agaba amawanga mu maaso ge, era amufuza bakabaka; abawa ekitala kye ng'enfuufu, ng'ebisasiro ebikuŋŋunsibwa eri omutego gwe. 
23_41_3_Abagoba n'ayitawo mirembe; ayita mu kkubo ly'atayitangamu n'ebigere bye. 
23_41_4_Ani eyakireeta eyakikola, ng'ayita emirembe okuva ku lubereberye? Nze Mukama ow'olubereberye era ow'enkonerero, nze wuuyo. 
23_41_5_Ebizinga byalaba ne bitya; enkomerero z'ensi zaakankana: baasembera ne bajja. 
23_41_6_Baayamba buli muntu muliraaiwa we; buli muntu n'agamba nuganda we nti Guma omwoyo. 
23_41_7_Awo omubazzi n'agumya omwoyo omuweesi wa zaabu, n'oyo asennyeita n'ennyondo n'agumya oyo akuba ku luyijja, ng'ayogera ku kyuma ekigatta nti Kirungi: n'akikomerera n'enninga kireme okusagaasagana. 
23_41_8_Naye ggwe, Isiraeri, omuddu vange, Yakobo gwe nnalonda, ezzadde lya Ibulayimu mukwano gwage 
23_41_10_totya, kubanga nze ndi wamu naawe; tokeŋŋentererwa, kubanga nze Katonda wo: naakuwanga amaanyi; weewaawo, naakuyambanga; weewaawo, naakuwaniriranga n'omukono ogwa ddyo ogw'obutuukirivu bwange. 
23_41_11_Laba, abo bonna abakusunguwalidde balikwatibwa ensonyi baliswazibwa: abo abawakana naawe baliba nga si kintu, era balibula. 
23_41_12_Olibanoonya so tolibalaba abo abakuziyiza: abo abalwana naawe baliba nga si kintu era ng'ekirerya. 
23_41_13_Kubanga nze Mukama Katonda wo naakwatanga ku mukono gwo ogwa ddyo nga nkugamba nti Totya; nze naakuyambanga. 
23_41_14_Totya, ggwe olusiriŋŋanyi Yakobo, nammwe abasajja ba Isiraeri; nze naakuyambanga, bw'ayogera Mukama, era Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri ye mununuzi wo. 
23_41_15_Laba, ndikufuula ekintu ekiwuula ekiggya eky'obwogi ekirina amannyo: ggwe oliwuula ensozi, n'oziseera ddala, a'ofuula obusozi okuba ng'ebisusunku. 
23_41_16_Oliziwujja, empewo n'ezifuumuula, embuyaga ez'akazunu ne zizisaasaanya: naawe olisanyukira Mukama, olyenyumiririza Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri. 
23_41_17_Abaavu n'abatalina kintu banoonya amazzi so nga tewali, olulimi lwabwe ne lulakasira; nze Mukama ndibaddamu, nze Katonda wa Isiraeri siribaleka. 
23_41_18_Ndizibikula emigga ku nsozi ez'obweru n'ensulo wakati mu biwonvu: ndifuula olukoola ekidiba ky'amazzi, n'ettaka ekkalu okuba enzizi z'amazzi. 
23_41_19_Ndisimba mu lukoola omuvule n'omusita n'omumwanyi n'omuzeyituuni; nditeeka mu ddungu enfugo n'omuyovu ne namukago wamu: 
23_41_20_balabe, bamanye, balowooze, bategeere wamu ng'omukono gwa Mukama gwe gukoze kino, era nga Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri ye akitonze. 
23_41_21_Muleete ensonga yammwe, bw'ayogera Mukama; mwolese ensonga zammwe ez'amaanyi, bw'ayogera Kabaka wa Yakobo. 
23_41_22_Bazireete, batubuulire ebigenda okubaawo: mubuulire ebyasooka okubaawo bwe biri, tubirowooze tutegeere enkomerero yaabyo ey'oluvannyuma; oba mutulage ebigenda okujja. 
23_41_23_Mubuulire ebigambo ebijja okubaawo oluvannyuma, tulyoke tutegeere nga muli bakatonda: weewaawo, mukole obulungi oba mukole obubi tukeŋŋentererwe tukirabire wamu. 
23_41_24_Laba, temuliiko gye muva, so n'omulimu gwammwe teguliiko gye guva: oyo abalonda wa muzizo. 
23_41_25_Nnyimusizza omuntu ava obukiika obwa kkono, era atuuse; okuva ebuvanjuba omuntu ayita erinnya lyange: era alijja ku bafuga nga ku ttaka, era ng'omubumbi bw'asamba ebbumba. 
23_41_26_Ani eyakibuulira okuva ku lubereberye tulyoke tumanye? era mu biro eby'edda tulyoke twogere nti Mutuukirivu? weewaawo, tewali abuulira, weewaawo, tewali alaga, weewaawo, tewali awulira ebigambo byammwe. 
23_41_27_Ndisooka okugamba Sayuuni nti Balabe, balabe; era ndiwa Yerusaalemi omuntu aleeta ebigambo ebirungi. 
23_41_28_Era bwe ntunula, tewali muntu; mu bo bennyini temuli ateesa ebigambo, ayinza okwanukula ekigambo bwe mbabuuza. 
23_41_29_Laba, bo bonna emirimu gyabwe birerya so si kintu: ebifaananyi byabwe ebyole mpewo na kwetabula. 
23_42_1_Laba omuweereza wange gwe mpanirira; omulonde wange obulamu bwange gwe busanyukira: ntadde omwoyo gwange ku ye; alyolesa omusango eri ab'amawanga. 
23_42_2_Talireekaana so taliyimusa so taliwuliza ddoboozi lye mu luguudo. 
23_42_3_Olumuli olubetentefu talirumenya so n'enfuuzi ezinyooka talizizikiza: alyolesa omusango mu mazima. 
23_42_4_Talizirika so talikementererwa okutuusa lw'alisimba omusango mu nsi; n'ebizinga biririndirira amateeka ge. 
23_42_5_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Katonda Mukama, eyatonda eggulu n'alibamba; eyayanjuluza ensi n'ebyo ebigivaamu; awa omukka abantu abagiriko n'omwoyo abo abagitambulako: 
23_42_6_nze Mukama nakuyita mu butuukirivu, era naakwatanga ku mukono gwo era naakukuumanga, ne nkuwa okubanga endagaano y'abantu, okubanga omusana eri ab'amawanga 
23_42_8_Nze Mukama; eryo lye linnya lyange: n'ekitiibwa kyange sirikiwa mulala, newakubadde ettendo lyange eri ebifaananyi ebyole. 
23_42_9_Laba, ebyasooka okubaawo bituuse, n'ebiggya mbibuulira: nga tebinnaba kulabika mbibabuulira. 
23_42_10_Mumuyimbire Mukama oluyimba oluggya, n'ettendo lye okuva ku nkomerero y'ensi; mmwe abaserengetera ku nnyanja ne byonna ebigirimu, ebizinga n'ababituulako. 
23_42_11_Eddungu n'ebibuga byamu biyimuse eddoboozi lyabyo, ebyalo Kedali 'mw'atuula; abatuula mu Seera bayimbe, boogerere waggulu nga bayima ku ntikko z'ensozi. 
23_42_12_Bamuwe Mukama ekitiibwa, era babuulire ettendo lye mu bizinga. 
23_42_13_Mukama alifuluma ng'ow'amaanyi; alibakwasa obuggya ng'omutabaazi: alireekaana, weewaawo, alyogerera waggulu; alikola abalabe be eby'amaanyi. 
23_42_14_Naludde okusirika; nabeerera awo ne nzibiikiriza: kaakano naayogerera waggulu ng'omukazi alumwa okuzaala; naalaakiira ne mpejjerawejjera wamu. 
23_42_15_Ndizikiriza ensozi n'obusozi, ne mpotosa emiddo gyako gyonna; era ndifuula emigga ebizinga ne nkaliza ebidiba. 
23_42_16_Era ndireeta abazibe b'amaaso mu kkubo lye batamanyi; mu mpitiro ze batamanyi mwe ndibayisa: ndifuula ekizikiza okuba omusana mu maaso gaabwe, n'ebifo ebikyamu ndibigolola. Ebyo ndibikola so siribaleka. 
23_42_17_Balikyusibwa okudda ennyuma, balikwasibwa ensonyi nnyingi, abeesiga ebifaananyi ebyole, abagamba ebifaananyi ebisaanuuse nti Mmwe muli bakatonda baffe. 
23_42_18_Muwulire, mmwe abaggavu b'amatu; mutunule, mmwe abazibe b'amaaso, mulyoke mulabe. 
23_42_19_Ani omuzibe w'amaaso wabula omuweereza wange? oba muggavu wa matu wabula omubaka wange gwe ntuma? ani omuzibe w'amaaso ng'oyo eyatabagana nange era omuzibe w'amaaso ng'omuweereza wa Mukama? 
23_42_20_Olaba bingi naye teweetegereza; amatu ge gagguse naye tawulira. 
23_42_21_Mukama yasiima, olw'obutuukirivu bwe, okukuza amateeka n'okugassaamu ekitiibwa. 
23_42_22_Naye bano be bantu abaanyagibwa ne batemulwa bo bonna bateegebwa mu bunnya, era bakwekeddwa mu nnyumba ez'amakomera: ba kunyagibwa so tewali awonya; ba kukambuulibwa so tewali ayogera nti Zzaayo. 
23_42_23_Ani ku mmwe anaategera ekyo okutu? anaategereza n'awulira olw'ebiro ebigenda okujja? 
23_42_24_Ani eyawaayo Yakobo okukambuulibwa ne Isiraeri eri abanyazi? si Mukama? oyo gwe twayonoona, so tebaaganya kutambulira mu makubo ge, so tebaagondera mateeka ge 
23_42_25_Kyeyava amufukako ekiruyi eky'obusungu bwe n'amaanyi ag'entalo; ne kimwokya enjuyi zonna era teyamanya; era kyamusonsomola, era teyakissaako mwoyo. 
23_43_1_Naye kaakano bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama eyakutonda, ggwe Yakobo, era eyakubumba, ggwe Isiraeri, nti Torya, kubanga nakununula; nakuyita erinnya lyo, oli wange. 
23_43_2_Bw'onooyitanga mu mazzi, naabeeranga naawe; ne mu migga, tegirikusaanyaawo: bw'onootambulanga okuyita mu muliro, toosiriirenga; so n'omuliro tegulyakira ku ggwe. 
23_43_3_Kubanga nze ndi Mukama Katonda wo, Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri, omulokozi wo; nawaayo Misiri okuba ekinunulo kyo, Kuusi ne Seba ku lulwo. 
23_43_4_Kubanga wali wa muwendo mungi mu maaso gange, era wa kitiibwa, nange nakwagala; kyendiva mpaayo abasajja ku lulwo n'amawanga ku lw'obulamu bwo. 
23_43_5_Totya; kubanga nze ndi wamu naawe: ndireeta ezzadde lyo okuliggya ebuvanjuba ne nku,kuŋŋaanya okuva ebugwanjuba 
23_43_8_Fulumya abazibe b'amaaso abalina amaaso n'abaggavu b'amatu abalina amatu. 
23_43_9_Amawanga gonna gakunnaanyizibwe wamu n'abantu beetabe: ani ku bo ayinza okubuulira ekyo n'atulaga ebyasooka okubaawo? baleete abajulirwa baabwe baweebwe obutuukirivu: oba bawulire boogere nti Bya mazima. 
23_43_10_Mmwe muli bajulirwa bange, bw'ayogera Mukama n'omuweereza wange gwe nnalonda mulyoke mumanye munzikirize mu tegeere nga nze nzuuyo; tewali Katonda eyabumbibwa okusooka nze, so tewaliba alinziririra. 
23_43_11_Nze, nze mwene, nze Mukama so tewali mulokozi wabula nze. 
23_43_12_Nze nabuulira era nalokola era nalaga, so tewabanga mu mmwe katonda mulala: kye mubeereddi abajulirwa bange, bw'ayogera Mukama, nange ndi Katonda. 
23_43_13_Weewaawo, omusana kasookeddi gubaawo era nze nzuuyo; so tewali ayinza okuwonya mu mukono gwange: ndikola omulimu, era ani ali guziyiza? 
23_43_14_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama omununuzi wammwe, Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri, nti Ku lwammwe na tuma e Babulooni, era ndibasere ngesa bonma ng'abadduse, be Bakaludaaya, mu byombo eby'okusanyuka kwabwe. 
23_43_15_Nze ndi Mukama Omutukuvu wammwe, Omutonzi wa Isiraeri, Kabaka wammwe. 
23_43_16_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama akuba oluguudo mu nnyanja n'e kkubo mu mazzi ag'amaanyi. 
23_43_17_afulumya eggaali n'embalaasi eggye n'obuyinza; bagalamira wamu, tebaligolokoka; bazikiridde, bazikidde ng'enfuuzi: nti 
23_43_18_Temujjukira ebyasooka okubaawo, so temulowooza bigambo bya dda. 
23_43_19_Laba, ndikola ekigambo ekiggya kaakano kirirabika; temulikimanya ndikuba oluguudo ne mu lukoola, ne ndeeta emigga mu ddungu. 
23_43_20_Ensolo ez'omu nsiko zirinzisaamu ekitiibwa, ebibe ne bamaaya kubanga ngaba amazzi mu lukoola n'emigga mu ddungu, okunywes abantu bange, abalonde bange 
23_43_21_abantu be nneebumbira nzekka boolesenga ettendo lyangi 
23_43_22_Naye tonkaabiranga, ggwe Yakobo; naye wantamwa, ggwe Isiraeri 
23_43_23_Tondeeteranga nsolo ntono ey'ebibyo ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa; so tonzisaamu kitiibwa na ssaddaaka zo. Sikuweerezesanga n'ebiweebwayo so sikukooyesanga na mugavu. 
23_43_24_Tonguliranga mmuli mpoomerevu na ffeeza, so tonzikusanga na masavu ga ssaddaaka zo naye ggwe wampeerezesa n'ebibi byo, wankoo'esa n'obutali butuukirivu bwo. 
23_43_25_Nze, nze mwene, nze nzuuyo sangula ebyonoono byo ku lwange nze; so sirijjukira bibi byo. 
23_43_26_Njiukiza; tuwoze fembi: leeta ensoiga yo olyoke oweebwe obutuukirivu. 
23_43_27_Kitaawo eyasooka yayonoona n'abategeeza bo bansobya. 
23_43_28_Kyendiva nvumisa abakulu ab'omu watukuvu, era ndifuula Yakobo kikolimo ne Isiraeri ekivume. 
23_44_1_Naye kaakano wulira, ggwe Yakobo omuweereza wange: ne Isiraeri gwe nnalonda: 
23_44_2_bw'ayo bw'ayogera Mukama eyakukola naakubumba okuva mu lubuto, naakuyambanga, nti Totya, ggwe Yakobo omuweereza wange; naawe Yesuluni gwe nnalonda. 
23_44_3_Kubanga ndifuka amazzi ku oyo alumildwa ennyonta n'emigga ku ttaka kkalu: ndifuka omwoyo gwange ku zzadde lyo n'omukisa gwange ku nda yo: 
23_44_4_era baliroka mu muddo ng'enzingu ku mabbali g'emigga. 
23_44_5_Walibaawo aligamba nti Nze wa Mukama; n'omulala alyetuuma eriinya lya Yakobo; n'omulala alivandiika n'omukono gwe nga wa Mukama, ne yeetuuma erinnya lya Isiraeri. 
23_44_6_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama, Kabaka wa Isiraeri, era omununuzi re Mukama ow'eggye nti Nze ndi wa lubereberye era nze ndi wa komerero; so tewali Katonda wabula nze. 
23_44_7_Era ani, nga nze, aliita n'akibuulira n'akinteekerateeera, kasookedde nzizaawo eggwanga ery'edda? n'ebyo ebijja okujja n’ebyo ebiribaawo babibuulire. 
23_44_8_Temutya so temutekemuka: bw'edda saakubuulira ne nkiraga? nammwe muli bajulirwa bange. Waliwo Katonda wabula nze? weewaawo, tewali Lwazi; nze siriiko lwe nmanyi. 
23_44_9_Abo abakola ekifaaianyi ekyole bonna birerya; n'ebintu byabwe eby'okwesiima tebiriiko kye birigasa: n'abajulirwa baabwe bo tebalaba so tebamanyi; balyoke bakwatibwe ensonyi. 
23_44_10_Ani eyakola katonda oba eyasaanuusa ekifaananyi ekyole ekitaliiko kye kigasa? 
23_44_11_Laba, banne bonna balikwatima ensonyi; n'abakozi ba mu bantu: bonna bakutltlaanyizibwe wamu, bayimirire; balitya balikwatirwa wamu ensonyi 
23_44_12_Omuweesi ng'aweesa embazzi n'ayisa mu manda n'agisennyenta n'ennyondo n'agisaaza n'omukono gwe ogw'amaanyi: weewaawo, ng'alumwa enjala amaanyi ge ne gaggwaawo; nga tanywa ku mazzi n'ayongobera. 
23_44_13_Omubazzi ng'aleega omugwa; ng'akiramba n'ekkalaamu; ng'akisaanya n'eranda n'akiramba kyonna n'ekyuma ekigera, n'akifaananya ekifaananyi ky'omuntu, ng'obulungi bw'omuntu bwe buli, okutuulanga mu nnyumba. 
23_44_14_Nga yeetemera emivule n'atwala enzo n'omuyovu, era yeenywerezaako ogumu ku miti egy'omu kibira: ng'asimba enkanaga enkuba n'egimeza. 
23_44_15_Awo eriba ya nku eri omuntu; n'agitwalako n'ayota; weewaawo, ng'agikoleeza n'ayokya omugaati: weewaawo, ng'akola katonda n'akisinza; ng'akola ekifaananyi ekyole n'akivuunamira. 
23_44_16_Ekitundu kyakyo ng'akyokya mu muliro; ku kitundu kyakyo kw'aggya okulya ennyama; ng'ayokya njokye n'akkuta: weewaawo, ng'ayota n'ayogera nti Owa, mbugumye, ndabye omuliro: 
23_44_17_n'ekitundu kyakyo ekifisseeko ng'akifuula katonda, ekifaananyi kye ekyole: ng'akivuunamira n'asinza n'akyegayirira n'ayogera nti Mponya; kubanga ggwe katonda wange. 
23_44_18_Tebamanyi so tebalowooza: kubanga azibye amaaso gaabwe n'okuyinza ne batayinza kulaba; n'emitima gyabwe n'okuyinza ne batayinza kutegeera. 
23_44_19_So tewali ajjukira, so tewali kumanya newakubadde okutegeera n'okwogera n'ayogera nti Ekitundu kyakyo nkyokezza mu muliro, weewaawo, era nsiise omugaati ku manda gaakyo; njokezza ennyama ne ngirya: ate ekitundu kyakyo ekifisseeko n'akifuula eky'omuzizo? n'avuunamira ekisiki ky'omuti? 
23_44_20_Alya evvu: omutima ogwalimbibwa gumukyamizza n'okuyinza n'atayinza kuwonya bulamu bwe newakubadde okwogera nti Eky'obulimba tekiri mu mukono gwange ogwa ddyo? 
23_44_21_Ebyo bijjukire, ggwe Yakobo; naawe Isiraeri, kubanga ggwe muweereza wange: nze nakubumba; ggwe muweereza wange: ggwe Isiraeri, sirikwerabira 
23_44_22_Nsangudde ebyonoono byo ng'ekire ekiziyivu, n'ebibi byo ng'ekire: komawo gye ndi; kubanga nakunnnula. 
23_44_23_Yimba, ggwe eggulu, kubanga Mukama ye akikoze; mwogerere waggulu, mmwe enjuyi eza wansi ez'ensi; mubaguke okuyimba, mmwe ensozi, ggwe ekibira na buli muti ogulimu: kubanga Mukama yanunula Yakobo era alyegulumiriza mu Isiraeri. 
23_44_24_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama, omununuzi wo, era eyakubumba okuva mu lubuto, nti Nze Mukama akola byonna; abamba eggulu nzekka; ayanjuluza ensi; ani ali awamu nange? 
23_44_25_atta obubonero obw'abalimba era alalusa abalogo; akyusa abagezigezi okudda ennyuma ne nsiruwaza amagezi gaabwe: 
23_44_26_anyweza ekigambo eky'omuweereza we ne ntuukiriza okuteesa kw'ababaka be; ayogera ku Yerusaalemi nti Kirituulwamu; ne ku bibuga bya Yuda nti Birizimbibwa, nange ndigolokosa ebifo byamu ebyazika: 
23_44_27_agamba obuziba nti Kalira, nange ndikaliza emigga: 
23_44_28_ayogera ku Kuulo nti Musumba wange era alituukiriza bye njagala byonna: n'okwogera ne njogera ku Yerusaalemi nti Kirizimbibwa; era agamba yeekaalu nti Omusingi gwo guliteekebwawo. 
23_45_1_Bw'atyo Mukama bw'agamba oyo gwe yafukako amafuta, Kuulo, gwe nkutte ku mukono gwe ogwa ddyo, okujeemula amawanga mu maaso ge, era ndisumulula ebiwato bya bakabaka; okuggulawo enzigi mu maaso ge ne ziwankaaki teziriggalwawo 
23_45_3_era ndikuwa obugagga obw'omu kizikiza n'ebintu ebyakwekebwa ebiri mu bifo eby'ekyama, olyoke omanye nga ndi Mukama akuyita erinnya lyo, Katonda wa Isiraeri 
23_45_4_Nze Mukama so tewali mulala; tewali Katonda wabula nze: ndikusiba olukoba, newakubadde nga tommanyanga: 
23_45_5_balyoke bamanye okuva ebuvanjuba n'okuva ebugwanjuba nga tewali wabula nze: nze Mukama so tewali mulala. 
23_45_6_Nze mmumba omusana era ntonda ekizikiza; ndeeta emirembe era ntonda obubi; nze Mukama akola ebyo byonna. 
23_45_7_Nze mmumba omusana era ntonda ekizikiza; ndeeta emirembe era ntonda obubi; nze Mukama akola ebyo byonna. 
23_45_8_Ggwe eggulu, tonnyesa okuva waggulu, n'ebbanga littulukuse obutuukirivu: ensi eyasame, baggyemu obulokozi, emeze obutuukirivu wamu; nze Mukama nagitonda. 
23_45_9_Zisanze oyo awakana n'Omukozi we! olugyo mu ngyo ez'ensi! Ebbumba lirigamba oyo alibumba nti Okola ki? oba omulimu gwo guligamba nti Talina ngalo? 
23_45_10_Zimusanze oyo agamba kitaawe nti Ozaala ki? oba omukazi nti Olu mwa kuzaala ki? 
23_45_11_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama, Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri era Omukozi we, nti Mumbuuze ebigambo ebigenda okujja; ebya batabani bange, n'eby'omulimu gw'engalo zange mundagire. 
23_45_12_Nakola ensi ne ntondera abantu mu yo: nze, ngalo zange, nabamba eggulu, n'eggye lyalyo lyonna nze naliragira. 
23_45_13_Mmugolokosezza mu butuukirivu, era ndigolola amakubo ge gonna: alizimba ekibuga kyange, era aliteera ddala abange abaagobebwa, si lwa muwendo so si lwa mpeera, bw'ayogera Mukama ow'eggye. 
23_45_14_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Omulimu gw'e Misiri n'obuguzi bw'e Kuusi n'Abasabeya, abasajja abawanvu, balikusenga ne baba babo; balikugoberera; nga bali mu masamba balisenga: era balikuvuunamira balikwegayirira nga boogera nti Mazima Katonda ali mu ggwe; so tewali mulala, tewali Katonda. 
23_45_15_Mazima ggwe Katonda eyeekweka, ggwe Katonda wa Isiraeri, Omulokozi. 
23_45_16_Balikwatibwa ensonyi, weewaawo, baliswala, bonna: baligendeza wamu mu kuswala abakola ebifaananyi. 
23_45_17_Naye Isiraeri alirokolebwa Mukama n'obulokozi obutaliggwaawo: temuukwatibwenga nsonyi temuuswalenga emirembe n'emirembe. 
23_45_18_Kubanga bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama eyatonda eggulu; ye Katonda; eyabumba ensi n'agikola; ye yaginyweza, yagitonda obutaba ddungu, yagibumba okutuulwamu; nti Nze Mukama; so tewali mulala. 
23_45_19_Soogereranga mu kyama, mu kifo eky'omu nsi ey'ekizikiza; sigambanga zzadde lya Yakobo nti Munnoonyeze bwereere: nze Mukama njogera butuukirivu, mbuulira ebigambo bya nsonga. 
23_45_20_Mwekuŋŋaanye mujje; musembere wamu, mmwe abawonye ku mawanga: tebalina magezi abasitula omuti ogw'ekifaananyi kyabwe ekyole ne beegayirira katonda atayinza kulokola. 
23_45_21_Mubuulire mwolese; weewaawo, bateese wamu: ani eyalanga ekyo okuva mu biro eby'edda? ani eyakibuulira okuva edda? si nze Mukama? so tewali Katonda mulala wabula nze; Katonda omutuukirivu era omulokozi; tewali mulala wabula nze. 
23_45_22_Mutunuulire nze, mulokoke, mmwe enkomerero zonna ez'ensi: kubanga nze Katonda so tewali mulala. 
23_45_23_Neerayidde mwene, ekigambo kivudde mu kamwa kange mu butuukirivu so tekirikomawo, nga nze buli vviivi lirinfukaamirira, buli lulimi lulirayira nze. 
23_45_24_Walibaawo aliŋŋamba nti mu Mukama mwokka mwe muli obutuukirivu n'amaanyi: eri oyo abaniu gye balijja, n'abo bonna abaamusunguwalira balikwatibwa ensonyi. 
23_45_25_Mu Mukama ezzadde lyonna erya Isiraeri mwe liriweerwa obutuukirivu era mwe liryenyumiririza. 
23_46_1_Beri avuunama, Nebo akutama; ebifaananyi biri ku nsolo ne ku bisolo: ebintu bye mwatambuzatambuzanga bifuuse omugugu, omutwalo eri ensolo ekooye. 
23_46_2_Bakutama bavuunama wamu; tebayinza kuwonya mugugu, naye bo bennyini bagenze mu kusibibwa. 
23_46_3_n'okutuusa ku bukadde nze nzuuyo: n'okutuusa ku nvi naabasitula'nga: nze nakola era nze naaweekainga: weewaawo, naasitulanga era naawonyanga. 
23_46_4_n'okutuusa ku bukadde nze nzuuyo: n'okutuusa ku nvi naabasitula'nga: nze nakola era nze naaweekainga: weewaawo, naasitulanga era naawonyanga. 
23_46_5_Ani gwe mulinfaananya era gwe mulinnenkanya era gwe mulingererako tufaanane? 
23_46_6_Abaggya ezaabu nnyingi mi nsawo ne bapima effeeza mu minzaani, bagulirira omuweesi wa zaabu n'agifuula katonda; bavuunamira, weewaawo, basinza. 
23_46_7_Bamukongojja ku kibegabega, bamu. situla ne bamusimba mu kifo kyo n'ayimirira; mu kifo kye taliseguka. wo: weewaawa, walibaawo alimukaabirira, naye tayinza kwanukula newakubadde okumuwonya mu nnaku ze. 
23_46_8_Mujjukire ekyo, mwerage obusajja: mukijjukire nate, mmwe aboonoonyi. 
23_46_9_Mujjukire ebigambo ebyasooka eby'edda: kubanga nze Katonda so tewali mulala; nze Katonda so tewali anfaanana; 
23_46_10_alanga enkomerero okuva ku lubereberye, n'ebigambo ebitannakolebwa okuva ku biro eby'edda; ayogera nti Okuteesa kwange kulinywera era ndikola bye njagala byonna: 
23_46_11_ayita ennyonyi ey'amaddu akuva ebuvanjuba, omusajja ow'okuteesa kwange okuva mu nsi ey'ewala; weewaawo, nayogera, n'okutuukiriza ndikituukiriza; nateesa, n'okukola ndikikola. 
23_46_12_Mumpulirize, mmwe abalina emitima emikakanyavu, abali ewala n'obutuukirivu: 
23_46_13_nsembeza obutuukirivu bwange, tebuliba wala n'obulokozi bwange tebulirwawo era nditeeka obulokozi mu Sayuuni ku lwa Isiraeri ekitiibwa kyange. 
23_47_1_Serengeta otuule mu nfuufu ggwe omuwala wa Babulooni atamanyi musajja; tuula ku ttaka awatali ntebe ya bwakabaka, ggwe omuwala w'Abakaludaaya: kubanga tebakyakuyitanga nyanyali era mwekanasi. 
23_47_2_Ddira emmengo osi obutta: bikkula ku maaso, ggyako ekirenge, bikkula ku kugulu, oyite mu migga. 
23_47_3_Obwereere bwo buli bikkuka, weewaawo, ensonyi zo zirirabika: ndiwalana eggwanga so sirikkiriza muntu yenna. 
23_47_4_Omununuzi waffe, Mukama ow'egge lye linnya lye, Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri. 
23_47_5_Tuula ng'osirise, weegendere mu kizikiza, ggwe omuwala w'Abakaludaaya: kubanga tebakya kuyitanga Mukyala wa mu bwakabaka. 
23_47_6_Nasunguwalira abantu bange, navumisa abusika bwange, ne mbawaayo mu mukono gwo: tewabasaasira n'akamu; ku bakadde obataddeko ekikoligo kyo kizito nnyo. 
23_47_7_N'oyogera nti Naabanga mukyala ennaku zonna: ebyo n'otobissa ku mwoyo so tewajjukira nkomerero yaabyo ya luvannyuma. 
23_47_8_Kale nno kaakano wulira kino, ggwe aweereddwa ejjaliri okwesiima, atuula ng'osiita, ayogera mu mutima gwo nti Wendi, so tewali mulala wabula nze; sirituula nga nnamwandu, so sirimanya kufiirwa baana: 
23_47_9_naye bino byombiriri birikujjira mangu ku lunaku lumu, okufiirwa abaana ne bunnamwandu: birikujjako mu kigera kyabyo ekituukiridde, obulogo bwo newakubadde nga bungi butya, n'obusawo bwo newakubadde nga busukkiridde ohungi. 
23_47_10_Kubanga weesiga obubi bwo; wayogera nti Siriiko andaba; amagezi go n'okumanya kwo bye bikukyamizza: n'oyogera mu mutima gwo nti Wendi, so tewali mulala wabula nze. 
23_47_11_Obubi kyebuliva bukujjako; tolimanya mmambya yaabwo: n'akataali kalikugwako; toliyinza kukaggyawo: n'okuzika kulikujjako mangu ago kw'otomanyiridde. 
23_47_12_Yimirira nno n'obusawo bwo n'obulogo bwo obwayinga obungi, obwakutengezzanga okuva mu buto bwo; oba nga mpozzi oliyinza okugasa, oba nga mpozzi oliyinza okusobola. 
23_47_13_Abateesa naawe abayinga obungi bakukooyezza: abalaguza eggulu, abalengera emmunyeenye, abalanga eby'emyezi bayimirire nno bakulokole mu ebyo ebirikujjako. 
23_47_14_Laba, baliba ng'ebisusunku; omuliro gulibookya; tebalyewonya mu buyinza bw'omuliro: teguliba yanda lya kwota, newakubadde kyoto eky'okutuulako. 
23_47_15_Bwe bityo bwe biriba gy'oli ebyo ebyakutengezzanga: abaagulaananga naawe okuva mu buto bwo balibulubuuta buli muntu ku luuyi lwe ye; tewaliba wa kukulokola. 
23_48_1_Muwulire kino, mmwe ennyuis mba ya Yakobo, abaatuumiwa erinnya lya Isiraeri era abavu de mu mazzi ga Yuda; abalayira rinnya lya Mukama, era aboogera ku Katonda wa Isiraeri, naye si mu mazima so si mu butuukirivu. 
23_48_2_Kubanga beeyita ba mu kibuga kitukuvu, era beesigama ku Katonda wa Isiraeri; Mukama ow'eggye lye linnya lye. 
23_48_3_Nabuulira ebigambo ebyasooka okuva edda; weewaawo, byava mu kamwa kange ne mbiranga: nabikola mangu ne bituukirira. 
23_48_4_Kubanga namanya ng'oli mukakanyavu, n'ensingo yo kinywa kya kyuma, n'ekyenyi kyo kikomo 
23_48_6_Wakiwulira; laba bino byonna; nammwe temulikibuulira? Nkulaze ebigambo ebiggya okuva mu biro bino, ebigambo ebyakwekebwa, by'otomanyanga. 
23_48_7_Bitondeddwa kaakano so si kuva dda; eka okusooka olwa leero tobiwuliranga; olemenga okwogera nti Laba, nali mbimanyi. 
23_48_8_Weewaawo, towuliranga; weewaawo, tomanyanga; weewaawo, obw'edda bwonna okutu kwo tekuggukanga: kubanga namanya nga walyazaamaanya nnyo, era wayitibwa musobya okuva mu lubuto. 
23_48_9_Olw'erinnya lyange ndyosaawo obusungu bwange, n'olw'ettendo lyange ndizibiikiriza gy'oli nneme okukuzikiriza. 
23_48_10_Laba, nkulongoosezza naye si nga ffeeza; nkulondedde mu kikoomi kwe kubonyaabonyezebwa. 
23_48_11_Ku lwange nze, ku lwange nze kyendiva nkikola; kubanga erinnya lyange bandirivumye batya? n'ekitiibwa kyange sirikiwa mulala: 
23_48_12_Mpuliriza, ggwe Yakobo, ne Isiraeri gwe nnayita: nze nzuuyo; nze w'olubereberye, era nze w'enkomerero. 
23_48_13_Weewaawo, omukono gwange gwe gwateekawo omusingi gw'ensi, n'omukono gwange ogwa ddyo gwe gwabamba eggulu: bwe mbiyita ne biyimirira wamu. 
23_48_14_Mwekurplaanye, mmwe mwenna, muwulire; ani ku bo eyali abuulidde ebyo? Mukama yamwagala: alikola Babulooni by'ayagala, n'omukono gwe guliba ku Bakaludaaya. 
23_48_15_Nze, nze mwene, njogedde; weewaawo, mmuyimuse; mmuleese, era olugendo lwe alirulabisa omukisa. 
23_48_16_Munsemberere, muwulire kino; okuva ku lubereberye soogereranga mu kyama; kasookedde kibaawo, nga wendi: era kaakano Mukama Katonda antumye n'omwoyo gwe. 
23_48_17_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama, omununuzi wo, Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri, nti Nze Mukama Katonda wo, akuyigiriza okugasa, akukulembera mu kkubo ly'oba oyitamu. 
23_48_18_Singa wawulira amateeka gange! kale emirembe gyo gyandibadde ng'omugga, n'obutuukirivu bwo ng'amayengo g'ennyanja: 
23_48_19_era n'ezzadde lyo lyandibadde ng'omusenyu, n'ab'enda yo ng'empeke zaagwo: erinnya lye teryandisanguliddwa so teryandizikiridde mu maaso gange. 
23_48_20_Mufulume mu Babulooni, mudduke Abakaludaaya; mubuulire mwogere kino mukirange n'okutuusa enkomerero y'ensi n'eddoboozi ery'okuyimba: mwogere nti Mukama anunudde omuweereza we Yakobo. 
23_48_21_So tebaalumwa nnyonta bwe yabayisa mu malungu: yabakulukusiza amazzi mu lwazi: era yayasa n'olwazi, amazzi ne gatiiriika. 
23_48_22_Tewali mirembe eri ababi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_49_1_Mumpulirize, mmwe ebizinga; era mutege amatu, mmwe amawanga, nga muyima wala: Mukama yampita okuva mu lubuto; okuva munda ya mmange yayatula erinnya lyange: 
23_49_2_era akamwa kange akafaananyizza ng'ekitala eky'obwogi, mu kisiikirize ky'omukono gwe mw'ankwese; era anfudde akasaale akazigule, mu mufuko gwe mw'ankuumidde ddala 
23_49_4_Naye ne njogera nti Nateganira bwereere, amaanyi gange gaafa busa, naye mazima omusango gwange guli ne Mukama, n'empeera yange eri ne Katonda wange.
