23_49_5_Era kaakano ayogera Mukama eyammumba okuva mu lubuto okuba omuweereza we, okumukomezaawo nate Yakobo era Isiraeri akuŋŋaanyizibwe gy'ali: (kubanga ndi wa kitiibwa mu maaso ga Mukama, era Katonda wange afuuse amaanyi gange:) 
23_49_6_weewaawo, ayogera nti Ekigambo kyayinga obwangu ggwe okuba omuweereza wange okugolokosa ebika bya Yakobo n'okulokola abawonye ku Isiraeri: era ndikuwaayo okuba omusana eri ab'amawaaga, obeerenga obulokozi bwange okutuusa ku nkomerero y'ensi. 
23_49_7_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama, omuauauzi wa Isiraeri, era Omutukuvu we, ng'agamba oyo abantu gwe banyooma, oyo eggwanga gwe likyawa, omuweereza w'abafuga, ati Bakabaka baliraba ne bagolokoka; abalangira baligolokoka ne basinza; ku lwa Mukama omwesigwa, Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri eya kulonda. 
23_49_8_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Nkwanukulidde mu biro eby'okukkirizibwamu, era nkuyambye ku lunaku olw'okulokokeramu: era ndikuwonya ne nkuwaayo okuba endagaano eri abantu, okugolokosa ensi, okubasisa obusika obwazika: 
23_49_9_ng'obuulira abo abasibiddwa ntiMufulume; abo abalimu kizikiza nti Mwerage. Banaaliiranga mu makubo, ne ku nsozi zonna ez'obweru kwe kunaabanga amalundiro gaabwe. 
23_49_10_Tebaalumwenga njala newakubadde ennyonta; so a'olubugumu teruubakwatenga newakubadde omusana: kubanga oyo abasaasira anaabakulemberanga era awali enzizi z'amazzi gy'anaabatwalanga. 
23_49_11_Era ndifuula ensozi zaage zonna okuba ekkubo, n'enguudo zange zirigulumizibwa. 
23_49_12_Laba, bano baliva wala: era, laba, baao baliva obukiika obwa kkoao n'ebugwanjuba; era bano mu nsi y'e Sinimu. 
23_49_13_Yimba, ggwe eggulu; era sanyuka, ggwe ensi; era mubaguke okuyimba, mmwe ensozi: kubanga Mukama asanyusizza abantu be, era alisaasira ababe ababonyaabonyezebwa. 
23_49_14_Naye Sayuuai n’ayogera nti Mukama andese, era Mukama anneerabidde. 
23_49_15_Omukazi ayinza okwerabira omwana we ayonka, obutasaasira mwana wa nda ye? weewaawo, abo bayinza okwerabira, naye siikwerabirenga ggwe. 
23_49_16_Laba, nkuyoze ku bibatu by'emikono gyange; ebisenge byo biri mu maaso gange bulijjo. 
23_49_17_Abaana bo baanguwa; abaakuzikiriza n'abaakuzisa balikuvaamu. 
23_49_18_Yimusa amaaso go enjuyi zonna olabe: abo bonna beekuŋŋaanya wamu ne bajja gy'oli. Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama, tolirema kubambala bonna ng'eky'obuyonjo, n'obeesiba ng'omugole. 
23_49_19_Kubanga ebifo byo ebyazika ebyalekebwawo n'ensi yo eyazikirizibwa, mazima kaakano olibayingirira obufunda abatuulamu, n'abo abaakulyanga baliba wala. 
23_49_20_Abaana ab'okufiirwa kwo balyogerera mu matu go nti Ekifo kinnyingiridde obufunda: mpa ebbanga ntuule. 
23_49_21_N'olyoka oyogerera mu mutima gwo nti Am eyanzaalira bano, kubanga nafiirwa abaana bange, era ndi omu, eyagobebwa, era abulubuutira eruuyi n'eruuyi? era ani eyalera bano? Laba, nasigala omu; bano, baali bali ludda wa? 
23_49_22_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Laba, ndigololera amawanga omukono gwange, ne nsimbira abantu ebendera yange: awo balireeta batabani bo mu kifuba kyabwe, ne bawala bo balikoagojjerwa ku bibegabega byabwe. 
23_49_23_Era bakabaka baliba bakitaawo abalera, ne bakaddulubaale baabwe baliba bannyoko abayonsa: balikuvuunamira n'amaaso gaabwe, ne bakomba enfuufu ey'omu bigere byo; kale olimaaya nga adi Mukama, n'abo abanniadirira tebalikwatibwa nsonyi. 
23_49_24_Omunyago guliggibwa ku b'amaanyi, oba abawambibwa olw'easonga baliteebwa? 
23_49_25_Naye bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti N'abo ab'amaanyi be baawamba baliggibwawo, n'omunyago gw'ab'entiisa guliteebwa: kubanga ndiyomba n'oyo ayomba naawe, era ndirokola abaana bo. 
23_49_26_Era abo abakujooga ndibaliisa ennyama yaabwe bo; era balitamiira omusaayi gwabwe bo, nga n'omwenge omuwoomerevu: n'abalina omubiri bonna balimanya nga nze Mukama ndi mulokozi wo, era omununuzi wo, Owaamaanyi owa Yakobo. 
23_50_1_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Ebbaluwa ey'okugoba nnyammwe eri ludda wa gye nna mugobya? oba aluwa ku abo abammanja gwe nnabaguza? Laba, olw'obutali butuukirivu bwammwe kyemwava mutundibwa, era okusobya kwammwe kwe kwagobya nnyammwe. 
23_50_2_Bwe nnajja, kyewava walema okubaawo omuntu ki? bwe nnayita, tewaali eyandiyitabye? Omukono gwange guyimpawadde ne gutayinza n'akatono kununula? oba sirina maanyi n'akatono ga kuwonya? Laba, olw'okunenya kwange nkaliza ennyanja; emigga ngifuula eddungu: ebyennyanja byamu ne biwunya, obutabaawo mazzi, ne bifa ennyonta. 
23_50_3_Nnyambaza eggulu obuddugavu, era ndibikkako ebibukutu. 
23_50_4_Mukama Katonda ampadde olulimi lw'abo abayigirizibwa, ndyoke mmanye okugumya n'ebigambo oyo akooye: azuukusa buli lukya; azuukusa okutu kwange okuwulira ng'abo abayigirizibwa. 
23_50_5_Mukama Katonda aggudde okutu kwange, ne ssiba mujeemu ne ssikyuka kudda nnyuma. 
23_50_6_Nawaayo amabega gange eri abakuba, n'amatania gang eri abo abakuunyuula enviiri: saakweka maaso gange nsonyi na kuwanda malusu. 
23_50_7_Kubanga Mukama Katonda alinnyamba; kyennava nnema okuswala: kyenvudde nteeka amaaso gange ng'ejjinja ery'embaalebaale, era mmanyi nga sirikwatibwa nsonyi. 
23_50_8_Ali kumpi ampeesa obutuukirivu; ani aliyomba nange? tuyimirire fembi; omulabe wange ye ani? ansemberere. 
23_50_9_Laba, Mukama Katonda ye alinnyamba; ani oyo alinsalira omusango? laba, bonna balikaddiwa ng'ekyambalo; ennyenje eribaliira ddala. 
23_50_10_Ani ku mmwe atya Mukama; agondera eddoboozi ly'omuweereza we? atambulira mu kizikiza, nga talina musana, yeesige erinnya lya Mukama, era yeesigame ku Katonda we. 
23_50_11_Laba, mmwe mwenna abakuma omuliro, abeesiba emimuli enjuyi zonna: mutambulire mu nnimi z'omuliro gwammwe, ne mu mimuli gye mukoleezezza, Ekyo kye muliweebwa mu mukono gwange; muligalamira nga munakuwadde. 
23_51_1_Mumpulirize, mmwe abagoberera obutuukirivu, mmwe abanoonya Mukama: mutunuulire olwazi lwe mwatemebwako, n'obunnya bw'obuya bwe mwasimibwamu. 
23_51_2_Tunuulira Ibulayimu jjajjammwe ne Saala eyabazaala: kubanga bwe yali ali omu yekka ne tumuyita ne mmuwa omukisa ne mmwaza. 
23_51_3_Kubanga Mukama asanyusizza Sayuuni: asanyusizza ebifo bye byonna ebyazika n'afuula olukoola lwe okuba nga Adeni n'eddungu lye okuba ng'olusuku lwa Mukama; essanyu n'okujaguza birirabika omwo, okwebaza, n'eddoboozi ery'okuyimba. 
23_51_4_Mumpulirize, mmwe abantu bange; era muntegere okutu, mmwe eggwanga lyange: kubanga etteeka lirifuluma gye ndi, era ndibeesaawo omusango gwange okuba omusana eri amawanga. 
23_51_5_Obutuukirivu bwange buli kumpi, obulokozi bwange bufulumye, n'emikono gyange girisalira amawanga emisango; ebizinga birinnindirira, n'omukono gwange gwe biryesiga. 
23_51_6_Muyimuse amaaso gammwe eri eggulu, era mutunuulire ensi wansi: kubanga eggulu lirivaawo ng'omukka, n'ensi erikaddiwa ng'ekyambalo, n'abo abagituulamu balifa bwe batyo: naye obulokozi bwange bunaabeereranga ennaku zonna, so n'obutuukirivu bwange tebujjulukukenga. 
23_51_7_Mumpulirize, mmwe abamanyi obutuukirivu, eggwanga eririna amateeka gange mu mutima gwammwe, temutyanga kuvuma kwa bantu, so temukeŋŋentererwanga lwa kuyomba kwabwe. 
23_51_8_Kubanga ennyenje eribaliira ddala ng'ekyambalo, n'enkuyege eribalya ng'ebyoya by'endiga: naye obutuukirivu bwange bunaabeereranga ennaku zonna, n'obulokozi bwange okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
23_51_9_Zuukuka, zuukuka, yambala amaanyi, ggwe omukono gwa Mukama; zuukuka nga mu nnaku ez'edda, mu mirembe egy'ebiro eby'edda. Si ggwe wuuyo eyatemaatema Lakabu, eyafumita ogusota? 
23_51_10_Si ggwe wuuyo eyakaliza ennyanja, amazzi ag'obuziba obuwanvu; eyafuula obuziba bw'ennyanja okuba ekkubo abaanunulibwa okusemokeramu? 
23_51_11_N'abo Mukama be yagula balikomawo ne bajja e Sayuumi n'okuyimba; n'essanyu eritaliggwaawo liriba ku mitwe gyabwe; balifuna essanyu n'okujaguza, ennaku n'okusinda biriddukira ddala. 
23_51_12_Nze, nze mwene, nze nzuuyo abasanyusa: ggwe anni n'okutya n'otya omuntu alifa, n'omwana w'omuntu alifuuka ng'omuddo; 
23_51_13_ne weerabira Mukama Omukozi wo, eyabamba eggulu, n'ateekawo emisingi gy'ensi; n'ozibyanga obudde bulijjo ng'otya olw'obukaali bw'omujoozi, bwe yeeteekateeka okuzikiriza? era buli ludda wa obukaali bw'omujoozi? 
23_51_14_Eyawambibwa eyagobebwa aliteebwa mangu; so talifa n'akka mu bunnya, so n'emmere ye teribula. 
23_51_15_Kubanga nze ndi Mukama Katonda wo asiikuusa ennyanja amayengo gaayo ne gawuluguma: Mukama ow'eggye lye linnya lye. 
23_51_16_Era ntadde ebigambo byange mu kamwa ko, era nkubisseeko mu kisiikirize ky'omukono gwange, ndyoke nsimbe eggulu ne nteekawo emisingi gy'ensi ne rJtlamba Sayuuni nti Ggwe bantu bange. 
23_51_17_Zuukuka, zuukuka, yimirira, ggwe Yerusaalemi, eyanywera mu mukono gwa Mukama ku kikompe eky'obukaali bwe; wanywa ku kibya eky'ekikompe eky'okutagatta n'okikutankira. 
23_51_18_Ku baana bonna be yazaala tekuli wa kumukulembera; so tekuli amukwata ku mukono ku baana bonna beyalera. 
23_51_19_Bino byombi bikuguddeko; ani alikukaabirako? okuzika n'okuzikirira, n'enjala n'ekitala; n'akusanyusa ntya? 
23_51_20_Batabani bo bazirise, bagalamira mu nguudo zonna we zisibuka, ng'engabi mu kitimba; bajjudde obukaali bwa Mukama, okunenya kwa Katonda wo. 
23_51_21_Kale nno kaakano wulira kino, ggwe abonyaabonyezebwa, era atamidde naye si na mweage: 
23_51_22_bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama wo Mukama era Katonda wo awoza ensonga ey'abantu be, nti Laba, nziye mu mukono gwo ekikompe eky'okutagatta, kye kibya eky'ekikompe eky'obukaali bwange; tokyakinywangako lwa kubiri: 
23_51_23_era ndikiteeka mu mukono gw'abo abaakubonyaabonya; abaagamba obulamu bwo nti Kutama tuyiteko: naawe n'oteekawo amabegago ng'ettaka era ng'oluguudo eri abo abayitako. 
23_52_1_Zuukuka, zuukuka, yambala amaanyi go, ggwe Sayuuni; yambala ebyambalo byo eby'obuyonjo, ggwe Yerusaalemi, ekibuga ekitukuvu: kubanga okuva leero temukyayingiranga mu ggwe nate atali mukomole n'atali mulongoofu. 
23_52_2_Weekunkumule enfuufu; golokoka otuule wansi, ggwe Yerusaalemi: weesumulule enjegere ez'omu bulago bwo, ggwe omuwala wa Sayuuni eyanyagibwa. 
23_52_3_Kubanga bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Mwatundirwa bwereere; era mulinunulibwa awatali ffeeza. 
23_52_4_Kubanga bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Olubereberye abantu bange baaserengeta e Misiri okutuulayo: Omwasuli n'abajooga ng'abalanga bwereere. 
23_52_5_Kale nno kaakano nkola ki wano, bw'ayogera Mukama, kubanga abantu bange baatwalirwa bwereere? abo ababafuga bawowoggana, bw'ayogera Mukama, n'erinnya lyange bazibya obudde bulijjo okulivuma. 
23_52_6_Abantu bange kyebaliva bamanya erinnya lyange: kyebaliva bamanya ku lunaku luli nga nze nzuuyo ayogera; laba, nze nzuuno. 
23_52_7_Nga birungi ku nsozi ebigere by'oyo aleeta ebigambo ebirungi, alanga emirembe, aleeta ebigambo ebirungi eby'obulungi, alanga obulokozi; agamba Sayuuni nti Katonda wo afuga! 
23_52_8_Eddoboozi ly'abasajja bo abakuuma! bayimusa eddoboozi, bayimbira wamu; kubanga baliraba eriiso n'eriiso, Mukama bw'alikomawo e Sayuuni. 
23_52_9_Mubaguke okusanyuka, muyimbire wamu, mmwe ebifo eby'e Yerusaalemi ebyazika: kubanga Mukama asanyusizza abantu be, anunudde Yerusaalemi. 
23_52_10_Mukama afungizizza omukono gwe omutukuvu mu maaso g'amawanga gonna; n'enkomerero zonna ez'ensi ziriraba obulokozi bwa Katonda waffe. 
23_52_11_Mugende, mugende, muve omwo, temukomanga ku kintu kyonna ekitali kirongoofu; muve wakati mu ye: mubeerenga balongoofu, mmwe abasitula ebintu bya Mukama. 
23_52_12_Kubanga temulivaamu nga mwanguyiriza so temuligenda nga mudduka: kubanga Mukama alibakulembera; era Katonda wa Isiraeri ye alibasemba. 
23_52_13_Laba, omuweereza wange alikola n'amagezi, aliyimusibwa alisitulibwa, era aligulumira nnyo, 
23_52_14_Ng'abangi bwe baakwewuunya, (amaaso ge gaayonooneka bwe gatyo okusinga omuntu yenna, n'embala ye okusinga abaana b'abantu,) 
23_52_15_bw'atyo bw'alimansira amawanga amangi; bakabaka balibuniza obumwa bwabwe gy'ali: kubanga kye batabuulirwanga balikiraba; ne kye batawuliranga balikitegeera. 
23_53_1_Ani akkiriza ebigambo byaffe: era ani abikkuliddwa omukono gwa Mukama? 
23_53_2_Kubanga yakulira mu maaso ge ng'ekisimbe ekigonvu era ng'ekikolo ekiva mu ttaka ekkalu; talina mbala newakubadde obulungi; era bwe tumulaba, nga tewali na kalungi akatumwegombesa. 
23_53_3_Yanyoomebwa n'agaanibwa abantu; omuntu ow'ennaku era eyamanyiira obuyinike: era ng'omuntu abantu gwe bakweka amaaso gaabwe bwe yanyoomebwa bw'atyo, ne tutamuyitamu ka buntu. 
23_53_4_Mazima yeetikka obuyinike bwaffe n'asitula ennaku zaffe: naye twamulowooza nga yakubibwa yafumitibwa Katonda n'abonyaabo nyezebwa. 
23_53_5_Naye yafumitibwa olw'okusobya kwaffe, yabetentebwa olw'obutali butuukirivu bwaffe: okubonerezebwa okw'emirembe gyaffe kwali ku ye; era emiggo gye gye gituwonya. 
23_53_6_Ffe fenna twawaba ng'endiga; twakyamira buli muntu mu kkubo lye ye; era Mukama atadde ku ye obutali butuukirivu bwaffe fenna. 
23_53_7_Yajoogebwa, naye ne yeetoowaza n'atayasama kamwa ke; ng'omwana gw'endiga ogutwalibwa okuttibwa, era ng'endiga esirika mu maaso g'abo abagisalako ebyoya; weewaawo, teyayasama kamwa ke. 
23_53_8_Yaggibwawo olw'okujoogebwa n'omusango; n'eby'ezzadde lye, ani ku bo eyalowooza nga yazikirizibwa mu nsi ey'abalamu? yakubibwa olw'okusobya kw'abantu bange. 
23_53_9_Ne bamuziikira wamu n'ababi, era n'abagagga mu kufa kwe; newakubadde nga tagiranga kyejo, so nga temuli bukuusa mu kamwa ke. 
23_53_10_Naye Mukama yasiima okumubetenta; amunakuwazizza: bw'ofuulanga obulamu bwe okuba ekiweebwayo olw'ekibi, aliraba ezzadde, alyongera ku nnaku ze, n'ebyo Mukama by'ayagala biriraba omukisa mu mukono gwe. 
23_53_11_Aliraba ku ebyo ebiva mu kulumwa kw'obulamu bwe, era birimumala: olw'okumumanya omuweereza wange omutuukirivu aliweesa bangi obutuukirivu era alyetikka obutali butuukirivu bwabwe. 
23_53_12_Kyendiva mmugabira omugabo wamu n'abakulu, era aligerekera omunyago wamu n'ab'amaanyi; kubanga yafuka obulamu bwe okutuusa ku kufa, n'abairwa wamu n'abasobya: naye yeetikka ekibi ky'abangi, era yawolereza abasobya. 
23_54_1_Yimba, ggwe omugumba, atazaalanga; baguka okuyimba oyogerere waggulu, atalumwanga kuzaala: kubanga abaana b'oyo atalina bba bangi okusinga abaana b'omukazi eyafumbirwa, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_54_2_Gaziya ekifo eky'eweema yo, era babambe amagigi g'ennyumba zo; tokwata mpola: wanvuya emigwa gyo, onyweze enkondo zo. 
23_54_3_Kubanga olyanjaala ku mukono ogwa ddyo ne ku gwa kkono; n'ezzadde lyo lirirya amawanga, era lirituuza abantu mu bibuga ebyalekebwayo. 
23_54_4_Totya: kubanga tolikwatibwa nsonyi: so toswala; kubanga ensonyi tezirikukwata: kubanga olyerabira ensonyi ez'omu buto bwo, n'ekivume ky'obwannamwandu bwo tolikijjukira nate. 
23_54_5_Kuba.nga Omutonzi wo ye balo; Mukama ow'eggye lye linnya lye: era Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri ye mununuzi wo; aliyitibwa Katonda wa nsi zonna. 
23_54_6_Kubanga Mukama akuyise ng'omukazi eyalekebwayo n'omwoyo gwe nga guliko obuyinike, omukazi ow'omu buvubuka, bw'agobebwa, bw'ayogera Katonda wo. 
23_54_7_Akaseera akatono nkuleseewo; naye ndikukutlnaanya n'okusaasira kungi. 
23_54_8_Obusungu obwanjaala nga bunkutte naakukisa amaaso gange akaseera; naye ndikusaasira n'ekisa ekitaliggwaawo, bw'ayogera Mukama omununuzi wo. 
23_54_9_Obusungu obwanjaala nga bunkutte naakukisa amaaso gange akaseera; naye ndikusaasira n'ekisa ekitaliggwaawo, bw'ayogera Mukama omununuzi wo. 
23_54_10_Kubanga ensozi ziri vaawo n'obusozi buliggibwawo; na ye ekisa kyange tekirikuyaako si n'endagaano yange ey'emirembe teriggibwawo, bw'ayogera Mukama akusaasira. 
23_54_11_Ggwe abonyaabonyezebwa asuukundibwa n'omuyaga so tosa nyusibwa, laba, nditeeka amayinj go mu mabala amalungi, ne nsimb emisingi gyo ne safiro. 
23_54_12_N'ebi tikkiro byo ndibikola n'amayinja amatwakaavu, n'enzigi zo ne ka bunkulo, n'ensalo yo yonna n'ama yinja agasanyusa. 
23_54_13_N'abaana bi bonna baliyigirizibwa Mukama; n'e mirembe gy'abaana bo giriba mingi. 
23_54_14_Mu butuukirivu mw'oliyima okunywezebwa: onoobanga wala n'o kujoogebwa, kubanga tolitya; onoobanga wala n'entiisa, kubanga terikusemberera. 
23_54_15_Laba, mpozzi ba likuŋŋaana naye si nze ndibakuŋŋaanya: buli alikukuŋŋaanirako aligwa ku lulwo. 
23_54_16_Laba, natonda omuweesi afukuta omuliro gw'amanda, n'aggyamu ekintu ekikola omulimu gwe; era natonda n'omuzikiriza okufaafaaganya. 
23_54_17_Tewaabenga kya kulwanyisa kye baliweesa oku lwana naawe ekiriraba omukisa; en buli lulimi olulikugolokokerako oku woza naawe olirusinga. Obwo bwi busika obw'abaddu ba Mukama n'obutuukirivu bwabwe obuva gye ndi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_55_1_Mukale, buli muntu alumiddwa ennyonta, mujje eri amazzi, n'oyo atalina bigula; mujje mugule mulye; weewaawo, mujje mugule omwenge n'amata awatali bigula awatali muwendo. 
23_55_2_Lwaki okuwaayo ebigula olw'ebyo ebitali bya kulya? lwaki okuteganira ebyo ebitakkutibwa? mumpulirire ddala nze, mulye ebirungi, obulamu bwa mmwe busanyukire amasavu. 
23_55_3_Mutege amatu gammwe, mujji gye ndi; muwulire, n'obulamu bwa mmwe bunaaba bulamu: nange saalagaana nammwe endagaano eteriggwaawo, kwe kusaasira kwa Dawudi okw'enkalakkalira. 
23_55_4_Laba, mmuwaddeyo okuba omujulirwa eri amawanga, omukulu era omugabe eri amawanga. 
23_55_5_Laba, oliyita eggwanga lye wali tomanyi, era eggwanga eryali terikumanyi liriddukira gy'oli, ku lwa Mukama Katonda wo ne ku lw'Omutukuvu wa Isiraeri; kubanga akugulumisizza. 
23_55_6_Munoonye Mukama nga bw'akyayinzika okulabika, mumukaabirire nga bw'akyali okumpi: 
23_55_7_omubi aleke ekkubo lye, n'omuntu atali mutuukirivu aleke ebirowoozo bye: era akomewo eri Mukama, naye anaamusaasira; adde eri Katonda waffe, kubanga anaasonyiyira ddala nnyo. 
23_55_8_Kubanga ebirowoozo byange si birowoozo byammwe, so n'amakubo gammwe si makubo gange, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_55_9_Kuba eggulu nga bwe lisinga ensi obugulumivu, amakubo gange bwe gasinga bwe gatyo amakubo gammwe, n'ebirowoozo byange ebi owoozo byammwe. 
23_55_10_Kuba enkuba nga bw'ekka n'omuzira okuva mu ggulu, ne bitaddayo, naye ne bifukirira ettaka, ne birimeza ne biribaza, ne biwa omusizi ensigo n'omuli ebyokulya; 
23_55_11_bwe kityo me kinaabanga ekigambo kyange ekiva mu kamwa kange: tekiridda gye ndi nga kyereere, naye kirikola kyo kye njagala, era kiriraba omuisa mu ekyo kye nnakitumirira. 
23_55_12_Kubanga mulifuluma n'essanyu, nulitwalibwa n'emirembe okuvaayo: nsozi n'obusozi ziribaguka okuyinba mu maaso gammwe, n'emiti yonna egy'oku ttale girikuba mu agalo. 
23_55_13_Mu kifo ky'omweramanyo mulimera olusambya, ne mu ifo ky'omutovu mulimera omunwanyi: era kiriba eri Mukama erinnya, akabonero akataliggwaawo kataliggibwawo. 
23_56_1_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Mukwatenga eby'ensonga, mukolenga eby'obutuukirivu: kubanga obulokozi bwange bunaatera kujja, n'obutuukirivu bwange buaatera okubikkulibwa. 
23_56_2_Alina mukisa omuntu akola ekyo, n'omwana w'omuntu akinyweza; akwata ssabbiiti obutagyonoona, n'akuuma omukono gwe obutakola bubi bwonna. 
23_56_3_So ne munnaggwanga eyeegatta ne Mukama tayogeranga nti Mukama talirema kunjawula n'abantu be: so n'omulaawe tayogeranga nti Laba, ndi muti mukalu. 
23_56_4_Kubanga bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama w'abalaawe abakwata ssabbiiti zange, ne beeroboza ebyo bye nsanyukira, ne banyweza endagaano yange. 
23_56_5_nti Abo be ndiwa ekijjukizo n'erinnya erisinga ery'abaana ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala mu nnyumba ne munda w'ebisenge byange; ndibawa erinnya eritaliggwaawo eritaliggibwawo. 
23_56_6_Era ne bannaggwanga abeegatta ne Mukama, okumuweerezanga, n'okwagalanga erinnya lya Mukama, okuba abaddu be, buli muntu akwata ssabbiiti obutagyonoona, n'anyweza endagaano yange 
23_56_8_Mukama Katonda akuŋŋaanya aba Isiraeri abaagobebwa ayogera nti Oliboolyawo ne mmukuŋŋaanyiza n'abalala, obutassaako babe abakuŋŋaanyizibbwa. 
23_56_9_Mmwe mwenna ensolo ez'omu nsiko, mujje okulya, mmwe mwenna ensolo ez'omu kibira. 
23_56_10_Abakuumi be bazibe be maaso, bonna tebalina kumanya; bonna mbwa nsirusiru, tebayinza kuboggola; nga baloota, nga bagalamira, nga baa gala okubongoota. 
23_56_11_Weewaawo, embwa za mululu, teziyinza kukkuta ennaku zonna; ne bano basumba abatayinza kutegeera; bonna bakyamidde mu kkulzo lyabwe bo, buli muntu eri amagoba ge, okuva mu njuyi zonna. 
23_56_12_Boogera nti Mujje, naakima omwenge, ne twekamirira ekitamiiza; n'olw'enkya luliba ng'olwa leero, olukulu olutenkanikika. 
23_57_1_Omutuukirivu azikirira, so tewali akissaako omwoyo; n'abantu ab'ekisa baggibwawo, nga tewali alowooza ng'omutuukirivu aggibwa mu bubi obugenda okujja. 
23_57_2_Ayingira mu mirembe; bawummulira ku bitanda byabwe, buli muntu atambulira mu bugolokofu bwe. 
23_57_3_Naye musembere wano, mmwe batabani b'omukazi omulogo, ezzadde ly'omwenzi n'omukazi omutambuzi. 
23_57_4_Muzannyira ku ani? ani gwe mukongoola ne mumusoomoza? temuli baana be kusobya, zzadde lya bulimba, 
23_57_5_mmwe abeereetera okwegomba mu mivule, wansi wa buli muti ogumera; abattira abaana mu biwonvu wansi w'enjatika z'enjazi? 
23_57_6_Mu mayinja amaweweevu ag'omu kiwonvu we wali omugabo gwo; ago, ago kye kitundu kyo: ago ge wafuukira ekiweebwayo ekyokunywa, ge wawa ekirabo. Ndiwooyawooyezebwa ebyo nga bibaddewo? 
23_57_7_Ku lusozi oluwanvu olugulumivu kwe wasimba ekitanda kyo: era eyo gye walinnyanga okuwaayo ssaddaaka. 
23_57_8_Era wasimba ekijjukizo kyo ennyuma w'enzigi n'emifuubeeto: kubanga weebikkulidde omulala atali nze, era olinnye; ogaziyizza ekitanda kyo ne weeragaanira endagaano nabo; wayagala ekitanda kyabwe gye wakirabira. 
23_57_9_N'ogenda eri kabaka ng'olina amafuta ag'omugavu, n'oyongera kalifuwa wo, n'otuma wale. ababaka bo, ne weetoowaza okutuusa ne mu magombe. 
23_57_10_Olugendo lwo lwayinga obunene ne lukukooya; naye n'otoyogera nti Tewali ssuubi: walaba ekyakuzzaamu amaanyi; kyewava olema okuzirika. 
23_57_11_Era ani gwe watya n'otekemuka n'okulimba n'olimba n'otonjijukira nze, so tokissanga ku mwoyo? obw'edda saasirika busirisi, naawe n'otontya? 
23_57_12_Ndibuulira obutuukirivu bwo, n'ebikolwa byo nabyo tebirikugasa. 
23_57_13_Bw'okaaba, abo be wakuŋŋaanya bakulokole; naye empewo eribatwala, omukka gulibaggirawo ddala bonna: naye oyo aneesiga nze ye alirya ensi, era ye alisikira olusozi olutukuvu. 
23_57_14_Era alyogera nti Mugulumize, mugulumize, mulongoose ekkubo, muggye enkonge mu kkubo ly'abantu bange. 
23_57_15_Kubanga bw'atyo bw'ayogera oyo ali waggulu omugulumivu atuula mu butaliggwaawo, erinnya lye Mutukuvu, nti Ntuula mu kifo ekigulumivu ekitukuvu, era wamu n'oyo alina omwoyo oguboneredde omukkakkamu, okulamya omwoyo gw'abakkakkamu, n'okulamya omutima gw'abo ababoneredde. 
23_57_16_Kubanga siriwakana ennaku zonna, so sirisunguwala emirembe gyonna: kubanga omwoyo gwandiggweereddewo mu maaso gange, n'emmeeme ze nnakola. 
23_57_17_Olw'omululu gwe ogutali gwa butuukirivu kyennava nsunguwala ne mmukuba, nakweka amaaso gange ne nsunguwala: ne yeeyongera okugenda mu maaso ng'abambaala mu kkubo ly'omutima gwe. 
23_57_18_Ndabye amakubo ge; era ndimuwonya: n'okuluŋŋamya ndimuluŋŋamya, ne mmuddiza ebisanyusa ye n'abo abamukaabirako. 
23_57_19_Nze ntonda ebibala eby'emimwa: Emirembe, emirembe eri oyo ali ewala n'eri oyo ali okumpi, bw'ayogera Mukama; nange ndimuwonya. 
23_57_20_Naye ababi baliŋŋanga ennyanja esiikuuka; kubanga teyinza kuteeka, n'amazzi gaayo gasiikuuka ebitosi n'ebisasiro. 
23_57_21_Tewali mirembe, bw'ayogera Katonda wange, eri ababi. 
23_58_1_Yogerera waggulu, tota, yimusa eddoboozi lyo ng'ekkondeere, obuulire abantu bange okusobya kwabwe, n'ennyumba ya Yakobo ebibi byabwe. 
23_58_2_Naye bannoonya bulijjo, era basanyuka okumanya amakubo gange: ng'eggwanga eryakolanga eby'obutuukirivu, ne bataleka kiragiro kya Katonda waabwe, bansaba ebiragiro eby'obutuukirivu; basanyuka okusemberera Katonda. 
23_58_3_Lwaki ffe okusiiba, bwe boogera, naawe n'otolaba? lwaki ffe okubonyaabonya obulamu bwaffe, naawe n'otokissaa ko mwoyo? Laba, ku lunaku olw'okusiiba kwammwe kwe mulabira essanyu lyammwe mmwe, n'emirimu gyammwe gyonna nga mukoze n'amaanyi. 
23_58_4_Laba, musiibira ennyombo n'okuwakana, n'okukuba ekikonde eky'ettima: temusiiba leero bwe mutyo n'okuwuliza ne muwuliza eddoboozi lyammwe mu ggulu. 
23_58_5_Okusiiba kwe nnalonda bwe kufaanana bwe kutyo? Olunaku omuntu lw'abonyezabonyezaako obulamu bwe? Kwe kukutamya omutwe ng'olulago, n'okwaliira ebibukutu n'evvu wansi we? ekyo ky'ojaooyita okusiiba, era olunaku Mukama lw'asiima? 
23_58_6_Kuno si kwe kusiiba kwe nnalonda? okusumulula ebisiba eby'ekyejo, okufunduukulula emigwa egy'ekikoligo, n'okuteera ddala abajoogebwa, era mumenye buli kikoligo? 
23_58_7_Si kugabira bayala emmere yo, n'oleeta abaavu abagobebwa mu nnyumba yo? bw'olabanga ali obwereere n'omwambaza; n'oteekisa mubiri gwo ggwe? 
23_58_8_Kale omusana gwo ne gulyoka gusala ng'emmambya, n'okuwona kwo ne kwanguwa okujja: n'obutuukirivu bwo bulikukulembera; ekitiibwa kya Mukama kye kirikusemba. 
23_58_9_N'olyoka oyita Mukama n'ayitaba; olikaaba naye alyogera nti Nze nzuuno. Bw'onoggya wakati wo ekikoligo, okulaga olunwe, n'okwogera obubi; 
23_58_10_n'omuggirawo omuyala obulamu bwo, n'okkusa obulamu obubonyaabonyezebwa; kale omusana gwo ne gulyoka guviirayo mu kizikiza, n'ekifu kyo kiriba ng'ettuntu: 
23_58_11_era Mukama anaakuluŋŋamyanga ennaku zonna, n'akkusa obulamu bwo mu bifo ebikalu n'anyweza amagumba go; naawe onoobanga ng'olusuku olufukirirwa amazzi era ng'oluzzi lw'amazzi olutaggwaamu mazzi. 
23_58_12_N'abo abalikuvaamu balizimba ebifo eby'edda ebyazika: olizza emisingi egy'emirembe emingi: era oliyitibwa nti Muzibi wa kituli, Muzza wa makubo ga kutuulamu. 
23_58_13_Bw'onookyusanga ekigere kyo okuva ku ssabbiiti obutakolanga by'oyagala ggwe ku lunaku lwange olutukuvu; ssabbiiti n'ogiyita essanyu, olunaku lwa Mukama olutukuvu olw'ekitiibwa; n'ogissangamu ekitiibwa, nga tokwata makubo go ggwe, so nga tonoonya by'oyagala ggwe, era nga toyogera bigambo byo ggwe: 
23_58_14_kale n'olyoka osanyukira Mukama; nange ndikwebagaza ku bifo ebigulumivu eby'ensi; era ndikuliisa obusika bwa Yakobo kitaawo: kubanga akamwa ka Mukama ke kakyogedde. 
23_59_1_Laba, omukono gwa Mukama teguyimpawadde n'okuyinza ne gutayinza kulokola; so n'okutu kwe tekumuggadde n'okuyinza ne kutayinza ku wulira: 
23_59_2_naye obutali butuukirivu bwammwe bwe bwawudde mmwe ne Katonda wammwe, n'ebibi byammwe bye bimukwesezza amaaso, n’atayagala kuwulira. 
23_59_3_Kubanga emikono gammwe gyonoonese n'omusaayi, engalo zammwe n'obutali butuukirivu; emimwa gyammwe gyogedde eby'obulimba, olulimi lwammwe luvulungutana eby'ekyejo. 
23_59_4_Tewali awaab: eby'ensonga so tewali awoza eby'a. mazima: beesiga obutaliimu ne boogera eby'obulimba; baba mbuto za bubi ne bazaala obutali butuukirivu. 
23_59_5_Baalula amagi ag'essala. mbwa ne baluka engoye eza nnabbubi: alya ku magi gaabwe afa n'ekyo ekibetentebwa ne kiwamatukamu embalasaasa. 
23_59_6_ngoye zaabwe tezirifuuka byambalo, so tebalyebikka mirimu gyabwe: emirimu gyabwe mirimu gya butali butuukirivu, n'ekikolwa eky'ekyejo kiri mu ngalo zaabwe. 
23_59_7_Ebigere byabwe bidduka mbiro okugoberera obubi, era banguya okuyiwa omusaayi ogutaliiko musango: ebi rowoozo byabwe birowoozo bya butali butuukirivu; okuzika n'oku zikirizibwa kuba mu makubo gaabwe. 
23_59_8_Ekkubo ery'emirembe tebalimanyi; so mu magenda gaabwe temuli musango: beekubidde amakubo amakyamu; buli atambulira omwo tamanyi mirembe. 
23_59_9_Omusango kyeguva gutubeera ewala, so n'obutuukirivu tebututuukako: tusuubira omusana, naye ne tulaba kizikiza; tusuubira okumasamasa naye ne tutambulira mu kifu. 
23_59_10_Tuwammanta ekisenge ng'abazibe b'amaaso, weewaawo, tuwammanta ng'abo abatalina maaso twesitala mu ttuntu ng'ekiro; mabo abalina amaanyi tuliŋŋanga abafu. 
23_59_11_Fenna tuwuluguma ng'eddubu, ne tuwuubaala nnyo ng bukaamukuukulu: tusuubira omu sango naye nga tewali; tusuubira obulokozi, naye butuli wala. 
23_59_12_Kubanga okusobya kwaffe kwe yongedde mu maaso go, n'ebibi byaffe be bajulirwa gye tuli: kubanga okusobya kwaffe kuli naffe, n’obutali butuukirivu bwaffe nabwo tubumanyi: 
23_59_13_nga tusobya era nga twegaana Mukama, era nga kukyuka obutagoberera Katonda waffe, nga twogera eby'okujooga n’eby'okujeema, nga tugunja ebigambo eby'obulimba era nga tubyogera okuva mu mutima. 
23_59_14_N'omusango gukyusibwa okudda ennyuma, n'obutuukirivu buyimirira wala: kubanga amazima gagwiridde mu luguudo, so n'obugolokofu tebuyinza kuyingira. 
23_59_15_Weewaawo, amaima gabuze; n'oyo ava mu bubi yeefuula munyago: Mukama n'akiraba n'anyiiga obutabaawo musango. 
23_59_16_N'alaba nga tewali muntu, ne yeewuunya obutabaawo muwoleeza: omukono gwe ye kyegwava gumuleetera obulokozi; n'obutuukirivu bwe bwe bwamuwanirira. 
23_59_17_N'ayambala obutuukirivu ng'ey'omu kifuba, n'enkuufiira ey'obulokozi ku mutwe gwe; n'ayambaa engoye ez'okuwalana eggwanga okuba ebyambalo, n'ayambaibwa obunyiikivu ng'omunagiro. 
23_59_18_Ng'ebikolwa byabwe bwe biriba, M'atyo bw'alisasula, abamukyawa libasasula ekiruyi, abamukyawa aliiasasula empeera; alisasula ebizinga mpeera. 
23_59_19_Kale balitya erinnya ya Mukama okuva ebugwanjuba, n’ekitiibwa kye okuva ebuvanjuba: kubanga alijja ng'omugga ogukulukuta n'amaanyi, ogutwalibwa a'onukka gwa Mukama. 
23_59_20_Era omununuzi alijja e Sayuuni n'eri abo bakyuka okuva mu kusobya mu Yakobo, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_59_21_Nange eno y'endagaano yange gye ndagaana nabo, bw'ayogera Mukama: omwoyo gwange oguli ku ggwe n'ebigambo byange bye ntadde mu kamwa ko tebiivenga mu kamwa ko newakubadde mu kamwa k'ezzadde lyo newakubadde mu kamwa k'ezzadde ly'ezzadde lyo, bw'ayogera Mukama, okusooka kaakano n'emirembe n'emirembe. 
23_60_1_Golokoka, yaka; kubanga omusana gwo gutuuse, n'ekiubwa kya Mukama kikuviiriddeyo. 
23_60_2_Kubanga, laba, ekizikiza kiribikka ku nsi n'ekizikiza ekikutte kiribikka ku mawanga: naye Mukama alikuviirayo n'ekitiibwa kye kirirabikira ku ggwe. 
23_60_3_N'amawanga galijja eri omusana gwo, ne bakabaka balijja eri okumasamasa kwo ng'ovaayo. 
23_60_4_Yimusa amaaso go omagemage olabe: bonna beekuŋŋaanyizza wamu, bajja gy'oli: batabani bo balijja nga bava wala, ne bawala bo baliweekerwa ku mbiriizi. 
23_60_5_Awo n'olyoka olaba n'oyakirwa, n'omutima gwo gulikankana ne gugaziyizibwa; kubanga obusukkirivu obuli mu nnyanja bulikyusibwa gy'oli, obugagga obw'amawanga bulikujjira. 
23_60_6_Olufulube lw'eŋŋamira lulikubikkako, eŋŋamira eze Midiyaani ne Efa; bonna balijja nga bava e Seeba: balireeta ezaabu n'omugavu ne balanga amatendo ga Mukama. 
23_60_7_Endiga zonna eza Kedali zirikuŋŋaanyizibwa gy'oli, endiga ennume eza Nebayoosi zirikuweereza: zinaalinnyanga ku kyoto kyange ne zikkirizibwa, era ndissaamu ekitubwa ennyumba ey'ekitiibwa kyange. 
23_60_8_Bano be baani ababuuka ng'ekire era nga bukaamukuukulu eri ebituli byabwo? 
23_60_9_Mazima ebizinga birinnindirira, n'ebyombo eby'e Talusiisi bye birisooka, okuleeta batabani bo okubaggya ewala, effeeza yaabwe n'ezaabu yaabwe wamu nabo, olw'erinnya lya Mukama Katonda wo n'olw'Omutukuvu owa Isiraeri, kubanga ye yakussizzaamu ekitiibwa. 
23_60_10_Era bannaggwanga balizimba enkomera zo ne bakabaka baabwe balikuweereza: kubanga nakukuba nga nkwatiddwa busungu, naye nkusaasidde nga nkwatiddwa kisa. 
23_60_11_Era n'enzigi zo ziaaabanga si nzigale bulijjo; teziggalwengawo misana n'ekiro; abantu bakuleeterenga obugagga obw'amawanga ne bakabaka baabwe nga bawambe. 
23_60_12_Kubanga eggwanga eryo n'obwakabaka abatalikkiriza kukuweereza baliggwaawo; weewaawo, amawanga ago galizikiririzibwa ddala. 
23_60_13_Ekitiibwa kya Lebanooni kirikujjira, enfugo n'omuyovu ne namukago wamu; okuwoomya ekifo eky'awatukuvu wange, era ndifuula ekifo eky'ebigere byange okuba eky'ekitiibwa. 
23_60_14_N'abaana b'abo abaakujooganga balijja nga bakukutaamirira; n'abo bonna abaakunyoomanga balivuunama awali ebigere byo; ne bakuyita kibuga kya Mukama, Sayuuni eky'Omutukuvu owa Isiraeri. 
23_60_15_Kubanga walekebwa n'okyayibwa ne wataba muntu ayita mu ggwe, ndikufuula okuba obulungi obungi obutaliggavaawo, essanyu ery'emirembe emingi. 
23_60_16_N'okuyonka oliyonka amata ag'amawanga, era oliyonka amabeere ga bakabaka: era olimanya nga nze Mukama ndi mulokozi wo era mununuzi wo, Owaamaanyi owa Yakobo. 
23_60_17_Mu kifo ky'ekikomo ndireeta zaabu ne mu kifo lry'ekyuma ndireeta ffeeza, ne mu kifo ky'omuti ndireeta kikomo, ne mu kifo ky'amayinja ndireeta kyuma: era. ndifuula abaami bo okuba emirembe n'abakusolooza okuba obutuukirivu. 
23_60_18_Ekyejo tekiriwulirwa nate mu nsi yo, newakubadde okuzika newakubadde okuzikirira mu nsalo zo; naye oliyita enkomera zo Bulokozi n'enzigi zo Kutendereza. 
23_60_19_Enjuba si yeeneebanga nate omusana gwo emisana; so n'omwezi si gwe gunaakwakiranga olw'okumasamasa: naye Mukama ye anaabeeranga gy'oli omusana ogutaliggwaawo, era Katonda wo ye anaabanga ekitiibwa kyo. 
23_60_20_Enjuba yo terigwa nate lwa kubiri so n'omwezi gwo tegulyegendera: kubanga Mukama ye anaabanga omusana gwo ogutaliggwaawo, n'ennaku ez'okukungubaga kwo ziriba nga ziweddewo. 
23_60_21_Era n'abantu bo banaabanga batuukirivu bonna, balisikira ensi okutuusa emirembe gyonna; ettabi nze lye nnasimba, omulimu gw'engalo zange ndyoke mpeebwe ekitiibwa. 
23_60_22_Omuto alifuuka lukumi n'omutono alifuuka ggwanga lya maanyi: nze Mukama ndikyanguya ebiro byakyo nga bituuse. 
23_61_1_Omwoyo gwa Mukama Katonda guli ku nze; kubanga Mukama anfuseeko amafuta okiubuulira abawombeefu ebigambo ebirungi; antumye okusiba abalina emitima egimenyese, okulangirira eddembe eri abawambe, n’abasibe okuggulirwawo ekkomera 
23_61_4_Kale balizimba ebyazika eby'edda, baliyimusa amatongo agaasooka okubaawo, era baliddaabiriza ebibuga ebyazika, amatongo ag'emirembe emingi. 
23_61_5_Era bannaggwanga baliyimirira ne baliisa endiga zammwe, n'abagenyi be banaabalimiranga be banaabalo ngooserezanga emizabbibu. 
23_61_6_Naye mmwe muliyitibwa bakabona ba Mukama: abantu balibayita baweereza ba Katonda waffe: mulirya obugagga obw'amawanga, ne mu kitiibwa kyabwe mwe mulyenyumiririza. 
23_61_7_Mu kifo ky'ensonyi zammwe muliweebwa emirundi ebiri; ne mu kifo ky'okuswala balisanyukira omugabo gwabwe: kyebaliva babeera n'emirundi ebiri mu nsi yaabwe: baliba n'essanyu eritaliggwaawo. 
23_61_8_Kubanga nze Mukama njagala omusango ogw'ensonga, nkyawa okunyaga wamu n'obutali butuukirivu; era ndibawa empeera yaabwe ng'amazima bwe gali, era ndiragaana nabo endagaano etaliggwaawo. 
23_61_9_N'ezzadde lyabwe lirimanyibwa mu mawanga, n'enda yaabwe mu bantu: bonna abaabalabanga balibakkiriza ng'abo ly'ezzadde Mukama ly'awadde omukisa. 
23_61_10_Naasanyukiranga nnyo Mukama, emmeeme yange eneesanyukiranga Katonda wange; kubanga annyambazizza ebyambalo eby'obulokozi, ambisseeko omunagiro ogw'obutuukirivu, ng'awasa omugole bwe yeeyonja n'engule, era ng'omugole bwe yeewoomya n'ebyobuyonjo bwe. 
23_61_11_Kuba ng'ettaka bwe lisansuza ekimuli kyalyo, era ng'olusuku bwe lumeza ebyo ebisigibwa mu lwo; bw'atyo Mukama Katonda bw'alimeza obutuukirivu n'okutendereza mu maaso g'amawanga gonna. 
23_62_1_Ku lwa Sayuuni kyendiva nnema okusirika ne ku lwa Yerusaalemi kyendiva nnema okuwummula, okutuusa obutuukirivu bwe lwe bulifuluma ng'okumasamasa, n'obulokozi bwe ng'ettabaaza eyaka. 
23_62_2_Kale amawanga galiraba obutuukirivu bwo, ne bakabaka bonna ekitiibwa kyo: awo olituumibwa erinnya eriggya akamwa ka Mukama lye kalituuma. 
23_62_3_Era oliba ngule ya bulungi mu mukono gwa Mukama, n'enkuufiira ey'obwakabaka mu mukono gwa Katonda wo. 
23_62_4_Toliyitibwa nate lwa kubiri nti Alekeddwa; so n'ensi yo teriyitibwa nate nti Eyazika: naye oliyitibwa nti Gwe nsanyukira, n'ensi yo eriyitibwa nti Eyafiunbirwa: kubanga Mukama akusanyukira, n'ensi yo erifumbirwa. 
23_62_5_Kuba omulenzi nga bw'awasa omuwala, bwe batyo batabani bo bwe balikuwasa: era ng'awasa omugole bw'asanyukira omugole, bw'atyo Katonda wo bw'alikusanyukira. 
23_62_6_Ntadde abakuumi ku bbugwe wo, ggwe Yerusaalemi; tebalisirika n'akatono emisana n'ekiro: mmwe abajjukiza ba Mukama, temuwummulanga, 
23_62_7_so temumuganyanga kuwummula, okutuusa lw'alinyweza n’afuula Yerusaalemi okuba ettendo mu nsi. 
23_62_8_Mukama alayidde omukono gwe ogwa ddyo n'omukono ogw'amaanyi ge nti Mazima siriwaayo nate eŋŋaano yo okuba emmere y'abalabe bo; so ne bannaggwanga tebalinywa mwenge gwo gwe wakolera emirimu: 
23_62_9_naye abaagikungula be baligirya ne batendereza Mukama; n'abo abaagunoga be baligunywera mu mpya ez'omu watukuvu wange. 
23_62_10_Muyite, muyite mu nzigi; mulongoose ekkubo ery'abantu; mugulumize mugulumize enguudo; mulondemu amayinja; muyimusize amawanga ebendera. 
23_62_11_Laba, Mukama alangiridde enkomerero y'ensi nti Mugambe omuwala wa Sayuuni nti Laba, obulokozi bwo bujja; laba empeera ye eri naye n'okusasula kwe kuli mu maaso ge. 
23_62_12_Era balibayita nti Bantu batukuvu, Banunule ba Mukama: naawe oliyitibwa nti Eyanoonyezebwa, Kibuga ekitalekebwa. 
23_63_1_1 Ani ono ava mu Edomu, ng'alina ebyambalo ebinnyike m ddagala ng'ava e Bozula? ono alin engoye ez'ekitiibwa, ng'atambuza amaanyi ge amangi? Nze ayogera obutuukirivu, ow'amaanyi okulokola. 
23_63_2_Obeeredde ki omumyufu m byambalo byo, engoye zo ne zifaa nana oyo asambira mu ssogolero? 
23_63_3_Nsambye essogolero omu nzekka so ku mawanga tekwali n'omu eyali awamu nange: weewaawo, nabasamba mu busungu bwange ne mbalinnyirira mu kiruyi kyange n'omusaayi ogw'obulamu bwabwe gumansukidde ku byambalo byange era engoye zange zonna zijjudde amabala. 
23_63_4_Kubanga olunaku olw'okuwalanirwako eggwanga lwali mu mutima gwange, n'omwaka ogw'abanunule bange gutuuse. 
23_63_5_Ne mmagamaga ne wataba mu yambi; ne nneewuunya obutabaawi wa kuwanirira: omukono gwangwe nze kyegwava gundeetera obulokozi n'ekiruyi kyange kye kyampanirira. 
23_63_6_Ne nninnyirira amawanga wansi mu busungu bwange, ne mbatamiiza ku kiruyi kyange, ne nfuka ku ttaka omusaayi ogw'obulamu bwabwe. 
23_63_7_Naayogera ku bikolwa bya Mukama eby'ekisa ekingi n'amatendo go Mukama, nga byonna bwe biri by'atuwadde Mukama; n'obulungi obungi obuli eri ennyumba ya Isiraeri, bw'abawadde ng'okusaasira kwe bwe kuli era ng'olufulube bwe luli olw'ebikolwa bye eby'ekisa ekingi. 
23_63_8_Kubanga yayogera nti Mazima be bantu bange, abaana abatalikuusakuusa: kale n'aba mulokozi waabwe. 
23_63_9_Yabonyaabonyezebwa mu kubonyaabonyezebwa kwabwe kwonna, ne malayika ali mu maaso ge yabalokolanga: mu kwagala kwe ne mu kusaasira kwe yabanunula; n'abasitulanga n'abeetikkiranga ennaku zonna ez'edda. 
23_63_10_Naye ne bajeema ne banakuwaze omwoyo gwe omutukuvu: kyeyava akyuka okuba omulabe waabwe; n'alwana nabo ye yennyini. 
23_63_11_Awo n'alyoka ajjukira ennaku ez'edda, Musa n'abantu be, ng'ayogera nti Ali ludda wa oyo eyabalinnyisa ng'abaggya mu nnyanja wamu n'abasumba b'endiga ze? ali ludda wa oyo eyateeka omwoyo gwe omutukuvu wakati mu bo? 
23_63_12_eyatambuzanga omukono gwe gw'ekitiibwa awali omukono ogwa ddyo ogwa Musa? eyayawulamu mazzi mu maaso gaabwe okwekolera erinnya eritaliggwaawo? 
23_63_13_eyabayisa mu buziba, ng'embaalasi mu ddungu, obuteesittala? 
23_63_14_Ng'ente bwe ziba ezikka mu kiwonvu, omwoyo gwa Mukama gwabawummuzanga bwe gutyo: bwe watwala bw'otyo abantu bo okwekolera erinnya ery'ekitiibwa. 
23_63_15_Tunula ng'oyima mu ggulu, olabe ng'oyima mu nnyumba ey'obutukuvu bwo n'ekitiibwa kyo: buli ludda wa obunyiikivu bwo n'ebikolwa byo eby'amaanyi? okwagala w'emmeeme yo n'okusaasira kwo kuziyizibwa gye ndi. 
23_63_16_Kubanga gwe Kitaffe, newakubadde nga bulayimu tatumanyi so ne Isiraeri ga tatvkkiriza: ggwe, ai Mukama, gwe Kitaffe; omununuzi waffe kuva emirembe n'emirembe lye innya lyo. 
23_63_17_Ai Mukama, lwaki gwe okutukyamya mu makubo go n'okakanyaza omutima gwaffe butakutya? Komawo ku lw'abaddu bo, ebika eby'obusika bwo. 
23_63_18_Abantu bo abatukuvu baabulina aseera buseera kaseera buseera: balabe baffe balinnyiridde awatuuvu wo. 
23_63_19_Tufuuse ng'abo b'otofuganga; ng'abo abatatuumibwuga linnya lyo. 
23_64_1_Singa oyuzizza eggulu, singa osse ensozi ne zikulukuta lw'okujja kwo 
23_64_3_Bwe wakola by'entiisa bye tutasuubiranga, waka, ensozi ne zikulukuta olw'okujja wo. 
23_64_4_Kubanga obw'edda abantu tebaawuliranga so n'okutu tekubateeezanga so n'eriiso terirabanga Katonda wabula ggwe akolera omumu oyo amulindirira. 
23_64_5_Osisinkaa n'oyo asanyuka n'akola eby'obutuukirivu, abo abakujjukira mu maubo go: laba, wasunguwala naffe ne vonoona: obw'edda twabeeranga mu ebyo, n'okulokoka tulirokoka? 
23_64_6_Kubanga fenna tufuuse ng'atali mulongoofu, n'ebikolwa byaffe byonna eby'obutuukirivu biriŋŋanga ekyambalo ekikongedde: era fenna tuwotoka ng'olulagala; n'obutali butuukirivu bwaffe bututwalira ddala ag'empewo. 
23_64_7_So tewali asaba linnya lyo, eyeekakaabiriza okukukwatako: kubanga otukisizza amaaso! go n'otumalawo olw'obutali butuukirivu bwaffe. 
23_64_8_Naye kaakano, ai Mukama, ggwe kitaffe; ffe tuli bbumba, naawe mubumbi waffe; naffe fenna tuli mulimu gwa mukono gwo. 
23_64_9_Tosunguwala nnyo nnyini, ai Mukama, so tojjukira butali butuukirivu enaaku zonna: laba, tunula, tukwegayiridde, ffe fenna tuli bantu bo. 
23_64_10_Ebibuga byo ebitukuvu bifuuse ddungu, Sayuuni kifuuse ddungu, Yerusaalemi matongo. 
23_64_11_Ennyumba yaffe entukuw ennungi, bajjajjaffe mwe baakutendererezanga, eyokeddwa omuliro; n'ebintu byaffe byonna eby'okwesiima bifaafaaganye. 
23_64_12_Olizibiikiriza ebyo aga bimaze okubaawo, ai Mukama olisirika n'otubonyaabonya nnyo nnyini? 
23_65_1_Mbuuzibwako abo abatambuuzaagako; ndabiddwa abo abatannoonyanga: nagamba nti Nda ba, ndaba, eri eggwanga eritatuumibwanga linnya lyange. 
23_65_2_Ngololedde emikono gyange okuzibya obudde abantu abajeemu abatambulira mu kkubo eritali ddungi, okugoberera ebirowoozo byabwe bo 
23_65_6_Laba, kiwandiikiddwa mu maaso gange: sirisirika, naye ndisasula, weewaawo, ndisasula mu kifuba byabwe 
23_65_7_obutali butuukirivu bwammwe mmwe n'obutali butuukirivu bwa bajjajjammwe wamu, bw'ayogera Mukama, abaayoterezanga obubaane ku asozi ne banzivoolera ku busozi: kyendiva nsooka okugera omulimu gwabwe mu kifuba kyabwe. 
23_65_8_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Ng'omwenge omusu bwe gulabikira mu kirimba, ne wabaswo eyogera ati Tokizikiriza kubanga mulimu omukisa: bwe ntyo bwe ndikola ku lw'abaddu bange aneme okubazikiriza bonna. 
23_65_9_Era ndiggya ezzadde mu Yakobo ne mu Yuda ndiggyamu alisikira ensozi zange: n'abalonde bange baligisikira n'abaddu bange balituula omwo. 
23_65_10_Awo Saloni kiriba kisibo kya ndiga, n'ekiwonw kya Akoli kiriba kifo ente we zigalamira, olw'abantu bange abannoonyezza. 
23_65_11_Naye mmwe abaleka Mukama, abeerabira olusozi lwange olutukuvu, abategekera Mukisa emmeeza, abajjuliza Kuteekawo omwenge omutabule; 
23_65_12_nze ndibateekerawo ekitala, nammwe mwenaa mulikutama okuttibwa: kubanga bwe nnayita tomwayitaba; bwe nnayogera temwawulira; naye ne mukola ekyali ekibi mu maaso gange ne mulonda ekyo kye ssaasanyukira. 
23_65_13_Kyava ayogera bw'ati Mukama Katonda nti Laba, abaddu bange balirya, naye mmwe mulirumwa njala: laba, abaddu bange balinywa, naye mmwe mulirumwa nnyonta: laba, abaddu bange balisanyuka, naye mmwe muliswala: 
23_65_14_laba, abaddu bange baliyimba omutima gwabwe aga gusanyuse, naye mmwe mulikaaba omutima gwammwe nga gunakuwadde ne muwowoggana omwoyo gwammwe nga gulumiddwa. 
23_65_15_Era mulirekera abalonde bange erinnya lyammwe okitba ekikolimo, era Mukama Katonda alikutta; n'atuuma abaddu be erinnya eddala: 
23_65_16_eyeesabira omukisa mu nsi kyanaavanga yeesabira omukisa eri Katonda ow'amazima; n'oyo alayira mu nsi anaalayiranga Katonda ow'amazuna; kubanga obuyinike obwasooka bwerabiddwa, era kubanga bukwekeddwa amaaso gange. 
23_65_17_Kubanga, laba, ntonda eggulu eriggya n'ensi empya: so ebintu ebyasooka tebirijjukirwa so tebiriyingira mu mwoyo. 
23_65_18_Naye musanyuke mujagulize ennaku zonna ekyo kye ntonda: kubanga, laba, ntonda Yerusaalemi okuba okusanyuka, n'abantu baamu okuba essanyu. 
23_65_19_Era ndisanyukira Yerusaalemi ne ajaguliza abantu bange: so n'eddoboozi ery'okukaaba nga terikyawulirwa omwo nate newakubadde eddoboozi ery'okulira. 
23_65_20_Temukyavangamu mwana wa nnaku bunaku, newakubadde omukaddeatannatuusa nnaku ze: kubanga omwana alifa nga yaakamaze emyaka kikumi, n'alina ebibi nga yaakamaze emyaka kikumi alikolimirwa. 
23_65_21_Era balizimba ennyumba ne basulamu; era balisimba ensuku ez'emizabbibu ne balya ebibala byamu. 
23_65_22_Tebalizimba omulala n'asulamu; tebalisimba omulala n'alya: kubanga ng'ennaku ez'omuti bwe ziba, bwe zityo bwe ziriba ennaku ez'abantu bange, n'abalonde bange balirwawo nga balya omulimu ogw'engalo zaabwe. 
23_65_23_Tebalikolera bwereere mirimu so tebalizaala ba kulaba nnaku; kubanga lye zzadde ly'abo abaweebwa Mukama omukisa, n’enda yaabwe wamu nabo. 
23_65_24_Awo olulituuka nga tebannaba kuyita ndiyitaba; era nga bakyayogera ndiwulira. 
23_65_25_Omusege n'omwana gw'endiga binaaliiranga wamu, n’empologoma eneeryanga omuddo ng'ente: n'enfuufu ye eneebanga emmere ey'omusota. Tebiriruma so tebirizikiririza ku lusozi lwange lwonna olutukuvu, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_66_1_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Eggulu ye ntebe yange, n'ensi ye ntebe y'ebigere byange: nnyumba ki gye mulinzimbira? era kifo ki ekiriba ekiwummulo kyange? 
23_66_2_Kubanga bino byonna omukono gwange gwe gwabikola, era ebyo byonna ne bibaawo bwe bityo, bw'ayogera Mukama: naye omwavu era alina omwoyo oguboneredde era akankanira ekigambo kyange ye wuuyo gwe nditunuulira. 
23_66_3_Asala ente aliŋŋanga atta omuntu; awaayo omwana gw'endiga alinnanga amenyako embwa obugalo; aleeta ekiweebwayo aliŋŋanga aleeta omusaayi gw'embizzi; ayoteza omugavu ng'oyo asabira ekifaananyi omukisa: weewaawo, balonze amakubo gaabwe bo, n'emmeeme yaabwe esanyukira emizizo gyabwe 
23_66_5_Muwulire ekigambo kya Mukama, mmwe abakankanira ekigambo kye: nti Baganda bammwe abaabakyawa, abaabagoba okubalanga erinnya lyange, boogedde nti Mukama aweebwe ekitiibwa tulyoke tulabe essanyu lyammwe; naye balikwatibwa ensonyi. 
23_66_6_Eddoboozi ery'okuyoogaana eriva mu kibuga, eddoboozi eriva mu yeekaalu, eddoboozi lya Mukama asasula abalabe be empeera. 
23_66_7_Yali nga tannalumwa n'azaala; obubalagaze bwe bwali nga tebunnatuuka n'azaala omwana wa bulenzi. 
23_66_8_Ani eyali awulidde ekigambo ekifaanana bwe kityo? ani eyali alabye ebigambo ebifaanana bwe bityo? Easi erizaalwa ku lunaku lumu? eggwanga liriva mu lubuto mulundi gumu? kubanga Sayuuni yali nga kyajje alumwe n'azaala abaana be. 
23_66_9_Ndituusa okuzaalwa ne ssizaaza? bw'ayogera Mukama: nze azaaza ndiggala olubuto? bw'ayogera Katonda wo. 
23_66_10_Musanyukire wamu ne Yerusaalemi, mujaguze ku lulwe, mmwe mwenna abamwagala: musanyukire wamu naye olw'essanyu, mmwe mwenna abamukaabirira: 
23_66_11_mulyoke muyonke mukkute amabeere ge agasanyusa; mulamule mumalemu musanyukire ekitiibwa kye ekisukkirivu. 
23_66_12_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Laba, ndibunya emirembe gy'ali ng'omugga, n’ekitiibwa ky'amawaaga ng'omugga ogwanjaala, nammwe muliyonkako; muliweekerwa ku mbiriizi, era mulibuusibwabuusibwa ku maviivi. 
23_66_13_Ng'omuntu nnyina gw'asanyusa, bwe ntyo bwe ndisanyusa mmwe; ne musanyusibwa mu Yerusaalemi. 
23_66_14_Era mulikiraba n'omutima gwammwe gulilaguza n'amagumba gammwe galyera ng'omuddo omugonvu: n'omukono gwa Mukama gulimanyibwa eri abaddu be, era alisunguwalira abalabe be. 
23_66_15_Kubanga, laba, Mukama alijja n'omuliro, n'amagaali ge galiba ng'empewo ey'akazimu; okusasula obusungu bwe n'ekiruyi, n'okunenya kwe n'ennimi ez'omuliro. 
23_66_16_Kubanga Mukama aliwoza na muliro era na kitala kye eri bonna abalina omubiri: era Mukama b'alitta baliba bangi. 
23_66_17_Abo abeetukuza ne beerongoosa okugenda mu nsuku, ennyuma w'omu ali wakati, nga balya ennyama embizzi n'eky'omuzizo ekyo n'omusonso; baliggweerawo wamu, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_66_18_Kubanga nze mmanyi emirimu gyabwe n'ebirowoozo byabwe: ebiro bijja lwe ndikuŋŋaanya amawanga gonna n'ennimi; kale balijja ne balaba ekitiibwa kyange. 
23_66_19_Era nditeeka akabonero mu bo, n'abo abawona ku bo ndibatuma mu mawanga, eri Talusiisi, Puuli ne Luudi, abaleega omutego, eri Tubali ne Yavani, mu bizinga ebiri ewala, abatawuliranga ttutumu lyange, so tebalabanga kitiibwa kyange; kale balibuulira amawanga ekitiibwa kyange. 
23_66_20_Awo balireeta baganda bammwe bonna nga babaggya mu mawanga gonna okuba ekiweebwayo eri Mukama, ku mbalaasi ne mu magaali ne ku nnyinyo ne ku nnyumbu ne ku nsolo ez'embiro, awali olusozi lwange olutukuvu Yerusaalemi, bw'ayogera Mukama, ng'abaana ba Isiraeri bwe baleeta ekyo kye bawaayo mu kintu ekirongoofu mu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
23_66_21_Era nditwala ne ku bo okuba bakabona n'Abaleevi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_66_22_Kubanga eggulu eriggya n'ensi empya bye ndikola bwe birisigala mu maaso gange, bw'ayogera Mukama, bwe bityo bwe birisigala ezzadde lyammwe n'erinnya lyammwe. 
23_66_23_Awo olulituuka, okuva ku mwezi okutuusa ku mwezi, n'okuva ku ssabbiiti okutuusa ku ssabbiiti, bonna abalina omubiri banajjanga okusinziza mu maaso gange, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
23_66_24_Kale balifuluma ne batunuulira emirambo gy'abasajja abansobezzaako: kubanga envunyu yaabwe terifa, so n'omuliro gwabwe tegulizikizibwa: era baliba kyenyinyalwa eri bonna abalina omubiri. 
24_1_1_Ebigambo bya Yeremiya mutabani wa Kirukiya ow'oku bakabona abaali mu Anasosi mu nsi ya Benyamini: 
24_1_2_eyajjirwa ekigambo kya Mukama mu mirembe gya Yosiya mutabani wa Amoni, kabaka wa Yuda, mu mwaka ogw'ekkumi n'esatu ogw'okufuga kwe. 
24_1_3_Era kyajjira ne mu mirembe gya Yekoyakimu mutabani wa Yosiya kabaka wa Yuda, okutuusa ku nkomerero y'omwaka ogw'ekkumi na gumu ogwa Zeddekiya mutabani wa Yosiya kabaka wa Yuda: okutuusa ab'e Yerusaalemi lwe baatwalibwa nga basibe mu mwezi ogw'okutaano. 
24_1_4_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nti 
24_1_5_Bwe nnali nga sinnakubumba mu lubuto nakumanya, era nga tonnava mu lubuto nakutukuza; nkutaddewo okuba nnabbi eri amawanga. 
24_1_6_Awo nze ne ndyoka njogera nti Woowe, Mukama Katonda! laba, siyinza kwogera: kubanga ndi mwana muto. 
24_1_7_Awo nze ne ndyoka njogera nti Woowe, Mukama Katonda! laba, siyinza kwogera: kubanga ndi mwana muto. 
24_1_8_Tobatyanga: kubanga nze ndi wamu naawe okukuwonya, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_1_9_Awo Mukama n'agolola omukono gwe n'akoma ku kamwa kange; Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Laba, ntadde ebigambo byange mu kamwa ko: 
24_1_10_laba, leero nkutaddewo okuba omukulu w'amawanga era ow'amatwale ga bakabaka, okusimbula n'okumenya n'okuzikiriza n'okusuula; okuzimba n'okusimba. 
24_1_11_Era nate ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti Yeremiya, olaba ki? Ne njogera nti Ndaba omuggo ogw'omulozi. 
24_1_12_Awo Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Olabye bulungi: kubanga ndabirira ekigambo kyange okukituukiriza. 
24_1_13_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira omulundi ogw'okubiri nga kyogera nti Olaba ki? Ne njogera nti Ndaba entamu eyeesera; n'amaaso gaayo gayima obukiika obwa kkono. 
24_1_14_Awo Mukama n'annamba nti Okuyima obukiika obwa kkono obubi bulifubutukira ku bonna abali mu nsi. 
24_1_15_Kubanga, laba, ndiyita ebika byonna eby'amatwale ga bakabaka b'obukiika obwa kkono, bw'ayogera Mukama; era balijja ne basimba buli muntu entebe ye awayingirirwa mu miryango gya Yerusaalemi n'okwolekera bbugwe waayo yenna enjuyi zonna n'okwolekera ebibuga byonna ebya Yuda. 
24_1_16_Era ndyatula emisango gyange eri bo olw'obubi bwabwe bwonna; kubanga bandese ne booteza obubaane eri bakatonda abalala, ne basinza emirimu egy'engalo zaabwe bo. 
24_1_17_Kale nno weesibe ekimyu oyimuke obagambe byonna bye nkulagira: tokeŋŋentererwanga eri bo, nneme okukukeŋŋenterera mu maaso gaabwe. 
24_1_18_Kubanga, laba, nkufudde leero ekibuga ekiriko enkomera, era empagi ey'ekyuma, era bbugwe ow'ekikomo eri ensi yonna, eri bakabaka ba Yuda, eri abakulu baayo, eri bakabona baayo, n'eri abantu ab'omu nsi. 
24_1_19_Era balirwana naawe; naye tebalikuwangula: kubanga nze ndi wamu naawe, bw'ayogera Mukama, okukuwonya. 
24_2_1_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
24_2_2_Genda oyogerere waggulu mu matu ga Yerusaalemi nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Nkujjuukirira ku kisa eky'omu buto bwo, okwagala okw'okwogerezebwa kwo; bwe wangoberera mu ddungu mu nsi etaalimu bisige. 
24_2_3_Isiraeri yali butukuvu eri Mukama, ebibala ebibereberye eby'oku kyengera kye: bonna abamulya baliyitibwa abazzizza omusango: obubi bulibatuukako, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_2_4_Muwulire ekigambo kya Mukama, mmwe ennyumba ya Yakobo, n'ebika byonna eby'ennyumba ya Isiraeri: 
24_2_5_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Butali butuukirivu ki bajjajjammwe bwe baalaba mu nze n'okugenda bagenze wala okunvaako, ne batambula okugoberera obutaliimu ne bafuuka abataliimu? 
24_2_6_So tebayogera nti Mukama ali ludda wa eyatuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri; eyatuyisa mu lukoola, mu nsi ey'amalungu n'obunnya, mu nsi ey'ennyonta n'ey'ekisiikirize eky'okufa, mu nsi omuntu yenna gy'atayitamu, so n'omuntu yenna mw'atabeera? 
24_2_7_Ne mbaleeta mu nsi ey'ekyengera, okulyanga ebibala byamu n'obulungi bwamu; naye bwe mwayingira ne mwonoona ensi yange, ne mufuula obusika bwange okuba omuzizo. 
24_2_8_Bakabona tebayogera nti Mukama ali ludda wa? n'abo abatogaatoga amateeka tebammanya: era n'abakungu ne bansobya, bannabbi ne balagula ku lwa Baali ne batambula nga bagoberera ebitaliiko kye bigasa. 
24_2_9_Kyennaava neeyongera okuwoza nammwe, bw'ayogera Mukama, era ndiwoza n'abaana b'abaana bammwe. 
24_2_10_Kubanga muwunguke mugende ku bizinga bya Kittimu mulabe; mutume e Kedali, mwetegereze nnyo; mulabe oba nga waali wabaddewo ekigambo ekyenkana awo. 
24_2_11_Waliwo eggwanga eryawaanyisa bakatonda baabwe, abatali bakatonda naye? naye abantu bange baawaanyisa ekitiibwa kyabwe olw'ekyo ekitaliiko kye kigasa. 
24_2_12_Samaaliririra ekyo, ggwe eggulu, otye ekitatiika, owuubaale nnyo, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_2_13_Kubanga abantu bange bakoze ebibi bibiri; bandese nze oluzzi olw'amazzi amalamu, ne beesimira ebidiba, ebidiba ttanka z'omu ttaka, ebitayinza kubaamu mazzi. 
24_2_14_Isiraeri muddu? muddu eyazaalibwa mu nnyumba? kiki ekimufudde omuyiggo? 
24_2_15_Empologoma ento zimuwulugumiddeko ne zivuuma: ne zizisa ensi ye; ebibuga bye byokereddwa ddala awatali abituulamu. 
24_2_16_Era abaana ba Noofu ne Tapanesi bamenye obwezinge bwo. 
24_2_17_Teweereeseeko ekya kubanga olese Mukama Katonda wo, bwe yakulur3tlamiza mu kkubo? 
24_2_18_Kale nno ofaayo ki mu kkubo erigenda e Misiri okunywa amazzi ga Sikoli? oba ofaayo ki mu kkubo erigenda e Bwasuli, okunywa amazzi ag'Omugga? 
24_2_19_Obubi bwo ggwe bulikubuulirira, n'okuseeseetuka kwo kulikunenya: kale manya olabe nga kigambo kibi era kya bubalagaze, kubanga olese Mukama Katonda wo, era ng'entiisa yange teri mu ggwe, bw'ayogera Mukama, Mukama ow'eggye. 
24_2_20_Kubanga obw'edda namenya ekikoligo kyo, ne nkutula ebisiba byo; n'oyogera nti Sijja kuweereza; kubanga wakutama ku buli lusozi oluwamvu ne wansi wa buli muti omubisi nga weefuula omwenzi. 
24_2_21_Era naye nali nkusimbye muzabbibu mulungi, ensigo ey'amazima ameereere: kale ofuuse otya gye ndi omuti ogwayonooneka ogw'omuzabbibu ogw'omu kibira? 
24_2_22_Kubanga newakubadde ng'onaaba n'oluvu n'okozesa ne sabbuuni mungi, naye obutali butuukirivu bwo bulambiddwa mu maaso gange, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
24_2_23_Oyinza otya okwogera nti Soonoonese, siigobereranga Babaali? laba ekkubo lyo mu kiwonvu, otegeere bye wakola; oli ŋŋamira ya mbiro ng'eyitaayita mu makubo gaayo; 
24_2_24_entulege eyamanyiira amalungu ekonga empewo nga yeegomba; mu kiseera kyayo ani ayinza okugikyusa? zonna eziginoonya teziryekooya; zinaagirabira mu mwezi gwayo. 
24_2_25_Ziyiza ekigere kyo oleme okuba atalina ngatto, n'omumiro gwo oleme okulakasira ennyonta; naye n'oyogera nti Tewali ssuubi nedda; kubanga njagadde bannaggwanga, era be ndigoberera. 
24_2_26_Omubbi nga bw'akwatibwa ensonyi bw'alabika, n'ennyumba ya Isiraeri bw'ekwatibwa ensonyi bw'eti; bo ne bakabaka baabwe n'abakulu baabwe ne bakabona ne bannabbi baabwe; 
24_2_27_abagamba ekikonge nti Ggwe kitange; n'ejjinja nti Ggwo onzaala: kubanga bankubye amabega so si maaso gaabwe: naye mu biro mwe balirabira ennaku balyogera nt Golokoka otulokole. 
24_2_28_Naye ba katonda bo be weekoledde bali ludda wa? bo bagolokoke oba nga ayinza okukulokola mu biro mw'oibira ennaku: kubanga ebibuga yo nga bwe byenkana, ne bakatonda bo bwe benkana bwe batyo, gwe Yuda. 
24_2_29_Kiki ekibaagaza okuwoza nage? mwenna munsobezza, bw'aogera Mukama. 
24_2_30_Abaana baunwe mbakubidde bwereere; tebaanyizza kubuulirirwa: ekitala kyaumwe mmwe kimazeewo bannabbi ammwe ng'empologoma ezikiriza. 
24_2_31_Mmwe ab'omu mirembe gino, mulabe ekigambo kya Mukama. Naabanga ddungu eri Isiraeri? oba si ya kizikiza ekikutte? abantu bange ekiboogeza ki nti Tutaaluuse; tetukyajja gy'oli nate? 
24_2_32_Omurala ayinza okwerabira ebibye eby'ouyonjo, oba omugole ebyambalo ye? naye abantu bange banneeraidde ennaku nnyingi ezitabalika. 
24_2_33_Ng'olongoosa ekkubo lyo oku.oonya okwagalibwa! kyovudde oyiiriza n'abakazi ababi amakubo go. 
24_2_34_Era ku birenge byo kulabise musaayi gw'emmeeme z'abaavu bataliiko musango: sigulabye mu ituli ekisimibwa wabula ku bino yonna. 
24_2_35_Era naye n'oyogera nti Siriiko musango; mazima obusungu bwe bukyuse okunvaako. Laba, ndiwoza naawe kubanga oyogera nti Soonoonanga. 
24_2_36_Otambulirataibulira ki ennyo bw'otyo okuwaayisa ekkubo lyo? era olikwatibwa nsonyi ne ku lwa Misiri, nga bwe wakwatibwa ensonyi ku lwa Bwasuli. 
24_2_37_Era ne gy'ali alivaayo nga weetisse emikono: kubanga Mukama gaanyi ebyo bye weesiga, so toliraba mukisa mu byo. 
24_3_1_Boogera nti Omusajja bw'agoba mukazi we, naye n'amuvaako n'aba ow'omusajja omulala, musajja oyo alimuddira nate? ensi yo teryonooneka nnyo? Naye gwe weefuula omwenzi eri baganzi bo bangi; era naye nzirira nate, bw'aogera Mukama. 
24_3_2_Yimusa amaaso o eri ensozi ez'obweru olabe; we batasulira naawe wa? Wabaatulorira ku mabbali g'ekkubo, ng'Omuwalabu mu ddungu; era wayonoona nsi n'obwenzi bwo n'obubi bwo. 
24_3_3_Empandaggirize kyezivudde ziziyizibwa, so tewabaddeewo ttoggo; era naye n'oba n'ekyenyi eky'omwenzi, wagaana okukwatibwa ensonyi. 
24_3_4_Tonkaabirenga okuva leero nti Kitange, ggwe musaale w'obuto bwange? 
24_3_5_Aliguguba n'obusungu bwe emirembe gyonna? aliremera mu bwo okutuusa enkomerero? Laba, wayogera n'okola ebigambo ebibi, n'okwata ekkubo lyo ggwe. 
24_3_6_Era nate Mukama n'aŋŋambira mu mirembe gya Yosiya kabaka nti Olabye ekyo Isiraeri eyaseeseetuka ky'akoze? alinnye ku buli lusozi oluwanvu ne wansi wa buli muti omubisi, ne yeefuulira eyo omwenzi. 
24_3_7_Ne njogera bwe yamala okukola ebyo byonna nti Alinzirira; naye n'atadda: ne mwannyina ow'enkwe Yuda n'akiraba. 
24_3_8_Ne ndaba, bwe nnamala okugoba Isiraeri eyaseeseetuka ne mmuwa ebbaluwa ey'okumugoba olw'ensonga eno kubanga ayenze, era naye Yuda ow'enkwe mwannyina n'atatya; naye era aaye n'agenda ne yeefuula omwenzi. 
24_3_9_Awo olwatuuka kubanga mwangu okwenda ensi n'eyonooneka, n'ayenda ku mayinja n'ebikonge. 
24_3_10_Era naye ebyo byotma newakubadde nga bimaze okubaawo, mwanayina ow'enkwe Yuda tanziridde n'omutima gwe gwonna, naye ag'akuusakuusa, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_3_11_Awo Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Isiraeri eyaseeseetuka yeeraze okuba omutuukirivu okukira Yuda ow'enkwe. 
24_3_12_Genda olangire ebigambo bino ng'otunuulira obuluika obwa kkono, oyogere nti Komawo, ggwe Isiraeri eyaseeseetuka, bw'ayogera Mukama; siibatunuulire n'obusungu: kubanga nnina okusaasira, bw'ayogera Mukama, siriguguba na busungu emirembe gyonna. 
24_3_13_Kyokka kkiriza obutali butuukirivu bwo, nga wasobya Mukama Katonda wo, a'osaasaanyiza amakubo go abagenyi wansi wa buli muti omubisi, so temwagondera ddoboozi lyange, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_3_14_Komawo, mmwe abaana abadda ennyuma, bw'ayogera Mukama; kubanga nze bbammwe: era ndibatwala nga nziya omu ku kibuga n'ababiri ku kika, ne mbaleeta e Sayuuni: 
24_3_15_era ndibawa abasumba ng'omutima gwange bwe guli abalibaliisa n'okumanya n'okutegeera. 
24_3_16_Awo olulituuka bwe muliba nga mwaze era nga mweyongedde mu nsi, kale mu biro ebyo, bw'ayogera Mukama, nga tebakyayogera nti Essanduuko ey'endagaano ya Mukama; so teriyingira mu mwoyo gwabwe; so tebaligijjukira; so tebaligikyalira; so tebalikola nate bwe batyo. 
24_3_17_Mu biro ebyo baliyita Yerusaalemi entebe ya Mukama; n'amawanga gonna galikuŋŋaanyizibwa eyo, eri erinnya lya Mukama e Yerusaalemi: so tebalitambula nate ng'obukakanyavu bw'omutima gwabwe omubi bwe buli. 
24_3_18_Mu biro ebyo ennyumba ya Yuda eritambulira wamu n'ennyumba ya Isiraeri, era baliviira wamu mu nsi ey'obukiika obwa kkono ne bayingira mu nsi gye nnawa bajjajjammwe okuba obusika. 
24_3_19_Naye ne njogera nti Ndikuteeka ntya mu baana, ne nkuwa ensi ey'essanyu, obusika obulungi mu ggye ly'amawanga? ne njogera nti Mulimpita nti Kitange; so temulikyuka obutangoberera. 
24_3_20_Mazima omukazi nga bw'ava ku bba ng'asala olukwe, bwe mutyo nammwe bwe munsalidde enkwe, mmwe ennyumba ya Isiraeri, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_3_21_Eddoboozi liwuliddwa ku nsozi ez'obweru, okukaaba n'okwegayirira kw'abaana ba Isiraeri; kubanga banyodde ekkubo lyabwe, beerabidde Mukama Katonda waabwe. 
24_3_22_Mukomeewo, mmwe abaana abaseeseetuse, naawonya okuseeseetuka kwammwe. Laba, tuzze gy'oli; kubanga ggwe Mukama Katonda waffe. 
24_3_23_Mazima okubeerwa okusuubirwa okuva ku nsozi kwa bwereere, oluyoogaano oluli ku nsozi: mazima mu Mukama Katonda waffe mwe muli obulokozi bwa Isiraeri. 
24_3_24_Naye ekyo ekikwasa ensonyi kye kimazeewo emirimu gya bajjajjaffe okuva mu buto bwaffe; embuzi zaabwe n'ente zaabwe, batabani baabwe n'abawala baabwe. 
24_3_25_Tugalamire ensonyi nga zitukutte, okuswala kwaffe kutubikkeko: kubanga twonoonye Mukama Katonda waffe, ffe ne bajjajjaffe okuva mu buto bwaffe ne leero: so tetugonderanga ddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda waffe. 
24_4_1_Bw'onokkiriza okukomawo, ggwe Isiraeri, bw'ayogera Mukama, eri nze gy'olidda: era bw'onoggyawo emizizo gyo mu maaso gange, kale tolijjulukuka 
24_4_3_Kubanga bw'atyo Mukama bw'agamba abasajja ba Yuda ne Yerusaalemi nti Mukabale ettaka lyammwe eritali ddime, so temusiganga mu maggwa. 
24_4_4_Mwekomole eri Mukama, muggyewo ebikuta eby'emitima gyammwe, mmwe abasajja ba Yuda n'abali mu Yerusaalemi: ekiruyi kyange kireme okufuluma ng'omuliro ne kyokya ne wataba ayinza okukizikiza olw'obubi obw'ebikolwa byammwe. 
24_4_5_Mulangirire mu Yuda, mulaalike mu Yerusaalemi; mwogere nti Mufuuwe ekkondeere mu nsi; mwogerere waggulu mwogere nti Mukuŋŋaane, tuyingire mu bibuga ebiriko enkomera. 
24_4_6_Musimbe ebendera okwolekera Sayuuni: mudduke muwone, temulwawo: kubanga ndireeta obubi obuliva obukiika obwa kkono n'okuzikiriza okunene. 
24_4_7_Empologoma erinnye okuva mu kisaka kyayo, era omuzikiriza w'amawanga; akutte ekkubo, avudde mu kifo kye; okuzisa ensi yo, ebibuga byo babizise obutabaamu abibeeramu. 
24_4_8_Olwekyo mwambale ebibukutu, mukungubage muwowoggane: kubanga ekiruyi kya Mukama tekikyuse okutuvaako. 
24_4_9_Awo olutituuka ku lunaku olwo, bw'ayogera Mukama, omutima gwa kabaka gulizikirira, n'omutima gw'abakulu; ne baka bona balisamaalirira ne bannabbi balyewuunya. 
24_4_10_Awo ne ndyoka njogera nti Woowe, Mukama Katonda! mazima olimbye nnyo eggwanga lino ne Yerusaalemi ng'oyogera nti Muliba n'emirembe; naye ekitala kituuka ku mmeeme. 
24_4_11_Mu biro ebyo baligamba eggwanga lino ne Yerusaalemi nti Embuyaga ez'olubugumu eziva ku nsozi ez'obweru mu ddungu ezoolekera omuwala w'abantu bange, si za kuwujja so si za kulongoosa; 
24_4_12_embuyaga nnyingi eziva ku ezo zirijja ku lwange: kaakano nange naayogera emisango ku bo. 
24_4_13_Laba, alirinnya ng'ebire, n'amagaali ge galiba ng'empewo ez'akazimu: embalaasi ze za mbiro okukira empungu. Zitusanze! kubanga tunyagiddwa. 
24_4_14_Ai Yerusaalemi, naaza omutima gwo guggweemu obubi, olyoke olokoke. Ebirowoozo byo ebibi birituusa wa okubeera mu nda yo? 
24_4_15_Kubanga eddoboozi lirangirira nga liyima e Ddaani, era liraalika obubi nga liyima ku nsozi za Efulayimu: 
24_4_16_mubuulire amawanga; laba, mulaalike eri Yerusaalemi ng'abakuumi bava mu nsi ey'ewala ne balangirira ebibuga bya Yuda n'eddoboozi lyabwe. 
24_4_17_Bakyetoolodde enjuyi zonna ng'abakuuma ennimiro; kubanga kyanjeemera, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_4_18_Ekkubo lyo n'ebikolwa byo bye bikufunidde ebyo; buno 'bwe bubi bwo; kubanga bwa bubalagaze, kubanga butuuka ne ku mutima gwo. 
24_4_19_Emmeeme yange, emmeeme yange! omutima gwange gunnuma munda mwennyini; omutima gwange gweraliikiridde mu nze; siyinza kusirika; kubanga owulidde, ai emmeeme yange, eddoboozi ly'ekkondeere, nga liraye. 
24_4_20_Okuzikirizibwa okuli kungulu w'okuzikirizibwa kulangirirwa; kubanga ensi yonna enyagiddwa: eweema zange zinyagiddwa nga simanyiridde, n'amagigi gange mu kaseera kamu. 
24_4_21_Ndituusa wa okulaba ebendera ne mpulira eddoboozi ly'ekkondeere? 
24_4_22_Kubanga abantu bange basirusiru, tebammanyi; biwawongole bya baana, so tebalina kutegeera: ba. magezi mu kukola obubi, naye mu kukola obulungi tebalina kumanya. 
24_4_23_Nalaba ensi, era, laba, nga njereere nga yeetabuddetabudde; n'eggulu nga temuli musana. 
24_4_24_Nalaba ensozi, era, laba, nga zikankana, obusozi bwonna ne buyuuguuma eruuyi n'eruuyi. 
24_4_25_Natunula, era, laba, nga tewali muntu, n'ennyonyi zonna ez'omu bbanga nga zidduse. 
24_4_26_Natunula, era, laba, ennimiro eŋŋimu nga zifuuse nkoola, n'ebibuga byamu byonna nga bimenyesemenyese ,olw'okujja kwa Mukama ne mu maaso g'ekiruyi kye. 
24_4_27_Kubanga bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama m Ensi yonna eriba nsiko; naye siri komekkerereza ddala. 
24_4_28_Ensi kye riva ewuubaala, n'eggulu eriri wa ggulu liriddugala: kubanga nze nkyogedde, nkimaliridde, so sejjusizza, so siridda nnyuma okukireka. 
24_4_29_Ekibuga kyonna kidduka olw'o kuyoogaana kw'abo abeebagadde embalaasi n'ab'emitego; bayingira mu bisaka, ne balinnya ku mayinja buli kibuga kirekeddwa, so tewali muntu atuula omwo. 
24_4_30_Naawe bw'olinyagibwa olikola otya? Ne wakubadde ng'oyambala olugoy, olutwakaavu, newakubadde nga wee yonja n'ebintu ebya zaabu, newa. kubadde ng'ogaziya amaaso go nga weesiigako eddagala, weefuulir bwereere omulungi: baganzi bo bakunyooma, banoonya obulami bwo. 
24_4_31_Kubanga mpulidde eddoboozi ng'ery'omukazi alumwa okuzaala, obubalagaze obuli ng'obwoyo azaala omwana we omubereberye, eddoboozi ly'omuwala wa Sayuuni alaakiira, ayanjala engalo ze ng'ayogera nti Zinsanze kaakano! kubanga emmeeme yange ezirika mu maaso g'abassi. 
24_5_1_Muddukane eruuyi n'eruuyi mu nguudo ez'e Yerusaalemi, mulabe nno, mumanye, munoonyeze mu bifo byamu ebigazi oba nga munaayinza okulaba omuntu, oba nga waliwo n'omu akola eby'ensonga, anoonya amazima; kale naakisonyiwa. 
24_5_2_Era ne bwe boogera nti Nga Mukama bw'ali omulamu, mazima balayira bya bulimba. 
24_5_3_Ai Mukama, amaaso go tegatunuulira mazima? obakubye, naye ne batanakuwala; obamazeewo, naye bagaanyi okubuulirirwa: bakakanyazizza amaaso gaabwe okukira olwazi; bagaanyi okudda. 
24_5_4_Awo ne njogera nti Mazima bano baavu: basirusiru; kubanga tebamanyi kkubo lya Mukama newakubadde omusango gwa Katonda waabwe: 
24_5_5_neegendera eri abakulu ne njogera nabo; kubanga bo bamanyi ekkubo lya Mukama, n'omusango gwa Katonda waabwe. Naye abo bamenye ekikoligo n'omwoyo gumu ne bakutula ebisiba. 
24_5_6_neegendera eri abakulu ne njogera nabo; kubanga bo bamanyi ekkubo lya Mukama, n'omusango gwa Katonda waabwe. Naye abo bamenye ekikoligo n'omwoyo gumu ne bakutula ebisiba. 
24_5_7_Nnyinza nrya okukusonyiwa? abaana bo banvuddeko, ne balayira abo abatali bakatonda: bwe nabaliisa okukkuta ne bayenda, ne bakuŋŋaanira ku nnyumba z'abakazi ab'enzi ebibiina. 
24_5_8_Baali ng'ezbalaasi ezaaliisibwa enkya: buli nuntu ng'abebera mukazi wa munne. 
24_5_9_Siribonereza olw'ebyo? bw'ayogera Mukama: era emmeeme ange teriwalana ggwanga ku ku ggwanga erifaanana bwe lityo? 
24_5_10_Mulinnye ku bbugwe waakyo, zuzikirize; naye temukomekkereeza ddala: muggyeewo amatabi gaakyo: kubanga si ga Mukama. 
24_5_11_Kubanga ennyumba ya Isiraeri ennyumba ya Yuda bankuusizzakuusizza nnyo nnyini, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_5_12_Beegaanyi Mukama e boogera nti Si ye; so obubi tebulitujjira; so tetuliraba kitala ewakubadde enjala: 
24_5_13_ne bannabi balifuuka mpewo, so n'ekigambo tekiri mu bo: bwe balikolebwa bwe atyo. 
24_5_14_Mukama Katonda ow'egye kyava ayogera nti Kubanga mwogera ekigambo ekyo, laba, ndizula ebigambo byange mu kamwa ko okuba omuliro n'abantu bano kuba enku, era gulibookya. 
24_5_15_Laba, ndireeta ku mmwe eggwaga eririva ewala, mmwe ennyumba ya Isiraeri, bw'ayogera Mukama: gwanga lya maanyi, ggwanga lya dda, eggwanga ly'otomanyiiko olumi lwalyo so totegeera bye boogera. 
24_5_16_Omufuko gwabwe ntaana eyasaamiridde, bonna basajja ba maanyi. 
24_5_17_Omufuko gwabwe ntaana eyaiamiridde, bonna basajja ba maanyi. 
24_5_18_Era naye ne mu biro ebyo, bw'aogera Mukama, sirikomekkerereza dala gye muli. 
24_5_19_Awo olulituuka bwe mulyogera nti Mukama Katonda waffe kiki ekimukozezza ffe byo byonna? kale n'olyoka obaamba nti Nga mmwe bwe munvuddeko ne muweerereza bakatonda bannaggwanga mu nsi yammwe, bwe mutyo bwe munaaweererezanga bannaggwanga mu nsi eteri yammwe. 
24_5_20_Mubuulirire kino mu nnyumba ya Yakobo, mukirangirire mu Yuda, nti 
24_5_21_Muwulire nno kino, mmwe abantu abasirusiru era abatalina kutegeera; abalina amaaso ne mutalaba; abalina amatu ne muta wulira: 
24_5_22_temuntya? bw'ayogera Mukama: temuukankanire kujja kwange, eyateeka omusenyu okuba ensalo y'ennyanja olw'ekiragiro ekitaliggwaawo, n'okuyinza n'eteyinza kugusukkako? era amayengo gaayo ne bwe geesuukunda, naye tegayinza kuwangula; ne bwe gawuuma, naye tegayinza kugusukkako. 
24_5_23_Naye abantu bano balina omutima omuwaganyavu era omujeemu; bajeemye bagenze. 
24_5_24_So teboogera mu mutima gwabwe nti Tutye nno Mukama Katonda waffe awa enkuba, ddumbi ne ttoggo, mu ntuuko zaayo; atuterekera sabbiiti ez'ebikungulwa ezaateekebwawo. 
24_5_25_Obutali butuukirivu bwammwe bwe busindise ebyo, n'ebibi byammwe bye bibaziyiriza ebirungi. 
24_5_26_Kubanga mu bantu bange mulabika abasajja ababi: balabirira ng'abatezi b'ennyonyi bwe batega; batega omutego, bakwasa bantu. 
24_5_27_Ng'ekiguli bwe kijjula ennyonyi, ennyumba zaabwe bwe zijjula bwe zityo obulimba: kyebavudde bafuuka abakulu ne bagaggawala. 
24_5_28_Bagezze, banyiridde: weewaawo, basukkiriza ebikolwa eby'obubi: tebalowooza nsonga, ensonga y'atalina kitaawe, balyoke balabe omukisa; so tebasalira baavu musango gwabwe. 
24_5_29_Siribonereza olw'ebyo? bw'ayogera Mukama: emmeeme yange teriwalana ggwanga ku ggwanga erifaanana bwe lityo? 
24_5_30_Ekigambo eky'ekitalo era eky'ekivve kituukiridde mu nsi; 
24_5_31_bannabbi balagula bya bulimba, ne bakabona bafuga ku lw'abo; n'abantu bange baagala kibeere bwe kityo: era mulikola ki ku nkomerero y'ebyo? 
24_6_1_Mudduke olw'okuwona, mmwe abaana ba Benyamini, muve wakati mu Yerusaalemi, mufuuyire ekkondeere e Tekowa, musimbe akabonero ku Besukakkeremu: kubanga obubi butunula nga buyima obukiika obwa kkono n'okuzikirira okunene. 
24_6_2_Oyo omulungi omwekanasi, omuwala wa Sayuuni, ndimuzikiriza. 
24_6_3_Abasumba balijja gy'ali nga balina ebisibo byabwe; balisimba eweema zaabwe okumwolekera enjuyi zonna; baliriira buli muntu mu kifo kye ye. 
24_6_4_Mwetegeke okulwana naye; muyimuke tulinnye mu ttuntu. Zitusanze! kubanga obudde bukka, kubanga ebisiikirize eby'akawungeezi byenudde. 
24_6_5_Muyimuke twambuke kiro, tuzikirize amayumba ge. 
24_6_6_Kubanga Mukama w'eggye ayogedde bw'ati nti Muteme emiti mutuume entuumo ku Yerusaalemi: ekibuga ekyo kye kigenda okubonerezebwa; kyonna kujooga kwereere wakati mu kyo. 
24_6_7_Ng'oluzzi bwe lukulukuta amazzi gaalwo, bwe kityo bwe kikulukuta obubi bwakyo: ekyejo n'okunyaga biwulirwa mu kyo; endwadde n'ebiwundu biba mu maaso gange bulijjo. 
24_6_8_Yiga ggwe Yerusaalemi, emmeeme yange ereme okwawukana naawe; nneme okukufuula amatongo, ensi omutali muntu. 
24_6_9_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama w'eggye nti Baliyerera ddala abalisigala ku Isiraeri ng'omuzabbibu: zza nate omukono gwo ng'omunozi w'ezabbibu mu bibbo. 
24_6_10_Ani gwe mba njogera naye ne mba omujulirwa, balyoke bawulire? laba, okutu kwabwe si kukomole, so tebayinza kuwuliriza: laba, ekigambo kya Mukama kifuuse gye bali ekivume; tebakisanyukira n'akamu. 
24_6_11_Kyenvudde njijula ekiruyi kya Mukama; nkooye okuzibiikiriza: kiyiwe ku baana abato mu luguudo ne ku kkuŋŋaaniro ly'abavubuka wamu: kubanga ne bba wamu n'omukazi alikwatibwa, omukadde wamu n'oyo awezezza ennaku ennyingi. 
24_6_12_N'ennyumba zaabwe zirifuuka za balala, ennimiro zaabwe n'abakazi baabwe wamu: kubanga ndigolola omukono gwange ku abo abali mu nsi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_6_13_Kubanga okuva ku muto mu bo okutuuka ku mukulu mu bo buli muntu wa mululu; era okuva ku nnabbi okutuuka ku kabona buli muntu alyazaamaanya. 
24_6_14_Era bawonyezza ekiwundu ky'abantu bange kungulu kwokka, nga boogera nti Mirembe, mirembe; so emirembe nga tewali. 
24_6_15_Baakwatibwa ensonyi bwe baamala okukola eby'emizizo? nedda, tebaakwatibwa nsonyi n'akatono, so tebaayinza kumyusa amaaso: kyebaliva bagwira mu abo abagwa: mu kiseera mwe ndibajjirira mwe balisuulirwa, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_6_16_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Muyimirire mu makubo mulabe, mubuuze amakubo ag'edda, oluguudo olulungi gye luli, mutambulire omwo, kale mulirabira emmeeme zammwe ekiwumniulo: naye ne boogera nti Tetuutambulire omwo. 
24_6_17_Ne mbateekako abakuumi ne boogera nti Muwulirize eddoboozi ly'ekkondeere; naye ne boogera nti Tetuuwulirize. 
24_6_18_Kale muwulire, mmwe amawanga, mumanye, mmwe ab'ekkuŋŋaaniro, ebiri mu bo. 
24_6_19_Wulira, ggwe ensi: laba, nditeeta akabi ku bantu bano, bye bibala by'ebirowoozo byabwe, kubanga tebawulidde bigambo byange; n'amateeka gange bagagaanyi. 
24_6_20_Omugavu oguva e Seeba gujjira ki gye ndi, n'emmuli ez'akaloosa eziva mu nsi ey'ewala? Bye muwaayo ebyokebwa tebikkirizika gye ndi, so ne ssaddaaka zammwe tebinsanyusa. 
24_6_21_Mukama kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, nditeeka enkonge mu maaso g'abantu bano: ne bakitaabwe ne batabani baabwe wamu balizeesittalako; muliraanwa we ne mukwano gwe balizikirira. 
24_6_22_Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Mukama nti Laba, waliwo eggwanga eriva mu nsi ey'obukiika obwa kkono, era eggwanga ekkulu liriyimuka okuva ku nkomerero z'ensi. 
24_6_23_Bakwata omutego n'effumu; bakambwe so tebalina kusaasira; eddoboozi lyabwe liwuuma ng'ennyanja, era beebagala embalaasi; buli muntu ng'atala, ng'omusajja bw'atalira olutalo, okulwana naawe, ai omuwala wa Sayuuni. 
24_6_24_Tuwulidde ettutumu lyalyo; emikono gyaffe ne ginafuwala: obubalagaze butukutte n'okulumwa ng'omukazi alumwa okuzaala. 
24_6_25_Temufulumanga mu ttale, so temutambuliranga mu kkubo; kubanga eriyo ekitala eky'omulabe n'entiisa enjuyi zonna. 
24_6_26_Ai omuwala w'abantu bange, weesibe ebibukutu, weekulukuunye mu vvu: kungubaga ng'akungubagira mutabani we omu yekka, nga weesaasaabaga nnyo nnyini; kubanga omunyazi alitujjira nga tetumanyiridde. 
24_6_27_Nkufudde kigo era lukomera mu bantu bange; olyoke omanye okeme ekkubo lyabwe. 
24_6_28_Bonna bajeemu abatalabwa, nga batambula nga bawaayiriza; bikomo era byuma: bonna bakola eby'obukyamu. 
24_6_29_Emavubo gifuuwa n'amaanyi; omuliro gumalawo lisasi: beeyongerera bwereere okulongoosa; kubanga ababi tebasimbulibwawo. 
24_6_30_Masengere ga ffeeza, abantu bwe balibayita bwe batyo, kubanga Mukama abasudde. 
24_7_1_Ekigambo ekyajjira Yeremiya ekyava eri Mukama nga kyogera nti 
24_7_2_Yimirira mu mulyango gw'ennyumba ya Mukama, olangirire eyo ekigambo kino, oyogere nti Muwulire ekigambo kya Mukama, mmwe mwenna aba Yuda, abayingira mu miryango gino okusinza Mukama. 
24_7_3_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama w'eggye, Katonda wa Isiraeri, nti Mulongoose amakubo gammwe n’ebikolwa byammwe, nange ndibatuuza mu kifo kino. 
24_7_4_Temwesiganga bigambo bya bulimba nti Bino ye yeekaalu ya Mukama, ye yeekaalu ya Mukama, ye yeekaalu ya Mukama. 
24_7_5_Kubanga bwe munaalongoosezanga ddala amakubo gammwe n'ebikolwa byammwe; bwe munaatuukiririzanga ddala emisango eri omuntu ne munne 
24_7_7_kale ndibatuuza mu kifo kino mu nsi gye nnawa bajjajjammwe obw'edda bwonna okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
24_7_8_Laba, mwesiga ebigambo eby'obulimba ebitayinza kugasa. 
24_7_9_Munabbanga, ne mutta, ne muyenda, ne mulayira eby'obulimba, ne mwoteza obubaane eri Baali, ne mutambula okugoberera bakatonda abalala be mutamanyanga, 
24_7_10_ne mujja ne muyimirira mu maaso gange mu nnyumba eno erituumibwa eritmya lyange, ne mwogera nti Tuwonyezebbwa; mulyoke mukole emizizo egyo gyonna? 
24_7_11_Ennyumba eno etuumibwako erinnya lyange efuuse empuku y'abanyazi mu maaso gammwe? Laba, nze, nze mwene, nkirabye, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_7_12_Naye mugende nno mu kifo kyange ekyali mu Siiro, gye nnatuuza erinnya lyange olubereberye, mulabe kye nnakikola olw'obubi bw'abantu bange Isiraeri. 
24_7_13_Era kaakano kubanga mukoze ebikolwa ebyo byonna, bw'ayogera Mukama; ne njogera nammwe, nga ngolokoka mu makya ne njogera, naye ne mutawulira; ne mbayita naye ne mutayitaba: 
24_7_14_kyendiva nkola ennyumba eyitibwa erinnya lyange; gye mwesiga, n'ekifo kye nnawa mmwe ne bajjajjammwe, nga bwe nnakola Siiro. 
24_7_15_Era ndibasuula okuva mu maaso gange, nga bwe nnasuula baganda bammwe bonna, ezzadde lyonna erya Efulayimu. 
24_7_16_Kale tosabiranga bantu bano so tobayimusizanga kukaaba newa. kubadde okusaba, so tonneegayiri. ranga okuwolereza, kubanga siikuwulire. 
24_7_17_Tolabye bye bakola mu bibuga bya Yuda ne mu nguudo ez'e Yerusaalemi? 
24_7_18_Abaana batyaba enku, bakitaabwe ne bakuma omuliro, abakazi ne bagoya obutta okufumbira kabaka w'eggulu omu kazi emigaati, n'okufukira bakatondi abalala ebiweebwayo eby'okunywa balyoke bansunguwaze. 
24_7_19_Basunguwaza nze? bw'ayogera Mukama tebeesunguwaza bo bennyini, oku swaza amaaso gaabwe bo? 
24_7_20_Mu kama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'at nti Laba, obusungu bwange n'ekiruyi kyange birifukibwa ku kif kino, ku bantu ne ku nsolo ne ku miti egy'omu ttale ne ku bibala eby'ettaka; era bulibuubuuka so te bulizikizibwa. 
24_7_21_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama w'eggye, Katonda wa Isiraeri nti Mwongere bye muwaayo ebyokebwa ku ssaddaaka zammwe, mulye ennyama. 
24_7_22_Kubanga saayogera ne baajjammwe so saabalagira ku maku kwe nnabaggira mu nsi y'e Misiri eby'ebiweebwayo ebyoebwa newakubadde ssaddaaka: 
24_7_23_naye ekigambo kino kye nnabaagira nti Muwulirenga eddoboozi yange, nange naabanga Katonda wammwe, nammwe munaabanga bantu bange: era mutambulirenga nu kkubo lye mbalagira, mulyoke nube bulungi. 
24_7_24_Naye ne batanfiira so tebaatega kutu kwabwe, naye ne batambulira mu kuteesa kwabwe bo ne mu bukakanyavu mu mutima gwabwe omubi, ne badda ennyuma so tebeeyongera nu maaso. 
24_7_25_Okuva ku lunaku bajjajjammwe kwe baaviira mu nsi ey'e Misiri ne leero, nabatumira abaddu bange bonna bannabbi, buli lunaku nga ngolokoka mu makya ne mbatuma: 
24_7_26_era naye ne batampulira so tebaatega kutu kwabwe, naye ne bakakanyaza ensingo yaabwe: baakola obubi okukira bajjajjaamwe. 
24_7_27_Era obagambanga ebigambo bino byonna; naye tebaakuwulitenga; era obakoowoolanga, naye tebaakuyitabenga. 
24_7_28_Era obaganbanga nti Lino lye ggwanga eritawulidde ddoboozi lya Mukama Katonda waabwe, so tebakkirizza tuyigirizibwa: amazima gafudde, gazikiridde okuva mu kamwa kaabwe. 
24_7_29_Sala enviiri zo ggwe Yerusaalemi, ozisuule wala, otanule okukungubagira ku nsozi ez'obweru; kubanga Mukama asudde abantu ab'omu mirembe egy'obusungu bwe, abaleseeyo. 
24_7_30_Kubanga abaana ba Yuda bakoze ebiri mu maaso gange ebibi, bw'ayogera Mukama: batadde emizizo gyabwe mu nnyumba eyitibwa erinnya lyange, okugyonoona. 
24_7_31_Era bazimbye ebifo ebigulumivu eby'e Tofesi ekiri mu kiwonvu ekya mutabani wa Kinomu, okwokya batabani baabwe ne bawala baabwe mu muliro; kye ssiragiranga so tekyayingira mu mutima gwange. 
24_7_32_Kale, laba, ennaku zijja, bw'ayogera Mukama, lwe kitaliyitibwa nate nti Tofesi newakubadde nti Kiwonvu kya mutabani Kiwonvu kya ttambiro: kubanga baliziika mu Tofesi okutuusa lwe watalibaawo bbanga lya kuziikamu. 
24_7_33_N'emirambo gy'abantu bano giriba mmere ya nnyonyi ez'omu bbanga n'ensolo ez'omu nsi; so tewaliba alizisaggula. 
24_7_34_Awo ne ndyoka nkomya mu bibuga bya Yuda ne mu nguudo ez'e Yerusaalemi eddoboozi ery'ebinyumu n'eddoboozi ery'essanyu, eddoboozi ly'awasa omugole n'eddoboozi ly'o mugole: kubanga ensi erifuuka nsiko. 
24_8_1_Mu biro ebyo, bw'ayogera Mukama, baliggya amagumba ga bassekabaka ba Yuda n'amagumba g'abakungu be n'amagumba ga bakabona n'amagumba ga bannabbi n'amagumba g'abo abali mu Yerusaalemi mu malaalo gaabwe.
