24_49_26_Abalenzi baakyo kyebaliva bagwira mu nguudo zaakyo, n'abasajja bonna abalwanyi balisirisibwa ku lunaku olwo, bw'ayogera Mukama w'eggye. 
24_49_27_Era ndikuma omuliro mu bbugwe w’e Ddamasiko, era gulyoka amayumba ga Benukadaadi. 
24_49_28_Ebya Kedali n'eby'obwakabaka bwa Kazoli Nebukadduleeza kabaka w'e Babulooni bwe yakuba. Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Mugolokoke mwambuke e Kedali, munyage abaana ab'ebuvanjuba. 
24_49_29_Eweema zaabwe n'embuzi zaabwe balizitwala; balyetwalira bo bennyini amagigi gaabwe n'ebintu byabwe byonna n'eŋŋamira zaabwe: era balibalangira nti Entiisa eri ku njuyi zonna. 
24_49_30_Mudduke mutambuletambule wala mwekweke wansi, mmwe ababeera e Kazoli, bw'ayogera Mukama; kubanga Nebukadduleeza kabaka w'e Babulooni abateeserezza ebigambo, era abasalidde amagezi. 
24_49_31_Mugolokoke mwambuke eri eggwanga eryegolola, eribeerera awo nga lisiita, bw'ayogera Mukama; abatalina nzigi newakubadde ebisiba, abatuula bokka. 
24_49_32_N'eŋŋamira zaabwe ziriba munyago, n'olufulube lw'ensolo zaabwe luliba lwa kugereka: era ndisaasaanyiza awali empewo zonna abo abamwa oluge; era ndireeta obuyinike bwabwe okubafuluma enjuyi zonna, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_49_33_Era Kazoli kinaabanga kifo kya bibe eky'okubeerangamu, matongo ag'olubeerera: tewaabenga muntu alibeera eyo, so tewaabenga mwana wa muntu alituula omwo. 
24_49_34_Ekigambo kya Mukama ekyajjira Yeremiya nnabbi ekya Eramu, Zeddekiya kabaka wa Yuda nga kyajje alye obwakabaka, nga kyogera nti 
24_49_35_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama w'eggye nti Laba, ndimenya omutego gwa Eramu, bwe bwesige obw'amaanyi gaabwe. 
24_49_36_Era ndireeta ku Eramu empewo ennya okuva mu njuyi zonna ez'eggulu, era ndibasaasaanyiza eri empewo ezo zonna; so tewaliba ggwanga abagobebwa aba Eramu gye bata lituuka. 
24_49_37_Era nditiisa Eramu mu maaso g'abalabe baabwe ne mu maaso g'abo abanoonya obulamu bwabwe: era ndibaleetako obubi, ekiruyi kyange, bw'ayogera Mukama; era ndisindika ekitala okubagoberera okutuusa lwe ndibamalawo: 
24_49_38_era nditeeka entebe yange mu Eramu, ne mmalamu omwo kabaka n'abakungu, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_49_39_Naye olulituuka mu nnaku ez'oluvannyuma ndikomyawo nate obusibe bwa Edomu, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_50_1_Ekigambo Mukama kye yayogera ekifa ku Babulooni, eky'ensi ey'Abakaludaaya, mu Yeremiya nnabbi. 
24_50_2_Mubuulire mu mawanga, mulangirire, musimbe ebendera; mulaalike, so temukisa: mwogere nti Babulooni kimenyeddwa, Beri akwatiddwa ensonyi, Merodaaki akennentereddwa; ebifaananyi byakyo bikwatiddwa ensonyi, esanamu zaakyo zikeŋŋentereddwa. 
24_50_3_Kubanga mu bukiika obwa kkono evaayo eggwanga okukitabaala, erizisa ensi yaakyo, so tewaliba alibeera omwo: badduse, bagenze, abantu era n'ensolo. 
24_50_4_Mu nnaku ezo ne mu biro ebyo, bw'ayogera Mukama, abaana ba Isiraeri balijja, bo n'abaana ba Yuda wamu; balikwata ekkubo lyabwe nga bakaaba amaziga, era balinoonya Mukama Katonda waabwe. 
24_50_5_Balibuuza ebya Sayuuni, amaaso gaabwe nga gatunulayo, nga boogera nti Mujje mwegatte ne Mukama nga mulagaanye endagaano eteriggwaawo eteryerabirwa. 
24_50_6_Abantu bange baabanga ndiga ezaabula: abasumba baabwe baabawabya, baabakyamiza ku nsozi: baavanga ku lusozi ne bagendanga ku kasozi, beerabidde ekifo kyabwe eky'okuwummuliramu. 
24_50_7_Bonna abaabalaba babalidde: n'abalabe baabwe ne boogera nti Tetwonoona kubanga bo basobezza Mukama, omubeera obutuukirivu, Mukama essuubi lya bajjajjaabwe. 
24_50_8_Mudduke muve wakati mu Babulooni, muve mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya, mubeere ng'embuzi emmandwa mu maaso g'ebisibo. 
24_50_9_Kubanga, laba, ndigolokosa ekibiina ky'amawanga amakulu ne mbatabaaza Babulooni okuva mu nsi ey'obukiika obwa kkono: era balisimba ennyiriri okulwana nakyo; kiriggibwa eyo: obusaale bwabwe buliba ng'obw'omusajja ow'amaanyi omukabakaba; tewaliba alidda obusa. 
24_50_10_Kale Obukaludaaya buliba munyago: bonna ababunyaga balikkuta, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_50_11_Kubanga musanyuse, kubanga mujaguza, mmwe abanyaga obusika bwange, kubanga muligita ng'ente enduusi ewuula, ne mufugula ng'embalaasi ez'amaanyi; 
24_50_12_nnyammwe alikwatibwa ensonyi nnyingi nnyo; eyabazaala aliswala: laba, aliba wa nkomerero mu mawanga, olukoola, ensi enkalu, n'eddungu. 
24_50_13_Olw'obusungu bwa Mukama kyeriva erema okutuulwamu, naye erirekerwawo ddala: buli ayita ku Babulooni alisamaalirira n'asooza ebibonoobono byakyo byonna. 
24_50_14_Musimbe ennyiriri okulwana ne Babulooni enjuyi zonna, mmwe mwenna abanaanuula omutego; mukirase, temusaasira busaale: kubanga kyayonoona Mukama. 
24_50_15_Mukireekaanireko enjuyi zonna; kijeemulukuse; amakomera gaakyo gagudde, babbugwe baakyo basuuliddwa: kubanga lye ggwanga Mukama ly'awalana; mukiwalaneko eggwanga; nga bwe kyakolanga mukikole bwe mutyo. 
24_50_16_Mumaleewo asiga mu Babulooni, n'oyo akwata ekiwabyo mu biro eby'okukunguliramu: olw'okutya ekitala ekijooga balikyukira buli muntu eri abantu b'ewaabwe, era baliddukira buli muntu mu nsi y'ewaabwe. 
24_50_17_Isiraeri ndiga ewabye; empologoma zimugobye kabaka w’e Bwasuli ye yasooka okumulya; ne Nebukadduleeza ono kabaka w’e Babulooni ye w'enkomerero, amenye emagumba ge. 
24_50_18_Mukama w'eggye, Katonda wa Isiraeri, kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, ndibonereza kabaka w’e Babulooni n'ensi ye nga bwe nnabonereza kabaka w’e Bwasuli. 
24_50_19_Era ndikomyawo Isiraeri nate mu ddundiro lye, era aliriira ltu Kalumeeri ne Basani, n'emmeeane ye erikkutira ku nsozi za Efulayimu, ne mu Gireyaadi. 
24_50_20_Mu nnaku ezo ne mu biro ebyo, bw'ayogera Mukama, obutali butuukirivu bwa Isiraeri balibunoonya so nga tewali; n'ebibi bya Yuda, stebirirabika: kubanga ndisonyiwa abo be ndireka okuba ekitundu ekifisseewo. 
24_50_21_Tabaala ensi y'e Merasayimu. gy'oba otabaala, n'abo abali mu Pekodi: otte ozikiririze ddala ennyuma waabwe, bw'ayogera Mukama, okole nga byonna bwe biri bye nnakulagira. 
24_50_22_Eddoboozi ery'entalo liri mu nsi n'ery'okuzikirira okunene. 
24_50_23_Ennyondo ey'ensi zonna ng'etemeddwa ng'emenyese! Babulooni nga kifuuse amatongo mu mawanga! 
24_50_24_Nakutegera omutego, n'okukwatibwa okwatiddwa, ai Babulooni, so tewamanyirira: olabise n'okukwatibwa okwatiddwa, kubanga wawakana ne Mukama. 
24_50_25_Mukama asumuludde etterekero ly'ebyokulwanyisa bye, era aggyeemu ebyokulwanyisa eby'okunyiiga kwe: kubanga Mukama, Mukama w'eggye, alina omulimu gw'agenda okukola mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya. 
24_50_26_Mukama asumuludde etterekero ly'ebyokulwanyisa bye, era aggyeemu ebyokulwanyisa eby'okunyiiga kwe: kubanga Mukama, Mukama w'eggye, alina omulimu gw'agenda okukola mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya. 
24_50_27_Mujje mukirumbe nga muva ku nsalo ekomererayo, musumulule amawanika gaakyo: mukituume nga bifunvu, mukizikiririze ddala: waleme okubaawo ekintu ekisigala ku kyo. 
24_50_28_Eddoboozi ly'abo abadduka ne bawona mu nsi y'e Babuloomi, okubuulira mu Sayuuni eggwanga Mukama Katonda waffe ly'aliwalana, ly'aliwalana olwa yeekaalu ye. 
24_50_29_Muyite abalasi bakuijnaane balumbe Babulooni, abo bonna abanaanuula omutego, musiisire okukyolekera enjuyi zonna; waleme okuba aliwona ku kyo: musasule ng'omulimu gwakyo bwe gwali; nga byonna bwe biri bye kyakolanga, bwe mutyo mukikolanga: kuba.nga yabanga wa malala eri Mukama, eri Omutukuvu owa Isiraeri. 
24_50_30_Abalenzi baakyo kye aliva bagwira mu nguudo zaakyo, abasajja baakyo bonna abalwanyi alisirisibwa ku lunaku olwo, bw'aogera Mukama. 
24_50_31_Laba, ndi mulabe wo, ai ggwe alina amalala, bw'aogera Mukama, Mukama w'eggye: banga olunaku lwo lutuuse, ekiseera mwe nnaakujjirira 
24_50_32_Alina amalala alyesittala n'agwa, so tewaliba alimuyimusa; era ndikuma omuliro mu bibuga bye, era gulyokya bonna abamwetoolodde. 
24_50_33_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama w'eggye nti Abaana ba Isiraeri n'abaana ba Yuda babajoogera wamu: n'abo bonna abaabatwala okuba abasibe babanywezezza; bagaanyi okubata. 
24_50_34_Omununuzi waabwe wa maanyi; Mukama w'eggye lye linnya lye: aliwoleza ddala ensongi yaabwe, alyoke awummuze ensi, era yeeraliikirize abo abali mu Babulooni. 
24_50_35_Ekitala kiri ku Bakalu daaya, bw'ayogera Mukama, m ku abo abali mu Babulooni ne ki bakungu baamu ne ku bagezigezi baamu. 
24_50_36_Ekitala kiri ku abo abeenyumiriza, era balisiruwala: eki tala kiri ku basajja baamu ab'a maanyi, era balikeŋŋentererwa. 
24_50_37_Ekitala kiri ku mbalaasi zaabwe ne ku magaali gaabwe ne ku bantu bonna abaatabulwa abali wakati mi kyo, era balifuuka ng'abakazi; ekitala kiri ku bintu byamu eby'obugagga, era birinyagibwa. 
24_50_38_Ekyanda kiri ku mazzi gaamu, era galikalira: kubanga nsi ya bifaananyi byole, era balalukidde esanamu. 
24_50_39_Ensolo ez'omu nsiko ez'omu ddungu kyezinaavanga zibeera eyo ne bamaaya banaabeeranga omwo so tekiibeerwengamu nate ennaki zonna; so tekiituulwengamu emi rembe n'emirembe. 
24_50_40_Nga Katonda bwe yasuula Sodomu ne Ggomola n'ebibuga ebyaliraanawo bw'ayogera Mukama; bwe kityo tewaabenga muntu anaatuulanga eyo, so tewaabenga mwana wa muntu anaabeeranga omwo. 
24_50_41_Laba, eggwanga liva obukiik: obwa kkono; era ekika ekikulu, eri bakabaka bangi abaliyimusibwa okuva ku njuyi z'ensi ezikomererayo 
24_50_42_Bakwata omutego n'effumu; bakambwe so tebalina kusaasira; eddoboozi lyabwe liwuuma ng'ennyanja era beebagala embalaasi; buli muntu ng'atala ng'omuntu bw'atalira olu talo, okulwana naawe, ai omuwal wa Babulooni. 
24_50_43_Kabaka w’e Babulooni awulidde ettutumo lyabwe emikono gye ne giddirira: obubalagaze bumukutte n'obulumi ng'omukazi alumwa okuzaala. 
24_50_44_Laba, alirinnya ng'empologoma eva ku malala ga Yoludaani, okulumba ekifo eky'amaanyi eky'okubeeramu naye ndikibaddusa mangu ago; eri buli alirondebwa, oyo gwe ndikuza ku kyo: kubanga ani afaanana nze era ani alinteekerawo ekiseera? eri ani omusumba aliyimirira mu maasa gange? 
24_50_45_Kale muwulire okuteesa kwa Mukama kw'ateeseza ku Babulooni; n'ebyo by'amaliridde eri ensi ey'Abakaludaaya: Tebalirema kubawalula okubaggyayo, abaana bato ab'omu kisibo; talirema kulekesaayo ekifo kyabwe eky'okubeeramu wamu nabo. 
24_50_46_Olw'eddoboozi y'okumenya Babulooni ettaka likankana, n'okukaaba kuwuliddwa mu mawanga. 
24_51_1_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Laba, ndireeta ku Babulooni ne ku abo abali mu Lebukamaayi embuyaga ezizikiriza. 
24_51_2_Era nditumira Babulooni bannaggwanga balikiwujja; n'ensi yaakyo baligimalamu byonna: kubanga balikirumbira enjuyi zonna ku lunaku lw'okulabiramu ennaku. 
24_51_3_Omulasi aleme okunaanuula omutego we, so aleme okweyimusa ng'ayaabadde ekizibawo kye eky'ebyuma; so temusonyiwa balenzi baamu; muzikiririze ddala eggye lyamu lyonna. 
24_51_4_Era baligwira mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya nga battiddwa, era nga bafunitiddwa mu nguudo zaakyo. 
24_51_5_Kubanga Isiraeri talekeddwayo Katonda we, Mukama w'eggye, newakubadde Yuda; ensi yaabwe ng'ejjudde omusaango gwe bazza eri omutukuvu wa Isiraeri. 
24_51_6_Mudduke muve mu Babulooni wakati, muwonye buli muntu obulamu bwe; temuzikirizibwa mu butali butuukirivu bwakyo: kubanga bye biro Mukama mw'awalanira eggwanga; likisasula empeera. 
24_51_7_Babulooni kyabanga kikompe kya zaabu mu nukono gwa Mukama, ekyatamiiza ensi zonna: amawanga ganywedde ku mwenge gwakyo; amawanga kyegavudde galaluka. 
24_51_8_Babulooni kigudde mangu ago, era kizikiridde: mukiwowogganire; muddire eddagala olw'obulumi bwakyo, oba nga mpozzi kinaayinzika okuwonyezebwa. 
24_51_9_Twandiwonyezza Babuooni, naye tekiwonye: mukireke, tudde buli muntu mu nsi y'ewaabwe ye; kubanga omusango gwakyo gutuuse mu ggulu, era gugulumizibwa okutuuka ne mu bbanga. 
24_51_10_Mukama ayolesezza obutuukirivu bwaffe: mujje tubuulire mu Sayuuni omulimu gwa Mukama Katonda waffe. 
24_51_11_Muzigule obusaale, muiyweze engabo: Mukama akubirizza omwoyo gwa bakabaka b'Abameedi; kubanga okuteesa kwe kuli eri Babulooni okukizikiriza: kubanga lye ggwanga Mukama ly'awalana, ly'awalana olwa yeekaalu ye 
24_51_12_Musimbe ebendera okwolekera bbugwe w'e Babulooni, munyweze abakuumi, muteekeewo abakuuma, mutegeke abateezi: kubanga Mukama ateesezza n'okukola akoze ebyo bye yayogera ku abo abali mu Babulooni. 
24_51_13_Ai ggwe atuula ku mazzi amangi, alina eby'obugagga ebingi ennyo nnyini, enkomerero yo etuuse, ekigera ky'omululu gwo. 
24_51_14_Mukama w'eggye yeerayidde yekka ng'ayogera nti Mazima ndikujjuza abasajja nga bulusejjera; era balikukuba olwogoolo. 
24_51_15_Yakola ensi n'obuyinza bwe, yanyweza ebintu byonna n'amagezi ge, era yabamba eggulu n'okutegeera kwe: 
24_51_16_bw'aleeta eddoboozi lye, wabaawo oluyoogaano olw'amazzi mu ggulu, era alinnyisa emikka okuva ku nkomerero z'ensi; akolera enkuba enjota, era aggya embuyaga mu mawanika ge. 
24_51_17_Buli muntu afuuse ng'ensolo, so talina kumanya; buli muweesi wa zaabu ekifaananyi kye ekyole kimukwasa ensonyi: kubanga ekifaananyi kye ekisaanuuse bulimba, so mu byo temuli mukka, 
24_51_18_Birerya, mulimu gwa bulimba: mu biro mwe birijjirirwa birizikirira. 
24_51_19_Omugabo gwa Yakobo tegufaanana ebyo: kubanga oyo ye mubumbi wa byonna; era Isiraeri kye kika eky'obusika bwe: Mukama w'eggye lye linnya lye. 
24_51_20_Ggwe mbazzi yange erwana, era eby'okulwanyisa byange: era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa amawanga; era ggwe ndizikirizisa obwakabaka; 
24_51_21_era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa embalaasi n'oyo agyebagadde; 
24_51_22_era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa ekigaali n'oyo akitambuliramu; era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa omusajja n'omukazi; era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa omukadde n'omulenzi; era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa omulenzi n'omuwala; 
24_51_23_era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa omusumba n'ekisibo kye; era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa omulimi n'omugogo gwe ogw'ente; era ggwe ndimenyesamenyesa abafuga n'abasigire. 
24_51_24_Era ndisasula Babulooni n'abo bonna abali mu Bukaludaaya obubi bwabwe bwonna bwe baakakola mu Sayuuni mmwe nga mulaba, bw'ayogera Mukama: 
24_51_25_Laba, ndi mulabe wo, ai olusozi oluzikiriza, bw'ayogera Mukama, oluzikiriza ensi zonna: era ndikugololerako omukono gwange, ne nkuyiringisa okuva ku mayinja, era ndikufuula olusozi olwaggya. 
24_51_26_So tebalikuggyako jjinja okuba ensonda, newakubadde ejjinja ery'emisingi; naye onoobanga matongo emirembe gyonna, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_51_27_Musimbe ebendera mu nsi, mufuuwe ekkondeere mu mawanga, mutegeke amawanga okulwana nakyo, muyite obwakabaka obwa Alalati ne Mini ne Asukenaazi, okukikuŋŋaanirako: mukigabire omugabe; mulinnyise embalaasi ng'obuwuka obuliko obwoya. 
24_51_28_Mutegeke amawanga okulwana nakyo, bakabaka b'Abameedi, abaamasaza baamu, n'abasigire bonna abaamu, n'ensi yonna gy'atwala. 
24_51_29_Era ensi ekankana, erumwa: kubanga ebyo Mukama bye yamalirira eri Babulooni binywera, okufuula ensi y'e Babulooni amatongo, nga tewali abeeramu. 
24_51_30_Abasajja ab'amaanyi ab'e Babulooni baleseeyo okulwana, basigadde mu bifo byabwe eby'amaanyi; amaanyi gaabwe gaweddewo; bafuuse ng'abakazi: ennyumba zaakyo zookeddwa; ebisiba byakyo bimenyese. 
24_51_31_Matalisi omu aliddukana okusisinkana ne munne, n'omubaka omu okusisinkana ne munne, okunnyonnyola kabaka w'e Babulooni ng'ekibuga kye kimenyeddwa enjuyi zonna: 
24_51_32_era basoonookerezza amawungukiro n'endago bazookezza omuliro, n'abasajja abalwanyi batidde. 
24_51_33_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama w'eggye, Katonda wa Isiraeri, nti Omuwala wa Babulooni aliŋŋanga egguuliro mu biro lwe balisambiramu; ekyasigaddeyo ekiseera kitono ebiro eby'okukunguliramu birikituukira. 
24_51_34_Nebukadduleeza kabaka w'e Babulooni andidde, ambetense, anfudde ekibya ekyereere, ammize ng'ogusota, ajjuzizza olubuto lwe eby'okuliira byange ebirungi; ansudde. 
24_51_35_Ekyejo ekyagirirwa nze n'omubiri gwange kibeere ku Babulooni, ali mu Sayuuni bw'alyogera; era Omusaayi gwange gubeere ku abo abali mu Bakaludaaya, Yerusaalemi bw'alyogera. 
24_51_36_Mukama kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, ndiwoza ensonga yo, ne nkuwalanira eggwanga: era ndikaliza ennyanja yaakyo, era ndimalawo ensulo yaakyo. 
24_51_37_Kale Babulooni kirifuuka bifunvu, ekifo eky'ebibe eky'okubeeramu, ekyewuunyo, n'okusoozebwa, nga tewali akibeeramu. 
24_51_38_Baliwulugumira wamu ng'empologoma ento; balivuumira wamu ng'abaana b'empolo goma. 
24_51_39_Bwe balibuguumirira, lwe ndifumba embaga yaabwe, era ndibatamiiza, basanyuke, era beebake otulo otutaliggwaawo, so baleme okuzuukuka, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_51_40_Ndibaserengesa ng'abaana b'endiga okuttibwa, ng'endiga ennume wamu n'embuzi emmandwa. 
24_51_41_Sesaki nga kimenyeddwa! n'ettendo ery'ensi zonna nga balisonookerezza! Babulooni nga kifuuse amatongo mu mawanga! 
24_51_42_Ennyanja erinnye ku Babulooni: olufulube lw'amayengo gaayo lukibisseeko. 
24_51_43_Ebibuga byakyo bifuuse matongo, ensi enkalu n'eddungu, ensi omutali muntu so tewali mwana wa muntu ayitawo. 
24_51_44_Era ndireeta omusango ku Beri mu Babulooni, era ndiggya mu kamwa ke ekyo kye yamira; so n'amawanga nga tegakyakulukutira wamu gy'a1i nate: weewaawo, bbugwe w'e Babulooni aligwa. 
24_51_45_Mmwe abantu bange, muve wakati mu kyo, mwerokole buli muntu ekiruyi kya Mukama. 
24_51_46_So n'omutima gwammwe guleme okuzirika, so temutyanga olw'ekigambo ekiriwulirwa mu nsi; kubanga ekigambo kirijjira mu mwaka gumu, era oluvannyuma mu mwaka omulala ekigambo kirijja n'ekyejo mu nsi, owessaza ng'alwana n'owessaza. 
24_51_47_Kale, laba, ennaku zijja lwe ndireeta omusango ku bifaananyi ebyole ebya Babulooni, n'ensi yaayo yonna erikwatibwa ensonyi; n'abaayo bonna abattiddwa baligwira wakati mu kyo. 
24_51_48_Kale eggulu n'ensi ne byonna ebibirimu biriyimba n'essanyu olwa Babulooni; kubanga abanyazi balijja gye kiri okuva obukiika obwa kkono, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_51_49_Nga Babulooni bwe kyagwisa aba Isiraeri abattibwa, bwe batyo e Babulooni ab'ensi yonna abattiddwa gye baligwira. 
24_51_50_Mmwe abawonye ekitala, mugende, temuyimirira buyimirizi; mujjukire Mukama nga muyima wala, era Yerusaalemi kiyingire mu mwoyo gwammwe. 
24_51_51_Tukwatiddwa ensonyi, kubanga tuwulidde ebivume; amaaso gaffe gaswadde: kubanga bannaggwanga bayingidde mu bifo ebitukuvu eby'omu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
24_51_52_Kale, laba, etunaku zijja, bw'ayogera Mukama, lwe ndireeta omusango ku bifaananyi byakyo ebyole; ne mu nsi yaakyo yonna abaliko ebiwundu balisinda. 
24_51_53_Babulooni newakubadde nga kirinnye okutuusa mu ggulu, era newakubadde nga kinywezezza entikko ey'amaanyi gaakyo, era naye abanyazi balijja gye kiri okuva we ndi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
24_51_54_Eddoboozi ery'okukaaba erivudde mu Babulooni n'ery'okuzikirira okunene erivudde mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya! 
24_51_55_kubanga Mukama anyaga Babulooni, era azikirizza oluyoogaano olunene okuva mu kyo; n'amayengo gaabwe gawuuma ng'amazzi amangi, era baleeta okuyoogaana kw'eddoboozi lyabwe: 
24_51_56_kubanga omunyazi akituuseeko, ku Babulooni, n'abasajja baamu ab'amaanyi bawambiddwa, emitego gyabwe gimenyesemenyese: kubanga Mukama ye Katonda asasula, talirema kuwa mpeera. 
24_51_57_Era nditaamiiza abakungu baamu n'abagezigezi baamu, abaamasaza baamu n'abasigire baamu n'abasajja baamu ab'amaanyi; era balyebaka otulo otutaliggwaawo so tebalizuukuka, bw'ayogera Kabaka, erinnya lye Mukama w'eggye. 
24_51_58_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama w'eggye nti Babbugwe abagazi b'e Babulooni balisuulirwa ddala, n'emiryango gyakyo emiwanvu giryokebwa omuliro; n'amawanga galiteganira obutaliimu, n'ebika biriteganira omuliro; era balikoowa. 
24_51_59_Ekigambo Yeremiya nnabbi kye yalagira Seraya mutabani wa Neriya mutabani wa Maseya, bwe yagenda e Babulooni wamu ne Zeddekiya kabaka wa Yuda nr mwaka ogw'okufuga kwe ogw'okuma. Era Seraya yali ssaabakaaki omukulu. 
24_51_60_Awo Yeremiya n'awandiika mu kitabo obubi bwonna obwali bugenda okujja ku Babulooni, by bigambo ebyo byonna ebiwandii kiddwa ku Babulooni. 
24_51_61_Awo Yeremiya n'agamba Seraya nti Bw'olituuka mu Babulooni, kale tolemanga kusoma, ebigambo bino byonna, 
24_51_62_oyogere nti Ai Mukama, wayogera eby'ekifo kino okukizikiriza omuntu yenna aleme okutuula omwo, omuntu newakubadde ensolo, naye kirekebwewo ennaki zonna. 
24_51_63_Awo olulituuka bw'oli mala okusoma ekitabo kino, n'olyoka okisibako ejjinja n'okisuula mi Fulaati wakati: 
24_51_64_era olyogera nti Babulooni bwe kirikka bwe kityo, so tekiribbulukuka nate, olw'obubi bwe ndikireetako: era balikoowa. Ebigambo bya Yeremiya we bikoma wano. 
24_52_1_Zeddekiya yali yaakamaze emyaka amakumi abiri mu gumu bwe yalya obwakabaka; n'afugira emyaka kkumi na gumu mu Yerusaalemi: ne nnyina erinnya lye yali Kamutali muwala wa Yeremiya ow'e Libuna. 
24_52_2_N'akolanga ebya ebyali mu maaso ga Mukama ebibi, nga byonna bwe byali Yekoyakimu bye yali akoze. 
24_52_3_Kubanga kyatuukirira olw'obusungu bwa Mukama mu Yerusaalemi ne Yuda okutuusa lwe yamala okubasuula okuva mu maaso ge: era Zeddekiya n'ajeemera kabaka w'e Babulooni. 
24_52_4_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'omwenda ogw'okufuga kwe mu mwezi ogw'ekkumi ku lunaku oIw'omwezi olw'ekkumi Nebukadduleeza kabaka w'e Babulooni n'ajja, ye n'eggye lye lyonna, okutabaala Yerusaalemi n'asiisira okukyolekera; ne bakizimbako ebigo enjuyi zonna. 
24_52_5_Awo ekibuga ne kizingizibwa okutuuka ku mwaka ogw'ekkumi n'ogumu ogwa kabaka Zeddekiya. 
24_52_6_Mu mwezi ogw'okuna ku lunaku olw'omwenda olw'omwezi enjala n'eba nnyingi mu kibuga, ne watabaawo mmere eri abantu ab'omu nsi. 
24_52_7_Awo ne bawagula ekituli mu kibuga, abasajja bonna abalwanyi ne badduka ne bafuluma mu kibuga ekiro mu kkubo ery'omuyango wakati mu babbugwe ababiri, ogwaliraana olusuku lwa kabaka; (era Abakaludaaya baali bazingizizza ekibuga) enjuyi zonna ne bayita mu kkubo erya Alaba. 
24_52_8_Naye eggye ery'Abakaludaaya ne bagoberera kabaka, Zeddekiya ne bamuyisiriza mu nsenyi ez'e Yeriko; ggye lyonna ne lisaasaana okumuvaako. 
24_52_9_Awo ne bawamba kabaka, ne bamwambusa eri kabaka w'e Babulooni e Libula mu nsi ey'e Kamasi; n'amusalira omusango. 
24_52_10_Awo kabaka w'e Babulooni n'atta batabani ba Zeddekiya ye ng'alaba: era n'attira n'abakungu bonna aba Yuda e Libula. 
24_52_11_Zeddekiya n'amugyamu amaaso; kabaka w'e Baulooni n'amusiba mu masamba amutwala e Babulooni, n'amuteeka mu kkomera okutuusa ku lunaku kwe yafiira. 
24_52_12_Awo mu mwezi ogw'okutaano ku lunaku olw’ekkumi olw'omwezi, we mwaka ogw'ekkumi n'omwenda gwa kabaka Nebukadduleeza kabaka w'e Babulooni, Nebuzaladaani mukulu w'abambowa, eyayimirianga mu maaso ga kabaka w’e Babulooni, n'ajja mu Yerusaalemi: 
24_52_13_n'ayokya ennyumba ya Mukama ennyumba ya kabaka; n'enyumba zonna ez'omu Yeusaalemi, buli nnyumba ennene agyokya omuliro. 
24_52_14_N'eggye lyonna ery'Abakaludaaya abaali wamu n'omukulu w'abambowa ne bamenya bbugwe yenna ow'e Yerusaalemi enjuyi zonna. 
24_52_15_Awo Nebuzaladaani omukulu w'abambowa nga basibe ku abo abasinga obwavu ku bantu n'ekitundu ekifisseewo ku bantu ekyali kisigadde mu kibuga n'abo abaali basenguse, abaasenga abaka w’e Babulooni, n'ekitundu kyali kisigaddewo eky'abakopi. 
24_52_16_Naye Nebuzaladaani omukulu T'abambowa n'aleka ku emizabbibu n'okulimanga. 
24_52_17_N'empagi ez'ebikomo ezaali mu nnyumba ya Mukama n'entebe ennyanja ey'ekikomo ebyali mu nnyumba ya Mukama Abakaludaaya ne babimenyaamenya, ne batwala e Babulooni ebikomo byabyo byonna. 
24_52_18_Era n'entamu n'ebisena n'ebisalako ebisiriiza n'ebibya n'ebijiiko n'ebintu byonna eby'ebikomo bye baaweerezanga nabyo ne babitwala. 
24_52_19_N'ebikompe n'emmumbiro n'ebibya n'entamu n'ebikondo n'ebijiiko n'obubya; ebyali ebya zaabu, mu zaabu, n'ebyo ebyali ebya ffeeza, mu ffeeza, omukulu w'abambowa bwe yabitwala bw'atyo. 
24_52_20_Empagi zombi, ennyanja emu, n'ente ennume ez'ebikomo ekkumi n'ebbiri ezaali wansi w'entebe, kabaka Sulemaani bye yakolera ennyumba ya Mukama: ebikomo eby'ebintu ebyo byonna tebyapimika. 
24_52_21_N'empagi, obuwanvu bw'empagi emu emikono kkumi na munaana; n'omugwa ogw'emikono kkumi n'ebiri gwagyetooloola; n'obugazi bwayo bwali engalo nnya: yalimu omuwulukwa. 
24_52_22_Era yaliko omutwe ogw'ekikomo; n'omutwe gumu obuwanvu bwagwo emikono etaano, omutwe nga guliko ebitimba n'amakomamawanga enjuyi zonna, byonna bya bikomo: n'empagi ey'okubiri nayo yaliko ebifaanana ebyo n'amakomamawanga. 
24_52_23_Era ku mbiriizi kwaliko amakomamawanga kyenda mu mukaaga; amakomamawanga gonna gaali kikumi ku bitimba enjuyi zonna. 
24_52_24_Awo omukulu w'abambowa n'atwala Seraaya kabona asinga obukulu ne Sefaniya kabona ow'okubiri n'abaggazi abasatu: 
24_52_25_n'aggya mu kibuga omwami eyatwalanga abasajja abalwanyi; n'abasajja musanvu ku abo abaalabanga amaaso ga kabaka, abaalabika mu kibuga; n'omuwandiisi ow'omukulu w'eggye eyayolesanga abantu ab'omu nsi; n'abasajja nkaaga ab'oku bantu ab'omu nsi abaalabika mu kibuga wakati. 
24_52_26_Awo Nebuzaladaani omukulu w'abambowa n'abatwala n'abaleeta eri kabaka w'e Babulooni e Libula. 
24_52_27_Kabaka w'e Babulooni n'abafumita n'abattira e Libula mu nsi ey'e Kamasi. Awo Yuda n'atwalibwa nga musibe okuva mu nsi ye. 
24_52_28_Bano be bantu Nebukadduleeza be yatwala nga basibe: mu mwaka ogw'omusanvu Abayudaaya enkumi ssatu mu amakumi abiri mu basatu: 
24_52_29_mu mwaka gwa Nebukadduleeza ogw'ekkumi n'omunaana n'atwala nga basibe okubaggya e Yerusaalemi abantu lunaana mu amakumi asatu mu babiri: 
24_52_30_mu mwaka gwa Nebukadduleeza ogw'amakumi abiri mu esatu Nebuzaladaani omukulu w'abambowa n'atwala nga basibe ku Bayudaaya abantu lusanvu mu amakumi ana mu bataano: abantu bonna baali enkumi nnya mu lukaaga. 
24_52_31_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'amakumi asatu mu musanvu ogw'okusibibwa kwa Yekoyakini kabaka wa Yuda, mu mwezi ogw'ekkumi n'ebiri ku lunaku olw'amakumi abiri mu ttaano Evirumerodaaki kabaka w'e Babulooni mu mwaka ogw'olubereberye ogw'okufuga kwe n'ayimusa omutwe gwa Yekoyakini kabaka wa Yuda, n'amuggya mu kkomera; 
24_52_32_n'ayogera naye eby'ekisa, n'agulumiza entebe ye okusinga entebe za bakabaka abaali awamu naye mu Babulooni. 
24_52_33_N'awaanyisa ebyambalo bye eby'omu kkomera, n'aliiranga emmere bulijjo mu maaso ge ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwe. 
24_52_34_Era okumuliisanga kabaka w'e Babulooni n'amusalira ebyenkalakkalira, omugabo ogw'oku buli lunaku okutuusa ku lunaku kwe yafiira, ennaku zonna ez'obulamu bwe. 
25_1_1_Ekibuga nga kitudde kyokka ekyajjulanga abantu! Nga kifuuse okuba nga nnamwandu! Ekyabanga omukulu mu mawanga, omumbejja mu masaza, Nga kifuuse kya musolo! 
25_1_2_Akaaba nnyo nnyini ekiro n'amaziga ge gali ku matama ge; Mu baganzi be bonna talina n'omu wa kumusanyusa: Mikwano gye gyonna bamukuusakuusizza, Bafuuse abalabe be. 
25_1_3_Yuda agenze mu busibe olw'okubonyaabonyezebwa n'olw'obuddu obuzito; Abeera mu bannaggwanga, talaba kiwummulo: Bonna abamuyigganya bamukwatira wabi. 
25_1_4_Amakubo ga Sayuuni gakaaba, kubanga tewali ajja eri okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu; Emiryango gye gyonna girekeddwawo, bakabona be basinda: Bawala be baliko obuyinike, naye yennyini abalagalwa. 
25_1_5_Abalabe be bafuuse omutwe, abamukyawa balabye omukisa; Kubanga Mukama amubonyaabonyezza olw'olufulube lw'ebyonoono bye: Abaana be abato bagenze mu kusibibwa mu maaso g'omulabe. 
25_1_6_Era omuwala wa Sayuuni afiiriddwa obukulu bwe bwonna: Abakungu be bafuuse ng'ennangaazi ezitalaba muddo, Era bagenze nga tebalina maanyi mu maaso g'oyo ayigganya. 
25_1_7_Yerusaalemi ajjukirira mu nnaku ez'okulabiramu ennaku n'obuyinike Ebintu bye byonna ebisanyusa, ebyabangawo okuva mu nnaku' ez'edda: Abantu be bwe baagwa mu mukono gw'omulabe, so nga tewali amuyamba, Abalabe baamulaba ne bakudaalira okuziika kwe. 
25_1_8_Yerusaalemi yayonoona nnyo nnyini, kyavudde afuuka ng'ekintu ekitali kirongoofu: Bonna abaamussangamu ekitiibwa bamunyoomye, kubanga balabye ensonyize: Weewaawo, assa ekikkowe n'akyuka ennyuma. 
25_1_9_Empitambi ye yali mu birenge bye; teyajjukira nkomerero ye ya luvannyuma; Kyavudde akkakkanyizibwa ddala; talina amusanyusa: Ai Mukama, tunuulira okubonyaabonyezebwa kwange; kubanga omulabe yeegulumizizza. 
25_1_10_Omulabe agolodde omukono gwe ku bintu bye byonna ebisanyusa: Kubanga alabye nga bannaggwanga bayingidde mu kifo kye ekitukuvu. Be walagirako baleme okuyingiranga mu kibiina kyo. 
25_1_11_Abantu be bonna bassa ebikkowe, banoonya emmere; Bawaddeyo ebintu byabwe ebisanyusa okugula emmere okuweezaweeza emmeeme yaabwe: Tunula, ai Mukama, olabe; kubanga nfuuse ataliiko ky'agasa. 
25_1_12_Temufaayo, mmwe mwenna abayitawo? Mutunule mulabe oba nga waliwo obuyinike bwonna obwenkana obuyinike bwange obukoleddwa nze, Mukama bw'ambonyaabonyezezza ku lunaku olw'ekiruyi kye. 
25_1_13_Yaweereza omuliro mu magumba gange ng'ayima waggulu, ne gugawangula: Ategedde ebigere byange ekitimba, anzizizza ennyuma, Andeeseeko okuwuubaala n'okuzirika n'okuyongobera okuzibya obudde. 
25_1_14_Ekikoligo ky'ebyonoono byange omukono gwe gwe gukisibye; Byezinzezinze, birinnye ku nsingo yange; amazeewo amaanyi gange: Mukama angabudde mu mikono gy'abo be siyinza kuyimirira mu maaso gaabwe. 
25_1_15_Mukama anyoomye abasajja bange bonna ab'amaanyi wakati mu nze; Ankuxlnaanyirizzaako okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu okubetenta abalenzi bange: Mukama asambye omuwala wa Yuda atamanyi musajja nga mu ssogolero. 
25_1_16_Olw'ebyo kyenvudde nkaaba amaziga; eriiso lyange, eriiso lyange likulukuta amazzi; Kubanga omukubagiza eyandisanyusizza emmeeme yange andi wala: Abaana bange balekeddwawo kubanga omulabe awangudde. 
25_1_17_Sayuuni ayanjuluza emikono gye; tewali wa kumukubagiza; Mukama alagidde ebya Yakobo abo abamwetoolodde babeere abalabe be: Yerusaalemi ali mu bo ng'ekintu ekitali kirongoofu. 
25_1_18_Mukama mutuukirivu; kubanga njeemedde ekiragiro kye: Muwulire, mbeegayiridde, mmwe amawanga gonna, mulabe obuyinike bwange: Abawala bange n'abalenzi bange bagenze mu busibe. 
25_1_19_Nayita baganzi bange, naye ne bannimba: Bakabona bange n'abakadde bange baaweerayo obulamu bwabwe mu kibuga, Nga bwe beenoonyeza emmere okuweezaweeza emmeeme zaabwe. 
25_1_20_Tunula, ai Mukama; kubanga ndi munaku: emmeeme yange yeeraliikiridde; Omutima gwange gukyuse munda yange; kubanga njeemye nnyo nnyini: Ebweru ekitala kinnyaga, mu nju mulimu ng'okufa. 
25_1_21_Bawulidde nga nzisa ebikkowe; tewali wa kunkubagiza; Abalabe bange bonna bawulidde ennaku ze ndabye; basanyuse kubanga okireese: Olireeta olunaku lwe walangirira, nabo balifaanana nze. 
25_1_22_Obubi bwabwe bwonna butuuke mu maaso go; Era obakole bo nga bw'onkoze nze olw'okusobya kwange kwonna: Kubanga ebikkowe bye nzisa bingi, n'omutima gwange guyongobedde. 
25_2_1_Mukama ng'abisseeko ekire ku muwala wa Sayuuni ng'aliko obusungu! Asudde ku nsi okuva mu ggulu obulungi bwa Isiraeri, So tajjukidde ntebe ya bigere bye ku lunaku olw'obusungu bwe. 
25_2_2_Mukama amize ennyumba zonna eza Yakobo, so takwatiddwa kisa; Asudde ebifo eby'amaanyi eby'omuwala wa Yuda olw'obusungu bwe; Abikkakkanyizza okutuuka ku ttaka: Ayonoonye obwakabaka n'abakungu baamu. 
25_2_3_Amazeewo ejjembe lyonna erya Isiraeri ng'aliko ekiruyi; Azzizzaayo omukono gwe ogwa ddyo mu maaso g'omulabe: Era ayokezza Yakobo ng'omuliro ogwaka ennyo, ogwokya enjuyi zonna. 
25_2_4_Anaanudde omutego gwe ng'omulabe, ayimiridde n'omukono gwe ogwa ddyo ng'omulabe, Era asse bonna abaasanyusanga amaaso: Mu weema ey'omuwala wa Sayuuni mw'afukidde obusungu bwe ng'omuliro. 
25_2_5_Mukama afuuse ng'omulabe, amize Isiraeri: Amize amayumba gaamu gonna, azikirizza ebifo bye eby'amaanyi: Era ayongedde okuwuubaala n'okukungubaga mu muwala wa Yuda. 
25_2_6_Era aggyeewo eweema ye lwa maanyi, ng'ey'omu lusuku; Azikirizza ekifo kye eky'okukuŋŋaanirangamu: Mukama yeerabizza mu Sayuuni okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu ne ssabbiiti, Era anyoomye kabaka ne kabona olw'okunyiiga kw'obusungu bwe. 
25_2_7_Mukama asudde ekyoto kye, atamiddwa awatukuvu we, Awaddeyo mu mukono gw'omulabe ebisenge by'amayumba gaamu: Bayoogaanidde mu nnyumba ya Mukama, nga ku lunaku olw'okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu. 
25_2_8_Mukama ateesezza okuzikiriza bbugwe ow'omuwala wa Sayuuni; Aleeze omugwa, omukono gwe taguzizzaayo okuleka okuzikiriza: Naye akungubazizza olukomera ne bbugwe; biggweerawo wamu. 
25_2_9_Emiryango gye gibulidde mu ttaka; azikirizza amenye ebisiba bye: Kabaka we n'abakungu be bah mu mawanga eteri mateeka; Weewaawo, banaabbi be tebalaba kwolesebwa okuvudde eri Mukama. 
25_2_10_Abakadde ab'omuwala wa Sayuuni batudde ku ttaka, basirise; Batadde enfuufu ku mitwe gyabwe; beesibye ebibukutu: Abawala ba Yerusaalemi bakoteka emitwe. 
25_2_11_Amaaso gange gaziba olw'amaziga, emmeeme yange yeeraliikiridde, Ekibumba kyange kifukiddwa ku ttaka olw'okuzikirira kw'omuwala w'abantu bange; Kubanga abaana abato n'abayonka bazirikira mu nguudo ez'omu kibuga. 
25_2_12_Bagamba bannyaabwe nti Etltlaano n'omwenge biri ludda wa? Bwe bazirikira ag'abaliko ebiwundu mu nguudo ez'omu kibuga, Emmeeme yaabwe bw'efukibwa mu kifuba kya bannyaabwe. 
25_2_13_Kiki kye nnaakutegeeza nga ndi mujulirwa gy'oli? kiki kye nnaafaananya naawe, ai omuwala wa Yerusaalemi? Kiki kye nnenkanya naawe, nkusanyuse, ai omuwala wa Sayuuni atamanyi musajja? Kubanga ekituli kyo kinene ng'ennyanja: ani ayinza okukuwonya? 
25_2_14_Bannabbi bo bakulabidde okwolesebwa okutaliimu okw'obusirusiru; So tebakunnyonnyodde obutali butuukirivu bwo, okukomyawo obusibe bwo: Naye bakulabidde emigugu egitaliimu n'ensonga ez'okugobebwa. 
25_2_15_Bonna abayitawo bakukubira mu ngalo; Basooza ne banyeenyereza omutwe gwabwe omuwala wa Yerusaalemi nga boogera nti Kino kye kibuga abantu kye baayitanga nti Obulungi obw'Abatuukirira, Essanyu ery'ensi zonna? 
25_2_16_Abalabe bo bonna bakwasamidde nnyo akamwa kaabwe; Basooza ne baluma obujigi; boogera nti Tumumize; Mazima luno lwe lunaku lwe twasuubira; tulusanze, tululabye. 
25_2_17_Mukama akoze ekyo kye yateesa; Atuukirizza ekigambo kye kye yalagira mu nnaku ez'edda; Asudde so tasaasidde: Era awadde omulabe okukusanyukirako, Agulumizizza ejjembe ly'abo abakukyawa. 
25_2_18_Omutima gwabwe gwakaabira Mukama: Ai bbugwe ow'omuwala wa Sayuuni, amaziga gakulukute ng'omugga emisana n'ekiro; Teweewummuza n'akatono; emmunye y'eriiso lyo terekangayo. 
25_2_19_Golokoka, okaabe ekiro ebisisimuka we bisookera; Fuka omutima gwo ng'amazzi mu maaso ga Mukama: Yimusa emikono gyo gy'ali olw'obulamu bw'abaana bo abato, Abaagala okufa enjala buli luguudo we lusibuka. 
25_2_20_Tunula, ai Mukama, olabe bw'ali gw'okoze bw'otyo Abakazi balirya ebibala byabwe, abaana ababuusibwabuusibwa mu mikono gyabwe? Kabona ne nnabbi balittirwa mu kifo ekitukuvu ekya Mukama 
25_2_21_Omulenzi n'omukadde bagalamidde ku ttaka mu nguudo; Abawala bange n'abalenzi bange ba gudde n'ekitala: Obattidde ku lunaku olw'obusungu bwo; osse so tosaasidde. 
25_2_22_Oyise entiisa zange okukuŋŋaana okuva enjuyi zonna nga ku lunaku olw'okukuntlaana okutukuvu, So tewali eyawona newakubadde eyasigalawo ku lunaku olw'obusungu bwa Mukama: Abo be nnabuusabuusa n'endera omulabe wange abamazeewo. 
25_3_1_Nze ndi muntu oyo eyalaba ennaku olw'omuggo ogw'obusungu bwe. 
25_3_2_Yantwala n'antambuliza mu kizikiza so si mu musana. 
25_3_3_Mazima tata kundeetako mukono gwe okuzibya obudde. 
25_3_4_Omubiri gwange n'eddiba lyange abikadiyizza; amenye amagumba gange. 
25_3_5_Anzimbiddeko n'anneetoolooza omususa n'okulumwa. 
25_3_6_Antuuzizza mu bifo eby'ekizikiza ng'abo abaafa edda. 
25_3_7_Ankomedde n'okuyinza ne siyinza kufuluma; azitoyezza olujegere lwange. 
25_3_8_Weewaawo, bwe nkaaba ne nkuba enduulu okubeerwa, aggalira okusaba kwange. 
25_3_9_Akomedde amakubo gange n'amayinja amateme, akyamizza empitiro zange. 
25_3_10_Ali gye ndi ng'eddubu eteega, ng'empologoma eri mu bifo eby'ekyama. 
25_3_11_Akyamizza olugendo lwange, n'antaagulataagula; ansamaalirizza. 
25_3_12_Anaanudde omutego gwe, n'anteekawo okuba sabbaawa w'akasaale. 
25_3_13_Ayingizizza mu mmeeme yange ebiri mu mufuko gwe. 
25_3_14_Nfuuse eky'okusekererwa eri abantu bange bonna; n'oluyimba lwabwe okuzibya obudde. 
25_3_15_Anzikusizza obubalagaze, annyiyizza abusinso, 
25_3_16_Era amenye amannyo gange n'oluyinjayinja, ambisseeko evvu. 
25_3_17_Era wayawula emmeeme yange okuba ewala n'emirembe; nneerabira omukisa bwe gufaanana. 
25_3_18_Ne njogera nti Amaanyi gabuze, n'okusuubira kwange okuva eri Mukama. 
25_3_19_Jjukira ennaku zange n'obuyinike bwange, abusinso n'omususa. 
25_3_20_Emmeeme yange ekyabijjukira, era ekutamye mu nda yange. 
25_3_21_Nkijjukira ekyo, kyenvudde mbeera n'okusuubira. 
25_3_22_Kwe kusaasira kwa Mukama ffe obutamalwawo, kubanga ekisa kye tekiggwaawo. 
25_3_23_Kiba kiggya buli nkya; obwesigwa bwo bungi. 
25_3_24_Mukama gwe mugabo gwange, emmeeme yange bw'eyogera; kyennaava mmusuubira. 
25_3_25_Mukama aba mulungi eri abo abamulindirira, eri emmeeme emunoonya. 
25_3_26_Kirungi omuntu okusuubiranga n'okulindiriranga obulokozi bwa Mukama ng'ateredde. 
25_3_27_Kirungi omuntu okusitula ekikoligo mu buto bwe. 
25_3_28_Atuule yekka asirike, kubanga akimutaddeko. 
25_3_29_Ateeke akamwa ke mu nfuufu oba nga mpozzi wanaabaawo okusuubira. 
25_3_30_Awe ettama lye eri oyo amukuba; akkute okuvumibwa. 
25_3_31_Kubanga Mukama talisuula annaku zonna. 
25_3_32_Kuba newakubadde ng'aleeta obuyinike, naye alikwatibwa ekisa ng'olufulube lw'okusaasira kwe bwe luli. 
25_3_33_Kubanga tagenderera kubonyaabonya newakubadde okuluma abaana b'abantu. 
25_3_34_Okulinnyirira n'ekigere abasibe bonna ab'omu nsi, 
25_3_35_Okukyamya ensonga y'amuntu mu maaso g'oyo ali waggulu ennyo, 
25_3_36_N'okulya ensonga, ebyo Mukama tabisiima. 
25_3_37_Ani oyo ayogera ne kituukirira, Mukama nga takiragidde? 
25_3_38_Mu kamwa k'oyo ali waggulu ennyo temuvaamu ebibi n'ebirungi? 
25_3_39_Omuntu omulamu yeemulugunyiza ki, omuntu olw'okubonerezebwa olw'ebibi bye? 
25_3_40_Tukebere tukeme emitima gyaffe, tulryukire nate eri Mukama. 
25_3_41_Tuyimuse emitima gyaffe wamu n'engalo zaffe eri Katonda mu gulu. 
25_3_42_Tusobezza era tujeemye; tosonyiye. 
25_3_43_Otubisseeko obusungu, n'otuyigganya; osse so tosaasidde. 
25_3_44_Weebisseeko ekire, okusaba kwafe kuleme okugguka okutuukayo. 
25_3_45_Otufudde ng'empitambi n'ebisasiro wakati mu mawanga. 
25_3_46_Abalabe baffe bonna batwasamidde nnyo akamwa kaabwe. 
25_3_47_Entiisa n'obunnya bitutuuseeko, okunyagibwa n'okuzikirira. 
25_3_48_Eriiso lyange likulukuta emigga egy'amazzi olw'okuzikirira kw'omuwala w'abantu bange. 
25_3_49_Eriiso lyange litonnya, terirekaayo, terita n'akatono, 
25_3_50_Okutuusa Mukama lw'anaatunula wansi n'alaba ng'ayima mu ggulu. 
25_3_51_Eriiso lyange linakuwaza emmeeme yange olw'abawala bonna ab'ekibuga kyange. 
25_3_52_Bancoccedde ddala nnyo ng'ennyonyi, ababa abalabe bange awatali nsonga. 
25_3_53_Bamazeewo obw’amu bwange mu nju ey'ebunnya, era bansuddeko ejjinja. 
25_3_54_Amazzi gaakulukuta ku mutwe gwange; ne njogera nti Mmaliddwawo. 
25_3_55_Nakaabira erinnya lyo, ai Mukama, nga nnyima mu nju ey'obunnya eya wansi ennyo. 
25_3_56_N'owulira eddoboozi lyange; tokisa kutu kwo kussa mukka kwange, okukaaba kwange. 
25_3_57_Wasembera ku lunaku kwe nnakukaabirira: n'oyogera nti Totya. 
25_3_58_Ai Mukama, wawoaa ensonga ez'emmeeme yange; wanunula obulamu bwange. 
25_3_59_Ai Mukama, olabye okujoogebwa kwange; nsalira omusango. 
25_3_60_Olabye eggwanga lyonna lye bawalana, n'enkwe zonna ze bansalira. 
25_3_61_Owulidde okuvuma kwabwe, ai Mukama, n'enkwe zonna ze bansalira; 
25_3_62_Emimwa gy'abo abangolokokerako n'ebyo bye bandowoolezaako okuzibya obudde. 
25_3_63_Tunuulira okutuula kwabwe n'okuyimuka kwabwe; nze ndi luyimba lwabwe, 
25_3_64_Olibasasula empeera, ai Mukama, ng'omulimu bwe guli ogw'emikono gyabwe. 
25_3_65_Olibawa omutima ogukakanyadde, ekikolimo kyo eri bo. 
25_3_66_Olibayigganya n'obusungu, n'obazikiriza okuva wansi w'eggulu lya Mukama. 
25_4_1_Zaabu ng'eyonoonese! zaabu ennungi ennyo nnyini nga efuuse! Amayinja ag'omu kifo ekitukuvu gafukibwa buli luguudo we lusibuka. 
25_4_2_Batabani ba Sayuuni ab'omuwendo omungi, abenkana zaabu ennungi, Nga bayitiddwa nsuwa za bbumba, omulimu gw'emikono gy'omubumbi! 
25_4_3_Era n'emisege giggyayo amabeere, giyonsa abaana baagyo: Omuwala w'abantu bange afuuse mukambwe nga bamaaya mu ddungu. 
25_4_4_Olulimi lw'omwana ayonka lwegasse n'ekibuno kye olw'ennyonta: Abaana abato basaba emmere, so tewali abagibegera. 
25_4_5_Abaalyanga nga beenaanya bawuubaalira mu nguudo: Abaakulira mu ngoye entwakaavu bawambaatira mmungo, 
25_4_6_Kubanga obutali butuukirivu bw'omuwala w'abantu bange businga obunene ekibi kya Sodomu, Ekyasuulibwa nga mu kaseera, so tewali eyakissaako omukono. 
25_4_7_Abakungu baali balongoofu okusinga omuzira, baali beeru okusinga amata, Emibiri gyabwe gyasinga amayinja amatwakaavu okumyuka, baali banyirivu nga safiro: 
25_4_8_Amaaso gaabwe gaasinga ekisiriiza okuddugala; tebaamanyibwa mu nguudo: Eddiba lyabwe lyegasse n'amagumba gaabwe; likaze, lifuuse ng'omuggo. 
25_4_9_Abattiddwa n'ekitala basinga abo abafudde enjala; Kubanga abo bayongobera nga bafumitiddwa olw'okubulwa ebibala eby'omu ntumiro. 
25_4_10_Abakazi ab'okusaasira okungi bafumbye abaana baabwe bo n'emikono gyabwe bo; Baabanga ba kulya gye bali mu kuzikirira kw'omuwala w'abantu bange. 
25_4_11_Mukama atuukirizza ekiruyi kye, era afukidde ddala obusungu bwe obukambwe; Era akumye omuliro mu Sayuuni ogwokezza emisingi gyakyo. 
25_4_12_Bakabaka b'ensi tebakkiriza, newakubadde bonna abatuula mu nsi zonna, Ng'omulabe n'oyo abakyawa agenda okuyingira mu miryango gy'e Yerusaalemi. 
25_4_13_Lwa bibi bya bannabbi baamu n'obutali butuukirivu bwa bakabona baamu, Abaayiwa omusaayi gw'abatuukirivu wakati mu kyo. 
25_4_14_Bawaba ng'abazibe b'amaaso mu nguudo, boonoonese n'omusaayi, N'okuyinza abantu ne batayinza kukoma ku byambalo byabwe. 
25_4_15_Muveewo, bwe baabalangira, nti Ekitali kirongoofu muveewo, muveewo, temukomako: Ewe badduka ne bawaba, abantu ne boogera mu mawanga nti Tebakyabeera wano nate. 
25_4_16_Obusungu bwa Mukama bubasaasaanyizza; takyassaayo mwoyo eri bo: Tebatya maaso ga bakabona, tebaganza bakadde. 
25_4_17_Amaaso gaffe gakyaziba nga tutunuulira okubeerwa kwaffe okutaliiko kye kugasa: Ewe twalindirira twalindirira eggwanga eritayinza kulokola. 
25_4_18_Bacocca ebisinde byaffe, n'okuyinza ne tutayinza kutambulira mu nguudo zaffe: Enkomerero yaffe eneetera kutuuka, ennaku zaffe zituukiridde; kubanga enkomerero yaffe etuuse. 
25_4_19_Abatuyigganya basinga embiro empungu ez'omu bbanga: Batucoccera ku nsozi, baatuteegera mu ddungu. 
25_4_20_Omukka ogw'omu nnyindo zaffe, oyo Mukama gwe yafukako amafuta, yakwatibwa mu bunaya bwabwe; Gwe twayogerako nti Tulituula mu mawanga wansi w'ekisiikirize ky'oyo. 
25_4_21_Sanyuka ojaguze, ai omuwala wa Edomu abeera mu nsi ya Uzi: Ekikompe kirigguka kirituuka ne ku ggwe; olitamiira ne weebikkula. 
25_4_22_Okubonereza obutali butuukirivu bwo kutuukiridde, ai omuwala wa Sayuuni; Takyakutwala nate mu busibe: Alibonereza obutali butuukiriw bwo, ai omuwala wa Edomu; Alikunnyonnyola ebibi byo. 
25_5_1_Jjukira, si Mukama, ebitujjidde: Tunula olabe okuvumibwa kwaffe. 
25_5_2_Obusika bwaffe bukyuse okuba obw'abanaggwanga, Ennyumba zaffe okuba ez'abatali ba muno. 
25_5_3_Tuli bamulekwa, so tetulina bakitaffe, Bannyaffe bali nga bannamwandu. 
25_5_4_Tunywedde amazzi gaffe lwa bintu; Enku zaffe bazituguza. 
25_5_5_Abatucocca batuuse ku nsingo zaffe: Tukooye so tetuliua kiwummulo. 
25_5_6_Tubagololedde Abamisiri emikono, N'Abasuuli olw'okukkuta emmere. 
25_5_7_Bakitaffe baayonoona so tebaliiwo; Naffe twetiase obutali butuukirivu bwabwe. 
25_5_8_Abaddu batufuga: Tewali wa kutulokola mu mukono gwabwe. 
25_5_9_Tufuna emmere yaffe lwa kusingawo bulamu bwaffe Olw'ekitala eky'omu ddungu. 
25_5_10_Eddiba lyaffe liddugadde ng'akabiga. Olw'olubugumu olw'enjala olwokya. 
25_5_11_Baakwatira abakazi mu Sayuuni, Abawala abatamanyi musajja mu bibuga bya Yuda. 
25_5_12_Abakungu baawanikibwa n'omukono gwabwe: Abalenzi baasitula olubengo, N'abaana abato beesittala nga beetikka enku. Amaaso g'abakadde tebaagassaamu kitiibwa. 
25_5_13_Abalenzi baasitula olubengo, N'abaana abato beesittala nga beetikka enku. 
25_5_14_Abakadde baweddewo mu mulyango Abalenzi baleseeyo okuyimba kwabwe. 
25_5_15_Essanyu ery'omu mutima gwaffe likomye: Okuzina kwaffe kufuuse okuwuubaala. 
25_5_16_Engule egudde evudde ku mutwe gwaffe: Zitusanze kubanga twonoonye. 
25_5_17_Omutima gwaffe kyeguvudde guyongobera; Olw'ebyo amaaso gaffe kyegavudde gayimbaala; 
25_5_18_Olw'olusozi lwa Sayuuni, olulekeddwawo; Ebibe bitambulira okwo. 
25_5_19_Ggwe, ai Mukama, obeerera ennaku zonna; Entebe yo ebaawo okuva ku mirembe okutuuka ku mirembe gyonna. 
25_5_20_Lwaki okutwerabira ennaku zonna, N'otuleka ebiro ebyenkanidde wano? 
25_5_21_Tukyuse gy'oli, ai Mukama, naffe tunaakyusibwa; Ennaku zaffe ozizze buggya ng'edda. 
25_5_22_Naye otusuulidde ddala, Otusunguwalidde nnyo. 
26_1_1_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'amakumi asatu mu mwezi ogw'okuna ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'okutaano, bwe nnali ndi mu basibe ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali, eggulu ne libikkulibwa, ne ndaba okwolesebwa kwa Katonda. 
26_1_2_Ku lunaku olw'okutaano olw'omwezi, gwe gwali omwaka ogw'okutaano ogw'okusibibwa kwa kabaka Yekoyakini, 
26_1_3_ekigambo kya Mukama ne kijjirira ddala Ezeekyeri kabona mutabani wa Buuzi mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali; omukono gwa Mukama ne gubeera ku ye eyo. 
26_1_4_Awo ne ntunula, era, laba, embuyaga ezikunta olw'amaanyi ne zifuluma obukiika obwa kkono, ekire ekinene n'omuliro ogw'ezingazinga n'okumasamasa okukyetoolodde, era mu gwo wakati ne muva ng'ebbala erya zaabu etabuddwamu effeeza, enva mu muliro wakati. 
26_1_5_Era mu gwo wakati ne muva ekifaananyi eky'ebiramu bina. N'embala yaabyo yali bw'eti; byalina ekifaananyi eky'omuntu. 
26_1_6_Era buli kimu kyalina obwenyi buna, era buli kimu ku byo kyalina ebiwaawaatiro bina. 
26_1_7_N'ebigere byabyo byali bigere bigolokofu; ne munda w'ebigere byabyo nga mufaanana munda w'ekigere ky'ennyana: era nga bitangalijja ng'ebbala ery'ekikomo ekizigule. 
26_1_8_Era byalina emikono gy'omuntu wansi w'ebiwaawaatiro byabyo ku mbiriizi zaabyo ennya: era ebyo ebina byalina obwenyi bwabyo n'ebiwaawaatiro byabyo bwe biti 
26_1_10_Ekifaananyi ky'obwenyi bwabyo, byalina obwenyi bw'omuntu; era ebyo ebina byalina obwenyi bw'empologoma ku lubiriizi olwa ddyo; era ebyo ebina byalina obwenyi bw'ente ku lubiriizi olwa kkono; ebyo byonna byalina n'obwenyi bw'empungu. 
26_1_11_N'obwenyi bwabyo n'ebiwaawaatiro byabyo byali nga byawuse waggulu; ebiwaawaatiro bibiri ebya buli kimu byagattibwa wamu, n'ebibiri byasaanikira emibiri gyabyo. 
26_1_12_Era buli kimu byagenda nga byesimbye: omwoyo gye gwabanga gugenda, gye byagenda; tebyakyuka bwe byagenda. 
26_1_13_Ekifaananyi ky'ebiramu ebyo, embala yaabyo yali ng'ebisiriiza eby'omuliro ebyaka, ng'embala ey'emimuli; yayambukanga n'ekkira wakati mu biramu ebyo: era omuliro nga gumasamasa ne mu muliro ne muva enjota. 
26_1_14_Ebiramu ne biddukana mbiro ne bikomawo ng'ekifaananyi eky'okumyansa kw'eggulu. 
26_1_15_Awo bwe nnali nga ntunuulira ebiramu ebyo, laba, nnamuziga ku ttaka ku mabbali g'ebiramu, buli bwenyi ku bwenyi bwabyo obuna nnamuziga omu. 
26_1_16_Embala eya bannamuziga n'omulimu gwabwe baafaanana ebbala erya berulo: era abo abana baalina ekifaananyi kimu: n'embala yaabwe n'omulimu gwabwe byali nga nnamuziga ali wakati wa nnamuziga. 
26_1_17_Bwe baatambulanga baatambuliranga ku mbiriizi zaabwe ennya: tebaakyuka bwe baatambula. 
26_1_18_Obwekulungirivu bwabwe bwali buwanvu, bwa ntiisa; era abo abana baalina obwekulungirivu bwabwe nga bujjudde amaaso enjuyi zonna. 
26_1_19_Era ebiramu bwe byatambulanga, bannamuziga baatambuliranga ku mabbali gaabyo: era ebiramu bwe byasitulibwanga okuva ku ttaka, bannamuziga baasitulibwanga. 
26_1_20_Omwoyo buli gye gwabanga gugenda, gye baagendanga; eyo omwoyo gye gwabanga gugenda: ne bannamuziga baasitulibwanga ku mabbali gaabyo; kubanga omwoyo ogw'ekiramu gwali mu bannamuziga. 
26_1_21_Ebyo bwe byatambulanga, ne bano baatambulanga; era ebyo bwe byayimiriranga, ne bano baayimiriranga; era ebyo bwe byasitulibwanga okuva ku ttaka, bannamuziga baasitulibwanga ku mabbali gaabyo: kubanga omwoyo ogw'ekiramu gwali mu bannamuziga. 
26_1_22_Era waggulu w'omutwe ogw'ekiramu waaliwo ekifaananyi eky'ebbanga, ng'ebbala erya kulusitalo ow'entiisa, nga kitimbibwa ku mitwe gyabyo waggulu. 
26_1_23_Era waasi w'ebbanga ebiwaawaatiro byabyo byali bigolokofu, ekimu kyalina bibiri ebyasaanikira eruuyi, na buli kimu kyalina bibiri ebyasaanikira eruuyi ku mibiri gyabyo. 
26_1_24_Era bwe byatambulanga, ne mpulira okuwuuma kw'ebiwaawaatiro byabyo ng'okuwuuma kw'amazzi amangi, ng'eddoboozi ly'Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna, okuwuuma okw'oluyoogaano ng'okuwuuma kw'eggye: bwe byayimiriranga, ne bissa ebiwaawaatiro byabyo. 
26_1_25_Era waaliwo eddoboozi waggulu w'ebbanga eryali waggulu w'emitwe gyabyo: bwe byayimiriranga, ne bissa ebiwaawaatiro byabyo. 
26_1_26_Era waggulu w'ebbanga eryali waggulu w'emitwe gyabyo kwaliko ekifaananyi eky'entebe, ng'embala ey'ejjinja eya safiro: ne ku kifaananyi eky'entebe kwaliko ekifaananyi ng'embala ey'omuntu ku yo waggulu. 
26_1_27_Ne ndaba ng'ebbala ery'ezaabu eta buddwamu effeeza, ng'embala ey'o muliro munda mu yo enjuyi zonna, okuva ku mbala y'ekiwato kye n'okwambuka; era okuva ku mbala y'ekiwato kye n'okukka, nalaba ng'embala ey'omuliro, era waaliwo okumasamasa okumwetoolodde. 
26_1_28_Ng'embala eya musoke aba ku kire ku lunaku olw'enkuba, bw'etyo bwe yali embala ey'okumasamasa enjuyi zonna. Eno ye yali embala ey'ekifaananyi eky'ekitiibwa kya Mukama. Awo bwe nnakiraba, ne nvuunama amaaso gange, ne mpulira eddoboozi ly'oyo eyayogera. 
26_2_1_N'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'o muntu, yimirira ku bigere bye nange naayogera naawe. 
26_2_2_Kale omwoyo ne guyingira mu nze bwe yayogera nange, ne gunnyimiriza ki bigere byange; ne mpulira oyo eya yogera nange. 
26_2_3_N'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, nkutuma eri abaana ba Isiraeri eri amawanga amajeemu, abanjeemedde: bo ne bajjajjaabwe bansobyanga oku tuukira ddala ku lunaku olwa leero. 
26_2_4_N'abaana ba kyejo, era ba mitima mikakanyavu; nkutuma eri abo: era olibagamba nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_2_5_Nabo, oba nga banaawulira, oba nga banaale kayo, (kubanga nnyumba njeemu era naye balimanya nga mu bo mubaddemu nnabbi. 
26_2_6_Naawe omwana w'omuntu, tobatyanga, so totyanga bigambo byabwe, newakubadde emyeramannyo n'amaggwa nga biri naawe, era ng'obeera mu njaba ez'obusagwa: totyanga bigambo byabwe, so tokeŋŋentererwanga olw'amaaso gaabwe, newakubadde nga nnyumba njeemu. 
26_2_7_Era olibagamba ebigambo byange oba nga banaawulira) oba nga banaalekayo: kubanga bajeemu nnyo nnyini. 
26_2_8_Naye ggwe, omwana w'omuntu, wulira kye nkugamba tobanga ggwe mujeemu ng'ennyumba eyo enjeemu: yasama akamwa ko olye ekyo kye nkuwa: 
26_2_9_Awo bwe nnatunula, laba, omukono gugololwa eri nze; era, laba, omuzingo gw'ekitabo nga guli omwo; 
26_2_10_n'egwanjululiza mu maaso gange; era gwawandiikibwa munda ne kungulu: era mwawandiikibwamu okuwuubaala n'okukungubaga n'obuyinike. 
26_3_1_Awo n'a ŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, lya ekyo ky'osanga; ya omuzingo guno, ogende ogambe ennyumba ya Isiraeri. 
26_3_2_Awo ne njasama akamwa kange n'andiisa omuzingo. 
26_3_3_N'aŋŋamba nti omwana w'omuntu, liisa olubuto wo, ojjuze ebyenda byo omuzingo guno gwe nkuwa. Kale ne ngulya, ne guba mu kamwa kange ng'omubisi gw'enjuki okuwoomerera. 
26_3_4_Awo n'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, genda otuuke eri ennyunba ya Isiraeri, oyogere nabo ebigambo byange. 
26_3_5_Kubanga totumiddwa eri eggwanga ery'enjogera gy'otomanyi era ab'olulimi oluzibu, wabula eri ennyumba ya Isiraeri 
26_3_7_Naye ennyumba ya Isiraeri tebalikuwulira; kubanga tebalimpulira nze: kubanga ennyumba yonna eya Isiraeri ba kyenyi kikalubo era ba mutima mukakanyavu. 
26_3_8_Laba, nkalubizza amaaso go awali amaaso gaabwe, n'ekyenyi kyo nkikalubizza awali ekyenyi kyabwe. 
26_3_9_Nfudde ekyenyi kyo ng'alimasi okukaluba okusinga ejjinja ery'embaalebaale: obatyanga, so tokeŋŋentererwanga olw'amaaso gaabwe, newakubadde iga nnyumba njeemu. 
26_3_10_Era nate n’aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, ebigambo byange byonna bye ndikubuulira, bikkirize mu mutima gwo, owulire n'amatu go. 
26_3_11_Era genda otuuke eri abo ab'obusibe, eri abaana ab'abantu bo, oyogere nabo obabuulire nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, oba nga banaawulira, oba nga banaalekayo. 
26_3_12_Awo omwoyo ne gunsitula, ne mpulira ennyuma wange eddoboozi ery'okuwulukuka okunene nga lyogera nti Ekitiibwa kya Mukama kyebazibwe okuva mu kifo kye. 
26_3_13_Awo ne mpulira okuwuuma kw'ebiwaawaatiro by'ebiramu nga bikomaganako, n'okuwuuma kwa bannamuziga ku mabbali gaabyo, okuwuuma okuwulukuka okunene. 
26_3_14_Awo omwoyo negunsitula ne guntwala: ne ŋŋenda nga ndiko obuyinike n'omwoyo gwange nga gubugumye, omukono gw'a Mukama ne guba gw'amaanyi ku nze. 
26_3_15_Awo ne ndyoka njija eri ab'obusibe e Terabibu, abaabeera ku mugga Kebali, ne mu kifo mwe baabeera; ne ntuula awo mu bo nga nsamaaliridde ne mmala ennaku musannvu. 
26_3_16_Awo olwatuuka ennaku musanvu bwe zaayitawo, ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_3_17_Omwana w'omuntu nkufudde omukuumi eri ennyumba ya Isiraeri: kale wulira ekigambo eky’omu kamwa kange, obawe okulaba okuva gye ndi. 
26_3_18_Bwe ŋŋamba omubi nti Toliirema kufa; naawe n'otomulabula so toyogera okulabula omubi okuva mu kkubo lye ebbi okuwonya obulamu bwe: omubi oyo alifiira mu butali butuukirivu bwe; naye omusaayi gwe ndiguvunaana mu mukono gwo. 
26_3_19_Era naye bw'olabula omubi, n’atakyuka okuleka obubi bwe newakubadde okuva mu kkubo lye ebbi, alifiira mu butali butuukirivu bwe; naye ggwe ng'owonyezza emmeeme yo. 
26_3_20_Nate omuntu omutuukirivu bw'akyuka okuleka obutuukirivu bwe, n'akola obutali butuukirivu, nange ne nteeka enkonge mu maaso ge, alifa: kubanga tomulabudde, alifiira mu kibi kye, n'ebikolwa bye ebituukirivu bye yakola tebirijjukirwa; naye omusaayi gwe ndiguvunaana mu mukono gwo. 
26_3_21_Era naye bw'olabula omuntu omutuukirivu, omutuukirivu aleme okukola ekibi n'atakola kibi, mazima aliba mulamu, kubanga alabuse; naawe ng'owonyezza emeeme yo. 
26_3_22_Awo omukono gw'a Mukama ne guba ku nze eyo; n'aŋŋamba nti Golokoka ofulume ogende mu lusenyi, nange ndyogerera naawe eyo. 
26_3_23_Awo ne ngolokoka ne nfuluma ne ŋŋenda mu lusenyi kale, laba, ekitiibwa kya Mukama nga kiyimiridde eyo, ng'ekitiibwa bwe kyali kye nnalaba ku lubalama lw'omugga Kebali ne nvuunama amaaso gange. 
26_3_24_Awo omwoyo ne guyingira mu nze ne gunnimiriza ku bigere byange, n'ayogera nange n'aŋŋamba nti Genda weggalire mu nnyumba yo. 
26_3_25_Naye ggwe, omwana w'omuntu, laba, balikussaako enjegere, ne bazikusibisa, so tolifuluma mu bo: 
26_3_26_era ndyegassa olulimi lwo n'ekibuno kyo, obeere kasiru era oleme okubeera gye bali anenya: kubanga nnyumba njeemu. 
26_3_27_Naye bwe njogera naawe, ndyasamya akamwa ko, naawe olibagamba nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Awulira awulire; n'oyo alekayo alekeyo; kubanga nnyumba njeemu. 
26_4_1_Era, omwana w'omuntu, weddirire ettoffaali oliteeke mu maaso go, oliwandiikeko ekibuga, Yerusaalemi: 
26_4_2_okizingize, okizimbireko ebigo, okituumireko ekifunvu; era teekawo ensiisira okukirumba, okisimbeko ebitomera enjuyi zonna. 
26_4_3_Era weddirire ekikalango eky'ekyuma okiteekewo okuba bbugwe ow'ekyuma wakati wo n'ekibuga: okisseeko amaaso go, kale kirizingizibwa, naawe olikizingiza. Ako kaliba kabonero eri ennyumba ya Isiraeri. 
26_4_4_Era nate galamiririra ku lubiriizi lwo olwa kkono, oluteekeko obutali butuukirivu bw'ennyumba ya Isiraeri: ng'omuwendo gw'ennaku bwe guliba z'oligalamiririra ku lwo, bw'olyetikka obutali butuukirivu bwabwe. 
26_4_5_Kubanga ntaddewo emyaka egy'obutali butuukirivu bwabwe okuba gy'oli omuwendo gw'ennaku, ennaku ebikumi bisatu mu kyenda: bw'otyo bw'olyetikka obutali butuukirivu obw'ennyumba ya Isiraeri. 
26_4_6_Era nate bw'oliba ng'omaze ezo, oligalamiririra ku lubiriizi lwo olwa ddyo, olyetikka obutali butuukirivu obw'ennyumba ya Yuda: ennaku amakumi ana, buli lunaku mwaka, bwe nnabuteekerawo gy'oli. 
26_4_7_Era osse amaaso go eri okuzingizibwa kwa Yerusaalemi, omukono gwo nga gubikkuddwako; era olikiragulirako. 
26_4_8_Era weetwalire eŋŋaano ne sayiri n'ebijanjaalo ne kawo n'omuwemba n'obulo, obiteeke mu kintu ekimu, weegoyere omugaati nabyo; ng'omuwendo gw'ennaku z'oligalamiririra ku lubiriizi lwo, ennaku ebikumi bisatu mu kyenda, bw'onooliirangako bw'otyo. 
26_4_9_Era weetwalire eŋŋaano ne sayiri n'ebijanjaalo ne kawo n'omuwemba n'obulo, obiteeke mu kintu ekimu, weegoyere omugaati nabyo; ng'omuwendo gw'ennaku z'oligalamiririra ku lubiriizi lwo, ennaku ebikumi bisatu mu kyenda, bw'onooliirangako bw'otyo. 
26_4_10_N'emmere yo gy'onoolyanga eneepimibwanga, sekeri amakumi abiri buli lunaku: onoogiriiranga mu ntuuko zaayo. 
26_4_11_Era onoonywanga amazzi agagerebwa, ekitundu ekya yini eky'omukaaga: onoonyweranga mu ntuuko zaago. 
26_4_12_Era onoogiryanga nga migaati gya sayiri, era onoogyokeranga mu mazzi agava mu bantu, bo nga balaba. 
26_4_13_Awo Mukama n'ayogera nti Era bwe batyo n'abaana ba Isiraeri banaalyanga emmere yaabwe nga si nnongoofu mu mawanga gye ndibagobera. 
26_4_14_Awo ne njogera nti Woowe, Mukama Katonda! Laba, emmeeme yange teyonoonebwanga: kubanga okuva ku buto bwange na buli kati siryanga ku ekyo ekifa kyokka newakubadde ekitaaguddwa ensolo; so n'ennyama ey'omuzizo teyingiranga mu kamwa kange. 
26_4_15_Awo n'alyoka aŋŋamba nti Laba, nkuwadde obusa bw'ente mu kifo ky'amazzi ag'abantu, era onoolongooserezanga okwo omugaati gwo. 
26_4_16_Era nate n'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, laba, ndimenya omuggo ogw'omugaati mu Yerusaalemi: kale banaalyanga omugaati nga bagupima era nga beeraliikirira; era banaanywanga amazzi nga bagagera era nga basamaalirira: 
26_4_17_babulwe omugaati n'amazzi, era basamaaliriragane, ne bayongoberera mu butali butuukirivu bwabwe. 
26_5_1_Naawe, omwana w'omuntu, ddira ekitala eky'obwogi, okyeddirire ng'akamwano ak'omumwi, okiyise ku mutwe gwo ne ku kirevu kyo: kale otwale eminzaani okupima, oyawule mu nviiri. 
26_5_2_Ekitundu eky'okusatu okyokeranga mu muliro wakati mu kibuga, ennaku ez'okuzingiza nga zituukiridde; n'ekitundu eky'okusatu okiddiranga, n'otema n'ekitala okukyetooloola; n'ekitundu eky'okusatu okisaasaanyizanga eri empewo, nange ndisowola ekitala ekiribagoberera. 
26_5_3_Era otwalangako omuwendo gwazo si nnyingi n'ozisiba mu kirenge kyo. 
26_5_4_Era ne ku ezo otwalangako, ozisuule mu muliro wakati, ozookere mu muliro; mu zo omuliro mwe guliva ogulibuna ennyumba yonna eya Isiraeri. 
26_5_5_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kino ye Yerusaalemi: nkitadde wakati mu mawanga, n'ensi zikyetoolodde. 
26_5_6_Era kyajeemera emisango gyange nga kikola obubi okusinga amawanga, era kijeemedde amateeka gange okusinga ensi ezikyetoolodde: kubanga bagaanyi emisango gyange, n'amateeka gange tebagatambuliddemu. 
26_5_7_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Kubanga muli ba mawaggali okukira amawanga agabeetoolodde, so temutambulidde mu mateeka gange, so temukutte misango gyange, so temukoze ng'ebiragiro bwe biri eby'amawanga agabeetoolodde 
26_5_9_Era ndikolera mu ggwe ekyo kye ssikolanga, era kye ssigenda kukola nate ekiri bwe kityo, olw'emizizo gyo gyonna. 
26_5_10_Bakitaabwe kyebaliva baliira abaana wakati mu ggwe, n'abaana balirya bakitaabwe: era ndituukiririza emisango mu ggwe, n'ekitundu kyo kyonna ekifisseewo ndikisaasaanyiza eri empewo zonna. 
26_5_11_Kale, nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, kubanga wayonoona awatukuvu wange n'ebibyo byonna eby'ebiwe n'ebibyo byonna eby'emizizo, nange kyendiva nkukendeeza; so n'amaaso gange tegalisonyiwa so nange sirikwatibwa kisa. 
26_5_12_Ekitundu kyo eky'okusatu kirifa kawumpuli, era balimalibwawo n'enjala wakati mu ggwe; n'ekitundu eky'okusatu kirigwa n'ekitala okukwetooloola; n'ekitundu eky'okusatu ndikisaasaanyiza eri empewo zonna, n'ensowola ekitala ekiribagoberera. 
26_5_13_Obusungu bwange bwe bulituukirira bwe butyo, era ndikkusa ekiruyi kyange ku bo, kale ndisanyusibwa: kale balimanya nga nze Mukama njogedde olw'obunyiikivu bwange, bwe ndimala okutuukiririza ku bo ekiruyi kyange. 
26_5_14_Era nate ndikufuula amatongo n'ekivume mu mawanga gonna agakwetoolodde, abo bonna abayitawo nga balaba. 
26_5_15_Awo kiriba kivume n'ekikiino ekiyigirwako era ekisamaalirirwa eri amawanga agakwetoolodde, bwe ndituukiririza emisango mu ggwe nga ndiko obusungu n'ekiruyi, era nga nnenya n'ekiruyi: nze Mukama nkyogedde 
26_5_16_bwe ndibaweerezaako obusaale obubi obw'enjala obw'okuzikiriza bwe ndiweereza okubazikiriza: era ndyongera ku mmwe enjala, era ndimenya omuggo gwammwe ogw'omugaati; 
26_5_17_era ndibaweerezaako enjala n'ensolo embi, era zirikufiiriza; era kawumpuli n'omusaayi biriyita mu ggwe; era ndikuleetako ekitala: nze Mukama nkyogedde. 
26_6_1_Era ekigambo lya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_6_2_Omwana w'omuntu, osse amaaso ge eri ensozi za Isiraeri, oziragule, oyogere nti 
26_6_3_Mmwe ensozi za Isiraeri muwulire ekigambo kya Mukama Katonda: bw'ati Mukama Katonda bw'agamba ensozi n'obusozi, emigga n'ebiwonvu, nti Laba, nze, nze mwene, ndibaleetako ekitala, eri ndizikiriza ebifo byammwe ebigulumivu. 
26_6_4_N'ebyoto byammwe birirekebwawo, n'ebifaananyi byammwe eby'enjuba birimenyeka: eri ndisuula abasajja bammwe abattibwa mu maaso g'ebifaananyi byammwe. 
26_6_5_Era ndigalamiza emirambo gy'abaana ba Isiraeri mu maaso g'ebifaananyi byabwe, era ndisaasaanya amagumba gammwe okwetooloola ebyoto byammwe. 
26_6_6_Mu bifo byonna mwe mubeera ebibuga birizisibwa, n'ebifo ebigulumivu birirekebwawo: ebyoto byammwe bizisibwe era birekebwewo, n'ebifaananyi byammwe bimenyeke biggweewo, n'ebifaananyi byammwe eby'enjuba bitemerwe ddala, n’emirimu gyammwe giggibwewo. 
26_6_7_Kale abattibwa baligwa wakati mu mmwe, era mulimanya nga nze ndi Mukama 
26_6_8_Era naye ndireka ekitundu ekifisseewo, kubanga muliba n'abamu abaliwona ekitala mu mawanga, bwe mulisaasaanyizibwa mu nsi nnyingi. 
26_6_9_Kale abo abaliwona ku mmwe balinjijukira nga bayima mu mawanga gye balitwalibwa mu basibe, bwe nnamenyeka olw’omutima gwabwe omwenzi, oguvudde ku nze, n'olw'amaaso gaabwe agagenda nga gayenda okuberera ebifaananyi byabwe: kale balyetamwa mu maaso gaabwe bo olw’obubi bwe bakola mu mizizo gyabwe gyonna. 
26_6_10_Era balimanya nga nze Mukama: saayogerera bwereere nga ndibakola obubi buno. 
26_6_11_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kuba n'omukono gwo, era samba n'ekigere kyo, oyogere nti Woowe! olw'emizizo gyonna emibi egy'ennyumba ya Isiraeri: kubanga baligwa n'ekitala n'enjala ne kawumpuli. 
26_6_12_Ali ewala alifa kawumpuli; n'oyo ali okumpi aligwa n’ekitala; n'oyo asigalawo n’azingizibwa alifa enjala: bwe ntyo bwe ndituukiririza ekiruyi kyange ku bo. 
26_6_13_Nammwe mulimanya nga nze ndi Mukama, abasajja baabwe abattiddwa bwe baliba mu bifaananyi byabwe okwetooloola ebyoto byabwe, ku buli lusozi oluwanvu, ku ntikko zonna ez'ensozi ne wansi wa buli muti ogwera ne wansi wa buli mwera omuziyivu, ekifo mwe baweerangayo evvumbe eddungi eri ebifaananyi byabwe byonna. 
26_6_14_Nange ndibagololerako omukono gwange ne ndekesawo ensi ne ngizisa, okuva ku ddungu e Dibula, okubuna ennyumba zaabwe zonna: kale balimanya nga nze ndi Mukama. 
26_7_1_Era nate ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_7_2_Naawe, omwana w'omuntu, bw'ati Mukama Katonda bw'agamba ensi a Isiraeri nti Enkomerero: enkonerero yennyini etuuse ku nsonda ennya ez'ensi. 
26_7_3_Kaakano enkonerero ekutuuseeko, nange ndikuweereza ku busungu bwange, era ndikusalira omusango ng'amakubo go bwe gali; era ndikuleetako emisizo gyo gyonna. 
26_7_4_So n'eriiso lyange teririkusonyiwa so sirikwatibwa kisa: naye ndikuleetako amakubo go, n'emizizo gyo giriba mu ggwe wakati: kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_7_5_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Akabi, akabi kamu: laba, kajja. 
26_7_6_Enkomerero etuuse, enkomerero yennyini etuuse, ezuukuka eri ggwe: laba, ejja. 
26_7_7_Omusango gwo gutuuse gy'oli, ai ggwe atuula mu nsi: ekiseera kituuse, olunaku luli kumpi; olunaku olw'okusasamaliramu so si lwa kwogereramu waggulu n'essanyu, ku nsozi. 
26_7_8_Kaakano naatera okufukira ddala ekiruyi kyange ku ggwe, ne ntuukiriza obusungu bwange eri ggwe, ne nkusalira omusango ng'amakubo go bwe gali; era ndikuleetako emizizo gyo gyonna. 
26_7_9_So n'eriiso lyange teririsonyiwa so sirikwatibwa kisa: ndikuleetako ng'amakubo go bwe gali, n'emizizo gyo giriba mu ggwe wakati; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama nkuba. 
26_7_10_Laba, olunaku, laba, lujja: omusango gwo gufulumye; omuggo gwanyizza, amalala gamulisizza. 
26_7_11_Ekyejo kigolokose okuba omuggo ogw'obubi; tewaliba ku bo abalisigalawo, newakubadde olufulube lwabwe newakubadde obugagga bwabwe: so tewaliba bukulu mu bo. 
26_7_12_Ekiseera kiruuse, olunaku lusembedde kumpi: agula aleme okusanyuka, so n'atunda aleme okunakuwala: kubanga obusungu buli ku lufulube lwabwe lwonna. 
26_7_13_Kubanga atunda talidda eri ekyo ekitundibwa, newakubadde nga bakyali balamu: kubanga okwolesebwa kwa lufulube lwabwe lwonna, tewaliba alidda; so tewaliba alyenyweza mu butali butuukirivu obw'obulamu bwe. 
26_7_14_Bafuuye ekkondeere bategese byonna; nave tewali agenda mu lutalo: kubanga obusungu bwange buli ku lufulube lwabwe lwonna. 
26_7_15_Ekitala kiri bweru, ne kawumpuli n'enjala biri munda: ali mu nnimiro alifa n'ekitala; n'oyo ali mu kibuga enjala ne kawumpuli birimulya. 
26_7_16_Naye abo abaliwonawo ku bo baliwona, era baliba ku nsozi nga bukaamukuukulu obw'omu biwonvu, bonna nga bawuubaala, buli muntu mu butali butuukirivu bwe. 
26_7_17_Emikono gyanna giriyongobera, n'amaviivi gonna galiba manafu ng'amazzi. 
26_7_18_Era balyesiba ebibukutu, n'ensisi eribabikkako; n'ensonyi ziribeera ku maaso gonna, n'emitwe gyabwe gyonna giribaako ebiwalaata. 
26_7_19_Balisuula effeeza yaabwe mu nguudo, ne zaabu yaabwe eriba ng'ekintu ekitali kirongoofu; effeeza yaabwe ne zaabu yaabwe tebiriyinza kubawonya ku lunaku olw'obusungu bwa Mukama; tebalyekkusa mmeeme zaabwe, so tebalyejjuza mbuto zaabwe: kubanga ebyo bye byabanga enkonge ey'obutali butuukirivu bwabwe. 
26_7_20_Obulungi obw'obuyonjo bwe yabusimba mu bukulu: naye ne bakolera ebifaananyi eby'emizizo gyabwe n'ebintu byabwe eby'ebivve omwo: kyenvudde mbufuula gye bali ng'ekintu ekitali kirongoofu. 
26_7_21_Era ndibuwaayo mu mikono gya bannaggwanga okuba omunyago, n'eri ababi ab'omu nsi okuba eky'okugereka; era balibwonoona. 
26_7_22_Era ndikyusa n'amaaso gange okugabaggyako, era bo balyonoona ekifo kyange eky'ekyama: era abanyazi balikiyingiramu ne bakyonoona. 
26_7_23_Kola olujegere: kubanga ensi ejjudde emisango egy'omusaayi, era ekibuga kijjudde ekyejo. 
26_7_24_Kyendiva ndeeta bannaggwanga abasinga obubi, ne balya ennyumba zaabwe: era ndikomya amalala ag'ab'amaanyi; n'ebifo byabwe ebitukuvu biryonoonebwa. 
26_7_25_Okuzikirira kujja; era balinoonya emirembe, kale nga tewali. 
26_7_26_Walijja akabi ku kabi, era waliwulirwa ebigambo ku bigambo; era balinoonya okwolesebwa eri nnabbi; nave amateeka galibula awali kabona, n'okuteesa awali abakadde. 
26_7_27_Kabaka aliwuubaala, n'omukungu alyambala obuyinike, n'emikono gy'abantu ab'omu nsi giryeraliikirira: ndibakola ng'ekkubo lyabwe bwe liri, era nga bwe basaanidde bwe ndibasalira omusango; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_8_1_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'omukaaga mu mwezi ogw'omukaaga ku lunaku oIw'okutaano olw'omwezi, bwe nnali nga ntudde mu nnyumba yange n'abakadde ba Yuda nga batudde mu maaso gange, omukono gwa Mukama Katonda ne gugwira eyo ku nze. 
26_8_2_Awo ne ntunula, era, laba, ekifaananyi ekyali ng'embala ey'omuliro; okuva ku mbala ey'ekiwato kye ne wansi, muliro: n'okuva ku kiwato kye n'okwambuka, ng'embala ey'okumasamasa, ng'ebbala lya zaabu etabuddwamu effeeza. 
26_8_3_Awo n'agolola ekyali ng'omukono n'ankwata ku muvumbo gw'enviiri ez'oku mutwe gwange; omwoyo ne gunsitula wakati w'ensi n'eggulu ne guntwala e Yerusaalemi mu kwolesebwa kwa Katonda, eri oluggi olw'omulyango ogw'oluggya olw'omunda, ogutunuulira obukiika obwa kkono; awali entebe ey'ekifaananyi eky'obuggya ekireeta obuggya. 
26_8_4_Awo, laba, ekitiibwa kya Katonda wa Isireaeri kyali eyo ng'embala bwe yali gye nnalabira mu lusenyi. 
26_8_5_Awo n'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, yimusa amaaso go kaakano eri ekkubo erigenda obukiika obwa kkono. Awo ne nnyimusa amaaso gange eri ekkubo erigenda obukiika obwa kkono, kale, laba, ekifaananyi kino eky'obuggya nga kiri mu mulyango ku luuyi olw'obukiika obwa kkono olw'omulyango ogw'ekyoto. 
26_8_6_Awo n'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, olaba kye bakola? olaba emizizo emikulu ennyumba ya Isiraeri gye bakolera wano, ndyoke nneesambe wala awatukuvu wange? naye onoolaba nate n'emizizo emirala emikulu. 
26_8_7_Awo n'andeeta ku luggi olw'oluggya; awo bwe nnatunula, laba, ekituli nga kiri mu kisenge. 
26_8_8_Awo n'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, sima nno mu kisenge awo bwe nnamala okusima mu kisenge, laba, oluggi. 
26_8_9_N'aŋŋamba nti Yingira olabe emizizo egy'obubi gye bakolera wano. 
26_8_10_Awo ne nnyingira ne ndaba; era, laba, buli ngeri ey'ebyewalula n'ensolo ez'emizizo n'ebifaananyi byonna eby'ennyumba ya Isiraeri nga bitoneddwa ku kisenge enjuyi zonna. 
26_8_11_Era nga wayimiridde mu maaso gaabyo abasajja nsanvu ku bakadde ab'omu nnyumba ya Isiraeri, ne wakati mu bo nga muyimiridde Yaazaniya mutabani wa Safani, buli muntu ng'akutte ekyoterezo kye mu mukono gwe; akaloosa ak'ekire eky'obubaane ne kanyooka. 
26_8_12_Awo n'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, olabye abakadde ab'omu nnyumba ya Isiraeri kye bakolera mu kizikiza, buli muntu mu bisenge bye ebirimu ebifaananyi? kubanga boogera nti Mukama tatulaba; Mukama yaleka ensi. 
26_8_13_Era n'aŋŋamba nti Era onoolaba nate n'emizizo emirala emikulu gye bakola. 
26_8_14_Awo n'andeeta eri oluggi olw'omulyango ogw'ennyumba ya Mukama ogwayolekera obukiika obwa kkono; awo, laba, abakazi nga batudde eyo nga bakaabira Tammuzi. 
26_8_15_Awo n'arlgamba nti Olabye, omwana w'omuntu? era onoolaba nate emizizo egisinga gino obukulu. 
26_8_16_Awo n'andeeta mu luggya olw'omunda olw'ennyumba ya Mukama, kale, laba, ku luggi olwa yeekaalu ya Mukama wakati w'ekisasi n'ekyoto nga waliwo abasajja ng'amakumi abiri mu bataano, abakubye enkoona yeekaalu ya Mukama n'amaaso gaabwe nga gatunuulira ebuvanjuba; era nga basinza enjuba nga batunuulira ebuvanjuba. 
26_8_17_Awo n'aŋŋamba nti Olabye, omwana w'omuntu? kigambo kyangu eri ennyumba ya Yuda nga bakola emizizo gye bakolera wano? kubanga bajjuzizza ensi ekyejo, era bakyuse nate okunsunguwaza: era, laba, basembeza ettabi ku nnyindo yaabwe. 
26_8_18_Era nange kyendiva nkola n'ekiruyi: eriiso lyange teririsonyiwa so sirikwatibwa kisa: era newakubadde nga bakaaba n'eddoboozi ddene mu matu gange, siribawulira. 
26_9_1_Awo n'ayogerera waggulu n'eddoboozi ddene mu matu gange ng'ayogera nti Sembeza abo abakulira ekibuga, buli muntu ng'akutte ekyokulwanyisa kye ekizikiriza mu mukono gwe. 
26_9_2_Kale, laba, abasajja mukaaga ne bajja nga bafuluma mu kkubo ery'omulyango ogw'engulu ogwolekera obukiika obwa kkono, buli muntu ng'akutte ekyokulwanyisa kye ekitta mu mukono gwe; n'omusajja omu wakati mu bo ayambadde bafuta ng'alina ekikompe kya bwino eky'omuwandiisi mu kiwato. Ne bayingira ne bayimirira ku mabbali g'ekyoto eky'ekikomo. 
26_9_3_Awo ekitiibwa kya Katonda wa Isiraeri kyali kirinnye okuva ku kerubi kwe kyali okutuuka ku mulyango ogw'ennyumba: n'ayita omusajja ayambadde bafuta eyalina ekikompe kya bwino eky'omuwandiisi mu kiwato. 
26_9_4_Awo Mukama n'amugamba nti Genda oyite wakati mu kibuga, wakati mu Yerusaalemi, oteeke akabonero ku byenyi by'a bantu abassa ebikkowe era abakaabira emizizo gyonna egikolerwa wakati mu kyo. 
26_9_5_N'abalala n'abagamba nze nga mpulira nti Mmw muyite mu kibuga nga mumuvaako ennyuma mufumite: eriiso lyammwe lireme okusonyiwa so temubanga na kisa: 
26_9_6_muttire ddala omukadde n'omulenzi n'omuwala n'abaana abato n'abakazi: naye temusembereranga muntu yenna aliko akabonero era musookere ku watukuvu wange. Awo ne basookera ku bakadde abaali mu maaso g'ennyumba 
26_9_7_N'abagamba nti Ennyumba mugyonoone, mujjuze empya abattibwa: mufulume. Awo ne bafuluma ne bafumitira mu kibuga. 
26_9_8_Awo olwatuuka bwe baali nga bafumita nange nga nsigaddewo, ne nvuunama amaaso gange ne nkaaba ne njogera nti Woowe, Mukama Katonda! onoozikiriza Isiraeri yenna afisseewo, ng'ofukira ddala ekiruyi kye ku Yerusaalemi? 
26_9_9_Awo n'aŋŋamba nti Obutali butuukirivu bw'ennyumba ya Isiraeri ne Yuda bungi nnyo nnyini, n'ensi ejjudde omusaayi, n'ekibuga kijjudde okulya ensonga: kubanga boogera nti Mukama yaleka ensi, so Mukama talaba. 
26_9_10_Era nange eriiso lyange teririsonyiwa so sirisaasira, naye ndireeta ekkubo lyabwe ku mutwe gwabwe. 
26_9_11_Kale, laba, omusajja ayambadde bafuta eyalina ekikompe ekya bwino mu kiwato n'azza ebigambo ng'ayogera nti Nkoze nga bw'ondagidde. 
26_10_1_Awo ne ntunula, era, laba; mu bbanga eryali waggulu w'omutwe gwa bakerubi ne walabika waggulu waabwe ng'ejjinja erya safiro ng'embala ey'ekifaananyi eky'entebe. 
26_10_2_N'agamba omusajja ayambadde bafuta n'ayogera nti Yingira wakati wa bannamuziga abeetooloola abawulukuka, wansi wa kerubi, ojjuze ebibatu byo byombi ebisiriiza eby'omuliro ebiva wakati wa bakerubi, obimansire ku kibuga. Awo n'ayingira nze nga ndaba. 
26_10_3_Era bakerubi baali bayimiridde ku luuyi olw'ennyumba olwa ddyo omusajja bwe yayingira; ekire ne kijjuza oluggya olw'omunda. 
26_10_4_Ekitiibwa kya Mukama ne kirimya okuva ku kerubi, ne kiyimirira waggulu ku mulyango ogw'ennyumba; ennyumba n'ejjula ekire, oluggya ne lujjula okumasamasa okw'edtiibwa kya Mukama. 
26_10_5_N'okuwuuma kw'ebiwaawaatiro bya kerubi ne kuwulirwa okutuuka ne mu luggya olw'ebweru, ng'eddoboozi lya Katonda Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna Wayogera. 
26_10_6_Awo olwatuuka bwe yalagira omusajja ayambadde bafuta ng'ayogera nti Ggya omuliro wakati wa bannamuziga abeetooloola abavulukuka wakati wa bakerubi, n'ayingira n'ayimirira ku mabbali ga mamuziga. 
26_10_7_Awo kerubi n'agoola omukono gwe ng'ayima wakati va bakerubi eri omuliro ogwali wakati wa bakerubi n'atwalako, n'agueeka mu mikono gy'oyo ayambadde bafuta, oyo n'agutoola n'afuluma. 
26_10_8_Awo ne walabika mu bakerubi embala ey'omukono gw'omuntu wansi w'ebiwaawaatiro byabwe. 
26_10_9_Awo ne ntunula, era, laba, bannamuziga bana nga bali ku mabbali ga bakerubi, nnamuziga omu ng'ali ku mabbali ga kerubi omu, ne nnamuziga omulala ng'ali ku mabbali ga kerubi omulala: n'embala eya bannamuziga rali ng'ebbala ery'ejjinja erya berulo. 
26_10_10_N'embala yaabwe, abo abana baalina ekifaananyi kimu, kwenkana mamuziga ng'ali munda wa nnamuziga. 
26_10_11_Bwe baatambulanga, ne batambulira ku mbiriizi zaabwe ennya: tebaakyuka bwe baatambula, naye mu kifo omutwe gye gwatunulanga, ne bagugobereranga tebaakyuka me baatambula. 
26_10_12_N'omubiri gwabwe gwonna n'amabega gaabwe n'emikono gyabwe n'ebiwaawaatiro byabwe ne bannamuziga byali bijudde amaaso enjuyi zonna, bannanuziga abo abana be baalina. 
26_10_13_Bannamuziga, baabayita nze nga mpulira bannamuziga abeetooloola abawulukuka. 
26_10_14_Era buli omu yalina obwenyi buna: obwenyi obw'olubereberye bwali bwenyi bwa kerubi, n'obwenyi obw'okubiri bwali bwenyi bwa muntu, n'obwenyi obw'okusatu bwenyi bwa mpologoma, n'obw'okuna bwenyi bwa mpungu. 
26_10_15_Era bakerubi baalinnya waggulu: ekyo kye kiramu kye nnalabira ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali. 
26_10_16_Era bakerubi bwe baatambulanga, bannamuziga ne batambulira ku mabbali gaabwe: era bakerubi bwe baayimusanga ebiwaawaatiro byabwe okulinnya okuva ku ttakka, so ne bannamuziga tebaakyukanga okuva ku mabbali gaabwe. 
26_10_17_Abo bwe baayimiriranga, ne bano ne bayimirira; era bo bwe balinnyanga waggulu, ne bano ne balinnyira wamu nabo: kubanga omwoyo gw'ekiramu gwali mu bo. 
26_10_18_Awo ekitiibwa kya Mukama ne kifuluma okuva waggulu ku mulyango gw'ennyumba ne kiyimirira waggulu wa bakerubi. 
26_10_19_Era bakerubi baayimusa ebiwaawaatiro byabwe ne balinnya okuva ku ttaka nze nga ndaba bwe baafuluma, ne bannamuziga ku mabbali gaabwe: era baayimirira ku luggi olw'omulyango ogw'ebuvanjuba ogw'ennyumba ya Mukama; era ekitiibwa kya Katonda wa Isiraeri kyali ku bo waggulu. 
26_10_20_Ekyo kye kiramu kye nnalaba wansi wa Katonda wa Isiraeri ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali; ne mmanya nga be bakerubi. 
26_10_21_Buli omu yalina obwenyi buna kinnoomu, era buli omu ebiwaawaatiro bina; n'ekifaananyi eky'emikono gy'omuntu kyali wansi w'ebiwaawaatiro byabwe. 
26_10_22_Era ekifaananyi eky'obwenyi bwabwe, bwe bwali obwenyi bwe nnalabira ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali, embala zaabwe nabo bennyini; bonna baatambulanga nga beesimba. 
26_11_1_Era nate omwoyo ne gunsitula ne guntwala eri omulyango ogw'ebuvanjuba ogw'ennyumba ya Mukama ogutunuulira ebuvanjuba: kale, laba, ku luggi olw'omulyango nga, kuliko abasajja amakumi abiri mu bataano; ne ndaba wakati mu bo Yaazaniya mutabani wa Azuli ne Peratiya mutabani wa Benaya, abakungu ab'omu bantu. 
26_11_2_N'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, bano be basajja abagunja obutali butuukirivu, era abawa okuteesa okubi mu kibuga kino: 
26_11_3_aboogera nti Ekiseera tekiri kumpi okuzimba ennyumba: ekibuga kino ye ntamu, naffe nnyama. 
26_11_4_Kale obalagulireko, lagula, ai omwana w'omuntu. 
26_11_5_Awo omwoyo gwa Mukama ne gungwako, n'aŋŋamba nti Yogera nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Bwe mutyo bwe mwogedde, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri; kubanga mmanyi ebigambo ebiyingira mu mwoyo gwammwe. 
26_11_6_Mwazizza abammwe abattibwa mu kibuga kino, era mujjuzizza enguudo zaakyo abo abattibwa. 
26_11_7_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Abammwe abattibwa be mutadde wakati mu kyo, abo ye nnyama, n'ekibuga ye ntamu: naye mmwe muliggibwa wakati mu kyo. 
26_11_8_Mutidde ekitala; nange ndibaleetako ekitala, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_11_9_Era ndibaggya wakati mu kyo, ne mbawaayo mu mikono gya bannaggwanga, era ndituukiriza mu mmwe emisango. 
26_11_10_Muligwa n'ekitala; ndibasalira omusango mu nsalo ya Isiraeri; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_11_11_Muligwa n'ekitala; ndibasalira omusango mu nsalo ya Isiraeri; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_11_12_kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama: kubanga temutambulidde mu mateeka gange, so temutuukirizza misango gyange, naye mukoze ng'ebiragiro bwe biri eby'amawanga agabeetoolodde 
26_11_13_Awo olwatuuka bwe nnalagula, Peratiya mutabani wa Benaya n'afa. Awo ne nvuunama amaaso gange, ne nkaaba n'eddoboozi ddene ne njogera nti Woowe, Mukama Katonda! onoomaliwaro ddala ekitundu kya Isiraeri ekifisseewo? 
26_11_14_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_11_15_Omwana w'omuntu, baganda bo, abasajja ab'ekika kyammwe, n'ennyumba yonna eya Isiraeri, bonna, be baabo abagambiddwa abo abali mu Yerusaalemi nti Mwesambe wala Mukama: ffe ensi eno etuweereddwa okuba obutaka: 
26_11_16_kale yogera nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kubanga nabajjulula ne mbatwala wala mu mawanga, era kubanga mbasaasaanyizza mu nsi nnyingi era naye ndiba gye bali ekifo ekitukuvu ekiseera ekitono mu nsi gye batuuse. 
26_11_17_Kale yogera nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ndibakuŋŋaanya okubaggya mu mawanga, ne mbayoola okubaggya mu nsi mwe mwasaasaanyizibwa, era ndibawa ensi ya Isiraeri. 
26_11_18_Kale balijjayo, ne baggyawo ebintu byayo byonna eby'ebiwe n'emizizo gyayo gyonna ne bagimalayo. 
26_11_19_Era ndibawa omutima gumu, era nditeeka omwoyo omuggya mu mmwe; era ndiggya omutima ogw'ejjinja mu mutima gwabwe, ne mbawa omutima ogw'e nnyama: 
26_11_20_balyoke batambulirenga mu mateeka gange ne bakwata ebyo bye nnassaawo ne babikola: era banaabanga bantu bange, nange naabanga Katonda waabwe. 
26_11_21_Naye abo, omutima gwabwe gutambula okugoberera omutima ogw'ebintu byabwe eby'ebiwe n'emizizo gyabwe, ndireeta ekkubo lyabwe ku mitwe gyabwe bo, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_11_22_Awo bakerubi ne balyoka bayimusa ebiwaawaatiro byabwe, ne bannamuziga nga bali ku mabbali gaabwe; n'ekitiibwa kya Katonda wa Isiraeri kyali ku bo waggulu. 
26_11_23_N'ekitiibwa kya Mukama ne kirinnya okuva wakati mu kibuga, ne kiyimirira ku lusozi oluli ku luuyi lw'ekibuga olw'ebuvanjuba. 
26_11_24_Omwoyo ne gunsitula ne guntwalira mu kwolesebwa olw'omwoyo gwa Katonda e Bukaludaaya eri ab'obusibe. Awo okwolesebwa kwe nnali ndabye ne kulinnya okunvaako. 
26_11_25_Awo ne njogera n'ab'obusibe ebigambo byonna Mukama bye yali andaze. 
26_12_1_Era ekigambo kya Mukama kyanjijira nga kyogera 
26_12_2_Omwana w'omuntu, obeera wakati mu nnyumba eyo enjeemu abalina amaaso ag'okulaba so tebalaba, abalina amatu ag'okuwulira so tebawulira; kubanga nnyumba njeemu. 
26_12_3_Kale, ggwe omwana. w'omuntu, weetegekere ebintu eby'obuwaŋŋanguse, ositule okusenguka misana bo nga balaba; era olisenguka mu kifo kyo n'odda mu kifo ekirala bo nga balaba: mpozzi balirowooza, newakubadde nga nnyumba njeemu. 
26_12_4_Era oliggyamu ebintu misana bo nga balaba, ng'ebintu eby'obuwaŋŋanguse: era olivaamu wekka akawungeezi bo nga balaba, ng'abantu bwe bavaamu abagobebwa ewaabwe.
