26_12_5_Sima ekisenge bo nga balaba, oyiseemu ebintu. 
26_12_6_Bisitulire ku kibegabega kyo bo nga balaba, obifulumye ekizikiza nga kikutte; olibikka ku maaso go oleme okulaba ettaka: kubanga nkutaddewo okuba akabonero eri ennyumba ya Isiraeri. 
26_12_7_Awo ne nkola bwe ntyo nga bwe nnalagirwa: naggyamu ebintu byange emisana ng'ebintu eby'obuwaŋŋanguse, akawungeezi ne nsima ekisenge n'omukono gwange; ne mbiggyamu ekizikiza nga kikutte, ne mbisitulira ku kibegabega kyange bo nga balaba. 
26_12_8_Awo enkya ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_12_9_Omwana w'omuntu, ennyumba ya Isiraeri, ennyumba enjeemu, tebakugambye nti Okola ki? 
26_12_10_Bagambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Omugugu guno gwa mulangira wa mu Yerusaalemi n'ennyumba yonna eya Isiraeri be balimu. 
26_12_11_Yogera nti Nze ndi kabonero kammwe: nga bwe nkoze, bwe batyo bwe balikolwa: baligobebwa ewaabwe okugenda mu busibe. 
26_12_12_N'omulangira ali mu bo alisitulira ku kibegabega kye ekizikiza nga kikutte n'afuluma; balisima mu kisenge okuyisaamu ebintu okubifulumya: alibikka ku maaso ge, kubanga taliraba ttaka n'amaaso ge. 
26_12_13_Era ndimusuulako ekitimba kyange, era aliteegebwa mu kyambika kyange: era ndimutwala e Babulooni mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya: era naye talikiraba, newakubadde ng'alifiira eyo. 
26_12_14_Era ndisaasaanyiza eri empewo zonna abo bonna abamwetoolodde okumuyamba n'ebibiina bye byonna; era ndisowola ekitala ekiribagoberera. 
26_12_15_Kale balimanya nga nze Mukama, bwe ndibasaasaanyiza mu mawanga ne mbataataaganyiza mu nsi nnyingi. 
26_12_16_Naye ndirekawo ku bo abasajja batono abaliwona ekitala n'enjala ne kawumpuli; balyoke babuulirenga emizizo gyabwe gyonna mu mawanga gye balituuka; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_12_17_Era nate ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_12_18_Omwana w'omuntu, lya emmere yo ng'okankana, onywe amazzi ng'ojugumira era nga weeraliikirira; ogambe abantu ab'omu nsi, nti 
26_12_19_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda ku abo abali mu Yerusaalemi n'ensi ya Isiraeri nti Balirya emmere yaabwe nga beeraliikirira, era balinywa amazzi gaabwe nga basamaalirira, ensi yaakyo erekebwewo byonna ebirimu olw'ekyejo ky'abo bonna abatuulamu. 
26_12_20_N'ebibuga ebibeerwamu birizisibwa, n'ensi eriba matongo; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_12_21_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_12_22_Omwana w'omuntu, lugero ki luno lwe mulina mu nsi ya Isiraeri, nga mwogera nti Ennaku ziyitirira, era buli kwolesebwa kubula? 
26_12_23_Kale bagambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ndikomya olugero olwo, so tebalirugera nate mu Isiraeri okuba olugero; naye bagambe nti Ennaku zinaatera okutuuka, n'okutuukiriza buli kwolesebwa. 
26_12_24_Kubanga tewalibaawo nate kwolesebwa okw'obwereere newakubadde obulaguzi obunyumiriza mu nnyumba ya Isiraeri. 
26_12_25_Kubanga nze Mukama; ndyogera n'ekigambo kye ndyogera kirituukirizi bwa; tekirirwisibwa nate; kubanga mu nnaku zammwe, ai ennyumba enjeemu, mwe ndyogerera ekigambo, era ndikituukiriza, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_12_26_Nate ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_12_27_Omwana w'omuntu, laba, ab'omu nnyumba ya Isiraeri boogera nti Okwolesebwa kwalaba kwa mu nnaku nnyingi ezitannajja, era alagula eby'ebiro ebikyali ewala. 
26_12_28_Kale bagambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Tewaliba ku bigambo byange ebirirwisibwa nate, naye ekigambo kye ndyo. gera kirituukirizibwa, bw'ayogers Mukama Katonda. 
26_13_1_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_13_2_Omwana w'omuntu, lagulira ki bannabbi ba Isiraeri abalagula obagambe abo abalagula ebiva mu mutima gwabwe bo, nti Muwulirekigambo kya Mukama 
26_13_4_Ai Isiaeri, bannabbi bo baabanga ng'ebe mu bifo ebyalekebwawo. 
26_13_5_Temwambukanga mu bituli ebyavagulwa, so temuddaabiririzanga nnyumba ya Isiraeri olukomera, muyimirire mu lutalo ku lunaku lwa Mukama. 
26_13_6_Balabye ebitaliimu n’obulaguzi obw'obulimba abo aboogera nti Mukama ayogera; so nga Mukama tabatumye: era basuubizizza abantu ng'ekigambo kigenda kunywezebwa. 
26_13_7_Temulabye wolesebwa okutaliimu, era temwogedde bulaguzi bwa bulimba, kubanga mwogera nti Mukama ayogera: era naye soogeranga? 
26_13_8_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera nti Kubanga mwogedde ebitaliimu, era mulabye eby'obulimba, kale, laba, ndi mulabe wammwe, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_13_9_Era omukono gwange guliba nulabe wa bannabbi abalaba ebitaiimu ne balagula eby'obulimba: ebaliba mu abo abateesa ab'omu antu bange, so tebaliwandiikibwa nu kiwandiike eky'emtyumba ya Isiraeri, so tebaliyingira mu nsi ra Isiraeri; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama Katonda. 
26_13_10_Kubanga, weewaawo, kubanga basenzesenze abantu bange, nga boogera nti Mirembe; so nga tewali mirembe; era omuntu bw'azimba ekisenge, aba, bakisiigako ebbumba eritasezuddwa bulungi: 
26_13_11_bagambe abo abakisiigako ebbumba eritasekuddwa bulungi nga kirigwa: walibaawo enkuba ekulukuta ennyo; nammwe, amayinja ag'omuzira amanene, muligwa; ne kibuyaga omungi alikimenya. 
26_13_12_Laba, ekisenge bwe kiriba nga kigudde, temuligambibwa nti Okusiigako kwe mwakisiigako kuli ludda wa? 
26_13_13_Kale bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ndikimenyera ddala ne kibuyaga mungi nga ndiko ekiruyi; era walibaawo enkuba ekulukuta ennyo nga ndiko obusungu, n'amayinja ag'omuzira amanene okukimalawo. 
26_13_14_Bwe ntyo bwe ndyabiza ddala ekisenge kye mwasiigako ebbumba eritasekuddwa bulungi, ne nkissa wansi, omusingi gwakyo n'okweruka ne gweruka: era kirigwa, nammwe mulimalibwawo wakati mu kyo: kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama: 
26_13_15_Bwe ntyo bwe ndituukiriza ekiruyi kyange ku kisenge ne ku abo abaakisiigako ebbumba eritasekuddwa bulungi; era ndibagamba nti Ekisenge tekikyaliwo newakubadde abo abaakisiigako; 
26_13_16_be bannabbi ba Isiraeri abalagula ebya Yerusaalemi era abakirabira okwolesebwa okw'emirembe, so nga tewali mirembe, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_13_17_Naawe, omwana w'omuntu, kakasa amaaso go okwolekera abawala b'abantu bo, abalagula ebiva mu mutima gwabwe bo; era balagulireko 
26_13_18_oyogere nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Zibasanze abakazi abatungira ebigugu ku nkokola zonna, era abakolera ebiwero emitwe gy'abantu aba buli kigera okuyigga obulamu Muliyigga obulamu bw'abantu bange, ne muwonya mwekka obulamu bwammwe okufa? 
26_13_19_Era mwanvumisa mu bantu bange olw'embatu eza sayiri n'olw'ebitole eby'emigaati okutta obulamu obutagwana kufa, n'okuwonya obulamu okufa obutagwana kuba bulamu, nga mulimba abantu bange abawulira eby'obulimba. 
26_13_20_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, ndi mulabe wa bigugu byammwe bye muyizza obulamu eyo okububuusa, era ndibisika okubiggya ku mikono gyammwe; era nditta obulamu, obulamu obwo bwe muyigga okubu buusa. 
26_13_21_Era n'ebiwero byammwe ndibiyuza, ne mponya abantu bange mu mukono gwammwe, so nga tebakyabeera mu mukono gwammwe okuyiggibwa; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_13_22_Kubanga muwuubazizza n'eby'obulimba omutima gw'omutuukiriw nze gwe siwuubaazanga; ne munyweza emikono gy'omubi, aleme okudda okuva mu kkubo lye ebbi n'awona nga mulamu: 
26_13_23_kyemuliva mulema okulaba nate ebitaliimu newakubadde okulagula obulaguzi: nange ndiwonya abantu bange mu mukono gwammwe; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_14_1_Awo abamu ku bakadde ba Isiraeri ne bajja gye ndi ne batuula mu maaso gange. 
26_14_2_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_14_3_Omwana w'omuntu, abasajja bano batutte ebifaananyi byabwe mu mutima gwabwe, era batadde enkonge ey'obutali butuukirivu mu maaso gaabwe: nnyinza ntya abo okumbuuza n'akamu kokka? 
26_14_4_Kale yogera nabo obagambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Buli muntu ow'omu anyumba ya Isiraeri atwala ebifaananyi bye mu mutima gwe, n'ateeka enkonge ey'obutali butuukirivu bwe mu maaso ge, n'ajja eri nnabbi; nze Mukama ndimuddamu mu ebyo ng'olufulube lw'ebifaananyi bye bwe luli 
26_14_6_Kale bagambe ennyumba ya Isiraeri nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Mudde mukyuke okuleka ebifaananyi byammwe; era mukyuse amaaso gammwe okuleka emizizo gyammwe gyonna. 
26_14_7_Kubanga buli muntu ow'omu nayumba ya Isiraeri oba ow'okubannaggwanga ababeera mu Isiraeri eyeeyawula nange n'atwala ebifaananyi bye mu mutima gwe n'ateeka enkonge ey'obutali butuukirivu bwe mu maaso ge n'ajja eri nnabbi okunneebuuzaako; nze Mukama ndimuddamu nze mwene: 
26_14_8_era ndikakasa amaaso gange okwolekera omuntu oyo, era ndimufuula ekyewuunyo, okuba akabonero n'olugero, era ndimuzikiriza wakati mu bantu bange; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_14_9_Era oba aga nnabbi alirimbibwa n'ayogera ekigambo, nze Mukama nga nnimbye nnabbi oyo, era ndimugololerako omukono gwange, ne mmuzikiriza wakati mu bantu bange Isiraeri. 
26_14_10_Era balyetikka obutali butuukirivu bwabwe: obutali butuukiriw bwa nnabbi bulyenkanira ddala obutali butuukirivu bw'oyo amwebuuzaako; 
26_14_11_ennyumba ya Isiraeri ereme okuwaba nate okunvaako newakubadde okweyonoona nate n'okusobya kwabwe kwonna; naye babeerenga abantu bange, nange mbeerenga Katonda waabwe, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_14_12_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_14_13_Omwana w'omuntu, ensi bwe nnyonoona ng'esobezza, nange ne ngigololerako omukono gwange ne mmenya omuggo ogw'emigaati gyamu, ne ngiweerezaako enjala, ne ngimalamu abantu era n'ensolo; 
26_14_14_abo bonsatule, Nuuwa ne Danyeri ne Yobu, newakubadde nga baali omwo, bandiwonyezza emmeeme zaabwe bo zokka olw'obutuukirivu bwabwe, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_14_15_Bwe ndiyisa ensolo embi mu nsi n'okugyonoona ne zigyonoona n'okuzika n'ezika, omuntu yenna n'atayinza kuyitamu olw'ensolo ezo; 
26_14_16_abasajja abo bonsatule newakubadde nga baali omwo, nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama, tebandiwonyezza batabani baabwe newakubadde bawala baabwe; bo bokka bandiwonyezebbwa, naye ensi erizika. 
26_14_17_Oba bwe ndireeta ekitala ku nsi ne njogera nti Ekitala, yita mu nsi; n'okumalamu ne ngimalamu abantu n'ensolo; 
26_14_18_abo bonsatule newakubadde nga bali omwo, nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, tebaliwonya batabani baabwe newakubadde bawala baabwe, naye bo bennyini baliwonyezebwa bokka. 
26_14_19_Oba bwe ndiweereza kawumpuli mu nsi eno, ne ngifukako ekiruyi kyange mu musaayi, okugimalamu abantu n'ensolo: 
26_14_20_Nuuwa ne Danyeri ne Yobu newakubadde nga bali omwo, nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, tebaliwonya mutabani waabwe newakubadde muwala waabwe; baliwonya emmeeme zaabwe bo zokka olw'obutuukirivu bwabwe. 
26_14_21_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kale tebirisinga nnyo okuba bwe bityo, bwe ndiweereza emisango gyange ena emizibu ku Yerusaalemi, ekitala n'enjala n'ensolo embi ne kawumpuli, okukimalamu abantu n'ensolo? 
26_14_22_Era naye mulisigalamu ekitundu ekifisseewo ekiriggibwamu ne kitwalibwa, abaana ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala: laba, balifuluma balijja gye muli, nammwe muliraba ekkubo lyabwe n'ebikolwa byabwe: kale mulisanyusibwa mu bubi bwe ndeese ku Yerusaalemi, olwa byonna bye nkireseeeko. 
26_14_23_Era balibasanyusa bwe muliraba ekkubo iyabwe n'ebikolwa byabwe: kale mulimanya nga saabalanga bwereere okukola byonna bye nnakolera mu kyo, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_15_1_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_15_2_Omwana w'omuntu, omuzabbibu gusinga gutya omuti gwonna, oba ettabi ery'ogumu ku miti egy'omu kibira? 
26_15_3_Banaggyangako emiti okukola omulimu gwonna? oba abantu banaggyangako ekikondo okuwanikako ekintu kyonna? 
26_15_4_Laba, bagusuula mu muliro okuba enku: omuliro gugwokezza eruuyi n'eruuyi ne wakati waagwo wayidde; guliko kye gugasa olw'omulimu gwonna? 
26_15_5_Laba, bwe gwali nga gukyali mulamba, tegwasaanira mulimu. gwonna: kale omuliro nga gugwokezza era nga guyidde gukyasaanira gutya omulimu gwonna? 
26_15_6_Kale Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Ng'omuzabbibu mu miti egy'omu kibira, gwe mpaddeyo eri omuliro okuba enku, bwe ntyo bwe ndiwaayo abo abali mu Yerusaalemi. 
26_15_7_Era ndikakasa amaaso gange okuboolekera; balifuluma mu muliro, naye omuliro gulibookya; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama, bwe ndikakasa amaaso gange okuboolekera. 
26_15_8_Era ndizisa ensi kubanga basobezza, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_16_1_Nate ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_16_2_Omwana w'omuntu, manyisa Yeru saalemi emizizo gyakyo, 
26_16_3_oyogere nti Bw'ati Mukama Katonda bw'agamba Yerusaalemi nti Okuzaalibwa kwo n'ekika kyo bya mu nsi ey'omu Kanani; Omwamoli ye yali Kitaawo, ne nnyoko yali Mukiiti. 
26_16_4_Era eby'okuzaalibwa kwo ku lunaku kwe wazaalirwa tewasalibwa kalira, so tewanaazibwa na mazzi okukutukuza; tewateekebwamu munnyo n'akatono, so tewabildubwako n'akatono. 
26_16_5_Tewali liiso eryakusaasira okukukola ku ebyo byonna, okukukwatirwa ekisa; naye n'osuulibwa mu ttale ebweru, kubanga wakyayibwa ggwe ku lunaku kwe wazaalirwa. 
26_16_6_Awo bwe nnakuyitako ne nkulabanga weekulukuunya mu musaayi gwo, ne nkugamba nti Newakubadde ng'oli mu musaayi gwo, ba mulamu: weewaawo, ne nkugamba nti Newakubadde ng'omu musaayi gwo, ba mulamu. 
26_16_7_Ne nkwaza ng'ekimuli eky'omu nnimiro, ne weeyongera n'ofuuka mukulu, n'otuuka ku buyonjo obulungi ennyo; amabeere go ne gamera, enviiri zo ne zikula; era naye ng'oli bwereere nga tobikkiddwako. 
26_16_8_Awo bwe nnakuyitako ne nkutunuulira, laba, ekiseera kyo nga kye kiseera eky'okwagalirwamu; ne nkwaliirako ekirenge kyange ne mbikka ku bwereere bwo: weewaawo, ne nkulayirira, ne ndagaan naawe endagaano, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, n'ofuuka wange. 
26_16_9_Awo ne nkunaaza n'amazzi; weewaawo, ne nkunaalizaako ddala omusaayi gwo, ne nkusiigako amafuta. 
26_16_10_N'okwambaza ne nkwa mbaza omulimu ogw'eddalizi, n nkunaanika engato ez'amaliba g'eŋŋonge ne nkusiba olwebagyo olwa bafuta ennungi, ne nkubikkaki aliiri. 
26_16_11_Era ne nkunaanika eby'obuyonjo, ne nteeka ebikomo ku mikono gyo n'omukuufu mu bulago bwo. 
26_16_12_Ne nteeka empeta k nnyindo yo, n'eby'omu matu mu matu go n'engule ennungi ki mutwe gwo. 
26_16_13_Bwe wayonjebwa bw'otyo n'ezaabu n'effeeza; n'ebya mbalo byo byali bya bafuta nnung ne aliiri n'omulimu ogw'eddalizi walyanga obutta obulungi n'omubis gw'enjuki n'amafuta: n'oba mulung nnyo nnyini, n'olaba omukisa oku tuusa mu bukulu obw'obwakabaka. 
26_16_14_Ettutumu lyo ne lyatiikirira mi mawanga olw'obulungi bwo; ku banga bwali butuukiridde olw'obu kulu bwange bwe nnali nkutaddeko bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_16_15_Naye ggwe ne weesiga obulungi bwo, ne weefuula omwene olw'ettutumu lyo, n'ofuka obukaba bwo ku buli muntu eyayitangawo bwabanga bubwe. 
26_16_16_Era watoola ku byambalo byo, ne weekolera ebifo ebigulumivu ebyayonjebwa n'amabala agatali gamu, n'oyendera ku byo: ebifaanana bwe bityo tebirijja so tebiriba bwe bityo. 
26_16_17_N'okuddira n'oddira eby'obuyonjo bwo ebirungi ebya zaabu yange n'ebya ffeeza yange bye nnali nkuwadde, ne weekolera ebifaananyi by'abantu, n'oyenda ku byo: 
26_16_18_n'oddira ebyambalo byo eby'eddalizi, n'obibikkako n'oteeka amafuta gange n'obubaane bwange mu maaso gaabyo. 
26_16_19_Era n'emmere yange gye nnakuwa, obutta obulungi n'amafuta n'omubisi gw'enjuki, bye nnakuliisanga, n'okuteeka n'obiteeka mu maaso gaabyo okuba evvumbe eddungi, ne biba bwe bityo, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_16_20_Era nate waddira abaana bo ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala, be wanzaalira, abo n'obawaayo okuba ssaddaaka eri byo okuliibwa. Obwenzi bwo kyali kigambo kitono, 
26_16_21_n'okutta n'otta abaana bange, n'obawaayo ng'obayisa mu muliro eri byo? 
26_16_22_Era mu mizizo gyo gyonna ne mu bwenzi bwo tojjukiranga nnaku za buto bwo, bwe wali obwereere nga tobikkiddwako, era nga weekulukuunya mu musaayi gwo. 
26_16_23_Awo olutuuse obubi bwo bwonna nga bumaze okubaawo, (zikusanze, zikusanze! bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda,) 
26_16_24_weezimbidde ekifo ekikulumbala ne weekolera ekifo ekigulumivu mu buli luguudo. 
26_16_25_Ozimbye ekifo kyo ekigulumivu buli luguudo we lusibuka, era ofudde obulungi bwo okuba eky'omuzizo, era obikkulidde ku bigere buli muyise n'oyongera ku bwenzi bwo. 
26_16_26_Era oyenze ku Bamisiri, baliraanwa bo, ab'omubiri omunene; n'oyongera ku bwe nzi bwo okunsunguwaza. 
26_16_27_Kale, laba, nkugololeddeko omukono gwange, era nkendeezezza emmere yo eya bulijjo, ne nkuwaayo eri okwagala kw'abo abakukyawa, abawala b'Abafirisuuti abakwatiddwa ensonyi ekkubo lyo ery'obukaba. 
26_16_28_Era n'oyenda ku Basuuli, kubanga tewayinza kukkuta; weewaawo, oyenze ku bo, era naye tewanyiwa. 
26_16_29_Era nate wayongera ku bwenzi bwo mu nsi ya Kanani okutuusa e Bukaludaaya; era naye n'obwo tebwakunyiya. 
26_16_30_Omutima gwo nga munafu! bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, kubanga okola bino byonna, omulimu ogw'omukazi ow'amawaggali omwenzi; 
26_16_31_kubanga ozimba ebifo byo ebikulumbala buli luguudo we lusibuka, n'okola ekifo kyo ekigulumivu mu buli luguudo; so tobanga nga mukazi mwenzi kubanga onyooma empeera. 
26_16_32_Omukazi alina bba ayenda so! akkiriza abagenyi mu kifo kya bbaawe so! 
26_16_33_Abakazi bonna abenzi babawa ebirabo: naye ggwe owa ebirabo byo baganzi bo bonna, n'obagulirira bajje gy'oli okuva mu njuyi zonna olw'obwenzi bwo. 
26_16_34_Era osobezza ensobya bbiri abakazi abalala mu bwenzi bwo, kubanga tewali akugoberera ggwe okwenda: era kubanga ogulirira so toweebwa mpeera kyova osobya ensobya ebbiri. 
26_16_35_Kale, ai omwenzi, wulira ekigambo kya Mukama: 
26_16_36_bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kubanga empitambi yo yafukirwa ddala, n'obwereere bwo ne bubikkulwako olw'obwenzi bwo bwe wayenda ku baganzi bo; era olw'ebifaananyi byonna eby'emizizo gyo n'olw'omusaayi gw'abaana bo gwe wabawa; 
26_16_37_kale, laba, ndikuŋŋaanya baganzi bo bonna be wasanyuka nabo, n'abo bonna be wayagala, wamu n'abo bonna be wakyawa; okukuŋŋaanya ndibakuŋŋaanya okulwana naawe enjuyi zonna, era ndibabikkulira obwereere bwo, bo nna balabe obwereere bwo. 
26_16_38_Era ndikusalira omusango ng'abakazi abatta obufumbo ne bayiwa omusaayi bwe basalirwa omusango; era ndikuleetako omusaayi ogw'ekiruyi n'obuggya. 
26_16_39_Era ndikuwaayo mu mukono gwabwe, kale balisuula ekifo kyo ekikulumbala ne bamenyaamenya ebifo byo ebigulumivu; era balikwambula ebyambalo byo, ne banyaga eby'obuyonjo bwo ebirungi: kale balikuleka ng'oli bwereere ng'obikkuddwako. 
26_16_40_Era balikulinnyisaako ekibiina, ne bakukuba amayinja, ne bakufumitira ddala n'ebitala byabwe. 
26_16_41_Era balyokya ennyumba zo omuliro ne batuukiriza emisango ku ggwe abakazi bangi nga balaba; era ndikulekesaayo obwenzi, so toliwaayo mpeera nate lwa kubiri. 
26_16_42_Bwe ntyo bwe ndikkusa ekiruyi kyange ku ggwe, n'obuggya bwange bulikuvaako, ne ntereera ne ssibaako busungu nate. 
26_16_43_Kubanga tojjukiranga nnaku za buto bwo, naye n'onnyiiza mu bino byonna; kale, laba, nange ndireeta ekkubo lyo ku mutwe gwo, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda: so tolyongera bukaba obwo ku mizizo gyo gyonna. 
26_16_44_Laba, buli muntu agera engero anaakugereranga olugero luno ng'ayogera nti Nga nnyina ne muwala we bw'atyo. 
26_16_45_Oli muwala wa nnyoko atamwa bba n'abaana be; era oli wa luganda ne baganda bo abatamwa ba bbaabwe: nnyamniwe yali Mukiiti, ne kitammwe yali Mwamoli. 
26_16_46_Ne mukulu wo ye Samaliya abeera ku mukono gwo ogwa kkono, ye ne bawala be: ne mwana wannyo atuula ku mukono gwo ogwa ddyo ye Sodomu ne bawala be. 
26_16_47_Era naye totambuliranga mu makubo gaabwe, so tokolanga ng'emizizo gyabwe bwe giri; naye ekyo ng'okiyita kigambo kitono nnyo, n'osinga bo okuba omukyamu mu makubo go gonna. 
26_16_48_Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, muganda wo Sodomu takolanga, ye newakubadde bawala be, nga ggwe bw'okoze, ggwe ne bawala bo. 
26_16_49_Laba, buno bwe bwali obutali butuukirivu bwa muganda wo Sodomu; amalala n'okukkutanga emmere n'okwesiima nga yeegolola byali mu ye ne mu bawala be; so teyanyweza mukono gwa mwavu n'eyeetaaga. 
26_16_50_Era baalina ekitigi, ne bakola eby'emizizo mu maaso gange: kyennava mbaggyawo nga bwe nnasiima. 
26_16_51_So ne Samaliya takolanga kitundu kya ku bibi byo; naye ggwe wayongera ku mizizo gyo okukira bo, n'oweesa obutuukirivu baganda bo olw'emizizo gyo gyonna gye wakola. 
26_16_52_Era naawe beerako ensonyi zo ggwe, kubanga osaze omusango baganda bo okusinga; olw'ebibi byo bye wakola eby'emizizo okukira bo kyebavudde bakusinga obutuukirivu: weewaawo, era swala obeereko ensonyi zo kubanga oweese.zza baganda bo obutuukirivu. 
26_16_53_Era ndikomyawo obusibe bwabwe, obusibe bwa Sodomu ne bawala be, n'obusibe bwa Samaliya ne bawala be, n'obusibe bwa Samaliya ne bawala be, n'obusibe bw'abasibe bo abali wakati mu bo: 
26_16_54_olyoke obeereko ensonyi zo ggwe, era okwatibwe ensonyi olw'ebyo byonna bye wakola, kubanga obasanyusa. 
26_16_55_Era baganda bo, Sodomu ne bawala be, balidda mu bukulu bwabwe obw'edda, ne Samaliya ne bawala be balidda mu bukulu bwabwe obw'edda, naawe ne bawala bo mulidda mu bukulu bwammwe obw'edda. 
26_16_56_Kubanga muganda wo Sodomu akamwa ko tekamwatulanga ku lunaku olw'amalala go; 
26_16_57_obubi bwo nga tebunnabikkulwa, nga mu biro abawala ab'e Busuuli lwe baavuma n'abo bonna abamwetoolodde, abawala aba Bafirisuuti abakugirira ekyejo enjuyi zonna. 
26_16_58_Wabaako obukaba bwo n'emizizo gyo, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
26_16_59_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ndikukolera ddala nga bw'okoze, ggwe eyanyooma ekirayiro n'omenya endagaano. 
26_16_60_Era naye nze ndijjukira endagaano gye nnalagaana naawe mu nnaku ez'obuto bwo, era ndinyweza eri ggwe endagaano eteriggwaawo. 
26_16_61_Kale n'olyoka ojjukira amakubo go, n'okwatibwa ensonyi, bw'oliweebwa baganda bo, baganda bo abakulu ne baganda bo abato: era ndikubawa okuba abawala, naye si lwa ndagaano yo. 
26_16_62_Era ndinyweza endagaano yange naawe; kale olimanya nga nze Mukama: 
26_16_63_olyoke ojjukire n'oswala n'olema okwasama nate akamwa ko olw'ensonyi zo; bwe ndimala okukusonyiwa byonna bye wakola, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_17_1_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_17_2_Omwana w'omuntu, leeta ekikokko ogerere ennyumba ya Isiraeri olugero 
26_17_4_yanogako amasanso gaagwo amato agakomererayo, n'eguggyayo n'egutwala mu nsi ey'obusuubuzi; yagusimba mu kibuga eky'abasuubuzi. 
26_17_5_Era yatwala ne ku nsigo ey'omu nsi, n'egisiga mu ttaka ggimu; yaguteeka awali amazzi amangi n'egusimba ng'omusafusafu. 
26_17_6_Ne gumera ne guba muzabbibu ogulanda omumpimpi, amatabi gaagwo ne gagikyukira n'emmizi gyagwo gyali wansi waayo: kale ne guba muzabbibu ne gusuula amatabi, ne gumera amasanso. 
26_17_7_Era waaliwo n'empungu ennene endala, eyalina ebiwaawaatiro ebinene n'ebyoya bingi: kale, laba, omuzabbibu ogwo ne gugiwetera emmizi gyagwo, ne gumera amatabi gaagwo okugenda gy'eri, okuva mu bibibi mwe gwasimbibwa, egufukirire amazzi. 
26_17_8_Gwasimbibwa mu ttaka eddungi awali amazzi amangi, gusuule amatabi era gubale ebibala, gubeerenga omuzabbibu omulungi. 
26_17_9_Yogera nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Guliraba omukisa?talisimbulammizi gyagwo, n'asalako ebibala byagwo, guwotoke; amalagala gaagwo gonna amabisi agamera gawotoke; newakubadde nga tewali buyinza bungi newakubadde abantu bangi okugusimbula n'emmizi gyagwo? 
26_17_10_Weewaawo, laba, bwe gusimbibwa guliraba omukisa? teguliwotokera ddala, embuyaga ez'ebuvanjuba bwe zigukomako? guliwotokera mu bibibi mwe gwakulira. 
26_17_11_Era nate ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_17_12_Gamba nno ennyumba enjeemu nti Temumanyi bigambo bino amakulu gaabyo bwe gali? babuulire nti Laba, kabaka w'e Babulooni yajja e Yerusaalemi n'awamba kabaka waayo n'abakungu baayo n'abaleeta gy'ali e Babulooni; 
26_17_13_era n'atwala ku zzadde lya kabaka, n'alagaana naye endagaano; era n'amulayiza ekirayiro, n'aggyaYo ab'amaanyi ab'omu nsi: 
26_17_14_obwakabaka bukkakkane, buleme okwegulnmiza, naye bunywere olw'okukwata endagaano ye. 
26_17_15_Naye n'amujeemera ng'atuma ababaka be mu Misiri, bamuwe embalaasi n'a bantu bangi. Aliraba omukisa? aliwona oyo akola ebifaanana bwe bityo? alimenya endagaano, era naye n'ewona? 
26_17_16_Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, mazima mu kifo kabaka mw'abeera eyamufuula kabaka, gwe yanyoomako ekirayiro kye n'ameny endagaano ye, oyo gy'ali waka mu Babulooni gy'alifiira. 
26_17_17_So ne Falaawo n'eggye lye ery'amaanyi n'ekibiina ekinene talibaako ky'amugasa mu ntalo, bwe balituuma ebifunvu ne bazimba ebigo, okuzikiriza abantu bangi. 
26_17_18_Kubanga anyoomye ekirayiro ng'amenya endagaano; era, laba, yali awadde omu kono gwe, era naye akoze eby byonna; taliwona. 
26_17_19_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Nga bwe ndi omulamu, mazima ekirayiro kyange ky'anyoomye n'endagaano yange gy'amenye ndibituusa n'okubituusa ku mutwe gwe ye. 
26_17_20_Era ndimusuulako ekitimb kyange, era ndimutwala e Babulooni, era ndiwoleza naye eyo olw'e kyonoono kye kye yannyonoona. 
26_17_21_Era abadduse be bonna mu bibiina bye byonna baligwa n'ekitala, n'abo abalisigalawo balisaa saanyizibwa eri empewo zonna kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama njogedde. 
26_17_22_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Era nditwala ku bu songezo obwa waggulu obw'omuvule ne mbusimba; ndinogako ku masanso gaagwo amato agakomererayo essanso erimu eggonvu, era ndirisimba ku lusozi oluwanvi olugulumivu: 
26_17_23_ku lusozi olw'e ntikko ya Isiraeri kwe ndirisimba kale lirisuula amatabi ne libala ebibala, ne guba omuvule omulungi era wansi waagwo wanaabeerang; ennyonyi zonna ez'ebiwaawaatiro byonna; mu kisiikirize eky'amatabi gaagwo we zinaatuulanga. 
26_17_24_Me miti gyonna egy'omu ttale girimanya nga nze Mukama nkakkanyizzi omuti omuwanvu, era nga ngulumizizza omuti omumpi, era nga nkazizza omuti ogwamera, era nga njezezza omuti omukalu: nze Mukama njogedde era nkikoze. 
26_18_1_Ekigambo kya Mukama kyanjijira nate nga kyogera nti 
26_18_2_Mubadde mutya n'okugera ne mugerera olugero luno ensi ya Isiraeri nga mwogera nti Bakitaabwe balidde ezabbibu ezinyuunyuntula n'amannyo g'abaana ganyenyeera? 
26_18_3_Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, temuliba na nsonga nate okugera olugero olwo mu Isiraeri. 
26_18_4_Laba, emmeeme zonna zange; ng'emmeeme ya kitaawe, n'emmeeme y'omwana bw'eryo yange: emmeeme ekola ekibi ye erifa. 
26_18_5_Naye omuntu bw'aba omutuukirivu n'akola ebyalagirwa eby'ensonga, 
26_18_6_so nga taliiridde ku nsozi, so nga tayimusizza maaso ge eri ebifaananyi eby'ennyumba ya Isiraeri, so nga tayonoonye mukazi wa munne, so nga tasemberedde mukazi mu biro eby'okweyawula kwe 
26_18_10_Bw'alizaala omwana, omunyazi, ayiwa omusaayi, era akola ku ebyo byonna, 
26_18_11_so atakola ku ebyo byonna ebimugwanidde, naye okulya eyaliira ku nsozi, n'ayonoona mukazi wa munne, 
26_18_12_eyalyazaamaanya omwavu n'eyeetaaga, eyanyaga olw'amaanyi, so atazza musingo, era eyayimusa amaaso ge eri ebifaananyi, eyakola eby'emizizo, 
26_18_13_eyawolanga olw'amagoba, era eyakkiriza ebisukkirira: kale aliba mulamu ono? taliba mulamu: akoze eby'emizizo bino byonna: talirema kufa; omusaayi gwe guliba ku ye. 
26_18_14_Laba, bw'alizaala omwana, alaba ebibi byonna ebya kitaawe bye yakola, n'atya n'atakola ebifaanana bwe bityo, 
26_18_15_ataliiranga ku nsozi, so atayimusanga maaso ge eri ebifaananyi eby'ennyumba ya Isiraeri, atayonoonanga mukazi wa munne, 
26_18_16_so atalyazaamaanyanga muntu yena, atasingirwanga kintu, so atanyaganga lwa maanyi, naye eyawanga omuyala emmere ye, eyabikkanga oyo ali obwereere n'ekyambalo, 
26_18_17_eyaggyako omukono gwe eri omwavu atakkirizanga magoba newakubadde ebisukkirira, eyatuukirizanga emisango gyange, eyatambuliranga mu mateeka gange; oyo talifa lwa butali butuukirivu bwa kitaawe, talirema kuba mulamu. 
26_18_18_Kitaawe, kubanga yajooga n'obukambwe, n'anyaga muganda we olw'amaanyi, n'akola ebyo ebitali birungi mu bantu be, laba, alifiira mu butali butuukirivu bwe. 
26_18_19_Era naye mwogera nti Omwana kiki ekimulobera okubaako obutali butuukiriw bwa kitaawe? Omwana bw'aba nga akoze ebyalagirwa eby'ensonga, era ng'akutte amateeka gange gonna, era ng'agakoze, talirema kuba mulamu. 
26_18_20_Emmeeme eyonoona ye erifa: omwana talibaako butali butuukiriw bwa kitaawe, so ne kitaawe talibaako butali butuukirivu bwa mwana we; obutuukiriw obw'omutuukiriw buliba ku ye, n'obubi obw'omubi buliba ku ye. 
26_18_21_Naye omubi bw'akyukanga okuleka ebibi bye byonna bye yakola n'akwata amateeka gange gonna, n'akola ebyalagirwa eby'ensonga, talirema kuba mulamu, talifa. 
26_18_22_Tewaliba ku byonoono bye bye yayonoona ebirijjukirwa ku ye: alibeera omulamu mu butuukirivu bwe bwe yakola. 
26_18_23_Nnina essanyu lye nsanyukira okufa kw'omubi? bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda: naye saagala bwagazi akomewo okuva mu kkubo lye abeere omulamu? 
26_18_24_Naye omutuukirivu bw'akyukanga okuleka obutuukirivu bwe n'akola ebitali bya butuukirivu n'akola ng'emizizo gyonna bwe giri omuntu omubi gy'akola, aliba mulamu? Tewaliba ku bikolwa bye eby'obutuukirivu bye yakola ebirijjukirwa: mu kyonoono kye ky'ayonoonye ne mu kibi kye ky'akoze, mu ebyo mw'alifiira. 
26_18_25_Era naye mwogera nti Ekkubo lya Mukama teryenkanankana. Muwulire nno, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri: ekkubo lyange si lye lyenkanattkana? amakubo gammwe si ge gatenkanankana? 
26_18_26_Omuntu omutuukirivu bw'akyukanga okuleka obutuukirivu bwe n'akola ebitali bya butuukirivu n'afiira omwo; mu butali butuukirivu bwe bw'akoze mw'alifiira. 
26_18_27_Nate omuntu omubi bw'akyukanga okuleka obubi bwe bw'akoze n'akola ebyo ebyalagirwa eby'ensonga, aliwonya eauneeme ye okufa. 
26_18_28_Kubanga alowooza n'akyuka okuleka ebyonoono bye byonna by'akoze, talirema kuba mulamu, talifa. 
26_18_29_Era naye ennyumba ya Isiraeri boogera nti Ekkubo lya Mukama teryenkanankana. Ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri, amakubo gange si ge genkanankana? amakubo gammwe si ge gatenkanankana? 
26_18_30_Kyendiva mbasalira omusango, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri, buli muntu ng'amakubo ge bwe gali, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. Mukomeewo, mukyuke okuleka ebyonoono byammwe byonna; kale obutali butuukirivu buleme okubazikiriza. 
26_18_31_Musuule wala nammwe ebyonoono byammwe byonna bye mwonoonye; mwekolere omutima omuggya n'omwoyo omuggya: kubanga kiki ekibaagaza okufa, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri? 
26_18_32_Kubanga sirina ssanyu lyakusanyukira lwa kufa kw'oyo afa, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda: kale mwekyuse muleme okufa 
26_19_1_Era nate tanula okukungubagira abakungu ba Isiraeri, 
26_19_2_oyogere nti Nnyoko kyali kiki? Mpologoma nkazi: yagalamiranga mu mpologoma, wakati mu mpologoma ento mwe yayonseza abaana baayo. 
26_19_3_N'akuza emu ku baana baayo; n'eba mpologoma ento: n'eyiga okukwata omuyiggo, n'erya abantu. 
26_19_4_Era n'amawanga ne gagiwulira; yakwatibwa mu bunnya bwabwe; ne bagireeta n'amalobo mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
26_19_5_Awo enkazi bwe yalaba ng'erindiridde n'essuubi lyayo nga libuze, n'eryoka eddira omwana gwayo omulala, n'egufuula empologoma ento. 
26_19_6_N'etambulatambula mu mpologoma, yafuuka empologoma ento: era yayiga okukwata omuyiggo, yalya abantu. 
26_19_7_Era yamanya amayumba gaabwe, n'ezisa ebibuga byabwe; ensi n'erekebwawo ne byonna ebyalimu olw'eddoboozi ery'okuwuluguma kwayo. 
26_19_8_Awo amawanga ne bagirumba enjuyi zonna nga gayima mu masaza: ne bagisuulako ekitimba kyabwe; n'ekwatibwa mu bunnya bwabwe. 
26_19_9_Ne bagisiba mu jjiririzo n'amalobo, ne bagitwala eri kabaka w’e Babulooni; baagitwala mu bigo, eddoboozi lyayo lireme okuwulirirwa nate ku nsozi za Isiraeri. 
26_19_10_Nnyoko yali ng'omuzabbibu mu musaayi gwo, ogwasimbibwa awali amazzi: yali mugimu, yajjula amatabi olw'amazzi amangi. 
26_19_11_Era yalina emiggo eminywevu okuba emiggo egy'obwakabaka egy'abo abaafuganga, n'obukulu bwabwe bwagulumizibwa wakati mu matabi amaziyivu ne balengerwa olw'obuwanvu bwabwe nga balina olufulube lw'amatabi gaabwe. 
26_19_12_Naye yasimbulibwa olw'ekiruyi; yasuulibwa wansi, embuyaga ez'ebuvanjuba ne zikaza ebibala bye: emiggo gye eminywevu ne giwogokako ne giwotoka; omuliro ne gugookya. 
26_19_13_Awo kaakano asimbiddwa mu ddungu, mu nsi enkalu ey'emiyonta. 
26_19_14_Era omuliro guvudde mu miggo egy'amatabi ge, gwokezza ebibala bye, ne kutaba ku ye omuggo munywevu okuba omuggo ogw'obwakabaka ogw'okufuga. Ebyo bya kukungubaga, era biriba bya kukungubaga. 
26_20_1_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'omusanvu mu mwezi ogw'okutaano ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'ekkumi, abamu ku bakadde ba Isiraeri ne bajja okubuuza Mukama ne batuula mu maaso gange. 
26_20_2_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_20_3_Omwana w'omuntu, yogera n'abakadde ba Isiraeri obagambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Muzze okumbuuza? Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, siibuuzibwe mmwe. 
26_20_4_Onoobasalira, omwana w'omuntu, onoobasalira omusango? Bamanyise emizizo gya bajjajjaa bwe 
26_20_7_ne mbagamba nti Musuule buli muntu emizizo egy'amaaso ge, so temweyonoonyesanga n'ebifaananyi eby'e Misiri; Me Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
26_20_8_Naye ne banjeemera ne batayagala kumpulira; tebaasuula buli muntu emizizo egy'amaaso gaabwe, so tebaaleka bifaananyi bya Misiri: kale ne njogera okubafukako ekiruyi kyange, okutuukiriza obusungu bwange ku bo wakati mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
26_20_9_Naye nakola olw'erinnya lyange lireme okuvumisibwa mu maaso g'amawanga, mwe baali, be nneetegereza mu maaso gaabwe gye bali, nga mbaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
26_20_10_Awo ne mbatambuza okuva mu nsi y'e Misiri, ne mbaleeta mu ddungu. 
26_20_11_Awo ne mbawa amateeka gange ne mbalaga emisango gyange, omuntu bw'akola egyo aliba mulamu mu gyo. 
26_20_12_Era nate ne mbawa ssabbiiti zange, okuba akabonero wakati wange nabo, balyoke bamanye nga aze Mukama abatukuza. 
26_20_13_Naye ennyumba ya Isiraeri ne banjeemera mu ddungu: tebaatambuliranga mu mateeka gange, ne bagaana emisango gyange, omuntu bw'akola egyo aliba mulamu mu gyo; ne ssabbiiti zange ne bazoonoona nnyo; kale ne njogera okubafukirako ekiruyi kyange mu ddungu okubamalawo. 
26_20_14_Naye ne nkola olw'erinnya lyange lireme okuvumisibwa mu maaso g'amawanga be nnabaggira mu maaso gaabwe. 
26_20_15_Era nate ne mbayimusiza omukono gwange mu ddungu nga sigenda kubaleeta mu nsi gye nnali mbawadde, ekulukuta amata n'omubisi gw'enjuki, kye kitiibwa ky'ensi zonna; 
26_20_16_kubanga baagaana emisango gyange ne batatambuliranga mu mateeka gange ne boonoonanga ssabbiiti zange: kubanga omutima gwabwe gwagobereranga ebifaananyi byabwe. 
26_20_17_Era naye eriiso lyange ne libasonyiwa okuzikirizibwa, so saabamalirawo ddala mu ddungu. 
26_20_18_Awo ne nnambira abaana baabwe mu ddungu nti Temutambu liranga mu mateeka ga bajjajja mmwe so temwekuumanga mi sango gyabwe so temweyonoonyesa n'ebifaananyi byabwe: 
26_20_19_nze Mukama Katonda wammwe; mutambu lirenga mu mateeka gange, mukwa tenga emisango gyange mugikolenga: 
26_20_20_era mutukuzenga essabbiiti zange; era zinaabanga kabonero wakati wange nammwe, mumanys nga nze Mukama Katonda wammwe. 
26_20_21_Naye abaana ne banjeemera; tebaatambuliranga mu mateeka gange so tebaakwatanga misango gyange okugikolanga, omuntu bw'akola egyo aliba mulamu mu gyo; baayonoonanga ssabbiiti zange; kale ne njogera okubafukirako ekituyi kyange okutuukiriza obusungu bwange eri bo mu ddungu. 
26_20_22_Era naye ne nziza omukono gwange ne nkola olw'erinnya lyange lireme okuvumisibwa mu maaso g'amawanga be nnabaggira mu maaso gaabwe. 
26_20_23_Era natene mbayimusizaomukono gwange mu ddungu aga ndibasaasaanyiza mu mawanga ne mbatataaganyiza mu nsi nnyingi; 
26_20_24_kubanga baali tebatuukirizza misango gyange, naye nga bagaanyi amateeka gange, era nga boonoonye essabbiiti zange, n'amaaso gaabwe gaali nga, gagoberera ebifaananyi bya bajjajjaabwe. 
26_20_25_Era nate ne mbawa amateeka agatali malungi, n'emisango gye batagenda kubeereramu balamu; 
26_20_26_ne mbagwagwawaza olw'ebirabo byabwe bo, kubanga baayisanga mu muliro bonna abaggulaada, ndyoke mbamaleko byonna, era bamanye nga nze Mukama. 
26_20_27_Kale, omwana w'omuntu, yogera n’ennyumba ya Isiraeri obagambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Era ne mu kino bajjajjammwe mwe banvumidde, kubanga bansobyako ekyonoono. 
26_20_28_Kubanga bwe nnali mbayingizizza mu nsi gye nnayimu.siza omukono gwange okubawa, kale ne balaba buli lusozi oluwanvu na buli muti omuziyivu, ne baweeranga eyo ssaddaaka zaabwe, era eyo gye baaleeteranga ekiweebwayo kyabwe ekinnyiiza, era eyo gye baanyookerezanga akaloosa kaabwe, ne bafukanga ebiweebwayo byabwe eby’okunywa. 
26_20_29_Awo ne mbagamba nti Ekifo ekigulumivu gye mugenda amakulu gaakyo ki? Awo erinnya lyakyo ne kituumibwa Bama ne leero. 
26_20_30_Kale gamba ennyumba ya Isiraeri nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Mweyonoonyesa ng'engeri bwe yali eya bajjajjammwe? era mwenda okugoberera emizizo gyabwe? 
26_20_31_era bwe muwaayo ebirabo byammwe, bwe muyisa batabani bammwe mu muliro, mweyonoonyesa n'ebifaananyi byammwe byonna ne leero? kale naabuuzibwa mmwe, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri? Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, siibuuzibwe mmwe: 
26_20_32_n'ekyo ekiyingira mu mwoyo gwammwe tekiribaawo n'akatono; kubanga mwogera nti Tunaaba ng'amawanga, ng'ebika eby'omu nsi, okuweereza emiti n'amayinja. 
26_20_33_Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, mazima ndiba kabaka wammwe n'engalo ez'amaanyi n'omukono ogwagololwa n'ekiruyi ekifikkiddwa: 
26_20_34_era ndibaggya mu mawanga ne mbakuŋŋaanya okubaggya mu nsi mwe mwasaasaanyizibwa, n'engalo ez'amaanyi n'omukono ogugoloddwa n'ekiruyi ekifukiddwa: 
26_20_35_era ndibaleeta mu ddungu ery'amawanga, era ndiwoleza eyo nammwe nga tutunulagana amaaso n'amaaso. 
26_20_36_Nga bwe nnawoleza ne bajjajjammwe mu ddungu ery'ensi y'e Misiri, bwe ntyo bwe ndiwoza nammwe, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_20_37_Era ndibayisa wansi w'omuggo, era ndibayingiza mu busibe bw'endagaano; 
26_20_38_era ndibamaliramu ddala abajeemu, n'abo abansobya; ndibaggya mu nsi mwe batuula, naye tebaliyingira mu nsi ya Isiraeri: kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_20_39_Nammwe, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri, bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Mugende muweereze buli muntu ebifaananyi bye, era n'oluvannyuma, bwe mutalikkiriza kumpulira: naye erinnya lyange ettukuvu temuliryonoona nate n'ebirabo byammwe n'ebifaananyi byammwe. 
26_20_40_Kubanga ku lusozi lwange olutukuvu, ku lusozi olw'entikko ya Isiraeri, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, okwo ennyumba yonna eya Isiraeri, bo bonna, kwe balimpeerereza mu nsi; eyo gye ndibakkiririza, era eyo gye ndibasalirira ebiweebwayo byammwe n'ebibala ebibereberye eby'ebitone byammwe wamu n'ebintu byammwe byonna ebitukuvu. 
26_20_41_Ndibakkiriza ng'akaloosa, bwe ndibaggya mu mawanga ne mbakuŋŋaanya okubaggya mu nsi mwe mwasaasaanyizibwa; kale nditukuzibwa mu mmwe mu maaso g'amawanga. 
26_20_42_Awo mulimanya nga nze Mukama, bwe ndibayingiza mu nsi ya Isiraeri, mu nsi gye nnayimusiza omukono gwange okugiwa bajjajjammwe. 
26_20_43_Awo mulijjuukirira eyo amakubo gammwe n'ebikolwa byammwe byonna bye mwegwagwawaza nabyo; era mulyetamwa mu maaso gammwe mmwe olw'ebibi byammwe byonna bye mwakola. 
26_20_44_Kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama, bwe ndimala okukola gye muli olw'erinnya lyange, si ng'amakubo gammwe amabi bwe gali, so si ng'ebikolwa byammwe ebikyamu bwe biri, ai mmwe ennyumba ya Isiraeri, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_20_45_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_20_46_Omwana w'omuntu, simba amaaso go obukiika obwa ddyo, otonnyese ekigambo kyo okwolekera obukiika obwa ddyo, olagulire ku kibira eky'ennimiro ey'obukiika obwa ddyo; 
26_20_47_ogambe ekibira eky'obukiika obwa ddyo nti Wulira ekigambo kya Mukama; bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Laba, ndikuma omuliro mu ggwe ne gwokya buli muti ogwera oguli mu ggwe na buli muti mukalu: ennimi ez'omuliro ezaaka tezirizikizibwa, n'amaaso gonna okuva obukiika obwa ddyo okutuuka obukiika obwa kkono galiggya nagwo. 
26_20_48_Kale bonna abalina omubiri baliraba nga nze Mukama ngukumye: tegulizikizibwa. 
26_20_49_Awo ne njogera nti Woowe, Mukama Katonda! banjogerako nti Si mugezi wa ngero? 
26_21_1_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_21_2_Omwana w'omuntu, simba amaaso go okwolekera e Yerusaalemi, otonnyese ekigambo kyo okwolekera ebifo ebitukuvu, olagulire ku nsi ya Isiraeri 
26_21_4_Kale kubanga ndikumaliramu ddala omutuukirivu n'omubi, ekitala kyange kyeluriva kifuluma mu kiraato kyakyo okutabaala bonna abalina omubiri, okuva obukiika obwa ddyo okutuuka obukiika obwa kkono: 
26_21_5_kale bonna abalina omubiri balimanya nga nze Mukama nsowodde ekitala kyange ne nkiggya mu kiraato kyakyo; tekiridda nate lwa kubiri. 
26_21_6_Kale ssa ebikkowe, ggwe omwana w'omuntu; amabega go nga gakusonjose era ng'oliko obuyinike bw'olissa ebikkowe bw'otyo bo nga balaba. 
26_21_7_Kale olunaatuuka bwe banaakugamba nti Lwaki ggwe okussa ebikkowe? n'oyogera nti Olw'ebigambo ebiwuliddwa, kubanga bijja: na buli mutima gulisaanuuka, n'emikono gyotma giriyongobera, na buli mwoyo gulizirika, n'amaviivi gonna galiba manafu ng'amazzi: laba, bijja, era birikolebwa, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_21_8_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_21_9_Omwana w'omuntu, lagula oyogere nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Yogera nti Ekitala, ekitala kiwagaddwa era kiziguddwa: 
26_21_10_kiwagaddwa kitte ekiwendo; kiziguddwa kibe ng'enjota: kale tunaasanyuka? omuggo ogw'omwana we gunyooma buli muti. 
26_21_11_Era kiweereddwayo okuzigulwa, kiryoke kikwatibwe: ekitala kiwagaddwa, weewaawo, kiziguddwa, okukiwaayo mu mukono gw'omussi. 
26_21_12_Kaaba era wowoggana, omwana w'omuntu: kubanga kiri ku bantu bange, kiri ku bakungu bonna aba Isiraeri: baweereddwayo eri ekitala wamu n'abantu bange: kale kuba ku kisambi kyo. 
26_21_13_Kubanga waliwo okusala omusango; era kiriba kitya omuggo nagwo ogugaya bwe guliba nga tegukyaliwo? bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_21_14_Kale ggwe, omwana w'omuntu, lagula okube mu ngalo; ekitala kyongerwe omuIundi ogw'okusatu, ekitala eky'abafumitiddwa okufa: kye kitala ky'omukulu, afumitiddwa okufa, ekiyingira mu bisenge byabwe. 
26_21_15_Ntadde omumwa gw'ekitala ku miryango gyabwe gyonna, omutima gwabwe gusaanuuke n'okwesittala kwabwe kwongerwe nnyo: ee! kifuuse ng'enjota, kisongoddwa olw'okutta. 
26_21_16_Weekuŋŋaanye, tambulira ku gwa ddyo; tala, tambulira ku gwa kkono; yonna yonna amaaso go gye goolekera. 
26_21_17_Era ndikuba mu ngalo, ne nzikusa ekiruyi kyange: nze Mukama nkyogedde. 
26_21_18_Ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nate nga kyogera nti 
26_21_19_Era, omwana w'omuntu, weeteekerewo amakubo abiri ekitala kya kabaka w'e Babulooni mwe kinaafuluma; ago gombi galiva mu nsi emu: olambe ekifo, okirambire ekkubo eridda mu kibuga we lisibuka. 
26_21_20_Oteekewo ekkubo ekitala mwe kinaafuluma okutuuka e Labba eky'abaana ba Amoni n'okutuuka eri Yuda mu Yerusaalemi ekiriko enkomera. 
26_21_21_Kubanga kabaka w'e Babulooni yayimirira mu masaŋŋanzira, amakubo gombi we gasibuka; okulagulwa: yazunzazunza obusaale, ne yeebuuza ku baterafi, n'akebera ekibumba. 
26_21_22_Mu mukono gwe ogwa ddyo nga mulimu obulaguzi obw'e Yerusaalemi, okusimba ebitomera, okwasamira akamwa okutta, okuyimusa eddoboozi n'okwogerera waggulu, okusimba ebitomera ku miryango, okutuuma ebifunvu, okuzimba ebigo. 
26_21_23_Era buliba gye bali ng'obulaguzi obutaliimu mu maaso gaabwe ababalayiridde ebirayiro: naye ajjukiza obutali butuukirivu, balyoke bakwatibwe. 
26_21_24_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Kubanga mujjukizizza obutali butuukirivu bwammwe, kubanga okusobya kwammwe kubikkuddwako, ebibi byammwe n'okulabika ne birabika mu bikolwa byammwe byonna; kubanga mujjukiddwa, mulikwatibwa n'omukono. 
26_21_25_Naawe, ai ggwe omubi afumitiddwa okufa, omukulu wa Isiraeri, ajjiriddwa olunaku lwo, mu biro eby'obutali butuukirivu obw'enkomerero; 
26_21_26_bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ggyawo enkufiira otikkuleko engule: ekyo tekiriba nate bwe kityo: gulumiza ebikkakkanye, okkakkanye ebigulumizibwa. 
26_21_27_Ndikivuunika, ndikivuunika, ndikivuunika: so n'ekyo tekiriba nate, okutuusa nnyini kyo lw'alijja, era ndikimuwa. 
26_21_28_Naawe, omwana w'omuntu, lagula oyogere nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda eby'abaana ba Amoni n'eby'okuvuma kwabwe; oyogere nti Ekitala, ekitala kisowoddwa, kiziguliddwa ekiwendo, okukiriisa, kibeere ng'enjota: 
26_21_29_nga bwe baakulabira ebyayanga, nga bwe baakulagula eby'obulimba, okukuteeka ku nsingo z'ababi abafumitiddwa okufa abajjiddwa olunaku lwabwe, mu biro eby'obutali butuukirivu obw'enkomerero. 
26_21_30_Kizze mu kiraato kyakyo. Mu kifo mwe watonderwa, mu nsi mwe wazaalirwa, mwe ndikusalirira omusango. 
26_21_31_Era ndikufukirako ddala okunyiiga kwange; ndikufuuwako omuliro ogw'obusungu bwange: era ndikuwaayo mu mukono gw'abantu abali ng'ensolo ab'amagezi okuzikiriza. 
26_21_32_Oliba nku za muliro; omusaayi gwo guliba wakati mu nsi; tolijjukirwa nate: kubanga nze Mukama nkyogedde. 
26_22_1_Era nate ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_22_2_Naawe, omwana w'omuntu, onoosala omusango, onoosala omusango ogw'ekibuga eky'omusaayi? kale kimanyise emizizo gyakyo gyonna. 
26_22_3_Era yogera nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ekibuga ekiyiwa omusaayi wakati mu kyo so, ekiseera kyakyo kituuke, ekikola ebifaananyi okweyonoona okwegwagwawaza! 
26_22_4_Ozzizza omusango ogw'omusaayi gwo gw'oyiye, era ogwagwawazibwa n'ebifaananyi byo bye wakola; era osembezezza ennaku zo, era otuuse ne mu myaka gyo: kyenvudde nkufuula ekivume eri amawanga, n'eky'okukudaalira eri ensi zonna. 
26_22_5_Abo abakuli okumpi, n'abo abakuli ewala balikukudaalira, ggwe alina erinnya ery'obugwagwa era ajjudde okusasamala. 
26_22_6_Laba, abakungu ba Isiraeri, buli muntu ng'obuyinza bwe bwe buli, baabanga mu ggwe okuyiwa omusaayi. 
26_22_7_Mu ggwe mwe baanyoomeranga kitaabwe ne nnyaabwe; wakati mu ggwe mw baakoleranga omugenyi eby'okujooga: mu ggwe mwe baalyazaamaanya nga atalina kitaawe ne nnamwandu. 
26_22_8_Wanyoomanga ebintu byange ebitukuvu, n'oyonoonanga ssabbiiti zange. 
26_22_9_Abasajja abawaayiriz baabanga mu ggwe okuyiwa omu saayi: ne mu ggwe mwe baaliirang ku nsozi: wakati mu ggwe mw baakoleranga eby'obukaba. 
26_22_10_Mu ggwe mwe babikkulidde ku bwereere bwa kitaabwe: mu ggwe mwe bakwatira n'amaanyi omukazi eyali nga si mulongoofu olw'okweyawul kwe. 
26_22_11_Era waliwo akoze eky'o muzizo ne mukazi wa munne; era waliwo n'omulala ayonoonye n'obu kaba muka mwana we; era waliwo n'omulala mu ggwe eyakwata mwa nnyina muwala wa kitaawe. 
26_22_12_Mu ggwe mwe baliiridde enguzi okuyiwa omusaayi; wasolooza amagoba ne bisukkirira, era baliraanwa bo wabaviisaamu amagoba ng'okwatiddwa omululu ng'ojooga, era onneerabidde nze, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_22_13_Laba nno, amagoba go agata ga mazima ge wagoba kyennava ngakubira mu ngalo n'omusaayi gwo ogwabanga wakati mu ggwe. 
26_22_14_Omutima gwo guliyinza okugumiikiriza, oba emikono gyo giriyinza okuba n'amaanyi, mu nnaku mm nditeeseza ebibyo? nze Mukama nkyogedde n'okukola ndikikola. 
26_22_15_Era ndikusaasaanyiza mu mawanga, ne nkutaataaganyiza mu nsi nnyingi; era ndikumalamu empitambi yo. 
26_22_16_Awo oligwagwawazibwa ku bubwo wekka mu maaso g'amawanga; kale olimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_22_17_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_22_18_Omwana w'omuntu, ennyumba Isiraeri efuuse amasengere gye ne bonna bikomo na masasi na byun na bbaati wakati mu kikoomi; masengere ga ffeeza. 
26_22_19_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Kubanga mwenna mufuuse mas ngere, laba, kyendiva mbakuŋŋnaana mu Yerusaalemi wakati. 
26_22_20_Nga bwe bakuŋŋaanya effeeza n'ebikomo n'ebyuma n'amabaati n'amasasi mu kyoto wakati okubifukutako omulikubisaanuusa; bwe ntyo bwe ndibakuŋŋaanya mmwe nga ndiko obusungu n'ekiruyi, era ndibateekawo ne mbasaanuusa. 
26_22_21_Weewaawo, ndibakuŋŋaanya ne mbafukutako omuliro ogw'obusungu bwange, nammwe mulisaanuuka wakati mu kyo. 
26_22_22_Ng'effeeza bw'esaanuukira wakati mu kyoto, nammwe bwe mulisaanuukira bwe mutyo wakati nu kyo; kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama mbafuseeko ekiruyi kyange. 
26_22_23_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_22_24_omwana w'omuntu, kigambe nti ggwe oli nsi eterongoosebwa, so tetonnyebwako nkuba ku lunaku olw'okunyiigirako. 
26_22_25_Waliwo okwekobaana kwa bannabbi baakyo wakati mu kyo ng'empologoma ewuuguma etaagulataagula omuyiggo:) alidde emmeeme z'abantu; banyaga eby'obugagga n'eby'omuwendo omungi; bafudde bannamwandu baakyo okuba abangi wakati mu kyo. 
26_22_26_Bakabona baakyo bagiridde ekyejo amateeka gange, era bagwagwawazizza ebintu byange ebinkuvu: tebaawuddeemu bitukuvu n’ebitali bitukuvu, so tebayigiriza bantu okwawulamu ebitali birongoou n'ebirongoofu, era bakwese amaaso gaabwe essabbiiti zange, nange tvumisibwa mu bo. 
26_22_27_Abakungu baakyo wakati mu kyo bali ng'enisege egitaagulataagula omuyiggo; okuyiwa omusaayi n'okuzikiriza emmeeme balyoke bafune amagoba igatali ga mazima. 
26_22_28_Era bannabbi baakyo babasiigiddeko ebbumba eritasekuddwa bulungi, nga balaba ebyayanga era nga babalagula eby'obulimba, nga boogera nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, Mu zama nga so tayogedde. 
26_22_29_Abantu ab'omu nsi bajooze, ne bagoberera okunyaga; weewaawo, beeraliikirizza omwavu n'eyeetaaga, era bajooze nunnaggwanga nga bamulanga bwereere. 
26_22_30_Ne nnoonya omusajja mu bo eyandiddaabirizza olukomera z'ayimirira mu kituli ekiwaguddwa mu maaso gange ku lw'ensi, nneme okugizikiriza: naye ne ssiraba n'omu. 
26_22_31_Kyenvudde mbafukako okunyiiga kwange; mbamazeewo n'omuliro ogw'obusungu bwange: ndese ku mutwe gwabwe ekkubo lyabwe bo, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_23_1_Ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nate nga kyogera nti 
26_23_2_Omwana w'omuntu, waaliwo abakazi babiri, nnyaabwe omu: 
26_23_3_ne bayenda mu Misiri; baayenda mu buto bwabwe: eyo amabeere gaabwe gye gaanyigirizibwa, era eyo gye baabetentera ennywanto ez'obutannaba kumanya musajja. 
26_23_4_N'amannya gaabwe Okola, omukulu, ne Okoliba, muganda we: ne baba bange ne bazaala abaana ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala. N'amannya gaabwe, Samaliya ye Okola, ne Yerusaalemi ye Okoliba. 
26_23_5_Okola n'ayenda bwe yali owange; n'asuusuuta baganzi be, Abaasuli baliraanwa be, 
26_23_6_abaayambalanga kaniki, abakulu n'abaamasaza, bonna balenzi abeegombebwa, abasajja ab'embalaasi abeebagadde embalaasi. 
26_23_7_N'abagabira obwenzi bwe, bonna basajja ab'e Bwasuli abalonde: era buli gwe yasuusuuta, ne yeyonoonyesa n'ebifaananyi byabwe byonna. 
26_23_8_So talekangayo bwenzi bwe okuva mu nnaku ez'e Misiri; kubanga mu buto bwe baasula naye, ne babetenta ennywanto ez'obutannaba kumanya musajja: ne bamufukako obwenzi bwabwe. 
26_23_9_Kyennava mmuwaayo mu mukono gwa baganzi be, mu mukono gw'Abaasuli be yasuusuuta, 
26_23_10_Abo baabikkula ku bwereere bwe: ne batwala abaana be ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala; naye ne bamutta n'ekitala: n'afuuka ekigambo eky'obuwemu mu bakazi; kubanga baamukomekkerezaako emisango. 
26_23_11_Ne muganda we Okoliba n'alaba ekyo, naye n'amusinga okukyama mu kusuusuuta kwe ne mu bwenzi bwe obwabanga obungi okusinga obwenzi bwa muganda we. 
26_23_12_Yasuusuuta Abaasuli, abaamasaza n'abakulu, baliraanwa be, abaayambalanga engoye ezinekaaneka ennyo, ab'embalaasi abeebagadde embalaasi, bonna balenzi abeegombebwa. 
26_23_13_Ne ndaba ng'agwagwawazibwa; bombi baakwata ekkubo limu. 
26_23_14_Ye n'ayongera ku bwenzi bwe; kubanga yalaba abasajja abatonebwa ku kisenge, ebifaananyi eby'Abakaludaaya ebyatonebwa n'eggerenge; 
26_23_15_nga beesibye enkoba mu biwato, nga bagaziyizza ebiremba ng'ekifaananyi bwe kiri eky'Ababulooni mu Bukaludaaya, ensi mwe baazaalirwa. 
26_23_16_Awo mangu ago nga kyajje abalabe n'abasuusuuta n'abatumira ababaka mu Bukaludaaya. 
26_23_17_Abababulooni ne bajja gy'ali mu kitanda eky'okwagala, ne bamwonoona n'obwenzi bwabwe, ye n'agwagwawazibwa nabo, omwoyo gwe ne gubatamwa. 
26_23_18_Kale bw'atyo n'abikkula ku bwenzi bwe n'abikkula ku bwereere bwe: kale omwoyo gwange ne gumutamwa, ng'omwoyo gwange bwe gwatamwa muganda we. 
26_23_19_Era naye n'ayongera ku bwenzi bwe, ng'ajjukira ennaku ez'obuto bwe, mwe yayendera mu nsi ey'e Misiri. 
26_23_20_Awo n'asuusuuta baganzi baabwe, omubiri gwabwe ng'ennyama y'endogoyi, n'ebibavaamu biri ng'ebiva mu mbalaasi. 
26_23_21_Bw'otyo n'ojjukira obukaba obw'omu buto bwo, ennywanto zo bwe zaabetentebwa Abamisiri olw'amabeere ag'omu buwala bwe. 
26_23_22_Kale, ggwe Okoliba, bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Laba, ndigolokosa ku ggwe baganzi bo omwoyo gwo be gutamiddwa, ne mbaleeta okukulumba enjuyi zonna: 
26_23_23_Abababulooni n'Abakaludaaya bonna, Pekodi ne Sowa ne Kowa, n'Abaasuli bonna wamu nabo: abalenzi abeegombebwa, bonna baamasaza n'abakulu, abalangira n'abasajja abaatiikirira, bonna nga beebagadde embalaasi. 
26_23_24_Era balikutabaala nga; bakutte eby'okulwanyisa, amagaali ne bannamuziga, era nga balina ekibiina eky'amawanga; balyesimba okulwana naawe, nga balina obugabo n'engabo n'enkuffiira enjuyi zonna: era ndibatikkira okusala emisango, ne bakusalira omusango ng'emisango gya bwe bwe giri. 
26_23_25_Era ndikusimbako obuggya bwange, nabo balikubonereza n'ekiruyi; balikuggyako ennyindo yo n'amatu go; n'ekitundu kyo ekirifikkawo kirigwa n'ekitala: balitwala abaana bo ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala; n'ekitundu kyo ekirifikkawo kiryokebwa omuliro. 
26_23_26_Era balikwambuza ebyambalo byo; ne bakuggyako eby'obuyonjo byo ebirungi. 
26_23_27_Bwe ntyo bwe ndimazaawo gy'oli obukaba bwo n'obwenzi bwo obwava mu nsi y'e Misiri: n'okuyimusa n'otobayimusiza nate amaaso go newakubadde okujjukira Misiri nate. 
26_23_28_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Laba, ndikuwaayo mu mukono gw'abo b'okyawa, mu mukono gw'abo omwoyo gwo be gutamiddwa: 
26_23_29_nabo balikukola olw'obukyawe, balikuggyako omulimu gwo gwonna, ne bakuleka ng'oli bwereere nga tobikkiddwako: obwereere obw'obwenzi bwo ne bubikkulibwa, obukaba bwo era n'obwenzi bwo. 
26_23_30_Ebyo birikukolebwa, kubanga wayenda okugoberera ab'amawanga era kubanga ogwagwawazibbwa n'ebifaananyi byabwe. 
26_23_31_Watambulira mu kkubo lya muganda wo; kyendiva mpa ekikompe kyo mu mukono gwo. 
26_23_32_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Olinywa ku kikompe kya muganda wo, ekiwanvu era ekinene: olisekererwa ddala n'oduulirwa: kirimu bingi. 
26_23_33_Olijjula obutamiivu n'obuyinike, ekikompe eky'okusamaalirira n'okulekebwawo, ekikompe kya muganda wo Samaliya. 
26_23_34_Olikinywa n'okutankira, n'omeketa engyo zaakyo, n'oyuza amabeere go: kubanga nze nkyogedde, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_23_35_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Kubanga onneerabidde, n'onsuula ennyuma w'amabega go, kale naawe beerako obukaba bwo n'obwenzi bwo. 
26_23_36_Era Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Omwana w'omuntu, onoosala omusango gwa Okola ne Okoliba? kale babuulire emizizo gyabwe. 
26_23_37_Kubanga baayenda, n'omusaayi guli mu mikono gyabwe, era baayenda ku bifaananyi byabwe; era ne batabani baabwe be banzaalira baabayisiza mu muliro eri byo okuliibwa. 
26_23_38_Era nate bankoze kino: boonoonye ekifo kyange ekitukuvu ku lunaku olumu, era boonoonye essabbiiti zange. 
26_23_39_Kubanga bwe baamala okuttira abaana baabwe ebifaananyi byabwe, kale ne bajja ku lunaku olwo mu kifo kyange ekitukuvu okukyonoona; era, laba, bwe batyo bwe bakoze wakati mu nnyumba yange. 
26_23_40_Era nate mwatumya abantu abava ewala: abaatumirwa omubaka, kale, laba, ne bajja; n'onaabira abo n'oziga amaaso go ne weeyonja n'eby'obuyonjo; 
26_23_41_n'otuula ku kitanda eky'ekitiibwa, emmeeza ng'etegekeddwa mu maaso gaakyo, kwe wateeka obubaane bwange n'amafuta gange. 
26_23_42_N'eddoboozi ery'ekibiina ekyegolola iyali naye: abatamiivu ne baleetebwa okuva mu ddungu wamu n'abasajja abakopi; ne bateeka ebikomo ku mikono gy'abo bombi, n'engule ennungi ku mitwe gyabwe. 
26_23_43_Awo ne njogera ku oyo eyali akaddiye mu bwenzi nti Kaakano banaayenda ku ye, naye nabo. 
26_23_44_Ne bayingira gy'ali, nga bwe bayingira eri omukazi omwenzi: bwe batyo bwe baayingira eri Okola n'eri Okoliba, abakazi abakaba. 
26_23_45_N'abatuukirivu, abo be balibasalira omusango ng'abakazi abenzi bwe basalirwa omusango era ng'abakazi abayiwa omusaayi bwe basalirwa omusango; kubanga benzi, n'omusaayi guli mu mikono gyabwe. 
26_23_46_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ndibalinnyisiza ekibiina ne mbawaayo okuyuuguumizibwa eruuyi n'eruuyi n'okunyagibwa. 
26_23_47_Kale ekibiina kiribakuba amayinja, ne babafumita n'ebitala byabwe; balitta abaana baabwe ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala ne bookya ennyumba zaabwe omuliro. 
26_23_48_Bwe ntyo bwe ndikomya obukaba mu nsi, abakazi bonna bayigirizibwe obutakola ng'obukaba bwammwe bwe buli. 
26_23_49_Era balibasasula obukaba bwammwe, nammwe mulibaako ebibi eby'ebifaananyi byaaunwe: kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama Katonda. 
26_24_1_Nate mu mwaka ogw'omwenda mu mwezi ogw'ekkumi ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'ekkumi ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_24_2_Omwana w'omuntu, weewandiikire erinnya ery'olunaku, ery'olunaku olwa leero: kabaka We Babulooni yasemberera Yerusaalemi ku lunaku luno. 
26_24_3_Era ogerere ennyumba enjeemu olugero obagambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Teekako sseffuliya, giteekeko, era ogifukemu amazzi: 
26_24_4_okuŋŋaanye ebifi byamu obiteekemu, buli kifi ekirungi, ekisambi n'omukono; gijjuze ama gvmba agasinga obulungi. 
26_24_5_Ddira ku mbuzi esinga obulungi, otuume amagumba wansi waayo: gyeseze bulungi; weewaawo, amagumba gaayo gafumbibwe wakati mu yo. 
26_24_6_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Zisanze ekibuga eky'omusaayi, essufuliya omuli obutalagge bwayo, so n'obutalagge bwayo tebugivuddeemu! giggyeemu kitundu kitundu; tegwiriddwako kalulu. 
26_24_7_Kubanga omusaayi gwakyo guli wakati mu kyo; kyaguteeka ku lwazi olwereere; tekyagufuka ku ttaka okugubikkako enfuufu 
26_24_9_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Zisanze ekibuga eky'omusaayi! era nange nditeekera enkoomi okuba ennene. 
26_24_10_Tindikira enku nnyingi, oyase omuliro, ofumbire ddala ennyama, okwase amazzi g'ennyama, amagumba gasiriire. 
26_24_11_Olyoke ogiteeke ku manda gaayo nga teriimu kintu, ebugume, n'ekikomo kyayo kiggye, n'empitambi yaayo esaanuuke mu yo, obutalagge bwayo bumalibwewo. 
26_24_12_Kyekooyezza n'okutegana: era naye obutalagge bwakyo obungi tebukivaamu; obutalagge bwakyo tebuvaamu na muliro. 
26_24_13_Mu mpitambi yo mulimu obukaba: kubanga nakulongoosa so tewalongoosebwa, kyoliva olema okulongoosebwa empitambi yo nate n'akatono okutuusa lwe ndikkusa ekiruyi kyange ku ggwe. 
26_24_14_Nze Mukama nkyogedde: kirituuka nange ndikikola; siridda nnyuma so sirisonyiwa so sirejjusa; ng'amakubo go bwe gali era ng'ebikolwa byo bwe biri, bwe balikusalira omusango, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_24_15_Era ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_24_16_Omwana w'omuntu, laba, oliba oli awo ne nkuggyako ekyo amaaso go kye geegomba: era naye towuubaa langa so tokaabanga maziga so n'a maziga go galemenga okukulukuta 
26_24_17_Ssa ebikkowe naye kasirise towuubaalira afudde, weesibe ekiremba kyo, onaanike engatto zo mu bigere, so tobikka ku mimwa gyo, so tolyanga ku mmere ey'abantu. 
26_24_18_Awo ne njogera n'abantu enkya; akawungeezi mukazi wange n'afa: ne nkola enkya nga bwe nnalagiddwa. 
26_24_19_Abantu ne baŋŋamba nti Tootubuulire ebigambo bino bwe biri ku ffe, kyova okola bw'otyo? 
26_24_20_Awo ne mbagamba nti Ekigambo kya Mukama kyanjijidde nga kyogera nti 
26_24_21_Gamba ennyumba ya Isiraeri nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Laba, ndyonoona ekifo kyange ekitukuvu, amalala ag'obuyinza bwammwe, amaaso gammwe kye geegomba, n'ekyo emmeeme yammwe ky'esaasira; kale abaana bammwe ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala be mwaleka ennyuma baligwa n'ekitala. 
26_24_22_Nammwe mulikola nga nze bwe nkoze: temulibikka ku mimwa gyammwe so temulirya mmere ya bantu. 
26_24_23_N'ebiremba byammwe biriba ku mitwe gyammwe, n'engatto zammwe mu bigere byammwe: temuliwuubaala so temulikaaba; naye muliyongoberera mu butali butuukirivu bwammwe, ne musinda buli muntu ne munne. 
26_24_24_Bwe kityo Ezeekyeri aliba gye muli akabonero; nga byonna bwe biri by'akoze bwe mutyo bwe mulikola: ekyo bwe kirijja, kale ne mulyoka mutegeera nga nze Mukama Katonda. 
26_24_25_Naawe, omwana w'omuntu, ku lunaku lwe ndibaggyako amaanyi gaabwe, essanyu ery'ekitiibwa kyabwe, amaaso gaabwe kye geegomba, n'ekyo kye bateekako omutima bwabwe, abaana baabwe ab'obuenzi n'ab'obuwala, 
26_24_26_kale ku lunaku olwo tekiriba bwe kityo ig'oyo aliwona alijja gy'oli okukikuwuliza n'amatu go! 
26_24_27_Ku lunaku lwo akamwa ko kalyasamira oyo aliba ng'awonye, n'oyogera so toliba kasiru nate: bwe kityo oliba kabonero gye bali; kale balimanya nga ze Mukama. 
26_25_1_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_25_2_mwana w'omuntu, simba amaaso okwolekera abaana ba Amoni, lalagulireko: 
26_25_3_ogambe abaana ba Amoni nti Muwulire ekigambo kya Mukama Katonda: bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Kubanga wayogera nti Nyeenya, eri awatukuvu wange, bwe wayonooneka; n'eri ensi ya Isiraeri bwe yazisibwa; n'eri ennyumba ya Yuda bwe baagenda mu busibe: 
26_25_4_laba, kyendiva nkuwaayo eri abaana ab'ebuvanjuba okuba obutaka, kale balisiisira ensiisira zaabwe mu ggwe, ne batuula mu ggwe; balirya ebibala byo, era balinywa amata go. 
26_25_5_Era ndifuula Labba okuba ng'ekisibo eky'eŋŋamira, n'abaana ba Amoni okuba ng'ekifo embuzi we zigalamira: kale mulimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_25_6_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kubanga okubye mu ngalo, n'osamba n'ebigere, n'osanyukira ku nsi ya Isiraeri n'ekyejo kyonna eky'omu mmeeme yo 
26_25_8_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kubanga Mowaabu ne Seyiri boogera nti Laba, ennyumba ya Yuda efaanana amawanga gonna 
26_25_10_okutabaala abaana ba Amoni, era ndibawa okuba obutaka, abaana ba Amoni balemenga okujjukirwanga mu mawanga: 
26_25_11_era ndituukiriza emisango ku Mowaabu; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_25_12_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kubanga Edomu akoze bubi ennyumba ya Yuda ng'awalana eggwanga, era ayonoonye nnyo era yeewalanidde eggwanga ku bo; 
26_25_13_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Ndigololera ku Edomu omukono gwange, ne mmumalamu abantu n'ensolo: era ndigizisa okuva e Temani: okutuuka e Dedani baligwa n'ekitala. 
26_25_14_Era nditeeka eggwanga lyange ku Edomu n'omukono gw'abantu bange Isiraeri; era balikolera mu Edomu ng'obusungu bwange bwe buli era ng'ekiruyi kyange bwe kiri: kale balimanya okuwalana kwange, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_25_15_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kubanga Abafirisuuti bakoze nga bawalana eggwanga, era bawalanye eggwanga emmeeme yaabwe ng'eriko ekyejo, okugizikiriza n'obulabe obutaggwaawo; 
26_25_16_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, ndigololera ku Bafirisuuti omukono gwange, era ndimalawo Abakeresi, ne nzikiriza ekitundu ekifisseewo eky'oku ttale ly'ennyanja. 
26_25_17_Era ndiwalana ku bo eggwanga ekkulu nga mbanenya n'ekiruyi: kale balimanya nga nze Mukama, bwe ndibateekako eggwanga lyange. 
26_26_1_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'ekkumi n'esatu ku lunaku olw'olubereberye olw'omwezi ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjira nga kyogera nti 
26_26_2_Omwana w'omuntu, kubanga Ttuulo ayogedde ku Yerusaalemi nti Nyeenya! oyo amenyese eyabanga omulyango ogw'amawanga; akyukidde gye ndi: kaakano ye ng'amaze okuzisibwa nze ndigaggawala: 
26_26_3_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, ndi mulabe wo, ggwe Ttuulo, era ndikutabaaza amawanga mangi, ng'ennyanja bw'etabaaza amayengo gaayo. 
26_26_4_Kale balizikiriza babbugwe ba Ttuulo, ne bamenyera ddala ebigo bye: era ndimukolokotako eafuufu ye, ne mmufuula olwazi olwereere. 
26_26_5_Anaabanga kifo kya kutegerangako migonjo wakati mu nnyanja: kubanga nze nkyogedde, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda: era kinaabanga munyago gwa mawanga. 
26_26_6_Ne bawala be abali mu ttale balittibwa n'ekitala: kale balimanya nga w’e Mukama. 
26_26_7_Kubanga Mukama Katonda bw'ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, ndireeta ku Ttuulo Nebukadduleeza kabaka w'e Babulooni; kabaka wa bakabaka, okuva obukiika obwa kkono, ng'alina embalaas; n'amagaali n'abeebagadde embalassi nekibiina n'abantu bangi. 
26_26_8_Alitta n'ekitala bawala bo abali mu ttale era alikuzimbako ebigo, n'akutuumako elufunvu, n'akuyimusizaako engabo. 
26_26_9_Era alisimba ebintu bye ebitomera ku babbugwe bo, era alimenyera ddala ebigo byo n'embazzi ze. 
26_26_10_Embalaasi ze kubanga ziyinze obungi, enfuufu yaazo erikubikkako: babbugwe bo balikankana olw'oluyoogaano lw'abo abeebagala embalaasi ne bannamuziga n'amagaali, bw'aliyingira mu miryango gyo, ng'abantu bwe bayingira mu kibuga ekiwaguddwa mu ekituli. 
26_26_11_Alirinnyirira enguudo zo zonna n'ebinuulo by'embalaasi ze: alitta abantu bo n'ekitala, n'empagi ez'amaanyi go zirikka wansi. 
26_26_12_Era balinyaga obugagga bwo, n'eby'obuguzi bwo balibifuula omuyiggo: era balimenyera ddala babbugwe bo, ne bazikiriza ennyumba zo ez'okwesiima: era baligalamiza amayinja go n'emiti gyo n'enfuufu yo wakati mu mazzi. 
26_26_13_Era ndikomya eddoboozi ery'ennyimba zo: n'okuvuga kw'ennanga zo tekuliwulirwa nate. 
26_26_14_Era ndikufuula olwazi olwereere: era onoobanga kifo kya kutegerangako migonjo: tolizimbibwa nate: kubanga nze Mukama nkyogedde, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_26_15_Bw'ati Mukama Katonda bw'agamba Ttuulo nti Ebizinga tebirikankana olw'okubwatuka olw'okugwa kwo, abaliko ebiwundu bwe balisinda, ng'abattira ekiwendo wakati mu ggwe? 
26_26_16_Awo abalangira bonna ab'ennyanja baliva ku ntebe zaabwe, ne bambula ebyambalo byabwe, ne beggyako engoye zaabwe: ez'eddalizi: balyambala okukankana; balituula ku ttaka nga bakankana buli kase;era ne bakusamaaliririra. 
26_26_17_Era balitanula okukukungubagira ne bakugamba nti Ng'ozikiridde, ggwe eyatuulwangamu abalunnyanja, eldbuga ekyayatiikirira, ekyalina amaanyi ku nnyanja, kyo n'abo abakituulamu, abaagwisaako entiisa yaabwe ku abo bonna abaagitambulirangamu! 
26_26_18_Kaakano ebizinga birikankana ku lunaku olw'okugwa kwo: weewaawo, ebizinga ebiri mu nnyanja birikeŋŋentererwa olw'okugenda kwo. 
26_26_19_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Bwe ndikufuula ekibuga ekyalekebwawo, ng'ebibuga ebitatuulwamu; bwe ndikulinnyisaako ennyanja, amazzi amangi ne gakubikkako; 
26_26_20_kale ndikukkakkanya wamu n'abo abakka mu bunnya, eri abantu ab'omu biro eby'edda, era ndikutuuza mu njuyi z'ensi eza wansi, mu bifo ebyalekebwawo obw'edda, wamu n'abo abakka mu bunnya, olemenga okutuulwamu; era nditeeka ekitiibwa mu nsi ey'abalamu: 
26_26_21_ndikufuula entiisa, so tolibaawo nate: newakubadde nga bakunoonya, naye tebaakulabenga nate ennaku zonna, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_27_1_Ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nate nga kyogera nti 
26_27_2_Naawe, omwana w'omuntu, tanula okukungubagira Ttuulo: 
26_27_3_ogambe Ttuulo nti Ai ggwe atuula awayingirirwa mu nayanja, omusuubuzi ow'amawanga eri ebizinga bingi, bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ggwe, ai Ttuulo oyogedde nti Nze natuukirira mu bulungi. 
26_27_4_Ensalo zo ziri mu mutima gw'ennyanja, abazimbi bo batuukirizza obulungi bwo. 
26_27_5_Embaawo zo zonna baaziggya mu miberozi egiva ku Seniri: baggye emivule ku Lebanooni okukukolera omulongooti. 
26_27_6_Enkasi zo bazikoze mu myera egya Basani: emmanga zo bazikozezza masanga agawaayirwa mu nzo ezaava ku bizinga bya Kittimu. 
26_27_7_Ettanga lyo lyali lya bafuta eriko omulimu ogw'eddalizi ogwava e Misiri, libeere gy'oli ebendera: engoye eza kaniki n'ez'effulungu ezaava ku bizinga bya Erisa ze zaali ettandaluwa yo. 
26_27_8_Abatuula mu Sidoni ne Aluvadi be baali abavuzi bo: abagezigezi bo baali mu ggwe, ai Ttuulo, be bali abagoba bo. 
26_27_9_Abakadde ba Gebali n'abagezigezi baayo baali mu ggwe, nga be bakonzi bo: ebyombo byonna eby'oku nnyanja n'abalunnyanja baabyo baabanga mu ggwe okuwamba eby'obuguzi bwo. 
26_27_10_Obuperusi ne Ludi ne Puti baali mu ggye lyo, abasajja bo abalwanyi: baawanikanga mu ggwe engabo n'enkuffiira: baatenda obulungi bwo. 
26_27_11_Abasajja ab'e Yaluvadi wamu n'eggye lyo baabanga ku babbugwe bo okwetooloola, n'Abagammada baabanga mu bigo byo: baawanikanga engabo zaabwe ku babbugwe bo okwetooloola: baatuukiriza obulungi bwo. 
26_27_12_Talusiisi ye yabaaga omusuubuzi wo olw'obugagga obw'engeri zonna : baawangayo olw'obuguzi bwo effeeza n'ebyuma n'amabaati n'amasasi. 
26_27_13_Yavani, Tubali, ne Meseki, be baali abasuubuzi bo: baawanga emibiri gy'abantu n'ebintu eby'ebikomo olw'obuguzi bwo. 
26_27_14_Ab'omu nnyumba ya Togaluma baawangayo embalaasi n'embalaasi ez'entalo n'ennyumbu olw'ebintu byo. 
26_27_15_Abasajja ab'e Dedani be baali abasuubuzi bo: ebizinga bingi ebyali akatale ak'omu mukono gwo: baakuleeteranga okuwaanyisa amasanga n'emitoogo. 
26_27_16_Obusuuli yabanga, musuubuzi wo olw'olufulube lw'emirimu gyo: baawangayo olw'ebintu byo amayinja aga nnawandagala n'olugoye olw'effulungu n'omulimu ogw'eddalizi ne bafuta ennungi ne kolali n'amayinja amatwakaavu, 
26_27_17_Yuda n'ensi ya Isiraeri baabanp basuubuzi bo: baawangayo olw'obuguzi bwo eŋŋaano ey'e Minnisi n'eby'akaloosa n'omubisi gw'enjuki n'amafuta n'envumbo. 
26_27_18_Ddamasiko yabanga musuubuzi wo olw'olufulube olw'emirimu gyo, olw'olufulube lw'obugagga obw'engeri zonna: n'omwenge ogw'e Keruboni n'ebyoya by'endiga ebyeru. 
26_27_19_Vedani ne Yavani baawangayo olw'ebintu byo obugoogwa: ekyuma ekimasamasa ne kasiya ne kalamo byabanga mu buguzi bwo. 
26_27_20_Dedani yabanga musuubuzi wo olw'engoye ez'omuwendo omung: ez'okwebagalirako. 
26_27_21_Obuwalabu n’abalangira bonna ab'e Kedali abo baabanga basuubuzi ba mu mukono gwo: baabanga basuubuzi bo olw'abaana b'endiga n'endiga ennume n'embuzi. 
26_27_22_Abasuubuzi ab'e Seeba ne Laama baabanga basuubuzi bo: baawangayo olw'e. bintu byo eby'akaloosa ebisings byonna n'amayinja gonna ag'omu wendo omungi n'ezaabu. 
26_27_23_Kalani, ne Kanne ne Edeni n'abasuu buzi ab'e Seeba ne Asuli, ne Kirunaadi baabanga basuubuzi bo. 
26_27_24_Abo be baabanga abasuubuzi bo olw'ebintu ebironde, olw'emitumba gya kaniki n'emirimu egy'eddalizi, n’essanduuko ez'ebyambalo ezineeaneeka, ezisibibwa n'emigwa ezikolebwa emivule, mu by'obuguzi wo. 
26_27_25_Ebyombo eby'e Talusiisi bye byakutambuliranga olw'obuguzi bwo: era wagaggawala n'oba wa kitiibwa kinene mu mutima gw'einyanja. 
26_27_26_Abavuzi bo baakuuusiza awali amazzi amangi: omuaga ogw'ebuvanjuba gukumenye nu mutima gw'ennyanja. 
26_27_27_Obugagga bwo n'ebintu byo, obuguzi bwo, abalunnyanja bo, n'abagoba bo, abakonzi bo n'abawamba obuguzi bwo, n'abasajja bo bonna abawanyi abaali mu ggwe, wamu n'ekibiina kyo kyonna ekiri mu ggwe wakati, baligwa mu mutima gw'emyanja ku lunaku olw'okugwa kwo. 
26_27_28_Olw'eddoboozi ery'okuleekaana kw'abagoba bo, ebyalo ebiriraaiyeewo birikankana. 
26_27_29_N'abo bonna abakwata enkasi, abalunnyanja n'abagoba bonna ab'oku nnyanja baliva mu byombo byabwe, baliyinirira ku lukalu, 
26_27_30_era baliwuliza eddoboozi lyabwe, nga bakukaabira, era balirira nga baliko obuyinike, ne basuula enfuufu ku mitwe gyabwe, era balyekulukuunya mu vvu: 
26_27_31_era balikumwera ne beesiba ebibukutu, era balikukaabira amaziga emmeeme zaabwe nga ziriko obuyinike, nga bawuubaala nnyo nnyini. 
26_27_32_Awo nga bakuba ebivoobe balitanula okukukungubagira ne bakukungubagira nga boogera nti Ani afaanana Ttuulo, afaanana oyo asirisibwa wakati mu nnyanja? 
26_27_33_Ebintu byo bwe byavanga ku znyanja, wajjuzanga amawanga maigi: wagaggawaza bakabaka b'ensi n’olufulube lw'obugagga bwon'ow'obuguzi bwo. 
26_27_34_Mu biro ennyaija bwe yakumenya mu buziba obw'amazzi, obuguzi bwo n'ekibiina kyo kyonna ne bigwa wakati mu ggwe. 
26_27_35_Abo bonna abali ku bizinga bakusamaaliriridde, ne bakabaka baabwe batidde nnyo nnyini, amaaso gaabwe geeraliikiridde. 
26_27_36_Abasuubuzi ab'omu mawanga bakusooza; ofuuse entiisa, so toobeigawo nate ennaku zonna. 
26_28_1_Ekigambo kya, Mukama ne kinjiiira nate nga kyogera nti 
26_28_2_Omwana w'omuntu, gamba omulangira w’e Ttuulo nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Kubanga omutima gwo gugulumizibbwa n'oyogera nti Nze katonda, ntudde ku ntebe ya Katonda wakati mu nnyanja: era naye oli muntu buntu so si Katonda, newakubadde nga wasimba omutima gwo ng'omutima gwa Katonda: 
26_28_3_laba, olina amagezi okusinga Danyeri; tewali kyama kye bayinza okukukweka: 
26_28_4_weefunira obugagga olw'amagezi go n'okutegeera kwo, n'ofuna ezaabu ne ffeeza mu by'obugagga byo: 
26_28_5_oyongedde obugagga bwo olw'amagezi go amangi n'olw'okusuubula kwo, n'omutima gwo gugulumizibwa olw'obugagga bwo: 
26_28_6_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Kubanga osimbye omutima gwo ng'omutima gwa Katonda 
26_28_8_Balikussa mu bunnya; era olifa ng'abo bwe bafa abattirwa mu mutima gw'ennyanja. 
26_28_9_Olyeyongera nate okugambira mu maaso g'oyo akutta nti Nze Katonda? naye oli muntu buntu so si Katonda mu mukono gw'oyo akufumita. 
26_28_10_Olifa ng'abo bwe bafa abatali bakomole n'omukono gwa bannaggwanga: kubanga nze nkyogedde, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_28_11_Era nate ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_28_12_Omwana w'omuntu, tanula okukungubagira kabaka w'e Ttuulo omugambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ossa akabonero ku muwendo, ng'ojjudde amagezi, ng'otuukiridde obulungi. 
26_28_13_Wali mu Adeni olusuku lwa Katonda; buli jjinja ery'omuwendo omungi lyabanga lya kukubikkako, sadio, topazi, ne alimasi, berulo, sokamu, ne yasepi, safiro, ejjinja erya nnawandagala, ne kabunkulo, ne zaabu: emirimu egy'ebitaasa byo n'egy'endere zo gyali mu ggwe; gyategekebwa ku lunaku kwe watonderwa. 
26_28_14_Wali kerubi eyafukibwako amafuta abikkako: era nze nakusimba n'okubeera n'obeera ku lusozi lwa Katonda olutukuvu; watambula eruuyi n'eruuyi wakati mu mayinja ag'omuliro. 
26_28_15_Wali ng'otuukiridde mu makubo go okuva ku lunaku kwe watonderwa okutuusa obutali butuukirivu Iwe bwalabika mu ggwe. 
26_28_16_Baakujuzza wakati ekyejo olw'olufulube olw'okusuubula kwo, n'oyonoona: kyenvudde nkusuula nga nkuggya ku lusozi lwa Katonda nga nkulanga obw'onoonefu; era nkuzikirizza, ai kerubi abikkako, okuva wakati mu mayinja ag'omuliro. 
26_28_17_Omutima gwo gwagulumizibwa olw'obulungi bwo, wakyamya amagezi go olw'okumasamasa kwo: nkusudde wansi, nkutadde mu maaso ga bakabaka, bakutunuulire. 
26_28_18_Wayouoona ebifo byo ebitukuvu olw'olufulube olw'obutali butuukirivu bwo mu kusuubula kwo okutali kwa mazima; kyenvudde nziya omuliro wakati mu ggwe, gukwokezza, era nkufudde evvu ku ttaka mu maaso g'abo bonna abakutunuulira. 
26_28_19_Abo bonna abakumanyi mu mawanga balikwewuunya: ofuuse entiisa so toobengawo nate ennaku zonna. 
26_28_20_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_28_21_Omwana w'omuntu, simba amaaso go okwolekera Sidoni kiragule, 
26_28_22_oyogere nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Laba, nze ndi mulabe wo, ai Sidoni; era ndigulumizibwa wakati mu ggwe: kale balimanya nga nze Mukama, bwe ndimala okutuukiririza mu kyo emisango, ne ntukuzibwa mu kyo 
26_28_23_Kubanga ndiweereza mu kyo kawumpuli n'omusaayi mu nguudo zaakyo; n'abaliko ebiwundu baligwa wakati mu kyo, ekitala nga kikirumba enjuyi zonna; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_28_24_Kale tewalibaawo nate omweramannyo ogufumita eri ennyumba ya Isiraeri newakubadde eriggwa erinakuwaza ku abo bonna ababeetoolodde, abaabagiriranga ekyejo; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama Katonda. 
26_28_25_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Bwe ndiba nga mmaze okukuŋŋaanya ennyumba ya Isiraeri okubaggya mu mawanga, mwe baasaasaanyizibwa, ne ntukuzibwa mu bo mu maaso g'amawanga, kale balituula mu nsi yaabwe gye nnawa omuddu wange Yakobo. 
26_28_26_Era balituula omwo mirembe; weewaawo, balizimba ennyumba ne basimba ensuku ez'emizabbibu, ne batuula mirembe nga tebaliiko kye batya; bwe ndiba nga mmaze okutuukiriza emisango ku abo bonna abaabagirira ekyejo ababeetoolodde; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama Katonda waabwe 
26_29_1_Mu mwaka ogw'ekkumi mu mwezi ogw'ekkumi ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'ekkumi n'ebbiri ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera 
26_29_2_Omwana w'omuntu, simba amaaso go okwolekera Falaawo kabaka w’e Misiri omulagulireko ne ku Misiri yonna: 
26_29_3_yogera ogambe nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Laba, ndi mulabe wo, Falaawo kabaka w’e Misiri, ogusota ogunene ogugalamira wakati mu migga gyagwo, ogwogedde nti Omugga gwange, gwange, era ngwekoledde nzekka. 
26_29_4_Era nditeeka amalobo mu mba zo, n'ebyennyanja eby'omu migga gyo ndibikwataganya n'amagamba go; era ndikulinnyisa okukuggya wakati mu migga gyo, wamu n'ebyennyanja byonna eby'omu migga gyo ebikwatagana n'amagamba go. 
26_29_5_Era ndikuleka ng'osuuliddwa mu ddungu, ggwe n'ebyennyanja byonna eby'omu migga gyo: oligwa ku ttale ebweru; tolikuŋŋaayizibwa so toliyoolebwa: nkuwaddeyo okuba emmere eri ensolo ez'oku nsi n'eri ennyonyi ez'omu bbanga. 
26_29_6_Kale bonna abali mu Misiri balimanya nga nze Mukama, kubanga baabanga muggo gwa lumuli eri ennpumba ya Isiraeri. 
26_29_7_Bwe bakukwata ku mukono, n'omenyeka n'oyasa ebibegabega byabwe byonna: era bwe beesigama ku ggwe, n'omenyeka, n'oyimiriza ebiwato byabwe byonna. 
26_29_8_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, ndikuleetako ekitala, ne nkumalamu abantu n'ensolo. 
26_29_9_N'ensi y'e Misiri eriba matongo era nsiko; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama: kubanga ayogedde nti Omugga gwange, era nze nagukola. 
26_29_10_Kale, laba, nze ndi mulabe wo, era ndi mulabe w'emigga gyo, era ndifuula ensi y'e Misiri ensiko enjereere n'amatongo, okuva ku kigo eky'e Sevene okutuuka ne ku nsalo ey'e Buwesiyopya 
26_29_11_Tewaliba kigere kya muntu ekiriyitamu so tewaliba kigere kya nsolo ekiriyitamu, so terituulwamu emyaka amakumi ana. 
26_29_12_Era ndifuula ensi y'e Misiri amatongo wakati mu nsi ezaalekebwawo, n'ebibuga byayo mu bibuga ebizisibwa biriba matongo emyaka amakumi ana: era ndisaasaanyiza Abamisiri mu mawanga ne mbataataanyiza mu nsi nnyingi. 
26_29_13_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Emyaka amakumi ana nga giyiseewo ndikuŋŋaanya Abamisiri okubaggya mu mawanga mwe baasaasaanyizibwa: 
26_29_14_era ndikomyawo obusibe obw'e Misiri, ne mbazza mu nsi ey'e Pasulo, mu nsi mwe baazaalirwa; era baliba eyo obwakabaka obwajeezebwa. 
26_29_15_Bulisinga obwakabaka bwonna okujeezebwa; so tebulyeguiumiza nate ku mawanga: era ndibakendeeza, so tebalifuga nate mawanga. 
26_29_16_So tebuliba nate bwesige bwa nnyumba ya Isiraeri, nga bujjukiza obutali butuukirivu, bwe bakebuka okubatunuulira; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama Katonda. 
26_29_17_Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'amakumi abiri mu musanvu mu mwezi ogw'olubereberye ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'olubereberye ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nga kyogera nti 
26_29_18_Omwana w'omuntu, Nebukadduleeza kabaka we Babulooni yatabaaza eggye lye olutabaalo olunene okulwanyisa Ttuulo: buli mutwe ne gubaako ekiwalaata, na buli kibegabega ne kibambuka: era naye teyalina mpeera, newakubadde eggye lye okuva e Ttuulo, olw'olutabaalo lwe yakitabaala: 
26_29_19_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, ndiwa Nebukadduleeza kabaka w'e Babulooni ensi y'e Misiri; era alitwaIira ddala olufulube lw'abantu baayo, n'anyaga omunyago gwamu, n'anyaga omuyiggo gwamu; era ye eriba empeera ey'eggye lye. 
26_29_20_Mmuwadde ensi y'e Misiri okuba empeera ye gye yatabaalira, kubanga baakola omulimu gwange, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
26_29_21_Ku lunaku olwo ndimereza ejjembe ennyumba ya Isiraeri, era ndikuwa okwasama akamwa wakati mu bo; kale balimanya nga nze Mukama. 
26_30_1_Ekigambo kya Mukama ne kinjijira nate nga kyogera nti 
26_30_2_Omwana w'omuntu, lagula oyogere nti Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Muwowoggane nti Zisanze olunaku! 
26_30_3_Kubanga olunaku luli kumpi, olunaku lwa Mukama lwe luli okumpi, olunaku olw'ebire; kiriba kiseera kya bannaggwanga. 
26_30_4_Era ekitala kiririnnya ku Misiri, n'obubalagaze buliba Buwesiyopya, abo abattiddwa bwe baligwa mu Misiri; era baliggyawo olufulube lw'abantu baamu, n'emisingi gyayo girimenyekera ddala. 
26_30_5_Obuwesiyopya, ne Puti, ne Ludi, n'abantu bonna abaatabulwa, ne Kubu, n'abaana bonna ab'ensi eragaanye, batiga'a wamu nabo n'ekitala. 
26_30_6_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Era n'abo abakwatirira Misiri baligwa, n'amalala ag'obuyinza bwayo galikankana: okuva ku kigo eky'e Sevene baligwa omwo n'ekitala, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
26_30_7_Era baliba nga balekeddwawo wakati mu nsi ezaalekebwawo, n'ebibuga byayo biriba wakati mu bibuga ebyazisibwa. 
26_30_8_Kale balimanya nga nze Mukama, bwe ndimala okukuma omuliro mu Misiri, n'ababeezi baayo bonna nga bazikiridde: 
26_30_9_Ku lunaku olwo ababaka balitambula nga bava mu maaso gange nga bagenderera mu byombo okutiisa Abesiyopya abeegolola; kale obubalagaza buliba ku bo, nga ku lunaku lw; Misiri; kubanga, laba, lujja.
