28_4_15_Ggwe, Isiraeri, newakubadde nga weefuula omwenzi, naye Yuda aleme okusoiya; so temujjanga e Girugaali, so emwambukanga e Besaveni, so emulayiranga nti Nga Mukama vw'ali omulamu. 
28_4_16_Kubanga Isiraeri akoze eby'obukakanyavu ng'ente enduusi enkakanyavu: kaakano Aukama alibaliisa ng'omwana gw'eAiga mu kifo ekigazi. 
28_4_17_Efulaimu yeegasse n'ebifaananyi; muleke. 
28_4_18_Bye banywa bikaatuuse: benda olutata; abakulu be baagala inyo ensonyi. 
28_4_19_Empewo emuaanikidde mu biwaawaatiro byayo; era balikwatibwa ensonyi olwa ssaldaaka zaabwe. 
28_5_1_Muwulire kino, mmwe bakabona, era muwulirize, mmwe myumba ya Isiraeri, era mutege matu, mmwe ennyumba ya kabaka, kubanga omusango guno gwammwe; kubanga mwabanga ekyambika e Mizupa, era ekitimba ekyasuulibwa ku Taboli. 
28_5_2_Era abajeemu bagenze nnyo wansi nga batta; naye nze ndi munenya w'abo bonna. 
28_5_3_Mmanyi Efulayimu, so ne Isiraeri tankisibwa: kubanga kaakano, ai Efulayimu, okoze eby'obwenzi, Isiaeri ayonoonese. 
28_5_4_Ebikolwa byabwe tebibagaanye kukyukira Katonda waabwe: kubanga omwoyo ogw'obwenzi guli mu bo, so tebamanyi Mukama. 
28_5_5_Era amalala ga Isiraeri gaba mujulirwa gy'ali mu maaso ge: Isiraeri ne Efulayimu kyebaliva beesittala mu butali butuukirivu bwabwe: era ne Yuda alyesittalira wamu nabo. 
28_5_6_Baligenda n'embuzi zaabwe n'ente zaabwe okunoonya Mukama; naye tebalimulaba: abeeyawuddeko. 
28_5_7_Bakuusizza Mukama; kubanga bazadde abaana ab'amakiro: kaakano omwezi ogwakaboneka gulibalya wamu n'ennimiro zaabwe. 
28_5_8_Mufuuwe eŋŋombe mu Gibeya n'ekkondeere mu Laama: mulaye eŋŋoma e Besaveni; nti Ennyuma wo, ai Benyamini. 
28_5_9_Efulayimu alifuuka matongo ku lunaku olw'okunenyezebwako: mmanyisizza mu bika bya Isiraeri ebyo ebitalirema kubaawo. 
28_5_10_Abakungu ba Yuda bali ng'abo abajjulula akabonero k'ensalo: ndifuka obusungu bwange ku bo ng'amazzi. 
28_5_11_Efulayimu ajoogeddwa, abetenteddwa mu kusalirwa omusango; kubanga yakkiriza okutambula okugoberera ekiragiro. 
28_5_12_Kyenvudde mbeera eri Efulayimu ng'ennyenje, n'eri ennyumba ya Yuda ng'okuvunda. 
28_5_13_Efulayimu bwe yalaba endwadde ye, ne Yuda n'alaba ekiwundu kye, kale Efulayimu n'agenda eri Obwasuli n'atumira kabaka Yalebu: naye tayinza kubawonya, so talibavumula ekiwundu kyammwe. 
28_5_14_Kubanga ndiba eri Efulayimu ng'empologoma, era ng'empologoma ento eri ennyumba ya Yuda: nze, nze mwene, nditaagula ne nvaawo; nditwalira ddala so tewaliba wa kuwonya. 
28_5_15_Ndigenda ne nzirayo mu kifo kyange okutuusa lwe balikkiriza okusobya kwabwe, ne banoonya amaaso gange: mu kubonyaabonyezebwa kwabwe mwe balinyiikiriza okunnoonya. 
28_6_1_Mujje tudde eri Mukama: kubanga ye yataagula, era ye alituwonya; ye yafumita; era ye alitunyiga. 
28_6_2_Ennaku bbiri nga ziyiseewo alitulamya: alitugolokosa ku lunaku olw'okusatu, naffe tuliba balamu mu maaso ge. 
28_6_3_Era tumanye, tunyiikire okumanya Mukama; okufuluma kwe kwa nkalakkalira ng'enkya: era alijja gye tuli ng'enkuba, ng'enkuba eya ddumbi efukirira ettaka. 
28_6_4_Ai Efulayimu, naakukola ntya? ai Yuda, naakukola ntya? kubanga obulungi bwammwe buliŋŋanga ekire eky'enkya era ng'omusulo oguggwaako nga bukyali. 
28_6_5_Kyennavanga mbatemya bannabbi; nnabassanga ebigambo eby'omu kamwa kange: n'emisango gyo giriŋŋanga omusana ogufuluma. 
28_6_6_Kubanga njagala ekisa so si ssaddaaka; n'okumanya Katonda okusinga ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa. 
28_6_7_Naye bo nga Adamu basobezza endagaano: eyo bankuusizza. 
28_6_8_Gireyaadi kibuga ky'abo abakola obutali butuukirivu, kisiigiddwako omusaayi. 
28_6_9_Era ng'ebibiina eby'abatemu bwe balindirira omusajja, ekibiina ekya bakabona bwe battira bwe batyo mu kkubo erigenda e Sekemu; weewaawo, bakoze eby'obukaba. 
28_6_10_Mu nnyumba ya Isiraeri mwe ndabidde ekigambo eky'ekiwe: obwenzi bulabikidde eyo mu Efulayimu, Isiraeri ayonoonese. 
28_6_11_Era naawe, ai Yuda, ebikungulwa byakuteekerwawo, bwe ndikomyawo obusibe obw'abantu bange. 
28_7_1_Bwe njagala okuwonya Isiraeri, obutali butuukirivu bwa Efulayimu ne bulyoka bulabika, n'obubi bwa Samaliya; kubanga bakola eby'obulimba: n'omubbi ayingira munda, n'ekibiina eky'abatemu banyagira ebweru. 
28_7_2_So tebalowooza mu mitima gyabwe nga nze njijukira obubi bwabwe bwonna: kaakano ebikolwa byabwe bo bibazingizizza; biri mu maaso gange. 
28_7_3_Basanyusa kabaka n'obubi bwabwe, n'abakungu n'eby'obulimba byabwe. 
28_7_4_Bonna benzi; baliŋŋanga akabiga akakumibwa omwoki w'emigaati; alekera awo okuseesa omuliro ng'amaze okugoya obutta okutuusa lwe bunaamala okuzimbulukuka. 
28_7_5_Ku lunaku lwa kabaka waffe abakungu beerwaza n'eddalu ery'omwenge: yagolola omukono gwe wamu n'abanyoomi. 
28_7_6_Kubanga bategese omutima gwabwe ng'akabiga, nga bateega: obusungu bwabwe bwebaka ne bukeesa obudde; enkya bwaka ng'omuliro ogwaka. 
28_7_7_Bonna babugumye ng'akabiga, ne balya abalamuzi baabwe; bakabaka baabwe bonna bagudde: tewali ku bo ankaabira. 
28_7_8_Efulayimu yeetabula mu mawanga; Efulayimu mugaati ogutakyusibwa. 
28_7_9_Bannaggwanga balidde amaanyi ge, so tamanyi: weewaawo, atobese envi, so tamanyi. 
28_7_10_mu maaso ge: era naye tebaddanga eri 1flukama Katonda waabwe so tebamunoonyanga, ebyo byonna newakubadde nga bimaze okubaawo. 
28_7_11_Era Efulayimu alinnanga ejjiba essirusiru eritalina magezi: bakaabira Misiri, bagenda eri Obwasuli. 
28_7_12_Bwe baligenda, ndibasuulira ekitimba kyange; ndibassa wansi ng'ennyonyi ez'omu bbanga: ndibakangavvula ng'ekkuŋŋaaniro lyabwe bwe baawuliranga. 
28_7_13_Zibasanze kubanga bawabye okunvaako; okuzikirira kubatuukeko! kubanga bansobezza: newakubadde nga njagala okubanunula, era naye banjogeddeko eby'obulimba. 
28_7_14_So tebankaabidde n'omutima gwabwe, naye bawowogganira ku bitanda byabwe: bakuŋŋaanira eŋŋaano n'omwenge, banjeemera. 
28_7_15_Newakubadde nga nayigiriza ne nnyweza emikono gyabwe, era naye banteesezzaako obubi. 
28_7_16_Bakomawo naye si eri oyo ali waggulu; bali ng'omutego ogulimba: abakungu baabwe baligwa n'ekitala olw'okulaluka kw'olulimi lwabwe: kuno kwe kuliba okusekererwa kwabwe mu nsi y'e Misiri. 
28_8_1_Teeka ekkondeere ku mumwa gwo. Ng'empungu bw'atyo bw'ajja okulumba ennyumba ya Mukama: kubanga basobezza endagaano ne boonoona amateeka gange. 
28_8_2_Balinkaabira nti Katonda wange, ffe Isiraeri tukumanyi. 
28_8_3_Isiraeri asudde ekirungi: omulabe alibayigganya. 
28_8_4_Bataddewo bakabaka naye si ku bwange; balonze abakungu nange nga sikimanyi; beekoledde ebifaananyi ne ffeeza yaabwe ne zaabu yaabwe balyoke bamalibwewo. 
28_8_5_Asudde ennyana yo, ai Samaliya; obusungu bwange bubaakiddeko: ebiro biryenkana wa okutuusa lwe baliba n'obutayonoona? 
28_8_6_Kubanga n'ekyo kivudde mu Isiraeri; omukozi ye yakikola, so si Katonda n'akztono: weewaawo, ennyana ya Samaliya erimenyekamenyeka. 
28_8_7_Kubanga basiga embuyaga, era balikungula embuyaga ez'akazimu: talina ŋŋaano emera; ekiti tekiribala mmere; n'okubala bwe kiriba kibaze, bannaggwanga baligiriira ddala. 
28_8_8_Isiraeri aliiriddwa ddala: kaakano bali mu mawanga ng'ekibya ekitaliiko bwe kisanyusa. 
28_8_9_Kubanga bambuse eri Obwasuli ng'entulege eri emu yokka: Efulayimu aguliridde abaganzi. 
28_8_10_Weewaawo, newakubadde nga bagulirira mu mawanga, kaakano naabakuŋŋaanya; era batanudde okukendeera olw'omugugu gwa kabaka w'abalangira. 
28_8_11_Kubanga Efulayimu ayongedde ebyoto okuleeta okwonoona, ebyoto kyebivudde bibeera gy'ali eky'okuleeta okwonoona. 
28_8_12_Newakubadde nga muwandiikira amateeka gange mu biragiro kakumi, biyitibwa kintu kinnaggwanga. 
28_8_13_Ssaddaaka ez'ebyange ebiweebwayo, bawaayo ennyama okuba ssaddaaka ne bagirya; naye Mukama tabakkiriza: kaakano anajjukira obutali butuukirivu bwabwe n'abonereza olw'ebibi byabwe; balidda mu Misiri. 
28_8_14_Kubanga Isiraeri yeerabidde Omukozi we, n'azimba amayumba; era Yuda ayongedde ebibuga ebiriko enkomera: naye ndiweereza omuliro ku bibuga bye, era gulyokya ebigo byabyo. 
28_9_1_Tosanyuka, ai Isiraeri, n'essanyu ng'amawanga; kubanga ogenze ng'oyenda okuva ku Katonda wo, weegomba empeera ku buli gguuliro. 
28_9_2_Egguuliro n'essogolero tebiribaliisa, n'omwenge omusu gulimuggwaako. 
28_9_3_Tebalibeera mu nsi ya Mukama; naye Efulayimu aliddayo mu Misiri, era baliriira mu Bwasuli emmere eteri nnongoofu. 
28_9_4_Tebalifuka ebiweebwayo eby'omwenge eri Mukama, so talibasanyukira: ssaddaaka zaabwe ziriba gye bali ng'emmere y'abakungubazi; bonna abanaagiryangako baliba boonoonese: kubanga emmere yaabwe eriba ya kukkutibwa bukkutibwa; teriyingira mu nnyumba ya Mukama. 
28_9_5_Mulikola ki ku lunaku olw'okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu, ne ku lunaku olw'embaga ya Mukama? 
28_9_6_Kubanga, laba, bagenze okuva awali okuzikirira, era naye Misiri alibakuŋŋaanya, Menfisi alibaziika: ebintu byabwe ebya ffeeza ebisanyusa emyennyango giribyemala: amaggwa galiba mu weema zaabwe. 
28_9_7_Ennaku ez'okubonererezaamu zituuse, ennaku ez'okusasuliramu zituuse; Isiraeri alikimanya: nnabbi musirusiru, omusajja alina omwoyo alaluse, olw'olufulube lw'obutali butuukirivu bwo, era okubanga obulabe bungi. 
28_9_8_Efulayimu yabanga mukuumi eri Katonda wange: nnabbi, ekyambika eky'omutezi w'ennyonyi kiri mu makubo ge gonna, n'obulabe mu nnyumba ya Katonda we. 
28_9_9_Beeyonoonye nnyo nnyini nga mu nnaku ez'e Gibeya: alijjukira obutali butuukirivu bwabwe, alibabonereza olw'ebibi byabwe. 
28_9_10_Nasanga Isiraeri ng'ezabbibu mu ddungu; nalaba bajjajjammwe ng'esooka okwengera ku mutiini mu mwaka gwagwo ogw'olubereberye: naye ne bajja e Baalipyoli, ne beeyawulira ekyo ekikwasa ensonyi, ne bafuuka ab'emizizo ng'ekyo kye bayagala. 
28_9_11_Efulayimu ekitiibwa kyabwe kiribuuka; kirigenda ng'ennyonyi: tewaliba kuzaala newakubadde ali olubuto newakubadde eggwako. 
28_9_12_Newakubadde nga balera abaana baabwe; era naye ndibafiisiza, ne wataba muntu asigaddewo: weewaawo, era ziribasanga bwe ndibavaako. 
28_9_13_Efulayimu asimbibwa mu kifo eky'okwesiima, nga bwe nnalaba Ttuulo: naye Efulayimu alifulumya abaana be eri omussi. 
28_9_14_Bawe, ai Mukama: oliwa ki? bawe olubuto olutaasa n'amabeere amakalu. 
28_9_15_Obubi bwabwe bwonna buli mi Girugaali; kubanga eyo gye nnaba. kyayira: olw'obubi obw'ebikolwa byabwe ndibagoba mu nnyumba yange: siribaagala nate; abakungu baabwe bonna bajeemu. 
28_9_16_Efulayimu afumitiddwa, ekikolo kyabwe kikaze, tebalibala bibala: weewaawo newakubadde nga bazaala, era naye nditta ekibala eky'olubuto lwabwe ekyagalwa. 
28_9_17_Katonda wange ali basuula kubanga tebaamuwulira: en baliba mmomboze mu mawanga. 
28_10_1_Isiraeri muzabbibu ogwera, oguleeta ebibala byagwo: ng'ebibala bye bwe byali ebingi, bw'atyo bw'ayongedde ebyoto bye; ng'ensi ye bwe yeeyongera okuba ennungi, empagi ze baakola bwe zaabanga ennungi bwe zityo. 
28_10_2_Omutima gwabwe gwawukanyeemu; kaakano banaalabika omusango nga gubasinze: alikuba ebyoto byabwe, alinyaga empagi zaabwe. 
28_10_3_Mazima kaakano banaayogera nti Tetulina kabaka: kubanga tetutya Mukama; ne kabaka ayinza kutukolera ki? 
28_10_4_Boogera ebigambo obugambo, nga balayira eby'obulimba mu kulagaana endagaano: omusango kyeguva gumerera mu mbibiro z'ennimiro ng'omususa. 
28_10_5_Abali mu Samaliya entiisa eribakwata olw'ennyana ez'e Besaveni: kubanga abantu baakyo balikiwuubaalira, ne bakabona baakyo abaakisanyukira, baliwuubaalira ekitiibwa kyakyo, kubanga kikivuddeko. 
28_10_6_Era nakyo kiritwalibwa e Bwasuli okuba ekirabo kya kabaka Yalebu: Efulayimu aliweebwa ensonyi, ne Isiraeri alikwatirwa ensonyi okuteesa kwe ye. 
28_10_7_Samaliya, kabaka waamu azikiridde ng'ejjovu ku mazzi. 
28_10_8_Era n'ebifo ebigulumivu eby'omu Aveni, okwonoona kwa Isiraeri, birizikirizibwa: amaggwa n'amatovu galimerera ku byoto byabwe; era baligamba ensozi nti Mutubikkeko; n'obusozi nti Mutugweko. 
28_10_9_Ai Isiraeri, wayonoonanga okuva ku nnaku ez'e Gibeya: baayimirira eyo; olutalo lwe balwana n'abaana ab'obujeemu luleme okubatuukirako mu Gibeya. 
28_10_10_Bwe ndiba nga njagadde, ndibakangavvula; n'amawanga galikuŋŋaanyizibwa okulwana nabo, bwe balisibibwa n'okusobya kwabwe kwombi. 
28_10_11_Era Efulayimu nte nduusi eyigirizibwa, eyagala okusamba eŋŋaano; naye nninnye mu bulago bwe obulungi. Nditeeka ku Efulayimu alimwebagala; Yuda alirima; Yakobo alikuba amavuunike. 
28_10_12_Mwesigire mu butuukirivu, mukungule ng'okusaasira bwe kuli; mukabale ettaka lyammwe eritali ddime: kubanga obudde butuuse okunoonya Mukama, okutuusa lw'alijja n'abatonnyesaako obutuukirivu. 
28_10_13_Mulimye obubi, mukungudde obutali butuukirivu; mulidde ebibala eby'obulimba: kubanga weesiganga ekkubo lyo, olufulube lw'abasajja bo ab'amaanyi. 
28_10_14_Okusasamala kyekuliva kubeera mu bantu bo, n'ebigo byo byonna birinyagibwa, nga Sulumaani bwe yanyaga Beswaluberi ku lunaku olw'olutalo: nnyaabwe yatandaggirwa wamu n'abaana be. 
28_10_15_Era bw'atyo Beseri bw'alibakola olw'obubi bwammwe obwenkanidde awo: emmambya bw'eriba ng'esala, kabaka wa Isiraeri alizikirizibwa ddala. 
28_11_1_Isiraeri bwe yali omwana omuto, namwagala, ne mpita omwana wange okuva mu Misiri. 
28_11_2_Nga bwe beeyongera okubayita, bwe batyo bwe beeyongera okubavaako: baawangayo ssaddaaka eri Babaali, ne bootereza obubaane ebifaananyi ebyole. 
28_11_3_Era naye nayigiriza Efulayimu okutambula; nabawambaatira mu mikono gyange; naye tebaamanya nga nze nabawonya. 
28_11_4_Nabawalula n'emigwa egy'omuntu, n'ebisiba eby'okwagala; era nabanga gye bali ng'abo ababaggyako ekikoligo ekiri ku mba zaabwe, ne nteeka emmere mu maaso gaabwe. 
28_11_5_Talidda mu nsi y'e Misiri; naye Omwasuli ye aliba kabaka we, kubanga baagaana okudda. 
28_11_6_N'ekitala kirigwa ku bibuga bye, era kirirya ebisiba bye ne kimalawo olw'okuteesa kwabwe bo. 
28_11_7_Era abantu bange bamaliridde okudda ennyuma okunvaako: newakubadde nga babayita okudda eri oyo ali waggulu, tewali n'omu akkiriza okumugulumiza. 
28_11_8_Naakuwaayo ntya, Efulayimu? naakugabula ntya, Isiraeri? naakufuula ntya nga Aduma? naakussaawo ntya nga Zeboyimu? omutima gwange gukyuse munda yange, okusaasira kwange kwakidde wamu. 
28_11_9_Sirituukiriza busungu bwange obukambwe, siridda kuzikiriza Efulayimu: kubanga nze Katonda so siri muntu; Omutukuvu ali wakati wo: so siri yingira mu kibuga. 
28_11_10_Balitambula okugoberera Mukama, naye aliwuluguma ng'empologoma: kubanga aliwuluguma, n'abaana abato balijja nga bakankana okuva ebugwanjuba 
28_11_11_Balijja nga bakankana ng'ennyonyi eva mu Misiri, era ng'ejjiba eriva mu nsi y'e Bwasuli: era ndibatuuza mu nnyumba zaabwe, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
28_11_12_Efulayimu anneetooloozezza obulimba, n'ennyumba ya Isiraeri enneetooloozezza obukuusa: naye Yuda akyafuga awali Katonda, era mwesigwa awali Omutukuvu. 
28_12_1_Efulayimu alya mpewo, era agoberera empewo ez'ebuvanjuba: tata kwongera bya bulimba na kuziika; era balagaana endagaano n'Obwasuli, n'amafuta gatwalibwa mu Misiri. 
28_12_2_Era Mukama alina empaka ne Yuda, era alibonereza Yakobo ng'amakubo ge bwe gali; alimusasula ng'ebikolwa bye bwe biri. 
28_12_3_Mu lubuto yamukwata muganda we ku kisinziiro; era bwe yakula n'aba n'obuyinza eri Katonda: 
28_12_4_weewaawo, yabanga n'obuyinza ku malayika n'awangula: yakaaba amaziga n'amwegayirira: yamulaba e Beseri, era eyo gye yayogerera naffe 
28_12_6_Kale kyukira Katonda wo: okwatanga okusaasira n'omusango, omulindiriranga Katonda wo ennaku zonna. 
28_12_7_Musuubuzi, minzaani ey'obulimba eri mu mukono gwe: ayagala okujooga. 
28_12_8_Musuubuzi, minzaani ey'obulimba eri mu mukono gwe: ayagala okujooga. 
28_12_9_Naye nze ndi Mukama Katonda wo okuva mu nsi y'e Misiri; oliboolyawo ne nkutuuza mu weema nga ku nnaku ez'embaga ey'okwewombeekerako. 
28_12_10_Era nayogeranga ne bannabbi, era rmyongedde okwolesebwa; era nagereranga engero mu mukono gwa bannabbi. 
28_12_11_Gireyaadi butali butuukirivu? bo butaliimu bwereere; mu Girugaali gye basalira ente okuba ssaddaaka: weewaawo, ebyoto byabwe biri ng'ebifunvu mu mbibiro z'ennimiro: 
28_12_12_Awo Yakobo n'addukira mu nnimiro ya Alamu, Isiraeri n'aweereza omukazi, era n'alundira omukazi. 
28_12_13_Era Mukama n'aggya Isiraeri mu Misiri ku bwa nnabbi, era nnabbi ye yamuwonya. 
28_12_14_Efulayimu asunguwazizza nnyo nnyini: omusaayi gwe kyeguliva gusigala ku ye, n'ekiwme kye Mukama we alikimusasula. 
28_13_1_Efulayimu bwe yayogera, ne wabaawo okukankana; yeegulumiza mu Isiraeri: naye bwe yayonoona olwa Baali, n'afa. 
28_13_2_Awo kaakano beeyongerayongera okwonoona, era beekoledde ebifaananyi ebisaanuuse ne ffeeza yaabwe, esanamu ng'amagezi gaabwe bo bwe gali, zonna mulimu gwa mukozi: bazoogerako nti Abasajja abasalassaddaaka banywegere ennyana. 
28_13_3_Kyebaliva babeera ng'ekire eky'enkya, era ng'omusulo oguggwaako nga bukyali, ng'ebisusunku embuyaga ez'skazimu bye zitwala okubiggya mu gguuliro, era ng'omukka oguva mu kituli ogufuluma. 
28_13_4_Era naye nze ndi Mukama Katonda wo okuva mu nsi y'e Misiri; so naawe tolimanya Katonda mulala wabula nze, so tewali mulokozi wazira nze. 
28_13_5_Nakumanyira mu ddungu, mu nsi ey'ennyonta ennyingi. 
28_13_6_Ng'eddundiro lyabwe bwe lyabanga, bwe bakkutanga bwe batyo; bakkuta, omutina gwabwe ne gavegulumiza; kyebavudde banneerabira nze. 
28_13_7_Kyenvudde mbeera gye bali ng'empologoma: ng'engo nditeegera mu kkubo: 
28_13_8_ndisisinkana nabo ng'eddubu enyagiddwako abaana baayo, era ndiyuza olubiko olw'oku mutima gwabwe: era ndibaliira eyo ng'empologoma; ensolo ey'omu nsiko eribataagula. 
28_13_9_Kwe kuzikirira kwo, ai Isiraeri, kubanga oli mulabe wange, omulabe w'omubeezi wo. 
28_13_10_Kabaka wo nno ali ludda wa, akulokole mu bibuga byo liyonna? n'abalamuzi bo be wayogerako nti Mpa kabaka n'abakungu? 
28_13_11_Nkuwadde kabaka nga ndiko obusungu, era mmuggyeewo nga ndiko ekiruyi. 
28_13_12_Obutali butuukirivu bwa Efiilayimu busibiddwa; ekibi kye kitere keddwa. 
28_13_13_Obubalagaze bw'omukazi alumwa okuzaala bulimutuukako: ye mwana atalina magezi; kubanga ekiseera kituuse aleme okulwa mu kifo omuyita abaana nga bazaalibwa. 
28_13_14_Ndibanunula eri amaanyi ag'amagombe; ndibagula okuva eri okufa: ggwe okufa, ebibonoobono byo biri ludda wa? ggwe entaana, okuzikiriza kwo kuli ludda wa? okwenenya kulikwekebwa amaaso gange. 
28_13_15_Newakubadde ng'alina ebibala bingi mu baganda be, embuyaga ez'ebuvanjuba zirijja, omukka gwa Mukama ogulinnya okuva mu ddungu, oluzzi lwe ne lukalira, ensulo ye n'eggwaawo: alinyaga ebibya byonna ebisanyusa ebyaterekebwa. 
28_13_16_Samaliya alibaako omusango gwe; kubanga ajeemedde Katonda we: baligwa n'ekitala; abaana baabwe abawere balitandaggirwa, n'abakazi baabwe abali embuto balibaagibwa. 
28_14_1_Ai Isiraeri, komawo eri Mukama Katonda wo; kubanga ogudde olw'obutali butuukirivu bwo. 
28_14_2_Mutwale ebigambo wamu nammwe, mukomewo eri Mukama: mumugambe nti Ggyawo obutali butuukirivu bwonna, okkirizeeko ebirungi: bwe tutyo tunaasasula ekiweebwayo eky'omu mimwa gyaffe, ng'ente ennume 
28_14_3_Asuli talituwonya; tetulyebagala embalaasi: so tetuligamba nate mulimu gwa mikono gyaffe nti Mmwe muli bakatonda baffe: kubanga eri ggwe atalina kitaawe gy'alabira okusaasirwa. 
28_14_4_Ndiwonya okudda kwabwe ennyuma, ndibaagala ku bwange: kubanga obusungu bwange bukyuse okumuvaako. 
28_14_5_Ndiba eri Isiraeri ng'omusulo: alimulisa ng'eddanga, era alisimba emizi gye nga Lebanooni. 
28_14_6_Amatabi ge galiranda, n'obulungi bwe buliba ng'omuzeyituuni, n'akaloosa ke nga Lebanooni. 
28_14_7_Ababeera wansi w'ekisiikirize kye balikomawo; balirama ng'eŋŋaano, ne bamulisa ng'omuzabbibu: akawoowo ke kaliba ng'omwenge ogwa Lebanooni. 
28_14_8_Efulayimu alyogera nti Nkyafaayo ki eri ebifaananyi? Nze njitabye, era ndissaayo omwoyo eri ye: nninga omuberosi omugimu; ebibala byo birabika okuva gye ndi. 
28_14_9_Ani alina amagezi n'ategeera bino? ani alina obukabakaba n'abimanya? kubanga amakubo ga Mukama ga nsonga, n'abatuukirivu banaagatambulirangamu; naye abasobya banaagwanga omwo. 
29_1_1_Ekigambo kya Mukama ekyajjira Yoweeri mutabani wa Pesweri. 
29_1_2_Muwulire kino, mmwe abakadde, era mutege okutu, mmwe mwenna abali mu nsi. Kino kyali kibaddewo mu biro byammwe oba mu biro bya bajjajjammwe? 
29_1_3_Mukibuulire abaana bammwe, n'abaana bammwe babuulire abaana baabwe, n'abaana baabwe ab'emirembe emirala. 
29_1_4_Ebyo akawuka bye kafissizzaawo enzige ebiridde; n'ebyo enzige bye yafissizzawo kalusejjera kabiridde; n'ebyo kalusejjera bye kafissizzaawo akaacaaka kabiridde. 
29_1_5_Muzuukuke, mmwe abatamiivu, mukaabe amaziga; muwowoggane, mmwe mwenna abanywa omwenge, olw'omwenge omuwoomerevu; kubanga gumaliddwawo okuva ku kamwa kammwe. 
29_1_6_Kubanga eggwanga litabadde ensi yange, ery'amaanyi eritabalika: amannyo ge mannyo ga mpologoma, era alina amasongezo ag'empologoma enkulu. 
29_1_7_Azisizza omuzabbibu gwange, era asasambudde omutiini gwange: agusasambulidde ddala, era agusudde wala; amatabi gaagwo gafuuse meeru. 
29_1_8_Kungubaga ng'omuwala ey'esibye ebibukutu bw'akungubagira bba ow'omu buwala, bwe. 
29_1_9_Ekiweebwayo eky'obutta n'ekiweebwayo eky'okunywa bimaliddiwawo okuva mu nnyumba ya Mukama; bakabona, abaweereza ba Mukama, bawuubaala. 
29_1_10_Ennimiro ezise, ensi ewuubaala; kubanga eŋŋaano ezise, omwenge omusu gukaze, amafuta gaggweerera. 
29_1_11_Mukwatibwe ensonyi, mmwe abalimi, muwowoggane, mmwe abawawaagula emizabbibu, olw'eŋŋaano ne sayiri; kubanga ebikungulwa eby'omu nnimiro bifudde. 
29_1_12_Omuzabbibu guwotose, n'omutiini guyongobera; omukomamawanga n'olukindu n'omucungwa, emiti gyonna egy'omu nnimiro, giwotose: kubanga essanyu liwotose okuva ku baana b'abantu. 
29_1_13_Mwesibe ebibukutu mukungubage, mmwe bakabona; muwowoggane, mmwe abaweereza ab'ekyoto; mujje mugalamire nga mwambadde ebibukutu mukeese obudde, mmwe abaweereza ba Katonda wange: kubanga ekiweebwayo eky'obutta n'ekiweebwayo eky'okunywa baguguba nabyo eri ennyumba ya Katonda wammwe 
29_1_14_Mutukuze okusiiba, muyite okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu, mukuŋŋaanyize abakadde ne bonna abali mu nsi eri ennyumba ya Mukama Katonda wammwe, mumukaabire Mukama. 
29_1_15_Zitusanze olw'olunaku kubanga olunaku lwa Mukama lunaatera okutuuka, era lulijja ng'okuzikiriza okuva eri Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna. 
29_1_16_Emmere temaliddwawo ffe nga tulaba, weewaawo, essanyu n'okujaguza okuva mu nnyumba ya Katonda waffe? 
29_1_17_Ensigo zivunda wansi w'amafunfugu gaazo; amawanika galekeddwawo, amaterekero gasuuliddwa; kubanga eŋŋaano ewotose. 
29_1_18_Ensolo nga zisinda! amagana g'ente gabuliddwa amagezi, kubanga tezirina muddo; weewaawo, ebisibo by'endiga birekeddwawo. 
29_1_19_Ai Mukama, ggwe nkaabira: kubanga omuliro gwokezza amalundiro ag'omu ddungu, n'ennimi zaagwo zookezza emiti gyonna egy'omu nnimiro. 
29_1_20_Weewaawo, ensolo ez'omu nsiko zikuwankirawankira: kubanga emigga egy'amazzi gikalidde, n'omuliro gwokezza amalundiro ag'omu ddungu. 
29_2_1_Mufuuyire ekkondeere mu Sayuuni, era mulayize ku lusozi lwange olutukuvu; bonna abali mu nsi bakankane: kubanga olunaku lwa Mukama lujja, kubanga luli kumpi 
29_2_3_Omuliro gwokya mu maaso gaabwe; era ennyuma waabwe ennimi z'omuliro zaaka: ensi eri ng'olusuku lwa Adeni mu mberi yaabwe, n'e nnyuma yaabwe ddungu eryazika so naye tewali eyali abawonye 
29_2_4_Enfaanana yaabwe eri ng'enfaanana y'embalaasi; era ng'abeeba gadde embalaasi bwe baddukana bwe batyo embiro: 
29_2_5_Babuuka ng bawuuma ng'amagaali bwe gawuu mira ku ntikko z'ensozi, ng'omuliri bwe guwuuma ogwokya ensambu ng'eggwanga ery'amaanyi erisimbye ennyiriri olw'olutalo. 
29_2_6_Olw'okujja kwabwe abantu babalagalwa amaaso gonna gafuuse ebbala. 
29_2_7_Badduka mbiro ng'abasajja ab'amaanyi; balinnya bbugwe ng'abasajja abalwanyi; era basimba buli muntu mu kkubo lye, so tebasobya nnyiriri. 
29_2_8_So tewali eyeesiga munne; basimba buli muntu mu mpitiro ye: era bawagulira awali ebyokulwa nyisa, so tebakoma mu lugendo lwabwe. 
29_2_9_Babuuka bagwa ku ki buga; bafubutukira ku bbugwe bawalampa ne batuuka mu nnyu mba; bayingirira mu madirisa ng'o mubbi. 
29_2_10_Ettaka likankana mi maaso gaabwe; eggulu lijugumira enjuba n'omwezi bibaako ekizikiza n'emmunyeeye zirekayo okwakkwazo: 
29_2_11_era Mukama aleeta eddoboozi lye mu maaso g'eggye lye kubanga olusiisira lwe lunene nnyo kubanga oyo atuukiriza ekigambo kye wa maanyi: kubanga olunaki lwa Mukama lukulu, lwa ntiisa nnyo nnyini; era ani ayinza okulusobola? 
29_2_12_Era naye ne kaakano munkyukire n'omutima gwammwa gwonna, n'okusiiba n'okukaaba amaziga n'okuwuubaala: 
29_2_13_era muyuze omutima gwammwe so si byambalo byammwe, mukyukire Mukama Katonda wammwe: kubanga wakisa, era ajjudde okusaasira, alwawo okusunguwala, era akwatirwa nnyo ekisa, era yejjusa obutaleeta bubi. 
29_2_14_Ani amanyi oba nga taakyuke ne yejjusa n'aleka omukisa ennyuma we, kye kiweebwayo eky'obutta n'ekiweebwayo eky'okunywa eri Mukama Katonda wammwe? 
29_2_15_Mufuuyire ekkondeere mu Sayuuni, mutukuze okusiiba, muyite okukuŋŋaana okutukuvu: 
29_2_16_mukuŋŋaanye abantu, mutukuze ekibiina, mukuŋŋaanye abakadde, muleete abaana abato n'abo abayonka mabeere: awasa omugole ave mu kisenge kye, n'omugole mu nju ye. 
29_2_17_Bakabona, abaweereza ba Mukama, bakaabire amaziga wakati w'ekisasi n'ekyoto, era boogere nti Saasira abantu bo, ai Mukama, so towaayo busika bwo okuvumibwa, mawanga okubafuga: kiki ekinaaba kiboogezza mu mawanga nti Katonda waabwe ali ludda wa? 
29_2_18_Awo Mukama n'akwatirwa obuggya ensi ye, n'asaasira abantu be. 
29_2_19_Awo Mukama n'addamu n’agamba abantu be nti Laba, ndibareereza eŋŋaano n'omwenge n'amafuta, era biribakkusa: 
29_2_20_so siribauula nate ekivume mu mawanga: aye ndibaggyako eggye ery'obukiika bwa kkono ne nditwala wala, ne nbagobera mu nsi enkalu eyalekebwawo, abakulembeze be mu nnyaya .ey'ebuvanjuba, n'abasembi be au nnyanja ey'ebugwanjuba; n'ekivundu kye kiririnnya, n'okuwunya we kulirinnya, kubanga akoze bikulu. 
29_2_21_Totya, ggwe ensi, sanyuka ojaguze; kubanga Mukama koze ebikulu. 
29_2_22_Temutya, mmwe ensolo ez'omu nsiko; kulanga amalundiro ag'omu ddungu aloka, kubanga omuti gubala ebibala byagwo, omutiini n'omuzeyituuni gireeta amaanyi gaagyo. 
29_2_23_Kale musanyuke, mmwe abaana a Sayuuni, era mujagulize Mukana Katonda wammwe: kubanga bawa enkuba eya ttoggo mu kigera yayo ekisaana, era abatonnyeseza nkuba, enkuba eya ttoggo n'enkuba ya ddumbi, mu mwezi ogw'olubeeberye. 
29_2_24_N'amawuuliro galijjula eŋŋaano, n'amasogolero galiyiika mwenge n'amafuta. 
29_2_25_Era ndibaddiza emyaka enzige gye yalya, alusejjera n'akaacaaka n'akawuka, ggye lyange eringi lye nnagaba kubatabaala. 
29_2_26_Kale munaalyanga bingi nnyo, ne mu kkuta, ne nutendereza erinnya lya Mukama Katonda wammwe eyabakola eby'ekitalo: n'abantu bange tebalikwati wa nsonyi ennaku zonna. 
29_2_27_Era aulimanya nga ndi wakati mu Isiraeri, era nga ndi Mukama Katonda rammwe, so tewali mulala: n'abantu bange tebalikwatibwa nsonyi. 
29_2_28_Awo olulituuka oluvannyuma ndifuka omwoyo gwange ku bonna abalina omubiri; kale batabani bammwe ne bawala bammwe baliragula, abakadde bammwe baliroota ebirooto, abalenzi bammwe baliraba okwolesebwa: 
29_2_29_era ne ku baddu ne ku bazaana mu nnaku ezo kwe ndifuka omwoyo gwange. 
29_2_30_Era ndyolesa eby'ekitalo mu ggulu ne mu nsi, omusaayi n'omuliro n'empagi ez'omukka. 
29_2_31_Enjuba erifuuka kizikiza, n'omwezi okuba omussayi, olunaku lwa Mukama olukulu era olw'entiisa nga terunnaba kujja. 
29_2_32_Awo olulituuka buli alisaba erinnya lya Mukama alirokoka: kubanga ku lusozi Sayuuni ne mu Yerusaalemi walibaawo abo abaliwona, nga Mukama bwe yayogera, ne mu kitundu ekirifikkawo mulibaamu abo Mukama b'aliyita. 
29_3_1_Kubanga, laba, mu nnaku ezo ne mu biro ebyo, bwe ndikomyawo obusibe bwa Yuda ne Yerusaalemi, 
29_3_2_ndikuŋŋaanya amawanga gonna ne mbaserengesa mu kiwonvu kya Yekosaffaati; kale ndiyima eyo ne mpolereza abantu bange n'obusika bwange Isiraeri be basaasaanyirizza mu mawanga ne bagabana ensi yange. 
29_3_3_Era bakubidde abantu bange obululu: era bawaddeyo omulenzi olw'omukazi omwenzi, ne batunda omuwala olw'omwenge, balyoke banywe. 
29_3_4_Weewaawo, nammwe nfaayo ki eri mmwe, mmwe Ttuulo ne Sidoni n'enjuyi zonna ez'Obufirisuuti? Mulinsasula? n'okusasula bwe muliba nga munsasudde, ndyanguya mangu ndisambyako okuzza okusasula kwammwe ku mutwe gwammwe mmwe. 
29_3_5_Kubanga mututte effeeza yange ne zaabu yange, ne mutwala mu biggwa byammwe ebintu byange ebirungi ebisanyusa 
29_3_7_laba, ndibagolokosa mu kifo gye mwabatunda, era ndizza okusasula kwammwe ku mutwe gwammwe mmwe: 
29_3_8_era nditunda batabani bammwe ne bawala bammwe mu mukono gw'abaana ba Yuda, n'abo balibaguza abasajja w’e Seba, eggwanga eriri ewala: kubanga Mukama ye akyogedde. 
29_3_9_Mulangirire kino mu mawanga; mutegeke obulwa: mugolokose abasajja ab'amaanyi: abasajja bonna abalwanyi basembere, bambuke. 
29_3_10_Muweese enkumbi zammwe okuba ebitala, n'ebiwabyo byammwe okuba amafumu: omunafu ayogere nti Ndi wa maanyi. 
29_3_11_Mwanguwe mujje, mmwe mwenna amawanga ageetoolodde mukuŋŋaane: serengesa eyo ababo ab'amaanyi, ai Mukama: 
29_3_12_Amawanga gayimuke gambuke mu kiwonvu kya Yekosaffaati: kubanga eyo gqe ndituula okusala omusango gw'amawanga gonna ageetoolodde. 
29_3_13_Muteekeewo ekiwabyo, kubanga ebikungulwa byengedde: mujje musambe; kubanga essogolero lijjudde, amabanvu gayiika; kubanga obubi bwabwe bungi. 
29_3_14_Oluggube, oluggube, oluggube lw'abantu bali mu kiwonvu eky'okumaliririramu! kubanga olunaku lwa Mukama luli kumpi mu kiwonvu eky'okumaliririramu. 
29_3_15_Enjuba n'omwezi biriko ekizikiza, n'emmunyeenye zirekayo okwaka kwazo. 
29_3_16_Awo Mukama aliwuluguma ng'ayima e Sayuuni, alireeta eddoboozi lye ng'ayima e Yerusaalemi; n'eggulu n'ensi birikankana: naye Mukama aliba buddukiro eri abantu be era ekigo eri abaana ba Isiraeri. 
29_3_17_Bwe mutyo mulimanya nga nze ndiMukama Katonda wammwe, abeera ku Sayuuni olusozi lwange olutukuvu: kale Yerusaalemi kiriba kitukuvu so tewaliba bannaggwanga abalikiyitamu nate. 
29_3_18_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku luli ensozi ziritonnya omwenge omuwoomerevu n'obusozi bulikulukuta amata, n'obugga bwonna obwa Yuda bulikulukuta amazzi; era oluzzi luliva mu nnyumba ya Mukama, lulifukirira ekiwonvu Sittimu. 
29_3_19_Misiri eriba matongo, ne Edomu eriba ddungu eryalekebwawo, olw'ekyejo ekyagirirwa abaana ba Yuda, kubanga bayiye omusaayi ogutaliiko musango mu nsi yaabwe. 
29_3_20_Naye Yuda alibeerera ennaku zonna, ne Yerusaalemi okuva ku mirembe okutuuka ku mirembe gyonna. 
29_3_21_Era ndirongoosa omusaayi gwabwe gwe ssaalongoosa: kubanga Mukama abeera ku Sayuuni. 
30_1_1_Ebigambo bya Amosi eyali ow'oku basumba b’e Tekowa, bye yalaba ebya Isiraeri mu mirembe gya Uzziya kabaka wa Yuda, ne mu mirembe gya Yerobowaamu mutabani wa Yowaasi kabaka wa Isiraeri ng'ekyasigaddeyo emyaka ebiri okutuuka ku kikankano ky'ensi. 
30_1_2_N'ayogera nti Mukama aliwuluguma ng'ayima e Sayuuni, era alireeta eddoboozi lye ng'ayima e Yerusaalemi; kale amalundiro ag'abasumba galiwnubaala, n'entikko ya Kalumeeri eriwotoka. 
30_1_3_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Olw'ebyonoono bisatu ebya Ddamasiko, weewaawo, olw'ebina, sirikyusa kubonerezebwa kwakyo okukivaako; kubanga bawudde Gireyaadi n'ebintu ebiwuula eby'ebyuma: 
30_1_4_naye ndiweereza omuliro mu nnyumba ya Kazayeeri, kale gulyokya amayumba ga Benukadadi. 
30_1_5_Era ndimenya ekisiba kya Ddamasiko, ne mmalawo oyo abeera mu kiwonvu kya Aveni, n'oyo akwata omuggo ogw'obwakabaka ndimumalawo okuva ku nnyumba ya Adeni: n'abantu ab'e Busuuli baligenda mu busibe e Kiri, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_1_6_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Olw'ebyonoono bya Gaza bisatu, weewaawo, olw'ebina, sirikyusa kubonerezebwa kwakyo okukivaako; kubanga batwala nga basibe eggwanga lyonna okubawaayo eri Edomu: 
30_1_7_naye ndiweereza omuliro ku bbugwe w'e Gaza, era gulyokya amayumba gaakyo: 
30_1_8_era ndimalawo abali mu Asudodi, n'oyo akwata omuggo ogw'obwakabaka ndimumalawo okuva ku Asukulooni: era ndikyusa omukono gwange okulwana ne Ekuloni, n'ekitundu ekifisseewo eky'Abafirisuuti balizikirira, bw'a yogera Mukama Katonda. 
30_1_9_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Olw'ebyonoono bya Ttuulo bisatu, weewaawo, olw'ebina, sirikyusa kubonerezebwa kwakyo okukivaako; kubanga bagabula eggwanga lyonna eri Edomu ne batajjukira ndagaano ey'oluganda: 
30_1_10_naye ndiweereza omuliro ku bbugwe w'e Ttuulo, era gulyokya amayumba gaakyo. 
30_1_11_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Olw'ebyonoono bya Edomu bisatu, weewaawo, olw'ebina, sirikyusa kubonerezebwa kwe okumuvaako; kubanga yayigganyanga muganda we n'ekitala, n'asuula okusaasira kwonna, obusungu bwe ne butaagulataagula ennaku zonna n'aguguba n'ekiruyi kye emirembe gyonna: 
30_1_12_naye ndiweereza omuliro ku Temani, era gulyokya amayumba ag'e Bozula. 
30_1_13_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Olw'ebyonoono eby'abaana ba Amoni bisatu, weewaawo, olw'ebina, sirikyusa kubonerezebwa kwabwe okubavaako; kubanga babaaze abakazi abali embuuto ab'e Giriyaadi, balyoke bagaziye ensalo yaabwe: 
30_1_14_naye ndikuma omuliro mu bbugwe w'e Labba, era gulyokya amayumba gaakyo, nga baleekaana ku lunaku olw'olutalo, kibuyaga ng'akunta ku lunaku olw'embuyaga ez'akazimu: 
30_1_15_era kabaka waabwe aligenda mu busibe, ye n'abakungu be wamu, nw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_2_1_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Olw'ebyonoono bya Mowaabu bisatu, weewaawo, olw'ebina, sirikyusa kubonerezebwa kwakyo; kubanga yayokya amagumba ga kabaka wa Edomu n'agafuula evvu: 
30_2_2_naye ndiweereza omuliro ku Mowaabu, era gulyokya amayumba ag'e Keriyoosi; era Mowaabu alifa, nga basasamala nga baleekaana nga bafuuwa ekkondeere: 
30_2_3_era ndimalawo omulamuzi okuva wakati mu kyo, era ndittira abakungu baamu bonna wamu naye, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_2_4_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Olw'ebyonoono bya Yuda bisatu, weewaawo, olw'ebina, sirikyusa kubonerezebwa kwe okumuvaako; kubanga bagaanyi amateeka ga Mukama, so tebakutte biragiro bye, n'eby'obulimba byabwe bibawabizza, bajjajjaabwe bye baagobereranga mu kutambuia kwabwe: 
30_2_5_naye ndiweereza omuliro ku Yuda, era gulyokya amayumba ag'e Yerusaalemi. 
30_2_6_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Olw'ebyonoono bya Isiraeri bisatu, weewaawo, olw'ebina, siiikyusa kubonerezebwa kwe okumuvaako; kubanga batunze omutuukirivu olw'effeeza ne yeetaaga olw'omugogo gw'engatto: 
30_2_7_abawankirawankira enfuufu ey'oku nsi ey'oku mutwe gw'abaaw, ne bakyamya olugendo olw'abawombeefu: n'omusajja ne kitaawe baliyingira eri omuwala omu, okwonoona erinnya lyange ettukuvu: 
30_2_8_era bagalamira ku mabbali ga buli kyoto ku ngoye ze basingirwa, ne mu nnyumba ya Katonda waabwe mwe banywera omwenge gw'abo be batanze. 
30_2_9_Era naye nazikiriza Omwamoli mu mberi yaabwe, obuwanvu bwe bwali ng'obuwanvu obw'emivule, era yali wa maanyi ng'emyera; era naye nazikiriza ebibala bye engulu n'emmizi gye wansi. 
30_2_10_Era nabalinnyisa nga mbaggya mu nsi y'e Misiri ne mbalurJtlamiza emyaka amakumi ana mu ddungu, okulya ensi ey'Omwamoli. 
30_2_11_Ne ngolokosa ku batabani bammwe okuba bannabbi, ne ku balenzi bammwe okuba Abawonge. Si bwe kiri bwe kityo, ai mmwe abaana ba Isiraeri? bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_2_12_Naye ne muwa Abawonge omwenge okunywa; ne mulagira bannabbi nga mwogera nti Temulagula. 
30_2_13_Laba, ndibanyigiriza mu kifo kyammwe, ng'eggaali erijjudde ebi nywa bwe linyigiriza. 
30_2_14_Awo okudduka kulibula ow'embiro, so n'ow'amaanyi talyongera maanyi ge, so n'omuzira talyewonya: 
30_2_15_so n'oyo akwata omutego taliyimirira; era n'omuddusi w'embiro talyewonya wadde n'oyo eyeebagala embalaasi talyewonya: 
30_2_16_n'oyo alina obugumu mu b'amaanyi alidduka ng'ali bwereere ku lunaku olwo, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_3_1_Muwulire ekigambo kino Mukama ky'afoogeddeko, mmwe abaana ba Isiraeri, ku kika kyonna kye nnalinnyisa nga nkiggya mu nsi y'e Misiri, ng'ayogera nti 
30_3_2_Mmwe mwekka be nnamanya ku bika byonna eby'ensi zonna: kyendiva mbabonereza olw'obutali butuukirivu bwammwe bwonna. 
30_3_3_Ababiri bayinza okutambulira awamu wabula nga batabaganye? 
30_3_4_Empologoma ewulugumira mu kibira nga terina muyiggo? empologoma ento eyima mu mpuku yaayo okulira nga teriiko ky'ekutte? 
30_3_5_Ennyonyi eyinza okugwa mu mutego ku nsi nga tebagiteze kakunizo? omutego gumasuka okuva wansi nga teguliiko kye gukwasizza? 
30_3_6_Bafuuyira ekkondeere mu kibuga, abantu ne batatya? obubi bugwa ku kibuga, Mukama nga tabuleese? 
30_3_7_Mazima Mukama Katonda taliiko ky'alikola wabula ng'abikkulidde abaddu be bannabbi ekyama kye. 
30_3_8_Empologoma ewulugumye, ani ataatye? Mukama Katonda ayogedde, ani ayinza obutalagula? 
30_3_9_Mulangirire mu mayumba mu Asudodi ne mu mayumba mu nsi y'e Misiri, mwogere nti Mukuŋŋaanire ku nsozi ez'e Samaliya, mulabe enjoogaano eziri omwo bwe zenkana obungi, n'okujooga bwe kuli okuli omwo wakati. 
30_3_10_Kubanga tebamanyi kukola bya nsonga, bw'ayogera Mukama, abo abatereka ekyejo n'obunyazi mu mayumba gaabwe. 
30_3_11_Mukama Katonda kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Walibaawo omulabe, okwetooloola ensi enjuyi zonna: naye alikkakkanya amaanyi go okukuvaako, n'amayumba go galinyagibwa. 
30_3_12_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Ng'omusumba bw'awonyaako mu kamwa k'empologoma amagulu abiri oba ekitundu ky'okutu; bwe batyo abaana ba Isiraeri bwe baliwonyezebwa, abatuula mu Samaliya mu nsonda y'ekiriri ne ku bigugu ebya aliiri eby'oku kitanda: 
30_3_13_Muwulire mube abajulirwa eri ennyumba ya Yakobo, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, Katonda ow'eggye. 
30_3_14_Kubanga ku lunaku lwe ndibonereza Isiraeri olw'ebyonoono bye, era ndibonereza n'ebyoto bya Beseri, n'amayembe g'ekyoto galisalihwako ne gagwa wansi. 
30_3_15_Era ndikuba ennyumba eya ttoggo wamu n'ennyumba ey'ekyeya; n'ennyumba ez'amasanga ziribula, n'amayumba amanene galikoma, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_4_1_Muwulire ekigambo kino, mmwe ente ez'e Basani, abali ku lusozi Iwa Samaliya, abajooga abaavu, abakamula abeetaaga, abagamba bakama baabwe nti Muleete tunywe. 
30_4_2_Mukama Katonda alayidde obutukuvu bwe nga, laba, ennaku ziribatuukako lwe balibaggyawo n'amalobo, n'ekitundu kyammwe ekirifikkawo balibaggyawo n'amalobo agavuba. 
30_4_3_Era mulivaamu nga muyita mu bituli ebiwaguddwa, buli nte ng'esimbira ddala mu maaso gaayo; ne mwesuula mu Kalumooni, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_4_4_Mujje e Beseri mwonoone; mujje e Girugaali mwongere okwonoona kwammwe; era muleetenga ssaddaaka zammwe buli nkya n'ebitundu byammwe eby'ekkumi buli nnaku essatu 
30_4_6_Era nange mbawadde obulongoofu bw'amannyo mu bibuga byammwe n'okubulwa emmere mu mayumba gammwe gonna: era naye temuddanga gye ndi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_4_7_Era nange mbaziyirizza enkuba, ng'ekyasigaddeyo emyezi esatu okutuusa amakungula: ne ntonnyesa enkuba ku kibuga ekimu, ne nziyiza enkuba okutonnya ku kibuga ekirala: ekitundu kimu kyatonnyebwako, n'ekitundu ky'etaatonnyako ne kiwotoka. 
30_4_8_Awo ab'omu bibuga ebibiri oba bisatu ne batambulatambula ne batuuka mu kibuga ekimu okunywa amazzi, so tebakkutanga: era naye temuddanga gye ndi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_4_9_Mbakubye n'okugengewala n'obukuku: akawuka kalidde olufulube lw'ensuku zammwe n'ensuku zammwe n'ensuku zammwe ez'emizabbibu n'emitiini gyammwe n'emizeyituuni gyammwe: era naye temuddanga gye ndi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_4_10_Mpeerezza mu mmwe kawumpuli ng'engeri ey'e Misiri bwe yali: abalenzi bammwe mbasse n'ekitala, ne nziyawo embalaasi zammwe; ne nninnyisiza ne mu nnyindo zammwe okuwunya kw'olusiisira lwammwe: era naye temuddanga gye ndi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_4_11_Nsudde abamu ku mmwe nga Katonda bwe yasuula Sodomu ne Ggomola, nammwe ne muba ng'omumuli ogusiikibwa mu muliro: era naye temuddanga gye ndi, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_4_12_Kyendiva nkukola bwe nti, ai Isiraeri: era kubanga ndikukola kino, weeteeketeeke okusisinkana ne Katonda wo, ai Isiraeri. 
30_4_13_Kubanga, laba, oyo abumba ensozi, era atonda embuyaga, era abuulira omuntu by'alowooza, afuula enkya okuba ekizikiza, era alinnya ku bifo ebigulumivu eby'ensi; Mukama Katonda ow'eggye lye linnya lye. 
30_5_1_Muwulire ekigambo kino kye nkwata okubakungubagira, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri. 
30_5_2_Omuwala wa Isiraeri agudde; takyayimuka nate: asuuliddwa wansi ku nsi ye tewali wa kumuyimusa. 
30_5_3_Kubanga bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda nti Ekibuga ekyavangamu olukumi kirisigazaawo kikumi, n'ekyo ekyavangamu ekikumi kirisigazaawo kkumi, eri ennyumba ya Isiraeri. 
30_5_4_Kubanga bw'ati Mukama bw'agamba ennyumba ya Isiraeri nti Munnoonye, kale munaabanga balamu: 
30_5_5_naye temunoonyanga Beseri, so temuyingiranga mu Girugaali, so temuyitanga okugenda e Beeruseba: kubanga Girugaali tekirirema kugenda mu busibe, ne Beseri kiriggwaawo. 
30_5_6_Munoonye Mukama, kale munaabanga balamu; aleme okubuubuuka ng'omuliro mu nnyumba ya Yusufu, ne gwokya so nga tewali wa kuguzikiza mu Beseri: 
30_5_7_mmwe abafuula omusango okuba obusinso, ne musuula wansi obutuukirivu 
30_5_10_Bakyawa oyo anenya mu mulyango, era batamwa oyo ayogera ebigolokofu. 
30_5_11_Kale kubanga muli. nnyirira omwavu, ne mumukamul entlaano: mwazimba ennyumba ez'a mayinja amateme, naye temulizi tuulamu; mwasimba ensuku z'emizabbibu ezisanyusa, naye temu linywa mwenge gwamu. 
30_5_12_Kubanga mmanyi ebyonoono bya mmwe bwe byenkana obungi n'ebibi byammwe bwe byenkana amaanyi mmwe ababonyaabonya omutuukirivu, abalya enguzi, era abagobera abo abeetaaga mu mulyango. 
30_5_13_Omukabakaba kyaliva asirika mi biro ebifaanana bwe bityo; kubang: bye biro ebibi. 
30_5_14_Munoonye obulungi so si bubi, mulyoke mubeere nga abalamu: kale Mukama Katonda ow'eggye anaabanga nammwe nga bwe mwogera. 
30_5_15_Mukyawenga obubi, mwagalenga obulungi munywezenga eby'ensonga mu mu. lyango: mpozzi Mukama Katond: ow'eggye alikwatirwa ekisa ekitundt kya Yusufu ekifisseewo. 
30_5_16_Mukama Katonda ow'eggye, Mukama kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Ebiwoobo biriba mu nguudo zonna engazi era balyogerera mu makubo gonns nti Woowe, woowe! kale baliyiti omulimi okukuba ebiwoobe, n'abo abalina amagezi okukungubaga okukuba ebiwoobe. 
30_5_17_Awo mu nsuku zonna ez'emizabbibu mulibaamt ebiwoobe: kubanga ndiyita mt ggwe wakati, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_5_18_Zibasanze mmwe abeegomba olunaku lwa Mukama! mwagalira ki olunaku lwa Mukama? kizikiza so si musana. 
30_5_19_Kwenkana omusajja ng'adduka empologoma, n'asisinkana eddubu n'esisinkana naye oba ng'ayingira mu nnyumba ne yeekwata ku kisenge omukono gwe omusota ne gumuluma. 
30_5_20_Olunaku lwa Mukama teruliba kizikiza so si musana? ekizikiza zigizigi so nga temuli katangaala? 
30_5_21_Nkyawa, nnyooma embaga zammwe, so sirisanyukira kukuŋŋaana kwammwe okutukuvu. 
30_5_22_Weewaawo, newa. kubadde nga muwaayo gye ad ebiweebwayo byammwe ebyokebwa n'ebiweebwayo byammwe eby'obutta, siribikkiriza: so sirissaayo mwoyo eri ebiweebwayo olw'emirembe eby'ensolo zammwe eza ssava. 
30_5_23_Nziyaako oluyoogaano olw'ennyimba zo; kubanga siiwulire nnanga zo bwe zikubibwa obulungi. 
30_5_24_Naye omusango gukulukute ng'amazzi, n'obutuukirivu ng'omugga ogw'amaanyi. 
30_5_25_Mwandeeteranga ssaddaaka n'ebiweebwayo mu ldungu emyaka amakumi ana, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri? 
30_5_26_Weewaawo, mwasitulanga Sikusi kabaka wammwe ne Kiyuni, ebifaananyi byammwe, emmunyeenye ya katonda wammwe, bye mwekolera. 
30_5_27_Kyendiva mbatwaza mu busibe okuyita e Ddamasiko, bw'ayogera Mukama, erinnya lye Katonda ow'eggye. 
30_6_1_Zibasanze abo abeegolodde mu Sayuuni n'abo abataliiko kye batya ku lusozi lw’e Samaliya, abasajja ab'amaanyi ab'omu ggwanga erisinga amawanga obukulu, abajjirwa ennyumba ya Isiraeri! 
30_6_2_Muyite mugende e Kalune mulabe; nuveeyo mugende e Kamasi ekizulu: mulyoke muserengete e Gaasi eky'Abafirisuuti: bisinga obwakabaka buno bwombi obulungi? oba ensalo yaabwe ekira ensalo yammwe obugazi? 
30_6_3_Mmwe abateeka ewala Aunaku olubi ne musembeza kumpi entebe ey'ekyejo 
30_6_7_Kale kyebaliva bagenda mu busibe wamu n'abo abaasooka okugenda mu busibe, n'ebinyumu by'abo abeegolola birivaawo. 
30_6_8_Mukama Katonda yeerayidde yekka, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda ow'eggye, nti Nkyawa obulungi bwa Yakobo, ne ntamvda amayumba ge: kyendiva mpaayo ekibuga ne byonna ebikirimu. 
30_6_9_Awo olulituuka abantu kkumi bwe balisigala mu nnyumba emu balifa. 
30_6_10_Era omuntu bw'anaasitulibwa kojjaawe, oyo amwokya, okuggya amagumba mu nnyumba, n'agamba oyo ali mu njuya. ez'ennyumba ez'omunda nti Wakyaliwo ali naawe? naye n'addamu nti Nedda; kale a'alyoka ayogera nti Sirika; kubanga tetuyinza kwatula linnya lya Mukama. 
30_6_11_Kubanga, laba, Mukama alagidde, n'ennyumba ennene eriwagulwamu ebituli n'ennyumba entono eribaamu enjatika. 
30_6_12_Embalaasi ziriddukira mbiro ku lwazi? omuntu alirimira okwo n'ente? mmwe okufuula ne mufuula omusango okuba omususa n'ebibala eby'obutuukirivu okuba abusinso: 
30_6_13_mmwe abasanyukira ekintu ekitaliiko kye kigasa, aboogera nti Tetwefunidde mayembe olw'amaanyi gaffe ffe? 
30_6_14_Kubanga, laba, ndibayimusizaako eggwanga, ai ennyumba ya Isiraeri, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda ow'eggye; era balibabonyaabonya okuva awayingirirwa e Kamasi okutuuka ku kagga aka Alaba. 
30_7_1_Bw'atyo Mukama Katonda bwe yandaga: era, laba, yabumba enzige ebimererezi nga bitanudde okumera; era, laba, byali bimererezi okukungula kwa kabaka nga kuwedde. 
30_7_2_Awo olwatuuka bwe zaamala okulya omuddo ogw'omu nsi ne ndyoka njogera nti Ai Mukama Katonda, sonyiwa, nkwegayiridde: Yakobo anaayimirira atya? kubanga mutono. 
30_7_3_Mukama ne yejjusa olw'ekyo: Tekiribaawo, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_7_4_Bw'atyo Mukama Katonda bwe yandaga: kale, laba, Mukama Katonda n'ayita abantu okuwakana n'omuliro; ne gwokya obuziba obunene, era gwandimazeewo n'olukalu. 
30_7_5_Awo ne ndyoka njogera nti Ai Mukama Katonda, lekayo, nkwegayiridde: Yakobo anaayinza atya okuyimirira? kubanga mutono. 
30_7_6_Awo Mukama ne yejjusa ekyo: Era n'ekyo tekiribaawo, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda. 
30_7_7_Bw'atyo bwe yandaga: kale, laba, Mukama n'ayimirira ku mabbali g'ekisenge ekyazimbibwa n'omugwa ogugera, era ng'akutte omugwa ogugera mu mukono gwe. 
30_7_8_Awo Mukama n'annamba nti Amosi, olaba ki? Ne ŋŋamba nti Omugwa ogugera. Awo Mukama n'ayogera nti Laba, nditeeka omugwa ogugera wakati w'abantu bange Isiraeri; siribayitako nate lwa kubiri: 
30_7_9_n'ebifo ebigulumivu ebya Isaaka birirekebwawo, n'ebifo ebitukuvu ebya Isiraeri birizisibwa; era ndigolokokera ku nnyumba ya Yerobowaamu n'ekitala. 
30_7_10_Awo Amaziya kabona ow'e Beseri n'atumira Yerobowaamu kabaka wa Isiraeri ng'ayogera nti Amosi akwekobedde wakati mu nnyumba ya Isiraeri: ensi teyinza kugumiikiriza bigambo bye byonna. 
30_7_11_Kubanga Amosi bw'ayogera bw'ati nti Yerobowaamu alifa n'ekitala, era Isiraeri talirema kutwalibwa nga musibe okuva mu nsi ye. 
30_7_12_Era Amaziya n'agamba Amosi nti Ggwe omulabi, genda we ddukire mu nsi ya Yuda, oliire eyo emmere, olagulire eyo: 
30_7_13_naye tolagulanga nate lwa kubiri e Beseri: kubanga kye kifo ekitukuvu ekya kabaka, era ye nnyumba ya kabaka. 
30_7_14_Awo Amosi n'alyoka addamu n'agamba Amaziya nti Nnali siri nnabbi, so saali mwana wa nnabbi; naye nnali musumba era musalizi w'emisukomooli: 
30_7_15_Mukama n'anziya ku mulimu ogw'okugoberera ekisibo, Mukama n'aŋŋamba nti Genda olagule abantu bange Isiraeri. 
30_7_16_Kale nno wulira ekigambo kya Mukama: Oyogera nti Tolagulanga ku Isiraeri, so totonnyesanga ku nnyumba ya Isaaka; 
30_7_17_Mukama kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Mukazi wo aliba mwenzi mu kibuga, ne batabani bo ne bawala bo baligwa n'ekitala, n'ensi yo erigabibwa n'omugwa; naawe kennyini olifiira mu nsi eteri nnongoofu, era Isiraeri talirema kutwalibwa nga musibe okuva mu nsi ye. 
30_8_1_Bw'atyo Mukama Katonda bwe yandaga: era, laba, ekibbo eky'ebibala eby'omu kyeya. 
30_8_2_N'ayogera nti Amosi, olaba ki? Ne njogera nti Ndaba ekibbo eky'ebibala eby'omu kyeya. Awo Mukama n'alyoka annamba nti Enkomerero etuuse ku bantu bange Isiraeri; siribayitako nate lwa kubiri. 
30_8_3_Awo ennyimba ez'omu yeekaalu ziriba kuwowoggana ku lunaku olwo, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda: emirambo giriba mingi; baligisuula mu buli kifo nga basirise. 
30_8_4_Muwulire kino, ai mmwe abaagala okuliira ddala eyeetaaga n'okumalawo abaavu ab'omu nsi, nga mwogera nti 
30_8_5_Omwezi ogwakaboneka guliggwaako ddi, tulyoke tutunde eŋŋaano? ne ssabbiiti, tusumulule eŋŋaano? nga mutoniwaza efa, era nga munenewaza sekeri, era nga mulyazaamaanya ne m;nzaan; ez'obulimba 
30_8_7_Mukama alayidde obulungi bwa Yakobo nti Mazima seerabirenga bikolwa bya bwe na kimu ennaku zotma. 
30_8_8_Ensi terikankanira ekyo, buli muntu n'awuubaala abeera omwo? weewaawo, eritumbiirira ddala wamu nga Omugga; era eritabanguka n'ekka nate nga Omugga ogw'e Misiri. 
30_8_9_Awo olulituuka ku lunaku olwo, bw'ayogera Mukatna Katonda, ndigwisa enjuba mu ttuntu, era ndireeta ekizikiza ku nsi obudde nga butangaala. 
30_8_10_Era ndifuula embaga zammwe okuba okuwuubaala, n'ennyimba zammwe zonna okuba okukungubaga; era ndireeta ebibukutu ku biwato byonna, n'ebiwalaata ku buli mutwe; era ndirufuula ng'okukungubagira omwana eyazaalibwa omu, n'enkomerero yaalwo ng'olunaku olubalagala. 
30_8_11_Laba, ennaku zijja, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda, lwe ndiweereza enjala mu nsi, eteri njala ya mmere newakubadde ennyonta ey'amazzi, naye enjala ey'okuwulira ebigambo bya Mukama. 
30_8_12_Awo balibulubuuta okuva ku nnyanja okutuuka ku nnyanja endala, n'okuva obukiika obwa kkono okutuuka ebuvanjuba; baliddukana mbiro eruuyi n'eruuyi okunoonya ekigambo kya Mukama, so tebalikiraba. 
30_8_13_Ku lunaku olwo abawala abalungi n'abalenzi balizirika olw'ennyoata. 
30_8_14_Abalayira ekibi kya Samaliya ne boogera nti Nga Katonda wo, ai Ddaani, bw'ali omulamu; era nti Ng'ekkubo lya Beeruseba bwe liri eddamu; abo baligwa so tebaliyimuka nate. 
30_9_1_Nalaba Mukama ng'ayimiridde ku mabbali g'ekyoto: n'ayogera nti Kuba emitwe, emiryango gikankane: era bamenyeemenye ku mitwe gy'abo bonna; era nditta n'ekitala ow'enkomerero ku bo: tewaliba ku bo alidduka, so tewaliba ku bo aliwona n'omu. 
30_9_2_Newakubadde nga basima okutuuka mu magombe, omukono gwange gulibaggyayo; era newakubadde nga balinnya okutuuka mu ggulu, ndibassa okubaggyayo. 
30_9_3_Era newakubadde nga beekwekera ku ntikko ya Kalumeeri, ndikenneenya ne mbaggyayo; era newakubadde nga bakwekeddwa amaaso gange mu buziba bw'ennyanja wansi, ndiragirira eyo omusota ne gubaluma. 
30_9_4_Era newakubadde nga bagenda mu busibe mu maaso g'abalabe baabwe, ndiragirira eyo ekitala ne kibatta: era nditeeka amaaso gange ku bo olw'okuleeta obubi so si bulungi. 
30_9_5_Kubanga Mukama, Katonda ow'eggye, ye wuuyo akoma ku nsi n'esaanuuka, na bonna abagibeeramu baliwuubaala; era eritumbiirira ddala wamu nga Omugga; era erikka nate nga Omugga ogw'e Misiri 
30_9_7_Mmwe temuli ng'abaana b'Abaesiyopya gye ndi, ai abaana ba Isiraeri? bw'ayogera Mukama. Saggya Isiraeri mu nsi y'e Misiri ne mbalinnyisa, ne nziya Abafirisuuti e Kafutoli, n'Abasuuli e Kiri? 
30_9_8_Laba, amaaso ga Mukama Katonda gali ku bwakabaka obulina ebibi, era ndibuzikiriza okuva ku maaso g'ettaka; kyokka sirizikiririza ddala nnyumba ya Yakobo, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
30_9_9_Kubanga, laba, ndiragira era ndiwewera ennyumba ya Isiraeri mu mawanga gonna, ng'eŋŋaano bw'ewewerwa mu lugali, naye tewaliba na kaweke na kamu akaligwa ku ttaka. 
30_9_10_Abalina ebibi bonna ab'omu bantu bange balifa n'ekitala aboogera nti Obubi tebulitutuukako so tebulitukulembera. 
30_9_11_Ku lunaku olwo ndisimba eweema ya Dawudi eyagwa, ne nziba ebituli byayo; era ndisimba ebibye ebyagwa, era ndigizimba nga mu nnaku ez'edda; 
30_9_12_balyoke balye ekitundu kya Edomu ekifisseewo, n'amawanga gonna agatuumibwa erinnya lyange, bw'ayogera Mukama akola kino. 
30_9_13_Laba, ennaku zijja, bw'ayogera Mukama, akabala lw'alituuka ku oyo akungula, n'oyo asamba ezabbibu lw'alituuka ku oyo asiga ensigo; n'ensozi ziritonnya omwenge omuwoomerevu, n'obu sozi bwonna bulisaanuuka. 
30_9_14_Era ndikomyawo obusibe bw'abantu bange Isiraeri, kale balizimba ebibuga ebyalekebwawo, ne babituulamu; era balisimba ensuku ez'emizabbibu, ne banywa omwenge gwamu; era balirima ennimiro, ne balya ebibala byamu. 
30_9_15_Era ndibasimba ku nsi yaabwe, so tebalisimbulwa nate mu nsi gye mbawadde, bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda wo. 
31_1_1_Okwolesebwa kwa Obadiya. Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama Katonda ku Edomu; nti Tuwulidde ebigambo ebiva eri Mukama n’omubaka atumiddwa eri amawanga nti Muyimuke, tuyimuke ku nsi ye tulwane naye. 
31_1_2_Laba, nkufudde omuto mu mawanga; onyoomebwa nnyo ggwe. 
31_1_3_Amalala ag'omu mutima gwo gakukyamizza, ggwe azimba mu biwuku eby'omu lwazi, ggwe atuula waggulu; ayogera mu mutima gwe nti Ani alinzisa wansi? 
31_1_4_Newakubadde ng'olinnya mu ggulu ng'empungu era ekisu kyo nga kiteekebwa wakati mu munnyeenye, ndikussa wansi ove eyo; bw'ayogera Mukama. 
31_1_5_Oba ababbi bajja gy'oli, oba abanyazi ekiro (so nga ozikirira!) tebandibbye bya kubamala? oba abanozi b'ezabbibu bajja gy'oli, tebandirese zabbibu ezeerebwawo? 
31_1_6_Ebya Esawu nga binoonyezebwa, ebikwekebwa ye nga bivumbuka ! 
31_1_7_Abantu bonna abaalagaana gy'oli bakuwerekedde okutuuka ku nsalo; abantu abaali balina emirembe naawe bakukyamizza era bakulemye; abaalya emmere yo batega omutego wansi wo; so temuli kutegeera mu ye. 
31_1_8_Ku lunaku luli sigenda kuzikiriza abagezigezi bave mu Edomu n'okutegeera kuve mu lusozi lwa Esawu? bw'ayogera Mukama. 
31_1_9_Era abazira bo; ggwe Temani, balyekanga buli muntu alyoke aggibwe mu lusozi lwa Esawu era attibwe. 
31_1_10_Kubanga wagirira amaanyi muganda wo Yakobo, ensonyi zirikukwata era oliggibwawo emirembe gyonna. 
31_1_11_Ku lunaku lwe wayimirira ku mabbali, ku lunaku abayise lwe baanyagaebintu bye n'abagenyi lwe baayingira mu nzigi ze eza wankaaki ne bakuba akalulu ku Yerusaalemi, naawe n'ofaanana ng'omu ku abo. 
31_1_12_Naye totunuulira lunaku lwa muganda wo ku lunaku olw'okugwirwako akabi, so tosanyuka olw'abaana ba Yuda ku lunaku olw'okuzikirira kwabwe; so teweekuza n'akamwa ko ku lunaku olw'akabi. 
31_1_13_Toyingiranga mw luggi olwa wankaaki olw'abantu bange ku lunaku mwe balirabira ennaku; so naawe totunuuliranga kabi kaabwe ku lunaku mwe balirabira ennaku so temukomanga ku bintu byabwe ku lunaku mwe balirabira ennaku. 
31_1_14_So toyimiriranga mu masaŋŋanzira okuzikiriza abantu be abawona; so towangayo bantu be abasigalawo ku lunaku olw'akabi. 
31_1_15_Kubanga olunaku lwa Mukama lusemberedde amawanga gonna: nga bwe wakola bwe kityo bwe kirikukolebwa ggwe; by'okola biridda ku mutwe gwo. 
31_1_16_Kubanga bwe mwanyweranga ku lusozi lwange olutukuvu, bwe kityo amawanga gonna bwe ganaanywanga ennaku zonna; weewaawo, ganaanywanga ganaamiranga galiba ng'agatabangawo. 
31_1_17_Naye ku lusozi Sayuuni kulibaako abawona, era luliba lutukuvu; n'ennyumba ya Yakobo eriba n'ebintu byabwe. 
31_1_18_Era ennyumba ya Yakobo eriba muliro n'ennyumba ya Yusufu eriba lulimi olw'omuliro n'enayumba ya Esawu nsambu, nabo balyaka gye bali, balibazikiriza; so tewaliba muntu wa mu nnyumba ya Esawo alisigalawo; kubanga Mukama ye akyogedde. 
31_1_19_N'olusozi lwa Esawu lulifuuka lw'abo ab'obukiika obwa ddyo; ensi y'Abafirisuuti eriba y'abo ab'ensenyi; era bo balirya ennimiro ya Efulayimu, n'ennimiro ey'e Samaliya: era Gireyaadi eriba ya Benyamini. 
31_1_20_N'abo ab'eggye lino ery'abaana ba Isiraeri abafugibwa obuddu abali mu Bakanani, baliba n'ensi okutuuka ku Zalefaasi; n'abo ab'omu Yerusaalemi abafugibwa obuddu abali mu Sefalaadi baliba n'ebibuga eby'obukiika obwa ddyo. 
31_1_21_Era abalokozi balirinnya ku lusozi Sayuuni basalire olusozi lwa Esawu omusango; n'obwakabaka buliba bwa Mukama. 
32_1_1_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama kyajja eri Yona, omwana wa Amittayi, nga kyogera nti 
32_1_2_Golokoka, ogende e Nineeve ekibuga ekyo ekinene okirangirire; kubanga obubi bwabwe bulinnye butuuse mu maaso gange. 
32_1_3_Naye Yona n'agolokoka okuddukira e Talusiisi okuva mu maaso ga Mukama; n'aserengeta e Yopa n'alaba ekyombo nga kigenda e Talusiisi; awo n'abawa empooza yaakyo n'asaabala omwo agende nabo e Talusiisi ave mu maaso ga Mukama. 
32_1_4_Naye Mukama n'asindika empewo ennyingi ku nnyanja, omuyaga omungi ne guba ku nnyanja ekyombo ne kyagala okumenyeka. 
32_1_5_N'abo abaavuga ne batya ne bakaabirira buli muntu katonda we; ne basuula mu nnyanja ebintu ebyali mu kyombo bakiwewule. Naye Yona yali ng'asse mu kisenge eky'omu kyombo, ng'agalamidde, yeebase otulo. 
32_1_6_Awo omugoba w'ekyombo n'ajja gy'ali n'amugamba nti Obadde otya, ggwe omwebasi? golokoka, osabe Katonda wo, era mpozzi Katonda anaatujjukira tuleme okuzikirira. 
32_1_7_Ne boogera buli muntu ne muganda we nti Jjangu tukube akalulu tulyoke tutegeere gwe tulangibwa akabi kano okutubaako. Awo ne bakuba akalulu, akalulu ne kagwa ku Yona. 
32_1_8_Awo ne bamugamba nti Kale tubuulire gwe tulangibwa akabi kano okutubaako; omulimu gwo mulimu ki? ova wa? ensi yammwe nsi ki? ekika kyammwe kika ki? 
32_1_9_N'abagamba nti Ndi Mwebbulaniya; ntya Mukama, Katonda ow'omu ggulu eyakola ennyanja n'olukalu. 
32_1_10_Awo abantu ne batya nnyo ne bamugamba nti Kino kiki ky'okoze ggwe? Kubanga abantu baamanya nti adduse mu maaso ga Mukama, kubanga yali ng'aba buulidde. 
32_1_11_Awo ne bamugamba nti Tunaakukola rurya ennyanja etuteekere? kubanga ennyanja yali ng'egenda yeeyongera okufuukuuka ennyo. 
32_1_12_N'abagamba nti Munsitule munsuule mu nnyanja; kale ennyanja eneebateekera; kubanga mmanyi nti omuyaga guno omungi gubakutte okubalanga nze. 
32_1_13_Naye abantu ne bavuga nnyo okuddayo okugoba ettale; naye ne batayinza; kubanga ennyanja yagenda yeeyongera bweyongezi okufuukuuka okubaziyiza. 
32_1_14_Kyebaava bakaabirira Mukama ne boogera nti Tukwegayiridde, ai Mukama, tukwegayiridde tuleme okuzikirira ku lw'obulamu obw'omuntu ono; so torussaako musaayi ogutaliiko musango; kubanga ggwe, ai Mukama, ggwe okoze ky'oyagala. 
32_1_15_Awo ne basitula Yona ne bamusuula mu nnyanja; awo omuyaga ogwali ku nnyanja ne gufa. 
32_1_16_Awo abantu ne batya nnyo Mukama; ne bawaayo ssaddaaka eri Mukama ne beeyama obweyamo. 
32_1_17_Mukama n'ateekateeka ekyennyanja ekinene kimire Yona; Yona n'amala mu lubuto olw'ekyennyanja ennakn ssatu emisana n'ekiro. 
32_2_1_Awo Yona n'asaba Mukama Katonda we mu lubuto olw'ekyennyanja. 
32_2_2_N'ayogera nti Nakaabirira Mukama kubanga nalaba ennaku, N'anziramu; Mu lubuto lw'emagombe nakoowoola; N'owulira eddoboozi lyange. 
32_2_3_Kubanga wansuula mu buziba, mu mutima ogw'ennyanja, Amataba ne ganneetooloola; Amayengo go gonna n'amasingiisira go gaayita waggulu ku nze. 
32_2_4_Ne njogera nti Ngobeddwa mu maaso go; Naye naatunuulira nate yeekaalu yo entukuvu. 
32_2_5_Amazzi gansaanikira, era okutuuka ku bulamu; Obuziba bwanneetooloola; Endago zambikka ku mutwe gwange. 
32_2_6_Ne nzika ensozi we zisibuka; Ensi n'ebisiba byayo ne binzigalira emirembe gyonna; Naye oggyeemu obulamu bwange mu bunnya, ai Mukama, Katonda wange. 
32_2_7_Emmeeme yange bwe yazirika mu nze, ne njijukira Mukama; N'okusaba kwange ne kutuuka gy'oli, mu yeekaalu yo entukuvu. 
32_2_8_Abo abassaayo omwoyo ku by'obulimba ebitaliimu balekayo okusaasirwa kwabwe. 
32_2_9_Naye nze naakuwa ssaddaaka yange n'eddoboozi ery'okwebaza; Naasasula obweyamo bwange. Obulokozi buva eri Mukama. 
32_2_10_Awo Mukama n'alagira ekyennyanja ne kisesetna Yona ku lukalu. 
32_3_1_Awo ekigambo kya Mukama ne kijja eri Yona omulundi ogw'okubiri, nga kyogera nti 
32_3_2_Golokoka, ogende e Nineeve, ekibuga ekyo ekinene, okibuulirire okubuulira kwe nkugamba. 
32_3_3_Awo Yona n'agolokoka n'agenda e Nineeve nga Mukama bwe yamugamba. Era Nineeve kyali kibuga kinene nnyo nnyini olugendo lwa nnaku ssatu okukibunya. 
32_3_4_Yona n'asooka okuyingira mu kibuga n'atambula olugendo lwa lunaku lumu n'ayogerera waggulu n'agamba nti Ennaku amakutni ana bwe ziriyitawo, Nineeve kirizikirira. 
32_3_5_Abantu ab'omu Nineeve ne bakkiriza Katonda ne balangirira okusiiba ne bambala ebibukutu, bonna okuva ku mukulu okutuuka ku muto. 
32_3_6_Ebigambo ne bituuka ku kabaka ow'e Nineeve, n'agolokoka ku ntebe n'ayambulamu ekyambalo kye ne yeebikkako ebibukutu n'atuula mu vvu. 
32_3_7_N'alangirira n'abuulira okubunya Nineeve olw'etteeka lya kabaka n'abakungu be, n'agamba nti Omuntu n'ensolo, eggana n'ekisibo, bireme okulega ku kintu; bireme okulyako n'okunywa amazzi 
32_3_9_Ani amanyi nga Katonda alikyuka alyejjusa, n'akyuka okuleka obusungu bwe obukambwe tuleme okuzikiri ra? 
32_3_10_Katonda n'alaba emirimu gyabwe nga bakyuse mu kkubo lyabwe ebbi; Katonda ne yejjusa obubi bwe yali ayogedde okubakola; n'atabubakola. 
32_4_1_Naye Yona n'atasiima n'akatono n'anyiikaala. 
32_4_2_N'asaba Mukama n'ayogera nti Nkusaba, ai Mukama, saayogera bwe ntyo nga nkyali mu nsi y'ewaffe. Kyennava nnyanguwa okuddukira e Talusiisi; kubanga nategeera nti oli Katonda mulungi ajjudde okusaasira alwawo okusunguwala, alina ekisa ekingi, era ataleeta bubi. 
32_4_3_Kale nno, ai Mukama, nkwegayiridde, onziyeko obulamu bwange; kubanga waakiri nfe okusinga okuba omulamu. 
32_4_4_Mukama n'ayogera nti Ggwe okoze bulungi okusunguwala? 
32_4_5_Awo Yona n'afuluma mu kibuga n'atuula ku luuyi olw'ekibuga olwolekedde ebuvanjuba n'asiisira eyo ekisiisira n'atuula omwo mu kisiikirize kyakyo okutuusa lw'aliraba ekibuga bwe kiriba. 
32_4_6_Mukama Katonda n'ategeka ekiryo n'akimeza awali Yona kimusiikirize ku mutwe gwe, kimuwonye ennaku ze yali alabye. Awo Yona n'asanyuka nnyo lolw'ekiryo. 
32_4_7_Naye Katonda n'ategeka ekiwuka obudde bwe bwakya enkya, ne kiruma ekiryo ne kiwotoka. 
32_4_8_Awo olwatuuka enjuba bwe yavaayo, Katonda n'ategeka embuyaga ez'obuvanjuba ez'olubugumu, omusana ne gwokya Yona mu mutwe gwe, n'azirika n'asaba afe, n'ayogera nti Waakiri nfe okusinga okuba omulamu. 
32_4_9_Katonda n'agamba Yona nti Ggwe okoze bulungi okusunguwala ku lw'ekiryo? N'ayogera nti Nkoze bulungi okusunguwala okutuusa lwe ndifa. 
32_4_10_Mukama n'ayogera nti Osaasidde ekiryo kyotaakolera mulimu so ky'otaameza; ekyamerera ekiro ekimu, ne kibulira ekiro ekimu; 
32_4_11_nange sandisaasidde Nineeve, ekibuga ekyo ekinene; omuli abantu akasiriivu mu obukumi obubiri n'okusukkirirawo abatayinza kwawula mukono gwabwe ogwa ddyo n'omukono gwabwe ogwa kkono; era n'ensolo ennyingi? 
33_1_1_Ekigambo kya Mukama ekyaja eri Mikka, Omumolasuuti, mu mirembe gya Yosamu, Akazi, ne Keezeekiya, bassekabaka ba Yuda, kye yalaba ku Samaliya ne ku Yerusaalemi. 
33_1_2_Muwulire, mmwe ab'amawanga mwenna; tega amatu go, ggwe ensi, n'ebyo byonna ebirimu; Mukama Katonda abe mujulirwa eri mmwe, Mukama ng'ayima mu yeekaalu ye entukuvu. 
33_1_3_Kubanga, laba, Mukama ava mu kifo kye, alikka alitambulira ku bifo ebigulumivu eby'ensi. 
33_1_4_N'ensozi zirisaanuuka wansi we n'enkonko ziryatika ng'ebisenge by'enjuki mu maaso g'omuliro, ng'amazzi agayiikira awali ebbanga. 
33_1_5_Olw'okwonoona kwa Yakobo ebyo byonna biribaawo n'olw'ebibi eby'ennyumba ya Isiraeri. Okwonoona okwa Yakobo kiki? si Samaliya? ebifo ebigulumivu ebya Yuda kiki? si Yerusaalemi? 
33_1_6_Kale ndifuula Samaliya ng'ekifunvu mu ttale; ng'ebizabbibu ebisimbe; nange ndisuula amayinja gaakyo mu lukonko, era ndyerula emisingi gyakyo. 
33_1_7_Ebifaananyi byakyo byonna birisekulwasekulwa n'empeera zaakyo zonna ziryokebwa omuliro, nange ndizikiriza ebifaananyi byakyo byonna; kubanga yazikuŋŋaanya nga ziva mu mpeera ey'omukazi omwenzi, era ziridda eri empeera ey'omwenzi. 
33_1_8_Kyendiva mpowoggana, ndikuba ebiwoobe, nditambula nga nnyambudde engoye zange era nga ndi bwereere; ndikaaba ng'ebibe, ndijoonajoona nga bamaaya. 
33_1_9_Kubanga ebiwundu bye tebiwonyezeka; kubanga kituuse ne ku Yuda; kituuse ku luggi olwa wankaaki olw'abantu bange, era ku Yerusaalemi. 
33_1_10_Temukibuulira mu Gaasi, temukaaba ama ziga n'akatono: ku Besuleyafula nneekulukuunyizza mu nfuufu. 
33_1_11_Muyite muveeyo, ggwe abeera mu Safiri, ng'oli bwereere, era ng'okwatibwa ensonyi; oyo abeera mu Zanani tavuddeemu; ebiwoobe bya Beswezeeri birikuggyako ekikondo kyakyo. 
33_1_12_Kubanga oyo abeera mu Malosi yeeraliikirira ng'alindirira ebirungi; kubanga akabi kasse, kavudde eri Mukama ku luggi olwa wankaaki olwa Yerusaalemi. 
33_1_13_Siba eggaali ku mbalaasi esinga embiro, ggwe abeera mu Lakisi: oyo ebibi kwe byasookera eri omuwala wa Sayuuni; kubanga ebyonoono bya Isiraeri byalabika mu ggwe. 
33_1_14_Kyoliva owa ekirabo Molesesu-gaasi, eky'okusiibula; ennyumba za Akuzibu ziriba eky'obulimba eri bassekabaka ba Isiraeri. 
33_1_15_Nkyagenda okuleeta gy'oli, ggwe abeera mu Malesa, oyo aliba nnannyini ggwe; ekitiibwa kya Isiraeri kirituuka era ku Adulamu. 
33_1_16_Weemwe osalire enviiri abaana abakusanyusa; gaziya ekiwalaata kyo ng'empungu; kubanga bakuggiddwako bagenze mu kusibibwa. 
33_2_1_Ziribasanga abo abateesa obutali butuukirivu, era abakolera obubi ku biriri byabwe! obudde bwe bukva, babukola, kubanga buli mu buyinza bw'emikono gyabwe. 
33_2_2_N'abo abeegomba ebyalo ne babinyaga; era ennyumba, ne bazitwala; era bajooga omusajja n'ennyumba ye, era omuntu n'obusika bwe. 
33_2_3_Mukama kyava ayogera bw'ati nti Laba, nteesa akabi ku kika kino, ke mutaliggyamu bulago bwammwe, so temulitambuza malala; kubanga bino bye biro ebibi. 
33_2_4_Ku lunaku luli balibagerera olugero, era balikuba ebiwoobe ebirimu obuyinike obungi, era balyogera nti Tunyagiddwa ddala; awaanyisa omugabo ogw'abantu bange; ng'akinziyako! agabira abajeemu ebyalo byaffe. 
33_2_5_Kyoliva olema okubeera n'omuntu alisuula omugwa, akalulu bwe kamugwako, mu kkuŋŋaaniro lya Mukama. 
33_2_6_Temulagulanga, bwe batyo bwe balagula. Tebaliragulira abo; ebivume tebiriggibwawo 
33_2_8_Naye mu nnaku zino abantu bange bayimuse ng'abalabe; muggyako essuuka ku ngoye z'abo abayita nga tebaliiko kye batya, ng'abantu abatayagala kulwana. 
33_2_9_Abakazi ab'abantu bange mubagoba mu nnyumba zaabwe ezibasanyusa; ku baana baabwe abato mubaggyako ekitiibwa kyange emirembe gyonna. 
33_2_10_Muyimuke, mugende; kubanga wano si kiwummulo kyammwe; olw'empitambi ezikiriza, era n'okuzikiriza okute nkanika. 
33_2_11_Omuntu atambula n'omwoyo ogw'okulimba, bw'alimba ng'ayogera nti Ndilntlagulira eby'omwenge n'ebitamiiza, ye aliba omulaguzi ow'abantu bano. 
33_2_12_Sirirema kukuŋŋaanya ab'ewammwe bonna, ggwe Yakobo; sirirema kuleeta aba Isiraeri abalisigalawo; ndibateeka awamu ng'endiga eza Bozula; ng'ekisibo ekiri wakati w'eddundiro lyazo, baliyoogaana nnyo kubanga abantu bangi. 
33_2_13_Oyo awagula ayambuse mu maaso gaabwe; bawagudde bayise batuuse ku luggi olwa wankaaki, era bafulumidde omwo; era kabaka waabwe ayise mu maaso gaabwe, Mukama abakulembedde. 
33_3_1_Ne njogera nti Muwulire, mbeegayiridde, mmwe abakulu ba Yakobo, nammwe abafuga ennyumba ya Isiraeri; si kwammwe okumanya omusango? 
33_3_2_abakyawa ebirungi, era abaagala ebibi; ababaggyako eddiba lyabwe n'omubiri gwabwe ku magumba gaabwe 
33_3_4_Mu biro ebyo banaakaabiriranga Mukama, so tebaddengamu; weewaawo, anaabakwekanga amaaso ge mu kiseera ekyo, nga bwe baakola obubi mu bikolwa byabwe. 
33_3_5_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama ku bannabbi abakyamya abantu bange; abaluma n'amannyo gaabwe, era bayogerera waggulu nti Mirembe; na buli agaana okuwa mu bumwa bwabwe, n'okukuma bamukumira olutalo; nti 
33_3_6_Kyekiriva kibeera ekiro gye muli, muleme okwolesebwa; era ekizikiza kiriba gye muli, muleme okulagula; era enjuba erigwira bannabbi, era obudde buliddugala ku bo. 
33_3_7_N'abalabi balikwatibwa ensonyi, n'abalaguzi baliswala; weewaawo, bonna balibikka ku mimwa gyabwe; kubanga tewali. kuddamu kwa Katonda. 
33_3_8_Naye mazima nze njijudde amaanyi olw'omwoyo gwa Mukama, n'omusango n'obuzira, mbuulire Yakobo okwonoona kwe era mbuulire Isiraeri ebibi bye: 
33_3_9_Muwulire kino, mbeegayirira, mmwe abakulu b'ennyumba ya Yakobo, nammwe abafuga ennyumba ya Isiraeri, abatamwa omusango, era abalya ensonga zonna. 
33_3_10_Bazimba Sayuuni n'omusaayi, era Yerusaalemi bakizimba n'obukyamu. 
33_3_11_Abakulu baakyo basala omusango, baweebwe empeera, ne bakabona baakyo bayigiriza bafune ebintu, ne bannabbi baakyo balagula baweebwe effeeza; naye bo balyesigama ku Mukama nga boogera nti Mukama tali wakati waffe? akabi tekalitutuukako. 
33_3_12_Sayuuai kyeruliva lulimibwa ng'omutala ku bwammwe, ne Yerusaalemi kirifuuka ekifunvu, n'olusozi olw'ennyumba ng'ebifo ebigulumivu eby'omu kibira. 
33_4_1_Naye mu nnaku ez'oluvannyuma oluliruuka olusozi olw'ennyumba ya Mukama luliba lunywevu ku ntikko y'ensozi era luliyimusibwa okusinga obusozi; era amawanga galikulukutiramu. 
33_4_2_Era amawanga mangi agaligenda, ne googera nti Mujje twambuke eri olusozi lwa Mukama, n'eri ennyumba ya Katonda wa Yakobo; naye alituyigiriza eby'enguudo ze, naffe tulitambulira mu makubo ge; kubanga mu Sayuuni mwe muliva amateeka n'ekigambo kya Mukama mu Yerusaalemi. 
33_4_3_Naye alisalira omusango amawanga mangi, era alinenya amawanga ag'amaanyi agali ewala; era baliweesa ebitala byabwe okuba enkumbi n'amafumu gaabwe okuba ebiwabyo; eggwanga teririyimusa ekitala ku ggwanga, so tebaayigenga kulwana nate. 
33_4_4_Naye balituula buli muntu mu muzabbibu gwe ne mu mutiini gwe; so tewalibaawo abakanga; kubanga akamwa ka Mukama w'eggye ke kakyogedde. 
33_4_5_Kubanga amawanga gonna ganaatambuliranga buli muntu mu linnya lya katonda we, naffe tunaatambuliranga mu linnya lya Mukama Katonda waffe emirembe n'emirembe. 
33_4_6_Ku lunaku luli, bw'ayogera Mukama, ndikujnaanya omukazi awenyera, era ndireeta oyo agobebwa n'oyo gwe nnalabisa ennaku 
33_4_8_Era naawe, ggwe ekigo eky'ekisibo, akasozi ak'omuwala wa Sayuuni, kulituuka gy'oli; weewaawo; okufuga okw'edda kulidda, obwakabaka obw'omuwala wa Yerusaalemi. 
33_4_9_Lwaki nno okukaaba ennyo? tewali kabaka gy'oli, omuteesa wo abula? obubalagaze ne bukukwata nga omukazi alumwa okuzaala. 
33_4_10_Lumibwa, sindika, ggwe omuwala wa Sayuuni, nga omukazi alukiwa okuzaala; kubanga kaakano oliva mu kibuga, olisiisira ku ttale, era olituuka e Babulooni; eyo gy'orokokera; eyo Mukama gy'aliununulira mu mukono gw'abalabe bo. 
33_4_11_Ne kaakano amawanga magi agakuŋŋaana okulwana naawe, googera nti Ayonooneke, era amaaso affe gatunuulire ebyo bye gaagala ga bituuse ku Sayuuni. 
33_4_12_Naye tebamanyi birowoozo bya Mukama; so tebategeera kuteesa kwe; kubanga bakuŋŋaanyizza ng'ebinywa by'e ttaano ku gguuliro lye. 
33_4_13_Yimuka, owuule, ggwe omuwala wa Sayuuni; kubanga ndifuula ejjembe yo ekyuma, era ndifuula ebinuulo byo ebikomo; naawe olimenyaameya amawanga mangi; era oliwonga magoba gaabwe eri Mukama, n'ebintu byabwe eri Mukama w'ensi zonna. 
33_5_1_Kaakano oneekuŋŋaanya bibiina bibiina, ggwe omuwala w'ebiiiina; atuzingizizza ffe; balikuba iluyi omulamuzi wa Isiraeri n'onuggo. 
33_5_2_Naye ggwe Besirekemu Efuasa, ggwe omuto ekuba mu nkumi za Yuda, mu ggwe mwe muliva gye idi aliba omufuzi mu Isiraeri; okuambulatambula kwe kwa dda na dda, emirembe nga teginnabaawo. 
33_5_3_Kyaliva abawaayo okutuusa ku biro alumwa okuzaala lw'alizaala: kale baganda be abasigalawo balikomawo eri abaana ba Isiraeri. 
33_5_4_Naye aliyimirira aliriisa ekisibo kye mu maanyi ga Mukama, mu bukulu obw'erinnya lya Mukama Katonda we; era balibeerera awo; kubanga mu nnaku ezo anaabanga nukulu okutuusa ku nkomerero z’ensi. 
33_5_5_Era omuntu oyo aliba mirembe gyaffe; Omwasuli bw'aliringira mu nsi y'ewaff'e, bw'alitanbula mu mayumba gaffe, kale tulinuyimusizaako abasumba musanvu, n’abantu munaana ab'ekitiibwa. 
33_5_6_Nabo balyonoona ensi ya Asuli n’ekitala era ensi ya Nimuloodi baligyonoona bwe baliba nga bayiigiramu; naye alitulokola eri Omwasuli bw'alituuka mu nsi y'ewaffe era bw'alitambula mu nsalo z'ewaffe. 
33_5_7_Era ekitundu kya Yakobo kirisigalawo kiriba wakati mu Bantu abangi ng'omusulo oguva eri Mukama, ng'empandaggirize ku muddo; ezitalindirira muntu so n'abaana b'abantu tebazirwisaawo. 
33_5_8_Era aba Yakobo abalisigalawo baliba mu mawanga, wakati w'abantu abangi, ng'empologoma mu nsolo ez'omu kibira, ng'empologoma ento mu bisibo by'endiga; bw'eyitamu, erinnyirira era etaagulataagula so tewali mulokozi. 
33_5_9_Omukono gwo guyimuke ku balabe bo; n'abakukyawa bonna bazikirire. 
33_5_10_Era kiriba ku lunaku luli, bw'ayogera Mukama, ndikuggyamu wakati embalaasi zo; era ndizikiriza amagaali go; 
33_5_11_era ndizikiriza ebibuga eby'omu nsi y'ewammwe, ndisuula wansi ebigo byo byonna; 
33_5_12_era ndiggyamu obulogo mu mukono gwo; so toliba na baganga nate; 
33_5_13_era ndikuggyamu wakati ebifaananyi byo ebyole n'empagi zo; so toLisinza nate emirimu egy'engalo zo. 
33_5_14_Era ndisimbula Baasera bo wakati wo; era ndizikiriza ebibuga byo. 
33_5_15_Era ndiwalana eggwanga n'obusungu n'ekiruyi ku mawanga agatawulira. 
33_6_1_Kale muwulire ebyo Mukama by'ayogera; nti Yimuka, yomba mu maaso g'ensozi; obusozi buwulire eddoboozi lyo. 
33_6_2_Muwulire, mmwe ensozi, ennyombo za Mukama, era mmwe emisingi egy'ensi egy'oluberera: kubanga Mukama alina ennyombo n'abantu be, aliwoza ne Isiraeri. 
33_6_3_Mmwe abantu bange, mbakoze ki? nali mbakooyezza naki? munnumirize. 
33_6_4_Kubanga nakuggya mu nsi y'e Misiri ne nkununula mu nnyumba ey'obuddu; ne nkukulembeza Musa ne Alooni ne Miryamu. 
33_6_5_Mmwe abantu bange, mujjukire nno Balaki kabaka wa Mowaabu bye yateesa, era Balamu omwana wa Byoli bye yamuddamu; mujjukire ebyabaawo okuva e Sittimu okutuuka e Girugaali, mulyoke mumanye ebikolwa eby'obutuukirivu ebya Mukama. 
33_6_6_Najja naki eri Mukama ne nvuuvama mu maaso ga Katonda asinga byonna? mmusemberere n'ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa, n'ennyana ezaakamaze omwaka gumu? 
33_6_7_Mukama alisiima endiga eza seddume enkumi oba emigga egy'amafuta obukumi? mpeeyo omwana wange omubereberye olw'okwonoona kwange, mpeeyo ekibala ky'omubiri gwange olw'ekibi eky'omu mmeeme yange 
33_6_8_Akubuulidde, ggwe omuntu, ekirungi bwe kiri; era Mukama akusalira kiki, wabula okukola eby'ensonga, era okwagala ekisa, era okutambula n'obuwombeefu ne Katonda wo? 
33_6_9_Eddoboozi lya Mukama lyogerera waggulu eri ekibuga, n'ow'amagezi aliraba erinnya lyo; muwulire omuggo, n'oyo bw'ali agulagidde. 
33_6_10_Ebintu eby'omuwendo eby'obubi bikyali mu nnyumba y'omubi, n'ekigera ekitatuuka eky'omuzizo? 
33_6_11_Ndiba mulongoofu bwe mba ne minzaani ey'obubi n'ensawo erimu ebipima eby'obulimba? 
33_6_12_Kubanga abagagga baakyo bajjudde ekyejo, n'abo ababeera mu kyo boogedde eby'obulimba, n'olulimi lwabwe lwa bulimba mu kamwa kaabwe: 
33_6_13_Nange kyenvudde nkufumita ekiwundu ekinene; nkuzisizza olw'ebibi byo. 
33_6_14_Olirya, so tolikkuta; era okutoowazibwa kwo kuliba wakati wo; era olijjulula, naye tolitwala mirembe; era ky'otwala ndikiwaayo eri ekitala. 
33_6_15_Olisiga, naye tolikungula; olirinnyirira zeyituuni, naye tolisaaba mafuta; era olisogola, naye tolinywa ku mwenge. 
33_6_16_Kubanga ebyalagirwa Omuli bikuumibwa, era ebikolwa byonna eby'omu nnyumba ya Akabu; nammwe mutambulira mu kuteesa kwabwe; ndyoke nkufnule ekifulukwa, n'abo ababeera mu kyo eky'okuduulirwa; nammwe mulitwala ebivume by'abantu bange. 
33_7_1_Zinsanze! kubanga nfaanana nga lwe bamala okulonda emmere yonna ennungi, ng'ezabbibu ezeerebwa mu lusuku; tewakyali kirimba eky'okulya; emmeeme yange yeegomba ettiini esooka okwengera. 
33_7_2_Omwegendereza abuze mu nsi, so tewali mugolokofu mu bantu: bonna bateega okuyiwa omusaayi, bayigga buli muntu muganda we n'ekitimba. 
33_7_3_Engalo zaabwe zikwata ku by'obubi okunyiikira okubikola; omulangira asaba, omulamuzi ayagala okuweebwa empeera; n'omukulu ayogera ekibi ekibeera mu mmeeme ye: bwe batyo bwe babirukira awamu. 
33_7_4_Oyo ku abo asinga obulungi afaanana ng'omweramannyo, omugolokofu ku abo asinga obubi olukomera lw'amaggwa: olunaku olw'abakuumi bo, lwe lw'okulabwako, lutuuse: kaakano we wanaaba okweraliikirira kwabwe. 
33_7_5_Temwesiga wa mukwano, temulowoozanga mukulembeze nga mwesigwa; kuuma enzigi z'akamwa ko eri oyo agalamira mu kifuba kyo. 
33_7_6_Kubanga omwana tassaamu kitiibwa kitaawe, omuwala akikinalira ku nnyina, muka mwana ku nnyazaala we; ab'omu nju be baba abalabe b'omuntu. 
33_7_7_Naye ku bwange naatunuuliranga Mukama; naalindiriranga Katonda ow'obulokozi bwange; Katonda wange anampuliranga. 
33_7_8_Tonsanyukirako, omulabe wange; bwe ngwa, naayimuka; bwe ntuula mu kizikiza, Mukama anaaba musana gye ndi. 
33_7_9_Naagumiikirizanga obusungu bwa Mukama kubanga mmujeemedde; okutuusa lw'aliwoza ensonga yange, era lw'alinsalira omusango: alindeeta eri omusana, era ndiraba ku butuukirivu bwe. 
33_7_10_Kale omulabe wange alikiraba, alikwatibwa ensonyi; eyantlamba nti Mukama Katonda wo ali ludda wa? Amaaso gange galimulabako; kaakano alirinnyirirwa ng'ebitosi eby'omu nguudo. 
33_7_11_Olunaku olw'okuzimba ebisenge byo! ku lunaku luli ekiragiro kiritwalibwa ewala. 
33_7_12_Ku lunaku luli baliva mu Bwasuli ne mu bibuga bya Misiri balituuka gy'oli, era baliva mu Misiri okutuuka ne ku Mugga, n'okuva ku nnyanja okutuuka ku nnyanja, n'okuva ku lusozi okutuuka ku lusozi. 
33_7_13_Naye ensi eriba kifulukwa, ku lw'abo ababeera omwo, olw'ebibala eby'ebikolwa byabwe. 
33_7_14_Liisa abantu bo n'omuggo gwo, ekisibo eky'obutaka bwo, ababeera bokka, mu kibira wakati wa Kalumeeri: baliire mu Basani ne mu Gireyaadi nga mu nnaku ez'edda. 
33_7_15_Nga bwe nnakola mu nnaku bwe wava mu nsi ya Misiri, ndimwolesa eby'ekitalo. 
33_7_16_Amawanga galiraba, galikwatirwa ensonyi amaanyi gaabwe gonna; baliteeka engalo zaabwe ku kamwa kaabwe, amatu gaabwe galiziba. 
33_7_17_Balikomba ku nfuufu ng'omusota; ng'ebyekulula eby'ensi baliva nga bakankana mu bwekwekero bwabwe: balijja eri Mukama Katonda waffe nga batekemuka era balitya ku lulwo. 
33_7_18_Ani Katonda nga ggwe asonyiwa obubi, ayita ku kwonoona okw'abasigalawo ab'obutaka bwe? talemera mu busungu bwe emirembe gyonna kubanga asanyukira okusaasira. 
33_7_19_Alikyuka alirusaasira; alisamba okwonoona kwaffe n'ekigere; era olisuula ebibi byabwe byonna mu buziba bw'ennyanja. 
33_7_20_Olikolera Yakobo amazima, olikolera Ibulayimu ekisa, bye walayirira bajjajjaffe okuva mu nnaku ez'edda. 
34_1_1_Omugugu gwa Nineeve. Ekitabo eky'okwolesebwa kwa Nakkumu, Omwerukoosi. 
34_1_2_Mukama ye Katonda w'obuggya, era awalana eggwanga; Mukama awalana eggwanga, era ow'obusungu obungi; Mukama awalana eggwanga abamukyawa, era aterekera abalabe be obusungu. 
34_1_3_Mukama tatera kusunguwala, alina amaanyi mangi, so talitaatira n'akatono. Ekkubo lya Mukama liyita mu kikuŋŋunta ne mu kibuyaga, era ebire ze nfuufu z'ebigere bye. 
34_1_4_Akangavvula ennyanja n'agikaza; era akaza emigga gyonna; Basani ebabuse ne Kalumeeri, era ekimuli eky'oku Lebanooni kibabuse. 
34_1_5_Ensozi zikankana gy'ali, obusozi ne busaanuuka; era ettaka ne limmuka mu maaso ge; weewaawo, ensi zonna ne bonna abazibeeramu. 
34_1_6_Mu maaso g'obusungu bwe ani ayinza okuyimirira? ani ayinza okubeerawo obusungu bwe nga bunyiikidde? obukambwe bwe bufukibwa ng'omuliro, n'enjazi zimenyebwamenyebwa ye. 
34_1_7_Mukama mulungi, kigo ku lunaku olw'okulabiramu ennaku; era amanyi abo abamwesiga. 
34_1_8_Naye ne mukoka akulukuta alimalirawo ddala ekifo kyakyo, era abalabe be alibagobera mu kizikiza. 
34_1_9_Kye muteesa ku Mukama kiki? alimalirawo ddala; obunaku tebuliyimuka omulundi ogw'okubiri. 
34_1_10_Kubanga newakubadde nga bali ng'amaggwa agakwataganye, era nga batobye kwenkana mu kunywa kwabwe, balyokerwa ddala ng'ensambu enkalu. 
34_1_11_Mu ggwe muwdde omu alowooza akabi ku Mukama, ateesa ebibi. 
34_1_12_Bw'ati bw'ayogera Mukama nti Newakubadde nga balina amaanyi amakakafu era bangi, era balizikirira, naye alivaawo. Newakubadde nga nakulabisa ennaku, sikyakulabisanga nnaku. 
34_1_13_Era kaakano naamenya ekikoligo kye kive ku ggwe, era naakutulakutula ebikusiba. 
34_1_14_Ne Mukama alagidde ku ggwe baleme okweyongera okusiga ku linnya lyo; ndizikiriza ekifaananyi ekyole n'ekifaananyi ekisaanuuse bive mu nnyumba ya bakatonda bo; ndisima entaana yo; kubanga oli mugwagwa. 
34_1_15_Laba, ku nsozi ebigere by'oyo abuulirira ebigambo ebirungi, alangira emirembe! Weekuuma embaga zo, ggwe Yuda, tuukiriza obweyamo bwo; kubanga omubi takyayitanga wakati wo; azikirira ddala. 
34_2_1_Oyo atandaggira ayambuse mu maaso go; kuuma ekigo, tunuulira ekkubo, nyweza ekiwato kyo, beera n'amaanyi agatasingika. 
34_2_2_Kubanga Mukama azzaawo ekitiibwa ekingi ekya Yakobo, ng'ekitiibwa ekingi ekya Isiraeri; kubanga abattuluzi babattuludde ne baaya amatabi g'emizabbibu gyabwe. 
34_2_3_Engazo z'abazira be zisiigibwako gerenge; abantu ab'amaanyi bambadde engoye entwakaaw; ebyuma by'amagaali bimasamasa ku lunaku lw'ateekateeka, era amafumu gagalulwa n'entiisa. 
34_2_4_Amagaali gatayira mu nguudo mbiro, ganyigana mu nguudo engazi; gafaanana ng'emimuli, gabuukabuuka ng'emyansa. 
34_2_5_Ajjukira ab'ekitiibwa ababe; beesittala nga bagenda; banguwa okutuuka ku bbugwe ow'ekigo, ogugabo ne guteekebwateekebwa. 
34_2_6_Enzigi ez'oku migga zigguddwawo, ennyumba ya kabaka ne bagisaanyaawo. 
34_2_7_Kuzzabu n'avumbuka, n'atwalibwa, abazaana be ne bakaaba nga n'eddoboozi ly'amayiba nga bakuba mu bifuba byabwe. 
34_2_8_Naye Nineeve kibaddewo okuva mu nnaku ez'edda ng'ekidiba ky'amazzi; naye badduka; Muyimirire, muyimirire, bwe bakoowoola; naye tewali atunuulira ennyuma.
