44_14_1_Awo olwatuuka mu Ikonio ne bayingirira wamumukkuŋŋaaniro ly'Abayudaaya, ne boogera bwe batyo ekibiina kinene n'okukkiriza ne bakkiriza, Abayudaaya n'Abayonaani. 
44_14_2_Naye Abayudaaya abataagonda ne baweerera ab'amawanga ne bafuula emmeeme zaabwe okuba embi eri ab'oluganda. 
44_14_3_Awo ne bamala ebiro bingi nga babuulira n'obuvumu mu Mukama waffe, eyategeeza ekigambo eky'ekisa kye, ng'abawa obubonero n'eby'amagero okukolebwanga mu mikono gyabwe. 
44_14_4_Naye ekibiina eky'omu kibuga ne kyawukanamu; abamu ne babeera ku ludda lw'Abayudaaya abamu ku ludda lw'abatume. 
44_14_5_Ab'amawanga n'Abayudaaya awamu n'abakulu baabwe bwe baabalumba okubagirira ekyejo, okubakuba amayinja, 
44_14_6_bwe baategeera ne baddukira mu bibuga eby'e Lukaoniya, Lusitula ne Derube n'ensi eriraanyeewo: 
44_14_7_ne babeera eyo nga babuulira enjiri. 
44_14_8_Mu Lusitula yaliyo omlmtu nga talina maanyi mu bigere n'abeeranga awo, mulema okuva mu lubuto lwa nnyina nga tatambulangako n'akatono. 
44_14_9_Oyo n'awulira Pawulo ng'ayogera: naye n'amwekaliriza amaaso n'alaba ng'alina okukkiriza okulokoka, 
44_14_10_n'ayogera n'eddoboozi ddene nti Yimirira ku bigere byo, weegolole. N'abuuka n'atambula. 
44_14_11_Ebibiina bwe baalaba Pawulo ky'akoze, ne bayimusa amaloboozi gaabwe, nga boogera mu lulimi Olulukaoniya nti Bakatonda basse gye tuli nga bafaanana abantu. 
44_14_12_Balunabba ne bamuyita Zewu; ne Pawulo ne bamuyita Kerume, kubaaga ye yasinga okwogera. 
44_14_13_Kabona wa Zewu, eyali mu maaso g'ekibuga, n'aleeta ente n'engule ez'ebimuli okutuuka ku luggi ng'ayagala okuwaayo ssaddaaka n'ebibiina. 
44_14_14_Naye abatume Balunabba ne Pawulo bwe baawulira, ne bayuza engoye zaabwe ne bafubutuka ne bagenda mu kibiina, nga boogerera waggulu 
44_14_15_nga bagamba nti Abasajja, kiki ekibakoza ebyo? Naffe tuli bantu abakwatibwa byonna nga mmwe, era tubabuulira ebigambo ebirungi muleke ebyo ebitaliimu mukyukire Katonda omulamu, eyakola eggulu n'ensi n'ennyanja n'ebintu byonna ebirimu: 
44_14_16_mu mirembe egyayita yaleka amawanga gonna okutambuliranga mu makubo gaago: 
44_14_17_naye teyeemalaayo nga talina mujulirwa, kubanga yakolanga bulungi, ng'abatonnyesezanga enkuba okuva mu ggulu n’abiro eby'okubalirangamu emmere, ng'ajjuzanga emitima gyammwe emmere n'essanyu. 
44_14_18_Bwe baayogera ebyo, ne baziyiza ebibiina lwa mpaka okubawa ssaddaaka. 
44_14_19_Naye Abayudaaya ne bava mu Antiyokiya ne Ikonio, ne baweerera ebibiina ne bakuba amayinja Pawulo, ne bamuwalulira ebweru w'ekibuga, nga balowooza nti afudde. 
44_14_20_Naye abayigirizwa bwe baamwetoolola n'ayimirira n'ayingira mu kibuga: ku lutlaku olw'okubiri n'agenda ne Balunabba okutuuka e Derube. 
44_14_21_Bwe baamala okubuulira enjiri mu kibuga ekyo n'okufuula abayigirizwa abangi, ne bakomawo mu Lusitula ne Ikonio ne Antiyokiya, 
44_14_22_nga banyweza emmeeme z'abayigirizwa, nga bababuulirira okunyiikiriranga mu kukkiriza, era nti olw'okulaba ennaku ennyingi kitugwanidde okuyingira mu bwakabaka bwa Katonda. 
44_14_23_Bwe baamala okulondera abakadde mu buli kkanisa n'okusaba n'okusiiba, ne babasigira Mukama waffe gwe bakkiriza. 
44_14_24_Ne bayita mu Pisidiya ne batuuka e Panfuliya. 
44_14_25_Bwe baamala okubuulira ekigambo mu Peruga ne baserengeta mu Ataliya; 
44_14_26_ne bavaayo ne bawanika amatanga okuruuka e Antiyokiya; abaayo be baabasigira ekisa kya Katonda olw'omulimu gwe baatuukiriza. 
44_14_27_Bwe baatuuka ne bakuŋŋaanya ekkanisa, ne bababuulira byonna Katonda bye yakoleranga awamu nabo, era nti yaggulirawo ab'amawanga oluggi olw'okukkiriza. 
44_14_28_Ne bamalayo ebiro bingi wamu n'abayigirizwa. 
44_15_1_Awo abantu ne bava e Buyudaaya ne bayigiriza ab'oluganda nti Bwe mutaakomolebwenga ng'empisa ya Musa bw'eri, temuyinza kulokoka. 
44_15_2_Bwe waali empaka enayingi n'okwawukana kw'endowooza wakati wa Pawulo ne Balunabba, ku luuyi olumu, n'abo abaava e Buyudaaya, ne balagira Pawulo ne Balunabba n'abalala ku bo okugenda e Yerusaalemi eri abatume n'abakadde olw'empaka ezo. 
44_15_3_Awo abo bwe baamala okusibirirwa ab'ekkanisa ne bayita mu Foyiniiki ne Samaliya, nga bannyonnyolera ddala okukyuka kw'ab'amawanga: ne basanyusiza ddala ab'oluganda bonna. 
44_15_4_Bwe baatuuka e Yerusaalemi, ab'ekkanisa n'abatume n'abakadde ne babasembeza, ne babuulira byonna Katonda bye yakoleranga awamu nabo. 
44_15_5_Naye ne bagolokoka abamu ab'omu kitundu ky'Abafalisaayo abakkiriza, nga bagamba nti Kigwana okubakomolanga n'okubalagira okukwatanga amateeka ga Musa. 
44_15_6_Abatume n'abakadde ne bakuŋŋaana okwetegereza ekigambo ekyo. 
44_15_7_Bwe waali okwawukaila kw'endowooza kungi, Peetero n'ayimirira n'abagamba nti Abasajja ab'oluganda, mmwe mumanyi nti okuva mu nnaku ez'edda Katonda yalonda mu mmwe ab'amawanga bawulire mu kamwa kange ekigambo eky'enjiri ne bakkiriza. 
44_15_8_Ne Katonda amanyi emitima n'abategeeza bwe yabawa Omwoyo Omutukuvu era nga ffe 
44_15_10_Kale kaakano mukemera ki Katonda, okuteeka ekikoligo mu bulago bw'abayigirizwa bajjajjaffe kye bataayinza kutwala newakubadde ffe? 
44_15_11_Naye tukkiriza okulokolebwa lwa kisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu, era nabo bwe batyo. 
44_15_12_Ekibiina kyonna ne kisirika; ne bawulira Balunabba ne Pawulo nga bannyonnyola obubonero n'eby'amagero byonna Katonda bye yabakozanga mu mawanga. 
44_15_13_Abo bwe baamala okusirika Yakobo n'addamu ng'agamba nti Abasajja ab'oluganda, mumpulire. 
44_15_14_Simyoni annyonnyodde Katonda bwe yasooka okutunuulira amawanga okuggiramu erinnya lye abantu. 
44_15_15_Ebigambo bya bannabbi bitabagana n'ebyo nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti 
44_15_16_Oluvannyuma lw'ebyo ndikyuka, Ndizimba nate eweema ya Dawudi eyagwa; Okumenyeka kwayo ndikuzimba nate, Era ndigigolokosa: 
44_15_17_Abantu abasigalawo banoonye Mukama, N'amawanga gonna abayitibwa erinnya lyange ku bo, 
44_15_18_Bw'ayogera Mukama, ategeeza ebyo byonna okuva ku lubereberye lw'ensi. 
44_15_19_Kyenva nsalawo tuleme okuteganya abava mu mawanga okukyukira Katonda; 
44_15_20_naye tubawandiikire beewalenga obugwagwa bw'ebifaananyi, n'obweazi, n'ebitugiddwa, n'omusaayi. 
44_15_21_Kubanga okuva edda Musa alina mu buli kibuga abamubuulira, ng'asomebwa mu makuŋŋaaniro buli ssabbiiti. 
44_15_22_Awo ne bakisiima abatume n'abakadde wamu n'ekkanisa yonna okulonda abantu mu bo n'okubatuma e Antiyokiya ne Pawulo ne Balunabba; Yuda ayitibwa Balusaba ne Siira, abantu abakulu mu b'oluganda: 
44_15_23_ne bawandiika ne bagikwasa mu mikono gyabwe nti Abatume n'ab'oluganda abakadde tulamusizza ab'oluganda abali mu Antiyokiya ne Busuuli ne Kirukiya abali mu mawanga: 
44_15_24_kubanga tuwulidde nti abantu abaava ewaffe baabasasamaza n'ebigambo nga bakyusa emmeeme zammwe, be tutalagiranga; 
44_15_25_tusiimye, bwe tutabaganye n'omwoyo gumu, okulonda abantu okubatuma gye muli wamu n'abaagalwa baffe Balunabba ne Pawulo, 
44_15_26_abantu abaasingawo obulamu bwabwe olw'erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
44_15_27_Kyetuvudde tutuma Yuda ne Siira era abalibabuulira obumu bennyini n'akamwa. 
44_15_28_Kubanga Omwoyo Omutukuvu yasiima naffe tuleme okubatikka omugugu omunene gwonna wabula bino ebigwana, 
44_15_29_okwewalanga ebiweebwa eri ebifaananyi, n'omusaayi, n'ebitugiddwa, n'obwenzi: bwe muneekuumanga ebyo, munaabanga bulungi. Mweraba. 
44_15_30_Awo ho, bwe baasindikibwa ne bajja e Antiyokiya, ne bakuŋŋaanya ekibiina ne babakwasa ebbaluwa. 
44_15_31_Bwe baasoma ne basanyuka olw'okubuulirirwa okwo. 
44_15_32_Yuda ne Siira, kubanga nabo baali bannabbi, ne babuulirira ab'oluganda mu bigambo bingi, ne babagumya. 
44_15_33_Bwe baamalayo ebiro, ne basiibulwa ab'oluganda n'emirembe okuddayo eri abaabatuma. 
44_15_34_Naye Siira yasiima okusigalayo. 
44_15_35_Naye Pawulo ne Balunabba ne balwayo mu Antiyokiya nga bayigirizanga era nga babuuliranga ekigambo kya Mukama waffe wamu n'abalala bangi era. 
44_15_36_Ennaku bwe zaayitawo Pawulo n'agamba Balunabba nti Kale tuddeyo tulambule ab'oluganda mu buli kibuga gye twabuulira ekigambo kya Mukama waffe, tulabe nga bwe bali. 
44_15_37_Balunabba era n’ayagala okutwala Yokaana erinaya: lye ery'okubiri Makko: 
44_15_38_naye Pawulo teyasiima kumutwala oyo eyabaleka mu Panfuliya n'atagenda nabo ku mulimu. 
44_15_39_Ne wabaawo empaka nnyingi n'okwawukana ne baawukana, Balunabba n'atwala Makko n'awanika amatanga okugenda e Kupulo; 
44_15_40_naye Pawulo n'alonda Siira, n'avaayo, ab'oluganda bwe baamusigira ekisa kya Mukama waffe. 
44_15_41_N'ayita mu Busuuli ne Kirukiya ng'agumya ekkanisa. 
44_16_1_Era n'atuuka e Derube ne Lusitula: laba, yaliyo omuyigirizwa erinnya lye Timoseewo, omwana w'umukuzi Omuyudaaya eyakkiriza: naye kitaawe 
44_16_2_eyasiimibwa ab'oluganda abaali mu Lusitula ne Ikonio. 
44_16_3_Oyo Pawulo n'ayagala okugenda naye; n'amutwala n'amukomola olw'Abayudaaya abaali mu bifo ebyo: kubanga bonna baamumanya nga kitaawe yali Muyonaani 
44_16_4_Bwe baali nga bayita mu bibuga ne babawa okukwatanga ebyalagirwa abatume n'abakadde abaali mu Yerusaalemi. 
44_16_5_Awo ekkanisa ne zinywerera mu kukkiriza, ne zeeyongeranga ku muwendo buli lunaku. 
44_16_6_Ne bayita mu nsi y'e Fulugiya ne Ggalatiya, kubanga baagaanibwa Omwoyo Omutukuvu okwogera ekigambo mu Asiya 
44_16_9_Pawulo n'alaba okwolesebwa ekiro, omuntu Omumakedoni ng'ayimiridde era ng'amwegayirira ng'agamba nti Wunguka okutuuka e Makedoni otuyambe. 
44_16_10_Bwe yamala okulaba okwolesebwa, amangu ago ne tusala amagezi okusitula okugenda e Makedoni, nga tutegeera nti Katonda atuyise okubabuulira enjiri. 
44_16_11_Kyetwava tusaabala okuva e Tulowa ne tukwata ekkubo eggolokofu okuruuka e Samoserakiya, ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne tutuuka e Neyapoli; 
44_16_12_ne tuvaayo okutuuka e Firipi, kye kibuga eky'e Makedoni elusookerwako mu njuyi ezo, ekyazimbibwa Abaruumi: ne tubeera mu kibuga omwo ne tulwamu ennaku. 
44_16_13_Awo ku lunaku lwa ssabbiiti ne tufuluma mu mulyango gw'ekibuga okugenda ku mugga bwe twalowooza nga yaliyo ekifo eky'okusabirangamu: ne tutuula ne twogera n'abakazi abaakuŋŋaana. 
44_16_14_Awo omukazi erinnya lye Ludiya, omutunzi w'engoye ez'effulungu, wa mu kibuga Suwatira, eyasinzaaga Katonda, n’atuwulira: Mukama waffe n'amubikkula omutima gwe okuwuliriza Pawulo bye yayogera. 
44_16_15_muyingire mu nnyumba yange mubeere omwo. N'atuwaliriza. 
44_16_16_Awo olwatuuka bwe twali tugenda wali awaasabirwanga, omuwala eyaliko dayimooni alagula n'atusanga, eyafuniranga bakama be ebintu ebingi olw'okulagula. 
44_16_17_Oyo bwe yagoberera Pawulo naffe n'ayogerera waggulu ng'agamba nti Abantu bano baddu ba Katonda Ali waggulu ennyo, abababuulira ekkubo ery'obulokozi. 
44_16_18_N'akolanga bw'atyo ennaku nnyingi. Naye Pawulo, bwe yanakuwala ennyo, n'akyuka n'agamba dayimooni nti Nkulagira mu linnya lya Yesu Kristo omuveeko. N'amuvaako mu kiseera ekyo. 
44_16_19_Naye bakama be bwe baalaba ng'essuubi ly'ebintu byabwe liweddewo, ne bakwata Pawulo ne Siira ne babawalula okubatwala mu katale eri abakulu, 
44_16_20_ne babatwala eri abalamuzi ne bagamba nti Abantu bano basasamaza nnyo ekibuga kyaffe, kubanga Bayudaaya 
44_16_21_era bayigiriza empisa ez'omuzizo ffe okuzikwatanga newakubadde okuzikolanga kubanga tuli Baruumi. 
44_16_22_Ekibiina ne kibagolokokerako wamu: abalamuzi ne babayuliza engoye zaabwe, ne balagira okubakuba emiggo. 
44_16_23_Bwe baabakuba emiggo emingi ne babasindikira mu kkomera, ne balagira omukuumi okubakuuma ennyo: 
44_16_24_oyo bwe yalagirwa bw'atyo n'abasindiikiriza mu kkomera ery'omunda, n'akomerera ebigere byabwe mu nvuba. 
44_16_25_Naye ekiro mu ttumbi Pawulo ne Siira ne basaba ne bayimbira Katonda, abasibe ne babawulira; 
44_16_26_amangu ago ne wabaawo ekikankano kinene n'emisingi gy'ekkomera ne gikankana: amangu ago enzigi zonna ne zigguka; n'ebyali bibasibye bonna ne bisumulukuka. 
44_16_27_Omukuumi w'ekkomera n'azuukuka, bwe yalaba enzigi z'ekkomera nga zigguse n'asowola ekitala kye n'agenda okwetta, kubanga ng'alowooza nti abasibe babombye. 
44_16_28_Naye Pawulo n'ayogerera waggulu n'eddoboozi ddene ng'agamba nti Teweekola kabi: kubanga fenna tuli wano. 
44_16_29_N'asaba ettabaaza n'addukana n'ayingira, n'avuunamira Pawulo ne Siira, ng'akankana, 
44_16_30_N'asaba ettabaaza n'addukana n'ayingira, n'avuunamira Pawulo ne Siira, ng'akankana, 
44_16_31_Ne bagamba nti Kkiriza Mukama waffe Yesu, onoolokoka ggwe n'ennyumba yo. 
44_16_32_Ne bamubuulira ekigambo kya Mukama waffe ne bonna abaali mu nnyumba ye. 
44_16_33_Nabatwala mu kiseera ekyo ekiro n'abanaaza emiggo; n'abatizibwa ye n'ennyumba ye yonna amangu ago. 
44_16_34_N'abalintayisa mu nnyumba ye, n'abaleetera emmeeza, n'asanyuka nnyo n'ennyumba ye yonna ng'akkirizza Katonda. 
44_16_35_Naye bwe bwakya enkya, abalamuzi ne batuma basserikale baabwe nga bagamba nti Musumulule abantu abo. 
44_16_36_Omukuumi w'ekkomera n'abuulira Pawulo ebigambo ebyo nti Abalamuzi batumye okubasumulula: kale kaakano mufulume, mugende n'emirembe. 
44_16_37_Naye Pawulo n'abagamba nti Batukubidde mu maaso ga bantu nga tetunnasalirwa musango, nga tuli Bantu Baruumi ne batusindiikiriza mu kkomera; ne kaakano batuggyamu kyama? Nedda; naye bajje bennyini batufulumye. 
44_16_38_Basserikale ne babuulira abalamuzi ebigambo bino: ne batya bwe baawulira nga Baruumi: 
44_16_39_ne bajja ne babeegayirira, ne babafulumya, ne baagala bave mu kibuga. 
44_16_40_Ne bafuhuna mu kkomera, ne bayingira mu nnyumba ya Ludiya, ne balaba ab'oluganda ne babasanyusa ne bavaayo. 
44_17_1_Ne Bayita mu Anfipoli ne Apolooniya ne batuuka e Ssessaloniika eyali ekkuŋŋaaniro ly'Abayudaaya: 
44_17_2_awo Pawulo nga bwe yali empisa ye n'ayingira mubo, mu ssabbiiti ssatu n'awakana nabo mu byawandiilubwa, 
44_17_3_ng'abikkula ng'ategeeza nti Kristo kya mugwanira okubonyaabonyezehwa n'okuzuukira mu bafu; era nti Oyo Yesu nze gwe mbabuulira ye Kristo. 
44_17_4_Abamu ku bo ne bakkirira ne beegatta ne Pawulo ne Siira; n'Abayonaani abeegendereza ekibiina kinene n'abakyala abakulu si batono. 
44_17_5_Naye Abayudaaya bwe baakwatibwa obuggya ne batwala abantu ababi ab'omu bakopi ne bakuŋŋaanyisa ahantu ne basasamaza ekibuga. Ne bazingiza ennyumba ya Yasooni ne baagala okubaleeta mu maaso g'abantu. 
44_17_6_Bwe bataabalaba, ne bawalula Yasooni n'ab'oluganda abamu okubatwala mu maaso g'abakulu ab'omu kibuga nga boogerera waggulu nti Bano abavuunika ensi bazze ne wano 
44_17_8_Ne basasamaza ekibiina'n'abakulu ab'omu kibuga bwe baawulira ebyo. 
44_17_9_Bwe baamala okweyimiriza Yasooni n'abalaIa, ne babata. 
44_17_10_Amangu ago ab'oluganda ne basindika ekiro Pawulo ne Siira okugenda e Beroya: nabo bwe baatuuka eyo ne bayingira mu kkuŋŋaaniro ly'Abayudaaya. 
44_17_11_Naye bano baali balungi okusinga ab'e Ssessaloniika, kubanga bakkiriza ekigambo n'omwoyo omwangu ennyo, buli lunaku nga banoonya mu byawandiikibwa oba nga ebyo bwe biri bwe bityo. 
44_17_12_Abamu bangi kyebaava bakkiriza, era n'abakazi abakyala Abayonaani n'abasajja si batono. 
44_17_13_Naye Abayudaaya ab'e Ssessaloniika bwe baategeera ng'ekigambo kya Katonda kibuuliddwa Pawulo era mu Beroya, era ne bajjayo ne baweerera ebibiina ne babasasamaza. 
44_17_14_Awo amangu ago ab'oluganda ne basindika Pawulo okugenda okutuuka ku nnyanja: Siira ne Timoseewo ne babeera eyo. 
44_17_15_Naye abaawerekera Pawulo ne bamuleeta mu Asene, ne balagirwa okugamba Siira ne Timoseewo bajje gy'ali amangu nga bwe bayinza, ne bagenda. 
44_17_16_Naye Pawulo bwe yali mu Asene ng'abalindirira, omwoyo gwe ne gumuluma bwe yalaba ekibuga nga kijjudde ebifaananyi. 
44_17_17_Awo n'awakaniranga mu kkuŋŋaaniro n'Abayudaaya n'abaali batya Katonda era ne mu katale buli lunaku n'abo abaamusisinkananga. 
44_17_18_Awo abantu abamu abafirosoofo, aba Epikuliyo ne Abasutoyiiko, ne bamusisinkana. Abamu ne bagamba nti Ayagala kwogera ki abujjabujjana ono? Abamu ne bagamba nti Afaanana ng'abuulira balubaale abaggya: kubanga yali ng'abuulira Yesu n'okuzuukira. 
44_17_19_Ne bamuItwala ne bamuleeta ku Aleyopaago nga bagamba nti Tunaayinza okutegeera okuyigiriza kuno okuggya kw'oyogera nga bwe kuli? 
44_17_20_Kubanga oleeta ebigambo ebiggya mu matu gaffe: kyetuva twagala okuteIgeera amakulu g'ebigambo bino. 
44_17_21_(Abaasene bonna n'abagenyi abaabangayo tebaakolanga kintu kirala wabula okwogeranga oba kuwuliranga ekigambo ekiggya.) 
44_17_22_Pawulo n'ayimirira wakati wa Aleyopaago n'agamba nti Abasajja Abaasene, mbalabye mu byonna nga mutya nnyo balubaale. 
44_17_23_Kubanga bwe mbadde mpita ne ntunuulira bye musinza, era ne nsanga ekyoto ekiwandiikiddwako nti KYA KATONDA ATATEGEERWA. Kale kye musinza nga temukitegeera nze kye mbabuulira. 
44_17_24_Katonda eyakola ensi n'ebirimu byonna, oyo kubanga ye Mukama w'eggulu n'ensi tabeera mu masabo agakolebwa n'emikono, 
44_17_25_so taweerezebwa mikono gya bantu, ng'eyeetaaga ekintu, kubanga oyo ye abawa bonna obulamu n'okussa omukka ne byonna; 
44_17_26_yakola okuva ku omu buli ggwanga ly'abantu okutuulanga ku nsi enjuyi zonna, bwe yalagira n'ayawulamu ebiro n'ensalo ez'okutuula kwabwe: 
44_17_27_banoonyenga Katonda mpozzi bawammante okumulaba, newakubadde nga tali wala wa buli omu ku ffe: 
44_17_28_kubanga mu oyo tuba balamu, tutambula, tubeerawo; era ng'abamu ab'ewammwe abayiiya bwe bagamba nti Kubanga era tuli zzadde lye. 
44_17_29_Kale bwe tuli ezzadde lya Katonda, tekirugwanira kulowoozanga nti Katonda afaanana zaabu oba ffeeza oba jjinja, ebyolebwa n'obukabakaba n'amagezi g'abantu. 
44_17_30_Kale Katonda ebiro ebyo eby'obutamanya teyabitunuuliranga; naye kaakano alagira abantu bonna abali wonna wonna okwenenya, 
44_17_31_kubanga yateekawo olunaku lw'agenda okusaliramu omusango ogw'ensonga ensi zonna mu muntu gwe yayawulamu, bwe yamala okuwa bonna ekikkirizisa bwe yamuzuukiza mu bafu. 
44_17_32_Naye bwe baawulira okuzuukira kw'abafu abamu ne basekerera; abalala ne bagamba nti Era tulikuwulira nate olw'ekigambo ekyo. 
44_17_33_Bwe batyo Pawulo n'abavaamu wakati. 
44_17_34_Naye abasajja abamu ne beegatta naye ne bakkiriza: muabo Diyonusiyo Omwaleyopaagoddewo, n'omukazi erinnya lye Damali, n’abalala wamu nabo. 
44_18_1_Awo oluvannyuma lw'ebyo n'ava mu Asene n'atuuka e Kkolinso. 
44_18_2_N'alaba omuntu Omuyudaaya erinnya lye Akula, eyazaalirwa mu Ponto, yali kyajje ave mu Italiya, ne mukazi we Pulisikira, kubanga Kulwawudiyo: yali alagidde Abayudaaya bonna okuva mu Ruumi: n'ajja gye baali 
44_18_3_era kubanga baalina omulimu gumu n'abeeranga nabo ne bakolanga omulimu; kubanga omulimu gwabwe baali bakozi ba weema. 
44_18_4_N'awakaniranga mu kkuŋŋaaniro bulissabbiiti, n'asendasendanga Abayudaaya n'Abayonaani. 
44_18_5_Naye Siira ne Timoseewo bwe baava e Makedoni, Pawulo n'awalirizibwa ekigambo, ng'ategeeza Abayudaaya nga Yesu ye Kristo. 
44_18_6_Bwe baamutangira ne bamuvuma, n’akunkumula engoye ze n'abagamba nti Omusaayi gwammwe gubeere ku mitwe gyammwe: nze ndi mulongoofu: okutanula kaakano nnaagenda eri ab'amawanga. 
44_18_7_N'avaayo, n'ayingira mu nnyumba y'omuntu erinnya lye Tito Yusito, atya Katonda, ennyumba ye eriraanye ekkuŋŋaniro. 
44_18_8_Era Kulisupo, omukulu w'ekkuŋŋaaniro, n'akkiriza Mukama waffe n'ennyumba ye yonna; n'Abakkolinso bangi bwe baawulira ne bakkiriza ne babatizibwa. 
44_18_9_Mukama waffe n'agamba Pawulo ekiro mu kwolesebwa nti Totya naye yogeranga, tosirikanga, 
44_18_10_kubanga nze ndi wamu naawe; so tewali muntu anaakulumbanga okukukola obubi: kubanga nnina abantu bangi mu kibuga muno. 
44_18_11_N'amalayo mwaka n'emyezi mukaaga ng'ayigirizanga ekigambo kya Katonda mu bo. 
44_18_12_Naye Galiyo bwe yali nga ye wessaza ly'e Akaya, Abayudaaya ne balumba Pawulo n’omwoyo gumu ne bamuleeta awasalirwa emisango, 
44_18_13_nga bagamba nti Ono asendasenda abantu okusinza Katonda ng'amateeka bwe gatalagira. 
44_18_14_Naye Pawulo bwe yali agenda okwasama akamwa ke, Galiyo n'agamba Abayudaaya nti Singa wabaabo okusobya oba kwonoona, okubi, mmwe Abayudaaya, nandibagumiikirizza: 
44_18_15_naye oba nga waliwo okubuuzagana okw'ebigambo: n'amannya n'amateeka agali mu mmwe, ekyo kyammwe: nze saagala kusala musango gw'ebyo. 
44_18_16_N'abagoba awasalirwa emisango. 
44_18_17_Bonna ne bakwata Sossene omukulu w'ekkuŋŋaaniro ne bamukubira awasalirwa emisango. Era Galiyo teyafaayo mu bigambo ebyo. 
44_18_18_Pawulo n'amalayo ennaku nnyingi endala nate, n'asiibula ab'oluganda n'avaayo n'awanika amatanga okugenda e Busuuli, era wamu naye Pulisikira ne Akula; bwe yamala okumwera enviiri mu Kekereya; kubanga yeerayirira. 
44_18_19_Ne batuuka mu Efeso, bali n'abaleka eyo; naye ye yennyini n'ayingira mu kkuŋŋaaniro n'awakana n'Abayudaaya. 
44_18_20_Bwe baamwagala okweyongera okutuula n'atakkiriza; 
44_18_21_naye n'abasiibula n'agamba nti Ndikomawo nate gye muli Katonda ng'ayagadde, n'awanika amatanga n'avaayo mu Efeso. 
44_18_22_N'agoba e Kayisaliya, n'alinnya n'alamusa ab'ekkanisa, n'aserengeta lokutuuka Antiyokiya. 
44_18_23_Bwe yamalayo ebiro si bingi n'avaayo, in'ayitira mu nsi y'e Ggalatiya w’e Fulugiya, ng'ava kumu, ng'agumya abayigirizwa bonna. 
44_18_24_Awo omuntu Omuyudaaya erinnya lye Apolo eyazaalirwa mu Alegezandereya, omuntu eyayigirizibwa, oyo n'atuuka mu Efeso, 
44_18_25_Oyo yali ng'abuliddwa ekkubo ya Mukama waffe, ng'ayaka mu mwoyo n'ayogera n'ayigiriza nnyo ebigambo bya Yesu, ng'amanyi okubatiza kwa Yokaana kwokka: 
44_18_26_oyo n'atanula okwogera n'obugumu mu kkuŋŋaaniro. Naye Pulisikira ne Akula bwe baawulira ne bamutwala gye bali, ne bongera okumutegeereza ddala ekkubo lya Katonda. 
44_18_27_Bwe yayagala okuwunguka okutuuka Akaya, ab'oluganda ne bamugumya ne bawandiikira abayigirizwa okumusembeza: bwe yatuuka n'abayambanga nnyo abakkiriza olw'ekisa: 
44_18_28_kubanga yasinganga Abayudaaya amaanyi amangi mu maaso g'abantu, ng'ategeezanga mu byawandiikibwa nga Yesu ye Kristo. 
44_19_1_Awo olwatuuka Apolo bwe yali e Kkolinso, Pawulo bwe yayitira mu njuyi eziri waggulu n'atuuka mu Efeso n'asanga abayigirizwa abamu: 
44_19_2_n'abagamba nti Mwaweebwa Omwoyo Omutukuvu bwe mwakkiriza? Ne bamugamba nti Nedda, n'okuwulira tetuwuliranga nti waliwo Omwoyo Omutukuvu. 
44_19_3_N'agamba nti Kale mwabatizibwa kuyingira mu ki? Ne bagamba nti Mu kubatizibwa kwa Yokaana. 
44_19_4_Pawulo n'ayogera nti Yokaana yabatiza okubatiza okw'okwenenya, ng'agamba abantu bakkirize agenda okujja ennyuma we, ye Yesu. 
44_19_5_Bwe baawulira ne babatizibwa okuyingira mu linnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu. 
44_19_6_Pawulo bwe yabassaako emikono, Omwoyo Omutukuvu n'ajja ku bo, ne boogera ennimi ne balagula. 
44_19_7_Abantu bonna baali nga kkumi na babiri. 
44_19_8_N'ayingira mu kkuŋŋaaniro n'ayogeranga n'obuvumu okumala emyezi esatu, ng'awakananga era ng'asendasendanga olw'ebigambo eby'obwakabaka bwa Katonda. 
44_19_9_Naye abamu bwe baakakanyala ne batawulira, nga bavumanga Ekkubo mu maaso g'ekibiina, n'ava gye baali, n'ayawula abayigirizwa, ng'awakaniranga buli lunaku mu ssomero lya Tulaano. 
44_19_10_Ebyo ne bimala emyaka ebiri, ne bonna abaali batuula mu Asiya ne bawulira ekigambo kya Mukama waffe, Abayudaaya n'Abayonaani. 
44_19_11_Katonda n'akolanga eby'amagero ebitalabwa buli lunaku mu mikono gya Pawulo, 
44_19_12_n'abalwadde ne baleeterwanga ebiremba n'engoye ez'oku mubiri gwe, endwadde ne zibavangako, dayimooni n'abavangako. 
44_19_13_Naye era abantu Abayudaaya abataliiko waabwe, abagoba dayimooni, ne beetulinkirira okwogera erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu ku abo abalina dayimooni, nga bagamba nti Mbalayiza Yesu Pawulo gw'abuulira. 
44_19_14_Awo waaliwo abaana musanvu aba Sukewa Omuyudaaya kabona omukulu, abaakola bwe batyo. 
44_19_15_Dayimooni n'addamu n'abagamba nti Yesu mmutegeera ne Pawulo mmumanyi; naye mmwe be ani? 
44_19_16_Omuntu eyaliko dayimooni n'ababuukira n'abasinga onna n'abayinza, n'okudduka ne badduka okuva mu nnyumba eri nga bah bwereere nga balina ebiwundu. 
44_19_17_Ekyo ne kitegeerwa bonna Abayudaaya n'Abayonaani abaatuulanga mu Efeso; entiisa n'ebakwata bonna, erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu ne ligulumizibwa. 
44_19_18_Era bangi ku bo abakkiriza ne bajja, ne baatula ne bategeeza ebi kolwa byabwe. 
44_19_19_Era bangi ku bo abaakolanga eby'obufumu ne bakuŋŋaanya ebitabo byabwe, ne babyokera mu maaso gaabwe bonna: ne babala omuwendo gwabyo ne balaba ebitundu bya ffeeza obukumi butaano. 
44_19_20_Bwe kityo ekigambo kya Mukama waffe ne kyeyongeranga mu maanyi ne kiwangula. 
44_19_21_Ebyo bwe byaggwa, Pawulo n'alowooza mu mwoyo okuyitira mu Makedoni ne Akaya, n'okugenda e Yerusaalemi, ng'agamba nti Bwe ndimala okubeera eyo, era kiŋŋwanidde okulaba ne Ruumi. 
44_19_22_N'atuma e Makedoni babiri ku abo abaamuweerezanga, Timoseewo ne Erasuto, ye yennyini n'alwayo ebiro si bingi mu Asiya. 
44_19_23_Mu kiseera ekyo ne wabaawo akacwano si katono olw'Ekkubo. 
44_19_24_Kubanga omuntu erinnya lye Demeteriyo, omuweesi wa ffeeza eyakolanga obusabo obwa ffeeza obwa Atemi n'afuniranga abaweesi amagoba si matono; 
44_19_25_n'akunnaanya abo n'abaakolanga emirimu egyo, n'agamba nti Abasajja, mumanyi nti omulimu ogwo obugagga bwaffe mwe buva; 
44_19_26_mulaba era muwulira nga si mu Efeso mwokka naye nga mu Asiya yonna Pawulo oyo asenzesenze era akyusizza ekibiina kinene, ng'agamba nti Abakolebwa n'emikono si bakatonda. 
44_19_27_Naye si ffe fekka tulabye akabi omulimu gwaffe okunyoomebwanga, era naye n'essabo lya Atemi katonda omukulu omukazi okulowoozebwanga nga si kintu, n'oyo n'okuggibwa n'aggibwa mu kitiibwa kye, asinzibwa Asiya yonna n'ensi zonna. 
44_19_28_Bwe baawulira ne bajjula obusungu ne boogerera waggulu nga bagamba nti Atemi w'Abaefeso mukulu. 
44_19_29_Ekibuga kyonna ne kijjula okwetabula kuno; ne bafubutuka n'omwoyo gumu okutuuka mu teyatero, bwe baamala okukwata Gayo ne Alisutaluuko, ab'e Makedoni, abaatambulanga ne Pawulo. 
44_19_30_Pawulo bwe yayagala okuyingira mu bantu, abayigirizwa ne batamukkiriza. 
44_19_31_Era abakulu abamu aba Asiya, abaali mikwano gye, ne bamutumira nga bamwegayirira aleme okwewaayo mu teyatero. 
44_19_32_Abamu ne boogerera waggulu bulala, n'abalala bulala, kubanga ekibiina kypli kyetabudde, so n'abalala bangi ne batategeera nsonga ebakuŋŋaanyizza. 
44_19_33_Ne baggya Alegezanda mu kibiina, Abayudaaya nga bamusindiikiriza. Alegezanda n'abawenya n'omukono n'ayagala okwennyonnyola eri abantu. 
44_19_34_Naye bwe baamutegeera nga Muyudaaya, bonna ne boogerera waggulu n'eddoboozi limu okumala ng'essaawa bbiri nti Atemi w'Abaefeso mukulu. 
44_19_35_Omuwandiisi bwe yasirisa ekibiina, n'agamba nti Abasajja Abaefeso, muntu ki atategeera ng'ekibuga ky'Abaefeso kye kikuuma essabo lya Atemi omukulu n'ekifaananyi ekyava eri Zewu. 
44_19_36_Kale kubanga ebyo tebyegaanika, kibagwanidde mmwe okukkakkana n'obutakola kintu mu kwanguyiriza. 
44_19_37_Kubanga muleese abantu bano abatanyaze bya mu ssabo so era tebawodde katonda waffe omukazi. 
44_19_38_Kale oba nga Demeteriyo n'abaweesi abali naye balina ekigambo ku muntu, enkiiko weeziri n'abaamasaza weebali: baloopagane. 
44_19_39_Naye oba nga munoonya birala, binaasalirwa mu kkuŋŋaaniro eribaawo bulijjo. 
44_19_40_Kubanga ddala tuyinza okutuukwako akabi olw'akeegugungo kano aka leero, kubanga tewali nsonga gye tuliyinza kuwoza olw'okukuŋŋaana kuno. 
44_19_41_Bwe yayogera bw'atyo n'ayabulula ekibiina. 
44_20_1_Akacwano bwe kamala okukkakkana, Pawulo n'ayita abayigirizwa n'ababuulirira n'abasiibula, n'avaayo okugenda e Makedoni. 
44_20_2_Bwe yayita mu njuyi ziri n'abategeeza ebigambo bingi, n'atuuka e Buyonaani. 
44_20_3_Bwe yamalayo emyezi esatu, era Abayudaaya bwe baamusalira olukwe, bwe yali ng'agenda okuyita mu nnyanja okuddayo mu Makedoni. 
44_20_4_Ne bagenda naye okutuuka mu Asiya Sopateri Omuberoya mutabani wa Puulo; n'Abasessaloniika Alisutaluuko ne Sekuado; ne Gayo Omuderube ne Timoseewo; n'AbasiyaTukiko ne Tulofiimo. 
44_20_5_Bano ne bakulembera ne batulindirira mu Tulowa. 
44_20_6_Ffe ne tuva mu Firipi ne tuwanika amatanga oluvannyuma lw'ennaku ez'emigaati egitazimbu lukuswa, ne tubatuukako mu Tulowa mu nnaku ttaano; gye twamala ennaku omusanvu. 
44_20_7_Awo ku lunaku olw'olubereberye mu ssabbiiti, bwe twakuŋŋaana lokumenya emigaati, Pawulo n'anyumya nabo, ng'ayagala okusitula enkya, n'alwawo mu kwogera okutuusa ettumbi. 
44_20_8_Ne wabaawo ettabaaza nnyingi mu kisenge ekya waggulu, mwe twakutAaanira. 
44_20_9_Omulenzi erinnya lye Yutuko n'atuula mu ddirisa, n'akwatibwa otulo tungi; awo Pawulo bwe yalwawo ng'akyanyumya, ng'akwatiddwa otulo tungi n'ava mu nju ey'okusatu, n'agwa, n'alondebwa ng'afudde. 
44_20_10_Pawulo n'akka n'amugwako n'amuwambaatira n'agamba nti Temukuba biwoobe; obulamu bwe mwebuli munda. 
44_20_11_N'alinnya n'amenya omugaati n'alyako n'alwawo ng'akyanyumya okutuusa enkya, n'alyoka avaayo. 
44_20_12_Ne baleeta omulenzi nga mulamu, ne basanyuka si katono. 
44_20_13_Naye ffe ne tukulembera okutuuka ku kyombo ne tugenda okutuuka e Aso, nga twagala eyo okusiika Pawulo: kubanga yali alagidde bw'atyo, ng'ayagala ye yennyini okuyita ku lukalu. 
44_20_14_Bwe yatusanga mu Aso ne tumusiika, ne tuja e Mituleene. 
44_20_15_Ne tuwanika amatanga okuvaayo ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne tutuuka mu maaso ga Kiyo; ku Iw'okusatu ne tugoba ku Samo; ku lw'okuna ne tutuuka mu Mireeto. 
44_20_16_Kubanga Pawulo yasiima okuyitira mu Efeso mu kyombo, aleme okulwa mu Asiya; kubanga yali ayanguwa, oba nga kiyinzika okubeera mu Yerusaalemi ku lunaku lwa Pentekoote. 
44_20_17_Bwe yali mu Mireeto n'atuma, mu Efeso n'ayita abakadde b'ekkanisa. 
44_20_18_Bwe baatuuka gy'ali n'abagamba nti Mmwe mumanyi okuva ku lunaku olw'olubereberye bwe nnalinnya mu Asiya, bwe nnabanga nammwe mui biro byonna, 
44_20_19_nga mpeereza Mukama waffe n'obuwombeefu bwonna n'amaziga n'okukemebwa kwe nnalaba mu nkwe z'Abayudaaya: 
44_20_20_bwe sseekekanga kubabuulira kigambo kyonna ekisaana, n'okubayigiririzanga mu maaso g'abantu ne mu buli nju, 
44_20_21_nga ntegeeza Abayudaaya era n'Abayonaani okwenenya eri Katoada n'okukkiriza Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
44_20_22_Kaakano, laba, bwe nsibiddwa mu mwoyo, ŋŋenda e Yerusaalemi nga simanyi bye ndiraba eyo, 
44_20_23_wabula nga Omwoyo Omutukuvu antegeeza mu buli kibuga; ng'agamba nti okusibibwa n'okubonyaabonyezebwa binnindiridde. 
44_20_24_Naye obulamu bwange sibulowooza nga kintu, nga bwa muwendo gye ndi, ndyoke ntuukirize olugendo lwange n'okuweereza kwe nnaweebwa Mukama waffe Yesu, okutegeezanga enjiri ey'ekisa kya Katonda. 
44_20_25_Kaakano, laba, nze mmanyi nga temukyandaba maaso gange mmwe mwenna be nnayitangamu nga mbuulira obwakabaka. 
44_20_26_Kyenva mbategeeza leero nti nze ndi mulongoofu olw'omusaayi gwa bonna, 
44_20_27_kubanga sseekekanga kubabuulira kuteesa kwa Katonda kwonna. 
44_20_28_Mwekuumenga mmwe mwekka n'ekisibo kyonna Omwoyo Omutukuvu mwe yabateeka mmwe okuba abalabirizi, okulundanga ekkanisa ya Katonda gye yeegulira n'omusaayi gwe yennyini. 
44_20_29_Nze mmanyi nga bwe ndimala okuvaawo emisege emikambwe giriyingira mu mmwe, tegirisaasira kisibo; 
44_20_30_era mu mmwe mwekka muliva abantu ngaboogera ebigambo ebikyamye, okuwalula abayigirizwa ennyuma waabwe. 
44_20_31_Kale mutunule, mujjukire nga saalekanga kulabula n'amaziga buli muntu mu myaka esatu emisana n'ekiro. 
44_20_32_Era ne kaakano mbasigira Katonda n'ekigambo eky'ekisa kye ekiyinza okuzimba n'okugaba obusika mu abo bonna abatukuzibwa. 
44_20_33_Seegombanga ffeeza ya muntu yenna newakubadde zaabu newakubadde ekyambalo. 
44_20_34_Mmwe mumanyi ng'emikono gino gye gyakolanga bye nneetaaga n'abo abali nange. 
44_20_35_Mbalaze mu byonna bwe kibagwanira okukolanga emirimu bwe mutyo okuyambanga abatalina maanyi, n'okujjukiranga ebigambo bya Mukama waffe Yesu bwe yagamba ye yennyini nti Okugaba kwa mukisa okusinga okutoola. Okugaba kwa mukisa okusinga okutoola. 
44_20_36_Bwe yayogera bw'atyo n'afukamira n'asabira wamu nabo bonna. 
44_20_37_Ne bakaaba nnyo bonna, ne bamugwa mu bulago Pawulo ne bamunywegera, 
44_20_38_nga banakuwala okusinga byonna olw'ekigambo kye yayogera nti tebakyaddayo kumulaba. Ne bamuwerekerako okutuuka ku kyombo. 
44_21_1_Awo olwatuuka bwe twamala okwawukana tlabo ne tuvaayo, ne tukwata ekkubo eggolokofu okutuuka e Koosi, ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne tutuuka e Rodo, ne tuvaayo ne tutuuka e Patala. 
44_21_2_Bwe twasanga ekyombo nga kiwunguka okugenda e Foyiniiki, ne tusaabala ne tugenda. 
44_21_3_Bwe twalengera Kupulo, ne tukireka ku mukono ogwa kkono ne tugenda e Busuuli, ne tugoba e Ttuulo: kubanga eyo ekyombo gye kyayagala okusiikululira ebintu. 
44_21_4_Bwe twalabayo abayigirizwa ne tumalayo ennaku musanvu. Abo ne bagamba Pawulo mu Mwoyo aleme okulinnya mu Yerusaalemi. 
44_21_5_Awo bwe twamalayo ennaku ezo ne tuvaayo ne tugenda; bonna ne batuwerekerako n'abakazi n'abaana abato okutuuka ebweru w'ekibuga: ne tufukamira ku lubalama lw'ennyanja, ne tusaba 
44_21_7_Naffe bwe twamala nlugun lwaffe okuva e Ttuulo ne tutuuk:a Potolemaayi; ne tulamusa ab'oluganda ne tumala nabo olunaku lumu. 
44_21_8_Ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne tuvaayo ne tutuuka e Kayisaliya: ne tuyingira mu nnyumba ya Firipo, omubuulizi w'enjiri, omu ku bali omusanvu, ne tutuula naye. 
44_21_9_Naye oyo yalina abawala bana abatamanyi musajja abaalagulanga. 
44_21_10_Bwe twalwayo ennaku nnyingi, e Buyudaaya n'evaayo omuntu nnabbi erinnya lye Agabo. 
44_21_11_N'ajja gye tuli n'addira olukoba lwa Pawulo ne yeesiba amagulu ge n'emikono gye n'agamba nti Bw'atyo bw'ayogera Omwoyo Omutukuvu nti Abayudaaya bwe balisiba bwe batyo mu Yerusaalemi omuntu nannyini luko-~ ba luno, balimuwaayo mu mikono gy'ab'amawanga. 
44_21_12_Bwe twawulira ebyo, ffe era n'abantu ab'omu kifo kiri ne tumwegayiriza aleme okulinnya mu Yerusaalemi. 
44_21_13_Awo Pawulo n'alyoka addamu nti Mukola ki okukaaba n'okumenya omutima gwange? Kubanga nze seetegese kusibibwa busibibwa era naye n'akufiira mu Yerusaalemi olw'erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu. 
44_21_14_Bwe yalema okuwulira ne tulekayo nga tugamba nti Mukama waffe ky’ayagala kikolebwa . 
44_21_15_Awo oluvannyuma lw'ennaku ezo ne tusitula emigugu ne tulinnya e Yerusaalemi. 
44_21_16_Era n'abayigirizwa abaava e Kayisaliya ne bagenda naffe, ne baleeta omuntu Munasoni ow'e Kupulo omuyigirizwa ow'edda, agenda okutusuza. 
44_21_17_Bwe twatuuka mu Yerusaalemi ab'oluganda ne batusembeza n'essanyu. 
44_21_18_Ku lunaku olw'akubiri Pawulo n'ayingira wamu naffe omwa Yakobo; era n'abakadde bonna baaliwo. 
44_21_19_Bwe yamala okubalamusa n'ababuulira kinnakimu Katonda bye yakolanga mu mawanga mu kuweereza kwe. 
44_21_20_Nabo bwe baawulira ne bagulumiza Katonda; ne bamugamba nti Olaba, ow'oluganda, enkumi bwe ziri mu Bayudaaya abantu abakkiriza; nabo bonna balina obuggya obw'amateeka: 
44_21_21_abo babuulirwa ebigambo byo nti ggwe oyigiriza Abayudaaya bonna abali mu mawanga okuleka Musa, ng'ogamba baleme okukomolanga abaana abato newakubadde okutambuliranga mu mpisa. 
44_21_22_Kale kiki kino? Tebaaleme kuIwulira ng'ozze. 
44_21_23_Kale kola nga bwe tukugamba: tulina abasajja bana abeerayirira ekirayiro; 
44_21_24_oba twale abo otukuzibwe wamu nabo, obawe effeeza beemweemitwe: bonna banaategeera ng'ebigambo bye baabuulirwa ku ggwe tebiriimu; naye nga naawe wennyini weegendereza ng'okwata amateeka. 
44_21_25_Naye ab'amawanga abakkiriza twawandiika ne rusala omusango nti beekuumenga mu bintu ebiweebwa eri ebifaananyi n'omusaayi n'ebitugiddwa n'obwenzi. 
44_21_26_Awo Pawulo n'alyoka atwala abantu, ku lunaku olw'okubiri n'atukuzibwa wamu nabo n'ayingira mu yeekaalu okulaga ennaku ez'okutukuza bwe zituuse, okutuusa ekiweebwayo lwe kyaweebwayo olwa buli omu ku bo. 
44_21_27_Awo ennaku omusanvu bwe zaali zinaatera okutuuka, Abayudaaya abaava mu Asiya ne bamulaba mu yeekaalu ne basasamaza ekibiina kyonna ne bamukwata, 
44_21_28_nga boogerera waggulu nti Abasajja Abaisiraeri, mutuyambe: ono ye muntu oli ayigiriza bonna buli kifo obubi ku bantu ne ku mateeka ne ku kifo kino: era nate aleese Abayonaani mu yeekaalu, ayonoonye ekifo ekitukuvu. 
44_21_29_Kubanga baali bamaze okulaba Tulofiimo Omuwefeso ng'ali naye mu kibuga: ne bateerera nti Pawulo amuleese mu yeekaalu. 
44_21_30_Ekibuga kyonna ne kyegugumula, abantu ne bakuŋŋaana mbiro; ne bakwata Pawulo ne bamuwalula oktunufulumya ebweru wa yeekaalu: amangu ago enzigi ne ziggalwawo. 
44_21_31_Bwe baali basala amagezi okumutta, ebigambo ne bituuka ku mwami omukulu w'ekitongole ekya basserikale nti Yerusaalemi kyonna kye fuukudde. 
44_21_32_Amangu ago n'atwala basserikale n'abaami n'aserengeta gye baali mbiro: nabo bwe baalaba omwami omukulu n'abaserikale ne baleka okukuba Pawulo. 
44_21_33_Awo omwami omukulu n'alyoka asembera n'amukwata n'alagira okumusibya enjegere bbiri; n'abuuza nti ye ani, ne ky'akoze ki. 
44_21_34_Abamu ab'omu kibiina ne boogerera waggulu bulala abalala bulala: bw'ataayinza kutegeera mazima olw'okuleekaana, n'alagira okumutwala mu kigo. 
44_21_35_Bwe yatuuka ku madaala, n'alyoka asitulibwa basserikale olw'amaanyi g'ekibiina: 
44_21_36_kubanga ekibiina ky'abantu baali bagoberera nga boogerera waggulu nti Mutte. 
44_21_37_Pawulo bwe yali anaatera okuyingizibwa mu kigo n'agamba omwami omukulu nti Kirungi mbeeko kye nkubuulira? N'agamba nti Omanyi Oluyonaani? 
44_21_38_Kale si ggwe Mumisiri oli mu nnaku ezaayita eyajeemesa abantu enkumi ennya ku Batemu bali, n'abatwala mu ddungu? 
44_21_39_Naye Pawulo n’agamba nti muntu Mugudaaya, ow’e Talusa eky’amu Kirukira, si wa mu kibuga ekitali kimanyifu: era nkwegayiridde, ndeka njogere n'abantu. 
44_21_40_Bwe yamukkiriza, Pawulo n'ayimirira ku madaala n'awenya n'omukono abantu: bwe baamala okusiriikirira ddala, n'ayogera mu lulimi Olwebbulaniya ng'agamba nti. 
44_22_1_Abasajja ab'oluganda ne bassebo, muwulire ensonga gye mbawoleza kaakano. 
44_22_2_Bwe baawulira ng'abagambye mu lulimi Olwebbulaniya ne beeyongera okusirika: n'agamba nti 
44_22_3_Nze adi muntu Muyudaaya, eyazaalirwa mu Taluso eky'omu Kirukiya, naye eyalererwa mu kibuga muno ku bigere bya Gamalyeri, eyayigirizibwa ennyo mu mpisa z'amateeka ga bajjajja, ne mbeeranga n'obuggya bwa Katonda nga mmwe mwenna bwe muli leero: 
44_22_4_ne njigganyanga ab'Ekkubo lino n'okubatta, nga mbasibanga era nga mbateekanga mu makomera abasajja n'abakazi 
44_22_6_Awo olwatuuka bwe nnali nga ntambula nga nnaatera okutuuka e Ddamasiko, nga mu ttuntu, amangu ago omusana mungi ogwava mu ggulu ne gwaka ne gunneetooloola 
44_22_8_Nze ne nziramu nti Ggwe ani, Mukama wange? N'aŋŋamba nti Nze Yesu Omunazaaleesi gw'oyigganya ggwe. 
44_22_9_Abaali awamu nange ne balaba omusana, naye ne batawulira ddoboozi ly'oyo eyayogera nange. 
44_22_10_Ne ŋŋamba nti Nnaakola ntya, Mukama wange? Mukama waffe n'aŋŋamba nti Golokoka, ogende e Ddamasiko, onoobuulirirwa eyo ebigambo ebyo byonna by'olagiddwa okukola. 
44_22_11_Bwe ssaayinza kulaba olw'ekitiibwa ky'omusana guli, ne nkwatibwa ku mukono abo abaali nange ne ntuuka mu Ddamasiko. 
44_22_12_Omuntu omu erinnya lye Ananiya atya Katonda mu mateeka, eyasiimibwa Abayudaaya bonna abatuula eyo, 
44_22_13_n'ajja gye ndi n'ayimirira we ndi n'aŋŋamba nti Ow'oluganda Sawulo, zibula. Mu kiseera ekyo ne nzibula okumutunuulira. 
44_22_14_N'agamba nti Katonda wa bajjajjaffe yakulonda dda otegeere ebyo by'ayagala, era olabe Omutuukirivu oli, era owulire eddoboozi eriva mu kamwa ke. 
44_22_15_Kubanga onoobeeranga mujulirwa we eri abantu bonna ow'ebigambo by'olabye ne by'owulidde. 
44_22_16_Kale kaakano ekikulwisa ki? Golokoka, obatizibwe onaaze ebibi byo, nga weegayirira erinnya lye. 
44_22_17_Awo olwatuuka bwe nnakomawo e Yerusaalemi, bwe nnali nga nsaba mu yeekaalu, omwoyo gwange ne guwaanyisibwa 
44_22_18_ne mmulaba ŋŋaamba nti Yanguwa ove mangu mu Yerusaalemi; kubanga tebalikkiriza kutegeeza kwo ku nze. 
44_22_19_Nange ne ŋŋamba nti Mukama wange, bo bennyini bamanyi nti nze nnabateekanga mu makomera era nga nnabakubiranga mu buli kkuŋŋaaniro abakukkiriza: 
44_22_20_era n'omusaayi ogw'omujulirwa wo Suteefano bwe gwayiibwa, nange kennyini nnali nga nnyimiridde awo, nga nsiimye, nga nkuuma ebyambala byabweabaamutta. 
44_22_21_N'aŋŋamba nti Genda: kubanga nze ŋŋende kukutuma wala mu b'amawanga. 
44_22_22_Ne bamuwuliriza okutuusa ku kigambo kina, ne bayimusa amaloboozi gaabwe nga bagamba nti Aggibwe mu nsi afaanana bw'atyo: kubanga si kirungi abeere mulamu. 
44_22_23_Bwe baali nga boogerera waggulu era nga bakasuka engoye zaabwe, era ngabafuumuulira waggulu enfuufu, 
44_22_24_omwami omukulu n'alagira okumuleeta mu kigo, ng'agamba okumukemereza n'emiggo alyoke ategeere ensonga gye bamulanze okwogerera waggulu ku ye bwe batyo. 
44_22_25_Bwe baali nga bamaze okumusibya enkoba, Pawulo n'agamba omwami eyali amuyimiridde okumpi nti Si kya muzizo mmwe okukuba omuntu Ommammi nga tannaba kusalirwa musango? 
44_22_26_Omwami bwe yawulira n'agenda eri omwami omukulu n'amubuulira ng'agamba nti Ogenda kukola ki? kubanga omuntu ono Muruumi. 
44_22_27_Omwami omukulu n'agenda gy'ali, n'amugamba nti Mbuulira, ggwe oli Muruumi? N'agamba nti Yee. 
44_22_28_Omwami omukulu n'addamu nti Nze nnafuna Oburuumi buno n'ebintu bingi. Pawulo n'agamba nti Naye nze mmwe nnazaalirwa. 
44_22_29_Awo amangu ago ne balyoka bamuleka abaali bagenda okumukemereza: era n'omwami omukulu n'atya bwe yamala oku tegeera nga Muruumi, era kubanga amusibye. 
44_22_30_Naye ku lunaku olw'okubiri, bwe yayagala okumanya amazima ensonga Abayudaaya gye bamulanze okumuloopa, n'amusumulula n'alagira bakabona abakulu n'olukiiko lwonna okukuŋŋaana, n'aleeta Pawulo n'amuteeka mu maaso gaabwe. 
44_23_1_Pawulo ne yeekaliriza amaaso ab'olukiiko n'agamba nti Abasajja ab'oluganda, nze nneegendereza n'omwoyo gwonna omulungi mu maaso ga Katonda okutuusa ku lunaku luno. 
44_23_2_Pawulo n'alyoka amugamba nti Katonda alikukuba, ggwe ekisenge ekyasiigibwa okutukula; era otudde okunsalira omusango ng'amateeka bwe gali, n'olagira okunkuba ng'amateeka bwe gatalagira? 
44_23_3_Pawulo n'alyoka amugamba nti Katonda alikukuba, ggwe ekisenge ekyasiigibwa okutukula; era otudde okunsalira omusango ng'amateeka bwe gali, n'olagira okunkuba ng'amateeka bwe gatalagira? 
44_23_4_Abaali bamuyimiridde okumpi ne bagamba nti Ovuma kabona asinga obukulu owa Katonda? 
44_23_5_Pawulo n'agamba nti Mbadde simumanyi, ab'oluganda, nga ye kabona asinga obukulu: kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti Toyogeranga bubi ku mukulu w'abantu bo. 
44_23_6_Naye Pawulo bwe yategeera ng'ekitundu ekimu kya Basaddukaayo n'eky'okubiri kya Bafalisaayo, n'ayogerera waggulu mu lukiiko nti Abasajja ab'oluganda, nze ndi Mufalisaayo mwana w'Abafalisaayo: nsalirwa omusango olw'essuubi n'okuzuukira kw'abafu. 
44_23_7_Bwe yayogera bw'atyo ne wabaawo okuyomba Abafalisaayo n'Abasaddukaayo, ekibiina ne kyawukanamu. 
44_23_8_Kubanga Abasaddukaayo bagamba nti tewali kuzuukira, newakubadde malayika, newakubadde omuzimu: naye Abafalisaayo baatula byombi. 
44_23_9_Ne wabaawo okukaayana kungi: abawandiisi abamu ab'omu kitundu eky'Abafalisaayo ne bayimirira ne bawakana nga bagamba nti Tetulaba kibi ku muntu ono: era kinaaba kitya oba ng'omuzimu gwe gwogedde naye oba malayika? 
44_23_10_Bwe waabaawo okuyomba okungi, omwami omukulu ng'atya Pawulo nga bagenda okumukutulamu, n'alagira ekitongole okukka wansi okumuggya wakati mu bo olw'amaanyi, okumuleeta mu kigo. 
44_23_11_Awo mu kiro eky'okubiri, Mukama waffe n'ayimirira w'ali n'agamba nti Guma omwoyo: kuba nga bwe wategeeza ebigambo byange mu Yerusaalemi, era kikugwanidde okutegeeza bw'otyo ne mu Ruumi. 
44_23_12_Bwe bwakya enkya, Abayudaaya ne balagaana ne beeyama obweyamo nga bagamba nti tebajja kulya newakubadde okunywa wabula nga bamaze kutta Pawulo. 
44_23_13_Abeekobaana bwe batyo ne basukka amakumi ana. 
44_23_14_Abo ne bajja eri bakabona abakulu n'abakadde ne bagamba nti Okwekolimira twekolimidde obutakomba ku kantu wabula nga tumaze kutta Pawulo. 
44_23_15_Kale kaakano mmwe n'olukiiko mugambe omwami omukulu amuleete wansi gye muli ng'abaagala okwongera okumanya amazima g'ebigambo bye: naffe, anaaba nga tannaba kusembera, tweteeseteese okumutta. 
44_23_16_Naye uumaana wa olwannywa wa Pawulo n'awuliral olukwe luno, n'ajja n'ayingira mu' kigo, n'abuulira Pawulo. 
44_23_17_Pawulo n'ayita omu ku baami n'amugamba nti Twala omulenzi ono eri omwami omukulu; kubanga alina, ekigambo okumubuulira. 
44_23_18_Awo oli n'amutwala n'amuleeta eri omwami omukulu n'agamba nti Pawulo olnnsibe yampise n'anneegayirira okukuleetera omulenzi ono, ng'alitia ky'agenda okukubuulira. 
44_23_19_Omwami omukulu n'amukwata ku mukono ne yeeyawula mu kyama n'amubuuza nti Bigambo ki by'olina okumbuulira? 
44_23_20_N'agamba nti Abayudaaya bateesezza okukwegayirira okuleeta Pawulo, enkya wansi mu lukiiko ng'agenda okwongera okumubuuza amazima g'ebigambo bye. 
44_23_21_Kale ggwe tobakkiriza: kubanga abantu baabwe bamuteeze okusinga amakumi ana abeekolimidde obutalya newakubadde okunywa wabula nga bamaze okumutta; nabo kaakano beeteeseteese nga balindirira ggwe okubasuubiza. 
44_23_22_Awo omwami omukulu n'asiibula omulenzi, bwe yamala okumukuutira nti Tobuulirako omuntu ng'ombuulidde ebigambo bino. 
44_23_23_N'ayita babiri ku baami n'agamba nti Mutegeke basserikale' ebikumi bibiri okugenda e Kayisaliya, n'ab'oku mbalaasi nsanvu, n'ab'amafumu ebikumi bibiri, mu ssaawa ey'okusatu ey'ekiro; 
44_23_24_era babalabire ensolo balyoke beebagazeeko Pawulo era bamutwale mirembe eri Ferikisi owessaza. 
44_23_25_N'awandiika ebbaluwa engeri, eno nti 
44_23_26_Kulawudiyo Lusiya alamusizza owessaza omulungi ennyo Ferikisi, 
44_23_27_Omuntu oyo bwe yamala okukwatibwa Abavudaaya, bwe baali bagenda okumutta, ne njija n'ekitongole gye baali ne mbamuggyako, bwe nnategeera nga Muruumi. 
44_23_28_Era bwe nnayagala okutegeera ensonga gye bamulanze okumuloopa„ ne mmutwala mu lukiiko lwabwe. 
44_23_29_Ne ndaba ng'aloopeddwa bya kubuuzibwa eby'omu mateeka gaabwe, naye nga tewali nsonga ya kumussa newakubadde okusibibwa. 
44_23_30_Bwe bambuulira nti banaamusalira olukwe, amangu ago ne mmuweereza gy'oli; era ne ndagira abamuloopa okumuloopera mmaaso go. 
44_23_31_Awo basserikale nga bwe baalagirwa ne batwala Pawulo ne bamuleeta mu kiro okutuuka mu Antipatuli. 
44_23_32_Naye ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne baleka ab'oku mbalaasi okugenda naye ne baddayo mu kigo: 
44_23_33_abo bwe baatuuka e Kayisaliya ne bawa ebbaluwa owessaza era ne bamwanjulira Pawulo. 
44_23_34_Bwe yamala okugisoma, n'abuuza essaza gye yava; bwe yabuulirwa nti yava mil Kirukiaya, 
44_23_35_n'agamba nti Ndikuwulira abakuloopa bwe balibaawo nabo: n'alagira okumukuumira mu nnyumba ya Kerode. 
44_24_1_Ennaku bwe zaayitawo ettaano, kabona asinga obukulu Ananiya n'aserengeta n'abakadde abamu n'omuntu omwogezi Terutuulo: abo ne babuulira owessaza ebigambo Pawulo bye yaloopebwa. 
44_24_2_Bwe yayitibwa, Terutuulo n'atanula okumuloopa ng'agamba nti Kubanga twali tufunye emirembo mingi eri ggwe, n'ebigambo ebibi nga birongoosebbwa mu ggwanga lino olw'okulabirira kwo, 
44_24_3_tubikkiriza ennaku zonna ne mu bifo byonna, Ferikisi omulungi ennyo, n'okwebaza kwonna. 
44_24_4_Naye nneme okwongera okukukooya, nkwegayiridde otuwulire mu bigambo bitono olw'obulungi bwo. 
44_24_5_Kubanga twalaba omuntu ono nga mubi nnyo, ajeemesa Abayudaaya bonna abali mu nsi zonna, era ye mukulu w'ekitundu ky'Abanazaaleesi: 
44_24_6_yagezaako okwonoona yeekaalu: ne tumukwata, ne twagala okumusalira omusango ng'amateeka gaffe bwe gali: 
44_24_7_naye omwami omukulu Lusiya n'ajja n'atumuggyako mu mikono gyaffe n'amaanyi mangi, 
44_24_8_bwe yalagira abamuvunaana okujja gy'oli: bw'onoomwebuuliza wekka onooyinza okutegeera bino byonna bye tumuvunaana. 
44_24_9_Era n'Abayudaaya ne bamuloopa bumu nga bagamba nti bwe bityo bwe biri. 
44_24_10_Awo owessaza bwe yamuwenya okwogera, Pawulo n'addamu nti Kubanga mmanyi ng'oli mulamuzi wa ggwanga lino okuva mu myaka mingi, nkuwoleza ebigambo byange n'omwoyo omugumu; 
44_24_11_kubanga oyinza okutegeera ng'ennaku tezinnayita kkumi na bbiri! kasookedde nninnya e Yerusaalerni okusinza: 
44_24_12_so tebansanganga mu yeekaalu nga mpakana n'omuntu oba nga njeemesa ekibiina newakubadde mu kkuŋŋaaniro newakubadde mu kibuga. 
44_24_13_So tebayinza kukakasa; w'oli ebigambo bye banvunaana; kaakano. 
44_24_14_Naye kino nkyatula w'oli nti Ekkubo nga bwe liri lye bayita enzikiriza, bwe ntyo bwe mpeereza Katonda wa bajjajjaffe, nga nzikiriza byonna ebyawandiikibwa mu mateeka ne mu bya bannabbi; 
44_24_15_nga nnina essuubi Katonda, era nabo bennyini lye basuubira, nti walibaawo okuzuukira kw'abatuukirivu era n'abatali batuukirivu. 
44_24_16_Era nnyiikira mu kigambo ekyo okubeeranga n'omwoyo ogutalina musango eri Katonda n'eri abantu ennaku zonna. 
44_24_17_Awo emyaka mingi bwe gyayitawo ne njija okuleeta eby'abaavu eri eggwanga lyaffe n'ebiweebwayo: 
44_24_18_bwe nnali mu ebyo Abayudaaya abamu abaava mu Asiya ne bansanga mu yeekaalu nga ntukuzibwa, nga sirina kibiina newakubadde oluyoogaano; 
44_24_19_abagwanidde okubeera w'oli n'okunnumiriza oba nga balina ekigambo ku nze 
44_24_20_Oba bano bayogere bennyini ekibi kye baalaba bwe nnayimirira mu lukiilro 
44_24_21_wabula olw'eddoboozi lino erimu lye nnayogerera waggulu, nga nnyimiridde mu bo, nti Olw'okuzuukira kw'abafu nsalirwa omusango gye muli ku lunaku luno. 
44_24_22_Naye Ferikisi, kubanga ye yali abasinga okumanya ebigambo eby’ekkubo, n’abalwisaawo ng’agamba okumanya ebigambo eby'Ekkubo, n'abalwisaawa ng'agamba nti bw'aliserengeta Lusiya omwami omukulu, ndisala omusango gw'ebigambo byammwe. 
44_24_23_N'alagira omwami okumukuuma (n'okumuwa ebbanga; n'obutaziyiza muntu yonna ku mikwano gye, okumuweereza. 
44_24_24_Naye ennaku bwe zaayitawo Ferikisi n'ajja ne mukazi we Dulusira, Omuyudaaya, n'ayita Pawulo n'amuwuliriza ku bigambo eby'okukkiriza Kristo Yesu. 
44_24_25_Bwe yali ng'ateeza eby’obubutuukinvu, n'eby'okwegendereza, n'eby'omusango ogugenda okujja, Ferikisi n'atya n'addamu nti Genda kaakano; bwe ndiba n’abbanga, ndikuyita. 
44_24_26_Era n'asuubira Pawulo okumuwa ebintu: kyeyava yeeyongeranga okumutumiranga okunyumyanga naye. 
44_24_27_Naye bwe waayitiwo emkyaka ebiri, obwa Ferikisi ne buweebwa Polukiyo Fesuto; Ferikisi bwe yayagala Abayudaaya okumusiima, n’aleka Pawulo nga musibe. 
44_25_1_Awo Fesuto bwe yatuuka mu ssaza, bwe waayitawo ennaku ssatu, n'ava mu Kayisaliya n'alinnya Yerusaalemi. 
44_25_2_Bakabona kulu n'abakungu b'Abayudaaya ne bamubuulira Pawulo bye yaloopebwa; ne bamwegayirira, 
44_25_3_nga baagala abakole obulungi ku ye, amutumire okujja e Yerusaalemi; bamuteegere mu kkubo okumutta. 
44_25_4_Naye Fesuto n'addamu nti Pawulo akuumirwa mu Kayisaliya, naye ye yennyini yali ng'anaatera okuvaayo okugenda. 
44_25_5_N'agamba nti Kale abakulu mu mmwe bagende nange, bamuvunaane oyo oba ng'aliko ekibi kyonna kyonna, 
44_25_6_Bwe yamalayo ewaabwe ennaku ezitaasingawo munaana oba kkumi, n'aserengeta e Kayisaliya; ku lunaku lw'okubiri n'atuula ku ntebe esalirwako emisango, n'alagira okuleeta Pawulo. 
44_25_7_Bwe yatuuka Abayudaaya abaava e Yerusaalemi ne bayimirira okumwetooloola, nga bateeta ebimuvunaanwa bingi era ebizibu, bye bataayinza kulumiriza 
44_25_9_Naye Fesuto, bwe za nti Siyonoonanga mu mateeka g'Abayudaaya newaIkubadde ku yeekaalu newakubadde yayagala Abayudaaya okumusiima, n'addamu eri Pawulo n'agamba nti Oyagala okugenda e Yerusaalemi osalinve eyo omusango gw'ebigambo bino mu maaso gange? 
44_25_10_Naye Pawulo n'agamba nti Nnyimiridde awali entebe esalirwako emisango eya Kayisaali, we ŋŋwanidde okusalirwa omusango: s'syonoonanga eri Abayudaaya, era nga naawe bw'otegeerera ddala obuIungi. 
44_25_11_Kale oba nga nnayonoona era nga nnakola ekigambo ekisaanidde okunzisa, sigaana kufa: naye oba nga bano ebigambo bye banvunaana nga tebiriiwo na kimu, tewali muntu, ayinza okumpaayo mu bo. Njulira Kayisaali. 
44_25_12_Fesuto bwe yamala okuteesa nabo mu lukiiko n'alyoka addamu nti Ojulidde Kayisaali: oligenda eri Kayisaali. 
44_25_13_Awo bwe waayitawo ennaku, Agulipa kabaka ne Berenike ne batuuka e Kayisaliya, ne balamusa Fesuto. 
44_25_14_Bwe baamalayo ennaku nnyingi, Fesuto n'abuulira kabaka ebigambo bya Pawulo ng'agamba nti Waliwo omuntu Ferikisi gwe yaleka nga musibe: 
44_25_15_bwe nnali mu Yerusaalemi bakabona abakulu n'abakadde b'Abayudaaya ne bambuulira ebigambo bye, nga baagala okumusalira omusango. 
44_25_16_Ne mbaddamu nti Si mpisa ya Baruumi okuwaayo omuntu abamuvunaana nga tebannaba kubaawo mu maaso ge, era nga tannaweebwa bbanga lya kuwoza bye bamuvunaana. 
44_25_17_Awo bwe baakuŋŋaanira wano, saalwa n'akatono, naye ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne ntuula ku ntebe esalirwako emisango ne ndagira okuleeta omusajja oyo. 
44_25_18_Bwe baayimirira abamuvunaana ne bataleeta nsonga ya bigambo bibi nga bwe nnali ndowooza; 
44_25_19_naye baalina ku ye ebibuuzibwa mu ddiini yaabwe n'eby'omuntu Yesu eyafa, Pawulo gwe yayogerako okuba omulamu. 
44_25_20_Nange bwe nnabulwa bwe nnaakebera ebyo, ne mmubuuza ng'ayagala okugenda e Yerusaalemi okusalirwayo omusango ogwa bino. 
44_25_21_Naye Pawulo bwe yajulira okukuumibwa okusalirwa omusango eri Augusito, ne ndagira okumukuumal okutuusa lwe ndimuweereza eri Kayisaali. 
44_25_22_Agulipa n'agamba Fesuto nti Nandyagadde nange okuwulira omuntu oyo. N'agamba nti Enkya onoomuwulira. 
44_25_23_Awo ku lunaku olw'okubiri Agulipa ne Berenike bwe bajja n'ekitiibwa ekinene era bwe baayingira mu kifo awawulirirwa emisango wamu n'abaami abakulu n'abakungu ab'omu kibuga, Fesuto n'alagira Pawulo n'aleetebwa. 
44_25_24_Fesuto n'agamba nti Agulipa kabaka nammwe mwenna abali wano naffe, mumulaba ono, ekibiina kyonna eky'Abayudaaya gwe banneegayiririra mu Yerusaalemi ne wano nga boogerera waggulu nti tekimugwanidde kuba mulamu nate. 
44_25_25_Naye nze ne ntegeera nga takoze kigambo ekisaanidde okumussa: naye ye bwe yajulira Augusito ne nsala okumuweerezaayo. 
44_25_26_Sirina kigambo ku ye eky'amazima okuwandiikira mukama wange. Kyenvudde mmuleeta we muli, era okusinga w'oli, ggwe kabaka Agulipa, bwe tunaamala okumukemereza ndyoke mbeere n'ekigambo eky'okuwandiika. 
44_25_27_Kubanga ndaba nga kya busiru okuweereza omusibe n'obutabuulira asonga eziri ku ye. 
44_26_1_Agulipa n'agamba Pawulo nti Okkirizibwa okuwoza ensonga zo. Awo Pawulo n'alyoka agolola omukono n'awoza nti 
44_26_2_Bye nnavunaanibwa Abayudaaya byonna, kabaka Agulipa, nneesiimye kubanga ŋŋenda okubiwoza leero w'oli 
44_26_4_Kale empisa zange okuva mu buto ezaasooka okubeeranga mu ggwanga lyaffe ne mu Yerusaalemi, Abayudaaya bonna bazimanyi 
44_26_6_lye basuubira okutuukako ebika byaffe ekkumi n'ebibiri, nga banyiikira okuweerezanga Katonda emisana n'ekiro: olw'essuubi eryo, kabaka, Abayudaaya kyebavudde bampawaabira. 
44_26_7_Kiki ekibalowoozesa nti tekiyinzika Katonda okuzuukiza abafu? 
44_26_8_Kiki ekibalowoozesa nti tekiyinzika Katonda okuzuukiza abafu? 
44_26_9_Mazima nze nalowoozanga nzekka nga kiŋŋwanidde okukolanga obubi ebigambo bingi ku linnya lya Yesu Omunazaaleesi. 
44_26_10_N'okukola nu nkolanga bwe ntyo e Yerusaalem nze ne nsibanga mu makomera abatukuvu baamu bangi, bwe nnaweebwa obuyinza eri bakabona abakulu. era bwe battibwa, ne nzikiriza okubatta. 
44_26_11_Era bwe nnababonerezanga emirundi mingi mu makuŋŋaaniro gonna ne mbawalirizanga okuvvoola; ne mbasunguwaliranga nnyo ne mbayigganyanga okutuukai mu bibuga eby'ebweru. 
44_26_12_Awo bwe nnali nga ŋŋenda e Ddamasiko nga nnina obuyinza n'okulagirwa okwava eri bakabona abakulu, 
44_26_13_mu ttuntu, kabaka, ne ndaba mu kkubo omusana ogwava mu ggulu ogusinga okwaka kw'enjuba ne gumasamasa ne gunneetooloola n'abaali batambula nange. 
44_26_14_Ne tugwa fenna wansi ne mpulira eddoboozi nga lyogera tlange mu lulimi Olwebbulaniya nti Sawulo, Sawulo, onjigganyiza ki? kye kizibu ggwe okusamba ku miwunda. 
44_26_15_Nze ne ŋŋamba nti Ggwe ani, Mukama wange? Mukama waffe n'agamba nti Nze Yesu, gw'oyigganya ggwe. 
44_26_16_Naye golokoka, oyimirire ku bigere byo: kyenvudde nkulabikira, nkulonde obeerenga omuweereza era omujulirwa w'ebyo mw'ondabidde era ow'ebyo mwe anaatulabikiranga, 
44_26_17_nga nkuwonya mu bantu ne mu b'amawaaga, nze gye nkutuma okuzibula amaaso gaabwe, 
44_26_18_nga nkuwonya mu bantu ne mu b'amawaaga, nze gye nkutuma okuzibula amaaso gaabwe, 
44_26_19_Kale, kabaka Agulipa, saalema kugondera okwolesebwa okw'omu ggulu: 
44_26_20_naye nnasooka okubuulira ab'omu Ddamasiko ne mu Yerusaalemi, era n'ensi yonna ey'e Buyudaaya n'eb'amawanga okwenenya n'okukyukira Katonda, nga bakolonga ebikolwa ebisaanidde okwenenya. 
44_26_21_Abayudaaya kyabaava bankwata mu yeekaalu ne bagezaako okunzita. 
44_26_22_Kale bwe nnafuna okubeerwa okwava eri Katonda, okutuusa ku lunaku luno nnyinuridde nga ntegeeza abato n'abakulu, nga soogera kigambo wabula bannabbi ne Musa bye baayogere nga bigenda okujja; 
44_26_23_ne kigwanira Kristo okubonyaabonyezebwa; era ye bw’alisooka mu kuzuukira kw’abafu okubuulira omusana abantu n’ab’amawanga. 
44_26_24_Bwe yawoza bw’atyo Fesuto n'agamba n'eddoboozi ddene nti Olaluse, Pawulo: okusoma okwo okungi kukukyuea okuba omulalu. 
44_26_25_Naye Pawulo n'agamba nti Siraluse, Fesuto omulungi ennyo, na,ye njogera ebigambo eby'amazima eby'obuntu bulamu. 
44_26_26_Kubanga kabaka amanyi ebigambo bino, gwe njogerera mu maaso ge n'obugumu. Kubanga tnmanyi ebigambo bino tebyekwese eri kabaka n'ekimu; kubanga ekyo tekyakolebwa mu bubba. 
44_26_27_Okkiriza bannabbi, kabaka Agulipa? Mmanyi ng'okkiriza. 
44_26_28_Agulipa n'agamba Pawulo nti Oyagala okunsendasenda onfuule Omukristaayo; 
44_26_29_Pawulo n'agamba nti Nandisabye Katonda olw'okusendasenda okutono oba okunene si ggwe wekka era naye ne bonna abampulira leero okufuuka nga nze awatali kusibibwa kuno. 
44_26_30_Kabaka n'agalokoka n'owessaza ne Berenike n'abaali batudde awamu nabo; 
44_26_31_bwe baddayo eka, ne boogera bokka na bokka aga bagamba nti Omuntu ono takoze ekisaanidde okumussa oba okumusibya. 
44_26_32_Agulipa n'agamba Fesuto nti Omuntu ono yandiyinzizza okuteebwa, singa teyajulira Kayisaali. 
44_27_1_Awo bwe kyalagirwa ffe okuwanika amatanga okugenda Italiya, ne bawaayo Pawulo n'abasibe abalala abamu eri omwami, erinnya lye Yuliyo, ow'ekitongole kya Augusito. 
44_27_2_Ne tusaabala mu kyombo eky'e Adulamutiyo ekyali kigenda ku njuyi z'e Asiya, ne tuvaayo, Alisutaluuko ow'e Makedoni ow'omu Ssessaloniika naye ng'ali naffe. 
44_27_3_Ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne tugoba e Sidoni: Yuliyo n'akola bulungi Pawulo n'amukkiriza okugenda eri mikwano gye okumulabirira. 
44_27_4_Ne tuvaayo ne tuyita ku mabbali ga Kupulo kubanga omuyaga gwali gutuva mu bwengula. 
44_27_5_Bwe twayita mu nnyanja ey'e Kirukiya n'e Panfuliya; tutuuka e Mula eky’e Lukiya. 
44_27_6_Omwami n'alabayo ekyombo eky'e Alegezanderiya nga kigenda Italiya; n'atusaabaza mu ekyo. 
44_27_7_Bwe twagenda empola ennaku nnyingi ne tutuuka lwa mpaka ku Kunido, omuyaga bwe gwatulobera, ne tuyita ku mabbali ga Kuleete mu maaso ga Salumone 
44_27_9_Bwe waayitawo ebiro bingi, obubi bwali bumaze okubaawo okugenda mu nnyanja kubanga ennaku ez'Okusiiba zaali ziyise, Pawulo n'abalabula 
44_27_10_ng'abagamba nti Abasajja, ndaba nti olugendo luno lulibaamu okwonoonekerwa n'okufiirwa kungi si kwa bintu byokka n'ekyombo, era naye n'obulamu bwaffe. 
44_27_11_Naye omwami n'akkiriza omugoba ne nnannyini kyombo okusinga Pawulo by'ayogedde. 
44_27_12_Kubanga omwalo tegwali mulungi okwewogomamu omuyaga, abamu bangi ne bateesa okuvaayo, mpozzi balyoke batuuke e Foyiniiki okwewogoma omuyaga; gwe mwalo ogw'e Kuleete ogutunuulira wakati w'obukiika n'ebuvanjuba, ne wakati w'obukiika obulala n'ebuvanjuba. 
44_27_13_Empewo ez'omuggundu bwe zaakunta empola, ne balowooza nti bafunye kye babadde baagala, ne basimbula essiika ne bayita kumpi nnyo ne Kuleete. 
44_27_14_Naye oluvannyuma lw'ebiro si bingi omuyaga ogulimu kibuyaga ogwavaayo oguyitibwa Ewulakulo ne gukunta: 
44_27_15_ekyombo bwe kyakwatibwa ne kitayinza kwolekera muyaga, ne tukireka ne tutwalibwa omuyaga. 
44_27_16_Ne tweyuna mu mabbali g'akazinga akayitibwa Kawuda, ne tutegana okukwata eryato: 
44_27_17_bwe baamala okulirinnyisa, ne baddira emigwa egy'okunyweza ekyombo ne bakisiba wansi. Bwe baatya okusuulibwa mu Suluti, ne bassa ebyali waggulu, ne batwalibwa omuyaga. 
44_27_18_Bwe twategana ennyo n'omuyaga, ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne basiikulula ebintu, 
44_27_19_era ku lw'okusatu ne basuula n'emikono gyabwe ebitwala ekyombo. 
44_27_20_Era enjuba newakubadde emmunyeenye mu nnaku nnyingi nga tebyaka, era n'omuyaga si mutono ogwatukwata, oluvannyuma essuubi lyonna ery'okulokoka ne lituggwaamu. 
44_27_21_Enjala bwe yali ennyingi, awo Pawulo n'alyoka ayimirira wakati waabwe n'agamba nti Kyabagwanira, abasajja, okumpulira obutava mu Kuleete, obu talaba kwonoonekerwa kuno n'okufiirwa. 
44_27_22_Era kaakano mbabuulirira okuguma emyoyo; kubanga tewaabe mu mmwe anaafiirwa obulamu n'akatono wabula ekyombo. 
44_27_23_Kubanga we ndi waayimiridde ekiro kino malayika wa Katonda, nze owuwe, gwe mpeereza, 
44_27_24_ng'agamba nti Totya, Pawulo; kikugwaInidde okuyimirira awali Kayisaali; era, laba, Katonda akuwadde bonna abagenda awamu naawe. 
44_27_25_Kale mugume emyoyo, abasajja; kubanga nzikiriza Katonda nga kiriba nga bwe yaŋŋambye. 
44_27_26_Naye kitugwanidde okusuulibwa ku kizinga. 
44_27_27_Naye ekim eky'ekkumi n'ebina bwe kyatuuka, nga tusuukundirwa eruuyi n'eruuyi mu Aduliya, mu ttumbi abalunnyanja ne baieebereza nti banaatera okusemberera olukalu; 
44_27_28_ne bagera ne balaba ebifuba amakumi abiri: bwe twagendako katono, ne bagera nate, ne balaba ebifuba kkumi na bitaano. 
44_27_29_Bwe baatya okuseerera awali amayinja, I ne basuula amasiika ana ku kiwenda ine balindirira bukye. 
44_27_30_Abalui nnyanja bwe baali baagala okudduka mu kyombo ne bamala okussa eryato mu nnyanja ng'abagenda okusuula lamasiika ku nsanda, 
44_27_31_Pawulo n'agamba omwami n'abaserikale nti Bwe bataabeere bano mu kyombo, mmwe temuuyinze kulokoka. 
44_27_32_Basserikale ne balyoka basala emigwa egy'eryato ne balireka okugenda. 
44_27_33_Awo bwe bwali bunaatera okukya, Pawulo n'abeegayirira bonna okulya ku mmere, ng'agamba nti Leero lunaku lwa kkumi na nnya ze mwakalindiririra nga musiiba mutalya kantu. 
44_27_34_Kyenva mbeegayirira okulya ku mmere: kubanga okwo kunaabalokola: kubanga tewaabule luviiri ku mitwe gyammwe n'omu. 
44_27_35_Bwe yamala okwogera bwatyo n'addira omugaati, ne yeebaliza Katonda mu maaso ga bonna n'agumenyamu n'atanula okulyako. 
44_27_36_Bonna ne baguma emyoyo, nabo ne balyako. 
44_27_37_Ne tuba fenna abaali mu kyombo emyoyo bikumi bibiri mu nsanvu mu mukaaga. 
44_27_38_Bwe baamala okukkuta emmere, ekyombo ne bakiwewula nga basuula eŋŋaano mu nnyanja. 
44_27_39_Bwe bwakya enkya, nga tebamanyi gye bali: naye ne balaba ekikono ekiriko omusenyu; ne bateesa, oba nga kiyinzika, okuseeza omwo ekyombo. 
44_27_40_Ne bakutula amasiika, ne bagaIeka mu nnyanja, mu kiseera ekyo bwe baasumulula emigwa egy'enkasi egoba, ne bawanika ettanga eri mu maaso eri empewo ne boolekera ku ttale. 
44_27_41_Naye bwe baatuuka mu kifo amayengo abiri we gaasisinkana, ne baseeza ekyombo; ensanda n'eseera n'enywera n'etanyeenya, naye ekiwenda ne kizibikuka n'amaanyi g'amayengo. 
44_27_42_Basserikale ne bateesa abasibe battibwe baleme okuwugirira okudduka. 
44_27_43_Naye omwami bwe yayagala okuwonya Pawulo, n'abaziyiza okukola kye bateesezza; n'alagira abaayinza okuwuga okwesuulamu basooke okutuuka ku ttale; 
44_27_44_n'abalala abaasigalawo, abamu ku mpero, n'abamu ku bintu by'ekyombo. Awo bwe batyo bonna ne batuuka ku ttale emirembe. 
44_28_1_Bwe twamala okulokoka ne tulyoka tutegeera ng'ekizinga kiyitibwa Merita. 
44_28_2_Bannaggwanga ne batukola obulungi obutali bwa bulijjo: kubanga baakuma omuliro, ne batusembeza fenna olw'enkuba eyatonnya n'olw'empewo. 
44_28_3_Naye Pawulo bwe yakuŋŋaanya omuganda gw'obuku, n'agussa mu muliro, embalasaasa n'evaamu olw'ebbugumu n'emwerippa ku mukono. 
44_28_4_Bannaggwanga bwe baalaba ekyekulula nga kireebeetera ku mukono, ne bagamba bokka na bokka nti Mazima omuntu ono mussi; newakubadde ng'alokose mu nnyanja, omusango tegumuganya kubeera mulamu. 
44_28_5_Naye n'akunkumulira mu muliro ekyekulula n'atabaako kabi. 
44_28_6_Naye bali ne balowooza nti anaazimba oba anaasinduka, okugwa eri nga mufu: naye bwe baalwawo ennyo nga bamutunuulira ne batalaba kibi ky'abaddeko, ne bakyuka ne bagamba nti katonda. 
44_28_7_Waaliwo kumpi n'ekifo ekyo ensuku z'omuntu omukulu w'ekizinga, erinnya ne Pubuliyo: oyo n'atusembeza n'atujjanjabira n'ekisa ennaku ssatu. 
44_28_8_Awo kitaawe wa Pubuliyo yali agalamidde, ng'alwadde omusujja n'ekiddukano ky'omusaayi: Pawulo n'ayingira mw'ali, n'asaba n'amussaako emikono n'amuwonya. 
44_28_9_Ekyo bwe kyakolebwa, abalala nabo abaali ku kizinga abaalina endwadde ne bajja ne bawonyezebwa: 
44_28_10_era abo ne batuwa ekitiibwa kinene; bwe twali tuvaayo ne baleeta ku lyato ebintu bye twetaaga. 
44_28_11_Emyezi esatu bwe gyayitawo, ne tuviirayo mu kyombo eky'e Alegezanderiya, ekyali ku kizinga mu biro eby'omuyaga, akabonero kaakyo Ab'oluganda abalongo. 
44_28_12_Ne tugoba mu Sulakusa ne tumalayo ennaku ssatu: 
44_28_13_ne tuvaayo ne twetooloola ne tutuuka e Regio: bwe waayitawo olunaku lumu, empewo ez'omuggundu ne zikunta, ku lunaku olw'okubiri ne tutuuka e Putiyooli; 
44_28_14_gye twasanga ab'oluganda ne batuyita okumala wamu nabo ennaku musanvu: awo bwe tutyo ne tutuuka e Ruumi 
44_28_15_Ab'oluganda bwe baawulira ebigambo byaffe ne bavaayo okutusisinkana mu Katale ka Apiyo ne mu Bisulo Ebisatu: Pawulo bwe yabalabako ne yeebaza Katonda n'aguma omwoyo. 
44_28_16_Bwe twayingira mu Ruumi, Pawulo n'alagirwa okubeera yekka wamu ne sserikale eyali amukuuma. 
44_28_17_Awo bwe waayitawo ennaku ssatu, n'ayita abakulu b'Abayu'daaya: bwe baamala okukuŋŋaana n'abagamba nti Nze, abasajja ab'oluganda, newakubadde nga saakola kibi ku bantu newakubadde ku mpisa za bajjajjaffe, naye nnasibibwa ne mpeebwayo mu mikono gy'Abaruumi mu Yerusaalemi: 
44_28_18_abo bwe baamala okunkemereza ne baagala okunsumulula, kuhanga tewaali nsonga gye ndi yakunzisa. 
44_28_19_Naye Abayudaaya bwe baagaana, ne mpalirizibwa okujulira Kayisaali, si ng'alina ekigambo okuloopa eggwanga lyaffe. 
44_28_20_Kale olw'ensonga eyo mbayise okundaba n'okwogera nange: kubanga olw'essuubi lya Isiraeri nsibiddwa n'olujegere luno. 
44_28_21_Bo ne bamugamba nti Ffe so tetuweebwunga bbaluwa za bigambo byo okuva mu Buyudaaya, so tewali ku b'oluganda eyali azze n'atubuulira oba n'ayogera ekigambo ekibi ku ggwe. 
44_28_22_Naye twagala okuwulira okuva gy'oli by'olowooza: kubanga ebigambo by'enzikiriza eno, tumanyi nti kiwerebwa wouna wonna. 
44_28_23_Ne bamulaga olunaku ne bajja bangi gy'ali mu kisulo; n'abannyonnyola ng'ategeeza obwakabaka bwa Katonda, era ng'abakkirizisa ebigambo bya Yesu mu mateeka ga Musa ne mu bya bannabbi okusooka enkya okutuusa akawungeezi. 
44_28_24_Abamu ne bakkiriza bye yayogera, abamu ne batakkiriza. 
44_28_25_Bwe bataatabagana bokka na bokka, ne bagenda, Pawulo bwe yamala okwogera ekigambo kimu, nti Omwoyo Omutukuvu yagamba bulungi bajjajjammwe mu nnabbi Isaaya 
44_28_26_ng'agamba nti Genda eri abantu bano, oyogere nti Okuwulira muliwulira, ne mutategeera; Okulaba muliraba, ne muteetegeereza: 
44_28_27_Kubanga omutima gw'abantu bano gusavuwadde, N'amatu gaabwe bawulira bubi, N'amaaso gaabwe bagazibye; Baleme okulaba n'amaaso, N'okuwulira n'amatu, N'okutegeera n'omutima gwabwe, N'okukyuka, Nze okubawonya. 
44_28_28_Kale mutegeere nti obulokozi bwa Katonda buno buweerezebbwa ab'amawanga : nabo balibuwulira. 
44_28_29_Bwe yayogera ebigambo ebyo, Abayudaaya ne bagenda nga bawakana nnyo bokka na bokka. 
44_28_30_N'amalayo emyaka ebiri miramba ewuwe yekka mu nju gye yapangisa, n'asembezanga bonna abajjanga gy'ali, 
44_28_31_ng'abuuliranga obwakabaka bwa Katonda, era ng'ayigirizanga n'obugumu bwonna ebigambo bya Mukama Yesu Kristo, n'ataziyizibwanga. 
45_1_1_Pawulo, omuddu wa Yesu Kristo, eyayitibwa okuba omutume, eyayawulirwa enjiri ya Katonda, 
45_1_2_gye yasuubiriza edda mu bannabbi be mu byawandii kibwa ebitukuvu, 
45_1_3_ebigambo ebyogera ku Mwana we, eyazaalibwa mu zzadde lya Dawudi mu mubiri, 
45_1_4_eyalagibwa okuba Omwana wa Katonda mu maanyi, mu mwoyo gw'obutukuvu, olw'okuzuukira kw'abafu, Yesu Kristo Mukama waffe, 
45_1_5_eyatuweesa ekisa n'obutume olw'okuwulira okuva mu kukkiriza mu mawanga gonna, olw'erinnya lye 
45_1_7_eri bonna abali mu Ruumi, abaagalwa Katonda, abayitibwa okuba abatukuvu: ekisa kibe nammwe n’emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
45_1_8_Okusooka, nneebaza Katonda wange ku bwa Yesu Kristo ku lwammwe mwenna, kubanga okukkiriza kwammwe kubuulirwa mu nsi zonna. 
45_1_9_Kubanga Katonda ye mujulirwa wange, gwe mpeerereza mu mwoyo gwange mu njiri y'Omwana we, bwe ajogera ku mmwe obutamala, 
45_1_10_nga nneegayirira bulijjo mu busaba bwange ndyoke ntambuzibwe buluagi ne baakano, Katonda bw’ayagala, okujja gye muli. 
45_1_11_Kubanga mbalumirwa okubalaba, ndyoke mbawe ku kirabo eky'omwoyo, mulyoke munywezebwe: 
45_1_12_kwe kusanyukagana awamu nammwe olw'okukkiriza kwammwe n'okwange. 
45_1_13_Era, ab'oluganda, saagala muleme kumanya ng'emirundi mingi nalowoozanga okujja gye muli (ne nziyizibwanga okutuusa kaakano), era ndyoke mbeereko n'ebibala mu mmwe, era nga mu mawanga amalala. 
45_1_14_Abayonaani era ne bannaggwanga, ab'amagezi era n'abasirusiru, bammanja. 
45_1_15_Era kyenva njagala okubabuulira enjiri nammwe abali mu Ruumi nga bwe nnyinza. 
45_1_16_Kubanga enjiri tenkwasa nsonyi: kubanga ge maanyi ga Katonda olw’okulokola eri buli akkiriza okusookera Muyudaaya era n'eri Omuyomaani. 
45_1_17_Kubanga mu yo obutuukirivu bwa Katonda bubikkulibwa obuva mu kukkiriza okutuusa mu kukkiriza: nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Naye omutuukirivu anaabanga mulamu lwa kukkiriza. 
45_1_18_Kubanga obusungu bwa Katonda bubikkulibwa okuva mu ggulu ku butatya Katonda bwonna n'obutaba na butuukirivu obw'abantu abaziyiza amazima mu butaba na butuukirivu; 
45_1_19_kubanga ebya Katonda ebimanyika birabika eri bo: kubanga Katonda yabibalabisa. 
45_1_20_Kubanga bibye ebitalabika okuva ku kutonda ensi birabikira ddala nga bitegeererwa ku bitonde, obuyinza bwe obutaggwaawo n'obwakatonda bwe; babeere nga tebalina kya kuwoza: 
45_1_21_kubanga, bwe baamanya Katonda, ne batamugulumizanga nga Katonda newakubadde okumwebazanga, naye ne bagobereranga ebitaliimu mu mpaka zaabwe, omutima gwabwe omusirusiru ne guzikirizibwa. 
45_1_22_Bwe beeyita ab'amagezi, so nga baasiruwala, 
45_1_23_ne bawaanyisa ekitiibwa kya Katonda ataggwaawo okufaanana ekifaananyi ky'omuntu aggwaawo, n'eky'ebibuuka n'eky'ebirina amagulu ana n'eky'ebyewalula. 
45_1_24_Katonda kyeyava abawaayo eri obugwagwa mu kwegomba kw'emitima gyabwe, okwonoonanga ekitiibwa ky'emibiri gyabwe bokka na bokka: 
45_1_25_kubanga amazima ga Katonda baagawaanyisaamu obulimba, ne basinzanga ne baweerezanga ekitonde okusinga Omutonzi, eyeebazibwa emirembe n'emirembe, Amiina. 
45_1_26_Katonda kyeyava abawaaye eri okukwatibwa okw'ensonyi: kubanga abakazi baabwe baawaanyisa ekikolwa kyabwe eky'obuzaaliranwa ne balufuula ekitali kya buzaaliranwa: 
45_1_27_era n'abasajja bwe batyo, bwe baaleka ekikolwa eky'omukazi eky'obuzaaliranwa, ne baakanga mu kwegomba kwabwe bokka na bokka, abasajja n'abasajja nga bakolagananga ebitasaana, era nga baweebwanga mu bo bokka empeera eyo eyasaanira okwonoona kwabwe. 
45_1_28_Era nga bwe batakkiriza kubeera ne Katonda mu magezi gaabwe, Katonda yabawaayo eri omwoyo ogutakkirizibwa, okukolanga ebitasaana; 
45_1_29_nga bajjudde obutaba na butuukirivu bwonna, obubi, okwegomba, ettima; nga bajjudde obuggya, obussi, okuyomba, obukuusa, enge; abageya, 
45_1_30_abalyolyoma, abakyawa Katonda, ab'ekyejo, ab'annalala, abeenvumiriza, abayiiya ebigambo ebibi, abatawulira bazadde baabwe, 
45_1_31_abatalina magezi, abaleka endagaano, abataagalana, abatalina kusaasira: 
45_1_32_abamanya omusango gwa Katonda, nti abakola ebyo basaanidde kufa, tebabikola bukozi, era naye basiima ababikola. 
45_2_1_Kyova olema okube a n'eky'okuwoza, ggwe buli muntu anenya: kubanga ky'anenya munno, weenenyeza ddala wekka; kubanga ggwe anenya okola ebyo. 
45_2_2_Era tumanyi ng'okunenya kwa Katonda nga kwa mazima ku abo abakola bwe batyo. 
45_2_3_Ggwe omuntu, anenya abakola bwe batyo naawe n'okola ebyo, olowooza ng'olirokoka: mu kunenya kwa Katonda? 
45_2_4_Oba onyoomye obugagga bw'obulungi bwe n'obuwombeefu n'okugumiikiriza, nga tomanyi ng'obulungi bwa Katonda bukuleeta mu kwenenya? 
45_2_5_Naye nga bw'olina obukakanyavu n'omutima oguteenenya, weeterekera obusungu obuliba ku lunaku olw'obusungu omusango ogw'ensonga gwa Katonda kwe gulibikkukira 
45_2_7_abanoonya ekitiibwa n'ettendo n'obutaggwaawo mu kugumiikiriza nga bakola bulungi. Alibasasula obulamu obutaggwaawo: 
45_2_8_naye ku abo abayomba n'abatawulira mazima, naye bawulira obutali butuukirivu kulibeera obusungu n'obukambwe, 
45_2_9_okubonyaabonyezebwa n'okulumizibwa ku buli bulamu bw'omuntu akola obubi, okusookera ku Muyudaaya era ne ku Muyonaani: 
45_2_10_naye elutiibwa n'ettendo n'emirembe ki buli akola obulungi, okusookera ki Muyudaaya era ne ku Muyonaani 
45_2_11_kubanga Katonda tasosola mi bantu. 
45_2_12_Kubanga bonna abaayonoonanga awatali mateeka, era balibula awatali mateeka: era bonna abaayonoonanga nga balina amateeka, balisalirwa omusango n'amateeka; 
45_2_13_kubanga abawulira obu wulizi amateeka si be batuukirivu eri Katonda, naye abakola eby'ama teeka be baliweebwa obutuukirivu 
45_2_14_kubanga ab'amawanga abatalin, mateeka bwe bakola mu buzaalira nwa eby'amateeka, abo, bwe bataba na mateeka, beebeerera amateeka bokka: 
45_2_15_kubanga balaga omulimi gw'amateeka nga gwawandiikibwa; mu mitima gyabwe, omwoyo gwa bwe nga gutegeeza wamu, n’ebiro woozo byabwe nga biroopagana oba nga biwozagana byokka na byokka 
45_2_16_ku lunaku Katonda kw'alisalira omusango gw'ebyama by'abantu ng'enjiri yange bw'eri, ku bwa Yes, Kristo. 
45_2_17_Naye ggwe bw'oyitibwa Omuyudaaya, ne weesigama ku mateeka ne weenyumiririza mu Katonda 
45_2_18_n'omanya by'ayagala, n'osiima ebisinga obulungi, ng'oyigirizibwa mu mateeka, 
45_2_19_ne weetegeera ggwe okubeera omusaale w'abaziba b'amaaso, omusana gw'abali mu kizikiza, 
45_2_20_omulagirizi w'abatalina magezi, omuyigiriza w'abaana abato ng'olina ekyokulabirako eky'amagezi n'eky'amazima mu mateeka 
45_2_21_kale ggwe ayigiriza omulala teweeyigiriza wekka? abuulira obutabbanga, obba? 
45_2_22_ayogera obutayendanga, oyenda? akyawa ebifaananyi, obba eby'omu biggwa 
45_2_23_eyeenyumiririza mu mateeka olw'okusobya amateeka oswaza Katonda? 
45_2_24_Kubanga erinnya lya Katonda liwoolebwa mu b'amawanga ku lwammwe, nga bwe kyawandiikibwa. 
45_2_25_Kubanga okukomolebwa kugasa bw’okwata amateeka: naye bw’oba omusobya w'amateeka okukomolebwa kwo kufuuse butakomolebwa. 
45_2_26_Kale atali mukomole bw'akwata ebiragiro ebiri mumateeka, obutakomolebwa bwe tebulibalibwa kuba kukomolebwa? 
45_2_27_era atali mukomole mu buzaaliranwa, bw'atuukiriza amateeka, alikusalira musango ggwe, omusobya w'amateeka, ng'olina ennunta n'okukamolebwa? 
45_2_28_Kubanga Omuyudaaya ow'okungulu si ye Muyudaaya; so n'okukomolebwa w'omubiri okw'okungulu si kwe kukomolebwa: 
45_2_29_naye Omuyudaaya ow'omunda ye Muyudaaya; n’okukomolebwa kwe kw'omutima, mu mwoyo, si mu nnukuta; atatenderezebwa bantu, wabula Katonda. 
45_3_1_Kale Omuyudaaya asinga atya? oba n'okukomolebwa kugasa ki? 
45_3_2_Kubanga nnyo mu bigambo byonna: eky'olubereberye kubanga bateresebwa Katonda bye yayogera. 
45_3_3_Kubanga kiba ki abamu bwe ataba na kukkiriza, obutakkiriza bwabwe buliggyawo obwesigwa bwa Katonda? 
45_3_4_Kitalo: nedda, Katonda abeerenga wa mazima, naye buli muntu abeerenga mulimba; nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Obeere n'obutuukirivu mu bigambo byo, Osinge bw'osalirwa omusango. 
45_3_5_Naye obutali butuukirivu bwaffe we butenderezesa obutuukirivu bwa Katonda, tunaayogera tutya? Katonda talina butuukirivu aleeta busungu? (Njogera mu buntu.) 
45_3_6_Kitalo: kubanga, (bwe kiba bwe kityo), Katonda alisalira atya ensi omusango? 
45_3_7_Naye amazima ga Katonda bwe geeyongera okulabika olw'obulimba bwange ye n'aweebwa kitiibwa, nze kiki ekinsaliza omuaago nate ng'omwonoonyi 
45_3_8_era kiki ekitulobera okwogera (nga bwe uwaayirizibwa, era ng'abamu bwe boogera nti tugamba) nti Tukolenga ebibi, ebirungi biryoke bijje? abo okusalirwa omusango kwa nsonga. 
45_3_9_Kale kiki? ffe zisanze okusinga bo? Nedda n'akatono: kubanga tusoose okuwawaabira Abayudaaya na n'Abayonaani nti bonna bafugibwa kibi; 
45_3_10_nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Tewali mutuukirivu n'omu; 
45_3_11_Tewali ategeera, Tewali anoonya Katonda; 
45_3_12_Bonna baakyama, baafuuka bata. saana wamu; Tewali akola obulungi, tewali n'omu; 
45_3_13_Omumiro gwabwe ye ntaana eyasaamiridde; Balimba n'ennimi zaabwe; Obusagwa bw'embalasaasa buli wansi w'emimwa gyabwe: 
45_3_14_Akamwa kaabwe kajjudde okukolima n'okukaawa: 
45_3_15_Ebigere byabwe byanguwa okuyiwa omusaayi; 
45_3_16_Okuzikirira n'obunaku biri mu makubo gaabwe; 
45_3_17_So tebamanyanga kkubo lya mirembe: 
45_3_18_Tewali kutya Katonda mu maaso gaabwe. 
45_3_19_Naye tumanyi nga byonna amateeka bye googera, gagamba abo abalina amateeka; buli kamwa konna kazibibwe, n'ensi zonna zibeereko omusango eri Katonda: 
45_3_20_kubanga olw'ebikolwa by'amateeka alina omubiri yenna taliweebwa butuukirivu mu maaso ge: kubanga amateeka ge gamanyisa ekibi. 
45_3_21_Naye kaakano awatali mateeka obutuukirivu bwa Katonda, obutegeezebwa amateeka ne bannabbi, bulabisibwa; 
45_3_22_bwe butuukirivu bwa Katonda olw'okukkiriza Yesu Kristo eri bonna abakkiriza; kubanga tewali njawulo; 
45_3_23_kubanga bonna baayonoona, ne bataruuka ku kitiibwa kya Katonda; 
45_3_24_naye baweebwa obutuukirivu bwa buwa lwa kisa kye olw'okuaunulibwa okuli mu Kristo Yesu: 
45_3_25_Katonda gwe yassaawo okuba omutango, olw'okukkiriza omusaayi gwe, okulaga obutuukirivu bwe, olw'okuleka ebibi ebyakolebwanga edda, Katonda ng'agumiikiriza; 
45_3_26_okulaga obutuukirivu bwe mu biro bino: alyoke abeere omutuukirivu era ng'awa obutuukirivu akkiriza Yesu. 
45_3_27_Kale okwenyumiriza kuli luuyi wa? Kwaziyizibwa. Kwaziyizibwa n'amateeka gafaanana gatya? ga bikolwa? Nedda: naye n'amateeka ga kukkiriza. 
45_3_28_Kyetuva tubala ng'omuntu aweebwa obutuukirivu lwa kukkiriza awatali bikolwa bya mu mateeka. 
45_3_29_Oba Katonda, Katonda wa Bayudaaya? era si Katonda wa ba mawanga? Weewaawo, era wa ba mawanga: 
45_3_30_oba nga Katonda ali omu, aliwa obutuukirivu abakomole olw'okukkiriza, n'abatali bakomole olw'okukkiriza. 
45_3_31_Kale amateeka tuga ggyawo olw'okukkiriza? Kitalo: nedda, tuganyweza bunyweza. 
45_4_1_Kale kiki kye tunaayogera Ibulayimu jjajjaffe mu mubiri kye yalaba. 
45_4_2_Kubanga Ibulayimu singa yaweebwa obutuukirivu olw'ebikolwa, singa alina ekimwenyumirizisa; naye talina mu maaso ga Katonda. 
45_4_3_Kubanga ebyawandiikibwa byogera bitya? Ibulayimu n'akkiriza Katonda, ne kumubalirwa okuba obutuukirivu. 
45_4_4_Kale, omukozi empeera ye temubalirwa lwa kisa, naye ng'ebbanja. 
45_4_5_Naye atakola, kyokka n'akkiriza oyo awa obutuukirivu abatatya Katonda, okukkiriza kwe kumubalirwa okuba obutuukirivu. 
45_4_6_Era nga Dawudi bw'ayogera omukisa gw'omuntu, Katonda gw'abalira obutuukirivu awatali bikolwa, nti 
45_4_7_Baweereddwa omukisa abaggibwako ebyonoono byabwe, Ebibi byabwe byabikkibwako. 
45_4_8_Aweereddwa omukisa omuntu Mukama gw'atalibalira kibi. 
45_4_9_Kale omukisa ogwo guli ku bakomole bokka, oba nantiki ku abo abatali bakomole? Kubanga tugambye nti okukkiriza kwe kwabalirwa Ibulayimu okuba obutuukirivu. 
45_4_10_Kale kwabalwa kutya? bwe yali ng'akomoleddwa, nantiki bwe yali nga tannakomolebwa? si bwe yali ng'akomoleddwa, naye nga tannakomolebwa: 
45_4_11_n'aweebwa ekyokulabirako eky'okukomolebwa, akabonero k'obutuukirivu obw'okukkiriza kwe yalina nga tannakomolebwa: alyoke abeerenga jjajjaabwe bonna abakkiriza nga si bakomole, babalirwenga obutuukirivu; 
45_4_12_era ne jjajja w'abakomole, so si w'abo abakomole obukomozi, naye, abatambulira mu bigere by'okukkiriza kwa jjajjaffe Ibulayimu kwe yalina nga tannakomolebwa. 
45_4_13_Kubanga okusuubiza tekwaweerwa Ibulayimu newakubadde ezzadde lye mu mateeka, nti alibeera musika wa nsi zonna, wabula mu butuukirivu abw'okukkiriza. 
45_4_14_Kubanga ab'omu mateeka singa be basika, okukkiriza singa kudibye, era n'okusuubiza singa kuggiddwawo: 
45_4_15_kubanga amateeka galeeta obusungu; naye awatali mateeka, era tewabaawo kwonoona. 
45_4_16_Kyekuva kuva mu kukkiriza, kulyoke kubeerenga kwa kisa, okusuubiza kulyoke kunywere eri ezzadde lyonna, si eri ab'omu mateeka bokka, naye era n'eri ab'omu kukkiriza kwa Ibulayimu, ye jjajjaffe fenna 
45_4_17_(nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Nkufudde jjajja w'amawanga amangi) mu maaso g'oyo gwe yakkiriza, ye Katonda, azuukiza abafu, era ayita ebitaliiwo ngrebiriwo. 
45_4_18_Eyakkiriza mu ssuubi awatasuubirikika, alyoke abeerenga jjajja w'amawanga amangi, nga bwe kyayogerwa nti Ezzadde lyo liriba bwe lityo.
