45_4_19_N'atanafuwa mu kukkiriza bwe yalowooza omubiri gwe ye nga gufudde (nga yaakamala emyaka nga kikumi), n'olubuto lwa Saala nga lufudde: 
45_4_20_naye mu kusuubiza kwa Katonda teyabuusabuusa mu butakkiriza, naye n'afuna amaanyi olw'okukkiriza, ng'agulumiza Katonda, 
45_4_21_era ng'ategeerera ddala nga bye yasuubiza era ayinza n'okubikola. 
45_4_22_Era kyekwava kumubalirwa okuba obu tuukirivu. 
45_4_23_Naye tekyawandiikibwa ku lulwe yekka nti kwamubalirwa; 
45_4_24_naye era ne ku lwaffe, abagenda okubalirwa, abakkiriza oyo eyazuukiza Yesu Mukama waffe mu bafu, 
45_4_25_eyaweebwayo olw'ebyonoono byaffe n'azuukira olw'okutuweesa obutuukirivu. 
45_5_1_Kale bwe twaweebwa obutuukirivu olw'okukkiriza, tubeerenga n'emirembe eri Katonda ku bwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, 
45_5_2_era eyatuweesa olw'okukkiriza okutuuka mu kisa kino kye tuyimiriddemu; era twenyumirizenga olw'okusuubira ekitiibwa kya Katonda. 
45_5_3_So si ekyo kyokka, era naye twenyumirizenga mu kubonaabona kwaffe, nga tumanyi ng'okubonaabona kuleeta Okugumiikiriza 
45_5_5_nate okusuubira tekukwasa nsonyi, kubanga okwagala kwa Katonda kufukiddwa ddala mu mitima gyaffe, ku bw'Omwoyo Omutukuvu gwe twaweebwa. 
45_5_6_Kubanga bwe twali nga tukyali banafu, mu ntuuko ze Kristo yafiirira abatatya Katonda. 
45_5_7_Kubanga kizibu omuntu okufiirira omutuukirivu; kubanga omulungi mpozzi omuntu aguma n'okumufiirira. 
45_5_8_Naye Katonda atenderezesa okwagala kwe ye gye tuli, kubanga bwe twali nga tukyalina ebibi Kristo n'atufiirira. 
45_5_9_Kale okusinga ennyo kaakano bwe twaweebwa obutuukirivu olw'omusaayi gwe, tugenda kulokoka mu busungu ku bubwe. 
45_5_10_Kuba obanga bwe twali tukyali balabe, twatabaganyizibwa ne Katonda olw'okufa kw'Omwana we, okusinga ennyo bwe twatabaganyizibwa tulirokoka olw'obulamu bwe; 
45_5_11_so si ekyo kyokka, era naye nga twenyumiririza mu Katonda ku bwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, atuweesezza kaakano okutabagana. 
45_5_12_Olw'ebyo, nga ku bw'omuntu omu ekibi bwe kyayingira mu nsi, okufa ne kuyingira olw'ekibi, bwe kityo okufa ne kubuna ku bantu bonna kubanga bonna baayonoona: 
45_5_13_kubanga okutuusa ku mateeka ekibi kyali mu nsi: naye ekibi tekibalibwa, awataba mateeka. 
45_5_14_Naye okufa kwafuga okuva ku Adamu okutuusa ku Musa, era ne ku abo abataasobya ng'engeri ey'okwonoona kwa Adamu, ye kye kifaananyi ky'oyo agenda okujja. 
45_5_15_Naye ng'okwonoona kuli bwe kwali, era n'ekirabo tekyali bwe kityo. Kuba obanga olw'okwonoona kw'omu abaafa bangi, okusinga ennyo ekisa kya Katonda n'ekirabo olw'ekisa ky'omuntu oli omu Yesu Kristo kyasukkirira okubuna abangi. 
45_5_16_Era nga bwe kwajja ku bw'omu eyayonoona, ekirabo tekyali bwe kityo: kubanga omusango gwava ku omu okusinga, naye ekirabo ne kiva mu byonoono ebingi okuweesa obutuukirivu. 
45_5_17_Kuba obanga olw'okwonoona kw'omu okufa kwafuga ku bw'omu, okusinga ennyo abo abaweebwa ekisa ekisukkirivu n'ekirabo eky'obutuukirivu balifigira mu bulamu ku bw'oyo omu Yesu Kristo. 
45_5_18_Kale bwe kityo ng'olw'okwonoona kw'omu omisango bwe gwasinga abantu bonna bwe kityo n'olw'obutuukirivu bw'mu ekirabo kyali ku bantu bonna okuweesa obutuukirivu bw'obulamu 
45_5_19_Kuba ng'olw'obutawulira bw'omuntu omu oli abangi bwe baafut ka ababi, bwe kityo n'olw'okuwulira kw'oyo omu abangi balifuuka abatuukirivu. 
45_5_20_Era n'amateeka ne gayingira, okwonoona kusukkirire; naye ekibi bwe kyasukkirira ekisa ne kisinga okusukkirira 
45_5_21_ng'ekibi bwe kyafugira mu kifa era n'ekisa bwe kityo kiryoke kifuga olw'obutuukirivu okuweesa obulamu obutaggwaawo, ku bwa Yesu Kristo Mukama waffe. 
45_6_1_Kale tunaayogeza tutya? Tunyiikirenga okukola ekibi ekisa kyeyongerenga? 
45_6_2_Kitalo Abafa ku kibi, tunaabeeranga tutya abalamu mu kyo nate? 
45_6_3_Oba temumanyi nga ffe fenna, abaabatizibwa okuyingira mu Kristo Yesu nga twabatizibwa kuyingira mu kufa kwe? 
45_6_4_Kyetwava tuziikibwa awamu naye mu kubatizibwa okuyingira mu kufa: nga Kristo bwe yaztialazibwa mu bafu olw'ekitii bwa kya Kitaawe, bwe tutyo naffe tutambulirenga mu bulamu obuggya. 
45_6_5_Kuba obanga twagattibwa wamu naye mu kifaananyi ky'okufa kwe, era tuligattibwa ne m kifaananyi ky'okuzuukira kwe 
45_6_6_bwe tumanya kino ng'omuntu waffe ow'edda yakomererwa. wamu naye, omubiri gw'ekibi gulyoka guggibwewo, tuleme okubeeranga nate abaddu b'ekibi 
45_6_8_Naye oba nga twafiira wamu ne Kristo, era tukkiriza nga tulibeera balamu wamu naye 
45_6_10_Kubanga okufa kwe yafa yafa ku kibi omulundi gumu: naye obulamu bw'alina, ali nabwo eri Katonda. 
45_6_11_Bwe mutyo nammwe mwerowoozenga okubeera abafa ku kibi, naye abalam eri Katonda mu Kristo Yesu. 
45_6_12_Kale ekibi kiremenga okufuga nu mubiri gwammwe ogufa, okuvuliranga okwegomba kwagwo: 
45_6_13_so temuwangayo bitundu byanmwe eri ekibi okubanga eby'okukoza obutali butuukirivu; aaye nwewengayo eri Katonda, ng'abaamu abaava mu bafu, n'ebitundu byammwe okubanga eby'okukoza butuukirivu eri Katonda. 
45_6_14_Kubanga ekibi tekiibenga mukama wammwe; kubanga amateeka si ge gabafuga, wabula ekisa. 
45_6_15_Kale tukole tutya? tukolenga kibi, kubanga amateeka si ge atufuga, wabula ekisa? Kitalo. 
45_6_16_Temumanyi nga gwe mwewa okuba abaddu b'okuwulira, muli baddu b'oyo gwe muwulira, oba ab'ekibi okuleeta okufa, oba ab'okuwulira okuleeta obutuukirivu? 
45_6_17_Naye Katonda yeebale, kubanga mwavanga baddu ba kibi, naye mwawulira mu mutima engeri eyo y'okuyigirizibwa gye mwaweebwa; 
45_6_18_kale bwe mwaweebwa eddembe kuva mu kibi, ne mufuuka abaddu bobutuukirivu. 
45_6_19_Njogera mu buntu olw'obunafu bw'omubiri wammwe: kuba nga bwe mwawagayo ebitundu byammwe okuba baddu eri obugwagwa n'eri obujeemu okujeemanga, bwe mutyo kaakano muwengayo ebitundu byanmwe okubanga abaddu eri obuuukirivu okutukuzibwa. 
45_6_20_Kubanga bwe mwabanga abaddu b'ekibi, mwabanga ba ddembe eri butuukirivu. 
45_6_21_Kale bibala ki bye mwalina mu biro biri eby'ebigambo ebibakwasa ensonyi kaakano? kubanga enkomerero yaabyo kufa. 
45_6_22_Naye kaakano bwe mwaveebwa eddembe okuva mu kibi, ne nufuuka abaddu ba Katonda, mulina ebibala byammwe olw'okutukuzibwa, n'enkomerero bulamu obuaggwaawo. 
45_6_23_Kubanga empeera y'ekibi kwe kufa; naye ekirabo kya Katonda bwe bulamu obutaggwaavo mu Kristo Yesu Mukama waffe. 
45_7_1_Oba temumanyi, ab'oluganda (kubanga ŋŋamba abategeera amateeka), ng'amateeka gafuga omuntu ng'akyali mulamu? 
45_7_2_Kubanga omukazi afugibwa bba ng'akyali mulamu; naye bba bw'afa, ng'asumuluddwa mu mateeka ga bba. 
45_7_3_Kale bwe kityo bba: bw'aba ng'akyali mulamu bw'anaabanga n'omusajja omulala, anaayitibwanga mwenzi: naye bba bw'afa, nga wabusa eri amateeka, obutaba mwenzi bw'aba n'omusajja omulala. 
45_7_4_Bwe kityo, baganda bange, era nammwe mwafa ku mateeka olw'omubiri gwa Kristo, mubeere n'omulala, ye oyo eyazuukizibwa mu bafu, tulyoke tubalirenga Katonda ebibala. 
45_7_5_Kubanga bwe twabanga mu mubiri, okwegomba okubi, okuliwo olw'amateeka, kwakolanga mu bitundu byaffe okubaliranga okufa ebibala. 
45_7_6_Naye kaakano twasumululwa mu mateeka, bwe twafa ku ekyo ekyabanga kitufuga, ffe tubeerenga abaddu mu buggya obw'omwoyo, so si mu nnukuta ez'edda. 
45_7_7_Kale tunaayogera tutya? Amateeka kye kibi? Kitalo. Naye ssanditegedde kibi, wabula mu mateeka: kubanga ssaadimanye kwegomba, singa amateeka tegaayogera nti Teweegombanga: 
45_7_8_naye ekibi bwe kyalaba we kiyima, ne kikolanga mu nze olw'amateeka okwegomba kwonna: kubanga awataba mateeka ekibi nga kifudde. 
45_7_9_Nange edda nnabanga mulamu awatali mateeka: naye ekiragiro bwe kyajja, ekibi ne kizuukira, nange ne nfa; 
45_7_10_n'ekiragiro ekyali eky'okuleeta obulamu, ekyo ne kirabika gye ndi eky'okuleeta okufa: 
45_7_11_kubanga ekibi, bwe kyalaba we kiyima olw'ekiragiro, ne kinnimba, ne kinzita olw'ekyo. 
45_7_12_Bwe kityo amateeka matukuvu, n'ekiragiro kitukuvu, kituukirivu, kirungi. 
45_7_13_Kale ekirungi kyafuuka kufa gye ndi? Kitalo. Naye ekibi kirabike okuba ekibi, kubanga kye kyandeetera okufa olw'ekirungi; ekibi kiryoke kyeyongerenga okubeera ekibi olw'eki ragiro. 
45_7_14_Kubanga tumanyi ng'amateeka ge g'omwoyo: naye nze ndi wa mubiri, natundibwa okufugibwanga ekibi. 
45_7_15_Kubanga kye nkola, ssikimanyi; kubanga kye njagala si kye nkola; naye kye nkyawa kye nkola. 
45_7_16_Naye oba nga kye ssaagala kye nkola, nzikiriza amateeka nga malungi. 
45_7_17_Kale kaakano ai nze nkikola nate, wabula ekibi ekituula mu nze. 
45_7_18_Kubanga mmanyi nga mu nze, gwe mubiri gwange, temutuula kirungi: kubanga okwagala kumbeera kumpi, naye okukola ekirungi tewali. 
45_7_19_Kubanga kye njagala ekirungi ssikikola: naye kye ssaagala ekibi kye nkola. 
45_7_20_Naye oba nga kye ssaagala kye nkola, si nze nkikola nate, wabula ekibi ekituula mu nze. 
45_7_21_Bwe kityo ndaba etteeka nti nze bwe njagala okukola ekirungi, ekibi kimbeera kumpi. 
45_7_22_Kubanga nsanyukira amateeka ga Katonda mu muntu ow'omunda: 
45_7_23_naye ndaba etteeka eddala mu bitundu byange nga lirwana n'etteeka ly'amagezi gange, era nga lindeeta mu bufuge wansi w'etteeka ly'ekibi eriri mu bitundu byange: 
45_7_24_Nze nga ndi muritu munaku! ani alindokola mu mubiri ogw'okufa kuno? 
45_7_25_Nneebaza Katonda ku bwa Yesu Kristo Mukama waffe. Kale bwe kityo nze nzekka mu magezi ndi muddu wa mateeka ga Katonda, naye mu mubiri wa tteeka lya kibi. 
45_8_1_Kale kaakano tebaliiko musango abali mu Kristo Yesu 
45_8_2_Kubanga etteeka ery'Omwoyo gw'obulamu mu Kristo Yesu lyanfuula ow'eddembe okunziya mu tteeka ly'ekibi n'ery'okufa. 
45_8_3_Kubanga amateeka kye gatayinza, kubanga manafu olw'omubiri, Katonda, bwe yatuma Omwana we ye mu kifaananyi ky'omubiri ogw'ekibi era olw'ekibi, n'asalira omusango ekibi mu mubiri: 
45_8_4_obutuukirivu bw'amateeka bulyoke butuukirizibwe mu ffe, abatatambula kugoberera mubiri, wabula omwoyo. 
45_8_5_Kubanga abagoberera omubiri, balowooza bya mubiri: naye abagoberera omwoyo, bya mwoyo. 
45_8_6_Kubaaga okulowooza kw'omubiri kwe kufa; naye okulowooza kw'omwoyo bwe bulamu n'emirembe: 
45_8_7_kubanga okulowooza kw'omubiri bwe bulabe eri Katonda; kubangatekufugibwa mateeka ga Katonda, kubanga n'okuyinza tegakuyinza: 
45_8_8_n'abo abali mu mubiri tebayinza kusanyusa Katonda. 
45_8_9_Naye mmwe temuli mu mubiri, wabula mu mwoyo, oba ng'Omwoyo gwa Katonda atuula mu mmwe. Naye omuntu bw'ataba na Mwoyogwa Kristo, oyo si, wuwe. 
45_8_10_Era oba aga Kristo ali'mu mmwe, omubiri nga gufudde olw'ekibi; naye omwoyo bwe bulamu olw'obutuukirivu. 
45_8_11_Naye oba nga Omwoyo gw'oyo eyazuukiza Yesu mu bafu atuula mu mmwe, oyo eyazuukiza Kristo Yesu mu bafu, era n'emibiri gyammwe egifa aligifuula emiramu ku bw'Omwoyo gwe atuula mu mmwe. 
45_8_12_Kale nno, ab'oluganda, tulina ebbanja: omubiri si gwe gutubanja; okugobereranga omubiri: 
45_8_13_kubanga bwe munaagobereranga omubiri, mugenda kufa; naye bwe munaafiisanga ebikolwa by'omubiri olw'Omwoyo, muliba balamu. 
45_8_14_Kubanga bonna abakulemberwa Omwoyo gwa Katonda, abo be baana ba Katonda. 
45_8_15_Kubanga temwaweebwa nate mwoyo gwa buddu okutya, naye mwaweebwa Omwoyo ow'okufuuka abaana, atukaabya nti Abba, Kitaffe. 
45_8_16_Omwoyo yennyini wamu n'omwoyo gwaffe ategeeza nga tuli baana ba Katonda: 
45_8_17_naye bwe tuli abaana, era tuli basika: abasika ba Katonda, era abasikira awamu ne Kristo; bwe tubonaabonera awamu, era tulyoke tuweerwe wamu ekitiibwa. 
45_8_18_Kubanga ngera ng'okubonaabona okw'omu biro bya kaakati nga tekutuuka kwenkanyaankanya n'ekitiibwa ekigenda okutubikkulirwa ffe. 
45_8_19_Kubanga okutunuulira ennyo okw'ebitonde kulindirira okubikkulirwa kw'abaana ba Katonda. 
45_8_20_Kubanga ebitonde byateekebwa okufugibwa obutaliimu, si lwa kwagala kwabyo wabula ku bw'oyo eyabifugisa, mu kusuubira nti 
45_8_21_era n'ebitonde byennyini nabyo biriweebwa eddembe okuva mu kufugibwa okuvunda okuyingira mu ddembe ery'ekitiibwa ky'abaana ba Katonda. 
45_8_22_Kubanga tumanyi ng'ebitonde byonna bisinda era birumirwa wamu okutuusa kaakano. 
45_8_23_Era si ekyo kyokka, naye era naffe, abalina ebibala ebibereberye eby'Omwoyo, era naffe tusiada munda yaffe, nga tuliadirira okufuuka abaana, kwe kunuaulibwa kw'omubiri gwaffe. 
45_8_24_Kubanga twalokoka lwa kusuubira: naye ekisuubirwa ekirabika si kusuubira: kubanga ani asuubira ky'alabako? 
45_8_25_Naye bwe tusuubira kye tutalabako, tukirindirira n'okugumiikiriza. 
45_8_26_Era bwe kityo Omwoyo atubeera obunafu bwaffe: kubaaga tetutnanyi kusaba nga bwe kitugwanira: naye Omwoyo yennyini atuwolereza n'okusinda okutayogerekeka; 
45_8_27_naye akebera emitima amanyi okulowooza kw'Omwoyo bwe kuli, kubanga awolereza abatukuvu nga Katonda bw'ayagala. 
45_8_28_Era tumanyi nti eri abo abaagala Katonda era abayitibwa ng'okuteesa kwe bwe kuli, ebintu byonna abibakolera wamu olw'obulungi. 
45_8_29_Kubanga bwe yamanya edda, era yabaawula dda okufaananyizibwa n'engeri y'Omwana we, abeerenga omubereberye mu b'oluganda abangi: 
45_8_30_era be yayawula edda, abo era yabayita: era be yayita, yabawa abo era obutuukirivu: era be yawa obutuukirivu, yabawa abo era ekitiibwa. 
45_8_31_Kale tunaayogera tutya ku ebyo? Katonda bw'abeera ku lwaffe, omulabe waffe ani? 
45_8_32_Ataagaana Mwana we ye, naye n'amuwaayo ku lwaffe fenna, era talitugabira bintu byonna wamu naye? 
45_8_33_Ani aliroopa abalonde ba Katonda? Katonda abawa obutuukirivu: 
45_8_34_ani alibasalira omusango? Kristo Yesu eyafa, oba okusinga eyazuukira, ali ku mukono ogwa ddyo ogwa Katonda, era atuwolereza. 
45_8_35_Ani alitwawukanya n'okwagala kwa Kristo? kulaba nnaku, oba kulumwa, oba kuyigganyizibwa, oba njala, oba kuba bwereere, oba kabi, oba kitala? 
45_8_36_Nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Tuttibwa obudde okuziba, okutulanga ggwe: Twabalibwa ng'endiga ez'okusalibwa. 
45_8_37_Naye mu ebyo byonna tuwangudde n'okukirawo ku bw'oyo eyatwagala. 
45_8_38_Kubanga ntegeeredde ddala nga newakubadde okufa, newakubadde obulamu, newakubadde bamalayika, newakubadde abafuga, newakubadde ebiriwo, newakubadde ebigenda okubaawo, newakubadde amaanyi, 
45_8_39_newakubadde obugulumivu, newakubadde okugenda wansi, newakubadde ekitonde kyonna ekirala, tebiiyinzenga kutwawukanya na kwagala kwa Katonda okuli mu Kristo Yesu Mukama waffe. 
45_9_1_Njogera amazima mu Kristo sirimba, omwoyo gwange nga guntegeereza mu Mwoyo Omutuukuvu, 
45_9_2_nga nnina ennaku nnyingi n'okulumwa okutamala mu mutim gwange. 
45_9_3_Kubanga nandyagadde nze mwene okukolimirwa Kristo olwa baganda bange, ab'ekika kyange mu mubiri: 
45_9_4_be Baisiraeri abaweebwa okufuuka abaana, n'ekitiibwa, n'endagaano, n'okuteekerwa amateeka, n'okuweerezanga Katonda, n'ebyasuubizibwa 
45_9_6_Naye si kubanga ekigambo kya Katonda kyavaawo Kubanga abava mu Isiraeri, si ba Baisiraeri bonna: 
45_9_7_so si kubanga lye zzadde lya Ibulayimu, kyebav babeera abaana bonna: naye, mu Isaaka ezzadde lyo mwe linaayitirwanga. 
45_9_8_Kwe kugamba nti abaana ab'omubiri, abo si be baana ba Katonda; naye abaana b'okusuubiza be babalibwa okuba ezzadde. 
45_9_9_Kubanga ekigambo kino kye ky'okusuubiza, nti Ng'ebiro ebyo bwe biri ndijja, ne Saala aliba n'omwana. 
45_9_10_Naye si ekyo kyokka; era naye ne Lebbeeka bwe yalina olubuto olw'omu, Isaaka jjajjaffe 
45_9_11_kubanga nga teba nnazaalibwa, so nga tebannakola kirungi oba kibi, okuteesa kwa Katonda mu kulonda kulyoke kunywere, si lwa bikolwa, wabula ku bw'oyo ayita, 
45_9_12_n'agambibwa nti Omukulu aliba muddu wa muto. 
45_9_13_Nga bwe kyawandiikibwa ne Yakobo n'amwagala, naye Essawa n'amukyawa. 
45_9_14_Kale tunaayogera tutya? Obi tali butuukirivu buli eri Katonda Kitalo. 
45_9_15_Kubanga agamba Musa nti Ndisaasira gwe ndisaasira, gwe ndikwatirwa ekisa gwe ndikwatirwa ekisa. 
45_9_16_Kale bwe kityo si ky'oyo ayagala newakubadde addukana, wabula kya Katonda asaasira. 
45_9_17_Kubanga ebyawandiikibwa bigamba Falaawo nti Kyennava nkuyimiriza, ndyoke njoleseze amaanyi gange mu ggwe, era erinnya lyange liryoke libuulirwe mu nsi zonna. 
45_9_18_Kale bwe kityo asaasira gw'ayagala okusaasira, era akakanyaza gw'ayagala okukakanyaza. 
45_9_19_Kale onoŋŋamba nti Kiki ekinunenyesa nate? Kubanga ani aziyiza by'ayagala? 
45_9_20_Naye ekisinga, ggwe omuntu, ggwe ani awatana ne Katonda? Ekibumbe kirigamba eyakibumba nti Kiki ekyakunkoza bw'oti? 
45_9_21_Oba omubumbi talina buyinza ku bbumba, mu kitole kimu okukola ekibya kimu eky'ekitiibwa, n'ekirala eky'ensoiyi? 
45_9_22_Kiki, oba nga Katonda me yayagala okulaga obusungu bwe, n'okumanyisa obuyinza bwe, yagumiikiriza n'okulindirira ennyo ebibya eby'obusungu ebyateekerwateekerwa okuzikirira: 
45_9_23_alyoke manyise obugagga obw'ekitiibwa ye ku bibya eby'okusaasirwa, bye uteekerateekera edda ekitubwa, 
45_9_24_ye ffe, n'okuyita be yayita, si mu Bayudaaya bokka, era naye ne mu y'amawanga? 
45_9_25_Era nga bw'ayogera mu Koseya nti Ndibayita abantu bange, abatali bantu bange; Era ataayagalwa, ayagaliddwa. 
45_9_26_Awo mu kifo kye baagambirwamu nti Mmwe temuli bantu bange, Mwe baliyitirwa abaana ba Katonda omulamu: 
45_9_27_Era Isaaya ayogerera waggulu bya Isiraeri nti Omuwendo gw'abaana ba Isiraeri oba guliba ng'omusenyu gw'ennyanja, ekitundu ekirisigalawo kye kirirokoka: 
45_9_28_kubanga Mukama alikola ekigambo ye ku nsi, ng'akituukiriza era g'akisalako. 
45_9_29_Era nga Isaaya we yasooka okwogera nti Singa Mukama Ow'eggye teyatulekerawo zzadde, Twandifuuse nga Sodomu, era twandifaanayizibbwa nga Ggomola. 
45_9_30_Kale tunaayogera tutya? Nti b'amawanga, abataagobereranga butuukirivu, baatuuka ku butuukivu, bwe butuukirivu obuva mu ukkiriza; 
45_9_31_naye Isiraeri, mu ugobereranga amateeka ag'obutuukirivu, teyatuuka ku mateeka gali. 
45_9_32_Lwaki? Kubanga tebaabugobereranga nga bayima mu kukkiriza, wabula nga mu bikolwa. Beesittala ku jjinja eryo eryesittalwako: 
45_9_33_nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Laba, nteeka mu Sayuuni ejjinja eryesittalwako n'olwazi olugwisa: Era akkiriza oyo talikwasibwa nsonyi. 
45_10_1_Ab'oluganda, kye njagala mu mutima gwange era kye nsaba Katonda ku lwabwe kye kino, balokoke. 
45_10_2_Kubanga mbategeeza nga balina okunyiikiririra Katonda, naye si mu kutegeera. 
45_10_3_Kubanga bwe batamanya butuukirivu bwa Katonda, era bwe bagezaako okutereeza obutuukirivu bwabwe bo bennyini, tebagondera butuukirivu bwa Katonda. 
45_10_4_Kubanga Kristo ye nkomerero y'amateeka olw'okuweesa obutuukirivu buli akkiriza, 
45_10_5_Kubanga Musa awandiika obutuukirivu obuva mu mateeka nti abukola ye aliba omulamu mu bwo. 
45_10_6_Naye obutuukirivu obuva mu kukkiriza bwogera bwe buti nti Toyogeranga mu mutima gwo nti Ani alirinnya mu ggulu? (kwe kuleeta Kristo wansi;) 
45_10_7_newakubadde nti Ani alikka emagombe? (kwe kulinnyisa Kristo okuva mu bafu.) 
45_10_8_Naye bwogera butya? Nti, Ekigambo kiri kumpi naawe, mu kamwako, ne mu mutima gwo: kye kigambo eky'okukkiriza kye tubuulira: 
45_10_9_kubanga bw'oyatula Yesu nga ye Mukama n'akamwa ko, n'okkiriza mu mutima gwo nti Katonda yamuzuukiza mu bafu, olirokoka: 
45_10_10_kubanga omuntu akkiriza na mutima okuweebwa obutuukirivu, era ayatula na kamwa okulokoka. 
45_10_11_Kubanga ebyawandiikibwa byogera nti Buli amukkiriza talikwasibwa nsonyi. 
45_10_12_Kubanga tewali njawulo ya Muyudaaya na Muyonaani: kubanga omu ye Mukama waabwe bonna, ye mugagga eri abo bonna abamukaabirira: 
45_10_13_kubanga, Buli alikaabirira erinnya lya Mukama alirokoka. 
45_10_14_Kale balikaabirira batya gwe batannakkiriza? era balikkiriza batya gwe batannawulirako? era baliwulira batya awatali abuulira? 
45_10_15_era balibuulira batya nga tebatumiddwa? nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Ebigere byabwe nga birungi nnyo ababuulira enjiri ey'ebirungi! 
45_10_16_Naye tebaagondera njiri bonna. Kubanga Isaaya ayogera nti Mukama, ani eyakkiriza ekigambo kyaffe? 
45_10_17_Kale okukkiriza kuva mu kuwulira, n'okuwulira mu kigambo kya Kristo. 
45_10_18_Naye njogera nti Tebawuliranga? Weewaawo, ddala, Eddoboozi lyabyo lyabuna mu nsi zonna, N'ebigambo byabyo okutuuka ku nkomerero z'ensi. 
45_10_19_Naye njogera nti Isiraeri tamanyanga? Musa ye yasooka okwogera nu Ndibakwasa obuggya eri abatali ba ggwanga, Eri eggwanga eritalina magezi ndibasunguwaza. 
45_10_20_Era Isaaya aguma nnyo n'ayogera nti Navumbulibwa abo abatannoonyanga, Nalagibwa eri abo abatambuulirizangako. 
45_10_21_Naye eri Isiraeri ayogera nti Obudde okuziba nagololera emikono gyange abantu abatawulira era abagaana. 
45_11_1_Naye eri Isiraeri ayogera ati Obudde okuziba nagololera emikono gyange abantu abatawulira era abagaana. 
45_11_2_Katonda teyagoba bantu be, be yamanya edda. Oba temumanyi ebya Eriya ebyawandiikibwa bwe byogera? bwe yasaba Katonda ng'ayogera ku Baisiraeri nti 
45_11_3_Mukama, batta bannabbi bo, ne basuula ebyoto byo: nange nfisseewo nzekka, era banoonya obulamu bwange. 
45_11_4_Naye okuddamu kwa Katonda kumugamba kutya? Nti Nze nneefissirizzaawo abasajja kasanvu, abatafikaamiriranga Baali. 
45_11_5_Kale bwe kityo era ne mu biro bino waliwo ekitundu ekyafikkawo mu kulonda okw'ekisa. 
45_11_6_Naye oba nga lwa kisa, si lwa bikolwa nate: oba nga si bwe kityo, ekisa si kisa nate. 
45_11_7_Kale tukole tutya? Isiraeri kye yanoonya, teyakiraba; naye abaalondebwa baakiraba, abalala ne bakakanyazibwa: 
45_11_8_nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Katonda yabawa omwoyo ogw'okubongoota, amaaso ag'obutalaba, n'amatu ag'obutawulira, okutuusa ku lunaku lwa leero. 
45_11_9_Era Dawudi ayogera nti Emmeeza yaabwe ebafuukire akakunizo n'ekigu, N'enkonge, n'empeera gye bali: 
45_11_10_Amaaso gaabwe gasiikirizibwe obutalaba, Era obakutamyenga omugongo gwabwe bulijjo. 
45_11_11_Kale njogera nti Kyebaava beesittala balyoke bagwe? Kitalo: naye olw'okwonoona kwabwe obulokozi kyebwava bujja eri ab'amawanga, okubakwasa obuggya. 
45_11_12_Naye oba ng'okwonoona kwabwe bwe bugagga bw'ensi, n'okuweebuuka kwabwe bwe bugagga bw'ab'amawanga; okutuukirira kwabwe tekusinga nnyo? 
45_11_13_Naye mbagamba mmwe ab'amawanga. Kale kubanga nze ndi mutume wa b'amawanga, ngulumiza okuweereza kwange: 
45_11_14_bwe ndiraba ekigambo kyonna kye ndikwasisa obuggya ab'omubiri gwange, ne ndokola abamu mu bo. 
45_11_15_Kuba oba ng'okugobebwa kwabwe kwe kutabaganya ensi, okusembezebwa kwabwe kiki, wabula obulamu mu bafu? 
45_11_16_Era ebibala ebibereberye bwe biba ebitukuvu, era n'ekitole kitukuvu: era ekikolo bwe kiba ekitukuvu, era n'amatabi matukuvu. 
45_11_17_Naye oba ng'amatabi agamu gaawogolebwa, naawe, eyali omuzeyituuni ogw'omu nsiko, wasimbibwa mu go, n'ogatta wamu nago ekikolo eky'obugevvu obw'omuzeyituuni; 
45_11_18_teweenyumiririzanga ku matabi: naye bwe weenyumirizanga, si ggwe weetisse ekikolo, naye ekikolo kye kyetisse ggwe. 
45_11_19_Kale onooyogera nti Amatabi kyegaava gawogolwa Me nsimbibweko. 
45_11_20_Weewaawo; gaawogolwa lwa butakkiriza, naawe onywedde lwa kukkiriza. Teweegulumizanga, naye tyanga: 
45_11_21_kuba oba nga Katonda teyasaasira matabi ga buzaaliranwa, era naawe talikusaasira. 
45_11_22_Kale laba obulungi n'obukambwe bwa Katonda: eri abaagwa, bukambwe; naye eri ggwe bulungi bwa Katonda, bw'onoobeereranga mu bulungi bwe: bw'otoobeererenga, naawe oliwogolwa. 
45_11_23_Era nabo, bwe bataabeererenga mu butakkiriza bwabwe balisimbwawo: kubanga Katonda ayinza okubasimbawo nate. 
45_11_24_Kuba oba nga ggwe wawogolwa ku muzeyituuni ogwali ogw'omu nsiko mu buzaaliranwa, n'osimbibwa mu muzeyituuni omulungi obutagoberera buzaaliranwa, abo, ab'obuzaaliranwa; tebalisinga nnyo kusimbibwa mu muzeyituuni gwabwe bo? 
45_11_25_Kubanga ssaagala mmwe, ab'oluganda, obutamanya kyama kino, mulemenga okubeera ab'amagezi mu maaso gammwe mwekka, ng'obukakanyavu bwabeera ku Baisiraeri mu kitundu, okutuusa okutuukirira kw'ab'amawanga lwe kulituuka; 
45_11_26_era bwe kityo Abaisiraeri bonna balirokoka: nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Muliva mu Sayuuni Awonya; Aliggyawo obutatya Katonda mu Yakobo: 
45_11_27_Era eno ye ndagaano yange eri bo, bwe ndibaggyako ebibi byabwe. 
45_11_28_Mu njiri, be balabe ku lwammwe: naye mu kulondebwa, baagalwa ku lwa bajjajja. 
45_11_29_Kubanga ebirabo n'okuyita kwa Katonda tebyejjusibwa. 
45_11_30_Kuba nga mmwe edda bwe mutaawulira Katonda, naye kaakati musaasiddwa olw'obutawulira bw'abo, 
45_11_31_bwe kityo nabo kaakati tebawulidde, olw'okusaasirwa kwammwe kaakati nabo balyoke basaasirwe. 
45_11_32_Kubanga Katonda yasiba bonna mu butawulira, alyoke asaasire bonna. 
45_11_33_Obuziba bw'obugagga obw'amagezi a'obw'okumanya kwa Katonda tomanyi bwe buli! emisango gye nga tegikeberekeka, n'amakubo ge nga tegekkaanyizika! 
45_11_34_Kubanga ani eyali amanye ebirowoozo bya Mukama? oba ani eyali amuwadde amagezi? 
45_11_35_oba ani eyali asoose okumuwa ekintu, era eliddizibwa nate? 
45_11_36_Kubanga byonna biva gy'ali, era biyita gy'ali, era bituuka gy'ali. Ekitiibwa kibeerenga gy'ali emirembe gyonna Amiina. 
45_12_1_Kyenvudde mbeegayirira, ab'oluganda, olw'okusaayi: kwa Katonda, okuwangayo emibiri gyammwe, ssaddaaka ennamu, entukuvu, esanyusa Katonda, kwe kuweereza kwammwe okw'amagezi. 
45_12_2_So temufaananyizibwanga ng'emirembe gino: naye mukyusibwe nga olw'okufuula amagezi gammwe amaggya, mulyoke mukemenga bwe biri Katonda by'ayagala, ebirungi ebisanyusa, ebituufu. 
45_12_3_Kubanga njogera, olw'ekisa kye nnaweebwa, eri buli muntu ali mu mmwe, alemenga okwerowooza oku singa bwe kimugwanidde okulo wooza; naye okulowoozanga ng yeegendereza, nga Katonda bwe yagabira buli muntu ekigera ky'o kukkiriza. 
45_12_4_Kubanga bwe tulina ebitundu ebingi mu mubiri ogumu naye ebitundu byonna tebirina mu limu gumu: 
45_12_5_bwe kityo ffe abangi tuli omubiri gumu mu Kristo, na buli muntu tuli ebitundu bya baana ffe fekka na fekka. 
45_12_6_Era nga bwe tulina ebitenkanankana ng'ekisa kyetwawebwa bwe kiri, oba bunabbi (tubuulirenga) mu kigera kyokukiriza kwaffe 
45_12_9_Okwagala kubeerenga kw’amazima. Mukyawenga obubi, mwegattenga n'obulungi. 
45_12_10_Mu kwagala kw'ab'oluganda mwagalanenga mwekka ne mwekka; mu kitiibwa buli muntu agulumizenga munne; 
45_12_11_mu kunyiikira si bagayaavu; abasanyufi mu mwoyo; nga mubeeranga baddu ba Mukama waffe; 
45_12_12_musanyukenga mu kusuubira; mugumiikirizenga mu bunaku; munyiikirenga mu kusaba; 
45_12_13_mugabirenga abatukuvu bye beetaaga; mwanirizenga abageayi. 
45_12_14_Musabirenga ababayigganya; musabirenga, so temukolimanga. 
45_12_15_Musanyukirenga wamu n'abo abasanyuka; mukaabirenga wamu n'abo abakaaba. 
45_12_16_Mulowoozenga bumu mwekka na mwekka. Temwegulumizanga, naye mugendenga n'abo abatalina bukulu. Temubanga ba magezi mu naaso gammwe mwekka. 
45_12_17_Tenuwalananga muntu kibi olw'ekibi. Awetegekenga ebirungi mu maaso g’abantu bonna. 
45_12_18_Oba nga kiyinzika, ku luuyi lwammwe, mutabaganenga n'abantu bonna. 
45_12_19_Temuwalananga mwekka ggwanga, baagalwa, naye waakiri musegulienga obusungu: kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti Okuwalana kwange; nze ndisasula, bw'ayogera Mukama. 
45_12_20_Naye omulabe wo bw'alumwanga enjala, muliisenga; bw'alumwanga ennyonta, munywesenga kubanga bw'okola bw'otyo, olinukumira amanda g'omuliro ku mutwe gwe. 
45_12_21_Towangulwanga bubi, naye wangulanga obubi olw'obulungi. 
45_13_1_Buli muntu awulirenga abakulu abafuga: kubanga tewali bukulu butava eri Katonda; n'abakulu abaliwo baalagirwa Katonda. 
45_13_2_Awakanya obukulu kyava awa:anya okulagira hwa Katonda: era bawakana balyezzaako omusango bo bokka. 
45_13_3_Kubanga abafuga si ba kutiisa mu kikolwa ekirungi, wabula mu kibi: Era oyagala obutatya bukulu? kola bulungi, alikusiima: 
45_13_4_kubanga ye muweereza wa Katonda eri ggwe olw'obulungi. Naye bw'okola obubi, tya; kubanga tawatira kitala bwereere: kubanga ye nuweereza wa Katonda, awalana obusungu ku oyo akola obubi. 
45_13_5_Kyekivudde kibagwanira okuwulira, si lwa busungu bwokka, naye lwa ku lw'omwoyo gwammwe. 
45_13_6_Era kyemuva muwa omusolo; kubanga be baweereza ba Katonda, nga baayiikirira mu mulimu ogwo. 
45_13_7_Musasulenga bonna amabanja gaabwe: ab'omusolo musolo; ab'empooza mpooza; ab'okutiibwa kutya; ab'ekitiibwa kitiibwa. 
45_13_8_Temubeeranga na bbanja lyonna eri omuntu yenna, wabula okwagalananga: kubanga ayagala muntu munne, ng'atuukirizza amateeka. 
45_13_9_Kubanga kino ati Toyendanga, tottanga, tobbanga, teweegombanga, n'etteeka eddala lyonna, ligattiddwa mu kino, nti Yagalanga muntu munno nga bwe weeyagala wekka. 
45_13_10_Okwagala tekukola bubi muntu munne: okwagala kyekuva kutuukiriza amateeka. 
45_13_11_Era mukolenga bwe mutyo, kubanga mumanyi ebiro, ng'obudde butuuse kaakano mmwe okuzuukuka mu tulo: kubanga kaakano obulokozi bwaffe nuli kumpi okusinga bwe twakkiriza. 
45_13_12_Ekiro kiyise, obudde bunaatera okukya: kale twambule ebikolwa eby'ekizikiza, era twambale ebyokulwanyisa eby'omusana. 
45_13_13_Tutambulenga nga tuwoomye nga mu musana, si mu binyumu ne mu mbaga ez'okutamiiranga, si mu bwenzi n'obukaba, si mu kuyombanga n'obuggya. 
45_13_14_Naye mwambale Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, so temutegekeranga mubiri, olw'okwegomba. 
45_14_1_Naye atali munywevu mu kukkiriza mumusembezenga, naye si lwa kusala musango gwa mpaka. 
45_14_2_Omulala akkiriza n'okulya n'alya byonna: naye atali munywevu alya nva. 
45_14_3_Alya tanyoomanga atalya; era atalya tasaliranga musango alya: kubanga Katonda yamusembeza. 
45_14_4_Ggwe ani asalira omusango omuweereza wa beene? eri mukama we yekka ayimirira oba agwa. Naye aliyimirira; kubanga Mukama waffe ayinza okumuyimiriza. 
45_14_5_Omuntu omulala alowooza olunaku olumu okusinga olulala, omulala alowooza ennaku zonna okwenkanankana. Buli muntu ategeererenga ddala mu magezi ge yekka. 
45_14_6_Alowooza olunaku, alulowooza ku bwa Mukama waffe: n'oyo alya, alya ku bwa Mukama waffe, kubanga yeebaza Katonda; n'oyo atalya, talya ku bwa Mukama waffe, era yeebaza Katonda. 
45_14_7_Kubanga tewali muntu mu ffe eyeebeerera omulamu ku bubwe yekka, era tewali eyeefiira ku bubwe yekka. 
45_14_8_Kubanga bwe tubeera abalamu, tuba balamu ku bwa Mukama waffe: oba bwe tufa, tufa ku bwa Mukama waffe: kale, bwe tuba abalamu, oba bwe tufa, tuba ba Mukama waffe. 
45_14_9_Kubanga Kristo kyeyava afa n'abeera omulamu, alyoke abeerenga Mukama w'abafu era n'abalamu. 
45_14_10_Naye ggwe kiki ekikusaliza omusango muganda wo? oba naawe kiki ekikunyoomesa muganda wo? kubanga fenna tuliyimirira mu maaso g'entebe ey'emisango eya Katonda. 
45_14_11_Kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti Nga bwe ndi omulamu, bw'ayogera Mukama, buli vviivi lirinfukaamirira, Na buli lulimi lulyatula Katonda. 
45_14_12_Kale bwe kityo buli muntu mu ffe alibalirira omuwendo gwe yekka eri Katonda. 
45_14_13_Kale tulemenga okusalira bannaffe emisango nate fekka na fekka: naye waakiri musale omusango guno, obutaleeteranga wa luganda ekyesittaza oba nkonge. 
45_14_14_Mmanyi era ntegeeredde ddala mu Mukama waffe Yesu, nga tewali kiutu kya muzizo mu buwangwa bwakyo: wabuta eri oyo akirowooza nga kya muzizo, kiba kya muzizo. 
45_14_15_Kuba oba nga mugaada wo anakuwala olw'emmere, nga tokyatambulira mu kwagala. Tomuzikirizanga lwa mmere yo oyo Kristo gwe yafiirira. 
45_14_16_Kale ekirungi kyammwe kiremenga okuvumibwa: 
45_14_17_kubanga obwakabaka bwa Katonda si kwe kulya n'okunywa, wabula butuukirivu na mirembe na ssanyu mu Mwoyo Omutukuvu: 
45_14_18_Kubanga aweereza Kristo bw'ati asanyusa nnyo Katonda, n'abantu bamusiima. 
45_14_19_Kale bwe kityo tugobererenga eby'emirembe, n'eby'okuzimbagananga fekka na fekka. 
45_14_20_Toyonoonanga mulimu gwa Katonda lwa mmere. Byonna birungi; naye kinaabanga kibi eri oyo alya nga yeesittala. 
45_14_21_Kirungi obutalyanga nnyama newakubadde okunywanga omwenge, newakubadde okukolanga byonna ebyesitazza muganda wo oba ebimunyiiza oba ebimunafuya. 
45_14_22_Okukkiriza kw'olina, beeranga nakwo wekka mu maaso ga Katonda. Oyo alina omukisa ateesalira musango mu kigambo ky'asiima. 
45_14_23_Naye oyo abuusabuusa azza musango bw'alya, kubanga talya mu kukkiriza; na buli ekitava mu kukkiriza, kye kibi. 
45_15_1_Era ffe abalina amaanyi kitugwanidde okwetikkanga obunafu bw'abo abatalina maanyi, so si kwesanyusanga fekka. 
45_15_2_Buli muntu mu ffe asanyusenga munne mu bulungi olw'okuzimba. 
45_15_3_Kubanga era ne Kristo teyeesanyusanga yekka: naye, nga bwe kyawandiikibwa, nti Ebivume byabwe abaakuvuma byagwa ku nze. 
45_15_4_Kubanga byonna ebyawandiikibwa edda, byawandiikibwa kutuyigiriza ffe, tulyoke tubeerenga n'okusuubira olw'okugumiikiriza n'olw'okusanyusa kw'ebyawandiikibwa. 
45_15_5_Era Katonda w'okugumiikiriza n'okusanyusa abawe mmwe okulowoozanga obumu mwekka na mwekka mu ngeri ya Kristo Yesu: 
45_15_6_mulyoke muwenga ekitiibwa Katonda, Kitaawe wa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, n'omwoyo ogumu n'akamwa akamu. 
45_15_7_Kale musembezaganyenga mwekka na mwekka, nga Kristo bwe yabasembeza mmwe, olw'ekitiibwa kya Katonda. 
45_15_8_Kubanga njogera nti Kristo yali muweereza w'abakomole olw'amazima ga Katonda, okunyweza ebyasuubizibwa eri bajjajja, 
45_15_9_era ab'amawanga balyoke bawenga Katonda ekitubwa olw'okusaasira; nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Kye`nnaavanga nkwatula mu b'amawanga, Era nnaayimbiranga erinnya lyo. 
45_15_10_Era nate syogera nti Musanyukenga, mmwe ab'amawanga, wamu n'abantu be. 
45_15_11_Era nate nti Mutenderezenga Mukama, mmwe ab'amawanga mwenna; Era ebika byonna bimutenderezenga. 
45_15_12_Era nate Isaaya ayogera nti Waliba ekikolo kya Yese, Era ayimirira okufuga ab'amawanga; Oyo ab'amawanga gwe balisuubira. 
45_15_13_Era Kat:onda ow'okusuubirwa abajjuze mmwe essanyu lyonna n’emirembe olw'okukkiriza, mmwe musukkirirenga mu kusuubira, mu maanyi g'Omwoyo Omutukuvu. 
45_15_14_Era nange nze ntegeeredde ddala ebyammwe, baganda bange, nga nammwe mujjudde obulungi, mujjudde okutegeera kwonna, nga muyinza n'okubuuliriragana mwekka na mwekka. 
45_15_15_Naye ne yongedde okuguma katono okul wandiikira, nga kubajjukiza na olw'ekisa kye nnaweebwa Katonda 
45_15_16_nze okubeeranga omuweereza wa Kristo Yesu eri ab'amawanga nga nkolera enjiri ya Katonda omulii gwa kabona, ssaddaaka y'ab'aa wanga eryoke esiimibwe ng'ekuzibwa Omwoyo Omutukuvu. 
45_15_17_Kale okwenyumiriza ndi nak mu Kristo Yesu mu bya Katonda. 
45_15_18_Kubanga siryanijanga kwoga kigambo kyonna wabula Kristo bye yankoza, olw'okuwulira kw'ab'an wanga, mu kigambo ne mu kikolwa, 
45_15_19_mu maanyi g'obubonero n’eby'amagero, mu maanyi g'Omwo Omutukuvu; bwe kityo okuva mu Yerusaalemi n'okwetooloola okutuuka mu Iruliko, natuukiriza enjiri Kristo; 
45_15_20_naye nga njagala ekitiibwa kino okubuuliranga enjiri, awayatulibwa erinnya lya Kristo nnemenga okuzimba ku musingi gwa beene; 
45_15_21_naye nga bwe kya wandiikibwa nti Baliraba abatabuulirwanga bigambo bye, Era abataawulira balitegeera. 
45_15_22_Era kyenaavanga nziyizibwa emirundi emingi okujja gye mu; 
45_15_23_naye kaakati, kubanga sikyalina bbanga mu nsi zino, era kuban, okuva mu myaka mingi nnali njagala okujja gye muli, 
45_15_24_we ndigendera mu Esupaniya (kubanga nsuubira okubalaba nga mpitay mmwe mumperekereko okuntuu eyo, bwe ndimala okubalabako n'okusanyukirako awamu nammwe); 
45_15_25_naye kaakati ŋŋenda e Yerusailemi, okuweereza abatukuvu. 
45_15_26_Kubanga ab'e Makedoni n'ab Akaya baasiima okusolooleza ebint abaavu ab'omu batukuvu abali Yerusaalemi. 
45_15_27_Kubanga basiima; era nga bababanja. Kuba oba ng'ab'amawanga basseekimu n'ebyabwe eby'omwoyo, babanja okubaweereza nate eby'omubiri. 
45_15_28_Kale bwe ndimala ekyo, bwe ndibakwasiza ddala ebibala ebyo ndivaayo, okuyita ewammwe okugenda e Sipeyini. 
45_15_29_Era mmanyi nga bwe ndijja gye muli adijja mu mukisa gwa Kristo nga gutuukiridde. 
45_15_30_Era mbeegayiridde, ab'oluganda, ku bwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, n'olw'okwagala kw'Omwoyo, okufubiranga awamu nange mu kunsabira Katonda; 
45_15_31_ndyoke mpone mu abo abatawulira mu Buyudaaya, n'okuweereza kwange kwe ntwala e Yerusaalemi kusiimibwe abatukuvu; 
45_15_32_ndyoke njije gye muli n'essanyu olw'okwagala kwa Katonda, mpummulire wamu nammwe. 
45_15_33_Era Katonda ow'emirembe abeerenga nammwe mwenna. Amiina. 
45_16_1_Mbanjulira Foyibe mwannyinaffe, ye muweereza w'ekkanisa ey'omu Kenkereya: 
45_16_2_mulyoke mumwanirize mu Mukama waffe, nga bwe kigwanidde abatukuw, era mumuyambe mu kigambo kyonna ky'alyetaaga gye muli: kubanga naye yennyini yayamba bangi, era nange nzennyini. 
45_16_3_Mumulamuse Pulisika ne Akula abaakolera awamu nange mu Kristo Yesu, 
45_16_4_abaawaayo obulago bwabwe olw'obulamu bwange; be sseebaza nze nzekka, era naye n'ekkanisa zonna ez'ab'amawanga: 
45_16_5_era mulamuse ekkanisa ey'omu nnyumba yaabwe. Mulamuse Epayineeto, gwe njagala, kye kibala eky'olubereberye eky'omu Asiya eri Kristo. 
45_16_6_Mulamuse Malyamu, eyabakolera mmwe emirimu emingi. 
45_16_7_Mulamuse Anduloniiko ne Yuniya, ab'ekika kyange, era abaasibirwa awamu nange, ab'amaanyi mu batume, era abansooka okubeera mu Kristo. 
45_16_8_Mulamuse Ampuliyaato, gwe njagala mu Mukama waffe. 
45_16_9_Mulamuse Ulubano, akolera awamu naffe mu Kristo, ne Sutaku gwe njagala. 
45_16_10_Mulamuse Apere akkirizibwa mu Kristo. Mubalamuse ab'omu nnyumba ya Alisutobulo. 
45_16_11_Mulamuse Kerodiyoni, ow'ekika kyange. Mubalamuse ab'omu nnyumba ya Nalukiso, abali mu Mukama waffe. 
45_16_12_Mulamuse Terufayina ne Terufoosa abaakola emirimu mu Mukama waffe. Mulamuse Perusi omwagalwa, eyakola emirimu emingi mu Mukama waffe. 
45_16_13_Mulamuse Luufo, eyalondebwa mu Mukama waffe, ne nnyina, ye mmange. 
45_16_14_Mulamuse Asunkulito, Fulegoni, Kerume, Patuloba, Keruma, n'ab'oluganda abali awamu nabo. 
45_16_15_Mulamuse Firologo ne Yuliya, Nerewu ne mwannyina, ne Olumpa, n'abatukuvu bonna abali awamu nabo. 
45_16_16_Mulamusagane n'okunywegera okutukuvu. Ekkanisa zonna eza Kristo zibalamusizza. 
45_16_17_Era mbeegayiridde, ab'oluganda, mutunuulirenga abo abaleeta eby'okwawukanya n'eby'okwesittaza, ebitali bya kuyigiriza kwe mwayiga: mubakubenga amabega abo. 
45_16_18_Kubanga abaliŋŋanga abo si baddu ba Mukama waffe Kristo, naye ba mbttto zaabwe bokka; era n'ebigambo ebirungi n'eby'okunyumya obulungi balimbalimba emitima gy'abo abatalina kabi. 
45_16_19_Kubanga okuwulira kwammwe kwabuna mu bonna. Kyenvudde mbasanyukira mmwe: naye njagala mmwe okubeeranga abagezi mu bulungi, era abasirusiru mu bubi. 
45_16_20_Era Katonda ow'emirembe alibetenta Setaani wansi w'ebigere byammwe mangu. Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo kibeerenga nammwe. 
45_16_21_Timoseewo, akolera awamu nange, abalamusizza; ne Lukiyo ne Yasooni ne Sosipateri, ab'ekika kyange. 
45_16_22_Nze Terutiyo, awandiise ebbaluwa eno, mbalamusizza mu Mukama waffe. 
45_16_23_Gayo, ansuza nze n'ekkanisa yonna, abalamusizza. Erasuto, omuwanika w'ekibuga, abalamusizza, ne Kwaluto, ow'oluganda. 
45_16_24_Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Kristo Yesu Kibeerenga nammwe mwenna. Amiina. 
45_16_25_Era oyo ayinza okubanyweza ng'enjiri yange n'okubuulirwa kwa Yesu Kristo bwe biri, ng'ekyama bwe kibikkuddwa ekyasirikirwa okuva mu biro eby'emirembe n'emirembe, 
45_16_26_naye kaakati kirabise ne lutegeezebwa amawanga gonna mu byawandiikibwa bya bannabbi, nga bwe yalagira Katonda ataggwaawo, olw'okuwulira okuva mu kukkiriza; 
45_16_27_Katonda ow'amagezi omu yekka aweebwenga ekitiibwa ku bwa Yesu Kristo emirembe egitaggwaawo. 
46_1_1_Paulo, eyayitibwa okuba omutume wa Yesu Kristo olw'okwagala kwa Katonda, ne Sossene ow'oluganda, 
46_1_2_eri ekkanisa ya Katonda eri mu Kkolinso, abaatukuzibwa mu Kristo Yesu, abaayitibwa okuba abatukuvu, wamu ne bonna abakoowoola erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo mu buli kifo, ye Mukama waabwe era owaffe: 
46_1_3_ekisa kibeerenga gye muli n'emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe, ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
46_1_4_Nneebaza Katonda wange bulijjo ku lwammwe, olw'ekisa kya Katonda kye mwaweerwa mu Kristo Yesu 
46_1_7_mmwe obutaweebuuka mu kirabo kyonna; nga mulindirira okubikkulibwa kwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo 
46_1_9_Katonda mwesigwa, eyabayisa okuyingira mu kusseekimu kw'Omwana we Yesu Kristo Mukama waffe: 
46_1_10_Naye mbeegayirira, ab'oluganda, olw'erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, mwenna okwogeranga obumu, so okwawakana kulemenga okuba mu mmwe, naye mugattirwenga ddala mu magezi gamu ne mu kulowooza kumu. 
46_1_11_Kubanga nnabuulirwa ebifa gye muli, baganda bange, abo ab'omu nnyumba ya Kuloowe, ng'eriyo ennyombo mu mmwe. 
46_1_12_Kye njogedde kye kino nti buli muntu mu mmwe ayogera nti Nze ndi wa Pawulo; nange wa Apolo; aange wa Keefa; nange wa Kristo: 
46_1_13_Kristo ayawuliddwamu? Pawulo yakomererwa ku lwammwe? oba mwabatizibwa okuyingira mu lianya lya Pawulo? 
46_1_14_Nneebaza Katonda kubanga sibatizanga muntu yenna mu mmwe, wabula Kulisupo ne Gaayo; 
46_1_15_omuntu yenna alemenga okwogera nga mwabarizibwa okuyingira mu linnya lyange: 
46_1_16_Era nnabatiza n'ennyumba ya Suteefana: nate simanyi nga nnabatiza omulala yenna. 
46_1_17_Kubanga Kristo teyantuma kubatiza, wabula okubuulira Enjiri: si mu magezi ga bigambo, omusalaaba gwa Kristo; gulemenga okuba ogw'obwereere: 
46_1_18_Kubanga ekigambo eky'omusaalaba bwe busirusiru eri abo ababula; naye eri ffe abalokebwa ge maanyi ga Katonda. 
46_1_19_Kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti. Ndizikiriza amagezi g'abagezigezi, N'obukabakaba bw'abakabakaba ndibuggyawo. 
46_1_20_Omugezigezi aluwa? omuwaadiisi aluwa? omuwakanyi ow'omu nsi muno aluwa? Katonda teyasiruwaza magezi ga nsi? 
46_1_21_Kubanga mu magezi ga Katonda ensi olw'amagezi gaayo bw'etaategeera Katonda, Katonda n'asiima olw'obusirusiru obw'okubuulira okwo okulokola abo abakkiriza. 
46_1_22_Kubanga Abayudaaya basaba obubonero, n'Abayonaani banooaya amagezi: 
46_1_23_naye ffe tubuulira Kristo eyakomererwa, eri Abayudaaya nkonge, n'eri ab'amawanga busirusiru; 
46_1_24_naye eri abo abayite Abayudaaya era n'Abayonaani, Kristo maanyi ga Katonda, era magezi ga Katonda. 
46_1_25_Kubanga obusirusiru bwa Katonda businga abantu amagezi; n'obunafu bwa Katonda businga abantu amaanyi. 
46_1_26_Kubanga mutunuulire okuyitibwa kwammwe, ab'oluganda, ng'ab'amagezi ag'omubiri si bangi abayitibwa, ab'amaanyi si bangi, ab'ekitiibwa si bangi: 
46_1_27_naye Katonda yalonda ebisirusiru eby'ensi, abagezigezi abakwase ensonyi; era Katonda yalonda ebinafu eby'ensi, akwase ensonyi eby'amaanyi; 
46_1_28_n'ebikopi by'ensi n'ebinyoomebwa Katonda yabironda era n'ebitaliiwo, aggyewo ebiriwo: 
46_1_29_omu biri gwonna gulemenga okwenyu miriza mu maaso ga Katonda. 
46_1_30_Naye ku bw'oyo mmwe muli mi Kristo Yesu, eyafuuka amagezi gye tuli okuva eri Katonda, era n'obutuukirivu n'okutukuzibwa, n'okununulibwa: 
46_1_31_nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Eyeenyumiriza, yeenyumiririzenga mu Mukama. 
46_2_1_Nange, ab'oluganda, bwe nnajja gye mu, sajja na maanyi mangi ag'ebigambo oba amagezi nga mbabuulira ekyama kya Katonda, 
46_2_2_Kubanga nnamalirira obutamanya kigambo mu mmwe, wabula Yesu Kristo era oyo eyakomererwa. 
46_2_3_Nange nnabeeranga nammwe mu bunafu ne mu kutya ne mu kukankana okungi. 
46_2_4_N'ekigambo kyange n'okubuulira kwange tebyabanga mu bigambo eby'amagezi ebisendasenda, wabula mu kutegeeza kw'Omwoyo n'amaanyi: 
46_2_5_okukkiriza kwammwe kulemenga okubeera mu magezi g'abantu, wabula mu maanyi ga Katonda. 
46_2_6_Naye amagezi tugoogera mu abo abatuukirira: naye amagezi agatali ga mu mirembe gino, era agatali ga bakulu ab'omu mirembe gino, abaggwaawo: 
46_2_7_naye twogera amagezi ga Katonda mu kyama, gali agakisibwa, Katonda ge yalagira edda ensi nga tezinnabaawo olw'ekitiibwa kyaffe: 
46_2_8_abakulu bonna ab'omu mirembe gino ge batategeeranga n'omu: kuba singa baagategeera, tebandikomeredde Mukama wa kitiibwa: 
46_2_9_naye nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Eriiso bye litalabangako, n'okutu bye kutawuliranga, N'ebitayingiranga mu mutima gwa muntu, Byonna Katonda bye yategekera abamwagala. 
46_2_10_Naye ffe Katonda yatubibikkulira ku bw'Omwoyo: kubanga Omwoyo anoonya byonna era n'ebitategeerekeka ebya Katonda. 
46_2_11_Kubanga muntu ki ategeera eby'omuntu wabula omwoyo gw'omuntu oguli mu ye? era bwe kityo n'ebya Katonda siwali abitegeera wabula Omwoyo gwa Katonda. 
46_2_12_Naye ffe tetwaweebwa mwoyo gwa nsi, wabula omwoyo oguva eri Katonda, tulyoke tutegeerenga Katonda by'atuwa obuwa. 
46_2_13_N'okwogera twogera ebyo, si mu bigambo amagezi g'abantu bye gayigiriza, wabula Omwoyo by'ayigiriza; bwe tugeraageranya eby'omwoyo n'eby'omwoyo. 
46_2_14_Naye omuntu ow'omukka obukka takkiriza bya Mwoyo gwa Katonda: kubanga bya busirusiru gy'ali; era tayinza kabitegeera, kubanga bikeberwa na mwoyo. 
46_2_15_Naye omuntu ow'omwoyo akebera byonna, aaye ye yennyini takeberwa muntu yenna. 
46_2_16_Kubanga ani eyali ategedde okulowooza kwa Mukama waffe, alyoke amuyigirize? Naye ffe tulina okulowooza kwa Kristo. 
46_3_1_Nange, ab'oluganda, ssaayinza kwogera nammwe ng'ab'omwoyo, naye ng'ab'omubiri, ng'abaaua abawere mu Kristo. 
46_3_2_Nnabanywesa mata, so si mmere; kubanga mwali temunnagiyinza: naye era ne kaakano temunnagiyinza 
46_3_4_Kubanga omuntu bw'ayogera nti Nze ndi wa Pawulo; u'omulala nti Nze ndi wa Apolo; nga temuli bantu buntu? 
46_3_5_Kale Apolo kye ki? ne Pawulo kye ki? Baweereza buweereza ababakkirizisa; era buli muntu nga Mukama waffe bwe yamuwa. 
46_3_6_Nze nnasiga, Apolo n'afukirira; naye Katonda ye yakuza. 
46_3_7_Kale bwe kityo asiga si kintu, newakubadde afukirira; wabula Kaonda akuza. 
46_3_8_Naye asiga n'ajfukirira bali bumu: naye buli muntu aliweebwa empeera ye ye ng'omulimu gwe ye bwe guliba. 
46_3_9_Kubanga Katonda tuli bakozi banne: muli nnimiro ya Katonda, muli nnyumba ya Katonda. 
46_3_10_Ng'ekisa kya Katonda bwe kiri kye nnaweebwa, ng'omukoza w'abazimbi ow'amagezi n'asima omusingi; n'omulala n'azimbako. Naye buli muntu yeekuumenga bw'azimbako. 
46_3_11_Kubanga tewali muntu ayinza kusima musingi mulala wabula ogwo ogwasimibwa, ye Yesu Kristo. 
46_3_12_Naye omuntu yenna bw'azimbanga ku musingi ogwo zaabu, ffeeza, amayinja ag'omuwendo omungi, emiti, essubi, ebisasiro; 
46_3_13_omulimu ogwa buli muntu gulirabisibwa: kubanga olunaku luli luligwolesa, kubanga gulibikkulirwa mu muliro; n'omuliro gwennyini gulikema omulimu ogwa buli muatu bwe gufaanana. 
46_3_14_Omulimu ogwa buli muntu gwe yazimbako bwe gulibeerawo, aliweebwa empeera. 
46_3_15_Omulimu ogwa buii muntu bwe gulyokebwa, alifiirwa; naye ye yennyini alirokoka; naye bw'ati, kuyita mu muliro. 
46_3_16_Temumaayi nga muli yeekaalu ya Katonda, era nga Omwoyo gwa Katonda abeera mu mmwe? 
46_3_17_Omuntu yenna bw'azikirizanga yeekaalu ya Katonda, Katonda alimuzikiriza oyo; kubanga yeekaalu ya Katonda ntukuvu: ye mmwe: 
46_3_18_Omuntu yenna teyeerimbanga; Omuntu yenna bwe yeerowoozanga okuba omugezi mu mmwe mu mirembe giao, sfuukenga musirusiru, alyoke afuuke omugezi. 
46_3_19_Kubanga amagezi ag'omu nsi muno bwe busirusiru eri Katonda. Kubanga kyawandiikibwa ati Akwasa abagezi enkwe zaabwe: 
46_3_20_era nate nti Mukama ategeera empaka ez'abagezi nga teziriimu. 
46_3_21_Omuntu yenna kyavanga alema okwenyumiriza mu bantu. Kubanga byonna byammwe; 
46_3_22_oba Pawulo, oba Apolo, oba Keefa, oba ensi, oba obulamu, oba okufa, oba ebiriwo, oba ebigenda okubaawo; byonna byammwe; 
46_3_23_nammwe muli ba Kristo; ne Kristo wa Katonda. 
46_4_1_Omuntu atulowoozenga bw'ati, nga tuli baweereza ba Kristo era abawanika b'ebyama bya Katonda: 
46_4_2_Era wano kigwanira abawanika, omuntu okulabikanga nga mwesigwa. 
46_4_3_Naye ku nze kigambo kitoao nnyo mmwe okunsalira omusango, oba omuntu yenna: era nange azekka sseesalira musango: 
46_4_4_Kubanga sseemanyiiko kigambo; naye ekyo tekimpeesa butuukirivu: naye ansalira omusango ye Mukama waffe. 
46_4_5_Kale temusalanga musango gwa kigambo kyonna, ebiro nga tebinnatuuka, okutuusa Mukama waffe lw'alijja, alimulisa ebikwekebwa eby'omu kizikiza, era alirabisa okuteesa okw'omu mitima; buli muntu n'alyoka aweebwa ettendo lye eri Katonda. 
46_4_6_Naye ebyo, ab'oluganda, mbigeredde ku nze ne Apolo ku lwammwe; mulyoke muyigire ku ffe obutasukkanga ku byawandiikibwa; omuntu yenna alemenga okwegulumiza olw'omu okusinga omulala. 
46_4_7_Kubanga akwawula ye ani? era olina ki ky'otaaweebwa? naye okuweebwa oba nga waweebwa, kiki ekikwenyumirizisa ng'ataaweebwa? 
46_4_8_Mumaze okukkuta, mumaze okugaggawala, mwafuga nga bakabaka awatali ffe: era mubeera kufuga nandyagadde, era naffe tulyoke tufugire wamu nammwe. 
46_4_9_Kubanga ndowooza nga Katonda ffe abatume yatwolesa. enkomerero ng'abataaleme kufa: kubanga twafuuka ekyerolerwa ensi ne bamalayika n'abantu. 
46_4_10_Ffe tuli basirusiru ku bwa Kristo, naye mmwe muli bagezigezi mu Kristo; ffe tuli banafu, naye mmwe muli ba maanyi; mmwe muli ba kitiibwa, ffe tuli ba kunyoomebwa: 
46_4_11_Era n'okutuusa ekiseera kino, tulumwa enjala era n'ennyonta, era tuba bwereere, era tukubibwa ebikonde, era tetuliiko waffe; 
46_4_12_era tukola emirimu nga tutegana n'emikono gyaffe: bwe tuvumibwa, tubasabira omukisa; bwe tuyigganyizibwa; tugumiikiriza; 
46_4_13_bwe tuwaayirizibwa, twegayirira: twafuuka ng'ebisasiro eby'ensi; empitambi eza byonna, okutuusa kaakano. 
46_4_14_Ebyo ssibiwandiika kubakwasa nsonyi, wabula okubabuutirira ng'abaana bange abaagalwa. 
46_4_15_Kuba newakubadde nga mulina abayigiriza kakumi mu Kristo, naye temulina bakitammwe bangi; kubanga nze nabazaaza enjiri mu Kristo Yesu: 
46_4_16_Kyenva mbeegayirira okungohereranga: 
46_4_17_Kyenva ntuma Timoseewo gye muli ye mwana wange omwagalwa omwesi.gwa mu Mukama waffe, alibajjukiza amakubo gange agali mu Kristo, nga bwe njigiriza yonna yonna mu buli kkanisa: 
46_4_18_Naye waliwo abalala abeegulumiza nga balowooza nga nze sigenda kujja gye muli. 
46_4_19_Naye ndijja gye muli mangu, Mukama waffe bw'alyagala; era ndimanya amaanyi gaabwe abeegulumiza so si kigambo kyabwe. 
46_4_20_Kubanga obwakabaka bwa Katonda tebuli mu kigambo, wabula mu maanyi: 
46_4_21_Mwagalako ki? njije gye muli n'omuggo, oba mu kwagala ne mu mwoyo ogw'obuwombeefu? 
46_5_1_N'okugamba bagamba nga mu mmwe mulimu obwenzi, era obwenzi bwe butyo obutali ne mu b'amawaaga, omuntu okubeera ne mukazi wa kifaawe. 
46_5_2_Nammwe mwegulumizizza; so femwanakuwala bunakuwazi, oyo eyakola ekikolwa ekyo alyoke aggibwe wakati mu mmwe. 
46_5_3_Kubanga nze bwe ssibaayo mu mubiri naye nga ndiyo mu mwoyo; mmaze okusalira omusango oyo eyayonoona ekyo bw'atyo, 
46_5_4_mu linnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu, mmwe nga mukuŋŋaanye n'omwoyo gwange awamu n'amaanyi ga Mukama waffe Yesu, 
46_5_5_okuwaayo ali bw'atyo eri Setaani omubiri okuzikirizibwa, omwoyo gulyoke gutokoke ku lunaku lwa Mukama waffe Yesu. 
46_5_6_Okwenyumiriza kwammwe si kulungi: Tetumanyi ng'ekizimbulukusa ekitono kizimbulukusa ekitole kyonna? 
46_5_7_Muggyeemu ekizimbulukusa eky'edda, mulyoke mubeere ekitole ekiggya, nga temuliimu kizimbulukusa. Kubaaga era n'Okuyitako kwaffe kwattibwa, ye Kristo: 
46_5_8_kale tufumbe embaga, si na kizimbulukusa eky'edda, newakubadde n'ekizimbulukusa eky'ettima n'obubi, wabula n'ebitazimbulukuswa eby'obutali bukuusa n'amazima. 
46_5_9_Nnabawandiikira mu bbaluwa yange obuteegattanga na benzi; 
46_5_10_so si kwewalira ddala abenzi ab'omu nsi muno, oba abeegombi n'abanyazi, oba abasinza ebifaananyi: kubanga bwe kiba kityo kyandibagwanidde okuva mu nsi: 
46_5_11_naye kaakano mbawandiikira obuteegattanga naye, omuntu yenaa ayitibwa ow'oluganda bw'aba nga azwenzi, oba mwegombi, oba: asinza ebifaananyi, oba muvumi, oba mutamiivu, oba munyazi; ali bw'atyo n'okulya temulyanga naye: 
46_5_12_Kubanga nfaayo ki okusalira omusango abali ebweru? Mmwe temusalira musango ba munju? 
46_5_13_Naye ab'ebweru Katonda ye abasalira omusango. Omubi oyo mumuggye mu mmwe. 
46_6_1_Omuntu yenna ku mmwe bw'aba n'ekigambo ku munne, ayaŋŋanga okuwoleza ensonga abatali baruukirivu, so si eri abatukuvu? 
46_6_2_Oba temumanyi ng'abatukuvu be balisalira ensi omusango? era oba ng'ensi mmwe muligisalira omusango, emusaanira kusala nsonga entono ennyo. 
46_6_3_Temumanyi nga tulisalira bamalayika omusango? tulirema. tutya okusala emisango egy'omu bulamu buno? 
46_6_4_Kale bwe muba n'okusala emisango egy'omu bulamu buno, abanyoomebwa mu kkanisa abo be muteekawo? 
46_6_5_Njogedde kubakwasa nsonyi. Kiri bwe kityo nti mu mmwe temuyinza kuzuuka muntu mugezi, ayinza okusalira baganda be ensonga, 
46_6_6_naye ow'oluganda awoze n'ow'oluganda, era ne mu maaso gaabo abatali bakkiriza? 
46_6_7_Naye era bwe mutyo mumaze okubaako: akabi, kubanga mulina emisango mwekka na mwekka: Lwaki obutamala gakolwanga bubi? lwaki obutamala galyazaamaanyizibwanga? 
46_6_8_Naye mmwe mwennyini mukola bubi, mulyazaa maanya, era n'ab'oluganda. 
46_6_9_Oba temumanyi ng'abatali batuukirivu tebalisikira bwakabaka bwa Katonda? Temulimbibwanga: newakubadde abakaba, newakubadde abasinza ebifaananyi, newakubadde abenzi, newakubadde abafuuka abakazi, newakubadde abalya ebisiyaga, 
46_6_10_newakubadde ababbi, newakubadde abeegombi, newakubadde abatamiivu, newakubadde abavumi, newakubadde abanyazi, tebalisikira bwakabaka bwa; Katonda. 
46_6_11_Era abamu ku nunwe mwali ng'abo: naye mwanaazibwa, naye mwatukuzibwa, naye mwaweebwa obutuukirivu olw'erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, n'olw'Omwoyo gwa Katonda waffe. 
46_6_12_Byonna birungi gye ndi; naye byonna tebinsaanira. Byonna birungi gye ndi; naye nze sigenda kufugibwanga kyonna kyonna. 
46_6_13_Eby'okulya bya lubuto, n'olubuto lwa bya kulya: naye Katonda alibiggyawo byombiriri. Naye omubiri si gwa bwenzi, naye gwa Mukama waffe; ne Mukama waffe avunaana omubiti: 
46_6_14_era Katonda yazuukiza Mukama waffe, era naffe alituzuukiza olw'amaanyi ge. 
46_6_15_Temumanyi ng'emibiri gyammwe bye bitundu bya Kristo? kale nzirirenga ebituadu bya Kristo mbifuule bitundu by'amwenzi? Kitalo. 
46_6_16_Oba temumNaye eyeegatta ne Mukama waffe gwe mwoyo gumu: anyi ng'eyeegatta n'omwenzi gwe mubiri gumu? kubanga ayogera nti Bombiriri banaabeeraaga omubiri gumu. 
46_6_17_Mwewalenga obwenzi. Buli kibi kyonna omuntu ky'akola kin kungulu ku mubiri; naye ayenda akola ekibi ku mubiri gwe ye: 
46_6_18_Oba temumanyi ng'omubiri gwammwe ye yeekaalu y'Omwoyo Omutukuvu ali mu mmwe, gwe mulina eyava eri Katonda? nammwe temuli ku bwammwe; 
46_6_19_kubanga mwagulibwa na muwendo: kale mugulumizenga Katonda mu mubiri gwammwe. 
46_7_1_Naye ku ebyo bye mwampandiikira; kirungi omusajja obutakwatanga ku mukazi. 
46_7_2_Naye, olw'obwenzi, buli musajja abeerenga ne mukazi we ye, na buli mukazi abeerenga ne musajja we ye: 
46_7_3_Omusajja asasulenga mukazi we ekyo ekimugwanira: era n'omukazi asasulenga bw'atyo omusajja. 
46_7_4_Amukazi tafuga mubiri gwe ye, wabula musajja we: era n'omusajja bw'atyo tafuga mubiri gwe ye, wabula mukazi we. 
46_7_5_Temumaŋŋananga, wabula mpozzi nga mulagaanye ekiseera, mulyoke mubeerenga n'ebbaaga ery'okusabiramu, ate mulyoke mubeerenga wamu, Setaani alemenga okubakema olw'obuteeziyiza bwammwe. 
46_7_6_Naye ebyo mbyogera nga nzikiriza bukkiriza, so siteeka tteeka 
46_7_7_Naye nandyagadde abantu bonna okubeeranga nga nze: Naye buli muntu alina ekirabo kye.ye, ekiva eri Katonda, omulala bw'ati, n'omulala bw'ati: 
46_7_8_Naye abatannafumbiriganwa ne bannamwandu mbagamba nti Kirungi bo okubeeranga nga nze: 
46_7_9_Naye oba nga tebayinza kweziyiza, bafumbiriganwenga: kubanga kye kirungi okufumbiriganwanga okuinga okwakanga. 
46_7_10_Naye abaaiala okufuumbirwaganwa mbalagira, so si nze wabula Mukama waffe, mukazi obutanobanga ku musajja we 
46_7_11_(naye okunoba bw'anobanga, beerenga awo obutafumbirwanga, ba atabaganenga ne musajja we); era n'omusajja obutalekangayo mukazi we. 
46_7_12_Naye abalala mba amba nze, si Mukama waffe: w'oluganda yenna bw'abanga n'onukazi atakkiriza, omukazi bw'aabagananga naye okubeera naye, Bamulekangayo. 
46_7_13_N'omukazi bw'abeeranga n'omusajja atakkiriza; aye: bw'atabagananga naye okubeea naye, tanobanga ku musajja we. 
46_7_14_Kubanga omusajja atakkiriza atuuzibwa na mukazi, n'omukazi atakiriza atukuzibwa na wa luganda: inga tekiri bwe kityo, abaana basmwe tebandibadde balongoofu; naye kaakano batukuvu. 
46_7_15_Naye atakkiriza bw'ayawukananga: ayawukane: ow'oluganda omusajja oba mkazi tali mu buddu mu bigambo biri bwe bityo: naye Katonda yaayitira mirembe. 
46_7_16_Kubanga, gwe omukazi; omanyi otya nga tolirokola musajja wo? oba, ggwe musajja, omanyi otya nga toliroola mukazi wo? 
46_7_17_Kino kyokka, buli muntu nga Mukama waffe bwe amugabira, buli muntu nga Katonda bwe yamuyita, atambulenga w'atyo. Era bwe ndagira bwe ntyo mu kkanisa zonna. 
46_7_18_Omuntu ennayayitibwa nga mukomole? teyeggyangako bukomole bwe. Imuntu yenna yayitibwa nga si mkomole? Takomolebwanga. 
46_7_19_Okukomolwa si kintu n'obuikomolwa si kintu wabula okukwatanga ebiragiro bya Katonda. 
46_7_20_Buli muntu abeerenga mu kuyibwa kwe yayitirwamu: 
46_7_21_Wayibwa ng'oli muddu? tokyeraliikiiranga: naye okuyinza bw'oyinzaga okuweebwa eddembe, waakiri beerenga nalyo. 
46_7_22_Kubanga mu lukama waffe eyayitibwa nga mudu, aweebwa Mukama waffe eddeabe: bw'atyo eyayitibwa nga wa dembe ye muddu wa Kristo. 
46_7_23_Mwagulibwa na muwendo; temufuukanga baddu ba bantu: 
46_7_24_Ab'oluganda, okuyitibwa buli muntu kwe yayitirwamu, abeerenga mu okwo wamu ne Katanda. 
46_7_25_Naye ku by'obatafumbiriganwa sirina kiragiro kya Mukama waffe: naye mbagamba nze ng'omuntu Mukama waffe gwe yasaasira okubeera omwesigwa. 
46_7_27_Wasibibwa n'omukazi? tonoonyanga kusumululwa. Wasumululwa ku mukazi? tonoonyanga mukazi: 
46_7_28_Naye okuwasa bw'owasanga, nga toyonoonye; n'omuwaia bw'afumbirwanga; nga tayonoonye. Naye abali bwe batyo banaabeeranga n'okubonaabona mu mubiri: nange mbasaasira. 
46_7_29_Naye kino kye njogera, ab'oluganda, nti Ebiro biyimpawadde, okutanula kaakano abalina abakazi babe ng'abatalina: 
46_7_30_era n'abo abakaaba babe ng'abatakaaba; n’abo abasanyuka babe ng'abatasanyuka; n'abo abagula babe ng'abatalina; 
46_7_31_n'abo abakoza eby'omu nsi babe ng'abatabikoza bubi: kubanga engeri ey'omu nsi muno eggwaawo. 
46_7_32_Naye njagala mmwe obuteeraliikiriranga. Atali mufumbo yeeraliikirira bya Mukama waffe, bw'anaasanyusanga Mukama waffe: 
46_7_33_naye omufumbo yeeraliikirira bya mu nsi, bw'anaasanyusanga mukazi we. 
46_7_34_Era waliwo enjawulo ku mufumbo n'omuwala. Atafiumbirwa yeeraliikirira bya Mukama waffe, abeerenga mutukuvu omubiri n'omwoyo: naye afumbirwa yeeraliikirira bya mu nsi, bw'anaasanyusanga musajja we. 
46_7_35_Njogedde ekyo olw'okubagasa nunwe bennyini; si lwakuba nga kyambika, wabula olw'obulungi era mulyoke muweerezenga Mukama waffe obutategananga: 
46_7_36_Naye omuntu bw'alowoozanga nga takola bulungi muwala we, oba nga ayitiridde obukulu, era oba nga kigwana okubeera bwe kityo, akolenga nga bw'ayagala; tayonoona; liafumbiriganwe. 
46_7_37_Naye oyo anywera mu mutima gwe, nga tawalirizibwa, naye ng'ayinza okutuukiriza bw'ayagala ye, era nga yamalirira kino mu mutima gwe okukuumanga muwala we, alikola bulungi. 
46_7_38_Kale afumbiza muwala we akola bulungi; era n'oyo atalifumbiza ye alisinga okukola obulungi. 
46_7_39_Omukazi asibibwa musajja: we ng'akyali mulamu; naye musajja we bw'aba nga yeebase, nga wa busa afumbirwenga gw'ayagala; kyokka mu Mukama waffe. 
46_7_40_Naye aba musanyufu okusigala nga bw'ali nga nze bwe ndowooza: era ndowooza nga nange nnina Omwoyo gwa Katonda. 
46_8_1_Naye ku ebyo ebiweebwa eri ebifaananyi: tumanyi nga tulina fenna okutegeera. Okutegeera kwegulumizisa, naye okwagala kuzimba. 
46_8_2_Omuntu bw'alowoozanga ng'aliko ky'ategedde, nga tannategeera nga bwe kimugwanira okutegeera 
46_8_4_Kale ku kulyanga ebiweebwa eri ebifaananyi, tumanyi ng'ekifaananyi si kintu mu nsi, era nga tewali Katonda omulala wabula omu. 
46_8_5_Kuba newakubadde nga waliwo abayitibwa bakatonda, oba mu ggulu, oba mu nsi; nga bwe waliwo bakatonda abangi n'abaami abangi 
46_8_7_Naye okutegeera okwo tekuli mu bantu bonna: naye abalala; kubanga baamanyiira ebifaananyi okutuusa kaakano, balya ng'ekiweereddwa eri ekifaananyi; n'omwoyo gwabwe, kubanga munafu, gubeera n'empitambi: 
46_8_8_Naye ekyokulya tekitusiimisa eri Katonda: era bwe tutalya tetuweebuuka: era bwe tulya tetweyongerako. 
46_8_9_Naye mwekuumenga mpozzi obuyinza bwammwe obwo bulemenga okuba enkonge eri abanafu. 
46_8_10_Kubanga omuntu bw'akulaba ggwe alina okutegeera ng'otudde ku mmere mu ssabo ly'ekifaananyi; omwoyo gw'oyo, bw'aba nga munafu, teguliguma kulya ebiweebwa eri ebifaananyi? 
46_8_11_Kubanga omunafu abula olw'okutegeera kwo, ow'oluganda Kristo gwe yafiirira. 
46_8_12_Era bwe kityo, bwe mwonoonanga ab'oluganda era ne mufumita omwoyo gwabwe, bwe guba nga munafu, nga mwonoona Kristo. 
46_8_13_Kale, eba ng'ekyokulya kyesittaza muganda wange, siiryenga nnyama emirembe gyonna, nnemenga okwesittaza muganda wange. 
46_9_1_Ssiri wa ddembe? ssirimutume? ssaalaba Yesu Mukama waffe? mmwe temuli mulimu gwange mu Mukama waffe? 
46_9_2_Oba nga ssiri mutume eri abalala, naye ndi mutume eri mmwe: kubanga mmwe kabonero k'obutume bwange mu Mukama waffe. 
46_9_3_Bwe mpoza bwe ati eri abo abankemereza. 
46_9_4_Tetulina buyinza okulyanga n'okunywanga? 
46_9_5_Tetiilina buyinza okutwalanga omukazi ow'oluganda awamu naffe, era ng'abatume abalala, ne baganda ba Mukama waffe, ne Keefa. 
46_9_6_Oba nze nzekka ne Balunabba tetulina buyinza obutakolanga mirimu? 
46_9_7_An.i agenda okutabaala yonna yonna n'atabaaza ebintu bye ye? ani asimba olusuku n'atalya ku mmere yaamu? oba ani alunda ekisibo n'atanywa ku mata g'ekisibo ekyo? 
46_9_8_Ebyo ajogera bya buntu? oba era n'amateeka tegoogera bwe gatyo? 
46_9_9_Kubanga kyawandiikibwa mu mateeka ga Musa ati Togisibanga kamwa ente ng'ewuula. Katonda alowooza bya nte? 
46_9_10_oba ayogera ku Iwaffe fekka? Kubanga kyawandiikibwa ku lwaffe: kubanga alima lumngwanira okulima ng'asuubira, era n'awuula kimugwanira okuwuula ng'asuubira okuweebwako. 
46_9_11_Oba nga ffe twabasigamu eby'omwoyo, kya kitalo ffe bwe tulikungula ebyammwe eby'omubiri? 
46_9_12_Oba nga abalala balina obuyinza obwo ku mmwe, ffe tetusinga bo? Naye tetwakoza buyinza obwo; naye tugumiikiriza bYonna, tulemenga okuleeta ekiziyiza enjiri ya Kristo. 
46_9_13_Temumanyi ng'abo abaweereza ebitukuvu balya ku by'omu yeekaalu, n'abo abaweereza ku kyoto bagabana n'ekyoto? 
46_9_14_Era ne Mukama waffe bw'atyo yalagira ababuuiira enjiri baliisibwenga olw'enjiri. 
46_9_15_Naye nze sibikozanga ebyo n'ekimu: so siwandiise ebya kiryoke kinkolerwenga nze bwe kityo kubanga waakiri nze okufa, okusinga omuatu yenna okufuula okwenyumiriza kwange okw'obwereere. 
46_9_16_Kubanga bwe mbuulira enjiri, siba na kya kwenyumiriza; kubanga nnina okuwalirizibwa; kubanga zinsanze, bwe ssibuulira njiri. 
46_9_17_Kuba oba nga nkola bwe ntyo n'okwagala, mbeera n'empeera: naye oba nga ssikola na kwagala, nnateresebwa obuwanika. 
46_9_18_Kale mpeera ki gye nnina? Mbuulira enjiri okugifuula ey'obwereere, nneme okukoleza ddala obuyinza bwange mu njiri. 
46_9_19_Kuba newakubadde nga ndi wa ddembe eri bonna, nneefuula muddu eri bonna, ndyoke nfunenga abangi. 
46_9_20_N'eri Abayudaaya nnafuuka nga Omuyudaaya; nfunenga Abayudaaya; eri abo abafugibwa amateeka nnafuuka ng'afugibwa amateeka, nze kennyini nga sifugibwa mateeka, nfunenga abafugibwa amateeka; 
46_9_21_eri abatalina mateeka nnafuuka ng'atalina mateeka, si butaba na mateeka eri Katonda, naye nga mpuiira amateeka eri Kristo, nfunenga abatalina mateeka. 
46_9_22_Eri abanafu nnafuuka munafu, nfunenga abanafu: eri bonna nfuuse byonna, mu byonna byonna adyoke ndokolenga abamu. 
46_9_23_Era nkola byonna olw'enjiri, ndyoke nzisenga kimu mu yo. 
46_9_24_Temumanyi ng'abadduka mu kuwakana baddukanira ddala bonna, naye aweebwako empeera omu? Muddukenga bwe mutyo mulyoke muweebwe. 
46_9_25_Era buli muntu awakana yeegendereza mu byonna. Kale bo bakola bwe batyo balyoke baweebwe engule eryonooneka, naye ffe etayonooneka. 
46_9_26_Nze kyenva nziruka bwe nti, si ng'atamanyi; nnwana bwe nti si ng'akuba ebbanga: 
46_9_27_naye nneebonereza omubiri gwange era ngufuga: mpozzi, nga maze okubuulira abalala, nze nzekka nneme okubeera atasiimibwa. 
46_10_1_Kubanga ssaagala mmwe obutategeera, ab'oluganda, bajjajjaffe bonna bwe baali wansi w'ekire, era bonna bwe baayita mu nnyanja 
46_10_4_kubanga baanywanga mu lwazi olw'omwoyo olwabagobereranga: n'olwazi olwo lwali Kristo. 
46_10_5_Naye bangi ku bo Katonda teyabasiima: kubanga baazikiririzibwa mu ddungu. 
46_10_6_Naye ebyo byali byakulabirako gye tuli, tulemenga okwegomba ebibi, era nga bo bwe beegomba. 
46_10_7_So temubanga basinza ba bifaananyi, ng'abamu ku bo: nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Abantu ne batuula okulya n'okunywa, ne bagolokoka okuzannya. 
46_10_8_Era tetwendanga, ng'abamu ku bo bwe baayenda, ne bagwa ku luaaku olumu obukumi bubiri mu enkumi ssatu. 
46_10_9_Era tetukemanga Mukama waffe, ng'abamu ku bo bwe baakema, emisota egyo ne gibatta. 
46_10_10_Era temwemulugunyanga, ng'abamu ku bo bwe beemulugunya, ne bazikirizibwa omuzikiriza. 
46_10_11_Naye ebyo byababaako abo okubeeranga ebyokulabirako; era byawandiikibwa olw'okutulabulanga ffe abatuukiddwako enkomerero z'emirembe. 
46_10_12_Kale alowooza ng'ayimiridde yeekuumenga aleme okugwa. 
46_10_13_Siwali kukema okubakwata okutali kwa bantu: naye Katonda mwesigwa, ataabaganyenga kukemebwa okusinga bwe muyinza; naye awamu n'okukemebwa era anassangawo n'obuddukira; mulyoke muyinzenga okugumiikiriza, 
46_10_14_Kale, baganda bange, muddukenga okusinza ebifaananyi. 
46_10_15_Mbagamba ng'abalina amagezi; mulowooze kye njogera. 
46_10_16_Ekikompe eky'omukisa, kye tusabira omukisa, si kwe kusseekimu omusaayi gwa Kristo? Omugaati gwe tumenyaamenya si kwe kusseekimu omubiri gwa Kristo? 
46_10_17_kubanga ffe abangi tuli mugaati gumu, omubiri gumu: kubanga fenna tugabana omugaati gumu. 
46_10_18_Mulabe Isiraeri ow'omubiri: abalya ssaddaaka tebassa kimu na kyoto? 
46_10_19_Kale njogera ki? ekiweebwa eri ekifaananyi nga kintu, oba ekifaananyi nga kintu? 
46_10_20_Naye njogera ng'ab'amawanga bye bawaayo bawa eri balubaale, so si eri Katonda: nange ssaagala mmwe kubeeranga abassee kimu ne balubaale. 
46_10_21_Temuyinza kunywa ku kikompe kya Mukama waffe ne ku kikompe kya balubaale: temuyinza kugabana ku mmeeza ya Mukama waffe ne ku mmeeza ya balubaale. 
46_10_22_Oba Mukama waffe tumukwasa obuggya? ffe tumusinga amaanyi? 
46_10_23_Byonna birungi; naye ebisaana si byonna. Byonna birungi, naye ebizimba si byonna. 
46_10_24_Omuntu yenna tanoonyanga bibye yekka, wabula ebya munne. 
46_10_25_Buli kye batundanga mu katale, mukiryanga, nga temubuuzizza kigambo olw'omwoyo; 
46_10_26_kubanga ensi ya Mukama waffe, n'okujjula kwayo. 
46_10_27_Omu ku abo abatakkiriza bw'abayitanga, nammwe bwe mwagalanga okugenda; ekiteekebwanga mu maaso gammwe mukiryanga, nga temubuuzizza kigambo olw'omwoyo; 
46_10_28_Naye omuntu bw'abagambanga nti Kino kyaweebwa okubeera ssaddaaka, temukiryanga ku lw'oya abuulidde, n'olw'omwoyo: 
46_10_29_bwe njogera omwoyo, si gugwo ggwe naye gwa mulala; kubanga eddembe lyange lwaki okusalirwa omusango n'omwoyo gw'omulala? 
46_10_30_Nze bwe ndya n'okwebaza, kiki ekinvumya olw'ekyo kye nneebaza? 
46_10_31_Kale oba nga mulya, oba nga munywa, oba nga mukola ekigambo kyonna kyonna, mukolenga byonna olw'ekitiibwa kya Katonda. 
46_10_32_Temuleetanga ekyesittaza eri Abayudaaya, newakubadde eri Abayonaani, newakubadde eri ekkanisa ya Katonda: 
46_10_33_era nga nange bwe nsanya magoba gange nze, wabula ag'abangi; balyoke balokoke. 
46_11_1_Mbatendereza kubanga munjijukira mu byonna, era munyweza bye mwaweebwa nga bwe nnabibawa. 
46_11_2_Naye njagala mmwe okumanya ng'omutwe gwa buli musajja ye Kristo; n'omutwe gw'omukazi ye musajja; n'omutwe gwa Kristo ye Katonda. 
46_11_3_Naye njagala mmwe okumanya ng'omutwe gwa buli musajja ye Kristo; n'omutwe gw'omukazi ye musajja; n’omutwe gwa Kristo ye Katonda. 
46_11_4_Buli musajja bw'asaba oba bw'abuulira, omutwe gwe nga gubikkiddwako, aswaza omutwe gwe. 
46_11_5_Naye buli mukazi bw'asaba oba bw'abuulira, omutwe gwe nga tegubikkiddwako, aswaza omutwe gwe: kubanga bwe bumu ddala ng'amwereddwa. 
46_11_6_Kuba oba ng'omukazi tabikkibwako, era asalibwenga enviiri: naye oba nga kya nsonyi omukazi okusalibwanga enviiri oba okumwebwanga, abikkibwengako. 
46_11_7_Kubanga omusajja tekimugwanira kubakkibwanga ku mutwe, kubanga oyo kye kifaananyi n'ekitiibwa kya Katonda: naye omukazi kye kitiibwa ky'omusajja. 
46_11_8_Kubanga omusajja teyava mu mukazi; wabula omukazi ye yava mu musajja: 
46_11_9_era kubanga omusajja teyatondebwa lwa mukazi; wabula omukazi olw'omusajja: 
46_11_10_kyekiva kigwanira omukazi okubangako akabonero ak'okufugibwa ku mutwe gwe olwa bamalayika. 
46_11_11_Era naye omukazi tabeerawo awatali musajja, era omusajja tabeerawo awatali mukazi, mu Mukama waffe. 
46_11_12_Kuba omukazi nga bwe yava mu musajja, era n'omusajja bw'atyo azaalibwa omukazi; naye byonna biva eri Katonda: 
46_11_13_Musale omusango nammwe mwekka: kisaana omukazi asabenga Katonda nga tabikkiddwako? 
46_11_14_Obuzaaliranwa bwokka tebubayigiriza nga omusajja bw'akuza enviiri zimuswaza? 
46_11_15_Naye omukazi bw'akuza enviiri; kye kitiibwa gy'ali: kubanga yaweebwa enviiri ze mu kifo ky'ekyambalo. 
46_11_16_Naye omuntu yenna bw'aba ng'ayagala okuleeta empaka, ffe tetulina mpisa ng'eyo, newakubadde ekkanisa za Katonda. 
46_11_17_Naye bwe mbalagira kino ssibatendereza, kabanga temukuŋŋaana lwa bulungi wabula olw'obubi. 
46_11_18_Kabanga eky'olubereberye, bwe mukuŋŋaanira mu kkanisa, mpulira nga waliwo okwawukana mu mmwe; era nkikkirizaamu. 
46_11_19_Kubanga era n'okwesalamu kikugwanira okubanga mu mmwe, abasiimibwa balyoke balabikenga mu mmwe. 
46_11_20_Kale bwe mukuŋŋaanira awamu, tekiyinzika kulya mmere ya Mukama waffe: 
46_11_21_kubanga mu kulya kwammwe buli muntu asooka munne okutoola emmere ye yekka; n'omulala alumwa enjala, n'omulala atamiira. 
46_11_22_Kiki ekyo? temulina nnyumba za kuliirangamu n'okunywerangamu? oba munyooma ekkanisa ya Katonda, ne muswaza abatalina nnyumba? Nnaabagamba ntya? nnaabatendereza olw'ekyo? Ssibatendereza. 
46_11_23_Kubanga nze nnaweebwa eri Mukama waffe era ekyo kye nnabawa mmwe, nga Mukama waffe Yesu mu kiro kiri kye yaliirwamu olukwe yatoola omugaati; 
46_11_24_ne yeebaza, n'agumenyamu, n'ayogera nti Guno gwe mubiri gwange oguli ku lwammwe: mukolenga bwe mutyo olw'okunjijukiranga nze. 
46_11_25_Era n'ekikompe bw'atyo bwe baamala okulya, ng'ayogera nti Ekikompe kino ye ndagaano empya mu musaayi gwange: mukolenga bwe mutyo buli lwe munaanywangako, olw'o kunjijukiranga nze. 
46_11_26_Kubanga buli lwe munaalyanga ku mugaati guno ne lwe munaanywanga ku kikompe, munaayolesanga okufa kwa Mukama waffe okutuusa lw'alijja. 
46_11_27_Kyanaavanga azza omusango ogw'omubiri n'omusaayi gwa Mukama waffe buli anaalyanga ku mugaati aba anaanywanga ku kikompe kya Mukama waffe nga tasaanidde. 
46_11_28_Naye omuntu yeekeberenga yekka alyoke alyenga ku mugaati bw'atyo, era anywenga ne ku kikompe. 
46_11_29_Kubanga alya era anywa, alya era anywa musango gwe ye, bw'atayawula mubiri. 
46_11_30_Mu mmwe kyemuvudde mubeeramu abangi abanafu n'abalwadde, era bangiko abeebaka: 
46_11_31_Naye singa twesalira omusango ffekka, tetwandisaliddwa musango. 
46_11_32_Naye bwe tusalirwa omusango, tubuulirirwa Mukama waffe, mueme akusingibwa omusango awamu n’ensi: 
46_11_33_Kale, baganda bange, bwe mukuŋŋgaananga okulya, mulindaganenga. 
46_11_34_Omuntu bw'alumwanga enjala, alyenga eka; okukuŋŋaana kwammwe kulemenga okuba okw'ensobi. N'ebirala ndibirongoosa, we ndijjira wonna. 
46_12_1_Kale nno, ab'oluganda, eby'ebirabo eby'omwoyo ssaagala mmwe obutabitegeera: 
46_12_2_Mumanyi bwe mwali ab'amawanga nga mwakyamizibwanga eri ebifaananyi ebitoogera, nga mukyamizibwa mu ngeri yonna. 
46_12_3_Kyenva mbategeeza nga siwali muntu bw'ayogera mu Mwoyo gwa Katonda agamba nti Yesu akolimiddwa; so siwali muntu ayinza okwogera nti Yesu ye Mukama waffe, wabula mu Mwoyo Omutukuvu. 
46_12_4_Naye waliwo enjawulo z'ebira bo, naye Omwoyo ali omu. 
46_12_5_Era waliwo enjawulo z'okuweereza, era Mukama waffe ali omu. 
46_12_6_Era waliwo enjawulo z'okukola, naye Katonda ali omu, akola byonna mu bona. 
46_12_7_Naye buli muntu aweebwa okulagibwa kw'Omwoyo olw'okugasa. 
46_12_8_Kubanga omulala Omwoyo amuweesa ekigambo eky'amagezi; n'omulala aweebwa ekigambo eky'okutegeeranga, ku bw'Omwoyo oyo: 
46_12_9_omulala okukkiriza, ku bw'Omwoyo oyo; n'omutala ebirabo eby'okuwonyanga, ku bw'Omwoyo omu; 
46_12_10_n’omulala okukolanga eby'amagero; n'omulala okubuuliranga; n'omulala okwawulanga emyoyo: omulala engeri z'ennimi; n'omulala okuvvuunuzanga ennimi: 
46_12_11_naye ebyo byonna Omwoyo oyo omu ye abikola, ng'agabira buli muntu kinnoomu nga ye bw'ayagala. 
46_12_12_Kuba omubiri nga bwe guli ogumu ne guba n'ebitundu ebingi n'ebitundu byonna eby'omubiri, newakubadde nga bingi, gwe mubiri gumu; era ne Kristo bw'atyo. 
46_12_13_Kubanga mu Mwoyo omu fenna twabatizibwa okuyingira mu mubiri gumu, oba Bayudaaya oba Bayonaani, oba baddu oba ba ddembe; fenna ne tunywesebwa mu Mwoyo omu. 
46_12_14_Kubanga n'omubiri si kitundu kimu, naye bingi. 
46_12_15_Ekigere bwe kyogera nti Kubanga siri mukono, siri wa ku mubiri; olwekyo tekibeera ekitali kya ku mubiri. 
46_12_16_Era okutu bwe kwogera nti Kubanga siri liiso, siri wa ku mubiri; olwekyo tekubeera okutali kwa ku mubiri. 
46_12_17_Omubiri gwonna singa liiso, okuwulira kwandibadde wa? Gwonaa singa kuwulira, okuwunyiriza kwandibadde wa? 
46_12_18_Naye kaakano Katonda yassaawo ebitundu buli kitmakimu mu mubiri, nga bwe yayagala. 
46_12_19_Era byonna singa kyali kitundu kimu, omubiri gwandibadde wa? 
46_12_20_Naye kaakano ebitundu biri bingi, naye omubiri gumu. 
46_12_21_N'eriiso teriyinza kugamba mukono nti Ggwe sikwetaaga: oba nate omutwe okugamba ebigere nti Mmwe sibeetaaga. 
46_12_22_Naye, ekisinga eanyo, ebitundu bino eby'omubiri ebirowoozebwa okubeera ebinafu byetaagibwa: 
46_12_23_n'ebyo eby'oku mubiri bye tulowooza obutaba na kitiibwa nnyo, bye twambaza ekitaibwa ekisinga obungi: n'ebitundu byaffe ebitali birungi bye bisinga okubeera n'obulungi; 
46_12_24_naye ebirungi byaffe tebyetaaga: naye Katonda yagattira ddala wamu omubiri, ekitundu ekyabulako ng'akiwa ekitiibwa ekisinga obungi; 
46_12_25_walemenga okubeera okwawula mu mubiri; naye ebitundu biyambaganenga bumu byokka na byokka. 
46_12_26_Era ekitundu ekimu bwe kibonaabona, ebitundu byonna bibonerabanera wamu nakyo; oba ekitundu ek~mu bwe kigulumizibwa, ebituadu byonna bisanyukira wamu nakyo: 
46_12_27_Naye mmwe muli mubiri gwa Kristo, n'ebitundu byagwo, buli muntu. 
46_12_28_Era Katonda yassaawo mu kkanisa abalala, okusooka batume, ab'okubiri bannabbi, ab'okusaru bayigiriza, nate eby'amagero, nate ebirabo eby'okuwonyanga, abayambi, abafuga, aboogezi b'ennimi. 
46_12_29_Bonna batume? bonna bannabbi? bonna bayigiriza? bonna bakola eby'amagero? 
46_12_30_bonna balina ebirabo eby'okuwonyanga? bonna boogera ennimi? bonna baavvuunula? 
46_12_31_Naye mwegombenga ebirabo ebisinga obukulu: Era mbalaga ekkubo erisinga ennyo obulungi. 
46_13_1_Bwe njogera n'enaimi z'abantu n’eza bamalayika, naye ne ssiba na kwagala, nga nfuuse ekikomo ekivuga n'ebitaasa ebisaala. 
46_13_2_Era bwe mba ne bunnabbi ne ntegeera ebyama byonna n'okutegeera kwonna; era bwe mba n'okukkiriza kwonna, n'okuggyawo ne nzigyawo ensozi; naye ne ssiba na kwagala, nga ssiri kintu. 
46_13_3_Era bwe ngabira abaavu bye nnina byonna okubaliisanga, era bwe mpaayo omubiri gwange okwokebwa, naye ne ssiba na kwagala, nga ssiriiko kye ngasizza. 
46_13_4_Okwagala kugumiikiriza, kulina ekisa; okwagala tekuba na buggya; okwagala tekwekulumbaza, tekwegulumiza 
46_13_5_tekukola bitasaana, tekunoonya byakwo, tekunyiiga, tekusiba bubi ku mwoyo 
46_13_8_Okwagala tekuggwaawo emirembe gyonna: naye oba bunnabbi, bulivaawo; oba ennimi, zirikoma; oba okutegeera, kulivaawo. 
46_13_9_Kubanga tutegeerako kitundu, era tulagulako kitundu: 
46_13_10_naye ebituukirivu bwe birijja, eby'ekitundu birivaawo. 
46_13_11_Bwe nnali omuto, nnayogeranga ng'omuto, nnategeeranga ng'omuto, nnalowoozanga ng'omuto: bwe nnakula, ne ndeka eby'obuto: 
46_13_12_Kubanga kaakano tulabira mu ndabirwamu ebitalabika bulungi; naye mu biro biri tulitunulagana n'amaaso: kaakano ntegeerako kitundu; naye mu biro biri nditegeerera ddala era nga bwe nnategeererwa ddala. 
46_13_13_Naye kaakano waliwo okukkiriza, okusuubira, okwagala, ebyo byonsntule; naye ku ebyo ekisinga obukulu kwagala. 
46_14_1_Mugobererenga okwagala; naye mwegombenga ebirabo eby'omwoyo, naye ekisinga mubuulirenga. 
46_14_2_Kubanga ayogera oiulimi tayogera eri bantu, wabula Katonda; kubanga siwali awulira; naye mu mwoyo ayogera byama. 
46_14_3_Naye abuulira ayogera eri abantu ebizimba, n'ebisanyusa, n'ebigumya. 
46_14_4_Ayogera olulimi yeezimba yekka; naye abuulira azimba ekkanisa. 
46_14_5_Kale mbaagala mwenna mwogerenga ennimi, naye waakiri mubuulirenga: era abuulira ye asinga obukulu ayogera ennimi, wabula ng'ategeeza, ekkanisa eryoke ezimbibwe. 
46_14_6_Naye kaakano; ab'oluganda, oba nga ndijja gye muli nga njogera ennimi, ndibagasa ntya; bwe ssiryogera nammwe oba mu kubikkula, oba mu kutegeera, oba mu kubuulira, oba mu kuyigiriza? 
46_14_7_Era n'ebitali biramu, ebireeta, eddoboozi; oba ndere, oba nnanga, bwe bitaleeta kwawula mu kuvuga, kitegeerwa kitya ekifuuyibwa oba ekikubibwa? 
46_14_8_Kubanga n'akagombe bwe kavuga eddoboozi eritategeerekeka, ani alyeteekateeka okulwana? 
46_14_9_Bwe mutyo nammwe bwe mutaaleetenga mu lulimi eddoboozi eriwulikika amangu, ekyogerwa kinaategeerwanga kitya? kuanga mulyogerera mu bbanga. 
46_14_10_Mpozzi waliwo mu nsi engeri 'ennimi bwe ziti, so siwali ngeri terina makulu. 
46_14_11_Kale bwe ssiianya makulu ga ddoboozi, ndibeera g'ajoboja eri oyo ayogera, n'oyo yogera alibeera ng'ajoboja eri nze. 
46_14_12_Bwe mutyo nammwe, kubanga awegomba eby'omwoyo, mwagalenga okweyongera olw'okuzimba kkanisa. 
46_14_13_Kale ayogera olulimi sabenga ategeezenga: 
46_14_14_Kubanga bwe nsaba mu lulimi, omwoyo wange gusaba, naye amagezi gange egabala bibala. 
46_14_15_Kale kiki? nnaaabyanga omwoyo, era nnaasabyaga n'amagezi, nnaayimbyanga mwoyo, era nnaayimbyanga n'amagezi. 
46_14_16_Kubanga bw'osaba omukisa mu mwoyo, abeera mu kifo y'oyo atamanyi anaddangamu atya tti Amiina olw'okwebaza kwo, bw'atategeera ky'oyogedde? 
46_14_17_Kubanga ggwe weebaza bulungi, naye mulala tazimbibwa. 
46_14_18_Nneebaza Katonda; mbasinga mwenna okwoera ennimi; 
46_14_19_naye mu kkanisa njagala okwogeranga ebigambo bitano n'amagezi gange, ndyoke njiirizenga n'abalala, okusinga ebiambo akakumi mu lulimi obulimi. 
46_14_20_Ab'oluganda, temubanga baana bato mu magezi: naye mu ttima mbeerenga baana bawere, naye mu magezi mubeerenga bakulu. 
46_14_21_Kyawandiikibwa mu mateeka nti Ndyogera n'abantu bano mu bantu ab'ennimi endala ne mu mimwa gya bannaggwanga; era ewakubadde bwe kityo tebalimpura, bw'ayogera Mukama: 
46_14_22_Ennimi kyeziva zibeera akaonero, si eri abo abakkiriza, waula eri abatakkiriza: naye okubuulira tekubeera kabonero eri abatalariza wabula eri abakkiriza. 
46_14_23_Kale ekkanisa yonna bw'eba g'ekuŋŋaanidde wamu, bonna ne oagera ennimi, ne wayingira abamumanyi oba abatakkiriza, tebaliamba nti mulaluse? 
46_14_24_Naye bona bwe babuulira, ne wayingira takkiriza oba atamanyi, anenyeebwa bonna, asalirwa bonna omuango; 
46_14_25_ebyama eby'omu mutima gwe birabisibwa; era bw'atyo livuunama amaaso, n'asinza Katonda, ng'ayogera nga Katonda ali mu mmwe ddala. 
46_14_26_Kale kiri kitya, ab'oluganda? Bwe mukuŋŋaana, buli muntu alina oluyimba, alina okuyigiriza, alina ekimubikkuliddwa, alina olulimi, alina okutegeeza. Byonna bikolebwenga olw'okuzimba. 
46_14_27_Omuntu bw'ayogeranga olulimi, boogerenga babiri oba nga bangi, basatu, era mu mpalo, era omu avvuunulenga: 
46_14_28_naye oba nga tewali avvuunula, asirikenga mu kkanisa; ayogererenga mu mmeeme ye era ne Katonda. 
46_14_29_Ne bannabbi boogerenga babiri oba basatu, n'abalala baawulenga. 
46_14_30_Naye omulala atudde bw'abikkulirwanga, eyasoose asirikenga. 
46_14_31_Kubanga mwenna muyinza okubuuliranga kinnoomu, bonna bayigenga, era bonna basanyusibwenga; 
46_14_32_n'emyoyo gya bannabbi gifugibwa bannabbi; 
46_14_33_kubanga Katonda si wa kuyoogaana, naye wa mirembe; nga mu kkanisa zonna ez'abatukuvu. 
46_14_34_Abakazi basirikenga mu kkanisa: kubanga tebalagirwa kwogera; naye ba bafugubwenga, era nga n'amateeka bwe googera. 
46_14_35_Era bwe baagalanga okuiyiga ekigambo, babuulizenga babbaabwe eka: kubanga kya nsonyi omukazi okwogeranga mu kkanisa. 
46_14_36_Oba gye muli ekigambo kya Katonda gye kyava? oba kyatuuka eri mmwe mwekka? 
46_14_37_Omuntu yenna bwe yeerowoozanga okuba nnabbi oba wa mwoyo, ategeerenga bye mbawandiikira, nga kye kiragiro kya Mukama waffe: 
46_14_38_Naye omuntu yenna bw'atategeera, aleme okutegeera. 
46_14_39_Kale baganda bange, mwegombenga okubuuliranga, so temuziyizanga kwogeranga nnimi: 
46_14_40_Naye byonna bikolebwenga nga bwe kisaana era mu mpisa ennungi. 
46_15_1_Kale mbategeeza, ab'oluganda, enjiri gye nnababuulira, era gye mwaweebwa, era gye, munywereramu, 
46_15_2_era gye mulokokeramu; mbategeeza ebigambo bye nnagibuuliriramu, oba nga muginyweza, wabula nga mwakkiririza bwereere.
