46_15_3_Kubanga nnasooka okubawa mmwe era kye nnaweebwa, nga Kristo yafa olw'ebibi byaffe ng'ebyawandiikibwa bwe byogera 
46_15_9_Kubanga nze ndi muto mu batume, atasaanira kuyitibwa mutume, kubanga nnayigganyanga ekkanisa ya Katonda. 
46_15_10_Naye olw'ekisa kya Katonda bwe ndi bwe ndi; n'ekisa kye ekyali gye ndi tekyali kya bwereere; naye nnakola emirimu mingi okusinga bonna: naye si aze, wabula ekisa kya Katonda ekyali nange. 
46_15_11_Kale oba nze oba bo, bwe tutyo bwe tubuulira, era bwe mutyo bwe mwakkiriza. 
46_15_12_Naye Kristo bw'abuulirwa nga yazuukizibwa mu bafu, abamu mu mmwe boogera batya nga tewali kuzuukira kwa bafu? 
46_15_13_Naye oba nga tewali kuzuukira kwa bafu, era ne Kristo teyazuukizibwa; 
46_15_14_era oba nga Kristo teyazuukizibwa, kale okubuulira kwaffe tekuliimu, so n'okukkiriza kwammwe tekuliimu. 
46_15_15_Era naye tulabika ag'abajulirwa ab'obulimba aba Katonda; kubanga twategeeza Katonda nga yazuukiza Kristo: gw'ataazuukiza, oba ng'a bafu tebazuukizibwa. 
46_15_16_Kuba oba ng'abafu tebazuukizibwa, era ne Kristo teyazuukizibwa: 
46_15_17_era oba nga Kristo teyazuukizibwa, okukkiriza kwammwe tekuliiko kye kugasa; mukyali mu bibi byammwe. 
46_15_18_Kale era n'abo abeebaka mu Kristo baabula. 
46_15_19_Oba nga mu bulamu buno bwokka mwe tubeeredde n’essuubi mu Kristo, tuli ba kusaasirwa okusinga abantu bonna: 
46_15_20_Naye kaakano Kristo yazuukizibwa mu bafu, gwe mwaka omubereberye ogw'abo abeebaka. 
46_15_21_Kubanga okufa bwe kwabaawo ku bw'omuntu, era n’okuzuukira kw'abafu kwabaawo ku bwa muntu. 
46_15_22_Kuba bonna nga bwe baafiira mu Adamu, era bwe batyo mu Kristo bonna mwe balifuukira abalamu. 
46_15_23_Naye buli muntu mu kifo kye ye: Kristo gwe mwaka omubereberye; oluvannyuma aba Y,risto mu kujja kwe. 
46_15_24_Enkomerero n'eryoka etuuka bw'aliwaayo obwakabaka eri Katonda ye Kitaawe; bw'aliba ng'amaze okuggyawo okufuga kwonna n'amaanyi gonna n'obuyinza. 
46_15_25_Kubanga kimugwanira okufuganga okutuusa lw'alissa abalabe be bonna wansi w'ebigere bye. 
46_15_26_Omulabe ow'enkomerero aliggibwawo, kwe kufa. 
46_15_27_Kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti Yassa byonna wansi w'ebigere bye. Naye bw'ayogera nti Byonna byassibwa wansi, kitegeerekeka ng'oyo teyassibwa wansi eyassa byonna wansi we. 
46_15_28_Naye byonna bwe birimala okussibwa wansi we, era n'Omwana yennyini n'alyoka assibwa wansi w'oyo eyassa byonna wansi we, Katonda alyoke abeerenga byonna mu byonna. 
46_15_29_Kubanga balikola batya ababatizibwa ku Iw'abafu? oba ng'abafu tebazuukizibwa ddala, kiki ekibabatizisa ku lw'abo? 
46_15_30_Naffe lwaki okubeera mu kabi buli kaseera? 
46_15_31_Nfa bulijjo, ndayidde okwenyumiriza okwo ku lwammwe, kwe ndi nakwo mu Kristo Yesu Mukama waffe. 
46_15_32_Oba nga nnalwana n'ensolo mu Efeso ng'omuntu obuntu, ngasibwa ntya? Oba ng'abafu tebazuukizibwa, tulye tunywe, kubanga tufa enkya. 
46_15_33_Temulimbwanga: Okukwana n'ababi kwonoona empisa ennungi. 
46_15_34_Mutamiirukukenga mu butuukirivu, so temwonoonanga; kubanga abalala tebategeera Katonda: njogedde kubakwasa nsonyi. 
46_15_35_Naye omuntu alyogera nti Abafu bazuukizibwa batya? era mubiri ki gwe bajja nagwo? 
46_15_36_Mu sirusiru ggwe, gy'osiga teba nnamu wabula ng'efa: 
46_15_37_ne gy'osiga, tosiga mubiri oguliba, wabula mpeke njereere, mpozzi ya ŋŋaano, oba ya ngeri ndala; 
46_15_38_naye Katonda agiwa omubiri nga bw'ayagala, era buli nsigo agiwa omubiri gwayo yokka. 
46_15_39_Ennyama yonna si nnyama emu: naye endala ya bantu, n'endala ya nsolo, n'endala ya nnyonyi, n'endala ya byannyanja. 
46_15_40_Era waliwo emibiri egy'omu ggulu n'emibiri egy'omu nsi: naye ekitiibwa eky'egy'omu ggulu kirala, n'eky'egy'omu nsi kirala. 
46_15_41_Ekitiibwa ky'enjuba kirala, n'ekitiibwa ky'omwezi kirala, n'eldtiibwa ly'emmunyeenye kirala: kubanga emmunyeenye teyenkana na ginnaayo kitiibwa. 
46_15_42_Era n'okuzuukira kw'abafu bwe kutyo. Gusigibwa mu kuvunda; guzuukizibwa mu butavunda: 
46_15_43_gusigibwa awatali kitiibwa; guzuukizibwa mu kitiibwa; gusigibwa mu bunafu; guzuukizibwa mu maanyi: 
46_15_44_gusigibwa nga mubiri gwa mukka; guzuukizibwa mubiri gwa mwoyo. Oba nga waliwo omubiri gw'omukka, era waliwo n'ogw'omwoyo. 
46_15_45_Era bwe kityo kyawandiikibwa nti Omuntu ow'olubereberye Adamu yafuuka mukka mulamu. Adamu ow'oluvannyuma yafuuka mwoyo oguleeta obulamu. 
46_15_46_Naye eky'omwoyo tekisooka, wabula eky'omukka; oluvannyuma kya mwoyo. 
46_15_47_Omuntu ow'olubereberye yava mu nsi, wa ttaka: omuntu ow'okubiri yava mu ggulu. 
46_15_48_Ng'oli ow'ettaka bwe yali, era n'ab'ettaka bwe bah bwe batyo: era ng'oli ow'omu ggulu bw'ali; era n'ab'omu ggulu bwe bali batyo. 
46_15_49_ra nga bwe twatwala ekifaananyi ky'oli ow'ettaka, era tulitwala n'ekifaananyi ky'oli ow'omu ggulu. 
46_15_50_Naye kino kye njogera, ab'oluganda, ng'omubiri n'omusaayi tebiyinza kusikira bwakabaka bwa Katonda so okuvunda. tekusikira butavunda: 
46_15_51_Laba, mbabuulira ekyama: tetulyebaka fenna, naye fenna tulifuusibwa, 
46_15_52_mangu ago, nga kutemya kikowe, akagombe ak'enkomerero bwe kalivuga: kubanga kalivuga, n'abafu balizuukizibwa obutavunda, naffe tulifuusibwa. 
46_15_53_Kubanga oguvunda guno,kigugwanira okwambala obutavunda, n'ogufa guno okwambala obutafa. 
46_15_54_Naye oguvunda guno bwe guliba nga gumaze okwambala obutavunda, n'ogufa guno okwambala obutafa, ekigambo ekyawandiikibwa ne kiryoka kituukirira nti Okufa kumiriddwa mu kuwangula. 
46_15_55_Ggwe okufa, okuwangula kwo kuli luuyi wa? Ggwe okufa, okuluma kwo kuli luuyi wa? 
46_15_56_Okuluma kw'okufa kye kibi; n'amaanyi g'ekibi ge mateeka: 
46_15_57_naye Katonda yeebazibwe, atuwanguza ffe ku bwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
46_15_58_Kale, baganda bange abaagalwa, munywerenga obutasagaasagana, nga mweyongeranga bulijjo mu mulimu gwa Mukama waffe, kubanga mumanyi ng'okufuba kwammwe si kwa bwereere mu Mukama waffe. 
46_16_1_Naye okukuŋŋaanyizanga ebintu abatukuvu, nga bwe nnalagira ekkanisa ez'e Ggalatiya, nammwe mukolenga bwe mutyo. 
46_16_2_Ku lunaku olw'olubereberye mu ssabbiiti buli muntu mu mmwe aterekenga ewuwe nga bw'ayambiddwa, ebintu bireme okukuŋŋaanyizibwa lwe ndijja. 
46_16_3_Era bwe ndituuka be mulisiima mu bbaluwa abo be ndituma okutwala ekisa kyammwe mu Yerusaalemi: 
46_16_4_era oba nga kirinsaanira nange okugenda, baligenda nange. 
46_16_5_Naye ndijja gye muli bwe ndiba nga mmaze okuyita mu Makedoni; kubanga ndiyita mu Makedoni: 
46_16_6_naye mpozzi ndituula gye muli katono, oba n'okumala ndimalayo biro bya ttoggo byokka, mmwe mulyoke munsibirire gye ndigenda yonna. 
46_16_7_Kubanga ssaagala kubalaba kaakano nga mpita buyisi: kubanga nsuubira okulwayo katono gye muli, Mukama waffe bw'alikkiriza. 
46_16_8_Naye ndirwayo mu Efeso okutuusa ku Pentekoote 
46_16_10_Naye oba nga Timoseewo alijja, mulabe abeerenga gye muli awatali kutya; kubanga akola omulimu gwa Mukama waffe era nga nze: 
46_16_11_kale omuntu yenna tamunyoomanga. Naye mumusibirire n'emirembe, ajje gye ndi: kubanga nsuubira okumulaba awamu n'ab'olu ganda. 
46_16_12_Naye ebya Apolo ow'oluganda, nnamwegayirira nnyo okujja gye muli awamu n'ab'oluganda: n'atayagalira ddala kujja mu kiseera kino; naye alijja bw'alifuna ebbanga. 
46_16_13_Mutunulenga, munywerenga mu kukkiriza, mubeerenga basajja, mubeerenga ba maanyi. 
46_16_14_Byonna bye mukola bikolebwenga mu kwagala. 
46_16_15_Naye mbeegayirira, ab'oluganda (mumanyi ennyumba ya Suteefana, nga gwe mwaka omubereberye ogw'omu Akaya, era nga beeteeseteese okuweereza abatukuvu), 
46_16_16_nammwe muwulirenga abali ng'abo, na buli muntu akolera awamu naffe afuba. 
46_16_17_Era nsanyukira okujja kwa Suteefana ne Folutunaato ne Akayiko: kubanga ebyabula ku lwammwe baabituukiriza. 
46_16_18_Kubanga baawummuza omwoyo gwange n'ogwammwe: kale mukkirizenga abali ng'abo. 
46_16_19_Ekkanisa ez'omu Asiya zibalamusizza. Akula ne Pulisika babalamusizza nnyo mu Mukama waffe; n'ekkanisa eri mu nnyumba yaabwe. 
46_16_20_Ab'oluganda bonna babalamusizza. Mulamusagane n'okunywegera okutukuvu. 
46_16_21_Kuno kwe kulamusa kwange Pawulo n'omukono gwange. 
46_16_22_Omuntu yenna bw'atayagalanga Mukama waffe, akolimirwenga. Mukama waffe ajja. 
46_16_23_Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo kibeerenga nammwe. 
46_16_24_Okwagala kwange kubeerenga nammwe mwenna mu Kristo Yesu. Amiina. 
47_1_1_Paulo, omutume wa Kristo Yesu olw'okwagala kwa Katonda, ne Timoseewo ow'oluganda, eri ekkariisa ya Katonda eri mu Kkolinso, awamu n'abatukuvu bonna abali mu Akaya yonna: 
47_1_2_ekisa kibeerenga gye muli n'emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
47_1_3_Yeebazibwe Katonda era Kitaawe wa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, Kitaffe ow'okusaasira era Katonda ow'okusanyusa kwonna 
47_1_5_Kuba ebibonyoobonyo bya Kristo aga bwe byeyongera ennyo gye tuli, era bwe kutyo n'okusanyusibwa kwaffe kweyongera nnyo ku bwa Kristo. 
47_1_6_Naye bwe tubonaabona, tubonaabona olw'okusanyusibwa n'okulokoka kwammwe; era bwe tusanyusibwa, tusaayusibwa olw'okusanyusibwa kwammwe, okuleeta okugumiikiriza ebiboayoobonyo ebyo naffe bye tubonyaabonyezebwa: 
47_1_7_era okusuubira kwaffe kunywera eri mmwe; nga tamanyi nti nga bwe mussa ekimu mu bibonyoobonyo, era bwe mutyo musse ekimu ne mu kusanyusibwa. 
47_1_8_Kubanga tetwagala mmwe obutategeera, ab'oluganda eby'okubonaabona kwaffe okwatubaako mu Asiya, bwe twazitoowererwa ennyo nnyini okusinga amaanyi gaffe, era n'okusuubira ne tutasuubira kuba balamu: 
47_1_9_era ffe bennyini twalimu okuddamu okw'okufa munda mu ffe, tuleme obwesige okubuteeka mu ffe fekka, wabula Katonda azuukiza abafu: 
47_1_10_eyatuwonya mu kufa okunene okwenkana awo, era anaatuwonyanga: era gwe tusuubira edda alituwonya; 
47_1_11_era mmwe bwe mubeera awamu ku lwaffe mu kusaba; bwe tulimala okuweebwa ekirabo olw'abantu abangi, abangi balyoke beebaze ku lwaffe. 
47_1_12_Kubanga okwenyumiriza kwaffe kwe kuno, okutegeeza okw'omwoyo gwaffe, nga mu butukuvu ne mu mazima ga Katonda, si mu magezi ag'omubiri wabula mu kisa kya Katonda, bwe twatambulanga mu nsi era okusinga ennyo eri mmwe. 
47_1_13_Kubanga tetubawandiikira birala wabula ebyo bye musoma era n'okwatula bye mwatula, era nsuubira nga munaabyatulanga okutuusa enkomerero: 
47_1_14_nga n'okwatula bwe mwatwatulako akatono, nti ffe tuli kwenyumiriza kwammwe, era nga nammwe bwe muli gye tuli, ku lunaku lwa Mukama waffe Yesu. 
47_1_15_Ne mu kusuubira kuno nnali njagala okujja gye muli edda, mulyoke muweebwe ekisa olw'okubiri; 
47_1_16_n'okuyita gye muli okugenda e Makedoni, n'okuva nate e Makedoni okujja gye muli, n'okusibirirwa mmwe okugenda e Buyudaaya. 
47_1_17_Kale bwe nnali njagala bwe ntyo, nnalagaalaganya? oba bye ateesa, mbiteesa kugoberera mubiri, nze okuba n'ebyo nti weewaawo, weewaawo, ate nti si weewaawo, si weewaawo? 
47_1_18_Naye nga Katonda bw'ali omwesigwa, ekigambo kyaffe ekiri eri mmwe si bwe kiti nti weewaawo ate nti si weewaawo. 
47_1_19_Kubanga Omwana wa Katonda, Yesu Kristo, ffe gwe twabuulira mu mmwe, nze ne Sirwano ne Timoseewo, teyali nti weewaawo ate nti si weewaawo, naye mu ye mwe muli weewaawo. 
47_1_20_Kubanga mu byonna byonna Katonda bye yasuubiza, mu oyo mwe muli weewaawo: era oyo kyava aleeta Amiina, Katonda atenderezebwe ku bwaffe. 
47_1_21_Naye. atunyweza ffe awamu nammwe mu Kristo, era eyatufukako amafuta, ye Katonda; 
47_1_22_era eyatussaako akabonero, n'atuwa omusingo ogw'Omwoyo mu mitima gyaffe. 
47_1_23_Naye nze mpita Katonda okuba omujulirwa w'emmeeme yange, nga kyennava nnema okujja mu Kkolinso, kubanga nnabasaasira. 
47_1_24_Si kubanga tufuga okukkiriza kwammwe, naye tuli bakozi bannammwe ab'essanyu lyammwe: kubanga okukkiriza kwe kubayimiriza. 
47_2_1_Naye kino nnakimalirira mu mwoyo gwange, obutajja nate na nnaku gye muli. 
47_2_2_Kubanga nze bwe mbanakuwaza, kale ansanyusa ye ani wabula oyo nze gwe nnakuwaza? 
47_2_3_N'ekyo nnakiwandiika bwe ndijja abo baleme okunnakuwaza abagwanira okunsanyusa; kubanga nneesiga mmwe mwenna, ng'essaayu lyange lye lyammwe mwenna, 
47_2_4_Kubanga mu kubonaabona okungi n'okulumwa omutima nnabawandiikira n'amaziga amangi, si lwa ku banakuwaza, naye mutegeere okwagala kwe nnina eri mmwe bwe kuli okungi enyo: 
47_2_5_Naye omuntu bw'aba annakuwazizza, abatanakuwazizza nze, wabula mmwe mwenna, so si mwenna, nneme okuzitowa ennyo: 
47_2_6_Kunaamumala ali bw'atyo okubonerezebwa okwo okw'abangi 
47_2_8_Kyenva mbeegayirira okunyweza okwagala eri oyo. 
47_2_9_Kubanga era kyennava mpandiika; ndyoke ntegeere okukemebwa kwammwe, oba nga muwulira mu bigambo byonna. 
47_2_10_Naye gwe musonyiwa ekigambo, nange mmusonyiwa: kubanga nange kye asonyiye, oba nga nsonyiye, nkisonyiye ku lwammwe mu maaso ga Kristo; 
47_2_11_Setaani alemenga kutwekulumbalizaako: kubanga tetuli ng'abatategeera nkwe ze. 
47_2_12_Naye bwe nnajja mu Tulowa olw'enjiri ya Kristo, era oluggi bwe lwanzigulirwawo mu Mukama waffe, 
47_2_13_ssaalaba kuwummula mu mwoyo gwange, olw'obutasanga Tito muganda wange: naye ne mbasiibula ne ŋŋenda mu Makedoni: 
47_2_14_Naye Katonda yeebazibwe, atutwala bulijjo ng'abawangulwa mu Kristo, n'atubikkuza evvumbe ery'okumutegeera ye mu buli kifo, 
47_2_15_Kubanga tuli vvumbe ddungi erya Kristo eri Katonda mu abo abalokoka ne mu bo ababula; 
47_2_16_eri abo ababula a tuli vvumbe eriva mu kufa erireeta okufa; naye eri bali tuli vvumbe eriva mu bulamu erireeta obulamu. Era ebyo ani abiyinza? 
47_2_17_Kubanga tetuli nga bali abasinga obungi, abatabanguzi ofwamambo kya Katonda: mu maaso naye olwa Katonda, mu ga Katonda bwe tutyo bwe twogera mu Kristo. 
47_3_1_Tutanula nate okwetendereza fekka? oba twetaaga ebbaluwa, ng'abalala, ez'okutendereza eri jnmwe, oba eziva gye muli? 
47_3_2_Mmwe muli bbaluwa yaffe, ewandiikiddwa mu mitima gyaffe abantu bonna gye bategeera, basoma; . 
47_3_3_nga mulabisibwa okuba ebbaluwa ya Kristo, ffe gye twamuweererezaamu, etaawandiikibwa na bwino, wabula Omwoyo gwa Katonda omulamu; si ku bipande eby'amayinja, wabula ku bipande mitima egy'omubiri 
47_3_4_Era bwe tutyo bwe twesiga Katonda ku bwa Kristo: 
47_3_5_si kubanga fekka tulina obuyinza, okulowoona ekigambo kulowooza ekigambo kyonna nga ekiva gye tuli; naye obuyinza bwaffe buva eri Katonda 
47_3_6_era eyatuyinzisa ng'abaweereza b'endagaano empya; si baweereza ba nnukuta, wabula ab’omwoyo: kubanga nnukuta etta; naye omwoyo guleeta obulamu. 
47_3_7_Naye oba okuweereza okw’okufa okwali mu nnukuta, okwasalibwa ku mayinja, kwajjira mu kitiibwa, amayinja, kwajjira mu kitiibwa, abaana ba Isiraeri n'okuyinza ne batayinza kwekaliriza maaso ga Musa olw'ekitiibwa ky’amaaso ge; ekyali kigenda akuggwaawo: 
47_3_8_okuweereza okw'omwoyo tekulisinga kuba na kitiibwa? 
47_3_9_Kuba oba kitiibwa eereza okw'omusango kye ng’okuweereza okw'obutuukirivu kweyongera nnyo okusukkiriza kitiibwa. 
47_3_10_Kubanga ekyaweebwa ekitiibwa tekyakiwebwa mu kigambo kino, olw'ekitiibwa ekisinga ekyo. 
47_3_11_Kuba oba ng'ekyaggwaawo kyalina ekitiibwa, eky'olubeerera kisinga ennyo okuba n’ekitiibwa. 
47_3_12_Kale nga bwe tulina essuubi eryenkana awo, twogera n'obuvumu bungi 
47_3_13_so si nga Musa eyeebi kkanga ku maaso ge, abaana ba Isiraeri balemenga okwekaliriza enkomerero y'ekyo ekyali kiggwaawo: 
47_3_14_naye amagezi gaabwe gaakakanyazibwa: kubanga n'okutuusa leero eky'okubikkako kiri kikyaliwo mu kusomebwa kw'endagaano ey'edda nga tekinnaggibwawo; ekyo kivaawo mu Kristo. 
47_3_15_Naye n'okutuusa leero, ebya Musa bwe bisomebwa, eky'okubikkako kiri ku mutima gwabwe. 
47_3_16_Naye bwe gukyukira Mukama waffe, eky'okubikkako kiggibwawo. 
47_3_17_Naye Mukama waffe gwe Mwoyo: era awaba Omwoyo gwa Mukama waffe we waba eddembe. 
47_3_18_Naye ffe fenna, bwe tumasamasa ng'endabirwamu ekitiibwa kya Mukama waffe amaaso, gaffe nga gaggiddwako eky'okubikkako, tufaananyizibwa engeri eri' okuva mu kitiibwa okutuuka mu kitiibwa, nga ku bwa Mukama waffe Omwoyo. 
47_4_1_Kale, kubanga tulina okuweereza okwo, nga bwe twasaasirwa, tetuddirira: 
47_4_2_naye twagaana eby'ensonyi ebikisibwa, aga tetutambulira mu bukuusa, so tetukyamya kigambo kya Katonda; naye olw'okulabisa amazima nga twetendereza eri omwoyo gwa buli muntu mu maaso ga Katonda. 
47_4_3_Naye okubikkibwako oba ng'enjiri yaffe ebikkibwako, ebikkibwako mu abo ababula: 
47_4_4_katonda ow'emirembe gino be yaziba amaaso g'amagezi gaabwe abatakkiriza, omusana gw'enjiri ey'ekitiibwa eya Kristo, oyo kye kifaananyi kya Katonda, gulemenga okubaakira: 
47_4_5_Kubanga tetwebuulira fekka, wabula Kristo Yesu nga ye Mukama waffe, naffe nga tuli baddu bammwe ku lwa Yesu. 
47_4_6_Kubanga Katonda ye yayogera nti Omusana gulyaka mu kizikiza, eyayaka mu mitima gyaffe, okuleeta omusana ogw'okutegeera ekitiibwa kya Katonda mu maaso ga Yesu Kristo. 
47_4_7_Naye obugagga obwo tuli nabwo mu bibya eby'ebbumba, amaanyi amangi ennyo galyoke gavenga eri Katonda, so si eri ffe 
47_4_9_tuyiggayizibwa, naye tetulekebwa; tumegebwa, naye tetuzikirira; 
47_4_10_bulijjo nga tutambula nga tulina mu mubiri okuttibwa kwa Yesu, era obulamu bwa Yesu bulyoke bulabisibwenga mu mubiri gwaffe. 
47_4_11_Kubanga ffe abalamu tuweebwayo ennaku zonna eri okufa okutulanga Yesu, era n'obulamu bwa Yesu bulyoke bulabisibwenga mu mubiri gwaffe ogufa. 
47_4_12_Bwe kiyo okufa kukolera mu ffe, naye bulamu mu mmwe. 
47_4_13_Naye nga tulina omwoyo guli ogw'okukkiriza, nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Nakkiriza, kyennava njogera era naffe tukkiriza, era kyetuva twogera; 
47_4_14_nga tumanyi ng'oyo eyazuukiza Mukama waffe Yesu, era naffe alituzuukiza wamu ne Yesu, era alitwanjulira wamu nammwe. 
47_4_15_Kubanga byonna biri ku bwammwe, ekisa ekyo bwe kyeyoagera olw'abangi kiryoke kyongezenga okwebaza Katonda aweebwe ekitiibwa. 
47_4_16_Kyetuva tulema okuddirira; naye newakubadde omuntu waffe w'okungulu ng'aggwaawo, naye omuntu waffe ow'omunda afuuka muggya bulijjo bulijjo. 
47_4_17_Kubanga okubonaabona kwaffe okuazitowa, okw'ekiseera ekya kaakano, wongerayongera nnyo okutukolera kidibwa ekizitowa eky'emirembe n’emirembe; 
47_4_18_ffe nga tetutuauuira ebirabika, wabula ebitalabika: nbanga ebirabika bya kiseera; naye ebitalabika bya mirembe na mirembe. 
47_5_1_Kubanga tumanyi nti, oba ng'ennyumba yaffe ey'ensiisira ey'onu nsi eryabizibwa, tulina eryazimbibwa tulina eyazimbibwa eva eri Katonda, ennyumba taazimbibwa na mikono, ey'emirenbe n'emirembe, ey'omu ggulu. 
47_5_2_Kubanga tusindira mu eno, nga wegomba okwambazibwa ennyunba yaffe eriva mu ggulu: 
47_5_3_bwe tulyambazibwa, mpozzi tuleme okusangibwa nga tuli bwereere: 
47_5_4_Kubanga ffe abali mu nsiisira eno tusinda, nga tuzitoowererwa; si kubanga twagala okwambuta, wabula okwambazibwa, ogwo ogufa gulyoke gumirwe obulamu. 
47_5_5_Naye eyaukolera ekyo ye Katonda, eyatuwa omusingo ogw'Omwoyo. 
47_5_6_Kyetuva tuguma omwoyo ennaku zonna, era tumanya nga bwe tuba mu mubiri tuba wala Mukama waffe 
47_5_7_(kubanga tutambula olw'okukkiriza, si lwa kulaba) 
47_5_9_Era kyetuva tufuba, oba nga tukyali muno, oba nga tuli wala, okusiimibwa ye. 
47_5_10_Kubanga ffe fenna kitugwanira okulabisibwa Kristo w'alisalira emisango; buli muntu aweebwe bye yakola mu mubiri, nga bwe yakola, oba birungi oba bibi. 
47_5_11_Kale, bwe tumanya entiisa ya Mukama waffe, tusendasenda abantu, naye tulabisibwa eri Katonda: era nsuubira nga tulabisibwa ne mu myoyo gyammwe. 
47_5_12_Tetwetendereza nate eri mmwe, wabula okubawa mmwe kye munaasinziirangako okwenyumirizanga ku lwaffe, mulyoke mubenga n'eky'okubaddamu abeenyumiriza mu maaso, so si mu mutima. 
47_5_13_Kuba oba nga tulaluse, tulaluse eri Katonda; oba nga twegendereza, twegendereza eri mmwe. 
47_5_14_Kubanga okwagala kwa Kristo kutuwaliriza, nga tulowooza bwe tuti ng'omu yabafiirira bonna, bonna kyebaava bafa; 
47_5_15_naye yafiirira bonna, abalamu balemenga okubeera abalamu nate ku bwabwe bokka, wabula ku bw'oyo eyabafiirira n'azuukira. 
47_5_16_Okusooka leero kyetuva tulema okumanya omuntu yenna mu mubiri: okumanya newakubadde nga twamanya Kristo mu mubiri, naye kaakano tetukyamumanya nate bwe tutyo. 
47_5_17_Omuntu yenna bw'aba mu Kristo kyava abeera ekitonde ekiggya: eby'edda nga biweddewo; laba, nga bifuuse biggya. 
47_5_18_Naye byonna biva eri Katonda, eyatutabaganya naye yekka ku bwa Kristo, n'atuwa ffe okuweereza okw'okutabaganya; nti 
47_5_19_Katonda yali mu Kristo ng'atabaganya ensi naye yennyini, nga tababalira byonoono byabwe, era nga yatuteresa ffe ekigambo eky'okutabaganya. 
47_5_20_Kyetuva tubeera ababaka mu kifo kya Kristo, Katonda ng'afaanana ng'abeegayirira mu ffe: tubeegayirira mu kifo kya Kristo mutabagane ne Katonda. 
47_5_21_Ataamanya kibi, yamufuula ekibi ku lwaffe; ffe tulyoke tufuuke obutuukirivu bwa Katonda mu ye. 
47_6_1_Era bwe tukolera emirimu awamu naye tubeegayirira obutaweerwa bwereere kisa kya Katonda 
47_6_2_(kubanga ayogera nti Mu biro eby'okukkirizibwamu nnakuwulira, Ne ku lunaku olw'obulokozi nnakuyamba: laba, kaakano bye biro eby'okukkirizibwamu; laba, kaakano lwe lunaku olw'obulokozi): 
47_6_3_nga tetuleeta nkonge yonna mu kigambo kyonna, okuweereza kwaffe kulemenga okunenyezebwa 
47_6_5_mu kukubibwa, mu kusibibwa, mu kukaayana, mu kufuba, mu kutunula, mu kusiiba 
47_6_8_olw'ekitiibwa n'olw'okunyoomebwa, elw'okuvumibwa n'olw'okusiimibwa; ng'abalimba, era naye ab'amazima 
47_6_10_ng'abanakuwala, naye abasanyuka bulijjo; ng'abaavu, naye abagaggawaza abangi; ng'abatalina kintu, era naye abalina ddala byonna. 
47_6_11_Akamwa kaffe kaasamiddwa eri mmwe, Abakkolinso, omutima gwaff'e gugaziye. 
47_6_12_Temufunze mu ffe, naye mufunze mu myoyo gyammwe. 
47_6_13_Naye mulyoke munsasule bwe mutyo (mbabuulira ng'abaana bange), nammwe mugaziwe. 
47_6_14_Temwegattanga na batakkiriza kubanga temwenkanankana: kubanga obutuukirivu n'obujeemu bugabana butya? oba omusana gussa kimu gutya n'ekizikiza? 
47_6_15_Era Kristo atabagana atya ne Beriyali? oba mugabo ki eri omukkirizal n'atali mukkiriza? 
47_6_16_Era yeekaalu ya Katonda yeegatta etya n'ebifaananyi? kubanga ffe tuli yeekaalu ya Katonda omulamu; nga Katonda bWe yayogera nti Nnaabeeranga mu bo, ne ntambuliranga mu bo; nange nnaabeeranga Katonda waabwe, nabo banaabeeranga bantu bange. 
47_6_17_Kale Muve wakati w'abo, mweyawule, bw'ayogera Mukama: So temukomanga ku kintu ekitali kirongoofu; Nange ndibasembeza. 
47_6_18_Era nnaabeeranga Kitammwe gye muli, Nammwe munaabeeranga gye ndi abaana ab'obulenzi n'ab'obuwala, bw'ayogera Mukama Omuyinza w'ebintu byonna. 
47_7_1_Kale bwe tulina ebyasuubizibwa ebyo,abaagalwa, twenaazengako obugwagwa bwonna obw'omubiri n'obw'omwoyo, nga tutuukiriza obutukuvu mu kutya Katonda. 
47_7_2_Mutukkirize: tetwonoonanga muntu yenna, tetuguliriranga muntu yenna, tetulyazaamaanyanga muatu yenna: 
47_7_3_Soogedde ku banenya: kubanga edda nnayogera nga muli mu mitima gyaffe okufiira awamu nammwe n'okubeera abalamu awamu nammwe. 
47_7_4_Njogera n'obuvumu bungi eri mmwe, nneenyumiriza nnyo ku lwammwe: njijudde nnyo essanyu, nsukkiridde okujaguza mu bibonoobono byaffe byonna. 
47_7_5_Kubanga era bwe twajja mu Makedoni, omubiri gwaffe ne gutalaba kuwummula n'akatono, naye ne tubonaabona eruuyi n'eruuyi; ebweru yaliyo entalo, munda mwalimu okutya. 
47_7_6_Kubanga era bwe twajja mu Makedoni, omubiri gwaffe ne gutalaba kuwummula n'akatono, naye ne tubonaabona eruuyi n'eruuyi; ebweru yaliyo entalo, munda mwalimu okutya. 
47_7_7_so si lwa kujja kwe kwokka, era naye olw'okusanyusibwa kwe yasanyusibwa mu mmwe, bwe yatubuulira okwegomba kwammwe, okunakuwala kwammwe, okunyiikira kwammwe ku lwange; nange kyennava nneeyongera okusanyuka. 
47_7_8_Kuba newakubadde nga nnabanakuwaza n'ebbaluwa yange, sejjusa, newakubadde nga namala okwejjusa; kubangandabye ng'ebbaluwa eyo yabanakuwaza, newakubadde nga yabanakuwaza kaseera. 
47_7_9_Kaakano nsanyuse, sisanyuse kubanga mwanakuwazibwa, naye kubanga mwanakuwala n'okwenenya ne mwenenya: kubanga mwanakuwala eri Katonda, muleme okufiirwa mu kigambo kyonna ku bwaffe. 
47_7_10_Kubanga okunakuwala eri Katonda kuleeta okwenenya okw'obulokozi okutejjusibwa: naye okunakuwala okw'omu nsi kuleeta okufa. 
47_7_11_Kubanga, laba; okunakuwala okwo eri Katonda nga kwabaleetera okufuba lokungi, era n'okuwoza ensonga yammwe, era n'okusunguwala, era n'okutya, era n'okwegomba, era n'okunyiikira, era a'okuwalana eggwanga! Mu byonna mwetegeeza nga muli balongoofu mu kigambo ekyo. 
47_7_12_Kale newakubadde nga nnabawandiikira, ssaawandiika ku lw'oyo eyakola obubi; newakubadde ku lw'oyo eyakolwa obubi, wabula okunyiikira kwammwe ku lwaffe kulyoke kulabisibwe eri mmwe mu maaso ga Katonda. 
47_7_13_Kyetwava tusanyusibwa: ne mu kusanyusibwa kwaffe, ne tweyongera nnyo okusanyuka olw'essanyu lya Tito, kubanga omwoyo gwe gwawummuzibwa mmwe mwenna. 
47_7_14_Kuba oba nga nneenyumiriza mu kigambo kyonna ku lwammwe eri oyo, ssaakwatibwa nsonyi; naye nga bwe twababuulira byonna mu mazima, era bwe kutyo n'okwenyumiriza kwaffe eri Tito kwali kwa mazima: 
47_7_15_N'okwagala kwe okw'omunda kweyongera nnyo nnyini okubeera gye muli; ng'ajjukira okugonda kwammwe mwenna, bwe mwamusembeza n'okutya n'okukankana. 
47_7_16_Nsanyuse kubanga mu byonna nguma omwoyo mu mmwe. 
47_8_1_Era tubategeeza, ab'oluganda, ekisa kya Katonda ekyaweebwa mu kkanisa ez'e Makedoni 
47_8_3_Kubanga, ntegeeza bo, baagaba bokka nga bwe baayinza era n'okusinga obuyinza bwabwa, 
47_8_4_nga batusaba n'okwegayirira okungi olw'ekisa ekyo n'okussa ekimu okwo mu kuweereza abatukuvu 
47_8_6_Kyetwava tubuulirira Tito, nga bwe yatanula edda, era bw'atyo alyoke akituukirize era n'ekisa ekyo gye muli. 
47_8_7_Naye nga bwe musukkirira mu byonna, mu kukkiriza, ne mu kwogera, ne mu kutegeera, ne mu kufuba kwonna, ne mu kwagala kwammwe eri ffe, era musukkirirenga ne mu kisa ekyo. 
47_8_8_Soogera nga mbalagira bulagizi, wabula olw'okufuba kw'abalala nga nkema okwagala kwammwe nga kwa mazima. 
47_8_9_Kubanga mutegeera ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, nti bwe yali omugagga, naye n'afuuka omwavu ku lwammwe, obwavu bwe bulyoke bubagaggawaze mmwe. 
47_8_10_Era mbagambye kye ndowooza olw'ekyo: kubanga kibasaanira mmwe, abaasooka okutanula, si kukola kwokka, era naye n'okwagala, nga mwakamala omwaka gumu. 
47_8_11_Naye kaakano mutuukirize n'okukola; nga bwe waaliwo okwagala amangu, era n'okutuukiriza bwe kutyo kulyoke kubeerewo, nga hwe muyinza; 
47_8_12_Kuba oba nga waliwo okwagala amangu, kukkirizibwa ng'omuntu bw'alina, si nga bw'atalina. 
47_8_13_Kubanga soogedde bwe ntyo, abalala bawummuzibwe, na mmwe muteganyizibwe: 
47_8_14_wabula olw'okwenkanankana, okusukkirira kwammwe kuweereze okwetaaga kwabwe kaakano mu biro bino, era n'okusukkirira kwabwe kulyoke kuweereze okwetaaga kwammwe; okwenkanankana kubeerewo: 
47_8_15_nga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Eyakuŋŋanyanga ennyingi, teyasigazangawo; naye eyakuŋŋaanyanga akatono, teyeetaaganga. 
47_8_16_Naye Katonda yeebazibwe, eyassa mu mutima gwe Tito okufuba okwo ku lwammwe. 
47_8_17_Kubanga okukktnza akkirizza okubuulirira kwaffe; kubanga naye yennyini alina okufuba okungi, asitula okugenda gye muli nga yeetuma. 
47_8_18_Era tutuma wamu naye ow'oluganda, atenderezebwa mu njiri mu kkanisa zonna; 
47_8_19_so si ekyo kyokka, era so naye oyo ye yalondebwa ekkanisa okutambula naffe olw'ekisa ekyo, kye tuweereza ffe Mukama waffe aweebwe ekitiibwa, era tulage okwa,gala kwaffe amangu: 
47_8_20_nga twetwala ekyo, omuntu obutatunenya olw'ekirabo kino kye tuweereza: 
47_8_21_kubanga tuteekateeka ebirungi, si mu maaso ga Mukama waffe mwokka, era naye ne mu maaso g'abantu. 
47_8_22_Era tutuma wamu nabo muganda waffe, gwe twakemanga emirundi emingi mu bigambo ebingi nga munyiikivu, naye kaakano muayiikivu nnyo. okusingawo, olw'okwesiga okungi kw'alina eri mmwe. 
47_8_23_Omuntu bw'anaabuuzanga ebya Tito, ye assa ekimu nange era ye mukozi munnange eri mmwe; oba bya baganda baffe, be babaka ab'ekkanisa, abo kye kitiibwa kya Kristo: 
47_8_24_Kale mubalage mu maaso g'ekkanisa ekiraga okwagala kwammwe n'okwenyumiriza kwaffe ku lwammwe. 
47_9_1_Kubanga eby'okuweereza abatukuvu tekinneetaagisa kubibawandiikira: 
47_9_2_kubanga mmanyi okwagala kwammwe, kwe nneenyumiririzaamu eri ab'e Makedoni ku lwammwe, nga Akaya yaakamala omwaka gumu okweteekateeka; n'okunyiikira kwammwe kwakubiriza bangi mu bo: 
47_9_3_Naye nttama ab'oluganda, okwenyumiriza kwaffe ku lwammwe kuleme okuba okw'obwereere mu kigambo ekyo; nga bwe njogedde, mulyoke mweteeketeeke: 
47_9_4_mpozzi ab'e Makedoni abalala bwe balijja nange, bwe.balibasanga nga temweteeseteese, ffe (obutoogera mmwe) tuleme okukwatibwa ensonyi mu kusuubira okwo. 
47_9_5_Kyenvudde ndowooza nga kiŋŋwanidde okwegayirira ab'oluganda, bankulembere: okujja gye muli, basooke balongoose omukisa gwammwe gwe mwasuubiza edda, gulyoke gweteeketeeke, ng'omukisa, so si ng'ekisoloozebwa. 
47_9_6_Naye kye njogedde kino nti Asiga entono, alikungula ntono; era asiga ennyingi, alikungula nnyingi. 
47_9_7_Buli muntu akolenga nga bw'amaliridde mu mutima gwe; si lwa nnaku, newakubadde olw'okuwalirizibwa: kubanga Katonda ayagala oyo agaba n'essanyu. 
47_9_8_Era Katonda ayinza okwaza ekisa kyonna gye muli mmwe nga mulina ebibamala byonna ennaku zonna mu bigambo byonna mulyoke musukkirirenga mu bikolwa byonna ebirungi: 
47_9_9_aga bwe kyawandiikibwa nti Ye asasaanya, yagabira abaavu Obutuukirivu bwe bwa lubeerera emirembe gyonna, 
47_9_10_Era oyo awa ensigo omusizi n'emmere ey'okulya, anaabawanga anaabongerangako ensigo zammwe; era anaayazanga ebibala eby'obutuukirivu bwammwe: 
47_9_11_nga mugaggawazibwa mu byonna mukolenga obugabi bwonna, obwebazisa Katonda mu ffe. 
47_9_12_Kubanga okugaba okw'okuweereza okwo ekujjula bujjuzi ekigera ky'ebyo abatukuvu bye beetaaga, era naye kusukkirira olw'okwebaza okungi eri Katonda; 
47_9_13_kubanga olw'okukemebwa kwammwe mu kuweereza kuno batendereza Katonda olw'okugonda oka okwatula kwammwe eri enjiri ya Kristo, n'olw'obugabi bw'okugabana kwammwe eri bo n'eri bonna; 
47_9_14_era bo bokka nga balumirwa mmwe emyoyo mu kubasabira olw'ekisa kya Katonda ekitasingika mu mmwe: 
47_9_15_Katonda yeebazibwe olw'ekirabo kye ekitayogerekeka. 
47_10_1_Naye aze kennyini Pawulo mbeegayirira olw'obukkakkamu n'obuwombeefu bwa Kristo, nze gwe mutoowaza bwe mba ssiriiwo mpitibwa muzlra 
47_10_3_Kuba newakubadde nga tutambulira mu mubiri, tetulwana kugobereranga mubiri 
47_10_4_(kubanga ebyokulwanyisa eby'entalo zaffe si bya mubiri, naye bya maanyi eri Katonda olw'okumenya ebigo) 
47_10_7_Mutunuulire ebintu nga bwe biri. Omuntu yenna bwe yeewulira muli nga wa Kristo yeerowonze kino nate yekka nti nga ye bw'ali owa Kristo, era na$e bwe tutyo, 
47_10_8_Kubanga ne bwe ndisukkirira okwenyumiriza olw'obuyinza bwaffe (Mukama waffe bwe yatuwa olw'okubazimba, so si lwa kubasuula), ssirikwatibwa nsonyi: 
47_10_9_nneme okufaanana ng'abatiisa n'ebbaluwa zange: 
47_10_10_Kubanga boogera nti Ebbaluwa ze nzibu, za maanyi; aaye bw'abaawo omubiri gwe munafu, n'okwogera kwe si kintu: 
47_10_11_Ali bw'atyo alowooze kino nti nga bwe tuli mu bigambo mu bbaluwa nga tetuliiyo, era bwe tutyo: bwe tuli mu bikolwa nga tuli eyo. 
47_10_12_Kubanga tetwanijanga kwerowooza nga tuli ku muweado gw'abalala ku bo abeetendereza bokka newakubadde okwegeraageranya nabo: naye bo bokka nga beegeza bokka na bokka, era nga beegeraageranya bokka na bokka, tebalina magezi. 
47_10_13_Naffe ffe tetulyenyumiriza okusinga ekigera kyaffe, wabula mu kigera eky'ensalo Katonda gye yatugabira okuba ekigera, era n'okutuuka ne gye muli: 
47_10_14_Kubanga tetukununkiriza kusinga kigera ng'abatatuuka gye muli: kubanga era twajja n'okutuuka gye muli mu njiri ya Kristo: 
47_10_15_nga tetwenyumiriza kusinga kigera kyaffe mu mirimu egy'abalala: naye nga tusuubira, okukkiriza kwammvee bwa kukula okuguiumizibwa mu mmwe ng'ensalo yaffe bw'eri okusukkirira, 
47_10_16_era n'okubuulira enjiri mu bifo ebiri ewala okusinga mmwe, era obuteenyumiiiza mu nsalo ey'abalala olw'ebyeteeseteese. 
47_10_17_Naye eyeenyumiriza yeenyumirizenga mu Mukama waffe. 
47_10_18_Kubanga eyeetendereza yekka si ye asiimibwa, wabula Mukama waffe gw'atendereza. 
47_11_1_Singa mungumiikirizza mu busirusiru obutono; era naye mungumiikirize. 
47_11_2_Kubanga mbakwatirwa obuggya bwa Katonda: kubanga nnabafumbiza bbammwe omu; ndyoke mbaleeta eri Kristo nga omuwala omulongoofu. 
47_11_3_Naye ntidde, ng'omusota bwe gwalimbalimba Kaawa mu bukuusa bwagwo, mpozzi ebirowoozo byammwe okwonoonebwanga mu kulaba wamu ne mu bulongoofu ebiri eri Kristo. 
47_11_4_Kuba oyo ajja bw'abuulira Yesu omulala gwe tutaabuulira, oba bwe muweebwa omwoyo omulala gwe mutaaweebwa, oba njiri ndala; gye mutakkiriza, mukola bulungi okumugumiikiriza. 
47_11_5_Kubanga ndowooza nga ssisingibwa n'akatono abatume abakulu ennyo. 
47_11_6_Naye newakubadde nga ndi muligo mu bigambo, naye ssiri muligo mu kutegeera; naye mu byonna twakwolesa mu bantu bonna eri mmwe. 
47_11_7_Oba nnayonoona bwe nueetoowaza nzekka mmwe mugulumizibwe kubanga nnababuulira enjiri ya Katonda ey'obwereere? 
47_11_8_Nnanyaga ekkanisa endala, nga mpeebwa empeera olw'okubaweereza mmwe 
47_11_10_Ng'amazima ga Kristo bwe gali mu nze, siwali: alinziyiza okwenyumiriza okwo mu asalo ez'e Yakaya. 
47_11_11_Lwaki? kubanga sibaagala? Katonda amanyi. 
47_11_12_Naye bwe nkola, era bwe nnaakolanga, mbaggirewo awasinziirwa abo abaagala awasinziirwa, balabike era nga ffe mu kigambo kye beenyumiririzaamu. 
47_11_13_Kubanga abali ng'abo be batume ab'obulimba, abakozi ab'obukuusa, abeefaananya ng'abatume ba Kristo. 
47_11_14_So si kya magero; kubanga ne Setaani yeefaananya aga malayika ow'omusana. 
47_11_15_Kale si kitalo era n'abaweeteza be bwe beefaananya ng'abaweereza: ab'obutuukirivu; enkomerero yaabwe eribeera ng'ebikolwa byabwe. 
47_11_16_Njogera nate nti Omuntu yenna aleme okundowooza nga ndi musirusiru; naye okulowooza bwe mundowooza bwe mutyo, naye munsembeze ng'omusirusiru, nange nneenyumirizeeko akatono. 
47_11_17_Kye njogera, sikyogera nga kigambo kya Mukama waffe, naye nga mu busirusiru, mu buvumu buno obw'okwenyumiriza. 
47_11_18_Kubanga bangi abeenyumiriza mu mubiri, nange nneenyumiriza. 
47_11_19_Kubanga mugumiikiriza n'essanyu abasirusiru, kubanga mtnwe muli bagezigezi. 
47_11_20_Kubanga mugumiikiriza omuntu, bw'abafuula abaddu, bw'abamira, bw'abawamha, bwe yeegulumiza, bw'abakuba amaaso. 
47_11_21_Njogedde olw'okweswaza, ng'abanafuwala. Naye omuntu yenna. ky'agumira (njogera mu busirusiru), nange nguma. 
47_11_22_Bo Baebbulaniya? nange. Bo Baisiraeri? nange. Bo zzadde lya Ibulayimu? nange. 
47_11_23_Bo baweereza ba Kristo? (njogera ng'omulalu) nze mbasinga; mu kufuba mbasukkirira, mu kusibibwa mbasukkirira, mu kukubibwa okuyingirira ennyo, mu kufa emirundi emingi. 
47_11_24_Eri Abayudaaya nnakubibwa emirundi etaano emiggo amakumi asatu mu mwenda. 
47_11_25_Emirundi esatu nnakubibwa enga, omulundi gumu nnakasuukirirwa amayinja, emirundi esatu eryato lyamenyeka, nnasula ne nsiiba mu buziba; 
47_11_26_mu kutambulanga emirundi emingi, mu bubi obw'emigga, mu bubi obw'abanyazi, mu bubi lobuva eri eggwanga lyange, mu bubi obuva eri ab'amawanga, mu bubi obw'omu kibuga, mu bubi obw'omu ddungu, mu bubi obw'omunnyanja, mu bubi obw'ab'oluganda ab'obulimba; 
47_11_27_mu kufuba n'okukoowa, mu kutunulanga emirundi emingi, mu njala n'ennyonta, mu kusiibanga: emirundi emingi, mu mpewo n'okubeera obwereere. 
47_11_28_Obutassaako bya bweru, waliwo ekinzitoowerera bulijjo bulijjo, okwerariikiriranga olw'ekkanisa zonna. 
47_11_29_Ani omunafu; nange bwe ssiba munafu? ani eyeesittazibwa, nange bwe ssaaka? 
47_11_30_Oba nga kirpwanidde okwenyumiriza, nneenyumirizanga olw'eby'obunafu bwange. 
47_11_31_Katonda Kitaawe wa Mukama waffe Yesu, eyeebazibwa emirembe gyonna, amanyi nga ssirimba. 
47_11_32_Mu Ddamasiko ow’essaza owa Aleta kabaka yateega ekibuga eky'Abadamasiko, alyoke ankwate: 
47_11_33_ne bampisa mu ddirisa nga ndi mu kisero ku bbugwe, ne ndokoka okuva mu mikono gye. 
47_12_1_Kiŋŋwanidde okwenyumiriza, newakubadde nga tekusaana; naye ka ŋŋende mu kwolesebwa n'okubikkulirwa kwa Mukama waffe. 
47_12_2_Mmanyi omuntu mu Kristo, eyaakamala emyaka ekkumi n'ena (oba mu mubiri, ssimanyi; oba awatali mubiri, ssimanyi; Katonda amaanyi), okutwalibwa omuntu ali bw'atyo mu ggutu ery'okusatu. 
47_12_3_Era, mmanyi omuntu ali bw'atyo (oba mu mubiri, oba awatali mubiri, ssimanyi; Katonda amanyi), 
47_12_4_bwe yatwalibwa mu lusuku lwa Katonda, n'awulira ebigambo ebitayogerekeka, ebitasaanira muntu kubyatula. 
47_12_5_Ku bw'omuntu ali bw'atyo nneenyumirizanga: naye ku bwange ssiryenyumisiza, wabula mu by'obunafu bwange. 
47_12_6_Kuba singa nayagala okwenyumirizanga, ssandibadde musirusiru; kubanga nandyogedde amazima: naye ndeka, omuntu yenna alemenga okundowooza okusinga bw'andaba oba bw'ampulira. 
47_12_7_N'olw'obukutu obusinga ennyo obw'ebyo ebyabikkulilswa, nnemenga okugulumizibwa ennyo, kyennava mpeebwa eriggwa mu mubiri, omubaka wa Setaani okunkubanga, nnemenga okugulumizibwa ennyo. 
47_12_8_Olw'ekigambo ekyo nneegayirira Mukama waffe emirundi esatu, kinveeko. 
47_12_9_N'aŋŋamba nti Ekisa kyange kikumala: kubanga amaanyi gange gatuukiririra mu bunafu. Kyennaavanga nneenyumiriza n'essanyu eringi olw'eby'obunafu bwange, amaanyi ga Kristo galyoke gasiisire ku nze. 
47_12_10_Kyenva nsanyukira eby'obunafu, okugirirwanga eky'ejo, okwetaaganga, okuyigganyizibwanga, okutegananga, okulangibwanga Kristo: kubanga bwe mba omunafu, lwe mba ow'amaanyi. 
47_12_11_Nfuuse musirusiru: mmwe mwampaliriza; kubanga nnagwanira okutenderezebwa mmwe; kubanga ssaasingibwa mu kigambo kyonna abatume abakulu ennyo, newakubadde nga nze siri kintu. 
47_12_12_Mazima obubonero obw'omutume bwakolerwanga ewammwe mu kugumiikiriza kwonna, mu bubonero n'eby'amagero n'eby'amaanyi. 
47_12_13_Kubanga kiki ekkanisa endala kye zaabasingiramu, wabula nze nzekka obutabazitoowereranga? munsonyiwe ekyonoono ekyo. 
47_12_14_Laba, omulundi ogw'okusatu kaakano nneeteeseteese okujja gye muli; so siribazitoowerera: kubanga sinoonya byammwe, wabula mmwe: kubanga tekigwanira abaana okuterekeranga abakadde, wabula abakadde okuterekeranga abaana. 
47_12_15_Era ndiwaayo era ndiweebwayo n'essanyu eringi olw'obulamu bwammwe. Bwe nsinga okubaagala ennyo, njagalibwa katono? 
47_12_16_Naye si musango, nze ssaabazitoowerera, naye, bwe nnali omugerengetanya, nabateega mu lukwe. 
47_12_17_Omuntu yenna gwe nnabatumira nnamufunya amagoba eri mmwe? 
47_12_18_Nnabuulirira Tito, ne ntuma ow'oluganda awamu naye. Tito yafuna amagoba eri mmwe? tetwatambula n'Omwoyo omu? tetwatambulira mu kisinde kimu? 
47_12_19_Obw'edda mulowoozezza nga ffe tubawoleza ensonga. Mu maaso ga Katonda twogerera mu Kristo. Naye byonna, abaagalwa, bya kubazimba mmwe. 
47_12_20_Kubanga ntidde, bwe ndijja, mpozzi okubasanga nga mufaanana nga bwe ssaagala, nange mmwe muleme okunsanga nga nfaanana nga bwe mutayagala; mpozzi okubeera eyo okuyomba, obuggya, obusungu, empaka, okulyolyoma, okugeya, okwegulumiza, okujeema; 
47_12_21_bwe ndijja nate, Katonda wange aleme okuntoowaza eri mmwe, nange okubanakuwalira abangi abaayonoona edda ne bateenenya obugwagwa n'obwenzi n'obukaba bwe baakola. 
47_13_1_Kaakano njija gye muli omulundi ogw'okusatu. Mu kamwa k'abajulirwa ababiri oba basatu buli kigambo kirinywera. 
47_13_2_Nnalaalika era ndaalika, nga bwe nnakola bwe nnali eyo omulundi ogw'okubiri, era ne kaakano bwe ntyo nga ssiriiyo, mbagamba abo abaayonoona edda n'abalala bonna, nti bwe ndijja nate, ssirisaasira 
47_13_4_kubanga yakomererwa olw'obunafu, naye mulamu olw'amaanyi ga Katonda. Kubanga naffe tuli banafu mu ye, naye tuliba balamu awamu naye olw'amaanyi ga Katonda eri mmwe. 
47_13_5_Mwekebere mwekka oba nga muli mu kukkiriza; mwekeme mwekka. Oba temwetegeera mwekka nga Yesu Kristo ali mu mmwe? wabula nga muli abatasiimibwa. 
47_13_6_Naye nsuubira nga mulitegeera nga ffe tetuli batasiimibwa: 
47_13_7_Era tusaba Katonda mmwe mulemenga okukola obubi bwonna; si ffe okulabika ng'abasiimibwa, wabula mmwe okukolanga obulungi ffe ne bwe tulibeera ng'abatasiimibwa. 
47_13_8_Kubanga tetuyinza kuziyiza mazima, wabula okugayamba. 
47_13_9_Kubanga tusanyuka ffe: bwe tuba abanafn, nammwe bwe muba n'amaanyi: era na kino tukisaba, mmwe, okutuukirira. 
47_13_10_Kyenvudde mpandiika ebyo nga ssiri eyo, bwe mbeera eyo nneme okuba omukambwe, ng'obuyinza bwe buli Mukama waffe bwe yampa olw'okuzimba, so si lwa kumenya. 
47_13_11_Eky'enkomerero, ab'oluganda, mweraba: Mutuukirire; musanyusibwe; mulowooze bumu; mubeere n'emirembe: ne Katonda ow'okwagala n'emirembe anaabanga nammwe. 
47_13_12_Mulamusagane n'okunywegera okutukuvu. 
47_13_13_Abatukuvu bonna babalamusizza. 
47_13_14_Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, n'okwagala kwa Katonda, n'okusseekimu okw'Omwoyo Omutukuvu, bibeerenga nammwe mwenna. 
48_1_1_Pawulo omutume (ataava mu bantu newakubadde okuyiia eri omuntu, wabula eri Yesu Kristo ne Katonda Kitaffe, eyamuzuukiza mu bafu), 
48_1_2_n'ab'oluganda bonna abali nange tubawandiikidde ekkanisa ez'e Ggalatiya: 
48_1_3_ekisa kibenga gye muli n'emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe, ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, 
48_1_4_eyeewaayo olw'ebibi byaffe, alyoke atuggye mu mirembe gino egiriwo emibi nga bwe yayagala Katonda era Kitaffe: 
48_1_5_aweebwenga ekitiibwa emirembe n'emirembe. Amiina. 
48_1_6_Nneewuunya kubanga musenguka mangu bwe muti eyabayita mu kisa kya Kristo okugenda eri enjiri efaanana obulala 
48_1_8_Naye oba nga ffe oba malayika ava mu ggulu bw'abuuliranga enjiri wabula nga bwe twababuulira, akolimirwenga. 
48_1_9_Nga bwe twasooka okwogeza, bwe nnyo bwe njogera kaakano nate nti Omuntu bw'ababuuliranga enjiri wabula nga bwe mwaweebwa, akolimirwenga. 
48_1_10_Kubanga kaakano mpembera bantu nantiki Katonda? Nantiki nsala amagezi okusiimibwa abantu? Singa nnali nga nkyasiimibwa abantu, ssandibadde muddu wa Kristo. 
48_1_11_Kubanga mbategeeza, ab'oluganda, nti enjiri eyabuulirwa nze si ya buntu: 
48_1_12_kubanga nange ssaagiweebwa muntu so siyigirizibwanga, wabula mu kubikkulirwa kwa Yesu Kristo. 
48_1_13_Kubanga mwawulira bwe nnabanga edda mu mpisa z'Ekiyudaaya, nga nnayigganyanga ekkanisa ya Katonda awatali kigera ne nginyaga, 
48_1_14_ne mpitirizanga mu mpisa z'Ekiyudaaya okusinga bangi bwe twakula mu ggwanga lyaffe, nga mbakiranga okubeera n'obuggya obungi ennyo mu mpisa ze nna weebwa bajjajjange. 
48_1_15_Naye Katonda bwe yasiima, eyanjawula okuva mu lubuto lwa mmange, n'ampita olw'ekisa kye, 
48_1_16_okubikkulira Omwana we mu nze, ndyoke mmubuulirenga mu b'amawanga; amangu ago ssaateesa na mubiri wadde aa musaayi: 
48_1_17_so ssaayambuka Yerusaalemi eri abo abansooka okubeera abatume: naye nagenda mu Buwalabu, ne nkomawo nate mu Ddamasiko. 
48_1_18_Awo bwe waayitawo emyaka esatu ne nnyambuka e Yerusaalemi okulaba Keefa, ne mmalayo gy'ali ennaku kkumi na ttaano. 
48_1_19_Naye ssaalaba mulala ku batume wabula Yakobo muganda wa Mukama wa ffe. 
48_1_20_Kale, bye mpandiika, laba, mu maaso ga Katonda ssirimba. 
48_1_21_Awo ne ŋŋenda mu njuyi ez'e Busuuli ne Kirukiya. 
48_1_22_Ne mba nga sinnaba kutegeerebwa mu maaso g'ekkanisa ez'e Buyudaaya eziri mu Kristo: 
48_1_23_naye ne bawuliranga buwulizi nti Eyatuyigganyanga edda kaakano abuulira okukkiriza kwe yanyaganga edda. 
48_2_1_Awo oluvannyuma, emyaka bwe gyayitawo kkumi n'ena, nalinnya e Yerusaalemi wamu ne Balunabba ne ntwala ne Tito. 
48_2_2_Nalinnyayo lwa kubikkulirwa; ne mbanjulira enjiri, gye mbuulira mu b'amawanga, naye mu kyama eri abo abaatenderezebwa, mpozzi nneme okugenderanga obwereere oba nga ŋŋenze. 
48_2_3_Naye newakubadde Tito eyali awamu nange, eyali Omuyonaani, teyawalirizibwa kukomolebwa: 
48_2_4_naye olw'ab'oluganda ab'obulimba abaayingizibwa mu kyama, abaayingira mu kyama okuketta eddembe lyaffe lye tulina mu Kristo Yesu, okututeeka mu buddu: 
48_2_5_abo tetwabagoaderako ssaawa n'emu okufugibwa bo; amazima g'enjiri ganywerenga gye muli. 
48_2_6_Naye abaatenderezebwa okuba abakulu (nga bwe ball kye kimu gye ndi; Katonda tasosola mu baatu) abaatenderezebwa aze tebannyongerako kintu: 
48_2_7_naye mu ngeri endala, bwe baalaba nga tmateresebwa enjiri y'abo abatali bakomole, nga Peetero ey'abakomole 
48_2_8_(kubanga eyakolera Peetero olw'obutume bw'abakomole ye yakolera nange olw'ab'amawanga) 
48_2_10_kyokka, tujjukirenga abaavu; ekyo n'okunyiikira kye nnanyiikirira ennyo okukikolanga. 
48_2_11_Naye Keefa bwe yajja e Antiyokiya, unamuwakanya nga tulabagana amaaso n'amaaso, kubanga yali mukyamu ddala. 
48_2_12_Kubanga olubereberye abantu nga tebannaba kujja kuva wa Yakobo, yalyanga n'ab'amawanga: naye bwe bajja, ne yeeyawula n'abaawukanako, ng'atya abakomole. 
48_2_13_Era n'Abayudaaya abalala bonna ne bakuusakuusa wamu naye; ne Balunabba n'okuwalulwa n'awalulwa obukuusa bwabwe. 
48_2_14_Naye bwe nnalaba nga tebaakwata kkubo ggolokofu mu mazima g'enjiri, ne ŋŋambira Keefa mu maaso gaabwe bonna nti Obanga ggwe bw'oli Omuyudaaya ogoberera empisa z'ab'amawanga ezitali za Kiyudaaya, owaliriza otya ab'amawanga okugobereranga empisa z'Ekiyudaaya? 
48_2_15_Ffe Abayudaaya ab'obuzaaliranwa abatali ba mu b'amawanga abalina ebibi, 
48_2_16_naye bwe tumanyi ng'omuntu taweebwa butuukirivu lwa bikolma bya mateeka wabuta olw'okukkiriza Yesu Kristo, era naffe twakkiriza Kristo Yesu, tulyoke tuweebwe obutuukirivu olw'okukkiriza Kristo, naye si lwa bikolwa bya mateeka: kubanga olw'ebikolwa eby'amateeka tewali alina omubiri aliweebwa obutuukirivu. 
48_2_17_Naye bwe twayagala okitweebwa obutuukirivu mu Kristo, oba nga twalabibwa naffe okuba n'ebibi, kale Kristo muweereza wa kibi? Kitalo. 
48_2_18_Kubanga bwe nzimba nate bye nnasuula, nneeraga nzekka okuba omwonoonyi. 
48_2_19_Kubanga olw'amateeka nnafa ku mateeka, ndyoke mbe omulamu eri Katonda. 
48_2_20_Nnakomererwa wamu ne Kristo; naye ndi mulamu; si ku bwange nate, naye Kristo ye mulamu mu nze: era obulamu bwe nnina kaakano mu mubiri, mbulina lwa kukkiriza Omwana wa Katonda eyanjagala ne yeewaayo ku lwange. 
48_2_21_Ssidibya kisa kya Katonda: kubanga obutuukirivu bwe buba mu mateeka, nga Kristo yafiira bwereere. 
48_3_1_Mmwe Abaggalatiya abatalina magezi, ani eyabaloga, so nga Yesu Kristo yakomererwa nga mulaba? 
48_3_2_Kino kyokka kye njagala mmwe okuntegeeza nti Mwaweebwa Omwoyo lwa bikolwa bya mateeka nantild lwa kuwulira kwa kukkiriza? 
48_3_3_Bwe mutyo bwe mutalina magezi? Abaasookera mu Mwoyo, kaakati mutuukiririzibwa mu mubiri? 
48_3_4_Mwabonyaabonyezebwa ebyenltana awo bya bwereere? so nga ddala si bwereere. 
48_3_5_Abawa Omwoyo, akola eby'amaanyi mu mmwe, akola Iwa bikolwa bya mateeka nantiki lwa kuwulira kwa ku kkiriza? 
48_3_6_Nga Ibulayimu bwe yakkiriaza Katonda, ne kumubalirwa okubeera obutuukirivu. 
48_3_7_Kale mutegeere ng'abayima mu kukkiriza be baana ba Ibulayimu. 
48_3_8_N'ekyawandiikibwa bwe kyalaba edda Katonda bw'aliwa amawanga obutuukirivu olw’okukkiriza, ne kibuulira olubereberye Ibulayimu enjiri nti Mu ggwe amawanga gonna mmwe galiweerwa omukisa. 
48_3_9_Bwe kityo abayima mu kukkiriza baweerwa omukisa awamu ne Ibulayimu eyalina okukkiriza. 
48_3_10_Kubanga bonna abayima mu bikolwa by'amateeka, bafugibwa kikolimo: kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti Akolimiddwa buli ataabinyiikirira byonna ebyawandiikibwa mu kitabo ky'amateeka, okubikolanga. 
48_3_11_Era kimanyiddwa nga mu mateeka tewali aweebwa butuukirivu eri Katonda: kubanga nti Abatuukirivu baanabeeranga balamu lwa kvkkiriza; 
48_3_12_naye amateeka tegayima mu kukkiriza; naye nti Omuntu agakola anaabeeraaga mulamu mu go. 
48_3_13_Kristo yatununula mu kikolimo ky'amateeka, bwe yafuuka ekikolimo ku lwaffe: kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti Akolimiddwa buli awanikiddwa ku muti: 
48_3_14_omukisa gwa Ibulayimu gulyoke gutuuke eri amawanga mu Kristo Yesu; tulyoke tuweebwe ekyasuubizibwa eky'Omwoyo olw'okukkiriza. 
48_3_15_Ab'oluganda; njogera mu buntu: endagaano newakubadde nga ya muntu buntu bw'emala okunywera tewali agiggyawo newakubadde agyongerako. 
48_3_16_Ebyasuubizibwa byagambibwa Ibulayimu n'omuzzukulu we. Tayogera nti N'eri abazzukulu, nga bangi, naye ng'omu nti N'eri omuzzukulu wo, ye Kristo. 
48_3_17_Kino kye njogera nti Endagaano eyasooka okunywezebwa Katonda, amateeka agajja nga wayiseewo emyaka ebikumi bina mu asatu tegagiggyaawo n'okudibya ekyasuubizibwa. 
48_3_18_Kuba oba ng'obusika buva mu mateeka, nga tebuva nate mu kusuubiza: naye Katonda yabuwa Ibulayimu olw'okusuubiza, 
48_3_19_Kale amateeka kiki? Gassibwawo lwa kwonoona okutuusa w'alijjira omuzzukulu eyasuubizibwa, gaalagirwa bamalayika mu mikono gy'omutabaganya. 
48_3_20_Naye omutabaganya si w'omu; naye Katonda ye omu. 
48_3_21_Kale amateeka tegatabagana n'ebyasuubizibwa Katonda? Kitalo: kuba singa amateeka gaaweebwa nga ge gayinza okuleeta obulamu, ddala obutuukirivu bwandibadde mu mateeka. 
48_3_22_Naye ebyawandiikibwa byabisiba byonna mu bufuge bw'ekibi, abakkiriza balyoke baweebwe ekyasuubizibwa ekiva mu kukkiriza Yesu Kristo. 
48_3_23_Naye okukkiriza nga tekunnaba kujja, twakuumirwanga mu bufuge bwa mateeka, nga tusibibwa olw'okukkiriza okugenda okubikkulwa. 
48_3_24_Bwe kityo amateeka yali mutwazi waffe eri Kristo, tulyoke tuweebwe obutuukirivu olw'okukkiriza. 
48_3_25_Naye okukkiriza bwe kumaze okujja, tetukyali mu bufuge bwa mutwazi. 
48_3_26_Kubanga mmwe mwenna muli baana ba Katonda olw'okukkiriza, mu Kristo Yesu. 
48_3_27_Kubanga mwenna abaabatizibwa okuyingira mu Kristo, mwayambala Kristo. 
48_3_28_Tewali Muyudaaya, newakubadde Omuyonaani, tewali muddu newakubadde ow'eddembe, tewali musajja na mukazi: kubanga mmwe mwenna muli omu mu Kristo Yesu. 
48_3_29_Era mmwe bwe muli aba Kristo, kale muli zzadde lya Ibulayimu, era muli basika ng'okusuubiza bwe kwali. 
48_4_1_Naye njogera nti omusika ng'akyali muto tayawulwa na muddu n'akatono, newakubadde nga ye'mukama wa byonna 
48_4_3_Bwe tutyo naffe, bwe twabanga abato, twabanga baddu nga tufugibwa eby'olubereberye eby'omu nsi: 
48_4_4_naye okutuukirira kw'ebiro bwe kwatuuka, Katonda n'atuma Omwana we eyazaalibwa omukazi, eyazaalibwa ng'afugibwa amateeka, 
48_4_5_alyoke abanunule abaafugibwa amateeka, tulyoke tuweebwe okufuuka abaana. 
48_4_6_Era kubanga muli banns, Katonda yatuma Omwoyo gw'Omwana we mu mitima gyaffe; ng'akaaba nti Aba, Kitaffe. 
48_4_7_Bwe kityo naawe tokyali muddu, naye mwana; oba ng'oli mwana, era oh musika ku bwa Katonda. 
48_4_8_Naye mu nnaku ziri bwe mutaamanyanga Katonda, mwabanga baddu ba bali abatali bakatonda mu buwangwa: 
48_4_9_naye kaakano bwe mutegedde Katonda, oba ekisinga bwe mutegeddwa Katonda, mukyuka mutya ennyuma mu bigambo eby'olubereberye ebitalina maanyi ebinafu, ate bye mwagala okufugibwa omulundi ogw'okubiri? 
48_4_10_Mukwata ennaku n'emyezi n'ebiro n'emyaka. 
48_4_11_Mbakeŋŋentererwa okutegana kwange gye muli okuba okw'obwereere. 
48_4_12_Mubeere nga nze, kubanga nange ndi nga mmwe, ab'oluganda mbeegayiridde. Temunnyonoonanga: 
48_4_13_naye mumanyi ng'olw'obunafu bw'omubiri nnababuulira enjiri omuluadi ogw'olubereberye: 
48_4_14_era okukemebwa kwammwe okw'omu mubiri gwange temwakuzeyooma so temwakulondoola, naye mwanzikiriza nga malayika ova Katonda, nga Kristo Yesu. 
48_4_15_Kale okwetenda kwammwe kuli luuyi wa? kubanga ndi mujulirwa wammwe nti, singa kyali kiyinzika, mwaadiggyeemu amaaso gammwe ne mugawa nze. 
48_4_16_Kale afuuse mulabe wammwe nga mbabuulira amazima? 
48_4_17_Beegonza gye muli naye si bulungi; naye kye baagala kwe kubaggalira ebweru, tnmwe mulyoke mwegonzenga gye bali: 
48_4_18_Naye kirungi abantu okwegonzaaga mu bulungi ennaku zonna, naye si nze lwe mbeera nammwe lwokka. 
48_4_19_Abaana bange abato, abannuma nate okutuusa Kristo lw'alibumbibwa mu mmwe, 
48_4_20_era nnandyagadde okubeera nammwe kaakano, n'okuwaanyisa eddoboozi lyange, kubanga mbuusabuusa olw'ebigambo byammwe. 
48_4_21_Mumbuulire mmwe abaagala okufugibwa amateeka, temuwulira mateeka? 
48_4_22_Kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti Ibulayimu yalina abaana babiri, omu wa muzaana, omu: wa wa ddembe. 
48_4_23_Naye ow'omuzaana yazaalibwa lwa mubiri; naye ow'ow'eddembe lwa kusuubiza. 
48_4_24_Ebyo bya lugero: kubanga abakazi abo ze ndagaano bbiri; emu eva ku lusozi Sinaayi, ezaala olw'obuddu, eyo ye Agali. 
48_4_25_Agali oyo lwe lusozi Sinaayi, oluli mu Buwalabu, era yenkanankana ne Yerusaalemi ekya kaakano: kubanga muddu wamu n'abaana be. 
48_4_26_Naye Yerusaalemi eky'omu ggutu kye ky'eddembe, ye nnyaffe. 
48_4_27_Kubanga kyawandiikibwa nti Saayuka, omugumba atazaala; Baguka okwogerera waggulu, atalumwa: Kubanga abaana b'oyo eyale kebwayo bangi okusinga ab'oyo alina omusajja: 
48_4_28_Naye ffe, ab'oluganda, tuli baana ba kuauubiza nga Isaaka bwe yali: 
48_4_29_Naye nga mu biro biri eyazaalibwa olw'omubiri nga bwe yayigganya eyazaalibwa olw'Omwoyo, bwe kityo ne kaakano. 
48_4_30_Naye ebyawandiikibwa byogera, bitya? nti Goba omuzaana n'omwana we: knbaana omwana w’omuzaana talisikira wamu n'omwana w'ow'eddembe. 
48_4_31_Kale, ab'oluganda, ffe tetuli ba muzaana, naye ba wa ddembe. 
48_5_1_Mu ddembe Kristo yatufuula ba ddembe: kale munywere, mulemenga okusibibwa nate mu kikoligo ky'obuddu. 
48_5_2_Laba, nze Pawulo mbagamba nti bwe munaakomolebwanga, Kristo talibaako ky'alibagasa. 
48_5_3_Era nate ntegeeza buli muntu akomolebwa nti alina ebbanja ery'okukolanga eby'amateeka byotuna: 
48_5_4_Mwawuliddwa eri Kristo, mmwe abaagala okuweebwa obutuukirivu mu mateeka; mugudde okuva mu kisa, 
48_5_5_Kubanga ffe ku bw'Omwoyo olw'okukkiriza tulindirira essuubi ery'obutuukirivu. 
48_5_6_Kubanga mu Kristo Yesu okukomolebwa tekulina maanyi newakubadde obutakomolebwa, wabula okukkiriza okukola olw'okwagala. 
48_5_7_Mwali mutambula bulungi; anti eyabaziyiza okugonderanga amazima? 
48_5_8_Okuwemba okwo tekwava eri oyo abayita. 
48_5_9_Ekizimbulukusa ekitono kizimbulukusa ekitole kyonna. 
48_5_10_Mbeesiga mmwe mu Mukama waffe, nti temulirowooza kigambo kirala: naye oyo abateganya alibaako omusango gwe, ne bw'aliba ani. 
48_5_11_Naye nze, ab'oluganda, oba nga nkyayigiriza okukomolebwa, kiki ekikyanjigganyisa? kale enkonge ey'omusalaba ng'evuddewo. 
48_5_12_Nnandyagadde bali abababuguutanya n'okweyawula beeyawule. 
48_5_13_Kubanga mmwe, ab'oluganda, mwayitibwa lwa ddembe; naye eddembe lyammwe liremenga okubeera omubiri kwe guyima, naye olw'okwagala muweerezaganenga mwekka na mwekka. 
48_5_14_Kubanga amateeka gonna garuukirira mu kigambo kimu, mu kino nti Oyagalanga muntu munno nga bwe weeyagala wekka. 
48_5_15_Naye bwe mulumagana, bwe mulyaŋŋana, mwegenderezenga mulemenga okwemalawo mwekka na mwekka: 
48_5_16_Naye njogera nti Mutambulirenga mu Mwoyo, kale temuutuukirizenga kwegomba kwa mubiri. 
48_5_17_Kubanga omubiri gwegomba nga guwakana n'Omwoyo, n'Omwoyo nga guwakana n'omubiri; kubanga ebyo byolekanye, mulemenga okukola ebyo bye mwagala. 
48_5_18_Naye bwe muluŋŋamizibwa Omwoyo, nga temufugibwa mateeka. 
48_5_19_Naye ebikolwa by'omubiri bya lwatu, bye bino, obwenzi, empitambi, obukaba, 
48_5_20_okusinza ebifaananyi, okuloga; obulabe, okuyomba; obuggya; obusunga, empaka, okweyawula, okwesalamu, 
48_5_21_ettima, obutamiivu, ebinyumu, n'ebiri ng'ebyo: nsooka okubabuulira ku ebyo, nga bye nnasooka okubabuulira, nti bali abakola ebiri ng'ebyo tebalisikira bwakabaka bwa Katonda. 
48_5_22_Naye ebibala by'Omwoyo kwe kwagala, okusanyuka, emirembe, okugumiikiriza, ekisa, obulungi, okukkiriza, 
48_5_23_obuwombeefu, okwegendereza: ku biri ng'ebyo tewali mateeka. 
48_5_24_N'abo aba Kristo Yesu baakomerera omubiri wamu n'okukwatibwa n'okwegomba kwagwo. 
48_5_25_Bwe tuba abalamu ku bw'Omwoyo, era tutambulenga ku bw'Omwoyo, 
48_5_26_Tuleme okwenyumiririzanga obwereere, nga twesunguwaza fekka na fekka, nga tukwatibwa obuggya fekka na fekka. 
48_6_1_Ab'oluganda, omuntu bw'alabibwanga ng'ayonoonye; mmwe ab'omwoyo mumulongoosenga ali bw'atyo mu mwoyo gw'obuwombeefu; nga weekuuma wekka naawe olemenga okukemebwa. 
48_6_2_Mubeeraganenga emigugu mwekka na mwekka, mutuukirizenga bwe mutyo etteeka lya Kristo. 
48_6_3_Kubanga omuntu bwe yeerowoozanga okuba ekintu, nga si kintu, nga yeerimbalimba. 
48_6_4_Naye buli muntu akemenga omulimu gwe ku bubwe; alyoke abeere n'okwenyumiriza ku bubwe yekka so si ku bwa mulala: 
48_6_5_Kubanga buli muntu alyetikka omutwalo gwe ye. 
48_6_6_Naye ayigirizibwanga ekigambo assenga ekimu n'oyo ayigiriza mu birungi byonna. 
48_6_7_Temulimbibwanga; Katonda tasekererwa: kubanga omuntu kyonna ky'asiga era ky'alikungula. 
48_6_8_Kubanga asigira omubiri gwe ye, alikungula mu mubiri okuvunda; naye asigira Omwoyo, alikungula mu Mwoyo obulamu obutaggwaawo. 
48_6_9_Tuleme okuddiriranga mu kukola obulungi: kubanga ebiro bwe birituuka, tulikungula; nga tetuzirise. 
48_6_10_Kale, bwe tunaalabanga ebbanga, tubakolenga obulungi bonna, naye okusinga abo abali mu nnyumba ey'okukkiriza. 
48_6_11_Mulabe bwe mbawandiikidde mu nnukuta ennene n'omukono gwange nze. 
48_6_12_Bonna abaagala okwewoomereza mu mubiri be babawaliriza okukomolebwanga; kyokka balemenga okuyigganyizibwa olw'omusalaba gwa Kristo: 
48_6_13_Kubanga era n'abo bennyini abakomolebwa amateeka tebagakwata; naye baagala mmwe okukomotebwanga, balyoke beenyumiririzenga ku mubiri gwammwe. 
48_6_14_Naye nze ssaagala kwenyumirizanga, wabula ku musalaba gwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo; olw'ogwo ensi ekomereddwa gye ndi, nange eri ensi. 
48_6_15_Kubanga okukomolebwa si kintu, newakubadde obucakomolebwa, wabula ekitonde ekiggya. 
48_6_16_N'abo bonna abanaatambuliranga mu tteeka eryo, emirembe gibenga ku bo, n'okusaasirwa, ne ku Isiraeri wa Katonda. 
48_6_17_Okutanula kaakano, omuntu yenna aleme okunteganyanga: kubanga ntwala enkovu za Yesu zisaliddwa ku mubiri gwange. 
48_6_18_Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo kibeerenga wamu n'omwoyo gwammwe, ab'oluganda. Amiina. 
49_1_1_Pawulo, omutume wa Kristo Yesu olw'akwagala kwa Katonda eri abatukuvu abali mu Efeso n'abakkiriza mu Kristo Yesu: 
49_1_2_ekisa kibeerenga gye muli n'emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
49_1_3_Yeebazibwe Katonda Kitaawe wa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, eyatuwa huli mukisa gwonna ogw'Omwoyo mu bifa eby'omu ggulu mu Kristo: 
49_1_4_nga bwe yatulondera mu ye ng'ensi tennaba kutondebwa, ffe okubeera abatukuvu abatalina kabi mu maaso ge mu kwagala: 
49_1_5_bwe yatwawula edda okumufuukira abaana ku bwa Yesu Kristo, nga bwe yasiima olw'okwagala kwe, 
49_1_6_ekitiibwa ky'ekisa kye kiryoke kitenderezebweaga, kye yatuwa obuwa mu oyo omwagalwa: 
49_1_7_eyatuweesa akununulibwa kwaffe olw'omusaayi gwe, okusonyiyibwa ebyo noono byaffe, ng'obugagga obw'ekisa kye bwe buli, 
49_1_8_kye yasukkiriza gye tuli mu magezi gonna n'okutegeera kwonna, 
49_1_9_bwe yatutegeeza ekyama eky'okwagala kwe, nga bwe yasiima yekka, nga bwe yamalirira edda mu ye, 
49_1_10_olw'obuwanika obw'omu bire ebituukirivu, okugattira awamu byonna mu Kristo, ebiri mu ggulu n'ebiri ku nsi; 
49_1_11_mu oyo naffe mwe twafuukira obusika bwe twayawulibwa edda mu kumalirira kw'oyo akoza byonna nga bw'ayagala mu kuteesa kwe; 
49_1_12_ffe tulyoke tubeere ettendo ly'ekitiibwa kye, ffe abaasooka okusuubira mu Kristo: 
49_1_13_era namnwe mu ye, bwe mwawulira ekigambo eky'amazima, enjiri ey'obulokozi bwammwe, mu oyo, n'okukkiriza bwe mwakkiriza, ne muteekebwako akabonero n'Omwoyo Omutukuvu eyasuubizibwa, 
49_1_14_gwe musingo gw'obusika bwaffe, okutuusa envuma ya Katonda lw'erinunulibwa, ekitiibwa kye kitenderezebwe. 
49_1_15_Bwe nnawulira okukkiriza Mukama waffe Yesu okuli mu mmwe, era kwe mulaga eri abatukuvu bonna, 
49_1_16_kyenva sirekangayo kwebaza, nga mboogerako mu kusaba kwange; 
49_1_17_Katonda wa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, Kitaffe ow'ekitiibwa, abawe omwoyo ogw'amagezi n'ogw'okubikkulirwa mu kumutegeera ye; 
49_1_18_nga mumulisibwanga amaaso ag'omutima gwammwe, mmwe okumanya essuubi ery'okuyita kwe bwe liri, obugagga obw'ekitiibwa eky'obusika bwe mu batukuvu bwe buli, 
49_1_19_era obukulu obusinga ennyo obw'amaanyi ge eri ffe abakkiriza bwe buli, ng'obuyinza bw'amaanyi ge bwe bukola, 
49_1_20_ge yakoza mu Kristo, bwe qamuzuukiza mu bafu, n'amutuuza ku mukono gwe ogwa ddyo mu bifo eby'omu ggulu, 
49_1_21_waggulu nayo okusinga okufuga kwonna n'obuyinza n'amaanyi n'obwami na buli linnya eryatulwa si mu mirembe gino gyokka naye ne mu egyo egigenda okujja: 
49_1_22_n'ateeka byonna wansi w'ebigere bye, n'amuteekawo okuba omutwe ku byonna en ekkanisa, 
49_1_23_gwe mubiri gwe, okutuukirira ku oyo atuukiriza byonna mu byonna. 
49_2_1_Era nammwe yabazuukiza bwe mwali nga mufiiridde mu byonoono n'ebibi byammwe, 
49_2_2_bye mwatambulirangamu edda ng'emirembe egy'ensi eno bwe giri, okugobereranga omukulu w'obuyinza obw'omu bbanga, omwoyo ogukolera kaakano mu baana abatawulira 
49_2_4_naye Katonda, kubanga ye mugagga w'ekisa, olw'okwagala kwe okungi kwe yatwagala ffe, 
49_2_5_era ffe bwe twali nga tufiiridde mu byonoono byaffe, yatufuula abalamu awamu ne Kristo (mwalokoka lwa kisa), 
49_2_6_n'atuzuukiza wamu naye, n'atutuuza wamu mu bifo eby'omu ggulu mu Kristo Yesu: 
49_2_7_mu mirembe egigenda okujja alyoke alage obugagga obusinga ennyo obw'ekisa kye mu bulungi obuli gye tuli mu Kristo Yesu: 
49_2_8_kubanga mwalokoka lwa kisa lwa kukkiriza; so tekwava gye muli: kye kirabo kya Katonda: 
49_2_9_tekwava mu bikolwa, amuntu yenna aleme okwenyumirizanga. 
49_2_10_Kubanga ffe tuli mulimu gwe, abaatonderwa mu Kristo Yesu olw'ebikolwa ebirungi, Katonda bye, yasooka okuteekateeka ffe okubitambulirangamu. 
49_2_11_Kale mujjukire ng'edda mmwe, abaali ab'amawanga mu mubiri, Abakomole be bayita Abataakomolebwa, mu mubiri okukolebwa n'emikono; 
49_2_12_nga mu biro biri mwali nga muli wala ne Kristo, mwali nga mubooleddwa mu kika kya Isiraeri, era mwali bannaggwanga eri endagaano ez'okusuubiza, nga temulina kusuubira, nga temulina Katonda mu nsi. 
49_2_13_Naye kaakano mu Kristo Yesu mmwe abaali ewala edda musembezebwa olw'omusaayi gwa Kristo. 
49_2_14_Kubanga ye gye mirembe gyaffe, eyafuula byombi ekimu, n'amenyawo ekisenge ekya wakati ekyawula, 
49_2_15_bwe yamala okuggyawo mu mubiri gwe obulabe, tawuleti ey'ebiragiro ebiri mu mateeka; alyoke atonde mu ye yennyini abo bombi okubeera omuntu omu omuggya, okuleeta emirembe; 
49_2_16_era alyoke atabaganye bombi eri Katonda mu mubiri gumu olw'omusalaba, bwe yattira obulabe ku gwo: 
49_2_17_n'ajja n'ababuulira enjiri ey'emirembe mmwe abaali ewala, n'emirembe abaali okumpi: 
49_2_18_kubanga ku bw'oyo ffe fembi tulina okusembera kwaffe eri Kitaffe mu Mwoyo omu. 
49_2_19_Kale bwe mutyo temukyali bannaggwanga na bayise, naye muli ba kika kimu n'abatukuvu, era ba mu nnyumba ya Katonda, 
49_2_20_kubanga mwazimbibwa ku musingi be batume ne bannabbi, Kristo Yesu yennyini bw'ali ejjinja eddene ery'oku nsonda; 
49_2_21_mu oyo buli nnyumba yonna, bw'egattibwa obulungi, ekula okubeeranga yeekaalu entukuvu mu Mukama waffe; 
49_2_22_mu oyo era nammwe muzimbibwa wamu okubeeranga ekisulo kya Katonda mu Mwoyo. 
49_3_1_Kale nze Pawulo, omusibe we Yesu Kristo ku lwammwe ab'amawanga 
49_3_4_ebiyinza okubategeeza, bwe mubisoma, okumanya kwange mu kyama kye Kristo 
49_3_7_gye nnafuukira omuweereza waayo, ng'ekirabo eky'ekisa kya Katonda bwe kiri kye nnaweebwa ng'akukola kw'amaanyi ge bwe kuli. 
49_3_8_Nze, omuto okusinga abato ab'omu batukuvu bonna, nnaweebwe ekisa kino, okubuuliranga ab’ama wanga obugagga bwa Kristo obutanoonyezeka 
49_3_10_kaakano abaamasaza n'ab'obuyinza mu bifo eby'omn ggulu bategeezebwe mu kkanisa amagezi amangi aga Katonda ag'engeri ennyingi, 
49_3_11_ng'okumalirira bwe kuli mu Kristo Yesu Mukama waffe: 
49_3_12_mwe tuggya obuvumu bwaffe n'okusembera n'obugumu olw'okumukkiriza ye. 
49_3_13_Kyenva nsaba mmwe mulemenga okuddirira olw'ebibonoobono byange ku lwammwe, ebyo kye kitiibwa kyammwe. 
49_3_14_Kyenva nfukaamirira Kitaffe, 
49_3_15_buli kika eky'omu ggulu n'eky'oku nsi kwe kiggya erinnya, 
49_3_16_abawe mmwe, ng'obugagga bw'ekitiibwa kye bwe buli, okunywezebwa n'amaanyi mu Mwoyo gwe mu muntu ow'omunda: 
49_3_17_Kristo atuulenga mu mitima g'yammwe olw'okukkiriza; mubeerenga n'emmizi munywezebwenga mu kwagala, 
49_3_18_mulyoke muweebwe amaanyi okukwatanga n'amagezi awamu n'abatukuvu botlaa obugazi n'obuwanvu n'obugulumivu n'okugenda wansi bwe biri, 
49_3_19_n’okutegeera okwagala kwa Kristo okusinga okutegeerwa, mulyoke mutuukirire okutuusa okutuukirira kwonna okwa Katonda. 
49_3_20_Kale oyo ayinza okukola ennyo okusingira ddala byonna bye tusaba oba bye tulowooza, ng'amaanyi bwe gali agakolera mu ffe, 
49_3_21_aweebwenga ekitiibwa mu kkanisa ne mu Kristo Yesu okutuusa emirembe n'emirembe egitaggwaawo. Amiina. 
49_4_1_Kyenva mbeegayirira nze omusibe mu Mukama waffe okutambulanga nga bwe kusaanira okuyitibwa kwe mwayitibwa, 
49_4_2_n'obukkakkamu bwonna n'obuwombeefu, n'okugumiikiriza, nga muzibiikirizagananga mu kwagalana, 
49_4_3_nga munyiikiranga okwekuuma obumu bw'Omwoyo mu kusibibwa n'emirembe. 
49_4_4_Omubiri guli gumu, n'Omwoyo omu, era nga nammwe bwe mwayitibwa mu kusuubira okumu okw'okuyitibwa kwammwe 
49_4_6_Katonda omu, Kitaawe wa bonna, afuga byonna, ayita mu byonna, era ali mu byonna. 
49_4_7_Naye buli muntu mu ffe yaweebwa ekisa ng'ekigera ky'ekirabo kya Kristo bwe kiri. 
49_4_8_Kyava ayogera nti Bwe yalinnya waggulu, n'anyaga okunyaga, N'awa abantu ebirabo. 
49_4_9_(Naye ekigambo ekyo nti Yalinnya, kigamba ki wabula okugamba nti era yakka mu njuyi eza wansi ez'ensi? 
49_4_10_Eyakka era ye wuuyo eyalinnya waggulu ennyo okusinga eggulu lyonna, alyoke atuukirize byonna.) 
49_4_11_Era oyo n'awa abalala okubeera abatume, n'abalala bannabbi, n'abalala ababuulizi, n'abalala abalunda n'abayigiriza; 
49_4_12_olw'okuiriza abatukuvu, olw'omulimu ogw'okuweereza, olw'okuzimba omubiri gwa Kristo: 
49_4_13_okutuusa lwe tulituuka fenna mu bumu obw'okukkiriza, n'obw'okutegeera Omwana wa Katonda, lwe tulituuka okuba omuntu omukulu okutuuka mu kigera eky'bbukulu obw'okutuukirira kwa Kristo: 
49_4_14_tulemenga okubeera nate abaana abato, nga tuyuugana nga tutwalibwanga buli mpewo ey'okuyigiriza, mu bukuusa bw'abantu, mu nkwe, olw'okugoberera okuteesa okw'obulimba; 
49_4_15_naye, bwe twogeranga amazima mu kwagalana, tulyoke tukule okutuuka mu ye mu byonna, gwe mutwe, Kristo; 
49_4_16_mu oyo omubiri gwonna bwe gugattibwa obulungi ne gunywezebwa awamu buli nnyingo ng'ereeta ebyayo, ng'okukola mu kigera okwa buli kitundu bwe kuli, omubiri gweyongera okukula olw'okwezimba mu kwagalana. 
49_4_17_Kyenva njogera kino ne ntegeeza mu Mukama waffe, mmwe mulemenga okutambula nate, era ng'ab'amawanga bwe batambula mu birowoozo byabwe ebitaliimu, 
49_4_18_nga bazikizibwa amagezi gaabwe, nga baawulibwa ku bulamu bwa Katonda olw'obutaregeera obuli mu bo, olw'okukakanyala okw'omutima gwabwe; 
49_4_19_kubanga beerabira okulumwa, ne beewaayo mu bwenzi, okukolanga eby'obugwagwa bwonna mu kwegomba. 
49_4_20_Naye mmwe temwayiga bwe mutyo Kristo; 
49_4_21_oba nga mwamuwulira, ne' muyigirizibwa mu ye ng'amazima bwe gali mu Yesu: 
49_4_22_mu bigambo by'empisa ez'olubereberye, mmwe okwambula omuntu ow'edda, avnda olw'okwegomba okw'obulimba; 
49_4_23_era okufuuka abaggya mu mwoyo ogw'ebirowoozo byammwe, 
49_4_24_okwambala omuntu omuggya, eyatondebwa mu kifaananyi kya Katonda mu butuukirivu ne mu butukuw obw'amazima. 
49_4_25_Kale mwambule obulimba, mwogerenga amazima buli muntu ne munne: kubanga tuli bitundu bya bannaffe fekka na fekka. 
49_4_26_Musunguwalenga so temwonoonanga: enjuba eremenga okugwa ku busungu bwammwe: 
49_4_27_so temuwanga bbanga Setaani. 
49_4_28_Eyabbanga alemenga okubba nate: naye waakiri afubenga, ng'akola ebirungi n'emikono gye, alyoke abeerenga n'eky'okumuwa eyeetaaga. 
49_4_29_Buli kigambo ekiwndu kireme okuvanga mu kamwa kammwe, naye ekirungi bwe kinaabangawo olw'okuzimba nga omuntu bwe yeetaaga, abawulira kibawenga ekisa. 
49_4_30_So temunakuwazanga Mwoyo Mutukuvu owa Katonda, eyabateesaako akabonero okutuusa olunaku olw'okununulibwa. 
49_4_31_Okukaawa kwonna n'obusungu n'obukambwe n'okukaayalla n'okuvuma bibavengako, awamu n'ettima lyonna: 
49_4_32_era mubeerenga n'obulungi mwekka na mwekka, abakwatibwa ekisa, nga musonyiwagananga, era nga Katonda bwe yabasonyiwa mu Kristo. 
49_5_1_Kale mugobererenga Katonda, ng'abaana abaagalwa 
49_5_3_Naye obwenzi n'obugwagwa bwonna n'okwegomba n'okwogerebwa tebyogerebwangako mu mmwe, nga bwe kigwanira abatukuvu 
49_5_4_newakubadde eby'ensonyi, newakubadde ebinyumizibwa eby'obusiru, newakubadde okubalaata, ebitasaana: naye waakiri okwebazanga. 
49_5_5_Kubanga ekyo mukitegeerera ddala nga tewali mwenzi, oba mu gwagwa, oba eyeegomba, ye oyo asinza ebifaananyi, alina obusika mu bwakabaka bwa Kristo ne Katonda. 
49_5_6_Omuntu yenna tabalimbanga n'ebigambo ebitaliimu: kubanga olw'ebyo obusungu bwa Katonda bujja ku baana abatawulira. 
49_5_7_Kale temussanga kimu nabo 
49_5_9_(kubanga ebibala by'omusana biri mu bulungi bwonna n'obutuukirivu n'amazima), 
49_5_10_nga mukeberanga Mukama waffe ky'ayagala bwe kiri; 
49_5_11_so temussanga kimu n'ebikolwa ebitabala eby'ekizikiza, naye waakiri mubibuulirirenga bubuulirizi; 
49_5_12_kubanga kya nsonyi n'okubyogerako ebyo bye bakola mu kyama. 
49_5_13_Naye ebigambo byonna, bwe bibuulirirwa, omusana gubirabisa: kubanga buli ekirabisibwa gwe musana. 
49_5_14_Kyava ayogera nti Zuukuka, ggwe eyeebase, ozuukire mu bafu, Kristo anaakwakira. 
49_5_15_Kale mutunule nnyo bwe mutambulanga, si ng'abatalina magezi, naye ng'abalina amagezi; 
49_5_16_nga mweguliranga ebbanga, kubanga ennaku zino mbi. 
49_5_17_Kale temubeeranga basirusiru, naye mutegeerenga Mukama waffe ky'ayagala bwe kiri. 
49_5_18_So temutamiiranga mwenge, kubanga mu gwo mulimu okwegayaggula, naye mujjulenga Omwoyo; 
49_5_19_nga mwogeragananga mu zabbuli n'ennyimba n'ebiyiiye eby'Omwoyo, nga muyimbanga, nga mumukubiranga ennanga mu mutima gwammwe Mukama waffe; 
49_5_20_nga mwebazanga ennaku zonna olwa byonna Katonda Kitaffe mu linnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo; 
49_5_21_nga muwuliragananga mu kutya Kristo. 
49_5_22_Abakazi, muwulirenga babbammwe, nga bwe muwulira Mukama waffe. 
49_5_23_Kubanga omusajja gwe mutwe gwa mukazi we, era nga Kristo bw'ali omutwe gw'ekkanisa, bw'ali omulokozi ow'omubiri yennyini. 
49_5_24_Naye ng'ekkanisa bw'ewulira Kristo, n'abakazi bwe batyo bawulirenga babbaabwe mu buli kigambo. 
49_5_25_Abasajja, mwagalenga bakazi bammwe, era nga Kristo bwe yayagala ekkanisa, ne yeewaayo ku lwayo; 
49_5_26_alyoke agitukuze ng'amaze okugirongoosa n'okuginaaza n'amazzi mu kigambo, 
49_5_27_alyoke agyereetere yenayini ekkanisa ey'ekitiibwa, nga terina bbala newakubadde olufunyiro newakubadde kyonna ekifaanana nga bino; naye ebeere entukuvu eteriiko bulema. 
49_5_28_Era bwe kibagwanidde bwe kityo abasajja okwagalanga bakazi baabwe benayini ng'emibiri gyabwe bennyini. Ayagala mukazi we yennyini, yeeyagala yekka: 
49_5_29_kubanga tewali munru eyali akyaye omubiri gwe yennyini, naye aguliisa agujjaajaba, era nga Kristo bw'ajjanjaba ekkanisa; 
49_5_30_kubanga tuli bitundu bya mubiri gwe. 
49_5_31_Omuntu kyanaavaaga aleka kitaawe ne nnyina ne yeegatta ne mukazi we; nabo bombi banaabanga omubiri gumu. 
49_5_32_Ekyama kino kikulu: naye njogera ku Kristo n'ekkaaisa. 
49_5_33_Naye era nammwe buli muntu ayagalenga mukazi we nga bwe yeeyagala yekka; n'omukazi atyenga bba. 
49_6_1_Abaana abato, muwulirenga abazadde bammwe mu Mukama waffe: kubanga kino kye kirungi. 
49_6_2_Ossangamu ekitiibwa kitaawo ne nnyoko (lye tteeka ery'olubereberye eririmu okusuubiza), 
49_6_3_olyoke obeerenga bulungi, era owangaalenga ennaku nnyingi ku nsi. 
49_6_4_Nammwe, bakitaabwe, temusuaguwazanga baana bammwe: naye mubalerenga mu kukangavvulanga ne mu kubuuliriranga kwa Mukama waffe. 
49_6_5_Abaddu, muwulirenga bakama bammwe ab'omubiri nga mulina okutya n'okukankana, omutima gwammwe nga teguliimu bukuusa, aga Kristo 
49_6_7_nga muweerezanga n'okwagala nga Mukamall waffe so si bantu: 
49_6_8_nga mumanyil nti buli munru ekirungi ky'akola, ky'aliweebwa nate eri Mukama waffe, oba muddu oba wa ddembe. 
49_6_9_Nammwe, bakama baabwe, mubakolenga bwe mutyo, nga mulekanga okutiisa: nga mumanyi nga Mukama waabwe era owammwe ali mu ggulu, so tewali kusosola mu bantu gy'ali. 
49_6_10_Eky'enkomerero, mubenga n'amaanyi mu Mukama waffe ne mu buyinza obw'amaanyi ge. 
49_6_11_Mwambalenga ebyokulwanyisa byonna ebya Katonda, mulyoke muyinzenga okuyimirira eri enkwe za Setaani. 
49_6_12_Kubanga tetumeggana na musaayi na mubiri, wabula n'abaamasaza, n'ab'obuyinza, n'abafuga ensi ab'omu kizikiza kino, n'emyoyo egy'obubi mu bifo ebya waggulu. 
49_6_13_Kale mutwalenga ebyokulwanyisa byonna ebya Katonda, mulyoke muyinzenga okuguma ku lunaku olubi, era bwe mulimala okukoIla byonna, musobole okuyimirira. 
49_6_14_Kale muyimirirenga, nga mwesibye mu kiwato kyammwe amazima, era nga mwambadde eky'omu kifuba obutuukirivu, 
49_6_15_era nga munaanise mu bigere okweteekateeka okw'enjiri ey'emirembe; 
49_6_16_era ku ebyo byonna nga mukwatiddeko engabo ey'okukkiriza, eneebayinzisanga okuzikiza obusaale bwonna obw'omuliro obw'omubi. 
49_6_17_Muweebwe ne sseppewo ey'obulokow, n'ekitala eky'Omwoyo, kye kigambo kya Katonda: 
49_6_18_nga musabanga buli kiseera mu Mwoyo n'okusaba n’okwegayiriranga kwonna n'okwegayirirrianga abatukuvu kusaba okwo mu kunyiikiranga kwonna n’okwegayiririranga abatukuvu bonna, 
49_6_19_era nange ndyoke mpeebwe okwogeranga okwasamyanga akamwa kange, okutegeezanga n'obuvumu ekyama eky'enjiri, 
49_6_20_gye mbeerera omubaka waayo mu lujegere; njogerenga n'obuvumu mu yo, nga bwe kiŋŋwanira okwogeranga. 
49_6_21_Naye nammwe mulyoke mutegeere ebifa gye ndi bwe biri, Tukiko, ow'oluganda omwagalwa era omuweereza omwesigwa mu Mukama waffe alibategeeza byonna: 
49_6_22_gwe mbatumidde olw'ensonga eno, mulyoke mutegeere ebifa gye tuli, era abasanyuse emitima gyammwe. 
49_6_23_Emirembe gibenga eri ab'oluganda, n'okwagala awamu n'okukkiriza ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
49_6_24_Ekisa kibeerenga n'abo bonna abaagala Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo mu butamala. 
50_1_1_Pawulo ne Timoseewo, abaddu ba Kristo Yesu, eri abatukuvu bonna mu Kristo Yesu abali mu Firipi, wamu n'abalabirizi n'abaweereza: 
50_1_2_ekisa kibeerenga gye muli n'emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
50_1_3_Nneebaza Katonda wange buli lwe mbajjukira, 
50_1_4_ennaku zonna buli lwe mbasabira mwenna nsaba n'essanyu, 
50_1_5_olw'okussa ekimu kwammwe okw'okubunya enjiri okuva ku lunaku olw'olubereberye okutuusa kaakano 
50_1_7_nga bwe kiri ekirungi nze okulowoozanga ekyo gye muli mwenna, kubanga ndi nammwe mu mutima gwange, bwe mussa ekimu mwenna awamu nange mu kisa, mu kusibibwa kwange era ne mu kuwolerezanga enjiri n'okuginywezanga. 
50_1_8_Kubanga Katonda ye mujulirwa wange, bwe mbalumirwa omwoyo mwenna mu kusaasira kwa Kristo Yesu. 
50_1_9_Era kino kye asaba okwagala kwammwe kweyongereyongerenga kusukkirirenga mu kutegeera n'okwawula kwonna: 
50_1_10_mulyoke musiimenga ebisinga obulungi; mubeerenga abatalina bukuusa era abatalina kabi okutuusa ku lunaku lwa Kristo; 
50_1_11_nga mujjudde ebibala eby'obutuukirivu, ebiriwo ku bwa Yesu Kristo, Katonda aweebwe ekitiibwa, atenderezebwe. 
50_1_12_Naye njagala mmwe okutegeera, ab'oluganda, ng'ebyambaako byajja lwa kubunya bubunya enjiri; 
50_1_13_n'okusibibwa kwange ne kulyoka kuIabika mu Kristo eri basserikale bonna aba kabaka, n'abalala bonna; 
50_1_14_n'ab'oluganda abasinga obungi mu Mukama waffe ne balyoka baguma olw'okusibwa kwange ne beeyongeranga nnyo okwaŋŋanga okubuuliranga ekigambo kya Katonda nga tebatya. 
50_1_15_Abalala babuulira Kristo lwa buggya n'okuyomba; era n'abalala bamubuulira lwa kisa: 
50_1_16_bano babuulira lwa kwagala, nga bamaayi nga nnateekebwawo lwa kuwolerezanga enjiri: 
50_1_17_naye bali babuulira Kristo olw'okuyomba, si mu mazima, nga balowooza okundeetera ennaku mu kusibibwa kwange. 
50_1_18_Naye n'ekyo asonga? wabula nga mu ngeri zonna, oba mu bukuusa oba mu mazima, Kristo abuulirwa; n'ekyo nkisanyukidde, weewaawo era ndisanyuka. 
50_1_19_Kubanga mmanyi ng'ekyo kirinviiramu obulokozi olw'okusaba kwammwe n'okuweebwa Omwoyo wa Yesu Kristo, 
50_1_20_nga bwe ntunuulira ennyo ne asuubira nga ssirikwatibwa nsonyi mu kigambo kyonna, wabula nga Kristo, ennaku zonna, era ne kaakano anaagulumizibwanga mu mubiri gwange mu buvumu bwonna, oba mu bulamu oba mu kufa. 
50_1_21_Kubanga gye ndi okuba omulamu ye Kristo, n'okufa ge magoba. 
50_1_22_Naye oba ng'okuba omulamu mu mubiri, okwo nga kye kibala eky'omulimu gwange, kale ssimanyi kye nneeroboza. 
50_1_23_Naye nziyizibwa enjuyi zombiriri, nga nneegomba okugenda okubeera ne Kristo; kubanga kwe kusinga ennyo nnyini: 
50_1_24_naye okubeera mu mubiri kwe kusinga okwetaagibwa ku lwammwe: 
50_1_25_Era, kubanga ntegeeredde ddala bwe ntyo, mmanyi nga ndibeera, era ndibeera wamu nammwe mwenna, olw'okuyitirira kwammwe n'okusanyuka olw'okukkiriza: 
50_1_26_okwenyutniriza kwammwe kulyoke kusukkirire mu Kristo Yesu ku bwange, nze olw'okujja gye muli nate. 
50_1_27_Naye kyokka okutambula kwammwe kubeerenga nga bwe kigwanira enjiri ya Kristo: bwe ndijja okubalabako oba nga ssiriiwo, ndyoke mpulire ebifa gye muli, nga munywedde mu mwoyo gumu, nga mulwaniriranga okukkiriza okw'enjiri n’emmeeme emu; 
50_1_28_so nga temukangibwa balabe mu kigambo kyonna: ke kabonero ddala gye bali ak'okuzikirira, naye er mmwe ka bulokozi, era obuva era Katonda; 
50_1_29_kubanga mwaweebwa ku lwa Kristo si kumukkiriza kwo kka, era naye n'okubonaabonanga ku lulwe: 
50_1_30_nga mulina okulwana kuli kwe mwalaba gye ndi, era kwe muwulira kaakano okuli gye ndi. 
50_2_1_Kale oba nga waliwo okukubagiza kwonna mu Kristo, oba ng'okusanyusa kwonna okw'okwagala, oba ng'okussa ekimu kwonna okw'Omwoyo, oba ng'okusaasira n'ekisa, 
50_2_2_mutuukirize essanyu lyange mulowoozenga bumu, nga mulina okwagala kumu, omwoyo gumu nga mulowooza bumu 
50_2_5_Mmwe mubeerengamu okulowooza kuli, era okwali mu Kristo Yesu 
50_2_7_naye yeggyako ekitiibwa, bwe yatwala engeri y'omuddu, n'abeera mu kifaananyi ky'abantu 
50_2_9_Era Katonda kyeyava amugulumiza ennyo n'amuwa erinnya liri erisinga amannya gonna; 
50_2_10_buli vviivi lifukaamirirenga erinnya lya Yesu, ery'eby'omu ggulu n'eby'oku nsi n'ebya wansi w'ensi, 
50_2_11_era buli lulimi lwatulenga nga Yesu Kristo ye Mukama waffe, Katonda Kitaffe aweebwe ekitiibwa. 
50_2_12_Kale, abaagalwa bange, nga bwe mwawuliranga ennaku zonna, si nga nze lwe mbeerawo lwokka, naye kaakano okusinga ennyo nga ssiriiyo, mutuukirizenga obulokozi bwammwe bennyini n'okutya n'okukankana; 
50_2_13_kubanga Katonda yakoza mu mmwe okwagala n'okukola, olw'okusiima kwe okulungi. 
50_2_14_Mukolenga byonna awatali kwemulugunyanga n'empaka; 
50_2_15_mulemenga okubaako kye munenye;ebwa newakubadde ettima, abaana ba Katonda abatalina mabala wakati n'emirembe egyakyama emikakaiyavu, gye mulabikiramu ng'ettabaaza z'omu nsi, 
50_2_16_nga mwolesa ekigambo eky'obulamu; ndyoke nbeere n'okwenyumiriza ku lunaku wa Kristo, kubanga ssaddukira bwereere, so ssaafubira bwereere. 
50_2_17_Naye newakubadde nga nfukima ku ssaddaaka n'okuweereza okw'okukkiriza kwammwe, nsanyuka era nsanyukira wamu nanmwe mwenna: 
50_2_18_era nammwe me mutyo musanyuke era musanyukire wamu nange. 
50_2_19_Naye nsuubira mu Mukama waffe Yesu, okubatumira amangu Timoseewo, nange ndyoke ngume omwoyo, bwe ndimala okutegeera ebifa gye muli. 
50_2_20_Kubanga sirina muntu mulala alina emmeeme eyenkana n'ey'oyo, aligenderera ebya mmwe mu mazima. 
50_2_21_Kubanga bo bonna beenoonyeza byabwe ku bwabwe, si bya Yesu Kristo. 
50_2_22_Naye ekimutegeezesa mukimanyi, nga aweerezanga wamu nange olw'enjiri, ng'omwana eri kitaawe. 
50_2_23_Kale oyo nsuubira okumutuma mangu, kyokka bwe ndimala okusba ebifa gye ndi: 
50_2_24_naye nsuubira mu Mukama waffe nti nange ndijja mangu. 
50_2_25_Naye nnalaba nga #331;ŋwanye okubatumira Epafuloddito muganda wange, era mukozi munange, era mulwanyi munnange, naye ye mutume wammwe era omuweereza w'ebintu bye nneetaaga; 
50_2_26_kubanga yabalumirwa omwoyo mmwe mwenna, ne yeeraliikirira nyo, kubanga mwawulira nga yalwala: 
50_2_27_kubanga okulwala yalwayali kumpi n'okufa: naye Katonda yamusaasira; so si ye yekka, naye era nange, ennaku endala zireme okweyongera ku nnaku ze nnina. 
50_2_28_Kyenva njagala ennyo okumutuma, bwe mulimulaba nate mulyo: musanyuke, nange nkendeeze ku makuwala kwange. 
50_2_29_Kale muwanirizanga mu Mukama waffe essanyu lyonna; era abafaanana oyo mubassengamu ekitiibwa: 
50_2_30_kubanga yabulako katono afe w'omulimu gwa Kristo, bwe yaigawo obulamu bwe alyoke atuukirize ekyabulako mu kuweereza kwammwe gye ndi. 
50_3_1_Ebisigaddeyo, baganda bange, musanyukirenga Mukama waffe. Okubawandiikira ebimu tekunkonya nze, naye kuleeta mirembe gye muli. 
50_3_2_Mwekuumenga embwa, mwekuumenga abakozi ababi, mwekuumenga abeesala: 
50_3_3_kubanga ffe tuli abeekomola, abasinza ku bw'Omwoyo gwa Katonda, abeenyumiririza mu Kristo Yesu, era abateesiga mubiri: 
50_3_4_newakubadde nga nze nnyinza n'okwesiga omubiri: omuntu omulala yenna bw'alowooza okwesiga omubiri, nze mmusinga:
