50_3_5_nze eyakomolerwa ku lunaku olw'omunaana, ow'omu ggwanga lya Isiraeri, ow'omu kika kya Benyamini, Omwebbulaniya wawu; mu mateeka Mufalisaayo 
50_3_7_Naye byonna ebyali amagoba gye ndi, ebyo nnabirowooza nga kufiirwa olwa Kristo. 
50_3_8_Naye era n'ebintu byonna nnabirowooza nga kufiirwa olw'obulungi obungi obw'okutegeera Kristo Yesu Mukama wange: ku bw'oyo nnafiirwa ebintu byonna, era mbirowooza okubeera mpitambi, ndyoke nfune amagoba ye Kristo, 
50_3_9_era ndyoke ndabikire mu ye, nga ssirina buruukirivu bwange obuva mu mateeka, wabule obutuukirivu obuliwo olw'okukkiriza Kristo, obuva eri Katonda mu kukkiriza: 
50_3_10_ndyoke mmutegeere ye n'obuyinza obw'okuzuukira kwe n'okussa ekimu okw'ebibonoobono bye, nga mmufaanana ne mu kufa kwe; 
50_3_11_bwe ndiyinza mu byonna byoana okutuuka ku kuzuukira kwe okuva mu bafu. 
50_3_12_Si kugamba nti mmaza okuweebwa oba nti mmaze okutuukirizibwa: naye ngoberera era ndyoke nkikwate ekyo kye yankwatira Kristo Yesu. 
50_3_13_Ab'oluganda, sseerowooza nze nga mmaze okukwata: naye kimu kye nkola, nga nneerabira ebyo ebiri ennyuma, era nga nkununkiriza ebyo ebiri mu maaso, 
50_3_14_nduubirira okutuuka awawakanirwa awali empeera ey'okuyita kwa Katonda okwa waggulu mu Kristo Yesu. 
50_3_15_Kale ffe fenna abaatuukirira, tulowoozenga ekyo: era bwe mulowooza ebirala mu kigambo kyonna, era Katonda alibabikkulira n’ekyo: 
50_3_16_naye kyokka, kye tutuuseeko, tutambulirenga mu ekyo. 
50_3_17_Ab'olugaada, mukkiriziganye wamu mungobererenga, era mulabirenga ku abo abatambula nga bwe mulina ffe okuba ekyokulabirako. 
50_3_18_Kubanga bangi abatambula be nnababuulirako emirundi emingi, ne kaakano mbabuulira nga nkaaba amaziga, nga be balabe ab'omusalaba gwa Kristo: 
50_3_19_enkomerero yaabwe kwe kuzikirira, katonda waabwe lwe lubuto, era ekitiibwa kyabwe kiri mu nsonyi zaabwe, balowooza bya mu nsi. 
50_3_20_Kubanga ffe ewaffe mu ggulu; era gye tulindiririra Omulokozi okuvaayo, Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo: 
50_3_21_aliwaanyisa omubiri ogw'okutoowazibwa kwaffe okufaananyizibwa ng'omubiri ogw'ekitiibwa kye, ng'okukola okwo bwe kuli okumuyinzisa n'okussa ebintu byanna wansi we. 
50_4_1_Kale, baganda bange abaagalwa be nnumirwa omwoyo, essanyu lyange era engule yange, muyimirirenga bwe mutyo okunywerera mu Mukama waffe, abaagalwa. 
50_4_2_Mbuulirira Ewodiya, era mbuulirira Suntuke, balowoozenga bumu mu Mukama waffe. 
50_4_3_Nate era naawe, muddu munnange ddala ddala, nkwegayiridde obeerenga abakazi abo, kubanga baakolanga emirimu wamu nange mu njiri, era ne Kulementi, n’abalala bakozi bannange, amannya gaabwe gali mu kitabo ky'obulamu. 
50_4_4_Musanyukirenga Mukama waffe ennaku zonna: nate njogera nti Musanyukenga. 
50_4_5_Okuzibiikiriza kwammwe kumanyibwenga abantu bonna. Mukama waffe ali kumpi. 
50_4_6_Temweraliikiriranga kigambo kyonna kyonna; naye mu kigambo kyonna mu kusabanga n'okwegayiriranga awamu n'okwebazanga bye mwagala bitegeezebwenga eri Katonda. 
50_4_7_N'emirembe gya Katonda, egisinga okutegeerwa kwonna, ginaabakuumanga emitima gyammwe n'ebirowoozo byammwe mu Kristo Yesu. 
50_4_8_Ebisigaddeyo, ab'oluganda, eby'amazima byonna, ebisaanira ekitiibwa byonna, eby'obutuukirivu byonna, ebirongoofu byonna, ebyagalibwa byonna, ebisiimibwa byonna; oba nga waliwo obulungi, era oba nga waliwo ettendo, ebyo mubirowoozenga. 
50_4_9_Bye mwayiga era ne muweebwa ne muwulira ne mulaba gye ndi, ebyo mubikolenga: ne Katonda ow'emirembe anaabeeranga nammwe. 
50_4_10_Naye nsanyukidde nnyo Mukama waffe kubanga kaakano kye mujje musibuke okulowooza ebyange; naye ekyo okulowooza mwakirowoozanga, naye temwalina bbanga. 
50_4_11_Si kubanga njogera olw'okwetaaga: kubanga nnayiga, embeera gye mbaamu yonna, obutabaako kye. nneetaaga. 
50_4_12_Mmanyi okwetoowaza, era mmanyi bwe kiba okuba n'ebintu ebingi: mu buli kigambo ne mu bigambo byonna nnayiga ekyama ekiri mu kukkuta ne mu kulumwa enjala, okuba n'ebingi era n'okuba mu bwetaavu. 
50_4_13_Nnyinzizza byonna mu oyo ampa amaanyi. 
50_4_14_Naye mwakola bulungi okussa ekimu n'ebibonoobono byange 
50_4_15_Era mmwe, Abafiripi, mumanyi nga mu kusooka kw'enjiri, bwe nnava mu Makedoni, nga siwali kkanisa eyassa ekimu nange mu kigambo eky'okugaba n'okuweebwa, wabula mmwe mwekka; 
50_4_16_kubanga era ne mu Ssessaloniika mwaweereza omulundi gumu, era n'ogw'okubiri, olw'okwetaaga kwange. 
50_4_17_Si kubanga nnoonya kirabo; naye nnoonya bibala ebyeyongera ku muwendo gwammwe. 
50_4_18_Naye nnina ebintu byonna, ne nsukkirira: nzikuse, bwe nnamala okuweebwa Epafulodito ebyava gye muli, evvumbe eriwunya obulungi, ssaddaaka ekkirizibwa, esiimibwa Katonda. 
50_4_19_Era Katonda wange anaatuukirizanga buli kye mwetaaga, ng'obugagga bwe bwe buli mu kitiibwa mu Kristo Yesu. 
50_4_20_Era Katonda era Kitaffe aweebwenga ekitiibwa emirembe n'emirembe. Amiina. 
50_4_21_Mulamuse buli mutukuvu mu Kristo Yesu. Ab'oluganda abali nange babalamusizza. 
50_4_22_Abatukuvu bonna babalamusizza, naye okusinga ab'omu nnyumba ya Kayisaali. 
50_4_23_Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo kibeerenga n'omwoyo gwammwe. 
51_1_1_Pawulo omutume wa Kzisto Yesu olw'okwagala kwa Katonda, ne Timoseewo ow'oluganda, 
51_1_2_era abatukuvu, ab'oluganda abeesigwa mu Kristo ab'omu Kkolosaayi: ekisa kibeerenga gye muli n'emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe. 
51_1_3_Twebaza Katonda Kitaawe wa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, nga tubasabira ennaku zonna, 
51_1_4_bwe twawulira okukkiriza kwammwe mu Kristo Yesu, n'okwagala kwe mulina eri abatukuvu bonna, 
51_1_5_olw'essuubi eryatsaterekerwa mu ggulu, lye mwawulira edda mu kigambo eky'amazima ag'enjiri, 
51_1_6_eyajja gye muli; era nga bw'eri mu nsi zonna, ng'ebala ebibala era ng'ekula, era nga ne mu mmwe, okuva ku lunaku bwe mwawulira ne mutegeera ekisa kya 
51_1_7_Katonda mu mazima; nga bwe mwayigirizibwa Epafula muddu mu nnaffe omwagalwa, ye muweereza omwesigwa owa Kristo ku lwaffe, 
51_1_8_era eyatubuulira okwagala kwammwe mu Mwoyo. 
51_1_9_Naffe kyetuva tetulekaayo, okuva ku lunaku bwe twawulira, okubasabira n'okubeegayirira mulyoke mujjuzibwe okutegeeranga by'ayagala mu magezi gonna n'okutegeera eby'Omwoyo, 
51_1_10_okutambulanga nga bwe kisaanira Mukama waffe olw'okusiimibwa kwonna, nga mubalanga ebibala mu buli kikolwa ekirungi, era nga mukuLiranga mu kutegeera Katonda; 
51_1_11_nga muyinzisibwanga n'obuyinza bwonna, ng'amaanyi ag'ekitiibwa kye bwe gali, olw'okugumiikiriza kwonna n'okuzibiikiriza awamu n'okusanyu:a; 
51_1_12_nga mwebaza Kitaffe, eyarusaanyiza ffe omugabo ogw'obusika obw'abatukuvu mu musana, 
51_1_13_eyatulokola mu buyinza obw'ekizikiza, n'atutwala mu bwakabal:a obw'Omwana we omwagalwa; 
51_1_14_mwe tubeerera n'okununulwa, kwe kusonyiyibwa kw'ebibi byaffe: 
51_1_15_oyo kye kifaananyi kya Katonda atalabika, omubereberye ow'ebitonde byonna; 
51_1_16_kubanga mu oyo ebintu byonna mwe byatonderwa, mu ggulu ne ku nsi, ebirabika n'ebitalabika, oba nga ntebe za bwaizabaka, oba bwami, oba kufuga, oba masaza; ebintu byonna byatondebwa ye, era ne ku lulwe; 
51_1_17_naye ye w'olubereberye mu byonna, era ebintu byonna bibeerawo mu ye. 
51_1_18_Era oyo gwe mutwe gw'omubiri, ve kkanisa: oyo lwe lubereberye, emubereberye ow'omu bafu; ye alyoke abeerenga ow'olubereberye mu byonna. 
51_1_19_Kubanga Kitaffe rasiima okutuukirira kwonna okubeeranga mu ye; 
51_1_20_n'okutabaganyisa ebintu byonna eri ye yennyini mu ye, bwe yamala okuleeta emirembe olw'omusaayi gw'omusalaba gwe; mu ye okutabaganyisa oba eby'oku nsi oba eby'omu ggulu. 
51_1_21_Nammwe, bwe mwali edda bannaggwanga era abalabe mu kulowooza kwammwe mu bikolwa ebibi, naye kaakano yabatabaganyisa 
51_1_22_mu mubiri ogw'ennyama ye olw'okufa, okubanjula abatukuvu, abataliiko mabala abatanenyezebwa mu maaso ge: 
51_1_23_bwe mubeera obubeezi mu kukkiriza, nga munywedde, nga temusagaasagana, so nga temuvudde mu ssuubi ly'enjiri gye mwawulira, eyabuulirwa mu bitonde byonna ebiri wansi w'eggulu; nze Pawulo gye nnafuukira omuweereza waayo. 
51_1_24_Kaakano nsanyuse mu bibonoobono byange ku lwammwe, era ntuukiriza ebibulako mu kulaba ennaku kwa Kristo mu mubiri gwange olw'omubiri gwe, ye kkanisa; 
51_1_25_nze gye nnafuukira omuweereza waayo, ng'obuwanika bwa Katonda bwe buli bwe nnaweebwa gye muli, okutuukiriza ekigambo kya Katonda, 
51_1_26_ekyama ekyakwekebwa okuva edda n'edda n'emirembe n'emirembe: naye kaakano kyolesebbwa eri abatukuvu be, 
51_1_27_Katonda be yayagala okutegeeza obugagga obw'ekitiibwa eky'ekyama kino bwe buli mu b'amawanga, ekyo ye Kristo mu mmwe, essuubi ery'ekitiibwa: 
51_1_28_gwe tubuulira ffe, nga tulabula buli muntu, era nga tuyigiriza buli muntu mu magezi gonna, tulyoke twanjule buli muntu ng'atuukiridde mu Kristo; 
51_1_29_n'okufuba kye nfubira era, nga mpakana ng'okukola kwe bwe kuli, okukolera mu nze n'amaanyi. 
51_2_1_Kubanga njagala mmwe okumanya okufuba bwe kuli okunene kwe nnina ku lwammwe n'abo ab'omu Lawodikiya, ne bonna abatalabanga maaso gange mu mubiri 
51_2_3_omuli obugagga bwonna obw'amagezi n'obw'okutegeera nga bukwekeddwa. 
51_2_4_Ekyo kye njogera nti omuntu yenna alemenga okubalimbalimba mu bigambo eby'okusendasenda. 
51_2_5_Kubanga newakubadde nga ssiriiyo mu mubiri, naye mu mwoyo ndi nammwe, nga nsanyuka era nga ndaba empisa zammwe ennungi, n'obunywevu obw'okukkiriza kwammwe mu Kristo. 
51_2_6_Kale nga bwe mwaweebwa Kristo Yesu Mukama waffe, mutambulirenga bwe mutyo mu ye, 
51_2_7_nga mulina emmizi, era nga muzimbibwa mu ye, era nga munywezebwa okukkiriza kwammwe, nga bwe mwayigirizibwa, nga musukkirira okwebaza. 
51_2_8_Mwekuume tewabeerangawo muntu abanyaga mu bufirosoofo n'eby'obulimba ebitaliimu, okugobereranga ebyayigirizibwa abantu okugobereranga eby'olubereberye eby'ensi, okutali kugoberera Kristo 
51_2_9_kubanga mu oyo mwe mutuula okutuukirira kwonna okw'obwa katonda ng'omubiri bwe guli, 
51_2_10_era mwatuukiririra mu ye, gwe mutwe ogw'okufuga n'obuyinza bwonna 
51_2_11_era mwakomolerwa mu oyo obukomole obutakomolebwa na mi kono, mu kwambula omubiri ogw'e nnyama, mu kukomolebwa kwa Kristo; 
51_2_12_bwe mwaziikirwa awamu naye mu kubatizibwa, era kwi mwazuukiriramu olw'okukltiriza okukola kwa Katonda, eyamuzuukiza mu bafu. 
51_2_13_Nammwe bwe mwali nga mufudde olw'ebyonoono byammwe n'obutakomolebwa mubiri gwammwe, yabafuula balamu wamu naye, bwe yamala okutusonyiwa ebyonoono byaffe byonna; 
51_2_14_n'okusangula endagaano eyawaadiikibwa mu mateeka, eyatwolekera, eyali omulabe waffe: nayo n’agiggyamu wakati mu kkubo, bwe yagikomerera ku musalaba: 
51_2_15_bwe yayambulira ddala obwami n’amasaza, n'abiwemuukiriza mu lwatu, bwe yabiwangulira ku gwo. 
51_2_16_Kale omuntu yenna tabanenyanga mu by'okulya oba mu by'okunywa, oba olw'embaga oba olw'omwezi oguboneka oba olwa ssabbiiti: 
51_2_17_ebyo kye kisiikirize ky'ebyo ebigenda okujja; naye omubiri gwe gwa Kristo. 
51_2_18_Omuntu yenaa tabanyagangako mpeera yammwe mu kwewombeeka kw'ayagala yekka n'okusinzanga bamalayika, ng'anywerera mu ebyo bye yalaba, nga yeegulumiririza bwereere mu mage zi ag'omubiri gwe, 
51_2_19_so nga teyeekwase Mutwe, omuva omubiri gwonna, ennyingo n'ebinyweza nga biguleetera era nga bigugatta wamu, nga gukula n'okukuza kwa Katonda. 
51_2_20_Oba nga mwafiira wamu ne Kristo okuleka eby'olubereberye eby'ensi, kiki ekibeeteesa wansi w'amateeka, ng'abakyali abalamu mu nsi nti 
51_2_21_Tokwatangako, so tolegangako, so tokomangako 
51_2_22_(ebyo byonna biggweerawo mu kukolebwa) okugobereranga ebiragiro n'okuyigiriza eby'abantu? 
51_2_23_Ebyo birina ddala ekifaananyi eky'amagezi mu kusinza Katonda abantu kwe bagunja bokka, ne mu kwewombeeka ne mu kubonyaabonya omubiri; naye tebiriiko kye bigasa n'akatono olw'okwegomba kw'omubiri. 
51_3_1_Kale oba nga mwazuukirira wamu ne Kristo, munoonyenga ebiri waggulu, Kristo gy'ali ng'arudde ku mukono ogwa ddyo ogwa Katonda. 
51_3_2_Mulowoozenga ebiri waggulu, so si ebiri ku nsi. 
51_3_3_Kubanga mwafa, n'obulamu bwammwe bukwekeddwa wamu ne Kristo mu Katonda. 
51_3_4_Kristo, obulamu bwaffe, bw'alirabisibwa, era nammwe ne mulyoka mulabisibwa wamu naye mu kitiibwa. 
51_3_5_Kale mufiise ebitundu byammwe ebiri ku nsi; obwenzi, obugwagwa, okwegomba okw'ensonyi, omululu omubi, n'okuyaayaana, kwe kusinza ebifaananyi 
51_3_8_Naye kaakano era nammwe muggyeewo byonna, obusungu, ekiruyi, ettima, okuvuma, okunyumya eby'ensonyi mu kamwa kammwe: 
51_3_9_temulimbagananga mwekka na mwekka; kubanga mwamweyambulako omuntu ow'edda wamu n'ebikolwa bye, 
51_3_10_ne mwambala omuntu omuggya, afuulibwa omuggya olw'okutegeera mu kifaananyi ky'oyo eyamutonda: 
51_3_11_awo tewayinza kubeerawo Muyonaani n'Omuyudaaya, okukomolwa n'obutakomolwa, munnaggwanga, Omusukusi, omuddu, ow'eddembe: naye Kristo bye bintu byonna ne mu byonna. 
51_3_12_Kale mwambalenga ng'abalonde ba Katonda, abatukuvu era abaagalwa, omwoyo ogw'ekisa, obulungi, okwewombeeka, obuteefu, okugumiikiriza; 
51_3_13_nga milzibiikirizagananga, era nga musonyiwagananga mwekka na mwekka, omuntu yenna bw'abeeranga n'ensonga ku muatu munne; era nga Mukama waffe bwe yabasonyiwa mmwe, era natnmwe bwe muryo: 
51_3_14_ku ebyo byonna era mwambale okwagalana, kye kintu ekinyweza okutuukirira. 
51_3_15_Era emirembe gya Katonda giramulenga mu mitima gyammwe, era gye mwayitirwa mu mubiri ogumu; era mubeerenga n'okwebaza. 
51_3_16_Ekigambo kya Kristo kibeerenga mu mmwe n'obugagga mu magezi gonna; nga muyigirizagananga era nga mulabulagananga mwekka na mwekka mu zabbuli n'ennyimba n'ebiyiiye eby'Omwoyo, nga muyimbira Katonda mu kisa mu mitima gyammwe. 
51_3_17_Era buli kye munaakolanga, mu kigambo oba mu kikolwa, mukolerenga byonna mu linnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu, nga mwebaza Katonda Kitaffe ku bubwe. 
51_3_18_Abakazi, muwulirenga babbammwe, nga bwe kiri ekirungi mu Mukama waffe. 
51_3_19_Abasajja, mwagalenga bakazi bammwe, so temubakwatirwanga bukambwe. 
51_3_20_Abaana abato, muwulirenga bakadde bammwe mu byonna, kubanga ekyo kye kisiimibwa mu Mukama waffe. 
51_3_21_Bakitaabwe, temunyiizanga baana bammwe, balemenga okuddirira omwoyo. 
51_3_22_Abaddu, muwulirenga bakama bammwe ab'omu mubiri mu byonna, si mu kuweereza okw'okungulu ng'abasiimibwa abantu, wabula mu mutima ogutalina bukuusa, nga mutya Mukama waffe: 
51_3_23_buli kye munaakolanga mukolenga n'omwoyo, nga ku bwa Mukama waffe so si ku bwa bantu; 
51_3_24_nga mumanyi nga mulisasulibwa Mukama waffe empeera ey'obusika: muli baddu ba Mukama waffe Kristo. 
51_3_25_Kubanga ayonoona aliweebwa nate nga bwe yayonoona: so siwali kusosola mu bantu. 
51_4_1_Bakama baabwe, mugabirenga abaddu bammwe eby'obutuukirivu n'okwenkanyankanyanga; nga mumanyi nga era nammwe mulina Mukama wammwe mu ggulu. 
51_4_2_Munyiikirirenga mu kusaba, nga mutunulanga mu kusaba mu kwebaza 
51_4_5_Mutambulirenga mu magezi eri abo ab'ebweru, nga mweguliranga ebbanga. 
51_4_6_Ebigambo byammwe bibeerenga n'ekisa ennaku zonna, nga binoga omunnyo, mulyoke mumanye bwe kibagwanidde okwanukulanga buli muntu yena. 
51_4_7_Tukiko, ow'oluganda omwagalwa era omuweereza omwesigwa era muddu munnaffe mu Mukama waffe, alibategeeza ebifa gye ndi byonna: 
51_4_8_gwe ntuma gye muli olw'ensonga eno, mulyoke mutegeere ebifa gye tuli era asanyuse emyoyo gyammwe 
51_4_10_Alisutaluuko, musibe munnange, abalamusizza, ne Makko, mujjwa wa Balunabba, (gwe mwalagirwa; bw'alijja gye muli, mumwanirizanga), 
51_4_11_ne Yesu ayitibwa Yusito, ab'omu bakomole: abo bokka be bakozi bannange olw'obwakabaka bwa Katonda, abansa nyusanga. 
51_4_12_Epafula, ow'ewammwe, omuddu wa Kristo Yesu, abalamusizza, afuba ennaku zonna ku lwammwe mu kusaba kwe, mulyoke muyimirirenga nga muli batuukirivu era nga mutegeerera ddala mu byonna Katonda by'ayagala. 
51_4_13_Kubanga ndi mujulirwa we ng'alina emirimu mingi ku lwammwe, n'ab'omu Lawodikiya, n'ab'omu Kiyerapoli. 
51_4_14_Lukka, omusawo omwagalwa, ne Dema babalamusizza. 
51_4_15_Mulamuse ab'oluganda ab'omu Lawodikiya, ne Nunfa, n'ekkanisa ey'omu nnyumba yaabwe. 
51_4_16_Era ebbaluwa eno bw'emalaaga okusomerwa mu mmwe, era mugisomese ne mu kkanisa ey'Abalawodikiya; era nammwe musome eriva mu Lawodikiya. 
51_4_17_Era mugambe Alukipo nti Weekuumenga okuweereza kwe waweebwa mu Mukama waffe, okukutuukiriza. 
51_4_18_Kuno kwe kulamusa kwange n'omukono gwange nze Pawulo. Mujjukirenga okusibibwa kwange. Ekisa kibeerenga nammwe. 
52_1_1_Pawulo ne Sirwano ne Timoseewo eri ekkanisa ey'Abasessaloniika eri mu Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo: ekisa kibeerenga gye muli n'emirembe. 
52_1_2_Twebaza Katonda ku lwammwe mwenna ennaku zonna, nga tuboogerako mu kusaba kwaffe 
52_1_5_kubanga enjiri yaffe teyajja gye muli mu kigambo bugambo, wabula era ne mu maanyi, ne mu Mwoyo Omutukuvu, ne mu kutegeerera ddala okungi; nga bwe mumanyi bwe twali gye muli ku lwammwe. 
52_1_6_Nammwe ne mutugoberera ffe ne Mukama waffe, bwe mwatoolera ekigambo mu kubonaabona okungi, n'essanyu ery'Omwoyo Omutukuvu 
52_1_8_Kubanga gye muli ye yava eddoboozi ly'ekigambo kya Mukama waffe, si mu Makedoni ne mu Akaya yokka, naye mu buli kifo okukkiriza kwammwe eri Katonda kwabuna; bwe tutyo ae tutabaako kigambo kye twetaaga okwogera. 
52_1_9_Kubanga bo bokka babuulira ebyaffe okuyingira kwaffe gye muli bwe kwali; era ne bwe mwakyukira Katonda okuleka ebifaananyi, okuweerezanga Katonda omulamu ow'amazima, 
52_1_10_n'okulindiriranga Omwana we okuva mu ggulu, gwe yaiuukiza mu bafu, Yesu, atulokola mu busungu obugenda okujja. 
52_2_1_Kubanga mmwe mwekka, ab'oluganda, mumanyi ng'okuyingira kwaffe gye muli tekwali kwa bwereere: 
52_2_2_naye bwe twamala okubonaabona n'okugirirwa ekyejo mu Firipi, nga bwe mumanyi, ne tugumira mu Katonda waffe okubuulira gye muli enjiri ya Katonda mu kufuba okungi. 
52_2_3_Kubanga okubuulirira kwaffe si kwa bulimba, so si kwa bugwagwa, so si mu bukuusa: 
52_2_4_naye nga bwe twasaanyizibwa Katonda okuteresebwa enjiri, bwe twogera bwe tutyo, si ag'abaagala okusiimibwa abantu, wabula Katonda akema emitima gyaffe. 
52_2_5_Kubanga tetubeeranga na kigambo eky'okwegonza, nga bwe mumanyi, newakubadde n'ensonga ey'okukisa okwegomba, Katonda ye mujulirwa 
52_2_7_Naye twali bawombeefu mu mmwe, ng'omulezi bw'ajjanjaba abaana be ye: 
52_2_8_bwe tutyo bwe twabalumirwa omwoyo, ne tusiima okubagabira, si njiri ya Katonda yokka, era naye n'emyoyo gyaffe ffe, kubanga mwali baagalwa baffe nnyo. 
52_2_9_Kubanga mujjukira, ab'oluganda, okufuba kwaffe n'okutegana: bwe twakolanga emirimu emisana n'ekiro, obutazitoowereranga muntu yenna ku mmwe, ne tubabuuliranga enjiri ya Katonda. 
52_2_10_Mmwe bajulirwa era ne Katonda, bwe twabanga n'obutukuvu n'obutuukirivu awatali kunenyezebwa eri mmwe abakkiriza: 
52_2_11_nga bwe mumanyi ffe bwe twali eri buli muntu ku mmwe, nga kitaabwe bw'aba eri abaana be, nga tubabuulirira era nga tubagumya emyoyo era nga tutegeeza, 
52_2_12_mulyoke mutambulenga nga bwe kisaanira Katonda abayita okuyingira mu bwakabaka bwe ye n'ekitiibwa. 
52_2_13_Naffe kyetuva twebaza Katonda obutayosa, kubanga bwe mwaweebwa ffe ekigambo eky'okuwulirwa, kye kya Katonda, temwakitoola nga kigambo kya bantu, naye nga bwe kiri amazima, ekigambo kya Katonda, n'okukola ekikolera mu mmwe abakkiriza. 
52_2_14_Kubanga mmwe, ab'oluganda, mwagoberera ekkaaisa za Katonda eziri mu Buyudaaya mu Kristo Yesu: kubanga nammwe mwabonyaabonyezebwa bwe mutyo ab'eggwanga lyammwe mmwe, nga nabo bwe baabonyaabonyezebwa Abayudaaya; 
52_2_15_abatta Mukama waffe Yesu ne bannabbi, era abaatugoba, so tebasiimibwa Katonda, era balabe ba bantu bonna; 
52_2_16_nga batuziyiza okubuulira ab'amawanga balyoke balokoke; okutuukiriza ebibi byabwe ennaku zonaa: naye obusungu bubatuuseeko obumalira ddala. 
52_2_17_Naye ffe, ab'oluganda, bwe mwatwawukanako akaseera akatono, mu maaso si mu mutima, tweyongera nnyo okufuba okubalaba mu maaso gammwe n'okubalumirwa ennyo omwoyo: 
52_2_18_kubanga twayagala okujja gye muli, nze Pawulo omulundi ogw'olubereberye era n'ogw'okubiri; Setaani n'atuziyiza. 
52_2_19_Kubanga essuubi lyaffe ki oba ssanyu oba ngule ey'okwenyumiriza? Bwe mutaba mmwe, mu maaso ga Mukama waffe Yesu mu kujja kwe? 
52_2_20_Kubanga mmwe kitiibwa kyaffe n'essanyu. 
52_3_1_Kyetwava tusiima okulekebwa ennyuma fekka mu Asene, bwe tutaayinza kugumiikiriza nate 
52_3_4_Kubanga mazima, bwe twali gye muli, twababuulira olubereberye nga tugenda okubonaabona; era bwe kyali bwe kityo era nga bwe mumanyi. 
52_3_5_Nange kyennava ntuma, bwe ssaayinza kugumiikiriza nate, ndyoke mmanye okukkiriza kwammwe; oba nga mpozzi omukemi oyo yabakema okufuba kwaffe ne kubo okw'obwereere. 
52_3_6_Naye Timoseewo kaakano bwe yajja gye tuli ng'ava gye muli, n'atuleetera ebigambo ebirungi eby'okukkiriza n'okwagala kwammwe, era nga mutujjukira bulungi ennaku zonna, nga mutulumirwa okutulaba, era nga ffe bwe tubalumirwa mmwe 
52_3_8_kubanga kaakano tuli balamu, mmwe bwe muyimirira mu Mukama waffe. 
52_3_9_Kubanga kwebaza ki kwe tuyinza okusasula Katonda ku lwammwe, olw'essanyu lyonna lye tusanyuka ku lwammwe mu tnaaso ga Katonda waffe; 
52_3_10_emisana n'ekiro nga tusaba nnyo nnyini okulaba ku maaso gatnmwe, n'okutuukiriza ebitatuuka mu kukkiriza kwammwe? 
52_3_11_Naye Katonda yennyini era Kitaffe, ne Mukama waffe Yesu agolole ekkubo lyaffe okujja gye muli: 
52_3_12_nammwe Mukama waffe abongerengako abasukkirizenga okwagalananga mwekka na mwekka n'eri bonna, era nga naffe eri mmwe; 
52_3_13_alyoke anywezenga emitima gyammwe nga tegiriiko kunenyezebwa mu butukuvu, mu maaso ga Katonda waffe era Kitaffe, mu kujja kwa Mukama waffe Yesu wamu n'abatukuvu be bonna. 
52_4_1_Kale, ab'oluganda, ebisigaddeyo, tubeegayirira tubabuulirira mu Mukama waffe Yesu, nga bwe mwaweebwa ffe bwe kibagwanira okutambulanga n'okusiimibwanga Katonda, era nga bwe mutambula; okweyongerangako nate. 
52_4_2_Kubanga mumanyi ebiragiro bwe biri bye twabalagira ku bwa Mukama waffe Yesu. 
52_4_3_Kubanga ekyo Katonda ky'ayagala, okutukuzibwa kwammwe, okwewalanga obwenzi 
52_4_5_si mu mululu ogw'okwegomba, era ng'amawanga agatamanyi Katonda 
52_4_7_Kubanga Katonda teyatuyitira bugwagwa, wabula mu butukuvu. 
52_4_8_Kale agaana tagaana muntu, wabula Katonda, abawa Omwoyo gwe Omutukuvu. 
52_4_9_Naye okuwandiikirava ku by'okwagalanga ab'oluganda okwo temukwetaaga: kubanga mmwe mwekka mwayigirizibwa Katonda okwagalananga; 
52_4_10_kubanga n'okukola mukola bwe mutyo ab'oluganda bonna ab'omu Makedotu yonna. Naye tubabuulirira ab'oluganda, okweyongeranga okusukkirira; 
52_4_11_era mwegombe oknkkakkananga, n'okukolanga ebyammwe mmwe, n'okukolanga emirimu n'emikono gyammwe, nga bwe twabalagira; 
52_4_12_mulyoke mutambulirenga mu mpisa ennungi eri ab'ebweru, nga temuliiko kye mwetaaga. 
52_4_13_Naye tetwagala mmwe . obutategeera, ab'oluganda, eby'abo abeebaka; mulemenga okunakuwala, era ng'abalala abatalina ssuubi. 
52_4_14_Kubanga bwe tukkiriza nga Yesu yafa n'azuukira, era Katonda alireeta bw'atyo abeebaka ku bwa Yesu wamu naye. 
52_4_15_Kubanga ekyo kye tubabuulisa mu kigambo hya Mukama waffe, nga ffe abalamu abaasigalawo okutuusa okujja kwa Mukama waffe tetulisooka abeebaka. 
52_4_16_Kubanga Mukama waffe yennyini alikka okuva mu ggulu n'okwogerera waggulu n'eddoboozi lya malayika omukulu n'ekkondeere lya Katoada: n'abo abaafiira mu Kristo be balisooka okuzuukira: 
52_4_17_naffe abalamu abaasigalawo ne tulyoka tutwalibwa wamu nabo mu bire okusisinkana Mukama waffe mu bbanga: kale bwe tutyo tunaabeeranga ne Mukama waffe ennaku zonna. 
52_4_18_Kale musanyusagaaenga mwekka na mwekka n'ebigambo bino. 
52_5_1_Naye eby'entuuko n'ebiro, ab'oluganda, temwetaaga kubiwandiikitwa. 
52_5_2_Kubanga mwekka mutnanyidde ddala ng'olunaku lwa Mukama waffe lujja ng'omubbi ekiro, bwe lutyo. 
52_5_3_Bwe baliba nga boogera nti Mirembe, siwali kabi, okuzikiriza okw'amangu ne kulyoka kubajjira, ng'okulumwa bwe kujjira omukazi ali olubuto; so tebaliwona n'akatono. 
52_5_4_Naye mmwe, ab'oluganda, temuli mu kizikiza, olunaku luli okubasisinkaniriza ng'omubbi: 
52_5_5_kubanga mmwe mwenna muli baana ba kutangaala, era muli baana ba musana: tetuli ba ldro newakubadde ab'ekizikiza 
52_5_7_Kubanga abeebaka beebaka kiro; n'abatamiira batamiira kiro. 
52_5_8_Naye ffe, kubanga tuli ba musana, tulemenga okutamiira, nga twambadde eky'omu kifuba eky'okukkiriza n'okwagala, n'enkuufiira, essuubi ly'obulokozi. 
52_5_9_Kubanga ffe Katonda teyatuteekerawo busungu, wabula okuweebwa obulokozi ku bwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, 
52_5_10_eyatufiirira ffe, bwe tutunula oba bwe twebaka tulyoke tubeere abalamu wamu naye. 
52_5_11_Kale musanyusaganenga, era muzimbaganenga buli muntu munne, era nga bwe mukola. 
52_5_12_Naye tubeegayirira, ab'oluganda, okumanyanga abafuba okukola emirimu mu mmwe, ababafuga mu Mukama waffe, abababuulirira; 
52_5_13_n'okubassaagamu ekitiibwa ennyo nnyini mu kwagala olw'omulimu gwabwe. Mubeerenga n'emirembe mu mmwe. 
52_5_14_Era tubabuulirira, ab'oluganda, munenyenga abatatambula bulungi, mugumyeaga abalina omwoyo omunafu, muyambenga abatalina maanyi, mu gumiikirizenga eri bonna. 
52_5_15_Mulabe omuntu yenna alemenga okuwalana ekibi olw'ekibi; naye ennaku zonna mugobererenga ekirungi mwekka na mwekka n'eri bonna. 
52_5_16_Musanyukenga ennaku zonna; 
52_5_17_musabenga obutayosa; 
52_5_18_mwebazenga mu kigambo kyonna kyonna: kubanga ekyo Katonda ky'abaagaliza mu Kristo Yesu gye muli. 
52_5_19_Temuzikizanga Mwoyo; 
52_5_20_temunyoomanga bunnabbi; 
52_5_21_mugezengako ku bigambo byonna; munywerezenga ddala ekirungi; 
52_5_22_mwewalenga buli ngeri ya bubi. 
52_5_23_Era Katonda ow'emirembe yennyini abatukulize ddala; era omwoyo gwammwe n'obulamu n'omubiri byonna awamu bikuumibwenga awatali kunenyezebwa mu kujja kwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
52_5_24_Abayita mwesigwa, n'okukola ye alikola. 
52_5_25_Ab'oluganda, mutusabirenga. 
52_5_26_Mulamuse ab'oluganda bonna n'okunywegera okutukuvu. 
52_5_27_Mbalayiza Mukama waffe okusomera ebbaluwa eno ab'oluganda bonna. 
52_5_28_Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo kibeerenga wamu nammwe. 
53_1_1_Pawulo ne Sirwano ne Timoseewo eri ekkanisa ey'Abasessaloniika mu Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo 
53_1_3_Kitugwanidde okwebazanga Katonda ennaku zonna ku lwamrnwe, ab'oluganda, nga bwe kisaana, kubanga okukkiriza kwammwe kukula nnyo, n'okwagalana kwa buli muntu ku mmwe mwenna mwekka na mwekka kweyongera 
53_1_6_oba nga kya nsonga eri Katonda okubasasula okubonaabona abababonyaabonya, 
53_1_7_era nammwe ababonyaabonyezebwa okubasasula okwesiima awamu naffe, mu kubikkulibwa kwa Mukama waffe Yesu okuva mu ggulu awamu ne bamalayika ab'obuyinza bwe, 
53_1_8_mu muliro ogwaka, ng'awalana eggwanga abatamanyi Katonda, n'abo abatagondera njiri ya Mukama waffe Yesu: 
53_1_9_abalibonerezebwa, kwe kuzikirira emirembe n'emirembe okuva mu maaso ga Mukama waffe ne mu kitiibwa ky'amaanyi ge, 
53_1_10_bw'alijja okuweebwa ekitiibwa mu batukuvu be, n'okwewuunyizibwa mu bonna abakkiriza (kubanga okutegeeza kwaffe gye muli kwakkirizibwa) ku lunaku luli. 
53_1_11_Kyetuva tubasabira ennaku zonna, Katonda waffe abasaanyize okuyitibwa kwammwe, era atuukirize n'amaanyi buli kye mwagala eky'obulungi na buli mulimu ogw'okukkiriza; 
53_1_12_erinnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu liryoke liweebwe ekitubwa mu mmwe, era nammwe mu ye, ng'ekisa kya Katonda waffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo bwe kiri. 
53_2_1_Naye tubeegayirira, ab'oluganda, olw'okujja kwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo n'olw'okuku#331;ŋaana kwaffe gy'ali 
53_2_4_aziyiza era eyeegulumiza okusinga buli kintu ekiyitibwa Katonda oba ekisinzibwa, n'okutuula n'atuula mu yeekaalu ya Katonda, nga yeeraga yekka nti ye Katonda. 
53_2_5_Temujjukira, nga bwe nnali nga nkyali gye muli, nababuulira ebyo? 
53_2_6_Era ne kaakano ekirobera mukimanyi, alyoke abikkuke mu ntuuko ze. 
53_2_7_Kubanga ne kaakano ekyama eky'obujeemu weekiri kikola: wabula kyokka aziyiza kaakano okutuusa lw'aliggibwawo. 
53_2_8_Awo omujeemi oli n'alyoka abikkuka, Mukama waffe Yesu gw'alitta n'omukka ogw'omu kamwa ke, era gw'alizikiriza n'okulabisibwa kw'okujja kwe 
53_2_10_n'okukyamya kwonna okutali kwa buruukirivu eri abo ababula; kubanga tebakkiriza kwagala mazima, balyoke balokoke. 
53_2_11_Katonda kyava abasindikira okukyamya okukola, bakkirize eby'obulimba: 
53_2_12_bonna balyoke basalirwe omusango abatakkiriza mazima naye abasanyukira obutali butuukirivu. 
53_2_13_Naye kitugwanidde ffe okwebazanga Katonda ennaku zonna ku lwammwe, ab'oluganda abaagalwa Mukama waffe, kubanga Katonda yabalondera obulokozi okuva ku lubereberye mu kutukuzibwa Omwoyo n'okukkiriza amazima 
53_2_14_bye yabayitira n'enjiri yaffe olw'okufuna ekitiibwa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo. 
53_2_15_Kale nno ab'oluganda, muyimirirenga, era munywezenga bye mwaweebwa ne muyigirizibwa, oba mu kigambo obi mu bbaluwa yaffe. 
53_2_16_Naye Mukama waffe Yesi Kristo yennyini, ne Katonda Kitaffe, eyatwagala n'atuwa okusanyusa okutaggwaawo n'essuubi eddungu mu kisa, 
53_2_17_abasanyuse emitima gyammwe aginywezenga mu buli kikolwa n'ekigambo ekirungi. 
53_3_1_Ebisigaddeyo, ab'oluganda, mu tusabirenga ekigambo kya Mukama waffe, kiwulukuke, kiweebwenga ekitiibwa, era nga mu mmwe 
53_3_3_Naye Mukama waffe mwesigwa, alibanyweza, anaabakuumanga eri omubi. 
53_3_4_Era twesiga Mukama waffe mu bigambo byammwe, nga mukola bye tulagir; era munaabikolanga. 
53_3_5_Era Mukama waffe aluŋŋamyenga emitima gyammwe okutuuka mu kwagal; kwa Katonda ne mu kugumiikiriza kwa Kristo. 
53_3_6_Era tubalagira, ab'oluganda mu linnya lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, mweyawulenga eri buli ow'oluganda atatambula bulungi newakubadde mu mpisa ze baaweebwa ffe. 
53_3_7_Kubanga mmwe mwe nnyini mumanyi bwe kibagwanira okutugobereranga: kubanga tetwalemwa kutambula bulungi mu mmwe 
53_3_9_si kubanga etulina buyinza, naye tweweeyo gye muli ng'ekyokulabirako mulyoke mutugobererenga. 
53_3_10_Kubanga era bwe twali gye muli, twabalagira bwe tutyo nti Omuntu yenna Wagaananga okukola emirimu, n'okulya talyanga. 
53_3_11_Kubanga tuwulira nti eriyo abamu abatatambula bulungi mu mmwe nga tebakola mirimu gyabwe n'akatono, wabula egy'abalala. 
53_3_12_Abali bwe batyo tubalagira era tubabuulirira mu Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, okuzolanga emirimu n'obuteefu balyote balyenga emmere yaabwe bo. 
53_3_13_Naye mmwe, ab'oluganda, ternukoowanga mu kukola obulungi. 
53_3_14_Era omuntu yenna bw'atagonderanga kigambo kyaffe mu bbaluwa eno, oyo mumwetegerezanga, so temwegattanga naye, ensonyi ziryoke zimukwate. 
53_3_15_So temutulowoozanga nga mulabe, naye mumubuuliriranga ng'ow'oluganda. 
53_3_16_Era Mukama waffe ow'emirembe yennyini abawenga emirembe ennaku zonna mu bigambo byonna. Mukama waffe abeerenga nammwe mwenna. 
53_3_17_Kuno kwe kulamusa kwange Pawulo n'omukono gwange, ke kabonero mu bbaluwa yonna: bwe ntyo bwe mpandiika. 
53_3_18_Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo kibeerenga nammwe mwenna. 
54_1_1_Pawulo, omutume wa Kristo Yesu ng'okulagira kwa Katonda Omulokozi waffe bwe kuli n'okwa Kristo Yesu essuubi lyaffe 
54_1_3_Nga bwe nnakubuulirira okubeera mu Efeso, bwe nnali nga ŋŋenda e Makedoni, olagirenga abamu obutayigirizanga bulala, 
54_1_4_newakubadde okulowoozanga enfumo n'ebigambo by'obuzaale ebitakoma, ebireeta empaka okusinga obuwanika bwa Katonda obuli mu kukkiriza; bwe nkola bwe ntyo ne kaakano: 
54_1_5_Naye enkomerero y'ekiragiro kwe kwagala okuva mu mutima omulongoofu n'omwoyo omulungi n'okukkiriza okutalina bukuusa: 
54_1_6_ebyo abamu babiwunjukamu ne bakyamira mu bigambo ebitaliimu 
54_1_8_Naye tumanyi ng'amateeka malungi, omuntu bw'agasoma ng'amateeka bwe gali, 
54_1_9_ng'amanyi ekyo nti amateeka tegateekerwawo muntu mutuukirivu, wabula abatali batuukirivu n'abajeemu, abatatya Katonda n'abalina ebibi, abatali batukuvu n'abavvoola Katonda, abatta bakitaabwe ne bannyaabwe, abassi b'abantu, 
54_1_10_abenzi, abalya ebisiyaga, abanyazi b'abantu, abalimba, abalayirira obwereere, n'ebirala byonna ebiwakana n'okuyigiriza okw'obulamu; 
54_1_11_ng'enjiri bw'eri ey'ekitiibwa kya Katonda eyeebazibwa gye nnateresebwa nze. 
54_1_12_Mmwebaza oyo eyampa amaanyi, ye Kristo Yesu Mukama waffe, kubanga yandowooza nga ndi mwesigwa, bwe yanteeka mu buweereza, 
54_1_13_olubereberye bwe nnali omuvumi era omuyigganya era ow'ekyejo: naye nnasaasirwa kubanga nnakolanga nga ssimanyi mu butakkiriza; 
54_1_14_ekisa kya Mukama waffe ne kyeyongera nnyo wamu n'okukkiriza n'okwagala okuli mu Kristo Yesu. 
54_1_15_Ekigambo kyesigwa, era ekisaanira okukkirizibwa kwonna nti Kristo Yesu yajja mu nsi okulokola abalina ebibi; mu bo nze w'olubereberye; 
54_1_16_naye kyennava nsaasirwa Yesu Kristo alyoke alabisize mu nze ow'olubereberye okugumiikiriza kwe kwonna, okubeeranga ekyokulabirako eri abo abagenda okumukkiriza olw'obulamu obutaggwaawo. 
54_1_17_Era Kabaka ow'emirembe n'emirembe, ataggwaawo, atalabika, Katonda amu, aweebwenga ettendo n'ekitiibwa emirembe n'emirembe. Amiina. 
54_1_18_Ekiragiro kino nkuteresa, mwana wange Timoseewo, ng'ebigambo bya bannabbi bwe byali bye baakwogerako edda, olyoke olwanirenga mu byo olutalo olulungi, 
54_1_19_ng'onyweza okukkiriza n'omwoyo omulungi, abalala gwe basindika eri ne bamenyekerwa okukkiriza kwabwe: 
54_1_20_mu abo ye Kumenayo ne Alegezanda: be nnawa eri Setaani, balyoke bayigirizibwe obutavumanga. 
54_2_1_Kale okusooka byonna mbabuulirira okwegayiriranga n'okusabanga n'okutakabananga n'okwebazanga bikolebwenga ku lw'abantu bonna 
54_2_3_Ekyo kye kirungi, ekikkirizibwa mu maaso g'Omulokozi waffe Katonda, 
54_2_4_ayagala abantu bonna okulokoka, era okutuuka mu kutegeerera ddala amazima. 
54_2_5_Kubanga waliwo Katonda omu, era omutabaganya wa Katonda n'abantu omu, omuntu Kristo Yesu, 
54_2_6_eyeewaayo abe omutango olwa bonna; okutegeeza kulibaawo mu nruuko zaakwo: 
54_2_7_nze kwe nnateekerwa omubuulizi era omutume (njogera mazima, ssirimba), omuyigiriza w'amawanga olw'okukkiriza n'amazima. 
54_2_8_Kyenva njagala abasajja basabenga mu buli kifo, aga bayimusa emikono emitukuvu, awatali busungu na mpaka. 
54_2_9_Bwe batyo n'abakazi beeyonjenga mu byambalo ebisaana, n'okukwatibwa ensonyi n'okwegendereza; si mu kulanganga enviiri, ne zaabu oba luulu oba engoye ez'omuwendo omungi; 
54_2_10_naye (nga bwe kisaanira abakazi abeeyita abatya Katonda) n'ebikolwa ebirungi. 
54_2_11_Omukazi ayigenga mu bukkakkamu mu kugonda kwonna. 
54_2_12_Naye omukazi mmugaanyi okuyigirizanga, newakubadde okufuganga omusajja, naye okubeeranga mu bukkakkamu. 
54_2_13_Kubanga Adamu ye yasooka okutondebwa, oluvannyuma Kaawa; 
54_2_14_era Adamu si ye yalimbibwa, naye omukazi oli ye yalimbibwa n'aba mu kwonoona: 
54_2_15_naye anaalokokanga mu kuzaala, bwe banaanyiikiranga mu kukkiriza n'okwagala n'obutukuvu awamu n'okwegendereza. 
54_3_1_Kyesigwa ekigambo ekyo nti Omuntu bw'ayagalaaga obulabirizi, yeegomba mulimu mulungi. 
54_3_2_Kale omulabirizi kimugwanira obutabangako kya kunenyezebwa, abeerenga musajja wa mukazi omu, atatamiira, mwegendereza, mukwata mpola, ayaniriza abagenyi, 
54_3_3_atayombera ku mwenge, atakuba; naye omuwombeefu, atalwana, ateegomba bintu 
54_3_6_si oyo eyaakakyuka, alemenga okwekulumbaza n'amala agwa mu musango gwa Setaani. 
54_3_7_Era nate kimugwanira okubeeranga n'okutegeezebwa okulungi eri abo ab'ebweru, alemenga okugwa mu kuvumibwa ne mu kyambika kya Setaani. 
54_3_8_Bwe batyo n'abaweereza kibagwanira okubeeranga abalimu ekitiibwa, si bannimibbirye, abatanywanga mwenge mungi, si beegombi ba bintu 
54_3_10_Era nate abo basookenga okukeuiebwa, balyoke baweereze, nga tebaliiko kya kunenyezebwa. 
54_3_11_Bwe batyo n'abakazi kibagwanira okubeeranga abalimu ekitiibwa, abatawaayiriza, abatatamiira, abeesigwa mu byonna. 
54_3_12_Abaweereza babeereaga basajja ba mukazi omu, nga bafuga abaana baabwe obulungi n'ennyumba zaabwe bo. 
54_3_13_Kubanga abamala okuweereza obulungi beefunira obukulu obulungi n'obugumu bungi mu kukkiriza okuli mu Kristo Yesu. 
54_3_14_Nkuwandiikidde ebyo nga nsuubira okujja gy'oli mangu; 
54_3_15_naye bwe ndwanga olyoke obe ag'omanyi bwe kigwana okukolanga mu nnyumba ya Katonda, ye kkanisa ya Katonda omulamu, empagi n'omusingi eby'amazima. 
54_3_16_Era awatali kubuusabuusa ekyama eky'okutya Katonda kye kikulu; oyo eyalabisibwa mu mubiri, n'aweebwa obutuukirivu mu mwoyo, n'alabibwa bamalayika, n'abuulirwa mu mawanga, n'akkirizibwa mu nsi, n'atwalibwa mu kitiibwa. 
54_4_1_Naye Omwoyo ayogera lwatu nti mu nnaku ez'oluvannyuma walibaawo abaliva mu kukkiriza, nga bawulira emyoyo egikyamya n'okuyigiriza kwa basetaani, 
54_4_2_olw'obunnanfuusi bw'abalimba, nga bookebwa emyoyo gyabwe nga n'ekyutna ekyokya, 
54_4_3_nga bawera okufumbiriganwanga era nga balagira okulekanga ebiriibwa, Katonda bye yatonda biriirwenga mu kwebaza abakkiriza ne bategeerera ddala amazima. 
54_4_4_Kubanga buli kitonde kya Katonda kirungi, so siwali kya kusuula bwe kitoolebwa n'okwebaza: 
54_4_5_kubanga kitukuzibwa na kigambo kya Katonda n'okusaba. 
54_4_6_Bw'onojjukizanga ab'oluganda ebyo, oaoobaaga muweereza mulungi owa Kristo Yesu, ng'okulira mu bigambo eby'okukkiriza n'eby'okuyigiriza okulungi kwe wagoberera: 
54_4_7_naye enfumo ezitali za ddiini ez'obusirusiru z'oba olekanga. Weemanyiizenga okutya Katonda: 
54_4_8_kubanga okwemanyiiza kw'omubiri kugasa akaseera katono; naye okutya Katonda kugasa mu byonna, kubanga kulina okusuubiza kw'obulamu obwa kaakano n'obw'obugenda okujja. 
54_4_9_Ekigambo ekyo kyesigwa era ekisaanira okukkirizibwa kwonna. 
54_4_10_Kubanga kyetuva tutegana ne tufuba, kubanga twasuubira Katonda omulamu, Omulokozi w'abantu bonna, okusinga w'abakkiriza, 
54_4_11_Lagiranga ebyo obiyigirizenga, 
54_4_12_Omuntu yenna takunyoomanga lwa buvubuka bwo; naye beeranga kyakulabirako eri abo abakkiriza mu kwogeranga, mu kutambulanga: mu kwagalanga, mu kukkirizanga, mu kubanga omulongoofu 
54_4_13_Okutuusa lwe ndijja, nyiikiranga mu kusoma, n'okubuuliriranga, n'okuyigirizanga. 
54_4_14_Tolekanga kirabo ekiri mu ggwe, kye waweebwa olw'obunnabbi awamu n'okuteekebwako emikono gy'abakadde 
54_4_15_Ebyo obiroweozenga, obeerenga mu ebyo; okuyitirira kwo kulabikenga eri bonna. 
54_4_16_Weekuumenga wekka n'okuyigiriza kwo. Nyiikiriranga mu ebyo; kubanga bw'okola bw'otyo, olyerokola wekka en n'abo abakuwulira. 
54_5_1_Tonenyanga mukadde, naye omubuuliriranga nga kitaawo abavubuka ng'ab'oluganda: 
54_5_2_abakazi abakadde nga nnyoko; abato nga bannyoko mu bulongoofu bwonna. 
54_5_3_Obawenga ekioibwa bannamwandu ababa bannamwandu ddala. 
54_5_4_Naye nnamwandu yenna bw'aba n'abaana oba bazzukulu basookenga okuyiga okwegendereza eri ab'omu nnyumba zaabwe, n'okusasula bakadde baabwe: kubange ekyo kye kikkirizibwa mu maaso ga Katonda. 
54_5_5_Naye abeera nnamwandu ddala n'alekebwa yekka, asuubira Katonda, n'anyiikiranga okusaba n'okwegayiriranga emisana n'ekiro. 
54_5_6_Naye oyo awoomerwa ebinyumu ng'afudde newakubaddi ng'akyali mulamu. 
54_5_7_Era n'ebyo obalagire, balemenga okubaaki eky'okunenyezebwa. 
54_5_8_Naye omuntu yenna bw'atajjanjaba babe n'okusinga ab'omu nnyumba ye nga yeegaanyi okukkiriza, era nga ye mubi okusinga atakkiriza 
54_5_9_Nnamwandu yenna tawandiikibwanga nga tannatuusa myaka nkaaga, eyafumbirwa omusajja omu 
54_5_10_asiimibwa mu bikolwa ebirungi oba nga yaleranga abaana, oba nga yayanirizanga abagenyi, oba nga yanaazanga abatukuvu ebigere, oba nga yabeeranga ababonaabona, oba nga yagobezeranga nnyo buli ki lwa ekirungi. 
54_5_11_Naye bannamwandu abakyali abato obagaanenga: kubanga bwe balikabawala ezi Kristo, nga baagala okufumbiri 
54_5_12_nga bazza omusango kuba basuula okukkiriza kwabwe okw’olubereberye. 
54_5_13_Era ate bayiga okubeeranga abagayaavu, nga ba mbulatambula okubuna amayumba naye tebagayaala bugayaazi, naye balina olugambo n'akajanja nga boogera ebitasaana. 
54_5_14_Kyenva njagala abakyali abato bafumbirwenga, bazaalenga abaana, ba: genga ennyumba, balemenga oku omulabe ebbanga w'ayima okuma: 
54_5_15_kubanga waliwo kaakano abaakyuka okugoberera Seta: 
54_5_16_Omukazi yenna akkiriza bw’banga ne bannamwandu, abo mbenga, era ekkanisa eremenga okuzitoowererwa, eryoke eyambenga bannamwandu ddala ddala. 
54_5_17_Abakadde abafuga obulungi basaanyizibwe okuweebwanga ekitiibwa emirundi ebiri, okusinga abafuba mu kigambo n'okuyigiri: 
54_5_18_Kubanga ekyawandiikibwa kyogera nti Tosibanga mumwa gn nte ewuula eŋŋaano. Era nti Akola emirimu asaanira empeera ye. 
54_5_19_Tokkirizanga kiroope ku mukadde awatali bajulirwa babiri oba basatu. 
54_5_20_Aboonoona obanenyezanga mu maaso g'abantu bonna, era n'abalala balyoke batyenga. 
54_5_21_Nkukuutirira mu maa; ga Katonda, ne Kristo Yesu, ne bamalayika abalonde, weekuumenga ebyo awatali kusaliriza, nga tokola kigambo olw'obuganzi. 
54_5_22_Toyanguyirizanga kussaako mikono ku muntu yenna, so tossanga kimu na bibi by'abantu abalala: weekuume obeerenga mulongoofu. 
54_5_23_Tonywanga mazzi gokka, naye onywa nga ne ku mwenge katono olw'olu buto lwo n'olw'okulwalalwala. 
54_5_24_Waliwo abantu ebibi byabwe biba mu lwatu; nga bibakulembera okugenda mu musango; era n'abalala bibavaako nnyuma. 
54_5_25_Era bwe zityo n'ebikolwa ebirungi biba mu lwatu; ne bwe kitaba bwe kityo tebirirema kwolesebwa. 
54_6_1_Abali mu bufuge abaddu balowoozenga bakama baabwe bennyini nga basaanidde ekitiibwa kyonna, erinnya lya Katonda n'okuyigiriza kwaffe biremenga okuvumibwa. 
54_6_2_Era abalina bakama baabwe abakkiriza tebabanyoomanga, kubanga ba luganda; naye beeyongere okubaweerezanga, kubanga abassa ekimu mu kukolwa obulungi bakkiriza era baagalwa. Yigirizanga ebyo obibuulirirenga. 
54_6_3_Omuntu yenna bw'ayigirizanga obulala, so nga takkiriza bigambo bya bulamu, bye bya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, n'okuyigiriza okugobereranga okutya Katonda 
54_6_5_okukaayana kw'abantu abayonooneka amagezi, abaggibwako amazima, nga balowooza ng'okutya Katonda kwe kufuna amagoba. 
54_6_6_Nave okutya Katonda wamu n'obutayaayaananga ge magoba amangi: 
54_6_7_kubanga tetwaleeta kintu mu nsi, kubanga era tetuyinza kuggya mu kintu 
54_6_9_Naye abaagala okugaggawala bagwa mu kukemebwa ne mu mutego n'okwegomba okungi okw'obusirusiru okwonoona, okunnyika abantu mu kubula n'okuzikirira. 
54_6_10_Kubanga okwagala ebintu kye kikolo ky'ebibi byonna: waliwo abantu abayaayaanira ebyo, ne bakyamizibwa okuva mu kukkiriza, ne beefumitira ddala n'ennaku ennyingi. 
54_6_11_Naye ggwe, omuntu wa Katonda, ddukanga ebyo,ogobererenga obutuukirivu, okutya Katonda, okukkiriza, okwagala, okugumiikiriza, obuwombeefu. 
54_6_12_Lwananga okulwana okulungi okw'okukkiriza, nywezanga obulamu obutaggwaawo, bwe wayitirwa, n'oyatula okwatula okulungi mu maaso g'abajulirwa abangi. 
54_6_13_Nkukuutirira mu maaso ga Katonda, awa byonna obulamu, ne Kristo Yesu eyategeeza okwatula okulungi eri Pontio Piraato; 
54_6_14_weekuumenga ekiragiro awatali bbala, awatali kya kunenyezebwa, okutuusa ku kulabika kwa Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo: 
54_6_15_kw'aliraga mu ntuuko zaakwo Nannyini buyinza yekka atenderezebwa, Kabaka wa bakabaka, era Mukama w'abaami; 
54_6_16_alina obutafa yekka, atuula mu kutangaala okutasemberekeka; omuntu yenna gw'atalabangako, so siwali ayinza okttmulaba: aweebwenga ekitiibwa n'obuyinza obutaggwaawo. Amiina. 
54_6_17_Okuutirenga abagagga ab'omu mirembe gya kaakano obuteegulumizanga, newakubadde okwesiga obugagga obutali bwa lubeerera, wabula Katonda, atuwa byonna olw'obugagga tulyoke twesanyusenga n'ebyo; 
54_6_18_bakolenga obulungi, babeerenga abagagga mu bikolwa ebirungi, babeerenga bagabi, bassenga kimu; 
54_6_19_nga beeterekera eky'okuyimako ekirungi olw'ebiro ebigenda okujja, balyoke banywezenga obulamu ddala ddala. 
54_6_20_Ai Timoseewo, kuumanga kye wateresebwa, nga weewala ebigambo ebitaliimu ebitali bya Katonda n'okulwana kw'ebigambo eby'okutegeera, okuyitibwa bwe kutyo mu bulimba; 
54_6_21_waliwo abantu abeegamba okuba nakwo, ne bakyama mu kukkiriza. Ekisa kibeerenga nammwe. 
55_1_1_Pawulo, omutume wa Kristo Yesu olw'okwagala kwa Katonda, ng'okusuubiza bwe kuli okw'obulamu obuli mu Kristo Yesu, 
55_1_2_eri Timoseewo, omwana wange omwagalwa: ekisa, okusaasira, emirembe ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Kristo Yesu Mukama waffe bituuke gy'oli. 
55_1_3_Nneebaza Katonda gwe mpeereza okuva ku bajjajjange mu mwoyo omulungi, bwe nkujjukira obutayosa mu kusaba kwange emisana n'ekiro 
55_1_4_nga nkulumirwa okukulaba, bwe njijukira amaziga go, ndyoke njijule essanyu 
55_1_6_Kyenva nkujjukiza okuseesanga ekirabo kya Katonda ekiri mu ggwe olw'okuteekebwako emikono gyange. 
55_1_7_Kubanga Katonda teyatuwa ffe omwoyo ogw'okutya, wabula ogw'amaanyi era ogw'okwagala era ogw'okwegenderezanga. 
55_1_8_Kale, tokwatirwanga nsonyi kutegeeza kwa Mukama waffe, newakubadde nze omusibe we: naye obonyaabonyezebwanga wamu n'enjiri ng'amaanyi ga Katonda bwe gali 
55_1_10_naye kirabisibwa kaakano olw'okwolesebwa kw'Omulokozi waffe Kristo Yesu, eyaggyawo okufa n'amulisa obulamu n'obutazikirira olw'enjiri, 
55_1_11_gye nnateekerwawo omubuulizi era omutume era omuyigiriza. 
55_1_12_Era kyenva mbonaabona bwe ntyo: naye sikwatibwa nsonyi; kubanga mmanyi gwe nnakkiriza, ne ntegeerera ddala ng'ayinza okukuumanga kye nnamuteresa okutuusa ku lunaku luli. 
55_1_13_Nywezanga ekyokulabirako eky'ebigambo eby'obulamu bye wawuliranga gye ndi, mu kukkiriza ne mu kwagala okuli mu Kristo Yesu. 
55_1_14_Ekintu ekirungi kye wateresebwa okikuumenga n'Omwoyo Omutukuvu, abeera muffe. 
55_1_15_Kino okimanyi nga bonna abali mu Asiya bankuba amabega; ku abo ye Fugero ne Kerumogene. 
55_1_16_Mukama waffe asaasire ennyumba ya Onesifolo: kubanga yampummuzanga emirundi mingi, so teyakwatirwa nsonyi lujegere lwange, 
55_1_17_naye bwe yali mu Ruumi n'anyiikira okunnoonya n'okulaba n'andaba 
55_1_18_(Mukama waffe amuwe okulaba okusaasirwa eri Mukama waffe ku lunaku luli); era n'okuweereza kwonna kwe yaweerezanga mu Efeso, ggwe okutegeera bulungi nnyo. 
55_2_1_Kale ggwe, mwana wange, beeranga wa maanyi mu kisa ekiri mu Kristo Yesu. 
55_2_2_Era bye wawuliranga gye ndi mu bajulirwa abangi, ebyo biteresenga abantu abeesigwa, era abalisaanira okuyigiriza n'abalala. 
55_2_3_Bonaboneranga wamu nange ng'omulwanyi omulungi owa Kristo Yesu. 
55_2_4_Siwali mulwanyi bw'atabaala eyeeyingiza mu mitawaana egy'obulamu buno, alyoke asiimibwe eyamuwandiika okuba omulwanyi. 
55_2_5_Naye era omuntu bw'awakana, taweebwa ngule bw'atawakana nga bwe kiragirwa. 
55_2_6_Omulimi akola emirimu kimugwanira okusooka okutwala ku bibala. 
55_2_7_Lowooza kye njogedde; kubanga Mukama waffe anaakuwanga okutegeera mu bigambo byonna. 
55_2_8_Jjukira Yesu Kristo, nga yazuukira mu bafu, ow'omu zzadde lya Dawudi, ng'enjiri yange bw'eyogera: 
55_2_9_gye mbonaboneramu okutuusa ku kusibibwa, ng'akola obubi; naye ekigambo kya Katonda tekisibibwa. 
55_2_10_Kyenva ngumiikiriza byonna olw'abalonde, era nabo balyoke bafune obulokovu obuli mu Kristo Yesu, wamu n'ekitiibwa ekitaggwaawo. 
55_2_11_Ekigambo kino kyesigwa nti Kuba oba nga twafa naye, era tulibeera balamu naye 
55_2_12_oba nga tugumiikiriza, era tulifuga naye: oba nga tulimwegaana era naye alitwegaana ffe: 
55_2_13_oba nga tetukkiriza, ye abeera mwesigwa kubanga tayinza kwerimba. 
55_2_14_Ebyo obibajjukizanga, ng'obakuutirira mu maaso ga Mukama waffe, obutalwananga na bigambo ebitagasa, ebikyamya abawulira 
55_2_15_Fubanga okweraga ng'osiimibwa Katonda, omukozi atakwatibwa nsonyi, ayisa wakati ekigambo eky'amazima. 
55_2_16_Naye ebigambo ebitaliimu ebitali bya ddiini obye walanga: kubanga baliyitirira mi butatya Katonda, 
55_2_17_n'ekigambo kyabwe kirirya nga kookolo: ku abo ye Kumenayo ne Fireeto; 
55_2_18_kubanga baakyama mu mazima, nga boogera ng'okuzuukira kwamala okubeerawo, era waliwo abantu be baavuunikirira okukkiriza kwabwe 
55_2_19_Naye omusingi gwa Katonda omugumu gubeerawo, nga gulina akabonero kano nti Mukama waffe amanyi ababe: era nti Yeewalenga obutali butuukirivu buli ayatula erinnya lya Mukama waffe 
55_2_20_Naye mu nnyumba ennene temubaamu bintu bya zaabu na bya ffeeza byokka, naye era n'eby'emiti n'eby'ebbumba; n'ebirala eby'ekitiibwa, n'ebirala ebitali bya kitiibwa 
55_2_21_Kale omuntu bwe yeerongoosaako ebyo, anaabeeranga ekintu eky'ekitiibwa, ekyatukuzibwa, ekisaanira omwami okuweerezanga ekyalongooserezebwa buli mulimi omulungi. 
55_2_22_Naye okwegomba okw'omu buvubuka okwewalanga naye ogobereranga obutuukirivu okukkiriza, okwagala, emirembe awamu n'abo abamusaba Mukama waffe mu mwoyo omulongoofi: 
55_2_23_Naye omuddu wa Mukama waffe tekimugwanira kulwananga, wabula okubeeranga omukkakkamu eri bonna, omuyigiriza, omugumiikiriza, 
55_2_24_abuulirira n'obuwombeefu abawakanyi, mpozzi oba nga Ka tonda alibawa okwenenya olw'okutegeerera ddala amazima, 
55_2_25_era balitamiirukuka okuva mu mutego wa Setaani, oyo ng'amaze okuakwasa okukolanga okwagala kw'oli. 
55_3_1_Naye tegeera kino nga mu nnaku ez'oluvannyuma ebiro eby'okusba ennaku birijja. 
55_3_2_Kubanga bantu baliba nga beeyagala bokka, baagala ebintu, abeenyumiriza, b'amalala, abavumi, abatagondera bazadde baabwe, abateebaza, abatali batukuvu, 
55_3_3_abatayagala ba luganda, abatatabagana, abawaayiriza, bateegendereza, abakambwe, abaayagala bulungi, 
55_3_4_ab'enkwe, abaakanyavu, abeegulumiza, abaagala ssanyu okusinga Katonda 
55_3_6_Kubanga ku abo be bantu basensera mu nnyumba ne banyaga bakazi abasirusiru abazitoowererwa bibi ebingi, abafugibwa okwegomba okutali kumu, 
55_3_7_abayiga bulijjo, ne batayinza ennaku zonna kutuuka ku kutegeerera ddala mazima. 
55_3_8_Era nga Yane ne Yambere bwe baaziyiza Musa, ne bano bwe batyo baziyiza amazima; bayonooneka amagezi gaabwe, abatasiimibwa mu kukkiriza. 
55_3_9_Naye tebalyeyongerako kuyitirira: kubanga obusirusiru bwabwe bulitegeeerwa ddala abantu bonna, era ng'owa bali bwe bwali. 
55_3_10_Naye gwe wagoberera nnyo okuyigiriza wange, empisa zange, okuteesa wange, okukkiriza kwange, okuumiikiriza kwange, okwagala kwage, okulindirira kwange, 
55_3_11_okuyigganyizibwa kwange, okubonaabona kwange; ebyambeerako mu Antiyokiya, mu Ikoniyo, mu Lusitula; okuyigganyizibwa kwe nnayigganyizibwanga bwe kwali: era Mukama waffe yandokola mu byonna. 
55_3_12_Naye era bonna abaagala mu Kristo Yesu okukwatanga empisa ez'okutya Katonda banaayigganyizibwanga. 
55_3_13_Naye abantu ababi n'abeetulinkirira balyeyongera okuyitiriranga mu bubi, nga balinba era nga balimbibwa. 
55_3_14_Naye ggwe beeranga mu ebyo bye wayiga n'otegeerera ddala, ng'omanyi bakuyigiriza bwe bali; 
55_3_15_era ng'okuva mu buto wamanyanga ebyawandiikibwa ebitukuvu ebiyinza okukugeziwaza okuyingira mu bulokovu olw'okukkiriza okuli mu Kristo Yesu. 
55_3_16_Buli ekyawandiikibwa kirina okuluŋŋamya kwa Katonda, era kigasa olw'okuyigirizanga, olw'okunenyanga, olw'okutereezanga, olw'okubuulira okuli mu butuukirivu; 
55_3_17_omuntu wa Katonda alemenga okubulwa kyonna kyonna, ng'alina ddala byonna olwa buli mulimu omulungi. 
55_4_1_Nkukuutirira mu maaso ga Katonda ne Kristo Yesu; alisalira omusango abalamu n'abafu, era n'olw'okulabika kwe n'obwakabaka bwe 
55_4_3_Kubanga ebiro birijja lwe batalikkiriza kuwulira kuyigiriza kwa bulamu; naye, amatu aga gabasiiwa, balikuŋŋaanya abayigiriza ng'okwegomba kwabwe bo bwe kuli 
55_4_5_Naye ggwe tamiirukukanga mu byonna, bonaabonanga, kolanga omulimu ogw'omubuulizi w'enjiri, tuukirizanga okuweereza kwo. 
55_4_6_Kubanga nze kaakano nfukibwa, n'ebiro eby'okuteebwa kwange bituuse. 
55_4_7_Nnwanye okulwana okulungi, olugendo ndutuusizza, okukkiriza nkukuumye: 
55_4_8_ekisigaddeyo, enterekeddwa engule ey'obutuukirivu Mukama waffe gy'alimpeera ku lunaku luli, asala emisango egy'ensonga: so si nze nzekka. naye era ne bonna abaagala okulabika kwe. 
55_4_9_Fuba okujja gye ndi mangu: 
55_4_10_kubanga Dema yandekawo, ng'ayagala emirembe egya kaakano, n'agenda e Ssessaloniika; Kulesuke e Ggalatiya, Tito e Dalumatiya. 
55_4_11_Lukka ye ali awamu nange yekka. Twala Makko, omuleete wamu naawe;.kubanga angasa olw'okuweereza. 
55_4_12_Naye Tukiko nnamutuma mu Efeso. 
55_4_13_Ekyambalo kye nnaleka mu Tulowa ewa Kappo, bw'oliba ng'ojja, kireete, n'ebitabo, naye, okusinga, biri eby'amaliba. 
55_4_14_Alegezanda omuweesi w'ebikomo yankola obubi bungi: Mukama waffe alimusasula ng'ebikolwa bye bwe byali: 
55_4_15_oyo naawe omwekuumanga; kubanga yaziyiza nnyo ebigambo byaffe. 
55_4_16_Mu kuwoza kwange okw'olubereberye siwali eyannyamba, naye bonna banjabulira: nsaba baleme okukibalirwa. 
55_4_17_Naye Mukama waffe yayimirira kumpi nange, n’ampa amaanyi; nze ndyoke atuukirize kye mbuulira, era ab'amawanga bonna balyoke bawulire: ne ndokoka mu kamwa k'empologoma. 
55_4_18_Mukama waffe anandokolanga mu buli kikolwa ekibi, era anankuumanga okutuusa ku bwakabaka bwe obw'omu ggulu: aweebwenga ekitiibwa emirembe n'emirembe. Amiina. 
55_4_19_Lamusa Pulisika ne Akula, n'ennyumba ya Onesifolo. 
55_4_20_Erasuto yabeera mu Kkolinso: naye Tulofiimo nnamuleka mu Mireeto ng'alwadde. 
55_4_21_Fuba okujja ebiro by'empewo nga tebinnatuuka. Ewubulo akulamusizza, ne Pudente, ne Lino, ne Kulawudiya, n'ab'oluganda bonna. 
55_4_22_Mukama waffe abeerenga n'omwoyo gwo: Ekisa kibeerenga nammwe. 
56_1_1_Pawulo, omuddu wa Katonda, era omutume wa Yesu Kristo, ng'okukkiriza kw'abalonde ba Katonda bwe kuli n'okutegeera amazima agali mu kutya Katonda, 
56_1_2_mu kusuubira obulamu obutaggwaawo, Katonda atayinza kulimba bwe yasuubiza ebiro eby'emirembe n'emirembe nga tebinnabaawo 
56_1_5_Kyennava nkuleka mu Kuleete, olyoke olongoosenga ebyasigalira, era oteekenga abakadde mu buli kibuga a nga nze bwe nnakulagira 
56_1_7_Kubanga omulabirizi kimugwanira obutabangako musango, ng'omuwanika wa Katonda; si mukakanyavu, si wa busungu, si ayombera ku mwenge, si akuba, si eyeegomba amagoba mu bukuusa 
56_1_10_Kubanga eriyo bangi abatagonda, aboogera ebitaliimu, abalimba, era okusinga ba mu bakomole, 
56_1_11_abagwanira okuzibibwanga emimwa; kubanga abo be bavuunika ennyumba ennamba nga bayigiriza ebitabagwanidde, olw'amagoba ag'obukuusa: 
56_1_12_Omu ku bo, nnabbi waabwe bo, yagamba nti Abakuleete balimba ennaku zonna, ensolo embi, embuto engayaavu. 
56_1_13_Okutegeeza okwo kwa mazima. Kyova oba boggoleranga n'obukambwe, balyoke babeere n'obulamu olw'okukkiriza 
56_1_14_balemenga okuwulira enfumo ez'obulimba ez'Ekiyudaaya n'ebiragiro by'abantu abakyuka okuleka amazima. 
56_1_15_Eri abalongoofu byonna birongoofu: naye abasiigibwa obugwagwa n'abatakkiriza eri abo tewali kirongoofu; naye amagezi gaabwe era n'omwoyo byasiigibwa obugwagwa. 
56_1_16_Baatula nga bamanyi Katonda; naye mu bikolwa byabwe bamwegaana, kubanga bagwagwa era abatawulira era abatasiimibwa mu buli kikolwa kyonna ekirungi. 
56_2_1_Naye ggwe yogeranga ebisaanira okuyigiriza okw'obulamu: 
56_2_2_abasajja abakadde balemenga kuba batamiivu, nga balimu ekitiibwa, nga beegendereza nga balina obulamu olw'okukkiriza, olw'okwagala, olw'okugumiikiriza: 
56_2_3_n'abakazi abakadde bwe batyo mu kifaananyi kyabwe nga beewombeeka, si abawaayiriza, so si abafugibwa omwenge omungi, abayigiriza ebirungi 
56_2_5_okwegenderezanga, okuba n'obulongoofu, okukolanga emirimu mu nnyumba zaabwe, okuba n'ekisa, okugonderanga babbaabwe, ekigambo kya Katonda kiremenga okuvumibwa: 
56_2_6_n'abavubuka bwe batyo obabuuliriranga okwegendereza: 
56_2_7_mu bigambo byonna nga weeraganga ng'ekyokulabirako eky'ebikolwa ebirungi; mu kuyigiriza kwo ng'olaganga obugolokofu, okubaamu ekitiibwa, 
56_2_8_ebigambo eby'obulamu ebitanenyezeka; oyo atali ku lulwo alyoke akwatibwenga ensonyi, nga talina kibi kya kutwogerako. 
56_2_9_Buuliriranga abaddu okugonderanga bakama baabwe, okusiimibwanga mu byonna, obutayombanga; 
56_2_10_obutabbanga, naye okulaganga obwesigwa obulungi bwonna; balyoke bayonjenga okuyigiriza kw'Omulokozi waffe Katonda mu byonna. 
56_2_11_Kubanga ekisa kya Katonda kirabise, nga kireetera abantu bonna obulokozi, 
56_2_12_nga kitubuulirira okugaananga obutatya Katonda n'okwegomba okw'omu nsi, tulyoke tubeerenga abalamu mu mirembe egya kaakano mu kwegendereza n'obutuukirivu n'okutya Katonda, 
56_2_13_nga tulindirira essuubi ery'omukisa n'okulabika kw'ekitiibwa kya Katonda omukulu era Omulokozi waffe Yesu Kristo; 
56_2_14_eyeewaayo ku lwaffe, alyoke atununule mu bujeemu bwonna, era yeerongooseze eggwanga ery'envuma, erinyiikirira ebikolwa ebirungi. 
56_2_15_Yogeranga ebyo, obibuulirirenga, onenyenga n'obuyinza bwonna, Omuntu yenna takunyoomanga. 
56_3_1_Obajjukizenga okugonderanga abafuga n'abalina obuyinza, okuwuliranga, okweteekerateekeranga buli kikolwa kyonna ekirungi, 
56_3_2_obutavumanga muntu yenna, obutalwananga, okwewombeekanga, nga balaga obukkakkamu bwonna eri abantu bonna. 
56_3_3_Kubanga era naffe edda twali basirusiru, abatawulira, abalimbibwa, nga tuweereza okwegomba n'ebinyumu ebitali bimu, nga tubeera mu ttima n'obuggya, abeekyayisa, era nga tukyawagana. 
56_3_4_Naye obulungi bw'Omulokozi waffe Katonda n'okwagala kwe eri abantu bwe byalabika, 
56_3_5_n'atulokola, si lwa bikolwa eby'omu butuukirivu bye twakola ffe wabula olw'okusaasira kwe, olw'okunaazibwa okw'okuzaalibwa omulundi ogw'okubiri n'okufuulibwa abaggya Omwoyo Omutukuvu, 
56_3_6_gwe yatufukako olw'obugagga, ku bwa Yesu Kristo Omulokozi waffe 
56_3_8_Ekigambo kino kyesigwa, ne ku bino njagala ggwe okukakasizanga ddala, abakkiriza Katonda bajjukirenga okussaako omwoyo ku bikolwa ebirungi. Ebyo birungi, era bigasa abantu: 
56_3_9_naye empaka ez'obusiru n'ebitabo ebirimu endyo z'okuzaalibwa n'ennyombo n'okuwakanira amateeka obyewalenga; kubanga tebiriiko kye bigasa so tebiriimu. 
56_3_10_Omuntu omukyamu, bw'omalanga okumubuulirira omulundi ogw'olubereberye n'ogw'okubiri, omugaananga, 
56_3_11_ng'omanya ng'ali ng'oyo akyamizibwa, era ayonoona, nga yeesalira yekka omusango. 
56_3_12_Bwe ntumanga Atema gy'oli oba Tukiko, fuba okujja gye ndi mu Nikopoli: kubanga nteesezza okumalira eyo ebiro eby'empewo. 
56_3_13_Fuba okubasibirira Zeena ow'amateeka ne Apolo, baleme okubulwa ekintu. 
56_3_14_Era abaffe bayige okussangako omwoyo ku bikolwa ebirungi mu bigambo ebyetaagibwa, balemenga obutabala. 
56_3_15_Abali nange bonna bakulamusizza. Olamuse abatwagala mu kukkiriza. Ekisa kibeerenga nammwe mwenna. 
57_1_1_Pawulo, omusibe wa Kristo Yesu ne Timoseewo ow'oluganda, eri Firemooni omwagalwa era mukozi munnaffe, 
57_1_2_ne Apofiya ow'oluganda ne Alukipo mulwanyi munnaffe, n'ekkanisa eri mu nnyumba yo: 
57_1_3_ekisa n'emirembe ebiwa eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo bibeerenga gye muli. 
57_1_4_Nneebaza Katonda wange ennaku zonna, nga nkwogerako mu kusaba kwange, 
57_1_5_bwe nnawulira okwagala kwo n'okukkiriza kw'olina eri Mukama waffe Yesu n'eri abatukuvu bonna 
57_1_7_Kubanga nnajaguza nnyo ne nsanyuka olw'okwagala kwo, kubanga emyoyo gy'abatukuvu wabiwummuza, ow'oluganda. 
57_1_8_Kale, newakubadde nga nnina obuvumu bwonna mu Kristo okukulagira ekisaana, 
57_1_9_naye olw'okwagala nkwegayirira bwegayirizi, kuba nfaanana nga bwe ndi, Pawulo omukadde, era kaakano omusibe wa Kristo Yesu: 
57_1_10_nkwegayirira olw'omwana wange, gwe nnazaalira mu busibe bwange, Onnessimo, 
57_1_11_ataakugasanga edda, naye kaakano atugasa ggwe nange: 
57_1_12_gwe nkomyawo gy'oli yennyini, ye gwe mwoyo gwange: 
57_1_13_nze gwe mbadde njagala okubeera naye gye ndi, alyoke ampeerezenga mu kifo kyo mu busibe bw'enjiri: 
57_1_14_naye ssaayagala kukola kigambo nga toteesezza, obulungi bwo buleme okubeera mu kuwalirizibwa, wabula mu kwagala. 
57_1_15_Kubanga mpozzi kyeyava ayawukana naawe ekiseera, olyoke obeerenga naye emirembe n'emirembe; nga takyali muddu nate, naye okusinga omuddu, ow'oluganda omwagalwa, okusinga ennyo gye ndi, naye okusingira ddala eri ggwe mu mubiri era ne mu Mukama waffe. 
57_1_16_nga takyali muddu nate, naye okusinga omuddu, ow'oluganda omwagalwa, okusinga ennyo gye ndi, naye okusingira ddala eri ggwe mu mubiri era ne mu Mukama waffe. 
57_1_17_Kale oba ng'ondowooza nze okubeera munno, musembeze oyo nga nze. 
57_1_18_Naye oba nga yakwonoona oba abanjibwa, mbalira nze ekyo; 
57_1_19_nze Pawulo mpandiise n'omukono gwange, nze ndisasula: nneme okukugamba nga nkubanja era naawe wekka nate. 
57_1_20_Kale, ow'oluganda, onsanyuse mu Mukama waffe: owummuze omwoyo gwange mu Kristo. 
57_1_21_Nkuwandiikidde nga nneesiga obugonvu bwo, nga mmanyi ng'olikola era okusinga bye njogera. 
57_1_22_Naye era nate onnongoosereze aw'okusula: kubanga nsuubira olw'okusaba kwammwe muliweebwa okundaba. 
57_1_23_Eyafula musibe munnange mu Kristo Yesu, akulamusizza; 
57_1_24_ne Makko, Alisutaluuko, Dema, Lukka, bakozi bannange. 
57_1_25_Ekisa kya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo kibeerenga n'omwoyo gwammwe. Amiina. 
58_1_1_Katonda edda bwe yayogereranga mu bitundu ebingi ne mu ngeri ennyingi eri bajjajjaffe mu bannabbi, 
58_1_2_mu nnaku zino ez'oluvannyuma yayogerera naffe mu Mwana, gwe yassaawo okuba omusika wa byonna, era gwe yatonza ebintu byonna 
58_1_5_Kubanga ani ku bamalayika gwe yali abuuliddeko nti Ggwe oli Mwana wange, Leero nkuzadde ggwe? era nate nti Nze nnaabeeranga Kitaawe gy'ali, Naye anaabeeranga Mwana gye ndi? 
58_1_6_Era nate bw'aleeta omubereberye mu nsi, ayogera nti Era bamalayika ba Katonda bonna bamusinzenga. 
58_1_7_Era ayogera ku bamalayika nti Afuula bamalayika be empewo, N'abaweereza be ennimi z'omuliro: 
58_1_8_naye ku Mwana ayogera nti Entebe yo, ai Katonda, ya lubeerera emirembe a'emirembe; N'omuggo ogw'obugolokofu gwe muggo ogw'obwakabaka bwo. 
58_1_9_Wayagala obutuukirivu, n'okyawa obujeemu; Katonda, Katonda wo, kyavudde akufukako Amafuta ag'okusanyuka okusinga banno. 
58_1_10_Era nti Ggwe, Mukama, ku lubereberye wassaawo emisingi gy'ensi, N'eggulu mulimu gwa mikono gyo: 
58_1_11_Ebyo biriggwaawo; naye ggwe oli wa lubeerera: N'ebyo byonna birikaddiwa ng'ekyambalo; 
58_1_12_Era olibizinga ng'essuuka, Ng'ekyambalo, ne biwaanyisibwa: Naye ggwe oba bumu, N'emyaka gyo tegiriggwaawo. 
58_1_13_Naye ku malayika ki gwe yali ayogeddeko nti Tuula ku mukono gwange ogwa ddyo, Okutuusa lwe ndifuula abalabe bo entebe y'ebigere byo? 
58_1_14_Bonna si gy'emyoyo egiweereza, nga gitumibwa okuweereza olw'abo abagenda okusikira obulokozi? 
58_2_1_Kyekivudde kitugwanira okusinga ennyo okulowooleza ddala ebyawulirwa, kabekasinge tuwaba ne tubivaako. 
58_2_2_Kuba oba ng'ekigambo ekyayogerwa bamalayika kyanywera, na buli kyonoono n'obutawulira byaweebwanga empeera ey'ensonga 
58_2_5_Kubanga bamalayika si be yafuza ensi egenda okubaawo, gye twogerako. 
58_2_6_Naye waliwo ekifo omu we yategeereza, ng'ayogera nti Omuntu kiki, ggwe okumujjukira? Oba omwana w'omuntu, ggwe okumujjira? 
58_2_7_Wamukola okubulako akatono okuba nga bamalayika; Wamussaako engule ey'ekitiibwa n'ettendo, N'omufuza emirimu egy'emikono gyo: 
58_2_8_Wateeka ebintu byonna wansi w'ebigere bye. Kubanga mu kuteeka ebintu byonna wansi we teyaggyako kintu obutakiteeka wansi we. Naye kaakano tetunnalaba bintu byonna nga biteekeddwa wansi we. 
58_2_9_Naye tutunuulira oyo eyakolebwa okubulako akatono okuba nga bamalayika, ye Yesu, olw'okubonaabona okw'okufa ng'assibwako engule ey'ekitiibwa n'ettendo, olw'ekisa kya Katonda alyoke alege ku kufa ku lwa buli muntu. 
58_2_10_Kubanga kyamusaanira oyo ebintu byonna bwe biri ku bubwe era eyabikozesa byonna, ng'aleeta abaana abangi mu kitiibwa, okutuukiriza omukulu w'obulokozi bwabwe olw'ebibonoobono. 
58_2_11_Kubanga oyo atukuza en, n'abo abatukuzibwa b'omu bonna: kyava alema okukwatibwa ensonyi okubayitanga ab'oluganda, 
58_2_12_ng'ayogera nti Ndibuulira baganda bange erinnya lyo, Ndikuyimba wakati mu kkuŋŋaaniro. 
58_2_13_Era nate nti Nze nnaamwesiganga oyo. Era nate nti Laba nze n'abaana Katonda be yampa. 
58_2_14_Kale kubanga abaana bagatta omusaayi n'omubiri, era naye yennyini bw'atyo yagatta ebyo; olw'okufa alyoke azikirize oyo eyalina amaanyi ag'okufa, ye Setaani; 
58_2_15_era alyoke abawe eddembe abo bonna abali mu buddu obulamu bwabwe bwonna olw'entiisa y'okufa. 
58_2_16_Kubanga mazima bamalayika si b'ayamba, naye ayamba zzadde lya Ibulayimu. 
58_2_17_Kyekyava kimugwanira mu byonna okufaananyizibwa baganda be, alyoke abeerenga kabona asinga obukulu ow'ekisa omwesigwa mu bigambo ebiri eri Katonda, olw'okutangirira ebibi by'abantu. 
58_2_18_Kubanga olw'okubonyaabonyezebwa ye yennyini ng'akemebwa, kyava ayinza okubayamba abo abakemebwa. 
58_3_1_Kale, ab'oluganda abatukuvu, abalina omugabo mu kuyitibwa okw'omu ggulu, mulowooze Omutume era Kabona Asinga Obukulu ow'eddiini gwe twatula, Yesu 
58_3_3_Kubanga oyo asaanyizibwa ekitiibwa ekingi okusinga Musa, ng'azimba ennyumba bw'abeera n'ettendo eringi okusinga ennyumba. 
58_3_4_Kubanga buli nnyumba wabaawo agizimba; naye eyazimba byonna ye Katonda. 
58_3_5_Ne Musa yali mwesigwa ye mu nnyumba ye yonna ng'omuddu, olw'okutegeeza ebyali bigenda okwogerwa 
58_3_7_Kale, nga Omwoyo Omutukuvu bw'ayogera nti Leero bwe munaawulira eddoboozi lye, 
58_3_8_Temukakanyaza mitima gyammwe, nga mu kusunguwazibwa, Nga ku lunaku olw'okukemerwa mu ddungu, 
58_3_9_Bajjajjammwe kwe bankema, nga bangeza, Ne balaba ebikolwa byange emyaka amakumi ana. 
58_3_10_Kyennava nnyiigira emirembe egyo, Ne njogera nti Bakyama bulijjo mu mutima gwabwe: Naye abo tebaategeera makubo gange; 
58_3_11_Nga bwe nnalayira mu busungu bwange, Nti Tebaliyingira mu kiwummulo kyange. 
58_3_12_Mwekuume, ab'oluganda, omutima omubi ogw'obutakkiriza gulemenga okuba mu muntu yenna ku mmwe, olw'okuva ku Katonda omulamu: 
58_3_13_naye mubuuliraganenga bulijjo bulijjo, okutuusa ekiseera nga kikyaliwo ekiyitibwa ekya leero; omuntu yenna ku mmwe alemenga okukakanyazibwa n'obulimba bw'ekibi: 
58_3_14_kubanga twafuuka abassa ekimu mu Kristo, oba nga tunaakwatiranga ddala okusuubira kwaffe okusoose nga kunywedde okutuusa enkomerero: 
58_3_15_nga bwe kikyayogerwa nti Leero bwe munaawulira eddoboozi lye, Temukakanyaza mitima gyammwe, nga mu kusunguwazibwa. 
58_3_16_Kubanga baani bwe baawulira abaamusunguwaza? si abo bonna abaava mu Misiri ne Musa? 
58_3_17_Era baani be yanyiigiranga emyaka amakumi ana? si abo abaayonoona, n'emirambo gyabwe ne gigwa mu ddungu? 
58_3_18_Era baani be yalayirira obutayingira mu kiwummulo kye, wabula obo abataagonda? 
58_3_19_Era tulaba nga tebaayinza kuyingira olw'obutakkiriza. 
58_4_1_Kale tutyenga nti okusuubiza okw'okuyingira mu kiwummulo nga bwe kukyatulekeddwa, omuntu yenna ku mmwe aleme kulabika nga takutuuseeko. 
58_4_2_Kubanga naffe twabuulirwa enjiri, era nga bo: naye ekigambo eky'okuwulira tekyabagasa bo, kubanga tebaagattibwa mu kukkiriza wamu n'abo abaawulira. 
58_4_3_Kubanga ffe abaamala okukkiriza tuyingira mu kiwummulo ekyo; nga bwe yayogera nti Nga bwe nnalayirira mu busungu bwange, Nti Tebaliyingira mu kiwummulo kyange: newakubadde ng'emirimu gyaggwa okuva mu kutondebwa kw'ensi. 
58_4_4_Kubanga waliwo w'ayogerera ku lunaku olw'omusanvu bw'ati, nti Katonda n'awummulira ku lunaku olw'omusanvu mu mirimu gye gyonna 
58_4_6_Kale kubanga kisigaddeyo abalala okukiyingiramu, n'abo abaasooka okubuulirwa, enjiri ne batayingira olw'obutagonda, 
58_4_7_nate ayawula olunaku gundi, ng'ayogerera mu Dawudi oluvannyuma lw'ebiro ebingi bwe biti, nti Leero, nga bwe kyogeddwa olubereberye, Leero bwe munaawulira eddoboozi lye, Temukakanyaza mitima gyammwe. 
58_4_8_Kuba singa Yoswa yabawummuza, teyandyogedde ku lunaku lulala oluvannyuma lw'ebyo. 
58_4_9_Kale wasigaddeyo ekiwummulo kya ssabbiiti eri abantu ba Katonda. 
58_4_10_Kubanga ayingidde mu kiwummulo kye, era naye ng'awummudde mu mirimu gye, nga Katonda bwe yawummula mu gigye. 
58_4_11_Kale tufubenga okuyingira mu kiwummulo ekyo, omuntu yenna aleme okugwa mu ngeri eyo ey'obutagonda. 
58_4_12_Kubanga ekigambo kya Katonda kiramu, era kikozi, era kisala okusinga buli kitala kyonna eky'obwogi obubiri, era kiyitamu n'okwawula ne kyawula obulamu n'omwoyo, ennyingo n'obusomyo, era kyangu okwawula okulowooza n'okufumiitiriza okw'omu mutima. 
58_4_13_So siwali kitonde ekitalabika mu maaso ge: naye ebintu byonna byeruliddwa era bibikkuliddwa mu maaso g'oyo gwe tuleetera ebigambo byaffe. 
58_4_14_Kale bwe tulina kabona asinga obukulu omunene, eyayita mu ggulu, Yesu Omwana wa Katonda, tunywezenga okwatula kwaffe. 
58_4_15_Kubanga tetulina kabona asinga obukulu atayinza kulumirwa wamu naffe mu bunafu bwaffe; naye eyakemebwa mu byonna bumu nga ffe, so nga ye talina kibi. 
58_4_16_Kale tusemberenga n'obuvumu eri entebe ey'ekisa, tulyoke tuweebwe okusaasirwa, era tufune ekisa olw'okubeerwa bwe tukwetaaga. 
58_5_1_Kubanga buli kabona asinga obukulu, bw'aggibwa mu bantu, ateekebwawo ku bwa bantu mu bigambo ebiri eri Katonda alyoke awengayo ebirabo era ne ssaddaaka olw'ebibi: 
58_5_2_ayinza okukwata empola abatamanyi n'abakyamye, kubanga era naye yennyini yeetooloddwa obunafu 
58_5_4_So omuntu yenna teyeetwalira yekka kitiibwa ekyo, wabula ng'ayitiddwa Katonda, era nga Alooni. 
58_5_5_Era bw'atyo Kristo teyeegulumiza yekka okufuuka kabona asinga obukulu, wabula oyo eyamugamba nti Ggwe oli Mwana wange, Leero nkuzadde ggwe: 
58_5_6_era nga bw'ayogera awalala nti Ggwe oli kabona emirembe gyonna ng'engeri ya Merukizeddeeki bw'eri. 
58_5_7_Oyo mu nnaku ze yabeereramu mu mubiri gwe, bwe yawaayo okwegayirira n'okusaba eri oyo eyayinza okumulokola mu kufa n'okukaaba ennyo n'amaziga, era bwe yawulirwa olw'okutya kwe Katonda, 
58_5_8_newakubadde nga Mwana, naye yayiga okugonda olw'ebyo bye yabonaabona: 
58_5_9_awo bwe yamala okutuukirizibwa, n'afuuka ensonga y'obulokozi obutaggwaawo eri abo bonna abamuwulira; 
58_5_10_Katonda gwe yayita kabona asinga obukulu ng'engeri ya Merukizeddeeki bw'eri. 
58_5_11_Gwe tulinako ebigambo ebingi okwogera era ebizibu okutegeeza, kubanga mufuuse baggavu b'amatu. 
58_5_12_Kubanga bwe kibagwanira okubeeranga abayigiriza olw'ebiro ebyayita, mwetaaga nate omuntu okubayigiriza ebisookerwako eby'olubereberye eby'ebigambo bya Katonda; era mufuuse abeetaaga amata, so si mmere nkalubo. 
58_5_13_Kubanga buli anywa amata nga tannamanya kigambo kya butuukirivu; kubanga mwana muto. 
58_5_14_Naye emmere enkalubo ya bakulu, abalina amagezi agayigirizibwa olw'okugakoza okwa wulanga obulungi n'obubi. 
58_6_1_Kale tuleke okwogera ku bigambo eby'olubereberye ebya Kristo, tuyitirire okutuuka mu bukulu; obutateekawo mulundi gwa kubiri musingi, kwe kwenenya ebikolwa ebifu, n'okukkiriza eri Katonda, 
58_6_2_okuyigiriza okw'okubatiza, n'okuteekako emikono, n'okuzuukira kw'abafu, n'omusango ogutaggwaawo. 
58_6_3_Era bwe tunaakola bwe tutyo Katonda bw'anaayagala. 
58_6_4_Kubanga abo abamala okwakirwa, ne balega ku kirabo eky'omu ggulu, ne bafuuka abassa ekimu mu Mwoyo Omutukuvu, 
58_6_5_ne balega ku kigambo ekirungi ekya Katonda ne ku maanyi ag'emirembe egigenda okujja, 
58_6_6_ne bagwa okubivaamu, tekiyinzika bo okubazza obuggya olw'okwenenya; nga beekomererera bokka omulundi ogw'okubiri Omwana wa Katonda, ne bamukwasa ensonyi mu lwatu. 
58_6_7_Kubanga ensi enywa enkuba egitonnyako emir u, emingi, n'ebala enva ezibasaa nira abo b'erimirwa, efuna omugabo gw'omukisa eri Katonda: 
58_6_8_naye bw'ebala amaggwa ne ssere, tesii mibwa era eri kumpi n'okukolimirwa; enkomerero yaayo kwokebwa. 
58_6_9_Naye, abaagalwa, twetegerezza ku mmwe ebigambo ebisinga ebyo obulungi era ebiri okumpi n'obulokozi, newakubadde nga twogeddi bwe tutyo: 
58_6_10_kubanga Katonda mutuukirivu tayinza kwerabira mulimu gwammwe n'okwagala kwe mwalaga eri erinnya lye, bwe mwaweereza abatukuvu, era mukyaweereza. 
58_6_11_Era twagala nnyo bili muntu ku mmwe okulaganga obunyiikivu obwo olw'okwetegerereza ddala essuubi eryo okutuusa ku nkomerero: 
58_6_12_mulemenga okubeera abagayaavu, naye abagoberera abo olw'okukkiriza n'okugumiikiriza abasikira ebyasuubizibwa. 
58_6_13_Kubanga, Katonda bwe yasuubiza Ibulayimu, bwe watali gw'ayinza kulayira amusinga obukulu, ne yeerayira yekka 
58_6_14_ng'ayogera nti Mazima okuwa omukisa nnaakuwanga omukisa, n'okwaza nnaakwazanga. 
58_6_15_Bw'atyo bwe yamala okugumiikiriza n'aweebwa ekyasuubizibwa 
58_6_16_Kubanga abantu balayira asinga obukulu: ne mu mpaka zaabwe zonna ekirayiro kye kisalawo okukakasa. 
58_6_17_Katonda kyeyava ateeka wakati ekirayiro, ng'ayagala okubooleseza ddala ennyo abasika ab'ekyasuubizibwa okuteesa kwe bwe kutajjulukuka: 
58_6_18_olw'ebigambo ebibiri ebitajjulukuka, Katonda by'atayinza kulimbiramu, tulyoke tubeerenga n'ekitugumya ekinywevu ffe abadduka okunoonya ekyekwekero okunyweza essuubi eryateekebwa mu maaso gaffe; 
58_6_19_lye tulina ng'essika ery'obulamu, essuubi eri tabuusibwabuusibwa era erinywevu era eriyingira munda w'eggigi. 
58_6_20_Yesu mwe yayingira omukulembeze ku lwaffe, bwe yafuuka ka bona asinga obukulu emirembe gyonna ng'engeri ya Merukizeddeeki bw'eri. 
58_7_1_Kubanga Merukizeddeeki oyo kabaka w’e Ssaalemi, kabona wa Katonda Ali waggulu ennyo, eyasisinkana Ibulayimu ng'akomawo ng'ava okutta bakabaka, n'amusabira omukisa, 
58_7_2_era Ibulayimu gwe yagabira ekitundu eky'ekkumi ekya byonna (eky'oluberereberye, mu kutegeezebwa, kabaka wa butuukirivu, era eky'okubiri, kabaka w'e Ssaalemi, ye kabaka ow'emirembe 
58_7_4_Kale mulowooze omuntu oyo bwe yali omukulu, Ibulayimu jjajja omukulu gwe yawa ekitundu eky'ekkumi ku munyago ogw'okwebonaanya. 
58_7_5_N'abo ab'omu baana ba Leevi abaaweebwa obwakabona amateeka gabalagira okusoloozanga ebitundu eby'ekkumi mu bantu, be baganda baabwe, newakubadde ng'abo bava mu ntumbwe za Ibulayimu: 
58_7_6_naye oyo, atabalibwa mu kika kyabwe, yasolooza Ibulayimu n'asabira omukisa nnannyini byasuubizibwa. 
58_7_7_Naye, tekyegaanika n'akatono, omuto yasabirwa omukulu omukisa. 
58_7_8_Era mu ekyo abaweebwa ebitundu eby'ekkumi be bantu abafa; naye mu kiri abiweebwa ye oyo ategeezebwa nga mulamu. 
58_7_9_Era, okwogera bwe kuti, ne Leevi, aweebwa omusolo, yaguweerayo mu Ibulayimu; 
58_7_10_kubanga yali akyali mu ntumbwe za jjajjaawe, Merukizeideeki bwe yamusisinkana. 
58_7_11_Kale okutuukirira singa kwaiwo lwa bwakabona obw'Ekileevi kubanga abantu baaweebwa amateeka mu biro byabwo), kiki ekyeaaza nate kabona ow'okubiri okulimuka mu ngeri ya Merukizeddeeki, n'atabalirwa mu ngeri ya Alooni? 
58_7_12_Kubanga obwakabona bwe buwaaayisibwa, era n'amateeka tegalema kuwaanyisibwa. 
58_7_13_Kubanga oyo eyayogerwako ebigambo byo wa kika kirala omutavanga auntu yenna eyali aweerezza ku kyoto. 
58_7_14_Kubanga kitegeerekese ga Mukama waffe yava mu Yuda; ekika Musa ky'atayogerako bigambo ya bakabona. 
58_7_15_N'ebyo byeyogera nnyo okutegeerekeka, oba nga ayimuka kabona ow'okubiri ng'ekifaananyi kya Merukizeddeeki bwe kiri, 
58_7_16_atalondebwa ng'amateeka bwe gali agalimu ekiragiro ky'omubiri, wabula ng'amaanyi bwe gali ag'obulamu obutakutuka: 
58_7_17_kubanga ategeezebwa nti Oli kabona okutuusa emirembe gyonna Ng'engeri ya Merukizeddeeki bw'eri. 
58_7_18_Kubanga ekiragiro ekyasooka kijjulukuka olw'obunafu n'obutagasa bwakyo 
58_7_19_(kubanga amateeka tagaliiko kye gaatuukiriza), essuubi erisinga obulungi ne liyingizibwa, eritusembezesa eri Katonda. 
58_7_20_Era bwe wataabula kulayira kirayiro 
58_7_21_(kubanga bo baafuulibwa bakabona awatali kirayiro; naye oyo awamu n'ekirayiro yafuulibwa oyo amwogerako nti Mukama yalayira, era talyejjusa, nti Oli kabona okutuusa emirembe gyonna); 
58_7_22_era ne Yesu bwe yafuuka bw'atyo omuyima w'endagaano esinga obulungi. 
58_7_23_Nabo bangi baafuulibwa bakabona, kubanga okufa kwabalobera okubeereranga: 
58_7_24_naye oyo, kubanga abeerera okutuusa emirembe gyonna, alina obwakabona obutavaawo. 
58_7_25_Era kyava ayinza okulokolera ddala abajja eri Katonda ku bubwe, kubanga abeera mulamu ennaku zonna okubawolerezanga. 
58_7_26_Kubanga kabona asinga obukulu afaanana bw'atyo ye yatusaani.ra, omutukuvu, ataliiko kabi, ataliiko bbala, eyayawulibwa eri abo abalina ebibi, era eyagulumizibwa okukira eggulu; 
58_7_27_atawalirizibwa, nga bakabona abasinga obukulu bali, okuwangayo ssaddaaka buli lunaku, okusooka olw'ebibi bye yennyini, oluvannyuma olw'ebyo eby'abantu: kubanga okwo yakukolera ddala omulundi gumu, bwe yeewaayo yennyini. 
58_7_28_Kubanga amateeka galonda abantu okuba bakabona abasinga obukulu, abalina obunafu; naye ekigambo eky'ekirayiro, ekyaddirira amateeka, kyalonda Omwana, eyatuukirizibwa okutuusa emirembe gyonna. 
58_8_1_Kale mu bigambo bye twogedde kino kye kikolo: tulina kabona asinga obukulu, afaanana bw'atyo, eyatuula ku mukono ogwa ddyo ogw'entebe ey'Obukulu obw'omu ggulu, 
58_8_2_omuweereza w'ebitukuvu, era ow'eweema ey'amazima, Mukama gye yasimba, si muntu. 
58_8_3_Kubanga buli kabona asinga obukulu alondebwa olw'omulimu ogw'okuwangayo ebirabo era ne ssaddaaka: kyekiva kimugwanira n'oyo okubeera n'ekintu eky'okuwaayo. 
58_8_4_Kale singa yali ku nsi, teyandibadde kabona n'akatono, nga waliwo abawaayo ebirabo ng'amateeka bwe gali 
58_8_6_Naye kaakano aweereddwa okuweereza okusinga okuwooma, era nga bw'ali omubaka w'endagaano esinga obulungi, kubanga yalagaanyizibwa olw'ebyasuubizibwa ebisinga obulungi. 
58_8_7_Kuba endagaano eri ey'olubereberye singa teyaliiko kya kunenyezebwa, tewandinoonyezebbwa bbanga ery'ey'okubiri. 
58_8_8_Kubanga bw'abanenya ayogera nti Laba, ennaku zijja, bw'ayogera Mukama, Bwe ndiragaana endagaano empya n'ennyumba ya Isiraeri era n'ennyumba ya Yuda 
58_8_10_Kubanga eno ye ndagaano gye ndiragaana n'ennyumba ya Isiraeri Oluvannyuma lw'ennaku ziri, bw'ayogera Mukama; Nditeeka amateeka gange mu magezi gaabwe, Era ne ku mutima gwabwe ndigawandiika; Nange nnaabeeranga Katonda gye bali, Nabo banaabeeranga bantu gye ndi: 
58_8_11_So buli muntu tebaliyigiriza munne, Na buli muntu muganda we, ng'ayogera nti Manya Mukama: Kubanga bonna balimmanya, Okuva ku muto okutuuka ku mukulu mu bo. 
58_8_12_Kubanga ndisaasira obutali butuukirivu bwabwe, N'ebibi byabwe siribijjukira nate. 
58_8_13_Bw'ayogera nti Endagaano empya ey'olubereberye aba agikaddiyizza. Naye ekikulu era ekikaddiwa kiri kumpi n'okuggwaawo. 
58_9_1_Era n'endagaano ey'olubereberye yalina empisa ezaalagirwa ez'okusinzanga Katonda, n'ekifo ekitukuvu, eky'omu nsi. 
58_9_2_Kubanga eweema yakolwa, ey'olubereberye eyalimu ekikondo ky'ettabaaza n'emmeeza n'emigaati egy'okulaga; awaayitibwa Awatukuvu. 
58_9_3_Era ennyuma w'eggigi ery'okubiri yaliyo eweema eyitibwa Entukuvu ennyo 
58_9_6_Naye ebyo bwe byakolebwa bwe bityo, bakabona bayingira mu weema ey'olubereberye obutayosa, nga batuukiriza emirimu egy'okuweereza 
58_9_8_Omwoyo Omutukuvu ng'ategeeza kino, ng'ekkubo eritwala mu kifo ekitukuvu terinnalabisibwa, ng'eweema ey'olubereberye ekyayimiriddewo 
58_9_10_kubanga ze mpisa ezaalagirwa ez'omubiri obubiri (era awamu n'ez'okulya n'ez'okunywa n'ez'okunaaba okutali kumu) ezaateekebwawo okutuusa ku biro eby'okudda obuggya. 
58_9_11_Naye Kristo bwe yajja kabona asinga obukulu ow'ebigambo ebirungi ebigenda okujja, n'ayita mu weema esinga obukulu n'okutuukirira, etaakolebwa na mikono, amakulu, etali ya mu nsi muno, 
58_9_12_so si lwa musaayi gwa mbuzi n'ennyana, naye lwa musaayi gwe ye, n'ayingirira ddala omulundi gumu mu watukuw, bwe yamala okufuna okununula okutaggwaawo. 
58_9_13_Kuba oba ng'omusaayi gw'embuzi n'ente ennume n'evvu ly'ente enduusi, ebimansirwa ku abo abalina empitambi, bitukuza okunaaza omubiri; 
58_9_14_omusaayi gwa Kristo, eyeewaayo yekka olw'Omwoyo ataggwaawo eri Katonda nga taliiko bulema, tegulisinga nnyo okunaaza omwoyo gwammwe mu bikolwa ebifu okuweereza Katonda omulamu? 
58_9_15_Era ye kyava abeera omubaka w'endagaano empya, okufa bwe kwabeerawo olw'okununula mu byonoono eby'omu ndagaano ey'olubereberye, abayitibwa balyoke baweebwe okusuubiza kw'obusika obutaggwaawo. 
58_9_16_Kubanga awaba endagaano ey'obusika, kigwana okubaawo okufa kw'oyo eyagiragaana. 
58_9_17_Kubanga endagaano ey'obusika enywerera awaba okufa: kubanga yali etuukirizza ekyagiragaanyisa eyagiragaana ng'akyali mulamu? 
58_9_18_Era n'endagaano ey'olubereberye kyeyava erema okusookebwa awatali musaayi. 
58_9_19_Kubanga buli kiragiro bwe kyamalanga okwogerwa Musa eri abantu bonna ng'amateeka bwe gali, n'atwalanga omusaayi gw'ennyana n'embuzi, wamu n'amazzi n'ebyoya by'endiga ebimyufu n'ezoobu, n'amansiranga ku kitabo kyennyini, era ne ku bantu bonna, 
58_9_20_ng'ayogera nti Guno gwe musaayi gw'endagaano Katonda gye ya balagira. 
58_9_21_Era nate eweema n'ebintu byonna eby'okuweereza n'abimansirangako omusaayi bw'atyo. 
58_9_22_Era mu mateeka kubulako katono ebintu byonna okunaazibwa omusaayi, era awataba kuyiwa musaayi tewabaawo kusonyiyibwa. 
58_9_23_Kale ebifaananyi by'ebye eby'omu ggulu kyabigwanira okunaazibwa n'ebyo, naye eby'omu ggulu byennyini okunaazibwa ne ssaddaaka ezisinga ezo. 
58_9_24_Kubanga Kristo teyayingira mu kifo eki. tukuvu ekyakolebwa n'emikono ekyafaanana ng'ekyo eky'amazima naye mu ggulu mwennyini, okulabika kaakano mu maaso ga Katonda, ku lwaffe: 
58_9_25_so si kwewangayo mirundi mingi; nga kabona asingE obukulu bw'ayingira mu kifo ekitukuvu buli mwaka n'omusaayi ogutali gugwe; 
58_9_26_kubanga kyandimugwanidde okubonaabonanga emirundi emingi okuva ku kutondebwa kw'ensi: naye kaakano omulundi gumu ku nkomerero y'emirembe alabise okuggyawo ekib: olw'okwewaayo yennyini.
